content: ಶ್ರೀ ವಿಷ್ಣು ವಿಶ್ವಾದಿ ಮೂಲ ಮಾಯಾಲೋಲ ।ದೇವ ಸರ್ವೇಶ ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನೆಂದು ಜನಂ  ॥ಆವುದನು ಕಾಣದೊಡಮಳ್ತಿಯಿಂ ನಂಬಿಹುದೊ ।ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧ ॥Sri Vishnu vishvAdi mUla mAyAlola ।deva sarvesha parabommanendu janam ॥Avudanu kanadoDamaLtiyim nambihudo ।A vichitrake namiso  - mankutimma ॥ 1 ॥Oh Mankutimma, salute to that strangeness that people believe heavily in even without seeing. They all describe it differently  - Sri Vishnu, beginning of everything including this world, Weaver of this web of magic, omnipotent God and the creator.
translation: Oh Mankutimma, salute to that strangeness that people believe heavily in even without seeing. They all describe it differently  - Sri Vishnu, beginning of everything including this world, Weaver of this web of magic, omnipotent God and the creator.
title: ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Sri Vishnu vishvAdi mUla mAyAlola ।deva sarvesha parabommanendu janam ॥Avudanu kanadoDamaLtiyim nambihudo ।A vichitrake namiso  - mankutimma ॥ 1 ॥
kagga: ಶ್ರೀ ವಿಷ್ಣು ವಿಶ್ವಾದಿ ಮೂಲ ಮಾಯಾಲೋಲ ।ದೇವ ಸರ್ವೇಶ ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನೆಂದು ಜನಂ  ॥ಆವುದನು ಕಾಣದೊಡಮಳ್ತಿಯಿಂ ನಂಬಿಹುದೊ ।ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧ ॥

content: ಜೀವ ಜಡರೂಪ ಪ್ರಪಂಚವನದಾವುದೋ।ಆವರಿಸಿಕೊಂಡುಮೊಳನೆರೆದುಮಿಹುದಂತೆ॥ಭಾವಕೊಳಪಡದಂತೆ ಅಳತೆಗಳವಡದಂತೆ।ಆ ವಿಶೇಷಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨ ॥jIva jaDarUpa prapanchavanadAvudo ।AvarisikonDum oLaneredum ihudante ॥bhAvakoLapanDante aLategaLavaDadante ।A visheShake namiso  - Mankutimma ॥ 2 ॥Oh Mankutimma, salute that unique thing that has at the same time both surrounded and penetrated every object  - living or otherwise. Neither does it yield to emotions nor can it be measured.
translation: Oh Mankutimma, salute that unique thing that has at the same time both surrounded and penetrated every object  - living or otherwise. Neither does it yield to emotions nor can it be measured.
title: ಆ ವಿಶೇಷಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jIva jaDarUpa prapanchavanadAvudo ।AvarisikonDum oLaneredum ihudante ॥bhAvakoLapanDante aLategaLavaDadante ।A visheShake namiso  - Mankutimma ॥ 2 ॥
kagga: ಜೀವ ಜಡರೂಪ ಪ್ರಪಂಚವನದಾವುದೋ।ಆವರಿಸಿಕೊಂಡುಮೊಳನೆರೆದುಮಿಹುದಂತೆ॥ಭಾವಕೊಳಪಡದಂತೆ ಅಳತೆಗಳವಡದಂತೆ।ಆ ವಿಶೇಷಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨ ॥

content: ಇಹುದೊ ಇಲ್ಲವೊ ತಿಳಿಯಗೊಡದೊಂದು ವಸ್ತು ನಿಜ।ಮಹಿಮೆಯಿಂ ಜಗವಾಗಿ ಜೀವವೇಷದಲಿ ॥ವಿಹರಿಪುದದೊಳ್ಳಿತೆಂಬುದು ನಿಸದವಾದೊಡಾ ।ಗಹನ ತತ್ತ್ವಕೆ ಶರಣೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩ ॥ihudo illavo tiLiyagoDadondu vastu nija ।mahimeyim jagavAgi jIvavEShadali ॥viharipudadu oLLiteMbudu nisadavAdoDA ।gahana tattvake sharaNo  - Mankutimma ॥ 3 ॥Oh Mankutimma, It is very difficult to conclude whether it exists or not. An entity which is manifesting its glory by flowing in this world as life. If it is really true, then seek refuge in that deep thought.
translation: Oh Mankutimma, It is very difficult to conclude whether it exists or not. An entity which is manifesting its glory by flowing in this world as life. If it is really true, then seek refuge in that deep thought.
title: ಗಹನ ತತ್ತ್ವಕೆ ಶರಣೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ihudo illavo tiLiyagoDadondu vastu nija ।mahimeyim jagavAgi jIvavEShadali ॥viharipudadu oLLiteMbudu nisadavAdoDA ।gahana tattvake sharaNo  - Mankutimma ॥ 3 ॥
kagga: ಇಹುದೊ ಇಲ್ಲವೊ ತಿಳಿಯಗೊಡದೊಂದು ವಸ್ತು ನಿಜ।ಮಹಿಮೆಯಿಂ ಜಗವಾಗಿ ಜೀವವೇಷದಲಿ ॥ವಿಹರಿಪುದದೊಳ್ಳಿತೆಂಬುದು ನಿಸದವಾದೊಡಾ ।ಗಹನ ತತ್ತ್ವಕೆ ಶರಣೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩ ॥

content: ದೇವರೆಂಬುದದೇನು ಕಗ್ಗತ್ತಲೆಯ ಗವಿಯೆ? ।ನಾವರಿಯಲಾರದೆಲ್ಲದರೊಟ್ಟು ಹೆಸರೆ? ॥ಕಾವನೊರ್ವನಿರಲ್ಕೆ ಜಗದ ಕಥಯೇಕಿಂತು? ।ಸಾವು ಹುಟ್ಟುಗಳೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫ ॥dEvarembudadEnu kaggattaleya gaviye? ।nAvu ariyalArada elladara oTTu hesare? ॥kAvanu orvanu iralke jagada kathe Eke intu? ।sAvu huTTugaLEnu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 5 ॥Oh Mankutimma! Is God confined to the dark caves (of sanctum sactorum)? Is it the representation of all that we can not understand? If there is one God looking over the entire world, then why is the world;s story like this? What is the secret of birth and death?
translation: Oh Mankutimma! Is God confined to the dark caves (of sanctum sactorum)? Is it the representation of all that we can not understand? If there is one God looking over the entire world, then why is the world;s story like this? What is the secret of birth and death?
title: ಜ್ಞಾನಪ್ರಮಾಣವೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dEvarembudadEnu kaggattaleya gaviye? ।nAvu ariyalArada elladara oTTu hesare? ॥kAvanu orvanu iralke jagada kathe Eke intu? ।sAvu huTTugaLEnu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 5 ॥
kagga: ದೇವರೆಂಬುದದೇನು ಕಗ್ಗತ್ತಲೆಯ ಗವಿಯೆ? ।ನಾವರಿಯಲಾರದೆಲ್ಲದರೊಟ್ಟು ಹೆಸರೆ? ॥ಕಾವನೊರ್ವನಿರಲ್ಕೆ ಜಗದ ಕಥಯೇಕಿಂತು? ।ಸಾವು ಹುಟ್ಟುಗಳೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫ ॥

If there is one God looking over the entire world, then why is the world’s story like this? What is the secret of birth and death?
translation: Oh Mankutimma! Is God confined to the dark caves (of sanctum sactorum)? Is it the representation of all that we can not understand? If there is one God looking over the entire world, then why is the world’s story like this? What is the secret of birth and death?
title: ಸಾವು ಹುಟ್ಟುಗಳೇನು? – ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ

content: ಒಗಟೆಯೇನೀ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ? ಬಾಳಿನರ್ಥವದೇನು? ।ಬಗೆದು ಬಿಡಿಸುವರಾರು ಸೊಜಿಗವನಿದನು? ॥ಜಗವ ನಿರವಿಸಿದ ಕೈಯೊದಾದೊಡೇಕಿಂತು ।ಬಗೆಬಗೆಯ ಜೀವಗತಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬ ॥ogaTe Enu E sRuShTi? bALinarthavadEnu? ।bagedu biDisuvarAru sojigavanu idanu? ॥jagava niravisida kai odAdoDe Ekintu ।bagebageya jIvagati?  - Mankutimma ॥ 6 ॥Oh Mankutimma! Is this world a mere riddle? What is the reason for living? Who will decipher this wonder? If a single hand created this world, then why is there so much diversity in life?
translation: Oh Mankutimma! Is this world a mere riddle? What is the reason for living? Who will decipher this wonder? If a single hand created this world, then why is there so much diversity in life?
title: ಏಕಿಂತು ಬಗೆಬಗೆಯ ಜೀವಗತಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ogaTe Enu E sRuShTi? bALinarthavadEnu? ।bagedu biDisuvarAru sojigavanu idanu? ॥jagava niravisida kai odAdoDe Ekintu ।bagebageya jIvagati?  - Mankutimma ॥ 6 ॥
kagga: ಒಗಟೆಯೇನೀ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ? ಬಾಳಿನರ್ಥವದೇನು? ।ಬಗೆದು ಬಿಡಿಸುವರಾರು ಸೊಜಿಗವನಿದನು? ॥ಜಗವ ನಿರವಿಸಿದ ಕೈಯೊದಾದೊಡೇಕಿಂತು ।ಬಗೆಬಗೆಯ ಜೀವಗತಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬ ॥

content: ಬದುಕಿಗಾರ್ ನಾಯಕರು, ಏಕನೊ ಅನೇಕರೋ? ।ವಿಧಿಯೊ ಪೌರುಷವೊ ಧರುಮವೊ ಅಂಧಬಲವೋ? ॥ಕುದುರುವುದೆಂತು ಈಯವ್ಯವಸ್ಥ್ರೆಯ ಪಾಡು? ।ಅದಿಗುದಿಯೆ ಗತಿಯೇನೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭ ॥badukigAr nAyakaru, EkanO anEkarO? ।vidhiyo pauroshavo dharumavo andhabalavO? ॥kuduruvudentu Iyavyavasteya pADu? ।adigudiye gatiyEnO?  - Mankutimma ॥ 7 ॥Oh Mankutimma! Who is pulling the strings of life? One? or Many? Is it fate, valour, morality or just faith that drives us all? When will this chaos actually work? Is this chaos the final reality?
translation: Oh Mankutimma! Who is pulling the strings of life? One? or Many? Is it fate, valour, morality or just faith that drives us all? When will this chaos actually work? Is this chaos the final reality?
title: ಅದಿಗುದಿಯೆ ಗತಿಯೇನೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: badukigAr nAyakaru, EkanO anEkarO? ।vidhiyo pauroshavo dharumavo andhabalavO? ॥kuduruvudentu Iyavyavasteya pADu? ।adigudiye gatiyEnO?  - Mankutimma ॥ 7 ॥
kagga: ಬದುಕಿಗಾರ್ ನಾಯಕರು, ಏಕನೊ ಅನೇಕರೋ? ।ವಿಧಿಯೊ ಪೌರುಷವೊ ಧರುಮವೊ ಅಂಧಬಲವೋ? ॥ಕುದುರುವುದೆಂತು ಈಯವ್ಯವಸ್ಥ್ರೆಯ ಪಾಡು? ।ಅದಿಗುದಿಯೆ ಗತಿಯೇನೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭ ॥

content: ಕ್ರಮವೊಂದು ಲಕ್ಷ್ಯವೊಂದುಂಟೇನು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ? ।ಭ್ರಮಿಪುದೇನಾಗಾಗ ಕರ್ತೃವಿನ ಮನಸು? ॥ಮಮತೆಯುಳ್ಳವನಾತನಾದೊಡೀ ಜೀವಗಳು ।ಶ್ರಮಪಡುವುವೇಕಿಂತು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮ ॥kramavondu lakshyavondu sRuShTiyali? ।bhramipudenu AgAga kartRuvina manasu? ॥ mamate uLLavanu AtanAdoDe ee jIvagaLu ।shramapaDuvuvu Ekintu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 8 ॥Oh Mankutimma! Is there a rule or a goal for this world? Does the creator;s mind wander from time to time? If the creator is always benevolent, then why are all these beings struggling so much?
translation: Oh Mankutimma! Is there a rule or a goal for this world? Does the creator;s mind wander from time to time? If the creator is always benevolent, then why are all these beings struggling so much?
title: ಶ್ರಮಪಡುವುವೇಕಿಂತು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kramavondu lakshyavondu sRuShTiyali? ।bhramipudenu AgAga kartRuvina manasu? ॥ mamate uLLavanu AtanAdoDe ee jIvagaLu ।shramapaDuvuvu Ekintu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 8 ॥
kagga: ಕ್ರಮವೊಂದು ಲಕ್ಷ್ಯವೊಂದುಂಟೇನು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ? ।ಭ್ರಮಿಪುದೇನಾಗಾಗ ಕರ್ತೃವಿನ ಮನಸು? ॥ಮಮತೆಯುಳ್ಳವನಾತನಾದೊಡೀ ಜೀವಗಳು ।ಶ್ರಮಪಡುವುವೇಕಿಂತು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮ ॥

content: ಏನು ಭೈರವಲೀಲೆಯೀ ವಿಶ್ವವಿಭ್ರಮಣೆ ।ಏನು ಭೂತಗ್ರಾಮನರ್ತನೊನ್ಮಾದ ॥ಏನಗ್ನಿ ಗೋಳಗಳು! ಏನಂತರಾಳಗಳು! ।ಏನು ವಿಸ್ಮಯ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯ ॥Enu bhairava lIle ee vishvavibhramaNe ।Enu bhUta grAma nartana unmAda ॥Enagni gOLagaLu! Enu antarALagaLu! ।Enu vismaya sRuShTi!  - Mankutimma ॥ 9 ॥Oh Mankutimma! This whole world is under a frightful illusion  - just like the intoxication of village fair. Dances, trances, balls of fire, deep introspection by some. This creation is filled so much wonder!
translation: Oh Mankutimma! This whole world is under a frightful illusion  - just like the intoxication of village fair. Dances, trances, balls of fire, deep introspection by some. This creation is filled so much wonder!
title: ಏನು ವಿಸ್ಮಯ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Enu bhairava lIle ee vishvavibhramaNe ।Enu bhUta grAma nartana unmAda ॥Enagni gOLagaLu! Enu antarALagaLu! ।Enu vismaya sRuShTi!  - Mankutimma ॥ 9 ॥
kagga: ಏನು ಭೈರವಲೀಲೆಯೀ ವಿಶ್ವವಿಭ್ರಮಣೆ ।ಏನು ಭೂತಗ್ರಾಮನರ್ತನೊನ್ಮಾದ ॥ಏನಗ್ನಿ ಗೋಳಗಳು! ಏನಂತರಾಳಗಳು! ।ಏನು ವಿಸ್ಮಯ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯ ॥

content: ಏನು ಪ್ರಪಂಚವಿದು! ಏನು ಧಾಳಾಧಾಳಿ!।ಏನದ್ಭುತಾಪಾರಶಕ್ತಿನಿರ್ಘಾತ! ॥ಮಾನವನ ಗುರಿಯೇನು? ಬೆಲೆಯೇನು? ಮುಗಿವೇನು?।ಏನರ್ಥವಿದಕೆಲ್ಲ?- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦ ॥ Enu prapanchavidu! Enu dhALAdhALi!।Enadbhuta apAra shaktinirghAta! ॥mAnavana guriyEnu? beleyEnu? mugivEnu? ।Enarthavu idakella?  - Mankutimma ॥ 10 ॥Oh Mankutimma! What kind of a world is this? Why is this commotion? What wonder is this unabated force? What should be the goal of a man? What is his value? What will be his end? What is the meaning of all these?
translation: Oh Mankutimma! What kind of a world is this? Why is this commotion? What wonder is this unabated force? What should be the goal of a man? What is his value? What will be his end? What is the meaning of all these?
title: ಮಾನವನ ಗುರಿಯೇನು? ಬೆಲೆಯೇನು? ಮುಗಿವೇನು?
transliteration: Enu prapanchavidu! Enu dhALAdhALi!।Enadbhuta apAra shaktinirghAta! ॥mAnavana guriyEnu? beleyEnu? mugivEnu? ।Enarthavu idakella?  - Mankutimma ॥ 10 ॥
kagga: ಏನು ಪ್ರಪಂಚವಿದು! ಏನು ಧಾಳಾಧಾಳಿ!।ಏನದ್ಭುತಾಪಾರಶಕ್ತಿನಿರ್ಘಾತ! ॥ಮಾನವನ ಗುರಿಯೇನು? ಬೆಲೆಯೇನು? ಮುಗಿವೇನು?।ಏನರ್ಥವಿದಕೆಲ್ಲ?- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦ ॥

content: ಮುತ್ತಿರುವುದಿಂದು ಭೂಮಿಯನೊಂದು ದುರ್ದೈವ ।ಮೃತ್ಯು ಕುಣಿಯುತಲಿಹನು ಕೇಕೆಹಾಕುತಲಿ ॥ಸುತ್ತಿಪುದು ತಲೆಯನನುದಿನದ ಲೋಕದ ವಾರ್ತೆ ।ಎತ್ತಲಿದಕೆಲ್ಲ ಕಡೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧ ॥muttiruvudindu bhUmiyanondu durdaiva ।mRutyu kuNiyutalihanu kEkehAkutali ॥suttipudu taleyanu anudinada lOkada vArte ।ettalu idakella kaDe?  - Mankutimma ॥ 11 ॥Oh Mankutimma! There is a epidemic that has plagued the entire world. Death is dancing laughing at everyone. Everyday worries about the world is keeping the mind busy. Where is the end to all these?
translation: Oh Mankutimma! There is a epidemic that has plagued the entire world. Death is dancing laughing at everyone. Everyday worries about the world is keeping the mind busy. Where is the end to all these?
title: ಎತ್ತಲಿದಕೆಲ್ಲ ಕಡೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: muttiruvudindu bhUmiyanondu durdaiva ।mRutyu kuNiyutalihanu kEkehAkutali ॥suttipudu taleyanu anudinada lOkada vArte ।ettalu idakella kaDe?  - Mankutimma ॥ 11 ॥
kagga: ಮುತ್ತಿರುವುದಿಂದು ಭೂಮಿಯನೊಂದು ದುರ್ದೈವ ।ಮೃತ್ಯು ಕುಣಿಯುತಲಿಹನು ಕೇಕೆಹಾಕುತಲಿ ॥ಸುತ್ತಿಪುದು ತಲೆಯನನುದಿನದ ಲೋಕದ ವಾರ್ತೆ ।ಎತ್ತಲಿದಕೆಲ್ಲ ಕಡೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧ ॥

content: ಮಾನವರೋ ದಾನವರೋ ಭೂಮಾತೆಯ ತಣಿಸೆ ।ಶೋಣಿತವನೆರೆಯುವರು ಬಾಷ್ಪ ಸಲುವುದಿರೆ? ॥ಏನು ಹಗೆ! ಏನು ಧಗೆ! ಏನು ಹೊಗೆ! ಯೀ ಧರಣಿ ।ಸೌನಿಕನ ಕಟ್ಟೆಯೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨ ॥mAnavarO dAnavarO bhUmAteya taNise ।shoNitavanu ereyuvaru bAShpa saluvudire? ॥Enu hage! Enu dhage! Enu hoge! yee dharaNi ।saunikana kaTTeyEm?  - Mankutimma ॥ 12 ॥Oh Mankutimma! Are these people men or demons? Instead of shedding little tears for the sake of mother earth they soak her in blood. What hatred! What heat (resulting from destruction because of the hatred)! What smoke (after every thing worth saving is burnt)! Is this whole earth a court-place of a butcher.
translation: Oh Mankutimma! Are these people men or demons? Instead of shedding little tears for the sake of mother earth they soak her in blood. What hatred! What heat (resulting from destruction because of the hatred)! What smoke (after every thing worth saving is burnt)! Is this whole earth a court-place of a butcher.
title: ಧರಣಿ ಸೌನಿಕನ ಕಟ್ಟೆಯೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mAnavarO dAnavarO bhUmAteya taNise ।shoNitavanu ereyuvaru bAShpa saluvudire? ॥Enu hage! Enu dhage! Enu hoge! yee dharaNi ।saunikana kaTTeyEm?  - Mankutimma ॥ 12 ॥
kagga: ಮಾನವರೋ ದಾನವರೋ ಭೂಮಾತೆಯ ತಣಿಸೆ ।ಶೋಣಿತವನೆರೆಯುವರು ಬಾಷ್ಪ ಸಲುವುದಿರೆ? ॥ಏನು ಹಗೆ! ಏನು ಧಗೆ! ಏನು ಹೊಗೆ! ಯೀ ಧರಣಿ ।ಸೌನಿಕನ ಕಟ್ಟೆಯೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨ ॥

content: ಪುರುಷಸ್ವತಂತ್ರೆಯ ಪರಮಸಿದ್ಧಿಯದೇನು? ।ಧರಣಿಗನುದಿನದ ರಕ್ತಾಭಿಷೇಚನೆಯೆ? ॥ಕರವಾಲವನು ಪುಷ್ಪಸರವೆಂದು ಸೆಳೆದಾಡೆ ।ಪರಿಮಳವ ಸೂಸುವುದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩ ॥puruSha svatantreya paramasiddhi adEnu? ।dharaNige anudinada rakta abhiShEchaneye? ॥karavAlavanu puShpasaravendu seLedADe ।parimaLava sUsuvude?  - Mankutimma ॥ 13 ॥Oh Mankutimma! What is the greatest achievement of human free will? Is it the everyday blood shed on this earth? If you catch hold of a sword and pull it as if it were garland of flowers will it give out fragrance.
translation: Oh Mankutimma! What is the greatest achievement of human free will? Is it the everyday blood shed on this earth? If you catch hold of a sword and pull it as if it were garland of flowers will it give out fragrance.
title: ಪರಿಮಳವ ಸೂಸುವುದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: puruSha svatantreya paramasiddhi adEnu? ।dharaNige anudinada rakta abhiShEchaneye? ॥karavAlavanu puShpasaravendu seLedADe ।parimaLava sUsuvude?  - Mankutimma ॥ 13 ॥
kagga: ಪುರುಷಸ್ವತಂತ್ರೆಯ ಪರಮಸಿದ್ಧಿಯದೇನು? ।ಧರಣಿಗನುದಿನದ ರಕ್ತಾಭಿಷೇಚನೆಯೆ? ॥ಕರವಾಲವನು ಪುಷ್ಪಸರವೆಂದು ಸೆಳೆದಾಡೆ ।ಪರಿಮಳವ ಸೂಸುವುದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩ ॥

content: ಹಳೆಯ ಭಕ್ತಿಶ್ರದ್ಧೆಯಳಿಸಿಹೋಗಿವೆ ಮಾಸಿ ।ಸುಳಿದಿಲ್ಲವಾವ ಹೊಸ ದರ್ಶನದ ಹೊಳಪುಂ ॥ಪಳಗಿದ್ದ ಮನೆ ಬಿದ್ದ ಕುಂಟ ಕುರುಡನ ತೆರದಿ ।ತಳಮಳಿಸುತಿದೆ ಲೋಕ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫ ॥haLeya bhakti shraddhe aLisi hOgive mAsi ।suLidu illa Ava hosa darshanada hoLapum ॥paLagidda mane bidda kunTa kuruDana teradi ।taLamaLisutide lOka  - Mankutimma ॥ 15 ॥O! Mankutimma, all the old faiths and beliefs have faded. No new bright ideas have come by. The whole world is anxious  - just like a blind man with just one leg finding his home collapse  - that home which he was so familiar with.
translation: O! Mankutimma, all the old faiths and beliefs have faded. No new bright ideas have come by. The whole world is anxious  - just like a blind man with just one leg finding his home collapse  - that home which he was so familiar with.
title: ತಳಮಳಿಸುತಿದೆ ಲೋಕ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: haLeya bhakti shraddhe aLisi hOgive mAsi ।suLidu illa Ava hosa darshanada hoLapum ॥paLagidda mane bidda kunTa kuruDana teradi ।taLamaLisutide lOka  - Mankutimma ॥ 15 ॥
kagga: ಹಳೆಯ ಭಕ್ತಿಶ್ರದ್ಧೆಯಳಿಸಿಹೋಗಿವೆ ಮಾಸಿ ।ಸುಳಿದಿಲ್ಲವಾವ ಹೊಸ ದರ್ಶನದ ಹೊಳಪುಂ ॥ಪಳಗಿದ್ದ ಮನೆ ಬಿದ್ದ ಕುಂಟ ಕುರುಡನ ತೆರದಿ ।ತಳಮಳಿಸುತಿದೆ ಲೋಕ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫ ॥

content: ಒಂದೆ ಗಗನವ ಕಾಣುತೊಂದೆ ನೆಲವನು ತುಳಿಯು ।ತೊಂದೆ ಧಾನ್ಯವನುಣ್ಣುತೊಂದೆ ನೀರ್ಗುಡಿದು ॥ಒಂದೆ ಗಾಳಿಯನುಸಿರ್ವ ನರಜಾತಿಯೊಳಗೆಂತು ।ಬಂದುದೀ ವೈಷಮ್ಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪ ॥onde gaganava kANuta onde nelavanu tuLiyuta ।onde dhAnyavanu uNNuta onde nIru kuDidu ॥onde gALiyanu usirva narajAtiyoLage entu ।bandudI vaiShamya?  - Mankutimma ॥ 14 ॥O! Mankutimma, all people of this world see the same single sky, walk on the same earth, eat the same food, drink the same water and breathe the same air. Still how come they hate each other so much?
translation: O! Mankutimma, all people of this world see the same single sky, walk on the same earth, eat the same food, drink the same water and breathe the same air. Still how come they hate each other so much?
title: ನರಜಾತಿಯೊಳಗೆಂತು ಬಂದುದೀ ವೈಷಮ್ಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: onde gaganava kANuta onde nelavanu tuLiyuta ।onde dhAnyavanu uNNuta onde nIru kuDidu ॥onde gALiyanu usirva narajAtiyoLage entu ।bandudI vaiShamya?  - Mankutimma ॥ 14 ॥
kagga: ಒಂದೆ ಗಗನವ ಕಾಣುತೊಂದೆ ನೆಲವನು ತುಳಿಯು ।ತೊಂದೆ ಧಾನ್ಯವನುಣ್ಣುತೊಂದೆ ನೀರ್ಗುಡಿದು ॥ಒಂದೆ ಗಾಳಿಯನುಸಿರ್ವ ನರಜಾತಿಯೊಳಗೆಂತು ।ಬಂದುದೀ ವೈಷಮ್ಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪ ॥

content: ತಳಮವಿದೇನಿಳೆಗೆ? ದೇವದನುಜರ್ಮಥಿಸೆ ।ಜಳನಿಧಿಯೊಳಾದಂತೆ ಸುಧೆಗೆ ಪೀಠಿಕೆಯೇಂ? ॥ಹಾಳಾಹಳಾವ ಕುಡಿವ ಗಿರಿಶನಿದ್ದಿರ್ದೊಡೀ ।ಕಳವಳವದೇತಕೆಲೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭ ॥taLamavu idEnu iLege? dEvadanujar mathise ।jaLanidhiyoLAdante sudhege pIThikeyEm? ॥hALAhaLava kuDiva girishanu iddirdoDe ee ।kaLAvaLAvadu EtakelO?  - Mankutimma ॥ 17 ॥O! Mankutimma, why are everyone on this earth so restless? It is similar to the restlessness among the Gods and Demons during the churning of the ocean when poison emanated as a produce. No one knew that it would be followed by elixir. So they did not know what to do with the poison. Luckily they had Lord Shiva to consume the posion and rescue the world. If we also know that there is such a person who will consume all our worries, then would we be still restless?
translation: O! Mankutimma, why are everyone on this earth so restless? It is similar to the restlessness among the Gods and Demons during the churning of the ocean when poison emanated as a produce. No one knew that it would be followed by elixir. So they did not know what to do with the poison. Luckily they had Lord Shiva to consume the posion and rescue the world. If we also know that there is such a person who will consume all our worries, then would we be still restless?
title: ಕಳವಳವದೇತಕೆಲೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: taLamavu idEnu iLege? dEvadanujar mathise ।jaLanidhiyoLAdante sudhege pIThikeyEm? ॥hALAhaLava kuDiva girishanu iddirdoDe ee ।kaLAvaLAvadu EtakelO?  - Mankutimma ॥ 17 ॥
kagga: ತಳಮವಿದೇನಿಳೆಗೆ? ದೇವದನುಜರ್ಮಥಿಸೆ ।ಜಳನಿಧಿಯೊಳಾದಂತೆ ಸುಧೆಗೆ ಪೀಠಿಕೆಯೇಂ? ॥ಹಾಳಾಹಳಾವ ಕುಡಿವ ಗಿರಿಶನಿದ್ದಿರ್ದೊಡೀ ।ಕಳವಳವದೇತಕೆಲೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭ ॥

content: ಇಳೆಯ ಬಿಟ್ಟಿನ್ನು ಮೆತ್ತಲುಮೈದದ ಪ್ರೇತ ।ವಲೆವಂತೆ ಲೋಕ ತಲ್ಲಣಿಸುತಿಹುದಿಂದು ॥ಹಳೆಧರ್ಮ ಸತ್ತಿಹುದು ಹೊಸಧರ್ಮ ಹುಟ್ಟಿಲ್ಲತಳಮಳಕೆ ಕಡೆಯೆಂದೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬ ॥iLeya biTTannu mettalumaidada prEta ।valevante lOka tallaNisuta ihudu indu ॥haLedharma sattihudu hosadharma huTTilla ।taLamaLake kaDeyendo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 16 ॥O! Mankutimma, The whole world is as restless as a spirit that has left this earth but not ascended to above world. Older beliefs and faiths have crumbled. New ones are not convincing yet. When will this restlessness end?
translation: O! Mankutimma, The whole world is as restless as a spirit that has left this earth but not ascended to above world. Older beliefs and faiths have crumbled. New ones are not convincing yet. When will this restlessness end?
title: ತಳಮಳಕೆ ಕಡೆಯೆಂದೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: iLeya biTTannu mettalumaidada prEta ।valevante lOka tallaNisuta ihudu indu ॥haLedharma sattihudu hosadharma huTTilla ।taLamaLake kaDeyendo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 16 ॥
kagga: ಇಳೆಯ ಬಿಟ್ಟಿನ್ನು ಮೆತ್ತಲುಮೈದದ ಪ್ರೇತ ।ವಲೆವಂತೆ ಲೋಕ ತಲ್ಲಣಿಸುತಿಹುದಿಂದು ॥ಹಳೆಧರ್ಮ ಸತ್ತಿಹುದು ಹೊಸಧರ್ಮ ಹುಟ್ಟಿಲ್ಲತಳಮಳಕೆ ಕಡೆಯೆಂದೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬ ॥

content: ನದಿಯ ತೆರೆಯವೊಲುರುಳಿ ಹೊರಳುತಿರುವುದು ಜೀವ ।ಮೊದಲಿಲ್ಲ ಮುಗಿವಿಲ್ಲ ನಿಲುವಿಲ್ಲವದಕೆ ॥ಬದುಕೇನು ಸಾವೇನು ಸೊದೆಯೇನು ವಿಷವೇನು? ।ಉದಕಬುದ್ಬುದವೆಲ್ಲ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮ ॥nadiya tereyavol uruLi horaLutiruvudu jIva ।modalilla mugivilla niluvillavadake ॥badukEnu sAvEnu sodeyEnu viShavEnu?udakabudbudavella!  - Mankutimma ॥ 18 ॥O! Mankutimma, life is rolling on the waves of the river without any aim or goal. There is no beginning to this ordeal; No end, No signs of stopping. What difference does it make  - life or death, medicine or poison? Every thing in the world is a mere water bubble.
translation: O! Mankutimma, life is rolling on the waves of the river without any aim or goal. There is no beginning to this ordeal; No end, No signs of stopping. What difference does it make  - life or death, medicine or poison? Every thing in the world is a mere water bubble.
title: ಉದಕಬುದ್ಬುದವೆಲ್ಲ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nadiya tereyavol uruLi horaLutiruvudu jIva ।modalilla mugivilla niluvillavadake ॥badukEnu sAvEnu sodeyEnu viShavEnu?udakabudbudavella!  - Mankutimma ॥ 18 ॥
kagga: ನದಿಯ ತೆರೆಯವೊಲುರುಳಿ ಹೊರಳುತಿರುವುದು ಜೀವ ।ಮೊದಲಿಲ್ಲ ಮುಗಿವಿಲ್ಲ ನಿಲುವಿಲ್ಲವದಕೆ ॥ಬದುಕೇನು ಸಾವೇನು ಸೊದೆಯೇನು ವಿಷವೇನು? ।ಉದಕಬುದ್ಬುದವೆಲ್ಲ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮ ॥

content: ಗಾಳಿ ಮಣ್ಣುಂಡೆಯೊಳಹೊಕ್ಕು ಹೊರಹೊರಳದು ।ಆಳೆನಿಪುದಂತಾಗದಿರೆ ಬರಿಯ ಹೆಂಟೆ ॥ಬಾಳೇನು ಧೂಳು ಸುಳಿ, ಮರ ತಿಕ್ಕಿದುರಿಯ ಹೊಗೆ ।ಕ್ಷೇಳವೇನಮೃತವೇಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯ ॥gALi maNNuDeya oLahokku horahoraLadu ।ALenipudante Agadire bariya henTe ॥bALEnu dhULu suLi, mara tikkiduriya hoge ।kSELavEn amRutavEm  - Mankutimma ॥ 19 ॥O! Mankutimma, by itself air will not go in & out of a lump of mud. If there is no life  - then body is as good as a lump of mud. Usually people attribute breath and warmth as proof of life. But the same is found in a whirlwind (breath) and also when dead wood rub against each other (warmth). What then is the source of life? What is poison? What is elixir? How do they effect life?
translation: O! Mankutimma, by itself air will not go in & out of a lump of mud. If there is no life  - then body is as good as a lump of mud. Usually people attribute breath and warmth as proof of life. But the same is found in a whirlwind (breath) and also when dead wood rub against each other (warmth). What then is the source of life? What is poison? What is elixir? How do they effect life?
title: ಕ್ಷೇಳವೇನಮೃತವೇಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: gALi maNNuDeya oLahokku horahoraLadu ।ALenipudante Agadire bariya henTe ॥bALEnu dhULu suLi, mara tikkiduriya hoge ।kSELavEn amRutavEm  - Mankutimma ॥ 19 ॥
kagga: ಗಾಳಿ ಮಣ್ಣುಂಡೆಯೊಳಹೊಕ್ಕು ಹೊರಹೊರಳದು ।ಆಳೆನಿಪುದಂತಾಗದಿರೆ ಬರಿಯ ಹೆಂಟೆ ॥ಬಾಳೇನು ಧೂಳು ಸುಳಿ, ಮರ ತಿಕ್ಕಿದುರಿಯ ಹೊಗೆ ।ಕ್ಷೇಳವೇನಮೃತವೇಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯ ॥

content: ಕಂಡ ದೈವಕ್ಕೆಲ್ಲ ಕೈಯ ಮುಗಿದೇನಹುದು? ।ಚಂಡಚತುರೋಪಾಯದಿಂದಲೇನಹುದು? ॥ತಂಡುಲದ ಹಿಡಿಯೊಂದು ತುಂಡು ಬಟ್ಟೆಯದೊಂದು ।ಅಂಡಲೆತವಿದಕೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦ ॥kanDa daivakkella kaiya mugidEnahudu? ।chanDachatura upAyadindalEnahudu? ॥tandulada hiDiyondu tunDu baTTeyadondu ।anDaletavidakEno?  - Mankutimma ॥ 20 ॥O! Mankutimma, what is the use of worshiping all the Gods (idols) you see? What is the use of planning sinister schemes? All one needs is one handful of rice and piece of rag. Is all the wanderings of a man only to attain these?
translation: O! Mankutimma, what is the use of worshiping all the Gods (idols) you see? What is the use of planning sinister schemes? All one needs is one handful of rice and piece of rag. Is all the wanderings of a man only to attain these?
title: ಅಂಡಲೆತವಿದಕೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kanDa daivakkella kaiya mugidEnahudu? ।chanDachatura upAyadindalEnahudu? ॥tandulada hiDiyondu tunDu baTTeyadondu ।anDaletavidakEno?  - Mankutimma ॥ 20 ॥
kagga: ಕಂಡ ದೈವಕ್ಕೆಲ್ಲ ಕೈಯ ಮುಗಿದೇನಹುದು? ।ಚಂಡಚತುರೋಪಾಯದಿಂದಲೇನಹುದು? ॥ತಂಡುಲದ ಹಿಡಿಯೊಂದು ತುಂಡು ಬಟ್ಟೆಯದೊಂದು ।ಅಂಡಲೆತವಿದಕೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦ ॥

content: ಹೊನ್ನೆಂದು ಜಗದಿ ನೀಂ ಕೈಗೆ ಕೊಂಡುದನು ವಿಧಿ ।ಮಣ್ಣೆನುವನ್; ಅವನ ವರ ಮಣ್ಣೆನುವೆ ನೀನು ॥ಭಿನ್ನಮಿಂತಿರೆ ವಸ್ತುಮೌಲ್ಯಹಳ ಗಣನೆಯೀ ।ಪಣ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ ಗತಿಯೆಂತೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧ ॥honnendu jagadi nIM kaige konDudanu vidhi ।maNNenuvan; avana vara maNNenuve nInu ॥bhinnam intire vastu maulyagaLa gaNane ee ।paNyakke gatiyento?  - Mankutimma ॥ 21 ॥O! Mankutimma, What you treasure in this world as gold  - fate treats it like dirt. You treat the boons given by providence as dirt. If the valuations of the materials is so different, then how can any trade be fair?
translation: O! Mankutimma, What you treasure in this world as gold  - fate treats it like dirt. You treat the boons given by providence as dirt. If the valuations of the materials is so different, then how can any trade be fair?
title: ಪಣ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ ಗತಿಯೆಂತೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: honnendu jagadi nIM kaige konDudanu vidhi ।maNNenuvan; avana vara maNNenuve nInu ॥bhinnam intire vastu maulyagaLa gaNane ee ।paNyakke gatiyento?  - Mankutimma ॥ 21 ॥
kagga: ಹೊನ್ನೆಂದು ಜಗದಿ ನೀಂ ಕೈಗೆ ಕೊಂಡುದನು ವಿಧಿ ।ಮಣ್ಣೆನುವನ್; ಅವನ ವರ ಮಣ್ಣೆನುವೆ ನೀನು ॥ಭಿನ್ನಮಿಂತಿರೆ ವಸ್ತುಮೌಲ್ಯಹಳ ಗಣನೆಯೀ ।ಪಣ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ ಗತಿಯೆಂತೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧ ॥

content: ಕೃತ್ರಿಮವೊ ಜಗವೆಲ್ಲ! ಸತ್ಯತೆಯದೆಲ್ಲಿಹುದೊ? ।ಕರ್ತೃವೆನಿಸಿದನೆ ತಾಂ ಗುಪ್ತನಾಗಿಹನು ॥ಚತ್ರವೀ ಜಗವಿದರೊಳಾರ ಗುಣವೆಂತಹುದೊ! ।ಯಾತ್ರಿಕನೆ, ಜಾಗರಿರೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨ ॥kRutrimavo jagavella! satyateyadellihudo? ।kartRuvenisidane tAM guptanAgihanu ॥chatrvI jagavu idaroLAra guNaventahudo! ।yAtrikane, jAgariro  - Mankutimma ॥ 22 ॥O! Mankutimma, the whole world looks artificial. Where is truth in all these? The so-called creator is gone into hiding. This world is like a random congregation of people. We can never be sure of any body;s intentions. Just like a traveller in a alien land, you must be very careful.
translation: O! Mankutimma, the whole world looks artificial. Where is truth in all these? The so-called creator is gone into hiding. This world is like a random congregation of people. We can never be sure of any body;s intentions. Just like a traveller in a alien land, you must be very careful.
title: ಯಾತ್ರಿಕನೆ, ಜಾಗರಿರೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kRutrimavo jagavella! satyateyadellihudo? ।kartRuvenisidane tAM guptanAgihanu ॥chatrvI jagavu idaroLAra guNaventahudo! ।yAtrikane, jAgariro  - Mankutimma ॥ 22 ॥
kagga: ಕೃತ್ರಿಮವೊ ಜಗವೆಲ್ಲ! ಸತ್ಯತೆಯದೆಲ್ಲಿಹುದೊ? ।ಕರ್ತೃವೆನಿಸಿದನೆ ತಾಂ ಗುಪ್ತನಾಗಿಹನು ॥ಚತ್ರವೀ ಜಗವಿದರೊಳಾರ ಗುಣವೆಂತಹುದೊ! ।ಯಾತ್ರಿಕನೆ, ಜಾಗರಿರೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨ ॥

content: ತಿರುತಿರುಗಿ ತೊಳಲುವುದು ತಿರಿದನ್ನವುಣ್ಣುವುದು ।ಮೆರೆದು ಮೈಮರೆಯುವುದು ಹಲ್ಲ ಕಿರಿಯುವುದು ॥ಮರಳಿ ಕೊರಗಾಡುವುದು ಕೆರಳುವುದು ನರಳುವುದು ।ಇರವಿದೇನೊಣರಗಳೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩ ॥tirutirugi tolaLuvudu tiridannavuNNuvudu ।meredu maimareyuvudu halla kiriyuvudu ॥maraLi koragADuvudu kereLuvudu naraLuvudu ।iravidEnoNaragaLe?  - Mankutimma ॥ 23 ॥O! Mankutimma, Is this existence all about dry emotions (irritations)- wandering restlessly, eating what ever you find, flaunting what ever little wealth on has, dreaming, hating people, lamenting, getting angry, suffering.
translation: O! Mankutimma, Is this existence all about dry emotions (irritations)- wandering restlessly, eating what ever you find, flaunting what ever little wealth on has, dreaming, hating people, lamenting, getting angry, suffering.
title: ಇರವಿದೇನೊಣರಗಳೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tirutirugi tolaLuvudu tiridannavuNNuvudu ।meredu maimareyuvudu halla kiriyuvudu ॥maraLi koragADuvudu kereLuvudu naraLuvudu ।iravidEnoNaragaLe?  - Mankutimma ॥ 23 ॥
kagga: ತಿರುತಿರುಗಿ ತೊಳಲುವುದು ತಿರಿದನ್ನವುಣ್ಣುವುದು ।ಮೆರೆದು ಮೈಮರೆಯುವುದು ಹಲ್ಲ ಕಿರಿಯುವುದು ॥ಮರಳಿ ಕೊರಗಾಡುವುದು ಕೆರಳುವುದು ನರಳುವುದು ।ಇರವಿದೇನೊಣರಗಳೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩ ॥

content: ನರರ ಭಯಬಯಕೆಗಳೆ ಸುರರ ತಾಯ್ತಂದೆಗಳೊ? ।ಸುರರಟ್ಟಹಾಸದಿನೆ ನರಭಕ್ತಿಯೊರಲೋ? ॥ಪರಿಕಿಸುವರೇನವರ್ಗಳನ್ಯೋನ್ಯಶಕ್ತಿಗಳ? ।ಧರುಮವೆಲ್ಲಿದರಲ್ಲಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪ ॥narara bhayabayakegaLe surara taytandegaLo? ।suraraTTahAsadine narabhaktiyoralO? ॥parikisuvarEnu avargaL anyOnya shaktigaLA? ।dharuma elli idaralli?  - Mankutimma ॥ 24 ॥O! Mankutimma, are Gods born out of human fears and desires? Or is human devotion only due to the arrogance (and tyranny) of Gods? Or are Gods troubling us in order to settle scores among themselves? Where is the concept of fairness here?
translation: O! Mankutimma, are Gods born out of human fears and desires? Or is human devotion only due to the arrogance (and tyranny) of Gods? Or are Gods troubling us in order to settle scores among themselves? Where is the concept of fairness here?
title: ಧರುಮವೆಲ್ಲಿದರಲ್ಲಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: narara bhayabayakegaLe surara taytandegaLo? ।suraraTTahAsadine narabhaktiyoralO? ॥parikisuvarEnu avargaL anyOnya shaktigaLA? ।dharuma elli idaralli?  - Mankutimma ॥ 24 ॥
kagga: ನರರ ಭಯಬಯಕೆಗಳೆ ಸುರರ ತಾಯ್ತಂದೆಗಳೊ? ।ಸುರರಟ್ಟಹಾಸದಿನೆ ನರಭಕ್ತಿಯೊರಲೋ? ॥ಪರಿಕಿಸುವರೇನವರ್ಗಳನ್ಯೋನ್ಯಶಕ್ತಿಗಳ? ।ಧರುಮವೆಲ್ಲಿದರಲ್ಲಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪ ॥

content: ಜೀವಗತಿಗೊಂದು ರೇಖಾಲೇಖವಿರಬೇಕು ।ನಾವಿಕನಿಗಿರುವಂತೆ ದಿಕ್ಕು ದಿನವೆಣಿಸೆ ॥ಭಾವಿಸುವುದೆಂತದನು ಮೊದಲು ಕೊನೆ ತೋರದಿರೆ? ।ಆವುದೀ ಜಗಕಾದಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫ ॥jIvagatigondu rEkhAlEkha ।nAvikanigiruvante dikku dinavaNise ॥bhAvisuvudu entadanu modalu kone tOradire? ।AvudI jagakAdi?  - Mankutimma ॥ 25 ॥O! Mankutimma, just like a navigator (of a ship) uses a map (direction) and counts days to sail on a course our lives require such a blue-print. How can we understand (or come up with) the blueprint if we know neither the beginning nor the end? How did it all start?
translation: O! Mankutimma, just like a navigator (of a ship) uses a map (direction) and counts days to sail on a course our lives require such a blue-print. How can we understand (or come up with) the blueprint if we know neither the beginning nor the end? How did it all start?
title: ಆವುದೀ ಜಗಕಾದಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jIvagatigondu rEkhAlEkha ।nAvikanigiruvante dikku dinavaNise ॥bhAvisuvudu entadanu modalu kone tOradire? ।AvudI jagakAdi?  - Mankutimma ॥ 25 ॥
kagga: ಜೀವಗತಿಗೊಂದು ರೇಖಾಲೇಖವಿರಬೇಕು ।ನಾವಿಕನಿಗಿರುವಂತೆ ದಿಕ್ಕು ದಿನವೆಣಿಸೆ ॥ಭಾವಿಸುವುದೆಂತದನು ಮೊದಲು ಕೊನೆ ತೋರದಿರೆ? ।ಆವುದೀ ಜಗಕಾದಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫ ॥

content: ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಾಶಯವದೇನಸ್ಪಷ್ಟ ಸಂಶ್ಲಿಷ್ಟ ।ಇಷ್ಟ ಮೊಹಕ ದಿವ್ಯಗುಣಗಳೊಂದು ಕಡೆ ॥ಕಷ್ಟ ಭೀಭತ್ಸ ಘೋರಂಗಳಿನ್ನೊಂದು ಕಡೆ ।ಕ್ಲಿಷ್ಟವೀ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಕೃತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬ ॥sRuShTiya ashayavadenu aspaShta samShliShTa ।iShTa mohaka divyaguNagaLu ondu kaDe ॥kaShTa bhIbhatsa ghoraMgaLu innondu kaDe ।kliShTavI brahmakRuti  - mankutimma ॥ 26 ॥O! Mankutimma, what is the goal of this creation? It is so unclear and merger of opposites. All the things that are likable, mesmerizing and magical are on one side. Those that are painful, fearful and horrific are on the other side. But the classifying not clear. They are indistinguishable from each other. This thing created by the creator is very difficult to understand.
translation: O! Mankutimma, what is the goal of this creation? It is so unclear and merger of opposites. All the things that are likable, mesmerizing and magical are on one side. Those that are painful, fearful and horrific are on the other side. But the classifying not clear. They are indistinguishable from each other. This thing created by the creator is very difficult to understand.
title: ಕ್ಲಿಷ್ಟವೀ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಕೃತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sRuShTiya ashayavadenu aspaShta samShliShTa ।iShTa mohaka divyaguNagaLu ondu kaDe ॥kaShTa bhIbhatsa ghoraMgaLu innondu kaDe ।kliShTavI brahmakRuti  - mankutimma ॥ 26 ॥
kagga: ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಾಶಯವದೇನಸ್ಪಷ್ಟ ಸಂಶ್ಲಿಷ್ಟ ।ಇಷ್ಟ ಮೊಹಕ ದಿವ್ಯಗುಣಗಳೊಂದು ಕಡೆ ॥ಕಷ್ಟ ಭೀಭತ್ಸ ಘೋರಂಗಳಿನ್ನೊಂದು ಕಡೆ ।ಕ್ಲಿಷ್ಟವೀ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಕೃತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬ ॥

content: ಧರೆಯ ಬದುಕೇನದರ ಗುರಿಯೇನು ಫಲವೇನು? ।ಬರಿ ಬಳಸು ಬಡಿದಾಟ ಬರಿ ಪರಿಭ್ರಮಣೆ ॥ತಿರುತಿರುಗಿ ಹೊಟ್ಟೆ ಹೊರಕೊಳುವ ಮೃಗಖಗಕಿಂತ ।ನರನು ಸಾಧಿಪುದೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭ ॥dhareya baduku enadara guriyEnu phalavEnu? ।bari baLasu baDidATa bari paribhramaNe ॥tirutirugi hoTTe horakoLuva mRuga khagakinta ।naranu sAdhipudu Enu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 27 ॥O! Mankutimma, What is the meaning of life on this world? What is the aim? What are its fruits (benefit of enduring it)? Any action we do is just a round about to the ultimate goal. It is a constant struggle. We seem to come back to the proverbial square one again and again. Don;t the animals and birds that lead a nomadic life wandering about for food very similar to us? Then what is the special achievement of mankind?
translation: O! Mankutimma, What is the meaning of life on this world? What is the aim? What are its fruits (benefit of enduring it)? Any action we do is just a round about to the ultimate goal. It is a constant struggle. We seem to come back to the proverbial square one again and again. Don;t the animals and birds that lead a nomadic life wandering about for food very similar to us? Then what is the special achievement of mankind?
title: ನರನು ಸಾಧಿಪುದೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dhareya baduku enadara guriyEnu phalavEnu? ।bari baLasu baDidATa bari paribhramaNe ॥tirutirugi hoTTe horakoLuva mRuga khagakinta ।naranu sAdhipudu Enu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 27 ॥
kagga: ಧರೆಯ ಬದುಕೇನದರ ಗುರಿಯೇನು ಫಲವೇನು? ।ಬರಿ ಬಳಸು ಬಡಿದಾಟ ಬರಿ ಪರಿಭ್ರಮಣೆ ॥ತಿರುತಿರುಗಿ ಹೊಟ್ಟೆ ಹೊರಕೊಳುವ ಮೃಗಖಗಕಿಂತ ।ನರನು ಸಾಧಿಪುದೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭ ॥

content: ಕಾರುಣ್ಯ ಸರಸ ಸೌಂದರ್ಯ ರುಚಿಗಳೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ- ।ಕಾರಣಮೆನಿಪ್ಪವೊಲು ತೋರ್ಪುದೊಂದು ಚಣ ॥ಕಾರ್ಪಣ್ಯ ಕಟುಕತೆಗಳೆನಿಪುದಿನ್ನೊಂದು ಚಣ ।ತೋರದಾವುದು ದಿಟವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮ ॥kAruNya sarasa soundarya ruchigaLe sRuShTi ।kAraNamenippavolu tOrpudondu chaNa ॥kArpaNya kaTukategaLenipudu innodu chaNa ।tOradAvudu diTavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 28 ॥O! Mankutimma, there are two seeming truths about creation. One suggests that compassion, romance, beauty and taste is the reason why there is a creation after all. Another second it seems as if the struggle and the hard heartedness is what that drives the world. It is not possible to know which one is the absolute truth.
translation: O! Mankutimma, there are two seeming truths about creation. One suggests that compassion, romance, beauty and taste is the reason why there is a creation after all. Another second it seems as if the struggle and the hard heartedness is what that drives the world. It is not possible to know which one is the absolute truth.
title: ತೋರದಾವುದು ದಿಟವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kAruNya sarasa soundarya ruchigaLe sRuShTi ।kAraNamenippavolu tOrpudondu chaNa ॥kArpaNya kaTukategaLenipudu innodu chaNa ।tOradAvudu diTavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 28 ॥
kagga: ಕಾರುಣ್ಯ ಸರಸ ಸೌಂದರ್ಯ ರುಚಿಗಳೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ- ।ಕಾರಣಮೆನಿಪ್ಪವೊಲು ತೋರ್ಪುದೊಂದು ಚಣ ॥ಕಾರ್ಪಣ್ಯ ಕಟುಕತೆಗಳೆನಿಪುದಿನ್ನೊಂದು ಚಣ ।ತೋರದಾವುದು ದಿಟವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮ ॥

content: ಎರಡುಮಿರಬಹುದು ದಿಟ; ಶಿವರುದ್ರನಲೆ ಬೊಮ್ಮ! ।ಕರವೊಂದರಲಿ ವೇಣು, ಶಂಖವೊಂದರಲಿ! ॥ಬೆರಳ್ಗಳೆರಡಾನುಮಿರೆ ಕೈ ಚಿಟಿಕೆಯಾಡುವುದು ।ಒರುವನಾಡುವುದೆಂತು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯ ॥eraDum irabahudu diTa; shivarudranale bomma! ।karavondarali vENu, shankavodarali ॥beraLgaLu eraDAnumire kai chiTikeyADuvudu ।oruvanAduvudentu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 29 ॥O! Mankutimma, It could be possible that both are true. The seed of creation could well be in the destruction it self. Brahma (God of creation) may be with in Shiva (God of destruction). The Lord (Vishnu) has a flute in one hand and divine conch in the other. Only if he have two fingers can he produce a tapping sound. What can he do alone? Hence there must be opposites the creations.
translation: O! Mankutimma, It could be possible that both are true. The seed of creation could well be in the destruction it self. Brahma (God of creation) may be with in Shiva (God of destruction). The Lord (Vishnu) has a flute in one hand and divine conch in the other. Only if he have two fingers can he produce a tapping sound. What can he do alone? Hence there must be opposites the creations.
title: ಒರುವನಾಡುವುದೆಂತು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: eraDum irabahudu diTa; shivarudranale bomma! ।karavondarali vENu, shankavodarali ॥beraLgaLu eraDAnumire kai chiTikeyADuvudu ।oruvanAduvudentu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 29 ॥
kagga: ಎರಡುಮಿರಬಹುದು ದಿಟ; ಶಿವರುದ್ರನಲೆ ಬೊಮ್ಮ! ।ಕರವೊಂದರಲಿ ವೇಣು, ಶಂಖವೊಂದರಲಿ! ॥ಬೆರಳ್ಗಳೆರಡಾನುಮಿರೆ ಕೈ ಚಿಟಿಕೆಯಾಡುವುದು ।ಒರುವನಾಡುವುದೆಂತು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯ ॥

content: ಬ್ರಹ್ಮವೇ ಸತ್ಯ, ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯೆ ಮಿಥ್ಯೆಯೆನ್ನುವೊಡೆ ।ಸಂಬಂಧವಿಲ್ಲವೇನಾ ವಿಷಯಯುಗಕೆ? ॥ನಮ್ಮ ಕಣ್ಮನಸುಗಳೆ ನಮಗೆ ಸಟೆ ಪೇಳುವೊಡೆ ।ನೆಮ್ಮುವುದದಾರನೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦ ॥brahmavE satya sRuShTiye mithye ennuvoDe ।saMbandhavillavEnA viShayayugake? ॥namma kaNNmanasugaLe namage saTe pELuvoDe ।nemmuvudadu AranO?  - Mankutimma ॥ 30 ॥O! Mankutimma, If God alone is real and all creation is a mere illusion, then is there no relation between those two? If our own eyes and mind tell us lies, then whom shall we believe?
translation: O! Mankutimma, If God alone is real and all creation is a mere illusion, then is there no relation between those two? If our own eyes and mind tell us lies, then whom shall we believe?
title: ನೆಮ್ಮುವುದದಾರನೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: brahmavE satya sRuShTiye mithye ennuvoDe ।saMbandhavillavEnA viShayayugake? ॥namma kaNNmanasugaLe namage saTe pELuvoDe ।nemmuvudadu AranO?  - Mankutimma ॥ 30 ॥
kagga: ಬ್ರಹ್ಮವೇ ಸತ್ಯ, ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯೆ ಮಿಥ್ಯೆಯೆನ್ನುವೊಡೆ ।ಸಂಬಂಧವಿಲ್ಲವೇನಾ ವಿಷಯಯುಗಕೆ? ॥ನಮ್ಮ ಕಣ್ಮನಸುಗಳೆ ನಮಗೆ ಸಟೆ ಪೇಳುವೊಡೆ ।ನೆಮ್ಮುವುದದಾರನೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦ ॥

content: ಬಚ್ಚಿಟ್ಟುಕೊಂಡಿಹುದೆ ಸತ್ಯ ಮಿಥ್ಯೆಯ ಹಿಂದೆ? ।ನಚ್ಚುವುದೆ ಮರೆಯೊಳಿಹುದನೆ ಸತ್ಯವೆಂದು? ॥ಅಚ್ಚರಿಯ ತಂತ್ರವಿದು; ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಸೃಷ್ಟಿಗಳೇಕೊ ।ಮುಚ್ಚಿಹವು ಸಾಜತೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧ ॥bacchiTTukondihude satya mithyeya hinde? ।nacchuvide mareyoLihudane satyavendu? ॥accariya tantravidu; brahmasRuShTigaLEko ।mucchihavu sAjateya  - Mankutimma ॥ 31 ॥O! Mankutimma, is the truth hiding behind the veil of deceit? Can I believe that what ever is hiding to be the truth? It looks like a strange ploy by the creations of God  - they all mask the truth.
translation: O! Mankutimma, is the truth hiding behind the veil of deceit? Can I believe that what ever is hiding to be the truth? It looks like a strange ploy by the creations of God  - they all mask the truth.
title: ಮುಚ್ಚಿಹವು ಸಾಜತೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bacchiTTukondihude satya mithyeya hinde? ।nacchuvide mareyoLihudane satyavendu? ॥accariya tantravidu; brahmasRuShTigaLEko ।mucchihavu sAjateya  - Mankutimma ॥ 31 ॥
kagga: ಬಚ್ಚಿಟ್ಟುಕೊಂಡಿಹುದೆ ಸತ್ಯ ಮಿಥ್ಯೆಯ ಹಿಂದೆ? ।ನಚ್ಚುವುದೆ ಮರೆಯೊಳಿಹುದನೆ ಸತ್ಯವೆಂದು? ॥ಅಚ್ಚರಿಯ ತಂತ್ರವಿದು; ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಸೃಷ್ಟಿಗಳೇಕೊ ।ಮುಚ್ಚಿಹವು ಸಾಜತೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧ ॥

content: ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನೀ ಜಗವ ರಚಿಸಿದವನಾದೊಡದು ।ಬರಿಯಾಟವೋ ಕನಸೊ ನಿದ್ದೆ ಕಲವರವೋ? ॥ಮರುಳನವನಲ್ಲದೊಡೆ ನಿಯಮವೊಂದಿರಬೇಕು ।ಗುರಿಗೊತ್ತದೇನಿಹುದೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨ ॥parabommanI jagava rachisidavanAdoDadu।bariyATavO kanasO nidde kalavaravO? ॥maruLanavanalladoDe niyamanondirabEku ।gurigottadEnihodo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 32 ॥O! Mankutimma, Let us assume that God created this world. Is it a game for him to create such worlds? Or is this his dream? Or just a mischief? If God is not a fool, there must be some order for this world. Wonder what is the that order/goal of this creation?
translation: O! Mankutimma, Let us assume that God created this world. Is it a game for him to create such worlds? Or is this his dream? Or just a mischief? If God is not a fool, there must be some order for this world. Wonder what is the that order/goal of this creation?
title: ಗುರಿಗೊತ್ತದೇನಿಹುದೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: parabommanI jagava rachisidavanAdoDadu।bariyATavO kanasO nidde kalavaravO? ॥maruLanavanalladoDe niyamanondirabEku ।gurigottadEnihodo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 32 ॥
kagga: ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನೀ ಜಗವ ರಚಿಸಿದವನಾದೊಡದು ।ಬರಿಯಾಟವೋ ಕನಸೊ ನಿದ್ದೆ ಕಲವರವೋ? ॥ಮರುಳನವನಲ್ಲದೊಡೆ ನಿಯಮವೊಂದಿರಬೇಕು ।ಗುರಿಗೊತ್ತದೇನಿಹುದೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨ ॥

content: ನರಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಯೆ ಬೊಮ್ಮನಾಶಯವೆ? ನಮ್ಮ ಬಾಳ್ ।ಬರಿ ಸಮಸ್ಯೆಯೆ? ಅದರ ಪೂರಣವದೆಲ್ಲಿ? ॥ಸುರಿದು ಪ್ರಶ್ನೆಗಳನುತ್ತರವ ಕುಡೆ ಬಾರದನ ।ಗುರುವೆಂದು ಕರೆಯುವೆಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩ ॥naraparIkSheye bommanAshayave? namma bAL।bari samasyeye? adara pUraNAvadelli? ॥suridu prashnegaLanuttarava kuDe bAradana ।guruvendu kareyuveya?  - Mankutimma ॥ 33 ॥O! Mankutimma, If is God;s wish to put us into tests all the time? Is our lives just a puzzle? What constitutes as its completion? Can you call a person who can help me find answers to these questions as a teacher?
translation: O! Mankutimma, If is God;s wish to put us into tests all the time? Is our lives just a puzzle? What constitutes as its completion? Can you call a person who can help me find answers to these questions as a teacher?
title: ಗುರುವೆಂದು ಕರೆಯುವೆಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: naraparIkSheye bommanAshayave? namma bAL।bari samasyeye? adara pUraNAvadelli? ॥suridu prashnegaLanuttarava kuDe bAradana ।guruvendu kareyuveya?  - Mankutimma ॥ 33 ॥
kagga: ನರಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಯೆ ಬೊಮ್ಮನಾಶಯವೆ? ನಮ್ಮ ಬಾಳ್ ।ಬರಿ ಸಮಸ್ಯೆಯೆ? ಅದರ ಪೂರಣವದೆಲ್ಲಿ? ॥ಸುರಿದು ಪ್ರಶ್ನೆಗಳನುತ್ತರವ ಕುಡೆ ಬಾರದನ ।ಗುರುವೆಂದು ಕರೆಯುವೆಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩ ॥

content: ಎಷ್ಟು ಚಿಂತಿಸಿದೊಡಂ ಶಂಕೆಯನೆ ಬೆಳಸುವೀ ।ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ ತತ್ತ್ವವೆಲ್ಲಿಯೋ ಬೆದಕಿ ನರನು ॥ಕಷ್ಟಪಡುತಿರಲೆನುವುದೋ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮವಿಧಿಯೇನೋ! ।ಅಷ್ಟೆ ನಮ್ಮಯ ಪಾಡು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪ ॥eshtu chintisidoDam shankeyane beLasivI ।srushtiyali tattvavu elliyO bedaki naranu ॥kaShTapaDutirali enuvudO brahmavidhiyEnO! ।ashte nammaya pADu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 34 ॥O! Mankutimma, is it the wish of providence to let man suffer trying to find answers to his questions about the creations. The doubts always seem to multiply when he thinks more about the answers. Is this our final fate?
translation: O! Mankutimma, is it the wish of providence to let man suffer trying to find answers to his questions about the creations. The doubts always seem to multiply when he thinks more about the answers. Is this our final fate?
title: ಅಷ್ಟೆ ನಮ್ಮಯ ಪಾಡು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: eshtu chintisidoDam shankeyane beLasivI ।srushtiyali tattvavu elliyO bedaki naranu ॥kaShTapaDutirali enuvudO brahmavidhiyEnO! ।ashte nammaya pADu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 34 ॥
kagga: ಎಷ್ಟು ಚಿಂತಿಸಿದೊಡಂ ಶಂಕೆಯನೆ ಬೆಳಸುವೀ ।ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ ತತ್ತ್ವವೆಲ್ಲಿಯೋ ಬೆದಕಿ ನರನು ॥ಕಷ್ಟಪಡುತಿರಲೆನುವುದೋ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮವಿಧಿಯೇನೋ! ।ಅಷ್ಟೆ ನಮ್ಮಯ ಪಾಡು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪ ॥

content: ಇರಬಹುದು; ಚಿರಕಾಲ ಬೊಮ್ಮ ಚಿಂತಿಸಿ ದುಡಿದು ।ನಿರವಿಸಿಹ ವಿಶ್ವಚಿತ್ರವ ಮರ್ತ್ಯನರನು ॥ಅರಿತೆನಾನೆನ್ನುವಂತಾಗೆ ಕೃತಿ ಕೌಶಲದ ।ಹಿರಿಮೆಗದು ಕುಂದಲ್ತೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫ ॥irabahudu; chirakAla bomma chintisi duDidu ।niravisiha vishvachitrada martyanaranu ॥arite nAnu ennuvantAge kruti kaushalada ।hirimege adu kundalte?  - Mankutimma ॥ 35 ॥O! Mannkutimma, It could be so that the Creator thought for eternity and designed this picture of the world. Would it demean his creative genius any much if the mortal man is able to figure it out?
translation: O! Mannkutimma, It could be so that the Creator thought for eternity and designed this picture of the world. Would it demean his creative genius any much if the mortal man is able to figure it out?
title: ಕೃತಿ ಕೌಶಲದ ಹಿರಿಮೆಗದು ಕುಂದಲ್ತೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: irabahudu; chirakAla bomma chintisi duDidu ।niravisiha vishvachitrada martyanaranu ॥arite nAnu ennuvantAge kruti kaushalada ।hirimege adu kundalte?  - Mankutimma ॥ 35 ॥
kagga: ಇರಬಹುದು; ಚಿರಕಾಲ ಬೊಮ್ಮ ಚಿಂತಿಸಿ ದುಡಿದು ।ನಿರವಿಸಿಹ ವಿಶ್ವಚಿತ್ರವ ಮರ್ತ್ಯನರನು ॥ಅರಿತೆನಾನೆನ್ನುವಂತಾಗೆ ಕೃತಿ ಕೌಶಲದ ।ಹಿರಿಮೆಗದು ಕುಂದಲ್ತೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫ ॥

content: ಎಲ್ಲೆಲ್ಲಿಯುಂ ಮೋಹಸಂಭ್ರಾಂತಿಗಳ ಕವಿಸಿ ।ಸಲ್ಲದ ಕುಮಾರ್ಗದೊಳು ನಿನ್ನ ತಾಂ ನಡಸಿ ॥ಗೆಲ್ಲಲಿಲ್ಲವನಾ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಯೊಳಗೆಂದು ವಿಧಿ ।ಸೊಲ್ಲಿಪುದು ಸರಿಯೇನೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬ ॥ellelliyum mOhasambhrAntigaLa kavisi ।sallada kumArgadoLu ninna tAm naDasi ॥gellalillavanA parIksheyoLagendu vidhi ।sollipudu sariyEnO?  - Mankutimma ॥ 36 ॥O! Mankutimma, Is the providence fair in claiming that man did not succeed in his tests? It set up illusions all around him. It made him tread all the wrong (immoral) paths.
translation: O! Mankutimma, Is the providence fair in claiming that man did not succeed in his tests? It set up illusions all around him. It made him tread all the wrong (immoral) paths.
title: ಸೊಲ್ಲಿಪುದು ಸರಿಯೇನೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ellelliyum mOhasambhrAntigaLa kavisi ।sallada kumArgadoLu ninna tAm naDasi ॥gellalillavanA parIksheyoLagendu vidhi ।sollipudu sariyEnO?  - Mankutimma ॥ 36 ॥
kagga: ಎಲ್ಲೆಲ್ಲಿಯುಂ ಮೋಹಸಂಭ್ರಾಂತಿಗಳ ಕವಿಸಿ ।ಸಲ್ಲದ ಕುಮಾರ್ಗದೊಳು ನಿನ್ನ ತಾಂ ನಡಸಿ ॥ಗೆಲ್ಲಲಿಲ್ಲವನಾ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಯೊಳಗೆಂದು ವಿಧಿ ।ಸೊಲ್ಲಿಪುದು ಸರಿಯೇನೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬ ॥

content: ಅವತರಿಸಿಹನು ಬೊಮ್ಮ ವಿಶ್ವದೇಹದೊಳೆನ್ನೆ ।ಅವನ ವೇಷಗಳೇಕೆ ಮಾರ್ಪಡುತಲಿಹವು? ॥ತವಕಪಡನೇತಕೋ ಕುರುಹ ತೋರಲು ನಮಗೆ ।ಅವಿತುಕೊಂಡಿಹುದೇಕೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭ ॥avatarisihanu bomma vishvadEhadoLenne ।avana vEShagaLEke mArpaDutalihavu? ॥tavakapaDanu EtakO kuruha tOralu namage ।avitukonDihudEkO?  - Mankutimma ॥ 37 ॥O! Mankutimma, If you say that the Creator incarnates on this world then why does his form change from time to time? Why is he not eager to show clues about himself to us? Why is he hiding?
translation: O! Mankutimma, If you say that the Creator incarnates on this world then why does his form change from time to time? Why is he not eager to show clues about himself to us? Why is he hiding?
title: ಅವಿತುಕೊಂಡಿಹುದೇಕೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: avatarisihanu bomma vishvadEhadoLenne ।avana vEShagaLEke mArpaDutalihavu? ॥tavakapaDanu EtakO kuruha tOralu namage ।avitukonDihudEkO?  - Mankutimma ॥ 37 ॥
kagga: ಅವತರಿಸಿಹನು ಬೊಮ್ಮ ವಿಶ್ವದೇಹದೊಳೆನ್ನೆ ।ಅವನ ವೇಷಗಳೇಕೆ ಮಾರ್ಪಡುತಲಿಹವು? ॥ತವಕಪಡನೇತಕೋ ಕುರುಹ ತೋರಲು ನಮಗೆ ।ಅವಿತುಕೊಂಡಿಹುದೇಕೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭ ॥

content: ಬೇರಯಿಸಿ ನಿಮಿಷನಿಮಿಷಕಮೊಡಲಬಣ್ಣಗಳ ।ತೋರಿಪೊಸರವಳ್ಳಿಯಂತೇನು ಬೊಮ್ಮಂ? ॥ಪೂರ ಮೈದೋರೆನೆಂಬಾ ಕಪಟಿಯಂಶಾವ ।ತಾರದಿಂದಾರ್ಗೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮ ॥bErayisi nimiSha nimiShakam oDala baNNagaLa ।toripo osaravaLLiyontEnu bommam? ॥pUra maidOrenu emba kapaTiya amshAva ।tAradinda ArgEnu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 38 ॥O! Mankutimma, Is the creator like a chameleon to change his appearance every minute? If that cheat is not ready to show himself completely ever, then what good are these part incarnations for any body?
translation: O! Mankutimma, Is the creator like a chameleon to change his appearance every minute? If that cheat is not ready to show himself completely ever, then what good are these part incarnations for any body?
title: ಅಂಶಾತಾರದಿಂದಾರ್ಗೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bErayisi nimiSha nimiShakam oDala baNNagaLa ।toripo osaravaLLiyontEnu bommam? ॥pUra maidOrenu emba kapaTiya amshAva ।tAradinda ArgEnu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 38 ॥
kagga: ಬೇರಯಿಸಿ ನಿಮಿಷನಿಮಿಷಕಮೊಡಲಬಣ್ಣಗಳ ।ತೋರಿಪೊಸರವಳ್ಳಿಯಂತೇನು ಬೊಮ್ಮಂ? ॥ಪೂರ ಮೈದೋರೆನೆಂಬಾ ಕಪಟಿಯಂಶಾವ ।ತಾರದಿಂದಾರ್ಗೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮ ॥

content: ಪುಸಿಯ ನೀಂ ಪುಸಿಗೈದು ದಿಟವ ಕಾಣ್ಬವೊಲೆಸಗೆ ।ಮುಸುಕ ತಳೆದಿಹನು ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನೆನ್ನುವೊಡೆ ॥ಒಸೆದೇತಕವನೀಯನೆಮಗೊಂದು ನಿಜಕುರುಹ ।ನಿಶೆಯೊಳುಡುಕರದವೊಲು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯ ॥pusiya nIm pusigaidu diTava kANbal osage ।musuka taLedihanu parabommanu enuuvoDe ॥osedEtake avau eeya nemagondu nijakuruha ।nisheyoL uDukaradavolu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 39 ॥O! Mankutimma? Let us entertain a thought that the creator who is behind a veil wants man to call the bluff (detect lie as lie) and be capable of seeing the truth. Then why has he not given us any real clue to that effect  - like moon light during a dark night?
translation: O! Mankutimma? Let us entertain a thought that the creator who is behind a veil wants man to call the bluff (detect lie as lie) and be capable of seeing the truth. Then why has he not given us any real clue to that effect  - like moon light during a dark night?
title: ನಿಶೆಯೊಳುಡುಕರದವೊಲು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: pusiya nIm pusigaidu diTava kANbal osage ।musuka taLedihanu parabommanu enuuvoDe ॥osedEtake avau eeya nemagondu nijakuruha ।nisheyoL uDukaradavolu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 39 ॥
kagga: ಪುಸಿಯ ನೀಂ ಪುಸಿಗೈದು ದಿಟವ ಕಾಣ್ಬವೊಲೆಸಗೆ ।ಮುಸುಕ ತಳೆದಿಹನು ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನೆನ್ನುವೊಡೆ ॥ಒಸೆದೇತಕವನೀಯನೆಮಗೊಂದು ನಿಜಕುರುಹ ।ನಿಶೆಯೊಳುಡುಕರದವೊಲು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯ ॥

content: ನಿಶಿಯೊಳೇಂ ಕಾಣಬಾರನು ಹಗಲನೊಲ್ಲದೊಡೆ ।ಶಶಿರವಿಗಳವನ ಮನೆಕಿಟಕಿಯಾಗಿರರೇಂ? ॥ಮುಸುಕುಬೆಳಕೊಂದಾದ ಸಂಜೆಮಂಜೇನವನು ।ಮಿಸುಕಿ ಸುಳಿಯುವ ಸಮಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦ ॥nishiyoLEm kANabAranu hagalanolladoDe ।shashi ravigaLu avana manekiTakiyAgirarEm? ॥musukubeLakondAda sanjemanjenavanu ।misuki suLiyuva samaya?  - Mankutimma ॥ 40 ॥O! Mankutimma, If he feels that daytime has too much light to his comfort, why does he not be seen even at night? Does he follow times according to cycles of Sun or Moon? Is the only time that he sneaks out when daylight fades into twilight?
translation: O! Mankutimma, If he feels that daytime has too much light to his comfort, why does he not be seen even at night? Does he follow times according to cycles of Sun or Moon? Is the only time that he sneaks out when daylight fades into twilight?
title: ಮಿಸುಕಿ ಸುಳಿಯುವ ಸಮಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nishiyoLEm kANabAranu hagalanolladoDe ।shashi ravigaLu avana manekiTakiyAgirarEm? ॥musukubeLakondAda sanjemanjenavanu ।misuki suLiyuva samaya?  - Mankutimma ॥ 40 ॥
kagga: ನಿಶಿಯೊಳೇಂ ಕಾಣಬಾರನು ಹಗಲನೊಲ್ಲದೊಡೆ ।ಶಶಿರವಿಗಳವನ ಮನೆಕಿಟಕಿಯಾಗಿರರೇಂ? ॥ಮುಸುಕುಬೆಳಕೊಂದಾದ ಸಂಜೆಮಂಜೇನವನು ।ಮಿಸುಕಿ ಸುಳಿಯುವ ಸಮಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦ ॥

content: ಕದಕಗಳಿಯನು ಬಿಗಿದು ಬೊಮ್ಮ ಗುಡಿಯೊಳಗಿರಲಿ ।ಅದರ ಕೀಲ್ಕುಂಚಿಕೆಯ ಹೊರಕೆಸೆಯೆ ಸಾಕು ॥ಪದವಾಕ್ಯವಿದರಾಗ ವಾದಗಡಣೆಯ ಬಿಟ್ಟು ।ಒದವಿಪರು ದಿಟದರಿವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧ ॥kadakagaLiyanu bigidu bomma guDiyoLagirali ।adara kIlkunchikeya horakeseye sAku ॥padavAkyavidarAga vAdagaDaNeya biTTu ।odaviparu diTadariva  - Mankutimma ॥ 41 ॥O! Mankutimma, let god lock himslef inside a temple. No Problem. At least, let him throw the key bunch outside. Those scholars who are good at words and sentences will at least then stop the arguments and debates and start talking (teaching) about the realization of the Truth.
translation: O! Mankutimma, let god lock himslef inside a temple. No Problem. At least, let him throw the key bunch outside. Those scholars who are good at words and sentences will at least then stop the arguments and debates and start talking (teaching) about the realization of the Truth.
title: ಒದವಿಪರು ದಿಟದರಿವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kadakagaLiyanu bigidu bomma guDiyoLagirali ।adara kIlkunchikeya horakeseye sAku ॥padavAkyavidarAga vAdagaDaNeya biTTu ।odaviparu diTadariva  - Mankutimma ॥ 41 ॥
kagga: ಕದಕಗಳಿಯನು ಬಿಗಿದು ಬೊಮ್ಮ ಗುಡಿಯೊಳಗಿರಲಿ ।ಅದರ ಕೀಲ್ಕುಂಚಿಕೆಯ ಹೊರಕೆಸೆಯೆ ಸಾಕು ॥ಪದವಾಕ್ಯವಿದರಾಗ ವಾದಗಡಣೆಯ ಬಿಟ್ಟು ।ಒದವಿಪರು ದಿಟದರಿವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧ ॥

content: ಆಹ! ಈ ಮೋಹಗಳೊ ನೇಹಗಳೊ ದಾಹಗಳೊ ।ಊಹಿಪೆಯ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ ಹೃದಯಮಿಹುದೆಂದು? ॥ಹೋಹೊ ಹಾಹಾ ಎಂದು ನಮ್ಮ ಬಾಯ್ಬಿಡಿಸುವುದೆ ।ಈ ಹರಿಬದೊಳಗುಟ್ಟೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨ ॥Aha! ee mOhagaLo nEhagaLo dAhagaLo ।Uhipeya sRuSTiyali hRudayam ihudendu? ॥hOho hAhA endu namma bAy biDusuvude ।ee haribada oLaguTTo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 42 ॥O! Mankutimma, Aha! Do you imagine that this world has space for emotions when you see attachments (love), friendships and yearnings? Or all these feelings only meant for us exclaim Ho Ho! Ha Ha! now-and-then.
translation: O! Mankutimma, Aha! Do you imagine that this world has space for emotions when you see attachments (love), friendships and yearnings? Or all these feelings only meant for us exclaim Ho Ho! Ha Ha! now-and-then.
title: ಬಾಯ್ಬಿಡಿಸುವುದೆ ಈ ಹರಿಬದೊಳಗುಟ್ಟೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Aha! ee mOhagaLo nEhagaLo dAhagaLo ।Uhipeya sRuSTiyali hRudayam ihudendu? ॥hOho hAhA endu namma bAy biDusuvude ।ee haribada oLaguTTo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 42 ॥
kagga: ಆಹ! ಈ ಮೋಹಗಳೊ ನೇಹಗಳೊ ದಾಹಗಳೊ ।ಊಹಿಪೆಯ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ ಹೃದಯಮಿಹುದೆಂದು? ॥ಹೋಹೊ ಹಾಹಾ ಎಂದು ನಮ್ಮ ಬಾಯ್ಬಿಡಿಸುವುದೆ ।ಈ ಹರಿಬದೊಳಗುಟ್ಟೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨ ॥

content: ಮೇಲೆ ಕೆಳಗೊಳಗೆ ಬಳಿ ಸುತ್ತಲೆತ್ತೆತ್ತಲುಂ ।ಮೂಲೆಮೂಲೆಯಲಿ ವಿದ್ಯುಲ್ಲಹರಿಯೊಂದು ॥ಧೂಲಿಕಣ ಭೂಗೋಳ ರವಿ ಚಂದ್ರ ತಾರೆಗಳ ।ಚಾಲಿಪುದು ಬಿಡು ಕೊಡದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩ ॥mEle keLagoLage baLi suttalu ettettalum ।mUlemUleyali vidyullahariyondu ॥dhUlikaNa bhUgOLa ravi chandra tAregaLa ।chAlipudu biDu koDade  - Mankutimma ॥ 43 ॥O! Mankutimma, there is some electrifying force that is causing this incessant movement of things. This force is every where  - top, bottom, inside, outside, surrounding everything, nook-and-corner. This force acts on everything from specs of dust to celestial objects  - Earth, Sun, Moon and the stars. Wonder what it may be and why it is so?
translation: O! Mankutimma, there is some electrifying force that is causing this incessant movement of things. This force is every where  - top, bottom, inside, outside, surrounding everything, nook-and-corner. This force acts on everything from specs of dust to celestial objects  - Earth, Sun, Moon and the stars. Wonder what it may be and why it is so?
title: ಚಾಲಿಪುದು ಬಿಡು ಕೊಡದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mEle keLagoLage baLi suttalu ettettalum ।mUlemUleyali vidyullahariyondu ॥dhUlikaNa bhUgOLa ravi chandra tAregaLa ।chAlipudu biDu koDade  - Mankutimma ॥ 43 ॥
kagga: ಮೇಲೆ ಕೆಳಗೊಳಗೆ ಬಳಿ ಸುತ್ತಲೆತ್ತೆತ್ತಲುಂ ।ಮೂಲೆಮೂಲೆಯಲಿ ವಿದ್ಯುಲ್ಲಹರಿಯೊಂದು ॥ಧೂಲಿಕಣ ಭೂಗೋಳ ರವಿ ಚಂದ್ರ ತಾರೆಗಳ ।ಚಾಲಿಪುದು ಬಿಡು ಕೊಡದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩ ॥

content: ಮಂದಾಕ್ಷಿ ನಮಗಿಹುದು. ಬಲುದೂರ ಸಾಗದದು ।ಸಂದೆ ಮಸಕಿನೊಳಿಹುದು ಜೀವನದ ಪಥವು ॥ಒಂದುಮೆಟುಕದು ಕೈಗೆ; ಏನೊ ಕಣ್ಕೆಣಕುವುದು ।ಸಂದಿಯವೆ ನಮ್ಮ ಗತಿ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪ ॥mandAkShi namagihudu. baludUra sAgadadu ।sande masakinoLihudu jIvanada pathavu ॥ondum eTukadu kaige; eno kaN keNakuvudu ।sandiyave namma gati!  - Mankutimma ॥ 44 ॥O! Mankutimma. Our eyesight is poor. It can not see too far. In this poor blurred vision we take some guesses and lead our lives. We do not get anything in our hand. But little flashes of light tantalize our eyes. Is guessing and groping in poor vision our ultimate fate?
translation: O! Mankutimma. Our eyesight is poor. It can not see too far. In this poor blurred vision we take some guesses and lead our lives. We do not get anything in our hand. But little flashes of light tantalize our eyes. Is guessing and groping in poor vision our ultimate fate?
title: ಸಂದಿಯವೆ ನಮ್ಮ ಗತಿ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mandAkShi namagihudu. baludUra sAgadadu ।sande masakinoLihudu jIvanada pathavu ॥ondum eTukadu kaige; eno kaN keNakuvudu ।sandiyave namma gati!  - Mankutimma ॥ 44 ॥
kagga: ಮಂದಾಕ್ಷಿ ನಮಗಿಹುದು. ಬಲುದೂರ ಸಾಗದದು ।ಸಂದೆ ಮಸಕಿನೊಳಿಹುದು ಜೀವನದ ಪಥವು ॥ಒಂದುಮೆಟುಕದು ಕೈಗೆ; ಏನೊ ಕಣ್ಕೆಣಕುವುದು ।ಸಂದಿಯವೆ ನಮ್ಮ ಗತಿ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪ ॥

content: ಬೆಂಕಿಯುಂಡೆಯ ಬೆಳಕು ಬೆಣ್ಣೆಯುಂಡೆಯ ಬೆಳಕು ।ಮಂಕುವಿಡಿಸಲು ಸಾಕು ಮಣ್ಣುಂಡೆ ಕಣ್ಗೆ ॥ಶಂಕೆಗೆಡೆಯಿರದು ಕತ್ತಲೆಯೆ ಜಗವನು ಕವಿಯೆ ।ಬೊಂಕುದೀವಿಗೆ ತಂಟೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫ ॥benkiyunDeya beLaku beNNeyunDeya beLaku ।mankuviDisalu sAku maNNuNde kaNge ॥shankege eDeyiradu kattaleye jagavanu kaviye ।bonkudIvige tanTe  - Mankutimma ॥ 45 ॥O! Mankutimma, a ball of fire has light. So does a ball of butter. One is hot, one is cold. Eyes can not differentiate between the two. A simple ball of clay molded into any shape is enough to deceive the eyes. There would be no doubt in our mind if the whole world was in darkness. It is this small flickering light that creates illusions and doubts in our mind.
translation: O! Mankutimma, a ball of fire has light. So does a ball of butter. One is hot, one is cold. Eyes can not differentiate between the two. A simple ball of clay molded into any shape is enough to deceive the eyes. There would be no doubt in our mind if the whole world was in darkness. It is this small flickering light that creates illusions and doubts in our mind.
title: ಬೊಂಕುದೀವಿಗೆ ತಂಟೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: benkiyunDeya beLaku beNNeyunDeya beLaku ।mankuviDisalu sAku maNNuNde kaNge ॥shankege eDeyiradu kattaleye jagavanu kaviye ।bonkudIvige tanTe  - Mankutimma ॥ 45 ॥
kagga: ಬೆಂಕಿಯುಂಡೆಯ ಬೆಳಕು ಬೆಣ್ಣೆಯುಂಡೆಯ ಬೆಳಕು ।ಮಂಕುವಿಡಿಸಲು ಸಾಕು ಮಣ್ಣುಂಡೆ ಕಣ್ಗೆ ॥ಶಂಕೆಗೆಡೆಯಿರದು ಕತ್ತಲೆಯೆ ಜಗವನು ಕವಿಯೆ ।ಬೊಂಕುದೀವಿಗೆ ತಂಟೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫ ॥

content: ಇರಲಿ ಜೀವರಹಸ್ಯವರೆಪರದೆಯೊಳಗಡಗಿ ।ಅರಸಿ ವರಿಸುವರಾರು ಬೀದಿಬತ್ತಲಿಯ? ॥ಅರಳಿಪುದದಡಗಿರ್ದೊಡಾಗ ನಮ್ಮದೆಗಣ್ಣ ।ಸುರಸತೆಯ ಕುತುಕದಿಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬ ॥irali jIvarahasyavu areparadeyoLage aDagi ।arasi varisuvarAru bIdibattaliya? ॥araLipudadu aDagirdoDe Aga nammadegaNNa ।surasateya kutukadim  - Mankutimma ॥ 46 ॥O! Mankutimma, Let the mystery of life be concealed behind a translucent veil  - only barely visible. Will any one willingly marry a bride who walks around naked on streets. People will not respect something that is easily accessible. Only when the mystery blooms in hiding does it tantalize our hearts with curiosity.
translation: O! Mankutimma, Let the mystery of life be concealed behind a translucent veil  - only barely visible. Will any one willingly marry a bride who walks around naked on streets. People will not respect something that is easily accessible. Only when the mystery blooms in hiding does it tantalize our hearts with curiosity.
title: ಸುರಸತೆಯ ಕುತುಕದಿಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: irali jIvarahasyavu areparadeyoLage aDagi ।arasi varisuvarAru bIdibattaliya? ॥araLipudadu aDagirdoDe Aga nammadegaNNa ।surasateya kutukadim  - Mankutimma ॥ 46 ॥
kagga: ಇರಲಿ ಜೀವರಹಸ್ಯವರೆಪರದೆಯೊಳಗಡಗಿ ।ಅರಸಿ ವರಿಸುವರಾರು ಬೀದಿಬತ್ತಲಿಯ? ॥ಅರಳಿಪುದದಡಗಿರ್ದೊಡಾಗ ನಮ್ಮದೆಗಣ್ಣ ।ಸುರಸತೆಯ ಕುತುಕದಿಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬ ॥

content: ಅರೆಗಣ್ಣು ನಮದೆಂದು ಕೊರಕೊರಗಿ ಫಲವೇನು? ।ಅರೆಬೆಳಕು ಧರೆಯೊಳೆಂದೊರಲಿ ಸುಖವೇನು? ॥ಇರುವ ಕಣ್ಣಿರುವ ಬೆಳಕಿನೊಳಾದನಿತ ನೋಡಿ ।ಪರಿಕಿಸಿದೊಡದು ಲಾಭ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭ ॥aregaNNu namadendu korakoragi phalavEnu? ।arebeLaku dhareyoLu endu orali sukhavEnu? ॥iruva kaNNiruva beLakinoLu Adanita nODi ।parikisidoDe adu lAbha  - Mankutimma ॥ 47 ॥O! Mankutimma, What is the use of lamenting that our eyes are not capable of seeing the complete truth? What is the use of bemoaning that light in this world is not sufficient? It is best if we try to see whatever is visible in whatever light is available.
translation: O! Mankutimma, What is the use of lamenting that our eyes are not capable of seeing the complete truth? What is the use of bemoaning that light in this world is not sufficient? It is best if we try to see whatever is visible in whatever light is available.
title: ಪರಿಕಿಸಿದೊಡದು ಲಾಭ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aregaNNu namadendu korakoragi phalavEnu? ।arebeLaku dhareyoLu endu orali sukhavEnu? ॥iruva kaNNiruva beLakinoLu Adanita nODi ।parikisidoDe adu lAbha  - Mankutimma ॥ 47 ॥
kagga: ಅರೆಗಣ್ಣು ನಮದೆಂದು ಕೊರಕೊರಗಿ ಫಲವೇನು? ।ಅರೆಬೆಳಕು ಧರೆಯೊಳೆಂದೊರಲಿ ಸುಖವೇನು? ॥ಇರುವ ಕಣ್ಣಿರುವ ಬೆಳಕಿನೊಳಾದನಿತ ನೋಡಿ ।ಪರಿಕಿಸಿದೊಡದು ಲಾಭ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭ ॥

content: ಒಂದಿಹುದುಪಾಯವೋರೊರ್ವನರೆಗಣ್ಣುಗಳು ।ಮೊಂದೊಂದು ಸತ್ಯಾಂಶಕಿರಣಗಳ ಪಿಡಿದು ॥ಒಂದುಗೂಡಿದೊಡವರ್ಗಳರಿವನೆಲ್ಲವನಾಗ ।ಮುಂದು ಸಾಗುವೆವಿನಿತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮ ॥ondihudu upAya OrOrvana aregaNNugaLu ।modondu satyAmsha kiraNagaLa piDidu ॥ondugUDidoDe avargaLu arivanellavanu Aga ।mundu sAguve initu  - Mankutimma ॥ 48 ॥O! Mankutimma, each of us can see some thing from what ever poor vision that we have. They are different incomplete versions of the truth. But we need not be disheartened. If we can unite all the different incomplete vision (which are all truths by themselves), we may get to know the real truth.
translation: O! Mankutimma, each of us can see some thing from what ever poor vision that we have. They are different incomplete versions of the truth. But we need not be disheartened. If we can unite all the different incomplete vision (which are all truths by themselves), we may get to know the real truth.
title: ಮುಂದು ಸಾಗುವೆವಿನಿತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ondihudu upAya OrOrvana aregaNNugaLu ।modondu satyAmsha kiraNagaLa piDidu ॥ondugUDidoDe avargaLu arivanellavanu Aga ।mundu sAguve initu  - Mankutimma ॥ 48 ॥
kagga: ಒಂದಿಹುದುಪಾಯವೋರೊರ್ವನರೆಗಣ್ಣುಗಳು ।ಮೊಂದೊಂದು ಸತ್ಯಾಂಶಕಿರಣಗಳ ಪಿಡಿದು ॥ಒಂದುಗೂಡಿದೊಡವರ್ಗಳರಿವನೆಲ್ಲವನಾಗ ।ಮುಂದು ಸಾಗುವೆವಿನಿತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮ ॥

content: ಪಂಡಿತರೆ ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರಿಗಳೆ ಮಿಥ್ಯೆಯಿಂ ತಥ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ ।ಖಂಡಿತದಿ ಸೇತುವೆಯ ಕಟ್ಟುವೊಡೆ ನೀವು ॥ಕಂಡಿಹಿರ ನರಹೃದಯದಾಳ ಸುಳಿ ಬಿರುಬುಗಳ? ।ದಂಡವದನುಳಿದ ನುಡಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯ ॥panditare shAstrigaLe mithyeyim tathyakke ।khanditadi sEtuveya kaTTuvoDe nIvu ॥kandihira nara hRudayada ALa suLi birubugaLa? ।danDavu adanu uLida nuDi  - Mankutimma ॥ 49 ॥O! Mankutimma, Let us ask these learned scholars who are determined to bridge the gap between what we can see and feel (deceit) to the ultimate truth  - Have you people been able to measure the emotional depth in people;s hearts and ferocity of the swirls that are found there? Any talk about the truth that ignores (does not explain) the human emotion/conscience is a waste.
translation: O! Mankutimma, Let us ask these learned scholars who are determined to bridge the gap between what we can see and feel (deceit) to the ultimate truth  - Have you people been able to measure the emotional depth in people;s hearts and ferocity of the swirls that are found there? Any talk about the truth that ignores (does not explain) the human emotion/conscience is a waste.
title: ದಂಡವದನುಳಿದ ನುಡಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: panditare shAstrigaLe mithyeyim tathyakke ।khanditadi sEtuveya kaTTuvoDe nIvu ॥kandihira nara hRudayada ALa suLi birubugaLa? ।danDavu adanu uLida nuDi  - Mankutimma ॥ 49 ॥
kagga: ಪಂಡಿತರೆ ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರಿಗಳೆ ಮಿಥ್ಯೆಯಿಂ ತಥ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ ।ಖಂಡಿತದಿ ಸೇತುವೆಯ ಕಟ್ಟುವೊಡೆ ನೀವು ॥ಕಂಡಿಹಿರ ನರಹೃದಯದಾಳ ಸುಳಿ ಬಿರುಬುಗಳ? ।ದಂಡವದನುಳಿದ ನುಡಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯ ॥

content: ಮನೆಯೆಲ್ಲಿ ಸತ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ? ಶ್ರುತಿ ತರ್ಕಮಾತ್ರದೊಳೆ? ।ಅನುಭವಮುಮದರೊಂದು ನೆಲೆಯಾಗದಿಹುದೇಂ? ॥ಮನುಜಹೃದಯಾಂಗಣದೊಳೆನಿತೆನಿತೊ ದನಿಯುದಿಸಿ ।ಅಣಕಿಪುವು ತರ್ಕವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦ ॥maneyelli satyakke? shruti tarkamAtradoLe? ।anubhavamum adarondu neleyAgadihudEm? ॥manuja hRudayAngaNadoL enitenito daniyudisi ।aNakipuvu tarkavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 50 ॥O! Mankutimma, where can I find the truth? Should I hope to see it through scriptures and logic? Should experience also not be a way to reach the truth? In the stage of the human heart many emotions (due to experiences) take shape and those voices taunt the inadequacy of logic in this matter (of finding the ultimate truth).
translation: O! Mankutimma, where can I find the truth? Should I hope to see it through scriptures and logic? Should experience also not be a way to reach the truth? In the stage of the human heart many emotions (due to experiences) take shape and those voices taunt the inadequacy of logic in this matter (of finding the ultimate truth).
title: ಅಣಕಿಪುವು ತರ್ಕವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: maneyelli satyakke? shruti tarkamAtradoLe? ।anubhavamum adarondu neleyAgadihudEm? ॥manuja hRudayAngaNadoL enitenito daniyudisi ।aNakipuvu tarkavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 50 ॥
kagga: ಮನೆಯೆಲ್ಲಿ ಸತ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ? ಶ್ರುತಿ ತರ್ಕಮಾತ್ರದೊಳೆ? ।ಅನುಭವಮುಮದರೊಂದು ನೆಲೆಯಾಗದಿಹುದೇಂ? ॥ಮನುಜಹೃದಯಾಂಗಣದೊಳೆನಿತೆನಿತೊ ದನಿಯುದಿಸಿ ।ಅಣಕಿಪುವು ತರ್ಕವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦ ॥

content: ಸೆಳೆಯುತಿರ್ಪುವದೊಂದು ಹೊರಬೆಡಗಿನೆಳೆಗಳೆ ।ನ್ನೊಳಗಿನಸುವೆಲ್ಲವನು ಕಟ್ಟಿನಿಂ ಬಿಗಿದು ॥ಎಳೆದಾಟವೇಂ ಋಣಾಕರ್ಷಣೆಯೊ? ಸೃಷ್ಟಿವಿಧಿ ।ಯೊಳತಂತ್ರವೊ? ನೋಡು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧ ॥seLeyutirpuvu adondu horabeDagina eLegaLu en ।oLagina asuvellavanu kaTTinim bigidu ॥eLedATavEm? RuNAkarShaNeyo? sRuShTividhiya ।oLatantravO? nODu  - Mankutimma ॥ 51 ॥O! Mankutimma, I feel that some external force has a firm grip on all my inner essence (life, mind) and is dragging it towards these wonders of this external sensory world. Is this attraction a matter of fate? Or is it some law of creation that we are not able to decipher? Think.
translation: O! Mankutimma, I feel that some external force has a firm grip on all my inner essence (life, mind) and is dragging it towards these wonders of this external sensory world. Is this attraction a matter of fate? Or is it some law of creation that we are not able to decipher? Think.
title: ಸೃಷ್ಟಿವಿಧಿಯೊಳತಂತ್ರವೊ? ನೋಡು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: seLeyutirpuvu adondu horabeDagina eLegaLu en ।oLagina asuvellavanu kaTTinim bigidu ॥eLedATavEm? RuNAkarShaNeyo? sRuShTividhiya ।oLatantravO? nODu  - Mankutimma ॥ 51 ॥
kagga: ಸೆಳೆಯುತಿರ್ಪುವದೊಂದು ಹೊರಬೆಡಗಿನೆಳೆಗಳೆ ।ನ್ನೊಳಗಿನಸುವೆಲ್ಲವನು ಕಟ್ಟಿನಿಂ ಬಿಗಿದು ॥ಎಳೆದಾಟವೇಂ ಋಣಾಕರ್ಷಣೆಯೊ? ಸೃಷ್ಟಿವಿಧಿ ।ಯೊಳತಂತ್ರವೊ? ನೋಡು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧ ॥

content: ಗಗನನೀಲಿಮೆಯೆನ್ನ ಕಣ್ಗೆ ಸೊಗೆವೀವಂತೆ ।ಮುಗಿವ ತರಣಿಯ ರಕ್ತ ಹಿತವೆನಿಸದೇಕೋ! ॥ಸೊಗದ ಮೂಲವದೆಲ್ಲಿ ನೀಲದೊಳೊ ಕೆಂಪಿನೊಳೊ ।ಬಗೆವೆನ್ನ ಮನಸಿನೊಳೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨ ॥gagana nIlime enna kaNge sogevIvante ।mugiva taraNiya rakta hitavenisadu eko! ॥sogada mUlavadelli nIladoLo kempinoLo ।bageva enna manisinoLo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 52 ॥O! Mankutimma, the blue sky in the morning pleases me. For some unknown reason, I don;t like the crimson hue of the same sky during sunset. Where is the source of this pleasure? Is it in the blue? or in crimson? or in my mind that differentiates the two?
translation: O! Mankutimma, the blue sky in the morning pleases me. For some unknown reason, I don;t like the crimson hue of the same sky during sunset. Where is the source of this pleasure? Is it in the blue? or in crimson? or in my mind that differentiates the two?
title: ಬಗೆವೆನ್ನ ಮನಸಿನೊಳೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: gagana nIlime enna kaNge sogevIvante ।mugiva taraNiya rakta hitavenisadu eko! ॥sogada mUlavadelli nIladoLo kempinoLo ।bageva enna manisinoLo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 52 ॥
kagga: ಗಗನನೀಲಿಮೆಯೆನ್ನ ಕಣ್ಗೆ ಸೊಗೆವೀವಂತೆ ।ಮುಗಿವ ತರಣಿಯ ರಕ್ತ ಹಿತವೆನಿಸದೇಕೋ! ॥ಸೊಗದ ಮೂಲವದೆಲ್ಲಿ ನೀಲದೊಳೊ ಕೆಂಪಿನೊಳೊ ।ಬಗೆವೆನ್ನ ಮನಸಿನೊಳೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨ ॥

content: ತೃಣಕೆ ಹಸಿರೆಲ್ಲಿಯದು? ಬೇರಿನದೆ? ಮಣ್ಣಿನದೆ? ।ದಿನಪನದೆ? ಚಂದ್ರನದೆ? ನೀರಿನದೆ? ನಿನದೆ? ॥ತಣಿತಣಿವ ನಿನ್ನ ಕಣ್ಣಿನ ಪುಣ್ಯವೋ? ನೋಡು ।ಗುಣಕೆ ಕಾರಣವೊಂದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩ ॥tRuNake hasirellinadu? bErinade? maNNinade? ।dinapanade? candranede? nIrinade? ninade? ॥taNitaNiva ninna kaNNina puNyavO? nODu ।guNake kAraNavonde?  - Mankutimma ॥ 53 ॥O! Mankutimma, Where did the grass get its green color? Did it get it from its roots? or the soil? Or the Sun? or the Moon? or the water? or from you, the observer? Or is it that your eyes are fortunate to see it as pleasing green? Can there be only one source for any quality we find in objects (and people)?
translation: O! Mankutimma, Where did the grass get its green color? Did it get it from its roots? or the soil? Or the Sun? or the Moon? or the water? or from you, the observer? Or is it that your eyes are fortunate to see it as pleasing green? Can there be only one source for any quality we find in objects (and people)?
title: ಗುಣಕೆ ಕಾರಣವೊಂದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tRuNake hasirellinadu? bErinade? maNNinade? ।dinapanade? candranede? nIrinade? ninade? ॥taNitaNiva ninna kaNNina puNyavO? nODu ।guNake kAraNavonde?  - Mankutimma ॥ 53 ॥
kagga: ತೃಣಕೆ ಹಸಿರೆಲ್ಲಿಯದು? ಬೇರಿನದೆ? ಮಣ್ಣಿನದೆ? ।ದಿನಪನದೆ? ಚಂದ್ರನದೆ? ನೀರಿನದೆ? ನಿನದೆ? ॥ತಣಿತಣಿವ ನಿನ್ನ ಕಣ್ಣಿನ ಪುಣ್ಯವೋ? ನೋಡು ।ಗುಣಕೆ ಕಾರಣವೊಂದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩ ॥

content: ಫಲವಿಲ್ಲ ಕಾರ್ಯಕಾರಣವಾದದಿಂ ತತ್ತ್ವ ।ಸಿಲುಕದೆಮ್ಮಯ ತರ್ಕಕರ್ಕಶಾಂಕುಶಕೆ ॥ಸುಳಿವುದಾಗೀಗಳದು ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮಾನುಭವಗಳಲಿ ।ತಿಳಿಮನದೆ ನೋಳ್ಪರ್ಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪ ॥phalavilla kAryakAraNa vAdadim tattva ।silukadu emmaya tarka karkashAnkushake ॥suLivudu AgIgaLadu sUkShmAnubhavagaLali ।tiLimanade nOLparge  - Mankutimma ॥ 54 ॥O! Mankutimma, doing a careful cause-effect analysis for all that we see will not lead us to the knowledge of the truth. Our logic and methods of deduction are mere jabbing forks at the truth  - some times it sticks. Some time not. But never the complete truth. But for people who can think with a clear open mind  - the complete truth surfaces at times in form of subtle experiences.
translation: O! Mankutimma, doing a careful cause-effect analysis for all that we see will not lead us to the knowledge of the truth. Our logic and methods of deduction are mere jabbing forks at the truth  - some times it sticks. Some time not. But never the complete truth. But for people who can think with a clear open mind  - the complete truth surfaces at times in form of subtle experiences.
title: ತಿಳಿಮನದೆ ನೋಳ್ಪರ್ಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: phalavilla kAryakAraNa vAdadim tattva ।silukadu emmaya tarka karkashAnkushake ॥suLivudu AgIgaLadu sUkShmAnubhavagaLali ।tiLimanade nOLparge  - Mankutimma ॥ 54 ॥
kagga: ಫಲವಿಲ್ಲ ಕಾರ್ಯಕಾರಣವಾದದಿಂ ತತ್ತ್ವ ।ಸಿಲುಕದೆಮ್ಮಯ ತರ್ಕಕರ್ಕಶಾಂಕುಶಕೆ ॥ಸುಳಿವುದಾಗೀಗಳದು ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮಾನುಭವಗಳಲಿ ।ತಿಳಿಮನದೆ ನೋಳ್ಪರ್ಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪ ॥

content: ಕುರುಡನಿನಚಂದ್ರರನು ಕಣ್ಣಿಂದ ಕಾಣುವನೆ? ।ಅರಿಯುವಂ ಸೋಂಕಿಂದೆ ಬಿಸಿಲುತಣಿವುಗಳ ॥ನರನುಮಂತೆಯೆ ಮನಸಿನನುಭವದಿ ಕಾಣುವನು ।ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವಮಹಿಮೆಯನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫ ॥kuruDanu ina chandraranu kaNNinda kANuvane? ।ariyuvam sOnkinde bisilu taNivugaLa ॥naranum anteye manasina anubhavadi kANuvanu ।parasattva mahimeyanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 55 ॥O! Mankutimma, Will a blind person see the Sun or the Moon? He can know about them only by the heat or cold that he feels. Similarly, one can know about the eternal truth subtle experiences of his mind.
translation: O! Mankutimma, Will a blind person see the Sun or the Moon? He can know about them only by the heat or cold that he feels. Similarly, one can know about the eternal truth subtle experiences of his mind.
title: ಕಾಣುವನು ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವಮಹಿಮೆಯನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kuruDanu ina chandraranu kaNNinda kANuvane? ।ariyuvam sOnkinde bisilu taNivugaLa ॥naranum anteye manasina anubhavadi kANuvanu ।parasattva mahimeyanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 55 ॥
kagga: ಕುರುಡನಿನಚಂದ್ರರನು ಕಣ್ಣಿಂದ ಕಾಣುವನೆ? ।ಅರಿಯುವಂ ಸೋಂಕಿಂದೆ ಬಿಸಿಲುತಣಿವುಗಳ ॥ನರನುಮಂತೆಯೆ ಮನಸಿನನುಭವದಿ ಕಾಣುವನು ।ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವಮಹಿಮೆಯನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫ ॥

content: ಮೇಲಿಂದ ನಕ್ಷತ್ರಜಯಘೋಷ ಸುತ್ತಣಿಂ ।ಭೂಲೋಕದರಚು ಕೆಳಗಿಂ ಮೂಳೆಯಳುವು ॥ಕೇಳಬರುತೀ ಮೂರು ಕೂಗೆನ್ನ ಹೃದಯದಲಿ ।ಮೇಳಯಿಸುತಿದೆ ಸಂತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬ ॥mElinda nakShatra jayaghOSha suttaNim ।bhUlOkada arachu keLagim mULeya aLuvu ॥kELabarutI mUru kUgenna hRudayadali ।mELayisutide sante  - Mankutimma ॥ 56 ॥O! Mankutimma, the joy of the stars, the chaos of this world, the agony of those who are buried below  - these are the three voices that my heart hears. The voices are all telling different things and it is utter chaos  - as if a village market.
translation: O! Mankutimma, the joy of the stars, the chaos of this world, the agony of those who are buried below  - these are the three voices that my heart hears. The voices are all telling different things and it is utter chaos  - as if a village market.
title: ಮೇಳಯಿಸುತಿದೆ ಸಂತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mElinda nakShatra jayaghOSha suttaNim ।bhUlOkada arachu keLagim mULeya aLuvu ॥kELabarutI mUru kUgenna hRudayadali ।mELayisutide sante  - Mankutimma ॥ 56 ॥
kagga: ಮೇಲಿಂದ ನಕ್ಷತ್ರಜಯಘೋಷ ಸುತ್ತಣಿಂ ।ಭೂಲೋಕದರಚು ಕೆಳಗಿಂ ಮೂಳೆಯಳುವು ॥ಕೇಳಬರುತೀ ಮೂರು ಕೂಗೆನ್ನ ಹೃದಯದಲಿ ।ಮೇಳಯಿಸುತಿದೆ ಸಂತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬ ॥

content: ಆಗುಂಬೆಯಸ್ತಮಯ ದ್ರೋಣಪರ್ವತದುದಯ ।ತ್ಯಾಗರಾಜನ ಗಾನ ವಾಲ್ಮೀಕಿ ಕವನ ॥ಆಗಿಸವೆ ತಾವಿವೆಮ್ಮಂತರಂಗದಿ ಸತ್ಯ ।ಯೋಗಪುಲಕಾಂಕುರವ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭ ॥ Agumbeya astamaya drONaparvatada udaya ।tyAgarAjana gAna vAlmIki kavana ॥Agisade tAvivu emma antarangadi satya ।yOga pulakAnkurava?  - Mankutimma ॥ 57 ॥O! Mankutimma  - the sunset of Agumbe, the sunrise of Dronaparvatha (now known as Baba Budan Giri), listening to Tyagaraja;s compositions, reading poems from Ramayana written by Valmiki  - Have all these not sprout the bud of happiness of realizing the eternal truth in our minds?
translation: O! Mankutimma  - the sunset of Agumbe, the sunrise of Dronaparvatha (now known as Baba Budan Giri), listening to Tyagaraja;s compositions, reading poems from Ramayana written by Valmiki  - Have all these not sprout the bud of happiness of realizing the eternal truth in our minds?
title: ಸತ್ಯ ಯೋಗಪುಲಕಾಂಕುರವ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Agumbeya astamaya drONaparvatada udaya ।tyAgarAjana gAna vAlmIki kavana ॥Agisade tAvivu emma antarangadi satya ।yOga pulakAnkurava?  - Mankutimma ॥ 57 ॥
kagga: ಆಗುಂಬೆಯಸ್ತಮಯ ದ್ರೋಣಪರ್ವತದುದಯ ।ತ್ಯಾಗರಾಜನ ಗಾನ ವಾಲ್ಮೀಕಿ ಕವನ ॥ಆಗಿಸವೆ ತಾವಿವೆಮ್ಮಂತರಂಗದಿ ಸತ್ಯ ।ಯೋಗಪುಲಕಾಂಕುರವ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭ ॥

content: ಮಲೆಕಣಿವೆಗಳ ಬೆರಗು ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಕೊಪದ ಗುಡುಗು ।ಕಳೆಯೊಲವು ನಲ್ಲೆಯ ವಿಯೊಗವಿಂತಹವು ॥ನಿಲಿಸಿ ಮನದೋಟವನು ಮೂಕಗೊಳಿಪುವುವೆನ್ನ ।ನೊಳದನಿಯದೊಂದರಿಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮ ॥male kaNivegaLa beragu prakRuti kOpada guDugu ।keLeya olavu nalleya viyOgavu intahavu ॥nilisi manada Otavanu mUkagoLipuvuvu ennanu ।oLadaniyadondarim  - Mankutimma ॥ 58 ॥O! Mankutimma, there are some instances in our lives when our minds stopping running around; when we stop talking and become speechless because it wakes up our inner conscience (and makes us see the truth). Seeing mighty mountains and valleys, natures fury and thunder, love of friends, separation from wife  - these are a few of such situations.
translation: O! Mankutimma, there are some instances in our lives when our minds stopping running around; when we stop talking and become speechless because it wakes up our inner conscience (and makes us see the truth). Seeing mighty mountains and valleys, natures fury and thunder, love of friends, separation from wife  - these are a few of such situations.
title: ಮೂಕಗೊಳಿಪುವುವೆನ್ನ ನೊಳದನಿಯದೊಂದರಿಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: male kaNivegaLa beragu prakRuti kOpada guDugu ।keLeya olavu nalleya viyOgavu intahavu ॥nilisi manada Otavanu mUkagoLipuvuvu ennanu ।oLadaniyadondarim  - Mankutimma ॥ 58 ॥
kagga: ಮಲೆಕಣಿವೆಗಳ ಬೆರಗು ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಕೊಪದ ಗುಡುಗು ।ಕಳೆಯೊಲವು ನಲ್ಲೆಯ ವಿಯೊಗವಿಂತಹವು ॥ನಿಲಿಸಿ ಮನದೋಟವನು ಮೂಕಗೊಳಿಪುವುವೆನ್ನ ।ನೊಳದನಿಯದೊಂದರಿಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮ ॥

content: ಮಣಿಮಂತ್ರತಂತ್ರಸಿದ್ಧಿಗಳ ಸಾಕ್ಷ್ಯಗಳೇಕೆ ।ಮನಗಾಣಿಸಲು ನಿನಗೆ ದೈವದದ್ಭುತವ? ॥ಮನುಜರೊಳಗಾಗಾಗ ತೋರ್ಪ ಮಹನೀಯಗುಣ ।ವನುವಾದ ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯ ॥maNi mantra tantra siddhigaLa sAkShyagaLEke ।managANisalu ninage daivada adbhutava? ॥manujaroLu AgAgAga tOrpa mahanIyaguNa ।vanuvAda bommanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 59 ॥O! Mankutimma, Why does one need look at gems, hymns, rituals and other accomplishments as proof of God;s existence? Isn;t the extraordinary noble qualities found in ordinary men once in a while enough proof?
translation: O! Mankutimma, Why does one need look at gems, hymns, rituals and other accomplishments as proof of God;s existence? Isn;t the extraordinary noble qualities found in ordinary men once in a while enough proof?
title: ಮಹನೀಯಗುಣ ವನುವಾದ ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: maNi mantra tantra siddhigaLa sAkShyagaLEke ।managANisalu ninage daivada adbhutava? ॥manujaroLu AgAgAga tOrpa mahanIyaguNa ।vanuvAda bommanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 59 ॥
kagga: ಮಣಿಮಂತ್ರತಂತ್ರಸಿದ್ಧಿಗಳ ಸಾಕ್ಷ್ಯಗಳೇಕೆ ।ಮನಗಾಣಿಸಲು ನಿನಗೆ ದೈವದದ್ಭುತವ? ॥ಮನುಜರೊಳಗಾಗಾಗ ತೋರ್ಪ ಮಹನೀಯಗುಣ ।ವನುವಾದ ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯ ॥

content: ಗ್ರೀಸಿನಾ ಕಬ್ಬಗಳನೋದುವರು ದೆಹಲಿಯಲಿ ।ಕಾಶಿಯಾ ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರಗಳನಾಕ್ಸ್ ಫರ್ಡಿನವರು‍ ॥ದೇಶಕಾಲವಿಭಾಗ ಮನದ ರಾಜ್ಯದೊಳಿರದು ।ಶ್ವಾಸವದು ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦ ॥grIsinA kabbagaLanu Oduvaru dehaliyali ।kAshiyA shAstragaLanu AkspharDinavaru ॥dEshakAlavibhAga manada rAjyadoLu iradu ।shvAsavadu bommanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 60 ॥O! Mankutimma, people in Delhi read the epics of Greece. People in Oxford, England read about the scriptures taught in Kashi. The compartmentalizing of time and space does not exist in the kingdom of the mind. There every word  - no matter who uttered it and where  - is a breath of God.
translation: O! Mankutimma, people in Delhi read the epics of Greece. People in Oxford, England read about the scriptures taught in Kashi. The compartmentalizing of time and space does not exist in the kingdom of the mind. There every word  - no matter who uttered it and where  - is a breath of God.
title: ಶ್ವಾಸವದು ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: grIsinA kabbagaLanu Oduvaru dehaliyali ।kAshiyA shAstragaLanu AkspharDinavaru ॥dEshakAlavibhAga manada rAjyadoLu iradu ।shvAsavadu bommanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 60 ॥
kagga: ಗ್ರೀಸಿನಾ ಕಬ್ಬಗಳನೋದುವರು ದೆಹಲಿಯಲಿ ।ಕಾಶಿಯಾ ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರಗಳನಾಕ್ಸ್ ಫರ್ಡಿನವರು‍ ॥ದೇಶಕಾಲವಿಭಾಗ ಮನದ ರಾಜ್ಯದೊಳಿರದು ।ಶ್ವಾಸವದು ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦ ॥

content: ನಕ್ಷತ್ರಮಂಡಲದಿನಾಚೆಯಿಂದೊಂದು ದನಿ ।ವಕ್ಷೋಗುಹಾಂತರದಿನೊಂದು ದನಿಯಿಂತೀ ॥ಸಾಕ್ಷಿದ್ವಯವು ನಿನ್ನೊಳೊಂದುಗೂಡಿದೊಡದೇ ।ಪ್ರೇಕ್ಷೆ ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧ ॥nakShatra manDaladina Acheinda ondu dani ।vakSho guhAntaradinondu daniyantI ॥sAkShidvayavu ninnoLu ondugUDidoDadE ।prEkShe parabommanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 61 ॥O! Mankutimma, there is a voice that seems to come from beyond the constellations of stars (all the external influences to our intellect). There is one voice that rises from deep inside our heart (as a result of deep contemplation). When we can resolve this duality and unify them into one, we will see God.
translation: O! Mankutimma, there is a voice that seems to come from beyond the constellations of stars (all the external influences to our intellect). There is one voice that rises from deep inside our heart (as a result of deep contemplation). When we can resolve this duality and unify them into one, we will see God.
title: ಪ್ರೇಕ್ಷೆ ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nakShatra manDaladina Acheinda ondu dani ।vakSho guhAntaradinondu daniyantI ॥sAkShidvayavu ninnoLu ondugUDidoDadE ।prEkShe parabommanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 61 ॥
kagga: ನಕ್ಷತ್ರಮಂಡಲದಿನಾಚೆಯಿಂದೊಂದು ದನಿ ।ವಕ್ಷೋಗುಹಾಂತರದಿನೊಂದು ದನಿಯಿಂತೀ ॥ಸಾಕ್ಷಿದ್ವಯವು ನಿನ್ನೊಳೊಂದುಗೂಡಿದೊಡದೇ ।ಪ್ರೇಕ್ಷೆ ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧ ॥

content: ಭೌತವಿಜ್ಞಾನಿ ರವಿತಾರೆಧರೆಗಳ ಚಲನ ।ರೀತಿ ವೇಗವನೆಳೆದು ಶಕ್ತಿಗಳ ಗುಣಿಪನ್ ॥ಪ್ರೀತಿ ರೋಷಗಳನವನಳೆವನೇನ್? ಅವ್ಯಕ್ತ ।ಚೇತನವನರಿವನೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೨ ॥bhauta vijnAni ravi tAre dharegaLa chalana ।rIti vEgavanu aLedu shaktigaLa guNipan ॥prIti rOShagaLanu avanu aLevanEn? avyakta ।chEtanavanu arivanEm?  - Mankutimma ॥ 62 ॥O! Mankutimma, physicist may very well observe the trajectory and speed of the Sun, stars and earth and know their strengths. Can he measure the feelings like love and anger? Can he know any details of any energy that do not have physical manifestations?
translation: O! Mankutimma, physicist may very well observe the trajectory and speed of the Sun, stars and earth and know their strengths. Can he measure the feelings like love and anger? Can he know any details of any energy that do not have physical manifestations?
title: ಅವ್ಯಕ್ತ ಚೇತನವನರಿವನೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bhauta vijnAni ravi tAre dharegaLa chalana ।rIti vEgavanu aLedu shaktigaLa guNipan ॥prIti rOShagaLanu avanu aLevanEn? avyakta ।chEtanavanu arivanEm?  - Mankutimma ॥ 62 ॥
kagga: ಭೌತವಿಜ್ಞಾನಿ ರವಿತಾರೆಧರೆಗಳ ಚಲನ ।ರೀತಿ ವೇಗವನೆಳೆದು ಶಕ್ತಿಗಳ ಗುಣಿಪನ್ ॥ಪ್ರೀತಿ ರೋಷಗಳನವನಳೆವನೇನ್? ಅವ್ಯಕ್ತ ।ಚೇತನವನರಿವನೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೨ ॥

content: ನರಭಾಷೆ ಬಣ್ಣಿಪುದೆ ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವರೂಪವನು? ।ಅರಿಯದದು ನಮ್ಮೆದೆಯ ಭಾವಗಳನೊರೆಯೆ ॥ಪರಮಾನುಭವಗಳುಲಿಯನುಭವಿಗಳೊಳಕಿವಿಗೆ ।ಒರಟುಯಾನವೊ ಭಾಷೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೩ ॥narabhAshe baNNipude parasattva rUpavanu? ।ariyadadu nammedeya bhAvagaLanoreye ॥paramAnubhavagaLa uliyu anubhavigaLa oLakivige ।oraTuyAnavo bhAShe  - Mankutimma ॥ 63 ॥O! Mankutimma, is any human language adequate enough to describe the form of the universal being (God)? Can it even describe our feelings in our hearts? If we intend to make our inner ears (of our minds) listen to words describing the extraordinary experiences, the human language comes up as coarse and highly inadequate.
translation: O! Mankutimma, is any human language adequate enough to describe the form of the universal being (God)? Can it even describe our feelings in our hearts? If we intend to make our inner ears (of our minds) listen to words describing the extraordinary experiences, the human language comes up as coarse and highly inadequate.
title: ಒರಟುಯಾನವೊ ಭಾಷೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: narabhAshe baNNipude parasattva rUpavanu? ।ariyadadu nammedeya bhAvagaLanoreye ॥paramAnubhavagaLa uliyu anubhavigaLa oLakivige ।oraTuyAnavo bhAShe  - Mankutimma ॥ 63 ॥
kagga: ನರಭಾಷೆ ಬಣ್ಣಿಪುದೆ ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವರೂಪವನು? ।ಅರಿಯದದು ನಮ್ಮೆದೆಯ ಭಾವಗಳನೊರೆಯೆ ॥ಪರಮಾನುಭವಗಳುಲಿಯನುಭವಿಗಳೊಳಕಿವಿಗೆ ।ಒರಟುಯಾನವೊ ಭಾಷೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೩ ॥

content: ಚಿತ್ತದನುಭವ ಭಾವ ಸಂಭಾವನೆಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ।ಭತ್ತವದನು ವಿಚಾರಯುಕ್ತಿಗಳು ಕುಟ್ಟೆ ॥ತತ್ತ್ವತಂಡುಲ ದೊರೆಗುಮದು ವಿವೇಚಿತತತ್ತ್ವ ।ನಿತ್ಯ ಭೋಜನ ನಮಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೪ ॥chittada anubhava bhAva sambhAvanegaLella ।bhattu avadanu vichArayukthigaLu kuTTe ॥tattva tunDala doregum adu vivEchita tattva ।nitya bhOjana namage  - Mankutimma ॥ 64 ॥O! Mankutimma, our experiences, feelings and merits are like paddy (with husk). One must beat with examination and arguments. Only then one will get conviction on his own philosophy. Only such a theory can be called as well-thought one. That will be the food for thought every day.
translation: O! Mankutimma, our experiences, feelings and merits are like paddy (with husk). One must beat with examination and arguments. Only then one will get conviction on his own philosophy. Only such a theory can be called as well-thought one. That will be the food for thought every day.
title: ನಿತ್ಯ ಭೋಜನ ನಮಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: chittada anubhava bhAva sambhAvanegaLella ।bhattu avadanu vichArayukthigaLu kuTTe ॥tattva tunDala doregum adu vivEchita tattva ।nitya bhOjana namage  - Mankutimma ॥ 64 ॥
kagga: ಚಿತ್ತದನುಭವ ಭಾವ ಸಂಭಾವನೆಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ।ಭತ್ತವದನು ವಿಚಾರಯುಕ್ತಿಗಳು ಕುಟ್ಟೆ ॥ತತ್ತ್ವತಂಡುಲ ದೊರೆಗುಮದು ವಿವೇಚಿತತತ್ತ್ವ ।ನಿತ್ಯ ಭೋಜನ ನಮಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೪ ॥

content: ಪುಸ್ತಕದಿ ದೊರೆತರಿವು ಮಸ್ತಕದಿ ತಳೆದ ಮಣಿ ।ಚಿತ್ತದೊಳು ಬೆಳೆದರಿವು ತರು ತಳೆದ ಪುಷ್ಪ ॥ವಸ್ತು ಸಾಕ್ಷಾತ್ಕಾರವಂತರೀಕ್ಷಣೆಯಿಂದ ।ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರಿತನದಿಂದಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೫ ॥pustakadi doretarivu mastakadi taLeda maNi ।chittadoLu beLedarivu taru taLeda pushpa ॥vastu sAkshAtkAravu antarIkShaNEyinda ।shAstritanadindalla  - Mankutimma ॥ 65 ॥O! Mankutimma, knowledge obtained from reading books is like an ornament on top of the head. It;s only external. Knowledge that grows from contemplation, is like a flower on a tree. The realization of the truth can only be attained by looking inwards. Not just by being called well-educated.
translation: O! Mankutimma, knowledge obtained from reading books is like an ornament on top of the head. It;s only external. Knowledge that grows from contemplation, is like a flower on a tree. The realization of the truth can only be attained by looking inwards. Not just by being called well-educated.
title: ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರಿತನದಿಂದಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: pustakadi doretarivu mastakadi taLeda maNi ।chittadoLu beLedarivu taru taLeda pushpa ॥vastu sAkshAtkAravu antarIkShaNEyinda ।shAstritanadindalla  - Mankutimma ॥ 65 ॥
kagga: ಪುಸ್ತಕದಿ ದೊರೆತರಿವು ಮಸ್ತಕದಿ ತಳೆದ ಮಣಿ ।ಚಿತ್ತದೊಳು ಬೆಳೆದರಿವು ತರು ತಳೆದ ಪುಷ್ಪ ॥ವಸ್ತು ಸಾಕ್ಷಾತ್ಕಾರವಂತರೀಕ್ಷಣೆಯಿಂದ ।ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರಿತನದಿಂದಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೫ ॥

content: ವ್ಯರ್ಥವೆಂದೆನಿಪುದಲ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ ಬಹುಭಾಗ? ।ಅರ್ಥವೇಂ ಕ್ರಿಮಿಕೀಟಕೋಟಿ ರಚನೆಯಲಿ? ॥ಕರ್ತನಾಲೋಚಿಸದ ದುಂದಿನವನೆಂಬ ನುಡಿ ।ಯರ್ಧದೃಷ್ಟಿಯ ವಿವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೬ ॥vyarthavendu inipudala sRuShTiyali bahubhAga? ।arthavEm krimi kITa kOTi rachaneyali? ॥kartanu Alochisada dundina avanu emba nuDiyu ।ardha dRuShTiya vivara  - Mankutimma ॥ 66 ॥O! Mankutimma, why does most things in this creation seem to be a waste? What is the meaning of crores of these minute creatures  - worms and insects? If we say the creator a spend thrift who has did not plan this creation well  - we would describing the half truth.
translation: O! Mankutimma, why does most things in this creation seem to be a waste? What is the meaning of crores of these minute creatures  - worms and insects? If we say the creator a spend thrift who has did not plan this creation well  - we would describing the half truth.
title: ಅರ್ಧದೃಷ್ಟಿಯ ವಿವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vyarthavendu inipudala sRuShTiyali bahubhAga? ।arthavEm krimi kITa kOTi rachaneyali? ॥kartanu Alochisada dundina avanu emba nuDiyu ।ardha dRuShTiya vivara  - Mankutimma ॥ 66 ॥
kagga: ವ್ಯರ್ಥವೆಂದೆನಿಪುದಲ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ ಬಹುಭಾಗ? ।ಅರ್ಥವೇಂ ಕ್ರಿಮಿಕೀಟಕೋಟಿ ರಚನೆಯಲಿ? ॥ಕರ್ತನಾಲೋಚಿಸದ ದುಂದಿನವನೆಂಬ ನುಡಿ ।ಯರ್ಧದೃಷ್ಟಿಯ ವಿವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೬ ॥

content: ಸ್ರಷ್ಟುಸಂಕಲ್ಪಲಿಪಿಯೆಲ್ಲ ನಮ್ಮೆದುರಿಲ್ಲ ।ದೃಷ್ಟಿಗೋಚರವದರೊಳೊಂದು ಗೆರೆ ಮಾತ್ರ ॥ಅಷ್ಟರಿಂದಿದು ನಷ್ಟವದು ಶಿಷ್ಟವೆನ್ನುವುದೆ? ।ಕ್ಲಿಷ್ಟದ ಸಮಸ್ಯೆಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೭ ॥sraShTu sankalpa lipiyella nammeduru illa ।dRuShTi gOcharavadaroLondu gere mAtra ॥aShTarinda idu naShTavu adu shiShTavu ennuvude? ।kliShTada samasyeyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 67 ॥O! Mankutimma, we do not have the entire blueprint/script of this creation in front of us. All we see could well be just a line of the entire blueprint. Just by that little information, how can we say one thing is bad and other is good? This is a tough confusing problem.
