translation: O! Mankutimma, we do not have the entire blueprint/script of this creation in front of us. All we see could well be just a line of the entire blueprint. Just by that little information, how can we say one thing is bad and other is good? This is a tough confusing problem.
title: ಕ್ಲಿಷ್ಟದ ಸಮಸ್ಯೆಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sraShTu sankalpa lipiyella nammeduru illa ।dRuShTi gOcharavadaroLondu gere mAtra ॥aShTarinda idu naShTavu adu shiShTavu ennuvude? ।kliShTada samasyeyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 67 ॥
kagga: ಸ್ರಷ್ಟುಸಂಕಲ್ಪಲಿಪಿಯೆಲ್ಲ ನಮ್ಮೆದುರಿಲ್ಲ ।ದೃಷ್ಟಿಗೋಚರವದರೊಳೊಂದು ಗೆರೆ ಮಾತ್ರ ॥ಅಷ್ಟರಿಂದಿದು ನಷ್ಟವದು ಶಿಷ್ಟವೆನ್ನುವುದೆ? ।ಕ್ಲಿಷ್ಟದ ಸಮಸ್ಯೆಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೭ ॥

content: ಎಲ್ಲ ಅರೆಬೆಳಕು ಅರೆಸುಳಿವು ಅರೆತಿಳಿವಿಲ್ಲಿ ।ಎಲ್ಲಿ ಪರಿಪೂರಣವೊ ಅದನರಿಯುವನಕ ॥ಸೊಲ್ಲಿಸುವರಾರು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯ ಪೇಟಿಯೊಳಗುಟ್ಟ? ।ಎಲ್ಲ ಬಾಳು ರಹಸ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೮ ॥ella arebeLaku aresuLivu aretiLivilli ।elli paripUraNavo adanariyuva tanaka ॥sollisuvarAru sRuShTiya pETiyoLaguTTa ।ella bALu rahasya  - Mankutimma ॥ 68 ॥O! Mankutimma, it;s all half lighted here, half clues, half knowledge. No one knows where is the complete truth. Until we know that, who is going to teach us about the mystery of this creation (kept hidden in the box)? All life is a mystery.
translation: O! Mankutimma, it;s all half lighted here, half clues, half knowledge. No one knows where is the complete truth. Until we know that, who is going to teach us about the mystery of this creation (kept hidden in the box)? All life is a mystery.
title: ಎಲ್ಲ ಬಾಳು ರಹಸ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ella arebeLaku aresuLivu aretiLivilli ।elli paripUraNavo adanariyuva tanaka ॥sollisuvarAru sRuShTiya pETiyoLaguTTa ।ella bALu rahasya  - Mankutimma ॥ 68 ॥
kagga: ಎಲ್ಲ ಅರೆಬೆಳಕು ಅರೆಸುಳಿವು ಅರೆತಿಳಿವಿಲ್ಲಿ ।ಎಲ್ಲಿ ಪರಿಪೂರಣವೊ ಅದನರಿಯುವನಕ ॥ಸೊಲ್ಲಿಸುವರಾರು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯ ಪೇಟಿಯೊಳಗುಟ್ಟ? ।ಎಲ್ಲ ಬಾಳು ರಹಸ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೮ ॥

content: ಹೆಸರನರಿಯದ ಸಸಿಯೊಳಿರವೆ ರಸಗಂಧಗಳು? ।ಬಿಸಿಲದನು ಪಕ್ವಗೊಳಿಸುತೆ ಬಿಡಿಸದಿಹುದೆ? ॥ಪಸರಿಸದೆ ಗಾಳಿಯದನೊಯ್ದು ದಿಸೆದಿಸೆಗಳೊಳು ।ಉಸಿರುತಿಹೆವದ ನಾವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯ ॥hesaranu ariyada sasiyoLirave rasagandhagaLu? ।bisilu adanu pakvagoLisute biDisadihude? ॥pasarisade gALiyu adanoydu disedisegaLoLu ।usirutihevu ada nAvu  - Mankutimma ॥ 69 ॥O! Mankutimma, doesn;t an unnamed plant have juice and scent glands? Doesn;t sunlight help in ripening it and make it bloom? Doesn;t wind carry the scent in all directions? We are breathing the same scent.
translation: O! Mankutimma, doesn;t an unnamed plant have juice and scent glands? Doesn;t sunlight help in ripening it and make it bloom? Doesn;t wind carry the scent in all directions? We are breathing the same scent.
title: ಉಸಿರುತಿಹೆವದ ನಾವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hesaranu ariyada sasiyoLirave rasagandhagaLu? ।bisilu adanu pakvagoLisute biDisadihude? ॥pasarisade gALiyu adanoydu disedisegaLoLu ।usirutihevu ada nAvu  - Mankutimma ॥ 69 ॥
kagga: ಹೆಸರನರಿಯದ ಸಸಿಯೊಳಿರವೆ ರಸಗಂಧಗಳು? ।ಬಿಸಿಲದನು ಪಕ್ವಗೊಳಿಸುತೆ ಬಿಡಿಸದಿಹುದೆ? ॥ಪಸರಿಸದೆ ಗಾಳಿಯದನೊಯ್ದು ದಿಸೆದಿಸೆಗಳೊಳು ।ಉಸಿರುತಿಹೆವದ ನಾವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯ ॥

content: ಭೂವಿಷಯದಲಿ ಪುದಿದ ರಸವಾಸನೆಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ।ಆವಿಯಾಗೇಳ್ದು ಮುಗಿಲಾಗಿ ಮಳೆಗರೆದು ॥ಬಾವಿಗೂಟೆಯನಿತ್ತು ನರರೊಡಲ ಸೇರುವುದು ।ದೈವ ರಸತಂತ್ರವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦ ॥bhUmi viShayadali pudida rasa vAsanegaLella ।AviyAgi eLdu mugilAgi maLegeradu ॥bAvige UTeyanu ittu narara oDala sEruvudu ।daiva rasatantravidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 70 ॥O! Mankutimma, juice and fragrance that is hidden in the earth gets pulled up as water-vapor. It then becomes clouds, then rains, then goes into the earth and fills the well in the form of springs. Then man drinks that water and it becomes a part of him. God has this strange policy for water  - so elaborate, yet so accurate.
translation: O! Mankutimma, juice and fragrance that is hidden in the earth gets pulled up as water-vapor. It then becomes clouds, then rains, then goes into the earth and fills the well in the form of springs. Then man drinks that water and it becomes a part of him. God has this strange policy for water  - so elaborate, yet so accurate.
title: ದೈವ ರಸತಂತ್ರವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bhUmi viShayadali pudida rasa vAsanegaLella ।AviyAgi eLdu mugilAgi maLegeradu ॥bAvige UTeyanu ittu narara oDala sEruvudu ।daiva rasatantravidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 70 ॥
kagga: ಭೂವಿಷಯದಲಿ ಪುದಿದ ರಸವಾಸನೆಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ।ಆವಿಯಾಗೇಳ್ದು ಮುಗಿಲಾಗಿ ಮಳೆಗರೆದು ॥ಬಾವಿಗೂಟೆಯನಿತ್ತು ನರರೊಡಲ ಸೇರುವುದು ।ದೈವ ರಸತಂತ್ರವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦ ॥

content: ತರಣಿ ಕಿರಣದ ನಂಟು ಗಗನ ಸಲಿಲದ ನಂಟು ।ಧರಣಿ ಚಲನೆಯ ನಂಟು ಮರುತನೊಳ್ನಂಟು ॥ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ನಂಟುಗಳಿನೊಂದು ಗಂಟೀ ವಿಶ್ವ ।ಕಿರಿದು ಪಿರಿದೊಂದಂಟು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧ ॥taraNi kiraNada nanTu gagana salilada nanTu ।dharaNi chalaneya nanTu marutanoL nanTu ॥paripariya nanTugaLina ondu ganTu ee vishva ।kiridu pridondu anTu  - Mankutimma ॥ 71 ॥O! Mankutimma, this whole world is made of complex knot of connections  - some small and some big. The sun is related to his rays, the sky has attachment to the water below, earth is connected to its movement, together they are connected to the flow of air.
translation: O! Mankutimma, this whole world is made of complex knot of connections  - some small and some big. The sun is related to his rays, the sky has attachment to the water below, earth is connected to its movement, together they are connected to the flow of air.
title: ಕಿರಿದು ಪಿರಿದೊಂದಂಟು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: taraNi kiraNada nanTu gagana salilada nanTu ।dharaNi chalaneya nanTu marutanoL nanTu ॥paripariya nanTugaLina ondu ganTu ee vishva ।kiridu pridondu anTu  - Mankutimma ॥ 71 ॥
kagga: ತರಣಿ ಕಿರಣದ ನಂಟು ಗಗನ ಸಲಿಲದ ನಂಟು ।ಧರಣಿ ಚಲನೆಯ ನಂಟು ಮರುತನೊಳ್ನಂಟು ॥ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ನಂಟುಗಳಿನೊಂದು ಗಂಟೀ ವಿಶ್ವ ।ಕಿರಿದು ಪಿರಿದೊಂದಂಟು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧ ॥

content: ಈ ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ ನೋಡಲೆಲ್ಲರೆಲ್ಲರ ನಂಟು ।ಅವನಾ ಬಂಧುತೆಯ ಜಡೆಯ ಬಿಡಿಸುವನು? ॥ಜೀವ ಜೀವಕೆ ನಂಟು ಜಡ ಚೇತನಕೆ ನಂಟು ।ಆವುದದಕಂಟಿರದು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨ ॥ee vishvadali nODalu ellaru ellara nanTu ।avanA bandhuteya jaDe bidisuvanu? ॥jIva jIvake nanTu jaDa chEtanake nanTu ।Avudadake anTiradu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 72 ॥O! Mankutumma, in this world every one is connected to every one else in some way or other. Will God tell us how to unwind this tangle of interconnectedness? Truly, everything is connected  - connections from living things to other living things (via a food chain or symbiosis) is understandable. But even a man;s mind can create attachment to even non-living things like material possessions. Tell me which object in this world is completely detached from the rest of the creation?
translation: O! Mankutumma, in this world every one is connected to every one else in some way or other. Will God tell us how to unwind this tangle of interconnectedness? Truly, everything is connected  - connections from living things to other living things (via a food chain or symbiosis) is understandable. But even a man;s mind can create attachment to even non-living things like material possessions. Tell me which object in this world is completely detached from the rest of the creation?
title: ಆವುದದಕಂಟಿರದು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ee vishvadali nODalu ellaru ellara nanTu ।avanA bandhuteya jaDe bidisuvanu? ॥jIva jIvake nanTu jaDa chEtanake nanTu ।Avudadake anTiradu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 72 ॥
kagga: ಈ ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ ನೋಡಲೆಲ್ಲರೆಲ್ಲರ ನಂಟು ।ಅವನಾ ಬಂಧುತೆಯ ಜಡೆಯ ಬಿಡಿಸುವನು? ॥ಜೀವ ಜೀವಕೆ ನಂಟು ಜಡ ಚೇತನಕೆ ನಂಟು ।ಆವುದದಕಂಟಿರದು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨ ॥

content: ನಂಟು ತಂಟೆಗಳ ಗಂಟೀ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಭಂಡಾರ ।ಅಂಟಿಲ್ಲವೆನಗಿದರೊಳೆನ್ನದಿರದೆಂದುಂ ॥ಒಂಟಿ ನೀನೊಳಜಗಕೆ ಭಂಟ ಹೊರಜಗಕಾಗಿ ।ಒಂಟಿಸಿಕೊ ಜೀವನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩ ॥nanTu tanTegaLa ganTI brahmabhanDAra ।anTillavenage idaroLu ennadu iradenduM ॥onTi nInu oLajagake bhanTa horajagakAgi ।onTisiko jIvanava  - Mankutimma ॥ 73 ॥O! Mankutimma, this whole universe is a big knot of interdependence, attachments and worries. There is no way one can deny having any attachment. Nor can one say that they have no part in it. One may be a loner and independent in his inner world (of mind). But to the outer world, he still has to participate a player (friend, father, spouse, child;). It is best to lead the life accepting this fact.
translation: O! Mankutimma, this whole universe is a big knot of interdependence, attachments and worries. There is no way one can deny having any attachment. Nor can one say that they have no part in it. One may be a loner and independent in his inner world (of mind). But to the outer world, he still has to participate a player (friend, father, spouse, child;). It is best to lead the life accepting this fact.
title: ಒಂಟಿಸಿಕೊ ಜೀವನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nanTu tanTegaLa ganTI brahmabhanDAra ।anTillavenage idaroLu ennadu iradenduM ॥onTi nInu oLajagake bhanTa horajagakAgi ।onTisiko jIvanava  - Mankutimma ॥ 73 ॥
kagga: ನಂಟು ತಂಟೆಗಳ ಗಂಟೀ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಭಂಡಾರ ।ಅಂಟಿಲ್ಲವೆನಗಿದರೊಳೆನ್ನದಿರದೆಂದುಂ ॥ಒಂಟಿ ನೀನೊಳಜಗಕೆ ಭಂಟ ಹೊರಜಗಕಾಗಿ ।ಒಂಟಿಸಿಕೊ ಜೀವನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩ ॥

content: ಸುಮ್ಮನೊಬ್ಬಂಟಿಯೆಂತಿಹುದು? ಬೇಸರವಹುದು ।ಹೊಮ್ಮುವೆನು ಕೋಟಿರೂಪದಲಿ ನಾನೆಂದು ॥ಬೊಮ್ಮನೆಳಸಿದನಂತೆ. ಆ ಯೆಳಸಿಕೆಯೆ ಮಾಯೆ ।ನಮ್ಮಿರವು ಮಾಯೆಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪ ॥summane obbanTiyentihudu? bEsaravahudu ।hommuvenu kOTirUpadali nAnendu ॥bommanu eLesidanante. A yeLasikeye mAye ।namma iruvu mAyeyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 74 ॥O! Mankutimma, the creator is said to have gotten bored of being alone. He thought, let me materialize in crores of forms. This thought itself is Maya (the illusion). Our existence is inside that illusion.
translation: O! Mankutimma, the creator is said to have gotten bored of being alone. He thought, let me materialize in crores of forms. This thought itself is Maya (the illusion). Our existence is inside that illusion.
title: ನಮ್ಮಿರವು ಮಾಯೆಯಲಿ – ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮಮ
transliteration: summane obbanTiyentihudu? bEsaravahudu ।hommuvenu kOTirUpadali nAnendu ॥bommanu eLesidanante. A yeLasikeye mAye ।namma iruvu mAyeyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 74 ॥
kagga: ಸುಮ್ಮನೊಬ್ಬಂಟಿಯೆಂತಿಹುದು? ಬೇಸರವಹುದು ।ಹೊಮ್ಮುವೆನು ಕೋಟಿರೂಪದಲಿ ನಾನೆಂದು ॥ಬೊಮ್ಮನೆಳಸಿದನಂತೆ. ಆ ಯೆಳಸಿಕೆಯೆ ಮಾಯೆ ।ನಮ್ಮಿರವು ಮಾಯೆಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪ ॥

content: ಮರ ತನ್ನ ಹೆತ್ತ ಬೀಜವನಿಲ್ಲವೆನಿಸಿ ವಿ- । ಸ್ತರಿಸುವಂದದಿ, ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ತನ್ನ ಮೂಲವನು ॥ ಮರೆಮಾಚಿ ತಾನೆ ಮೆರೆಯುತ್ತಿಹುದು ಕಣ್ಗಳಿಗೆ । ನೊರೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ಪಾಲ್ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮ – ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫ ॥ mara tanna hetta bIjavanu illavenisi । vistarisuvandadi, sRuShTi tanna mUlavanu ॥ maremAchi tAne mereyuttihudu kaNgaLige । nore sRuShTi pAl brahma – Mankutimma ॥ 75 ॥ O! Mankutimma, a tree grows big and wide out of a seed by destroying it. Just like that, the creation has kept hidden its origin and is exhibiting diversity to our eyes. In a tumbler full of milk, the foam is creation and milk is the creator himself.
translation: O! Mankutimma, a tree grows big and wide out of a seed by destroying it. Just like that, the creation has kept hidden its origin and is exhibiting diversity to our eyes. In a tumbler full of milk, the foam is creation and milk is the creator himself.
title: ನೊರೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ಪಾಲ್ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mara tanna hetta bIjavanu illavenisi । vistarisuvandadi, sRuShTi tanna mUlavanu ॥ maremAchi tAne mereyuttihudu kaNgaLige । nore sRuShTi pAl brahma – Mankutimma ॥ 75 ॥
kagga: ಮರ ತನ್ನ ಹೆತ್ತ ಬೀಜವನಿಲ್ಲವೆನಿಸಿ ವಿ- । ಸ್ತರಿಸುವಂದದಿ, ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ತನ್ನ ಮೂಲವನು ॥ ಮರೆಮಾಚಿ ತಾನೆ ಮೆರೆಯುತ್ತಿಹುದು ಕಣ್ಗಳಿಗೆ । ನೊರೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ಪಾಲ್ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮ – ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫ ॥

content: ಬಹುವಾಗಲೆಳಸಿ ತಾನೊಬ್ಬಂಟಿ ಬೊಮ್ಮ ನಿಜ ।ಮಹಿಮೆಯಿಂ ಸೃಜಿಸಿ ವಿಶ್ವವನಲ್ಲಿ ನೆಲಸಿ ॥ವಹಿಸಿ ಜೀವತೆಯ ಮಾಯೆಯ ಸರಸವಿರಸದಲಿ ।ವಿಹರಿಪನು ನಿರ್ಲಿಪ್ತ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬ ॥bahuvAgalu eLasi tAnobbanTi bomma nija ।mahimeyiM sRujisi vishvavanu illi nelasi ॥vahisi jIvateya mAyeya sarasavirasadali ।viharipanu nirlipta!  - Mankutimma ॥ 76 ॥O! Mankutimma, the creator felt he was alone. So, he thought of becoming ;many; himself. He used his greatness to create and place this universe here. In that he created life. Once this illusion of ;many; was created, he wanders in it unattached to the multitude of emotions it has.
translation: O! Mankutimma, the creator felt he was alone. So, he thought of becoming ;many; himself. He used his greatness to create and place this universe here. In that he created life. Once this illusion of ;many; was created, he wanders in it unattached to the multitude of emotions it has.
title: ವಿಹರಿಪನು ನಿರ್ಲಿಪ್ತ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bahuvAgalu eLasi tAnobbanTi bomma nija ।mahimeyiM sRujisi vishvavanu illi nelasi ॥vahisi jIvateya mAyeya sarasavirasadali ।viharipanu nirlipta!  - Mankutimma ॥ 76 ॥
kagga: ಬಹುವಾಗಲೆಳಸಿ ತಾನೊಬ್ಬಂಟಿ ಬೊಮ್ಮ ನಿಜ ।ಮಹಿಮೆಯಿಂ ಸೃಜಿಸಿ ವಿಶ್ವವನಲ್ಲಿ ನೆಲಸಿ ॥ವಹಿಸಿ ಜೀವತೆಯ ಮಾಯೆಯ ಸರಸವಿರಸದಲಿ ।ವಿಹರಿಪನು ನಿರ್ಲಿಪ್ತ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬ ॥

content: ತನ್ನ ಹೊಳಹೊಳಪುಗಳ ನೆನೆನೆನೆದು ಮೈಮರೆತ ।ರನ್ನವೋ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮ; ನೋಡುವನು-ನಿಜಪಿಂಛ ॥ವರ್ಣದೆಣಿಕೆಯಲಿ ತನ್ನನೆ ಮರೆತ ನವಿಲವೊಲು ।ತನ್ಮಯನೊ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭ ॥tanna hoLaHoLapugaLa nene nenedu maimareta ।rannavO brahma; nODuvanu  - nijapinCha ॥varNada eNikeyali tannane mareta navilavolu ।tanmayano sRuShTiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 77 ॥O! Mankutimma, is God (Creator) like a precious gem that shines by itself (and for itself) independent and irrespective of who is watching it? Similarly a peacock with pristine colors in its feathers, is happy watching and grooming itself. Both the gem and the peacock do not care if any one else appreciates their beauty or not. The creator also is lost in his own creation  - not caring for anything else.
translation: O! Mankutimma, is God (Creator) like a precious gem that shines by itself (and for itself) independent and irrespective of who is watching it? Similarly a peacock with pristine colors in its feathers, is happy watching and grooming itself. Both the gem and the peacock do not care if any one else appreciates their beauty or not. The creator also is lost in his own creation  - not caring for anything else.
title: ತನ್ಮಯನೊ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tanna hoLaHoLapugaLa nene nenedu maimareta ।rannavO brahma; nODuvanu  - nijapinCha ॥varNada eNikeyali tannane mareta navilavolu ।tanmayano sRuShTiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 77 ॥
kagga: ತನ್ನ ಹೊಳಹೊಳಪುಗಳ ನೆನೆನೆನೆದು ಮೈಮರೆತ ।ರನ್ನವೋ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮ; ನೋಡುವನು-ನಿಜಪಿಂಛ ॥ವರ್ಣದೆಣಿಕೆಯಲಿ ತನ್ನನೆ ಮರೆತ ನವಿಲವೊಲು ।ತನ್ಮಯನೊ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭ ॥

content: ತರುಣಿ ತನ್ನೊಡವೆಗಳ ತಳೆಯುತ್ತ ತೆಗೆಯುತ್ತ ।ಪರಕಿಸುತೆ ಮುಕರದಲಿ ಸೊಗಸುಗಳ ಪರಿಯ ॥ಮರೆತೆಲ್ಲವನು ವಿಲಸಿಪಂತೆ ತಾಂ ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ ।ಮೆರೆಯುವನು ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮ ॥taruNi tanna oDavegaLa taLeyutta tegeyutta ।parakisute mukaradali sogasugaLa pariya ॥maretu ellavanu vilasipante tAm vishvadali ।mereyuvanu parabomma  - Mankutimma ॥ 78 ॥O! Mankutimma, a young girl when alone in a room takes her own time and enjoys  - wearing each ornament, looking at herself at various angles and takes it off before moving to the next ornament  - next looks, next thrill. Just like that the creator is playing with his creation enjoying one form after another. He seems to be lost while enjoying this process.
translation: O! Mankutimma, a young girl when alone in a room takes her own time and enjoys  - wearing each ornament, looking at herself at various angles and takes it off before moving to the next ornament  - next looks, next thrill. Just like that the creator is playing with his creation enjoying one form after another. He seems to be lost while enjoying this process.
title: ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ ಮೆರೆಯುವನು ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: taruNi tanna oDavegaLa taLeyutta tegeyutta ।parakisute mukaradali sogasugaLa pariya ॥maretu ellavanu vilasipante tAm vishvadali ।mereyuvanu parabomma  - Mankutimma ॥ 78 ॥
kagga: ತರುಣಿ ತನ್ನೊಡವೆಗಳ ತಳೆಯುತ್ತ ತೆಗೆಯುತ್ತ ।ಪರಕಿಸುತೆ ಮುಕರದಲಿ ಸೊಗಸುಗಳ ಪರಿಯ ॥ಮರೆತೆಲ್ಲವನು ವಿಲಸಿಪಂತೆ ತಾಂ ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ ।ಮೆರೆಯುವನು ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮ ॥

content: ಬರೆವ ಹಲಗೆಯನೊಡೆದು ಬಾಲಕನು ತಾನದನು ।ಮರಳಿ ಜೋಡಿಪೆನೆನ್ನುತಾಯಾಸಗೊಳುತ ॥ಸರಿಚೌಕಗೈವಾಟದಲಿ ಜಗವ ಮರೆವಂತೆ ।ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯ ॥bareva halageyanu oDedu bAlakanu tAnadanu ।maraLi jODipenu ennuta AyAsagoLuta ॥sarichoukagaiva ATadali jagava marevante ।parabomma sRuShTiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 79 ॥O! Mankutimma, a small boy is engrossed in putting together the pieces of his broken slate to make it complete again. He broke it in the first place. Although it is tiresome for him to put it back together, he is involved it in wholeheartedly and in oblivious to the rest of the world. So is the creator  - engrossed in the process of creating and breaking his own creation. He is enjoying it just like the little boy even if it seems tiresome and futile.
translation: O! Mankutimma, a small boy is engrossed in putting together the pieces of his broken slate to make it complete again. He broke it in the first place. Although it is tiresome for him to put it back together, he is involved it in wholeheartedly and in oblivious to the rest of the world. So is the creator  - engrossed in the process of creating and breaking his own creation. He is enjoying it just like the little boy even if it seems tiresome and futile.
title: ಮರೆವಂತೆ ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bareva halageyanu oDedu bAlakanu tAnadanu ।maraLi jODipenu ennuta AyAsagoLuta ॥sarichoukagaiva ATadali jagava marevante ।parabomma sRuShTiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 79 ॥
kagga: ಬರೆವ ಹಲಗೆಯನೊಡೆದು ಬಾಲಕನು ತಾನದನು ।ಮರಳಿ ಜೋಡಿಪೆನೆನ್ನುತಾಯಾಸಗೊಳುತ ॥ಸರಿಚೌಕಗೈವಾಟದಲಿ ಜಗವ ಮರೆವಂತೆ ।ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯ ॥

content: ಚೀಟಿಯಾಟದ ಬಿನದಿ ತಾನೊರ್ವನಿರ್ವರವೊಲ್ ।ಆಟವಾಡುತಲಿ ತನ್ನೊರ್ ತನವ ಮೆರೆವಾ ॥ಮಾಟದಲಿ ಬೊಮ್ಮನುಂ ತನ್ನೇಕತೆಯ ಜೀವ ।ಪಾಟಿಯಲಿ ಮರೆತಿಹನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦ ॥chITiyATada binadi tAnOrvanu ervaravol ।ATavADutali tannor tanava mereva ॥mATadali bommanum tanna Ekateya jIva ।pATiyali maretihanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 80 ॥O! Mankutimma, when people are alone and get bored, they play cards. A two person game  - both of which are played by the same person. They quickly get engrossed in the game giving their full best to either sides when it is their turn to play. Creator is doing exactly like that. He is leading his lonely existence by playing all the roles of all the beings, doing good justice to all the roles.
translation: O! Mankutimma, when people are alone and get bored, they play cards. A two person game  - both of which are played by the same person. They quickly get engrossed in the game giving their full best to either sides when it is their turn to play. Creator is doing exactly like that. He is leading his lonely existence by playing all the roles of all the beings, doing good justice to all the roles.
title: ಪಾಟಿಯಲಿ ಮರೆತಿಹನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: chITiyATada binadi tAnOrvanu ervaravol ।ATavADutali tannor tanava mereva ॥mATadali bommanum tanna Ekateya jIva ।pATiyali maretihanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 80 ॥
kagga: ಚೀಟಿಯಾಟದ ಬಿನದಿ ತಾನೊರ್ವನಿರ್ವರವೊಲ್ ।ಆಟವಾಡುತಲಿ ತನ್ನೊರ್ ತನವ ಮೆರೆವಾ ॥ಮಾಟದಲಿ ಬೊಮ್ಮನುಂ ತನ್ನೇಕತೆಯ ಜೀವ ।ಪಾಟಿಯಲಿ ಮರೆತಿಹನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦ ॥

content: ಮರೆತಿಹನೆ ಬೊಮ್ಮ? ಮರೆತಿಲ್ಲ; ಮರೆತವೊಲಿಹನು ।ಧರಿಸಿ ಜೀವಾಕೃತಿಯ ಜಗದಿ ತನ್ನನೆ ತಾನ್ ॥ಅರಸಿಕೊಳುವವೊಲಿಹುದು; ದೊರೆತವೊಲ್ ತೋರೆ ಸುಖ ।ದೊರೆವವರೆಗಾಯಸವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧ ॥maretihane bomma? maretilla; maretavol ihanu ।dharisi jIvAkRutiya jagadi tannane tAn ॥arasikoLuvavol ihudu; doretavol tOre sukha ।dorevavarege AyAsavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 81 ॥O! Mankutimma, has the creator forgotten about the creation? No, he hasn;t. He only seems to have forgotten himself since he has taken form of life in this world. With in this world, he is playing the part of searching for himself. If it appears to be close to finding himself, it is happiness. Untill that happens, the search is tiresome.
translation: O! Mankutimma, has the creator forgotten about the creation? No, he hasn;t. He only seems to have forgotten himself since he has taken form of life in this world. With in this world, he is playing the part of searching for himself. If it appears to be close to finding himself, it is happiness. Untill that happens, the search is tiresome.
title: ದೊರೆವವರೆಗಾಯಸವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: maretihane bomma? maretilla; maretavol ihanu ।dharisi jIvAkRutiya jagadi tannane tAn ॥arasikoLuvavol ihudu; doretavol tOre sukha ।dorevavarege AyAsavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 81 ॥
kagga: ಮರೆತಿಹನೆ ಬೊಮ್ಮ? ಮರೆತಿಲ್ಲ; ಮರೆತವೊಲಿಹನು ।ಧರಿಸಿ ಜೀವಾಕೃತಿಯ ಜಗದಿ ತನ್ನನೆ ತಾನ್ ॥ಅರಸಿಕೊಳುವವೊಲಿಹುದು; ದೊರೆತವೊಲ್ ತೋರೆ ಸುಖ ।ದೊರೆವವರೆಗಾಯಸವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧ ॥

content: ಬನ್ನಿರಾಡುವ ಕಣ್ಣ ಮುಚ್ಚಾಲೆಯಾಟವನು ।ಎನ್ನನರಸಿರಿ ಬನ್ನಿ ಮಕ್ಕಳಿರ ಬೇಗ ॥ಬನ್ನಿರಾಟವ ಬೇಡವೆಂಬರನು ನಾಂ ಬಿಡೆನು ।ಎನ್ನುವಜ್ಜಿಯೊ ಬೊಮ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨ ॥bannirADuva kaNNa mucchAleyATavanu ।ennanarasiri banni makkaLira bEga ॥banniri ATava bEDavembaranu nAm biDenu ।ennuva ajjiyo bomma  - Mankutimma ॥ 82 ॥O! Mankutimma, an old lady calls all the kids to play hide-and-seek. She taunts all of them to find her. She will not accept if any one declines to play the game. The creator is like her engaging all of us in this grand game of hide-and-seek called life.
translation: O! Mankutimma, an old lady calls all the kids to play hide-and-seek. She taunts all of them to find her. She will not accept if any one declines to play the game. The creator is like her engaging all of us in this grand game of hide-and-seek called life.
title: ಎನ್ನುವಜ್ಜಿಯೊ ಬೊಮ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bannirADuva kaNNa mucchAleyATavanu ।ennanarasiri banni makkaLira bEga ॥banniri ATava bEDavembaranu nAm biDenu ।ennuva ajjiyo bomma  - Mankutimma ॥ 82 ॥
kagga: ಬನ್ನಿರಾಡುವ ಕಣ್ಣ ಮುಚ್ಚಾಲೆಯಾಟವನು ।ಎನ್ನನರಸಿರಿ ಬನ್ನಿ ಮಕ್ಕಳಿರ ಬೇಗ ॥ಬನ್ನಿರಾಟವ ಬೇಡವೆಂಬರನು ನಾಂ ಬಿಡೆನು ।ಎನ್ನುವಜ್ಜಿಯೊ ಬೊಮ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨ ॥

content: ಮಾನಸವ ಚಿಂತೆವಿಡಿದಂದೊರ್ವನೆರಡಾಗಿ ।ತಾನದಾರೊಳೊ ವಾದಿಸುವನಂತೆ ಬಾಯಿಂ ॥ದೇನನೊ ನುಡಿಯುತ್ತ ಕೈಸನ್ನೆಗೈಯುವನು ।ಭಾನವೊಂದರೊಳೆರಡು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩ ॥mAnasava chinteviDidandu orvane eraDAgi ।tAnadAroLo vAdisuvanante bAyin ॥dEnano nuDiyutta kaisannegaiyuvanu ।bhAnavondaroLeraDu  - Mankutimma ॥ 83 ॥O! Mankutimma, when some worry clouds the mind we can see a person talking to himself. In his mind, he is actually talking to someone other. He argues with that person, utters words from his mouth, makes hand gestures at him. Still, you can not see the other person. There are both persons in the same single physical form that is seen.
translation: O! Mankutimma, when some worry clouds the mind we can see a person talking to himself. In his mind, he is actually talking to someone other. He argues with that person, utters words from his mouth, makes hand gestures at him. Still, you can not see the other person. There are both persons in the same single physical form that is seen.
title: ಭಾನವೊಂದರೊಳೆರಡು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mAnasava chinteviDidandu orvane eraDAgi ।tAnadAroLo vAdisuvanante bAyin ॥dEnano nuDiyutta kaisannegaiyuvanu ।bhAnavondaroLeraDu  - Mankutimma ॥ 83 ॥
kagga: ಮಾನಸವ ಚಿಂತೆವಿಡಿದಂದೊರ್ವನೆರಡಾಗಿ ।ತಾನದಾರೊಳೊ ವಾದಿಸುವನಂತೆ ಬಾಯಿಂ ॥ದೇನನೊ ನುಡಿಯುತ್ತ ಕೈಸನ್ನೆಗೈಯುವನು ।ಭಾನವೊಂದರೊಳೆರಡು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩ ॥

content: ಅಣು ಭೂತ ಭೂಗೋಲ ತಾರಾಂಬರಾದಿಗಳ ।ನಣಿಮಾಡಿ ಬಿಗಿದು ನಸು ಸಡಿಲವನುಮಿರಿಸಿ ॥ಕುಣಿಸುತಿರುವನು ತನ್ನ ಕೃತಿಕಂತುಕವನದರೊ ।ಳಣಗಿದ್ದು ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪ ॥aNu bhUta bhUgOla tAra ambarAdigaLanu ।aNimADi bigidu nasu saDilavanum irisi ॥kuNisutiruvanu tanna kRuti kantukavanu adaroL ।aNagiddu parabomma  - Mankutimma ॥ 84 ॥O! Mankutimma, God created this universe with atoms, beings, planets, stars, sky and all other creations. He tied all of them together tightly with some rules. He slackened those rules a bit to let them all dance. Then he hides inside his own creation and enjoys the process (dance).
translation: O! Mankutimma, God created this universe with atoms, beings, planets, stars, sky and all other creations. He tied all of them together tightly with some rules. He slackened those rules a bit to let them all dance. Then he hides inside his own creation and enjoys the process (dance).
title: ಅಣಗಿದ್ದು ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aNu bhUta bhUgOla tAra ambarAdigaLanu ।aNimADi bigidu nasu saDilavanum irisi ॥kuNisutiruvanu tanna kRuti kantukavanu adaroL ।aNagiddu parabomma  - Mankutimma ॥ 84 ॥
kagga: ಅಣು ಭೂತ ಭೂಗೋಲ ತಾರಾಂಬರಾದಿಗಳ ।ನಣಿಮಾಡಿ ಬಿಗಿದು ನಸು ಸಡಿಲವನುಮಿರಿಸಿ ॥ಕುಣಿಸುತಿರುವನು ತನ್ನ ಕೃತಿಕಂತುಕವನದರೊ ।ಳಣಗಿದ್ದು ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪ ॥

content: ನಭದ ಬಯಲೊಳನಂತ, ಮನದ ಗುಹೆಯೊಳನಂತ ।ವುಭಯದಾ ನಡುವೆ ಸಾದ್ಯಂತ ಜೀವಕಥೆ ॥ವಿಭುವೊಬ್ಬನೀ ಗಾಳಿಬುಡ್ಡೆಗಳನೂದುವನು ।ಹಬೆಗುಳ್ಳೆಯೋ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫ ॥nabhada bayaloL ananta, manada guheyoL anantavu ।ubhayadA naDuve sAdyanta jIvakathe ॥vibhuvu obbanI gALibuDDegaLanu Uduvanu ।habeguLLeyO sRuShTi  - Mankutimma ॥ 85 ॥O! Mankutimma, there is infinity in the sky, there is infinity in the depths of our conscience. In between these outer and inner worlds, the story of our lives are finite  - with definite start and end. God is the one who creates these air bubbles in which we lead our lives assuming that is all there is in this creation.
translation: O! Mankutimma, there is infinity in the sky, there is infinity in the depths of our conscience. In between these outer and inner worlds, the story of our lives are finite  - with definite start and end. God is the one who creates these air bubbles in which we lead our lives assuming that is all there is in this creation.
title: ಹಬೆಗುಳ್ಳೆಯೋ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nabhada bayaloL ananta, manada guheyoL anantavu ।ubhayadA naDuve sAdyanta jIvakathe ॥vibhuvu obbanI gALibuDDegaLanu Uduvanu ।habeguLLeyO sRuShTi  - Mankutimma ॥ 85 ॥
kagga: ನಭದ ಬಯಲೊಳನಂತ, ಮನದ ಗುಹೆಯೊಳನಂತ ।ವುಭಯದಾ ನಡುವೆ ಸಾದ್ಯಂತ ಜೀವಕಥೆ ॥ವಿಭುವೊಬ್ಬನೀ ಗಾಳಿಬುಡ್ಡೆಗಳನೂದುವನು ।ಹಬೆಗುಳ್ಳೆಯೋ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫ ॥

content: ಗಗನ ತಲೆನವಿರಾಗೆ ಪರೆ ತಾರೆ ಹೂವಾಗೆ ।ಜಗವೆಲ್ಲ ವಪುವಾಗೆ ಮಾಯೆ ಸತಿಯಾಗೆ ॥ನಗುನಗುವ ಬೊಬ್ಬಿಡುವ ಜೀವತಾಂಡವ ರಸಿಕ ।ಭಗವಂತ ಶಿವರುದ್ರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬ ॥gagana talenavirAge pare tAre hUvAge ।jagavella vapuvAge mAye satiyAge ॥nagunaguva bobbiDuva jIvatAndava rasika ।bhagavanta shivarudra  - Mankutimma ॥ 86 ॥O! Mankutimma, the sky is the hair-do. The moon and stars are flowers on the head. The world is his body. Maya, the illusion, is his wife. His laughter, roars and dance manifest as life in his creation. He, whom we call as Shiva or Rudra takes delight in his work.
translation: O! Mankutimma, the sky is the hair-do. The moon and stars are flowers on the head. The world is his body. Maya, the illusion, is his wife. His laughter, roars and dance manifest as life in his creation. He, whom we call as Shiva or Rudra takes delight in his work.
title: ಭಗವಂತ ಶಿವರುದ್ರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: gagana talenavirAge pare tAre hUvAge ।jagavella vapuvAge mAye satiyAge ॥nagunaguva bobbiDuva jIvatAndava rasika ।bhagavanta shivarudra  - Mankutimma ॥ 86 ॥
kagga: ಗಗನ ತಲೆನವಿರಾಗೆ ಪರೆ ತಾರೆ ಹೂವಾಗೆ ।ಜಗವೆಲ್ಲ ವಪುವಾಗೆ ಮಾಯೆ ಸತಿಯಾಗೆ ॥ನಗುನಗುವ ಬೊಬ್ಬಿಡುವ ಜೀವತಾಂಡವ ರಸಿಕ ।ಭಗವಂತ ಶಿವರುದ್ರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬ ॥

content: ಬೆಳೆ ಹೊಳಪು ವಿಕಸನ ವಿಕಾರ ಸಂಭ್ರಮಗಳಲಿ ।ಬೆಳಕು ವೇಗಗಳೆನಿಪ ಕಾಲ ದಿಕ್ಕುಗಳ ॥ಚಲನೆಯಲಿ ವಿಶ್ವಸಂಮೋಹನಗಳೆಲ್ಲವಾ ।ವಿಲಸಿತವು ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭ ॥beLe hoLapu vikasana vikAra saMbhramagaLali ।beLaku vEgagaLenipa kAla dikkugaLa ॥chalaneyali vishvasammOhanagaLu ellavu A ।vilasitavu bommanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 87 ॥O! Mankutimma, in growth, in brilliance, in expansion, in ugliness, in happiness, in measuring light and speed, in keeping track of time and the directions, in feeling the movement of this world one can see illusions that are created by Him for his own enjoyment.
translation: O! Mankutimma, in growth, in brilliance, in expansion, in ugliness, in happiness, in measuring light and speed, in keeping track of time and the directions, in feeling the movement of this world one can see illusions that are created by Him for his own enjoyment.
title: ವಿಲಸಿತವು ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: beLe hoLapu vikasana vikAra saMbhramagaLali ।beLaku vEgagaLenipa kAla dikkugaLa ॥chalaneyali vishvasammOhanagaLu ellavu A ।vilasitavu bommanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 87 ॥
kagga: ಬೆಳೆ ಹೊಳಪು ವಿಕಸನ ವಿಕಾರ ಸಂಭ್ರಮಗಳಲಿ ।ಬೆಳಕು ವೇಗಗಳೆನಿಪ ಕಾಲ ದಿಕ್ಕುಗಳ ॥ಚಲನೆಯಲಿ ವಿಶ್ವಸಂಮೋಹನಗಳೆಲ್ಲವಾ ।ವಿಲಸಿತವು ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭ ॥

content: ಚಲನೆ ವಿಶ್ವಾಸ್ತರಣೆಯದುವೆ ಮಾಯಾಭ್ರಮಣೆ ।ಸಲೆ ಬಗೆಯಲದು ಪರಬ್ರಹ್ಮ ವಿಸ್ಫುರಣೆ ॥ಥಳಥಳಕೆ ವಜ್ರದಲಿ ನೈಜವಿರುವಂತೆಯು ।ಜ್ಜ್ವಲತೆ ಬೊಮ್ಮಗೆ ನೈಜ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮ ॥chalane vishvAstaraNeyaduve mAyAbhramaNe ।sale bageyaladu parabrahma visphuraNe ॥thaLathaLake vajradali naijaviruvanteyu ।ujjvalate bommage naija  - Mankutimma ॥ 88 ॥O! Mankutimma, this universe is ever moving and expanding or so it feels. If one goes to the root of this, you will only see the brilliance of the Creator. To be radiant is the innate quality of a diamond. To be brilliant is a innate quality of the Creator.
translation: O! Mankutimma, this universe is ever moving and expanding or so it feels. If one goes to the root of this, you will only see the brilliance of the Creator. To be radiant is the innate quality of a diamond. To be brilliant is a innate quality of the Creator.
title: ಉಜ್ಜ್ವಲತೆ ಬೊಮ್ಮಗೆ ನೈಜ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: chalane vishvAstaraNeyaduve mAyAbhramaNe ।sale bageyaladu parabrahma visphuraNe ॥thaLathaLake vajradali naijaviruvanteyu ।ujjvalate bommage naija  - Mankutimma ॥ 88 ॥
kagga: ಚಲನೆ ವಿಶ್ವಾಸ್ತರಣೆಯದುವೆ ಮಾಯಾಭ್ರಮಣೆ ।ಸಲೆ ಬಗೆಯಲದು ಪರಬ್ರಹ್ಮ ವಿಸ್ಫುರಣೆ ॥ಥಳಥಳಕೆ ವಜ್ರದಲಿ ನೈಜವಿರುವಂತೆಯು ।ಜ್ಜ್ವಲತೆ ಬೊಮ್ಮಗೆ ನೈಜ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮ ॥

content: ಆದಿದಿವಸವದಾವುದೆಂದೆಂದುಮಿಹ ಜಗಕೆ? ।ಬೋಧನೆಯ ಸುಲಭತೆಗೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಲಯಕಥನ ॥ಪಾದಶಿರಗಳ ಕೂರ್ಮ ಚಾಚಿಕೊಂಡಿರೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ।ಸೇದಿಕೊಂಡಿರೆ ಲಯವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯ ॥Adi divasavadu Avudendendum iha jagake? ।bOdhaneya sulabhatege sRuShTi laya kathana ॥pAdashiragaLa kUrma chAchikonDire sRuShTi ।sEdikonDire layavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 89 ॥O! Mankutimma, it is a very frequently asked question. When did this world begin? Our scriptures answer it in the form of a story. There is a divine turtle. If it spreads its legs and head out of the shell, it is creation. When it withdraws its limbs into the shell, the creation is destroyed.
translation: O! Mankutimma, it is a very frequently asked question. When did this world begin? Our scriptures answer it in the form of a story. There is a divine turtle. If it spreads its legs and head out of the shell, it is creation. When it withdraws its limbs into the shell, the creation is destroyed.
title: ಸೇದಿಕೊಂಡಿರೆ ಲಯವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Adi divasavadu Avudendendum iha jagake? ।bOdhaneya sulabhatege sRuShTi laya kathana ॥pAdashiragaLa kUrma chAchikonDire sRuShTi ।sEdikonDire layavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 89 ॥
kagga: ಆದಿದಿವಸವದಾವುದೆಂದೆಂದುಮಿಹ ಜಗಕೆ? ।ಬೋಧನೆಯ ಸುಲಭತೆಗೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಲಯಕಥನ ॥ಪಾದಶಿರಗಳ ಕೂರ್ಮ ಚಾಚಿಕೊಂಡಿರೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ।ಸೇದಿಕೊಂಡಿರೆ ಲಯವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯ ॥

content: ಆವುದಿರುವಿಕೆಗಾದಿ? ಎಂದು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯ ಮೊದಲು? ।ಆವುದಬ್ಧಿಯ ತೆರೆಗಳಲಿ ಮೊಟ್ಟಮೊದಲು? ॥ಆವುದೆಲರಿನ ನಿಲ್ಲದಲೆತಕ್ಕೆ ಪಡುಸೀಮೆ? ।ಈ ವಿಶ್ವಕಥೆಯಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦ ॥Avudu iruvikege Adi? endu sRuShTiya modalu? ।Avudu abdhiya teregaLali moTTamodalu? ॥Avudu elarina nillada aletakke paDusIme? ।ee vishvakatheyantu  - Mankutimma ॥ 90 ॥O! Mankutimma, what caused the beginning of this existence? When did this creation come into being? Which one of the waves of the sea is the first? Where does this seemingly endless flow of wind end? I wonder what might be the story of this world.
translation: O! Mankutimma, what caused the beginning of this existence? When did this creation come into being? Which one of the waves of the sea is the first? Where does this seemingly endless flow of wind end? I wonder what might be the story of this world.
title: ಈ ವಿಶ್ವಕಥೆಯಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Avudu iruvikege Adi? endu sRuShTiya modalu? ।Avudu abdhiya teregaLali moTTamodalu? ॥Avudu elarina nillada aletakke paDusIme? ।ee vishvakatheyantu  - Mankutimma ॥ 90 ॥
kagga: ಆವುದಿರುವಿಕೆಗಾದಿ? ಎಂದು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯ ಮೊದಲು? ।ಆವುದಬ್ಧಿಯ ತೆರೆಗಳಲಿ ಮೊಟ್ಟಮೊದಲು? ॥ಆವುದೆಲರಿನ ನಿಲ್ಲದಲೆತಕ್ಕೆ ಪಡುಸೀಮೆ? ।ಈ ವಿಶ್ವಕಥೆಯಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦ ॥

content: ಕಮಲವುದಯದೊಳರಳಿ ಸಂಜೆಯಲಿ ಮುಗುಳಾಗಿ ।ಸುಮವಪ್ಪುದಂತೆ ಮರುವಗಲು ಮುಗುಳ್ದಂತು ॥ಅಮಿತ ಪ್ರಪಂಚನಾಕುಂಚನಾವರ್ತನ ।ಕ್ರಮವೆ ವಿಶ್ವಚರಿತ್ರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೧ ॥kamalavu udayadoLu araLi sanjeyali muguLAgi ।sumavappudante maruvagalu muguLdantu ॥amita prapanchana Akunchana Avartana ।kramave vishva charitre  - Mankutimma ॥ 91 ॥O! Mankutimma, a lotus blooms at sunrise and closes again in the evening. Next day it becomes a full flower again and smiles. The seems to be the order in the history of the universe  - never ending cycle of expansion, contraction and reversal.
translation: O! Mankutimma, a lotus blooms at sunrise and closes again in the evening. Next day it becomes a full flower again and smiles. The seems to be the order in the history of the universe  - never ending cycle of expansion, contraction and reversal.
title: ಕ್ರಮವೆ ವಿಶ್ವಚರಿತ್ರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kamalavu udayadoLu araLi sanjeyali muguLAgi ।sumavappudante maruvagalu muguLdantu ॥amita prapanchana Akunchana Avartana ।kramave vishva charitre  - Mankutimma ॥ 91 ॥
kagga: ಕಮಲವುದಯದೊಳರಳಿ ಸಂಜೆಯಲಿ ಮುಗುಳಾಗಿ ।ಸುಮವಪ್ಪುದಂತೆ ಮರುವಗಲು ಮುಗುಳ್ದಂತು ॥ಅಮಿತ ಪ್ರಪಂಚನಾಕುಂಚನಾವರ್ತನ ।ಕ್ರಮವೆ ವಿಶ್ವಚರಿತ್ರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೧ ॥

content: ಎತ್ತಣಿನೊ ದೃಕ್ಷರಿಧಿಯಾಚೆಯಿಂದಲನಂತ । ಸತ್ತ್ವ ತೆರೆತೆರೆಯಾಗಿ ಬೀಸಿ ಗೂಢದಲಿ ॥ಬಿತ್ತರಿಸುತಿಹುದು ಹೊಸ ಹೊಸತನವನೆಡೆಬಿಡದೆ ।ನಿತ್ಯನಿತ್ಯವು ಜಗದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೨ ॥ettaNino dRuk sharadhiyAcheyindal ananta ।sattva tere tereyAgi bIsi gUDhadali ॥bittarisutihudu hosa hosatanavanu eDebiDade ।nitya nityavu jagadi  - Mankutimma ॥ 92 ॥O! Mankutimma, from some where beyond the infinite open oceans essence of the eternal truth are coming to us as waves secretly (discreetly). These waves are delivering new freshness to this world incessantly  - day after day.
translation: O! Mankutimma, from some where beyond the infinite open oceans essence of the eternal truth are coming to us as waves secretly (discreetly). These waves are delivering new freshness to this world incessantly  - day after day.
title: ನಿತ್ಯನಿತ್ಯವು ಜಗದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ettaNino dRuk sharadhiyAcheyindal ananta ।sattva tere tereyAgi bIsi gUDhadali ॥bittarisutihudu hosa hosatanavanu eDebiDade ।nitya nityavu jagadi  - Mankutimma ॥ 92 ॥
kagga: ಎತ್ತಣಿನೊ ದೃಕ್ಷರಿಧಿಯಾಚೆಯಿಂದಲನಂತ । ಸತ್ತ್ವ ತೆರೆತೆರೆಯಾಗಿ ಬೀಸಿ ಗೂಢದಲಿ ॥ಬಿತ್ತರಿಸುತಿಹುದು ಹೊಸ ಹೊಸತನವನೆಡೆಬಿಡದೆ ।ನಿತ್ಯನಿತ್ಯವು ಜಗದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೨ ॥

content: ಜ್ವಾಲಮಾಲಾಕುಲ ಜಗದ್ರೂಪ ತಾಂಡವದಿ ।ಲೀಲೆಯಿಂ ಜೀವತೆಯನಾಂತು ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮಂ ॥ತಾಳಲಯಮೇಳನದಿನೊಮ್ಮೆ ರಭಸದಿನೊಮ್ಮೆ ।ಲೊಲನಾಗಿರ್ಪನೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೩ ॥jvAlamAlAkula jagadrUpa tANdavadi ।lIleyiM jIvateyanAntu parabommaM ॥tALa laya mELanadi omme rabhasadi inomme ।lolanAgirpanalo  - Mankutimma ॥ 93 ॥O! Mankutimma, this whole world is full of interconnected fire(energy) strands dancing. In this choreography, God brought in life on his own accord  - for his own pleasure. This dance is smooh, enchating and methodical at times; violent and forceful at other times. The creator has fully immersed himself in this activity of dancing.
translation: O! Mankutimma, this whole world is full of interconnected fire(energy) strands dancing. In this choreography, God brought in life on his own accord  - for his own pleasure. This dance is smooh, enchating and methodical at times; violent and forceful at other times. The creator has fully immersed himself in this activity of dancing.
title: ಲೊಲನಾಗಿರ್ಪನೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jvAlamAlAkula jagadrUpa tANdavadi ।lIleyiM jIvateyanAntu parabommaM ॥tALa laya mELanadi omme rabhasadi inomme ।lolanAgirpanalo  - Mankutimma ॥ 93 ॥
kagga: ಜ್ವಾಲಮಾಲಾಕುಲ ಜಗದ್ರೂಪ ತಾಂಡವದಿ ।ಲೀಲೆಯಿಂ ಜೀವತೆಯನಾಂತು ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮಂ ॥ತಾಳಲಯಮೇಳನದಿನೊಮ್ಮೆ ರಭಸದಿನೊಮ್ಮೆ ।ಲೊಲನಾಗಿರ್ಪನೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೩ ॥

content: ಕೇಳಿಯುಂ ಮಾಯೆಯದು; ನೃತ್ಯಗತಿ ಬರಿತೋರ್ಕೆ ।ಮೂಲಮಂ ಕಂಡಂಗೆ ಸಂಭ್ರಾಂತಿಯೇನು? ॥ಆಳದಲಿ ನಿರ್ಲಿಪ್ತ ಮೇಲೆ ನಿಯತಿಕ್ಲುಪ್ತ ।ಲೀಲಾಪ್ರಿಯಂ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೪ ॥kELiyum mAyeyadul nRutyagati bari tOrke ।mUlavam kandange sambhrantiyenu? ॥ALadali nirlipta mEle niyatiklupta ।lIlApriyam brahma  - Mankutimma ॥ 94 ॥O! Mankutimma, thinking may also be an illusion (of free will). The well choreographed world order is only a show. If a person has realised the root of it all  - he will look through this illusion. On the surface it may seem as though the creator also is bound by rules and subject to some form of attachments; underneath he is totally detached and is truly free. The creator is likes playing with his creation.
translation: O! Mankutimma, thinking may also be an illusion (of free will). The well choreographed world order is only a show. If a person has realised the root of it all  - he will look through this illusion. On the surface it may seem as though the creator also is bound by rules and subject to some form of attachments; underneath he is totally detached and is truly free. The creator is likes playing with his creation.
title: ಲೀಲಾಪ್ರಿಯಂ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kELiyum mAyeyadul nRutyagati bari tOrke ।mUlavam kandange sambhrantiyenu? ॥ALadali nirlipta mEle niyatiklupta ।lIlApriyam brahma  - Mankutimma ॥ 94 ॥
kagga: ಕೇಳಿಯುಂ ಮಾಯೆಯದು; ನೃತ್ಯಗತಿ ಬರಿತೋರ್ಕೆ ।ಮೂಲಮಂ ಕಂಡಂಗೆ ಸಂಭ್ರಾಂತಿಯೇನು? ॥ಆಳದಲಿ ನಿರ್ಲಿಪ್ತ ಮೇಲೆ ನಿಯತಿಕ್ಲುಪ್ತ ।ಲೀಲಾಪ್ರಿಯಂ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೪ ॥

content: ಶ್ಯಾಮಸುಂದರನವನೆ ಚಕ್ರಿ ನರಹರಿಯಂತೆ ।ಸೋಮಶಂಕರನೆ ಭೈರವ ರುದ್ರನಂತೆ ॥ಹೈಮವತಿ ಶಿವೆ ತಾನೆ ಕಾಳಿ ಚಂಡಿಕೆಯಂತೆ ।ಪ್ರೇಮ ಘೋರಗಳೊಂದೆ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೫ ॥shyAmasundaranu avane chakri narahariyante ।sOmashankarane bhairava rudrenante ॥haimavati shive tAne kALi chanDikeyante ।prema ghOragaLu onde!  - Mankutimma ॥ 95 ॥O! Mankutimma, Shyamasundara (beautiful and dark  - krishna) is none other than Chakri (the one with divine wheel as a weapon  - to kill Shishupala) or Narahari (Lion faced man who killed Hiranyakashipu). Lord Shiva is describes as Somashekhara (decorated by the moon); also as Bhairava (the frightful) and Rudra (the destroyer). Shiva;s wife Parvati  - also known as the pleasing Haimavati (daughter of Himavat  - the mountain God). She is also the Kali and Chandika; both were her incarnations to kill demons. All this emphasizes that love and gore are different views of the same underlying essence.
translation: O! Mankutimma, Shyamasundara (beautiful and dark  - krishna) is none other than Chakri (the one with divine wheel as a weapon  - to kill Shishupala) or Narahari (Lion faced man who killed Hiranyakashipu). Lord Shiva is describes as Somashekhara (decorated by the moon); also as Bhairava (the frightful) and Rudra (the destroyer). Shiva;s wife Parvati  - also known as the pleasing Haimavati (daughter of Himavat  - the mountain God). She is also the Kali and Chandika; both were her incarnations to kill demons. All this emphasizes that love and gore are different views of the same underlying essence.
title: ಪ್ರೇಮ ಘೋರಗಳೊಂದೆ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: shyAmasundaranu avane chakri narahariyante ।sOmashankarane bhairava rudrenante ॥haimavati shive tAne kALi chanDikeyante ।prema ghOragaLu onde!  - Mankutimma ॥ 95 ॥
kagga: ಶ್ಯಾಮಸುಂದರನವನೆ ಚಕ್ರಿ ನರಹರಿಯಂತೆ ।ಸೋಮಶಂಕರನೆ ಭೈರವ ರುದ್ರನಂತೆ ॥ಹೈಮವತಿ ಶಿವೆ ತಾನೆ ಕಾಳಿ ಚಂಡಿಕೆಯಂತೆ ।ಪ್ರೇಮ ಘೋರಗಳೊಂದೆ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೫ ॥

content: ಸತ್ಯವೆಂಬುದದೇನು ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಾಂಡ ತಾಂಡವದಿ । ಸತ್ಯವೇ ಸತ್ಯವಲ ಕಡಲಲೆಯ ಬಾಳೊಳ್ ॥ಮಿಥ್ಯೆಯೆಂಬುದೆ ಮಿಥ್ಯೆ; ಜೀವನಾಟಕ ಸತ್ಯ ।ಕೃತ್ಯವಿದು ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೬ ॥satyavembudadEnu brahmAnDa tAnDavadi ।satyave satyavala kaDalaleya bALoL ॥mithyeyembude mithye; jIvanATaka satya ।kRutyavidu bommanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 96 ॥O! Mankutimma, What is the truth in this world run by the cosmic dance? What we think as truth is not the real or complete truth in this life that behaves like waves at the ocean  - temporary, but endless. If we say everything is a lie/illusion, then we open the door for that hypothesis to be false also. All we can confirm as truth is that we are alive at this moment. The whole show is choreographed by the Creator.
translation: O! Mankutimma, What is the truth in this world run by the cosmic dance? What we think as truth is not the real or complete truth in this life that behaves like waves at the ocean  - temporary, but endless. If we say everything is a lie/illusion, then we open the door for that hypothesis to be false also. All we can confirm as truth is that we are alive at this moment. The whole show is choreographed by the Creator.
title: ಕೃತ್ಯವಿದು ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: satyavembudadEnu brahmAnDa tAnDavadi ।satyave satyavala kaDalaleya bALoL ॥mithyeyembude mithye; jIvanATaka satya ।kRutyavidu bommanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 96 ॥
kagga: ಸತ್ಯವೆಂಬುದದೇನು ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಾಂಡ ತಾಂಡವದಿ । ಸತ್ಯವೇ ಸತ್ಯವಲ ಕಡಲಲೆಯ ಬಾಳೊಳ್ ॥ಮಿಥ್ಯೆಯೆಂಬುದೆ ಮಿಥ್ಯೆ; ಜೀವನಾಟಕ ಸತ್ಯ ।ಕೃತ್ಯವಿದು ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೬ ॥

content: ಧರ್ಮವೆಂಬುದದೇನು? ಕರ್ಮವೆಂಬುದದೇನು? ।ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಾಂಡಕಥೆಯೇನು? ಜೀವಿತವಿದೇನು? ॥ಬ್ರಹ್ಮವೆಲ್ಲಕು ಮೂಲ ಮಾಯೆ ತತ್ಕೃತಿಜಾಲ ।ಬ್ರಹ್ಮವೇ ಜೀವನವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೭ ॥dharmavembudadEnu? karmavembudadEnu? ।brahmAnDakatheyEnu? jIvitavidEnu? ॥brahmavu ellaku mUla mAye tat kRuti jAla ।brahmavE jIvanavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 97 ॥What is Dharma? What is Karma? What is the story of this universe? What is life? The Creator is the cause of every thing. This world is an illusion created by him. Creator himself is the life in all of us.  - Mankutimma.
translation: What is Dharma? What is Karma? What is the story of this universe? What is life? The Creator is the cause of every thing. This world is an illusion created by him. Creator himself is the life in all of us.  - Mankutimma.
title: ಬ್ರಹ್ಮವೇ ಜೀವನವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dharmavembudadEnu? karmavembudadEnu? ।brahmAnDakatheyEnu? jIvitavidEnu? ॥brahmavu ellaku mUla mAye tat kRuti jAla ।brahmavE jIvanavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 97 ॥
kagga: ಧರ್ಮವೆಂಬುದದೇನು? ಕರ್ಮವೆಂಬುದದೇನು? ।ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಾಂಡಕಥೆಯೇನು? ಜೀವಿತವಿದೇನು? ॥ಬ್ರಹ್ಮವೆಲ್ಲಕು ಮೂಲ ಮಾಯೆ ತತ್ಕೃತಿಜಾಲ ।ಬ್ರಹ್ಮವೇ ಜೀವನವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೭ ॥

content: ವಕ್ರಋಜುಮಿಶ್ರ ಜಗವದರ ಶೋಧನೆ ಧರ್ಮ ।ಪ್ರಾಕೃತಧ್ವನಿಮಿಶ್ರವದರಡುಗೆ ರಾಗ ॥ವ್ಯಾಕೃತದಿನವ್ಯಾಕೃತಾದಿಸತ್ತ್ವಕೆ ನಿನ್ನ ।ಜಾಗೃತಿಪ ಮತಿ ಧರ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೮ ॥vakra Ruju mishra jagavu adara shOdhane dharma ।prAkRuta dhvani mishravu adaraDuge rAga ॥vyAkRutadina avyAkRuta Adi sattvake ninna ।jAgRutipa mati dharma  - Mankutimma ॥ 98 ॥This world is a mixture of things that are straight and crooked. To search for the truth is Dharma  - our duty. Just like when different kinds of sound mixed well gives out music  - such different kinds of things are required in this world to make it beautiful. This wisdom which leads us to the ultimate unified truth from all the fractured truth is called Dharma.  - Mankutimma
translation: This world is a mixture of things that are straight and crooked. To search for the truth is Dharma  - our duty. Just like when different kinds of sound mixed well gives out music  - such different kinds of things are required in this world to make it beautiful. This wisdom which leads us to the ultimate unified truth from all the fractured truth is called Dharma.  - Mankutimma
title: ಜಾಗೃತಿಪ ಮತಿ ಧರ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vakra Ruju mishra jagavu adara shOdhane dharma ।prAkRuta dhvani mishravu adaraDuge rAga ॥vyAkRutadina avyAkRuta Adi sattvake ninna ।jAgRutipa mati dharma  - Mankutimma ॥ 98 ॥
kagga: ವಕ್ರಋಜುಮಿಶ್ರ ಜಗವದರ ಶೋಧನೆ ಧರ್ಮ ।ಪ್ರಾಕೃತಧ್ವನಿಮಿಶ್ರವದರಡುಗೆ ರಾಗ ॥ವ್ಯಾಕೃತದಿನವ್ಯಾಕೃತಾದಿಸತ್ತ್ವಕೆ ನಿನ್ನ ।ಜಾಗೃತಿಪ ಮತಿ ಧರ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೮ ॥

content: ಜಲಧಿತೀರದಿ ನಿಂತು ವೀಕ್ಷಿಸಿಕ್ಕೆಲಗಳಲಿ ।ಚಲವೊಂದಚಲವೊಂದು ಸಮವದಸಮವಿದು ॥ಕಲೆತಿರ್ಪುವಂತು ಮೇಯಾಮೇಯಗಳು ಜಗದಿ ।ಮಿಲಿತತೆಯಿನೀ ರುಚಿಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೯ ॥jaladhi tIradi vIkShisi ikkelagaLali ।chalavondu achalavondu samavadu asamavidu ॥kaletirpuvantu mEya amEyagaLu jagadi ।militateyinI ruchiyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 99 ॥If one stands on the sea shore and watches either side; he sees one side (sea) moving, the other (land) stands still. One side is plain and other side has variety. Just like the such un-likes meet, this world is a amalgamation of things that we can see (and measure) and things that are beyond measure. Such blending creates this tasteful world.  - Mankutimma
translation: If one stands on the sea shore and watches either side; he sees one side (sea) moving, the other (land) stands still. One side is plain and other side has variety. Just like the such un-likes meet, this world is a amalgamation of things that we can see (and measure) and things that are beyond measure. Such blending creates this tasteful world.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಿಲಿತತೆಯಿನೀ ರುಚಿಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jaladhi tIradi vIkShisi ikkelagaLali ।chalavondu achalavondu samavadu asamavidu ॥kaletirpuvantu mEya amEyagaLu jagadi ।militateyinI ruchiyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 99 ॥
kagga: ಜಲಧಿತೀರದಿ ನಿಂತು ವೀಕ್ಷಿಸಿಕ್ಕೆಲಗಳಲಿ ।ಚಲವೊಂದಚಲವೊಂದು ಸಮವದಸಮವಿದು ॥ಕಲೆತಿರ್ಪುವಂತು ಮೇಯಾಮೇಯಗಳು ಜಗದಿ ।ಮಿಲಿತತೆಯಿನೀ ರುಚಿಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೯ ॥

content: ಅವಿದಿತಾಖಂಡಸತ್ತ್ವದಪಾರ ಜಲಧಿಯಲಿ ।ಭುವನದ ದ್ವೀಪ ಕಿಂಚಿನ್ಮಾತ್ರವಿದಿತ ॥ಪವಿತಾಂತರಕ್ಷಿಗಾಯೆರಡುಮೊಂದೇ ವಸ್ತು ।ವವಗುಂಠಿತ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೦ ॥avidita aKhanDa sattvada apAra jaladhiyali ।Bhuvanada dvIpa kinchit mAtra avidita ॥pavita antarakshige A eraDum onde vastu ।vavagunTita brahma  - Mankutimma ॥ 100 ॥In a huge undivided ocean of knowledge about true essence, this world is a small island that we do not understand. For a learned (pure) eye, these both are one and the same. The supreme being is what is hidden beneath all these forms.  - Mankutimma.
translation: In a huge undivided ocean of knowledge about true essence, this world is a small island that we do not understand. For a learned (pure) eye, these both are one and the same. The supreme being is what is hidden beneath all these forms.  - Mankutimma.
title: ವವಗುಂಠಿತ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: avidita aKhanDa sattvada apAra jaladhiyali ।Bhuvanada dvIpa kinchit mAtra avidita ॥pavita antarakshige A eraDum onde vastu ।vavagunTita brahma  - Mankutimma ॥ 100 ॥
kagga: ಅವಿದಿತಾಖಂಡಸತ್ತ್ವದಪಾರ ಜಲಧಿಯಲಿ ।ಭುವನದ ದ್ವೀಪ ಕಿಂಚಿನ್ಮಾತ್ರವಿದಿತ ॥ಪವಿತಾಂತರಕ್ಷಿಗಾಯೆರಡುಮೊಂದೇ ವಸ್ತು ।ವವಗುಂಠಿತ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೦ ॥

content: ಹಾಲಿನೊಳು ಬೆಣ್ಣೆ ಕಡಲೊಳಗೆ ನೀರ್ಗಲ್ಲವೊಲು ।ತೇಲುವುದಮೇಯಸತ್ತ್ವದಲಿ ಮೇಯ ಜಗ ॥ಮೂಲದಶೆಯೊಳಗೊಂದು, ಮಾಪನದ ಬಗೆಗೆರಡು ।ಗಾಳಿಯುಸಿರುಗಳಂತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೧ ॥hAlinoLu beNNe kaDaloLage nIrgallavolu ।tEluvudu amEya sattvadali mEya jaga ॥mUladasheyoLage ondu, mApanada bagege eraDu ।gAli usirugaLante  - Mankutimma ॥ 101 ॥Butter in milk is like icebergs in a sea. Small measurable entities  floating on the vast immeasurable. In essence both are same  - fat in  case of milk/butter and water in case of ocean/iceberg. But if one needs  to measure/perceive they are different. Just like, air and breath. We  call it air when it surrounds us; but when we inhale a small measurable  quantity of it, we  call it breath (with a enhanced sense of reverence).  - Mankutimma
translation: Butter in milk is like icebergs in a sea. Small measurable entities  floating on the vast immeasurable. In essence both are same  - fat in  case of milk/butter and water in case of ocean/iceberg. But if one needs  to measure/perceive they are different. Just like, air and breath. We  call it air when it surrounds us; but when we inhale a small measurable  quantity of it, we  call it breath (with a enhanced sense of reverence).  - Mankutimma
title: ಗಾಳಿಯುಸಿರುಗಳಂತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hAlinoLu beNNe kaDaloLage nIrgallavolu ।tEluvudu amEya sattvadali mEya jaga ॥mUladasheyoLage ondu, mApanada bagege eraDu ।gAli usirugaLante  - Mankutimma ॥ 101 ॥
kagga: ಹಾಲಿನೊಳು ಬೆಣ್ಣೆ ಕಡಲೊಳಗೆ ನೀರ್ಗಲ್ಲವೊಲು ।ತೇಲುವುದಮೇಯಸತ್ತ್ವದಲಿ ಮೇಯ ಜಗ ॥ಮೂಲದಶೆಯೊಳಗೊಂದು, ಮಾಪನದ ಬಗೆಗೆರಡು ।ಗಾಳಿಯುಸಿರುಗಳಂತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೧ ॥

content: ಕಾಯ ನಿರ್ಣೇಯವದರೊಳು ಮನವನಿರ್ಣೇಯ ।ಸ್ನಾಯು ಸಂಖ್ಯೇಯ ಜೀವಳಮಸಂಖ್ಯೇಯ ॥ಮೇಯಾಪ್ರಮೇಯಮಿಶ್ರಣವಿಂತು ನರಜಂತು ।ನೇಯವದು ವಿಶ್ವಕಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೨ ॥kAya nirNEyavu adaroLu manavu anirNEya ।snAyu sankhyEya jIvALam asankhyEya ॥mEya apramEya mishraNavintu narajantu ।nEyavadu vishvakam  - Mankutimma ॥ 102 ॥This body can be seen, measured and determined. The mind inside the body is quite the opposite; cannot be seen, measured or determined for certain. One can count and visualise the strengths of the muscles of the body. The life essence that makes them work is neither seen nor can be measured. A person is always a mixture of these measurable and immeasurable entities; only such a mixture makes him complete and interesting. Same is true for this world also.  - Mankutimma
translation: This body can be seen, measured and determined. The mind inside the body is quite the opposite; cannot be seen, measured or determined for certain. One can count and visualise the strengths of the muscles of the body. The life essence that makes them work is neither seen nor can be measured. A person is always a mixture of these measurable and immeasurable entities; only such a mixture makes him complete and interesting. Same is true for this world also.  - Mankutimma
title: ನೇಯವದು ವಿಶ್ವಕಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kAya nirNEyavu adaroLu manavu anirNEya ।snAyu sankhyEya jIvALam asankhyEya ॥mEya apramEya mishraNavintu narajantu ।nEyavadu vishvakam  - Mankutimma ॥ 102 ॥
kagga: ಕಾಯ ನಿರ್ಣೇಯವದರೊಳು ಮನವನಿರ್ಣೇಯ ।ಸ್ನಾಯು ಸಂಖ್ಯೇಯ ಜೀವಳಮಸಂಖ್ಯೇಯ ॥ಮೇಯಾಪ್ರಮೇಯಮಿಶ್ರಣವಿಂತು ನರಜಂತು ।ನೇಯವದು ವಿಶ್ವಕಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೨ ॥

content: ಜ್ಞೇಯದ ದ್ವೀಪಕಜ್ಞೇಯಾಬ್ಧಿಯಾವರಣ ।ಕಾಯಕದ ಗಿರಿಗೆ ಮಾನಸದಭ್ರಪಟಲ ॥ಮೇಯವನು ಬಗೆದೇನ್ ಅಮೇಯ ಸುತ್ತಲುಮಿರಲು? ।ಮಾಯೆಯೀ ಮಿಶ್ರಣವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೩ ॥jnEyada dvIpake ajneya abdhi AvaraNa ।kAyakada girige mAnasada bhrapaTala ॥mEyavanu bagedEn amEya suttalum iralu? ।mAyeyI mishraNavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 103 ॥What can be known is just an island in the vast ocean of the unknown. Mind weaves a vail of illusion over the body  - like a cloud over a mountain. What is the use of knowing, measuring all that can be measured while there is a vast scape of unmeasurable out there? The world is an interesting illusion created by this mixture of the measurable and the immeasurable.  - Mankutimma.
translation: What can be known is just an island in the vast ocean of the unknown. Mind weaves a vail of illusion over the body  - like a cloud over a mountain. What is the use of knowing, measuring all that can be measured while there is a vast scape of unmeasurable out there? The world is an interesting illusion created by this mixture of the measurable and the immeasurable.  - Mankutimma.
title: ಮಾಯೆಯೀ ಮಿಶ್ರಣವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jnEyada dvIpake ajneya abdhi AvaraNa ।kAyakada girige mAnasada bhrapaTala ॥mEyavanu bagedEn amEya suttalum iralu? ।mAyeyI mishraNavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 103 ॥
kagga: ಜ್ಞೇಯದ ದ್ವೀಪಕಜ್ಞೇಯಾಬ್ಧಿಯಾವರಣ ।ಕಾಯಕದ ಗಿರಿಗೆ ಮಾನಸದಭ್ರಪಟಲ ॥ಮೇಯವನು ಬಗೆದೇನ್ ಅಮೇಯ ಸುತ್ತಲುಮಿರಲು? ।ಮಾಯೆಯೀ ಮಿಶ್ರಣವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೩ ॥

content: ಕಾಲವಕ್ಷಯದೀಪವದರ ಪಾತ್ರೆಯಪಾರ ।ಬಾಳ್ ಅದರಿನಾದೊಂದು ಕಿರುಹಣತೆ ಮಿಣಕು ॥ಗಾಳಿಯಾರಿಪುದೊಂದನಿನ್ನೊಂದ ಹೊತ್ತಿಪುದು ।ತೈಲಧಾರೆಯಖಂಡ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೪ ॥kAlavu akshayadIpavu adara pAtreyu apAra ।bAL adarinAdondu kiruhaNate miNuku ॥gALiyu Aripudu ondanu innonda hottipudu ।tailadhAre akhanDa  - Mankutimma ॥ 104 ॥Time is like an never ending torch. Its power is vast. Life is just a flash of light from a small lamp. Wind puts off some flames while helps some to get bigger. The supply of oil to these lamps is uninterrupted and infinite.
translation: Time is like an never ending torch. Its power is vast. Life is just a flash of light from a small lamp. Wind puts off some flames while helps some to get bigger. The supply of oil to these lamps is uninterrupted and infinite.
title: ತೈಲಧಾರೆಯಖಂಡ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kAlavu akshayadIpavu adara pAtreyu apAra ।bAL adarinAdondu kiruhaNate miNuku ॥gALiyu Aripudu ondanu innonda hottipudu ।tailadhAre akhanDa  - Mankutimma ॥ 104 ॥
kagga: ಕಾಲವಕ್ಷಯದೀಪವದರ ಪಾತ್ರೆಯಪಾರ ।ಬಾಳ್ ಅದರಿನಾದೊಂದು ಕಿರುಹಣತೆ ಮಿಣಕು ॥ಗಾಳಿಯಾರಿಪುದೊಂದನಿನ್ನೊಂದ ಹೊತ್ತಿಪುದು ।ತೈಲಧಾರೆಯಖಂಡ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೪ ॥

content: ಭಿತ್ತಿಯೊಂದಿಲ್ಲದಿರೆ ಚಿತ್ರವೆಂತಿರಲಹುದು? ।ಚಿತ್ರವಿಲ್ಲದ ಭಿತ್ತಿ ಸೊಗಸಹುದದೆಂತು? ॥ನಿತ್ಯ ಸತ್ತ್ವವೆ ಭಿತ್ತಿ, ಜೀವಿತ ಕ್ಷಣಚಿತ್ರ ।ತತ್ತ್ವವೀ ಸಂಬಂಧ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೫ ॥bhittiyondu illadire chitraventiralahudu ।chitravillada bhitti sogasahudadentu? ॥nitya sattvave bhitti, jIvita kshaNachitra ।tattvavI sambandha  - Mankutimma ॥ 105 ॥How can the painting be there when there is no canvas? What is the joy in a canvas without the painting? The essence of truth is the canvas and the interesting painting is the life that we see on it which lasts a mere second. Our existence is in this relation between the canvas and the painting.  - Mankutimma
translation: How can the painting be there when there is no canvas? What is the joy in a canvas without the painting? The essence of truth is the canvas and the interesting painting is the life that we see on it which lasts a mere second. Our existence is in this relation between the canvas and the painting.  - Mankutimma
title: ತತ್ತ್ವವೀ ಸಂಬಂಧ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bhittiyondu illadire chitraventiralahudu ।chitravillada bhitti sogasahudadentu? ॥nitya sattvave bhitti, jIvita kshaNachitra ।tattvavI sambandha  - Mankutimma ॥ 105 ॥
kagga: ಭಿತ್ತಿಯೊಂದಿಲ್ಲದಿರೆ ಚಿತ್ರವೆಂತಿರಲಹುದು? ।ಚಿತ್ರವಿಲ್ಲದ ಭಿತ್ತಿ ಸೊಗಸಹುದದೆಂತು? ॥ನಿತ್ಯ ಸತ್ತ್ವವೆ ಭಿತ್ತಿ, ಜೀವಿತ ಕ್ಷಣಚಿತ್ರ ।ತತ್ತ್ವವೀ ಸಂಬಂಧ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೫ ॥

content: ಚೌಕಟ್ಟನಂತವದರೊಳು ಚಿತ್ರಪಟ ಸಾಂತ ।ಸಾಕಾರ ಘನತತಿ ನಿರಾಕಾರ ನಭದಿ ॥ಲೌಕಿಕದ ಮೌಲ್ಯ ನಿರ್ಲೌಕಿಕದ ನಾಣ್ಯದಲಿ ।ಲೆಕ್ಕ ತಾತ್ತ್ವಿಕನಿಗಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೬ ॥chaukattu anantavu adaroLu chitrapaTa sAnta ।sAkAra Ghanatati nirAkAra nabhadi ॥laukikada maulya nirlaukikada nANyadali ।lekka tAttvikanige idu  - Mankutimma ॥ 106 ॥The borders of the painting (and hence the canvas) is infinite. The painting itself is finite, definite and short lived. In the infinite formless sky, we see objects that are finite (like clouds, moon, starts, sun etc;) and have forms. For a person enlightened about the truth, all worldly objects are to be measured and valued against the value of the universal truth. Any other valuation is false.  - Mankutimma.
translation: The borders of the painting (and hence the canvas) is infinite. The painting itself is finite, definite and short lived. In the infinite formless sky, we see objects that are finite (like clouds, moon, starts, sun etc;) and have forms. For a person enlightened about the truth, all worldly objects are to be measured and valued against the value of the universal truth. Any other valuation is false.  - Mankutimma.
title: ಲೆಕ್ಕ ತಾತ್ತ್ವಿಕನಿಗಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: chaukattu anantavu adaroLu chitrapaTa sAnta ।sAkAra Ghanatati nirAkAra nabhadi ॥laukikada maulya nirlaukikada nANyadali ।lekka tAttvikanige idu  - Mankutimma ॥ 106 ॥
kagga: ಚೌಕಟ್ಟನಂತವದರೊಳು ಚಿತ್ರಪಟ ಸಾಂತ ।ಸಾಕಾರ ಘನತತಿ ನಿರಾಕಾರ ನಭದಿ ॥ಲೌಕಿಕದ ಮೌಲ್ಯ ನಿರ್ಲೌಕಿಕದ ನಾಣ್ಯದಲಿ ।ಲೆಕ್ಕ ತಾತ್ತ್ವಿಕನಿಗಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೬ ॥

content: ಅಜ್ಞಾತವಾದುದನಭಾವವೆನೆ ನಾಸ್ತಿಕನು ।ಅಜ್ಞೇಯವೆಂದದಕೆ ಕೈ ಮುಗಿಯೆ ಭಕ್ತ ॥ಜಿಜ್ಞಾಸ್ಯವೆಂದು ಪರಿಕಿಸತೊಡಗೆ ವಿಜ್ಞಾನಿ ।ಸ್ವಜ್ಞಪ್ತಿಶೋಧಿ ಮುನಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೭ ॥ajNatavAdudanu abhAvavene nAstikanu ।ajnEyavendu adake kai mugiye bhakta ॥jijnAsyavendu parikisatoDage vignAni ।svajnaptishOdhi muni  - Mankutimma ॥ 107 ॥ An atheist denies the existence of anything he does not understand. A believer worships it mostly because he thinks he can not know it completely anyway. A scientist sees it as a wonder, recognizes that he does not know its ways, tries to break it down and explain why it is so. A saint is one who turns inward seeking to know it all.  - Mankutimma
translation: An atheist denies the existence of anything he does not understand. A believer worships it mostly because he thinks he can not know it completely anyway. A scientist sees it as a wonder, recognizes that he does not know its ways, tries to break it down and explain why it is so. A saint is one who turns inward seeking to know it all.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸ್ವಜ್ಞಪ್ತಿಶೋಧಿ ಮುನಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ajNatavAdudanu abhAvavene nAstikanu ।ajnEyavendu adake kai mugiye bhakta ॥jijnAsyavendu parikisatoDage vignAni ।svajnaptishOdhi muni  - Mankutimma ॥ 107 ॥
kagga: ಅಜ್ಞಾತವಾದುದನಭಾವವೆನೆ ನಾಸ್ತಿಕನು ।ಅಜ್ಞೇಯವೆಂದದಕೆ ಕೈ ಮುಗಿಯೆ ಭಕ್ತ ॥ಜಿಜ್ಞಾಸ್ಯವೆಂದು ಪರಿಕಿಸತೊಡಗೆ ವಿಜ್ಞಾನಿ ।ಸ್ವಜ್ಞಪ್ತಿಶೋಧಿ ಮುನಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೭ ॥

content: ಜಡವೇನು? ಜೀವವೇಂ? ಚೈತನ್ಯ ನಿದ್ರಿಸಿರು ।ವೆಡೆಯೆಲ್ಲ ಜಡಲೋಕ ಕಲ್ಲು ಕಡ್ಡಿ ಕಸ ॥ಅಡಗಿರ್ಪ ಚೈತನ್ಯವೆಚ್ಚರಲು ಜಂತು ಜಗ ।ಜಡವೆ ಜೀವದ ವಸತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೮ ॥jaDavEnu? jIvavEm? chaitanya nidrisiru ।veDeyella jaDalOka kallu kaDDi kasa ॥aDagirpa chaitanyavu echharalu jantu jaga ।jaDave jIvada vasati  - Mankutimma ॥ 108 ॥What is a lifeless object? What is life? Where ever the energy is dormant  - we call it life less; stone, stick and dirt. When the hidden energy is woken up, the world comes to life. In a way, life resides in lifeless objects.  - Mankutimma
translation: What is a lifeless object? What is life? Where ever the energy is dormant  - we call it life less; stone, stick and dirt. When the hidden energy is woken up, the world comes to life. In a way, life resides in lifeless objects.  - Mankutimma
title: ಜಡವೆ ಜೀವದ ವಸತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jaDavEnu? jIvavEm? chaitanya nidrisiru ।veDeyella jaDalOka kallu kaDDi kasa ॥aDagirpa chaitanyavu echharalu jantu jaga ।jaDave jIvada vasati  - Mankutimma ॥ 108 ॥
kagga: ಜಡವೇನು? ಜೀವವೇಂ? ಚೈತನ್ಯ ನಿದ್ರಿಸಿರು ।ವೆಡೆಯೆಲ್ಲ ಜಡಲೋಕ ಕಲ್ಲು ಕಡ್ಡಿ ಕಸ ॥ಅಡಗಿರ್ಪ ಚೈತನ್ಯವೆಚ್ಚರಲು ಜಂತು ಜಗ ।ಜಡವೆ ಜೀವದ ವಸತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೮ ॥

content: ಶಿಲೆಯಾಗಿ ನಿದ್ರಿಸುತ್ತಿರ್ದಾಕೆ ರಾಮಪದ ।ತಲದ ಸಂಸ್ಪರ್ಶದಿಂದೆದ್ದು ನಿಂತಂತೆ ॥ಚಲಿಸದೆನಿಸಿದ ಜಡವನಾವ ಗಾಳಿಯೊ ಸೋಕೆ ।ಬಲ ತೀವಿ ಚಲಿಪುದದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೯ ॥shileyAgi nidrisuttirdAke rAmapada ।talada samsparshadinda eddu nintante ॥chalisadu enisida jaDavanu Ava gALiyo sOke ।bala tIvi chalipudu adu  - Mankutimma ॥ 109 ॥Ahalya had turned into stone due to a curse from her husband Gautama. She stayed as a stone unmoved till Rama touched it with his foot. She came back to life. We may think many such objects as lifeless just because it does not move. Such objects can come to life and move when some wind blows energy into it.  - Mankutimma.
translation: Ahalya had turned into stone due to a curse from her husband Gautama. She stayed as a stone unmoved till Rama touched it with his foot. She came back to life. We may think many such objects as lifeless just because it does not move. Such objects can come to life and move when some wind blows energy into it.  - Mankutimma.
title: ಬಲ ತೀವಿ ಚಲಿಪುದದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: shileyAgi nidrisuttirdAke rAmapada ।talada samsparshadinda eddu nintante ॥chalisadu enisida jaDavanu Ava gALiyo sOke ।bala tIvi chalipudu adu  - Mankutimma ॥ 109 ॥
kagga: ಶಿಲೆಯಾಗಿ ನಿದ್ರಿಸುತ್ತಿರ್ದಾಕೆ ರಾಮಪದ ।ತಲದ ಸಂಸ್ಪರ್ಶದಿಂದೆದ್ದು ನಿಂತಂತೆ ॥ಚಲಿಸದೆನಿಸಿದ ಜಡವನಾವ ಗಾಳಿಯೊ ಸೋಕೆ ।ಬಲ ತೀವಿ ಚಲಿಪುದದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೦೯ ॥

content: ಹಿಮಗಿರಿಯ ಕಂಡಂಗೆ ಕ್ರಿಮಿಯ ಹಿರಿಮೆಯದೇನು? ।ಕ್ರಿಮಿಗೆ ಹಸಿವುಂಟಿನಿತು ಬೆದಕಾಟವುಂಟು ॥ಅಮಿತ ಸಂತತಿಯುಂಟು ಹಿಮಗಿರಿಯ ಸಮಯುಗದ ।ಕ್ರಿಮಿಪಂಕ್ತಿ ಕಿರಿದಹುದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೦ ॥himagiriya kanDange krimiya hirimeyadEnu? ।krimige hasivunTu initu bedakATavunTu ॥amita santatiyunTu himagiriya samayugada ।krimipankti kiridahude?  - Mankutimma ॥ 110 ॥If a person has seen the snow capped mountains, what greatness will he see in a mere bacteria? The bacteria though, has life, hunger and urge to go places in search of food. It has (the cumulative intelligence of) infinite lineage of bacteria that came before it; perhaps the as old as the mighty mountains. Is this legacy of bacteria any smaller than that of the mountain?  - Mankutimma.
translation: If a person has seen the snow capped mountains, what greatness will he see in a mere bacteria? The bacteria though, has life, hunger and urge to go places in search of food. It has (the cumulative intelligence of) infinite lineage of bacteria that came before it; perhaps the as old as the mighty mountains. Is this legacy of bacteria any smaller than that of the mountain?  - Mankutimma.
title: ಕ್ರಿಮಿಪಂಕ್ತಿ ಕಿರಿದಹುದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: himagiriya kanDange krimiya hirimeyadEnu? ।krimige hasivunTu initu bedakATavunTu ॥amita santatiyunTu himagiriya samayugada ।krimipankti kiridahude?  - Mankutimma ॥ 110 ॥
kagga: ಹಿಮಗಿರಿಯ ಕಂಡಂಗೆ ಕ್ರಿಮಿಯ ಹಿರಿಮೆಯದೇನು? ।ಕ್ರಿಮಿಗೆ ಹಸಿವುಂಟಿನಿತು ಬೆದಕಾಟವುಂಟು ॥ಅಮಿತ ಸಂತತಿಯುಂಟು ಹಿಮಗಿರಿಯ ಸಮಯುಗದ ।ಕ್ರಿಮಿಪಂಕ್ತಿ ಕಿರಿದಹುದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೦ ॥

content: ಜಡವೆಂಬುದೇನು? ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ ಚೇತನ ಸುಪ್ತಿ ।ಅಡಗಿ ನಿದ್ರಿಪುದಲ್ಲಿ ಚೈತನ್ಯದಗ್ನಿ ॥ಮಿಡಿಯೆ ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವ ವಿದ್ಯುದ್ದೀಪ್ತಿಯದನಾಗ ।ನೆಡೆವುದದು ಜೀವಿವೊಲು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೧ ॥jaDavembudEnu? sRuShTiyali chEtana supti ।aDagi nidripudalli chaitanyada agni ॥miDiye parasattva vidyut dIptiyadanu Aga ।neDevudadu jIvivolu  - Mankutimma ॥ 111 ॥What is an inanimate object? It is just another part of creation where life is asleep. The fire of life is asleep inside them. When the supreme cosmic being blows electrifying energy into it, it starts walking (moving) like a living being.  - Mankutimma.
translation: What is an inanimate object? It is just another part of creation where life is asleep. The fire of life is asleep inside them. When the supreme cosmic being blows electrifying energy into it, it starts walking (moving) like a living being.  - Mankutimma.
title: ನೆಡೆವುದದು ಜೀವಿವೊಲು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jaDavembudEnu? sRuShTiyali chEtana supti ।aDagi nidripudalli chaitanyada agni ॥miDiye parasattva vidyut dIptiyadanu Aga ।neDevudadu jIvivolu  - Mankutimma ॥ 111 ॥
kagga: ಜಡವೆಂಬುದೇನು? ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ ಚೇತನ ಸುಪ್ತಿ ।ಅಡಗಿ ನಿದ್ರಿಪುದಲ್ಲಿ ಚೈತನ್ಯದಗ್ನಿ ॥ಮಿಡಿಯೆ ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವ ವಿದ್ಯುದ್ದೀಪ್ತಿಯದನಾಗ ।ನೆಡೆವುದದು ಜೀವಿವೊಲು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೧ ॥

content: ಹಿಮಗಿರಿಯೊಳವಿತಿಹುದು ಚೈತನ್ಯದಗ್ನಿಕಣ ।ಸ್ತಿಮಿತದಿಂ ನಿಂತಿರ್ಪುದದು ಧರೆಯ ಹಿತಕೆ ॥ಶಮದ ಸುಂದರದ ಸಾತ್ತ್ವಿಕದ ಗಾಂಭೀರ್ಯವದು ।ನಮಗೊಂದು ವೇದನಿಧಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೨ ॥himagiriyoLu avitihudu chaitanyada agni kaNa ।stimitadim nintirpudadu dhareya hitake ॥shamada sundarada sAttvikada gAmbhIryavu adu ।namagondu vEdanidhi  - Mankutimma ॥ 112 ॥Even inside the inanimate snow capped mountains, hides a spark of energy. It is contained and calm for the good of the earth (not everything is this world should be living  - for its own good). That is the beauty of tranquillity, purity, profundity and composure. It is a source of inspiration and knowledge.  - Mankutimma.
translation: Even inside the inanimate snow capped mountains, hides a spark of energy. It is contained and calm for the good of the earth (not everything is this world should be living  - for its own good). That is the beauty of tranquillity, purity, profundity and composure. It is a source of inspiration and knowledge.  - Mankutimma.
title: ನಮಗೊಂದು ವೇದನಿಧಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: himagiriyoLu avitihudu chaitanyada agni kaNa ।stimitadim nintirpudadu dhareya hitake ॥shamada sundarada sAttvikada gAmbhIryavu adu ।namagondu vEdanidhi  - Mankutimma ॥ 112 ॥
kagga: ಹಿಮಗಿರಿಯೊಳವಿತಿಹುದು ಚೈತನ್ಯದಗ್ನಿಕಣ ।ಸ್ತಿಮಿತದಿಂ ನಿಂತಿರ್ಪುದದು ಧರೆಯ ಹಿತಕೆ ॥ಶಮದ ಸುಂದರದ ಸಾತ್ತ್ವಿಕದ ಗಾಂಭೀರ್ಯವದು ।ನಮಗೊಂದು ವೇದನಿಧಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೨ ॥

content: ಅಣುಸಂಖ್ಯೆಯೆಣಿಸುವನು ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ ವಿಜ್ಞಾನಿ ।ಗುಣಿಸುವನು ಭೂತಶಕ್ತಿಗಳನದರಿಂದೇಂ? ॥ಗಣಿತಸಾಧ್ಯದ ಹಿಂದಗಣ್ಯದ ಮಹತ್ತತ್ತ್ವ ।ವಣಗಿಹುದು ಮೂಲವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೩ ॥aNusankhyeya eNisuvanu vishvadali vijnAni ।guNisuvanu bhUta shaktigaLanu adarindEm? ॥gaNitasAdhyada hinde agaNyada mahat tattvavu ।aNagihudu mUlavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 113 ॥A scientist can count the atoms in this world. But by knowing that can he know about the spirit of life in beings? Behind every facet of an object that can be measured, there is the greatness of the cosmic spirit that can not be measured or counted. That is the root of the object;s existence.  - Mankutimma.
translation: A scientist can count the atoms in this world. But by knowing that can he know about the spirit of life in beings? Behind every facet of an object that can be measured, there is the greatness of the cosmic spirit that can not be measured or counted. That is the root of the object;s existence.  - Mankutimma.
title: ಅಣಗಿಹುದು ಮೂಲವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aNusankhyeya eNisuvanu vishvadali vijnAni ।guNisuvanu bhUta shaktigaLanu adarindEm? ॥gaNitasAdhyada hinde agaNyada mahat tattvavu ।aNagihudu mUlavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 113 ॥
kagga: ಅಣುಸಂಖ್ಯೆಯೆಣಿಸುವನು ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ ವಿಜ್ಞಾನಿ ।ಗುಣಿಸುವನು ಭೂತಶಕ್ತಿಗಳನದರಿಂದೇಂ? ॥ಗಣಿತಸಾಧ್ಯದ ಹಿಂದಗಣ್ಯದ ಮಹತ್ತತ್ತ್ವ ।ವಣಗಿಹುದು ಮೂಲವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೩ ॥

content: ಸೃಷ್ಟಿರೂಪಂಗಳವತಾರದೊಳ್ ಕ್ರಮಲಕ್ಷ್ಯ ।ಪುಷ್ಟವಾಗಿರ್ದೊಡೇನಿಲ್ಲದೊಡದೇನು? ॥ಶಿಷ್ಟಮಾದುದು ಸತ್ತ್ವವದನು ಸೋಕದು ರೂಪ ।ದೃಷ್ಟಿ ಸತ್ತ್ವದೊಳಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೪ ॥sRuShTirUpangaLa avatAradoL kramalakShya ।puShTavAgirdoDe enu illadoDe adEnu? ॥shiShTamAdudu sattvavu adanu sOkadu rUpa ।dRuShTi sattvadoLirali  - Mankutimma ॥ 114 ॥We may observe some order in the forms of objects of creation is this world. The order may make sense to our hypothesis or may not. Does it matter? The cosmic spirit behind all forms and order is the only truth. That is not affected by the forms, or our impressions of the forms or our hypothesis about the forms. If one wants to understand it, he must set his eyes on the spirit and not the forms.  - Mankutimma.
translation: We may observe some order in the forms of objects of creation is this world. The order may make sense to our hypothesis or may not. Does it matter? The cosmic spirit behind all forms and order is the only truth. That is not affected by the forms, or our impressions of the forms or our hypothesis about the forms. If one wants to understand it, he must set his eyes on the spirit and not the forms.  - Mankutimma.
title: ದೃಷ್ಟಿ ಸತ್ತ್ವದೊಳಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sRuShTirUpangaLa avatAradoL kramalakShya ।puShTavAgirdoDe enu illadoDe adEnu? ॥shiShTamAdudu sattvavu adanu sOkadu rUpa ।dRuShTi sattvadoLirali  - Mankutimma ॥ 114 ॥
kagga: ಸೃಷ್ಟಿರೂಪಂಗಳವತಾರದೊಳ್ ಕ್ರಮಲಕ್ಷ್ಯ ।ಪುಷ್ಟವಾಗಿರ್ದೊಡೇನಿಲ್ಲದೊಡದೇನು? ॥ಶಿಷ್ಟಮಾದುದು ಸತ್ತ್ವವದನು ಸೋಕದು ರೂಪ ।ದೃಷ್ಟಿ ಸತ್ತ್ವದೊಳಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೪ ॥

content: ಕ್ರಮದ ನಭವಿಕೃತಿ ವಾಯ್ವಾದಿ ರೂಪಗಳಂತೆ ।ಕೃಮಿ ಬೀಜದಿಂ ಮತ್ಸ್ಯ ಮೃಗ ಮನುಜರಂತೆ ॥ಕ್ರಮ ವಿವರವೇನಿರಲಿ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯ ವಿಧಾನದಲಿ ।ಸಮಸದದು ಸತ್ತ್ವವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೫ ॥kramada nabhavikRuti vAyu Adi rUpagaLante ।krimi bIjadim matsya mRuga manujarante ॥krama vivaravEnirali sRuShTiya vidhAnadali ।samasadadu sattvavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 115 ॥What we think is order in this creation are like clouds in the sky  - limited impressions on the infinite sky. They say a single celled bacteria gave rise to fish, land animals and finally humans in that order. This hypothesis may be very well made and explain in every detail how nature works. However, it is not equal to the cosmic spirit that can breathe life into the inanimate objects.  - Mankutimma
translation: What we think is order in this creation are like clouds in the sky  - limited impressions on the infinite sky. They say a single celled bacteria gave rise to fish, land animals and finally humans in that order. This hypothesis may be very well made and explain in every detail how nature works. However, it is not equal to the cosmic spirit that can breathe life into the inanimate objects.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಮಸದದು ಸತ್ತ್ವವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kramada nabhavikRuti vAyu Adi rUpagaLante ।krimi bIjadim matsya mRuga manujarante ॥krama vivaravEnirali sRuShTiya vidhAnadali ।samasadadu sattvavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 115 ॥

content: ಪರಮಾಣುಮಿಂ ಪ್ರಪಂಚಗಳ ಸಂಯೋಜಿಪುದು ।ಮರೆಯಿಂದ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಂತ್ರವ ಚಾಲಿಸುವುದು ॥ಚರಲೀಲೆಯಲಿ ಜೀವವೆನಿಪ ಚೈತನ್ಯವದು ।ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವ ಶಕ್ತಿಯಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೬ ॥paramANumim prapanchagaLa samyOjipudu ।mareyinda sRuShTi yantrava cAlisuvudu ॥caralIleyali jIvavenipa chaitanyavadu ।parasattva shaktiyalo  - Mankutimma ॥ 116 ॥Ordering all the atoms in order to create this world (and perhaps other worlds), running this machinery of the world from background, giving life to all beings in this world  - are all the works of the cosmic spirit.  - Mankutimma
translation: Ordering all the atoms in order to create this world (and perhaps other worlds), running this machinery of the world from background, giving life to all beings in this world  - are all the works of the cosmic spirit.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವ ಶಕ್ತಿಯಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: paramANumim prapanchagaLa samyOjipudu ।mareyinda sRuShTi yantrava cAlisuvudu ॥caralIleyali jIvavenipa chaitanyavadu ।parasattva shaktiyalo  - Mankutimma ॥ 116 ॥
kagga: ಪರಮಾಣುಮಿಂ ಪ್ರಪಂಚಗಳ ಸಂಯೋಜಿಪುದು ।ಮರೆಯಿಂದ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಂತ್ರವ ಚಾಲಿಸುವುದು ॥ಚರಲೀಲೆಯಲಿ ಜೀವವೆನಿಪ ಚೈತನ್ಯವದು ।ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವ ಶಕ್ತಿಯಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೬ ॥

content: ಸ್ಥಾಪಿತವೆ ಜೀವ ನಿನ್ನೊಡಲಿನೊಂದಂಗದಲಿ? ।ಆಪಾದಶಿರವುಮದು ತುಂಬಿರುವುದಲ್ತೆ? ॥ವ್ಯಾಪಿಸಿಹುದಂತೊಂದು ಚೈತನ್ಯ ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ ।ಲೇಪಗೊಳ್ಳದ ಸತ್ತ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೭ ॥sthApitave jIva ninnoDalina ondangadali? ।ApAda shiravum adu tumbiruvudalte? ॥vyApisihudu antondu chaitanya vishvadali ।lEpagoLLada sattva  - Mankutimma ॥ 117 ॥Is life present in any one part of your body? Is it not filled from foot to head completely? Just like that, the cosmic spirit is present every where in this world as the life giving energy. At the same time, it is not attached to anything (or any one thing).  - Mankutimma.
translation: Is life present in any one part of your body? Is it not filled from foot to head completely? Just like that, the cosmic spirit is present every where in this world as the life giving energy. At the same time, it is not attached to anything (or any one thing).  - Mankutimma.
title: ಲೇಪಗೊಳ್ಳದ ಸತ್ತ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sthApitave jIva ninnoDalina ondangadali? ।ApAda shiravum adu tumbiruvudalte? ॥vyApisihudu antondu chaitanya vishvadali ।lEpagoLLada sattva  - Mankutimma ॥ 117 ॥
kagga: ಸ್ಥಾಪಿತವೆ ಜೀವ ನಿನ್ನೊಡಲಿನೊಂದಂಗದಲಿ? ।ಆಪಾದಶಿರವುಮದು ತುಂಬಿರುವುದಲ್ತೆ? ॥ವ್ಯಾಪಿಸಿಹುದಂತೊಂದು ಚೈತನ್ಯ ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ ।ಲೇಪಗೊಳ್ಳದ ಸತ್ತ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೭ ॥

content: ರವಿಮಾತ್ರದಿಂದಲ್ಲ ಭುವಿಮಾತ್ರದಿಂದಲ್ಲ ।ಭುವನಪೋಷಣೆಯುಭಯ ಸಹಕಾರದಿಂದ ॥ವಿವಿಧ ಶಕ್ತಿರಸಂಗಳೇಕೀಭವಿಸೆ ಜೀವ ।ಅವಿತರ್ಕ್ಯ ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೮ ॥ravi mAtradindalla bhuvi mAtradindalla ।bhuvana pOShaNeyu ubhaya sahakAradinda ॥vividha shakti rasangaLu EkIbhavise jIva ।avitarkya sUkShmavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 118 ॥The source of life in this world is not only due to the Sun, not only due to the earth. If life has to sustain on this planet there has to be contribution from both of them. Various energies and matter have to come together and become one to make life possible. It is a subtle point that can not be settled through logic or argument.  - Mankutimma
translation: The source of life in this world is not only due to the Sun, not only due to the earth. If life has to sustain on this planet there has to be contribution from both of them. Various energies and matter have to come together and become one to make life possible. It is a subtle point that can not be settled through logic or argument.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅವಿತರ್ಕ್ಯ ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ravi mAtradindalla bhuvi mAtradindalla ।bhuvana pOShaNeyu ubhaya sahakAradinda ॥vividha shakti rasangaLu EkIbhavise jIva ।avitarkya sUkShmavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 118 ॥
kagga: ರವಿಮಾತ್ರದಿಂದಲ್ಲ ಭುವಿಮಾತ್ರದಿಂದಲ್ಲ ।ಭುವನಪೋಷಣೆಯುಭಯ ಸಹಕಾರದಿಂದ ॥ವಿವಿಧ ಶಕ್ತಿರಸಂಗಳೇಕೀಭವಿಸೆ ಜೀವ ।ಅವಿತರ್ಕ್ಯ ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೮ ॥

content: ನಾವುಣ್ಣುವನ್ನಗಳು ನಾವು ಕುಡಿವುದಕಗಳು ।ನಾವುಸಿರುವೆಲರುಗಳು ನಾವುಡುವ ವಸ್ತ್ರ ॥ಭೂವ್ಯೋಮಗಳ ಯಂತ್ರ ಸಂಘದುತ್ಪನ್ನಗಳು ।ಜೀವವೆರಡರ ಶಿಶುವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೯ ॥nAvuNNuva annagaLu nAvu kuDiva udakagaLu ।nAvu usiruva elarugaLu nAvu uDuva vastra ॥bhU vyOmagaLa yantra sanghada utpannagaLu ।jIva eraDara shishuvu  - Mankutimma ॥ 119 ॥The food we eat, the water we drink, the air we breathe, the clothes we wear; are all works of complex machinery in this earth and cosmic space. Life is a result of both of them; earth providing material and the cosmic outer space providing the energy.  - Mankutimma
translation: The food we eat, the water we drink, the air we breathe, the clothes we wear; are all works of complex machinery in this earth and cosmic space. Life is a result of both of them; earth providing material and the cosmic outer space providing the energy.  - Mankutimma
title: ಜೀವವೆರಡರ ಶಿಶುವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nAvuNNuva annagaLu nAvu kuDiva udakagaLu ।nAvu usiruva elarugaLu nAvu uDuva vastra ॥bhU vyOmagaLa yantra sanghada utpannagaLu ।jIva eraDara shishuvu  - Mankutimma ॥ 119 ॥
kagga: ನಾವುಣ್ಣುವನ್ನಗಳು ನಾವು ಕುಡಿವುದಕಗಳು ।ನಾವುಸಿರುವೆಲರುಗಳು ನಾವುಡುವ ವಸ್ತ್ರ ॥ಭೂವ್ಯೋಮಗಳ ಯಂತ್ರ ಸಂಘದುತ್ಪನ್ನಗಳು ।ಜೀವವೆರಡರ ಶಿಶುವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧೯ ॥

content: ಪಾಕ ನಿನ್ನೊಳದೊಂದು ಸಾಗುತಿಹುದೆಡೆಬಿಡದೆ ।ಲೋಕದೆಲ್ಲವು ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮಗತಿಯಿನೊಳವೊಕ್ಕು ॥ಸಾಕುಬೇಕುಗಳೆಲ್ಲವದರಿನಾ ಯಂತ್ರವನು ।ಏಕೆ ರಚಿಸಿದನೊ ವಿಧಿ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೦ ॥paka ninnoLadondu sAgutihudu eDebiDade ।lOkadellavu sUkShmagatiyin oLavokku ॥sAkubEkugaLu ellavadarinA yantravanu ।Eke rachisidano vidhi!  - Mankutimma ॥ 120 ॥The body is an amazing machinery. There is a incessant process of assimilation that goes on inside it. Everything in this world gets into it in a subtle way (through ingesting or through our senses). Once in, it has mechanism to make us want more or enough of particular things. Why providence created such a wonderful machine!!  - Mankutimma
translation: The body is an amazing machinery. There is a incessant process of assimilation that goes on inside it. Everything in this world gets into it in a subtle way (through ingesting or through our senses). Once in, it has mechanism to make us want more or enough of particular things. Why providence created such a wonderful machine!!  - Mankutimma
title: ಏಕೆ ರಚಿಸಿದನೊ ವಿಧಿ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: paka ninnoLadondu sAgutihudu eDebiDade ।lOkadellavu sUkShmagatiyin oLavokku ॥sAkubEkugaLu ellavadarinA yantravanu ।Eke rachisidano vidhi!  - Mankutimma ॥ 120 ॥
kagga: ಪಾಕ ನಿನ್ನೊಳದೊಂದು ಸಾಗುತಿಹುದೆಡೆಬಿಡದೆ ।ಲೋಕದೆಲ್ಲವು ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮಗತಿಯಿನೊಳವೊಕ್ಕು ॥ಸಾಕುಬೇಕುಗಳೆಲ್ಲವದರಿನಾ ಯಂತ್ರವನು ।ಏಕೆ ರಚಿಸಿದನೊ ವಿಧಿ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೦ ॥

content: ತನುವೇನು? ಮನವೇನು? ಪರಮಾಣು ಸಂಧಾನ ।ಕುಣಿಸುತಿಹುದುಭಯವನು ಮೂರನೆಯದೊಂದು ॥ತೃಣದ ಹಸಿರಿನ ಹುಟ್ಟು ತಾರೆಯೆಸಕದ ಗುಟ್ಟು ।ದಣಿಯದದನರಸನು ನೀಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೧ ॥tanuvEnu? manavEnu? paramANu sandhAna ।kuNisutihudu ubhayavanu mUraneyadondu ॥tRuNada hasirina huttu tAreyesakada guttu ।daNiyadu adanu arasu anu nIm  - Mankutimma ॥ 121 ॥What is a body? What is mind? Both are just a specific arrangement of atoms. Both of these are controlled by a third force. That force is behind the grass being green, the sparkle of the stars. It is a force that never tires. You must search for that spirit always.- Mankutimma
translation: What is a body? What is mind? Both are just a specific arrangement of atoms. Both of these are controlled by a third force. That force is behind the grass being green, the sparkle of the stars. It is a force that never tires. You must search for that spirit always.- Mankutimma
title: ದಣಿಯದದನರಸನು ನೀಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tanuvEnu? manavEnu? paramANu sandhAna ।kuNisutihudu ubhayavanu mUraneyadondu ॥tRuNada hasirina huttu tAreyesakada guttu ।daNiyadu adanu arasu anu nIm  - Mankutimma ॥ 121 ॥
kagga: ತನುವೇನು? ಮನವೇನು? ಪರಮಾಣು ಸಂಧಾನ ।ಕುಣಿಸುತಿಹುದುಭಯವನು ಮೂರನೆಯದೊಂದು ॥ತೃಣದ ಹಸಿರಿನ ಹುಟ್ಟು ತಾರೆಯೆಸಕದ ಗುಟ್ಟು ।ದಣಿಯದದನರಸನು ನೀಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೧ ॥

content: ಜನಿಸಿದುದು ಮೃತಿಯನೆಳಸದೆ ಕುಲವ ಬೆಳಸುವುದು ।ಒಣಗಿದಂತಿರುವ ತೃಣಮೂಲ ಮೊಳೆಯುವುದು ॥ಮನುಜರಳಿವರು ಮನುಜಸಂತಾನ ನಿಂತಿಹುದು ।ಅಣಗದಾತ್ಮದ ಸತ್ತ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೨ ॥janisidudu mRutiyanELasade kulava beLasuvudu ।oNagidantiruva tRuNamUla moLeyuvudu ॥manujaru aLivaru manujasantAna nintihudu ।aNagadu Atmada sattva  - Mankutimma ॥ 122 ॥What is born will go on procreating without giving much thought to the fact that death is imminent. A dry blade of grass also sprouts in time. People will perish, but mankind continues. The essence of life can not be subdued.  - Mankutimma
translation: What is born will go on procreating without giving much thought to the fact that death is imminent. A dry blade of grass also sprouts in time. People will perish, but mankind continues. The essence of life can not be subdued.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅಣಗದಾತ್ಮದ ಸತ್ತ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: janisidudu mRutiyanELasade kulava beLasuvudu ।oNagidantiruva tRuNamUla moLeyuvudu ॥manujaru aLivaru manujasantAna nintihudu ।aNagadu Atmada sattva  - Mankutimma ॥ 122 ॥
kagga: ಜನಿಸಿದುದು ಮೃತಿಯನೆಳಸದೆ ಕುಲವ ಬೆಳಸುವುದು ।ಒಣಗಿದಂತಿರುವ ತೃಣಮೂಲ ಮೊಳೆಯುವುದು ॥ಮನುಜರಳಿವರು ಮನುಜಸಂತಾನ ನಿಂತಿಹುದು ।ಅಣಗದಾತ್ಮದ ಸತ್ತ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೨ ॥

content: ಬನ್ನಬವಣೆಗಳ ತಾನೆನಿತೆನಿತು ಪಟ್ಟಿರೆಯು ।ಮಿನ್ನೊಮ್ಮೆ ಮತ್ತೊಮ್ಮೆ ಹೊಸ ಸಾಹಸಗಳಿಂ ॥ಸನ್ನಹಿಸುವಂ ಸುಮ್ಮನಿರಲೊಲದೆ ಮಾನವನು ।ಚಿನ್ಮಯತೆಯಾತ್ಮಗುಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೩ ॥banna bavaNegaLa tAnu enitenitu pattireyum ।innomme mattomme hosa sAhasagaLim ॥sannahisuvam summaniralu olade mAnavanu ।chinmayate AtmaguNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 123 ॥Man faces a lot of miseries and troubles in his work. But he always bounces back with a more vigor and a new endeavors. He is not the one who can remain silent when troubled. Why does he do all this when all he can think is right with him?  - ;chit; (mind) is the nature of the atma (soul) that is residing in him.  - Mankutimma
translation: Man faces a lot of miseries and troubles in his work. But he always bounces back with a more vigor and a new endeavors. He is not the one who can remain silent when troubled. Why does he do all this when all he can think is right with him?  - ;chit; (mind) is the nature of the atma (soul) that is residing in him.  - Mankutimma
title: ಚಿನ್ಮಯತೆಯಾತ್ಮಗುಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: banna bavaNegaLa tAnu enitenitu pattireyum ।innomme mattomme hosa sAhasagaLim ॥sannahisuvam summaniralu olade mAnavanu ।chinmayate AtmaguNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 123 ॥
kagga: ಬನ್ನಬವಣೆಗಳ ತಾನೆನಿತೆನಿತು ಪಟ್ಟಿರೆಯು ।ಮಿನ್ನೊಮ್ಮೆ ಮತ್ತೊಮ್ಮೆ ಹೊಸ ಸಾಹಸಗಳಿಂ ॥ಸನ್ನಹಿಸುವಂ ಸುಮ್ಮನಿರಲೊಲದೆ ಮಾನವನು ।ಚಿನ್ಮಯತೆಯಾತ್ಮಗುಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೩ ॥

content: ಮೌನದೊಳೊ ಮಾತಿನೊಳೊ ಹಾಸ್ಯದೊಳೊ ಹಾಡಿನೊಳೊ ।ಮಾನವಂ ಪ್ರಣಯದೊಳೊ ವೀರ ವಿಜಯದೊಳೋ ॥ಎನೊ ಎಂತೋ ಸಮಾಧಾನಗಳನರಸುತಿಹ ।ನಾನಂದವಾತ್ಮಗುಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೪ ॥maunadoLo mAtinoLo hAsyadoLo hADinoLo ।mAnavam praNayadoLo vIra vijayadoLO ॥eno entO samAdhAnagaLanu arasutihanu ।Anandavu AtmaguNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 124 ॥Man seeks happiness always. Some seek it in silence, in conversation, in comedy, in music, in romance, in victory. What offers solace to one;s perturbed mind is different for different people. Why does he do all these when ;ananda; (happiness) is the nature of the atma (soul) in him.  - Mankutimma
translation: Man seeks happiness always. Some seek it in silence, in conversation, in comedy, in music, in romance, in victory. What offers solace to one;s perturbed mind is different for different people. Why does he do all these when ;ananda; (happiness) is the nature of the atma (soul) in him.  - Mankutimma
title: ಆನಂದವಾತ್ಮಗುಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: maunadoLo mAtinoLo hAsyadoLo hADinoLo ।mAnavam praNayadoLo vIra vijayadoLO ॥eno entO samAdhAnagaLanu arasutihanu ।Anandavu AtmaguNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 124 ॥
kagga: ಮೌನದೊಳೊ ಮಾತಿನೊಳೊ ಹಾಸ್ಯದೊಳೊ ಹಾಡಿನೊಳೊ ।ಮಾನವಂ ಪ್ರಣಯದೊಳೊ ವೀರ ವಿಜಯದೊಳೋ ॥ಎನೊ ಎಂತೋ ಸಮಾಧಾನಗಳನರಸುತಿಹ ।ನಾನಂದವಾತ್ಮಗುಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೪ ॥

content: ಸಚ್ಚಿದಾನಂದಂಗಳಾತ್ಮ ಸ್ವಭಾವ ರಸ ।ಬಚ್ಚಿಡುವುದದನು ಜೀವಿತೆಯ ಮಾಯಿಕತೆ॥ಇಕ್ಷುವೊಲ್ ಜೀವ; ಗಾಣದವೊಲ್ ಜಗನ್ಮಾಯೆ ।ನಿಚ್ಚವಿಳೆಯಾಲೆಮನೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೫ ॥sat chit AnandamgaLu Atma svabhAva rasa ।bacchiDuvudadanu jIviteya mAyikate ॥ikShuvol jIva; gANadavol jaganmAya ।nicchaviLe Alemane  - Mankutimma ॥ 125 ॥sat, chit and ananda are the inherent essential qualities of the atma. The life that we lead will put a veil on them and prevent us from seeing them. That is the reason we seek those qualities in the outside world. Life is like a sugar-cane, hiding the juice in it. We have to extract the pure essence (sat, chit and ananda) by subjecting it to the crusher machine. i.e. by leading this worldly life. This world is the sugar-cane-juice-extracting-factory.  - Mankutimma
translation: sat, chit and ananda are the inherent essential qualities of the atma. The life that we lead will put a veil on them and prevent us from seeing them. That is the reason we seek those qualities in the outside world. Life is like a sugar-cane, hiding the juice in it. We have to extract the pure essence (sat, chit and ananda) by subjecting it to the crusher machine. i.e. by leading this worldly life. This world is the sugar-cane-juice-extracting-factory.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಿಚ್ಚವಿಳೆಯಾಲೆಮನೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sat chit AnandamgaLu Atma svabhAva rasa ।bacchiDuvudadanu jIviteya mAyikate ॥ikShuvol jIva; gANadavol jaganmAya ।nicchaviLe Alemane  - Mankutimma ॥ 125 ॥
kagga: ಸಚ್ಚಿದಾನಂದಂಗಳಾತ್ಮ ಸ್ವಭಾವ ರಸ ।ಬಚ್ಚಿಡುವುದದನು ಜೀವಿತೆಯ ಮಾಯಿಕತೆ॥ಇಕ್ಷುವೊಲ್ ಜೀವ; ಗಾಣದವೊಲ್ ಜಗನ್ಮಾಯೆ ।ನಿಚ್ಚವಿಳೆಯಾಲೆಮನೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೫ ॥

content: ಒಳಿತೆಂದು ಸೊಗಸೆಂದು ಜಗವು ಮೆಚ್ಚುವುದೆಲ್ಲ ।ಕಲೆ ಕಣಂಗಳು ಮಾತ್ರ ಪೂರ್ಣಂಗಳಲ್ಲ ॥ನಲಿವು ಚೆಲುವುಗಳ ಪರಿಪೂರ್ಣ ಮೂಲಾಕೃತಿಯೆ ।ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನೆನ್ನುವರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೬ ॥oLitendu sogasendu jagavu mecchuvudella ।kale kaNangalu mAtra pUrNangaLella ॥nalivu cheluvugaLa paripUrNa mUlAkrUtiye ।parabommanu ennuvuru  - Mankutimma ॥ 126 ॥Man appreciates his world  - good, amazing. These are all just portions and particles of the whole  - never the same as the complete. People call the ;whole; essence complete with all happiness and beauty as the Creator (God).  - Mankutimma
translation: Man appreciates his world  - good, amazing. These are all just portions and particles of the whole  - never the same as the complete. People call the ;whole; essence complete with all happiness and beauty as the Creator (God).  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನೆನ್ನುವರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: oLitendu sogasendu jagavu mecchuvudella ।kale kaNangalu mAtra pUrNangaLella ॥nalivu cheluvugaLa paripUrNa mUlAkrUtiye ।parabommanu ennuvuru  - Mankutimma ॥ 126 ॥
kagga: ಒಳಿತೆಂದು ಸೊಗಸೆಂದು ಜಗವು ಮೆಚ್ಚುವುದೆಲ್ಲ ।ಕಲೆ ಕಣಂಗಳು ಮಾತ್ರ ಪೂರ್ಣಂಗಳಲ್ಲ ॥ನಲಿವು ಚೆಲುವುಗಳ ಪರಿಪೂರ್ಣ ಮೂಲಾಕೃತಿಯೆ ।ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನೆನ್ನುವರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೬ ॥

content: ಶಿವಸೌಖ್ಯಸೌಂದರ್ಯಗಳ ಪೂರ್ಣರವಿ ಬೊಮ್ಮ ।ಭುವನಜೀವನಜಲಧಿಯೂರ್ಮಿಕೋಟಿಯಲಿ ॥ಛವಿಕೋಟಿಯೆರಚಲ್ ಪ್ರತಿಚ್ಛಾಯೆ ವಿಲಸಿಪುದು ।ಸವಿ ನಮ್ಮದದರ ಕಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೭ ॥shiva sauKhya saundaryagaLa pUrNaravi bomma ।bhuvana jIvana jaladhiya UrmikOTiyali ॥Chavi kOTiyerachal praticChAye vilisipudu ।savi nammadadara kaNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 127 ॥The creator represents all that is auspicious, pleasing and beauty. He is like a Sun full with brightness representing the three qualities. He showers his rays of splendor on the crores of waves in sea of life on this earth. With such rays the world reflects with splendor. For our eyes, this reflection itself is a pleasure.  - Mankutimma
translation: The creator represents all that is auspicious, pleasing and beauty. He is like a Sun full with brightness representing the three qualities.
