He showers his rays of splendor on the crores of waves in sea of life on this earth. With such rays the world reflects with splendor. For our eyes, this reflection itself is a pleasure.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸವಿ ನಮ್ಮದದರ ಕಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: shiva sauKhya saundaryagaLa pUrNaravi bomma ।bhuvana jIvana jaladhiya UrmikOTiyali ॥Chavi kOTiyerachal praticChAye vilisipudu ।savi nammadadara kaNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 127 ॥
kagga: ಶಿವಸೌಖ್ಯಸೌಂದರ್ಯಗಳ ಪೂರ್ಣರವಿ ಬೊಮ್ಮ ।ಭುವನಜೀವನಜಲಧಿಯೂರ್ಮಿಕೋಟಿಯಲಿ ॥ಛವಿಕೋಟಿಯೆರಚಲ್ ಪ್ರತಿಚ್ಛಾಯೆ ವಿಲಸಿಪುದು ।ಸವಿ ನಮ್ಮದದರ ಕಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೭ ॥

content: ಹೊರಗಾವುದೊಳಗಾವುದೀ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಚಕ್ರದಲಿ ।ಎರಡನೊಂದಾಗಿಪುದು ಹರಿವ ನಮ್ಮುಸಿರು ॥ಇರುವುದುಳಿದಿನಿತು ಹೊರಗಾಳಿ ಯೋಗಿಗಳೊಳಂ ।ಬರಿ ಸುಷಿರಪಿಂಡ ಜಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೮ ॥horagAvudu oLagAvidu ee sRuShTi chakradali ।eraDanu ondAgipudu hariva nammusiru ॥iruvudu uLidu initu horagALi yOgigaLa oLam ।bari suShirapinDa jaga  - Mankutimma ॥ 128 ॥What is ;in; or ;out; in this cycle of life? Both are unified by our action of breathing. Isn;t it? Even when a yogi breathes, only a little of the outside remains inside. Every being in this world is like a sponge  - it can soak in the essence from outside and give it out also. Without the essence, it is dry an lifeless.  - Mankutimma
translation: What is ;in; or ;out; in this cycle of life? Both are unified by our action of breathing. Isn;t it? Even when a yogi breathes, only a little of the outside remains inside. Every being in this world is like a sponge  - it can soak in the essence from outside and give it out also. Without the essence, it is dry an lifeless.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬರಿ ಸುಷಿರಪಿಂಡ ಜಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: horagAvudu oLagAvidu ee sRuShTi chakradali ।eraDanu ondAgipudu hariva nammusiru ॥iruvudu uLidu initu horagALi yOgigaLa oLam ।bari suShirapinDa jaga  - Mankutimma ॥ 128 ॥
kagga: ಹೊರಗಾವುದೊಳಗಾವುದೀ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಚಕ್ರದಲಿ ।ಎರಡನೊಂದಾಗಿಪುದು ಹರಿವ ನಮ್ಮುಸಿರು ॥ಇರುವುದುಳಿದಿನಿತು ಹೊರಗಾಳಿ ಯೋಗಿಗಳೊಳಂ ।ಬರಿ ಸುಷಿರಪಿಂಡ ಜಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೮ ॥

content: ಧರೆಯ ನೀರ್ಗಾಗಸದ ನೀರಿಳಿದು ಬೆರವಂತೆ ।ನರನ ಪ್ರಾಕ್ತನಕೆ ನೂತನಸತ್ತ್ವ ಬೆರೆತು ॥ಪರಿವುದೀ ವಿಶ್ವಜೀವನಲಹರಿಯನವರತ ।ಚಿರಪ್ರತ್ನನೂತ್ನ ಜಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೯ ॥dhareya nIrge Agasada nIriLidu berevante ।narana prAktanake nUtanasattva beretu ॥parivudI vishva jIvana lahariyu anavarata ।chira pratna nUtna jaga- Mankutimma ॥ 129 ॥Pure water from the sky comes down to the earth and mixes with water on earth. Similarly, energy from the cosmic spirit mixes with that of the man and keeps the stream of life on this earth flowing forever. This world is permanent  - with somethings old, and some things old.  - Mankutimma
translation: Pure water from the sky comes down to the earth and mixes with water on earth. Similarly, energy from the cosmic spirit mixes with that of the man and keeps the stream of life on this earth flowing forever. This world is permanent  - with somethings old, and some things old.  - Mankutimma
title: ಚಿರಪ್ರತ್ನನೂತ್ನ ಜಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dhareya nIrge Agasada nIriLidu berevante ।narana prAktanake nUtanasattva beretu ॥parivudI vishva jIvana lahariyu anavarata ।chira pratna nUtna jaga- Mankutimma ॥ 129 ॥
kagga: ಧರೆಯ ನೀರ್ಗಾಗಸದ ನೀರಿಳಿದು ಬೆರವಂತೆ ।ನರನ ಪ್ರಾಕ್ತನಕೆ ನೂತನಸತ್ತ್ವ ಬೆರೆತು ॥ಪರಿವುದೀ ವಿಶ್ವಜೀವನಲಹರಿಯನವರತ ।ಚಿರಪ್ರತ್ನನೂತ್ನ ಜಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨೯ ॥

content: ರಾಮನಡಿಯಿಟ್ಟ ನೆಲ,ಭೀಮನುಸಿರಿದ ಗಾಳಿ ।ವ್ಯೋಮದೆ ಭಗೀರಥಂ ತಂದ ಸುರತಟಿನಿ ॥ಸೋಮನಂ ಪೆತ್ತ ಕಡಲೀ ಪುರಾತನಗಳಿರೆ ।ನಾಮೆಂತು ಹೊಸಬರೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೦ ॥rAmanaDiyiTTa nela, bhImanusirida gALi।vyOmade bhagIratham tanda surataTini ॥sOmanam petta kaDalI purAtanagaLire ।nAmentu hosabarelo- Mankutimma ॥ 130 ॥This is the same world that existed eons ago. We still have the earth on which Lord Rama walked in Treta yuga. We still have the same air that Bheema breathed in Dwapara yuga. The river Ganga that Bhagiratha brought from heaven to earth is still flowing. The ocean that gave birth to the Moon (during the divine churning) is still around. How is that we are ;new;?  - Mankutimma
translation: This is the same world that existed eons ago. We still have the earth on which Lord Rama walked in Treta yuga. We still have the same air that Bheema breathed in Dwapara yuga. The river Ganga that Bhagiratha brought from heaven to earth is still flowing. The ocean that gave birth to the Moon (during the divine churning) is still around. How is that we are ;new;?  - Mankutimma
title: ನಾಮೆಂತು ಹೊಸಬರೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: rAmanaDiyiTTa nela, bhImanusirida gALi।vyOmade bhagIratham tanda surataTini ॥sOmanam petta kaDalI purAtanagaLire ।nAmentu hosabarelo- Mankutimma ॥ 130 ॥
kagga: ರಾಮನಡಿಯಿಟ್ಟ ನೆಲ,ಭೀಮನುಸಿರಿದ ಗಾಳಿ ।ವ್ಯೋಮದೆ ಭಗೀರಥಂ ತಂದ ಸುರತಟಿನಿ ॥ಸೋಮನಂ ಪೆತ್ತ ಕಡಲೀ ಪುರಾತನಗಳಿರೆ ।ನಾಮೆಂತು ಹೊಸಬರೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೦ ॥

content: ಪುಲಿ ಸಿಂಗದುಚ್ಛ್ವಾಸ,ಹಸು ಹುಲ್ಲೆ ಹಯದುಸಿರು ।ಹುಳು ಹಾವಿಲಿಯ ಸುಯ್ಲು, ಹಕ್ಕಿ ಹದ್ದುಯ್ಲು ॥ಕಲೆತಿರ್ಪುವೀಯೆಲ್ಲ ನಾಮುಸಿರ್ವೆಲರಿನಲಿ ।ಕಲಬರಿಕೆ ಜಗದುಸಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೧ ॥puli singada ucChvAsa, hasu hulle hayada usiru ।huLu hAvu iliya suylu, hakki haddu uylu ॥kaletirpuvu Iyella nAm usirva elarinali ।kalabarike jagada usiru  - Mankutimma ॥ 131 ॥The breath from the tigers and lions, the cattle, the deer, the horses, the worms, the snake or the rat, the birds, the eagle  - are all mixed in the air that we inhale. The breath in this world is all mixed  - never pure.  - Mankutimma
translation: The breath from the tigers and lions, the cattle, the deer, the horses, the worms, the snake or the rat, the birds, the eagle  - are all mixed in the air that we inhale. The breath in this world is all mixed  - never pure.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಲಬರಿಕೆ ಜಗದುಸಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: puli singada ucChvAsa, hasu hulle hayada usiru ।huLu hAvu iliya suylu, hakki haddu uylu ॥kaletirpuvu Iyella nAm usirva elarinali ।kalabarike jagada usiru  - Mankutimma ॥ 131 ॥
kagga: ಪುಲಿ ಸಿಂಗದುಚ್ಛ್ವಾಸ,ಹಸು ಹುಲ್ಲೆ ಹಯದುಸಿರು ।ಹುಳು ಹಾವಿಲಿಯ ಸುಯ್ಲು, ಹಕ್ಕಿ ಹದ್ದುಯ್ಲು ॥ಕಲೆತಿರ್ಪುವೀಯೆಲ್ಲ ನಾಮುಸಿರ್ವೆಲರಿನಲಿ ।ಕಲಬರಿಕೆ ಜಗದುಸಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೧ ॥

content: ರಾಮನುಚ್ಛ್ವಾಸವಲೆದಿರದೆ ರಾವಣನೆಡೆಗೆ? ।ರಾಮನುಂ ದಶಕಂಠನೆಲರನುಸಿರಿರನೆ? ॥ರಾಮರಾವಣರುಸಿರ್ಗಳಿಂದು ನಮ್ಮೊಳಗಿರವೆ? ।ಭೂಮಿಯಲಿ ಪೊಸತೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೨ ॥rAmana ucChvAsavu aledirade rAvaNaneDege? ।rAmanum dashakanThanu elaranu usirirane? ॥rAmarAvaNara usirgaLu indu nammoLagirave? ।bhUmiyali posatEno?  - Mankutimma ॥ 132 ॥Would the air exhaled from Rama not wandered near Ravana? Would not Rama have inhaled air exhaled from Ravana? Would the same air breathed by them not be still around during our times? What is new in this earth?  - Mankutimma
translation: Would the air exhaled from Rama not wandered near Ravana? Would not Rama have inhaled air exhaled from Ravana? Would the same air breathed by them not be still around during our times? What is new in this earth?  - Mankutimma
title: ಭೂಮಿಯಲಿ ಪೊಸತೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: rAmana ucChvAsavu aledirade rAvaNaneDege? ।rAmanum dashakanThanu elaranu usirirane? ॥rAmarAvaNara usirgaLu indu nammoLagirave? ।bhUmiyali posatEno?  - Mankutimma ॥ 132 ॥
kagga: ರಾಮನುಚ್ಛ್ವಾಸವಲೆದಿರದೆ ರಾವಣನೆಡೆಗೆ? ।ರಾಮನುಂ ದಶಕಂಠನೆಲರನುಸಿರಿರನೆ? ॥ರಾಮರಾವಣರುಸಿರ್ಗಳಿಂದು ನಮ್ಮೊಳಗಿರವೆ? ।ಭೂಮಿಯಲಿ ಪೊಸತೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೨ ॥

content: ಬಹಿರಂತರಗಳೊಂದು ಭೂತಭವ್ಯಗಳೊಂದು ।ಇಹಪರಂಗಳುಮೊಂದು ಚೈತನ್ಯವೊಂದು ॥ಬಹುಪಾತ್ರನಾಟಕದಿ ಮಾಯೆ ಶತವೇಷಗಳ ।ವಹಿಸಲೀವಳು ಪತಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೩ ॥bahir antargaLu ondu bhUtabhavyagaLu ondu ।iha parangaLum ondu chaitanya ondu ॥bahupAtranATakadi mAye shataveShagaLa ।vahisalu IvaLu patige  - Mankutimma ॥ 133 ॥The ;out; and ;in; are unified into one. The ;past; and ;future; are one and the same. ;Here; and ;there; are the same. Energy is one. In this multi-actor drama, Maya (illusion, often referred as wife of the creator) has given hundreds of roles to her husband.  - Mankutimma
translation: The ;out; and ;in; are unified into one. The ;past; and ;future; are one and the same. ;Here; and ;there; are the same. Energy is one. In this multi-actor drama, Maya (illusion, often referred as wife of the creator) has given hundreds of roles to her husband.  - Mankutimma
title: ಶತವೇಷಗಳ ವಹಿಸಲೀವಳು ಪತಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bahir antargaLu ondu bhUtabhavyagaLu ondu ।iha parangaLum ondu chaitanya ondu ॥bahupAtranATakadi mAye shataveShagaLa ।vahisalu IvaLu patige  - Mankutimma ॥ 133 ॥
kagga: ಬಹಿರಂತರಗಳೊಂದು ಭೂತಭವ್ಯಗಳೊಂದು ।ಇಹಪರಂಗಳುಮೊಂದು ಚೈತನ್ಯವೊಂದು ॥ಬಹುಪಾತ್ರನಾಟಕದಿ ಮಾಯೆ ಶತವೇಷಗಳ ।ವಹಿಸಲೀವಳು ಪತಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೩ ॥

content: ಏಕದಿಂದಲನೇಕ ಮತ್ತನೇಕದಿನೇಕ ।ವೀ ಕ್ರಮವೆ ವಿಶ್ವದಂಗಾಂಗಸಂಬಂಧ ॥ಲೋಕದಲಿ ಜಾತಿಯಲಿ ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿಯಲಿ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಯಲಿ ।ಸಾಕಲ್ಯದರಿವಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೪ ॥EkadindalE aneka matte anekadina Ekavu ।ee kramave vishvada angAnga sambandha ॥lOkadali jAtiyali vyaktiyali samstheyali ।sAkalyada arivirali  - Mankutimma ॥ 134 ॥It all starts with one. One becomes many. Over time, the many again becomes (merges into) one. This is the order of every thing in this universe  - the worlds, the tribes, in a person, in an institution. One must make a note of this. But at all times, we must be aware of the cosmic spirit that is complete and eternal.  - Mankutimma
translation: It all starts with one. One becomes many. Over time, the many again becomes (merges into) one. This is the order of every thing in this universe  - the worlds, the tribes, in a person, in an institution. One must make a note of this. But at all times, we must be aware of the cosmic spirit that is complete and eternal.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಾಕಲ್ಯದರಿವಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: EkadindalE aneka matte anekadina Ekavu ।ee kramave vishvada angAnga sambandha ॥lOkadali jAtiyali vyaktiyali samstheyali ।sAkalyada arivirali  - Mankutimma ॥ 134 ॥
kagga: ಏಕದಿಂದಲನೇಕ ಮತ್ತನೇಕದಿನೇಕ ।ವೀ ಕ್ರಮವೆ ವಿಶ್ವದಂಗಾಂಗಸಂಬಂಧ ॥ಲೋಕದಲಿ ಜಾತಿಯಲಿ ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿಯಲಿ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಯಲಿ ।ಸಾಕಲ್ಯದರಿವಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೪ ॥

content: ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣಗೋಳದಲಿ ನೆನೆದೆಡೆಯೆ ಕೇಂದ್ರವಲ ।ಕಂಪಿಸುವ ಕೇಂದ್ರ ನೀಂ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಕಂದುಕದಿ ॥ಶಂಪಾತರಂಗವದರೊಳು ತುಂಬಿ ಪರಿಯುತಿದೆ ।ದಂಭೋಳಿ ನೀನಾಗು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೫ ॥sampUrNa gOLadali nenedeDeye kEndravala ।kampisuva kEndra nIm brahma kandukadi ॥shampA tarangavu adaroLu tumbi pariyutide ।dambhOLi nInAgu  - Mankutimma ॥ 135 ॥In this spherical universe any point you pick can be assumed to be the center. In this cosmic boiler, you (and every body else) are the ever changing center (of your own world). There is lightning like energy overflowing in the boiler. It is for us to tap into the energy and make good use. You must be like the Dhambholi lightning. (which is a lightning from Vajrayudha of Indra)  - Mankutimma
translation: In this spherical universe any point you pick can be assumed to be the center. In this cosmic boiler, you (and every body else) are the ever changing center (of your own world). There is lightning like energy overflowing in the boiler. It is for us to tap into the energy and make good use. You must be like the Dhambholi lightning. (which is a lightning from Vajrayudha of Indra)  - Mankutimma
title: ದಂಭೋಳಿ ನೀನಾಗು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sampUrNa gOLadali nenedeDeye kEndravala ।kampisuva kEndra nIm brahma kandukadi ॥shampA tarangavu adaroLu tumbi pariyutide ।dambhOLi nInAgu  - Mankutimma ॥ 135 ॥
kagga: ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣಗೋಳದಲಿ ನೆನೆದೆಡೆಯೆ ಕೇಂದ್ರವಲ ।ಕಂಪಿಸುವ ಕೇಂದ್ರ ನೀಂ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಕಂದುಕದಿ ॥ಶಂಪಾತರಂಗವದರೊಳು ತುಂಬಿ ಪರಿಯುತಿದೆ ।ದಂಭೋಳಿ ನೀನಾಗು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೫ ॥

content: ವಿಶ್ವಪರಿಧಿಯದೆಲ್ಲೊ ಸೂರ್ಯಚಂದ್ರರಿನಾಚೆ ।ವಿಶ್ವಕೇಂದ್ರವು ನೀನೆ, ನೀನೆಣಿಸಿದೆಡೆಯೆ ॥ನಿಃಶ್ವಸಿತ ಸಂಬಂಧ ನಿನಗಂ ದಿಗಂತಕಂ ।ಪುಷ್ಪವಾಗಿರು ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೬ ॥vishva paridhiyadello sUrya chandrarinAche ।vishva kEndravu nIne, nIneNisideDege ॥niHshvasita sambandha ninagam digantakam ।puShpavAgiru nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 136 ॥The outer limit to this universe is somewhere beyond the sun and the moon. We can not know that. But for you, you can be the center of the universe and you can be where ever you want. The reach of your universe is as much as you can exhale (as far as you can think, as far as your fame/influence can reach). You must be like a fragrant flower which is very small, but has its influence far-reaching becuase of its fragrance.  - Mankutimma
translation: The outer limit to this universe is somewhere beyond the sun and the moon. We can not know that. But for you, you can be the center of the universe and you can be where ever you want. The reach of your universe is as much as you can exhale (as far as you can think, as far as your fame/influence can reach). You must be like a fragrant flower which is very small, but has its influence far-reaching becuase of its fragrance.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪುಷ್ಪವಾಗಿರು ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vishva paridhiyadello sUrya chandrarinAche ।vishva kEndravu nIne, nIneNisideDege ॥niHshvasita sambandha ninagam digantakam ।puShpavAgiru nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 136 ॥
kagga: ವಿಶ್ವಪರಿಧಿಯದೆಲ್ಲೊ ಸೂರ್ಯಚಂದ್ರರಿನಾಚೆ ।ವಿಶ್ವಕೇಂದ್ರವು ನೀನೆ, ನೀನೆಣಿಸಿದೆಡೆಯೆ ॥ನಿಃಶ್ವಸಿತ ಸಂಬಂಧ ನಿನಗಂ ದಿಗಂತಕಂ ।ಪುಷ್ಪವಾಗಿರು ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೬ ॥

content: ನಾನೆನುವವನೆ ವಿಶ್ವಚಕ್ರನಾಭಿಯವಂಗೆ ।ಕಾಣಬಹ ದಿಗ್ವಲಯ ಚಕ್ರನೇಮಿಪಥ ॥ಅನಂತ್ಯವೀ ಜಗಚ್ಚಕ್ರನಾಭಿಕ್ರಮತೆ ।ತಾನೊಂದೆ ಸತ್ತ್ವವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೭ ॥nAnenuvavane vishva chakra nAbhiyu avange ।kANabaha dik valaya chakranemIpatha ॥anantyavI jagat chakrana abhikramate ।tAnode sattvavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 137 ॥A person who believes ;each man is the center of his world; will see himself at the center of the world wheel. Any direction he looks, he sees path taken by that wheel. The revolutions of this wheel is never-ending. This is the only ultimate truth.  - Mankutimma
translation: A person who believes ;each man is the center of his world; will see himself at the center of the world wheel. Any direction he looks, he sees path taken by that wheel. The revolutions of this wheel is never-ending. This is the only ultimate truth.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಾನೊಂದೆ ಸತ್ತ್ವವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nAnenuvavane vishva chakra nAbhiyu avange ।kANabaha dik valaya chakranemIpatha ॥anantyavI jagat chakrana abhikramate ।tAnode sattvavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 137 ॥
kagga: ನಾನೆನುವವನೆ ವಿಶ್ವಚಕ್ರನಾಭಿಯವಂಗೆ ।ಕಾಣಬಹ ದಿಗ್ವಲಯ ಚಕ್ರನೇಮಿಪಥ ॥ಅನಂತ್ಯವೀ ಜಗಚ್ಚಕ್ರನಾಭಿಕ್ರಮತೆ ।ತಾನೊಂದೆ ಸತ್ತ್ವವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೭ ॥

content: ಬಾನಾಚೆಯಿಂ ವಿಶ್ವಸತ್ತ್ವ ತಾನಿಳಿದಿಳಿಗೆ ।ನಾನೆನುವ ಚೇತನದಿ ರೂಪಗೊಂಡಿಹುದೊ? ॥ನಾನೆನುವ ಕೇಂದ್ರದಿನೆ ಹೊರಟ ಸತ್ತ್ವದ ಪರಿಧಿ ।ಬಾನಾಚೆ ಹಬ್ಬಿಹುದೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೮ ॥bAnAcheyim vishva sattva tAnu iLidu iLege ।nAnenuva chetanadi rUpugonDihudo? ॥nAnenva kEndradine horaTa sattvada paridhi ।bAnAche habbihudo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 138 ॥Has the cosmic spirit from beyond the sky descended into this earth and taken form of one;s conscience? Or the essence radiating from one;s center has reached beyond the skies?  - Mankutimma
translation: Has the cosmic spirit from beyond the sky descended into this earth and taken form of one;s conscience? Or the essence radiating from one;s center has reached beyond the skies?  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಾನಾಚೆ ಹಬ್ಬಿಹುದೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bAnAcheyim vishva sattva tAnu iLidu iLege ।nAnenuva chetanadi rUpugonDihudo? ॥nAnenva kEndradine horaTa sattvada paridhi ।bAnAche habbihudo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 138 ॥
kagga: ಬಾನಾಚೆಯಿಂ ವಿಶ್ವಸತ್ತ್ವ ತಾನಿಳಿದಿಳಿಗೆ ।ನಾನೆನುವ ಚೇತನದಿ ರೂಪಗೊಂಡಿಹುದೊ? ॥ನಾನೆನುವ ಕೇಂದ್ರದಿನೆ ಹೊರಟ ಸತ್ತ್ವದ ಪರಿಧಿ ।ಬಾನಾಚೆ ಹಬ್ಬಿಹುದೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೮ ॥

content: ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಕಥೆ ಕಟ್ಟುಕಥೆ; ವಿಲಯಕಥೆ ಬರಿಯ ಕಥೆ ।ಹುಟ್ಟುಸಾವುಗಳೊಂದೆ ಪುರುಳಿನೆರಡು ದಶೆ ॥ನಿತ್ಯಪರಿವರ್ತನೆಯೆ ಚೈತನ್ಯನರ್ತನೆಯೆ ।ಸತ್ಯ ಜಗದಲಿ ಕಾಣೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೯ ॥sRuShTi kathe kaTTu kathe; vilaya kathe bariya kathe ।huTTu sAvugaLu onde puruLina eradu dashe ॥nityaparivartaneye chaitanya nartaneye ।satya jagadali kANo  - Mankutimma ॥ 139 ॥The story of creation is a built-up story. The story of destruction is nothing more than a story. Birth and death are the same. They are two states of the same truth. See the ultimate truth in this world in the form of constant change and the dance of energy.  - Mankutimma
translation: The story of creation is a built-up story. The story of destruction is nothing more than a story. Birth and death are the same. They are two states of the same truth. See the ultimate truth in this world in the form of constant change and the dance of energy.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸತ್ಯ ಜಗದಲಿ ಕಾಣೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sRuShTi kathe kaTTu kathe; vilaya kathe bariya kathe ।huTTu sAvugaLu onde puruLina eradu dashe ॥nityaparivartaneye chaitanya nartaneye ।satya jagadali kANo  - Mankutimma ॥ 139 ॥
kagga: ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಕಥೆ ಕಟ್ಟುಕಥೆ; ವಿಲಯಕಥೆ ಬರಿಯ ಕಥೆ ।ಹುಟ್ಟುಸಾವುಗಳೊಂದೆ ಪುರುಳಿನೆರಡು ದಶೆ ॥ನಿತ್ಯಪರಿವರ್ತನೆಯೆ ಚೈತನ್ಯನರ್ತನೆಯೆ ।ಸತ್ಯ ಜಗದಲಿ ಕಾಣೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩೯ ॥

content: ಋತುಚಕ್ರ ತಿರುಗುವುದು, ಕಾಲನೆದೆ ಮರುಗುವುದು ।ಮೃತನ ಮಣ್ಣಿಂದ ಹೊಸ ಹುಲ್ಲು ಮೊಳೆಯುವುದು ॥ಕ್ಷಿತಿ ಗರ್ಭಧರಿಸುವಳು ಮತ್ತುದಿಸುವುದು ಜೀವ ।ಸತತ ಕೃಷಿಯೋ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೦ ॥Rutuchakra tiruguvudu, kAlana ede maruguvudu ।mRutana maNNinda hosa hullu moLeyuvudu ॥kShiti garbha dharisuvaLu matte udisuvudu jIva ।satata kRuShiyo prakRuti  - Mankutimma ॥ 140 ॥Nothing stops when a person dies. The seasons continue to change. Time may grieve for some time. From the soil in which the dead are buried, rises the sprout of grass. Earth is pregnant again with new life. Nature is in a constant state of cultivation.  - Mankutimma
translation: Nothing stops when a person dies. The seasons continue to change. Time may grieve for some time. From the soil in which the dead are buried, rises the sprout of grass. Earth is pregnant again with new life. Nature is in a constant state of cultivation.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸತತ ಕೃಷಿಯೋ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Rutuchakra tiruguvudu, kAlana ede maruguvudu ।mRutana maNNinda hosa hullu moLeyuvudu ॥kShiti garbha dharisuvaLu matte udisuvudu jIva ।satata kRuShiyo prakRuti  - Mankutimma ॥ 140 ॥
kagga: ಋತುಚಕ್ರ ತಿರುಗುವುದು, ಕಾಲನೆದೆ ಮರುಗುವುದು ।ಮೃತನ ಮಣ್ಣಿಂದ ಹೊಸ ಹುಲ್ಲು ಮೊಳೆಯುವುದು ॥ಕ್ಷಿತಿ ಗರ್ಭಧರಿಸುವಳು ಮತ್ತುದಿಸುವುದು ಜೀವ ।ಸತತ ಕೃಷಿಯೋ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೦ ॥

content: ಹಳೆ ಸೂರ್ಯ ಹಳೆ ಚಂದ್ರ ಹಳೆ ಭೂಮಿ ಹಳೆ ನೀರು ।ಹಳೆ ಹಿಮಾಚಲ ಗಂಗೆ ಹಳೆ ವಂಶಚರಿತೆ ॥ಹಳೆಯವಿವು ನೀನದರೊಳಾವುದನು ಕಳೆದೀಯೊ? ।ಹಳದು ಹೊಸತರೊಳಿರದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೧ ॥haLe sUrya haLe chandra haLe bhUmi haLe nIru ।haLe himAchala gange haLe vamsha charite ॥haLeyavu ivu nInu adaroLu Avudanu kaLedIyo? ।haLadu hosataroLu irade?  - Mankutimma ॥ 141 ॥The Sun, Moon, Earth, Water, Himalayas, Ganga and the human lineage are all very very old. Can you replace any one of them just because they are old? Aren;t the old not present in the new?  - Mankutimma
translation: The Sun, Moon, Earth, Water, Himalayas, Ganga and the human lineage are all very very old. Can you replace any one of them just because they are old? Aren;t the old not present in the new?  - Mankutimma
title: ಹಳದು ಹೊಸತರೊಳಿರದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: haLe sUrya haLe chandra haLe bhUmi haLe nIru ।haLe himAchala gange haLe vamsha charite ॥haLeyavu ivu nInu adaroLu Avudanu kaLedIyo? ।haLadu hosataroLu irade?  - Mankutimma ॥ 141 ॥
kagga: ಹಳೆ ಸೂರ್ಯ ಹಳೆ ಚಂದ್ರ ಹಳೆ ಭೂಮಿ ಹಳೆ ನೀರು ।ಹಳೆ ಹಿಮಾಚಲ ಗಂಗೆ ಹಳೆ ವಂಶಚರಿತೆ ॥ಹಳೆಯವಿವು ನೀನದರೊಳಾವುದನು ಕಳೆದೀಯೊ? ।ಹಳದು ಹೊಸತರೊಳಿರದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೧ ॥

content: ಮೂಲವಸ್ತುವದೊಂದು ಲೀಲೆಗೋಸುಗ ನೂರು ।ಕಾಲದೃಷ್ಟಿಗೆ ಬಹುಳ ಕೇವಲದೊಳೇಕ ॥ಸ್ಥೂಲವಿವಿಧದಿ ಬಾಳಿ ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮಸಾಮ್ಯವ ತಾಳಿ ।ಆಳುತಿರು ಜೀವನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೨ ॥mUlavastuvu adondu lIlegosuga nUru ।kAla dRuShTige bahuLa kEvaladoLu Eka ॥sthUla vividhadi bALi sUkShma sAmyava tALi ।ALutiru jIvanava  - Mankutimma ॥ 142 ॥The ultimate truth (essence) is one. So the sake of spicing it up, it takes up hundred forms. If you splice the existence based on time, they are all different. But if watched in totality of space and time, they are all one and the same. One must lead the life in this coarse world which is compartmentalized. But he must understand the subtlety of the one-ness in this world. Only then will he be on top of his life.  - Mankutimma
translation: The ultimate truth (essence) is one. So the sake of spicing it up, it takes up hundred forms. If you splice the existence based on time, they are all different. But if watched in totality of space and time, they are all one and the same. One must lead the life in this coarse world which is compartmentalized. But he must understand the subtlety of the one-ness in this world. Only then will he be on top of his life.  - Mankutimma
title: ಆಳುತಿರು ಜೀವನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mUlavastuvu adondu lIlegosuga nUru ।kAla dRuShTige bahuLa kEvaladoLu Eka ॥sthUla vividhadi bALi sUkShma sAmyava tALi ।ALutiru jIvanava  - Mankutimma ॥ 142 ॥
kagga: ಮೂಲವಸ್ತುವದೊಂದು ಲೀಲೆಗೋಸುಗ ನೂರು ।ಕಾಲದೃಷ್ಟಿಗೆ ಬಹುಳ ಕೇವಲದೊಳೇಕ ॥ಸ್ಥೂಲವಿವಿಧದಿ ಬಾಳಿ ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮಸಾಮ್ಯವ ತಾಳಿ ।ಆಳುತಿರು ಜೀವನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೨ ॥

content: ಧಾತ್ರಿಯನು ಮದುವೆಮಂಟಪದವೊಲು ಸಿಂಗರಿಸಿ ।ಕ್ಷಾತ್ರದಗ್ನಿಗಳ ನರಹೃದಯಗಳೊಳಿರಿಸಿ ॥ಕೃತ್ರಿಮವನೆಡೆಬಿಡದೆ ನೆಡಸಿ ನಗುವ ವಿಲಾಸಿ ।ಚಿತ್ರಕಾರಿಯೊ ಮಾಯೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೩ ॥dhAtriyanu maduve manTapadavolu singarisi ।kShAtrada agnigaLa nara hRudayagaLoLu irisi ॥kRutrimavanu eDebiDade naDasi naguva vilAsi ।chitrakAriyo mAye  - Mankutimma ॥ 143 ॥She has decorated the earth like a wedding reception and implanted restlessness in the heart of a man. She is keeping up the illusion without any break. Maya is the smiling artist amused at her own act.  - Mankutimma
translation: She has decorated the earth like a wedding reception and implanted restlessness in the heart of a man. She is keeping up the illusion without any break. Maya is the smiling artist amused at her own act.  - Mankutimma
title: ಚಿತ್ರಕಾರಿಯೊ ಮಾಯೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dhAtriyanu maduve manTapadavolu singarisi ।kShAtrada agnigaLa nara hRudayagaLoLu irisi ॥kRutrimavanu eDebiDade naDasi naguva vilAsi ।chitrakAriyo mAye  - Mankutimma ॥ 143 ॥
kagga: ಧಾತ್ರಿಯನು ಮದುವೆಮಂಟಪದವೊಲು ಸಿಂಗರಿಸಿ ।ಕ್ಷಾತ್ರದಗ್ನಿಗಳ ನರಹೃದಯಗಳೊಳಿರಿಸಿ ॥ಕೃತ್ರಿಮವನೆಡೆಬಿಡದೆ ನೆಡಸಿ ನಗುವ ವಿಲಾಸಿ ।ಚಿತ್ರಕಾರಿಯೊ ಮಾಯೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೩ ॥

content: ವಾಯುವಂ ಕಾಣ್ಬನಾರ್? ತತ್ಕ್ರಿಯೆಯ ಕಾಣನಾರ್? ।ಮಾಯೆಯಂತಪರೀಕ್ಷ್ಯಸತ್ತ್ವದೀಕ್ಷ್ಯಕೃತಿ ॥ರಾಯನಂ ಕಾಣಲಾಗದೆ ಮಂತ್ರಿಯೆಡೆಸಾರ್ವ ।ದೇಯಾರ್ಥಿಯೊಲು ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೪ ॥vAyuvam kANbanAr? tatkriyeya kANanAr? ।mAyeyayante aparIkShya sattvada IkShya kRuti ॥rAyanam kANalAgade mantriyaDe sArva ।dEyArthiyolu nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 144 ॥Who has seen air? Who has not seen the effects of air (wind)? Just like that Maya (the illusion) is the measurable manifestation of the immeasurable essence of the cosmic spirit. When a petitioner can not see the king, he laments in front of the minister.  - Mankutimma
translation: Who has seen air? Who has not seen the effects of air (wind)? Just like that Maya (the illusion) is the measurable manifestation of the immeasurable essence of the cosmic spirit. When a petitioner can not see the king, he laments in front of the minister.  - Mankutimma
title: ದೇಯಾರ್ಥಿಯೊಲು ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vAyuvam kANbanAr? tatkriyeya kANanAr? ।mAyeyayante aparIkShya sattvada IkShya kRuti ॥rAyanam kANalAgade mantriyaDe sArva ।dEyArthiyolu nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 144 ॥
kagga: ವಾಯುವಂ ಕಾಣ್ಬನಾರ್? ತತ್ಕ್ರಿಯೆಯ ಕಾಣನಾರ್? ।ಮಾಯೆಯಂತಪರೀಕ್ಷ್ಯಸತ್ತ್ವದೀಕ್ಷ್ಯಕೃತಿ ॥ರಾಯನಂ ಕಾಣಲಾಗದೆ ಮಂತ್ರಿಯೆಡೆಸಾರ್ವ ।ದೇಯಾರ್ಥಿಯೊಲು ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೪ ॥

content: ಮಾಯೆಯೇ ಸರಸಿ; ನಿರ್ಗುಣ ಸತ್ತ್ವದಿಂದೇನು? ।ಮಾಯೆ ಬಿಡೆ ಜಗವೆತ್ತ? ಜೀವಕಥೆಯೆತ್ತ? ॥ಮೇಯವಲ್ಲದ ಮಹಿಮೆ ಛಾಯೆಯಾ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮನದು ।ತಾಯವಳು ನೀಂ ಮಗುವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೫ ॥mAyeyE sarasi; nirguNa sattvadindEnu? ।mAye biDe jagavetta? jIvakatheyetta? ॥mEyavallada mahime ChAyeyA brahmanadu ।tAyi avaLu nIm maguvu  - Mankutimma ॥ 144 ॥Maya takes interest in indulging. What use would the purity of the cosmic essence be for us? If the illusion is lifted, would the world be as interesting? Would there by the mesmerizing story of life? This illusion is just a reflection of the cosmic spirit. She is the mother and you are the child. There is no existence without the illusion.  - Mankutimma
translation: Maya takes interest in indulging. What use would the purity of the cosmic essence be for us? If the illusion is lifted, would the world be as interesting? Would there by the mesmerizing story of life? This illusion is just a reflection of the cosmic spirit. She is the mother and you are the child. There is no existence without the illusion.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಾಯವಳು ನೀಂ ಮಗುವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mAyeyE sarasi; nirguNa sattvadindEnu? ।mAye biDe jagavetta? jIvakatheyetta? ॥mEyavallada mahime ChAyeyA brahmanadu ।tAyi avaLu nIm maguvu  - Mankutimma ॥ 144 ॥
kagga: ಮಾಯೆಯೇ ಸರಸಿ; ನಿರ್ಗುಣ ಸತ್ತ್ವದಿಂದೇನು? ।ಮಾಯೆ ಬಿಡೆ ಜಗವೆತ್ತ? ಜೀವಕಥೆಯೆತ್ತ? ॥ಮೇಯವಲ್ಲದ ಮಹಿಮೆ ಛಾಯೆಯಾ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮನದು ।ತಾಯವಳು ನೀಂ ಮಗುವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೫ ॥

content: ರಾಯ ಮುದಿದಶರಥನಾಡಿಸುತ ಕೈಕೇಯಿ ।ಸ್ವೀಯ ವಶದಲಿ ಕೋಸಲವನಾಳಿದಂತೆ ॥ಮಾಯೆ ಬೊಮ್ಮನ ಬಿನದವಡಿಸಿ ನಮ್ಮೀ ಜಗವ ।ಕಾಯುವಳು ತನ್ನಿಚ್ಛೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೬ ॥rAya mudi dasharathana ADisuta kaikEyi ।svIya vashadali kOsalavanu ALidante ॥mAye bommana binadavaDisi nammI jagava ।kAyuvaLu tannicChe  - Mankutimma ॥ 146 ॥Kaikeyi ruled the Kosala kingdom the way she wanted, with total independence because she amused the old king Dasharatha. Maya seems to be running our world as she pleases by amusing the creator.  - Mankutimma
translation: Kaikeyi ruled the Kosala kingdom the way she wanted, with total independence because she amused the old king Dasharatha. Maya seems to be running our world as she pleases by amusing the creator.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಾಯುವಳು ತನ್ನಿಚ್ಛೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: rAya mudi dasharathana ADisuta kaikEyi ।svIya vashadali kOsalavanu ALidante ॥mAye bommana binadavaDisi nammI jagava ।kAyuvaLu tannicChe  - Mankutimma ॥ 146 ॥
kagga: ರಾಯ ಮುದಿದಶರಥನಾಡಿಸುತ ಕೈಕೇಯಿ ।ಸ್ವೀಯ ವಶದಲಿ ಕೋಸಲವನಾಳಿದಂತೆ ॥ಮಾಯೆ ಬೊಮ್ಮನ ಬಿನದವಡಿಸಿ ನಮ್ಮೀ ಜಗವ ।ಕಾಯುವಳು ತನ್ನಿಚ್ಛೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೬ ॥

content: ಮಾಯೆಯೊಮ್ಮೊಮ್ಮೆ ತೋರುವಳು ಮಿಗಿಲಕ್ಕರೆಯ ।ಮಾಯಿಪಳು ಗಾಯಗಳನೀವಳಿಷ್ಟಗಳ ॥ಮೈಯ ನೀಂ ಮರೆಯೆ ನೂಕುವಳಾಗ ಪಾತಾಳಕೆ ।ಪ್ರೇಯ ಪೂತನಿಯವಳು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೭ ॥mAyeyu ommomme tOruvaLu migilakkareya ।mAyipaLu gAyagaLanu IvaLu iShTagala ॥maiya nIm mareye nUkuvaLu Aga pAtALake ।prEya pUtaniyu avaLu  - Mankutimma ॥ 147 ॥Maya will shower you with care at one time. She will heal all your wounds and grant your wishes. If you lose your mind in the process of enjoyment, that is when she will push you to the underworld. She is a demon (Putani) in lovable costume.  - Mankutimma
translation: Maya will shower you with care at one time. She will heal all your wounds and grant your wishes. If you lose your mind in the process of enjoyment, that is when she will push you to the underworld. She is a demon (Putani) in lovable costume.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪ್ರೇಯ ಪೂತನಿಯವಳು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mAyeyu ommomme tOruvaLu migilakkareya ।mAyipaLu gAyagaLanu IvaLu iShTagala ॥maiya nIm mareye nUkuvaLu Aga pAtALake ।prEya pUtaniyu avaLu  - Mankutimma ॥ 147 ॥
kagga: ಮಾಯೆಯೊಮ್ಮೊಮ್ಮೆ ತೋರುವಳು ಮಿಗಿಲಕ್ಕರೆಯ ।ಮಾಯಿಪಳು ಗಾಯಗಳನೀವಳಿಷ್ಟಗಳ ॥ಮೈಯ ನೀಂ ಮರೆಯೆ ನೂಕುವಳಾಗ ಪಾತಾಳಕೆ ।ಪ್ರೇಯ ಪೂತನಿಯವಳು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೭ ॥

content: ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಯಿಂ ಪೊರಗಿರುವ ನರನಾರು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ? ।ಸ್ವಕೃತಿಯೆಂದವನೆನುವುದವಳಿರದೊಡಿರದು ॥ಸುಕೃತವೆನಿಸುವುದವಳ ನೀಂ ವಶಕೆ ಕೊಳುವ ನಯ ।ವಿಕೃತಿಗೆಡೆಯಾಗದಿರೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೮ ॥prakRutiyim poragiruva naranAru sRuShTiyali? ।svakRutiyendu avanenuvudu avaLiradoDiradu ॥sukRutavenisuvudu avaLa nIm vashake koLuva naya ।vikRutigeDeyAgadiro  - Mankutimma ॥ 148 ॥Who can claim that he is outside nature? What can he create that does not have nature;s contribution in it? It is best when man surrenders himself to nature and makes best use of her. Don;t be an aberration in nature.  - Mankutimma
translation: Who can claim that he is outside nature? What can he create that does not have nature;s contribution in it? It is best when man surrenders himself to nature and makes best use of her. Don;t be an aberration in nature.  - Mankutimma
title: ವಿಕೃತಿಗೆಡೆಯಾಗದಿರೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: prakRutiyim poragiruva naranAru sRuShTiyali? ।svakRutiyendu avanenuvudu avaLiradoDiradu ॥sukRutavenisuvudu avaLa nIm vashake koLuva naya ।vikRutigeDeyAgadiro  - Mankutimma ॥ 148 ॥
kagga: ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಯಿಂ ಪೊರಗಿರುವ ನರನಾರು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ? ।ಸ್ವಕೃತಿಯೆಂದವನೆನುವುದವಳಿರದೊಡಿರದು ॥ಸುಕೃತವೆನಿಸುವುದವಳ ನೀಂ ವಶಕೆ ಕೊಳುವ ನಯ ।ವಿಕೃತಿಗೆಡೆಯಾಗದಿರೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೮ ॥

content: ಅರಸನೊಬ್ಬನಲ್ಲ; ಮೂವರು ಬಾಳನಾಳುವರು ।ನರ ಕರುಮ ದೈವಗಳು; ತೊಡಕದಕೆ ಸಾಜ ॥ಗುರಿಯಿಡದ, ಮೊದಲು ಕೊನೆಯಿರದ, ದರಬಾರಿನಲಿ ।ಸರಿಯೇನೊ ತಪ್ಪೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೯ ॥arasanobbanalla; mUvaru bALanu ALuvaru ।nara karuma daivagaLu; toDakadake sAja ॥guriyiDada, modalu koneyirada, darabArinali ।sariyEno tappEno?  - Mankutimma ॥ 149 ॥There no ;one; master to our lives. There are three. We are one of them. Results of our actions  - present and past is another. God is the third master of our lives. With these three masters there seems to be no goal, no start or end in this court. There is no definite rule to judge our actions by  - good or bad.  - Mankutimma
translation: There no ;one; master to our lives. There are three. We are one of them. Results of our actions  - present and past is another. God is the third master of our lives. With these three masters there seems to be no goal, no start or end in this court. There is no definite rule to judge our actions by  - good or bad.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸರಿಯೇನೊ ತಪ್ಪೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: arasanobbanalla; mUvaru bALanu ALuvaru ।nara karuma daivagaLu; toDakadake sAja ॥guriyiDada, modalu koneyirada, darabArinali ।sariyEno tappEno?  - Mankutimma ॥ 149 ॥
kagga: ಅರಸನೊಬ್ಬನಲ್ಲ; ಮೂವರು ಬಾಳನಾಳುವರು ।ನರ ಕರುಮ ದೈವಗಳು; ತೊಡಕದಕೆ ಸಾಜ ॥ಗುರಿಯಿಡದ, ಮೊದಲು ಕೊನೆಯಿರದ, ದರಬಾರಿನಲಿ ।ಸರಿಯೇನೊ ತಪ್ಪೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪೯ ॥

content: ದೊರೆ ಮೂವರಿರುವಲ್ಲಿ ಸರಿಯಿಹುದೆ ಸೋಜಿಗವು ।ಕೊರತೆ ಹೆಚ್ಚಿಕೆಗಳಿರಲಚ್ಚರಿಯದೇನು? ॥ಬರಲಿ ಬರುವುದು; ಸರಿವುದೆಲ್ಲ ಸರಿಯಲಿ; ನಿನಗೆ ।ಪರಿವೆಯೇನಿಲ್ಲೆಲವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೦ ॥dore mUvariruvalli sariyihude sOjigavu ।korate hecchikegaLu iralacchariyadEnu? ॥barali baruvudu; sarividella sariyali; ninage ।pariveyu enilla elavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 150 ॥With three masters for our life, it is interesting that at least some things fine in this world. Is there any surprise if there are some shortcomings or unexpected windfalls? Let what has to come come. Let all that has to move move. Why should you worry?  - Mankutimma
translation: With three masters for our life, it is interesting that at least some things fine in this world. Is there any surprise if there are some shortcomings or unexpected windfalls? Let what has to come come. Let all that has to move move. Why should you worry?  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರಿವೆಯೇನಿಲ್ಲೆಲವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dore mUvariruvalli sariyihude sOjigavu ।korate hecchikegaLu iralacchariyadEnu? ॥barali baruvudu; sarividella sariyali; ninage ।pariveyu enilla elavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 150 ॥
kagga: ದೊರೆ ಮೂವರಿರುವಲ್ಲಿ ಸರಿಯಿಹುದೆ ಸೋಜಿಗವು ।ಕೊರತೆ ಹೆಚ್ಚಿಕೆಗಳಿರಲಚ್ಚರಿಯದೇನು? ॥ಬರಲಿ ಬರುವುದು; ಸರಿವುದೆಲ್ಲ ಸರಿಯಲಿ; ನಿನಗೆ ।ಪರಿವೆಯೇನಿಲ್ಲೆಲವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೦ ॥

content: ದೈವವೆನಿಸಿರುತೆ ವಿಶ್ವಪ್ರಕೃತಿಶಕ್ತಿಯಲಿ ।ಜೀವವಾಸನೆಗಳಲಿ ಪೂರ್ವಕೃತವೆನಿಸಿ ॥ಧೀವರ್ತನೆಯಲಿ ಪೌರುಷವೆನಿಸಿ ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವ ।ತ್ರೈವಿಧದೊಳಿರುತಿಹುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೧ ॥daivavu enisirute vishva prakRuti shaktiyali ।jIva vAsanegaLali pUrvakRutavenisi ॥dhIvartaneyali pauruShavenisi parasattva ।traividhadoLu irutihudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 151 ॥The cosmic spirit is spoken about in three ways  - When it comes to creation of the world; it is called providence. When it comes to the way it makes people behave, it is called as karma (or results of prior actions). Referring to acts of mind, it is called as Man;s effort.  - Mankutimma
translation: The cosmic spirit is spoken about in three ways  - When it comes to creation of the world; it is called providence. When it comes to the way it makes people behave, it is called as karma (or results of prior actions). Referring to acts of mind, it is called as Man;s effort.  - Mankutimma
title: ತ್ರೈವಿಧದೊಳಿರುತಿಹುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: daivavu enisirute vishva prakRuti shaktiyali ।jIva vAsanegaLali pUrvakRutavenisi ॥dhIvartaneyali pauruShavenisi parasattva ।traividhadoLu irutihudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 151 ॥
kagga: ದೈವವೆನಿಸಿರುತೆ ವಿಶ್ವಪ್ರಕೃತಿಶಕ್ತಿಯಲಿ ।ಜೀವವಾಸನೆಗಳಲಿ ಪೂರ್ವಕೃತವೆನಿಸಿ ॥ಧೀವರ್ತನೆಯಲಿ ಪೌರುಷವೆನಿಸಿ ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವ ।ತ್ರೈವಿಧದೊಳಿರುತಿಹುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೧ ॥

content: ಪುಣ್ಯಪಾಪ ಋಣಾನುಬಂಧ ವಾಸನೆಗಳಿವು ।ಜನ್ಮಾಂತರದ ಕರ್ಮಶೇಷದಂಶಗಳು ॥ಎಣ್ಣಿಕೆಗೆ ಸಿಲುಕದಾಕಸ್ಮಿಕ ಯದೃಚ್ಛೆಗಳು ।ಸನ್ನಿಹಿತ ದೈವಿಕದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೨ ॥puNya pApa RuNAnubandha vAsanegaLivu ।janmAntarada karma sheShadamshagaLu ॥aNNikege silukada Akasmika yadRucChegaLu ।sannihita daivakade  - Mankutimma ॥ 152 ॥Good deeds, sins, indebtedness, various indulgences are all attributed as results of previous actions; even from prior births. These may be seen as improbable co-incidences. However, it is all well in order from the view point of the Providence.  - Mankutimma
translation: Good deeds, sins, indebtedness, various indulgences are all attributed as results of previous actions; even from prior births. These may be seen as improbable co-incidences. However, it is all well in order from the view point of the Providence.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸನ್ನಿಹಿತ ದೈವಿಕದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: puNya pApa RuNAnubandha vAsanegaLivu ।janmAntarada karma sheShadamshagaLu ॥aNNikege silukada Akasmika yadRucChegaLu ।sannihita daivakade  - Mankutimma ॥ 152 ॥
kagga: ಪುಣ್ಯಪಾಪ ಋಣಾನುಬಂಧ ವಾಸನೆಗಳಿವು ।ಜನ್ಮಾಂತರದ ಕರ್ಮಶೇಷದಂಶಗಳು ॥ಎಣ್ಣಿಕೆಗೆ ಸಿಲುಕದಾಕಸ್ಮಿಕ ಯದೃಚ್ಛೆಗಳು ।ಸನ್ನಿಹಿತ ದೈವಿಕದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೨ ॥

content: ಪ್ರಾರಾಬ್ಧಕರ್ಮಮುಂ ದೈವಿಕದ ಲೀಲೆಯುಂ ।ತೋರುವುವದೃಷ್ಟವಿಧಿಯೆಂಬ ಪೆಸರುಗಳಿಂ ॥ಆರುಮಳೆವವರಿಲ್ಲವವುಗಳಾವೇಗಗಳ ।ಪೌರುಷವು ನವಸತ್ತ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೩ ॥prArAbda karmamum daivikada lIleyum ।tOruvuvu adRuShTa vidhiyemba pesarugaLim ॥Arum aLevavarillavu avugaLa AvEgagaLa ।pauruShavu navasattva  - Mankutimma ॥ 153 ॥Results of actions done in past life and acts of Providence will manifest in our life as luck, fate and other unpredictable, non-measurable events. Of the three forms of the cosmic spirit, only the Human Effort is new and pertains to the present.  - Mankutimma
translation: Results of actions done in past life and acts of Providence will manifest in our life as luck, fate and other unpredictable, non-measurable events. Of the three forms of the cosmic spirit, only the Human Effort is new and pertains to the present.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪೌರುಷವು ನವಸತ್ತ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: prArAbda karmamum daivikada lIleyum ।tOruvuvu adRuShTa vidhiyemba pesarugaLim ॥Arum aLevavarillavu avugaLa AvEgagaLa ।pauruShavu navasattva  - Mankutimma ॥ 153 ॥
kagga: ಪ್ರಾರಾಬ್ಧಕರ್ಮಮುಂ ದೈವಿಕದ ಲೀಲೆಯುಂ ।ತೋರುವುವದೃಷ್ಟವಿಧಿಯೆಂಬ ಪೆಸರುಗಳಿಂ ॥ಆರುಮಳೆವವರಿಲ್ಲವವುಗಳಾವೇಗಗಳ ।ಪೌರುಷವು ನವಸತ್ತ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೩ ॥

content: ಪೊಸರಸಂ ಬೇರಿಗನುದಿನಮೊದವಿ ಧರೆಯಿಂದ ।ಸಸಿಗೆ ಹೊಸತಳಿರ ತಲೆಯಲಿ ಮುಡಿಸುವಂತೆ ॥ಹೊಸ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಸತ್ತ್ವಮೆತ್ತಣಿನೊ ಬರುತನುದಿನಂ ।ಪೊಸತಾಗಿಪುದು ಜಗವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೪ ॥posa rasam bErige anudinam odavi dhareyinda ।sasige hosa taLira taleyali muDisuvante ॥hosa sRuShTi sattvam ettaNino baruta anudinam ।posatAgipudu jagava  - Mankutimma ॥ 154 ॥When water is poured at the roots of the tree every day, fresh sprouts emerge from the head of the tree. Like wise freshness is infused by the cosmic spirit into this world every day making it new every day.  - Mankutimma
translation: When water is poured at the roots of the tree every day, fresh sprouts emerge from the head of the tree. Like wise freshness is infused by the cosmic spirit into this world every day making it new every day.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪೊಸತಾಗಿಪುದು ಜಗವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: posa rasam bErige anudinam odavi dhareyinda ।sasige hosa taLira taleyali muDisuvante ॥hosa sRuShTi sattvam ettaNino baruta anudinam ।posatAgipudu jagava  - Mankutimma ॥ 154 ॥
kagga: ಪೊಸರಸಂ ಬೇರಿಗನುದಿನಮೊದವಿ ಧರೆಯಿಂದ ।ಸಸಿಗೆ ಹೊಸತಳಿರ ತಲೆಯಲಿ ಮುಡಿಸುವಂತೆ ॥ಹೊಸ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಸತ್ತ್ವಮೆತ್ತಣಿನೊ ಬರುತನುದಿನಂ ।ಪೊಸತಾಗಿಪುದು ಜಗವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೪ ॥

content: ಶ್ವಸನನಾಗಸದಿನಿಳಿದದ್ರಿಗುಹೆಗಳೊಳಲೆಯು ।ತುಸಿರಾಗಿ ನಮ್ಮೊಳಾವಗಮಾಡುವಂತೆ ॥ವಿಸರಸತ್ತ್ವಮದೊಂದದೆತ್ತಣಿನೊ ಬಂದು ನ ।ಮ್ಮಸುಗಳೊಳವೊಗುತಿಹುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೫ ॥shvasanu Agasadin iLidu adri guhegaLOLu aleyuta ।usirAgi nammoLu Avaga mADuvante ॥visara sattvamu adondu ettaNino bandu ।namma asugaLoLuvogutihudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 155 ॥Air from the skies descends, wanders through the caves in the mountains and enters us in the form of breath. Just like that energy from the cosmic spirit enters us as life from somewhere.  - Mankutimma
translation: Air from the skies descends, wanders through the caves in the mountains and enters us in the form of breath. Just like that energy from the cosmic spirit enters us as life from somewhere.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಮ್ಮಸುಗಳೊಳವೊಗುತಿಹುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: shvasanu Agasadin iLidu adri guhegaLOLu aleyuta ।usirAgi nammoLu Avaga mADuvante ॥visara sattvamu adondu ettaNino bandu ।namma asugaLoLuvogutihudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 155 ॥
kagga: ಶ್ವಸನನಾಗಸದಿನಿಳಿದದ್ರಿಗುಹೆಗಳೊಳಲೆಯು ।ತುಸಿರಾಗಿ ನಮ್ಮೊಳಾವಗಮಾಡುವಂತೆ ॥ವಿಸರಸತ್ತ್ವಮದೊಂದದೆತ್ತಣಿನೊ ಬಂದು ನ ।ಮ್ಮಸುಗಳೊಳವೊಗುತಿಹುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೫ ॥

content: ತೋಯಿಸುತ ಬೇಯಿಸುತ ಹೆಚ್ಚುತ್ತ ಕೊಚ್ಚುತ್ತ ।ಕಾಯಿಸುತ ಕರಿಯುತ್ತ ಹುರಿಯುತ್ತ ಸುಡುತ ॥ಈಯವನಿಯೊಲೆಯೊಳೆಮ್ಮಯ ಬಾಳನಟ್ಟು ವಿಧಿ ।ಬಾಯ ಚಪ್ಪರಿಸುವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೬ ॥tOyisuta bEyisuta hecchutta kocchutta ।kAyisuta kariyutta huriyutta suDuta ॥ee avaniya oleyoLu emmaya bALanaTTu vidhi ।bAya chapparisuvanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 156 ॥Providence licking its lips to indicate its eagerness to eat us. He is cooking our lives on this stove called world  - soaking, baking, increasing, cutting into pieces, heating over a pan, deep frying, dry frying, roasting us.  - Mankutimma
translation: Providence licking its lips to indicate its eagerness to eat us. He is cooking our lives on this stove called world  - soaking, baking, increasing, cutting into pieces, heating over a pan, deep frying, dry frying, roasting us.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಾಯ ಚಪ್ಪರಿಸುವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tOyisuta bEyisuta hecchutta kocchutta ।kAyisuta kariyutta huriyutta suDuta ॥ee avaniya oleyoLu emmaya bALanaTTu vidhi ।bAya chapparisuvanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 156 ॥
kagga: ತೋಯಿಸುತ ಬೇಯಿಸುತ ಹೆಚ್ಚುತ್ತ ಕೊಚ್ಚುತ್ತ ।ಕಾಯಿಸುತ ಕರಿಯುತ್ತ ಹುರಿಯುತ್ತ ಸುಡುತ ॥ಈಯವನಿಯೊಲೆಯೊಳೆಮ್ಮಯ ಬಾಳನಟ್ಟು ವಿಧಿ ।ಬಾಯ ಚಪ್ಪರಿಸುವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೬ ॥

content: ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನಾ ವಿಧಿಯ ನೇಮಿಸಿಹುದೇತಕೆನೆ ।ನರಜಾತಿ ಸಾನುಭೂತಿಯ ಕಲಿಯಲೆಂದು ॥ಪರರೆಂಬರಿಲ್ಲ ಆತ್ಮಾಂಶರೆಲ್ಲರೆನಿತ್ತೆ ।ಬೆರೆ ನೀನು ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೭ ॥parabommanA vidhiya nEmisihudu Etakene ।narajAti sAnubhUtiya kaliyalendu ॥pararembarilla AtmAmsharellarenitte ।bere nInu vishvadali  - Mankutimma ॥ 157 ॥Why is the Creator appoint providence to play with our lives? To make mankind learn some compassion. To make mankind realize that there is effectively no difference between him and the other man when he is put against providence. To make man realize that there is a soul/life in every body which is as important as the one in him. Realize this and try to become one with the rest of the world. Don;t live in a shell.   - Mankutimma
translation: Why is the Creator appoint providence to play with our lives? To make mankind learn some compassion. To make mankind realize that there is effectively no difference between him and the other man when he is put against providence. To make man realize that there is a soul/life in every body which is as important as the one in him. Realize this and try to become one with the rest of the world. Don;t live in a shell.   - Mankutimma
title: ಬೆರೆ ನೀನು ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: parabommanA vidhiya nEmisihudu Etakene ।narajAti sAnubhUtiya kaliyalendu ॥pararembarilla AtmAmsharellarenitte ।bere nInu vishvadali  - Mankutimma ॥ 157 ॥
kagga: ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನಾ ವಿಧಿಯ ನೇಮಿಸಿಹುದೇತಕೆನೆ ।ನರಜಾತಿ ಸಾನುಭೂತಿಯ ಕಲಿಯಲೆಂದು ॥ಪರರೆಂಬರಿಲ್ಲ ಆತ್ಮಾಂಶರೆಲ್ಲರೆನಿತ್ತೆ ।ಬೆರೆ ನೀನು ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೭ ॥

content: ಕರವೆದಡದೃಷ್ಟಕ್ಕೆ; ನರನ ಪೂರ್ವಿಕವೊಂದು ।ಪೆರತೊಂದು ನವಸೃಷ್ಟಿಸತ್ತ್ವವಾ ಬೊಗಸೆ ॥ಧರಿಸಿಹುದು ಮನುಜಜೀವಿತವನದರೊತ್ತಡದೆ ।ಪರಿದಾಟ ನಮಗೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೮ ॥karavu earaDu adRuShTakke; narana pUrvikavondu ।peratondu navasRuShTi sattvavu A bogase ॥dharisuhudu manuja jIvitavanu adara ottaDade ।paridATa namagella  - Mankutimma ॥ 158 ॥Luck is supported by two hands. Man;s prior actions is one of them. The other is the cosmic spirit that is pumping freshness into this world. These hands make a cup and hold our precious life in it. Our life is a struggle based on how tightly they hold (squeeze)  - Mankutimma
translation: Luck is supported by two hands. Man;s prior actions is one of them. The other is the cosmic spirit that is pumping freshness into this world. These hands make a cup and hold our precious life in it. Our life is a struggle based on how tightly they hold (squeeze)  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರಿದಾಟ ನಮಗೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: karavu earaDu adRuShTakke; narana pUrvikavondu ।peratondu navasRuShTi sattvavu A bogase ॥dharisuhudu manuja jIvitavanu adara ottaDade ।paridATa namagella  - Mankutimma ॥ 158 ॥
kagga: ಕರವೆದಡದೃಷ್ಟಕ್ಕೆ; ನರನ ಪೂರ್ವಿಕವೊಂದು ।ಪೆರತೊಂದು ನವಸೃಷ್ಟಿಸತ್ತ್ವವಾ ಬೊಗಸೆ ॥ಧರಿಸಿಹುದು ಮನುಜಜೀವಿತವನದರೊತ್ತಡದೆ ।ಪರಿದಾಟ ನಮಗೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೮ ॥

content: ತಾಪಿಸುತೆ ತಣಿಯಿಸುತೆ ಕುಲುಕಿಸುತೆ ಋತುವೈದ್ಯ ।ಭೂಪಟದಿ ಜೀವರಸಗಳ ಪಚಿಸುವಂತೆ ॥ಪಾಪಿಯಂ ಪ್ರೋತ್ಸಹಿಸಿ ಸುಕೃತಿಯ ಪರೀಕ್ಷಿಸುತ ।ವೇಪಿಪನು ವಿಧಿ ನಮ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೯ ॥tApisute taNiyisute kulukisute Rutuvaidya ।bhUpaTadi jIvarasagaLa pachisuvante ॥pApiyam protsahisi sukRutiya parIkShisuta ।vEpipanu vidhi namma  - Mankutimma ॥ 159 ॥God who created the seasons is making life possible by cooking the elements of the earth  - heating, cooling, shaking it. Similarly the providence is playing a similar game with our lives. Sometimes it supports bad guys and scrutinizing the good deeds. It has us completely under its control.  - Mankutimma
translation: God who created the seasons is making life possible by cooking the elements of the earth  - heating, cooling, shaking it. Similarly the providence is playing a similar game with our lives. Sometimes it supports bad guys and scrutinizing the good deeds. It has us completely under its control.  - Mankutimma
title: ವೇಪಿಪನು ವಿಧಿ ನಮ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tApisute taNiyisute kulukisute Rutuvaidya ।bhUpaTadi jIvarasagaLa pachisuvante ॥pApiyam protsahisi sukRutiya parIkShisuta ।vEpipanu vidhi namma  - Mankutimma ॥ 159 ॥
kagga: ತಾಪಿಸುತೆ ತಣಿಯಿಸುತೆ ಕುಲುಕಿಸುತೆ ಋತುವೈದ್ಯ ।ಭೂಪಟದಿ ಜೀವರಸಗಳ ಪಚಿಸುವಂತೆ ॥ಪಾಪಿಯಂ ಪ್ರೋತ್ಸಹಿಸಿ ಸುಕೃತಿಯ ಪರೀಕ್ಷಿಸುತ ।ವೇಪಿಪನು ವಿಧಿ ನಮ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫೯ ॥

content: ಆವ ಬೇಳೆಯದಾವ ನೀರಿನಲಿ ಬೇಯುವುದೊ! ।ಆವ ಜೀವದ ಪಾಕವಾವ ತಾಪದಿನೋ! ॥ಆ ವಿವರವನು ಕಾಣದಾಕ್ಷೇಪಣೆಯದೇನು? ।ದೈವಗುಟ್ಟದು ತಿಳಿಯೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೦ ॥Ava bELeyu adAva nIrinali bEyuvudo! ।Ava jIvada pAkavu Ava tApadinO! ॥A vivaravanu kANadu AkShEpaNeyadEnu? ।daivaguTTadu tiLiye  - Mankutimma ॥ 160 ॥Which pulse will boil (bake) in which water! Whose life will blossom at the cost of whose! No one can know the relation between them in advance. But can any one complain? It is a divine secret that one can not know.  - Mankutimma
translation: Which pulse will boil (bake) in which water! Whose life will blossom at the cost of whose! No one can know the relation between them in advance. But can any one complain? It is a divine secret that one can not know.  - Mankutimma
title: ದೈವಗುಟ್ಟದು ತಿಳಿಯೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Ava bELeyu adAva nIrinali bEyuvudo! ।Ava jIvada pAkavu Ava tApadinO! ॥A vivaravanu kANadu AkShEpaNeyadEnu? ।daivaguTTadu tiLiye  - Mankutimma ॥ 160 ॥
kagga: ಆವ ಬೇಳೆಯದಾವ ನೀರಿನಲಿ ಬೇಯುವುದೊ! ।ಆವ ಜೀವದ ಪಾಕವಾವ ತಾಪದಿನೋ! ॥ಆ ವಿವರವನು ಕಾಣದಾಕ್ಷೇಪಣೆಯದೇನು? ।ದೈವಗುಟ್ಟದು ತಿಳಿಯೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೦ ॥

content: ವಿಧಿಯ ಹೊರೆಗಳನು ತಪ್ಪಿಸಿಕೊಳುವನೆಲ್ಲಿಹನು? ।ಬೆದರಿಕೆಯನದರಿಂದ ನೀಗಿಪನು ಸಖನು ॥ಎದೆಯನುಕ್ಕಾಗಿಸಾನಿಸು ಬೆನ್ನ, ತುಟಿಯ ಬಿಗಿ ।ವಿಧಿಯಗಸ, ನೀಂ ಕತ್ತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೧ ॥vidhiya horegaLanu tappisikoLuvanu ellihanu? ।bedarikeyanu adarinda nIgipanu sakhanu ॥edeyanu ukkAgisu Anisu benna, tuTiya bigi ।vidhiyu agasa, nIm katte  - Mankutimma ॥ 161 ॥Where can one find a person who can escape from the clutches of providence? He who can help you get out of fear is a true friend. Harden your heart like iron, bend your back according to situations, shut your mouth  - providence is the washer man and you are his donkey.  - Mankutimma
translation: Where can one find a person who can escape from the clutches of providence? He who can help you get out of fear is a true friend. Harden your heart like iron, bend your back according to situations, shut your mouth  - providence is the washer man and you are his donkey.  - Mankutimma
title: ವಿಧಿಯಗಸ, ನೀಂ ಕತ್ತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vidhiya horegaLanu tappisikoLuvanu ellihanu? ।bedarikeyanu adarinda nIgipanu sakhanu ॥edeyanu ukkAgisu Anisu benna, tuTiya bigi ।vidhiyu agasa, nIm katte  - Mankutimma ॥ 161 ॥
kagga: ವಿಧಿಯ ಹೊರೆಗಳನು ತಪ್ಪಿಸಿಕೊಳುವನೆಲ್ಲಿಹನು? ।ಬೆದರಿಕೆಯನದರಿಂದ ನೀಗಿಪನು ಸಖನು ॥ಎದೆಯನುಕ್ಕಾಗಿಸಾನಿಸು ಬೆನ್ನ, ತುಟಿಯ ಬಿಗಿ ।ವಿಧಿಯಗಸ, ನೀಂ ಕತ್ತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೧ ॥

content: ಟಗರೆರಡ ಬೆಳಸಿ ಕೊಬ್ಬಿಸಿ ಕೆಣಕಿ ಹುರಿಗೊಳಿಸಿ ।ಜಗಳವಾಡಿಸಿ ದೈವಜೀವಗಳ ಪೆಸರಿಂ ॥ನಗುತಲಿರುವನು ನೋಡಿ; ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನೇಂ ಬಿನದಿ! ।ಬಿಗಿಯದಿರು ನೀಂ ಬೀಗಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೨ ॥Tagaru erada beLasi kobbisi keNaki hurigoLisi ।jagaLavADisi daiva jIvagaLa pesarim ॥nagutaliruvanu nODi; parabommanEm binadi! ।bigiyadiru nIm bIgi  - Mankutimma ॥ 162 ॥God has reared two fighting goats. He has fed them well. He provokes them, eggs them to fight against each other. These goats symbolizes fate(providence) and human effort. He is watching the fight and laughing. There are no winners in this game even though at times either of the goats may feel good. You be wary of feeling proud of your own accomplishments.  - Mankutimma
translation: God has reared two fighting goats. He has fed them well. He provokes them, eggs them to fight against each other. These goats symbolizes fate(providence) and human effort. He is watching the fight and laughing. There are no winners in this game even though at times either of the goats may feel good. You be wary of feeling proud of your own accomplishments.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಿಗಿಯದಿರು ನೀಂ ಬೀಗಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Tagaru erada beLasi kobbisi keNaki hurigoLisi ।jagaLavADisi daiva jIvagaLa pesarim ॥nagutaliruvanu nODi; parabommanEm binadi! ।bigiyadiru nIm bIgi  - Mankutimma ॥ 162 ॥
kagga: ಟಗರೆರಡ ಬೆಳಸಿ ಕೊಬ್ಬಿಸಿ ಕೆಣಕಿ ಹುರಿಗೊಳಿಸಿ ।ಜಗಳವಾಡಿಸಿ ದೈವಜೀವಗಳ ಪೆಸರಿಂ ॥ನಗುತಲಿರುವನು ನೋಡಿ; ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನೇಂ ಬಿನದಿ! ।ಬಿಗಿಯದಿರು ನೀಂ ಬೀಗಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೨ ॥

content: ಮನುಷ್ಯಚರಿತೆಯಚ್ಛಿನ್ನವಾಹಿನಿ ಸಾಗ ।ಲಾನುಪೂರ್ವ್ಯದ ಕರ್ಮಋಣಶೇಷವಿನಿತು ॥ತಾನಿರಲೆಬೇಕಲ್ತೆ ಪೌರುಷಸ್ಪರ್ಧನೆಗೆ ।ಆನೆಗಂಕುಶದಂತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೩ ॥manuShya chariteyu acChinna vAhini sAgalu ।Anu pUrvyada karma Runa sheShava initu ॥tAnu iralebEkalte pauruSha spardhanege ।Anege ankushadante  - Mankutimma ॥ 163 ॥History of mankind;s prowess is a continuous story. Every new generation is making more progress than previous. He takes forward the consequences of his actions into the next life. This accounting is required to keep in check man;s confidence in his abilities going overboard. Just like a hook is required to control the mighty elephants.  - Mankutimma
translation: History of mankind;s prowess is a continuous story. Every new generation is making more progress than previous. He takes forward the consequences of his actions into the next life. This accounting is required to keep in check man;s confidence in his abilities going overboard. Just like a hook is required to control the mighty elephants.  - Mankutimma
title: ಆನೆಗಂಕುಶದಂತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: manuShya chariteyu acChinna vAhini sAgalu ।Anu pUrvyada karma Runa sheShava initu ॥tAnu iralebEkalte pauruSha spardhanege ।Anege ankushadante  - Mankutimma ॥ 163 ॥
kagga: ಮನುಷ್ಯಚರಿತೆಯಚ್ಛಿನ್ನವಾಹಿನಿ ಸಾಗ ।ಲಾನುಪೂರ್ವ್ಯದ ಕರ್ಮಋಣಶೇಷವಿನಿತು ॥ತಾನಿರಲೆಬೇಕಲ್ತೆ ಪೌರುಷಸ್ಪರ್ಧನೆಗೆ ।ಆನೆಗಂಕುಶದಂತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೩ ॥

content: ಹಳಯ ಮಲೆ ಹಳೆಯ ನೆಲವಾದೊಡೆಯುಮೊರತೆ  ಮಳೆ ।ಹೊಳೆನೀರನಾವಗಂ ಪೊಸದಾಗಿಸುವವೊಲ್ ॥ಹಳೆಯ ಕರ್ಮವ ಹೊಸದು ಕೊಚ್ಚಿ ಪೌರುಷನದಿಯ ।ಬೆಳೆಯಿಪುದು ನವತೆಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೪ ॥haLeya male haLeya nelavAdoDeyum orate maLe ।hoLe nIranAvagam posadagisuvavol ॥haLeya karmava hosadu kocchi pauruSha nadiya ।beLeyipudu navateyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 164 ॥The mountain is old and so is the earth. But rain water does erode them and adds fresh water to the pond. Just like that human effort will erode the baggage of previous births (consequences of actions then) and will lead to man;s prosperity.  - Mankutimma
translation: The mountain is old and so is the earth. But rain water does erode them and adds fresh water to the pond. Just like that human effort will erode the baggage of previous births (consequences of actions then) and will lead to man;s prosperity.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬೆಳೆಯಿಪುದು ನವತೆಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: haLeya male haLeya nelavAdoDeyum orate maLe ।hoLe nIranAvagam posadagisuvavol ॥haLeya karmava hosadu kocchi pauruSha nadiya ।beLeyipudu navateyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 164 ॥
kagga: ಹಳಯ ಮಲೆ ಹಳೆಯ ನೆಲವಾದೊಡೆಯುಮೊರತೆ  ಮಳೆ ।ಹೊಳೆನೀರನಾವಗಂ ಪೊಸದಾಗಿಸುವವೊಲ್ ॥ಹಳೆಯ ಕರ್ಮವ ಹೊಸದು ಕೊಚ್ಚಿ ಪೌರುಷನದಿಯ ।ಬೆಳೆಯಿಪುದು ನವತೆಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೪ ॥

content: ಹೊಸಹೊಸದು ತಾನಾಗುತಿರ್ದೊಡಂ ತನ್ನಯ ।ಪ್ರಸವ ಪ್ರವಾಹ ಭೂಮಿಗಳ ಹಳತನದಿಂ ॥ನಸುಸೋಂಕು ವಾಸನೆಯ ಪೊನಲೊಂದಬೇಕಲ್ತೆ? ।ಹೊಸದು ಹಳದಾಗದೇ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೫ ॥hosa hosadu tAnAgutirdoDam tannaya ।prasava pravAha bhUmigaLa haLatanadim ॥nasusOnku vAsaneya ponalu ondabEkalte? ।hosadu haLadAgadE  - Mankutimma ॥ 165 ॥As we see new things in this world being created every day we must realize that they are all being made from old things only. Just like the new water (from previous verse) will have some smells from the past (of the earth) anything new will bear some resemblance to the past. Also, will ;new; not become ;old; in time?  - Mankutimma
translation: As we see new things in this world being created every day we must realize that they are all being made from old things only. Just like the new water (from previous verse) will have some smells from the past (of the earth) anything new will bear some resemblance to the past. Also, will ;new; not become ;old; in time?  - Mankutimma
title: ಹೊಸದು ಹಳದಾಗದೇ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hosa hosadu tAnAgutirdoDam tannaya ।prasava pravAha bhUmigaLa haLatanadim ॥nasusOnku vAsaneya ponalu ondabEkalte? ।hosadu haLadAgadE  - Mankutimma ॥ 165 ॥
kagga: ಹೊಸಹೊಸದು ತಾನಾಗುತಿರ್ದೊಡಂ ತನ್ನಯ ।ಪ್ರಸವ ಪ್ರವಾಹ ಭೂಮಿಗಳ ಹಳತನದಿಂ ॥ನಸುಸೋಂಕು ವಾಸನೆಯ ಪೊನಲೊಂದಬೇಕಲ್ತೆ? ।ಹೊಸದು ಹಳದಾಗದೇ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೫ ॥

content: ಹುಳು ಹುಟ್ಟಿ ಸಾಯುತಿರೆ, ನೆಲ ಸವೆದು ಕರಗುತಿರೆ ।ಕಡಲೊಳೆತ್ತಲೊ ಹೊಸದ್ವೀಪವೇಳುವುದು ॥ಕಳೆಯುತೊಂದಿರಲಿಲ್ಲಿ, ಬೆಳೆವುದಿನ್ನೊಂದೆಲ್ಲೊ ।ಅಳಿವಿಲ್ಲ ವಿಶ್ವಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೬ ॥huLu huTTi sAyutire, nela savedu karagutire ।kaDaloLu ellalo hosa dvIpavu ELuvudu ॥kaLeyuta ondiralu illi, beLevudu innondu ello ।aLivilla vishvakke  - Mankutimma ॥ 166 ॥As insects and worms are being born and dying every day, as earth gets eroded and reduced everyday  - some where in the ocean a new island is getting formed. As one diminishes, something else increases. There is no end to this process or to this world.  - Mankutimma
translation: As insects and worms are being born and dying every day, as earth gets eroded and reduced everyday  - some where in the ocean a new island is getting formed. As one diminishes, something else increases. There is no end to this process or to this world.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅಳಿವಿಲ್ಲ ವಿಶ್ವಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: huLu huTTi sAyutire, nela savedu karagutire ।kaDaloLu ellalo hosa dvIpavu ELuvudu ॥kaLeyuta ondiralu illi, beLevudu innondu ello ।aLivilla vishvakke  - Mankutimma ॥ 166 ॥
kagga: ಹುಳು ಹುಟ್ಟಿ ಸಾಯುತಿರೆ, ನೆಲ ಸವೆದು ಕರಗುತಿರೆ ।ಕಡಲೊಳೆತ್ತಲೊ ಹೊಸದ್ವೀಪವೇಳುವುದು ॥ಕಳೆಯುತೊಂದಿರಲಿಲ್ಲಿ, ಬೆಳೆವುದಿನ್ನೊಂದೆಲ್ಲೊ ।ಅಳಿವಿಲ್ಲ ವಿಶ್ವಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೬ ॥

content: ಕ್ಷಿತಿಚಕ್ರ ರವಿಚಕ್ರ ಋತುಚಕ್ರಗಳಿಗಿಹುದು ।ಮಿತವೃತ್ತಿ; ನರನಿಗಂತೆಯೆ ಕರ್ಮನಿಯತಿ ॥ಕ್ಷಿತಿಕಂಪ ರಾಹುಕೇತುಭ್ರಮೆ ನರಪ್ರಗತಿ ।ಅತಿಚರಿತೆ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೭ ॥kShiti chakra ravi chakra Rutu chakragaLige ihudu ।mita vRutti; naranige anteye karma niyati ॥kShiti kaMpa rAhu kEtu bhrame nara pragati ।ati charite pragatiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 167 ॥The movement of earth and the Sun along its orbit, the cycle of seasons are all well defined and bound by the rules. Just like that, man;s fate is decided by the actions he takes. (Typically, we believe good returns follow good deeds). However, there are also some incidents in nature that are outside of the system that can not be predicted  - like earth quakes and comets. So is man;s progress  - unpredicatable.  - Mankutimma
translation: The movement of earth and the Sun along its orbit, the cycle of seasons are all well defined and bound by the rules. Just like that, man;s fate is decided by the actions he takes. (Typically, we believe good returns follow good deeds). However, there are also some incidents in nature that are outside of the system that can not be predicted  - like earth quakes and comets. So is man;s progress  - unpredicatable.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅತಿಚರಿತೆ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kShiti chakra ravi chakra Rutu chakragaLige ihudu ।mita vRutti; naranige anteye karma niyati ॥kShiti kaMpa rAhu kEtu bhrame nara pragati ।ati charite pragatiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 167 ॥
kagga: ಕ್ಷಿತಿಚಕ್ರ ರವಿಚಕ್ರ ಋತುಚಕ್ರಗಳಿಗಿಹುದು ।ಮಿತವೃತ್ತಿ; ನರನಿಗಂತೆಯೆ ಕರ್ಮನಿಯತಿ ॥ಕ್ಷಿತಿಕಂಪ ರಾಹುಕೇತುಭ್ರಮೆ ನರಪ್ರಗತಿ ।ಅತಿಚರಿತೆ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೭ ॥

content: ಅನುಬಂಧ ಜೀವಜೀವಕೆ ಪುರಾಕೃತದಿಂದ ।ಮನದ ರಾಗದ್ವೇಷವಾಸನೆಗಳದರಿಂ ॥ತನುಕಾಂತಿ ಮೋಹ ವಿಕೃತಿಗಳುಮಾ ತೊಡಕಿನವು ।ಕೊನೆಯಿರದ ಬಲೆಯೊ ಅದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೮ ॥anubandha jIva jIvake purAkRutadinda ।manada rAga dvESha vAsanegaLu adarim ॥tanukAnti mOha vikRutigaLum toDakinavu ।kone irada baleyo adu  - Mankutimma ॥ 168 ॥Our relationships with one another is a result of our prior actions which brings us together (or tears apart) now. These relationships gives rise to feelings in our minds  - liking, hatred, indulgence. Beauty, love (attachment) and other distortions will hamper us from seeing the truth. Finally it will result in us making more relations  - good or bad. This is an endless net.  - Mankutimma
translation: Our relationships with one another is a result of our prior actions which brings us together (or tears apart) now. These relationships gives rise to feelings in our minds  - liking, hatred, indulgence. Beauty, love (attachment) and other distortions will hamper us from seeing the truth. Finally it will result in us making more relations  - good or bad. This is an endless net.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕೊನೆಯಿರದ ಬಲೆಯೊ ಅದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: anubandha jIva jIvake purAkRutadinda ।manada rAga dvESha vAsanegaLu adarim ॥tanukAnti mOha vikRutigaLum toDakinavu ।kone irada baleyo adu  - Mankutimma ॥ 168 ॥
kagga: ಅನುಬಂಧ ಜೀವಜೀವಕೆ ಪುರಾಕೃತದಿಂದ ।ಮನದ ರಾಗದ್ವೇಷವಾಸನೆಗಳದರಿಂ ॥ತನುಕಾಂತಿ ಮೋಹ ವಿಕೃತಿಗಳುಮಾ ತೊಡಕಿನವು ।ಕೊನೆಯಿರದ ಬಲೆಯೊ ಅದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೮ ॥

content: ಋಣದ ಮೂಟೆಯ ಹೊರಿಸಿ, ಪೂರ್ವಾರ್ಜಿತದ ಹುರಿಯ ।ಕುಣಿಕೆಯಲಿ ನಿನ್ನ ಕೊರಳನು ಬಿಗಿದು ವಿಧಿಯು ॥ತೃಣದ ಕಡ್ಡಿಯ ಮುಂದೆ ಹಿಡಿದಾಶೆ ತೋರುತಿರೆ ।ಕುಣಿವ ಗರ್ದಭ ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೯ ॥RuNada mUTeya horisi, pUrvAjitada huriya ।kuNikeyali ninna koraLanu bigidu vidhiyu ॥tRuNada kaDDiya munde hiDidAshe tOrutire ।kuNiva gardabha nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 169 ॥You are the donkey that providence controls. It puts the weight of consequences of previous actions on you. It crafts a noose out of a rope made of your old actions. It puts the noose around your neck and tightens it. It dangles a handful of grass in front of you to keep you interested and dance to its tunes.  - Mankutimma
translation: You are the donkey that providence controls. It puts the weight of consequences of previous actions on you. It crafts a noose out of a rope made of your old actions. It puts the noose around your neck and tightens it. It dangles a handful of grass in front of you to keep you interested and dance to its tunes.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕುಣಿವ ಗರ್ದಭ ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: RuNada mUTeya horisi, pUrvAjitada huriya ।kuNikeyali ninna koraLanu bigidu vidhiyu ॥tRuNada kaDDiya munde hiDidAshe tOrutire ।kuNiva gardabha nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 169 ॥
kagga: ಋಣದ ಮೂಟೆಯ ಹೊರಿಸಿ, ಪೂರ್ವಾರ್ಜಿತದ ಹುರಿಯ ।ಕುಣಿಕೆಯಲಿ ನಿನ್ನ ಕೊರಳನು ಬಿಗಿದು ವಿಧಿಯು ॥ತೃಣದ ಕಡ್ಡಿಯ ಮುಂದೆ ಹಿಡಿದಾಶೆ ತೋರುತಿರೆ ।ಕುಣಿವ ಗರ್ದಭ ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬೯ ॥

content: ಉಣುವುದುಡುವುದು ಪಡುವುದಾಡುವುದು ಮಾಡುವುದು ।ಋಣಗಳೆಲ್ಲವು ಪೂರ್ವಸಂಚಿತಾಂಶಗಳು ॥ಹಣೆಯೊಳದು ಲಿಖಿತಮಿರೆಯುಂ ವಾಚಿಸುವನಿಲ್ಲ ।ಗೊಣಗಾಟವಳಿಸುವುದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೦ ॥uNuvudu uDuvudu paDuvudu ADuvudu mADuvudu ।RuNagaLellavu pUrvasanchita amshagaLu ॥haNeyoLadu likhitam ireyum vAchisuvanu illa ।goNagATavu aLisuvude?  - Mankutimma ॥ 170 ॥What ever we eat, dress, endure, play, create are all consequences (or unsettled loans) of our previous actions. Everything is written clearly on the forehead. But there is no one who can read it. Will any amount of lamenting erase it?  - Mankutimma
translation: What ever we eat, dress, endure, play, create are all consequences (or unsettled loans) of our previous actions. Everything is written clearly on the forehead. But there is no one who can read it. Will any amount of lamenting erase it?  - Mankutimma
title: ಗೊಣಗಾಟವಳಿಸುವುದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: uNuvudu uDuvudu paDuvudu ADuvudu mADuvudu ।RuNagaLellavu pUrvasanchita amshagaLu ॥haNeyoLadu likhitam ireyum vAchisuvanu illa ।goNagATavu aLisuvude?  - Mankutimma ॥ 170 ॥
kagga: ಉಣುವುದುಡುವುದು ಪಡುವುದಾಡುವುದು ಮಾಡುವುದು ।ಋಣಗಳೆಲ್ಲವು ಪೂರ್ವಸಂಚಿತಾಂಶಗಳು ॥ಹಣೆಯೊಳದು ಲಿಖಿತಮಿರೆಯುಂ ವಾಚಿಸುವನಿಲ್ಲ ।ಗೊಣಗಾಟವಳಿಸುವುದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೦ ॥

content: ಇಂದು ಮದುವೆಯ ಹಬ್ಬ; ನಾಳೆ ವೈಕುಂಠ ತಿಥಿ ।ಇಂದು ಮೃಷ್ಟಾನ್ನಸುಖ, ನಾಳೆ ಭಿಕ್ಷಾನ್ನ ॥ಇಂದು ಬರಿಯುಪವಾಸ, ನಾಳೆ ಪಾರಣೆ  - ಯಿಂತು ।ಸಂದಿರುವುದನ್ನ ಋಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೧ ॥indu maduveya habba; nALe vaikunTha tithi ।indu mRuShTAnna sukha, nALe bhikShAnna ॥indu bariya upavAsa, nALe pAraNe  - yintu ।sandiruvudu anna RuNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 171 ॥Today we rejoice since it is a wedding day. Tomorrow, it could be a funeral. Today we get a full course special meal. Tomorrow we may have to ask for alms. Today we have to fast. Tomorrow we may get special food. We will settle the debt of food by all these means.  - Mankutimma
translation: Today we rejoice since it is a wedding day. Tomorrow, it could be a funeral. Today we get a full course special meal. Tomorrow we may have to ask for alms. Today we have to fast. Tomorrow we may get special food. We will settle the debt of food by all these means.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಂದಿರುವುದನ್ನ ಋಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: indu maduveya habba; nALe vaikunTha tithi ।indu mRuShTAnna sukha, nALe bhikShAnna ॥indu bariya upavAsa, nALe pAraNe  - yintu ।sandiruvudu anna RuNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 171 ॥
kagga: ಇಂದು ಮದುವೆಯ ಹಬ್ಬ; ನಾಳೆ ವೈಕುಂಠ ತಿಥಿ ।ಇಂದು ಮೃಷ್ಟಾನ್ನಸುಖ, ನಾಳೆ ಭಿಕ್ಷಾನ್ನ ॥ಇಂದು ಬರಿಯುಪವಾಸ, ನಾಳೆ ಪಾರಣೆ  - ಯಿಂತು ।ಸಂದಿರುವುದನ್ನ ಋಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೧ ॥

content: ಅರಿ ಮಿತ್ರ ಸತಿ ಪುತ್ರ ಬಳಗವದೆಲ್ಲ ।ಕರುಮದವತಾರಗಳೊ, ಋಣಲತೆಯ ಚಿಗುರೋ ॥ಕುರಿಯನಾಗಿಸಿ ನಿನ್ನ ಕಾಪಿಡುವ ಸಂಸಾರ ।ವುರಿಮಾರಿಯಾದೀತೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೨ ॥ari mitra sati putra baLagavadella ।karumada avatAragaLo, RuNalateya chigurO ॥kuriyanAgisi ninna kApiDuva samsAravu ।urimAriyAdIto  - Mankutimma ॥ 172 ॥Enemies, friends, wife, son and relatives are different forms of karma  - consequences of old deeds. They are fresh sprouts of the creeper that represents the ever living debt of consequences. A family that rears the sheep with lot of love can turn tyrant and offer as sacrifice to the Goddess.  - Mankutimma
translation: Enemies, friends, wife, son and relatives are different forms of karma  - consequences of old deeds. They are fresh sprouts of the creeper that represents the ever living debt of consequences. A family that rears the sheep with lot of love can turn tyrant and offer as sacrifice to the Goddess.  - Mankutimma
title: ಉರಿಮಾರಿಯಾದೀತೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ari mitra sati putra baLagavadella ।karumada avatAragaLo, RuNalateya chigurO ॥kuriyanAgisi ninna kApiDuva samsAravu ।urimAriyAdIto  - Mankutimma ॥ 172 ॥
kagga: ಅರಿ ಮಿತ್ರ ಸತಿ ಪುತ್ರ ಬಳಗವದೆಲ್ಲ ।ಕರುಮದವತಾರಗಳೊ, ಋಣಲತೆಯ ಚಿಗುರೋ ॥ಕುರಿಯನಾಗಿಸಿ ನಿನ್ನ ಕಾಪಿಡುವ ಸಂಸಾರ ।ವುರಿಮಾರಿಯಾದೀತೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೨ ॥

content: ಬಂಧುಬಳಗವುಮಂತಕನ ಚಮುವೊ, ಛದ್ಮಚಮು ।ದಂದುಗದ ಬಾಗಿನಗಳವರ ನಲುಮೆಗಳು ॥ಕುಂದಿಪ್ಪುವಾತ್ಮನನವರ್ಗಳುಪಕಾರಗಳು ।ಮಂದಿಗಾಗದಿರು ಬಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೩ ॥bandhu baLagavum antakana chamuvu, Chadma chamu ।dandugada bAginagaLavara nalumegaLu ॥kundippuvu Atmananu avargaLa upakAragaLu ।mandigAgadiru bali  - Mankutimma ॥ 173 ॥Friends and acquaintances are all soldiers of the destroyer (Death). They are not mere soldiers  - they are soldiers in disguise. The love they shower on us is nothing but gifts of trouble in disguise. They help they do will put burden on us. You should realize this and avoid being obligated to people.  - Mankutimma
translation: Friends and acquaintances are all soldiers of the destroyer (Death). They are not mere soldiers  - they are soldiers in disguise. The love they shower on us is nothing but gifts of trouble in disguise. They help they do will put burden on us. You should realize this and avoid being obligated to people.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಂದಿಗಾಗದಿರು ಬಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bandhu baLagavum antakana chamuvu, Chadma chamu ।dandugada bAginagaLavara nalumegaLu ॥kundippuvu Atmananu avargaLa upakAragaLu ।mandigAgadiru bali  - Mankutimma ॥ 173 ॥
kagga: ಬಂಧುಬಳಗವುಮಂತಕನ ಚಮುವೊ, ಛದ್ಮಚಮು ।ದಂದುಗದ ಬಾಗಿನಗಳವರ ನಲುಮೆಗಳು ॥ಕುಂದಿಪ್ಪುವಾತ್ಮನನವರ್ಗಳುಪಕಾರಗಳು ।ಮಂದಿಗಾಗದಿರು ಬಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೩ ॥

content: ತಂದೆಮಕ್ಕಳಿಗೆ ಹದಗೆಟ್ಟುದನು ಕಾಣೆಯಾ? ।ಹೊಂದಿರುವರವರ್ ಅಹಂತೆಯು ಮೊಳೆಯುವನಕ ॥ತಂದೆಯಾರ್ ಮಕ್ಕಳಾರ್ ನಾನೆಂಬುದೆದ್ದುನಿಲೆ? ।ಬಂಧ ಮುರಿವುದು ಬಳಿಕ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೪ ॥tande makkaLige hadageTTudanu kANeyA? ।hondiruvaru avar ahanteyu moLeyuvanaka ॥tandeyAr makkaLAr nAnembudu eddunile? ।bandha murivudu baLika  - Mankutimma ॥ 174 ॥Have you not seen fathers and sons going against each other? They are in total harmony until they realize their egos. Who is the father or the son  - when the word ;I; stands out. All ties break down after that.   - Mankutimma
translation: Have you not seen fathers and sons going against each other? They are in total harmony until they realize their egos. Who is the father or the son  - when the word ;I; stands out. All ties break down after that.   - Mankutimma
title: ಬಂಧ ಮುರಿವುದು ಬಳಿಕ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tande makkaLige hadageTTudanu kANeyA? ।hondiruvaru avar ahanteyu moLeyuvanaka ॥tandeyAr makkaLAr nAnembudu eddunile? ।bandha murivudu baLika  - Mankutimma ॥ 174 ॥
kagga: ತಂದೆಮಕ್ಕಳಿಗೆ ಹದಗೆಟ್ಟುದನು ಕಾಣೆಯಾ? ।ಹೊಂದಿರುವರವರ್ ಅಹಂತೆಯು ಮೊಳೆಯುವನಕ ॥ತಂದೆಯಾರ್ ಮಕ್ಕಳಾರ್ ನಾನೆಂಬುದೆದ್ದುನಿಲೆ? ।ಬಂಧ ಮುರಿವುದು ಬಳಿಕ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೪ ॥

content: ಕಾಂಕ್ಷೆಗಳ ಬೋಧಿಸುವ ಬಂಧುಸಖರುಪಕಾರ ।ಯಕ್ಷಿಯರು ಮ್ಯಾಕ್ ಬೆತನಿಗೆಸಗಿದುಪದೇಶ ॥ಉತ್ಸಾಹವಿದ್ದೇನು? ವಾತ್ಸಲ್ಯವಿದ್ದೇನು? ।ಅಕ್ಷಿ ನಿರ್ಮಲವೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೫ ॥kAnkShegaLa bOdhisuva bandhusakhara upakAra ।yakShiyaru mAcbethanige esagida upadEsha ॥utsAhaviddEnu? vAtsalyaviddEnu? ।akShi nirmalavEno?  - Mankutimma ॥ 175 ॥We think friends and relatives help us out by guiding us and showing us aspirations. But they are nothing different than the fairies who whispered in Mac Beth;s ears. What is the use of all enthusiasm and love? One must see if their vision is clear (and not blinded by their prejudices).  - Mankutimma
translation: We think friends and relatives help us out by guiding us and showing us aspirations. But they are nothing different than the fairies who whispered in Mac Beth;s ears. What is the use of all enthusiasm and love? One must see if their vision is clear (and not blinded by their prejudices).  - Mankutimma
title: ಅಕ್ಷಿ ನಿರ್ಮಲವೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kAnkShegaLa bOdhisuva bandhusakhara upakAra ।yakShiyaru mAcbethanige esagida upadEsha ॥utsAhaviddEnu? vAtsalyaviddEnu? ।akShi nirmalavEno?  - Mankutimma ॥ 175 ॥
kagga: ಕಾಂಕ್ಷೆಗಳ ಬೋಧಿಸುವ ಬಂಧುಸಖರುಪಕಾರ ।ಯಕ್ಷಿಯರು ಮ್ಯಾಕ್ ಬೆತನಿಗೆಸಗಿದುಪದೇಶ ॥ಉತ್ಸಾಹವಿದ್ದೇನು? ವಾತ್ಸಲ್ಯವಿದ್ದೇನು? ।ಅಕ್ಷಿ ನಿರ್ಮಲವೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೫ ॥

content: ಇಂಗಿತಜ್ಞಾನವಿಲ್ಲದ ಬಂಧುಪರಿವಾರ ।ಹಂಗಿಸುವ ಛಲವುಳ್ಳ ಸತಿಪುತ್ರಸಖರು ॥ಬಂಗಾರದಸಿ ಚುಚ್ಚೆ ಸಿಂಗರದ ಬೊಟ್ಟೆನುವ ।ಮಂಗಬುದ್ಧಿಯ ಜನರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೬ ॥ingita jnAnavillada bandhu parivAra ।hangisuva ChalavuLLa sati putra sakharu ॥bangArada asi chucche singarada boTTenuva ।manga buddhiya janaru  - Mankutimma ॥ 176 ॥People may never understand what gives meaning to your life. Your wife, children and relatives are determined to taunt you for your ways. They are so monkey minded that if you are pricked (on the forehead) by a golden knife, instead of grieving, they admireit as a good decoration.  - Mankutimma
translation: People may never understand what gives meaning to your life. Your wife, children and relatives are determined to taunt you for your ways. They are so monkey minded that if you are pricked (on the forehead) by a golden knife, instead of grieving, they admireit as a good decoration.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಂಗಬುದ್ಧಿಯ ಜನರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ingita jnAnavillada bandhu parivAra ।hangisuva ChalavuLLa sati putra sakharu ॥bangArada asi chucche singarada boTTenuva ।manga buddhiya janaru  - Mankutimma ॥ 176 ॥
kagga: ಇಂಗಿತಜ್ಞಾನವಿಲ್ಲದ ಬಂಧುಪರಿವಾರ ।ಹಂಗಿಸುವ ಛಲವುಳ್ಳ ಸತಿಪುತ್ರಸಖರು ॥ಬಂಗಾರದಸಿ ಚುಚ್ಚೆ ಸಿಂಗರದ ಬೊಟ್ಟೆನುವ ।ಮಂಗಬುದ್ಧಿಯ ಜನರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೬ ॥

content: ಬಂಧುವುಂ ಮಿತ್ರನುಂ ಭೃತ್ಯನುಂ ಶತ್ರುವೊಲೆ ।ದಂಡಧರನೋಲಗಕೆ ನಿನ್ನನೆಳೆವವರೋ ॥ಅಂದದೊಡವೆಯ ಮೊನೆಗಳಿಂದೆದೆಯನೊತ್ತುವಾ ।ಮಂದಹಸಿತದ ಕೊಲೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೭ ॥bandhuvum mitranum bhRutyanum shatruvole ।danDadharana Olagake ninnanu eLevavarO ॥andada oDaveya monegaLinda edeyanu ottuva ।mandahasitada koleyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 177 ॥The relatives, the friends and the servants are all your enemies. They are only leading you to the court of death with lot of baggage. They seem to be smiling when they kill you, just like a sharp end of an ornament pressing against your chest.  - Mankutimma
translation: The relatives, the friends and the servants are all your enemies. They are only leading you to the court of death with lot of baggage. They seem to be smiling when they kill you, just like a sharp end of an ornament pressing against your chest.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಂದಹಸಿತದ ಕೊಲೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bandhuvum mitranum bhRutyanum shatruvole ।danDadharana Olagake ninnanu eLevavarO ॥andada oDaveya monegaLinda edeyanu ottuva ।mandahasitada koleyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 177 ॥
kagga: ಬಂಧುವುಂ ಮಿತ್ರನುಂ ಭೃತ್ಯನುಂ ಶತ್ರುವೊಲೆ ।ದಂಡಧರನೋಲಗಕೆ ನಿನ್ನನೆಳೆವವರೋ ॥ಅಂದದೊಡವೆಯ ಮೊನೆಗಳಿಂದೆದೆಯನೊತ್ತುವಾ ।ಮಂದಹಸಿತದ ಕೊಲೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೭ ॥

content: ದ್ವೇಷ ರೋಷಗಳವೊಲೆ ನೇಹಮುಂ ಮೋಹಮುಂ ।ಪಾಶವಾಗಲ್ಬಹುದು ನಿನಗೆ ಮೈಮರಸಿ ॥ವಾಸನೆಗಳುರುಬಿ ಚಿತ್ತಜ್ವರಂಗಳ ಬಿತ್ತಿ ।ಮೋಸದಲಿ ಕೊಲ್ಲುವುವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೮ ॥dvESha rOShagaLavole nEhamum mOhamum ।pAshavAgal bahudu ninage maimarasi ॥vAsanegaLurubi chitta jvarangaLa bitti ।mOsadali kolluvuvo  - Mankutimma ॥ 178 ॥Just like hatred and rage can hurt you; so can friendship and attachment (excessive love). They can make you forget yourself and become a noose around your neck. It will make you get into bad habits, gives you mental agony and kills you by deceit.  - Mankutimma
translation: Just like hatred and rage can hurt you; so can friendship and attachment (excessive love). They can make you forget yourself and become a noose around your neck. It will make you get into bad habits, gives you mental agony and kills you by deceit.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೋಸದಲಿ ಕೊಲ್ಲುವುವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dvESha rOShagaLavole nEhamum mOhamum ।pAshavAgal bahudu ninage maimarasi ॥vAsanegaLurubi chitta jvarangaLa bitti ।mOsadali kolluvuvo  - Mankutimma ॥ 178 ॥
kagga: ದ್ವೇಷ ರೋಷಗಳವೊಲೆ ನೇಹಮುಂ ಮೋಹಮುಂ ।ಪಾಶವಾಗಲ್ಬಹುದು ನಿನಗೆ ಮೈಮರಸಿ ॥ವಾಸನೆಗಳುರುಬಿ ಚಿತ್ತಜ್ವರಂಗಳ ಬಿತ್ತಿ ।ಮೋಸದಲಿ ಕೊಲ್ಲುವುವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೮ ॥

content: ಕರುಮ ಬಂದಿದಿರಹುದು ಮೋಹನದ ರೂಪಿನಲಿ ।ಕಿರುನಗುವು ಕುಡಿನೋಟ ಕೊಂಕುನುಡಿಗಳಲಿ ॥ಕರೆದು ತಳ್ಳುವ, ತಳ್ಕರಿಸುತೊಳಗೆ ಕಿಚ್ಚಿಡುವ ।ತರಳತೆಯದೇಂ ತಂತ್ರ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೯ ॥karuma bandu idirabahudu mOhanada rUpinali ।kirunaguvu kuDinOTa konku nuDigaLali ॥karedu taLLuva, talkarisuta oLage kicchiDuva ।taraLareyadEm tantra?  - Mankutimma ॥ 179 ॥Our previous actions may come back to us as fate in many ways; as love, as a delighting smile, as naughty glances from the corner of the eye, as harsh insulting words. It has the habit of drawing you close and then throwing you out. It can hug you tight and burn you from inside. Who know what plan is it hatching to get you?  - Mankutimma
translation: Our previous actions may come back to us as fate in many ways; as love, as a delighting smile, as naughty glances from the corner of the eye, as harsh insulting words. It has the habit of drawing you close and then throwing you out. It can hug you tight and burn you from inside. Who know what plan is it hatching to get you?  - Mankutimma
title: ತರಳತೆಯದೇಂ ತಂತ್ರ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: karuma bandu idirabahudu mOhanada rUpinali ।kirunaguvu kuDinOTa konku nuDigaLali ॥karedu taLLuva, talkarisuta oLage kicchiDuva ।taraLareyadEm tantra?  - Mankutimma ॥ 179 ॥
kagga: ಕರುಮ ಬಂದಿದಿರಹುದು ಮೋಹನದ ರೂಪಿನಲಿ ।ಕಿರುನಗುವು ಕುಡಿನೋಟ ಕೊಂಕುನುಡಿಗಳಲಿ ॥ಕರೆದು ತಳ್ಳುವ, ತಳ್ಕರಿಸುತೊಳಗೆ ಕಿಚ್ಚಿಡುವ ।ತರಳತೆಯದೇಂ ತಂತ್ರ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭೯ ॥

content: ಮೃತ್ಯು ತಾಂ ಬಂದು ಮೋಹಿನಿಯರೂಪದಿ ನಿನ್ನ ।ಚಿತ್ತವನು ಸೆರೆವಿಡಿದು ನೆತ್ತರನು ಬಸಿದು ॥ನಿತ್ಯ ನಿನ್ನಸುವ ಲವ ಲವ ಪೀರುತಲಿ ದೀರ್ಘ ।ಹತ್ಯೆಯಲಿ ಹರುಷಿಪಳೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೦ ॥mRutyu tAm bandu mOhiniya rUpadi ninna ।chittavanu sereviDidu nettaranu basidu ॥nitya ninna asuva lava lava pIrutali dIrgha ।hatyeyali haruShipaLo  - Mankutimma ॥ 180 ॥Death works in mysterious ways. She comes to you as enchanting damsel. She steals your mind. She sucks the life blood out of you. It kills you by taking life away from you little by little. She takes pleasure in doing so.  - Mankutimma
translation: Death works in mysterious ways. She comes to you as enchanting damsel. She steals your mind. She sucks the life blood out of you. It kills you by taking life away from you little by little. She takes pleasure in doing so.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹತ್ಯೆಯಲಿ ಹರುಷಿಪಳೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mRutyu tAm bandu mOhiniya rUpadi ninna ।chittavanu sereviDidu nettaranu basidu ॥nitya ninna asuva lava lava pIrutali dIrgha ।hatyeyali haruShipaLo  - Mankutimma ॥ 180 ॥
kagga: ಮೃತ್ಯು ತಾಂ ಬಂದು ಮೋಹಿನಿಯರೂಪದಿ ನಿನ್ನ ।ಚಿತ್ತವನು ಸೆರೆವಿಡಿದು ನೆತ್ತರನು ಬಸಿದು ॥ನಿತ್ಯ ನಿನ್ನಸುವ ಲವ ಲವ ಪೀರುತಲಿ ದೀರ್ಘ ।ಹತ್ಯೆಯಲಿ ಹರುಷಿಪಳೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೦ ॥

content: ಕ್ಷಣವೊಂದರೊಳೆ ಪೂರ್ತಿ ಕೊಲ್ಲುವುದು ಯಮಶೂಲ ।ಕ್ಷಣವನುಕ್ಷಣ ಕೊಲ್ಲುವುವು ಮೋಹಮಮತೆ ॥ಕುಣಿಕೆಯನು ನಿನ್ನ ಕೊರಳಿಗೆ ಹೂಡಿ ಚಿರಕಾಲ ।ವಣುವಣುವೆ ಬಿಗಿಯುವುವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೧ ॥kAshaNa odaroLe pUrti kolluvudu yamashUla ।kShavu anukShaNa kolluvuvu mOha mamate ॥kuNikeyanu ninna koraLige hUDi chirakAlavu ।aNuvaNuve bigiyuvuvo  - Mankutimma ॥ 181 ॥The trident of the lord of death kills you in an instant. But love and attachment kills you slowly second by second. It puts a noose around your neck and tightens it bit by bit all your life.  - Mankutimma
translation: The trident of the lord of death kills you in an instant. But love and attachment kills you slowly second by second. It puts a noose around your neck and tightens it bit by bit all your life.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅಣುವಣುವೆ ಬಿಗಿಯುವುವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kAshaNa odaroLe pUrti kolluvudu yamashUla ।kShavu anukShaNa kolluvuvu mOha mamate ॥kuNikeyanu ninna koraLige hUDi chirakAlavu ।aNuvaNuve bigiyuvuvo  - Mankutimma ॥ 181 ॥
kagga: ಕ್ಷಣವೊಂದರೊಳೆ ಪೂರ್ತಿ ಕೊಲ್ಲುವುದು ಯಮಶೂಲ ।ಕ್ಷಣವನುಕ್ಷಣ ಕೊಲ್ಲುವುವು ಮೋಹಮಮತೆ ॥ಕುಣಿಕೆಯನು ನಿನ್ನ ಕೊರಳಿಗೆ ಹೂಡಿ ಚಿರಕಾಲ ।ವಣುವಣುವೆ ಬಿಗಿಯುವುವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೧ ॥

content: ಋಣದ ಜಾಲವನಂತ, ಕರುಮಚಕ್ರವನಂತ ।ಜನುಮಜನುಮದ ಕಥೆಯ ತಂತುಗಳನಂತ ॥ಅನವರತ ನೂತನವಿದೆನಿಪ ವಿಶ್ವದ ತಂತ್ರ ।ಬಿನದ ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮಂಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೨ ॥RuNada jAlavu ananta, karuma chakravu ananta ।januma janumada katheya tantugaLu ananta ॥anavarata nUtanavidu enipa vishvada tantra ।binada parabommange  - Mankutimma ॥ 182 ॥The cycle of debt is endless. The cycle of consequences of our actions are endless. The linkages from one birth to another is also endless. In spite of this, the world looks new for ever. The creator seems to relish this freshness.  - Mankutimma
translation: The cycle of debt is endless. The cycle of consequences of our actions are endless. The linkages from one birth to another is also endless. In spite of this, the world looks new for ever. The creator seems to relish this freshness.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಿನದ ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮಂಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: RuNada jAlavu ananta, karuma chakravu ananta ।januma janumada katheya tantugaLu ananta ॥anavarata nUtanavidu enipa vishvada tantra ।binada parabommange  - Mankutimma ॥ 182 ॥
kagga: ಋಣದ ಜಾಲವನಂತ, ಕರುಮಚಕ್ರವನಂತ ।ಜನುಮಜನುಮದ ಕಥೆಯ ತಂತುಗಳನಂತ ॥ಅನವರತ ನೂತನವಿದೆನಿಪ ವಿಶ್ವದ ತಂತ್ರ ।ಬಿನದ ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮಂಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೨ ॥

content: ಪುಣ್ಯದಿಂ ಬಂದ ಸಿರಿ ಮದಮೋಹಗಳ ಮೂಲ ।ಖಿನ್ನನಾಗಿಪ ಪಾಪಫಲವಾತ್ಮಶುದ್ಧಿ ॥ಅನ್ಯೋನ್ಯಜನಕಗಳು ಪುಣ್ಯಪಾಪಗಳಿಂತು ।ಧನ್ಯನುಭಯವ ಮೀರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೩ ॥puNyadiM banda siri mada mOhagaLa mUla ।khinnanAgipa pApaphalavu Atma shuddhi ॥anyOnya janakagaLu puNya pApa gaLu intu ।dhanyanu ubhayava mIre  - Mankutimma ॥ 182 ॥We get riches due to good deeds done in the past. These riches make us do bad things and hence accumulate bad karma. This bad karma makes us go through a lot of misery. When enduring misery, we do good deeds. Good deeds and Bad deeds thus beget each other and keep the cycle going on for ever. Blessed is the person who can grow beyond both sin and good karma so that he can end the cycle.  - Mankutimma
translation: We get riches due to good deeds done in the past. These riches make us do bad things and hence accumulate bad karma. This bad karma makes us go through a lot of misery. When enduring misery, we do good deeds. Good deeds and Bad deeds thus beget each other and keep the cycle going on for ever. Blessed is the person who can grow beyond both sin and good karma so that he can end the cycle.  - Mankutimma
title: ಧನ್ಯನುಭಯವ ಮೀರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: puNyadiM banda siri mada mOhagaLa mUla ।khinnanAgipa pApaphalavu Atma shuddhi ॥anyOnya janakagaLu puNya pApa gaLu intu ।dhanyanu ubhayava mIre  - Mankutimma ॥ 182 ॥
kagga: ಪುಣ್ಯದಿಂ ಬಂದ ಸಿರಿ ಮದಮೋಹಗಳ ಮೂಲ ।ಖಿನ್ನನಾಗಿಪ ಪಾಪಫಲವಾತ್ಮಶುದ್ಧಿ ॥ಅನ್ಯೋನ್ಯಜನಕಗಳು ಪುಣ್ಯಪಾಪಗಳಿಂತು ।ಧನ್ಯನುಭಯವ ಮೀರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೩ ॥

content: ನೋಡುನೋಡುತ ಲೋಕಸಹವಾಸ ಸಾಕಹುದು ।ಬಾಡುತಿಹ ಹೂಮಾಲೆ ಗೂಢವಿಹ ಕಜ್ಜಿ ॥ತೋಡದಿರು ಬಾಳ್ವೆಯಾಳವನು; ಮೇಲ್ಮೇಲೆ ನೀ ।ನೋಡಾಡು ಹಗುರದಿಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೪ ॥nODa nODuta lOka sahavAsa sAkahudu ।bADutiha hUmAle gUDhavu iha kajji ॥tODadiru bALveya ALavanu; mElmEle nI ।nODADu haguradim  - Mankutimma ॥ 184 ॥Our interest in this world decreases eventually over time. A garland of flowers will not remain fresh for ever; it wilts. Just like that, a beautiful body may be hiding a itch inside. The world is also like that. It looks beautiful as long as we do not scratch the surface and dig deep. One must learn to enjoy the world by superficially glancing over it.  - Mankutimma
translation: Our interest in this world decreases eventually over time. A garland of flowers will not remain fresh for ever; it wilts. Just like that, a beautiful body may be hiding a itch inside. The world is also like that. It looks beautiful as long as we do not scratch the surface and dig deep. One must learn to enjoy the world by superficially glancing over it.  - Mankutimma
title: ನೋಡಾಡು ಹಗುರದಿಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nODa nODuta lOka sahavAsa sAkahudu ।bADutiha hUmAle gUDhavu iha kajji ॥tODadiru bALveya ALavanu; mElmEle nI ।nODADu haguradim  - Mankutimma ॥ 184 ॥
kagga: ನೋಡುನೋಡುತ ಲೋಕಸಹವಾಸ ಸಾಕಹುದು ।ಬಾಡುತಿಹ ಹೂಮಾಲೆ ಗೂಢವಿಹ ಕಜ್ಜಿ ॥ತೋಡದಿರು ಬಾಳ್ವೆಯಾಳವನು; ಮೇಲ್ಮೇಲೆ ನೀ ।ನೋಡಾಡು ಹಗುರದಿಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೪ ॥

content: ಹೃದಯಜೀವನಕಿನಿತು ಬೆಲೆಯಿರದೆ? ಫಲವಿರದೆ? ।ಮಧುರಭಾವ ಪ್ರೇಮ ದಯೆಯೆಲ್ಲ ಬರಿದೆ ॥ವಿಧಿಯಂಗಡಿಯೊಳದನು ಕಸವೆಂದು ತಳ್ಳುವೊಡೆ ।ಬದುಕಿನಲಿ ತಿರುಳೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೫ ॥hRudaya jIvanake initu bele irade? phalavirade? ।madhura bhAva prEma dayeyella baride ॥vidhiya angaDiyoLu adanu kasavendu taLLuvoDe ।badukinili tiruLEnu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 185 ॥Is there no consideration to the hearts feelings? To the life? To the lovely feelings, love, compassion? Are all of these feelings just consequences of old deeds that fate throws away as dirt? If that be so, what is the excitement in life?  - Mankutimma
translation: Is there no consideration to the hearts feelings? To the life? To the lovely feelings, love, compassion? Are all of these feelings just consequences of old deeds that fate throws away as dirt? If that be so, what is the excitement in life?  - Mankutimma
title: ಬದುಕಿನಲಿ ತಿರುಳೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hRudaya jIvanake initu bele irade? phalavirade? ।madhura bhAva prEma dayeyella baride ॥vidhiya angaDiyoLu adanu kasavendu taLLuvoDe ।badukinili tiruLEnu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 185 ॥
kagga: ಹೃದಯಜೀವನಕಿನಿತು ಬೆಲೆಯಿರದೆ? ಫಲವಿರದೆ? ।ಮಧುರಭಾವ ಪ್ರೇಮ ದಯೆಯೆಲ್ಲ ಬರಿದೆ ॥ವಿಧಿಯಂಗಡಿಯೊಳದನು ಕಸವೆಂದು ತಳ್ಳುವೊಡೆ ।ಬದುಕಿನಲಿ ತಿರುಳೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೫ ॥

content: ತಡಕಾಟ ಬದುಕೆಲ್ಲವೇಕಾಕಿಜೀವ ತ ।ನ್ನೊಡನಾಡಿ ಜೀವಗಳ ತಡಕಿ ಕೈಚಾಚಿ ॥ಪಿಡಿಯಲಲೆದಾಡುಗುಂ, ಪ್ರೀತಿ ಋಣ ಮಮತೆಗಳ ।ಮಡುವೊಳೋಲಾಡುತ್ತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೬ ॥taDakATa badukellavu ekAki jIvana tanna ।oDanADi jIvagaLa taDaki kaichAchi ॥piDiyalu aledADugum, prIti RuNa mamategaLa ।maDuvOL olAdutte  - Mankutimma ॥ 186 ॥Entire life is a struggle. Alone in this world, we search for partners, make them struggle in their life. We wander all over the world and stretch out our hands to hold theirs. But we get lost in the whirlpool of love, debt and compassion.  - Mankutimma
translation: Entire life is a struggle. Alone in this world, we search for partners, make them struggle in their life. We wander all over the world and stretch out our hands to hold theirs. But we get lost in the whirlpool of love, debt and compassion.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಡುವೊಳೋಲಾಡುತ್ತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: taDakATa badukellavu ekAki jIvana tanna ।oDanADi jIvagaLa taDaki kaichAchi ॥piDiyalu aledADugum, prIti RuNa mamategaLa ।maDuvOL olAdutte  - Mankutimma ॥ 186 ॥
kagga: ತಡಕಾಟ ಬದುಕೆಲ್ಲವೇಕಾಕಿಜೀವ ತ ।ನ್ನೊಡನಾಡಿ ಜೀವಗಳ ತಡಕಿ ಕೈಚಾಚಿ ॥ಪಿಡಿಯಲಲೆದಾಡುಗುಂ, ಪ್ರೀತಿ ಋಣ ಮಮತೆಗಳ ।ಮಡುವೊಳೋಲಾಡುತ್ತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೬ ॥

content: ನುಡಿಗಟ್ಟಿನಾಟದಕ್ಕರಚೀಟಿಯೊಟ್ಟಿನಲಿ ।ತಡಕಿ ನಾವಾಯ್ದಾಯ್ದು ನುಡಿಜೋಡಿಪಂತೆ ॥ಬಿಡಿಜೀವ ಸಂಗಾತಿಜೀವಗಳನರಸಿ ತಾಂ ।ಪಡೆದಂದು ಪೂರ್ಣವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೭ ॥nuDigaTTinATada akkara chITiya oTTInali ।taDaki nAvu AydAydu nuDijODipante ॥biDijIva sangAti jIvagaLanu arasi tAm ।paDedandu pUrNavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 187 ॥In scrabble we carefully pick letters from out slate and make words. Just like that, in life search for suitable partners in our life. The day we find them, our life attains completeness.  - Mankutimma
translation: In scrabble we carefully pick letters from out slate and make words. Just like that, in life search for suitable partners in our life. The day we find them, our life attains completeness.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪಡೆದಂದು ಪೂರ್ಣವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nuDigaTTinATada akkara chITiya oTTInali ।taDaki nAvu AydAydu nuDijODipante ॥biDijIva sangAti jIvagaLanu arasi tAm ।paDedandu pUrNavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 187 ॥
kagga: ನುಡಿಗಟ್ಟಿನಾಟದಕ್ಕರಚೀಟಿಯೊಟ್ಟಿನಲಿ ।ತಡಕಿ ನಾವಾಯ್ದಾಯ್ದು ನುಡಿಜೋಡಿಪಂತೆ ॥ಬಿಡಿಜೀವ ಸಂಗಾತಿಜೀವಗಳನರಸಿ ತಾಂ ।ಪಡೆದಂದು ಪೂರ್ಣವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೭ ॥

content: ರಸರುಚಿಗಳನು ಕಲಿಸಿ ಪಕ್ವಾನ್ನಗಳ ಪಚಿಸಿ ।ರಸನೆಯಲಿ ನೀರಿಳಿಸಿ ಬಿಸಿಯುಸಿರ ಬಿಡಿಸಿ ॥ದಶದಿಶೆಗಳಿಂ ಮುತ್ತಿ ಬರುವ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಗದಾರು ।ವಶನಾಗದಿಹ ನರನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೮ ॥rasa ruchigaLa kalasi pakvAnnagaLa pachisi ।rasaneyali nIriLisi bisiyusira biDisi ॥dasha dishegaLim mutti baruva prakRutige adAru ।vashanAgadiha  - Mankutimma ॥ 188 ॥Is there a man who does not surrender to nature;s allurement? She introduces us to various tastes, feeds us gourmet food, makes our mouth water, makes pant (at the spices), attacks our senses from ten directions.  - Mankutimma
translation: Is there a man who does not surrender to nature;s allurement? She introduces us to various tastes, feeds us gourmet food, makes our mouth water, makes pant (at the spices), attacks our senses from ten directions.  - Mankutimma
title: ವಶನಾಗದಿಹ ನರನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: rasa ruchigaLa kalasi pakvAnnagaLa pachisi ।rasaneyali nIriLisi bisiyusira biDisi ॥dasha dishegaLim mutti baruva prakRutige adAru ।vashanAgadiha  - Mankutimma ॥ 188 ॥
kagga: ರಸರುಚಿಗಳನು ಕಲಿಸಿ ಪಕ್ವಾನ್ನಗಳ ಪಚಿಸಿ ।ರಸನೆಯಲಿ ನೀರಿಳಿಸಿ ಬಿಸಿಯುಸಿರ ಬಿಡಿಸಿ ॥ದಶದಿಶೆಗಳಿಂ ಮುತ್ತಿ ಬರುವ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಗದಾರು ।ವಶನಾಗದಿಹ ನರನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೮ ॥

content: ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ರೂಪಕಾಂತಿಗಳ ಕಣ್ಣಾಗಿಸುವ ।ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ಫಲಮಧುರಗಳ ರಸನೆಗುಣಿಪ ॥ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ಕಂಠರವಗಳ ಕಿವಿಗೆ ಸೋಕಿಸುವ ।ಗುರು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ರಸಿಕತೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೯ ॥paripariya rUpakAntigaLa kaNNAgisuva ।paripariya phala madhuragaLa rasaneguNipa ॥paripariya kanTharavagaLa kivige sOkisuva ।guru sRuShTi rasikatege  - Mankutimma ॥ 189 ॥Nature is the teacher for all the indulgence we do. It puts beautiful creations in front of our eyes. It gives sweet fruits to please our taste buds. It makes wonderful notes fall on our ears.  - Mankutimma
translation: Nature is the teacher for all the indulgence we do. It puts beautiful creations in front of our eyes. It gives sweet fruits to please our taste buds. It makes wonderful notes fall on our ears.  - Mankutimma
title: ಗುರು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ರಸಿಕತೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: paripariya rUpakAntigaLa kaNNAgisuva ।paripariya phala madhuragaLa rasaneguNipa ॥paripariya kanTharavagaLa kivige sOkisuva ।guru sRuShTi rasikatege  - Mankutimma ॥ 189 ॥
kagga: ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ರೂಪಕಾಂತಿಗಳ ಕಣ್ಣಾಗಿಸುವ ।ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ಫಲಮಧುರಗಳ ರಸನೆಗುಣಿಪ ॥ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ಕಂಠರವಗಳ ಕಿವಿಗೆ ಸೋಕಿಸುವ ।ಗುರು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ರಸಿಕತೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮೯ ॥

content: ಅಮೃತಕಣವಂ ಮರ್ತ್ಯಮೃದ್ಘಟದಿ ಬಯ್ತಿರಿಸಿ ।ವಿಮೃಶಬುದ್ಧಿಗೆ ಮೋಹದುಪನೇತ್ರವಿಡಿಸಿ ॥ಸಾಮ್ರಾಜ್ಯಮಧ್ಯದಲಿ ದುರ್ಭಿಕ್ಷವಾಗಿಪುದು ।ಕಮ್ರತೆಯೊ ನಮ್ರತೆಯೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೦ ॥amRutakaNavam mRutya mRut ghaTadi baytirisi ।vimRusha buddhige mOhada upanEtrava iDisi ॥sAmrAjya madhyadali durbhikShavAgipudu ।kamrateyo namrateyo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 190 ॥Nature has placed the precious drop of elixir (the soul) inside the destructible body made of earth (mud). It has put the blinders of attachment on the free thinking mind. It makes us see famine right in the midst of land of prosperity. Is nature being cunning or just humble (acting only as an instrument of the Creator)?  - Mankutimma
translation: Nature has placed the precious drop of elixir (the soul) inside the destructible body made of earth (mud). It has put the blinders of attachment on the free thinking mind. It makes us see famine right in the midst of land of prosperity. Is nature being cunning or just humble (acting only as an instrument of the Creator)?  - Mankutimma
