title: ಕಮ್ರತೆಯೊ ನಮ್ರತೆಯೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: amRutakaNavam mRutya mRut ghaTadi baytirisi ।vimRusha buddhige mOhada upanEtrava iDisi ॥sAmrAjya madhyadali durbhikShavAgipudu ।kamrateyo namrateyo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 190 ॥
kagga: ಅಮೃತಕಣವಂ ಮರ್ತ್ಯಮೃದ್ಘಟದಿ ಬಯ್ತಿರಿಸಿ ।ವಿಮೃಶಬುದ್ಧಿಗೆ ಮೋಹದುಪನೇತ್ರವಿಡಿಸಿ ॥ಸಾಮ್ರಾಜ್ಯಮಧ್ಯದಲಿ ದುರ್ಭಿಕ್ಷವಾಗಿಪುದು ।ಕಮ್ರತೆಯೊ ನಮ್ರತೆಯೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೦ ॥

content: ಪೊಡೆಯುಣಿಸ ಮಿಗಹಕ್ಕಿಹುಳುಗಳಂದದಿ ನರನು ।ತಡಕುವನು; ತನ್ನಾತ್ಮದುಣಿಸ ಮರೆಯುವನು ॥ಒಡಲಿನಬ್ಬರವೇನು? ಆತ್ಮದ ನಾಣ್ಚೇನು? ।ಪೊಡವಿಗಿದೆ ದುಮ್ಮಾನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೧ ॥poDeyuNisa miga hakki huLugaLandadi naranu ।taDakuvanu; tanna AtmaduNisa mareyuvanu ॥oDalina abbaravEnu? Atmada nANchEnu? ।poDavigide dummAna  - Mankutimma ॥ 191 ॥When the body gets hungry, we struggle to find food just like the animals, birds or worms. Man usually forgets the hunger of the soul. This is because the body make a lot of noise when it is hungry. But the sould does not. Yet ultimately, it is the body that suffers  - Mankutimma
translation: When the body gets hungry, we struggle to find food just like the animals, birds or worms. Man usually forgets the hunger of the soul. This is because the body make a lot of noise when it is hungry. But the sould does not. Yet ultimately, it is the body that suffers  - Mankutimma
title: ಪೊಡವಿಗಿದೆ ದುಮ್ಮಾನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: poDeyuNisa miga hakki huLugaLandadi naranu ।taDakuvanu; tanna AtmaduNisa mareyuvanu ॥oDalina abbaravEnu? Atmada nANchEnu? ।poDavigide dummAna  - Mankutimma ॥ 191 ॥

content: ದೇವದಾನವರ ರಣರಂಗ ಮಾನವಹೃದಯ ।ಭಾವ ರಾಗ ಹಠಂಗಳವರ ಸೇನೆಗಳು ॥ಭೂವಿಭವಜಯಗಳ ಭ್ರಾಂತಿಯಲಿ ಮರೆಯುವರು ।ಜೀವಾಮೃತವನವರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೨ ॥dEva dAnavara ranaranga mAnava hRudaya ।bhAva rAga haThangaLu avara sEnegaLu ॥bhUvi bhava jayagaLa bhrantiyali mereyuvaru ।jIvAmRutavanu avaru  - Mankutimma ॥ 192 ॥Man;s heart is a battle ground of the Gods and the Demons (good and the bad). Emotions, indulgences and being adamant are all their armies. In illusions of just being so, winning and losing they exhibit the essence of life.  - Mankutimma
translation: Man;s heart is a battle ground of the Gods and the Demons (good and the bad). Emotions, indulgences and being adamant are all their armies. In illusions of just being so, winning and losing they exhibit the essence of life.  - Mankutimma
title: ಜೀವಾಮೃತವನವರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dEva dAnavara ranaranga mAnava hRudaya ।bhAva rAga haThangaLu avara sEnegaLu ॥bhUvi bhava jayagaLa bhrantiyali mereyuvaru ।jIvAmRutavanu avaru  - Mankutimma ॥ 192 ॥
kagga: ದೇವದಾನವರ ರಣರಂಗ ಮಾನವಹೃದಯ ।ಭಾವ ರಾಗ ಹಠಂಗಳವರ ಸೇನೆಗಳು ॥ಭೂವಿಭವಜಯಗಳ ಭ್ರಾಂತಿಯಲಿ ಮರೆಯುವರು ।ಜೀವಾಮೃತವನವರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೨ ॥

content: ಪರಮೇಷ್ಠಿ ನಿಜಚಾತುರಿಯನಳೆಯ ನಿರವಿಸಿದ ।ನೆರಡುಕೈಯಿಂದೆರಡು ಜಂತುಗಳ ಬಳಿಕ ॥ಇರದೆ ತಾನವನೊಂದುಗೂಡಿಸಲು ಬೆರಗಾಯ್ತು ।ನರಿಯು ವಾನರವು ನರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೩ ॥paramEShThi nija chAturiyanaLeya nivarisidanu ।eraDu kaiyinda eraDu jantugaLa baLika ॥irade tAnu avanondugoDisalu beragAytu ।nariyu vAnaravu nara  - Mankutimma ॥ 193 ॥The supreme creator is very smart. With his two hands, he created two animals. And in one move, he merged them into one. They were a fox (ನರಿ) and a monkey(ವಾನರ) and Man(ನರ) was the result  - cunning as a fox; fickle as a monkey.  - Mankutimma
translation: The supreme creator is very smart. With his two hands, he created two animals. And in one move, he merged them into one. They were a fox (ನರಿ) and a monkey(ವಾನರ) and Man(ನರ) was the result  - cunning as a fox; fickle as a monkey.  - Mankutimma
title: ನರಿಯು ವಾನರವು ನರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: paramEShThi nija chAturiyanaLeya nivarisidanu ।eraDu kaiyinda eraDu jantugaLa baLika ॥irade tAnu avanondugoDisalu beragAytu ।nariyu vAnaravu nara  - Mankutimma ॥ 193 ॥
kagga: ಪರಮೇಷ್ಠಿ ನಿಜಚಾತುರಿಯನಳೆಯ ನಿರವಿಸಿದ ।ನೆರಡುಕೈಯಿಂದೆರಡು ಜಂತುಗಳ ಬಳಿಕ ॥ಇರದೆ ತಾನವನೊಂದುಗೂಡಿಸಲು ಬೆರಗಾಯ್ತು ।ನರಿಯು ವಾನರವು ನರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೩ ॥

content: ಅಂತರಂಗವನೆಲ್ಲ ಬಿಚ್ಚಿ ತೋರಿಪನಾರು? ।ಅಂತರಗಭೀರಗಳ ತಾನೆ ಕಂಡವನಾರ್? ॥ಗಂತಿಗಳು ಗಂಟುಗಳು ಮಡಿಪುಮಡಿಪುಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ।ಸ್ವಂತಕೇ ದುರ್ದರ್ಶ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೪ ॥antarangavenella bichchi tOripanAru? ।antaragabhIragaLa tAne kanDavanAr? ॥gantigaLu ganTugaLu maDipu maDipugaLalli ।svantake durdasha  - Mankutimma ॥ 194 ॥Who is there who can show us our inside thoughts? Is there any one who has seen his own inner thoughts? There are many many folds, lumps and knots in one;s own thoughts that are not visible easily to oneself.  - Mankutimma
translation: Who is there who can show us our inside thoughts? Is there any one who has seen his own inner thoughts? There are many many folds, lumps and knots in one;s own thoughts that are not visible easily to oneself.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸ್ವಂತಕೇ ದುರ್ದರ್ಶ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: antarangavenella bichchi tOripanAru? ।antaragabhIragaLa tAne kanDavanAr? ॥gantigaLu ganTugaLu maDipu maDipugaLalli ।svantake durdasha  - Mankutimma ॥ 194 ॥
kagga: ಅಂತರಂಗವನೆಲ್ಲ ಬಿಚ್ಚಿ ತೋರಿಪನಾರು? ।ಅಂತರಗಭೀರಗಳ ತಾನೆ ಕಂಡವನಾರ್? ॥ಗಂತಿಗಳು ಗಂಟುಗಳು ಮಡಿಪುಮಡಿಪುಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ।ಸ್ವಂತಕೇ ದುರ್ದರ್ಶ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೪ ॥

content: ಮೊಗ ನಾಲ್ಕು ನರನಿಗಂತೆಯೆ ನಾರಿಗಂ ಬಗೆಯೆ ।ಜಗಕೆ ಕಾಣಿಪುದೊಂದು, ಮನೆಯ ಜನಕೊಂದು ॥ಸೊಗಸಿನೆಳಸಿಕೆಗೊಂದು, ತನ್ನಾತ್ಮಕಿನ್ನೊಂದು ।ಬಗೆಯೆಷ್ಟೊ ಮೊಗವಷ್ಟು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೫ ॥moga nAlku naranige anteye nArigam bageya ।jagake kANipudondu, maneya janakondu ॥sogasineLasikege ondu, tanna Atmake innodu ।bageyeShTo mogavaShTu  - Mankutimma ॥ 195 ॥A man has four faces; so does a woman. Same number as the kind of relations one has. One face for the world, one for the family members, one to enjoy the pleasures of the world and one more his inner conscience.  - Mankutimma
translation: A man has four faces; so does a woman. Same number as the kind of relations one has. One face for the world, one for the family members, one to enjoy the pleasures of the world and one more his inner conscience.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಗೆಯೆಷ್ಟೊ ಮೊಗವಷ್ಟು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: moga nAlku naranige anteye nArigam bageya ।jagake kANipudondu, maneya janakondu ॥sogasineLasikege ondu, tanna Atmake innodu ।bageyeShTo mogavaShTu  - Mankutimma ॥ 195 ॥
kagga: ಮೊಗ ನಾಲ್ಕು ನರನಿಗಂತೆಯೆ ನಾರಿಗಂ ಬಗೆಯೆ ।ಜಗಕೆ ಕಾಣಿಪುದೊಂದು, ಮನೆಯ ಜನಕೊಂದು ॥ಸೊಗಸಿನೆಳಸಿಕೆಗೊಂದು, ತನ್ನಾತ್ಮಕಿನ್ನೊಂದು ।ಬಗೆಯೆಷ್ಟೊ ಮೊಗವಷ್ಟು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೫ ॥

content: ಮನುಜಲೋಕವಿಕಾರಗಳನು ನೀನಳಿಸುವೊಡೆ ।ಮನಕೊಂದು ದರ್ಪಣವ ನಿರವಿಸೆಂತಾನುಂ ॥ಅನುಭವಿಪರವರಂದು ತಮ್ಮಂತರಂಗಗಳ ।ಅನುಪಮಾಸಹ್ಯಗಳ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೬ ॥manuja lOka vikAragaLanu nInu aLisuvoDe ।manakondu darpaNava niravisemtAnum ॥anubhaviparu avarandu tamma antarangagaLa ।anupama asahyagaLa  - Mankutimma ॥ 196 ॥If one wishes to clean the world from all the imperfections, then one must start by creating a mirror for his own mind. Then he will be able to see the unique disgusting details of their own inner thoughts.  - Mankutimma
translation: If one wishes to clean the world from all the imperfections, then one must start by creating a mirror for his own mind. Then he will be able to see the unique disgusting details of their own inner thoughts.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅನುಪಮಾಸಹ್ಯಗಳ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: manuja lOka vikAragaLanu nInu aLisuvoDe ।manakondu darpaNava niravisemtAnum ॥anubhaviparu avarandu tamma antarangagaLa ।anupama asahyagaLa  - Mankutimma ॥ 196 ॥
kagga: ಮನುಜಲೋಕವಿಕಾರಗಳನು ನೀನಳಿಸುವೊಡೆ ।ಮನಕೊಂದು ದರ್ಪಣವ ನಿರವಿಸೆಂತಾನುಂ ॥ಅನುಭವಿಪರವರಂದು ತಮ್ಮಂತರಂಗಗಳ ।ಅನುಪಮಾಸಹ್ಯಗಳ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೬ ॥

content: ಕನಲ್ದ ಹುಲಿ ಕೆರಳ್ದ ಹರಿ ಮುಳ್ ‍ಕರಡಿ ಛಲನಾಗ ।ಅಣಕು ಕಪಿ ಸೀಳ್ನಾಯಿ ಮೊದಲಾದ ಮೃಗದ ॥ಸೆಣಸುಮುಸುಡಿಯ ಘೋರದುಷ್ಟಚೇಷ್ಟೆಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ।ವಣಗಿಹುವು ನರಮನದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೭ ॥kanalda huli keraLda hari muL karaDi Chala nAga ।aNaku kapi sILnAyi modalAda mRugada ॥seNasu musuDiya ghOra duShTa chEShTegaLu ellavu ।aNagihavu naramanadi  - Mankutimma ॥ 197 ॥A hurt tiger, an angry lion, porcupine, adamant cobra, mimicking monkey, raging dog and other animals with their frightening fighting rogue faces are all hidden inside a man;s mind.  - Mankutimma
translation: A hurt tiger, an angry lion, porcupine, adamant cobra, mimicking monkey, raging dog and other animals with their frightening fighting rogue faces are all hidden inside a man;s mind.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅಣಗಿಹುವು ನರಮನದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kanalda huli keraLda hari muL karaDi Chala nAga ।aNaku kapi sILnAyi modalAda mRugada ॥seNasu musuDiya ghOra duShTa chEShTegaLu ellavu ।aNagihavu naramanadi  - Mankutimma ॥ 197 ॥
kagga: ಕನಲ್ದ ಹುಲಿ ಕೆರಳ್ದ ಹರಿ ಮುಳ್ ‍ಕರಡಿ ಛಲನಾಗ ।ಅಣಕು ಕಪಿ ಸೀಳ್ನಾಯಿ ಮೊದಲಾದ ಮೃಗದ ॥ಸೆಣಸುಮುಸುಡಿಯ ಘೋರದುಷ್ಟಚೇಷ್ಟೆಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ।ವಣಗಿಹುವು ನರಮನದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೭ ॥

content: ಸತ್ಯವಂತನನರಸಲೆನುತ ಪೇಟೆಗಳೊಳಗೆ ।ಹುಟ್ಟಹಗಲೊಳೆ ದೀವಿಗೆಯ ಹಿಡಿದು ನೆಡೆದು ॥ಕೆಟ್ಟುದೀ ಜಗವೆಂದು ತೊಟ್ಟಿಯೊಳೆ ವಸಿಸಿದನು ।ತಾತ್ತ್ವಿಕ ಡಯೋಜೆನಿಸ್  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೮ ॥satyavantananu arasalenuta pETegaLoLage ।huTTu hagaloLe dIvigeya hiDidu neDedu ॥keTTudI jagavendu toTTiyoLe vasisidanu ।tAttvika Dayojenis  - Mankutimma ॥ 198 ॥He went out to search for a honest person by holding a lamp in broad day light. He could not find one. He decided that the whole world is bad and started living a well. Such was the philosophy of Diogenes.  - Mankutimma
translation: He went out to search for a honest person by holding a lamp in broad day light. He could not find one. He decided that the whole world is bad and started living a well. Such was the philosophy of Diogenes.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಾತ್ತ್ವಿಕ ಡಯೋಜೆನಿಸ್  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: satyavantananu arasalenuta pETegaLoLage ।huTTu hagaloLe dIvigeya hiDidu neDedu ॥keTTudI jagavendu toTTiyoLe vasisidanu ।tAttvika Dayojenis  - Mankutimma ॥ 198 ॥
kagga: ಸತ್ಯವಂತನನರಸಲೆನುತ ಪೇಟೆಗಳೊಳಗೆ ।ಹುಟ್ಟಹಗಲೊಳೆ ದೀವಿಗೆಯ ಹಿಡಿದು ನೆಡೆದು ॥ಕೆಟ್ಟುದೀ ಜಗವೆಂದು ತೊಟ್ಟಿಯೊಳೆ ವಸಿಸಿದನು ।ತಾತ್ತ್ವಿಕ ಡಯೋಜೆನಿಸ್  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೮ ॥

content: ಪದರಪದರಗಳಿಹುವು ಗಂಟುಗಂಟುಗಳಿಹುವು ।ಹೃದಯದಲಿ ಬುದ್ಧಿಯಲಿ ವಾಕ್ಚರ್ಯೆಗಳಲಿ ॥ಇದಮಿತ್ಥಮೆಲ್ಲಿಹುದು ಮನುಜಸ್ವಭಾವದಲಿ? ।ವಿಧಿಯ ಕೈಚಿತ್ರವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೯ ॥padara padaragaLihuvu ganTu ganTugaLihuvu ।hRudayadali buddhiyali vAkcharyegaLali ॥idam ittham ellihudu manuja svabhAvadali? ।vidhiya kai chitravadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 199 ॥There are many folds and knots in everyone;s heart, mind and speech. Can a man;s nature be known/predicted deterministically? It;s all like a picture drawn by the hands of Providence.  - Mankutimma
translation: There are many folds and knots in everyone;s heart, mind and speech. Can a man;s nature be known/predicted deterministically? It;s all like a picture drawn by the hands of Providence.  - Mankutimma
title: ವಿಧಿಯ ಕೈಚಿತ್ರವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: padara padaragaLihuvu ganTu ganTugaLihuvu ।hRudayadali buddhiyali vAkcharyegaLali ॥idam ittham ellihudu manuja svabhAvadali? ।vidhiya kai chitravadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 199 ॥
kagga: ಪದರಪದರಗಳಿಹುವು ಗಂಟುಗಂಟುಗಳಿಹುವು ।ಹೃದಯದಲಿ ಬುದ್ಧಿಯಲಿ ವಾಕ್ಚರ್ಯೆಗಳಲಿ ॥ಇದಮಿತ್ಥಮೆಲ್ಲಿಹುದು ಮನುಜಸ್ವಭಾವದಲಿ? ।ವಿಧಿಯ ಕೈಚಿತ್ರವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯೯ ॥

content: ಹೊಟ್ಟೆಯೊಂದರ ರಗಳೆ ಸಾಲದೆಂದೇನೊ ವಿಧಿ ।ಹೊಟ್ಟೆಕಿಚ್ಚಿನ ಕಿಡಿಯ ನೆಟ್ಟಿಹನು ನರನೊಳ್ ॥ಹೊಟ್ಟೆತುಂಬಿದ ತೋಳ ಮಲಗೀತು; ನೀಂ ಪೆರರ ।ದಿಟ್ಟಿಸುತ ಕರುಬುವೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೦ ॥hoTTeyondara ragaLe sAladendEno vidhi ।hoTTe kichchina kiDiya neTTihanu naranoL ॥hoTTe tumbida tOLa malagItu; nIm perara ।diTTisuta kurubuveyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 200 ॥Just as if man does not suffer enough because of hunger in the stomach, man also has the fire in his belly (due to jealousy). Even a wolf (known to be always hungry) may sleep when its stomach is full. But man still worries (after having all his wishes satisfied) by looking at others.  - Mankutimma
translation: Just as if man does not suffer enough because of hunger in the stomach, man also has the fire in his belly (due to jealousy). Even a wolf (known to be always hungry) may sleep when its stomach is full. But man still worries (after having all his wishes satisfied) by looking at others.  - Mankutimma
title: ದಿಟ್ಟಿಸುತ ಕರುಬುವೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hoTTeyondara ragaLe sAladendEno vidhi ।hoTTe kichchina kiDiya neTTihanu naranoL ॥hoTTe tumbida tOLa malagItu; nIm perara ।diTTisuta kurubuveyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 200 ॥

content: ಉರಿಯುತಿರೆ ಹೊಟ್ಟೆಕಿಚ್ಚಾರಿಸಲು ನೀರೆಲ್ಲಿ? ।ನರಕವೆದೆಯಲಿ ನೆಲಸೆ ನಿದ್ದೆಗೆಡೆಯೆಲ್ಲಿ? ॥ಹರಿಸಲಪ್ಪುದೆ ನರರು ಮತ್ಸರಿಯ ಸಂಕಟವ? ।ಕರುಬಿದನ ಹರಿ ಪೊರೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೧ ॥uriyutire hoTTe kichchu Arisalu nIrelli? ।narakavu edeyali nelase niddege eDeyelli? ॥harisalappude nararu matsariya sankaTava? ।karubu idana hari porege  - Mankutimma ॥ 201 ॥Is there water that can dowse this fire of jealousy? If hell resides in our mind, then where is the question of sleep (or peace)? Can man ever vanquish this discomfort of jealousy? Only God can help us to curb this feeling.  - Mankutimma
translation: Is there water that can dowse this fire of jealousy? If hell resides in our mind, then where is the question of sleep (or peace)? Can man ever vanquish this discomfort of jealousy? Only God can help us to curb this feeling.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕರುಬಿದನ ಹರಿ ಪೊರೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ

content: ರಾವಣನ ದಶಶಿರವದೇಂ? ನರನು ಶತಶಿರನು ।ಸಾವಿರಾಸ್ಯಗಳನೊಂದರೊಳಣಗಿಸಿಹನು ॥ಹಾವಾಗಿ ಹುಲಿಯಾಗಿ ಕಪ್ಪೆ ಹುಲ್ಲೆಯುಮಾಗಿ ।ಭೂವ್ಯೊಮಕತಿಶಯನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೨ ॥rAvaNana dashashiravadEm? naranu shata shiranu ।sAvira AsyagaLanu ondaroLa aNagisihanu ॥hAvAgi huliyAgi kappe hulleyum Agi ।bhU vyomake atishayanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 202 ॥What is so great about Ravana having ten heads? Any man had hundred heads. He has thousand cunning minds all hidden inside one. He can be at times like a snake (slippery), a tiger (dangerous) or a deer (docile). There is no other being in this world  - earth and sky  - that comes close to his ability.  - Mankutimma
translation: What is so great about Ravana having ten heads? Any man had hundred heads. He has thousand cunning minds all hidden inside one. He can be at times like a snake (slippery), a tiger (dangerous) or a deer (docile). There is no other being in this world  - earth and sky  - that comes close to his ability.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭೂವ್ಯೊಮಕತಿಶಯನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: rAvaNana dashashiravadEm? naranu shata shiranu ।sAvira AsyagaLanu ondaroLa aNagisihanu ॥hAvAgi huliyAgi kappe hulleyum Agi ।bhU vyomake atishayanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 202 ॥
kagga: ರಾವಣನ ದಶಶಿರವದೇಂ? ನರನು ಶತಶಿರನು ।ಸಾವಿರಾಸ್ಯಗಳನೊಂದರೊಳಣಗಿಸಿಹನು ॥ಹಾವಾಗಿ ಹುಲಿಯಾಗಿ ಕಪ್ಪೆ ಹುಲ್ಲೆಯುಮಾಗಿ ।ಭೂವ್ಯೊಮಕತಿಶಯನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೨ ॥

content: ತಲೆಯೊಳಗೆ ನೆರೆದಿಹುವು ನೂರಾರು ಹಕ್ಕಿಗಳು ।ಗಿಳಿ ಗೂಗೆ ಕಾಗೆ ಕೋಗಿಲೆ ಹದ್ದು ನವಿಲು ॥ಕಿಲಕಿಲನೆ ಗೊರಗೊರನೆ ಕಿರಿಚಿ ಕೂಗುತ್ತಿಹುವು ।ನೆಲೆಯೆಲ್ಲಿ ನಿದ್ದೆಗೆಲೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೩ ॥taleya oLage neredihuvu nUrAru hakkigaLu ।giLi gUge kAge kOgile haddu navilu ॥kilakilane goragorane kirichi kUgutihuvu ।neleyelli niddege elo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 203 ॥In a man;s mind he can hear voices of all the birds  - parrots, owls, crows, koels, eagles, peacocks. Each one has its own melody or cacophony  - just like the voices of his inner mind/conscience. How can he find peace and rest?  - Mankutimma
translation: In a man;s mind he can hear voices of all the birds  - parrots, owls, crows, koels, eagles, peacocks. Each one has its own melody or cacophony  - just like the voices of his inner mind/conscience. How can he find peace and rest?  - Mankutimma
title: ನೆಲೆಯೆಲ್ಲಿ ನಿದ್ದೆಗೆಲೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: taleya oLage neredihuvu nUrAru hakkigaLu ।giLi gUge kAge kOgile haddu navilu ॥kilakilane goragorane kirichi kUgutihuvu ।neleyelli niddege elo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 203 ॥
kagga: ತಲೆಯೊಳಗೆ ನೆರೆದಿಹುವು ನೂರಾರು ಹಕ್ಕಿಗಳು ।ಗಿಳಿ ಗೂಗೆ ಕಾಗೆ ಕೋಗಿಲೆ ಹದ್ದು ನವಿಲು ॥ಕಿಲಕಿಲನೆ ಗೊರಗೊರನೆ ಕಿರಿಚಿ ಕೂಗುತ್ತಿಹುವು ।ನೆಲೆಯೆಲ್ಲಿ ನಿದ್ದೆಗೆಲೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೩ ॥

content: ದೇವಾಂಶ ಪಶ್ವಂಶಗಳ ಗಂಟು ಮಾನುಷತೆ ।ಧೀವಿಮರ್ಶೆಯಿನೊಂದ ಸತ್ಕರಿಸಿ ಬಲಿಸಿ ॥ಭಾವಪರಿಶೋಧನೆಯಿನಿನ್ನೊಂದ ದಂಡಿಪುದೆ ।ಜೀವಪ್ರಕರ್ಷಗತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೪ ॥dEva amsha pashu amshagaLa ganTu mAnuShate ।dhI vimarsheyina onda satkarisi balisi ॥bhAva parishOdhaneyina innonda danDipude ।jIva prakarShagati  - Mankutimma ॥ 204 ॥A human life is a complex mixture of elements of Gods and Demons. One must use his intellect to know and recognise the divine elements and nurture them to be strong. One must also know his inner feelings to recognise the demonic elements and curb them to keep them under check. This is the only way he can make progress in his life.  - Mankutimma
translation: A human life is a complex mixture of elements of Gods and Demons. One must use his intellect to know and recognise the divine elements and nurture them to be strong. One must also know his inner feelings to recognise the demonic elements and curb them to keep them under check. This is the only way he can make progress in his life.  - Mankutimma
title: ಜೀವಪ್ರಕರ್ಷಗತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dEva amsha pashu amshagaLa ganTu mAnuShate ।dhI vimarsheyina onda satkarisi balisi ॥bhAva parishOdhaneyina innonda danDipude ।jIva prakarShagati  - Mankutimma ॥ 204 ॥
kagga: ದೇವಾಂಶ ಪಶ್ವಂಶಗಳ ಗಂಟು ಮಾನುಷತೆ ।ಧೀವಿಮರ್ಶೆಯಿನೊಂದ ಸತ್ಕರಿಸಿ ಬಲಿಸಿ ॥ಭಾವಪರಿಶೋಧನೆಯಿನಿನ್ನೊಂದ ದಂಡಿಪುದೆ ।ಜೀವಪ್ರಕರ್ಷಗತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೪ ॥

content: ಕಲ್ಲಾಗಿ ನಿಲ್ಲುವನು, ಬಳ್ಳಿವೊಲು ಬಳುಕುವನು ।ಮುಳ್ಳಾಗಿ ಚುಚ್ಚುವನು, ಫುಲ್ಲಸುಮವಹನು ॥ಕಲ್ಲೋಲವಾರಿಧಿವೊಲುರವಣಿಸಿ ಮೊರೆಯುವನು ।ಕ್ಷುಲ್ಲಮಾನಿಸನಿವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೫ ॥kallAgi nilluvanu, baLLivolu baLukuvanu ।muLLAgi chucchuvanu, phulla sumavu ahanu ॥kallOla vAridhivolu ravaNisi moreyuvanu ।kShulla mAnisanu ivanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 205 ॥What are all the antics a man can do? He can stand still like a stone. He can bend like a creeper. He can hurt like a thorn. He can bring happiness like a fresh flower. He can both enchant and roar like waves at sea. Yet, he is just another being (when compared to the vastness and variety of this universe).  - Mankutimma
translation: What are all the antics a man can do? He can stand still like a stone. He can bend like a creeper. He can hurt like a thorn. He can bring happiness like a fresh flower. He can both enchant and roar like waves at sea. Yet, he is just another being (when compared to the vastness and variety of this universe).  - Mankutimma
title: ಕ್ಷುಲ್ಲಮಾನಿಸನಿವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kallAgi nilluvanu, baLLivolu baLukuvanu ।muLLAgi chucchuvanu, phulla sumavu ahanu ॥kallOla vAridhivolu ravaNisi moreyuvanu ।kShulla mAnisanu ivanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 205 ॥
kagga: ಕಲ್ಲಾಗಿ ನಿಲ್ಲುವನು, ಬಳ್ಳಿವೊಲು ಬಳುಕುವನು ।ಮುಳ್ಳಾಗಿ ಚುಚ್ಚುವನು, ಫುಲ್ಲಸುಮವಹನು ॥ಕಲ್ಲೋಲವಾರಿಧಿವೊಲುರವಣಿಸಿ ಮೊರೆಯುವನು ।ಕ್ಷುಲ್ಲಮಾನಿಸನಿವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೫ ॥

content: ಸತ್ತವೆನ್ನಾಶೆಗಳು, ಗೆದ್ದೆನಿಂದ್ರಿಯಗಣವ ।ಚಿತ್ತವಿನ್ನಲುಗದೆಂಬಾ ಜಂಬ ಬೇಡ ॥ಎತ್ತಣಿಂದಲೊ ಗಾಳಿ ಮೋಹಬೀಜವ ತಂದು ।ಬಿತ್ತಲಾರದೆ ಮನದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೬ ॥sattevu enna AshegaLu, geddenu indriya gaNava ।cittavu innu alugadu embA jamba bEDa ॥ettaNindalo gALi mOha bIjava tandu ।bittalArade manadi  - Mankutimma ॥ 206 ॥Do not be proud like this: ;All my desires are dead. I have conquered all my senses. My mind shall not waver any more.; Wind shall carry a seed of desire (attachment) from somewhere and plant it in your mind. Can;t it?   - Mankutimma
translation: Do not be proud like this: ;All my desires are dead. I have conquered all my senses. My mind shall not waver any more.; Wind shall carry a seed of desire (attachment) from somewhere and plant it in your mind. Can;t it?   - Mankutimma
title: ಬಿತ್ತಲಾರದೆ ಮನದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sattevu enna AshegaLu, geddenu indriya gaNava ।cittavu innu alugadu embA jamba bEDa ॥ettaNindalo gALi mOha bIjava tandu ।bittalArade manadi  - Mankutimma ॥ 206 ॥
kagga: ಸತ್ತವೆನ್ನಾಶೆಗಳು, ಗೆದ್ದೆನಿಂದ್ರಿಯಗಣವ ।ಚಿತ್ತವಿನ್ನಲುಗದೆಂಬಾ ಜಂಬ ಬೇಡ ॥ಎತ್ತಣಿಂದಲೊ ಗಾಳಿ ಮೋಹಬೀಜವ ತಂದು ।ಬಿತ್ತಲಾರದೆ ಮನದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೬ ॥

content: ಒಣಗಿ ಬೇಸಗೆಯಿಂದ ಮಣ್ಣಾಗಿ ಕಾಣದಿಹ ।ತೃಣ ಮೊಳೆಯುವುದು ಮರಳಿ ಹನಿಯೆರಡು ಬೀಳೆ ॥ಅಣಗಿರ್ದು ನರನಾಶೆಯಂತು ಕಷ್ಟದ ದಿನದಿ ।ಕುಣಿವುದನುಕೂಲ ಬರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೭ ॥oNagi bEsageyinda maNNAgi kANadiha ।tRuNa moLeyuvudu maraLi haniyeraDu bILe ॥aNagirdu narana Asheyantu kaShTada dinadi ।kuNivudu anukUla bare  - Mankutimma ॥ 207 ॥A blade of grass dries in summer and gets burried in sand. Just when two drops of water falls over it, it springs back to life. Just like that man;s desires are all hiding when he is in trouble. They all come out and start dancing when he is prosperous again.  - Mankutimma
translation: A blade of grass dries in summer and gets burried in sand. Just when two drops of water falls over it, it springs back to life. Just like that man;s desires are all hiding when he is in trouble. They all come out and start dancing when he is prosperous again.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕುಣಿವುದನುಕೂಲ ಬರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: oNagi bEsageyinda maNNAgi kANadiha ।tRuNa moLeyuvudu maraLi haniyeraDu bILe ॥aNagirdu narana Asheyantu kaShTada dinadi ।kuNivudu anukUla bare  - Mankutimma ॥ 207 ॥
kagga: ಒಣಗಿ ಬೇಸಗೆಯಿಂದ ಮಣ್ಣಾಗಿ ಕಾಣದಿಹ ।ತೃಣ ಮೊಳೆಯುವುದು ಮರಳಿ ಹನಿಯೆರಡು ಬೀಳೆ ॥ಅಣಗಿರ್ದು ನರನಾಶೆಯಂತು ಕಷ್ಟದ ದಿನದಿ ।ಕುಣಿವುದನುಕೂಲ ಬರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೭ ॥

content: ಬೆದಕಾಟ ಬದುಕೆಲ್ಲ; ಚಣಚಣವು ಹೊಸ ಹಸಿವು ।ಅದಕಾಗಿ ಇದಕಾಗಿ ಮತ್ತೊಂದಕಾಗಿ ॥ಅಧಿಕಾರ ಸಿರಿ ಸೊಗಸು ಕೀರ್ತಿಗಳ ನೆನೆದು ಮನ ।ಕುದಿಯುತಿಹುದಾವಗಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೮ ॥bedakATa badukella; chaNa chaNavu hosa hasivu ।adakAgi idakAgi mattondakAgi ॥adhikAra siri sogasu kIrtigaLa nenedu mana ।kuduyutihudu Avagam  - Mankutimma ॥ 208 ॥Life is a struggle all along. Every second we have new hunger; for this, for that and for something else. Sometimes it is for power, or wealth, or splendor, or fame. Mind is always restless thinking about them.  - Mankutimma
translation: Life is a struggle all along. Every second we have new hunger; for this, for that and for something else. Sometimes it is for power, or wealth, or splendor, or fame. Mind is always restless thinking about them.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕುದಿಯುತಿಹುದಾವಗಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bedakATa badukella; chaNa chaNavu hosa hasivu ।adakAgi idakAgi mattondakAgi ॥adhikAra siri sogasu kIrtigaLa nenedu mana ।kuduyutihudu Avagam  - Mankutimma ॥ 208 ॥
kagga: ಬೆದಕಾಟ ಬದುಕೆಲ್ಲ; ಚಣಚಣವು ಹೊಸ ಹಸಿವು ।ಅದಕಾಗಿ ಇದಕಾಗಿ ಮತ್ತೊಂದಕಾಗಿ ॥ಅಧಿಕಾರ ಸಿರಿ ಸೊಗಸು ಕೀರ್ತಿಗಳ ನೆನೆದು ಮನ ।ಕುದಿಯುತಿಹುದಾವಗಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೮ ॥

content: ದನ ಸಿಂಗ ಹುಲಿ ಹಕ್ಕಿ ಹಾವು ಮೀನ್ ಗಳಿಗೆಲ್ಲ ।ಇನಿಸುಣಿಸು, ಬೆದೆ, ಬೆದರು  - ಅಷ್ಟೆ ಜೀವಿತವು ॥ಮನುಜನೆಂತನಿತರಿಂ ತೃಪ್ತಿವಡೆವನವಂಗೆ ।ಕ್ಷಣಕ್ಷಣವು ಹೊಸ ಹಸಿವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೯ ॥dana singa huli hakki mIngaLigella ।inisu uNisu, bede, bedaru  - aShte jIvitavu ॥manujanu enatanitarim tRuptivaDevu avange ।kShaNa kShaNavu hosa hasivu  - Mankutimma ॥ 209 ॥Cow, lion, tiger, snake, fish and other animals have a simple definition of life. Struggle for food, secure a mate to have a healthy progeny, be scared about life (from predators or nature)  - this pretty much completes their life and they are happy if they are able to do just that. But man is not like them. He is not happy just doing the same. His desires grow and change every second.  - Mankutimma
translation: Cow, lion, tiger, snake, fish and other animals have a simple definition of life. Struggle for food, secure a mate to have a healthy progeny, be scared about life (from predators or nature)  - this pretty much completes their life and they are happy if they are able to do just that. But man is not like them. He is not happy just doing the same. His desires grow and change every second.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕ್ಷಣಕ್ಷಣವು ಹೊಸ ಹಸಿವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dana singa huli hakki mIngaLigella ।inisu uNisu, bede, bedaru  - aShte jIvitavu ॥manujanu enatanitarim tRuptivaDevu avange ।kShaNa kShaNavu hosa hasivu  - Mankutimma ॥ 209 ॥
kagga: ದನ ಸಿಂಗ ಹುಲಿ ಹಕ್ಕಿ ಹಾವು ಮೀನ್ ಗಳಿಗೆಲ್ಲ ।ಇನಿಸುಣಿಸು, ಬೆದೆ, ಬೆದರು  - ಅಷ್ಟೆ ಜೀವಿತವು ॥ಮನುಜನೆಂತನಿತರಿಂ ತೃಪ್ತಿವಡೆವನವಂಗೆ ।ಕ್ಷಣಕ್ಷಣವು ಹೊಸ ಹಸಿವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦೯ ॥

content: ತಂಗಳುಣಿಸಾದೊಡಂ ಸಾಕೆನುವನುಪವಾಸಿ ।ಸಿಂಗಾರ ಸಂಗಾತಿ ಬೇಕುಂಡವನಿಗೆ ॥ಬಂಗಾರ ಪದವಿ ಪ್ರತಿಷ್ಠೆ ಬೇಕಾಬಳಿಕ ।ಹಿಂಗದಾಯೆದೆಚಿಲುಮೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೦ ॥tangaLu uNisAdoDam sAku enuvanu upavAsi ।singAra sangAti bEku unDavanige ॥bangAra padavi pratiShThe bEku AbaLika ।hingadu A ede chilume  - Mankutimma ॥ 210 ॥A hungry person is satisfied (temporarily) even if he is given stale food. But a person who has eaten wants to look good and have a companion. Later more needs come up like gold for ornaments, position of power, fame. The fountain of wants in his heart does not go dry even if he gets all of them.  - Mankutimma
translation: A hungry person is satisfied (temporarily) even if he is given stale food. But a person who has eaten wants to look good and have a companion. Later more needs come up like gold for ornaments, position of power, fame. The fountain of wants in his heart does not go dry even if he gets all of them.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹಿಂಗದಾಯೆದೆಚಿಲುಮೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tangaLu uNisAdoDam sAku enuvanu upavAsi ।singAra sangAti bEku unDavanige ॥bangAra padavi pratiShThe bEku AbaLika ।hingadu A ede chilume  - Mankutimma ॥ 210 ॥
kagga: ತಂಗಳುಣಿಸಾದೊಡಂ ಸಾಕೆನುವನುಪವಾಸಿ ।ಸಿಂಗಾರ ಸಂಗಾತಿ ಬೇಕುಂಡವನಿಗೆ ॥ಬಂಗಾರ ಪದವಿ ಪ್ರತಿಷ್ಠೆ ಬೇಕಾಬಳಿಕ ।ಹಿಂಗದಾಯೆದೆಚಿಲುಮೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೦ ॥

content: ಮನಸು ಬೆಳೆದಂತೆಲ್ಲ ಹಸಿವು ಬೆಳೆಯುವುದಯ್ಯ ।ತಣಿಸಲದನೊಗೆಯುವುದು ಬಗೆಬಗೆಯ ಯುಕ್ತಿ ॥ಮನುಜನೇಳಿಗೆಯದರಿನ್; ಆ ಮನಸಿನೇಳಿಗೆಗೆ ।ಕೊನೆಯೆಲ್ಲಿ? ಚಿಂತಿಸೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೧ ॥manasu beLedantella hasivu beLeyuvudayya ।taNisaladanu ogeyuvudu bagebageya yukti ॥manujana ELige adarin; A manasina ELigege ।koneyelli? chintiselo  - Mankutimma ॥ 211 ॥As the mind grows, so does the hunger. To satiate that hunger the mind comes up with various novel ideas. These ideas are the cause of human progress perhaps leading to the growth of mind. But, is there an end to this cycle of growth of the mind? Think.  - Mankutimma
translation: As the mind grows, so does the hunger. To satiate that hunger the mind comes up with various novel ideas. These ideas are the cause of human progress perhaps leading to the growth of mind. But, is there an end to this cycle of growth of the mind? Think.  - Mankutimma
title: ಆ ಮನಸಿನೇಳಿಗೆಗೆ ಕೊನೆಯೆಲ್ಲಿ? ಚಿಂತಿಸೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: manasu beLedantella hasivu beLeyuvudayya ।taNisaladanu ogeyuvudu bagebageya yukti ॥manujana ELige adarin; A manasina ELigege ।koneyelli? chintiselo  - Mankutimma ॥ 211 ॥
kagga: ಮನಸು ಬೆಳೆದಂತೆಲ್ಲ ಹಸಿವು ಬೆಳೆಯುವುದಯ್ಯ ।ತಣಿಸಲದನೊಗೆಯುವುದು ಬಗೆಬಗೆಯ ಯುಕ್ತಿ ॥ಮನುಜನೇಳಿಗೆಯದರಿನ್; ಆ ಮನಸಿನೇಳಿಗೆಗೆ ।ಕೊನೆಯೆಲ್ಲಿ? ಚಿಂತಿಸೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೧ ॥

content: ದಿನದಿನವು ಹಳಸುವುವು, ದಿನದಿನವು ಕೊಳೆಯುವುವು ।ಮನುಜಕುಲದೆಲ್ಲ ಕೃತಿವಿಜಯವಿಭವಗಳು ॥ಅನುದಿನವು ಮತ್ತವನು ತೊಳೆದು ಹೊಸತೆನಿಸುವುದೆ ।ಜನುಮಸಫಲತೆ ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೨ ॥dina dinavu haLasuvuvu, dina dinavu koLeyuvuvu ।manujakulada ella kruti vijaya vibhavagaLu ॥anudinavu mattavanu toLedu hosatenisuvude ।janumasaphalate ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 212 ॥Everyday they become stale and decay. All mankind;s achievements are temporary; his works, his victories and his wealth. Your life;s satisfaction must lie in the action of cleaning yesterday;s stale and making them today;s new.  - Mankutimma
translation: Everyday they become stale and decay. All mankind;s achievements are temporary; his works, his victories and his wealth. Your life;s satisfaction must lie in the action of cleaning yesterday;s stale and making them today;s new.  - Mankutimma
title: ಜನುಮಸಫಲತೆ ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dina dinavu haLasuvuvu, dina dinavu koLeyuvuvu ।manujakulada ella kruti vijaya vibhavagaLu ॥anudinavu mattavanu toLedu hosatenisuvude ।janumasaphalate ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 212 ॥
kagga: ದಿನದಿನವು ಹಳಸುವುವು, ದಿನದಿನವು ಕೊಳೆಯುವುವು ।ಮನುಜಕುಲದೆಲ್ಲ ಕೃತಿವಿಜಯವಿಭವಗಳು ॥ಅನುದಿನವು ಮತ್ತವನು ತೊಳೆದು ಹೊಸತೆನಿಸುವುದೆ ।ಜನುಮಸಫಲತೆ ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೨ ॥

content: ಸಾಜಗುಣವೆಂದುಪೇಕ್ಷಿಪೆಯ ನಿನ್ನವಗುಣವ? ।ಸಾಜವನು ಬಿಟ್ಟಲುಗದಿಹುದು ಮೃಗಕೀಟ ॥ಸಾಜವಂ ಶಿಕ್ಷಿಸುತ ಲೋಕಸಂಸ್ಥಿತಿಗದನು ।ಯೋಜಿಪುದೆ ನರಮಹಿಮೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೩ ॥sAja guNavendu upEkShipeya ninna avaguNava? ।sAjavanu biTTu alugadihudu mRugakITa ॥sAjavam shikShisuta lOka samsthitigadanu ।yOjipude naramahime  - Mankutimma ॥ 213 ॥Are you turning a blind eye towards your bad habits sighting their innate nature as a reason not to change? Only animals and insects can not get to change their innate behaviours. To curb the innate instincts and to use it for the good of the world order is the greatness of being human.  - Mankutimma
translation: Are you turning a blind eye towards your bad habits sighting their innate nature as a reason not to change? Only animals and insects can not get to change their innate behaviours. To curb the innate instincts and to use it for the good of the world order is the greatness of being human.  - Mankutimma
title: ಯೋಜಿಪುದೆ ನರಮಹಿಮೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sAja guNavendu upEkShipeya ninna avaguNava? ।sAjavanu biTTu alugadihudu mRugakITa ॥sAjavam shikShisuta lOka samsthitigadanu ।yOjipude naramahime  - Mankutimma ॥ 213 ॥
kagga: ಸಾಜಗುಣವೆಂದುಪೇಕ್ಷಿಪೆಯ ನಿನ್ನವಗುಣವ? ।ಸಾಜವನು ಬಿಟ್ಟಲುಗದಿಹುದು ಮೃಗಕೀಟ ॥ಸಾಜವಂ ಶಿಕ್ಷಿಸುತ ಲೋಕಸಂಸ್ಥಿತಿಗದನು ।ಯೋಜಿಪುದೆ ನರಮಹಿಮೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೩ ॥

content: ಸಹಜ ನಗ್ನತೆ ನಮಗೆ, ಸಹಜ ನಖದಾಡಿಗಳು ।ಬಹುಯುಗದ ಸಂಸ್ಕಾರ ವಸ್ತ್ರ ಸಿಂಗಾರ ॥ಸಹಜತೆ ನಿರಕ್ಷರತೆ, ವಿದ್ಯೆ ತಾಂ ಕೃತಕವಲ ।ಸಹಜಿದಿನೆ ಕೃತಕಮುಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೪ ॥sahaja nagnate namage, sahaja nakha dADigaLu ।bahuyugada samskAra vastra singAra ॥sahajate nirakSharate, vidye tAm kRutakavala ।sahajidine kRutakamum  - Mankutimma ॥ 214 ॥It is innate nature to be naked, the nails and the beard. Clothes, fashion and decoration are results of ages of civilizations. To be natural is to be illiterate. To learn is then is to be artificial. The artificial always has its roots in the natural.  - Mankutimma
translation: It is innate nature to be naked, the nails and the beard. Clothes, fashion and decoration are results of ages of civilizations. To be natural is to be illiterate. To learn is then is to be artificial. The artificial always has its roots in the natural.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಹಜಿದಿನೆ ಕೃತಕಮುಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sahaja nagnate namage, sahaja nakha dADigaLu ।bahuyugada samskAra vastra singAra ॥sahajate nirakSharate, vidye tAm kRutakavala ।sahajidine kRutakamum  - Mankutimma ॥ 214 ॥
kagga: ಸಹಜ ನಗ್ನತೆ ನಮಗೆ, ಸಹಜ ನಖದಾಡಿಗಳು ।ಬಹುಯುಗದ ಸಂಸ್ಕಾರ ವಸ್ತ್ರ ಸಿಂಗಾರ ॥ಸಹಜತೆ ನಿರಕ್ಷರತೆ, ವಿದ್ಯೆ ತಾಂ ಕೃತಕವಲ ।ಸಹಜಿದಿನೆ ಕೃತಕಮುಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೪ ॥

content: ಇಹುದಕಿಂತೊಳಿತಿಹುದು; ಒಳಿತ ಗಳಿಸಲ್ಬಹುದು ।ಸಹಿಸಿಸುವೆನದಕೆನುವ ಮತಿಯಿನೇ ಪ್ರಗತಿ ॥ರಹಸಿಯದ ಬುಗ್ಗೆಯದು, ಚಿಮ್ಮುತಿಹುದೆಲ್ಲರೊಳು ।ಸಹಜವಾ ಮತಿ ಕೃತಕ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೫ ॥ihudakinta oLitihudu; oLita gaLisal bahudu ।sahisisuvenu adakenuva matiyinE pragati ॥rahasiyada buggeyadu, chimmutihudu ellaroLu ।sahajavA mati kRutaka  - Mankutimma ॥ 215 ॥There is something better than what we have now. There is a way to get that too. I will have to go though some difficulty to get it. But, I am prepared to do that. The spring of such desires is present in all of us. It is very natural. What this natural longing makes our mind do is artificial.  - Mankutimma
translation: There is something better than what we have now. There is a way to get that too. I will have to go though some difficulty to get it. But, I am prepared to do that. The spring of such desires is present in all of us. It is very natural. What this natural longing makes our mind do is artificial.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಹಜವಾ ಮತಿ ಕೃತಕ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ihudakinta oLitihudu; oLita gaLisal bahudu ।sahisisuvenu adakenuva matiyinE pragati ॥rahasiyada buggeyadu, chimmutihudu ellaroLu ।sahajavA mati kRutaka  - Mankutimma ॥ 215 ॥
kagga: ಇಹುದಕಿಂತೊಳಿತಿಹುದು; ಒಳಿತ ಗಳಿಸಲ್ಬಹುದು ।ಸಹಿಸಿಸುವೆನದಕೆನುವ ಮತಿಯಿನೇ ಪ್ರಗತಿ ॥ರಹಸಿಯದ ಬುಗ್ಗೆಯದು, ಚಿಮ್ಮುತಿಹುದೆಲ್ಲರೊಳು ।ಸಹಜವಾ ಮತಿ ಕೃತಕ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೫ ॥

content: ಸಿರಿ ಸೊಬಗುಗಳ ಬೆದಕು, ಕೆಳೆ ಬಲುಮೆಗಳ ಬೆದಕು ।ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮ ನಾಟಕದ ವೇಷಚೇಷ್ಟೆ ॥ಅರಸುತಿಹ ಜೀವ ನಾಯಕನು, ನಾಯಕಿಯವನ ।ಕೆರಳಿಸುವ ಮೋಹರುಚಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೬ ॥siri sobagugaLa bedaku, keLe balumegaLa bedaku ।parabomma nATakada vEShachEShTe ॥arasutiha jIva nAyakanu, nAyakiyavana ।keraLisuva mOharuchiye  - Mankutimma ॥ 216 ॥Life is a struggle; for wealth and pleasures, for position weak or powerful. These are pranks of the characters in the drama directed by the creator. The living being who is going through the struggle is the hero  - the protagonist. The feeling that kindles the longing for desires is the heroine.  - Mankutimma
translation: Life is a struggle; for wealth and pleasures, for position weak or powerful. These are pranks of the characters in the drama directed by the creator. The living being who is going through the struggle is the hero  - the protagonist. The feeling that kindles the longing for desires is the heroine.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕೆರಳಿಸುವ ಮೋಹರುಚಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: siri sobagugaLa bedaku, keLe balumegaLa bedaku ।parabomma nATakada vEShachEShTe ॥arasutiha jIva nAyakanu, nAyakiyavana ।keraLisuva mOharuchiye  - Mankutimma ॥ 216 ॥
kagga: ಸಿರಿ ಸೊಬಗುಗಳ ಬೆದಕು, ಕೆಳೆ ಬಲುಮೆಗಳ ಬೆದಕು ।ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮ ನಾಟಕದ ವೇಷಚೇಷ್ಟೆ ॥ಅರಸುತಿಹ ಜೀವ ನಾಯಕನು, ನಾಯಕಿಯವನ ।ಕೆರಳಿಸುವ ಮೋಹರುಚಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೬ ॥

content: ಆಗಸದ ಬಾಗು, ಚಂದ್ರಮನ ಗುಂಡಿನ ನುಣ್ಪು ।ಸಾಗರದ ತೆರೆವಂಕು, ಗಿಡಬಳ್ಳಿ ಬಳುಕು ॥ಮೇಘವರ್ಣಚ್ಛಾಯೆ  - ಯೀಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಿಂ ನಮ್ಮೊ ।ಳಾಗಿಹುದು ರೂಪರುಚಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೭ ॥Agasada bAgu, chandramana gunDina nuNpu ।sAgarada terevanku, giDa baLLi baLuku ॥mEghavarNa cChAye  - yIsRuShTiyim nammoLu ।Agihudu rUparuchi  - Mankutimma ॥ 217 ॥Let;s discuss one of the senses  - the sight. The sky that seems to meet the Earth at the horizon, the curve of the Moon, the crookedness of the waves of the sea, the dancing elegance of the plants and creepers, the darkness of the cloud, it;s shadow on the ground. By showing us all this, it is nature that taught us to indulge in this sensory pleasure.  - Mankutimma
translation: Let;s discuss one of the senses  - the sight. The sky that seems to meet the Earth at the horizon, the curve of the Moon, the crookedness of the waves of the sea, the dancing elegance of the plants and creepers, the darkness of the cloud, it;s shadow on the ground. By showing us all this, it is nature that taught us to indulge in this sensory pleasure.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಮ್ಮೊಳಾಗಿಹುದು ರೂಪರುಚಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Agasada bAgu, chandramana gunDina nuNpu ।sAgarada terevanku, giDa baLLi baLuku ॥mEghavarNa cChAye  - yIsRuShTiyim nammoLu ।Agihudu rUparuchi  - Mankutimma ॥ 217 ॥
kagga: ಆಗಸದ ಬಾಗು, ಚಂದ್ರಮನ ಗುಂಡಿನ ನುಣ್ಪು ।ಸಾಗರದ ತೆರೆವಂಕು, ಗಿಡಬಳ್ಳಿ ಬಳುಕು ॥ಮೇಘವರ್ಣಚ್ಛಾಯೆ  - ಯೀಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಿಂ ನಮ್ಮೊ ।ಳಾಗಿಹುದು ರೂಪರುಚಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೭ ॥

content: ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ರೂಪಿನಲಿ ಕಾಂತಿಯಲಿ ರಾಗದಲಿ ।ನೆರೆಯಿಸುತ ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ರಸಗಳಂ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ ॥ಕೆರಳಿಸುತ ಹಸಿವುಗಳ, ಸವಿಗಳನು ಕಲಿಸುವಳು ।ಗುರು ರುಚಿಗೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೮ ॥paripariya rUpinali kAntiyali rAgadali ।nereyisuta paripariya rasagaLam prakRuti ॥keraLisuta hasivugaLa, savigaLanu kalisuvaLu ।guru ruchige sRuShtiyala  - Mankutimma ॥ 218 ॥Nature produces so many things that are rich in beauty, brilliance and taste. It also puts hunger in man and teaches him to savour her products. Once hooked, man takes it further by creating his own combinations and creates more tasty products. But it is nature that taught him his first lessons of taste.  - Mankutimma
translation: Nature produces so many things that are rich in beauty, brilliance and taste. It also puts hunger in man and teaches him to savour her products. Once hooked, man takes it further by creating his own combinations and creates more tasty products. But it is nature that taught him his first lessons of taste.  - Mankutimma
title: ಗುರು ರುಚಿಗೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: paripariya rUpinali kAntiyali rAgadali ।nereyisuta paripariya rasagaLam prakRuti ॥keraLisuta hasivugaLa, savigaLanu kalisuvaLu ।guru ruchige sRuShtiyala  - Mankutimma ॥ 218 ॥

content: ಅರೆಯರೆಯ ನಮಗೆ ತೋರ್ಪೊಲವು ಚೆಲುವುಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ।ಪರಿಪೂರ್ಣ ಸುಖ ಸತ್ತ್ವ ಸಾಗರದ ತೆರೆಗಳ್ ॥ತರಣಿ ದೂರದೊಳಿಹನು; ಕಿರಣ ನಮಗೆಟಕುವುದು ।ತೆರೆಯು ನೆರೆತದ ಕುರುಹೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೯ ॥areyareya namage tOrpa olavu cheluvugaLella ।paripUrNa sukha sattva sAgarada teregaL ॥taraNi dUradoLihanu; kiraNa namage eTakuvudu ।tereyu neretada kuruho  - Mankutimma ॥ 219 ॥The complete truth about the cosmic spirit is vast. What little love and beauty we see (and get happy) in this world are mere waves that reach the shore. The sea of complete love and happiness is the cosmic spirit. Just like the rays of the Sun which is so far is an undeniable proof of the existence of the Sun, the waves are the proof of the existence of that ocean of happiness.  - Mankutimma
translation: The complete truth about the cosmic spirit is vast. What little love and beauty we see (and get happy) in this world are mere waves that reach the shore. The sea of complete love and happiness is the cosmic spirit. Just like the rays of the Sun which is so far is an undeniable proof of the existence of the Sun, the waves are the proof of the existence of that ocean of happiness.  - Mankutimma
title: ತೆರೆಯು ನೆರೆತದ ಕುರುಹೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: areyareya namage tOrpa olavu cheluvugaLella ।paripUrNa sukha sattva sAgarada teregaL ॥taraNi dUradoLihanu; kiraNa namage eTakuvudu ।tereyu neretada kuruho  - Mankutimma ॥ 219 ॥
kagga: ಅರೆಯರೆಯ ನಮಗೆ ತೋರ್ಪೊಲವು ಚೆಲುವುಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ।ಪರಿಪೂರ್ಣ ಸುಖ ಸತ್ತ್ವ ಸಾಗರದ ತೆರೆಗಳ್ ॥ತರಣಿ ದೂರದೊಳಿಹನು; ಕಿರಣ ನಮಗೆಟಕುವುದು ।ತೆರೆಯು ನೆರೆತದ ಕುರುಹೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧೯ ॥

content: ಸೌಂದರ್ಯ ಬಾಂಧವ್ಯಗಳು ಸತ್ಯವಲ್ಲದೊಡೆ ।ಕುಂದುವಡೆಯದ ಸತ್ಯವಿಳೆಯೊಳಿನ್ನೆಲ್ಲಿ? ॥ಗಂಧಾನಿಲಂಗಳವು ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವಪುಷ್ಪದವು ।ಸಂದೇಹವೇನಲವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೦ ॥saundarya bAndhavyagaLu satyavalladoDe ।kunduvaDeyada satyavu iLeyoLu innelli? ॥gandha anilangaLavu parasattva puShpadavu ।sandEhavEnalavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 220 ॥If beauty and compassion (relationship) are not true then what else in this world can be called as truth? Everything else either falls short or breaks down when challenged. Beauty and love are the fragrances of the flower that represents the cosmic spirit. Why is there any doubt about this?  - Mankutimma
translation: If beauty and compassion (relationship) are not true then what else in this world can be called as truth? Everything else either falls short or breaks down when challenged. Beauty and love are the fragrances of the flower that represents the cosmic spirit. Why is there any doubt about this?  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಂದೇಹವೇನಲವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: saundarya bAndhavyagaLu satyavalladoDe ।kunduvaDeyada satyavu iLeyoLu innelli? ॥gandha anilangaLavu parasattva puShpadavu ।sandEhavEnalavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 220 ॥
kagga: ಸೌಂದರ್ಯ ಬಾಂಧವ್ಯಗಳು ಸತ್ಯವಲ್ಲದೊಡೆ ।ಕುಂದುವಡೆಯದ ಸತ್ಯವಿಳೆಯೊಳಿನ್ನೆಲ್ಲಿ? ॥ಗಂಧಾನಿಲಂಗಳವು ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವಪುಷ್ಪದವು ।ಸಂದೇಹವೇನಲವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೦ ॥

content: ಅರೆಗಳಿಗೆಯನುಭವವೆ ಮಾನಸವ ಕರಗಿಸದೆ? ।ಪರಿಪಕ್ವಗೊಳಿಸದೇನದು ಜೀವರಸವ? ॥ಉರಿ ತಣಿಪುಗಳಿನಾತ್ಮಸಂಸ್ಕಾರಗಳನೆಸಪ ।ಪುರಳ ಪುಸಿಯೆನ್ನುವೆಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೧ ॥are gaLigeya anubhavave mAnasava karagisade? ।paripakvagoLisadenu adu jIvarasava ॥uri taNipugaLu ina Atma samskAragaLanu esapa ।puraLa pusiyennuveya?  - Mankutimma ॥ 221 ॥An experience lasting just half a second is enough to soften us. Don;t such experiences bring clarity and refines our convictions in life? These experiences could be pleasant or troublesome. But they touch your soul and their effect is real. Can we deny that?  - Mankutimma
translation: An experience lasting just half a second is enough to soften us. Don;t such experiences bring clarity and refines our convictions in life? These experiences could be pleasant or troublesome. But they touch your soul and their effect is real. Can we deny that?  - Mankutimma
title: ಪುರಳ ಪುಸಿಯೆನ್ನುವೆಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: are gaLigeya anubhavave mAnasava karagisade? ।paripakvagoLisadenu adu jIvarasava ॥uri taNipugaLu ina Atma samskAragaLanu esapa ।puraLa pusiyennuveya?  - Mankutimma ॥ 221 ॥
kagga: ಅರೆಗಳಿಗೆಯನುಭವವೆ ಮಾನಸವ ಕರಗಿಸದೆ? ।ಪರಿಪಕ್ವಗೊಳಿಸದೇನದು ಜೀವರಸವ? ॥ಉರಿ ತಣಿಪುಗಳಿನಾತ್ಮಸಂಸ್ಕಾರಗಳನೆಸಪ ।ಪುರಳ ಪುಸಿಯೆನ್ನುವೆಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೧ ॥

content: ಆವುದೋ ಒಳಿತೆಂದು ಆವುದೋ ಸೊಗವೆಂದು ।ಆವಾವ ದಿಕ್ಕಿನೊಳಮಾವಗಂ ಬೆದಕಿ ॥ಜೀವ ಪರಿಧಾವಿಪವೊಲ್ ಆಗಿಪಂತರ್ವೃತ್ತಿ ।ಭಾವುಕದ ನೆಲೆಯ ಕರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೨ ॥AvudO oLitendu AvudO sogavendu ।AvAva dikkinoLam Avagam bedaki ॥jIva paridhAvipavol AgipantarvRutti ।bhAvukada neleya kare  - Mankutimma ॥ 222 ॥We always seek something good and beautiful in what we already don;t have. We struggle and wander in different directions seeking the same. Man;s mind will drive his life into circles behind these longings. The mind does this to find solace and peace.  - Mankutimma
translation: We always seek something good and beautiful in what we already don;t have. We struggle and wander in different directions seeking the same. Man;s mind will drive his life into circles behind these longings. The mind does this to find solace and peace.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭಾವುಕದ ನೆಲೆಯ ಕರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: AvudO oLitendu AvudO sogavendu ।AvAva dikkinoLam Avagam bedaki ॥jIva paridhAvipavol AgipantarvRutti ।bhAvukada neleya kare  - Mankutimma ॥ 222 ॥
kagga: ಆವುದೋ ಒಳಿತೆಂದು ಆವುದೋ ಸೊಗವೆಂದು ।ಆವಾವ ದಿಕ್ಕಿನೊಳಮಾವಗಂ ಬೆದಕಿ ॥ಜೀವ ಪರಿಧಾವಿಪವೊಲ್ ಆಗಿಪಂತರ್ವೃತ್ತಿ ।ಭಾವುಕದ ನೆಲೆಯ ಕರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೨ ॥

content: ಒಡೆಯನಾವೆಡೆ ಸಾರ್ದನೆಂದು ಪದವಾಸನೆಯ ।ತಡಕಿ ಮೂಸುತ ಶುನಕನಲೆದಾಡುವಂತೆ ॥ಬಡಜಗವನೊಳಿತಕೆಂದತ್ತಿತ್ತ ಪುಡುಕಿಸುವ ।ಬೆಡಗು ಶಿವನೊಡವೆಯದೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೩ ॥oDeyanu AvaDe sArdanendu pada vAsaneya ।taDaki mUsuta shunakanu aledADuvante ॥baDa jagavanu oLitakendu attitta puDukisuva ।beDagu shivana oDaveyado  - Mankutimma ॥ 223 ॥A dog can trace his master;s footsteps by catching the scent and finally reach him. Man searches for God;s artistry just like that in this poor world. The things true and beautiful are the dropped ornaments of Him (lord Shiva).  - Mankutimma
translation: A dog can trace his master;s footsteps by catching the scent and finally reach him. Man searches for God;s artistry just like that in this poor world. The things true and beautiful are the dropped ornaments of Him (lord Shiva).  - Mankutimma
title: ಬೆಡಗು ಶಿವನೊಡವೆಯದೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: oDeyanu AvaDe sArdanendu pada vAsaneya ।taDaki mUsuta shunakanu aledADuvante ॥baDa jagavanu oLitakendu attitta puDukisuva ।beDagu shivana oDaveyado  - Mankutimma ॥ 223 ॥
kagga: ಒಡೆಯನಾವೆಡೆ ಸಾರ್ದನೆಂದು ಪದವಾಸನೆಯ ।ತಡಕಿ ಮೂಸುತ ಶುನಕನಲೆದಾಡುವಂತೆ ॥ಬಡಜಗವನೊಳಿತಕೆಂದತ್ತಿತ್ತ ಪುಡುಕಿಸುವ ।ಬೆಡಗು ಶಿವನೊಡವೆಯದೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೩ ॥

content: ಅದು ಬೇಕು ಇದು ಬೇಕು ಮತ್ತೊಂದು ಬೇಕೆಂದು ।ಬೆದಕುತಿರುವುದು ಲೋಕ ಸೊಗದಿರವನೆಳಸಿ ॥ಹೃದಯಗುಹೆಯಾ ಸುಖಧ್ಯಾನದೂಟೆಯೆ ಸಾಕ್ಷಿ ।ಮುದಗಳಮಿತದ ನಿಧಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೪ ॥adu bEku idu bEku mattondu bEkendu ।bedakutiruvudu lOka sogadiravanu eLasi ॥hRudaya guheya A sukha dhyAnada UTeye sAkShi ।mudagaLa amita nidhige  - Mankutimma ॥ 224 ॥Want that, want this and want something else. Man runs around the world with this sole thought in his mind since he feels he can be happy after getting that something. Getting that triggers a happy feeling deep in his heart. But he does not realise that the happiness was already there to begin with. There is unlimitted happiness right in his heart if only he can meditate and see it.  - Mankutimma
translation: Want that, want this and want something else. Man runs around the world with this sole thought in his mind since he feels he can be happy after getting that something. Getting that triggers a happy feeling deep in his heart. But he does not realise that the happiness was already there to begin with. There is unlimitted happiness right in his heart if only he can meditate and see it.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮುದಗಳಮಿತದ ನಿಧಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: adu bEku idu bEku mattondu bEkendu ।bedakutiruvudu lOka sogadiravanu eLasi ॥hRudaya guheya A sukha dhyAnada UTeye sAkShi ।mudagaLa amita nidhige  - Mankutimma ॥ 224 ॥
kagga: ಅದು ಬೇಕು ಇದು ಬೇಕು ಮತ್ತೊಂದು ಬೇಕೆಂದು ।ಬೆದಕುತಿರುವುದು ಲೋಕ ಸೊಗದಿರವನೆಳಸಿ ॥ಹೃದಯಗುಹೆಯಾ ಸುಖಧ್ಯಾನದೂಟೆಯೆ ಸಾಕ್ಷಿ ।ಮುದಗಳಮಿತದ ನಿಧಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೪ ॥

content: ಶರಧಿಯೊಳಗಣ ವಸ್ತುಗಳನಲಚಿ ಜಾಲಿಸುವ ।ತೆರೆಯಂತೆ ವಿಶ್ವಸತ್ತ್ವದ ಲಹರಿ ನಮ್ಮ ॥ಹೊರಗೊಳಗುಗಳಲಿ ಸಂತತ ನೆರೆದು ಹರಿಯುತ್ತ ।ಭರಿಸುತಿರುವುದು ಬಾಳ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೫ ॥sharadhiya oLagaNa vastugaLanu alachi jAlisuva ।tereyante vishva sattvada lahari namma ॥horagu oLagugalali santata neredu hariyutta ।bharisutiruvudu bALa  - Mankutimma ॥ 225 ॥The waves of the sea are relentless. They keep bringing to shore precious things from the bottom of the sea. The cosmic spirit is also relentless like the waves. It flows inside and outside of us for ever and fills us with life.  - Mankutimma
translation: The waves of the sea are relentless. They keep bringing to shore precious things from the bottom of the sea. The cosmic spirit is also relentless like the waves. It flows inside and outside of us for ever and fills us with life.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭರಿಸುತಿರುವುದು ಬಾಳ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sharadhiya oLagaNa vastugaLanu alachi jAlisuva ।tereyante vishva sattvada lahari namma ॥horagu oLagugalali santata neredu hariyutta ।bharisutiruvudu bALa  - Mankutimma ॥ 225 ॥
kagga: ಶರಧಿಯೊಳಗಣ ವಸ್ತುಗಳನಲಚಿ ಜಾಲಿಸುವ ।ತೆರೆಯಂತೆ ವಿಶ್ವಸತ್ತ್ವದ ಲಹರಿ ನಮ್ಮ ॥ಹೊರಗೊಳಗುಗಳಲಿ ಸಂತತ ನೆರೆದು ಹರಿಯುತ್ತ ।ಭರಿಸುತಿರುವುದು ಬಾಳ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೫ ॥

content: ಉಸಿರವೊಲನುಕ್ಷಣಂ ಪುರುಷನೊಳವೊಗುತವನ ।ಪೊಸಬನಂಗೆಯ್ದು ದೈವಿಕಸತ್ತ್ವಮವನುಂ ॥ಪೊಸತನವನ್ ಉಳಿದ ಲೋಕಕೆ ನೀಡೆ ದುಡಿವಂತೆ ।ಬೆಸಸುತಿಹುದೇಗಳುಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೬ ॥usiravol anukShaNam puruShana oLavoguta avana ।posabanam geydu daivika sattvam avanum ॥posatanu avan uLida lOkake nIDe duDivante ।besasutihudu EgaLum  - Mankutimma ॥ 226 ॥When a man inhales, the breath makes him a fresh and a ;new; man. The cosmic spirit is the force behind this freshness and makes the ;fresh him; work so that he can distribute the freshness to the rest of the world. This world order is maintained for ever.  - Mankutimma
translation: When a man inhales, the breath makes him a fresh and a ;new; man. The cosmic spirit is the force behind this freshness and makes the ;fresh him; work so that he can distribute the freshness to the rest of the world. This world order is maintained for ever.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬೆಸಸುತಿಹುದೇಗಳುಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: usiravol anukShaNam puruShana oLavoguta avana ।posabanam geydu daivika sattvam avanum ॥posatanu avan uLida lOkake nIDe duDivante ।besasutihudu EgaLum  - Mankutimma ॥ 226 ॥
kagga: ಉಸಿರವೊಲನುಕ್ಷಣಂ ಪುರುಷನೊಳವೊಗುತವನ ।ಪೊಸಬನಂಗೆಯ್ದು ದೈವಿಕಸತ್ತ್ವಮವನುಂ ॥ಪೊಸತನವನ್ ಉಳಿದ ಲೋಕಕೆ ನೀಡೆ ದುಡಿವಂತೆ ।ಬೆಸಸುತಿಹುದೇಗಳುಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೬ ॥

content: ನೂತ್ನತೆಯ ಪೂರ್ಣತೆಯನನ್ಯೂನತೆಯ ಗಳಿಪ ।ಯತ್ನಮೆ ಪೌರುಷಪ್ರಗತಿ; ಅದೆ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ ॥ವಿಜ್ಞಾನ ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರ ಕಲೆ ಕಾವ್ಯ ವಿದ್ಯೆಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ।ಧನ್ಯತೆಯ ಬೆದಕಾಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೭ ॥nUtnateya pUrNateya ananyUnateya gaLipa ।yatname pauruSha pragati, ade prakRuti ॥vijnAna shAstra kale kAvya vidyegaLella ।dhanyateya bedakATa  - Mankutimma ॥ 227 ॥Mankind;s progress is measured by trying to achieve freshness, completeness, lack of void. That is very natural. Science, scriptures, arts, poetry and education are all man;s way of feeling satisfied with his progress.  - Mankutimma
translation: Mankind;s progress is measured by trying to achieve freshness, completeness, lack of void. That is very natural. Science, scriptures, arts, poetry and education are all man;s way of feeling satisfied with his progress.  - Mankutimma
title: ಧನ್ಯತೆಯ ಬೆದಕಾಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nUtnateya pUrNateya ananyUnateya gaLipa ।yatname pauruSha pragati, ade prakRuti ॥vijnAna shAstra kale kAvya vidyegaLella ।dhanyateya bedakATa  - Mankutimma ॥ 227 ॥
kagga: ನೂತ್ನತೆಯ ಪೂರ್ಣತೆಯನನ್ಯೂನತೆಯ ಗಳಿಪ ।ಯತ್ನಮೆ ಪೌರುಷಪ್ರಗತಿ; ಅದೆ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ ॥ವಿಜ್ಞಾನ ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರ ಕಲೆ ಕಾವ್ಯ ವಿದ್ಯೆಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ।ಧನ್ಯತೆಯ ಬೆದಕಾಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೭ ॥

content: ಮತಿಯು ತಾಂ ಸತ್ಯಶುಭಗಳ ನವನವಾಂಶಗಳ ।ಗತಿಯನರಸುತ ನಡೆಯೆ ಪೌರುಷಪ್ರಗತಿ ॥ಮತ ನೀತಿ ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರಗಳು ರಾಜ್ಯಸಂಧಾನಗಳು ।ಮತಿಯ ಕಿಂಚಿದ್ವಿಜಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೮ ॥matiyu tAm satya shubhagaLa nava nava amshagaLa ।gatiyanu arasuta naDeye pauruSha pragati ॥mata nIti shAstragaLu rAjya sandhAnagaLu ।matiya kinchit vijaya  - Mankutimma ॥ 228 ॥The mind wanders in the search of things that are true, auspicious, and fresh. This is what he perceives as ;progress;. In that regard he has come up with his own moral framework, written scriptures, got countries to agree on treaties. All these are small victories of the mind. The real challenge is to reconcile with the inner self and find peace  - not the perceived progress  - Mankutimma
translation: The mind wanders in the search of things that are true, auspicious, and fresh. This is what he perceives as ;progress;. In that regard he has come up with his own moral framework, written scriptures, got countries to agree on treaties. All these are small victories of the mind. The real challenge is to reconcile with the inner self and find peace  - not the perceived progress  - Mankutimma
title: ಮತಿಯ ಕಿಂಚಿದ್ವಿಜಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: matiyu tAm satya shubhagaLa nava nava amshagaLa ।gatiyanu arasuta naDeye pauruSha pragati ॥mata nIti shAstragaLu rAjya sandhAnagaLu ।matiya kinchit vijaya  - Mankutimma ॥ 228 ॥
kagga: ಮತಿಯು ತಾಂ ಸತ್ಯಶುಭಗಳ ನವನವಾಂಶಗಳ ।ಗತಿಯನರಸುತ ನಡೆಯೆ ಪೌರುಷಪ್ರಗತಿ ॥ಮತ ನೀತಿ ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರಗಳು ರಾಜ್ಯಸಂಧಾನಗಳು ।ಮತಿಯ ಕಿಂಚಿದ್ವಿಜಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೮ ॥

content: ತೊರೆಯ ತೆರೆಸಾಲ್ಗಳೇಳುತ ಬೀಳುತಿರುವಂತೆ ।ಪರಿಯುತಿರ್ಪುದು ಪುರುಷಚೈತನ್ಯಲಹರಿ ॥ಅರಿಯದದು ನಿಲುಗಡೆಯ, ತೊರೆಯದದು ಚಲಗತಿಯ ।ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನುಯ್ಯಲದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೯ ॥toreya tere sAlgaLu ELuta bILitiruvante ।pariyutirpudu puruSha chaitanya lahari ॥ariyadadu nilugaDeya, toreyadadu chalagati ।parabommana uyyala adu  - Mankutimma ॥ 229 ॥The waves in a stream always ebb and fall for ever. So does the energy that drives man;s progress. It does not knows to stop. It will not give up the dynamic nature. It;s motion is like the perfect pendulum of God.  - Mankutimma
translation: The waves in a stream always ebb and fall for ever. So does the energy that drives man;s progress. It does not knows to stop. It will not give up the dynamic nature. It;s motion is like the perfect pendulum of God.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನುಯ್ಯಲದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: toreya tere sAlgaLu ELuta bILitiruvante ।pariyutirpudu puruSha chaitanya lahari ॥ariyadadu nilugaDeya, toreyadadu chalagati ।parabommana uyyala adu  - Mankutimma ॥ 229 ॥
kagga: ತೊರೆಯ ತೆರೆಸಾಲ್ಗಳೇಳುತ ಬೀಳುತಿರುವಂತೆ ।ಪರಿಯುತಿರ್ಪುದು ಪುರುಷಚೈತನ್ಯಲಹರಿ ॥ಅರಿಯದದು ನಿಲುಗಡೆಯ, ತೊರೆಯದದು ಚಲಗತಿಯ ।ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನುಯ್ಯಲದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨೯ ॥

content: ತೆರೆಯೇಳುವುದು ದೈವಸತ್ತ್ವ ನರನೊಳು ನೆರೆಯೆ ।ತೆರೆ ಬೀಳುವುದು ಕರ್ಮವಿಧಿಯಿದಿರು ಪರಿಯೆ ॥ತೆರೆಯನಾನುತೆ ತಗ್ಗು, ತಗ್ಗನಾನುತಲಿ ತೆರೆ ।ತೆರೆತಗ್ಗುಗಳಿನೆ ತೊರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೦ ॥tereyu ELuvudu daiva sattva naranoLu nereye ।tere bILuvudu karma vidhiya idiru pariye ॥tereyanu Anute taggu, tagganu Anutali tere ।tere taggugaLine tore  - Mankutimma ॥ 230 ॥Man;s progress is like the waves of a stream. They rise when the cosmic spirit fills them with freshness. When man suffers the consequences of his own actions, the wave falls. Low follows a high and high follows a low. Alternating between highs and lows is the hall mark of life.  - Mankutimma
translation: Man;s progress is like the waves of a stream. They rise when the cosmic spirit fills them with freshness. When man suffers the consequences of his own actions, the wave falls. Low follows a high and high follows a low. Alternating between highs and lows is the hall mark of life.  - Mankutimma
title: ತೆರೆತಗ್ಗುಗಳಿನೆ ತೊರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tereyu ELuvudu daiva sattva naranoLu nereye ।tere bILuvudu karma vidhiya idiru pariye ॥tereyanu Anute taggu, tagganu Anutali tere ।tere taggugaLine tore  - Mankutimma ॥ 230 ॥
kagga: ತೆರೆಯೇಳುವುದು ದೈವಸತ್ತ್ವ ನರನೊಳು ನೆರೆಯೆ ।ತೆರೆ ಬೀಳುವುದು ಕರ್ಮವಿಧಿಯಿದಿರು ಪರಿಯೆ ॥ತೆರೆಯನಾನುತೆ ತಗ್ಗು, ತಗ್ಗನಾನುತಲಿ ತೆರೆ ।ತೆರೆತಗ್ಗುಗಳಿನೆ ತೊರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೦ ॥

content: ಇಂದೆದ್ದ ತೆರೆ ನಾಳೆ ಬೀಳುವುದು; ಮರುವಗಲು ।ಮುಂದೆ ತಾನೇಳುವುದು ಬೇರೆ ಗಾತ್ರದಲಿ ॥ಇಂದು ನಾಳೆಗಳನೆಲ್ಲವ ಕೂಡಿ ನೋಡಿದೊಡೆ ।ಮುಂದಹುದು ಬೆರಗೊಂದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೧ ॥indedda tere nALe bILuvudu; maruvagalu ।munde tAnu ELuvudu bEre gAtradali ॥indu nALegalanu ellava kUDi nODidoDe ।mundahudu beragonde  - Mankutimma ॥ 231 ॥High part of today will fall tomorrow. Again it will raise tomorrow in a different spot, in a different form. Only when you see today and tomorrow together, you will realize that it has moved forward. Mankind;s progress is like that.  - Mankutimma
translation: High part of today will fall tomorrow. Again it will raise tomorrow in a different spot, in a different form. Only when you see today and tomorrow together, you will realize that it has moved forward. Mankind;s progress is like that.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮುಂದಹುದು ಬೆರಗೊಂದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: indedda tere nALe bILuvudu; maruvagalu ।munde tAnu ELuvudu bEre gAtradali ॥indu nALegalanu ellava kUDi nODidoDe ।mundahudu beragonde  - Mankutimma ॥ 231 ॥
kagga: ಇಂದೆದ್ದ ತೆರೆ ನಾಳೆ ಬೀಳುವುದು; ಮರುವಗಲು ।ಮುಂದೆ ತಾನೇಳುವುದು ಬೇರೆ ಗಾತ್ರದಲಿ ॥ಇಂದು ನಾಳೆಗಳನೆಲ್ಲವ ಕೂಡಿ ನೋಡಿದೊಡೆ ।ಮುಂದಹುದು ಬೆರಗೊಂದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೧ ॥

content: ಬೀಳುವುದ ನಿಲ್ಲಿಪುದು, ಬಿದ್ದುದನು ಕಟ್ಟುವುದು ।ಹಾಲೊಡೆಯೆ ಕಡೆದದನು ತಕ್ರವಾಗಿಪುದು ॥ಹಾಳ ಹಾಳಾಗಿಪುದು, ಹಳದ ಹೊಸತಾಗಿಪುದು ।ಬಾಳಿಗಿದೆ ಚಿರಧರ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೨ ॥bILuvuda nillipudu, biddudanu kaTTuvudu ।hAloDeye kadedu adanu takravAgipudu ॥hALa hALAgipudu, haLada hosatAgipudu ।bALigide chira dharma  - Mankutimma ॥ 232 ॥These are the only the antics of mankind. Stopping things from going bad, reconstructing things that fall apart. If milk gets spoiled, they churn it and make curds from it. Letting a few things spoil. Renewing the spoilt things by making something new from it.  - Mankutimma
translation: These are the only the antics of mankind. Stopping things from going bad, reconstructing things that fall apart. If milk gets spoiled, they churn it and make curds from it. Letting a few things spoil. Renewing the spoilt things by making something new from it.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಾಳಿಗಿದೆ ಚಿರಧರ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bILuvuda nillipudu, biddudanu kaTTuvudu ।hAloDeye kadedu adanu takravAgipudu ॥hALa hALAgipudu, haLada hosatAgipudu ।bALigide chira dharma  - Mankutimma ॥ 232 ॥
kagga: ಬೀಳುವುದ ನಿಲ್ಲಿಪುದು, ಬಿದ್ದುದನು ಕಟ್ಟುವುದು ।ಹಾಲೊಡೆಯೆ ಕಡೆದದನು ತಕ್ರವಾಗಿಪುದು ॥ಹಾಳ ಹಾಳಾಗಿಪುದು, ಹಳದ ಹೊಸತಾಗಿಪುದು ।ಬಾಳಿಗಿದೆ ಚಿರಧರ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೨ ॥

content: ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯ ವಿಧಾನದಲಿ ಸೊಟ್ಟಗಳು ನೂರಿಹುವು ।ನೆಟ್ಟಗಿಪೆನ್ ಅವನ್ ಎಂದು ನರರ ಚಿರದೀಕ್ಷೆ ॥ಇಷ್ಟಗಳನನ್ಯೋನ್ಯವವರೇಕೆ ಬಗೆದಿರರು? ।ನಿಷ್ಠುರಪ್ರಿಯರವರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೩ ॥sRuShTiya vidhAnadali soTTagaLu nUrihuvu ।neTTagipen avan endu narara chira dIkShe ॥iShTagaLanu anyOnyavavarEke bagediraru? ।niShThUra priyaravaru  - Mankutimma ॥ 233 ॥There are hundred things crooked in the ways of nature. Collectively mankind has taken a vow to correct them all. But individually their desires are all inter-related and often contradicts with that of others. But many times, the opposites do come together by attraction.  - Mankutimma
translation: There are hundred things crooked in the ways of nature. Collectively mankind has taken a vow to correct them all. But individually their desires are all inter-related and often contradicts with that of others. But many times, the opposites do come together by attraction.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಿಷ್ಠುರಪ್ರಿಯರವರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sRuShTiya vidhAnadali soTTagaLu nUrihuvu ।neTTagipen avan endu narara chira dIkShe ॥iShTagaLanu anyOnyavavarEke bagediraru? ।niShThUra priyaravaru  - Mankutimma ॥ 233 ॥
kagga: ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯ ವಿಧಾನದಲಿ ಸೊಟ್ಟಗಳು ನೂರಿಹುವು ।ನೆಟ್ಟಗಿಪೆನ್ ಅವನ್ ಎಂದು ನರರ ಚಿರದೀಕ್ಷೆ ॥ಇಷ್ಟಗಳನನ್ಯೋನ್ಯವವರೇಕೆ ಬಗೆದಿರರು? ।ನಿಷ್ಠುರಪ್ರಿಯರವರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೩ ॥

content: ಕಣ್ಣೆರಡದೇಕೆರಡುಮೊಂದೆ ಪಕ್ಕದೊಳೇಕೆ? ।ಬೆನ್ನೊಳೊಂದೆದೆಯೊಳೊಂದಿರಲು ಸುಕರವಲ? ॥ಅನ್ಯಾಯ ವಿಕಟಂಗಳೆನಿತೊ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಕ್ರಮದಿ! ।ಸೊನ್ನೆ ಜನವಾಕ್ಕಲ್ಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೪ ॥kaNNu eraDum onde pakkadoLEke? ।bennoLondu edeyoLondiralu sukaravala? ॥anyAya vikaTangaLu enito sRuShTi kramadi ।sonne jana vAk alli  - Mankutimma ॥ 234 ॥Why are the two eyes on the same side next to each other? One in the back and another in the front would be very useful. Right? Nature;s ways are sometimes strange and at times unfair also. Man;s opinions have no value there.  - Mankutimma
translation: Why are the two eyes on the same side next to each other? One in the back and another in the front would be very useful. Right? Nature;s ways are sometimes strange and at times unfair also. Man;s opinions have no value there.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸೊನ್ನೆ ಜನವಾಕ್ಕಲ್ಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kaNNu eraDum onde pakkadoLEke? ।bennoLondu edeyoLondiralu sukaravala? ॥anyAya vikaTangaLu enito sRuShTi kramadi ।sonne jana vAk alli  - Mankutimma ॥ 234 ॥
kagga: ಕಣ್ಣೆರಡದೇಕೆರಡುಮೊಂದೆ ಪಕ್ಕದೊಳೇಕೆ? ।ಬೆನ್ನೊಳೊಂದೆದೆಯೊಳೊಂದಿರಲು ಸುಕರವಲ? ॥ಅನ್ಯಾಯ ವಿಕಟಂಗಳೆನಿತೊ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಕ್ರಮದಿ! ।ಸೊನ್ನೆ ಜನವಾಕ್ಕಲ್ಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೪ ॥

content: ಧರೆ ಸಸ್ಯಫಲದಿ ಜೀವಿಗೆ ಪುಷ್ಟಿಯಿತ್ತೊಡೇಂ? ।ಮರಳಿ ತಾಂ ಪಡೆಯಳೇನ್ ಅವನಿನರ್ಧವನು? ॥ಧರಣಿಗೇ ನಮ್ಮೊಡಲು ಹುಯ್ಗಡುಬು ತಪ್ಪಲೆಯೊ! ।ಪರಮೇಷ್ಠಿ ಯುಕ್ತಿಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೫ ॥dhare sasya phaladi jIvige puShTiyittoDEm? ।maraLi tAm paDeyaLEn avanina ardhavanu? ॥dharaNigE nammoDalu huygaDubu tappaleyo ।paramEShThi yuktiyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 235 ॥The earth gives man the fruits as nutrition to help him grow. Later it takes back part of what it gives. After death man;s body gets back into earth. Our bodies are like bowls of kadubu (delicacy). It is the brilliance of the Creator that everything comes around a full circle.  - Mankutimma
translation: The earth gives man the fruits as nutrition to help him grow. Later it takes back part of what it gives. After death man;s body gets back into earth. Our bodies are like bowls of kadubu (delicacy). It is the brilliance of the Creator that everything comes around a full circle.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರಮೇಷ್ಠಿ ಯುಕ್ತಿಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dhare sasya phaladi jIvige puShTiyittoDEm? ।maraLi tAm paDeyaLEn avanina ardhavanu? ॥dharaNigE nammoDalu huygaDubu tappaleyo ।paramEShThi yuktiyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 235 ॥
kagga: ಧರೆ ಸಸ್ಯಫಲದಿ ಜೀವಿಗೆ ಪುಷ್ಟಿಯಿತ್ತೊಡೇಂ? ।ಮರಳಿ ತಾಂ ಪಡೆಯಳೇನ್ ಅವನಿನರ್ಧವನು? ॥ಧರಣಿಗೇ ನಮ್ಮೊಡಲು ಹುಯ್ಗಡುಬು ತಪ್ಪಲೆಯೊ! ।ಪರಮೇಷ್ಠಿ ಯುಕ್ತಿಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೫ ॥

content: ತರುಜಾತಿ ಖಗಜಾತಿ ಮೃಗಜಾತಿಗಳು ನೂರು ।ನರಜಾತಿ ಮಿಕ್ಕ ಜಾತಿಗಳಿಂದ ಬೇರೆ ॥ನರರೊಳೋರೊರ್ವನುಂ ತಾನೊಂದು ಬೇರೆ ಜಗ ।ಬೆರಕೆ ಸಾಮ್ಯಾಸಾಮ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೬ ॥tarujAti khagajAti mRugajAtigaLu nUru ।narajAti mikka jAtigaLinda bEre ॥nararoLu OrOrvanum tAnondu bEre jaga ।berake sAmya asAmya  - Mankutimma ॥ 236 ॥Different kinds of plants, birds and animals  - there are hundreds of them. But mankind is different. Every man lives his own world. There is individuality in every one. But, there is sameness in being human and the like for individuality.  - Mankutimma
translation: Different kinds of plants, birds and animals  - there are hundreds of them. But mankind is different. Every man lives his own world. There is individuality in every one. But, there is sameness in being human and the like for individuality.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬೆರಕೆ ಸಾಮ್ಯಾಸಾಮ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tarujAti khagajAti mRugajAtigaLu nUru ।narajAti mikka jAtigaLinda bEre ॥nararoLu OrOrvanum tAnondu bEre jaga ।berake sAmya asAmya  - Mankutimma ॥ 236 ॥
kagga: ತರುಜಾತಿ ಖಗಜಾತಿ ಮೃಗಜಾತಿಗಳು ನೂರು ।ನರಜಾತಿ ಮಿಕ್ಕ ಜಾತಿಗಳಿಂದ ಬೇರೆ ॥ನರರೊಳೋರೊರ್ವನುಂ ತಾನೊಂದು ಬೇರೆ ಜಗ ।ಬೆರಕೆ ಸಾಮ್ಯಾಸಾಮ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೬ ॥

content: ನೆಲವೊಂದೆ, ಹೊಲ ಗದ್ದೆ ತೋಟ ಮರಳೆರೆ ಬೇರೆ ।ಜಲವೊಂದೆ, ಸಿಹಿಯುಪ್ಪು ಜವುಗೂಟೆ ಬೇರೆ ॥ಕುಲವೊಂದರೊಳೆ ಸೋದರವ್ಯಕ್ತಿಗುಣ ಬೇರೆ ।ಹಲವುಮೊಂದುಂ ಸಾಜ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೭ ॥nelavonde, hola gadde tOTa maraLere bEre ।jalavonde, sihi uppu javugUTe bEre ॥kulavondaroLe sOdara vyaktiguNa bEre ।halavum ondum sAja  - Mankutimma ॥ 237 ॥Its the same land. But a farmland, a garden or a desert are all different. Water is the same. But some are sweet, salty or hard. People may be from same family. But they may have different characters. Being same as others and being different are all very natural.  - Mankutimma
translation: Its the same land. But a farmland, a garden or a desert are all different. Water is the same. But some are sweet, salty or hard. People may be from same family. But they may have different characters. Being same as others and being different are all very natural.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹಲವುಮೊಂದುಂ ಸಾಜ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nelavonde, hola gadde tOTa maraLere bEre ।jalavonde, sihi uppu javugUTe bEre ॥kulavondaroLe sOdara vyaktiguNa bEre ।halavum ondum sAja  - Mankutimma ॥ 237 ॥
kagga: ನೆಲವೊಂದೆ, ಹೊಲ ಗದ್ದೆ ತೋಟ ಮರಳೆರೆ ಬೇರೆ ।ಜಲವೊಂದೆ, ಸಿಹಿಯುಪ್ಪು ಜವುಗೂಟೆ ಬೇರೆ ॥ಕುಲವೊಂದರೊಳೆ ಸೋದರವ್ಯಕ್ತಿಗುಣ ಬೇರೆ ।ಹಲವುಮೊಂದುಂ ಸಾಜ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೭ ॥

content: ಮನುಜಕುಲವೊಂದೊಬ್ಬನಿನ್ನೊಬ್ಬನಂತಿಲ್ಲ ।ತನುವಂಗಗಳೊಳೊಂದು, ರೂಪ ಗುಣ ಬೇರೆ ॥ಮನದೊಳೊಬ್ಬೊಬ್ಬನೊಂದೊಂದು, ಪ್ರಪಂಚವಿಂ ।ತನುವೇಕದೊಳ್ ಬಹುಳ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೮ ॥manuja kulavondu obbanu innobbanante illa ।tanuvu angagaLoLu ondu, rUpa guNa bEre ॥manadoLu obbobbanu ondondu, prapanchavim ।tanuvEkadOL bahuLa  - Mankutimma ॥ 238 ॥Mankind is thus. Each individual is unique. They may resemble each other in form  - body and organs. But in terms of qualities and character, they are all different. In their mind each one lives in their own world (with them as the center). This is the paradox of people being different and the same.  - Mankutimma
translation: Mankind is thus. Each individual is unique. They may resemble each other in form  - body and organs. But in terms of qualities and character, they are all different. In their mind each one lives in their own world (with them as the center). This is the paradox of people being different and the same.  - Mankutimma
title: ತನುವೇಕದೊಳ್ ಬಹುಳ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: manuja kulavondu obbanu innobbanante illa ।tanuvu angagaLoLu ondu, rUpa guNa bEre ॥manadoLu obbobbanu ondondu, prapanchavim ।tanuvEkadOL bahuLa  - Mankutimma ॥ 238 ॥
kagga: ಮನುಜಕುಲವೊಂದೊಬ್ಬನಿನ್ನೊಬ್ಬನಂತಿಲ್ಲ ।ತನುವಂಗಗಳೊಳೊಂದು, ರೂಪ ಗುಣ ಬೇರೆ ॥ಮನದೊಳೊಬ್ಬೊಬ್ಬನೊಂದೊಂದು, ಪ್ರಪಂಚವಿಂ ।ತನುವೇಕದೊಳ್ ಬಹುಳ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೮ ॥

content: ಸಮವಿಲ್ಲ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ, ನರನಂತೆ ನರನಿಲ್ಲ ।ಕ್ಷಮೆಯುಮವಳೊಳಗಿಲ್ಲ, ಕರ್ಮದಂತೆ ಫಲ ॥ಕ್ರಮವೊಂದ ನೀಮಾಗಿಸಿರಿ ನೋಳ್ಪೆನಾನೆನುತೆ ।ನಮಗವಳ್ ಪ್ರಸ್ಪರ್ಧಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೯ ॥samavilla sRuShTiyali, naranante naranilla ।kShameyum avaLoLagilla, karmadante phala ॥kramavonda nImAgisiri nOLpe nAnu enute ।namagavaL praspardhi  - Mankutimma ॥ 239 ॥There is very little likeness in the creation. One man is not like the other. This gives the feeling that it is all random. But Nature seems to have a good hold of the whole act and runs it according to a plan. She has no forgiveness. She makes sure that one always faces consequences of his action  - good or bad. If you think you can alter any one process in her order, she will challenge you. She is your adversary then.   - Mankutimma
translation: There is very little likeness in the creation. One man is not like the other. This gives the feeling that it is all random. But Nature seems to have a good hold of the whole act and runs it according to a plan. She has no forgiveness. She makes sure that one always faces consequences of his action  - good or bad. If you think you can alter any one process in her order, she will challenge you. She is your adversary then.   - Mankutimma
title: ನಮಗವಳ್ ಪ್ರಸ್ಪರ್ಧಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: samavilla sRuShTiyali, naranante naranilla ।kShameyum avaLoLagilla, karmadante phala ॥kramavonda nImAgisiri nOLpe nAnu enute ।namagavaL praspardhi  - Mankutimma ॥ 239 ॥
kagga: ಸಮವಿಲ್ಲ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ, ನರನಂತೆ ನರನಿಲ್ಲ ।ಕ್ಷಮೆಯುಮವಳೊಳಗಿಲ್ಲ, ಕರ್ಮದಂತೆ ಫಲ ॥ಕ್ರಮವೊಂದ ನೀಮಾಗಿಸಿರಿ ನೋಳ್ಪೆನಾನೆನುತೆ ।ನಮಗವಳ್ ಪ್ರಸ್ಪರ್ಧಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩೯ ॥

content: ಬೆರಳುಗಳ ನೋಡವುಗಳೊಂದರಂತೊಂದಿಲ್ಲ ।ಕರಧರ್ಮಕುಚಿತವಾ ಹೆಚ್ಚು ಕಡಮೆಗಳು ॥ಪುರಳ ಪಿಡಿವುವೆ ಬೆರಳ್ಗಳೆಲ್ಲಮೊಂದುದ್ದವಿರೆ? ।ಸರಿಯಹುದು ಕಾರ್ಯದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೦ ॥beraLugaLa nODu avugaLa ondarantondilla ।karadharmake uchitavu A hecchu kaDimegaLu ॥puraLa piDivuve beraLgaLu ellamu onduddavire? ।sariyahudu kAryadali  - Mankutimma ॥ 240 ॥Look at out fingers. No two of them are alike. For the fingers, it is good to be dissimilar like that. Can the fingers hold any thing firmly if they were all alike? They are good as they are  - dissimilar.  - Mankutimma
translation: Look at out fingers. No two of them are alike. For the fingers, it is good to be dissimilar like that. Can the fingers hold any thing firmly if they were all alike? They are good as they are  - dissimilar.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸರಿಯಹುದು ಕಾರ್ಯದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: beraLugaLa nODu avugaLa ondarantondilla ।karadharmake uchitavu A hecchu kaDimegaLu ॥puraLa piDivuve beraLgaLu ellamu onduddavire? ।sariyahudu kAryadali  - Mankutimma ॥ 240 ॥
kagga: ಬೆರಳುಗಳ ನೋಡವುಗಳೊಂದರಂತೊಂದಿಲ್ಲ ।ಕರಧರ್ಮಕುಚಿತವಾ ಹೆಚ್ಚು ಕಡಮೆಗಳು ॥ಪುರಳ ಪಿಡಿವುವೆ ಬೆರಳ್ಗಳೆಲ್ಲಮೊಂದುದ್ದವಿರೆ? ।ಸರಿಯಹುದು ಕಾರ್ಯದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೦ ॥

content: ಅಸಮದಲಿ ಸಮತೆಯನು ವಿಷಮದಲಿ ಮೈತ್ರಿಯನು ।ಅಸಮಂಜಸದಿ ಸಮನ್ವಯ ಸೂತ್ರ ನಯವ ॥ವೆಸನಮಯ ಸಂಸಾರದಲಿ ವಿನೋದವ ಕಾಣ್ಬ ।ರಸಿಕತೆಯೆ ಯೋಗವಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೧ ॥asamadali samateyanu viShamadali maitriyanu ।asamanjasadi samanvaya sUtra nayava ॥vesanamaya samsAradali vinOdava kANba ।rasikateye yOgavalo  - Mankutimma ॥ 241 ॥One attains inner peace when he can see oneness among the dissimilar, when he respect friendship even in the face of danger, when one can come up with a recipe for harmony in chaos, when he is tasteful to find humour in this world filled with misery.  - Mankutimma
translation: One attains inner peace when he can see oneness among the dissimilar, when he respect friendship even in the face of danger, when one can come up with a recipe for harmony in chaos, when he is tasteful to find humour in this world filled with misery.  - Mankutimma
title: ರಸಿಕತೆಯೆ ಯೋಗವಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: asamadali samateyanu viShamadali maitriyanu ।asamanjasadi samanvaya sUtra nayava ॥vesanamaya samsAradali vinOdava kANba ।rasikateye yOgavalo  - Mankutimma ॥ 241 ॥
kagga: ಅಸಮದಲಿ ಸಮತೆಯನು ವಿಷಮದಲಿ ಮೈತ್ರಿಯನು ।ಅಸಮಂಜಸದಿ ಸಮನ್ವಯ ಸೂತ್ರ ನಯವ ॥ವೆಸನಮಯ ಸಂಸಾರದಲಿ ವಿನೋದವ ಕಾಣ್ಬ ।ರಸಿಕತೆಯೆ ಯೋಗವಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೧ ॥

content: ಐಕ್ಯ ನಾನಾತ್ವಗಳು, ನಿಯತಿ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರಗಳು ।ತರ್ಕ್ಯ ನಿಸ್ತರ್ಕ್ಯಗಳು ಬೆರತು ಚಿತ್ರದಲಿ ॥ಶಕ್ಯಮುಂ ಪುರುಷತಂತ್ರಕ್ಕಶಕ್ಯಮುಮಾದ ।ಸಿಕ್ಕಗಳ ಕಂತೆ ಜಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೨ ॥aikya nAnAtvagaLu, niyati svatantragaLu ।tarkya nistarkyagaLu beratu chitradali ॥shakyamum puruShatantrakke ashakyamum Ada ।sikkagaLa kante jaga  - Mankutimma ॥ 242 ॥Oneness and multiplicity, controlled and independent, logical and illogical, things are achievable by man;s endeavors and those that are impossible are all mixed up in this picture of the world which is a knotty mess.  - Mankutimma
translation: Oneness and multiplicity, controlled and independent, logical and illogical, things are achievable by man;s endeavors and those that are impossible are all mixed up in this picture of the world which is a knotty mess.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಿಕ್ಕಗಳ ಕಂತೆ ಜಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aikya nAnAtvagaLu, niyati svatantragaLu ।tarkya nistarkyagaLu beratu chitradali ॥shakyamum puruShatantrakke ashakyamum Ada ।sikkagaLa kante jaga  - Mankutimma ॥ 242 ॥
kagga: ಐಕ್ಯ ನಾನಾತ್ವಗಳು, ನಿಯತಿ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರಗಳು ।ತರ್ಕ್ಯ ನಿಸ್ತರ್ಕ್ಯಗಳು ಬೆರತು ಚಿತ್ರದಲಿ ॥ಶಕ್ಯಮುಂ ಪುರುಷತಂತ್ರಕ್ಕಶಕ್ಯಮುಮಾದ ।ಸಿಕ್ಕಗಳ ಕಂತೆ ಜಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೨ ॥

content: ಸಮವರ್ತಿಗಳು ಜಗದೊಳಿಬ್ಬರೇ ದಿಟವರಿಯೆ ।ಯಮರಾಜನೊಬ್ಬ ಜಾಠರರಾಜನೊಬ್ಬ ॥ಶ್ರಮವನನುದಿನಮುಮಾಗಿಪನೊಬ್ಬನೆಲ್ಲವನು ।ಶಮಿಸಿ ಮುಗಿಸುವನೊಬ್ಬ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೩ ॥smavartigaLu jagadoLibbarE diTavariye ।yamarAjanobba jAThararAjanobba ॥shramavanu anudinamum Agipanobbanu ellavanu ।shamisi mugisuvanobba  - Mankutimma ॥ 243 ॥There are only two people who treat every one uniformly. One is Yama, the God of death and the other is the King of stomach (hunger). Hunger will haunt every one and force them to do something or other every day. The other will take every thing away and put an end to everyone.  - Mankutimma
translation: There are only two people who treat every one uniformly. One is Yama, the God of death and the other is the King of stomach (hunger). Hunger will haunt every one and force them to do something or other every day. The other will take every thing away and put an end to everyone.  - Mankutimma
title: ಶಮಿಸಿ ಮುಗಿಸುವನೊಬ್ಬ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: smavartigaLu jagadoLibbarE diTavariye ।yamarAjanobba jAThararAjanobba ॥shramavanu anudinamum Agipanobbanu ellavanu ।shamisi mugisuvanobba  - Mankutimma ॥ 243 ॥
kagga: ಸಮವರ್ತಿಗಳು ಜಗದೊಳಿಬ್ಬರೇ ದಿಟವರಿಯೆ ।ಯಮರಾಜನೊಬ್ಬ ಜಾಠರರಾಜನೊಬ್ಬ ॥ಶ್ರಮವನನುದಿನಮುಮಾಗಿಪನೊಬ್ಬನೆಲ್ಲವನು ।ಶಮಿಸಿ ಮುಗಿಸುವನೊಬ್ಬ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೩ ॥

content: ಒಲ್ಲೆನೆನುವರದಾರ್ ಅಹಿಂಸೆತತ್ತ್ವದ ಸೊಬಗ? ।ಸಲ್ಲಿಸುವೆನಾ ವ್ರತವನೆನಲೊಂದು ತೊಡಕು ॥ಹುಲ್ಲೆಯನು ತಿನುವ ಹುಲಿಯೊಣಹುಲ್ಲನುಣಲಹುದೆ ।ಎಲ್ಲಿ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ ದಯೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೪ ॥ollenu enuvaru adAr ahimse tattvada sobaga? ।sallisuvenA vratavanu enalondu toDaku ॥hulleyanu tinuva huliyu oNahullanu uNalahude ।elli sRuShTiyali daye?  - Mankutimma ॥ 244 ॥Who does not appreciate the virtue of non-violence as a philosophy. Problems arise only when we start following it and intend not to harm any one. Can a tiger stop eating a deer and live on dry grass? There is no place for compassion in this nature.  - Mankutimma
translation: Who does not appreciate the virtue of non-violence as a philosophy. Problems arise only when we start following it and intend not to harm any one. Can a tiger stop eating a deer and live on dry grass? There is no place for compassion in this nature.  - Mankutimma
title: ಎಲ್ಲಿ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ ದಯೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ollenu enuvaru adAr ahimse tattvada sobaga? ।sallisuvenA vratavanu enalondu toDaku ॥hulleyanu tinuva huliyu oNahullanu uNalahude ।elli sRuShTiyali daye?  - Mankutimma ॥ 244 ॥
kagga: ಒಲ್ಲೆನೆನುವರದಾರ್ ಅಹಿಂಸೆತತ್ತ್ವದ ಸೊಬಗ? ।ಸಲ್ಲಿಸುವೆನಾ ವ್ರತವನೆನಲೊಂದು ತೊಡಕು ॥ಹುಲ್ಲೆಯನು ತಿನುವ ಹುಲಿಯೊಣಹುಲ್ಲನುಣಲಹುದೆ ।ಎಲ್ಲಿ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ ದಯೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೪ ॥

content: ಕೊಲೆಗಡಿಕನೆನಿಪ ಹುಲಿ ಸಲಹದೇಂ ಮರಿಗಳನು? ।ಒಲುಮೆಕರುಳಡಗಿಹುದು ಪಗೆತನದ ಪೊಡೆಯೊಳ್ ॥ನಲುಮೆಯನು ಹೊರಹೊಮ್ಮಿಸುವುದು ನರನುನ್ನತಿಕೆ ।ಒಲವಾತ್ಮವಿಸ್ತರಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೫ ॥kolegaDikanu enipa huli salahadEm marigaLanu? ।olumekaruLa aDagihudu pagetanada poDeyoL ॥nalumeyanu horahommisuvudu narana unnatike ।olavu Atma vistaraNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 245 ॥You may call a tiger cruel and a murderer. But does it not care for its own cubs? It shows that it is capable of love that is hidden in its belly  - deep inside its body that shows off only hatred. So is the innate nature of man. But his greatness is in getting the love out into open. That love is also a means to enrich his soul.  - Mankutimma
translation: You may call a tiger cruel and a murderer. But does it not care for its own cubs? It shows that it is capable of love that is hidden in its belly  - deep inside its body that shows off only hatred. So is the innate nature of man. But his greatness is in getting the love out into open. That love is also a means to enrich his soul.  - Mankutimma
title: ಒಲವಾತ್ಮವಿಸ್ತರಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kolegaDikanu enipa huli salahadEm marigaLanu? ।olumekaruLa aDagihudu pagetanada poDeyoL ॥nalumeyanu horahommisuvudu narana unnatike ।olavu Atma vistaraNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 245 ॥

content: ಪ್ರೇಮಬೀಜಗಳಿಹುವು ವೈರಬೀಜಗಳವೊಲೆ ।ಸೌಮ್ಯಮುಂ ಸಂಕ್ಷೋಭೆಯಂತೆ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಯಲಿ ॥ಭ್ರಾಮಕದ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಾ ವಿಷಮಲಕ್ಷಣಗಳಲಿ ।ಸಾಮರಸ್ಯವನರಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೬ ॥prEmabIjagaLu ihuvu vaira bIjagaLavole ।saumyamum sankShObheyante prakRutiyali ॥bhrAmakada sRuShTiyA viShama lakShaNagaLali ।sAmarasyavanu araso  - Mankutimma ॥ 246 ॥In this world there are seeds of love, just like there are seeds of hatred. Just like there is peace and calm, there is misery and turmoil in this nature. Seeing all these contradictions in this creation, our mind may wander. But we must strive to search for the truth that unifies them all.  - Mankutimma
translation: In this world there are seeds of love, just like there are seeds of hatred. Just like there is peace and calm, there is misery and turmoil in this nature. Seeing all these contradictions in this creation, our mind may wander. But we must strive to search for the truth that unifies them all.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಾಮರಸ್ಯವನರಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: prEmabIjagaLu ihuvu vaira bIjagaLavole ।saumyamum sankShObheyante prakRutiyali ॥bhrAmakada sRuShTiyA viShama lakShaNagaLali ।sAmarasyavanu araso  - Mankutimma ॥ 246 ॥
