content: ಮನದಿಂದ ಮನಕೆ ಪಾರ್ವುದು ಬಾಳಿನುರಿಯ ಕಿಡಿ ।ಮನೆಯಿಂದ ಮನೆಗಲೆವ ಗಾಳಿ ಹೊಗೆಯಂತೆ ॥ಮನುಜರ ಪರಸ್ಪರೋದ್ರೇಕ ಜಗದ ವಿಲಾಸ ।ಮನವೆ ಪರಮಾದ್ಭುತವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೭ ॥manadinda manake pArvudu bALina uriya kiDi ।maneyinda manege aleva gALi hogeyante ॥manujara paraspara udrEka jagada vilAsa ।manave parama adbhutavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 246 ॥Worries in life travel from mind to mind when people exchange their thoughts and fears. Just like wind carries smoke from house to house. The beauty of this world is that minds of men feed on each others anxiety and creates spectacle. Mind is a miracle.  - Mankutimma
translation: Worries in life travel from mind to mind when people exchange their thoughts and fears. Just like wind carries smoke from house to house. The beauty of this world is that minds of men feed on each others anxiety and creates spectacle. Mind is a miracle.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮನವೆ ಪರಮಾದ್ಭುತವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: manadinda manake pArvudu bALina uriya kiDi ।maneyinda manege aleva gALi hogeyante ॥manujara paraspara udrEka jagada vilAsa ।manave parama adbhutavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 246 ॥
kagga: ಮನದಿಂದ ಮನಕೆ ಪಾರ್ವುದು ಬಾಳಿನುರಿಯ ಕಿಡಿ ।ಮನೆಯಿಂದ ಮನೆಗಲೆವ ಗಾಳಿ ಹೊಗೆಯಂತೆ ॥ಮನುಜರ ಪರಸ್ಪರೋದ್ರೇಕ ಜಗದ ವಿಲಾಸ ।ಮನವೆ ಪರಮಾದ್ಭುತವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೭ ॥

content: ತೆರಿಗೆಗಳು ಹಲವುಂಟು ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಗಂ ಸಲ್ಲುವುವು ।ತೆರದೆ ನೀಂ ಮರೆಯೆ ದಂಡಿಪಳಾಕೆ ಮುನಿದು ॥ಕರಣಂಗಳಾಕೆಯವು ಮಿತದೊಳವುಗಳ ಬಳಸಿ ।ತೆರು ಸಲುವ ಬಾಡಿಗೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೮ ॥terigegaLu halavunTu prakRutigam salluvuvu ।terade nIm mareye danDipaLu Ake munidu ॥karaNangaLu Akeyavu mitadoL avugala baLasi ।teru saluva bADigeya  - Mankutimma ॥ 248 ॥There are many taxes that are due to nature from us (and rightly so). If you forget to pay, then she will punish. But she has all the apparatus needed to make progress. We should use them in moderation and pay her the rent for them.  - Mankutimma
translation: There are many taxes that are due to nature from us (and rightly so). If you forget to pay, then she will punish. But she has all the apparatus needed to make progress. We should use them in moderation and pay her the rent for them.  - Mankutimma
title: ತೆರು ಸಲುವ ಬಾಡಿಗೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: terigegaLu halavunTu prakRutigam salluvuvu ।terade nIm mareye danDipaLu Ake munidu ॥karaNangaLu Akeyavu mitadoL avugala baLasi ।teru saluva bADigeya  - Mankutimma ॥ 248 ॥
kagga: ತೆರಿಗೆಗಳು ಹಲವುಂಟು ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಗಂ ಸಲ್ಲುವುವು ।ತೆರದೆ ನೀಂ ಮರೆಯೆ ದಂಡಿಪಳಾಕೆ ಮುನಿದು ॥ಕರಣಂಗಳಾಕೆಯವು ಮಿತದೊಳವುಗಳ ಬಳಸಿ ।ತೆರು ಸಲುವ ಬಾಡಿಗೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೮ ॥

content: ಹಾಳು ಹಾಳೆಲ್ಲ ಬಾಳೆನ್ನುತಿರ್ದೊಡೆಯುಮದ- ।ರೂಳಿಗವ ತಪ್ಪಿಸುವ ಜಾಣನೆಲ್ಲಿಹನು? ॥ಊಳಿಗವೊ ಕಾಳಗವೊ ಕೂಳ್ಕರೆಯೊ ಗೋಳ್ಕರೆಯೊ ।ಬಾಳು ಬಾಳದೆ ಬಿಡದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೯ ॥hALu hALella bALu ennutirdoDeyum adara ।ULigava tappisuva jANanellihanu? ॥ULigavo kALagavo kULkareyo gOLkareyo ।bALu bALade biDadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 249 ॥One may say  - all life is a waste, futile. But having said so, is there any one smart enough to free himself from its bondage? Misery or battle, happiness or sadness  - one has to live his life. Life does not give you a choice not to.  - Mankutimma
translation: One may say  - all life is a waste, futile. But having said so, is there any one smart enough to free himself from its bondage? Misery or battle, happiness or sadness  - one has to live his life. Life does not give you a choice not to.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಾಳು ಬಾಳದೆ ಬಿಡದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hALu hALella bALu ennutirdoDeyum adara ।ULigava tappisuva jANanellihanu? ॥ULigavo kALagavo kULkareyo gOLkareyo ।bALu bALade biDadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 249 ॥
kagga: ಹಾಳು ಹಾಳೆಲ್ಲ ಬಾಳೆನ್ನುತಿರ್ದೊಡೆಯುಮದ- ।ರೂಳಿಗವ ತಪ್ಪಿಸುವ ಜಾಣನೆಲ್ಲಿಹನು? ॥ಊಳಿಗವೊ ಕಾಳಗವೊ ಕೂಳ್ಕರೆಯೊ ಗೋಳ್ಕರೆಯೊ ।ಬಾಳು ಬಾಳದೆ ಬಿಡದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪೯ ॥

content: ಜೀವನವದೊಂದು ಪರಮೈಶ್ವರ್ಯ ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು ।ಸೇವೆಯದನೂರ್ಜಿತಂಗೊಳಿಸುವೆಲ್ಲೆಸಕ ॥ಈವರಾರ್ ಕೊಳುವರಾರೆಲ್ಲರೊಂದಾಗಿರಲು? ।ನೈವೇದ್ಯಭಾಗಿ ನೀಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೦ ॥jIvanavu adondu paramaishvarya bommandu ।sEveyadanu UrjitangoLisuvalli esaka ॥eevarAr koLuvarAr ellaru ondAgiralu? ।naivEdya bhAgi nIm  - Mankutimma ॥ 250 ॥Life is a precious wealth. But that belongs the creator. We are living it only to materialize His whims and wishes. In this process we exchange so many things with other fellow creatures. But how can we separate who is the giver or who is the taker, when all of them are part of the same One. All of your experiences  - good or bad  - are just handed over to you by Him.  - Mankutimma
translation: Life is a precious wealth. But that belongs the creator. We are living it only to materialize His whims and wishes. In this process we exchange so many things with other fellow creatures. But how can we separate who is the giver or who is the taker, when all of them are part of the same One. All of your experiences  - good or bad  - are just handed over to you by Him.  - Mankutimma
title: ನೈವೇದ್ಯಭಾಗಿ ನೀಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jIvanavu adondu paramaishvarya bommandu ।sEveyadanu UrjitangoLisuvalli esaka ॥eevarAr koLuvarAr ellaru ondAgiralu? ।naivEdya bhAgi nIm  - Mankutimma ॥ 250 ॥
kagga: ಜೀವನವದೊಂದು ಪರಮೈಶ್ವರ್ಯ ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು ।ಸೇವೆಯದನೂರ್ಜಿತಂಗೊಳಿಸುವೆಲ್ಲೆಸಕ ॥ಈವರಾರ್ ಕೊಳುವರಾರೆಲ್ಲರೊಂದಾಗಿರಲು? ।ನೈವೇದ್ಯಭಾಗಿ ನೀಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೦ ॥

content: ತಲೆಯಮೇಗಡೆ ಬೇರು, ಕೆಳಗೆ ಕೊಂಬೆಲೆ ಚಿಗುರು ।ಬಿಳಲೂರೆಗಳ ಲೆಕ್ಕಕಿಲ್ಲ ಕೊನೆ ಮೊದಲು ॥ಬೆಳೆವುದೀ ಪರಿಯರಳಿಮರದಂತೆ ನರಕೋಟಿ ।ನಲಿವನದರಲಿ ಬೊಮ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೧ ॥taleya mEgaDe bEru, keLage kombe ele chiguru ।bILalUregaLa lekkakilla kone modalu ॥beLevudI pariya araLi maradante narakOTi ।nalivanu adarali bomma  - Mankutimma ॥ 251 ॥The roots are above its head. Below are the branches and the fresh sprouts. The shoots that supports it are countless. There is neither a beginning nor any end to this banyan tree. Just like the tree, mankind (and the rest of nature) grows unhindered. The creator is just revelling in his own creation.  - Mankutimma
translation: The roots are above its head. Below are the branches and the fresh sprouts. The shoots that supports it are countless. There is neither a beginning nor any end to this banyan tree. Just like the tree, mankind (and the rest of nature) grows unhindered. The creator is just revelling in his own creation.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಲಿವನದರಲಿ ಬೊಮ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: taleya mEgaDe bEru, keLage kombe ele chiguru ।bILalUregaLa lekkakilla kone modalu ॥beLevudI pariya araLi maradante narakOTi ।nalivanu adarali bomma  - Mankutimma ॥ 251 ॥
kagga: ತಲೆಯಮೇಗಡೆ ಬೇರು, ಕೆಳಗೆ ಕೊಂಬೆಲೆ ಚಿಗುರು ।ಬಿಳಲೂರೆಗಳ ಲೆಕ್ಕಕಿಲ್ಲ ಕೊನೆ ಮೊದಲು ॥ಬೆಳೆವುದೀ ಪರಿಯರಳಿಮರದಂತೆ ನರಕೋಟಿ ।ನಲಿವನದರಲಿ ಬೊಮ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೧ ॥

content: ಒಂದು ಕೊಂಬೆಯು ಬಾಡಲಿನ್ನೊಂದು ಚಿಗುರುವುದು ।ಸಂದಿಹುದು ಚಿರನವತೆಯಶ್ವತ್ಥಮರಕೆ ॥ಎಂದೆಂದುಮಂತಿರುವುದೀ ವಿಶ್ವವೃಕ್ಷವದ ।ರೊಂದು ರೆಂಬೆಯೊ ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೨ ॥ondu kombeyu bADalu innodu chiguruvudu ।sandihudu chira navateyu ashvattha marake ॥endendum antiruvudI vishva vRukShavu adara ।ondu rembeyo nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 252 ॥If one branch wilts, another one sprouts. Thus this banyan tree is bestowed with endless freshness. This tree will be like this for ever and every day. You are just one branch of it.  - Mankutimma
translation: If one branch wilts, another one sprouts. Thus this banyan tree is bestowed with endless freshness. This tree will be like this for ever and every day. You are just one branch of it.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅದರೊಂದು ರೆಂಬೆಯೊ ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ondu kombeyu bADalu innodu chiguruvudu ।sandihudu chira navateyu ashvattha marake ॥endendum antiruvudI vishva vRukShavu adara ।ondu rembeyo nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 252 ॥
kagga: ಒಂದು ಕೊಂಬೆಯು ಬಾಡಲಿನ್ನೊಂದು ಚಿಗುರುವುದು ।ಸಂದಿಹುದು ಚಿರನವತೆಯಶ್ವತ್ಥಮರಕೆ ॥ಎಂದೆಂದುಮಂತಿರುವುದೀ ವಿಶ್ವವೃಕ್ಷವದ ।ರೊಂದು ರೆಂಬೆಯೊ ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೨ ॥

content: ಅಂದಂದಿಗಾದನಿತು ಬುಡ ಕಟ್ಟಿ ಕಳೆ ತೆಗೆದು ।ಚೆಂದಳಿರು ದಿನದಿನಮುಮೊಗೆಯೆ ನೀರೆರೆದು ॥ಸಂದ ಬಲದಿಂದ ಜಗದಶ್ವತ್ಥ ಸೇವೆಯಲಿ ।ನಿಂದಿರುವುದಲೆ ಧರ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೩ ॥andandige Adanitu buDa kaTTi kaLe tegedu ।chenda taLiru dinadinamu mogeye nIreredu ॥sanda baladinda jagada ashvattha sEveyali ।nindiruvudale dharma  - Mankutimma ॥ 253 ॥Everyday one must tend to this tree as much or as little life permits. He must make the root stable, take out the weeds, pour water. The tree takes strength from this care and gives out beautiful sprouts and grows. It is best if we stand at the service of this tree that symbolises our entire world.  - Mankutimma
translation: Everyday one must tend to this tree as much or as little life permits. He must make the root stable, take out the weeds, pour water. The tree takes strength from this care and gives out beautiful sprouts and grows. It is best if we stand at the service of this tree that symbolises our entire world.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಿಂದಿರುವುದಲೆ ಧರ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: andandige Adanitu buDa kaTTi kaLe tegedu ।chenda taLiru dinadinamu mogeye nIreredu ॥sanda baladinda jagada ashvattha sEveyali ।nindiruvudale dharma  - Mankutimma ॥ 253 ॥
kagga: ಅಂದಂದಿಗಾದನಿತು ಬುಡ ಕಟ್ಟಿ ಕಳೆ ತೆಗೆದು ।ಚೆಂದಳಿರು ದಿನದಿನಮುಮೊಗೆಯೆ ನೀರೆರೆದು ॥ಸಂದ ಬಲದಿಂದ ಜಗದಶ್ವತ್ಥ ಸೇವೆಯಲಿ ।ನಿಂದಿರುವುದಲೆ ಧರ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೩ ॥

content: ನಾಟಕವ ನೋಡು ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಾಂಡರಂಗಸ್ಥಲದಿ ।ಕೋಟಿ ನಟರಾಂತಿಹರು ಚಿತ್ರಪಾತ್ರಗಳ ॥ಆಟಕ್ಕೆ ಕಥೆಯಿಲ್ಲ ಮೊದಲಿಲ್ಲ ಕಡೆಯಿಲ್ಲ ।ನೋಟಕರು ಮಾಟಕರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೪ ॥nATakava nODu brahmAnDa ranga sthaladi ।kOTi naTarAntiharu chitra pAtragaLa ॥ATakke katheyilla modalilla kaDeyilla ।nOTakaru mATakare  - Mankutimma ॥ 254 ॥Look at the drama happening on the stage of the Universe. Crores of people are playing colorful characters. This drama has no plot, no beginning and no ending. Here, the audience are also part of the act and play characters.  - Mankutimma
translation: Look at the drama happening on the stage of the Universe. Crores of people are playing colorful characters. This drama has no plot, no beginning and no ending. Here, the audience are also part of the act and play characters.  - Mankutimma
title: ನೋಟಕರು ಮಾಟಕರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nATakava nODu brahmAnDa ranga sthaladi ।kOTi naTarAntiharu chitra pAtragaLa ॥ATakke katheyilla modalilla kaDeyilla ।nOTakaru mATakare  - Mankutimma ॥ 254 ॥
kagga: ನಾಟಕವ ನೋಡು ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಾಂಡರಂಗಸ್ಥಲದಿ ।ಕೋಟಿ ನಟರಾಂತಿಹರು ಚಿತ್ರಪಾತ್ರಗಳ ॥ಆಟಕ್ಕೆ ಕಥೆಯಿಲ್ಲ ಮೊದಲಿಲ್ಲ ಕಡೆಯಿಲ್ಲ ।ನೋಟಕರು ಮಾಟಕರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೪ ॥

content: ನಾಟಕದೊಳನುವಿಂದ ಬೆರತದನು ಮೆಚ್ಚೆನಿಸಿ ।ನೋಟಕನುಮಾಗಿ ತಾಂ ನಲಿದು ನಲಿಯಿಸುವಾ ॥ಪಾಠವನು ಕಲಿತವನೆ ಬಾಳನಾಳುವ ಯೋಗಿ ।ಆಟಕಂ ನಯವುಂಟು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೫ ॥nATakadoLu anuvinda beretu adanu mecchenisi ।nOTakanum Agi tAm nalidu naliyusuva A ॥pAThavanu kalitavane bALanu ALuva yOgi ।ATakam nayavunTu  - Mankutimma ॥ 255 ॥The only way to be happy in this world is to realize that it is a drama played on a stage and immerse in it completely from the very beginning (of self). One must play his part to the fullest of his abilities to entertain others. At the same time, he must realize that he is also a spectator for the play and enjoy some scenes that he witnesses  - irrespective of it being a comedy or a tragedy. If you learn this lesson, then you will be the master who rules your life. Even though this drama does not have a plot, a beginning or an end, it does have rules.  - Mankutimma
translation: The only way to be happy in this world is to realize that it is a drama played on a stage and immerse in it completely from the very beginning (of self). One must play his part to the fullest of his abilities to entertain others. At the same time, he must realize that he is also a spectator for the play and enjoy some scenes that he witnesses  - irrespective of it being a comedy or a tragedy. If you learn this lesson, then you will be the master who rules your life. Even though this drama does not have a plot, a beginning or an end, it does have rules.  - Mankutimma
title: ಆಟಕಂ ನಯವುಂಟು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ

content: ಪರದ ಮೇಲ್ಕಣ್ಣಿಟ್ಟು ಧರೆಯ ತುಚ್ಛವೆನುತ್ತ ।ತೊರೆದಾಯಸಂಗೊಳ್ಳೆ ದೊರೆವ ಫಲವೇನು? ॥ಸುರಧನುವಿಗೇಣಿಯಿಡಹೊರಟು ನಿನ್ನಂಗಳದ ।ಕಿರಿಹೂವ ಮರೆಯುವೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೬ ॥parada mele kaNNiTTu dhareya tucCha venutta ।toreda AyasangoLLe doreva phalavEnu? ॥suradhanuvige ENi idahoraTu ninnangaLada ।kirihuuva mareyuveya  - Mankutimma ॥ 256 ॥Having kept your sight on the other world (calling it better), you consider this world to be inferior (and not worthy of efforts). If you give up efforts in this world then how can you get good results in the other world? You are trying to keep a ladder to climb up to a rainbow and forgetting about the small beautiful flower in your backyard.  - Mankutimma
translation: Having kept your sight on the other world (calling it better), you consider this world to be inferior (and not worthy of efforts). If you give up efforts in this world then how can you get good results in the other world? You are trying to keep a ladder to climb up to a rainbow and forgetting about the small beautiful flower in your backyard.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಿರಿಹೂವ ಮರೆಯುವೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: parada mele kaNNiTTu dhareya tucCha venutta ।toreda AyasangoLLe doreva phalavEnu? ॥suradhanuvige ENi idahoraTu ninnangaLada ।kirihuuva mareyuveya  - Mankutimma ॥ 256 ॥
kagga: ಪರದ ಮೇಲ್ಕಣ್ಣಿಟ್ಟು ಧರೆಯ ತುಚ್ಛವೆನುತ್ತ ।ತೊರೆದಾಯಸಂಗೊಳ್ಳೆ ದೊರೆವ ಫಲವೇನು? ॥ಸುರಧನುವಿಗೇಣಿಯಿಡಹೊರಟು ನಿನ್ನಂಗಳದ ।ಕಿರಿಹೂವ ಮರೆಯುವೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೬ ॥

content: ಪರಕಿಹವೆ ಸೋಪಾನವೆಂದು ನೀನೊಪ್ಪುವೊಡೆ ।ಪರಕಿಂತಲಿಹವೆಂತು ಜೊಳ್ಳದಾದೀತು? ॥ಹೊರಲೆಬೇಕಂತಾದೊಡಿಹದ ಹೊರೆಗಳನೆಲ್ಲ ।ಜರೆವುದೇಕಿನ್ನದನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೭ ॥parakihave sOpAnavendu nInu oppuvoDe ।parakintalu ihaventu joLLadAdItu? ॥horalebEkantAdoDe ihada horegaLanella ।jareyudu Ekinnadanu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 257 ॥If you agree that a good after-life (in another world) is based on what we do in this world now. Then, how can we belittle what we do here? Actions here are as important as in the other world. In order to pass to the next, we have to bear all the troubles (and happiness) in this world without any exception. Then why frown up on this world?  - Mankutimma
translation: If you agree that a good after-life (in another world) is based on what we do in this world now. Then, how can we belittle what we do here? Actions here are as important as in the other world. In order to pass to the next, we have to bear all the troubles (and happiness) in this world without any exception. Then why frown up on this world?  - Mankutimma
title: ಜರೆವುದೇಕಿನ್ನದನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: parakihave sOpAnavendu nInu oppuvoDe ।parakintalu ihaventu joLLadAdItu? ॥horalebEkantAdoDe ihada horegaLanella ।jareyudu Ekinnadanu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 257 ॥
kagga: ಪರಕಿಹವೆ ಸೋಪಾನವೆಂದು ನೀನೊಪ್ಪುವೊಡೆ ।ಪರಕಿಂತಲಿಹವೆಂತು ಜೊಳ್ಳದಾದೀತು? ॥ಹೊರಲೆಬೇಕಂತಾದೊಡಿಹದ ಹೊರೆಗಳನೆಲ್ಲ ।ಜರೆವುದೇಕಿನ್ನದನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೭ ॥

content: ಒಲ್ಲೆನೆನದಿರು ಬಾಳನ್, ಒಲವದೇನೆನ್ನದಿರು । ಉಲ್ಲಾಸಕೆಡೆಮಾಡು ನಿನ್ನನಾದನಿತು ॥ ನಿಲ್ಲು ಕೆಚ್ಚೆದೆಯಿಂದಲನ್ಯಾಯಗಳನಳಿಸೆ । ಎಲ್ಲಕಂ ಸಿದ್ಧನಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೮ ॥ olle enadiru bALan, olavadEn ennadiru । ullAsake eDemADu ninna Adanitu ॥ nillu kecchedeyindalu anyAyagaLanu aLise । ellakaM siddhaniru  - Mankutimma ॥ 258 ॥ Don;t say no to Life. Don;t be ignorant of love. Cut yourself a little slack and make room for leisure. Don;t worry about the injustices meted out to you. Face them with courage and be ready for everything.  - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t say no to Life. Don;t be ignorant of love. Cut yourself a little slack and make room for leisure. Don;t worry about the injustices meted out to you. Face them with courage and be ready for everything.  - Mankutimma
title: ಎಲ್ಲಕಂ ಸಿದ್ಧನಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: olle enadiru bALan, olavadEn ennadiru । ullAsake eDemADu ninna Adanitu ॥ nillu kecchedeyindalu anyAyagaLanu aLise । ellakaM siddhaniru  - Mankutimma ॥ 258 ॥
kagga: ಒಲ್ಲೆನೆನದಿರು ಬಾಳನ್, ಒಲವದೇನೆನ್ನದಿರು । ಉಲ್ಲಾಸಕೆಡೆಮಾಡು ನಿನ್ನನಾದನಿತು ॥ ನಿಲ್ಲು ಕೆಚ್ಚೆದೆಯಿಂದಲನ್ಯಾಯಗಳನಳಿಸೆ । ಎಲ್ಲಕಂ ಸಿದ್ಧನಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೮ ॥

content: ಕಡಲ ಕಡೆದರು ಸುರಾಸುರರು ನಿಜಬಲದಿಂದ । ಕುಡಿದನದನು ತಪಸ್ಸಿನಿಂದ ಕುಂಭಜನು ॥ ಕಡಮೆಜನ ಪಾರಗಾಂಬರೆ ಗಾಸಿಯನು ಪಡದೆ? । ಪೊಡವಿ ಬಾಳ್ವೆಯುಮಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೯ ॥ kaDala kaDedaru sura asuraru nija baladinda । kuDidanadanu tapassininda kumbhajanu ॥ kaDamejana pAragAmbare gAsiyanu paDade? । poDavi bALveyuyumantu  - Mankutimma ॥ 259 ॥ The Gods and Demons churned the sea from their muscle strength and got amazing returns. From the strength derived from his penance Agasthya could drink the entire ocean. These were great men who could accomplish the feats with ease. But lesser mortals can not achieve greatness without struggle. Life on this Earth is like this.  - Mankutimma
translation: The Gods and Demons churned the sea from their muscle strength and got amazing returns. From the strength derived from his penance Agasthya could drink the entire ocean. These were great men who could accomplish the feats with ease. But lesser mortals can not achieve greatness without struggle. Life on this Earth is like this.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪೊಡವಿ ಬಾಳ್ವೆಯುಮಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kaDala kaDedaru sura asuraru nija baladinda । kuDidanadanu tapassininda kumbhajanu ॥ kaDamejana pAragAmbare gAsiyanu paDade? । poDavi bALveyuyumantu  - Mankutimma ॥ 259 ॥
kagga: ಕಡಲ ಕಡೆದರು ಸುರಾಸುರರು ನಿಜಬಲದಿಂದ । ಕುಡಿದನದನು ತಪಸ್ಸಿನಿಂದ ಕುಂಭಜನು ॥ ಕಡಮೆಜನ ಪಾರಗಾಂಬರೆ ಗಾಸಿಯನು ಪಡದೆ? । ಪೊಡವಿ ಬಾಳ್ವೆಯುಮಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫೯ ॥

content: ದ್ರಾಕ್ಷಿರಸವೇನಲ್ಲ ಜೀವನದ ತಿರುಳಾರ್ಗಮ್ । ಇಕ್ಷುದಂಡದವೊಲದು ಕಷ್ಟಭೋಜನವೆ ॥ ದಕ್ಷತೆಯಿನಿಡಿಯುವಂಗೊಂದೆರಡು ಗುಟುಕು ರಸ । ಮಾಕ್ಷಿಕರು ಮಿಕ್ಕೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೦ ॥ drAkShi rasavEnalla jIvanada tiruLu Argam । ikShudanDavol adu kaShTa bhOjanave ॥ dakShateyina iDiyuvange onderaDu guTuku rasa । mAkShikaru mikella  - Mankutimma ॥ 260 ॥ Nuances of life is not like drinking grape juice (which is very easy). It is more like getting sugarcane juice from the cane. If one is determined and puts in the effort he will get couple of gulps of juice. That;s it. Rest of them are like flies sitting on crushed cane  - they get close, but can not taste the juice.   - Mankutimma
translation: Nuances of life is not like drinking grape juice (which is very easy). It is more like getting sugarcane juice from the cane. If one is determined and puts in the effort he will get couple of gulps of juice. That;s it. Rest of them are like flies sitting on crushed cane  - they get close, but can not taste the juice.   - Mankutimma
title: ಮಾಕ್ಷಿಕರು ಮಿಕ್ಕೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: drAkShi rasavEnalla jIvanada tiruLu Argam । ikShudanDavol adu kaShTa bhOjanave ॥ dakShateyina iDiyuvange onderaDu guTuku rasa । mAkShikaru mikella  - Mankutimma ॥ 260 ॥
kagga: ದ್ರಾಕ್ಷಿರಸವೇನಲ್ಲ ಜೀವನದ ತಿರುಳಾರ್ಗಮ್ । ಇಕ್ಷುದಂಡದವೊಲದು ಕಷ್ಟಭೋಜನವೆ ॥ ದಕ್ಷತೆಯಿನಿಡಿಯುವಂಗೊಂದೆರಡು ಗುಟುಕು ರಸ । ಮಾಕ್ಷಿಕರು ಮಿಕ್ಕೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೦ ॥

content: ಆಟವೋ ಮಾಟವೋ ಕಾಟವೋ ಲೋಕವಿದು! । ಊಟ ಉಪಚಾರಗಳ ಬೇಡವೆನ್ನದಿರು ॥ ಪಾಟವವು ಮೈಗಿರಲಿ, ನೋಟ ತತ್ತ್ವದೊಳಿರಲಿ । ಪಾಠಿಸು ಸಮನ್ವಯವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೧ ॥ ATavO mATavO kATavO lOkavidu! । UTa upachAragaLa bEDavennadiru ॥ pATavavu maigirali, nOTa tattva । pAThisu samanvayava  - Mankutimma ॥ 261 ॥ This world could be a game, an illusion or just a pain. But we have to get through this. So, do not say no to food and nourishments. Let these be a lesson to your body. But let us keep our eyes (mind) on the philosophy. The goal of the mind should be to attain a balance.  - Mankutimma
translation: This world could be a game, an illusion or just a pain. But we have to get through this. So, do not say no to food and nourishments. Let these be a lesson to your body. But let us keep our eyes (mind) on the philosophy. The goal of the mind should be to attain a balance.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪಾಠಿಸು ಸಮನ್ವಯವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ATavO mATavO kATavO lOkavidu! । UTa upachAragaLa bEDavennadiru ॥ pATavavu maigirali, nOTa tattva । pAThisu samanvayava  - Mankutimma ॥ 261 ॥
kagga: ಆಟವೋ ಮಾಟವೋ ಕಾಟವೋ ಲೋಕವಿದು! । ಊಟ ಉಪಚಾರಗಳ ಬೇಡವೆನ್ನದಿರು ॥ ಪಾಟವವು ಮೈಗಿರಲಿ, ನೋಟ ತತ್ತ್ವದೊಳಿರಲಿ । ಪಾಠಿಸು ಸಮನ್ವಯವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೧ ॥

content: ಒಂದು ಕಣ್ಣಳುವಂದು ಮತ್ತೊಂದ ತಳ್ಕೈಸಿ । ಅಂದ ಚೆಂದಗಳ ಜನವರಸುವುದು ಬಾಳೊಳ್ ॥ ಬಂಧುಮೋಹವೊ ಯಶವೊ ವೈರವೋ ವೈಭವವೊ । ಬಂಧಿಪುದು ಜಗಕವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೨ ॥ ondu kaNNu aLuvandu mattond taLkaisi । anda chendagaLa janavu arasuvudu bALoL ॥ bandhu mOhavo yashavo vairavO vaibhavavo । bandhipudu jagakavara  - Mankutimma ॥ 262 ॥ When one eye sheds tears, people try to make themselves happy by showing beautiful things to the other eye. This is how world works  - in constant pursuit of happiness. People get trapped in this world permanently due to love for relatives, seeking fame, wanting revenge or longing for magnanimity.   - Mankutimma
translation: When one eye sheds tears, people try to make themselves happy by showing beautiful things to the other eye. This is how world works  - in constant pursuit of happiness. People get trapped in this world permanently due to love for relatives, seeking fame, wanting revenge or longing for magnanimity.   - Mankutimma
title: ಬಂಧಿಪುದು ಜಗಕವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ondu kaNNu aLuvandu mattond taLkaisi । anda chendagaLa janavu arasuvudu bALoL ॥ bandhu mOhavo yashavo vairavO vaibhavavo । bandhipudu jagakavara  - Mankutimma ॥ 262 ॥
kagga: ಒಂದು ಕಣ್ಣಳುವಂದು ಮತ್ತೊಂದ ತಳ್ಕೈಸಿ । ಅಂದ ಚೆಂದಗಳ ಜನವರಸುವುದು ಬಾಳೊಳ್ ॥ ಬಂಧುಮೋಹವೊ ಯಶವೊ ವೈರವೋ ವೈಭವವೊ । ಬಂಧಿಪುದು ಜಗಕವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೨ ॥

content: ಬಾಳು ಪಾಳೆನ್ನುವರ ಬಿಟ್ಟಿಹುದೆ ಬೆದಕಾಟ? । ತಾಳಿದರೆ ಬಾಳನಂತಹರುಮ್ ಆಶೆಯಲಿ? ॥ ಕಾಲವಿನ್ನಿರದಿಂತು ನಾಳೆ ನೋಡುವಮೆನುತ । ಮೇಲನೆ ನಿರೀಕ್ಷಿಪರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೩ ॥ bALu pALu ennuvara biTTihude bedakATa? । tALidare bALantaharum Asheyali? ॥ kAlavu inniradintu nALe nODuvam enuta । mElane nirIkShiparu  - Mankutimma ॥ 263 ॥ People may say Life is a waste. But have they given up the struggle? Do they not wait patiently for better days to come? Even they know that time will not remain like this forever and always look forward for a better tomorrow.  - Mankutimma
translation: People may say Life is a waste. But have they given up the struggle? Do they not wait patiently for better days to come? Even they know that time will not remain like this forever and always look forward for a better tomorrow.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೇಲನೆ ನಿರೀಕ್ಷಿಪರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bALu pALu ennuvara biTTihude bedakATa? । tALidare bALantaharum Asheyali? ॥ kAlavu inniradintu nALe nODuvam enuta । mElane nirIkShiparu  - Mankutimma ॥ 263 ॥
kagga: ಬಾಳು ಪಾಳೆನ್ನುವರ ಬಿಟ್ಟಿಹುದೆ ಬೆದಕಾಟ? । ತಾಳಿದರೆ ಬಾಳನಂತಹರುಮ್ ಆಶೆಯಲಿ? ॥ ಕಾಲವಿನ್ನಿರದಿಂತು ನಾಳೆ ನೋಡುವಮೆನುತ । ಮೇಲನೆ ನಿರೀಕ್ಷಿಪರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೩ ॥

content: ಗೋಳಾಡಲುಂ ಬೇಡ, ಲೋಲಾಪ್ತಿಯುಂ ಬೇಡ । ಬಾಳು ಪರಚೇತನದ ಕೇಳಿಯೆಂದೆಣಿಸಿ ॥ ಪಾಲಿಗನು ನೀನದರೊಳೆನಿಪಂತೆ ಬಾಳುತಿರು । ಕೇಳಿಯುಂ ಧರ್ಮವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೪ ॥ gOLADalum bEDa, lOlAptiyum bEDa । bALu parachEtanada kELiyindeNisi ॥ pAliganu nInu adaroLenipante bALutiru । kELiyum dharmavelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 264 ॥ Don;t whine. Don;t indulge and revel either. Live life as if it is controlled by the whims of the cosmic spirit. You are just playing a part in the grand scheme of things that he Cosmic Spirit is well in control of. Its whim is not arbitrary, it also follows the rules of Dharma.  - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t whine. Don;t indulge and revel either. Live life as if it is controlled by the whims of the cosmic spirit. You are just playing a part in the grand scheme of things that he Cosmic Spirit is well in control of. Its whim is not arbitrary, it also follows the rules of Dharma.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕೇಳಿಯುಂ ಧರ್ಮವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: gOLADalum bEDa, lOlAptiyum bEDa । bALu parachEtanada kELiyindeNisi ॥ pAliganu nInu adaroLenipante bALutiru । kELiyum dharmavelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 264 ॥
kagga: ಗೋಳಾಡಲುಂ ಬೇಡ, ಲೋಲಾಪ್ತಿಯುಂ ಬೇಡ । ಬಾಳು ಪರಚೇತನದ ಕೇಳಿಯೆಂದೆಣಿಸಿ ॥ ಪಾಲಿಗನು ನೀನದರೊಳೆನಿಪಂತೆ ಬಾಳುತಿರು । ಕೇಳಿಯುಂ ಧರ್ಮವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೪ ॥

content: ಬಾಳ ಸಿರಿ ಸೊಗಸುಗಳ ಪೆರ್ಚಿಪನು ಖೇಲಕನು । ಕೀಳದೆನಿಪವನೊರಟ, ಮಂಕ, ಕಲ್ಲೆದೆಗ ॥ ತೋಳಿಂದೆ ತಿಳಿವಿಂದೆ ನುಡಿಯಿಂದೆ ಜಗದರಿವ । ಮೇಲೆನಿಪವನೆ ರಸಿಕ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೫ ॥ bALa siri sogasugaLa perchipanu khElakanu । kILadu enipavanu oRaTa, manka, kalledega ॥ tOLinde tiLivinde nuDiyinde jagadariva । mElenipavane rasika  - Mankutimma ॥ 265 ॥ The master of the game has shown us all the riches and the beauties of the world. Don;t say all these worldly things are inferior to the pursuit of the supreme. If you say so, you will be brash, dim-wit and a person with a stone heart. People who try to understand this world by muscle strength, intellect, words and appreciate it are called tasteful.  - Mankutimma
translation: The master of the game has shown us all the riches and the beauties of the world. Don;t say all these worldly things are inferior to the pursuit of the supreme. If you say so, you will be brash, dim-wit and a person with a stone heart. People who try to understand this world by muscle strength, intellect, words and appreciate it are called tasteful.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೇಲೆನಿಪವನೆ ರಸಿಕ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bALa siri sogasugaLa perchipanu khElakanu । kILadu enipavanu oRaTa, manka, kalledega ॥ tOLinde tiLivinde nuDiyinde jagadariva । mElenipavane rasika  - Mankutimma ॥ 265 ॥
kagga: ಬಾಳ ಸಿರಿ ಸೊಗಸುಗಳ ಪೆರ್ಚಿಪನು ಖೇಲಕನು । ಕೀಳದೆನಿಪವನೊರಟ, ಮಂಕ, ಕಲ್ಲೆದೆಗ ॥ ತೋಳಿಂದೆ ತಿಳಿವಿಂದೆ ನುಡಿಯಿಂದೆ ಜಗದರಿವ । ಮೇಲೆನಿಪವನೆ ರಸಿಕ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೫ ॥

content: ಬಾಳ ಹಳಿವುದದೇಕೆ? ಗೋಳ ಕರೆವುದದೇಕೆ? । ಬಾಳಿದಲ್ಲದೆ ತಪ್ಪದೇನ ಮಾಡಿದೊಡಂ ॥ ಕೇಳಿಯದು ಬೊಮ್ಮನಾಡಿಪನು ನೀನದರೊಳಗೆ । ಪಾಲುಗೊಳಲಬೇಡ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೬ ॥ bALa haLivudu adEke? gOLa karevudu adEke? । bALidallade tappadu Ena mADidoDam ॥ kELiyadu bommanADipanu nInadaroLage । pAlugoLalabEDa  - Mankutimma ॥ 266 ॥ Why belittle life? Why whine? This life has to be lived no matter what antics we do to escape from it. This universe is being run as part a wish of the Creator. You are a part of it. Don;t resist being a part of it.  - Mankutimma
translation: Why belittle life? Why whine? This life has to be lived no matter what antics we do to escape from it. This universe is being run as part a wish of the Creator. You are a part of it. Don;t resist being a part of it.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪಾಲುಗೊಳಲಬೇಡ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bALa haLivudu adEke? gOLa karevudu adEke? । bALidallade tappadu Ena mADidoDam ॥ kELiyadu bommanADipanu nInadaroLage । pAlugoLalabEDa  - Mankutimma ॥ 266 ॥
kagga: ಬಾಳ ಹಳಿವುದದೇಕೆ? ಗೋಳ ಕರೆವುದದೇಕೆ? । ಬಾಳಿದಲ್ಲದೆ ತಪ್ಪದೇನ ಮಾಡಿದೊಡಂ ॥ ಕೇಳಿಯದು ಬೊಮ್ಮನಾಡಿಪನು ನೀನದರೊಳಗೆ । ಪಾಲುಗೊಳಲಬೇಡ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೬ ॥

content: ಲೀಲೆಯೇಂ ಬಾಳೆಲ್ಲ? ಛೀ ತಳ್ಳು ಹಾಸ್ಯವನು । ಬಾಲರೇಂ ನಾವಿನ್ನುಮೆನುತ ಪಲ್ಕಡಿದು ॥ ಖೇಲನವ ಬೇಡವೆನುವರನು ವಿಧಿರಾಯನವ- । ಹೇಳಿಪನು ಸೆರೆವಿಡಿದು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೭ ॥ lIleyEm bALella? ChI taLLu hAsyavanu । bAlarEm nAvinnum enuta palkaDidu ॥ KElanava bEDavenuvaranu vidhirAyanu । avahELipanu sereviDidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 267 ॥ Is all life just an illusion? Don;t treat us like kids. We may get angry at who ever is running the Universe and opt to get out of the game. Fate will catch hold of those people and make them play the game again.  - Mankutimma
translation: Is all life just an illusion? Don;t treat us like kids. We may get angry at who ever is running the Universe and opt to get out of the game. Fate will catch hold of those people and make them play the game again.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅವಹೇಳಿಪನು ಸೆರೆವಿಡಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮವ
transliteration: lIleyEm bALella? ChI taLLu hAsyavanu । bAlarEm nAvinnum enuta palkaDidu ॥ KElanava bEDavenuvaranu vidhirAyanu । avahELipanu sereviDidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 267 ॥
kagga: ಲೀಲೆಯೇಂ ಬಾಳೆಲ್ಲ? ಛೀ ತಳ್ಳು ಹಾಸ್ಯವನು । ಬಾಲರೇಂ ನಾವಿನ್ನುಮೆನುತ ಪಲ್ಕಡಿದು ॥ ಖೇಲನವ ಬೇಡವೆನುವರನು ವಿಧಿರಾಯನವ- । ಹೇಳಿಪನು ಸೆರೆವಿಡಿದು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೭ ॥

content: ನಾಚಿಕೆಯದೇಕೆ ನೀಂ ಬದುಕಿನಲಿ ಸೊಗವಡಲು? । ಚಾಚುದಿಹುದಾತ್ಮ ನಾಲಗೆಯ ದೆಸೆದೆಸೆಗೆ ॥ ಬಾಚಿಕೊಳಲಮೃತಕಣಗಳನೆಲ್ಲ ತನ್ನೆಡೆಗೆ । ಸಾಜ ಸೊಗವಾತ್ಮಂಗೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೮ ॥ nAchikeyadEke nIm badukinali sogavaDalu? । chAchutihudu Atma nAlageya desedesege ॥ bAchikoLalu amRuta kaNagaLanella tanneDege । sAja sogavu Atmange  - Mankutimma ॥ 268 ॥ Why should one be ashamed of enjoying life? The soul is spreading its tongue towards all directions to lick all available drops of elixir. Pursuit of happiness is natural to the soul.  - Mankutimma
translation: Why should one be ashamed of enjoying life? The soul is spreading its tongue towards all directions to lick all available drops of elixir. Pursuit of happiness is natural to the soul.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಾಜ ಸೊಗವಾತ್ಮಂಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nAchikeyadEke nIm badukinali sogavaDalu? । chAchutihudu Atma nAlageya desedesege ॥ bAchikoLalu amRuta kaNagaLanella tanneDege । sAja sogavu Atmange  - Mankutimma ॥ 268 ॥
kagga: ನಾಚಿಕೆಯದೇಕೆ ನೀಂ ಬದುಕಿನಲಿ ಸೊಗವಡಲು? । ಚಾಚುದಿಹುದಾತ್ಮ ನಾಲಗೆಯ ದೆಸೆದೆಸೆಗೆ ॥ ಬಾಚಿಕೊಳಲಮೃತಕಣಗಳನೆಲ್ಲ ತನ್ನೆಡೆಗೆ । ಸಾಜ ಸೊಗವಾತ್ಮಂಗೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೮ ॥

content: ಸುಂದರವನೆಸಗು ಜೀವನದ ಸಾಹಸದಿಂದೆ । ಕುಂದಿಲ್ಲವದಕೆ ಸಾಹಸಭಂಗದಿಂದೆ ॥ ಮುಂದಕದು ಸಾಗುವುದು ಮರಳಿ ಸಾಹಸದಿಂದೆ । ಚೆಂದ ಧೀರೋದ್ಯಮವೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೯ ॥ sundaravanu esagu jIvanada sAhasadinde । kundillavadake sAhasa bhangadinde ॥ mundakadu sAguvudu maraLi sAhasadinde । chenda dhIrOdyamave  - Mankutimma ॥ 269 ॥ One must put in hard work in life and create wonderful things. When hard work does not yeild results, the spirit must not be subdued. One must proceed ahead again with renewed vigor. This courage in man;s efforts is what makes this world beautiful.  - Mankutimma
translation: One must put in hard work in life and create wonderful things. When hard work does not yeild results, the spirit must not be subdued. One must proceed ahead again with renewed vigor. This courage in man;s efforts is what makes this world beautiful.  - Mankutimma
title: ಚೆಂದ ಧೀರೋದ್ಯಮವೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sundaravanu esagu jIvanada sAhasadinde । kundillavadake sAhasa bhangadinde ॥ mundakadu sAguvudu maraLi sAhasadinde । chenda dhIrOdyamave  - Mankutimma ॥ 269 ॥
kagga: ಸುಂದರವನೆಸಗು ಜೀವನದ ಸಾಹಸದಿಂದೆ । ಕುಂದಿಲ್ಲವದಕೆ ಸಾಹಸಭಂಗದಿಂದೆ ॥ ಮುಂದಕದು ಸಾಗುವುದು ಮರಳಿ ಸಾಹಸದಿಂದೆ । ಚೆಂದ ಧೀರೋದ್ಯಮವೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬೯ ॥

content: ಎಲ್ಲರಿಗಮಾಗಿ ತಾನ್, ಎಲ್ಲರುಂ ತನಗಾಗಿ । ನಿಲ್ಲುವೇಕಾತ್ಮತೆಯ ಬಾಳ್ವೆಯಿಂ ಕಲಿಯಲ್ ॥ ಸಲ್ಲುವುಪಕರಣಗಳು ಮನೆ ರಾಜ್ಯ ಸಂಸಾರ- । ವಲ್ಲಗಳೆಯದಿರವನು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೦ ॥ ellerigam Agi tAn, ellarum tanagAgi । nilluva EkAtmateya bALveyim kaliyal ॥ salluva upakaraNagaLu mane rAjya samsArava । allagaLeyadir avanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 270 ॥ Be available to help every one. Be open to receive help from others. Learn to live in harmony like thus. To live ones life, one needs support structure around him  - house, state and the world. Don;t belittle them.  - Mankutimma
translation: Be available to help every one. Be open to receive help from others. Learn to live in harmony like thus. To live ones life, one needs support structure around him  - house, state and the world. Don;t belittle them.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅಲ್ಲಗಳೆಯದಿರವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ellerigam Agi tAn, ellarum tanagAgi । nilluva EkAtmateya bALveyim kaliyal ॥ salluva upakaraNagaLu mane rAjya samsArava । allagaLeyadir avanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 270 ॥
kagga: ಎಲ್ಲರಿಗಮಾಗಿ ತಾನ್, ಎಲ್ಲರುಂ ತನಗಾಗಿ । ನಿಲ್ಲುವೇಕಾತ್ಮತೆಯ ಬಾಳ್ವೆಯಿಂ ಕಲಿಯಲ್ ॥ ಸಲ್ಲುವುಪಕರಣಗಳು ಮನೆ ರಾಜ್ಯ ಸಂಸಾರ- । ವಲ್ಲಗಳೆಯದಿರವನು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೦ ॥

content: ವ್ಯರ್ಥವೀ ಜೀವನದ ಬಡಿದಾಟವೆನ್ನದಿರು । ಅರ್ಥವಹುದದು ನಿನಗೆ ಪೂರ್ಣದರ್ಶನದಿಂ ॥ ನರ್ತಿಪನು ಜಡಜೀವರೂಪಂಗಳಲಿ । ಪೂರ್ತಿಯಿದನರಿಯೆ ಸೊಗ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೧ ॥ vyarthavu ee jIvanada baDIdATavu ennadiru । arthavahudadu ninage pUrNadarshanadim ॥ nartipanu jaDa jIva rUpangaLali । pUrthi idanariye soga  - Mankutimma ॥ 271 ॥ Don;t tell that the struggle of life is a waste. You will understand the purpose of life when you get the whole picture. The Cosmic spirit is dancing inside every non-living and living things. When you understand this completely, you will revel.  - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t tell that the struggle of life is a waste. You will understand the purpose of life when you get the whole picture. The Cosmic spirit is dancing inside every non-living and living things. When you understand this completely, you will revel.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪೂರ್ತಿಯಿದನರಿಯೆ ಸೊಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vyarthavu ee jIvanada baDIdATavu ennadiru । arthavahudadu ninage pUrNadarshanadim ॥ nartipanu jaDa jIva rUpangaLali । pUrthi idanariye soga  - Mankutimma ॥ 271 ॥
kagga: ವ್ಯರ್ಥವೀ ಜೀವನದ ಬಡಿದಾಟವೆನ್ನದಿರು । ಅರ್ಥವಹುದದು ನಿನಗೆ ಪೂರ್ಣದರ್ಶನದಿಂ ॥ ನರ್ತಿಪನು ಜಡಜೀವರೂಪಂಗಳಲಿ । ಪೂರ್ತಿಯಿದನರಿಯೆ ಸೊಗ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೧ ॥

content: ಬೊಮ್ಮನೇ ಸಂಸೃತಿಯ ಕಟ್ಟಿಕೊಂಡುತ್ಸಹಿಸೆ । ಸುಮ್ಮನರೆಚಣವಿರದೆ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ ತೊಡಗುತಿರೆ ॥ ಜನ್ಮ ಸಾಕೆನುವುದೇ? ದುಮ್ಮಾನವಡುವುದೇಂ? । ಚಿಮ್ಮುಲ್ಲಸವ ಧರೆಗೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೨ ॥ bommanE samsRutiya kaTTikonDu utsahise । summane arechaNavirade prakRuti toDagutire ॥ janma sAkenuvudE? dummAnavaDuvudEm? । chimmullasava dharege  - Mankutimma ॥ 272 ॥ The creator himself is engrossed in building this world. Nature is not wasting even fraction of a second and is pumping joy into this creation. Is it right for us to give up on life? Is it right for us to doubt the intentions (of the creator/nature)?  - Mankutimma
translation: The creator himself is engrossed in building this world. Nature is not wasting even fraction of a second and is pumping joy into this creation. Is it right for us to give up on life? Is it right for us to doubt the intentions (of the creator/nature)?  - Mankutimma
title: ಚಿಮ್ಮುಲ್ಲಸವ ಧರೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bommanE samsRutiya kaTTikonDu utsahise । summane arechaNavirade prakRuti toDagutire ॥ janma sAkenuvudE? dummAnavaDuvudEm? । chimmullasava dharege  - Mankutimma ॥ 272 ॥
kagga: ಬೊಮ್ಮನೇ ಸಂಸೃತಿಯ ಕಟ್ಟಿಕೊಂಡುತ್ಸಹಿಸೆ । ಸುಮ್ಮನರೆಚಣವಿರದೆ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ ತೊಡಗುತಿರೆ ॥ ಜನ್ಮ ಸಾಕೆನುವುದೇ? ದುಮ್ಮಾನವಡುವುದೇಂ? । ಚಿಮ್ಮುಲ್ಲಸವ ಧರೆಗೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೨ ॥

content: ಕೋಟಿ ದೆಸೆಯುಸಿರುಗಳು, ಕೋಟಿ ರಸದಾವಿಗಳು । ಕೋಟಿ ಹೃದಯದ ಹೋಹೊ ಹಾಹಕಾರಗಳು ॥ ಕೂಟ ಕೂಡಿಹುವಂತರಿಕ್ಷದಲಿ ನೀನದರಿನ್ । ಓಟವೋಡುವುದೆತ್ತ? - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೩ ॥ kOTi deseyusirugaLu, kOTi rasadAvigaLu । kOTi hRudayada hOho hAhakAragaLu ॥ kUTa kUDihuvu antarikshadali nIn adarin । OTavODuvudetta?  - Mankutimma ॥ 273 ॥ This world has crores of creatures all going through their lives just as you are doing. All of them may have their tired moments, happy moments, moments of savoring the beauties of the world. There are cries of excitement, sorrow, encouragement let out by them. All these are making formations in the sky. How can you escape from this world? No matter where you go, these cries will always follow you. Some of them are yours too.  - Mankutimma
translation: This world has crores of creatures all going through their lives just as you are doing. All of them may have their tired moments, happy moments, moments of savoring the beauties of the world. There are cries of excitement, sorrow, encouragement let out by them. All these are making formations in the sky. How can you escape from this world? No matter where you go, these cries will always follow you. Some of them are yours too.  - Mankutimma
title: ಓಟವೋಡುವುದೆತ್ತ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kOTi deseyusirugaLu, kOTi rasadAvigaLu । kOTi hRudayada hOho hAhakAragaLu ॥ kUTa kUDihuvu antarikshadali nIn adarin । OTavODuvudetta?  - Mankutimma ॥ 273 ॥
kagga: ಕೋಟಿ ದೆಸೆಯುಸಿರುಗಳು, ಕೋಟಿ ರಸದಾವಿಗಳು । ಕೋಟಿ ಹೃದಯದ ಹೋಹೊ ಹಾಹಕಾರಗಳು ॥ ಕೂಟ ಕೂಡಿಹುವಂತರಿಕ್ಷದಲಿ ನೀನದರಿನ್ । ಓಟವೋಡುವುದೆತ್ತ? - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೩ ॥

content: ನಯದಿಂದ ಸೋಕು, ನೀಂ ದಯೆಯಿಂದ ನೋಡದನು । ಭಯದಿನೋಲಗಿಸು, ನೀಂ ಪೂಜೆಗೈಯದನು ॥ ಸ್ವಯಮಂಕುರಿತ ಸಕಲ ವಿಶ್ವಸತ್ತ್ವವೊ; ಜೀವ । ಪ್ರಿಯತಮವೊ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೪ ॥ nayadinda sOku, dayeyinda nODadanu । bhayadinOlagisu, nIm pUjehaiyadanu ॥ svayam ankurita sakala vishva sattvavo; jIva । priyatamavo sRuShtiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 274 ॥ The life that you have is part of the cosmic spirit that resides in your body. You have to treat it with love and compassion. You should be very wary of doing anything that would hurt it. You should worship it. Life inside us should be the most loved thing in this creation.  - Mankutimma
translation: The life that you have is part of the cosmic spirit that resides in your body. You have to treat it with love and compassion. You should be very wary of doing anything that would hurt it. You should worship it. Life inside us should be the most loved thing in this creation.  - Mankutimma
title: ಜೀವ ಪ್ರಿಯತಮವೊ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nayadinda sOku, dayeyinda nODadanu । bhayadinOlagisu, nIm pUjehaiyadanu ॥ svayam ankurita sakala vishva sattvavo; jIva । priyatamavo sRuShtiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 274 ॥
kagga: ನಯದಿಂದ ಸೋಕು, ನೀಂ ದಯೆಯಿಂದ ನೋಡದನು । ಭಯದಿನೋಲಗಿಸು, ನೀಂ ಪೂಜೆಗೈಯದನು ॥ ಸ್ವಯಮಂಕುರಿತ ಸಕಲ ವಿಶ್ವಸತ್ತ್ವವೊ; ಜೀವ । ಪ್ರಿಯತಮವೊ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೪ ॥

content: ಸರ್ವರುಂ ಸಾಧುಗಳೆ ಸರ್ವರುಂ ಬೋಧಕರೆ । ಜೀವನಪರೀಕ್ಷೆ ಬಂದಿದಿರು ನಿಲುವನಕ ॥ ಭಾವಮರ್ಮಂಗಳೇಳುವುವಾಗ ತಳದಿಂದ । ದೇವರೇ ಗತಿಯಾಗ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೫ ॥ sarvarum sAdhugaLe sarvarum bOdhakare । jIvana parIkShe bandu idiru niluvanaka ॥ bhAva marmangaLu ELuvuvu Aga taLadinda । dEvarE gatiyAga  - Mankutimma ॥ 275 ॥ Until life poses a difficult question every one is noble and preachers. When life becomes difficult, feelings (and illusions) arise from deep down their heart. Only God can save us then.  - Mankutimma
translation: Until life poses a difficult question every one is noble and preachers. When life becomes difficult, feelings (and illusions) arise from deep down their heart. Only God can save us then.  - Mankutimma
title: ದೇವರೇ ಗತಿಯಾಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sarvarum sAdhugaLe sarvarum bOdhakare । jIvana parIkShe bandu idiru niluvanaka ॥ bhAva marmangaLu ELuvuvu Aga taLadinda । dEvarE gatiyAga  - Mankutimma ॥ 275 ॥
kagga: ಸರ್ವರುಂ ಸಾಧುಗಳೆ ಸರ್ವರುಂ ಬೋಧಕರೆ । ಜೀವನಪರೀಕ್ಷೆ ಬಂದಿದಿರು ನಿಲುವನಕ ॥ ಭಾವಮರ್ಮಂಗಳೇಳುವುವಾಗ ತಳದಿಂದ । ದೇವರೇ ಗತಿಯಾಗ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೫ ॥

content: ಎಲ್ಲರುಂ ಜಿತಮನಸ್ಕರೆ ದೈವ ವಿಧಿ ಮಾಯೆ । ಚೆಲ್ವರೂಪಿಂ ಬಂದು ಕಣ್ಕುಕ್ಕುವನಕ ॥ ವಲ್ಗುರೂಪೆ ಸುಭದ್ರೆ ಕಣ್ಮುಂದೆ ಸುಳಿವನಕ । ಫಲ್ಗುಣನು ಸಂನ್ಯಾಸಿ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೬ ॥ ellarum jitamanaskare daiva vidhi mAye । chelvarUpim bandu kaNkukkuvanaka ॥ valgurUpe subhadre kaNmunde suLivanaka । phalguNanu samnyAsi  - Mankutimma ॥ 276 ॥ Everyone has conquered his mind as long as divine illusion does not bring in a beautiful form in front of you to taunt your senses. Arjuna was a celibate saint until the beautiful Subhadra came in front of him.  - Mankutimma
translation: Everyone has conquered his mind as long as divine illusion does not bring in a beautiful form in front of you to taunt your senses. Arjuna was a celibate saint until the beautiful Subhadra came in front of him.  - Mankutimma
title: ಫಲ್ಗುಣನು ಸಂನ್ಯಾಸಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ellarum jitamanaskare daiva vidhi mAye । chelvarUpim bandu kaNkukkuvanaka ॥ valgurUpe subhadre kaNmunde suLivanaka । phalguNanu samnyAsi  - Mankutimma ॥ 276 ॥
kagga: ಎಲ್ಲರುಂ ಜಿತಮನಸ್ಕರೆ ದೈವ ವಿಧಿ ಮಾಯೆ । ಚೆಲ್ವರೂಪಿಂ ಬಂದು ಕಣ್ಕುಕ್ಕುವನಕ ॥ ವಲ್ಗುರೂಪೆ ಸುಭದ್ರೆ ಕಣ್ಮುಂದೆ ಸುಳಿವನಕ । ಫಲ್ಗುಣನು ಸಂನ್ಯಾಸಿ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೬ ॥

content: ಧಾರುಣೀಸುತೆಯವೊಲು ದೃಢಮನಸ್ಕರದಾರು? । ಮಾರೀಚಹರಣವಡ್ಡಾಡಲೇನಾಯ್ತು? ॥ ವಾರಿಧಿಯೊಳಡಗಿ ನಿದ್ರಿಪ ಬಾಡವವೊ ತೃಷ್ಣೆ । ಆರದನು ಕೆರಳಿಪರೊ! - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೭ ॥ dhAruNIsuteyavolu dRuDHamanaskaradAru? । mArIchaharaNa vaDDADalEnAytu? ॥ vAridhiyoLaDagi nidripa bADavavo tRuShNe । Ardanu keraLiparo!  - Mankutimma ॥ 277 ॥ Is there is any better example of self control than Sita? What happened to her when the golden deer came in front of her? Desire hides sleeping in deep ocean of the mind. It does not die. When the time is right (or wrong) it comes up and troubles every one. What is that which provokes it?  - Mankutimma
translation: Is there is any better example of self control than Sita? What happened to her when the golden deer came in front of her? Desire hides sleeping in deep ocean of the mind. It does not die. When the time is right (or wrong) it comes up and troubles every one. What is that which provokes it?  - Mankutimma
title: ಆರದನು ಕೆರಳಿಪರೊ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dhAruNIsuteyavolu dRuDHamanaskaradAru? । mArIchaharaNa vaDDADalEnAytu? ॥ vAridhiyoLaDagi nidripa bADavavo tRuShNe । Ardanu keraLiparo!  - Mankutimma ॥ 277 ॥
kagga: ಧಾರುಣೀಸುತೆಯವೊಲು ದೃಢಮನಸ್ಕರದಾರು? । ಮಾರೀಚಹರಣವಡ್ಡಾಡಲೇನಾಯ್ತು? ॥ ವಾರಿಧಿಯೊಳಡಗಿ ನಿದ್ರಿಪ ಬಾಡವವೊ ತೃಷ್ಣೆ । ಆರದನು ಕೆರಳಿಪರೊ! - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೭ ॥

content: ಆನೆಗಾರ್ ಇರುವೆಗಾರ್ ಕಾಗೆಗಾರ್ ಕಪ್ಪೆಗಾರ್ । ಕಾಣಿಸುವರನ್ನವನು? ಹಸಿವವರ ಗುರುವು ॥ ಮಾನವನುಮಂತುದರಶಿಷ್ಯನವನಾ ರಸನೆ । ನಾನಾವಯವಗಳಲಿ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೮ ॥ AnegAr iruvegAr kAgegAr kappegAr । kANisuvar annavanu? hasivu avara guruvu ॥ mAnavanumantu udara shiShyanu avanA rasane । nAnA avayavagaLali  - Mankutimma ॥ 278 ॥ Who teaches the elephants, ants, crows and frogs to find food? No one does. The hunger inside them leads them to their food. Man has hunger in every part of the body and hence has developed various tastes. These are tastes that make him what he is  - prosperous or miserable.  - Mankutimma
translation: Who teaches the elephants, ants, crows and frogs to find food? No one does. The hunger inside them leads them to their food. Man has hunger in every part of the body and hence has developed various tastes. These are tastes that make him what he is  - prosperous or miserable.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಾನಾವಯವಗಳಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: AnegAr iruvegAr kAgegAr kappegAr । kANisuvar annavanu? hasivu avara guruvu ॥ mAnavanumantu udara shiShyanu avanA rasane । nAnA avayavagaLali  - Mankutimma ॥ 278 ॥
kagga: ಆನೆಗಾರ್ ಇರುವೆಗಾರ್ ಕಾಗೆಗಾರ್ ಕಪ್ಪೆಗಾರ್ । ಕಾಣಿಸುವರನ್ನವನು? ಹಸಿವವರ ಗುರುವು ॥ ಮಾನವನುಮಂತುದರಶಿಷ್ಯನವನಾ ರಸನೆ । ನಾನಾವಯವಗಳಲಿ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೮ ॥

content: ಯಮನಿಗೇಕಪಕೀರ್ತಿ? ನರರು ಬಲು ಕರುಣಿಗಳೆ? । ಮಮತೆಯಿನೊ ರೋಷದಿನೊ ಹಾಸ್ಯದಿನೊ ಹೇಗೋ ॥ ನಿಮಿಷನಿಮಿಷಮುಮೊರ್ವನಿನ್ನೊರ್ವನನು ತಿಕ್ಕಿ । ಸಮೆಯಿಸುವನಾಯುವನು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೯ ॥ yamanigEke apakIrti? nararu balu karuNigaLe? । mamateyino rOShadino hAsyadino hEgO ॥ nimiShanimiShamum orvanu innorvananu tikki। sameyisuvanu Ayuvanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 279 ॥ Why should one consider Yama (Lord of death) harsh? Is man very kind to his own kind? Either through love, compassion, anger or fun he creates emotions in those around him. This emotional roller coaster every minute erodes life out of people minute by minute.  - Mankutimma
translation: Why should one consider Yama (Lord of death) harsh? Is man very kind to his own kind? Either through love, compassion, anger or fun he creates emotions in those around him. This emotional roller coaster every minute erodes life out of people minute by minute.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಮೆಯಿಸುವನಾಯುವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: yamanigEke apakIrti? nararu balu karuNigaLe? । mamateyino rOShadino hAsyadino hEgO ॥ nimiShanimiShamum orvanu innorvananu tikki। sameyisuvanu Ayuvanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 279 ॥
kagga: ಯಮನಿಗೇಕಪಕೀರ್ತಿ? ನರರು ಬಲು ಕರುಣಿಗಳೆ? । ಮಮತೆಯಿನೊ ರೋಷದಿನೊ ಹಾಸ್ಯದಿನೊ ಹೇಗೋ ॥ ನಿಮಿಷನಿಮಿಷಮುಮೊರ್ವನಿನ್ನೊರ್ವನನು ತಿಕ್ಕಿ । ಸಮೆಯಿಸುವನಾಯುವನು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭೯ ॥

content: ದೋಷಿಯವನಿವನು ಪಾಪಿಯೆನುತ್ತ ಗಳಹದಿರು ।ಆಶೆಯೆನಿತವನು ಸಹಿಸಿದನೊ! ದಹಿಸಿದನೊ! ॥ವಾಸನೆಗಳವನನೇನೆಳದವೋ ಬಲವೆನೊ! ।ಪಾಶಬದ್ಧನು ನರನು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೦ ॥dOShiyavan ivanu pApi enutta gaLahadiru ।Asheyenitavanu sahisidano! dahisidano! ॥vAsanegaLu avananEnu eLadavO balaveno! ।pAshabaddhanu naranu  - Mankutimma ॥ 280 ॥Don;t single out people and call them as imperfect and sinners. Who knows how many desires he had to fight against? How many he endured? How many he burnt? Sensory pleasures pull him strongly in all direction. Man is always bound by his desires.  - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t single out people and call them as imperfect and sinners. Who knows how many desires he had to fight against? How many he endured? How many he burnt? Sensory pleasures pull him strongly in all direction. Man is always bound by his desires.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪಾಶಬದ್ಧನು ನರನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dOShiyavan ivanu pApi enutta gaLahadiru ।Asheyenitavanu sahisidano! dahisidano! ॥vAsanegaLu avananEnu eLadavO balaveno! ।pAshabaddhanu naranu  - Mankutimma ॥ 280 ॥
kagga: ದೋಷಿಯವನಿವನು ಪಾಪಿಯೆನುತ್ತ ಗಳಹದಿರು ।ಆಶೆಯೆನಿತವನು ಸಹಿಸಿದನೊ! ದಹಿಸಿದನೊ! ॥ವಾಸನೆಗಳವನನೇನೆಳದವೋ ಬಲವೆನೊ! ।ಪಾಶಬದ್ಧನು ನರನು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೦ ॥

content: ಪಾತಕಿಯೊಳಾಗ್ರಹವ ತೋರೆ ನಿರ್ಮಲನಾರು? ।ಆತುಮದ ಪರಿಕಥೆಯನರಿತವರೆ ನಾವು? ॥ಸೋತ ದುರ್ಬಲಿಗೆ ಸಲ್ಲುವುದು ನಮ್ಮನುಕಂಪೆ ।ನೀತಿ ನಿಂದೆಯೊಳಿರದು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೧ ॥pAtakiyoL Agrahava tOre nirmalanu yAru?।Atumada parikatheyanu aritavare nAvu? ॥sOta durbalige salluvudu namma anukampe ।nIti nindeyoLiradu  - Mankutimma ॥ 281 ॥Those who feel angry at a sinner; are they pure? Who knows why any one does what they do? They may have failed to resist against desire. The defeated deserve our sympathies. It is not wise to berate them.  - Mankutimma
translation: Those who feel angry at a sinner; are they pure? Who knows why any one does what they do? They may have failed to resist against desire. The defeated deserve our sympathies. It is not wise to berate them.  - Mankutimma
title: ನೀತಿ ನಿಂದೆಯೊಳಿರದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: pAtakiyoL Agrahava tOre nirmalanu yAru?।Atumada parikatheyanu aritavare nAvu? ॥sOta durbalige salluvudu namma anukampe ।nIti nindeyoLiradu  - Mankutimma ॥ 281 ॥
kagga: ಪಾತಕಿಯೊಳಾಗ್ರಹವ ತೋರೆ ನಿರ್ಮಲನಾರು? ।ಆತುಮದ ಪರಿಕಥೆಯನರಿತವರೆ ನಾವು? ॥ಸೋತ ದುರ್ಬಲಿಗೆ ಸಲ್ಲುವುದು ನಮ್ಮನುಕಂಪೆ ।ನೀತಿ ನಿಂದೆಯೊಳಿರದು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೧ ॥

content: ಪಾಪವೆಂಬುದದೇನು ಸುಲಭಸಾಧನೆಯಲ್ಲ ।ತಾಪದಿಂ ಬೇಯದವನ್ ಅದನೆಸಪನಲ್ಲ ॥ವಾಪಿಯಾಳವ ದಡದಿ ನಿಂತಾತನರಿವನೇಂ? ।ಪಾಪಿಯೆದೆಯೊಳಕಿಳಿಯೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೨ ॥pApavembudu adEnu sulabha sAdhaneyalla ।tApadim bEyadavan adanu esepanalla ॥vApiyALava daDadi nintu Atana arivanEm? ।pApiya edeyoLake iLiyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 282 ॥It is not very easy to commit sin. If one had a choice, they would never commit any sin. If someone commits any sin, there must be a strong reason why he did so. That reason may be hidden deep inside his mind and troubling him all along. One can not know the depth of the well by standing by its side. It can only be measured by getting into it. Instead of commenting on them, one must understand why any one commits sin.  - Mankutimma
translation: It is not very easy to commit sin. If one had a choice, they would never commit any sin. If someone commits any sin, there must be a strong reason why he did so. That reason may be hidden deep inside his mind and troubling him all along. One can not know the depth of the well by standing by its side. It can only be measured by getting into it. Instead of commenting on them, one must understand why any one commits sin.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪಾಪಿಯೆದೆಯೊಳಕಿಳಿಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: pApavembudu adEnu sulabha sAdhaneyalla ।tApadim bEyadavan adanu esepanalla ॥vApiyALava daDadi nintu Atana arivanEm? ।pApiya edeyoLake iLiyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 282 ॥
kagga: ಪಾಪವೆಂಬುದದೇನು ಸುಲಭಸಾಧನೆಯಲ್ಲ ।ತಾಪದಿಂ ಬೇಯದವನ್ ಅದನೆಸಪನಲ್ಲ ॥ವಾಪಿಯಾಳವ ದಡದಿ ನಿಂತಾತನರಿವನೇಂ? ।ಪಾಪಿಯೆದೆಯೊಳಕಿಳಿಯೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೨ ॥

content: ರಾವಣನ ಹಳಿವವನೆ, ಜೀವವನೆ ಬಿಸುಡಿಸುವ ।ಲಾವಣ್ಯವೆಂತಹುದೊ? ನೋವದೆಂತಹುದೊ? ॥ಬೇವಸವ ಪಟ್ಟು ತಿಳಿ; ತಿಳಿದು ಹಳಿಯುವೊಡೆ ಹಳಿ ।ಗಾವಿಲನ ಗಳಹೇನು?‌ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೩ ॥rAvaNana haLivavane, jIvavane bisuDisuva ।lAvaNyavu entahudo? nOvu adentahudo? ॥bEvasava paTTu tiLi; tiLidu haLiyuvoDe haLi ।gAvilana gaLahEnu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 283 ॥You may want to criticize Ravana for doing all the sins committed in Ramayana. But have you thought about his motive? Have thought how strong should that emotion (desire, revenge) be which pushed him to do so? How much pained was he because of these feelings? Try to understand his turmoil. After understanding, if you still want to criticize, go ahead. But criticizing without understanding is meaningless.   - Mankutimma
translation: You may want to criticize Ravana for doing all the sins committed in Ramayana. But have you thought about his motive? Have thought how strong should that emotion (desire, revenge) be which pushed him to do so? How much pained was he because of these feelings? Try to understand his turmoil. After understanding, if you still want to criticize, go ahead. But criticizing without understanding is meaningless.   - Mankutimma
title: ಗಾವಿಲನ ಗಳಹೇನು?‌  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: rAvaNana haLivavane, jIvavane bisuDisuva ।lAvaNyavu entahudo? nOvu adentahudo? ॥bEvasava paTTu tiLi; tiLidu haLiyuvoDe haLi ।gAvilana gaLahEnu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 283 ॥
kagga: ರಾವಣನ ಹಳಿವವನೆ, ಜೀವವನೆ ಬಿಸುಡಿಸುವ ।ಲಾವಣ್ಯವೆಂತಹುದೊ? ನೋವದೆಂತಹುದೊ? ॥ಬೇವಸವ ಪಟ್ಟು ತಿಳಿ; ತಿಳಿದು ಹಳಿಯುವೊಡೆ ಹಳಿ ।ಗಾವಿಲನ ಗಳಹೇನು?‌ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೩ ॥

content: ಜೀವಋಣಗಳ ಲೆಕ್ಕದಾದಿಯರಿಯದ ನಾವು ।ಆವುದನು ಸರಿಯೆನುವ?‌ತಪ್ಪಾವುದೆನುವ? ॥ಓವೊ ಬಿಡು ಕಡುಕಷ್ಟ ನೀತಿನಿರ್ಣಯದ ಹೊರೆ ।ದೈವವದ ಹೊರಲಿ ಬಿಡು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೪ ॥jIvaRuNagaLa lekkada Adiya ariyada nAvu ।Avudanu sariyenuva? tappavudenuva? ॥Ovo biDu kaDukaShTa nItinirNayada hore ।daivavada horali biDu  - Mankutimma ॥ 284 ॥We do not know the beginning of this cycle of debt (or causation). How can we say something is right or wrong? Alas! it is very difficult, the burden of judgment of morality. Let us leave that job to fate.  - Mankutimma
translation: We do not know the beginning of this cycle of debt (or causation). How can we say something is right or wrong? Alas! it is very difficult, the burden of judgment of morality. Let us leave that job to fate.  - Mankutimma
title: ದೈವವದ ಹೊರಲಿ ಬಿಡು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jIvaRuNagaLa lekkada Adiya ariyada nAvu ।Avudanu sariyenuva? tappavudenuva? ॥Ovo biDu kaDukaShTa nItinirNayada hore ।daivavada horali biDu  - Mankutimma ॥ 284 ॥
kagga: ಜೀವಋಣಗಳ ಲೆಕ್ಕದಾದಿಯರಿಯದ ನಾವು ।ಆವುದನು ಸರಿಯೆನುವ?‌ತಪ್ಪಾವುದೆನುವ? ॥ಓವೊ ಬಿಡು ಕಡುಕಷ್ಟ ನೀತಿನಿರ್ಣಯದ ಹೊರೆ ।ದೈವವದ ಹೊರಲಿ ಬಿಡು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೪ ॥

content: ನಾಚಿಕೆಯನಾಗಿಪುವು ನಮ್ಮ ಸುಖದಾತುರದ ।ಯೋಚನೆಗಳವನು ಮರುವಗಲು ಪರಿಕಿಸಲು ॥ಚಾಚಿದ್ದ ರಸನೆ ತಾನೊಳಸೇದಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವುದು ।ರೇಚನವದಾತ್ಮಕ್ಕೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೫ ॥nAchikeyanu Agipuvu namma sukhadAturada ।yOchanegaLu avanu maruvagalu parikisalu ॥chAchidda rasane tAn oLasEdikoLLuvudu ।rEchanavu adu Atmakke  - Mankutimma ॥ 285 ॥We let our mind wander in search of pleasures. But when we think about it the next morning, we get embarrassed. We withdraw the tongue that was stretched out to taste (symbolic of us reeling our minds back under control). Such control is good for the soul.   - Mankutimma
translation: We let our mind wander in search of pleasures. But when we think about it the next morning, we get embarrassed. We withdraw the tongue that was stretched out to taste (symbolic of us reeling our minds back under control). Such control is good for the soul.   - Mankutimma
title: ರೇಚನವದಾತ್ಮಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nAchikeyanu Agipuvu namma sukhadAturada ।yOchanegaLu avanu maruvagalu parikisalu ॥chAchidda rasane tAn oLasEdikoLLuvudu ।rEchanavu adu Atmakke  - Mankutimma ॥ 285 ॥
kagga: ನಾಚಿಕೆಯನಾಗಿಪುವು ನಮ್ಮ ಸುಖದಾತುರದ ।ಯೋಚನೆಗಳವನು ಮರುವಗಲು ಪರಿಕಿಸಲು ॥ಚಾಚಿದ್ದ ರಸನೆ ತಾನೊಳಸೇದಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವುದು ।ರೇಚನವದಾತ್ಮಕ್ಕೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೫ ॥

content: ಸನ್ನಿಹಿತ ಮನುಜನಲಿ ದೈವಪಾಶವವೆರಡು ।ಪುಣ್ಯ ಪಾಪದ ಮಿಶ್ರವವನ ಸ್ವಭಾವ ॥ಕಣ್ಣೊಮ್ಮೆಯಾಗಸದ ಬೆಳಕಿನೊಡನಾಡುವುದು ।ಮಣ್ಣೊಳುರುಳುವುದೊಮ್ಮೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೬ ॥sannihita manujanali daiva pAshava eraDu ।puNya pApada mishravavana svabhAva ॥kaNNomme yAgasada beLakinoDane ADuvudu ।maNNoLu uruLuvudomme  - Mankutimma ॥ 286 ॥Both divine and demonic characters are together in a man. His actions lead both to good and bad karma. At times our eyes look at the sky (and feel happy). At other times, the same eyes roll over mud (looking down in shame).  - Mankutimma
translation: Both divine and demonic characters are together in a man. His actions lead both to good and bad karma. At times our eyes look at the sky (and feel happy). At other times, the same eyes roll over mud (looking down in shame).  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಣ್ಣೊಳುರುಳುವುದೊಮ್ಮೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sannihita manujanali daiva pAshava eraDu ।puNya pApada mishravavana svabhAva ॥kaNNomme yAgasada beLakinoDane ADuvudu ।maNNoLu uruLuvudomme  - Mankutimma ॥ 286 ॥
kagga: ಸನ್ನಿಹಿತ ಮನುಜನಲಿ ದೈವಪಾಶವವೆರಡು ।ಪುಣ್ಯ ಪಾಪದ ಮಿಶ್ರವವನ ಸ್ವಭಾವ ॥ಕಣ್ಣೊಮ್ಮೆಯಾಗಸದ ಬೆಳಕಿನೊಡನಾಡುವುದು ।ಮಣ್ಣೊಳುರುಳುವುದೊಮ್ಮೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೬ ॥

content: ನರರ ಸ್ವಭಾವ ವಕ್ರಗಳನೆಣಿಸುವುದೇಕೆ? ।ಗಿರಿ ಕಣಿವೆಗಳ ಗಣಿಸಿ ರೋಷಗೊಳ್ಳುವೆಯೇಂ ॥ಸುರೆ ಗರಲ ಸುಧೆಗಳ್ ಅಬ್ಧಿಯಲಿ ಸೋದರರಲ್ತೆ? ।ಅರಿತೊಗ್ಗು ಸಾಜಕ್ಕೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೭ ॥narara svabhAva vakragaLaneNisuvudEke? ।giri kaNivegaLa gaNisi rOShagoLLuveyEM? ॥sure garala sudhegaL abdhiyali sOdararalte? ।aritu oggu sAjakke  - Mankutimma ॥ 287 ॥Why are we so worried about varying natures and imperfections of people? Do we worry about the same kind of difference or imperfections on the face of the earth? There are mountains and valleys; But we don;t get angry at any of them. Intoxicating alcohol, poison and elixir all came from the same exercise of churning the ocean. So, all of them are brotherly. One must understand this and accept people as they are with their innate qualities.  - Mankutimma
translation: Why are we so worried about varying natures and imperfections of people? Do we worry about the same kind of difference or imperfections on the face of the earth? There are mountains and valleys; But we don;t get angry at any of them. Intoxicating alcohol, poison and elixir all came from the same exercise of churning the ocean. So, all of them are brotherly. One must understand this and accept people as they are with their innate qualities.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅರಿತೊಗ್ಗು ಸಾಜಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: narara svabhAva vakragaLaneNisuvudEke? ।giri kaNivegaLa gaNisi rOShagoLLuveyEM? ॥sure garala sudhegaL abdhiyali sOdararalte? ।aritu oggu sAjakke  - Mankutimma ॥ 287 ॥
kagga: ನರರ ಸ್ವಭಾವ ವಕ್ರಗಳನೆಣಿಸುವುದೇಕೆ? ।ಗಿರಿ ಕಣಿವೆಗಳ ಗಣಿಸಿ ರೋಷಗೊಳ್ಳುವೆಯೇಂ ॥ಸುರೆ ಗರಲ ಸುಧೆಗಳ್ ಅಬ್ಧಿಯಲಿ ಸೋದರರಲ್ತೆ? ।ಅರಿತೊಗ್ಗು ಸಾಜಕ್ಕೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೭ ॥

content: ರಾಮನಿರ್ದಂದು ರಾವಣನೊಬ್ಬನಿರ್ದನಲ ।ಭೀಮನಿರ್ದಂದು ದುಶ್ಶಾಸನನದೊರ್ವನ್ ॥ಈ ಮಹಿಯೊಳನ್ಯಾಯಕಾರಿಯಿಲ್ಲದುದೆಂದು? ।ರಾಮಭಟನಾಗು ನೀಂ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೮ ॥rAmanirdandu rAvaNanobbanirdanala ।bhImanirdandu dushshAsananadorvan ॥E mahiyoLanyAyakAriyilladudendu? ।rAmabhaTanAgu nIM  - Mankutimma ॥ 288 ॥When there was Rama, there was a Ravana. When there was a Bheema, there was one Dushyasana. Is there any period in this world that did not have bad people? In your time, you should be on Rama;s side (good side).  - Mankutimma
translation: When there was Rama, there was a Ravana. When there was a Bheema, there was one Dushyasana. Is there any period in this world that did not have bad people? In your time, you should be on Rama;s side (good side).  - Mankutimma
title: ರಾಮಭಟನಾಗು ನೀಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: rAmanirdandu rAvaNanobbanirdanala ।bhImanirdandu dushshAsananadorvan ॥E mahiyoLanyAyakAriyilladudendu? ।rAmabhaTanAgu nIM  - Mankutimma ॥ 288 ॥
kagga: ರಾಮನಿರ್ದಂದು ರಾವಣನೊಬ್ಬನಿರ್ದನಲ ।ಭೀಮನಿರ್ದಂದು ದುಶ್ಶಾಸನನದೊರ್ವನ್ ॥ಈ ಮಹಿಯೊಳನ್ಯಾಯಕಾರಿಯಿಲ್ಲದುದೆಂದು? ।ರಾಮಭಟನಾಗು ನೀಂ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೮ ॥

content: ಆಳನೀಳಗಳ ಕಾಣಲ್ಕಾಗಿಸದೆ ಮೊರೆವ ।ಬಾಳ ಕಡಲೊಳು ಮುಳುಗಿ ತಳದಿಂದಲೆದ್ದು ॥ಪೇಳುವರದಾರು ನ್ಯಾಯಾನ್ಯಾಯ ವಿವರಗಳ ।ಗಾಳಿಗಾಬರಿಯೆಲ್ಲ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೯ ॥ALanILagaLA kANalkAgisade moreva ।bALa kaDaloLu muLugi taLadindaleddu ॥pELuvaradAru nyAyAnyAya vivaragaLa ।gALigAbariyella  - Mankutimma ॥ 289 ॥This life is like a dangerous sea. We can not know its depth or its expanse. Is there any one who can dive deep, touch its bottom (understand it completely), come back to surface and tell us what is good and what is not? Without such knowledgeable people, everything other people say are just hypothesis, rumors that cause fears.  - Mankutimma
translation: This life is like a dangerous sea. We can not know its depth or its expanse. Is there any one who can dive deep, touch its bottom (understand it completely), come back to surface and tell us what is good and what is not? Without such knowledgeable people, everything other people say are just hypothesis, rumors that cause fears.  - Mankutimma
title: ಗಾಳಿಗಾಬರಿಯೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ALanILagaLA kANalkAgisade moreva ।bALa kaDaloLu muLugi taLadindaleddu ॥pELuvaradAru nyAyAnyAya vivaragaLa ।gALigAbariyella  - Mankutimma ॥ 289 ॥
kagga: ಆಳನೀಳಗಳ ಕಾಣಲ್ಕಾಗಿಸದೆ ಮೊರೆವ ।ಬಾಳ ಕಡಲೊಳು ಮುಳುಗಿ ತಳದಿಂದಲೆದ್ದು ॥ಪೇಳುವರದಾರು ನ್ಯಾಯಾನ್ಯಾಯ ವಿವರಗಳ ।ಗಾಳಿಗಾಬರಿಯೆಲ್ಲ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮೯ ॥

content: ಸಕ್ಕರೆಯ ಭಕ್ಷ್ಯವನು ಮಕ್ಕಳೆದುರಿಗೆ ಕೈಗೆ ।ಸಿಕ್ಕುವಂತಿರಿಸಿ ಕದ್ದರೆ ಗದ್ದರಿಪುದೇಂ? ॥ತಕ್ಕುದಲ್ಲದಪೇಕ್ಷೆಗೇಕೆ ಮದ್ಯವ ಕುಡಿಸು- ।ತುಕ್ಕಿಸುವನದನು ವಿಧಿ? - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೦ ॥sakkareya bhakShyavanu makkaLedurige kaige ।sikkuvantirisi kaddare gaddaripudEM? ॥takkudalladapEkShegEke madyava kuDisu- ।tukkisuvanadanu vidhi?  - Mankutimma ॥ 290 ॥If you keep a sweet candy in front of a child and ask it not to eat, it will not work out. The child will definitely not be able to resist and try eating it. Then will you punish the child? Man already has desires which are not moral. But, fate adds intoxication to the desiring mind and encourages it.  - Mankutimma
translation: If you keep a sweet candy in front of a child and ask it not to eat, it will not work out. The child will definitely not be able to resist and try eating it. Then will you punish the child? Man already has desires which are not moral. But, fate adds intoxication to the desiring mind and encourages it.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕುಡಿಸುತುಕ್ಕಿಸುವನದನು ವಿಧಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sakkareya bhakShyavanu makkaLedurige kaige ।sikkuvantirisi kaddare gaddaripudEM? ॥takkudalladapEkShegEke madyava kuDisu- ।tukkisuvanadanu vidhi?  - Mankutimma ॥ 290 ॥
kagga: ಸಕ್ಕರೆಯ ಭಕ್ಷ್ಯವನು ಮಕ್ಕಳೆದುರಿಗೆ ಕೈಗೆ ।ಸಿಕ್ಕುವಂತಿರಿಸಿ ಕದ್ದರೆ ಗದ್ದರಿಪುದೇಂ? ॥ತಕ್ಕುದಲ್ಲದಪೇಕ್ಷೆಗೇಕೆ ಮದ್ಯವ ಕುಡಿಸು- ।ತುಕ್ಕಿಸುವನದನು ವಿಧಿ? - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೦ ॥

content: ತಿದ್ದಿಕೊಳೊ ನಿನ್ನ ನೀಂ; ಜಗವ ತಿದ್ದುವುದಿರಲಿ ।ತಿದ್ದಿಕೆಗಮೊಂದು ಮಿತಿಯುಂಟು ಮರೆಯದಿರು ॥ಉದ್ದ ನೀಂ ಬೆರಳನಿತು ಬೆಳೆದೀಯೆ ಸಾಮಿಂದೆ ।ಸ್ಪರ್ಧಿಯೆ ತ್ರಿವಿಕ್ರಮಗೆ?- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೨ ॥tiddikoLo ninna nIM; jagava tidduvudirali ।tiddikegamondu mitiyunTu mareyadiru ॥udda nIM beraLanitu beLedIye sAminde ।spardhiye trivikramage?  - Mankutimma ॥ 292 ॥You must work to correct yourself before trying to correct the world. You must remember that there is a limit to this correction. You can do all exercise and make your finger stronger (to point mistakes in others and correct them). But can you be any comparison to Trivikrama?  - Mankutimma
translation: You must work to correct yourself before trying to correct the world. You must remember that there is a limit to this correction. You can do all exercise and make your finger stronger (to point mistakes in others and correct them). But can you be any comparison to Trivikrama?  - Mankutimma
title: ದೋಷವೊಳಗೋ ಹೊರಗೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tiddikoLo ninna nIM; jagava tidduvudirali ।tiddikegamondu mitiyunTu mareyadiru ॥udda nIM beraLanitu beLedIye sAminde ।spardhiye trivikramage?  - Mankutimma ॥ 292 ॥
kagga: ತಿದ್ದಿಕೊಳೊ ನಿನ್ನ ನೀಂ; ಜಗವ ತಿದ್ದುವುದಿರಲಿ ।ತಿದ್ದಿಕೆಗಮೊಂದು ಮಿತಿಯುಂಟು ಮರೆಯದಿರು ॥ಉದ್ದ ನೀಂ ಬೆರಳನಿತು ಬೆಳೆದೀಯೆ ಸಾಮಿಂದೆ ।ಸ್ಪರ್ಧಿಯೆ ತ್ರಿವಿಕ್ರಮಗೆ?- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೨ ॥

content: ದರಿಯಿರದೆ ಗಿರಿಯಿಲ್ಲ, ನೆರಳಿರದೆ ಬೆಳಕಿಲ್ಲ ।ಮರಣವಿಲ್ಲದೆ ಜನನಜೀವನಗಳಿಲ್ಲ ॥ವರಗುಣೋನ್ನತಿಗೆ ನಿಮ್ನಗುಣಂಗಳೊಡವುಟ್ಟು ।ತೆರೆ ಬೀಳದೇಳುಳುವುದೆ?- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೩ ॥dariyirade giriyilla, neraLirade beLakilla ।maraNAvillade jananajIvanagaLilla ॥varaguNOnnatige nimnaguNangaLoDavuTTu ।tere bILadELuvude?  - Mankutimma ॥ 293 ॥There are no mountains without valleys. There can not be light without shadows. If people never died, there would be no life or births.For every virtue, there is a vice born with it. A tide cannot rise before having fallen before (and vice-versa).  - Mankutimma
translation: There are no mountains without valleys. There can not be light without shadows. If people never died, there would be no life or births.For every virtue, there is a vice born with it. A tide cannot rise before having fallen before (and vice-versa).  - Mankutimma
title: ತೆರೆ ಬೀಳದೇಳುಳುವುದೆ?- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dariyirade giriyilla, neraLirade beLakilla ।maraNAvillade jananajIvanagaLilla ॥varaguNOnnatige nimnaguNangaLoDavuTTu ।tere bILadELuvude?  - Mankutimma ॥ 293 ॥
kagga: ದರಿಯಿರದೆ ಗಿರಿಯಿಲ್ಲ, ನೆರಳಿರದೆ ಬೆಳಕಿಲ್ಲ ।ಮರಣವಿಲ್ಲದೆ ಜನನಜೀವನಗಳಿಲ್ಲ ॥ವರಗುಣೋನ್ನತಿಗೆ ನಿಮ್ನಗುಣಂಗಳೊಡವುಟ್ಟು ।ತೆರೆ ಬೀಳದೇಳುಳುವುದೆ?- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೩ ॥

content: ಉಪ್ಪಿಷ್ಟು ಹುಳಿಯಿಷ್ಟು ಕಾರ ಸಿಹಿಯಷ್ಟಿಷ್ಟು ।ಒಪ್ಪಿರ್ದೊಡದು ಭೋಜ್ಯವಂತು ಜೀವಿತಮುಂ ॥ತಪ್ಪು ಸರಿ ಬೆಪ್ಪು ಜಾಣಂದಕುಂದುಗಳ ಬಗೆ ।ಯಿಪ್ಪತ್ತು ಸೇರೆ ರುಚಿ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೪ ॥uppiShTu huLiyiShTu kAra sihiyaShTiShTu ।oppidorDe adu bhOjyavantu jIvitamuM ॥tappu sari beppu jANa anda kundugaLa bage ।yippattu sEre ruchi  - Mankutimma ॥ 294 ॥For a tasty meal it must have a little salt, a little sour, a little hot and a little sweet  - all to correct proportions. If it is not so, then how can one eat such food? Similarly, our life must be a proportional combination of mistakes, right choices, stupidity, intelligence, beauty and shortcomings. With twenty such qualities life becomes meaningful.  - Mankutimma
translation: For a tasty meal it must have a little salt, a little sour, a little hot and a little sweet  - all to correct proportions. If it is not so, then how can one eat such food? Similarly, our life must be a proportional combination of mistakes, right choices, stupidity, intelligence, beauty and shortcomings. With twenty such qualities life becomes meaningful.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಗೆಯಿಪ್ಪತ್ತು ಸೇರೆ ರುಚಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: uppiShTu huLiyiShTu kAra sihiyaShTiShTu ।oppidorDe adu bhOjyavantu jIvitamuM ॥tappu sari beppu jANa anda kundugaLa bage ।yippattu sEre ruchi  - Mankutimma ॥ 294 ॥
kagga: ಉಪ್ಪಿಷ್ಟು ಹುಳಿಯಿಷ್ಟು ಕಾರ ಸಿಹಿಯಷ್ಟಿಷ್ಟು ।ಒಪ್ಪಿರ್ದೊಡದು ಭೋಜ್ಯವಂತು ಜೀವಿತಮುಂ ॥ತಪ್ಪು ಸರಿ ಬೆಪ್ಪು ಜಾಣಂದಕುಂದುಗಳ ಬಗೆ ।ಯಿಪ್ಪತ್ತು ಸೇರೆ ರುಚಿ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೪ ॥

content: ತಪ್ಪನಿನಿತುಂ ಸೈಸದಪ್ಪಟದ ಗುಣಶಾಲಿ ।ಕಪ್ಪು ಕಂಡು ಕನಲ್ವ ಕೆಂಡ ಗುಲಗಂಜಿ ॥ಉಪ್ಪೊ ಸಪ್ಪೆಯೊ ನಿನ್ನ ಮೈಬೆವರು ನೆಕ್ಕಿ ತಿಳಿ ।ಒಪ್ಪಿಹೆಯ ನೀನಜನ?- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೫ ॥tappan initum saisada appaTada guNashAli ।kappu kanDu kanalva kenDa gulaganji ॥uppo sappeyo ninna maibevaru nekki tiLi ।oppiheya nIn ajana?  - Mankutimma ॥ 295 ॥If a person does not tolerate mistakes from any one and considers himself perfect then he is like a crab;s eye seed which thinks it is red and oblivious to its back which is black. If you want to know if your sweat is sweet or salty, then you have lick and taste. You will know that it is salty, just like anyone else. At least now, do you agree that there is a Creator?  - Mankutimma
translation: If a person does not tolerate mistakes from any one and considers himself perfect then he is like a crab;s eye seed which thinks it is red and oblivious to its back which is black. If you want to know if your sweat is sweet or salty, then you have lick and taste. You will know that it is salty, just like anyone else. At least now, do you agree that there is a Creator?  - Mankutimma
title: ಒಪ್ಪಿಹೆಯ ನೀನಜನ?- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tappan initum saisada appaTada guNashAli ।kappu kanDu kanalva kenDa gulaganji ॥uppo sappeyo ninna maibevaru nekki tiLi ।oppiheya nIn ajana?  - Mankutimma ॥ 295 ॥
kagga: ತಪ್ಪನಿನಿತುಂ ಸೈಸದಪ್ಪಟದ ಗುಣಶಾಲಿ ।ಕಪ್ಪು ಕಂಡು ಕನಲ್ವ ಕೆಂಡ ಗುಲಗಂಜಿ ॥ಉಪ್ಪೊ ಸಪ್ಪೆಯೊ ನಿನ್ನ ಮೈಬೆವರು ನೆಕ್ಕಿ ತಿಳಿ ।ಒಪ್ಪಿಹೆಯ ನೀನಜನ?- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೫ ॥

content: ಮರುಕದುಂಬಿದ ಕಣ್ಣನೋಟದೊಳಗಿದ್ದೀತು ।ಬಿರುನುಡಿಯೊಳಿರದೊಂದು ಕೂರಲಗು, ಸಖನೆ ॥ಕರವಾಳಕದಿರದಿಹ ದುರಿತಕಾರಿಯ ಹೃದಯ ।ಕರುಣೆಯಿಂ ಕರಗೀತೊ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೬ ॥maruka tuMbida kaNNA nOTadoLage iddItu ।birunuDiyoLa iradondu kUralagu, sakhane ॥karavALake adiradiha duritakAriya hRudaya ।karuNeyiM karagIto  - Mankutimma ॥ 296 ॥Friend, there is a powerful weapon in a compassion filled eyes that is not found in the harsh words. A sinner may not be get reformed by the fear of a sword, but his heart could melt down by compassion.  - Mankutimma
translation: Friend, there is a powerful weapon in a compassion filled eyes that is not found in the harsh words. A sinner may not be get reformed by the fear of a sword, but his heart could melt down by compassion.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕರುಣೆಯಿಂ ಕರಗೀತೊ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: maruka tuMbida kaNNA nOTadoLage iddItu ।birunuDiyoLa iradondu kUralagu, sakhane ॥karavALake adiradiha duritakAriya hRudaya ।karuNeyiM karagIto  - Mankutimma ॥ 296 ॥
kagga: ಮರುಕದುಂಬಿದ ಕಣ್ಣನೋಟದೊಳಗಿದ್ದೀತು ।ಬಿರುನುಡಿಯೊಳಿರದೊಂದು ಕೂರಲಗು, ಸಖನೆ ॥ಕರವಾಳಕದಿರದಿಹ ದುರಿತಕಾರಿಯ ಹೃದಯ ।ಕರುಣೆಯಿಂ ಕರಗೀತೊ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೬ ॥

content: ಪೆರ್ಮೆಯ ಗುಣಂಗಳಿನ್ನೂರು ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರೋಕ್ತದವು ।ಸರ್ವೋತ್ತಮಗಳೆರಡು ಸರ್ವಕಠಿನಗಳು ॥ನಿರ್ಮತ್ಸರತೆಯೊಂದು ದೋಷಿಯೊಳ್ ಕ್ಷಮೆಯೊಂದು ।ಬ್ರಾಹ್ಮಿಕಾಭ್ಯಾಸವದು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೭ ॥permeya guNangaLinnUru shAstrOktadavu ।sarvOttamagaLeraDu sarvakaThinagaLu ॥nirmatsarateyu ondu dOShiyoL kShameyondu ।brAhmikAbhyAsavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 297 ॥There are a lot of good qualities described in the scriptures. Two of them are the best and most difficult to cultivate. One is to be free from jealousy. The other is to forgive a sinner. These are the very best practices that one must follow.  - Mankutimma
translation: There are a lot of good qualities described in the scriptures. Two of them are the best and most difficult to cultivate. One is to be free from jealousy. The other is to forgive a sinner. These are the very best practices that one must follow.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬ್ರಾಹ್ಮಿಕಾಭ್ಯಾಸವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: permeya guNangaLinnUru shAstrOktadavu ।sarvOttamagaLeraDu sarvakaThinagaLu ॥nirmatsarateyu ondu dOShiyoL kShameyondu ।brAhmikAbhyAsavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 297 ॥
kagga: ಪೆರ್ಮೆಯ ಗುಣಂಗಳಿನ್ನೂರು ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರೋಕ್ತದವು ।ಸರ್ವೋತ್ತಮಗಳೆರಡು ಸರ್ವಕಠಿನಗಳು ॥ನಿರ್ಮತ್ಸರತೆಯೊಂದು ದೋಷಿಯೊಳ್ ಕ್ಷಮೆಯೊಂದು ।ಬ್ರಾಹ್ಮಿಕಾಭ್ಯಾಸವದು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೭ ॥

content: ಗಾರೆಗಚ್ಚೀನಲ್ಲ ದಾರು ದೂಲಗಳಲ್ಲ ।ಪಾರದ ದ್ರವದವೊಲು ಮನುಜಸ್ವಭಾವ ॥ವೀರಶಪಥಗಳಿಂದೆ ಘನರೂಪಿಯಾಗದದು ।ಸೈರಿಸದನಿನಿತು ನೀಂ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೮ ॥gAregachichInalla dAru dUlagaLalla ।pArada dravadavolu manujasvabhAva ॥vIrashapathagaLinde ghanarUpiyAgadadu ।sairise adanu initu nIM  - Mankutimma ॥ 298 ॥Man;s nature is not to constant; not etched in stone, not immovable as wooden pillars. It is mercurial. People take brave vows to control their own character. A while later, they realize they were wrong. Such efforts to stay constant are not for ever. We must understand and endure such unsteadiness.  - Mankutimma
translation: Man;s nature is not to constant; not etched in stone, not immovable as wooden pillars. It is mercurial. People take brave vows to control their own character. A while later, they realize they were wrong. Such efforts to stay constant are not for ever. We must understand and endure such unsteadiness.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸೈರಿಸದನಿನಿತು ನೀಂ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: gAregachichInalla dAru dUlagaLalla ।pArada dravadavolu manujasvabhAva ॥vIrashapathagaLinde ghanarUpiyAgadadu ।sairise adanu initu nIM  - Mankutimma ॥ 298 ॥
kagga: ಗಾರೆಗಚ್ಚೀನಲ್ಲ ದಾರು ದೂಲಗಳಲ್ಲ ।ಪಾರದ ದ್ರವದವೊಲು ಮನುಜಸ್ವಭಾವ ॥ವೀರಶಪಥಗಳಿಂದೆ ಘನರೂಪಿಯಾಗದದು ।ಸೈರಿಸದನಿನಿತು ನೀಂ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೮ ॥

content: ಹಟವಾದಕೆಡೆಯೆಲ್ಲಿ ಮನುಜಪ್ರಪಂಚದಲಿ? ।ಸಟೆಯೆಷ್ಟೊ ದಿಟವೆಷ್ಟೊ ಬೆರೆತಿರುವುವಿಲ್ಲಿ ॥ಪಟುವಾಗಿ ನಿಲಲಹುದೆ ಮಣಲೊಳೆಸಗಿದ ಗೋಡೆ? ।ಕಟುತೆ ಸಲ್ಲದು ಜಗಕೆ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೯ ॥haTavAdake eDeyelli manuja prapanchadali? ।saTeyeShTo diTaveShTo beretiruvivilli ॥paTuvAgi nilalahude maNaloLesagida gODe? ।kaTute salladu jagake  - Mankutimma ॥ 299 ॥One must not take a hard-liner;s approach in life. Is it possible? There are as many lies in our lives mixed up as our turths. Can a wall built of mud (us) stay put under pressure? We should not be so hard on rest of the world when we ourselves are imperfect.  - Mankutimma
translation: One must not take a hard-liner;s approach in life. Is it possible? There are as many lies in our lives mixed up as our turths. Can a wall built of mud (us) stay put under pressure? We should not be so hard on rest of the world when we ourselves are imperfect.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಟುತೆ ಸಲ್ಲದು ಜಗಕೆ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: haTavAdake eDeyelli manuja prapanchadali? ।saTeyeShTo diTaveShTo beretiruvivilli ॥paTuvAgi nilalahude maNaloLesagida gODe? ।kaTute salladu jagake  - Mankutimma ॥ 299 ॥
kagga: ಹಟವಾದಕೆಡೆಯೆಲ್ಲಿ ಮನುಜಪ್ರಪಂಚದಲಿ? ।ಸಟೆಯೆಷ್ಟೊ ದಿಟವೆಷ್ಟೊ ಬೆರೆತಿರುವುವಿಲ್ಲಿ ॥ಪಟುವಾಗಿ ನಿಲಲಹುದೆ ಮಣಲೊಳೆಸಗಿದ ಗೋಡೆ? ।ಕಟುತೆ ಸಲ್ಲದು ಜಗಕೆ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯೯ ॥

content: ಗಿಡದಿ ನಗುತಿರುವ ಹೂ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಸಖನಿಗೆ ಚೆಂದ ।ಮಡದಿ ಮುಡಿದಿರುವ ಹೂ ಯುವಕಂಗೆ ಚೆಂದ ॥ಗುಡಿಯೊಳಗೆ ಕೊಡುವ ಹೂ ದೈವಭಕ್ತಗೆ ಚೆಂದ ।ಬಿಡಿಗಾಸು ಹೂವಳಗೆ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೦ ॥giDadi nagutiruva hU prakRutisakhanige chenda ।maDadi muDidiruva hU yuvakange chenda ॥guDiyoLage koDuva hU daivabhaktage chenda ।biDi kAsu hUvaLage  - Mankutimma ॥ 300 ॥ The same object has different importance for different people. A smiling flower in a plant will make a naturalist happy. A tasteful youth will be happy if his wife wears that flower. A devotee will be happy if that flower is placed on the idol at the temple. For a flower maid, it is just a means to make money.- Mankutimma
translation: The same object has different importance for different people. A smiling flower in a plant will make a naturalist happy. A tasteful youth will be happy if his wife wears that flower. A devotee will be happy if that flower is placed on the idol at the temple. For a flower maid, it is just a means to make money.- Mankutimma
title: ಬಿಡಿಗಾಸು ಹೂವಳಗೆ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: giDadi nagutiruva hU prakRutisakhanige chenda ।maDadi muDidiruva hU yuvakange chenda ॥guDiyoLage koDuva hU daivabhaktage chenda ।biDi kAsu hUvaLage  - Mankutimma ॥ 300 ॥
kagga: ಗಿಡದಿ ನಗುತಿರುವ ಹೂ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಸಖನಿಗೆ ಚೆಂದ ।ಮಡದಿ ಮುಡಿದಿರುವ ಹೂ ಯುವಕಂಗೆ ಚೆಂದ ॥ಗುಡಿಯೊಳಗೆ ಕೊಡುವ ಹೂ ದೈವಭಕ್ತಗೆ ಚೆಂದ ।ಬಿಡಿಗಾಸು ಹೂವಳಗೆ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೦ ॥

content: ಇಲ್ಲಿ ಚೆನ್ನಲ್ಲಿ ಚೆನ್ನೆಲ್ಲೊ ಚೆನ್ನೆನುತೆಣಿಸಿ ।ಹುಲ್ಲು ಬಯಲೊಂದೆಡೆಯಿನೊಂದಕ್ಕೆ ನೆಗೆದು ॥ಮೆಲ್ಲದೆಯೆ ಧಾವಿಸುತ ದಣಿವ ಕರುವನು ಪೋಲ್ತೊ- ।ಡೆಲ್ಲಿಯೋ ಸುಖ ನಿನಗೆ ? - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೧ ॥illi chennalli chennello chennu enuta eNisi ।hullubayalu ondeDeyim inu ondakke negedu ॥melladeye dhAvisuta daNiva karuvanu pOltoDe ।elliyO sukha ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 301 ॥Here is better. There is better. Somewhere else is better. A calf thinks one pasture is better than the other and keeps running from one to another without grazing. Thus, it gets tired. If you also run behind pleasures like that, where is happiness for you?  - Mankutimma
translation: Here is better. There is better. Somewhere else is better. A calf thinks one pasture is better than the other and keeps running from one to another without grazing. Thus, it gets tired. If you also run behind pleasures like that, where is happiness for you?  - Mankutimma
title: ಪೋಲ್ತೊಡೆಲ್ಲಿಯೋ ಸುಖ ನಿನಗೆ ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: illi chennalli chennello chennu enuta eNisi ।hullubayalu ondeDeyim inu ondakke negedu ॥melladeye dhAvisuta daNiva karuvanu pOltoDe ।elliyO sukha ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 301 ॥

content: ಹೊತ್ತು ಕಣಕಣದಿ ಮಣ್ಣನು ಗೆದ್ದಲಿರುವೆಗಳು ।ಮೆತ್ತುತೆಡೆಬಿಡದೆ ದುಡಿದಾಗಿಸಿದ ಗೂಡು ॥ಹುತ್ತವಾಗುವುದು ವಿಷಸರ್ಪಕ್ಕೆ; ಮಾನವನ ।ಯತ್ನಗಳ ಕಥೆಯಿಷ್ಟೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೨ ॥hottu kaNakaNadi maNNanu geddalairuvegaLu ।mettuta eDebiDade duDidu Agisida gUDu ॥huttavAguvudu viShasarpakke; mAnavana ।yatnagaLa katheyiShTe  - Mankutimma ॥ 302 ॥Ants build an ant-hill by carrying each grain of sand laboriously and working incessantly. Later it becomes home for a poisonous snake. Man’s effort also suffer the same fate.  - Mankutimma
translation: Ants build an ant-hill by carrying each grain of sand laboriously and working incessantly. Later it becomes home for a poisonous snake. Man’s effort also suffer the same fate.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಾನವನ ಯತ್ನಗಳ ಕಥೆಯಿಷ್ಟೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hottu kaNakaNadi maNNanu geddalairuvegaLu ।mettuta eDebiDade duDidu Agisida gUDu ॥huttavAguvudu viShasarpakke; mAnavana ।yatnagaLa katheyiShTe  - Mankutimma ॥ 302 ॥
kagga: ಹೊತ್ತು ಕಣಕಣದಿ ಮಣ್ಣನು ಗೆದ್ದಲಿರುವೆಗಳು ।ಮೆತ್ತುತೆಡೆಬಿಡದೆ ದುಡಿದಾಗಿಸಿದ ಗೂಡು ॥ಹುತ್ತವಾಗುವುದು ವಿಷಸರ್ಪಕ್ಕೆ; ಮಾನವನ ।ಯತ್ನಗಳ ಕಥೆಯಿಷ್ಟೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೨ ॥

content: ಅಪ್ಪಾಲೆ ತಿಪ್ಪಾಲೆ ತಿರುಗಿಬಿದ್ದವನೊಬ್ಬ ।ಸ್ವಪ್ನಲೋಕದಿ ತಿರೆಯ ಮರೆತಾತನೊಬ್ಬ ॥ತಪ್ಪುಸರಿಗಳ ತೂಕವಳೆಯೆ ಕುಳಿತವನೊಬ್ಬ ।ಬೆಪ್ಪನಾರ್ ಮೂವರಲಿ ? - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೩ ॥appAle tippAle tirugibiddavanobba ।svapnalOkadi tireya mareta Atanu obba ॥tappu sarigaLa tUkava aLeye kuLitavanu obba ।beppanAr mUvarali?  - Mankutimma ॥ 303 ॥One plays merry-go-round and has fallen flat with dizziness. Another one is day dreaming and has forgotten the real world. There is another one who is endlessly weighing the right and the wrong for every action. All of them are not doing any action. Who among the three is the most dumb?  - Mankutimma
translation: One plays merry-go-round and has fallen flat with dizziness. Another one is day dreaming and has forgotten the real world. There is another one who is endlessly weighing the right and the wrong for every action. All of them are not doing any action. Who among the three is the most dumb?  - Mankutimma
title: ಬೆಪ್ಪನಾರ್ ಮೂವರಲಿ ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: appAle tippAle tirugibiddavanobba ।svapnalOkadi tireya mareta Atanu obba ॥tappu sarigaLa tUkava aLeye kuLitavanu obba ।beppanAr mUvarali?  - Mankutimma ॥ 303 ॥
kagga: ಅಪ್ಪಾಲೆ ತಿಪ್ಪಾಲೆ ತಿರುಗಿಬಿದ್ದವನೊಬ್ಬ ।ಸ್ವಪ್ನಲೋಕದಿ ತಿರೆಯ ಮರೆತಾತನೊಬ್ಬ ॥ತಪ್ಪುಸರಿಗಳ ತೂಕವಳೆಯೆ ಕುಳಿತವನೊಬ್ಬ ।ಬೆಪ್ಪನಾರ್ ಮೂವರಲಿ ? - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೩ ॥

content: ಗಿರಿಯ ಮೇಲಕೆ ದೊಡ್ದ ಬಂಡೆಯನು ಸಿಸಿಫಸನು ।ಉರುಳಿಸಿರಲೊಂದೆರಡು ಮಾರು ಘಾಸಿಯಲಿ ॥ಸರಿದು ಕೆಳಕದದೆಂತೊ ಜಾರುವುದು ಮರಮರಳಿ ।ಪುರುಷಪ್ರಗತಿಯಂತು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೪ ॥giriya mElake doDDa baNDeyanu sisiphasanu ।uruLisi iralu ondu eraDu mAru ghAsiyali ॥saridu keLake adu ento jAruvudu maramaraLi ।puruShapragatiyantu  - Mankutimma ॥ 304 ॥Sisyphus is punished by the Gods to roll a boulder a hill only to see it roll back down again. He has to do this till eternity. This is the same fate of human progress. Cycles of progress and devastation continue forever.  - Mankutimma
translation: Sisyphus is punished by the Gods to roll a boulder a hill only to see it roll back down again. He has to do this till eternity. This is the same fate of human progress. Cycles of progress and devastation continue forever.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪುರುಷಪ್ರಗತಿಯಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: giriya mElake doDDa baNDeyanu sisiphasanu ।uruLisi iralu ondu eraDu mAru ghAsiyali ॥saridu keLake adu ento jAruvudu maramaraLi ।puruShapragatiyantu  - Mankutimma ॥ 304 ॥
kagga: ಗಿರಿಯ ಮೇಲಕೆ ದೊಡ್ದ ಬಂಡೆಯನು ಸಿಸಿಫಸನು ।ಉರುಳಿಸಿರಲೊಂದೆರಡು ಮಾರು ಘಾಸಿಯಲಿ ॥ಸರಿದು ಕೆಳಕದದೆಂತೊ ಜಾರುವುದು ಮರಮರಳಿ ।ಪುರುಷಪ್ರಗತಿಯಂತು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೪ ॥

content: ಕಾಕತಾಳೀಯ ಕಥೆ ಲೋಕಚರಿತೆಯೊಳೆಷ್ಟೊ! ।ತೀಕೆಗೆಟುಕವು ನಮಗೆ ಕಾರ್ಯಕಾರಣಗಳ್ ॥ಎಕೊ ಕಣ್ಣಲೆಯುವುದು; ಎನೊ ಅದ ಪಿಡುಯುವುದು ।ವ್ಯಾಕುಲತೆ ಫಲಿತಾಂಶ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೫ ॥kAkatALIya kathe lOkachariteya oLu eShTo! ।TIkege eTukavu namage kAryakAraNagaL ॥eko kaNNu aleyuvudu; eno ada piDiyuvudu ।vyAkulate phalitAMsha  - Mankutimma ॥ 305 ॥There are so many coincidences in world (like the time of a crow sitting on a palm tree and the palm leaf falling). The causation of events is beyond our analysis. Our eyes wander without reason. It catches attention of some things without reason. The end result of trying to analyze is only anxiety.  - Mankutimma
translation: There are so many coincidences in world (like the time of a crow sitting on a palm tree and the palm leaf falling). The causation of events is beyond our analysis. Our eyes wander without reason. It catches attention of some things without reason. The end result of trying to analyze is only anxiety.  - Mankutimma
title: ವ್ಯಾಕುಲತೆ ಫಲಿತಾಂಶ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kAkatALIya kathe lOkachariteya oLu eShTo! ।TIkege eTukavu namage kAryakAraNagaL ॥eko kaNNu aleyuvudu; eno ada piDiyuvudu ।vyAkulate phalitAMsha  - Mankutimma ॥ 305 ॥
kagga: ಕಾಕತಾಳೀಯ ಕಥೆ ಲೋಕಚರಿತೆಯೊಳೆಷ್ಟೊ! ।ತೀಕೆಗೆಟುಕವು ನಮಗೆ ಕಾರ್ಯಕಾರಣಗಳ್ ॥ಎಕೊ ಕಣ್ಣಲೆಯುವುದು; ಎನೊ ಅದ ಪಿಡುಯುವುದು ।ವ್ಯಾಕುಲತೆ ಫಲಿತಾಂಶ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೫ ॥

content: ನಾಸಿಕದ ಮಾಟದಿಂದಾ ಕ್ಲಿಯೋಪ್ಯಾಟ್ರಳಿಗೆ ।ದಾಸರಾದರು ಶೂರ ಸೀಸರ್ ಆಂಟನಿಗಳ್ ॥ದೇಶಚರಿತೆಗಮವರ ಜಸಕಮಂಕುಶವಾಯ್ತು ।ನಾಸಾಪುಟದ ರೇಖೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೬ ॥nAsikada mATadinda A kliyOpyATraLige ।dAsarAdaru shUra sIsar AntonigaL ॥dEshacharitegam avara jasakam ankusha Aytu ।nAsApuTada rEkhe  - Mankutimma ॥ 306 ॥Brave and courageous Caesar and Anthony were mesmerized by the shape of her nose and became slaves of Cleopatra. This resulted in them and their country being defamed. Such stories are common in human history when something so precious is lost for frivolous reasons.  - Mankutimma
translation: Brave and courageous Caesar and Anthony were mesmerized by the shape of her nose and became slaves of Cleopatra. This resulted in them and their country being defamed. Such stories are common in human history when something so precious is lost for frivolous reasons.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಾಸಾಪುಟದ ರೇಖೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nAsikada mATadinda A kliyOpyATraLige ।dAsarAdaru shUra sIsar AntonigaL ॥dEshacharitegam avara jasakam ankusha Aytu ।nAsApuTada rEkhe  - Mankutimma ॥ 306 ॥
kagga: ನಾಸಿಕದ ಮಾಟದಿಂದಾ ಕ್ಲಿಯೋಪ್ಯಾಟ್ರಳಿಗೆ ।ದಾಸರಾದರು ಶೂರ ಸೀಸರ್ ಆಂಟನಿಗಳ್ ॥ದೇಶಚರಿತೆಗಮವರ ಜಸಕಮಂಕುಶವಾಯ್ತು ।ನಾಸಾಪುಟದ ರೇಖೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೬ ॥

content: ಸುರಪಸಭೆಯಲಿ ಗಾಧಿಸುತ ವಸಿಷ್ಟ ಸ್ಪರ್ಧೆ ।ಧರೆಯೊಳದರಿಂ ಹರಿಶ್ಚಂದ್ರಂಗೆ ತಪನೆ ॥ಬರುವುದಿಂತೆತ್ತಣಿನೊ ಬೇಡದ ಪ್ರಾರಬ್ಧ ।ಕರುಮಗತಿ ಕೃತ್ರಿಮವೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೭ ॥surapasabheyali gAdhisuta vasiShTa spardhe ।dhara oLu adariM harishchandrange tapane ॥baruvudu intu ettaNino bEDada prArabdha ।karumagati kRutrimavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 307 ॥In the court of Indra, Vishwamitra and Vasishta had an argument. The result of that was all the hardships that Harishchandra had to face. The troubles we face could also come to us from nowhere. We have to just endure them as they come.  - Mankutimma
translation: In the court of Indra, Vishwamitra and Vasishta had an argument. The result of that was all the hardships that Harishchandra had to face. The troubles we face could also come to us from nowhere. We have to just endure them as they come.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕರುಮಗತಿ ಕೃತ್ರಿಮವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: surapasabheyali gAdhisuta vasiShTa spardhe ।dhara oLu adariM harishchandrange tapane ॥baruvudu intu ettaNino bEDada prArabdha ।karumagati kRutrimavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 307 ॥
kagga: ಸುರಪಸಭೆಯಲಿ ಗಾಧಿಸುತ ವಸಿಷ್ಟ ಸ್ಪರ್ಧೆ ।ಧರೆಯೊಳದರಿಂ ಹರಿಶ್ಚಂದ್ರಂಗೆ ತಪನೆ ॥ಬರುವುದಿಂತೆತ್ತಣಿನೊ ಬೇಡದ ಪ್ರಾರಬ್ಧ ।ಕರುಮಗತಿ ಕೃತ್ರಿಮವೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೭ ॥

content: ಸರಕಾರ ಹರಿಗೋಲು, ತೆರೆಸುಳಿಗಳತ್ತಿತ್ತ ।ಸುರೆ ಕುಡಿದವರು ಕೆಲರು ಹುಟ್ಟು ಹಾಕುವರು ॥ಬಿರುಗಾಳಿ ಬೀಸುವುದು, ಜನವೆದ್ದು ಕುಣಿಯುವುದು ।ಉರುಳದಿಹುದಚ್ಚರಿಯೊ‌!‌- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೮ ॥sarakAra harigOlu, teresuLigaLu atta itta ।sure kudidavaru kelaru huTTu hAkuvaru ॥birugALi bIsuvudu, janaveddu kuNiyuvudu ।uruLade ihudu achchariyo!  - Mankutimma ॥ 308 ॥Government is like a coracle. There are whirls and strong currents on either side. Drunkards are in charge of the oars. There is a strong wind. There are people who are dancing (like revolting). It is surprising that it has not capsized.  - Mankutimma
translation: Government is like a coracle. There are whirls and strong currents on either side. Drunkards are in charge of the oars. There is a strong wind. There are people who are dancing (like revolting). It is surprising that it has not capsized.  - Mankutimma
title: ಉರುಳದಿಹುದಚ್ಚರಿಯೊ‌!‌- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sarakAra harigOlu, teresuLigaLu atta itta ।sure kudidavaru kelaru huTTu hAkuvaru ॥birugALi bIsuvudu, janaveddu kuNiyuvudu ।uruLade ihudu achchariyo!  - Mankutimma ॥ 308 ॥
kagga: ಸರಕಾರ ಹರಿಗೋಲು, ತೆರೆಸುಳಿಗಳತ್ತಿತ್ತ ।ಸುರೆ ಕುಡಿದವರು ಕೆಲರು ಹುಟ್ಟು ಹಾಕುವರು ॥ಬಿರುಗಾಳಿ ಬೀಸುವುದು, ಜನವೆದ್ದು ಕುಣಿಯುವುದು ।ಉರುಳದಿಹುದಚ್ಚರಿಯೊ‌!‌- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೮ ॥

content: ವನ್ಯಮೃಗಗಳ ನಡುವೆ ಗೋವು ಬಂದೇನಹುದು? ।ಪಣ್ಯವೀಧಿಯಲಿ ತಾತ್ತ್ವಿಕನಿಗೇನಹುದು‌? ॥ಅನ್ಯಾಯದುನ್ಮತ್ತ ಕೋಲಾಹಲದ ಲೋಕ ।ಪುಣ್ಯವನು ಚಿಂತಿಪುದೆ ? - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೯ ॥vanyamRugagaLA naDuve gOvu bandu Enu ahudu ? ।paNyavIdhiyali tAttvikanige Enu ahudu? ॥anyAyada unmatta kOlAhalada lOka ।puNyavanu chintipude ?  - Mankutimma ॥ 309 ॥What will happen if a cow enters an area with wild animals? What is the use of a philosopher in a street full of businessmen? Will the chaotic world intoxicated by injustice think about right or wrong?  - Mankutimma
translation: What will happen if a cow enters an area with wild animals? What is the use of a philosopher in a street full of businessmen? Will the chaotic world intoxicated by injustice think about right or wrong?  - Mankutimma
title: ಲೋಕ ಪುಣ್ಯವನು ಚಿಂತಿಪುದೆ ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vanyamRugagaLA naDuve gOvu bandu Enu ahudu ? ।paNyavIdhiyali tAttvikanige Enu ahudu? ॥anyAyada unmatta kOlAhalada lOka ।puNyavanu chintipude ?  - Mankutimma ॥ 309 ॥
kagga: ವನ್ಯಮೃಗಗಳ ನಡುವೆ ಗೋವು ಬಂದೇನಹುದು? ।ಪಣ್ಯವೀಧಿಯಲಿ ತಾತ್ತ್ವಿಕನಿಗೇನಹುದು‌? ॥ಅನ್ಯಾಯದುನ್ಮತ್ತ ಕೋಲಾಹಲದ ಲೋಕ ।ಪುಣ್ಯವನು ಚಿಂತಿಪುದೆ ? - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦೯ ॥

content: ಸ್ವಾಭಾವಿಕವ ಮರೆತು ನಭಕೇಣಿ ಹೂಡುವುದುಮ್ ।ಆಭಾಸವನು ಸತ್ಯವೊಂದು ಬೆಮಿಸುವುದುಮ್ ॥ಸೌಭಾಗ್ಯಗಳನರಸಿ ದೌರ್ಭಾಗ್ಯಕೀಡಹುದುಮ್ ।ಅಭಿಶಾಪ ನರಕುಲಕೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೦ ॥svAbhAvikava maretu nabhake ENi hUDuvudum ।AbhAsavanu satyavendu bemisuvudum ॥saubhAgyagaLanu arasi daurbhAgyake IDu ahudum ।abhishApa narakulake  - Mankutimma ॥ 310 ॥These are the three curses on mankind. Forgetting natural limitation and trying to place a ladder to the sky. To believe the unnatural as the truth. To chase wealth although it leads to destruction.  - Mankutimma
translation: These are the three curses on mankind. Forgetting natural limitation and trying to place a ladder to the sky. To believe the unnatural as the truth. To chase wealth although it leads to destruction.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅಭಿಶಾಪ ನರಕುಲಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: svAbhAvikava maretu nabhake ENi hUDuvudum ।AbhAsavanu satyavendu bemisuvudum ॥saubhAgyagaLanu arasi daurbhAgyake IDu ahudum ।abhishApa narakulake  - Mankutimma ॥ 310 ॥
kagga: ಸ್ವಾಭಾವಿಕವ ಮರೆತು ನಭಕೇಣಿ ಹೂಡುವುದುಮ್ ।ಆಭಾಸವನು ಸತ್ಯವೊಂದು ಬೆಮಿಸುವುದುಮ್ ॥ಸೌಭಾಗ್ಯಗಳನರಸಿ ದೌರ್ಭಾಗ್ಯಕೀಡಹುದುಮ್ ।ಅಭಿಶಾಪ ನರಕುಲಕೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೦ ॥

content: ಒಟ್ಟಿನಲಿ ತತ್ತ್ವವಿದು: ವಿಕಟರಸಿಕನೋ ಧಾತ । ತೊಟ್ಟಿಲನು ತೂಗುವನು, ಮಗುವ ಜಿಗುಟುವನು ॥ ಸಿಟ್ಟನ್ ಒಡವುಟ್ಟುಗಳೊಳಾಗಿಪನು, ಸೋಲಿಪನು । ತುತ್ತು ವಿಕಟಿಗೆ ನಾವು-  ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ  ॥ ೩೧೧ ॥oTTinali tattvavidu: vikaTarasikanO dhAta । toTTilanu tUguvanu, maguva jiguTuvanu ॥ siTTan oDavuTTugaLoL Agipanu, sOlipanu । tuttu vikaTige nAvu – Mankutimma ॥  311 ॥The bottom line is this. The creator is a very tasteful person. But he has his idiosyncrasies. He rocks the cradle and also pinches the child. He makes us siblings and puts lot of love between us. But he also makes us angry at each other. He makes us lose whenever we are at fight with him. For him, we are just food for fun. – Mankutimma
translation: The bottom line is this. The creator is a very tasteful person. But he has his idiosyncrasies. He rocks the cradle and also pinches the child. He makes us siblings and puts lot of love between us. But he also makes us angry at each other. He makes us lose whenever we are at fight with him. For him, we are just food for fun. – Mankutimma
title: ತುತ್ತು ವಿಕಟಿಗೆ ನಾವು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
