transliteration: oTTinali tattvavidu: vikaTarasikanO dhAta । toTTilanu tUguvanu, maguva jiguTuvanu ॥ siTTan oDavuTTugaLoL Agipanu, sOlipanu । tuttu vikaTige nAvu – Mankutimma ॥  311 ॥
kagga: ಒಟ್ಟಿನಲಿ ತತ್ತ್ವವಿದು: ವಿಕಟರಸಿಕನೋ ಧಾತ । ತೊಟ್ಟಿಲನು ತೂಗುವನು, ಮಗುವ ಜಿಗುಟುವನು ॥ ಸಿಟ್ಟನ್ ಒಡವುಟ್ಟುಗಳೊಳಾಗಿಪನು, ಸೋಲಿಪನು । ತುತ್ತು ವಿಕಟಿಗೆ ನಾವು-  ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ  ॥ ೩೧೧ ॥

content: ಒಂದು ಜನ್ಮದ ಲೆಕ್ಕವಂದೆ ಮುಗಿವಂತೇಕೆ ।ಸಂಧಿಸವು ಕಾಲ ಕಾರಣ ಕರಣ ಕಾರ್ಯ ? ॥ಮುಂದಕೇತಕೆ ಮಿಗಿಸಿ ಕರ್ಮಋಣಶೇಷಗಳ ।ಬಂಧಿಪನು ವಿಧಿ ನಿನ್ನ ? - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೨ ॥ondu janmada lekkavu ande mugivante Eke ।sandhisavu kAla kAraNa karaNa kArya ? ॥mundakEtake migisi karma RuNa shEShagaLa ।bandhipanu vidhi ninna ?  - Mankutimma ॥ 312 ॥Why doesn;t the account of causation (time, cause and action) be tallied to zero balance at the end of each life? Why does it get carried over to subsequent births and haunt us then. Providence ties us down with pervious balance for ever.  - Mankutimma
translation: Why doesn;t the account of causation (time, cause and action) be tallied to zero balance at the end of each life? Why does it get carried over to subsequent births and haunt us then. Providence ties us down with pervious balance for ever.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಂಧಿಪನು ವಿಧಿ ನಿನ್ನ ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ondu janmada lekkavu ande mugivante Eke ।sandhisavu kAla kAraNa karaNa kArya ? ॥mundakEtake migisi karma RuNa shEShagaLa ।bandhipanu vidhi ninna ?  - Mankutimma ॥ 312 ॥
kagga: ಒಂದು ಜನ್ಮದ ಲೆಕ್ಕವಂದೆ ಮುಗಿವಂತೇಕೆ ।ಸಂಧಿಸವು ಕಾಲ ಕಾರಣ ಕರಣ ಕಾರ್ಯ ? ॥ಮುಂದಕೇತಕೆ ಮಿಗಿಸಿ ಕರ್ಮಋಣಶೇಷಗಳ ।ಬಂಧಿಪನು ವಿಧಿ ನಿನ್ನ ? - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೨ ॥

content: ಒಳ್ಳೆ ಲೆಕ್ಕಿಗನಲ್ಲ ಪರಮೇಷ್ಠಿ; ನಮ್ಮಿಂದ ।ಸಲ್ಲುವುದ ಕೊಳಲು ಜನ್ಮಾಂತರಕೆ ಕಾಯ್ವಂ ॥ಇಲ್ಲಿ ಸಲ್ಲುವುದ ತಾನಿಂದೆ ತೀರಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳ- ।ಲೊಲ್ಲನೇನಂತಕನು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೩ ॥oLLe lekkigan alla paramEShThi; namminda ।salluvuda koLalu janmAntarake kAyvaM ॥illi salluvuda tAninde tIrisikoLlal ।ollan En antakanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 313 ॥The Creator does not seem to be a smart accountant. He waits for many lifetimes to extract from us what we owe him. Why has he not put a practice in place to settle the account of this birth in this life only?  - Mankutimma
translation: The Creator does not seem to be a smart accountant. He waits for many lifetimes to extract from us what we owe him. Why has he not put a practice in place to settle the account of this birth in this life only?  - Mankutimma
title: ತೀರಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳಲೊಲ್ಲನೇನಂತಕನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: oLLe lekkigan alla paramEShThi; namminda ।salluvuda koLalu janmAntarake kAyvaM ॥illi salluvuda tAninde tIrisikoLlal ।ollan En antakanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 313 ॥
kagga: ಒಳ್ಳೆ ಲೆಕ್ಕಿಗನಲ್ಲ ಪರಮೇಷ್ಠಿ; ನಮ್ಮಿಂದ ।ಸಲ್ಲುವುದ ಕೊಳಲು ಜನ್ಮಾಂತರಕೆ ಕಾಯ್ವಂ ॥ಇಲ್ಲಿ ಸಲ್ಲುವುದ ತಾನಿಂದೆ ತೀರಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳ- ।ಲೊಲ್ಲನೇನಂತಕನು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೩ ॥

content: ಕರ್ಮಋಣಶೇಷಂಗಳುಳಿಯದಿರೆ ಬಿತ್ತಾಗಿ ।ಜನ್ಮ ಜನ್ಮಾಂತರದ ಮರಗಳೇಳದಿರೆ ॥ಬ್ರಹ್ಮನುದ್ಯಾನವನ ಶಾಶ್ವತದೊಳಿಹುದೆಂತು ? ।ಮರ್ಮವಿದು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೪ ॥karma RuNashEShangaL uLiyade ire bittAgi ।janma janmAntarada maragaL ELade ire ॥brahmana udyAnavana shAshvatadoL ihudu entu ? ।marmavidu sRuShTiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 314 ॥The left over debt of consequences of actions from previous births are the seeds sown in the garden of the Creator. New trees of repeated births grow from that. It is because of this carrying over, does this garden stay green for ever. The reason for this setup is a great mystery in this creation.  - Mankutimma
translation: The left over debt of consequences of actions from previous births are the seeds sown in the garden of the Creator. New trees of repeated births grow from that. It is because of this carrying over, does this garden stay green for ever. The reason for this setup is a great mystery in this creation.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮರ್ಮವಿದು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: karma RuNashEShangaL uLiyade ire bittAgi ।janma janmAntarada maragaL ELade ire ॥brahmana udyAnavana shAshvatadoL ihudu entu ? ।marmavidu sRuShTiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 314 ॥
kagga: ಕರ್ಮಋಣಶೇಷಂಗಳುಳಿಯದಿರೆ ಬಿತ್ತಾಗಿ ।ಜನ್ಮ ಜನ್ಮಾಂತರದ ಮರಗಳೇಳದಿರೆ ॥ಬ್ರಹ್ಮನುದ್ಯಾನವನ ಶಾಶ್ವತದೊಳಿಹುದೆಂತು ? ।ಮರ್ಮವಿದು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೪ ॥

content: ಸಂಬಳದ ಹಂಬಲವೊ, ಡಾಂಭಿಕತೆಯಬ್ಬರವೊ ।ಇಂಬು ಕೂರ್ಮೆಯ ಕರೆಯೊ, ಕರುಳ ಕರೆಕರೆಯೋ ॥ತುಂಬಿಹುವು ಬಾಳಿನಲಿ ನೂರು ತಕರಾರುಗಳು ।ಬೆಂಬಲವವೆಲೊ ಜಗಕೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೫ ॥sambaLada hambalavo, DAmbhikateya abbaravo ।imbu kUrmeya kareyo, karuLa karekareyO ॥tumbihuvu bALinali nUru takarArugaLu ।bembalavu avu elo jagake  - Mankutimma ॥ 315 ॥Our life is filled with hundreds of annoyances  - want of better salary, urge to be famous and successful, attachment towards home, call of a wife (spouse), crying of a child and so on. The whole world is running because of these drivers.  - Mankutimma
translation: Our life is filled with hundreds of annoyances  - want of better salary, urge to be famous and successful, attachment towards home, call of a wife (spouse), crying of a child and so on. The whole world is running because of these drivers.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬೆಂಬಲವವೆಲೊ ಜಗಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sambaLada hambalavo, DAmbhikateya abbaravo ।imbu kUrmeya kareyo, karuLa karekareyO ॥tumbihuvu bALinali nUru takarArugaLu ।bembalavu avu elo jagake  - Mankutimma ॥ 315 ॥
kagga: ಸಂಬಳದ ಹಂಬಲವೊ, ಡಾಂಭಿಕತೆಯಬ್ಬರವೊ ।ಇಂಬು ಕೂರ್ಮೆಯ ಕರೆಯೊ, ಕರುಳ ಕರೆಕರೆಯೋ ॥ತುಂಬಿಹುವು ಬಾಳಿನಲಿ ನೂರು ತಕರಾರುಗಳು ।ಬೆಂಬಲವವೆಲೊ ಜಗಕೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೫ ॥

content: ತಿರುತಿರುಗಿ ತಿರುಗುತ್ತೆ ಬುಗುರಿ ತಾನೇ ಸೋತು ।ತಿರೆಗುರುಳುವುದು ತನ್ನ ಬಲವ ತಾಂ ಕಳೆದು ॥ನರನುಮಂತೆಯೆ ಸುತ್ತಿ ಕಡೆಗೊಂದು ದಿನ ।ತೆರುವನಸ್ಥಿಯ ಧರೆಗೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೬ ॥tirutirugi tirugutte buguri tAnE sOtu ।tirege uruLuvudu tanna balava tAM kaLedu ॥naranum anteye sutti kaDege ondu dina ।teruvanu asthiya dharege  - Mankutimma ॥ 316 ॥A top spins beautifully. It may think it is the master of its own fate. But it loses and slows down. It falls on the ground when it has not more strength. Man is also like that. As long as he has any strength in him, he will continue to stay in action  - creating things. Once the strength vanishes, he is burried and becomes one with the earth.  - Mankutimma
translation: A top spins beautifully. It may think it is the master of its own fate. But it loses and slows down. It falls on the ground when it has not more strength. Man is also like that. As long as he has any strength in him, he will continue to stay in action  - creating things. Once the strength vanishes, he is burried and becomes one with the earth.  - Mankutimma
title: ತೆರುವನಸ್ಥಿಯ ಧರೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tirutirugi tirugutte buguri tAnE sOtu ।tirege uruLuvudu tanna balava tAM kaLedu ॥naranum anteye sutti kaDege ondu dina ।teruvanu asthiya dharege  - Mankutimma ॥ 316 ॥
kagga: ತಿರುತಿರುಗಿ ತಿರುಗುತ್ತೆ ಬುಗುರಿ ತಾನೇ ಸೋತು ।ತಿರೆಗುರುಳುವುದು ತನ್ನ ಬಲವ ತಾಂ ಕಳೆದು ॥ನರನುಮಂತೆಯೆ ಸುತ್ತಿ ಕಡೆಗೊಂದು ದಿನ ।ತೆರುವನಸ್ಥಿಯ ಧರೆಗೆ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೬ ॥

content: ಪುಣ್ಯಪಾಪದ ಮಿಶ್ರ ನರಜಂತುವವನ ನೆಲೆ ।ಮಣ್ಣು ಕರುಳುಗಳೆಸಕವವನ ಮೈದೊಡವು ॥ಬಣ್ಣ ಬಣ್ಣದ ವಸ್ತ್ರ; ಬಿಳ್ಪೊಡನೆ ಕಪ್ಪಿಹುದು ।ಕಣ್ಣ ದುರುಗುಟಿಸದಿರು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೭ ॥puNyapApada mishra narajantuvu avana nele ।maNNu karuLugaLu esakavu avana maidoDavu ॥baNNa baNNAda vastra; biLpoDane kappihudu ।kaNNA duruguTisade iru  - Mankutimma ॥ 317 ॥Man;s efforts attract both sins and good karma. His actions are driven by his attachment towards his past (homeland) and future (his children). He wears colorful clothes (does lot of antics). There is some dark along with white. (some good, some sins). Every body is like that. You dont squint your eyes when you see some one with a mix of good and bad qualities.  - Mankutimma
translation: Man;s efforts attract both sins and good karma. His actions are driven by his attachment towards his past (homeland) and future (his children). He wears colorful clothes (does lot of antics). There is some dark along with white. (some good, some sins). Every body is like that. You dont squint your eyes when you see some one with a mix of good and bad qualities.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಣ್ಣ ದುರುಗುಟಿಸದಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: puNyapApada mishra narajantuvu avana nele ।maNNu karuLugaLu esakavu avana maidoDavu ॥baNNa baNNAda vastra; biLpoDane kappihudu ।kaNNA duruguTisade iru  - Mankutimma ॥ 317 ॥
kagga: ಪುಣ್ಯಪಾಪದ ಮಿಶ್ರ ನರಜಂತುವವನ ನೆಲೆ ।ಮಣ್ಣು ಕರುಳುಗಳೆಸಕವವನ ಮೈದೊಡವು ॥ಬಣ್ಣ ಬಣ್ಣದ ವಸ್ತ್ರ; ಬಿಳ್ಪೊಡನೆ ಕಪ್ಪಿಹುದು ।ಕಣ್ಣ ದುರುಗುಟಿಸದಿರು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೭ ॥

content: ಹಾಸ್ಯಗಾರನೊ ಬೊಮ್ಮ; ವಿಕಟ ಪರಿಹಾಸವದು ।ಆಸ್ಯ ಗಂಭೀರ; ಬೆರಲಿಂದ ಚಕಳಗುಳಿ ॥ವಿಶ್ವಾಸದುಪಚಾರ; ಹುಣಿಸೆಮೆಣಸಾಹಾರ ।ವಿಶ್ವಪಾಲನೆಯಿಂತು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೮ ॥hAsyagArano bomma; vikaTa parihAsavu adu ।Asya gambhIra; beralinda chakaLaguLi ॥vishvAsada upachAra; huNise meNasu AhAra ।vishvapAlaneyintu  - Mankutimma ॥ 318 ॥The Creator is a funny person. Such is his humor  - He is very straight faced, but he tickles you with his fingers. It is like some one greeting you well when you go to their home, but serve only sour and spicy food. This is the way he runs this world.  - Mankutimma
translation: The Creator is a funny person. Such is his humor  - He is very straight faced, but he tickles you with his fingers. It is like some one greeting you well when you go to their home, but serve only sour and spicy food. This is the way he runs this world.  - Mankutimma
title: ವಿಶ್ವಪಾಲನೆಯಿಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hAsyagArano bomma; vikaTa parihAsavu adu ।Asya gambhIra; beralinda chakaLaguLi ॥vishvAsada upachAra; huNise meNasu AhAra ।vishvapAlaneyintu  - Mankutimma ॥ 318 ॥
kagga: ಹಾಸ್ಯಗಾರನೊ ಬೊಮ್ಮ; ವಿಕಟ ಪರಿಹಾಸವದು ।ಆಸ್ಯ ಗಂಭೀರ; ಬೆರಲಿಂದ ಚಕಳಗುಳಿ ॥ವಿಶ್ವಾಸದುಪಚಾರ; ಹುಣಿಸೆಮೆಣಸಾಹಾರ ।ವಿಶ್ವಪಾಲನೆಯಿಂತು - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೮ ॥

content: ಪಂಚಭೂತಗಳಂತೆ; ಪಂಚೇಂದ್ರಿಯಗಳಂತೆ ।ಪಂಚವೇಕೆ? ಚತುಷ್ಯ ಷಟ್ಯವೇಕಲ್ಲ? ॥ಹೊಂಚುತಿಹನಂತೆ ವಿಭು; ಸಂಚವನದೇನಿಹುದೊ ।ವಂಚಿತರು ನಾವೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೯ ॥panchabhUtagaLante; pancEndriyagaLante ।panchavEke? catuShya shaTyavEkalla? ॥honchutihanante vibhu; sanchu avanadu Enihudo ।vanchitaru nAvella  - Mankutimma ॥ 319 ॥Five basic elements; Five sense organs. Why are they always five? Why not four? Or Six? The creator is hatching some plan. We do not know what his plan is. We are the people who are being duped (keeping a secret from us).  - Mankutimma
translation: Five basic elements; Five sense organs. Why are they always five? Why not four? Or Six? The creator is hatching some plan. We do not know what his plan is. We are the people who are being duped (keeping a secret from us).  - Mankutimma
title: ವಂಚಿತರು ನಾವೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: panchabhUtagaLante; pancEndriyagaLante ।panchavEke? catuShya shaTyavEkalla? ॥honchutihanante vibhu; sanchu avanadu Enihudo ।vanchitaru nAvella  - Mankutimma ॥ 319 ॥
kagga: ಪಂಚಭೂತಗಳಂತೆ; ಪಂಚೇಂದ್ರಿಯಗಳಂತೆ ।ಪಂಚವೇಕೆ? ಚತುಷ್ಯ ಷಟ್ಯವೇಕಲ್ಲ? ॥ಹೊಂಚುತಿಹನಂತೆ ವಿಭು; ಸಂಚವನದೇನಿಹುದೊ ।ವಂಚಿತರು ನಾವೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧೯ ॥

content: ಪಂಚಕವೊ, ಪಂಚ ಪಂಚಕವೊ; ಮಾಭೂತಗಳ ।ಹಂಚಿಕೆಯನರಿತೇನು? ಗುಣವ ತಿಳಿದೇನು? ॥ಕೊಂಚ ಕೊಂಚಗಳರಿವು ಪೂರ್ಣದರಿವಾದೀತೆ? ।ಮಿಂಚಿದುದು ಪರತತ್ತ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೦ ॥panchakavo, pancha panchakavo; mAbhUtagaLa ।hanchikeyanu aritEnu? guNava tiLidEnu? ॥koncha konchagaLa arivu pUrNada arivAdIte? ।minchidudu paratattva  - Mankutimma ॥ 320 ॥Principle of five, or five times five. What do we got to do with relations among the basic elements? What do we gain by understanding them? Can the incomplete knowledge about parts lead to the realization of the whole? The cosmic spirit is like a lightning that is difficult to grasp.  - Mankutimma
translation: Principle of five, or five times five. What do we got to do with relations among the basic elements? What do we gain by understanding them? Can the incomplete knowledge about parts lead to the realization of the whole? The cosmic spirit is like a lightning that is difficult to grasp.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಿಂಚಿದುದು ಪರತತ್ತ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: panchakavo, pancha panchakavo; mAbhUtagaLa ।hanchikeyanu aritEnu? guNava tiLidEnu? ॥koncha konchagaLa arivu pUrNada arivAdIte? ।minchidudu paratattva  - Mankutimma ॥ 320 ॥
kagga: ಪಂಚಕವೊ, ಪಂಚ ಪಂಚಕವೊ; ಮಾಭೂತಗಳ ।ಹಂಚಿಕೆಯನರಿತೇನು? ಗುಣವ ತಿಳಿದೇನು? ॥ಕೊಂಚ ಕೊಂಚಗಳರಿವು ಪೂರ್ಣದರಿವಾದೀತೆ? ।ಮಿಂಚಿದುದು ಪರತತ್ತ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೦ ॥

content: ಜೀವನದ ಪರಿಪೂರ್ಣದರ್ಶನವದೊಂದಿಹುದು ।ಭೂವ್ಯೋಮ ವಿಸ್ತರದ ಮಿತಿಯ ಮೀರ್ದುದುದು ॥ದೇವ ನರ ಪಶು ಸಸಿಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ಕುಣಿಯುವರಲ್ಲಿ ।ಭಾವಿಸಾ ಚಿತ್ರವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೧ ॥jIvanada paripUrNadarshana adu ondu ihudu ।bhUvyOma vistarada mitiya mIrdudu adu ॥dEva nara pashu sasigaLella kuNiyuvaralli ।bhAvisu A chitravanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 321 ॥There is one complete vision of Life. This vision is beyond the boundaries of expanse earth and the sky. In that vision, the Gods, humans, animals, plants are all dancing. Imagine such a picture.  - Mankutimma
translation: There is one complete vision of Life. This vision is beyond the boundaries of expanse earth and the sky. In that vision, the Gods, humans, animals, plants are all dancing. Imagine such a picture.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭಾವಿಸಾ ಚಿತ್ರವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jIvanada paripUrNadarshana adu ondu ihudu ।bhUvyOma vistarada mitiya mIrdudu adu ॥dEva nara pashu sasigaLella kuNiyuvaralli ।bhAvisu A chitravanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 321 ॥
kagga: ಜೀವನದ ಪರಿಪೂರ್ಣದರ್ಶನವದೊಂದಿಹುದು ।ಭೂವ್ಯೋಮ ವಿಸ್ತರದ ಮಿತಿಯ ಮೀರ್ದುದುದು ॥ದೇವ ನರ ಪಶು ಸಸಿಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ಕುಣಿಯುವರಲ್ಲಿ ।ಭಾವಿಸಾ ಚಿತ್ರವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೧ ॥

content: ಆ ವಿಶ್ವರೂಪ ಸಂದರ್ಶನದಿ ಹೊಂದಿಹುವು ।ಜೀವ ನಿರ್ಜೀವಗಳು, ಕ್ರಮ ಯದೃಚ್ಛೆಗಳು ॥ಆವಶ್ಯ ವಶ್ಯ; ಸ್ವಾಚ್ಛಂದ್ಯ ನಿರ್ಭಂದಗಳು ।ಕೈವಲ್ಯದೃಷ್ಟಿಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೨ ॥A vishvarUpa sandarshanadi hondihuvu ।jIva nirjIvagaLu, krama yadRucChegaLu ॥Avashya vashya, svAcChandya nirbhandagaLu ।kaivalya dRushTiyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 322 ॥In this vision of the universe, all opposites are together (and not differnt from each other)- living things and objects, planned and the spontaneous, required as well as dispensable, free as well as constrained. Such is the glory of the unified view.  - Mankutimma
translation: In this vision of the universe, all opposites are together (and not differnt from each other)- living things and objects, planned and the spontaneous, required as well as dispensable, free as well as constrained. Such is the glory of the unified view.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕೈವಲ್ಯದೃಷ್ಟಿಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: A vishvarUpa sandarshanadi hondihuvu ।jIva nirjIvagaLu, krama yadRucChegaLu ॥Avashya vashya, svAcChandya nirbhandagaLu ।kaivalya dRushTiyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 322 ॥
kagga: ಆ ವಿಶ್ವರೂಪ ಸಂದರ್ಶನದಿ ಹೊಂದಿಹುವು ।ಜೀವ ನಿರ್ಜೀವಗಳು, ಕ್ರಮ ಯದೃಚ್ಛೆಗಳು ॥ಆವಶ್ಯ ವಶ್ಯ; ಸ್ವಾಚ್ಛಂದ್ಯ ನಿರ್ಭಂದಗಳು ।ಕೈವಲ್ಯದೃಷ್ಟಿಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೨ ॥

content: ಸಾರಸುಖನಿಧಿ ಪರಬ್ರಹ್ಮನಿರುತಿರಲ್ ।ಸ್ವಾರಸ್ಯಹೀನರೆನ್ನುವರೆ ಜೀವಿತವೆ? ॥ಪೌರುಷ ಪ್ರೇಮ ಸೌಂದರ್ಯಗಳುಮಂತೆಯೇ ।ಸ್ವಾರಸ್ಯವೋ ರಹಸ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೩ ॥sAra suKhanidhi parabrahmanu iruta iralu ।svArasyahIna ennnuvare jIvitave? ॥pauruSha prEma saundaryagaLum anteyE ।svArasyavO rahasya  - Mankutimma ॥ 323 ॥The Creator is the treasure of all essence and happiness. That being so, how can we say that his creation and life is not fascinating. Fascination is also a mystery just like what drives mankind towards courage, love and beauty.  - Mankutimma
translation: The Creator is the treasure of all essence and happiness. That being so, how can we say that his creation and life is not fascinating. Fascination is also a mystery just like what drives mankind towards courage, love and beauty.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸ್ವಾರಸ್ಯವೋ ರಹಸ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sAra suKhanidhi parabrahmanu iruta iralu ।svArasyahIna ennnuvare jIvitave? ॥pauruSha prEma saundaryagaLum anteyE ।svArasyavO rahasya  - Mankutimma ॥ 323 ॥
kagga: ಸಾರಸುಖನಿಧಿ ಪರಬ್ರಹ್ಮನಿರುತಿರಲ್ ।ಸ್ವಾರಸ್ಯಹೀನರೆನ್ನುವರೆ ಜೀವಿತವೆ? ॥ಪೌರುಷ ಪ್ರೇಮ ಸೌಂದರ್ಯಗಳುಮಂತೆಯೇ ।ಸ್ವಾರಸ್ಯವೋ ರಹಸ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೩ ॥

content: ಏನೆ ನಿಜವಿರಲಿ ಮತ್ತೇನೆ ಸುಳ್ಳಾಗಿರಲಿ ।ನಾನೆನಿಪ್ಪಾತ್ಮವೊಂದಿರುವುದನುಭವಿಕ ॥ಹಾನಿಗಾವಾತನಾತ್ಮವನುಮಂ ಕೆಡಹದಿರು ।ಧ್ಯಾನಿಸಾತ್ಮದ ಗತಿಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೪ ॥Ene nijavirali mattEne suLLAgirali ।nAnu enipa Atma ondu iruvudu anubhavika ॥hanige AvAtana Atmavanum keDahade iru ।dhyAnisu Atmada gatiya  - Mankutimma ॥324 ॥What and where is the nature of soul? There may be many theories; some true, some false. But every one has a conscience that every one feels and understands. Don;t do any thing that brings harm to that conscience. Meditate and listen to (and follow) it.   - Mankutimma
translation: What and where is the nature of soul? There may be many theories; some true, some false. But every one has a conscience that every one feels and understands. Don;t do any thing that brings harm to that conscience. Meditate and listen to (and follow) it.   - Mankutimma
title: ಧ್ಯಾನಿಸಾತ್ಮದ ಗತಿಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Ene nijavirali mattEne suLLAgirali ।nAnu enipa Atma ondu iruvudu anubhavika ॥hanige AvAtana Atmavanum keDahade iru ।dhyAnisu Atmada gatiya  - Mankutimma ॥324 ॥
kagga: ಏನೆ ನಿಜವಿರಲಿ ಮತ್ತೇನೆ ಸುಳ್ಳಾಗಿರಲಿ ।ನಾನೆನಿಪ್ಪಾತ್ಮವೊಂದಿರುವುದನುಭವಿಕ ॥ಹಾನಿಗಾವಾತನಾತ್ಮವನುಮಂ ಕೆಡಹದಿರು ।ಧ್ಯಾನಿಸಾತ್ಮದ ಗತಿಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೪ ॥

content: ಎಷ್ಟು ಬಗೆ ಯಂತ್ರಗಳೊಳೆಷ್ಟು ರಸಮಿಶ್ರದಿಂ ।ದೆಷ್ಟಾಧಿಭೂತಗಳು ಪರಿಪಾಕವೊಂದಿ ॥ಒಟ್ಟು ಸೇರಿಹವು ನರನೆಂಬ ಸಿದ್ಧಿಯೊಳವನು ।ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಶೈಲದ ಶಿಖರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೫ ॥eShTu bage yantragaLa oLu eShTu rasamishradinda ।eShTu adhibhUtagaLu paripAkavondi ॥oTTu sErihavu naranu emba siddhiya oLuavanu ।sRuShTishailada shiKara  - Mankutimma ॥ 325 ॥This human body is made of so many different kind of machines and so many emotions. Man;s body is the final result of tiresome refining of the base material. He is the crown jewel of creation  - Mankutimma
translation: This human body is made of so many different kind of machines and so many emotions. Man;s body is the final result of tiresome refining of the base material. He is the crown jewel of creation  - Mankutimma
title: ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಶೈಲದ ಶಿಖರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: eShTu bage yantragaLa oLu eShTu rasamishradinda ।eShTu adhibhUtagaLu paripAkavondi ॥oTTu sErihavu naranu emba siddhiya oLuavanu ।sRuShTishailada shiKara  - Mankutimma ॥ 325 ॥
kagga: ಎಷ್ಟು ಬಗೆ ಯಂತ್ರಗಳೊಳೆಷ್ಟು ರಸಮಿಶ್ರದಿಂ ।ದೆಷ್ಟಾಧಿಭೂತಗಳು ಪರಿಪಾಕವೊಂದಿ ॥ಒಟ್ಟು ಸೇರಿಹವು ನರನೆಂಬ ಸಿದ್ಧಿಯೊಳವನು ।ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಶೈಲದ ಶಿಖರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೫ ॥

content: ಸುಮ್ಮನಿರಲೊಲದೆ ತನಗೊಡನಾಡಿಯೊರ್ವಳನು ।ನಿರ್ಮಿಸಿ ನಿಜಾಂಶದಿಂ ಮಾಯೆಯೆಂಬವಳಿಂ ॥ದುಣ್ಮಿದ ಜಗಜ್ಜಾಲಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ವಿಹರಿಸುತಿರುವ ।ಬೊಮ್ಮನಾಟವ ಮೆರೆಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೬ ॥summane iralu olade tanage oDanAgi OrvaLanu ।nirmisi nija aMshadiM mAye ambavaLinda ॥uNmida jagajjAlagaLalli viharisutiruva ।bommanATava mereso  - Mankutimma ॥ 326 ॥The creator did not want to be alone. So, he created a companion for himself from himself  - Maya (the illusion). Now he lets Maya create the world of illusion and wanders all around it. Our life is in that illusion. Let us lead it in way it befits him.  - Mankutimma
translation: The creator did not want to be alone. So, he created a companion for himself from himself  - Maya (the illusion). Now he lets Maya create the world of illusion and wanders all around it. Our life is in that illusion. Let us lead it in way it befits him.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬೊಮ್ಮನಾಟವ ಮೆರೆಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: summane iralu olade tanage oDanAgi OrvaLanu ।nirmisi nija aMshadiM mAye ambavaLinda ॥uNmida jagajjAlagaLalli viharisutiruva ।bommanATava mereso  - Mankutimma ॥ 326 ॥
kagga: ಸುಮ್ಮನಿರಲೊಲದೆ ತನಗೊಡನಾಡಿಯೊರ್ವಳನು ।ನಿರ್ಮಿಸಿ ನಿಜಾಂಶದಿಂ ಮಾಯೆಯೆಂಬವಳಿಂ ॥ದುಣ್ಮಿದ ಜಗಜ್ಜಾಲಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ವಿಹರಿಸುತಿರುವ ।ಬೊಮ್ಮನಾಟವ ಮೆರೆಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೬ ॥

content: ಜೀವಸಂಘವಿದೇನು? ಗಂಜೀಫಿನೆಲೆಗಟ್ಟು ।ದೈವ ಪೌರುಷ ಪೂರ್ವವಾಸನೆಗಳೆಂಬಾ ॥ಮೂವರದನಾಡುವರು, ಚದುರಿಸುತೆ, ಬೆರಸಿಡುತೆ ।ನಾವೆಲ್ಲರಾಟದೆಲೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೭ ॥jIvasanGhavu idu Enu? ganjIphina ele kaTTu ।daiva pauruSha pUrvavAsanegaLu emba A ॥mUvaru adanu ADuvaru, cadurisute, beraDisute ।nAvellarATadele  - Mankutimma ॥ 327 ॥What is this living world? It is like a board game. Providence, human effort and previous deed (their consequences) are the players. The game involves disbursing the pawns, arranging them again and mixing them. We are just the pawns.  - Mankutimma
translation: What is this living world? It is like a board game. Providence, human effort and previous deed (their consequences) are the players. The game involves disbursing the pawns, arranging them again and mixing them. We are just the pawns.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಾವೆಲ್ಲರಾಟದೆಲೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jIvasanGhavu idu Enu? ganjIphina ele kaTTu ।daiva pauruSha pUrvavAsanegaLu emba A ॥mUvaru adanu ADuvaru, cadurisute, beraDisute ।nAvellarATadele  - Mankutimma ॥ 327 ॥
kagga: ಜೀವಸಂಘವಿದೇನು? ಗಂಜೀಫಿನೆಲೆಗಟ್ಟು ।ದೈವ ಪೌರುಷ ಪೂರ್ವವಾಸನೆಗಳೆಂಬಾ ॥ಮೂವರದನಾಡುವರು, ಚದುರಿಸುತೆ, ಬೆರಸಿಡುತೆ ।ನಾವೆಲ್ಲರಾಟದೆಲೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೭ ॥

content: ಎಲೆಕಟ್ಟನಾಗಾಗ ಕಲಸಿಕೊಡುವುದೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ।ಬಳಿಕೆಲೆಯ ಗತಿಯೆಂತೋ ಎಲ್ಲಿ ಸೇರುವುದೋ! ॥ಬಳಸುತಿಹುದೊಂದೊಂದುಮೊಂದೊಂದು ದಿಕ್ಕಿನಲಿ ।ಅಲೆಯುವೆವು ನಾವಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೮ ॥elekaTTanu AgAga kalasikoDuvude sRuShTi ।baLika eleya gatiyentO elli sEruvudO! ॥baLasuta ihudu ondondu ondondu dikkinali ।aleyuvevu nAvi antu  - Mankutimma ॥ 328 ॥This creation is like a pack of cards. We are the cards. The game involves mixing them and drawing them at random. No one cannot know which card will be dealt when and where. Any card can be used for anything at any time. We are wandering in this world thus.  - Mankutimma
translation: This creation is like a pack of cards. We are the cards. The game involves mixing them and drawing them at random. No one cannot know which card will be dealt when and where. Any card can be used for anything at any time. We are wandering in this world thus.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅಲೆಯುವೆವು ನಾವಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: elekaTTanu AgAga kalasikoDuvude sRuShTi ।baLika eleya gatiyentO elli sEruvudO! ॥baLasuta ihudu ondondu ondondu dikkinali ।aleyuvevu nAvi antu  - Mankutimma ॥ 328 ॥
kagga: ಎಲೆಕಟ್ಟನಾಗಾಗ ಕಲಸಿಕೊಡುವುದೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ।ಬಳಿಕೆಲೆಯ ಗತಿಯೆಂತೋ ಎಲ್ಲಿ ಸೇರುವುದೋ! ॥ಬಳಸುತಿಹುದೊಂದೊಂದುಮೊಂದೊಂದು ದಿಕ್ಕಿನಲಿ ।ಅಲೆಯುವೆವು ನಾವಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೮ ॥

content: ನಿಲದೆ ನಡೆವುದು ಮೊದಲು ಕೊನೆಯಿಲ್ಲದೀಯಾಟ ।ಕಳೆವುವದರಲಿ ನಮ್ಮ ಜನುಮಜನುಮಗಳು ॥ಗೆಲವಾರ್ಗೊ! ಸೋಲಾರ್ಗೊ! ಲೆಕ್ಕನೋಡುವುದೆಂದೊ! ।ಫಲವು ಬರಿಯಾಟವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೯ ॥nilade naDevudu modalu kone illada ee ATa ।kaLevuvu adarali namma janumajanumagaLu ॥gelavArgo! sOlArgo! lekanODuvudu endo! ।phalavu bari ATavelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 329॥Like this, the game of cards go on for ever without beginning or an end. We spend our lives after lives in this game (being cards). Who is winning, who is losing  - we will never know. When will the scorecards be tallied? The game itself is the result.  - Mankutimma
translation: Like this, the game of cards go on for ever without beginning or an end. We spend our lives after lives in this game (being cards). Who is winning, who is losing  - we will never know. When will the scorecards be tallied? The game itself is the result.  - Mankutimma
title: ಫಲವು ಬರಿಯಾಟವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nilade naDevudu modalu kone illada ee ATa ।kaLevuvu adarali namma janumajanumagaLu ॥gelavArgo! sOlArgo! lekanODuvudu endo! ।phalavu bari ATavelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 329॥
kagga: ನಿಲದೆ ನಡೆವುದು ಮೊದಲು ಕೊನೆಯಿಲ್ಲದೀಯಾಟ ।ಕಳೆವುವದರಲಿ ನಮ್ಮ ಜನುಮಜನುಮಗಳು ॥ಗೆಲವಾರ್ಗೊ! ಸೋಲಾರ್ಗೊ! ಲೆಕ್ಕನೋಡುವುದೆಂದೊ! ।ಫಲವು ಬರಿಯಾಟವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨೯ ॥

content: ಆಟಕ್ಕೆ ಫಲವೇನು? ಕುತುಕದ ರುಚಿಯೆ ಫಲ ।ಚೀಟಿ ತಾಂ ಬೀಳೆನೆನಲ್ ಆಟ ಸಾಗುವುದೆ? ॥ಏಟಾಯ್ತೆ ಗೆಲವಾಯ್ತೆಯೆಂದು ಕೇಳುವುದೇನು? ।ಆಟದೋಟವೆ ಲಾಭ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೦ ॥ATakke phalavnu? kautukada ruchiye phala ।chITi tAM bILenu enal ATa sAguvude? ॥ETAyte gelavAyte endu kELuvudu Enu? ।ATada Otave lAbha  - Mankutimma ॥ 330 ॥What is the outcome of the game? The curiosity generated during the game itself is the result. The game does not progress if the cards are not cut (dropped). Once played, no one should care if the card won or got trumped. The progress of the game itself should be considered as profit.  - Mankutimma
translation: What is the outcome of the game? The curiosity generated during the game itself is the result. The game does not progress if the cards are not cut (dropped). Once played, no one should care if the card won or got trumped. The progress of the game itself should be considered as profit.  - Mankutimma
title: ಆಟದೋಟವೆ ಲಾಭ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ATakke phalavnu? kautukada ruchiye phala ।chITi tAM bILenu enal ATa sAguvude? ॥ETAyte gelavAyte endu kELuvudu Enu? ।ATada Otave lAbha  - Mankutimma ॥ 330 ॥
kagga: ಆಟಕ್ಕೆ ಫಲವೇನು? ಕುತುಕದ ರುಚಿಯೆ ಫಲ ।ಚೀಟಿ ತಾಂ ಬೀಳೆನೆನಲ್ ಆಟ ಸಾಗುವುದೆ? ॥ಏಟಾಯ್ತೆ ಗೆಲವಾಯ್ತೆಯೆಂದು ಕೇಳುವುದೇನು? ।ಆಟದೋಟವೆ ಲಾಭ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೦ ॥

content: ಸತ್ಯ ಶಿವ ಸುಂದರದ ಸಚ್ಚಿದಾನಂದನದ ।ಭಿತ್ತಿಯಲಿ ಬಣ್ಣಬಣ್ಣದ ಜೀವಚಿತ್ರ ॥ನಿತ್ಯ ನೀನದ ನೆನೆದು ಚಿತ್ರದಲಿ ಮನವಿರಿಸೆ ।ವೃತ್ತಿ ತನ್ಮಯವಹುದೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೧ ॥satya shiva sundarada sat chit Anandanada ।bhittiyali baNNabaNNAda jIvachitra ॥nitya nInu ada nenedu chitradali mana irise ।vRutti tanmaya ahudo  - Mankutimma ॥ 331 ॥Sat (truth), Chit(inner peace) and Ananda (happiness) are the qualities of the cosmic spirit. It is also our base qualities (Satya (truth), Shiva (peace), Sundara (beauty))that we may have forgotten. On a canvas of these qualities, the colourful picture of life is drawn. You should channelise your mind every day towards these qualities. Then whatever work you do will attain the same qualities.  - Mankutimma
translation: Sat (truth), Chit(inner peace) and Ananda (happiness) are the qualities of the cosmic spirit. It is also our base qualities (Satya (truth), Shiva (peace), Sundara (beauty))that we may have forgotten. On a canvas of these qualities, the colourful picture of life is drawn. You should channelise your mind every day towards these qualities. Then whatever work you do will attain the same qualities.  - Mankutimma
title: ವೃತ್ತಿ ತನ್ಮಯವಹುದೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: satya shiva sundarada sat chit Anandanada ।bhittiyali baNNabaNNAda jIvachitra ॥nitya nInu ada nenedu chitradali mana irise ।vRutti tanmaya ahudo  - Mankutimma ॥ 331 ॥
kagga: ಸತ್ಯ ಶಿವ ಸುಂದರದ ಸಚ್ಚಿದಾನಂದನದ ।ಭಿತ್ತಿಯಲಿ ಬಣ್ಣಬಣ್ಣದ ಜೀವಚಿತ್ರ ॥ನಿತ್ಯ ನೀನದ ನೆನೆದು ಚಿತ್ರದಲಿ ಮನವಿರಿಸೆ ।ವೃತ್ತಿ ತನ್ಮಯವಹುದೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೧ ॥

content: ಸತ್ಯವೆಂಬುದದೆಲ್ಲಿ? ನಿನ್ನಂತರಂಗದೊಳೊ ।ಸುತ್ತ ನೀನನುಭವಿಪ ಬಾಹ್ಯ ಚಿತ್ರದೊಳೋ ॥ಯುಕ್ತಿಯಿಂದೊಂದನೊಂದಕೆ ತೊಡಿಸಿ ಸರಿನೋಡೆ ।ತತ್ತ್ವದರ್ಶನವಹುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥೩೩೨ ॥satya embudu adu elli? ninna antarangada oLo ।sutta nInu anubhavipa bAhya chitradoLO ॥yuktiyinda ondanu ondake toDisi sarinODe । tattvadarshana ahudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 332 ॥Where is the truth hidden? In your own conscience. In the world surrounding you that you can experience. When you connect them both with your intellect, then you will have the realization of the ultimate truth.   - Mankutimma
translation: Where is the truth hidden? In your own conscience. In the world surrounding you that you can experience. When you connect them both with your intellect, then you will have the realization of the ultimate truth.   - Mankutimma
title: ತತ್ತ್ವದರ್ಶನವಹುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: satya embudu adu elli? ninna antarangada oLo ।sutta nInu anubhavipa bAhya chitradoLO ॥yuktiyinda ondanu ondake toDisi sarinODe । tattvadarshana ahudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 332 ॥
kagga: ಸತ್ಯವೆಂಬುದದೆಲ್ಲಿ? ನಿನ್ನಂತರಂಗದೊಳೊ ।ಸುತ್ತ ನೀನನುಭವಿಪ ಬಾಹ್ಯ ಚಿತ್ರದೊಳೋ ॥ಯುಕ್ತಿಯಿಂದೊಂದನೊಂದಕೆ ತೊಡಿಸಿ ಸರಿನೋಡೆ ।ತತ್ತ್ವದರ್ಶನವಹುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥೩೩೨ ॥

content: ಓರೋರ್ವನಿಚ್ಛೆಗುಣವೊಂದೊಂದು ಬಗೆ ಜಗದಿ ।ಭಾರಮೋರೊರ್ವನಿಂಗೊಂದೊಂದು ತೆರದಿ ॥ದಾರಗಳಿನವರ ವಿಧಿ ಪಿಡಿದು ಕುಣಿದಾಡಿಸಲು ।ನೂರುಜಡೆಕೋಲಾಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೪ ॥OrOrvana icChe guNavu ondondu bage jagadi ।bhAramu Ororvaninge ondondu teradi ॥dAragaLina avara vidhi piDidu kuNidADisalu ।nUru jaDe kOlATa  - Mankutimma ॥ 334 ॥Each one has his own desires and his own qualities. Each one has to deal with his own burdens in his own way. Providence is playing a careful game of Kolu Jade of hundred strings by controlling all of us.  - Mankutimma
translation: Each one has his own desires and his own qualities. Each one has to deal with his own burdens in his own way. Providence is playing a careful game of Kolu Jade of hundred strings by controlling all of us.  - Mankutimma
title: ನೂರುಜಡೆಕೋಲಾಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: OrOrvana icChe guNavu ondondu bage jagadi ।bhAramu Ororvaninge ondondu teradi ॥dAragaLina avara vidhi piDidu kuNidADisalu ।nUru jaDe kOlATa  - Mankutimma ॥ 334 ॥
kagga: ಓರೋರ್ವನಿಚ್ಛೆಗುಣವೊಂದೊಂದು ಬಗೆ ಜಗದಿ ।ಭಾರಮೋರೊರ್ವನಿಂಗೊಂದೊಂದು ತೆರದಿ ॥ದಾರಗಳಿನವರ ವಿಧಿ ಪಿಡಿದು ಕುಣಿದಾಡಿಸಲು ।ನೂರುಜಡೆಕೋಲಾಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೪ ॥

content: ಸತ್ಯಾನುಭವವೆಲ್ಲರಿಂಗಮೊಂದೆಂತಹುದು? ।ಬೆಟ್ಟದಡಿಯೊಳಗೊಬ್ಬ; ಕೋಡಬಳಿಯೊಬ್ಬ ॥ಎತ್ತರದ ದೃಶ್ಯ ಕಣಿವೆಯೊಳಿಹನಿಗಾದೀತೆ? ।ನೇತ್ರದಂದದೆ ನೋಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೩ ॥satyAnubhavavu ellaringam ondentahudu? ।beTTadaDiyoLagobba; kODabaLiyobba ॥ettarada dRushya kaNiveyoLihanigAdIte? ।nEtradandade nOTa  - Mankutimma ॥ 333 ॥The realization of the truth can not happen to every one in the same way. Can it? One may realize it in the valley looking up towards the enormous mountain. Another person may have it on top of the mountain. Can a person in the valley see the same thing as the one on the top? What we see depends on our point of view.  - Mankutimma
translation: The realization of the truth can not happen to every one in the same way. Can it? One may realize it in the valley looking up towards the enormous mountain. Another person may have it on top of the mountain. Can a person in the valley see the same thing as the one on the top? What we see depends on our point of view.  - Mankutimma
title: ನೇತ್ರದಂದದೆ ನೋಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: satyAnubhavavu ellaringam ondentahudu? ।beTTadaDiyoLagobba; kODabaLiyobba ॥ettarada dRushya kaNiveyoLihanigAdIte? ।nEtradandade nOTa  - Mankutimma ॥ 333 ॥
kagga: ಸತ್ಯಾನುಭವವೆಲ್ಲರಿಂಗಮೊಂದೆಂತಹುದು? ।ಬೆಟ್ಟದಡಿಯೊಳಗೊಬ್ಬ; ಕೋಡಬಳಿಯೊಬ್ಬ ॥ಎತ್ತರದ ದೃಶ್ಯ ಕಣಿವೆಯೊಳಿಹನಿಗಾದೀತೆ? ।ನೇತ್ರದಂದದೆ ನೋಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೩ ॥

content: ಆವ ಜನ್ಮದ ಋಣವೊ, ಆವ ಕರ್ಮದ ಕಣವೊ ।ಮಾವಾಗಿ ಬೇವಾಗಿ ಸಂಸಾರ ವನದಿ ॥ಜೀವಕೀಂಟಿಪುವು ಮಾದಕದ ರಸಪಾನಗಳ ।ಭಾವಜ್ವರಂಗಳವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೫ ॥Ava janmada RuNavo, Ava karmada kaNavo ।mAvAgi bEvAgi samsAra vanadi ॥jIvake eenTipuvu mAdakada rasapAnagaLA ।bhAva jvarangaLavu  - Mankutimma ॥ 335 ॥Left over karmic debt from some older birth, consequences of previous actions come back to haunt us. They come as mango or neem (sweet or bitter) in the forest of this world. Providence makes a strong potion of those fruits and make people drink it and induce a fever of emotions.  - Mankutimma
translation: Left over karmic debt from some older birth, consequences of previous actions come back to haunt us. They come as mango or neem (sweet or bitter) in the forest of this world. Providence makes a strong potion of those fruits and make people drink it and induce a fever of emotions.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭಾವಜ್ವರಂಗಳವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Ava janmada RuNavo, Ava karmada kaNavo ।mAvAgi bEvAgi samsAra vanadi ॥jIvake eenTipuvu mAdakada rasapAnagaLA ।bhAva jvarangaLavu  - Mankutimma ॥ 335 ॥
kagga: ಆವ ಜನ್ಮದ ಋಣವೊ, ಆವ ಕರ್ಮದ ಕಣವೊ ।ಮಾವಾಗಿ ಬೇವಾಗಿ ಸಂಸಾರ ವನದಿ ॥ಜೀವಕೀಂಟಿಪುವು ಮಾದಕದ ರಸಪಾನಗಳ ।ಭಾವಜ್ವರಂಗಳವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೫ ॥

content: ನಿನ್ನ ಜೀವಿತವೆಲ್ಲ ನಿನ್ನ ಕೈಮಾಳ್ಕೆಯೇಂ? ।ಅನ್ಯಶಕ್ತಿಗಳೆನಿತೊ ಬೆರೆತಿರುವುವಲ್ಲಿ ॥ ಅನ್ನವಿಡುವರು, ತಿಳಿವನೀವರ್, ಒಡನಾಡುವರು ।ನಿನ್ನ ಬಾಳ್ಗಿವರಿರರೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೬ ॥ninna jIvitavella ninna kaimALkeyEM? ।anyashaktigaLu enito beretiruvuvu alli ॥annaviDuvaru, tiLivanIvar, oDanADuvaru ।ninna bALge ivaru irare?  - Mankutimma ॥ 336 ॥Do you think your whole life is self made? There are so many forces that have got together to shape your present. People who have given you food, others who have advised you, some others who just gave you company  - have these people not been a part of your making?  - Mankutimma
translation: Do you think your whole life is self made? There are so many forces that have got together to shape your present. People who have given you food, others who have advised you, some others who just gave you company  - have these people not been a part of your making?  - Mankutimma
title: ನಿನ್ನ ಬಾಳ್ಗಿವರಿರರೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ninna jIvitavella ninna kaimALkeyEM? ।anyashaktigaLu enito beretiruvuvu alli ॥annaviDuvaru, tiLivanIvar, oDanADuvaru ।ninna bALge ivaru irare?  - Mankutimma ॥ 336 ॥
kagga: ನಿನ್ನ ಜೀವಿತವೆಲ್ಲ ನಿನ್ನ ಕೈಮಾಳ್ಕೆಯೇಂ? ।ಅನ್ಯಶಕ್ತಿಗಳೆನಿತೊ ಬೆರೆತಿರುವುವಲ್ಲಿ ॥ ಅನ್ನವಿಡುವರು, ತಿಳಿವನೀವರ್, ಒಡನಾಡುವರು ।ನಿನ್ನ ಬಾಳ್ಗಿವರಿರರೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೬ ॥

content: ಅನಿಲಗುಣ ಭೂಗುಣಗಳಿಂ ಸಸ್ಯಧಾನ್ಯಗುಣ ।ತನುಗುಣಗಳನ್ನದಿಂ, ಮನದ ಗುಣ ತನುವಿಂ ॥ಜನಪದವಿಧಂಗಳಿಂತಾಗಿಹುವು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯನೆ ।ಮನುವೊಬ್ಬ, ಜನತೆ ಶತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೭ ॥anilaguNa bhUguNagaLim sasyadhanyaguNa ।tanuguNagaLannadim, manada guNa tanuvim ॥janapada vidhangaLu intAgihuvu sRuShTiyane ।manuvobba, janate shata  - Mankutimma ॥ 337 ॥Air and earth are the basic qualities that get into the plants and cereals. Our body follows the qualities of what we eat. Mind follows the body. This leads to varieties in population. All are same at a human level, but differ at a group level due to their habits.  - Mankutimma
translation: Air and earth are the basic qualities that get into the plants and cereals. Our body follows the qualities of what we eat. Mind follows the body. This leads to varieties in population. All are same at a human level, but differ at a group level due to their habits.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮನುವೊಬ್ಬ, ಜನತೆ ಶತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: anilaguNa bhUguNagaLim sasyadhanyaguNa ।tanuguNagaLannadim, manada guNa tanuvim ॥janapada vidhangaLu intAgihuvu sRuShTiyane ।manuvobba, janate shata  - Mankutimma ॥ 337 ॥
kagga: ಅನಿಲಗುಣ ಭೂಗುಣಗಳಿಂ ಸಸ್ಯಧಾನ್ಯಗುಣ ।ತನುಗುಣಗಳನ್ನದಿಂ, ಮನದ ಗುಣ ತನುವಿಂ ॥ಜನಪದವಿಧಂಗಳಿಂತಾಗಿಹುವು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯನೆ ।ಮನುವೊಬ್ಬ, ಜನತೆ ಶತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೭ ॥

content: ಓರ್ವ ನಾನೆಂದು ನೀನೆಂತು ತಿಳಿಯುವೆ ಜಗದಿ? ।ನೂರ್ವರಣಗಿಹರು ನಿನ್ನಾತ್ಮ ಕೋಶದಲಿ ॥ಪೂರ್ವಿಕರು, ಜತೆಯವರು, ಬಂಧುಸಖಶತ್ರುಗಳು ।ಸರ್ವರಿಂ ನಿನ್ನ ಗುಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೮ ॥Orva nAnendu nInentu tiLiyuve jagadi? ।nUrvaraNagiharu ninnAtma kOshadali ॥pUrvikaru, jateyavaru, bandhusakhashatrugaLu ।sarvarim ninna guNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 338 ॥Individuality is a myth. How can you think about yourself as a single person? There are traces of hundred (many) people in this shell that you call as me. Your ancestors, family, relatives, friends and enemies are all part of what you are. Your qualities are derived (influenced) by all of them.  - Mankutimma
translation: Individuality is a myth. How can you think about yourself as a single person? There are traces of hundred (many) people in this shell that you call as me. Your ancestors, family, relatives, friends and enemies are all part of what you are. Your qualities are derived (influenced) by all of them.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸರ್ವರಿಂ ನಿನ್ನ ಗುಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Orva nAnendu nInentu tiLiyuve jagadi? ।nUrvaraNagiharu ninnAtma kOshadali ॥pUrvikaru, jateyavaru, bandhusakhashatrugaLu ।sarvarim ninna guNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 338 ॥
kagga: ಓರ್ವ ನಾನೆಂದು ನೀನೆಂತು ತಿಳಿಯುವೆ ಜಗದಿ? ।ನೂರ್ವರಣಗಿಹರು ನಿನ್ನಾತ್ಮ ಕೋಶದಲಿ ॥ಪೂರ್ವಿಕರು, ಜತೆಯವರು, ಬಂಧುಸಖಶತ್ರುಗಳು ।ಸರ್ವರಿಂ ನಿನ್ನ ಗುಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೮ ॥

content: ನಿನ್ನಜ್ಜ ಮುತ್ತಜ್ಜ ಮೂಲಜ್ಜರೆಲ್ಲರುಂ ।ನಿನ್ನೊಳವತರಿಸಿ ಮುಂದಿನ್ನು ಜನಿಸಲಿಹ ॥ನಿನ್ನ ಮಗ ಮರಿಮೊಮ್ಮರೊಳು ಜೀವಿಪ್ಪರ್ ।ಅನ್ವಯ ಚಿರಂಜೀವಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೯ ॥ninnajja muttajja mUlajjaru ellarum ।ninnoLu avatarisi mundinnu janisalu iha ॥ninna maga mari mommara oLu jIvippar ।anvaya chiranjIvi  - Mankutimma ॥ 339 ॥Your grandfather, his father and the fist person in your lineage all of them are inside you. They will also be in your son who is yet to be born, and his grand son too. The live inside you in the form of the influence each generation has on its next and that will go on for ever.  - Mankutimma[Traslator's note: Is he talking about genes?]
translation: Your grandfather, his father and the fist person in your lineage all of them are inside you. They will also be in your son who is yet to be born, and his grand son too. The live inside you in the form of the influence each generation has on its next and that will go on for ever.  - Mankutimma[Traslator's note: Is he talking about genes?]
title: ಅನ್ವಯ ಚಿರಂಜೀವಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ninnajja muttajja mUlajjaru ellarum ।ninnoLu avatarisi mundinnu janisalu iha ॥ninna maga mari mommara oLu jIvippar ।anvaya chiranjIvi  - Mankutimma ॥ 339 ॥
kagga: ನಿನ್ನಜ್ಜ ಮುತ್ತಜ್ಜ ಮೂಲಜ್ಜರೆಲ್ಲರುಂ ।ನಿನ್ನೊಳವತರಿಸಿ ಮುಂದಿನ್ನು ಜನಿಸಲಿಹ ॥ನಿನ್ನ ಮಗ ಮರಿಮೊಮ್ಮರೊಳು ಜೀವಿಪ್ಪರ್ ।ಅನ್ವಯ ಚಿರಂಜೀವಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩೯ ॥

content: ರೇಖಾರಹಸ್ಯಗಳು ನಿನ್ನ ಹಣೆಯವದಿರಲಿ ।ನೀಂ ಕಾಣ್ಬ ರೂಪಭಾವಂಗಳೊಳಮಿಹುವು ॥ತಾಕಿ ನಿನ್ನಾತುಮದ ನಾಕನರಕಂಗಳ್ ।ಏಕವೆನಿಪುವುವು ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೦ ॥rEkhArahasyagaLu ninna haNeyavu adu irali ।nim kANba rUpabhAvangaLoLam ihuvu ॥tAki ninna Atumada nAkanarakangaL ।Ekavu enipuvuvu ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 340 ॥Let the secrets coded in the lines of your forehead be as they are. You can see it from your own eyes in the happenings in this world around you and the feelings they generate in you. Thiose feelings will touch your soul and make you realise that heaven and hell are the same. In essence they will make you realize that if you relate to the world around you, the encoded secret (often termed as fate) does not matter at all.  - Mankutimma
translation: Let the secrets coded in the lines of your forehead be as they are. You can see it from your own eyes in the happenings in this world around you and the feelings they generate in you. Thiose feelings will touch your soul and make you realise that heaven and hell are the same. In essence they will make you realize that if you relate to the world around you, the encoded secret (often termed as fate) does not matter at all.  - Mankutimma
title: ಏಕವೆನಿಪುವುವು ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: rEkhArahasyagaLu ninna haNeyavu adu irali ।nim kANba rUpabhAvangaLoLam ihuvu ॥tAki ninna Atumada nAkanarakangaL ।Ekavu enipuvuvu ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 340 ॥
kagga: ರೇಖಾರಹಸ್ಯಗಳು ನಿನ್ನ ಹಣೆಯವದಿರಲಿ ।ನೀಂ ಕಾಣ್ಬ ರೂಪಭಾವಂಗಳೊಳಮಿಹುವು ॥ತಾಕಿ ನಿನ್ನಾತುಮದ ನಾಕನರಕಂಗಳ್ ।ಏಕವೆನಿಪುವುವು ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೦ ॥

content: ಕ್ಷೀರಾನ್ನದಿಂದೆ ನರಪುಷ್ಟಿ; ಹಸುವಿಂ ಪಾಲು ।ಪೈರು ಬೆಳಸಿಂದೆ ಹಸು; ಪೈರುಗಳ್ಗೂರ ॥ಸಾರದಿಂ ಪುಷ್ಟಿ; ಇಂತುಣಿಸುಮುಂಬನುಮೊಂದು ।ಪಾಲೇನು? ಪೇಲೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೧ ॥kShIra annadinde narapuShTi; hasuvim pAlu ।pairu beLesinde hasu; pairugaLge Ura ॥sAradim puShTi; intu uNisuM ombanum ondu ।pAlEnu? pElEnu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 341 ॥Rice mixed in milk is good for man;s body. Milk comes from the cow. Cow grows well when it eats the grass. For grass, the nutrition comes from soil of the village that is mixed with cow;s waste. The whole nature is thus filled with such relationships of provider and consumers. Every being;s produce becomes food for the next. What is then the difference between milk or dung?  - Mankutimma
translation: Rice mixed in milk is good for man;s body. Milk comes from the cow. Cow grows well when it eats the grass. For grass, the nutrition comes from soil of the village that is mixed with cow;s waste. The whole nature is thus filled with such relationships of provider and consumers. Every being;s produce becomes food for the next. What is then the difference between milk or dung?  - Mankutimma
title: ಪಾಲೇನು? ಪೇಲೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kShIra annadinde narapuShTi; hasuvim pAlu ।pairu beLesinde hasu; pairugaLge Ura ॥sAradim puShTi; intu uNisuM ombanum ondu ।pAlEnu? pElEnu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 341 ॥
kagga: ಕ್ಷೀರಾನ್ನದಿಂದೆ ನರಪುಷ್ಟಿ; ಹಸುವಿಂ ಪಾಲು ।ಪೈರು ಬೆಳಸಿಂದೆ ಹಸು; ಪೈರುಗಳ್ಗೂರ ॥ಸಾರದಿಂ ಪುಷ್ಟಿ; ಇಂತುಣಿಸುಮುಂಬನುಮೊಂದು ।ಪಾಲೇನು? ಪೇಲೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೧ ॥

content: ಪೂಸರದಿ ಕಾಂತಿ ಸೌರಭ ಮೊದಲನೆಯ ತಾಸು ।ವಾಸನೆಯ ಹಳಸು ಕೊಳಕೊಳಚೆಯಾ ಬಳಿಕ ॥ಮಾಸಿ ನಲುನಲುಗಿ ಮುಳ್ಳಹುದು ಮೂರನೆ ತಾಸು ।ಸಂಸಾರಕಥೆಯದುವೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೨ ॥pUsaradi kAnti saurabha modalaneya tAsu ।vAsaneya haLasu koLakoLacheyA baLika ॥mAsi nalunalugi muLLahudu mUrane tAsu ।samsAra katheyu aduve  - Mankutimma ॥ 342 ॥ In the first hour, a garland of flowers will have lusture and fragrance. In the next hour, it will rot and stink. In the third hour, it will dry and prick us like a thorn. The story of the world is also thus.  - Mankutimma
translation: In the first hour, a garland of flowers will have lusture and fragrance. In the next hour, it will rot and stink. In the third hour, it will dry and prick us like a thorn. The story of the world is also thus.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಂಸಾರಕಥೆಯದುವೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: pUsaradi kAnti saurabha modalaneya tAsu ।vAsaneya haLasu koLakoLacheyA baLika ॥mAsi nalunalugi muLLahudu mUrane tAsu ।samsAra katheyu aduve  - Mankutimma ॥ 342 ॥
kagga: ಪೂಸರದಿ ಕಾಂತಿ ಸೌರಭ ಮೊದಲನೆಯ ತಾಸು ।ವಾಸನೆಯ ಹಳಸು ಕೊಳಕೊಳಚೆಯಾ ಬಳಿಕ ॥ಮಾಸಿ ನಲುನಲುಗಿ ಮುಳ್ಳಹುದು ಮೂರನೆ ತಾಸು ।ಸಂಸಾರಕಥೆಯದುವೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೨ ॥

content: ಸಾಕುಸಾಕೆನಿಸುವುದು ಲೋಕ ಸಂಪರ್ಕಸುಖ ।ಸೋಕಿದೆಡೆ ತುರಿಯನೆಬ್ಬಿಸುವ ತುರುಚಿಯದು ॥ಮೂಕನವೆ ತುರಿಸದಿರೆ, ತುರಿಯುತಿರೆ ಹುಣ್ಣುರಿತ ।ಮೂಕನಪಹಾಸ್ಯವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೩ ॥ sAku sAku enisuvudu lOka samparka sukha ।sOkideDe turiyanu ebbisuva turuchiyadu ॥mUkanave turisadire, turiyutire huNNurita ।mUkana apahAsyavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 343 ॥One gets fed up of his associations with the pleasures of this world. It is like poison ivy; we get itches where ever it touches. If you don;t scratch, then we suffer a silent agony. If you scratch, you get rashes. It is like making fun of a helpless person.  - Mankutimma
translation: One gets fed up of his associations with the pleasures of this world. It is like poison ivy; we get itches where ever it touches. If you don;t scratch, then we suffer a silent agony. If you scratch, you get rashes. It is like making fun of a helpless person.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೂಕನಪಹಾಸ್ಯವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sAku sAku enisuvudu lOka samparka sukha ।sOkideDe turiyanu ebbisuva turuchiyadu ॥mUkanave turisadire, turiyutire huNNurita ।mUkana apahAsyavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 343 ॥
kagga: ಸಾಕುಸಾಕೆನಿಸುವುದು ಲೋಕ ಸಂಪರ್ಕಸುಖ ।ಸೋಕಿದೆಡೆ ತುರಿಯನೆಬ್ಬಿಸುವ ತುರುಚಿಯದು ॥ಮೂಕನವೆ ತುರಿಸದಿರೆ, ತುರಿಯುತಿರೆ ಹುಣ್ಣುರಿತ ।ಮೂಕನಪಹಾಸ್ಯವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೩ ॥

content: ಮಿಡಿಚೀಪೆಕಾಯಿಗಳ ತಡಬಡದೆ ನುಂಗುವುದು ।ಕಡಿಯೆ ಹೊಟ್ಟೆಯಲಿ ಹರಳೆಣ್ಣೇ ಕುಡಿಯುವುದು ॥ಬಿಡುತಿರಲು ನೋವಾಗ ಸುಖವೀಗಳೆನ್ನುವುದು ।ಪೊಡವಿಗಿದೆ ಭೋಗವಿಧಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೪ ॥ miDichIpekAyigaLa taDabiDade nuMguvudu ।kaDiye hoTTeyali haraLeNNE kuDiyuvudu ॥biDutiralu nOvAga sukhavu IgaL ennuvudu ।poDavigide bhOgavidhi  - Mankutimma ॥ 344 ॥To eat guavas without waiting for them to ripe. To drink castor-oil when stomach hurts (due to the guavas). When the pain subsides, calling that as pleasure. This is the way we have fun in this world.  - Mankutimma
translation: To eat guavas without waiting for them to ripe. To drink castor-oil when stomach hurts (due to the guavas). When the pain subsides, calling that as pleasure. This is the way we have fun in this world.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪೊಡವಿಗಿದೆ ಭೋಗವಿಧಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: miDichIpekAyigaLa taDabiDade nuMguvudu ।kaDiye hoTTeyali haraLeNNE kuDiyuvudu ॥biDutiralu nOvAga sukhavu IgaL ennuvudu ।poDavigide bhOgavidhi  - Mankutimma ॥ 344 ॥
kagga: ಮಿಡಿಚೀಪೆಕಾಯಿಗಳ ತಡಬಡದೆ ನುಂಗುವುದು ।ಕಡಿಯೆ ಹೊಟ್ಟೆಯಲಿ ಹರಳೆಣ್ಣೇ ಕುಡಿಯುವುದು ॥ಬಿಡುತಿರಲು ನೋವಾಗ ಸುಖವೀಗಳೆನ್ನುವುದು ।ಪೊಡವಿಗಿದೆ ಭೋಗವಿಧಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೪ ॥

content: ಅಡಿಜಾರಿ ಬೀಳುವುದು, ತಡವಿಕೊಂಡೇಳುವುದು ।ಕಡುಬ ನುಂಗುವುದು, ಕಹಿಮದ್ದ ಕುಡಿಯುವುದು ॥ದುಡುಕಿ ಮತಿದಪ್ಪುವುದು, ತಪ್ಪನೊಪ್ಪೆನ್ನುವುದು ।ಬದುಕೆಂಬುದಿದು ತಾನೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೫ ॥aDijAri bILuvudu, taDavikonDELuvudu ।kaDuba nonguvudu, kahimaddu kuDiyuvudu ॥diDuki mati tappuvudu, tappanu oppennuvudu ।badukembudu idu tAne?  - Mankutimma ॥ 345 ॥To slip and fall; only to shake up and get up to continue. To eat lot of kadubu (sweet) in hurry; only to be forced to take bitter medicine later. Making wring decisions due to haste; not accepting them as wrong as pursuing them as if they were the right ones. Life is just this. Isn;t it?  - Mankutimma
translation: To slip and fall; only to shake up and get up to continue. To eat lot of kadubu (sweet) in hurry; only to be forced to take bitter medicine later. Making wring decisions due to haste; not accepting them as wrong as pursuing them as if they were the right ones. Life is just this. Isn;t it?  - Mankutimma
title: ಬದುಕೆಂಬುದಿದು ತಾನೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aDijAri bILuvudu, taDavikonDELuvudu ।kaDuba nonguvudu, kahimaddu kuDiyuvudu ॥diDuki mati tappuvudu, tappanu oppennuvudu ।badukembudu idu tAne?  - Mankutimma ॥ 345 ॥
kagga: ಅಡಿಜಾರಿ ಬೀಳುವುದು, ತಡವಿಕೊಂಡೇಳುವುದು ।ಕಡುಬ ನುಂಗುವುದು, ಕಹಿಮದ್ದ ಕುಡಿಯುವುದು ॥ದುಡುಕಿ ಮತಿದಪ್ಪುವುದು, ತಪ್ಪನೊಪ್ಪೆನ್ನುವುದು ।ಬದುಕೆಂಬುದಿದು ತಾನೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೫ ॥

content: ಹೇರಾಳು ಮೂಟೆಗೂಲಿಯ ಬೇಡಿ ಹೆಗಲೊಡ್ಡಿ ।ಭಾರವನು ನಾಲ್ಕು ಮಾರೊಯ್ದಷ್ಟರೊಳಗೇ ॥ದೂರವಿನ್ನೆಷ್ಟೆನುತಲಾತುರಿಪನ್ ಅದನಿಳಿಸೆ ।ಕಾರುಬಾರುಗಳಷ್ಟೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೬ ॥hErALu mUTegUliya bEDi hegaloDDi ।bhAravanu nAlku mAroydaShTaroLagE ॥dUravinneShTu enutale Aturipan adaniLise ।kArubArugaLaShTe  - Mankutimma ॥ 346 ॥Most of man;s endeavors fall into this category. A coolie who agrees to carry your weight through. He takes it on his shoulders. After walking just four yards, he starts asking how much longer he needs to go. In a haste, he gives up and drops the weight.  - Mankutimma
translation: Most of man;s endeavors fall into this category. A coolie who agrees to carry your weight through. He takes it on his shoulders. After walking just four yards, he starts asking how much longer he needs to go. In a haste, he gives up and drops the weight.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಾರುಬಾರುಗಳಷ್ಟೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hErALu mUTegUliya bEDi hegaloDDi ।bhAravanu nAlku mAroydaShTaroLagE ॥dUravinneShTu enutale Aturipan adaniLise ।kArubArugaLaShTe  - Mankutimma ॥ 346 ॥
kagga: ಹೇರಾಳು ಮೂಟೆಗೂಲಿಯ ಬೇಡಿ ಹೆಗಲೊಡ್ಡಿ ।ಭಾರವನು ನಾಲ್ಕು ಮಾರೊಯ್ದಷ್ಟರೊಳಗೇ ॥ದೂರವಿನ್ನೆಷ್ಟೆನುತಲಾತುರಿಪನ್ ಅದನಿಳಿಸೆ ।ಕಾರುಬಾರುಗಳಷ್ಟೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೬ ॥

content: ರುಚಿಗೊಪ್ಪೆ ರಸನೆಗದು ಶೂಲವಹುದುದರಕ್ಕೆ ।ತ್ವಚೆ ಬೇಳ್ಪ ತಂಗಾಳಿಯಿಂ ಬೇನೆಯೆದೆಗೆ ॥ರಚಿಸಿದವನಿಂತೊಡಲೊಳಿಡೆ ವಿಷಮ ಕುಟಿಲಗಳ ।ಉಚಿತವಾವುದೋ ನಿನಗೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೭ ॥richigoppe rasanegedu shUlavahudu udarakke ।tvache bELpa tangALiyim bEneyedege ॥rachisidavanu intu oDaloLu iDe viShama kuTilagaLa ।uchitavAvudO ninage?  - Mankutimma ॥ 347 ॥God has created the body with parts that have conflicting needs. The tongue likes spicy tasty food which is bad for the tummy. The skin likes cool breeze which is bad for the lungs. You have to decide which one you need to please.  - Mankutimma
translation: God has created the body with parts that have conflicting needs. The tongue likes spicy tasty food which is bad for the tummy. The skin likes cool breeze which is bad for the lungs. You have to decide which one you need to please.  - Mankutimma
title: ಉಚಿತವಾವುದೋ ನಿನಗೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: richigoppe rasanegedu shUlavahudu udarakke ।tvache bELpa tangALiyim bEneyedege ॥rachisidavanu intu oDaloLu iDe viShama kuTilagaLa ।uchitavAvudO ninage?  - Mankutimma ॥ 347 ॥
kagga: ರುಚಿಗೊಪ್ಪೆ ರಸನೆಗದು ಶೂಲವಹುದುದರಕ್ಕೆ ।ತ್ವಚೆ ಬೇಳ್ಪ ತಂಗಾಳಿಯಿಂ ಬೇನೆಯೆದೆಗೆ ॥ರಚಿಸಿದವನಿಂತೊಡಲೊಳಿಡೆ ವಿಷಮ ಕುಟಿಲಗಳ ।ಉಚಿತವಾವುದೋ ನಿನಗೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೭ ॥

content: ಬಾಳಿನೊಳಕಿಚ್ಚು ದೆಸೆದೆಸೆಗುರಿಯ ಚಾಚುತಿರೆ ।ಕಾಲನೆನ್ನುವ ಹುಚ್ಚ ಮಣ್ಣನೆರಚುತಿರೆ ॥ಧೂಳು ಹೊಗೆಗಳ ಹೊರತು ಜಗದಿ ಬೇರಿಲ್ಲದಿರೆ ।ಮೇಲೇನು? ಬೀಳೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೮ ॥bALinoLakichchu desedeseguriya chAchutire ।kAlanennuva huchcha maNNAnerachutire ॥dhULu hogegaLa horatu jagadi bErilladire ।mElEnu? bILEnu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 348 ॥The struggles and passions in life are like flames spreading heat in ten directions. Time is like a fool who is throwing sand at it (fire) to douse it. This whole world seems to be a dance of dust and smoke from this activity. You may rise or you may fall; in this dance, everything seems to be the same.  - Mankutimma
translation: The struggles and passions in life are like flames spreading heat in ten directions. Time is like a fool who is throwing sand at it (fire) to douse it. This whole world seems to be a dance of dust and smoke from this activity. You may rise or you may fall; in this dance, everything seems to be the same.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೇಲೇನು? ಬೀಳೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bALinoLakichchu desedeseguriya chAchutire ।kAlanennuva huchcha maNNAnerachutire ॥dhULu hogegaLa horatu jagadi bErilladire ।mElEnu? bILEnu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 348 ॥
kagga: ಬಾಳಿನೊಳಕಿಚ್ಚು ದೆಸೆದೆಸೆಗುರಿಯ ಚಾಚುತಿರೆ ।ಕಾಲನೆನ್ನುವ ಹುಚ್ಚ ಮಣ್ಣನೆರಚುತಿರೆ ॥ಧೂಳು ಹೊಗೆಗಳ ಹೊರತು ಜಗದಿ ಬೇರಿಲ್ಲದಿರೆ ।ಮೇಲೇನು? ಬೀಳೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೮ ॥

content: ಮಿತ ನಿನ್ನ ಗುಣ ಶಕ್ತಿ, ಮಿತ ನಿನ್ನ ಕರ್ತವ್ಯ ।ಮಿತ ಅತಿಗಳಂತರವ ಕಾಣುವುದೆ ಕಡಿದು ॥ಹಿತವೆನಿಸಿದನಿತೆಸಗು; ದೈವಕುಳಿದುದನು ಬಿಡು ।ಕೃತಿಯಲಿ ದೈವಕಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೯ ॥mita ninna guNa shakti, mita ninna kartavya ।mita atigaLantarava kANuvude kaDidu ॥hitavenisidanitesagu; daivake uLidudanu biDu ।kRutiyali daivakam  - Mankutimma ॥ 349 ॥Limited are your qualities and capabilities. So, limited are your duties as well. To recognize one;s limit is hard and it very easy to confuse it with the limitless possibilities. You must put in as much effort that pleases you (your limit). Stop when it is truly hurting. Leave the rest to God. Let there be His part also in your work.  - Mankutimma
translation: Limited are your qualities and capabilities. So, limited are your duties as well. To recognize one;s limit is hard and it very easy to confuse it with the limitless possibilities. You must put in as much effort that pleases you (your limit). Stop when it is truly hurting. Leave the rest to God. Let there be His part also in your work.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕೃತಿಯಲಿ ದೈವಕಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mita ninna guNa shakti, mita ninna kartavya ।mita atigaLantarava kANuvude kaDidu ॥hitavenisidanitesagu; daivake uLidudanu biDu ।kRutiyali daivakam  - Mankutimma ॥ 349 ॥
kagga: ಮಿತ ನಿನ್ನ ಗುಣ ಶಕ್ತಿ, ಮಿತ ನಿನ್ನ ಕರ್ತವ್ಯ ।ಮಿತ ಅತಿಗಳಂತರವ ಕಾಣುವುದೆ ಕಡಿದು ॥ಹಿತವೆನಿಸಿದನಿತೆಸಗು; ದೈವಕುಳಿದುದನು ಬಿಡು ।ಕೃತಿಯಲಿ ದೈವಕಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೯ ॥

content: ಹೇಳಲಾಗದ ಹಸಿವು, ತಾಳಾಲಾಗದ ತಪನೆ ।ಆಳಾದಲಿ ನಾಚನಾಗಿಪ ಚಿಂತೆಯೂಟೆ ॥ಗಾಳಿಯೆತ್ತತ್ತಣಿನೊ ತಂದೀವ ಸೋಂಕು  - ಇವೆ ।ಬಾಳ ಸಾಮಗ್ರಿಯಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೦ ॥hELalAgada hasivu, tALalAgada tapane ।ALadali nAchanAgipa chinteya UTe ॥gALiyu ettattaNino tandIva sOnku ।bALa sAmagriyala  - Mankutimma ॥ 350 ॥What do we have in life? So much hunger that can not be described. Restlessness that is har to endure. Embarrassing thoughts buried deep in our minds. Desires that the wind brings along from somewhere. These are our facts of life and how can we be happy with these?  - Mankutimma
translation: What do we have in life? So much hunger that can not be described. Restlessness that is har to endure. Embarrassing thoughts buried deep in our minds. Desires that the wind brings along from somewhere. These are our facts of life and how can we be happy with these?  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಾಳ ಸಾಮಗ್ರಿಯಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hELalAgada hasivu, tALalAgada tapane ।ALadali nAchanAgipa chinteya UTe ॥gALiyu ettattaNino tandIva sOnku ।bALa sAmagriyala  - Mankutimma ॥ 350 ॥
kagga: ಹೇಳಲಾಗದ ಹಸಿವು, ತಾಳಾಲಾಗದ ತಪನೆ ।ಆಳಾದಲಿ ನಾಚನಾಗಿಪ ಚಿಂತೆಯೂಟೆ ॥ಗಾಳಿಯೆತ್ತತ್ತಣಿನೊ ತಂದೀವ ಸೋಂಕು  - ಇವೆ ।ಬಾಳ ಸಾಮಗ್ರಿಯಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೦ ॥

content: ಹುದುಗಿಹುದದೆಲ್ಲಿ ಪರಮಾತ್ಮನೀ ತನುವಿನಲಿ? ।ಹೃದಯದೊಳೊ ಮೆದುಳಿನೊಳೊ ಹುಬ್ಬಿನಿರುಕಿನೊಳೋ ॥ಇದನೆನಿತೊ ತರ್ಕಿಸಿಹರ್; ಎನ್ನೆಣಿಕೆಯನು ಕೇಳು ।ಉದರವಾತ್ಮನಿವಾಸ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೧ ॥hudugi ihudu adu elli paramAtmanI tanuvinali? ।hRudayadoLo meduLinoLo hubbina irukina oLO? ॥idanu enito tarkisihar; enneNikeyanu kELu ।udara AtmanivAsa  - Mankutimma ॥ 351 ॥Where has God hidden in this body? In the heart? or brain? or where the eyebrows meet? Many people have debated it before; Listen to my theory  - stomach is where He lives.  - Mankutimma
translation: Where has God hidden in this body? In the heart? or brain? or where the eyebrows meet? Many people have debated it before; Listen to my theory  - stomach is where He lives.  - Mankutimma
title: ಉದರವಾತ್ಮನಿವಾಸ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hudugi ihudu adu elli paramAtmanI tanuvinali? ।hRudayadoLo meduLinoLo hubbina irukina oLO? ॥idanu enito tarkisihar; enneNikeyanu kELu ।udara AtmanivAsa  - Mankutimma ॥ 351 ॥
kagga: ಹುದುಗಿಹುದದೆಲ್ಲಿ ಪರಮಾತ್ಮನೀ ತನುವಿನಲಿ? ।ಹೃದಯದೊಳೊ ಮೆದುಳಿನೊಳೊ ಹುಬ್ಬಿನಿರುಕಿನೊಳೋ ॥ಇದನೆನಿತೊ ತರ್ಕಿಸಿಹರ್; ಎನ್ನೆಣಿಕೆಯನು ಕೇಳು ।ಉದರವಾತ್ಮನಿವಾಸ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೧ ॥

content: ಹೊಟ್ಟೆರಾಯನ ನಿತ್ಯದಟ್ಟಹಾಸವೊ ಬಾಳೊ ।ಧೃಷ್ಟ ಧಣಿಯೂಳಿಗಕೆ ಸೊಟ್ಟು ಮೈಬಾಗು ॥ಹಿಟ್ಟಿಗಗಲಿದ ಬಾಯಿ, ಬಟ್ಟೆಗೊಡ್ಡಿದ ಕೈಯಿ ।ಇಷ್ಟೆ ನಮ್ಮೆಲ್ಲ ಕಥೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೨ ॥hoTTerAyana nityadaTTahAsavo bALu ।dhRuShTa dhaNiyULigake soTTu maibAgu ॥hiTTigagalida bAyi, baTTegoDDida kaiyi ।iShTe nammella kathe  - Mankutimma ॥ 352 ॥Our life is nothing but the daily antics of the Stomach. Because of this Stomach, we are ready to bend our body (back) to work for a wealthy master. Our mouth opens as soon as it sees food (for the sake of the Stomach). To keep the Stomach filled, we beg for clothes from the master. The hand automatically stretches out for the alms. Thus is all our stories.  - Mankutimma
translation: Our life is nothing but the daily antics of the Stomach. Because of this Stomach, we are ready to bend our body (back) to work for a wealthy master. Our mouth opens as soon as it sees food (for the sake of the Stomach). To keep the Stomach filled, we beg for clothes from the master. The hand automatically stretches out for the alms. Thus is all our stories.  - Mankutimma
title: ಇಷ್ಟೆ ನಮ್ಮೆಲ್ಲ ಕಥೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hoTTerAyana nityadaTTahAsavo bALu ।dhRuShTa dhaNiyULigake soTTu maibAgu ॥hiTTigagalida bAyi, baTTegoDDida kaiyi ।iShTe nammella kathe  - Mankutimma ॥ 352 ॥
kagga: ಹೊಟ್ಟೆರಾಯನ ನಿತ್ಯದಟ್ಟಹಾಸವೊ ಬಾಳೊ ।ಧೃಷ್ಟ ಧಣಿಯೂಳಿಗಕೆ ಸೊಟ್ಟು ಮೈಬಾಗು ॥ಹಿಟ್ಟಿಗಗಲಿದ ಬಾಯಿ, ಬಟ್ಟೆಗೊಡ್ಡಿದ ಕೈಯಿ ।ಇಷ್ಟೆ ನಮ್ಮೆಲ್ಲ ಕಥೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೨ ॥

content: ಏನಾದೊಡೇನು? ನೀನೆಲ್ಲಿ ಪೋದೊಡಮೇನು? ।ಪ್ರಾಣವೇಂ ಮಾನವೇನಭ್ಯುದಯವೇನು? ॥ಮಾನವಾತೀತವೊಂದೆಲ್ಲವನು ನುಂಗುವುದು ।ಜಾನಿಸಿದನಾವಗಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೩ ॥Enu AdoDe Enu? nInelli pOdoDame Enu? ।prANavEM mAnavEm abhyudayavEnu? ॥mAnavAItavu ondu ellavanu nunguvudu ।jAnisu idan Avagam  - Mankutimma ॥ 353 ॥Many interesting things may happen. You may go to many places. You may be alive, well respected and prosperous. What good are all this when they are all controlled by something beyond all human understanding (God) and will finally finish them all. Always keep thinking about that.  - Mankutimma
translation: Many interesting things may happen. You may go to many places. You may be alive, well respected and prosperous. What good are all this when they are all controlled by something beyond all human understanding (God) and will finally finish them all. Always keep thinking about that.  - Mankutimma
title: ಜಾನಿಸಿದನಾವಗಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Enu AdoDe Enu? nInelli pOdoDame Enu? ।prANavEM mAnavEm abhyudayavEnu? ॥mAnavAItavu ondu ellavanu nunguvudu ।jAnisu idan Avagam  - Mankutimma ॥ 353 ॥
kagga: ಏನಾದೊಡೇನು? ನೀನೆಲ್ಲಿ ಪೋದೊಡಮೇನು? ।ಪ್ರಾಣವೇಂ ಮಾನವೇನಭ್ಯುದಯವೇನು? ॥ಮಾನವಾತೀತವೊಂದೆಲ್ಲವನು ನುಂಗುವುದು ।ಜಾನಿಸಿದನಾವಗಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೩ ॥

content: ಲೋಕವೆಲ್ಲವು ದೈವಲೀಲೆಯಂಬರೆ, ಪೇಳಿ ।ಶೋಕ ಸೋಂಕಿರದೊಡಾ ಲೀಲೆ ನೀರಸವೇಂ? ॥ಮೂಕಂಗೆ ಕಳ್ ಕುಡಿಸಿ ಚೇಳ್ ಕುಟುಕಿಪಾಟವಿದು ।ಏಕಪಕ್ಷದ ಲೀಲೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೪ ॥lOkavellavu daivaleeleyembare, pELi ।shOka sOnku iradoDA lIle nIrasavEm? ॥mUkange kaL kuDisi chEL kuTukipa ATavidu ।EkapakShada lEle  - Mankutimma ॥ 354 ॥We say that the whole world is a divine game. In this game, there is no loser and hence there must be no sorrow. Even though there is no loser, the game is still interesting. It is like getting a dumb person (who cannot speak) drunk and letting a scorpion bite him. He can not tell any one about his pain. But is jumping around. People think he is jumping/dancing because of the liquor and laugh at him. Only God is amusing himself.  - Mankutimma
translation: We say that the whole world is a divine game. In this game, there is no loser and hence there must be no sorrow. Even though there is no loser, the game is still interesting. It is like getting a dumb person (who cannot speak) drunk and letting a scorpion bite him. He can not tell any one about his pain. But is jumping around. People think he is jumping/dancing because of the liquor and laugh at him. Only God is amusing himself.  - Mankutimma
title: ಏಕಪಕ್ಷದ ಲೀಲೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: lOkavellavu daivaleeleyembare, pELi ।shOka sOnku iradoDA lIle nIrasavEm? ॥mUkange kaL kuDisi chEL kuTukipa ATavidu ।EkapakShada lEle  - Mankutimma ॥ 354 ॥
kagga: ಲೋಕವೆಲ್ಲವು ದೈವಲೀಲೆಯಂಬರೆ, ಪೇಳಿ ।ಶೋಕ ಸೋಂಕಿರದೊಡಾ ಲೀಲೆ ನೀರಸವೇಂ? ॥ಮೂಕಂಗೆ ಕಳ್ ಕುಡಿಸಿ ಚೇಳ್ ಕುಟುಕಿಪಾಟವಿದು ।ಏಕಪಕ್ಷದ ಲೀಲೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪೪ ॥

content: ಗುಣಿಗುಣಿಸಿ ತಿಣುಕುತ್ತ ಹೆಣಗಾಡಿ ಫಲವೇನು ।ಗಣನೆಗೆಟುಕದದೊಂದಚಿಂತ್ಯವೆತ್ತಲೊ ತಾನ್ ।ಅಣಗಿರ್ದು ನಿನ್ನೆಲ್ಲ ಗಣಿತಗಳನಣಕಿಪುದು ।ದಣಿಯದಾ ವಿಧಿ ವಿಕಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೫ ॥guNiguNisi tiNukutta heNagADi phalavEnu ।gaNAnege eTukada ondu achintyavu ettalo tAn ॥aNagirdu ninnella gaNitagaLanu aNakipudu ।daNiyadA vidhi vikaTa  - Mankutimma ॥ 355 ॥What is the use of calculating your wealth, devising new ways to earn, working hard endlessly? There is a force hidden somewhere that you can not imagine who will make fun of all your calculations. Providence is working tirelessly to make fun of your efforts.  - Mankutimma
translation: What is the use of calculating your wealth, devising new ways to earn, working hard endlessly? There is a force hidden somewhere that you can not imagine who will make fun of all your calculations. Providence is working tirelessly to make fun of your efforts.  - Mankutimma
title: ದಣಿಯದಾ ವಿಧಿ ವಿಕಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: guNiguNisi tiNukutta heNagADi phalavEnu ।gaNAnege eTukada ondu achintyavu ettalo tAn ॥aNagirdu ninnella gaNitagaLanu aNakipudu ।daNiyadA vidhi vikaTa  - Mankutimma ॥ 355 ॥
kagga: ಗುಣಿಗುಣಿಸಿ ತಿಣುಕುತ್ತ ಹೆಣಗಾಡಿ ಫಲವೇನು ।ಗಣನೆಗೆಟುಕದದೊಂದಚಿಂತ್ಯವೆತ್ತಲೊ ತಾನ್ ।ಅಣಗಿರ್ದು ನಿನ್ನೆಲ್ಲ ಗಣಿತಗಳನಣಕಿಪುದು ।ದಣಿಯದಾ ವಿಧಿ ವಿಕಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೫ ॥

content: ಆಶೆ ಬಲೆಯನು ಬೀಸಿ, ನಿನ್ನ ತನ್ನೆಡೆಗೆಳೆದು ।ಘಾಸಿ ನೀಂ ಬಡುತ ಬಾಯ್ಬಿಡಲೋರೆ ನೋಡಿ ॥ಮೈಸವರಿ ಕಾಲನೆಡವಿಸಿ, ಗುಟ್ಟಿನಲಿ ನಗುವ ।ಮೋಸದಾಟವೊ ದೈವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೬ ॥Ashe baleyanu bIsi, ninna tanneDege eLedu ।ghAsi nIm baDuta bAybiDalu Ore nODi ॥maisavari kAlnu eDavisi, guTTinali naguva ।mOsada ATavo daiva  - Mankutimma ॥ 356 ॥Fate will pull you towards it by using desire as his bait. When you are wounded and tired, it sees your from the corner of its eyes, give a pleasant look, pats your back as if to give you support. In reality is is only setting you up to trip in your next step. It is secretly smiling at you after finishing you in this devious game.  - Mankutimma
translation: Fate will pull you towards it by using desire as his bait. When you are wounded and tired, it sees your from the corner of its eyes, give a pleasant look, pats your back as if to give you support. In reality is is only setting you up to trip in your next step. It is secretly smiling at you after finishing you in this devious game.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೋಸದಾಟವೊ ದೈವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Ashe baleyanu bIsi, ninna tanneDege eLedu ।ghAsi nIm baDuta bAybiDalu Ore nODi ॥maisavari kAlnu eDavisi, guTTinali naguva ।mOsada ATavo daiva  - Mankutimma ॥ 356 ॥
kagga: ಆಶೆ ಬಲೆಯನು ಬೀಸಿ, ನಿನ್ನ ತನ್ನೆಡೆಗೆಳೆದು ।ಘಾಸಿ ನೀಂ ಬಡುತ ಬಾಯ್ಬಿಡಲೋರೆ ನೋಡಿ ॥ಮೈಸವರಿ ಕಾಲನೆಡವಿಸಿ, ಗುಟ್ಟಿನಲಿ ನಗುವ ।ಮೋಸದಾಟವೊ ದೈವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೬ ॥

content: ಧಾತನೆಣ್ಣೆಯಗಾಣದೆಳ್ಳುಕಾಳಲೆ ನೀನು? ।ಆತನೆಲ್ಲರನರೆವನ್; ಆರನುಂ ಬಿಡನು ॥ಆತುರಂಗೊಳದೆ ವಿಸ್ಮೃತಿಬಡದುಪೇಕ್ಷಿಸದೆ ।ಘಾತಿಸುವನೆಲ್ಲರನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೭ ॥dhAtana eNNEya gANada eLLu kALu ale nInu? ।Atanu ellaran arevan; Aranum biDanu ॥AturangoLAde vismRutibaDade upEkShisade ।ghAtisuvanu ellaranu  - Mankutimma ॥ 357 ॥You are a mere sesame seed lined up for crushing in the oil mill of the Creator. He will crush every one. He will not spare any one. He will not hurry. Neither will he forget. He will not ignore his work (of crushing you). He will get to every one.  - Mankutimma
translation: You are a mere sesame seed lined up for crushing in the oil mill of the Creator. He will crush every one. He will not spare any one. He will not hurry. Neither will he forget. He will not ignore his work (of crushing you). He will get to every one.  - Mankutimma
title: ಘಾತಿಸುವನೆಲ್ಲರನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dhAtana eNNEya gANada eLLu kALu ale nInu? ।Atanu ellaran arevan; Aranum biDanu ॥AturangoLAde vismRutibaDade upEkShisade ।ghAtisuvanu ellaranu  - Mankutimma ॥ 357 ॥
kagga: ಧಾತನೆಣ್ಣೆಯಗಾಣದೆಳ್ಳುಕಾಳಲೆ ನೀನು? ।ಆತನೆಲ್ಲರನರೆವನ್; ಆರನುಂ ಬಿಡನು ॥ಆತುರಂಗೊಳದೆ ವಿಸ್ಮೃತಿಬಡದುಪೇಕ್ಷಿಸದೆ ।ಘಾತಿಸುವನೆಲ್ಲರನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೭ ॥

content: ಇದು ನಡೆಯಲಿಲ್ಲವದು ನಿಂತುಹೋಯಿತೆನುತ್ತ ।ಎದೆಯುಬ್ಬೆಗವನೊಂದಿ ಕುದಿಯುತಿಹುದೇಕೋ? ॥ಅಧಿಕಾರಪಟ್ಟವನು ನಿನಗಾರು ಕಟ್ಟಿಹರು? ।ವಿಧಿಯ ಮೇಸ್ತ್ರಿಯೇ ನೀನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೮ ॥idu naDeyalilla adu nintu hOyitu enutta ।ede ubbegavanu ondi kudiyuta ihudu EkO? ॥adhikArapaTTavanu ninagAru kaTTiharu? ।vidhiya mEstriyE nInu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 358 ॥Many a work in our daily schedule will not pan out the way we want it to. Some don;t progress. Others may have have come to a full stop. Why does your heart get excited and boil? Who gave you the role of setting things right in this world? Are you the mason appointed by God to run this world?  - Mankutimma
translation: Many a work in our daily schedule will not pan out the way we want it to. Some don;t progress. Others may have have come to a full stop. Why does your heart get excited and boil? Who gave you the role of setting things right in this world? Are you the mason appointed by God to run this world?  - Mankutimma
title: ವಿಧಿಯ ಮೇಸ್ತ್ರಿಯೇ ನೀನು?
transliteration: idu naDeyalilla adu nintu hOyitu enutta ।ede ubbegavanu ondi kudiyuta ihudu EkO? ॥adhikArapaTTavanu ninagAru kaTTiharu? ।vidhiya mEstriyE nInu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 358 ॥
kagga: ಇದು ನಡೆಯಲಿಲ್ಲವದು ನಿಂತುಹೋಯಿತೆನುತ್ತ ।ಎದೆಯುಬ್ಬೆಗವನೊಂದಿ ಕುದಿಯುತಿಹುದೇಕೋ? ॥ಅಧಿಕಾರಪಟ್ಟವನು ನಿನಗಾರು ಕಟ್ಟಿಹರು? ।ವಿಧಿಯ ಮೇಸ್ತ್ರಿಯೇ ನೀನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೮ ॥

content: ಸೊಟ್ಟುಗಳ ನೆಟ್ಟಗಾಗಿಪ ಯತ್ನ ಲೋಕದಲಿ ।ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಾದಿಯಿನಾಗುತಿಹುದು; ಫಲವೇನು? ॥ಹೊಟ್ಟೆ ನೋವಿಳಿಯುತಿರೆ ರಟ್ಟೆ ನೋವೆನ್ನುವುದು ।ಮಟ್ಟಸವೆ ತಿರೆಹರಿವು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೯ ॥soTugaLa neTTage Agipa yatna lOkadali ।sRuShTi Adiyan Aguta ihudu; phalavEnu? ॥hoTTe nOvu iLiyuta ire raTTe nOvu ennuvudu ।maTTasave tireharivu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 359 ॥Even since the beginning of the creation, people are trying to straighten the crooked things in this nature. What is the result? If the stomach ache subsides, the arm starts hurting. It is like trying to fill a hole in earth by digging elsewhere.  - Mankutimma
translation: Even since the beginning of the creation, people are trying to straighten the crooked things in this nature. What is the result? If the stomach ache subsides, the arm starts hurting. It is like trying to fill a hole in earth by digging elsewhere.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಟ್ಟಸವೆ ತಿರೆಹರಿವು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: soTugaLa neTTage Agipa yatna lOkadali ।sRuShTi Adiyan Aguta ihudu; phalavEnu? ॥hoTTe nOvu iLiyuta ire raTTe nOvu ennuvudu ।maTTasave tireharivu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 359 ॥
kagga: ಸೊಟ್ಟುಗಳ ನೆಟ್ಟಗಾಗಿಪ ಯತ್ನ ಲೋಕದಲಿ ।ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಾದಿಯಿನಾಗುತಿಹುದು; ಫಲವೇನು? ॥ಹೊಟ್ಟೆ ನೋವಿಳಿಯುತಿರೆ ರಟ್ಟೆ ನೋವೆನ್ನುವುದು ।ಮಟ್ಟಸವೆ ತಿರೆಹರಿವು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫೯ ॥

content: ಇನ್ನೇನು ಮತ್ತೇನು ಗತಿಯೆಂದು ಬೆದರಿದರು ।ನಿನ್ನ ಕೈಯೊಳಗಿಹುದೆ ವಿಧಿಯ ಲೆಕ್ಕಣಿಕೆ? ॥ಕಣ್ಣಿಗೆಟುಕದೆ ಸಾಗುತಿಹುದು ದೈವದ ಸಂಚು ।ತಣ್ಣಾಗಿರಿಸಾತ್ಮವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೦ ॥innEnu mattEnu gatiyendu bedarade iru ।ninna kai oLage ihude vidhiya lekkaNike? ॥kaNNige eTukade sAguta ihudu daivada sanchu ।taNNAge irisu Atmavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 360 ॥Don;t get restless by thinking about the future. Many things are not under your control. You will not know what fate has in store for you. His plan is something that you can not see. Placate your mind and be happy. (after putting your best efforts at any endeavor)  - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t get restless by thinking about the future. Many things are not under your control. You will not know what fate has in store for you. His plan is something that you can not see. Placate your mind and be happy. (after putting your best efforts at any endeavor)  - Mankutimma
title: ತಣ್ಣಾಗಿರಿಸಾತ್ಮವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: innEnu mattEnu gatiyendu bedarade iru ।ninna kai oLage ihude vidhiya lekkaNike? ॥kaNNige eTukade sAguta ihudu daivada sanchu ।taNNAge irisu Atmavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 360 ॥
kagga: ಇನ್ನೇನು ಮತ್ತೇನು ಗತಿಯೆಂದು ಬೆದರಿದರು ।ನಿನ್ನ ಕೈಯೊಳಗಿಹುದೆ ವಿಧಿಯ ಲೆಕ್ಕಣಿಕೆ? ॥ಕಣ್ಣಿಗೆಟುಕದೆ ಸಾಗುತಿಹುದು ದೈವದ ಸಂಚು ।ತಣ್ಣಾಗಿರಿಸಾತ್ಮವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೦ ॥

content: ಎಲ್ಲಿಯೋ ವಿಧಿಯ ಗೂಢದ ಕರ್ಮಶಾಲೆಯಲಿ ।ನಿಲ್ಲದಾಡುತ್ತಿಹುದು ಯಂತ್ರ ಕೀಲುಗಳು ॥ಎಲ್ಲಾಗುಹೋಗುಗಳುಮಾ ಚಕ್ರಗತಿಯಂತೆ ।ತಲ್ಲಣವು ನಿನಗೇಕೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೧ ॥elliyO vidhiya gUDada karmashAleyali ।nillade ADutta ihudu yantra kIlugaLu ॥ella Agu hOgugaLam A chakragatiyante ।tallaNavu ninagEke?  - Mankutimma ॥ 361 ॥Some where in Providence;s secret workshop there are machines and fixtures that work non-stop. All day-to-day activities are paced by that machines. Why are you becoming restless?  - Mankutimma
translation: Some where in Providence;s secret workshop there are machines and fixtures that work non-stop. All day-to-day activities are paced by that machines. Why are you becoming restless?  - Mankutimma
title: ತಲ್ಲಣವು ನಿನಗೇಕೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: elliyO vidhiya gUDada karmashAleyali ।nillade ADutta ihudu yantra kIlugaLu ॥ella Agu hOgugaLam A chakragatiyante ।tallaNavu ninagEke?  - Mankutimma ॥ 361 ॥
kagga: ಎಲ್ಲಿಯೋ ವಿಧಿಯ ಗೂಢದ ಕರ್ಮಶಾಲೆಯಲಿ ।ನಿಲ್ಲದಾಡುತ್ತಿಹುದು ಯಂತ್ರ ಕೀಲುಗಳು ॥ಎಲ್ಲಾಗುಹೋಗುಗಳುಮಾ ಚಕ್ರಗತಿಯಂತೆ ।ತಲ್ಲಣವು ನಿನಗೇಕೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೧ ॥

content: ಕಾಲನದಿಯಲಿ ನಮ್ಮ ಬಾಳದೋಣಿಯು ಮೆರೆದು ।ತೇಲುತ್ತ ಭಯವ ಕಾಣದೆ ಸಾಗುತಿರಲು ॥ಗಾಳಿಯಾವಗಮೊ ಬಂದೆತ್ತಣಿನೊ ಬೀಸುತ್ತ ।ಮೇಲ ಕೀಳಾಗಿಪುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೨ ॥kAlanadiyali namma bALadONiyu meredu ।tElutta bhayava kANade sAguta iralu ॥gALi yAvagamo bandu ettaNino bIsuta ।mEla kELu Agipudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 362 ॥In this river of time, our boat of life is sailing well. We are very happy. We know no fear. But a gust of wind from somewhere can wipe us off and topple us any time. Everything that was held high will have to lay low then.  - Mankutimma
translation: In this river of time, our boat of life is sailing well. We are very happy. We know no fear. But a gust of wind from somewhere can wipe us off and topple us any time. Everything that was held high will have to lay low then.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೇಲ ಕೀಳಾಗಿಪುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kAlanadiyali namma bALadONiyu meredu ।tElutta bhayava kANade sAguta iralu ॥gALi yAvagamo bandu ettaNino bIsuta ।mEla kELu Agipudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 362 ॥
kagga: ಕಾಲನದಿಯಲಿ ನಮ್ಮ ಬಾಳದೋಣಿಯು ಮೆರೆದು ।ತೇಲುತ್ತ ಭಯವ ಕಾಣದೆ ಸಾಗುತಿರಲು ॥ಗಾಳಿಯಾವಗಮೊ ಬಂದೆತ್ತಣಿನೊ ಬೀಸುತ್ತ ।ಮೇಲ ಕೀಳಾಗಿಪುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೨ ॥

content: ಆತುರತೆಯೇನಿರದು ವಿಧಿಯಯಂತ್ರಚಲನೆಯಲಿ ।ಭೀತತೆಯುಮಿರದು, ವಿಸ್ಮೃತಿಯುಮಿರದೆಂದುಂ ॥ಸಾಧಿಪುದದೆಲ್ಲವನು ನಿಲದೆ, ತಪ್ಪದೆ, ಬಿಡದೆ ।ಕಾತರತೆ ನಿನಗೇಕೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೩ ॥Aturate Enu iradu vidhiya yantrachalaneyali ।bhItateyum iradu, vismRutiyum iradu endum ॥sAdhipudu ellavanu nilade, tappade, biDade ।kAtarate ninagEke?  - Mankutimma ॥ 363 ॥There is no anxiety (or urgency) in the running of the Providence machine. No fear. No lapse (or forgetting) ever. It will achieve and outlast everything without fail, without letting off. Why do you get restless?  - Mankutimma
translation: There is no anxiety (or urgency) in the running of the Providence machine. No fear. No lapse (or forgetting) ever. It will achieve and outlast everything without fail, without letting off. Why do you get restless?  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಾತರತೆ ನಿನಗೇಕೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Aturate Enu iradu vidhiya yantrachalaneyali ।bhItateyum iradu, vismRutiyum iradu endum ॥sAdhipudu ellavanu nilade, tappade, biDade ।kAtarate ninagEke?  - Mankutimma ॥ 363 ॥
kagga: ಆತುರತೆಯೇನಿರದು ವಿಧಿಯಯಂತ್ರಚಲನೆಯಲಿ ।ಭೀತತೆಯುಮಿರದು, ವಿಸ್ಮೃತಿಯುಮಿರದೆಂದುಂ ॥ಸಾಧಿಪುದದೆಲ್ಲವನು ನಿಲದೆ, ತಪ್ಪದೆ, ಬಿಡದೆ ।ಕಾತರತೆ ನಿನಗೇಕೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೩ ॥

content: ನಟಿಪುದೊಮ್ಮೊಮ್ಮೆ ಮರುಕವ ದೈವ ಮನುಜರಲಿ ।ಕಟುಕನಿನಿಸಕ್ಕಿಯನು ಹಕ್ಕಿಗೆರೆಚುವವೋಲ್ ॥ತುಟಿ ಸುಟ್ಟು ರಸನೆಗೆಟುಕದ ಕೀರು ದೈವಕೃಪೆ ।ತಟವಟವೊ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿದಯೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೪ ॥naTipudu ommomme marukava daiva manujarali ।kaTukanu inisu akkiyanu hakkige erechuva vOl ॥tuTi suTTu rasanege eTukada kIru daivakRupe ।taTavaTavo sRuShTidaye  - Mankutimma ॥ 364 ॥Every once in a while, Providence acts as if it is compassionate with us. Just like a tyrant throws grains at the bird (not with the intent to feed, but to capture it). His gifts is like milk that touch (and warms) the lips but does not reach the toungue. The favours showered on you by Creation is a mere illusion.  - Mankutimma
translation: Every once in a while, Providence acts as if it is compassionate with us. Just like a tyrant throws grains at the bird (not with the intent to feed, but to capture it). His gifts is like milk that touch (and warms) the lips but does not reach the toungue. The favours showered on you by Creation is a mere illusion.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಟವಟವೊ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿದಯೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: naTipudu ommomme marukava daiva manujarali ।kaTukanu inisu akkiyanu hakkige erechuva vOl ॥tuTi suTTu rasanege eTukada kIru daivakRupe ।taTavaTavo sRuShTidaye  - Mankutimma ॥ 364 ॥
kagga: ನಟಿಪುದೊಮ್ಮೊಮ್ಮೆ ಮರುಕವ ದೈವ ಮನುಜರಲಿ ।ಕಟುಕನಿನಿಸಕ್ಕಿಯನು ಹಕ್ಕಿಗೆರೆಚುವವೋಲ್ ॥ತುಟಿ ಸುಟ್ಟು ರಸನೆಗೆಟುಕದ ಕೀರು ದೈವಕೃಪೆ ।ತಟವಟವೊ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿದಯೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೪ ॥

content: ಅದು ಒಳಿತು ಇದು ಕೆಟ್ಟುದೆಂಬ ಹಟ ನಿನಗೇಕೆ? । ಹೊದಿಸುವುದು ದೈವವೆಲ್ಲಕಮೊಂದು ತೆರೆಯ ॥ ಸೊದೆಯ ಸೌರಭ ನಂಜುಬಟ್ಟಲಲಿ ತೋರೀತು । ವಿಧಿಯ ಬಗೆಯೆಂತಿಹುದೋ! – ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೫ ॥adu oLitu idu keTTudemba haTa ninagEke? । hodisuvudu daivavellakamondu tereya ॥ sodeya saurabha nanjubaTTalali tOrItu । vidhiya bage entu ihudO! – Mankutimma ॥ 365 ॥ Why are you so hardlined branding some things as good and some as bad? Fate has put a veil on everything so that you will never know the true form of anything. A bowl of poison may bear the smell of elixir. Such are the ways of illusion created by Creation – Mankutimma
translation: Why are you so hardlined branding some things as good and some as bad? Fate has put a veil on everything so that you will never know the true form of anything. A bowl of poison may bear the smell of elixir. Such are the ways of illusion created by Creation – Mankutimma
title: ವಿಧಿಯ ಬಗೆಯೆಂತಿಹುದೋ! – ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: adu oLitu idu keTTudemba haTa ninagEke? । hodisuvudu daivavellakamondu tereya ॥ sodeya saurabha nanjubaTTalali tOrItu । vidhiya bage entu ihudO! – Mankutimma ॥ 365 ॥
kagga: ಅದು ಒಳಿತು ಇದು ಕೆಟ್ಟುದೆಂಬ ಹಟ ನಿನಗೇಕೆ? । ಹೊದಿಸುವುದು ದೈವವೆಲ್ಲಕಮೊಂದು ತೆರೆಯ ॥ ಸೊದೆಯ ಸೌರಭ ನಂಜುಬಟ್ಟಲಲಿ ತೋರೀತು । ವಿಧಿಯ ಬಗೆಯೆಂತಿಹುದೋ! – ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೫ ॥

content: ಗ್ರಹಗತಿಯ ತಿದ್ದುವನೆ ಜೋಯಿಸನು ಜಾತಕದಿ? ।ವಿಹಿತವಾಗಿಹುದದರ ಗತಿ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ವಿಧಿಯಿಂ ॥ಸಹಿಸಿದಲ್ಲದೆ ಮುಗಿಯದಾವ ದಶೆ ಬಂದೊಡಂ ।ಸಹನೆ ವಜ್ರದ ಕವಚ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೬ ॥grahagatiya tidduvane jOyisanu jAtakadi? ।vihita Agi ihudu adara gati sRuShTi vidhiyim ॥sahisidallade mugiyadAva dashe bandoDam ।sahane vajrada kavacha  - Mankutimma ॥ 366 ॥Can the astrologer change your fate by fudging your horoscope? The movement of the planets follow a definite rule (independent of the astrologer). (If you believe that the planets have an effect on you, then) there is no escaping from effects the of fate in your life. One has to simply endure it. While doing so, patience is like a diamond (impregnable) armor.  - Mankutimma
translation: Can the astrologer change your fate by fudging your horoscope? The movement of the planets follow a definite rule (independent of the astrologer). (If you believe that the planets have an effect on you, then) there is no escaping from effects the of fate in your life. One has to simply endure it. While doing so, patience is like a diamond (impregnable) armor.  - Mankutimma
title: ವಿಧಿಯ ಬಗೆಯೆಂತಿಹುದೋ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: grahagatiya tidduvane jOyisanu jAtakadi? ।vihita Agi ihudu adara gati sRuShTi vidhiyim ॥sahisidallade mugiyadAva dashe bandoDam ।sahane vajrada kavacha  - Mankutimma ॥ 366 ॥
kagga: ಗ್ರಹಗತಿಯ ತಿದ್ದುವನೆ ಜೋಯಿಸನು ಜಾತಕದಿ? ।ವಿಹಿತವಾಗಿಹುದದರ ಗತಿ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ವಿಧಿಯಿಂ ॥ಸಹಿಸಿದಲ್ಲದೆ ಮುಗಿಯದಾವ ದಶೆ ಬಂದೊಡಂ ।ಸಹನೆ ವಜ್ರದ ಕವಚ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೬ ॥

content: ಧಾರಿಣಿಯ ವಾಸಿಗಳ್ಗಿಹುದೊಂದು ಹಿತವಾರ್ತೆ ।ಆರಯ್ವುದಾರ್ತರ್ ಅತ್ಯಾರರಾಪದವ ॥ರೌರವಿಗೆ ಹಿತ ಮಹಾರೌರವಿಯ ಗೋಳುದನಿ ।ನಾರಕದೊಳುದುಪಾಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೭ ॥dhAriNiya vAsigaLge ihudu ondu hitavArte ।Arayvudu Artar ati Artar Apadava ॥rauravige hita mahArauraviya gOLudani ।nArakada oLu adu upAya  - Mankutimma ॥ 367 ॥There is one good news for the earthlings. There is one way not to be sad in this world. When one is sad, look at people who are more sad. When you are living in hell, look at people living in worse hell. Their plights will make one feel fortunate about his own state of living.  - Mankutimma
translation: There is one good news for the earthlings. There is one way not to be sad in this world. When one is sad, look at people who are more sad. When you are living in hell, look at people living in worse hell. Their plights will make one feel fortunate about his own state of living.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಾರಕದೊಳುದುಪಾಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dhAriNiya vAsigaLge ihudu ondu hitavArte ।Arayvudu Artar ati Artar Apadava ॥rauravige hita mahArauraviya gOLudani ।nArakada oLu adu upAya  - Mankutimma ॥ 367 ॥
kagga: ಧಾರಿಣಿಯ ವಾಸಿಗಳ್ಗಿಹುದೊಂದು ಹಿತವಾರ್ತೆ ।ಆರಯ್ವುದಾರ್ತರ್ ಅತ್ಯಾರರಾಪದವ ॥ರೌರವಿಗೆ ಹಿತ ಮಹಾರೌರವಿಯ ಗೋಳುದನಿ ।ನಾರಕದೊಳುದುಪಾಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೭ ॥

content: ಮುಕ್ಕೋಟಿ ದೇವತೆಗಳಾಳುತಿಹ ಲೋಕದಲಿ ।ದಿಕ್ಕುಕಾಣದೆ ಜೀವಿಯಲೆಯುವುದಚ್ಚರಿಯೇಂ? ॥ಒಕ್ಕಟನೊಡೆಯರೇ ಕಲಿಯದಿರೆ ನಮ್ಮ ಗತಿ- ।ಗಿಕ್ಕಟ್ಟು ತಪ್ಪುವುದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೮ ॥mukkoTi dEvategaLu ALuta iha lOkadali ।dikkukANade jIvi aleyuvudu achchariyEm? ॥okkaTTan oDeyarE kaliyade ire namma gatige ।ikkaTTu tappuvude?  - Mankutimma ॥ 368 ॥The world is run by three crore Gods (as per popular theology). Then why is man wandering aimlessly? Should he not be very happy with so many care-takers? Is it surprising? When the lords themselves don;t have unity, then how can the followers escape such a fate?  - Mankutimma
translation: The world is run by three crore Gods (as per popular theology). Then why is man wandering aimlessly? Should he not be very happy with so many care-takers? Is it surprising? When the lords themselves don;t have unity, then how can the followers escape such a fate?  - Mankutimma
title: ಗತಿಗಿಕ್ಕಟ್ಟು ತಪ್ಪುವುದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mukkoTi dEvategaLu ALuta iha lOkadali ।dikkukANade jIvi aleyuvudu achchariyEm? ॥okkaTTan oDeyarE kaliyade ire namma gatige ।ikkaTTu tappuvude?  - Mankutimma ॥ 368 ॥
kagga: ಮುಕ್ಕೋಟಿ ದೇವತೆಗಳಾಳುತಿಹ ಲೋಕದಲಿ ।ದಿಕ್ಕುಕಾಣದೆ ಜೀವಿಯಲೆಯುವುದಚ್ಚರಿಯೇಂ? ॥ಒಕ್ಕಟನೊಡೆಯರೇ ಕಲಿಯದಿರೆ ನಮ್ಮ ಗತಿ- ।ಗಿಕ್ಕಟ್ಟು ತಪ್ಪುವುದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೮ ॥

content: ಏಕವಾಗವೆ ದೈವಚಿತ್ತನರಚಿತ್ತಗಳು? ।ಏಕೆನ್ನ ಮನವನಾಳನು ಲೋಕದೊಡೆಯಂ? ॥ಬೇಕೆನಿಪುದೊಂದೆನಗೆ, ವಿಧಿ ಗೆಯ್ವದಿನ್ನೊಂದು ।ಈ ಕುಟಿಲಕೇಂ ಮದ್ದು ?- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೯ ॥EkavAgave daivachittanarachittagaLu? ।Ekenna manavanu ALanu lOkada oDeyam? ॥bEku enipudu ondu enage, vidhi geyvudu innondu ।ee kuTilake Em maddu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 369 ॥Why can the thoughts of man and God be alike? If God can control everything, why does he not make my mind tune to what he wants? My mind wants one thing. Fate give me another. What is the remedy for this treachery.  - Mankutimma
translation: Why can the thoughts of man and God be alike? If God can control everything, why does he not make my mind tune to what he wants? My mind wants one thing. Fate give me another. What is the remedy for this treachery.  - Mankutimma
title: ಈ ಕುಟಿಲಕೇಂ ಮದ್ದು ?- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: EkavAgave daivachittanarachittagaLu? ।Ekenna manavanu ALanu lOkada oDeyam? ॥bEku enipudu ondu enage, vidhi geyvudu innondu ।ee kuTilake Em maddu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 369 ॥
kagga: ಏಕವಾಗವೆ ದೈವಚಿತ್ತನರಚಿತ್ತಗಳು? ।ಏಕೆನ್ನ ಮನವನಾಳನು ಲೋಕದೊಡೆಯಂ? ॥ಬೇಕೆನಿಪುದೊಂದೆನಗೆ, ವಿಧಿ ಗೆಯ್ವದಿನ್ನೊಂದು ।ಈ ಕುಟಿಲಕೇಂ ಮದ್ದು ?- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬೯ ॥

content: ಸ್ವಾತಿ ಮಳೆಹನಿ ಬೀಳ್ವ, ಶುಕ್ತಿ ಬಾಯ್ದೆರೆದೇಳ್ವ ।ಕೌತುಕದ ಸಮಯಯೋಗದೆ ಮೌಕ್ತಿಕ ಫಲ ॥ಪ್ರೀತಿ ಸುಖ ಸತ್ಯದರ್ಶನ ಶಾಂತಿಗಳ ಹುಟ್ಟುಮ್ ।ಆ ತೆರೆದ ಯೋಗದಿನೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೦ ॥svAti maLehani bILva, shukti bAyi teredu ELva ।kautukada samayayOgade mauktika phala ॥prIti sukha satyadarshana shAntigaLa huTTum ।A tereda yOgadine  - Mankutimma ॥ 370 ॥When it rains during Swati period (star), the oyster rises to the surface and opens its mouth to get a drop of fresh water. (Popular belief says that such drops of pure water become pearls) Lot of factors have to come together in time to bear such a beautiful fruit (pearl). So are the birth of love, happiness, truth, realization and peace in our life.  - Mankutimma
translation: When it rains during Swati period (star), the oyster rises to the surface and opens its mouth to get a drop of fresh water. (Popular belief says that such drops of pure water become pearls) Lot of factors have to come together in time to bear such a beautiful fruit (pearl). So are the birth of love, happiness, truth, realization and peace in our life.  - Mankutimma
title: ಆ ತೆರೆದ ಯೋಗದಿನೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: svAti maLehani bILva, shukti bAyi teredu ELva ।kautukada samayayOgade mauktika phala ॥prIti sukha satyadarshana shAntigaLa huTTum ।A tereda yOgadine  - Mankutimma ॥ 370 ॥
kagga: ಸ್ವಾತಿ ಮಳೆಹನಿ ಬೀಳ್ವ, ಶುಕ್ತಿ ಬಾಯ್ದೆರೆದೇಳ್ವ ।ಕೌತುಕದ ಸಮಯಯೋಗದೆ ಮೌಕ್ತಿಕ ಫಲ ॥ಪ್ರೀತಿ ಸುಖ ಸತ್ಯದರ್ಶನ ಶಾಂತಿಗಳ ಹುಟ್ಟುಮ್ ।ಆ ತೆರೆದ ಯೋಗದಿನೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೦ ॥

content: ಬೇಕು ಬೇಕದು ಬೇಕು ಬೇಕಿದೆನಗಿನ್ನೊಂದು ।ಬೇಕೆನುತ ಬೊಬ್ಬಿಡುತಲಿಹ ಘಟವನಿದನು ॥ಏಕೆಂದು ರಚಿಸಿದನೊ ಬೊಮ್ಮನೀ ಬೇಕು ಜಪ ।ಸಾಕೆನಿಪುದೆಂದಿಗಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೧ ॥bEku bEkadu bEku bEku idu enage innondu ।bEkenuta bobbiDutalu iha ghaTavanu idanu ॥Ekendu rachisidano bommanI bEku japa ।sAku enipudu endige elo  - Mankutimma ॥ 371 ॥I want this. I want that. I want something else. Why did the creator make this pot that always shouts ;want, want, want;? When will this chanting of ;want; turn to ;enough;?  - Mankutimma
translation: I want this. I want that. I want something else. Why did the creator make this pot that always shouts ;want, want, want;? When will this chanting of ;want; turn to ;enough;?  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಾಕೆನಿಪುದೆಂದಿಗಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bEku bEkadu bEku bEku idu enage innondu ।bEkenuta bobbiDutalu iha ghaTavanu idanu ॥Ekendu rachisidano bommanI bEku japa ।sAku enipudu endige elo  - Mankutimma ॥ 371 ॥
kagga: ಬೇಕು ಬೇಕದು ಬೇಕು ಬೇಕಿದೆನಗಿನ್ನೊಂದು ।ಬೇಕೆನುತ ಬೊಬ್ಬಿಡುತಲಿಹ ಘಟವನಿದನು ॥ಏಕೆಂದು ರಚಿಸಿದನೊ ಬೊಮ್ಮನೀ ಬೇಕು ಜಪ ।ಸಾಕೆನಿಪುದೆಂದಿಗಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೧ ॥

content: ವನದಿ ನಿರ್ಜನದಿ ಮೌನದಿ ತಪವನೆಸಗುವನ ।ನೆನಪಿನಲಿ ಪಿಂತಿನನುಭವವುಳಿಯದೇನು? ॥ಇವಿನೋಟ ಸವಿಯೂಟ ಕಿನಿಸು ಕರುಬುಗಳಾಟ ।ಕನಲುತಿಹುವಾಳದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೨ ॥vanadi nirjanadi maunadi tapavam esaguvana ।nenapinali pintina anubhava uLiyadEnu? ॥ivinOTa saviyUTa kinisu kurubagaLa ATa ।kanalutihuvu ALadali  - Mankutimma ॥ 372 ॥If one leaves this society and retreats to a forest, where there are no people to disturb him  - and sits in silence and meditates, will he be at peace? In his memories he still carries all the experiences of the past. The beautiful sights, the tasty food, the anger, the jealousy  - all these feelings will still continue to haunt and trouble him.  - Mankutimma
translation: If one leaves this society and retreats to a forest, where there are no people to disturb him  - and sits in silence and meditates, will he be at peace? In his memories he still carries all the experiences of the past. The beautiful sights, the tasty food, the anger, the jealousy  - all these feelings will still continue to haunt and trouble him.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕನಲುತಿಹುವಾಳದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vanadi nirjanadi maunadi tapavam esaguvana ।nenapinali pintina anubhava uLiyadEnu? ॥ivinOTa saviyUTa kinisu kurubagaLa ATa ।kanalutihuvu ALadali  - Mankutimma ॥ 372 ॥
kagga: ವನದಿ ನಿರ್ಜನದಿ ಮೌನದಿ ತಪವನೆಸಗುವನ ।ನೆನಪಿನಲಿ ಪಿಂತಿನನುಭವವುಳಿಯದೇನು? ॥ಇವಿನೋಟ ಸವಿಯೂಟ ಕಿನಿಸು ಕರುಬುಗಳಾಟ ।ಕನಲುತಿಹುವಾಳದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೨ ॥

content: ಮನೆಯ ತೊರೆದೋಡಲೇಂ? ವನಗುಹೆಯ ಸಾರಲೇಂ? ।ತನುವನುಗ್ರವ್ರತಗಳಿಂದೆ ದಂಡಿಸಲೇಂ? ॥ಬಿನದಗಳನರಸಿ ನೀನೂರೂರೊಳಲೆದೊಡೇಂ? ।ಮನವ ತೊರೆದಿರಲಹುದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೩ ॥maneya toredu ODalEm? vanaguheya sAralEm? ।tanuvanu ugravratagaLinde danDisalEm? ॥binadagaLAnu arasi nInu UrU UroLu aledoDe Em? ।manava toredu iralu ahude  - Mankutimma ॥ 373 ॥Will abandoning one;s home help? Will retreating to forest help? Will subjecting the body to strict austerity help? Will wandering from village to village in search of happiness help? Wherever you go, whatever you do  - your mind is following you will all its baggage and will not let you in peace. Is there a way one can live by leaving his mind behind?  - Mankutimma
translation: Will abandoning one;s home help? Will retreating to forest help? Will subjecting the body to strict austerity help? Will wandering from village to village in search of happiness help? Wherever you go, whatever you do  - your mind is following you will all its baggage and will not let you in peace. Is there a way one can live by leaving his mind behind?  - Mankutimma
title: ಮನವ ತೊರೆದಿರಲಹುದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: maneya toredu ODalEm? vanaguheya sAralEm? ।tanuvanu ugravratagaLinde danDisalEm? ॥binadagaLAnu arasi nInu UrU UroLu aledoDe Em? ।manava toredu iralu ahude  - Mankutimma ॥ 373 ॥
kagga: ಮನೆಯ ತೊರೆದೋಡಲೇಂ? ವನಗುಹೆಯ ಸಾರಲೇಂ? ।ತನುವನುಗ್ರವ್ರತಗಳಿಂದೆ ದಂಡಿಸಲೇಂ? ॥ಬಿನದಗಳನರಸಿ ನೀನೂರೂರೊಳಲೆದೊಡೇಂ? ।ಮನವ ತೊರೆದಿರಲಹುದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೩ ॥

content: ಈ ಜಗದ ಗಂಧ ಪರಿಪರಿ ಹಸಿವ ಕೆಣಕುತಿರೆ ।ಭೋಜನವ ನೀಡನೆನೆ ಮನ ಸುಮ್ಮನಿಹುದೆ? ॥ಸಾಜಗಳ ಕೊಲ್ಲೆನುವ ಹಠಯೋಗಕಿಂತ ಸರಿ ।ರಾಜಯೋಗದುಪಾಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೪ ॥ee jagada gandha paripari hasiva keNakuta ire ।bhOjanava nIDenu ene mana summane ihude? ॥sAjagaLa kollenuva haTayOgakinta sari ।rAjayOgada upAya  - Mankutimma ॥ 374 ॥The fragrance of this world are inciting various kinds of hunger in our minds. Will the mind keep quiet if we deny it the food to satisfy the hunger? Trying to find inner peace by denying innate needs of a body is called ;haTayOga;. Instead of that, ;rAjayOga;  - of being aware of the needs as well as the body;s limiations is better.  - Mankutimma
translation: The fragrance of this world are inciting various kinds of hunger in our minds. Will the mind keep quiet if we deny it the food to satisfy the hunger? Trying to find inner peace by denying innate needs of a body is called ;haTayOga;. Instead of that, ;rAjayOga;  - of being aware of the needs as well as the body;s limiations is better.  - Mankutimma
title: ರಾಜಯೋಗದುಪಾಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ee jagada gandha paripari hasiva keNakuta ire ।bhOjanava nIDenu ene mana summane ihude? ॥sAjagaLa kollenuva haTayOgakinta sari ।rAjayOgada upAya  - Mankutimma ॥ 374 ॥
