kagga: ಈ ಜಗದ ಗಂಧ ಪರಿಪರಿ ಹಸಿವ ಕೆಣಕುತಿರೆ ।ಭೋಜನವ ನೀಡನೆನೆ ಮನ ಸುಮ್ಮನಿಹುದೆ? ॥ಸಾಜಗಳ ಕೊಲ್ಲೆನುವ ಹಠಯೋಗಕಿಂತ ಸರಿ ।ರಾಜಯೋಗದುಪಾಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೪ ॥

content: ಮನವನಾಳ್ವುದು ಹಟದ ಮಗುವನಾಳುವ ನಯದೆ ।ಇನಿತಿನಿತು ಸವಿಯುಣಿಸುಸವಿಕಥೆಗಳಿಂದೆ ॥ಅನುಕೂಲಿಸದು ಬರಿಯ ಕೂಗು ಬಡಿತಗಳಿನದು ।ಇನಿತಿತ್ತು ಮರಸಿನಿತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೫ ॥manavanu ALvudu haTada maguvanu ALuva nayade ।initu initu saviyuNisu savikathegaLinde ॥anukUlisadu bariya kUgu baDitagaLinadu ।initu ittu marasinita  - Mankutimma ॥ 375 ॥The way to rule the mind is similar to dealing with a cranky kid. One must feed sweet in small quantities by telling them interesting tales. A kid will not keep quiet by us yelling at it or spanking. It has to be consoled by giving it a little and making it forget the rest.  - Mankutimma
translation: The way to rule the mind is similar to dealing with a cranky kid. One must feed sweet in small quantities by telling them interesting tales. A kid will not keep quiet by us yelling at it or spanking. It has to be consoled by giving it a little and making it forget the rest.  - Mankutimma
title: ಇನಿತಿತ್ತು ಮರಸಿನಿತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: manavanu ALvudu haTada maguvanu ALuva nayade ।initu initu saviyuNisu savikathegaLinde ॥anukUlisadu bariya kUgu baDitagaLinadu ।initu ittu marasinita  - Mankutimma ॥ 375 ॥
kagga: ಮನವನಾಳ್ವುದು ಹಟದ ಮಗುವನಾಳುವ ನಯದೆ ।ಇನಿತಿನಿತು ಸವಿಯುಣಿಸುಸವಿಕಥೆಗಳಿಂದೆ ॥ಅನುಕೂಲಿಸದು ಬರಿಯ ಕೂಗು ಬಡಿತಗಳಿನದು ।ಇನಿತಿತ್ತು ಮರಸಿನಿತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೫ ॥

content: ಅಂತಾನುಮಿಂತಾನುಮೆಂತೊ ನಿನಗಾದಂತೆ ।ಶಾಂತೆಯನೆ ನೀನರಸು ಮನ ಕೆರಳಿದಂದು ॥ಸಂತವಿಡುತೊಮ್ಮೆ ಶಿಕ್ಷಿಸುತೊಮ್ಮೆ ಶಿಶುವೆಂದು ।ಸ್ವಾಂತಮಂ ತಿದ್ದುತಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೬ ॥antAnum intAnum ento ninagAdante ।shAnteyane nInu arasu mana keraLidandu ॥santaviDutomme shikShisuta omme shishuvendu ।svAntamam tiddutiru  - Mankutimma ॥ 376 ॥When your mind gets restless, you should try to find a way to placate it  - like this, like that or some how. You may empathize with it once or punish it some other time. You should treat your mind like a kid and correct it without hurting it.  - Mankutimma
translation: When your mind gets restless, you should try to find a way to placate it  - like this, like that or some how. You may empathize with it once or punish it some other time. You should treat your mind like a kid and correct it without hurting it.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸ್ವಾಂತಮಂ ತಿದ್ದುತಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: antAnum intAnum ento ninagAdante ।shAnteyane nInu arasu mana keraLidandu ॥santaviDutomme shikShisuta omme shishuvendu ।svAntamam tiddutiru  - Mankutimma ॥ 376 ॥
kagga: ಅಂತಾನುಮಿಂತಾನುಮೆಂತೊ ನಿನಗಾದಂತೆ ।ಶಾಂತೆಯನೆ ನೀನರಸು ಮನ ಕೆರಳಿದಂದು ॥ಸಂತವಿಡುತೊಮ್ಮೆ ಶಿಕ್ಷಿಸುತೊಮ್ಮೆ ಶಿಶುವೆಂದು ।ಸ್ವಾಂತಮಂ ತಿದ್ದುತಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೬ ॥

content: ಉದರ ದೈವಕೆ ಜಗದೊಳೆದುರು ದೈವವದೆಲ್ಲಿ? ।ಮೊದಲದರ ಪೂಜೆ; ಮಿಕ್ಕೆಲ್ಲವದರಿಂದ ॥ಮದಿಸುವುದದಾದರಿಸೆ, ಕುದಿವುದು ನಿರಾಕರಿಸೆ ।ಹದದೊಳಿರಿಸುವುದೆಂತೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೭ ॥udara daivake jagadoLu eduru daivavu adelli? ।modaladara pUje; mikkellavu adarinda ॥madisuvudu ada Adarise; kudivudu nirAkarise ।hadadoLu irisuvudentO?  - Mankutimma ॥ 377 ॥Stomach is the first God that we should try to worship. All other Gods will come after that and only because of that. If you worship it too much, it will become powerful and control you. If you let it suffer in hunger, it will get angry. How does one maintain balance?  - Mankutimma
translation: Stomach is the first God that we should try to worship. All other Gods will come after that and only because of that. If you worship it too much, it will become powerful and control you. If you let it suffer in hunger, it will get angry. How does one maintain balance?  - Mankutimma
title: ಹದದೊಳಿರಿಸುವುದೆಂತೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: udara daivake jagadoLu eduru daivavu adelli? ।modaladara pUje; mikkellavu adarinda ॥madisuvudu ada Adarise; kudivudu nirAkarise ।hadadoLu irisuvudentO?  - Mankutimma ॥ 377 ॥
kagga: ಉದರ ದೈವಕೆ ಜಗದೊಳೆದುರು ದೈವವದೆಲ್ಲಿ? ।ಮೊದಲದರ ಪೂಜೆ; ಮಿಕ್ಕೆಲ್ಲವದರಿಂದ ॥ಮದಿಸುವುದದಾದರಿಸೆ, ಕುದಿವುದು ನಿರಾಕರಿಸೆ ।ಹದದೊಳಿರಿಸುವುದೆಂತೋ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೭ ॥

content: ಕುದಿ ಹೆಚ್ಚೆ ವೆಗಟಹುದು; ಕಡಿಮೆಯಿರೆ ಹಸಿನಾತ ।ಕದಡಲೊಡೆವುದು ಹಾಲು; ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮವದರ ಹದ ॥ಅದರವೊಲೆ ಮನದ ಹದ, ಅದನೆಚ್ಚರದಿ ನೋಡು ।ಬದುಕು ಸೊಗ ಹದದಿಂದ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೮ ॥kudi hechche vegaTahudu; kaDimeyire hasinAta ।kadaDaloDevudu hAlu; sUkshmavadara hada ॥adaravole manada hada, adanechcharadi nODu ।baduku soga hadadinda  - Mankutimma ॥ 378 ॥If you heat it more, it will get a smoky smell. If you heat it less, then it will still retain the raw smell. if you shake it more, it will get spoiled. The balance with which you should treat milk is very delicate. So is the nature of our mind. Pay careful attention to it. Life is a bliss when the mind is balanced.  - Mankutimma
translation: If you heat it more, it will get a smoky smell. If you heat it less, then it will still retain the raw smell. if you shake it more, it will get spoiled. The balance with which you should treat milk is very delicate. So is the nature of our mind. Pay careful attention to it. Life is a bliss when the mind is balanced.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬದುಕು ಸೊಗ ಹದದಿಂದ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kudi hechche vegaTahudu; kaDimeyire hasinAta ।kadaDaloDevudu hAlu; sUkshmavadara hada ॥adaravole manada hada, adanechcharadi nODu ।baduku soga hadadinda  - Mankutimma ॥ 378 ॥
kagga: ಕುದಿ ಹೆಚ್ಚೆ ವೆಗಟಹುದು; ಕಡಿಮೆಯಿರೆ ಹಸಿನಾತ ।ಕದಡಲೊಡೆವುದು ಹಾಲು; ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮವದರ ಹದ ॥ಅದರವೊಲೆ ಮನದ ಹದ, ಅದನೆಚ್ಚರದಿ ನೋಡು ।ಬದುಕು ಸೊಗ ಹದದಿಂದ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೮ ॥

content: ತೃಪ್ತಿಯರಿಯದ ವಾಂಛೆ, ಜೀರ್ಣಿಸದ ಭುಕ್ತಿವೊಲು ।ಗುಪ್ತದಲಿ ಕೊಳೆಯುತ್ತೆ ವಿಷಬೀಜವಾಗಿ ॥ಪ್ರಾಪ್ತಿಗೊಳಿಪುದು ಜೀವಕುನ್ಮಾದತಾಪಗಳ ।ಸುಪ್ತವಹುದೆಂತಿಚ್ಛೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೯ ॥tRuptiyariyada vAnChe, jIrNisada bhuktivolu ।guptadali koLeyutte viShabIjavAgi ॥prAptigoLipudu jIvakunmAdatApagaLa ।suptavahudu entichChe?  - Mankutimma ॥ 379 ॥Desire that knows no satisfaction is similar to the food that does not get digested. It rots inside and turns into poison. They intoxicate people;s mind and create restlessness. How do we lay these desires to rest?   - Mankutimma
translation: Desire that knows no satisfaction is similar to the food that does not get digested. It rots inside and turns into poison. They intoxicate people;s mind and create restlessness. How do we lay these desires to rest?   - Mankutimma
title: ಸುಪ್ತವಹುದೆಂತಿಚ್ಛೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tRuptiyariyada vAnChe, jIrNisada bhuktivolu ।guptadali koLeyutte viShabIjavAgi ॥prAptigoLipudu jIvakunmAdatApagaLa ।suptavahudu entichChe?  - Mankutimma ॥ 379 ॥
kagga: ತೃಪ್ತಿಯರಿಯದ ವಾಂಛೆ, ಜೀರ್ಣಿಸದ ಭುಕ್ತಿವೊಲು ।ಗುಪ್ತದಲಿ ಕೊಳೆಯುತ್ತೆ ವಿಷಬೀಜವಾಗಿ ॥ಪ್ರಾಪ್ತಿಗೊಳಿಪುದು ಜೀವಕುನ್ಮಾದತಾಪಗಳ ।ಸುಪ್ತವಹುದೆಂತಿಚ್ಛೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭೯ ॥

content: ಹುಲಿಯ ಕೆಣುಕುವುದು ಹುಲಿ; ಕಪಿಯನಣಕಿಪುದು ಕಪಿ ।ಹುಲಿಕಪಿಗಳವಿತಿರದ ನರಜಂತುವೆಲ್ಲಿ? ॥ಮಲಗಿರುವ ಮೃಗವನಂತಿರಲು ಬಿಡುವುದೆ ಜಾಣು ।ಕುಲಕದಿರು ಬಾಲವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೦ ॥huliya keNukuvudu huli; kapiyanu aNakipudu kapi ।hulikapigaLavitirada narajantuvelli? ॥malagiruva mRugavanantiralu biDuvude jANu ।kulakadiru mAlavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 380 ॥A tiger will provoke another tiger. A monkey will provoke another monkey. Can anyone find a man who does not have a tiger and a monkey inside him? An intelligent person will let the sleeping animals inside him lie. Don;t try to shake the tail.  - Mankutimma
translation: A tiger will provoke another tiger. A monkey will provoke another monkey. Can anyone find a man who does not have a tiger and a monkey inside him? An intelligent person will let the sleeping animals inside him lie. Don;t try to shake the tail.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕುಲಕದಿರು ಬಾಲವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: huliya keNukuvudu huli; kapiyanu aNakipudu kapi ।hulikapigaLavitirada narajantuvelli? ॥malagiruva mRugavanantiralu biDuvude jANu ।kulakadiru mAlavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 380 ॥
kagga: ಹುಲಿಯ ಕೆಣುಕುವುದು ಹುಲಿ; ಕಪಿಯನಣಕಿಪುದು ಕಪಿ ।ಹುಲಿಕಪಿಗಳವಿತಿರದ ನರಜಂತುವೆಲ್ಲಿ? ॥ಮಲಗಿರುವ ಮೃಗವನಂತಿರಲು ಬಿಡುವುದೆ ಜಾಣು ।ಕುಲಕದಿರು ಬಾಲವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೦ ॥

content: ಅತಿಶಯದದೃಷ್ಟ ಹುಟ್ಟಿಂ ಮೃತೇಂದ್ರಿಯನದಲ? ।ಇತರರೊಳು ವಿಷಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಗೆ ನಿಲುವರಾರು? ॥ಮಿತಕುಕ್ಷಿ ಮಿತಭುಕ್ತ; ಮತ್ತಾರ್ ಜಿತೇಂದ್ರಿಯನು? ।ಅತಿಚರ್ಚೆ ಸಲದಲ್ಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೧ ॥atishayada adRuShTa huttim mRuta indriyanadu ala? ।itararoLu vishaparIkShege niluvarAru? ॥mitakukShi mitabhukti; mattAr jitEndriyanu? ।aticharche saladalli  - Mankutimma ॥ 381 ॥Can we say that a person who is born without senses (eyes or ears) is the most fortunate? Can others (those born with senses) test the poison and still stand? If a person has less hunger and consumes less, who else can we call as the ;conqueror of senses (desires);? There is no need to over analyze this.  - Mankutimma
translation: Can we say that a person who is born without senses (eyes or ears) is the most fortunate? Can others (those born with senses) test the poison and still stand? If a person has less hunger and consumes less, who else can we call as the ;conqueror of senses (desires);? There is no need to over analyze this.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅತಿಚರ್ಚೆ ಸಲದಲ್ಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: atishayada adRuShTa huttim mRuta indriyanadu ala? ।itararoLu vishaparIkShege niluvarAru? ॥mitakukShi mitabhukti; mattAr jitEndriyanu? ।aticharche saladalli  - Mankutimma ॥ 381 ॥
kagga: ಅತಿಶಯದದೃಷ್ಟ ಹುಟ್ಟಿಂ ಮೃತೇಂದ್ರಿಯನದಲ? ।ಇತರರೊಳು ವಿಷಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಗೆ ನಿಲುವರಾರು? ॥ಮಿತಕುಕ್ಷಿ ಮಿತಭುಕ್ತ; ಮತ್ತಾರ್ ಜಿತೇಂದ್ರಿಯನು? ।ಅತಿಚರ್ಚೆ ಸಲದಲ್ಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೧ ॥

content: ಇಂದ್ರಿಯವ ಜಯಿಸಿದೆಯೊ? ಮಂದವೋ ನಿನ್ನಕ್ಷಿ? ।ಸೌಂದರ್ಯ ಯಕ್ಷಿಣಿಯೆ ನಿನ್ನ ತೊರೆದಿಹಳೋ? ॥ಅಂಧನೆ ವಿರಕ್ತನ್; ಅಪ್ಸರೆಯ ಕಾಣದನೆ ಯತಿ ।ಕಂಡು ಕೆರಳನಾರೊ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೨ ॥indriyava jayisideyo? mandavO ninna akShi? ।saundarya yakShiNiye ninna toredihaLO? ॥andhane viraktan; apsareya kANadane yati ।kanDu keraLanAro!  - Mankutimma ॥ 382 ॥When one claims to have conquered his senses (desires), one must be skeptical. Did he really conquer? or his senses have gone weak? or the lady of beauty abandoned him? A blind person is naturally inclined away from enjoying beauty. Any one can be a saint as long as he has not seen a celestial damsel. Is there anyone who can resist the temptation after seeing the damsels?  - Mankutimma
translation: When one claims to have conquered his senses (desires), one must be skeptical. Did he really conquer? or his senses have gone weak? or the lady of beauty abandoned him? A blind person is naturally inclined away from enjoying beauty. Any one can be a saint as long as he has not seen a celestial damsel. Is there anyone who can resist the temptation after seeing the damsels?  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಂಡು ಕೆರಳನಾರೊ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: indriyava jayisideyo? mandavO ninna akShi? ।saundarya yakShiNiye ninna toredihaLO? ॥andhane viraktan; apsareya kANadane yati ।kanDu keraLanAro!  - Mankutimma ॥ 382 ॥
kagga: ಇಂದ್ರಿಯವ ಜಯಿಸಿದೆಯೊ? ಮಂದವೋ ನಿನ್ನಕ್ಷಿ? ।ಸೌಂದರ್ಯ ಯಕ್ಷಿಣಿಯೆ ನಿನ್ನ ತೊರೆದಿಹಳೋ? ॥ಅಂಧನೆ ವಿರಕ್ತನ್; ಅಪ್ಸರೆಯ ಕಾಣದನೆ ಯತಿ ।ಕಂಡು ಕೆರಳನಾರೊ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೨ ॥

content: ಜನಕಜೆಯ ದರುಶನಿದಿನಾಯ್ತು ರಾವಣ ಚಪಲ ।ಕನಕಮೃಗದರುಶನದೆ ಜಾನಕಿಯ ಚಪಲ ॥ಜನವವನ ನಿಂದಿಪುದು, ಕನಿಕರಿಪುದಾಕೆಯಲಿ ।ಮನದ ಬಗೆಯರಿಯದದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೩ ॥janakajeya darushanidinAytu rAvaNa chapala ।kanakamRugadarushanade jAnakiya chapala ॥janavu avana nindipudu, kanikaripudu Akeyali ।manada bage ariyadu adu  - Mankutimma ॥ 383 ॥Ravana;s desires were aroused when he saw Sita (daughter of Janaka). Sita;s desires were aroused when she saw the golden deer. We all know what followed. People criticize Ravana, but sympathize with Sita  - even though both gave in to their desires. No one can know how mind reacts.  - Mankutimma
translation: Ravana;s desires were aroused when he saw Sita (daughter of Janaka). Sita;s desires were aroused when she saw the golden deer. We all know what followed. People criticize Ravana, but sympathize with Sita  - even though both gave in to their desires. No one can know how mind reacts.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮನದ ಬಗೆಯರಿಯದದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: janakajeya darushanidinAytu rAvaNa chapala ।kanakamRugadarushanade jAnakiya chapala ॥janavu avana nindipudu, kanikaripudu Akeyali ।manada bage ariyadu adu  - Mankutimma ॥ 383 ॥
kagga: ಜನಕಜೆಯ ದರುಶನಿದಿನಾಯ್ತು ರಾವಣ ಚಪಲ ।ಕನಕಮೃಗದರುಶನದೆ ಜಾನಕಿಯ ಚಪಲ ॥ಜನವವನ ನಿಂದಿಪುದು, ಕನಿಕರಿಪುದಾಕೆಯಲಿ ।ಮನದ ಬಗೆಯರಿಯದದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೩ ॥

content: ಹೊಟ್ಟೆಯಲಿ ಹಸಿವು, ಮನದಲಿ ಮಮತೆ  - ಈ ಎರಡು ।ಗುಟ್ಟು ಕೀಲುಗಳಿಹವು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಂತ್ರದಲಿ ॥ಕಟ್ಟಿಪುವು ಕೋಟೆಗಳ, ಕೀಳಿಪುವು ತಾರೆಗಳ ।ಸೊಟ್ಟಾಗಿಪುವು ನಿನ್ನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೪ ॥hoTTeyali hasivu, manadali mamate  - ee eraDu ।huTTu kIlugaLu ihavu sRuShTi yantradali ॥kaTTipuvu kOTegaLa, kILipuvu tAregaLa ।soTTAgipuvu ninna  - Mankutimma ॥ 384 ॥There are two secret parts of this creation machinery  - hunger and love. These strong emotions make people build forts, (look to) snatch stars from the sky. They make man ambitious. It is so strong that people are ready to give up straight ways to achieve their ambitions.  - Mankutimma
translation: There are two secret parts of this creation machinery  - hunger and love. These strong emotions make people build forts, (look to) snatch stars from the sky. They make man ambitious. It is so strong that people are ready to give up straight ways to achieve their ambitions.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸೊಟ್ಟಾಗಿಪುವು ನಿನ್ನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hoTTeyali hasivu, manadali mamate  - ee eraDu ।huTTu kIlugaLu ihavu sRuShTi yantradali ॥kaTTipuvu kOTegaLa, kILipuvu tAregaLa ।soTTAgipuvu ninna  - Mankutimma ॥ 384 ॥
kagga: ಹೊಟ್ಟೆಯಲಿ ಹಸಿವು, ಮನದಲಿ ಮಮತೆ  - ಈ ಎರಡು ।ಗುಟ್ಟು ಕೀಲುಗಳಿಹವು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಂತ್ರದಲಿ ॥ಕಟ್ಟಿಪುವು ಕೋಟೆಗಳ, ಕೀಳಿಪುವು ತಾರೆಗಳ ।ಸೊಟ್ಟಾಗಿಪುವು ನಿನ್ನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೪ ॥

content: ದಾಸರೋ ನಾವೆಲ್ಲ ಶುನಕನಂದದಿ ಜಗದಿ ।ವಾಸನೆಗಳೆಳೆತಕ್ಕೆ ದಿಕ್ಕು ದಿಕ್ಕಿನಲಿ ॥ಪಾಶಗಳು ಹೊರಗೆ, ಕೊಂಡಿಗಳು ನಮ್ಮೊಳಗಿಹವು ।ವಾಸನಾಕ್ಷಯ ಮೋಕ್ಷ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೫ ॥dAsarO nAvella shunakanandadi jagadi ।vAsanegaLu eLetakke dikku dikkinali ॥pAshagaLu horage, konDigaLu nammoLagihavu ।vAsanAkshaya mOksha  - Mankutimma ॥ 385 ॥We are all servants. We follow our desires like dogs follow the scent (of food) in all directions. The strings that yank us (the desires) are no doubt, outside us. But the hook that ties them to us are with in us. If we make our mind up, we can unhook us from those strings. To reduce our indulgence is no less than salvation.  - Mankutimma
translation: We are all servants. We follow our desires like dogs follow the scent (of food) in all directions. The strings that yank us (the desires) are no doubt, outside us. But the hook that ties them to us are with in us. If we make our mind up, we can unhook us from those strings. To reduce our indulgence is no less than salvation.  - Mankutimma
title: ವಾಸನಾಕ್ಷಯ ಮೋಕ್ಷ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dAsarO nAvella shunakanandadi jagadi ।vAsanegaLu eLetakke dikku dikkinali ॥pAshagaLu horage, konDigaLu nammoLagihavu ।vAsanAkshaya mOksha  - Mankutimma ॥ 385 ॥
kagga: ದಾಸರೋ ನಾವೆಲ್ಲ ಶುನಕನಂದದಿ ಜಗದಿ ।ವಾಸನೆಗಳೆಳೆತಕ್ಕೆ ದಿಕ್ಕು ದಿಕ್ಕಿನಲಿ ॥ಪಾಶಗಳು ಹೊರಗೆ, ಕೊಂಡಿಗಳು ನಮ್ಮೊಳಗಿಹವು ।ವಾಸನಾಕ್ಷಯ ಮೋಕ್ಷ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೫ ॥

content: ಹೃದಯದುಬ್ಬರವೇನು ಹೊಟ್ಟೆಯುಬ್ಬರದಂತೆ ।ಅದರಿಳಿತ ಕೊರಳ ನಾದದ ಸದ್ದಿನಿಂದ ॥ಅದೆ ನಗುವು ದುಗುಡಗಳು, ಅದೆ ಹೊಗಳು ತೆಗಳುಗಳು ।ಅದನಿಳಿಸೆ ಶಾಂತಿಯೆಲೋ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೬ ॥hRudayadubbaravEnu hoTTeyubbaradante ।adariLita koraLa nAdada saddininda ॥ade naguvu duguDagaLu, ade hogaLu tegaLugaLu ।adaniLise shAntiyelO  - Mankutimma ॥ 386 ॥When the stomach is full, the uneasiness subsides when you burp  - let out a relieving sound from the food pipe. What should one do when you feel full in the heart? You laugh, cry, praise, condemn and let it out. Once you let it out, you will feel relieved.  - Mankutimma
translation: When the stomach is full, the uneasiness subsides when you burp  - let out a relieving sound from the food pipe. What should one do when you feel full in the heart? You laugh, cry, praise, condemn and let it out. Once you let it out, you will feel relieved.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅದನಿಳಿಸೆ ಶಾಂತಿಯೆಲೋ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hRudayadubbaravEnu hoTTeyubbaradante ।adariLita koraLa nAdada saddininda ॥ade naguvu duguDagaLu, ade hogaLu tegaLugaLu ।adaniLise shAntiyelO  - Mankutimma ॥ 386 ॥
kagga: ಹೃದಯದುಬ್ಬರವೇನು ಹೊಟ್ಟೆಯುಬ್ಬರದಂತೆ ।ಅದರಿಳಿತ ಕೊರಳ ನಾದದ ಸದ್ದಿನಿಂದ ॥ಅದೆ ನಗುವು ದುಗುಡಗಳು, ಅದೆ ಹೊಗಳು ತೆಗಳುಗಳು ।ಅದನಿಳಿಸೆ ಶಾಂತಿಯೆಲೋ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೬ ॥

content: ರದನೋದಯಜ್ವರಕೆ ಸಿಲುಕದಿಹ ಶಿಶುವಿರದು ।ವಿಧಿಯೊದೆಗೆ ಸಿಕ್ಕದಿಹ ನರಜಂತುವಿರದು ॥ಒದೆಪೆಟ್ಟು ಮುಗಿದಂದು ರಾಹುದಂಷ್ಟ್ರದೆ ಹೊರಟ ।ವಿಧುಬಿಂಬವೋ ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೭ ॥radanOdayajvarake silukadiha shishuviradu ।vidhiyodege sikkadiha narajantuviradu ॥odepeTTu mugidandu rAhudanShTrade horaTa । vidhubimbavO nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 387 ॥When a baby is about grow teeth, it will go through the pain of fever. It is very natural and no child has ever escaped the fate. Once you get through it, you will come out stronger and brighter like the image of the Moon escaping from the mouth of Rahu (after eclipse).  - Mankutimma
translation: When a baby is about grow teeth, it will go through the pain of fever. It is very natural and no child has ever escaped the fate. Once you get through it, you will come out stronger and brighter like the image of the Moon escaping from the mouth of Rahu (after eclipse).  - Mankutimma
title: ವಿಧುಬಿಂಬವೋ ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: radanOdayajvarake silukadiha shishuviradu ।vidhiyodege sikkadiha narajantuviradu ॥odepeTTu mugidandu rAhudanShTrade horaTa । vidhubimbavO nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 387 ॥
kagga: ರದನೋದಯಜ್ವರಕೆ ಸಿಲುಕದಿಹ ಶಿಶುವಿರದು ।ವಿಧಿಯೊದೆಗೆ ಸಿಕ್ಕದಿಹ ನರಜಂತುವಿರದು ॥ಒದೆಪೆಟ್ಟು ಮುಗಿದಂದು ರಾಹುದಂಷ್ಟ್ರದೆ ಹೊರಟ ।ವಿಧುಬಿಂಬವೋ ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೭ ॥

content: ದೇಹಾತುಮಂಗಳೆರಡಂಗಗಳು ಜೀವನಕೆ ।ನೇಹದಿಂದೊಂದನೊಂದಾದರಿಸೆ ಲೇಸು ॥ದಾಹಗೊಂಡಿರಲೊಂದು ಮಿಕ್ಕೊಂದಕೆಲ್ಲಿ ಸುಖ? ।ದ್ರೋಹ ಬೇಡೊಂದಕಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೮ ॥dEha AtumangaLu eraDu angagaLu jIvanake ।nEhadinda ondanondAdu arise lEsu ॥dAhagonDiralondu mikkondakelli sukha? ।drOha bEDa ondakam  - Mankutimma ॥ 388 ॥Body and spirit are both essential parts of life. They have to complement each other like friends. If one of them is left dry, where is happiness for the other? You should not betray either one of them.  - Mankutimma
translation: Body and spirit are both essential parts of life. They have to complement each other like friends. If one of them is left dry, where is happiness for the other? You should not betray either one of them.  - Mankutimma
title: ದ್ರೋಹ ಬೇಡೊಂದಕಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dEha AtumangaLu eraDu angagaLu jIvanake ।nEhadinda ondanondAdu arise lEsu ॥dAhagonDiralondu mikkondakelli sukha? ।drOha bEDa ondakam  - Mankutimma ॥ 388 ॥
kagga: ದೇಹಾತುಮಂಗಳೆರಡಂಗಗಳು ಜೀವನಕೆ ।ನೇಹದಿಂದೊಂದನೊಂದಾದರಿಸೆ ಲೇಸು ॥ದಾಹಗೊಂಡಿರಲೊಂದು ಮಿಕ್ಕೊಂದಕೆಲ್ಲಿ ಸುಖ? ।ದ್ರೋಹ ಬೇಡೊಂದಕಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೮ ॥

content: ಕಾಯವನು ಮೃದ್ಭಾಂಡ ಮಾಂಸಪಿಂಡವೆನುತ್ತೆ ।ಹೇಯವೆಂದೆಂದೊಡಾತ್ಮಂಗಪ್ಪುದೇನು? ॥ಆಯುಧವನದನು ತೊರೆದಾತ್ಮನೇಂಗೈದಪನು ।ನ್ಯಾಯ ತನುವಿಗಮಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೯ ॥kAyavanu mRudbhADa mAsapinDavenutte ।hEyavendondoDAtmangappudEnu? ॥ayudhavanadanu toredAtmanEngaidapanu ।nyAya tanuvigamirali  - Mankutimma ॥ 389 ॥If you consider this body as just a pot of mud filled with pieces of flesh, call it disgusting  - then can you do justice to the soul. Body is the material through which the soul can prosper. If you make body weak then the soul loses its support. You must do justice to the body as well.   - Mankutimma
translation: If you consider this body as just a pot of mud filled with pieces of flesh, call it disgusting  - then can you do justice to the soul. Body is the material through which the soul can prosper. If you make body weak then the soul loses its support. You must do justice to the body as well.   - Mankutimma
title: ನ್ಯಾಯ ತನುವಿಗಮಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kAyavanu mRudbhADa mAsapinDavenutte ।hEyavendondoDAtmangappudEnu? ॥ayudhavanadanu toredAtmanEngaidapanu ।nyAya tanuvigamirali  - Mankutimma ॥ 389 ॥
kagga: ಕಾಯವನು ಮೃದ್ಭಾಂಡ ಮಾಂಸಪಿಂಡವೆನುತ್ತೆ ।ಹೇಯವೆಂದೆಂದೊಡಾತ್ಮಂಗಪ್ಪುದೇನು? ॥ಆಯುಧವನದನು ತೊರೆದಾತ್ಮನೇಂಗೈದಪನು ।ನ್ಯಾಯ ತನುವಿಗಮಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮೯ ॥

content: ಸುಳ್ಳಲ್ಲ ಕಥೆಯ ತಿರುಕನು ಕಂಡ ಸವಿಗನಸು ।ಚೆಲ್ಲಿತಲ್ಲವೆ ಹಿಟ್ಟು ಘಟವನವನೊದೆಯೆ? ॥ಜಳ್ಳು ಸುಖದುಃಖವಿರಬಹುದಾದೊಡದರ ಮೊನೆ ।ಮುಳ್ಳಹುದು ಜೀವಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೦ ॥suLLalla katheya tirukanu kanDa saviganasu ।chellitallave hiTTu ghaTavanu avanodeye? ॥jaLLu sukhadukhavu irabahudAdoDe adara mone ।muLLahudu jIvakke  - Mankutimma ॥ 390 ॥The tale of the beggar kicking the pot containing food in his sleep while dreaming is not fiction. It is everyone;s life story. The whole world may be a dream, an illusion. But, its sting is very real.  - Mankutimma
translation: The tale of the beggar kicking the pot containing food in his sleep while dreaming is not fiction. It is everyone;s life story. The whole world may be a dream, an illusion. But, its sting is very real.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮುಳ್ಳಹುದು ಜೀವಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: suLLalla katheya tirukanu kanDa saviganasu ।chellitallave hiTTu ghaTavanu avanodeye? ॥jaLLu sukhadukhavu irabahudAdoDe adara mone ।muLLahudu jIvakke  - Mankutimma ॥ 390 ॥
kagga: ಸುಳ್ಳಲ್ಲ ಕಥೆಯ ತಿರುಕನು ಕಂಡ ಸವಿಗನಸು ।ಚೆಲ್ಲಿತಲ್ಲವೆ ಹಿಟ್ಟು ಘಟವನವನೊದೆಯೆ? ॥ಜಳ್ಳು ಸುಖದುಃಖವಿರಬಹುದಾದೊಡದರ ಮೊನೆ ।ಮುಳ್ಳಹುದು ಜೀವಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೦ ॥

content: ಹುರಿಯುರುಳೆ ಹಾವಲ್ಲವಾದೊಡಂ ಮಬ್ಬಿನಲಿ ।ಹರಿದಾಡಿದಂತಾಗೆ ನೋಳ್ಪಂಗೆ ಬೆದರಿ ॥ಸುರಿಸುವಾ ಬೆವರು ದಿಟ; ಜಗವುಮಂತುಟೆ ದಿಟವು ।ಜರೆಯದಿರು ತೋರ್ಕೆಗಳ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೧ ॥huriyuruLe hAvallavAdoDam mabbinali ।haridADidantAge nOLpange bedari ॥surisuvA bevaru diTa; jagavumantuTe diTavu ।jareyadiru tOrkegaLa  - Mankutimma ॥ 391 ॥When one sees a noose made of a rope in the dim light, he may think it is a snake. He is frightened and starts sweating. The fright and sweat are all real. But the snake is not. This world is also as real as that. Don;t dismiss the appearances because everything is real as long as the feeling is real.   - Mankutimma
translation: When one sees a noose made of a rope in the dim light, he may think it is a snake. He is frightened and starts sweating. The fright and sweat are all real. But the snake is not. This world is also as real as that. Don;t dismiss the appearances because everything is real as long as the feeling is real.   - Mankutimma
title: ಜರೆಯದಿರು ತೋರ್ಕೆಗಳ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: huriyuruLe hAvallavAdoDam mabbinali ।haridADidantAge nOLpange bedari ॥surisuvA bevaru diTa; jagavumantuTe diTavu ।jareyadiru tOrkegaLa  - Mankutimma ॥ 391 ॥
kagga: ಹುರಿಯುರುಳೆ ಹಾವಲ್ಲವಾದೊಡಂ ಮಬ್ಬಿನಲಿ ।ಹರಿದಾಡಿದಂತಾಗೆ ನೋಳ್ಪಂಗೆ ಬೆದರಿ ॥ಸುರಿಸುವಾ ಬೆವರು ದಿಟ; ಜಗವುಮಂತುಟೆ ದಿಟವು ।ಜರೆಯದಿರು ತೋರ್ಕೆಗಳ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೧ ॥

content: ಸೌಂದರ್ಯ ಬಾಂಧವ್ಯಗಳನು ಬರಿದೆನಲಹುದೆ? ।ಹೊಂದಿಸವೆ ಕುಂದಿಸವೆ ಜೀವಿಗಳನವುಗಳ್? ॥ಸಿಂಧುಪೂರದಿ ಬಿದ್ದವರೊಳೊಬ್ಬರೊಬ್ಬರನು ।ಅಂದಿಕೊಳಲದು ಬರಿದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೨ ॥saundarya bAndhavyagaLanu baridenalahude? ।hondisave kundisave jIvigaLanavugaL? ॥sindhupUradi biddavaroLu obbarobbaranu ।andikoLaladu baride?  - Mankutimma ॥ 392 ॥Can you dismiss the beauty and love in this world as all illusion and false? Don;t these very feelings get us together or make us sad? have you not seen strangers who are caught in the torrent (or at sea) cling to each other for dear life. We are also like that in this torrent of life and seeking each other to get through it is very natural.  - Mankutimma
translation: Can you dismiss the beauty and love in this world as all illusion and false? Don;t these very feelings get us together or make us sad? have you not seen strangers who are caught in the torrent (or at sea) cling to each other for dear life. We are also like that in this torrent of life and seeking each other to get through it is very natural.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅಂದಿಕೊಳಲದು ಬರಿದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: saundarya bAndhavyagaLanu baridenalahude? ।hondisave kundisave jIvigaLanavugaL? ॥sindhupUradi biddavaroLu obbarobbaranu ।andikoLaladu baride?  - Mankutimma ॥ 392 ॥
kagga: ಸೌಂದರ್ಯ ಬಾಂಧವ್ಯಗಳನು ಬರಿದೆನಲಹುದೆ? ।ಹೊಂದಿಸವೆ ಕುಂದಿಸವೆ ಜೀವಿಗಳನವುಗಳ್? ॥ಸಿಂಧುಪೂರದಿ ಬಿದ್ದವರೊಳೊಬ್ಬರೊಬ್ಬರನು ।ಅಂದಿಕೊಳಲದು ಬರಿದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೨ ॥

content: ಎನಿತೆನಿತ್ತು ವಿಕಾರ ಪರಿಣಾಮಗಳ ನಮ್ಮ ।ಮನಕಾಗಿಪುವೊ ಲೋಕರೂಪಶಕ್ತಿಗಳು ॥ಅನಿತನಿತು ಸತ್ಯತೆಯವಕ್ಕುಂಟು ಜೀವಿತದಿ ।ಅನುಭವವೆ ದಿಟದಳತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೩ ॥enitenittu vikAra pariNAmagaLa namma ।manakAgipuvo lOkarUpashaktigaLu ॥anitanitu satyateyavakkunTu jIvitadi ।anubhavave diTadaLAte  - Mankutimma ॥ 393 ॥The artifacts of this world distort the images in our mind. We can never be free of our prejudices. We can only believe those images cast on our mind are real. The measure of reality is only through the experiences.   - Mankutimma
translation: The artifacts of this world distort the images in our mind. We can never be free of our prejudices. We can only believe those images cast on our mind are real. The measure of reality is only through the experiences.   - Mankutimma
title: ಅನುಭವವೆ ದಿಟದಳತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: enitenittu vikAra pariNAmagaLa namma ।manakAgipuvo lOkarUpashaktigaLu ॥anitanitu satyateyavakkunTu jIvitadi ।anubhavave diTadaLAte  - Mankutimma ॥ 393 ॥
kagga: ಎನಿತೆನಿತ್ತು ವಿಕಾರ ಪರಿಣಾಮಗಳ ನಮ್ಮ ।ಮನಕಾಗಿಪುವೊ ಲೋಕರೂಪಶಕ್ತಿಗಳು ॥ಅನಿತನಿತು ಸತ್ಯತೆಯವಕ್ಕುಂಟು ಜೀವಿತದಿ ।ಅನುಭವವೆ ದಿಟದಳತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೩ ॥

content: ಕನಸು ದಿಟ; ನೆನಸು ದಿಟ; ತನುವೊಳಿಹ ಚೇತನವ ।ಕನಲಿಸುವ ಕುಣಿಸುವಾ ಹಬೆಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ದಿಟ ॥ಇನಿತನಿತು ದಿಟಗಳಿವು-ತುಂಬುದಿಟದಂಶಗಳು ।ಗಣನೀಯವವು ಬಾಳ್ಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೪ ॥kanasu diTa; nenasu diTa; tanuvoLiha chEtanava ।kanalisuva kuNisuvA habegaLella diTa ॥initanitu diTagaLivu-tumbudiTadanshagaLu ।gaNanIyavavu bALge  - Mankutimma ॥ 394 ॥The dream is real. Memories are real. Real are those feelings which incite us and make us dance to its tunes. These are small truths. All parts and pieces of the ultimate truth. These smaller truths are also very essential for life.  - Mankutimma
translation: The dream is real. Memories are real. Real are those feelings which incite us and make us dance to its tunes. These are small truths. All parts and pieces of the ultimate truth. These smaller truths are also very essential for life.  - Mankutimma
title: ಗಣನೀಯವವು ಬಾಳ್ಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kanasu diTa; nenasu diTa; tanuvoLiha chEtanava ।kanalisuva kuNisuvA habegaLella diTa ॥initanitu diTagaLivu-tumbudiTadanshagaLu ।gaNanIyavavu bALge  - Mankutimma ॥ 394 ॥
kagga: ಕನಸು ದಿಟ; ನೆನಸು ದಿಟ; ತನುವೊಳಿಹ ಚೇತನವ ।ಕನಲಿಸುವ ಕುಣಿಸುವಾ ಹಬೆಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ದಿಟ ॥ಇನಿತನಿತು ದಿಟಗಳಿವು-ತುಂಬುದಿಟದಂಶಗಳು ।ಗಣನೀಯವವು ಬಾಳ್ಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೪ ॥

content: ತುಂಬುದಿಟ ಜೀವಿತದ ಗಣನೆಗಳ ಮೀರಿದುದು ।ಇಂಬುಗಳ ಬಿಂಬಗಳ ಸನ್ನಿಧಾನವದು ॥ಅಂಬರದಿನಾಚಿನದು, ತುಂಬಿರುವುದೆತ್ತಲುಂ ।ಶಂಭು ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೫ ॥tumbudiTa jIvitada gaNanegaLa mIridudu ।imbugaLa bimbagaLa sannidhAnavadu ॥ambaradinAchinadu, tumbiruvudettalum ।shambhu parabommanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 395 ॥Comprehending the full truth is beyond our lifetimes. The ultimate truth is there in all reflections of itself. It can be seen with love. It exists even beyond the skies in all directions. It exists by the will of the Creator  - Mankutimma
translation: Comprehending the full truth is beyond our lifetimes. The ultimate truth is there in all reflections of itself. It can be seen with love. It exists even beyond the skies in all directions. It exists by the will of the Creator  - Mankutimma
title: ಶಂಭು ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tumbudiTa jIvitada gaNanegaLa mIridudu ।imbugaLa bimbagaLa sannidhAnavadu ॥ambaradinAchinadu, tumbiruvudettalum ।shambhu parabommanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 395 ॥
kagga: ತುಂಬುದಿಟ ಜೀವಿತದ ಗಣನೆಗಳ ಮೀರಿದುದು ।ಇಂಬುಗಳ ಬಿಂಬಗಳ ಸನ್ನಿಧಾನವದು ॥ಅಂಬರದಿನಾಚಿನದು, ತುಂಬಿರುವುದೆತ್ತಲುಂ ।ಶಂಭು ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೫ ॥

content: ಕಲ್ಮಷದ ವಲ್ಮೀಕವೆಂದೊಡಲ ಜರೆಯದಿರು ।ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಪುರಿಯೆಂದದನು ಋಷಿಗಳೊರೆದಿಹರು ॥ಹಮ್ಮುಳ್ಳ ಹಯವ ಕಾಪಿಟ್ತು ಕಡಿವಣ ತೊಡಿಸೆ ।ನಮ್ಮ ಗುರಿಗೈದಿಪುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೬ ॥kalmaShada valmIkavendoDala jareyadiru ।brahmapuriyendadanu RuShigaLorediharu ॥hammuLLa hayava kApiTTu kaDivaNa toDise ।namma gurige aidipudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 396 ॥Don;t berate the body as an ant hill (snake;s house) full of impurities (and poison). The ancient sages have proclaimed it as the abode of the Creator himself. If one can keep the energetic horse under control, the he can go to places. We can definitely reach our goals. We have five horses (senses).  - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t berate the body as an ant hill (snake;s house) full of impurities (and poison). The ancient sages have proclaimed it as the abode of the Creator himself. If one can keep the energetic horse under control, the he can go to places. We can definitely reach our goals. We have five horses (senses).  - Mankutimma
title: ನಮ್ಮ ಗುರಿಗೈದಿಪುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kalmaShada valmIkavendoDala jareyadiru ।brahmapuriyendadanu RuShigaLorediharu ॥hammuLLa hayava kApiTTu kaDivaNa toDise ।namma gurige aidipudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 396 ॥
kagga: ಕಲ್ಮಷದ ವಲ್ಮೀಕವೆಂದೊಡಲ ಜರೆಯದಿರು ।ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಪುರಿಯೆಂದದನು ಋಷಿಗಳೊರೆದಿಹರು ॥ಹಮ್ಮುಳ್ಳ ಹಯವ ಕಾಪಿಟ್ತು ಕಡಿವಣ ತೊಡಿಸೆ ।ನಮ್ಮ ಗುರಿಗೈದಿಪುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೬ ॥

content: ದೇಹವೆಂಬುದು ಕುದುರೆಯಾತ್ಮನದರಾರೋಹಿ ।ವಾಹನವನುಪವಾಸವಿರಿಸೆ ನಡೆದೀತೆ? ॥ರೋಹಿ ಜಾಗ್ರತೆದಪ್ಪೆ ಯಾತ್ರೆ ಸುಖ ಸಾಗೀತೆ? ।ಸ್ನೇಹವೆರಡಕಮುಚಿತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೭ ॥dEhavembudu kudureyu Atmanu adara ArOhi ।vAhanavanu upavAsa irise naDedIte? ॥rOhi jAgratedappe yAtre sukha sAgIte? ।snEhavu eraDakam uchita  - Mankutimma ॥ 397 ॥Body is a horse. Soul is the rider. If the vehicle is starved, will it move? If the rider is not alert, then can the journey be safe and happy? It is best if both the horse and the rider are friends with each other.  - Mankutimma
translation: Body is a horse. Soul is the rider. If the vehicle is starved, will it move? If the rider is not alert, then can the journey be safe and happy? It is best if both the horse and the rider are friends with each other.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸ್ನೇಹವೆರಡಕಮುಚಿತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dEhavembudu kudureyu Atmanu adara ArOhi ।vAhanavanu upavAsa irise naDedIte? ॥rOhi jAgratedappe yAtre sukha sAgIte? ।snEhavu eraDakam uchita  - Mankutimma ॥ 397 ॥
kagga: ದೇಹವೆಂಬುದು ಕುದುರೆಯಾತ್ಮನದರಾರೋಹಿ ।ವಾಹನವನುಪವಾಸವಿರಿಸೆ ನಡೆದೀತೆ? ॥ರೋಹಿ ಜಾಗ್ರತೆದಪ್ಪೆ ಯಾತ್ರೆ ಸುಖ ಸಾಗೀತೆ? ।ಸ್ನೇಹವೆರಡಕಮುಚಿತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೭ ॥

content: ಇರುವನ್ನಮೀ ಬಾಳು ದಿಟವದರ ವಿವರಣೆಯ ।ಹೊರೆ ನಮ್ಮ ಮೇಲಿಲ್ಲ ನಾವದರ ಸಿರಿಯ ॥ಪಿರಿದಾಗಿಸಲು ನಿಂತು ಯುಕ್ತಿಯಿಂ ದುಡಿಯುವುದು ।ಪುರುಷಾರ್ಥಸಾಧನೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೮ ॥iruvannamI bALu diTavadara vivaraNeya ।hore namma mElilla nAvadara siriya ॥piridAgisalu nintu yuktiyim duDiyuvudu ।purushArthasAdhaneyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 398 ॥Our life here is real. It is not up to us to discuss (and decide) how it came into existence. Let us leave that to God. We are here. We have to strive to make this place more beautiful and prosperous. We should think in those lines. It must be the goal of all our worldly endeavors.  - Mankutimma
translation: Our life here is real. It is not up to us to discuss (and decide) how it came into existence. Let us leave that to God. We are here. We have to strive to make this place more beautiful and prosperous. We should think in those lines. It must be the goal of all our worldly endeavors.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪುರುಷಾರ್ಥಸಾಧನೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: iruvannamI bALu diTavadara vivaraNeya ।hore namma mElilla nAvadara siriya ॥piridAgisalu nintu yuktiyim duDiyuvudu ।purushArthasAdhaneyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 398 ॥
kagga: ಇರುವನ್ನಮೀ ಬಾಳು ದಿಟವದರ ವಿವರಣೆಯ ।ಹೊರೆ ನಮ್ಮ ಮೇಲಿಲ್ಲ ನಾವದರ ಸಿರಿಯ ॥ಪಿರಿದಾಗಿಸಲು ನಿಂತು ಯುಕ್ತಿಯಿಂ ದುಡಿಯುವುದು ।ಪುರುಷಾರ್ಥಸಾಧನೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೮ ॥

content: ಕಾಯಮಾತ್ರದುದಲ್ಲವಾತ್ಮಮಾತ್ರದುದಲ್ಲ- ।ವಾಯೆರಡುಮೊಂದಾಗಲದು ಜೀವಲೀಲೆ ॥ತಾಯಿವೊಲು ನಿನಗಾತ್ಮ, ಮಡದಿವೊಲು ಕಾಯವವ- ।ರಾಯವನು ಸರಿನೋಡು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೯ ॥kAyamAtradudallavu AtmamAtradudallavu ।AyeraDum ondAgaladu jIvalIle ॥tAyivolu ninagAtma, maDadivolu kAyavava- ।rAyuvanu sarinODu  - Mankutimma ॥ 399 ॥It is not about body alone. Neither is it about the soul alone. Only when both are fused into one, does the joy of life materialize. The soul is like your mother and the body is like your wife. You must watch their balance carefully   - Mankutimma
translation: It is not about body alone. Neither is it about the soul alone. Only when both are fused into one, does the joy of life materialize. The soul is like your mother and the body is like your wife. You must watch their balance carefully   - Mankutimma
title: ಕಾಯವವರಾಯವನು ಸರಿನೋಡು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kAyamAtradudallavu AtmamAtradudallavu ।AyeraDum ondAgaladu jIvalIle ॥tAyivolu ninagAtma, maDadivolu kAyavava- ।rAyuvanu sarinODu  - Mankutimma ॥ 399 ॥
kagga: ಕಾಯಮಾತ್ರದುದಲ್ಲವಾತ್ಮಮಾತ್ರದುದಲ್ಲ- ।ವಾಯೆರಡುಮೊಂದಾಗಲದು ಜೀವಲೀಲೆ ॥ತಾಯಿವೊಲು ನಿನಗಾತ್ಮ, ಮಡದಿವೊಲು ಕಾಯವವ- ।ರಾಯವನು ಸರಿನೋಡು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯೯ ॥

content: ದೃಶ್ಯವೆಲ್ಲವು ನಶ್ಯವಾದೊಡೇಂ? ದೃಷ್ಟಿಗದು ।ವಶ್ಯವಿರುವನಕದನು ದೃಷ್ಟಿಪುದೆ ಕಾರ್ಯಂ ॥ವಿಶ್ವಾನುಭವವೆ ವಿಶ್ವಾತ್ಮಾನುಭವಕೆ ಪಥ ।ನಶ್ಯದಿಂದವಿನಶ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೦ ॥dRushyavellavu nashyavAdoDEM? dRuShTigadu ।vashyaviruvanakadanu dRushTipude kAryam ॥vishvAnubhavave vishvAtma anubhavake patha ।nashyadindavinashya  - Mankutimma ॥ 400 ॥What if everything that can be seen is destroyed? We can not do anything about it. But to see whatever is accessible to our senses now is to be seen. Only by experiencing this world can we hope to reach the cosmic spirit or universal soul. This is the only path from destructible to permanent  - Mankutimma
translation: What if everything that can be seen is destroyed? We can not do anything about it. But to see whatever is accessible to our senses now is to be seen. Only by experiencing this world can we hope to reach the cosmic spirit or universal soul. This is the only path from destructible to permanent  - Mankutimma
title: ನಶ್ಯದಿಂದವಿನಶ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dRushyavellavu nashyavAdoDEM? dRuShTigadu ।vashyaviruvanakadanu dRushTipude kAryam ॥vishvAnubhavave vishvAtma anubhavake patha ।nashyadindavinashya  - Mankutimma ॥ 400 ॥
kagga: ದೃಶ್ಯವೆಲ್ಲವು ನಶ್ಯವಾದೊಡೇಂ? ದೃಷ್ಟಿಗದು ।ವಶ್ಯವಿರುವನಕದನು ದೃಷ್ಟಿಪುದೆ ಕಾರ್ಯಂ ॥ವಿಶ್ವಾನುಭವವೆ ವಿಶ್ವಾತ್ಮಾನುಭವಕೆ ಪಥ ।ನಶ್ಯದಿಂದವಿನಶ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೦ ॥

content: ಮರಣಶಯ್ಯೆಯದೆಂದು ತಿಳಿದೊಡಂ ರೋಗಿಯನು ।ಹರಣಮಿರುವನ್ನೆಗಂ ಪರಿಚರಿಸುವಂತೆ ॥ಸ್ಥಿರವಲ್ಲವೀ ಲೋಕವಾದೊಡಮದುಳ್ಳನಕ ।ಚರಿಸು ನೀನಾಳಾಗಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೧ ॥maraNashayyeyadendu tiLidoDam rOgiyanu ।haraNamiruvannegam paricharisuvante ॥sthiravallavI lOkavAdoDam aduLLanaka ।charisu nInALAgi  - Mankutimma ॥ 401 ॥Even after knowing that a patient is terminally ill, we treat him up until the last second he has life left in him. Similarly, we should serve this world like a servant even though we know that every thing in this world will get destroyed in time.  - Mankutimma
translation: Even after knowing that a patient is terminally ill, we treat him up until the last second he has life left in him. Similarly, we should serve this world like a servant even though we know that every thing in this world will get destroyed in time.  - Mankutimma
title: ಚರಿಸು ನೀನಾಳಾಗಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: maraNashayyeyadendu tiLidoDam rOgiyanu ।haraNamiruvannegam paricharisuvante ॥sthiravallavI lOkavAdoDam aduLLanaka ।charisu nInALAgi  - Mankutimma ॥ 401 ॥
kagga: ಮರಣಶಯ್ಯೆಯದೆಂದು ತಿಳಿದೊಡಂ ರೋಗಿಯನು ।ಹರಣಮಿರುವನ್ನೆಗಂ ಪರಿಚರಿಸುವಂತೆ ॥ಸ್ಥಿರವಲ್ಲವೀ ಲೋಕವಾದೊಡಮದುಳ್ಳನಕ ।ಚರಿಸು ನೀನಾಳಾಗಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೧ ॥

content: ಜವನ ನಿಂದಿಪುದೇಕೆ ಸರ್ವಘಾತಕನೆಂದು? ।ಭುವಿಗೆ ವೃದ್ಧಸಮೃದ್ಧಿಯನು ಸುಮ್ಮನಿರಲ್ ॥ನವಜನಕ್ಕೆಡೆಯೆತ್ತಲಾರುಮೆಡೆಬಿಡದೆ ನಿಲೆ? ।ನವತೆಯವನಿಂ ಜಗಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೨ ॥javana nindipudEke sarvaghAtakanendu? ।bhuvige vRuddha samRuddhiyanu summaniral ॥navajanakke eDe yettalu Arum eDebiDade nile? ।navateyavanim jagake  - Mankutimma ॥ 402 ॥Everybody hates Death since he puts an end to every ting we know. But just imagine what would happen if he just stopped working. This world would be filled with old people. If no one conceded any space, how could new people come to this world. Death brings freshness into this world.  - Mankutimma
translation: Everybody hates Death since he puts an end to every ting we know. But just imagine what would happen if he just stopped working. This world would be filled with old people. If no one conceded any space, how could new people come to this world. Death brings freshness into this world.  - Mankutimma
title: ನವತೆಯವನಿಂ ಜಗಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: javana nindipudEke sarvaghAtakanendu? ।bhuvige vRuddha samRuddhiyanu summaniral ॥navajanakke eDe yettalu Arum eDebiDade nile? ।navateyavanim jagake  - Mankutimma ॥ 402 ॥
kagga: ಜವನ ನಿಂದಿಪುದೇಕೆ ಸರ್ವಘಾತಕನೆಂದು? ।ಭುವಿಗೆ ವೃದ್ಧಸಮೃದ್ಧಿಯನು ಸುಮ್ಮನಿರಲ್ ॥ನವಜನಕ್ಕೆಡೆಯೆತ್ತಲಾರುಮೆಡೆಬಿಡದೆ ನಿಲೆ? ।ನವತೆಯವನಿಂ ಜಗಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೨ ॥

content: ಹೊಳಪು ಹೊಳಪಿನ ನಡುವೆ ಬಿಡುವಿನಿತು ರತ್ನದಲಿ ।ಬೆಳಕು ಬೆಳಕಿನ ನಡುವೆ ಅನಿತಿನಿತು ನೆರಳು ॥ಬೆಳಸು ಬೆಳಾಸಿನ ಸಾಲು ನಡುವೆ ಬದಿ ಗದ್ದೆಯಲಿ ।ಉಳಿಗಳಿವಿನ ನೆರೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೩ ॥hoLapu hoLapina naDuve biDuvinitu ratnadali ।beLaku beLakina naDuve anitinitu neraLu ॥beLasu beLAsina sAlu naDuve badi gaddeyali ।uLigaLivina nereyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 403 ॥In between the brilliance of gems, there is gap (lackluster) in a necklace. Between streaks of light are some shadows. Between expanse of cultivated farm, there is boundaries where there is nothing. All the above things  - gems, light and farms look beautiful (and meaningful) only when they exist with (and right next to) their antithesis.  - Mankutimma
translation: In between the brilliance of gems, there is gap (lackluster) in a necklace. Between streaks of light are some shadows. Between expanse of cultivated farm, there is boundaries where there is nothing. All the above things  - gems, light and farms look beautiful (and meaningful) only when they exist with (and right next to) their antithesis.  - Mankutimma
title: ಉಳಿಗಳಿವಿನ ನೆರೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hoLapu hoLapina naDuve biDuvinitu ratnadali ।beLaku beLakina naDuve anitinitu neraLu ॥beLasu beLAsina sAlu naDuve badi gaddeyali ।uLigaLivina nereyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 403 ॥
kagga: ಹೊಳಪು ಹೊಳಪಿನ ನಡುವೆ ಬಿಡುವಿನಿತು ರತ್ನದಲಿ ।ಬೆಳಕು ಬೆಳಕಿನ ನಡುವೆ ಅನಿತಿನಿತು ನೆರಳು ॥ಬೆಳಸು ಬೆಳಾಸಿನ ಸಾಲು ನಡುವೆ ಬದಿ ಗದ್ದೆಯಲಿ ।ಉಳಿಗಳಿವಿನ ನೆರೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೩ ॥

content: ದೇವರ್ಕಳುದಿಸಿ ಮರೆಯಹರು; ದೇವತ್ವ ಚಿರ ।ಜಾವ ದಿನ ಬಂದು ಪೋಗುವುವು; ಕಾಲ ಚಿರ ॥ಜೀವದ ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿ ಸಾಯ್ವುದು; ಜೀವಸತ್ವ ಚಿರ ।ಭಾವಿಸಾ ಕೇವಲವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೪ ॥dEvarkaLudisi mareyaharu; dEvatva chira ।jAva dina bandu pOguvuvu; kAla chira ॥jIvada vyakta sAyvudu; jIvasatva chira ।bhAvisA kEvalava  - Mankutimma ॥ 404 ॥Gods may rise and disappear. But divinity is permanent. Nights and days may come and go. But time remains. Beings may die. But life goes on. Imagine such a universal truth which is beyond Gods, time or life.  - Mankutimma
translation: Gods may rise and disappear. But divinity is permanent. Nights and days may come and go. But time remains. Beings may die. But life goes on. Imagine such a universal truth which is beyond Gods, time or life.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭಾವಿಸಾ ಕೇವಲವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dEvarkaLudisi mareyaharu; dEvatva chira ।jAva dina bandu pOguvuvu; kAla chira ॥jIvada vyakta sAyvudu; jIvasatva chira ।bhAvisA kEvalava  - Mankutimma ॥ 404 ॥
kagga: ದೇವರ್ಕಳುದಿಸಿ ಮರೆಯಹರು; ದೇವತ್ವ ಚಿರ ।ಜಾವ ದಿನ ಬಂದು ಪೋಗುವುವು; ಕಾಲ ಚಿರ ॥ಜೀವದ ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿ ಸಾಯ್ವುದು; ಜೀವಸತ್ವ ಚಿರ ।ಭಾವಿಸಾ ಕೇವಲವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೪ ॥

content: ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮ ಜೀವಭೇದದಿ ನಿಜೈಕ್ಯವ ಮರೆಯೆ ।ಮರಳಿ ತನ್ನೊಟ್ಟನವನರಸಲೆಚ್ಚರಿಸಲ್ ॥ನರನಾರಿಯರ ಪರಸ್ಪರ ಮೋಹದಲಿ ಮಾಯೆ ।ನಿರವಿಸಿಹಳಂಕುಶವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೫ ॥parabomma jIvabhEdadi nijaikyava mereye ।maraLi tanna oTTAnu avanu arasal echcharisal ॥naranAriyara paraspara mOhadali mAye ।nravisihaLu ankushava  - Mankutimma ॥ 405 ॥The creator is one and only one. But he himself has materialized as so many beings. In this form, he has forgotten his earlier form (of whole). To get back to his original form, he has got Maya (illusion) create a hook to wake us up  - that is love between a man and a woman.  - Mankutimma
translation: The creator is one and only one. But he himself has materialized as so many beings. In this form, he has forgotten his earlier form (of whole). To get back to his original form, he has got Maya (illusion) create a hook to wake us up  - that is love between a man and a woman.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಿರವಿಸಿಹಳಂಕುಶವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: parabomma jIvabhEdadi nijaikyava mereye ।maraLi tanna oTTAnu avanu arasal echcharisal ॥naranAriyara paraspara mOhadali mAye ।nravisihaLu ankushava  - Mankutimma ॥ 405 ॥
kagga: ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮ ಜೀವಭೇದದಿ ನಿಜೈಕ್ಯವ ಮರೆಯೆ ।ಮರಳಿ ತನ್ನೊಟ್ಟನವನರಸಲೆಚ್ಚರಿಸಲ್ ॥ನರನಾರಿಯರ ಪರಸ್ಪರ ಮೋಹದಲಿ ಮಾಯೆ ।ನಿರವಿಸಿಹಳಂಕುಶವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೫ ॥

content: ನರನಾರಿಮೋಹದಿಂ ವಂಶವದಕಾಗಿ ಮನೆ ।ನೆರೆ ಹೊರೆಗಳೂರು ರಾಷ್ಟ್ರಗಳು ಸಂಘಗಳು ॥ಕೆರೆಯೊಂದು ಕೇಂದ್ರದಿಂದಲೆಯೆ ಬಳೆಗಳು ನೂರು ।ಹರಿವಂತೆ ಸಂಸಾರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೬ ॥naranArimOhadim vamshavadakAgi mane ।nere horegaLUru rAShTragaLu sanghagaLu ॥kereyondu kEndradindaleye baLegaLu nUru ।harivante samsAra  - Mankutimma ॥ 406 ॥From the love between a man and woman starts a family and a dynasty. To support a family, a house. Then neighbors. Later villages and then nations and alliances. There is only one pod. But a vibration started at the center of it creates a hundred waves spreading in all direction. Such is this world.   - Mankutimma
translation: From the love between a man and woman starts a family and a dynasty. To support a family, a house. Then neighbors. Later villages and then nations and alliances. There is only one pod. But a vibration started at the center of it creates a hundred waves spreading in all direction. Such is this world.   - Mankutimma
title: ಹರಿವಂತೆ ಸಂಸಾರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: naranArimOhadim vamshavadakAgi mane ।nere horegaLUru rAShTragaLu sanghagaLu ॥kereyondu kEndradindaleye baLegaLu nUru ।harivante samsAra  - Mankutimma ॥ 406 ॥
kagga: ನರನಾರಿಮೋಹದಿಂ ವಂಶವದಕಾಗಿ ಮನೆ ।ನೆರೆ ಹೊರೆಗಳೂರು ರಾಷ್ಟ್ರಗಳು ಸಂಘಗಳು ॥ಕೆರೆಯೊಂದು ಕೇಂದ್ರದಿಂದಲೆಯೆ ಬಳೆಗಳು ನೂರು ।ಹರಿವಂತೆ ಸಂಸಾರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೬ ॥

content: ಅದರಿಂದ ನೀತಿ ನಯವದರಿಂದ ಕುಲಗೋತ್ರ ।ವದರಿಂದ ರಾಜ್ಯ ಮಠ ಧರ್ಮ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಗಳು ॥ಒದವುವದರಿಂದೆ ಮಮತಾನಾಶದವಕಾಶ- ।ವದರಿನಾತ್ಮವಿಕಾಸ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೭ ॥adarinda nIti nayavu adarinda kulagOtravu ।adarinda rAjya maTha dharma samsthegaLu ॥odavuvuad arinde mamatA nAshada avakAshavu ।adarinAtmavikAsa  - Mankutimma ॥ 407 ॥It (love between a man and a woman) leads to customs and traditions. Then to families and pride in dynasties. Nations, religious sects, moral framework and institutions follow. These again enable a person to shed his attachment and desire. From that follows the enrichment of the soul  - Mankutimma
translation: It (love between a man and a woman) leads to customs and traditions. Then to families and pride in dynasties. Nations, religious sects, moral framework and institutions follow. These again enable a person to shed his attachment and desire. From that follows the enrichment of the soul  - Mankutimma
title: ಅದರಿನಾತ್ಮವಿಕಾಸ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: adarinda nIti nayavu adarinda kulagOtravu ।adarinda rAjya maTha dharma samsthegaLu ॥odavuvuad arinde mamatA nAshada avakAshavu ।adarinAtmavikAsa  - Mankutimma ॥ 407 ॥
kagga: ಅದರಿಂದ ನೀತಿ ನಯವದರಿಂದ ಕುಲಗೋತ್ರ ।ವದರಿಂದ ರಾಜ್ಯ ಮಠ ಧರ್ಮ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಗಳು ॥ಒದವುವದರಿಂದೆ ಮಮತಾನಾಶದವಕಾಶ- ।ವದರಿನಾತ್ಮವಿಕಾಸ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೭ ॥

content: ತಲೆಯಿಂದ ತಲೆಗೆ, ಪೀಳಿಗೆಯಿಂದ ಪೀಳಿಗೆಗೆ ।ಅಲೆಯಿಂದಲಲೆಗೆ ಟಪ್ಪೆಯ ಚಾರನಂತೆ ॥ಇಳಿಯುತಿದೆ ಯುಗದಿಂದ ಯುಗಕೆ ಮಾನವಧರ್ಮ ।ನಿಲದಮೃತಧಾರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೮ ॥taleyinda talege, pILigeyinda pILigege ।aleyindalalege Tappeya chAranante ॥iLiyutide yugadinda yugake mAnavadharma ।niladu amRutadhAre  - Mankutimma ॥ 408 ॥Head to head (person to person), generation to generation, wave to a wave humanity is passing on information (traditions and customs) just like post man. This is happening since every epoch of time since the beginning. Individuals may perish. But humanity continues like a endless stream of elixir.   - Mankutimma
translation: Head to head (person to person), generation to generation, wave to a wave humanity is passing on information (traditions and customs) just like post man. This is happening since every epoch of time since the beginning. Individuals may perish. But humanity continues like a endless stream of elixir.   - Mankutimma
title: ನಿಲದಮೃತಧಾರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: taleyinda talege, pILigeyinda pILigege ।aleyindalalege Tappeya chAranante ॥iLiyutide yugadinda yugake mAnavadharma ।niladu amRutadhAre  - Mankutimma ॥ 408 ॥
kagga: ತಲೆಯಿಂದ ತಲೆಗೆ, ಪೀಳಿಗೆಯಿಂದ ಪೀಳಿಗೆಗೆ ।ಅಲೆಯಿಂದಲಲೆಗೆ ಟಪ್ಪೆಯ ಚಾರನಂತೆ ॥ಇಳಿಯುತಿದೆ ಯುಗದಿಂದ ಯುಗಕೆ ಮಾನವಧರ್ಮ ।ನಿಲದಮೃತಧಾರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೮ ॥

content: ಮಾನುಷದ ಚರಿತೆ ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವಸಾಕ್ಷಾತ್ಕವಿತೆ ।ಕಾಣಿಪುದದಾತ್ಮಸ್ವಭಾವದುದ್ಗಮವ ॥ಏನಾಶೆ! ಯೇನು ಸಾಹಸ! ವೇನು ಭಂಗಗಳು! ।ಆನುಭವವೇದವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೯ ॥mAnuShada charite parasattva sAkShAt kavite ।kANipudu adu AtmasvabhAvada udgamava ॥EnAsheyu! Enu sAhasavu! Enu bhangagaLu! ।AnubhavavEdavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 409 ॥The story of mankind is beautiful poetry composed  by the cosmic spirit. In this poem we see the rise of the soul (self). What desires! What courage! What antics! What beautiful experiences! (as comparable to the Vedas)   - Mankutimma
translation: The story of mankind is beautiful poetry composed  by the cosmic spirit. In this poem we see the rise of the soul (self). What desires! What courage! What antics! What beautiful experiences! (as comparable to the Vedas)   - Mankutimma
title: ಆನುಭವವೇದವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mAnuShada charite parasattva sAkShAt kavite ।kANipudu adu AtmasvabhAvada udgamava ॥EnAsheyu! Enu sAhasavu! Enu bhangagaLu! ।AnubhavavEdavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 409 ॥
kagga: ಮಾನುಷದ ಚರಿತೆ ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವಸಾಕ್ಷಾತ್ಕವಿತೆ ।ಕಾಣಿಪುದದಾತ್ಮಸ್ವಭಾವದುದ್ಗಮವ ॥ಏನಾಶೆ! ಯೇನು ಸಾಹಸ! ವೇನು ಭಂಗಗಳು! ।ಆನುಭವವೇದವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦೯ ॥

content: ಜಾನಪದಗಳು ರಾಜ್ಯಸಾಮ್ರಾಜ್ಯಗಳು ಗುರು ।ಸ್ಥಾನಗಳು ಧರ್ಮಗಳು ಭಾಷೆ ವಿದ್ಯೆಗಳು ॥ಕಾಣಿಸದೆ ಸಾಗಿಹವು ಕಾಲಪ್ರವಾಹದಲಿ ।ಮಾನವತೆ ನಿಂತಿಹುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೦ ॥ janapadagaLu rAjyasAmrAjyagaLu guru ।sthAnagaLu dharmagaLu bhAShe vidyegaLu ॥kANisade sAgihavu kAlapravAhadali ।mAnavate nintihudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 410 ॥Provinces, states, empires, pontiffs, positions, religions, languages, skills and teachings have all come and gone in this flood of time. Only humanity stands constant.  - Mankutimma
translation: Provinces, states, empires, pontiffs, positions, religions, languages, skills and teachings have all come and gone in this flood of time. Only humanity stands constant.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಾನವತೆ ನಿಂತಿಹುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: janapadagaLu rAjyasAmrAjyagaLu guru ।sthAnagaLu dharmagaLu bhAShe vidyegaLu ॥kANisade sAgihavu kAlapravAhadali ।mAnavate nintihudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 410 ॥
kagga: ಜಾನಪದಗಳು ರಾಜ್ಯಸಾಮ್ರಾಜ್ಯಗಳು ಗುರು ।ಸ್ಥಾನಗಳು ಧರ್ಮಗಳು ಭಾಷೆ ವಿದ್ಯೆಗಳು ॥ಕಾಣಿಸದೆ ಸಾಗಿಹವು ಕಾಲಪ್ರವಾಹದಲಿ ।ಮಾನವತೆ ನಿಂತಿಹುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೦ ॥

content: ತೆರಪನರಿಯದೆ ಪರಿವ ಕಾಲಪ್ರವಾಹದಲಿ ।ಪುರುಷರಚಿತಗಳೆನಿತೊ ತೇಲಿಹೋಗಿಹವು ॥ಪುರ ರಾಷ್ಟ್ರ ದುರ್ಗಗಳು, ಮತ ನೀತಿ ಯುಕ್ತಿಗಳು ।ಪುರುಷತನ ನಿಂತಿಹುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೧ ॥terapanu ariyade pariva kAlapravAhadali ।puruSha rachitagaLenito tElihOgihavu ॥pura rAShTra durgagaLu, mata nIti yuktigaLu ।puruShatana nintihudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 411 ॥Time flows incessantly. In this flow man made artefacts have all gone floating and drifting  - cities, countries, forts, castes, moral constructs, wisdom. Mankind alone stands.  - Mankutimma
translation: Time flows incessantly. In this flow man made artefacts have all gone floating and drifting  - cities, countries, forts, castes, moral constructs, wisdom. Mankind alone stands.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪುರುಷತನ ನಿಂತಿಹುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: terapanu ariyade pariva kAlapravAhadali ।puruSha rachitagaLenito tElihOgihavu ॥pura rAShTra durgagaLu, mata nIti yuktigaLu ।puruShatana nintihudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 411 ॥
kagga: ತೆರಪನರಿಯದೆ ಪರಿವ ಕಾಲಪ್ರವಾಹದಲಿ ।ಪುರುಷರಚಿತಗಳೆನಿತೊ ತೇಲಿಹೋಗಿಹವು ॥ಪುರ ರಾಷ್ಟ್ರ ದುರ್ಗಗಳು, ಮತ ನೀತಿ ಯುಕ್ತಿಗಳು ।ಪುರುಷತನ ನಿಂತಿಹುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೧ ॥

content: ಜನಿಸಿದೆಡೆಯಿಂ ಕಡಲವರೆಗಮಡಿಯಡಿ ನೆಲದ ।ಗುಣದ ಕೊಳ್ಳುತ ಕೊಡುತ ಪೊನಲು ಮಾರ್ಪಡುಗಂ ॥ಮನುಜಸಂತಾನದಲಿ ಗುಣದವತರಣವಂತು ।ಗುಣಿಪುದೆಂತಾ ತೆರನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೨ ॥janisideDeyim kaDalavaregamaDiyaDi nelada ।guNada koLLuta koDuta ponalu mArpaDugam ॥manujasantAnadali guNadavataraNavantu ।guNipudentA terana  - Mankutimma ॥ 412 ॥A river flows from its birthplace to the sea. All along, it collects qualities of the earth and giving the earth some of its own qualities  - forever changing. It is the same with qualities of humanity. They keep changing in every generation. One can not keep count or track of how the changes happen.  - Mankutimma
translation: A river flows from its birthplace to the sea. All along, it collects qualities of the earth and giving the earth some of its own qualities  - forever changing. It is the same with qualities of humanity. They keep changing in every generation. One can not keep count or track of how the changes happen.  - Mankutimma
title: ಗುಣಿಪುದೆಂತಾ ತೆರನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: janisideDeyim kaDalavaregamaDiyaDi nelada ।guNada koLLuta koDuta ponalu mArpaDugam ॥manujasantAnadali guNadavataraNavantu ।guNipudentA terana  - Mankutimma ॥ 412 ॥
kagga: ಜನಿಸಿದೆಡೆಯಿಂ ಕಡಲವರೆಗಮಡಿಯಡಿ ನೆಲದ ।ಗುಣದ ಕೊಳ್ಳುತ ಕೊಡುತ ಪೊನಲು ಮಾರ್ಪಡುಗಂ ॥ಮನುಜಸಂತಾನದಲಿ ಗುಣದವತರಣವಂತು ।ಗುಣಿಪುದೆಂತಾ ತೆರನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೨ ॥

content: ಬರಿಯ ಹೆಣ್ ಬರಿಯ ಗಂಡೆಂಬುದಿಳೆಯೊಳಗಿಲ್ಲ ।ಬೆರಕೆಯಲ್ಲರುಮರ್ಧನಾರೀಶನಂತೆ ॥ನರತೆಯಣು ನಾರಿಯಲಿ ನಾರೀತ್ವ ನರನೊಳಣು ।ತಿರಿಚುತಿರುವುದು ಮನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೩ ॥bariya heN bariya ganDembudu iLeyoLagilla ।berakeyallarum ardhanArIshanante ॥narateyanu nAriyali nArItva naranoLaNu ।tirichutiruvudu manava  - Mankutimma ॥ 413 ॥No one in this world is entirely male or entirely female. All of us are like Lord Shiva a mixture of both male and female qualities. There will always be soft woman-like qualities in a man. There will be harsh man-like qualities in every woman. The mix of these qualities twist our mind in various ways.  - Mankutimma
translation: No one in this world is entirely male or entirely female. All of us are like Lord Shiva a mixture of both male and female qualities. There will always be soft woman-like qualities in a man. There will be harsh man-like qualities in every woman. The mix of these qualities twist our mind in various ways.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಿರಿಚುತಿರುವುದು ಮನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bariya heN bariya ganDembudu iLeyoLagilla ।berakeyallarum ardhanArIshanante ॥narateyanu nAriyali nArItva naranoLaNu ।tirichutiruvudu manava  - Mankutimma ॥ 413 ॥
kagga: ಬರಿಯ ಹೆಣ್ ಬರಿಯ ಗಂಡೆಂಬುದಿಳೆಯೊಳಗಿಲ್ಲ ।ಬೆರಕೆಯಲ್ಲರುಮರ್ಧನಾರೀಶನಂತೆ ॥ನರತೆಯಣು ನಾರಿಯಲಿ ನಾರೀತ್ವ ನರನೊಳಣು ।ತಿರಿಚುತಿರುವುದು ಮನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೩ ॥

content: ಅಳೆವನಾರ್ ಪೆಣ್ಗಂಡುಗಳನೆಳೆವ ನೂಲುಗಳ? ।ಕೆಳೆಪಗೆಗಳೆಲ್ಲವಾಳದಲಿ ಬಲು ತೊಡಕು ॥ಇಳೆಯ ಋಣಗಳ ಲೆಕ್ಕವಿಹುದು ವಿಧಿಯಕ್ಕರದಿ ।ತಿಳಿಯಗೊಡನದ ನಮಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೪ ॥aLevanAr peNganDugaLanu eLeva nUlugaLa? ।keLe pagegaLu ellavu ALadali balu toDaku ॥iLeya RuNagaLa lekkamihudu vidhiyakkaradi ।tiLiyagoDanu ada namage  - Mankutimma ॥ 414 ॥Who is to explain (measure) the bonding that strings a man and woman together? The love, the hatred are feelings that are all confusing at the very depth. One can not be distinguished from another. But, providence will keep a detailed account of all our actions. It simply does not let us know the fact.  - Mankutimma
translation: Who is to explain (measure) the bonding that strings a man and woman together? The love, the hatred are feelings that are all confusing at the very depth. One can not be distinguished from another. But, providence will keep a detailed account of all our actions. It simply does not let us know the fact.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಿಳಿಯಗೊಡನದ ನಮಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aLevanAr peNganDugaLanu eLeva nUlugaLa? ।keLe pagegaLu ellavu ALadali balu toDaku ॥iLeya RuNagaLa lekkamihudu vidhiyakkaradi ।tiLiyagoDanu ada namage  - Mankutimma ॥ 414 ॥
kagga: ಅಳೆವನಾರ್ ಪೆಣ್ಗಂಡುಗಳನೆಳೆವ ನೂಲುಗಳ? ।ಕೆಳೆಪಗೆಗಳೆಲ್ಲವಾಳದಲಿ ಬಲು ತೊಡಕು ॥ಇಳೆಯ ಋಣಗಳ ಲೆಕ್ಕವಿಹುದು ವಿಧಿಯಕ್ಕರದಿ ।ತಿಳಿಯಗೊಡನದ ನಮಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೪ ॥

content: ಎಲ್ಲಿಯದನೊ ಅದೆಲ್ಲಿಯದಕೋ ಹೆಣೆಯುವನು ।ಒಲ್ಲೆವೆನೆ ನೀವೆ ಕಿತ್ತಾಡಿಕೊಳಿರೆನುವನ್ ॥ಬೆಲ್ಲದಡುಗೆಯಲಿ ಹಿಡಿ ಮರಳನೆರಚಿರಿಸುವನು ।ಒಳ್ಳೆಯುಪಕಾರಿ ವಿಧಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೫ ॥elliyadano adelliyadakO heNeyuvanu ।ollevene nIve kittADikoLirenuvan ॥belladaDukeyali hiDi maraLanerachirisuvanu ।oLLeyupakAri vidhi  - Mankutimma ॥ 415 ॥Providence binds beings from some place to another in a different (far away) place. If people resist, then it will let them both by themselves to fight it out between them. This act of fate has not logic and does not seem to help the people involved. It is like throwing a handful of sand in a sweet dish (mostly sweet, but cannot eat because of the sand).  - Mankutimma
translation: Providence binds beings from some place to another in a different (far away) place. If people resist, then it will let them both by themselves to fight it out between them. This act of fate has not logic and does not seem to help the people involved. It is like throwing a handful of sand in a sweet dish (mostly sweet, but cannot eat because of the sand).  - Mankutimma
title: ಒಳ್ಳೆಯುಪಕಾರಿ ವಿಧಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: elliyadano adelliyadakO heNeyuvanu ।ollevene nIve kittADikoLirenuvan ॥belladaDukeyali hiDi maraLanerachirisuvanu ।oLLeyupakAri vidhi  - Mankutimma ॥ 415 ॥
kagga: ಎಲ್ಲಿಯದನೊ ಅದೆಲ್ಲಿಯದಕೋ ಹೆಣೆಯುವನು ।ಒಲ್ಲೆವೆನೆ ನೀವೆ ಕಿತ್ತಾಡಿಕೊಳಿರೆನುವನ್ ॥ಬೆಲ್ಲದಡುಗೆಯಲಿ ಹಿಡಿ ಮರಳನೆರಚಿರಿಸುವನು ।ಒಳ್ಳೆಯುಪಕಾರಿ ವಿಧಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೫ ॥

content: ಕುಸುಮಕೋಮಲಗಾತ್ರ ಶೂರ್ಪಣಖಿಗರಿದಾಯ್ತೆ? ।ವಿಷದ ಪೂತನಿ ನಯನಪಕ್ಷ್ಮದೊಳಗಿರಳೆ? ॥ಮುಸಿನಗುವಿನೊಳಗಿರಲಶಕ್ಯವೆ ಪಿಶಾಚಿಕೆಗೆ ।ಮೃಷೆಯೊ ಮೈಬೆಡಗೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೬ ॥kusuma kOmala gAtra shUrpaNakhige aridAyte? ।vishada pUtani nayanapakShmadoLagiraLe? ॥musinaguvinoLagiralashakyave pishAchikege ।mRuSheyo maibeDagella  - Mankutimma ॥ 416 ॥Did Shoorpanakha not take the form of a delicate damsel? Did Putani whose body was full of poison not appear to be very pleasing (as harmless as the eye-lashes) to the eyes? Can a smile not hide devious intention? The whole bodily appearance is nothing but a lie.  - Mankutimma
translation: Did Shoorpanakha not take the form of a delicate damsel? Did Putani whose body was full of poison not appear to be very pleasing (as harmless as the eye-lashes) to the eyes? Can a smile not hide devious intention? The whole bodily appearance is nothing but a lie.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೃಷೆಯೊ ಮೈಬೆಡಗೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kusuma kOmala gAtra shUrpaNakhige aridAyte? ।vishada pUtani nayanapakShmadoLagiraLe? ॥musinaguvinoLagiralashakyave pishAchikege ।mRuSheyo maibeDagella  - Mankutimma ॥ 416 ॥
kagga: ಕುಸುಮಕೋಮಲಗಾತ್ರ ಶೂರ್ಪಣಖಿಗರಿದಾಯ್ತೆ? ।ವಿಷದ ಪೂತನಿ ನಯನಪಕ್ಷ್ಮದೊಳಗಿರಳೆ? ॥ಮುಸಿನಗುವಿನೊಳಗಿರಲಶಕ್ಯವೆ ಪಿಶಾಚಿಕೆಗೆ ।ಮೃಷೆಯೊ ಮೈಬೆಡಗೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೬ ॥

content: ಹೇಮಕುಂಭದಿ ಕೊಳಚೆರೊಚ್ಚುನೀರ್ಗಳ ತುಂಬಿ ।ರಾಮನೀಯಕದೊಳಿಟ್ಟಾಮಗಂಧವನು ॥ಪ್ರೇಮಪುಷ್ಪಕೆ ಮೊನಚು ಗರಗಸವನಂಚಿರಿಸಿ ।ಏಂ ಮಾಡಿದನೊ ಬೊಮ್ಮ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೭ ॥hEmakumbhadi koLacherochchunIrgaLa tumbi ।rAmanIyakadoLiTTAmagandhavanu ॥prEmapuShpake monachu garagasavanancharisi ।Em mADidano bomma!  - Mankutimma ॥ 417 ॥What has this creator made? He has kept dirty (mixed with waste and mire) water in a golden pot. He has given bad smell (of meat and death) to a beautiful thing. He has given love razor sharp edges. Oh! What an irony!  - Mankutimma
translation: What has this creator made? He has kept dirty (mixed with waste and mire) water in a golden pot. He has given bad smell (of meat and death) to a beautiful thing. He has given love razor sharp edges. Oh! What an irony!  - Mankutimma
title: ಏಂ ಮಾಡಿದನೊ ಬೊಮ್ಮ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hEmakumbhadi koLacherochchunIrgaLa tumbi ।rAmanIyakadoLiTTAmagandhavanu ॥prEmapuShpake monachu garagasavanancharisi ।Em mADidano bomma!  - Mankutimma ॥ 417 ॥
