content: ಕೈಕೇಯಿ ಸತ್ಯಭಾಮೆಯರಂಶವಿರದ ಪೆಣ್ ।ಲೋಕದೊಳಗಿರಳು; ಬೆಳೆವುದು ಲೋಕವವರಿಂ ॥ಸಾಕಿ ಸಲಹುವ ಮತ್ಸರವದು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯುಪಾಯ ।ಬೇಕದಕೆ ನಗು ಸಹನೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೮ ॥kaikEyi satyabhAmeyara anshavirada peN ।lOkadoLage iraLu; beLEvudu lOkavavarim ॥sAki salahuva matsaravadu sRuShTiyupAya ।bEkadake nagu sahane  - Mankutimma ॥ 418 ॥There is no lady in this world who does not have few qualities of Kaikeyi and Satyabhama. This world is growing only because of them. It is creator;s plot to encourage such behavior in people so that the world can move on. To deal with that, one needs to recognize it, laugh about it and have a little patience.  - Mankutimma
translation: There is no lady in this world who does not have few qualities of Kaikeyi and Satyabhama. This world is growing only because of them. It is creator;s plot to encourage such behavior in people so that the world can move on. To deal with that, one needs to recognize it, laugh about it and have a little patience.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬೇಕದಕೆ ನಗು ಸಹನೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kaikEyi satyabhAmeyara anshavirada peN ।lOkadoLage iraLu; beLEvudu lOkavavarim ॥sAki salahuva matsaravadu sRuShTiyupAya ।bEkadake nagu sahane  - Mankutimma ॥ 418 ॥
kagga: ಕೈಕೇಯಿ ಸತ್ಯಭಾಮೆಯರಂಶವಿರದ ಪೆಣ್ ।ಲೋಕದೊಳಗಿರಳು; ಬೆಳೆವುದು ಲೋಕವವರಿಂ ॥ಸಾಕಿ ಸಲಹುವ ಮತ್ಸರವದು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯುಪಾಯ ।ಬೇಕದಕೆ ನಗು ಸಹನೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೮ ॥

content: ಎಳೆಯ ತರು ದಿನದಿನವು ಹೊಸತಳಿರ ತಳೆವಂತೆ ।ತಿಳಿನೀರು ಚಿಲುಮೆಯಲಿ ನಿಲದುಕ್ಕುವಂತೆ ॥ಎಳೆ ಮಕ್ಕಳೊಳು ತಿಳಿವು ಮೊಳೆತು ಬೆಳೆವುದು ನೋಡು ।ಇಳೆಯೊಳಗದೊಂದು ಸೊಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೯ ॥eLeya taru dinadinavu hosataLira taLevante ।tiLinIru chilumeyali niladukkuvante ॥eLe makkaLoLu tiLivu moLetu beLEvudu nODu ।iLeyoLage adondu soga  - Mankutimma ॥ 419 ॥A small plant will sprout new leaves every day. Fresh water flows out of a spring without stopping. Young children become wiser and grow up every day. Watching all this in on this earth is itself fun.  - Mankutimma
translation: A small plant will sprout new leaves every day. Fresh water flows out of a spring without stopping. Young children become wiser and grow up every day. Watching all this in on this earth is itself fun.  - Mankutimma
title: ಇಳೆಯೊಳಗದೊಂದು ಸೊಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: eLeya taru dinadinavu hosataLira taLevante ।tiLinIru chilumeyali niladukkuvante ॥eLe makkaLoLu tiLivu moLetu beLEvudu nODu ।iLeyoLage adondu soga  - Mankutimma ॥ 419 ॥
kagga: ಎಳೆಯ ತರು ದಿನದಿನವು ಹೊಸತಳಿರ ತಳೆವಂತೆ ।ತಿಳಿನೀರು ಚಿಲುಮೆಯಲಿ ನಿಲದುಕ್ಕುವಂತೆ ॥ಎಳೆ ಮಕ್ಕಳೊಳು ತಿಳಿವು ಮೊಳೆತು ಬೆಳೆವುದು ನೋಡು ।ಇಳೆಯೊಳಗದೊಂದು ಸೊಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧೯ ॥

content: ಮಕ್ಕಳ ಭವಿಷ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ ಕಕ್ಕುಲಿತೆಗೊಳಬೇಡ ।ಪಕ್ಕಾಗುವುದು ಭಾಗ್ಯವೆಂತೆಂತೊ ಜಗದಿ ॥ದಕ್ಕಿತೇಂ ಕುರುಪಾಂಡುತನಯರ್ಗೆ ರಾಜ್ಯಸುಖ? ।ದಿಕ್ಕುವರಿಗವರವರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೦ ॥makkaLa bhaviShyakke kakkulitegoLabEDa ।pakkAguvudu bhAgyaventento jagadi ॥dakkitEm kurupAnDutanayarge rAjyasukha? ।dikku avarige avaravare  - Mankutimma ॥ 420 ॥Don;t be worried about the children;s future. Fate will bring strange things beyond your control into their lives. Were the children of either Pandu or Kuru (Kaurava and brothers) able to enjoy the kingdom in peace? Each one will find his own way.  - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t be worried about the children;s future. Fate will bring strange things beyond your control into their lives. Were the children of either Pandu or Kuru (Kaurava and brothers) able to enjoy the kingdom in peace? Each one will find his own way.  - Mankutimma
title: ದಿಕ್ಕುವರಿಗವರವರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: makkaLa bhaviShyakke kakkulitegoLabEDa ।pakkAguvudu bhAgyaventento jagadi ॥dakkitEm kurupAnDutanayarge rAjyasukha? ।dikku avarige avaravare  - Mankutimma ॥ 420 ॥
kagga: ಮಕ್ಕಳ ಭವಿಷ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ ಕಕ್ಕುಲಿತೆಗೊಳಬೇಡ ।ಪಕ್ಕಾಗುವುದು ಭಾಗ್ಯವೆಂತೆಂತೊ ಜಗದಿ ॥ದಕ್ಕಿತೇಂ ಕುರುಪಾಂಡುತನಯರ್ಗೆ ರಾಜ್ಯಸುಖ? ।ದಿಕ್ಕುವರಿಗವರವರೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೦ ॥

content: ತನುಭವವ್ಯಾಮೋಹ ಮುಸುಕಿತಾ ವ್ಯಾಸನಂ? ।ಜನಿಪುದದು ಪ್ರಕೃತಿತಂತ್ರದೆ ಹೃದಯತಲದೊಳ್ ॥ಕ್ಷಣಮಾತ್ರಮಾನುಮದು ಕಣ್ಣೀರ ಬರಿಸುವುದು ।ಗಣಿಸಬೇಡದನು ನೀಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೧ ॥tanubhava vyAmOha musukitA vyAsanam? ।janipudadu prakRutitantrade hRudayataladoL ॥kShaNamAtramAnumadu kaNNIra barisuvudu ।gaNisabEDadanu nIm  - Mankutimma ॥ 421 ॥Who is able to escape the attachment towards their children? Even the omniscient sage Vyasa could not control himself when his son was separated from him. The attachment takes birth in one;s heart naturally. It brings tears to one;s eyes as soon as there is separation. One must not take these feelings too strongly.  - Mankutimma
translation: Who is able to escape the attachment towards their children? Even the omniscient sage Vyasa could not control himself when his son was separated from him. The attachment takes birth in one;s heart naturally. It brings tears to one;s eyes as soon as there is separation. One must not take these feelings too strongly.  - Mankutimma
title: ಗಣಿಸಬೇಡದನು ನೀಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tanubhava vyAmOha musukitA vyAsanam? ।janipudadu prakRutitantrade hRudayataladoL ॥kShaNamAtramAnumadu kaNNIra barisuvudu ।gaNisabEDadanu nIm  - Mankutimma ॥ 421 ॥
kagga: ತನುಭವವ್ಯಾಮೋಹ ಮುಸುಕಿತಾ ವ್ಯಾಸನಂ? ।ಜನಿಪುದದು ಪ್ರಕೃತಿತಂತ್ರದೆ ಹೃದಯತಲದೊಳ್ ॥ಕ್ಷಣಮಾತ್ರಮಾನುಮದು ಕಣ್ಣೀರ ಬರಿಸುವುದು ।ಗಣಿಸಬೇಡದನು ನೀಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೧ ॥

content: ಅನುರಾಗದುಃಖಂಗಳೊಮ್ಮೊಮ್ಮೆ ಬಿರುಬೀಸಿ ।ಮನದಿ ತೆರೆಗಳ ಕುಲುಕಿ ಕಡೆಯುವುದುಮೊಳಿತು ॥ಘನ ವರ್ಷ ಬಿರುಗಾಳಿ ಬಡಿಯಲಿರುಳೊಳ್ ನೆಲನ ।ದಿನದ ಸೊಗಸಿಮ್ಮಡಿಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೨ ॥anurAgadukhangaLu ommomme birubIsi ।manadi teregaLa kuluki kaDeyuvudum oLitu ॥ghana varSha birugALi baDiyaliruLoL nelana ।dinada sogasimmaDiyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 422 ॥Love and disappointment sometimes create a storm in our minds and disturb our peace. It is good. When it pours all night with strong winds, the following morning will be bright and pleasant  - Mankutimma
translation: Love and disappointment sometimes create a storm in our minds and disturb our peace. It is good. When it pours all night with strong winds, the following morning will be bright and pleasant  - Mankutimma
title: ದಿನದ ಸೊಗಸಿಮ್ಮಡಿಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: anurAgadukhangaLu ommomme birubIsi ।manadi teregaLa kuluki kaDeyuvudum oLitu ॥ghana varSha birugALi baDiyaliruLoL nelana ।dinada sogasimmaDiyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 422 ॥
kagga: ಅನುರಾಗದುಃಖಂಗಳೊಮ್ಮೊಮ್ಮೆ ಬಿರುಬೀಸಿ ।ಮನದಿ ತೆರೆಗಳ ಕುಲುಕಿ ಕಡೆಯುವುದುಮೊಳಿತು ॥ಘನ ವರ್ಷ ಬಿರುಗಾಳಿ ಬಡಿಯಲಿರುಳೊಳ್ ನೆಲನ ।ದಿನದ ಸೊಗಸಿಮ್ಮಡಿಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೨ ॥

content: ಭಾವರಾಗೋದ್ರೇಕ ತಾನೆ ತಪ್ಪೇನಲ್ಲ ।ಧೀವಿವೇಕದ ಸಮತೆಯದರಿನದಿರದಿರೆ ॥ಸ್ವಾವಿದ್ಯೆಯಾ ಮೋಹ ಮಮತೆಯದನಂಟದಿರೆ ।ಪಾವನವೊ ಹೃನ್ಮಥನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೩ ॥bhAvarAga udrEka tAne tappEnalla ।dhIvivEkada samateyu adarin adiradire ॥sva avidyeyA mOha mamateyadanu anTadire ।pAvanavo hRunmathana  - Mankutimma ॥ 423 ॥It is not wrong to succumb to feelings and emotions. But one must not lose the balance of wisdom and intellect. If the feelings are pure and free from innate ignorance, attachment and love then they will cleanse your heart.  - Mankutimma
translation: It is not wrong to succumb to feelings and emotions. But one must not lose the balance of wisdom and intellect. If the feelings are pure and free from innate ignorance, attachment and love then they will cleanse your heart.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪಾವನವೊ ಹೃನ್ಮಥನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bhAvarAga udrEka tAne tappEnalla ।dhIvivEkada samateyu adarin adiradire ॥sva avidyeyA mOha mamateyadanu anTadire ।pAvanavo hRunmathana  - Mankutimma ॥ 423 ॥
kagga: ಭಾವರಾಗೋದ್ರೇಕ ತಾನೆ ತಪ್ಪೇನಲ್ಲ ।ಧೀವಿವೇಕದ ಸಮತೆಯದರಿನದಿರದಿರೆ ॥ಸ್ವಾವಿದ್ಯೆಯಾ ಮೋಹ ಮಮತೆಯದನಂಟದಿರೆ ।ಪಾವನವೊ ಹೃನ್ಮಥನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೩ ॥

content: ಕಾರಿರುಳೊಳಾಗಸದಿ ತಾರೆ ನೂರಿದ್ದೇನು? ।ದಾರಿಗನ ಕಣ್ಗೆ ಬೇಕೊಂದು ಮನೆಬೆಳಕು ॥ದೂರದಾ ದೈವವಂತಿರಲಿ, ಮಾನುಷಸಖನ ।ಕೋರುವುದು ಬಡಜೀವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೪ ॥kAriruLoLu Agasadi tAre nUriddEnu? ।dArigana kaNge bEkondu manebeLaku ॥dUradA daivavantirali, mAnuShasakhana ।kOruvudu baDajIva  - Mankutimma ॥ 424 ॥In a dark night when the sky is dark, what is the use of a hundreds of stars? A traveller will seek not the light from stars, but the light from a home where he can be safe. Let us have faith in a God who is far away. But for day-to-day counselling one needs a friend. That;s all the poor soul is asking for.  - Mankutimma
translation: In a dark night when the sky is dark, what is the use of a hundreds of stars? A traveller will seek not the light from stars, but the light from a home where he can be safe. Let us have faith in a God who is far away. But for day-to-day counselling one needs a friend. That;s all the poor soul is asking for.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕೋರುವುದು ಬಡಜೀವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kAriruLoLu Agasadi tAre nUriddEnu? ।dArigana kaNge bEkondu manebeLaku ॥dUradA daivavantirali, mAnuShasakhana ।kOruvudu baDajIva  - Mankutimma ॥ 424 ॥
kagga: ಕಾರಿರುಳೊಳಾಗಸದಿ ತಾರೆ ನೂರಿದ್ದೇನು? ।ದಾರಿಗನ ಕಣ್ಗೆ ಬೇಕೊಂದು ಮನೆಬೆಳಕು ॥ದೂರದಾ ದೈವವಂತಿರಲಿ, ಮಾನುಷಸಖನ ।ಕೋರುವುದು ಬಡಜೀವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೪ ॥

content: ಹರಿಗೆ ನಿನ್ನನುರಾಗವೆಲ್ಲವನು ಸಲ್ಲಿಸೆನೆ ।ಮರುನುಡಿಯ ನುಡಿವನೇನ್ ಒಡಲ ತೋರದನು? ॥ಪರಿತಪಿಸುವುದು ಜೀವ ಜೀವಸರಸವನೆಳಸಿ ।ನರಧರ್ಮಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೫ ॥harige ninna anurAgavellavanu sallisene ।marunuDiya nuDivanEn oDala tOradanu? ॥paritapisuvudu jIva jIvasarasavaneLAsi ।naradharmasUkshmavidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 425 ॥It is often asked of us to devote all our love to Him (God). But how is that easy? He has not shown himself ever. He has not spoken to us. Human beings always find it easy to love those and long for whom they can see and connect to.  - Mankutimma
translation: It is often asked of us to devote all our love to Him (God). But how is that easy? He has not shown himself ever. He has not spoken to us. Human beings always find it easy to love those and long for whom they can see and connect to.  - Mankutimma
title: ನರಧರ್ಮಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: harige ninna anurAgavellavanu sallisene ।marunuDiya nuDivanEn oDala tOradanu? ॥paritapisuvudu jIva jIvasarasavaneLAsi ।naradharmasUkshmavidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 425 ॥
kagga: ಹರಿಗೆ ನಿನ್ನನುರಾಗವೆಲ್ಲವನು ಸಲ್ಲಿಸೆನೆ ।ಮರುನುಡಿಯ ನುಡಿವನೇನ್ ಒಡಲ ತೋರದನು? ॥ಪರಿತಪಿಸುವುದು ಜೀವ ಜೀವಸರಸವನೆಳಸಿ ।ನರಧರ್ಮಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೫ ॥

content: ಮನುಜರೂಪದಿನಾದರವನು ಪಡೆಯದ ಹೃದಯ- ।ವನುರಾಗವನು ಬಿಡಾಲಕೊ ಶುಕಕೊ ಕಪಿಗೊ ॥ಶುನಕಕೋ ಸುರಿದದರ ಮಾರ್ದನಿಯನಾಲಿಪುದು ।ತಣಿವು ಜೀವಸ್ವರದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೬ ॥manujarUpadin Adaravanu paDeyada hRudayavu ।anurAgavanu biDAlako shukako kapigo ॥shunakakO suridu adara mArdaniyan Alipudu ।taNivu jIvasvarade  - Mankutimma ॥ 426 ॥When a person does not get enough love he diverts all his love towards a cat, a parrot, a monkey or a dog. He listens to the sounds they make and finds solace in it. Everyone longs to be spoken to  - at least by pets.  - Mankutimma
translation: When a person does not get enough love he diverts all his love towards a cat, a parrot, a monkey or a dog. He listens to the sounds they make and finds solace in it. Everyone longs to be spoken to  - at least by pets.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಣಿವು ಜೀವಸ್ವರದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: manujarUpadin Adaravanu paDeyada hRudayavu ।anurAgavanu biDAlako shukako kapigo ॥shunakakO suridu adara mArdaniyan Alipudu ।taNivu jIvasvarade  - Mankutimma ॥ 426 ॥
kagga: ಮನುಜರೂಪದಿನಾದರವನು ಪಡೆಯದ ಹೃದಯ- ।ವನುರಾಗವನು ಬಿಡಾಲಕೊ ಶುಕಕೊ ಕಪಿಗೊ ॥ಶುನಕಕೋ ಸುರಿದದರ ಮಾರ್ದನಿಯನಾಲಿಪುದು ।ತಣಿವು ಜೀವಸ್ವರದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೬ ॥

content: ಮಾತೆವೊಲೊ ಪಿತನವೊಲೊ ಪತಿಯವೊಲೊ ಸತಿಯವೊಲೊ ।ಭ್ರಾತಸುತಸಖರವೊಲೊ ಪಾತ್ರವೊಂದಕೆ ತಾಂ ॥ಕಾತರಿಸುತಿಹುದು ತನ್ನೆಲ್ಲವನು ಮುಡುಪುಕುಡೆ ।ಪ್ರೀತಿಯ ಹುಚ್ಚು ಚಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೭ ॥mAtevolo pitanavolo patiyavolo satiyavolo ।bhrAtasutasakharavolo pAtravondake tAm ॥kAtarisuta ihudu tanna ellavanu mudupukuDe ।prItiya huchchu chaTa  - Mankutimma ॥ 427 ॥Everyone is bit by this love bug. Its an addiction. They want to show their love to others  - as a mother, as a father, as a husband, as a wife, as a brother, as a son or as a friend.  - Mankutimma
translation: Everyone is bit by this love bug. Its an addiction. They want to show their love to others  - as a mother, as a father, as a husband, as a wife, as a brother, as a son or as a friend.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪ್ರೀತಿಯ ಹುಚ್ಚು ಚಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mAtevolo pitanavolo patiyavolo satiyavolo ।bhrAtasutasakharavolo pAtravondake tAm ॥kAtarisuta ihudu tanna ellavanu mudupukuDe ।prItiya huchchu chaTa  - Mankutimma ॥ 427 ॥
kagga: ಮಾತೆವೊಲೊ ಪಿತನವೊಲೊ ಪತಿಯವೊಲೊ ಸತಿಯವೊಲೊ ।ಭ್ರಾತಸುತಸಖರವೊಲೊ ಪಾತ್ರವೊಂದಕೆ ತಾಂ ॥ಕಾತರಿಸುತಿಹುದು ತನ್ನೆಲ್ಲವನು ಮುಡುಪುಕುಡೆ ।ಪ್ರೀತಿಯ ಹುಚ್ಚು ಚಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೭ ॥

content: ಪ್ರೇಮ ಕನಲೆ ಪಿಶಾಚಿ, ತೃಪ್ತಿಯಾಂತಿರೆ ಲಕ್ಷ್ಮಿ ।ಭ್ರಾಮಿಪುದದು ಪ್ರತಿಪ್ರೇಮಯಾಚನೆಯೊಳ್ ॥ಮಾಮಕವಿದೆಂದಾವುದಕೊ ತಾನೆ ಬಲಿವೋಗಿ ।ಶಾಮನವನೊಂದುವುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೮ ॥prEma kanale pishAchi, tRuptiyAntire lakshmi ।bhrAmipudadu pratiprEmayAchaneyoL ॥mAmakavu idu endu AvudakO tAne balavOgi ।shAmanavanu honduvudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 428 ॥Love is two faced. If it is irritated, it becomes a demon. If it is satisfied, it is as peaceful as Lakshmi. It wanders about looking for someone who can return love. Love alone has the ability to do the supreme sacrifice of offering oneself to someone else. It attains peace thereby.  - Mankutimma
translation: Love is two faced. If it is irritated, it becomes a demon. If it is satisfied, it is as peaceful as Lakshmi. It wanders about looking for someone who can return love. Love alone has the ability to do the supreme sacrifice of offering oneself to someone else. It attains peace thereby.  - Mankutimma
title: ಶಾಮನವನೊಂದುವುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: prEma kanale pishAchi, tRuptiyAntire lakshmi ।bhrAmipudadu pratiprEmayAchaneyoL ॥mAmakavu idu endu AvudakO tAne balavOgi ।shAmanavanu honduvudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 428 ॥
kagga: ಪ್ರೇಮ ಕನಲೆ ಪಿಶಾಚಿ, ತೃಪ್ತಿಯಾಂತಿರೆ ಲಕ್ಷ್ಮಿ ।ಭ್ರಾಮಿಪುದದು ಪ್ರತಿಪ್ರೇಮಯಾಚನೆಯೊಳ್ ॥ಮಾಮಕವಿದೆಂದಾವುದಕೊ ತಾನೆ ಬಲಿವೋಗಿ ।ಶಾಮನವನೊಂದುವುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೮ ॥

content: ಬಂಧನವದೇನಲ್ಲ ಜೀವಜೀವಪ್ರೇಮ ।ಒಂದೆ ನಿಲೆ ಜೀವವರೆ, ಬೆರೆತರಳೆ ಪೂರ್ಣ ॥ದಂದುಗವನ್ ಅರಗೆಯ್ದು, ಸಂತಸವನಿಮ್ಮಡಿಪ ।ಬಾಂಧವ್ಯ ದೈವಕೃಪೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೯ ॥bandhanavadEnalla jIvajIvaprEma ।onde nile jIvavu are, beretu araLe pUrNa ॥dandugavan aregeydu, santasavanimmaDipa ।bAndhavya daivakRupe  - Mankutimma ॥ 429 ॥Love between people is not a bondage. If you stand alone, you are a mere half. If you connect and stand together, then you bloom. This love reduces the troubles by half and doubles the happiness. Such a love is God;s gift to us.  - Mankutimma
translation: Love between people is not a bondage. If you stand alone, you are a mere half. If you connect and stand together, then you bloom. This love reduces the troubles by half and doubles the happiness. Such a love is God;s gift to us.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಾಂಧವ್ಯ ದೈವಕೃಪೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bandhanavadEnalla jIvajIvaprEma ।onde nile jIvavu are, beretu araLe pUrNa ॥dandugavan aregeydu, santasavanimmaDipa ।bAndhavya daivakRupe  - Mankutimma ॥ 429 ॥
kagga: ಬಂಧನವದೇನಲ್ಲ ಜೀವಜೀವಪ್ರೇಮ ।ಒಂದೆ ನಿಲೆ ಜೀವವರೆ, ಬೆರೆತರಳೆ ಪೂರ್ಣ ॥ದಂದುಗವನ್ ಅರಗೆಯ್ದು, ಸಂತಸವನಿಮ್ಮಡಿಪ ।ಬಾಂಧವ್ಯ ದೈವಕೃಪೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨೯ ॥

content: ಒಬ್ಬನುಣುವೂಟದಲಿ ಸವಿಯಿಲ್ಲ ಸೊಗವಿಲ್ಲ ।ಇಬ್ಬರಾಗುವೆನೆಂದನಂತೆ ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮಂ ॥ಹೆಬ್ಬದುಕನೊಂಟಿತನದೊಳದೇನು ಬದುಕುವೆಯೊ? ।ತಬ್ಬಿಕೊಳೊ ವಿಶ್ವವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೦ ॥obbanu uNuva UTadali saviyilla sogavilla ।ibbaru Aguvenu endanante parabommam ॥hebbadukanu onTitanadoLu adEnu badukuveyo? ।tabbikoLo vishvavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 430 ॥When one eats alone, he can neither enjoy nor does it taste good. So, God thought about becoming two (created one more of himself). He kept on doing it and created this world. When even God could not stand being alone, why should man do so? Life is large and world is huge. Embrace it wholeheartedly.  - Mankutimma
translation: When one eats alone, he can neither enjoy nor does it taste good. So, God thought about becoming two (created one more of himself). He kept on doing it and created this world. When even God could not stand being alone, why should man do so? Life is large and world is huge. Embrace it wholeheartedly.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಬ್ಬಿಕೊಳೊ ವಿಶ್ವವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: obbanu uNuva UTadali saviyilla sogavilla ।ibbaru Aguvenu endanante parabommam ॥hebbadukanu onTitanadoLu adEnu badukuveyo? ।tabbikoLo vishvavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 430 ॥
kagga: ಒಬ್ಬನುಣುವೂಟದಲಿ ಸವಿಯಿಲ್ಲ ಸೊಗವಿಲ್ಲ ।ಇಬ್ಬರಾಗುವೆನೆಂದನಂತೆ ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮಂ ॥ಹೆಬ್ಬದುಕನೊಂಟಿತನದೊಳದೇನು ಬದುಕುವೆಯೊ? ।ತಬ್ಬಿಕೊಳೊ ವಿಶ್ವವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೦ ॥

content: ಕೊಳದಿ ನೀಂ ಮೀವಂದು ತೆರೆಯೆದ್ದು ಹರಡುತ್ತೆ ।ವಲಯವಲಯಗಳಾಗಿ ಸಾರುವುದು ದಡಕೆ ॥ಅಲೆಗಳಾ ತೆರದಿ ನಿನ್ನಾತ್ಮದಿಂ ಪರಿಪರಿದು ।ಕಲೆತುಕೊಳ್ಳಲಿ ಜಗದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೧ ॥koLadi nIm mIvandu tereyeddu haraDutte ।valayavalayagaLAgi sAruvudu daDake ॥alegaLA teradi ninnAtmadim pariparidu ।kaletukoLLali jagadi  - Mankutimma ॥ 431 ॥When one get down into a pond to take bath, you can see ripples emanating with you as centre. The waves expand all the way to the banks. Just like that your actions create ripples in this world. We should make positive influences around us and expand our influence so that we feel one with the world.  - Mankutimma
translation: When one get down into a pond to take bath, you can see ripples emanating with you as centre. The waves expand all the way to the banks. Just like that your actions create ripples in this world. We should make positive influences around us and expand our influence so that we feel one with the world.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಲೆತುಕೊಳ್ಳಲಿ ಜಗದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: koLadi nIm mIvandu tereyeddu haraDutte ।valayavalayagaLAgi sAruvudu daDake ॥alegaLA teradi ninnAtmadim pariparidu ।kaletukoLLali jagadi  - Mankutimma ॥ 431 ॥
kagga: ಕೊಳದಿ ನೀಂ ಮೀವಂದು ತೆರೆಯೆದ್ದು ಹರಡುತ್ತೆ ।ವಲಯವಲಯಗಳಾಗಿ ಸಾರುವುದು ದಡಕೆ ॥ಅಲೆಗಳಾ ತೆರದಿ ನಿನ್ನಾತ್ಮದಿಂ ಪರಿಪರಿದು ।ಕಲೆತುಕೊಳ್ಳಲಿ ಜಗದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೧ ॥

content: ಪ್ರತ್ಯೇಕಸುಖವಲ್ಪದುದು, ಗಳಿಗೆತೋರ್ಕೆಯದು ।ಆತ್ಮವಿಸ್ತಾರವಾಗಿಪುದೆ ನಿತ್ಯಸುಖ ॥ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿಜೀವನದ ಸೊಂಪು ಸಮಷ್ಟಿಜೀವನದಿ ।ಒಟ್ಟುಬಾಳ್ವುದ ಕಲಿಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೨ ॥pratyEkasukhavalpadudu, gaLige tOrkeyadu ।AtmavistAravu Agipude nityasukha ॥vyaktijIvanada sompu samaShTijIvanadi ।oTTubALvuda kaliyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 432 ॥Material pleasures enjoyed in isolation is weak. The gains made thus is only for a show. The real happiness is only when you expand your ;self; to include the world. That happiness is for ever. Individual happiness is best when it is enjoyed with the whole. Learn to live together.  - Mankutimma
translation: Material pleasures enjoyed in isolation is weak. The gains made thus is only for a show. The real happiness is only when you expand your ;self; to include the world. That happiness is for ever. Individual happiness is best when it is enjoyed with the whole. Learn to live together.  - Mankutimma
title: ಒಟ್ಟುಬಾಳ್ವುದ ಕಲಿಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: pratyEkasukhavalpadudu, gaLige tOrkeyadu ।AtmavistAravu Agipude nityasukha ॥vyaktijIvanada sompu samaShTijIvanadi ।oTTubALvuda kaliyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 432 ॥
kagga: ಪ್ರತ್ಯೇಕಸುಖವಲ್ಪದುದು, ಗಳಿಗೆತೋರ್ಕೆಯದು ।ಆತ್ಮವಿಸ್ತಾರವಾಗಿಪುದೆ ನಿತ್ಯಸುಖ ॥ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿಜೀವನದ ಸೊಂಪು ಸಮಷ್ಟಿಜೀವನದಿ ।ಒಟ್ಟುಬಾಳ್ವುದ ಕಲಿಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೨ ॥

content: ಅಳುವೇನು? ನಗುವೇನು? ಹೃತ್ಕಪಾಟೋದ್ಘಾಟ ।ಶಿಲೆಯೆ ನೀಂ ಕರಗದಿರಲ್? ಅರಳದಿರೆ ಮರಳೇಂ? ॥ಒಳಜಗವ ಹೊರವಡಿಪ, ಹೊರಜಗವನೊಳಕೊಳುವ ।ಸುಳುದಾರಿಯಳುನಗುವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೩ ॥aLuvEnu? naguvEnu? hRutkapATa udghATa ।shileya nIm karagadiral? araLadire maraLEm? ॥oLajagava horavaDipa, horajagavanu oLakoLuva ।suLudAriyaLu naguvu  - Mankutimma ॥ 433 ॥What is the meaning of crying? What does laughing mean? These are ways to open the doors to your heart. Are you a stone that does not melt (in grief)? Are you sand that does not bloom (in happiness)? Weeping and laughing are shortcuts to make inner emotions come out and take in the senses of world.  - Mankutimma
translation: What is the meaning of crying? What does laughing mean? These are ways to open the doors to your heart. Are you a stone that does not melt (in grief)? Are you sand that does not bloom (in happiness)? Weeping and laughing are shortcuts to make inner emotions come out and take in the senses of world.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸುಳುದಾರಿಯಳುನಗುವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aLuvEnu? naguvEnu? hRutkapATa udghATa ।shileya nIm karagadiral? araLadire maraLEm? ॥oLajagava horavaDipa, horajagavanu oLakoLuva ।suLudAriyaLu naguvu  - Mankutimma ॥ 433 ॥
kagga: ಅಳುವೇನು? ನಗುವೇನು? ಹೃತ್ಕಪಾಟೋದ್ಘಾಟ ।ಶಿಲೆಯೆ ನೀಂ ಕರಗದಿರಲ್? ಅರಳದಿರೆ ಮರಳೇಂ? ॥ಒಳಜಗವ ಹೊರವಡಿಪ, ಹೊರಜಗವನೊಳಕೊಳುವ ।ಸುಳುದಾರಿಯಳುನಗುವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೩ ॥

content: ನಗುವೊಂದು ರಸಪಾಕವಳುವೊಂದು ರಸಪಾಕ ।ನಗುವಾತ್ಮ ಪರಿಮಳವ ಪಸರಿಸುವ ಕುಸುಮ ॥ದುಗುಡವಾತ್ಮವ ಕಡೆದು ಸತ್ತ್ವವೆತ್ತುವಮಂತು ।ಬಗೆದೆರಡನುಂ ಭುಜಿಸು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೪ ॥naguvondu rasapAkavaLuvondu rasapAka ।naguvAtma parimaLava pasarisuva kusuma ॥duguDavAtmava kaDedu sattvavettuvamantu ।bagederaDanum bhujisu  - Mankutimma ॥ 434 ॥Happiness and grief are both emotions. While happiness is like fragrance of the flower of the soul. Grief helps you centrifuge your thoughts and gets the truth out. Identify them both and experience them.  - Mankutimma
translation: Happiness and grief are both emotions. While happiness is like fragrance of the flower of the soul. Grief helps you centrifuge your thoughts and gets the truth out. Identify them both and experience them.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಗೆದೆರಡನುಂ ಭುಜಿಸು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: naguvondu rasapAkavaLuvondu rasapAka ।naguvAtma parimaLava pasarisuva kusuma ॥duguDavAtmava kaDedu sattvavettuvamantu ।bagederaDanum bhujisu  - Mankutimma ॥ 434 ॥
kagga: ನಗುವೊಂದು ರಸಪಾಕವಳುವೊಂದು ರಸಪಾಕ ।ನಗುವಾತ್ಮ ಪರಿಮಳವ ಪಸರಿಸುವ ಕುಸುಮ ॥ದುಗುಡವಾತ್ಮವ ಕಡೆದು ಸತ್ತ್ವವೆತ್ತುವಮಂತು ।ಬಗೆದೆರಡನುಂ ಭುಜಿಸು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೪ ॥

content: ರಮಣೀಯಕದಿ ನಲಿವಕ್ಷಿಯೊಡನೆಚಲಮನ ।ಪ್ರೇಮಮಯಮನದೊಡನೆ ಮೋಹಬಡದಾತ್ಮ ॥ಭೀಮಬಲದೊಡನೆ ರಾಮನ ಅಭಯ ನಿಯಮವಿರೆ ।ಯಾಮಳ ವರಂಗಳವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೫ ॥ramaNIyakadi nalivakshiyoDanachalamana ।prEmamayamanadoDane mOhabaDadAtma ॥bhImabaladoDane rAmana abhaya niyamavire ।yAmaLa varangaLavu  - Mankutimma ॥ 435 ॥An eye that can experience beauty along with a mind that does not waver from goal. A loving mind along with a soul that does not get tied down by attachment. Strength like that of Bheema along with the restraint of Rama. Its a boon to have these both together.  - Mankutimma
translation: An eye that can experience beauty along with a mind that does not waver from goal. A loving mind along with a soul that does not get tied down by attachment. Strength like that of Bheema along with the restraint of Rama. Its a boon to have these both together.  - Mankutimma
title: ಯಾಮಳ ವರಂಗಳವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ramaNIyakadi nalivakshiyoDanachalamana ।prEmamayamanadoDane mOhabaDadAtma ॥bhImabaladoDane rAmana abhaya niyamavire ।yAmaLa varangaLavu  - Mankutimma ॥ 435 ॥
kagga: ರಮಣೀಯಕದಿ ನಲಿವಕ್ಷಿಯೊಡನೆಚಲಮನ ।ಪ್ರೇಮಮಯಮನದೊಡನೆ ಮೋಹಬಡದಾತ್ಮ ॥ಭೀಮಬಲದೊಡನೆ ರಾಮನ ಅಭಯ ನಿಯಮವಿರೆ ।ಯಾಮಳ ವರಂಗಳವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೫ ॥

content: ಎದೆ ಮಾರುವೋಗದೊಡೆ, ಕಣ್ ಸೊಬಗನುಂಡರೇಂ? ।ಹೃದಯ ಮುಯ್ ಕೇಳದೊಡೆ, ನೆಲವ ಸೂಸಿದರೇಂ? ॥ಕದಡದಿರ್ದೊಡೆ ಮನವ, ತನು ಸೊಗವ ಸವಿದೊಡೇಂ? ।ಮುದ ತಾನೆ ತಪ್ಪಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೬ ॥ede mAruvOgada oDe, kaN sobaganu unDare Em? ।hRudaya muy kELada oDe, nelava sUsidare Em? ॥kadaDade irdoDe manava, tanu sogava savidoDe Em? ।muda tAne tappalla  - Mankutimma ॥ 436 ॥If the heart does not feel, it is no use of just eyes enjoying the sight. Is it? If the heart does not reciprocate, is there is any use of extending friendship? If the mind is not excited, is bodily pleasure any good? There is no harm in enjoying. But when we do enjoy, we must remember when it is in good taste and when not.  - Mankutimma
translation: If the heart does not feel, it is no use of just eyes enjoying the sight. Is it? If the heart does not reciprocate, is there is any use of extending friendship? If the mind is not excited, is bodily pleasure any good? There is no harm in enjoying. But when we do enjoy, we must remember when it is in good taste and when not.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮುದ ತಾನೆ ತಪ್ಪಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ede mAruvOgada oDe, kaN sobaganu unDare Em? ।hRudaya muy kELada oDe, nelava sUsidare Em? ॥kadaDade irdoDe manava, tanu sogava savidoDe Em? ।muda tAne tappalla  - Mankutimma ॥ 436 ॥
kagga: ಎದೆ ಮಾರುವೋಗದೊಡೆ, ಕಣ್ ಸೊಬಗನುಂಡರೇಂ? ।ಹೃದಯ ಮುಯ್ ಕೇಳದೊಡೆ, ನೆಲವ ಸೂಸಿದರೇಂ? ॥ಕದಡದಿರ್ದೊಡೆ ಮನವ, ತನು ಸೊಗವ ಸವಿದೊಡೇಂ? ।ಮುದ ತಾನೆ ತಪ್ಪಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೬ ॥

content: ಶಕ್ತಿ ಕರಣಕ್ಕಿರಲಿ, ರಸ ಸಂಗ್ರಹಣ ಶಕ್ತಿ ।ಯುಕ್ತಿವದರೊಡನಿರಲಿ ಭೋಗದಿ ವಿರಕ್ತಿ ॥ಶಕ್ತಿ ತನ್ನೊಳಗಿದ್ದು ರಕ್ತಮನನಾಗದನೆ ।ಉತ್ತಮೋತ್ತಮ ಸುಕೃತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೭ ॥shakti karaNakke irali, rasa sangrahaNa shakti ।yuktavu adara oDane irali bhOgadi virakti ॥shakti tanna oLage iddu raktamanan Agadane ।uttama uttama sukRuti  - Mankutimma ॥ 437 ॥Let the senses have the strength to extract flavors of the world. Along with it, let there be aversion towards indulgence. It is the best of the best to be both powerful and not let the power get to one;s head. (be levelheaded)  - Mankutimma
translation: Let the senses have the strength to extract flavors of the world. Along with it, let there be aversion towards indulgence. It is the best of the best to be both powerful and not let the power get to one;s head. (be levelheaded)  - Mankutimma
title: ಉತ್ತಮೋತ್ತಮ ಸುಕೃತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: shakti karaNakke irali, rasa sangrahaNa shakti ।yuktavu adara oDane irali bhOgadi virakti ॥shakti tanna oLage iddu raktamanan Agadane ।uttama uttama sukRuti  - Mankutimma ॥ 437 ॥
kagga: ಶಕ್ತಿ ಕರಣಕ್ಕಿರಲಿ, ರಸ ಸಂಗ್ರಹಣ ಶಕ್ತಿ ।ಯುಕ್ತಿವದರೊಡನಿರಲಿ ಭೋಗದಿ ವಿರಕ್ತಿ ॥ಶಕ್ತಿ ತನ್ನೊಳಗಿದ್ದು ರಕ್ತಮನನಾಗದನೆ ।ಉತ್ತಮೋತ್ತಮ ಸುಕೃತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೭ ॥

content: ತಳಿರ ನಸುಕೆಂಪು, ಬಳುಕೆಲೆಯ ಹಸುರಿನ ಸೊಂಪು ।ತಿಳಿಮನದ ಯುವಜನದ ನಗುಗಣ್ಣ ಹೊಳಪು ॥ಬೆಳೆವರಿವು ಮಗುದುಟಿಯಿನುಣ್ಣಿಸುವ ನುಡಿಚಿಗುರು ।ಇಳೆಯೊಳಿವನೊಲ್ಲನಾರ್?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೮ ॥taLira nasukempu, baLuku eleya hasurina sompu ।tiLimanada yuvajanada nagugaNNa hoLapu ॥beLeva arivu maguduTiyin uNNisuva nudichiguru ।iLeyoL ivan ollan Ar?  - Mankutimma ॥ 438 ॥Who in this world can deny being attracted to these  - light red tinge of fresh sprout, waving of green leaves to the tune of the wind, bright laughter of young people with pure (light, clear) mind, first words of a baby just coming to grips with the world. These are all God;s gift to us and every one loves it.  - Mankutimma
translation: Who in this world can deny being attracted to these  - light red tinge of fresh sprout, waving of green leaves to the tune of the wind, bright laughter of young people with pure (light, clear) mind, first words of a baby just coming to grips with the world. These are all God;s gift to us and every one loves it.  - Mankutimma
title: ಇಳೆಯೊಳಿವನೊಲ್ಲನಾರ್?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: taLira nasukempu, baLuku eleya hasurina sompu ।tiLimanada yuvajanada nagugaNNa hoLapu ॥beLeva arivu maguduTiyin uNNisuva nudichiguru ।iLeyoL ivan ollan Ar?  - Mankutimma ॥ 438 ॥
kagga: ತಳಿರ ನಸುಕೆಂಪು, ಬಳುಕೆಲೆಯ ಹಸುರಿನ ಸೊಂಪು ।ತಿಳಿಮನದ ಯುವಜನದ ನಗುಗಣ್ಣ ಹೊಳಪು ॥ಬೆಳೆವರಿವು ಮಗುದುಟಿಯಿನುಣ್ಣಿಸುವ ನುಡಿಚಿಗುರು ।ಇಳೆಯೊಳಿವನೊಲ್ಲನಾರ್?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೮ ॥

content: ಏಳಿಸುವುದೊಂದು ಹೊರಸುಳಿವೆನ್ನ ಹೃದಯದಲಿ ।ಗಾಳಿಸುಂಟರೆಯನದು ಹರಣಗಳ ಕುಲುಕಿ ॥ಬಾಳನಲ್ಲಾಡಿಪುದು ಬೇರಿಂದ ತುದಿವರೆಗೆ ।ಧೂಳದರೊಳೀ ಜನ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೯ ॥ELisuvudondu horasuLivenna hRudayadali ।gALisunTareyanadu haraNagaLa kuluki ॥bALanallaDipudu bErinda tudivarege ।dhULadaroLI janma  - Mankutimma ॥ 439 ॥There are so many things in this world that effect us. Sometimes, one of them can create a storm in our hearts. That storm can shake your life from root to tip. One may even feel that your whole life is a speck of dust being tossed around in that storm.   - Mankutimma
translation: There are so many things in this world that effect us. Sometimes, one of them can create a storm in our hearts. That storm can shake your life from root to tip. One may even feel that your whole life is a speck of dust being tossed around in that storm.   - Mankutimma
title: ಧೂಳದರೊಳೀ ಜನ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ELisuvudondu horasuLivenna hRudayadali ।gALisunTareyanadu haraNagaLa kuluki ॥bALanallaDipudu bErinda tudivarege ।dhULadaroLI janma  - Mankutimma ॥ 439 ॥
kagga: ಏಳಿಸುವುದೊಂದು ಹೊರಸುಳಿವೆನ್ನ ಹೃದಯದಲಿ ।ಗಾಳಿಸುಂಟರೆಯನದು ಹರಣಗಳ ಕುಲುಕಿ ॥ಬಾಳನಲ್ಲಾಡಿಪುದು ಬೇರಿಂದ ತುದಿವರೆಗೆ ।ಧೂಳದರೊಳೀ ಜನ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩೯ ॥

content: ಹೊರಗೆ ಹೊಳೆವೊಂದು ಹೊಳಪಿನ ಕಿರಣವೆನ್ನೆದೆಯೊ- ।ಳುರಿಯನೆಬ್ಬಿಸಿ ಹೊಗೆಯನೆರಚಿ ಕಣ್ಗಳಿಗೆ ॥ಕೆರಳಿಪುದು ಕರಣಗಳ, ಮರಳಿಪುದು ಹರಣಗಳ ।ಹೊರಮೋಹವೊಳದಾಹ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೦ ॥horage hoLevondu hoLapina kiraNavu enna edeya oLu ।uriyanu ebbisi hogeyanu erachi kaNgaLige ॥keraLipudu karaNagaLa, maraLipudu haraNagaLa ।horamOha oLa dAha  - Mankutimma ॥ 440 ॥A shining attraction in the outside world can create a pain in our hearts. It burns it. It clouds our eyes (and judgment). It excites our senses and cheats our simple lives. All this happens because of our inner longing and attachment towards outer entities.  - Mankutimma
translation: A shining attraction in the outside world can create a pain in our hearts. It burns it. It clouds our eyes (and judgment). It excites our senses and cheats our simple lives. All this happens because of our inner longing and attachment towards outer entities.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹೊರಮೋಹವೊಳದಾಹ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: horage hoLevondu hoLapina kiraNavu enna edeya oLu ।uriyanu ebbisi hogeyanu erachi kaNgaLige ॥keraLipudu karaNagaLa, maraLipudu haraNagaLa ।horamOha oLa dAha  - Mankutimma ॥ 440 ॥
kagga: ಹೊರಗೆ ಹೊಳೆವೊಂದು ಹೊಳಪಿನ ಕಿರಣವೆನ್ನೆದೆಯೊ- ।ಳುರಿಯನೆಬ್ಬಿಸಿ ಹೊಗೆಯನೆರಚಿ ಕಣ್ಗಳಿಗೆ ॥ಕೆರಳಿಪುದು ಕರಣಗಳ, ಮರಳಿಪುದು ಹರಣಗಳ ।ಹೊರಮೋಹವೊಳದಾಹ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೦ ॥

content: ಇಂತು ಹೊರಗೊಳಗುಗಳು ಬೇರೆಲೋಕಗಳಲ್ಲ ।ಅಂತರಂಗದೊಳೂರಸಂತೆ ಸದ್ದಿಹುದು ॥ಸಂತೆಯೊಳಮಂತರಂಗದ ಸದ್ದು ಕೇಳಿಪುದು ।ಸ್ವಾಂತದಿಕ್ಕೆಲಗಳವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೧ ॥intu horage oLagugaLu bErelOkagaLu alla ।antarangadoL Ura sante saddu ihudu ॥santeyoLu antarangada saddu kELipudu ।svAntada ikkelagaLu avu  - Mankutimma ॥ 441 ॥There is no separate inner and outer worlds. The sounds of the outside village can be heard on the inside. The voice of the inner mind can be heard even among the chaos of the outside. The inner and outer worlds are two facets of our mind.  - Mankutimma
translation: There is no separate inner and outer worlds. The sounds of the outside village can be heard on the inside. The voice of the inner mind can be heard even among the chaos of the outside. The inner and outer worlds are two facets of our mind.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸ್ವಾಂತದಿಕ್ಕೆಲಗಳವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: intu horage oLagugaLu bErelOkagaLu alla ।antarangadoL Ura sante saddu ihudu ॥santeyoLu antarangada saddu kELipudu ।svAntada ikkelagaLu avu  - Mankutimma ॥ 441 ॥
kagga: ಇಂತು ಹೊರಗೊಳಗುಗಳು ಬೇರೆಲೋಕಗಳಲ್ಲ ।ಅಂತರಂಗದೊಳೂರಸಂತೆ ಸದ್ದಿಹುದು ॥ಸಂತೆಯೊಳಮಂತರಂಗದ ಸದ್ದು ಕೇಳಿಪುದು ।ಸ್ವಾಂತದಿಕ್ಕೆಲಗಳವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೧ ॥

content: ಸೊಗಸು ಬೇಡದ ನರಪ್ರಾಣಿಯೆಲ್ಲಿಹುದಯ್ಯ? ।ಮಗುವೆ, ಮುದುಕನೆ, ಪುರಾಣಿಕ ಪುರೋಹಿತರೆ? ॥ಜಗದ ಕಣ್ಣಿಣಿಕದೆಡೆ ಮುಕುರದೆದುರೊಳು ನಿಂತು ।ಮೊಗವ ತಿದ್ದುವರೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೨ ॥sogasu bEDada naraprANi ellihudu ayya? ।maguve, mudukane, purANika purOhitare? ॥jagada kaNNu iNikadeDe mukurada eduroLu nintu ।mogava tidduvaru ella  - Mankutimma ॥ 442 ॥Is there is a human being who does not like beauty and happiness? A child, an old man, an accountant, a priest  - can any one deny it? When the world is not looking, every one look at the mirror and correct their faces.  - Mankutimma
translation: Is there is a human being who does not like beauty and happiness? A child, an old man, an accountant, a priest  - can any one deny it? When the world is not looking, every one look at the mirror and correct their faces.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೊಗವ ತಿದ್ದುವರೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sogasu bEDada naraprANi ellihudu ayya? ।maguve, mudukane, purANika purOhitare? ॥jagada kaNNu iNikadeDe mukurada eduroLu nintu ।mogava tidduvaru ella  - Mankutimma ॥ 442 ॥
kagga: ಸೊಗಸು ಬೇಡದ ನರಪ್ರಾಣಿಯೆಲ್ಲಿಹುದಯ್ಯ? ।ಮಗುವೆ, ಮುದುಕನೆ, ಪುರಾಣಿಕ ಪುರೋಹಿತರೆ? ॥ಜಗದ ಕಣ್ಣಿಣಿಕದೆಡೆ ಮುಕುರದೆದುರೊಳು ನಿಂತು ।ಮೊಗವ ತಿದ್ದುವರೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೨ ॥

content: ತಿಂಗಳಾರರ ದುಡಿತ ಚೆಂಗುಲಾಬಿಯ ಬೆಳೆತ ।ಕಂಗೊಳಿಪುದದರ ಸಿರಿಯರೆಗಳಿಗೆಯಲರೊಳ್ ॥ಪೊಂಗುವಾನಂದವದನನುಭವಿಸಿದವನ್ ಅಜನ ।ಹಂಗಿಪನೆ ಕೃಪಣತೆಗೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೩ ॥tingaLu Arara duDdita chengulAbiya beLeta ।kangoLipudu adara siri aregaLige alar oL ॥ponguva Anandavanu anubhavisidan ajana ।hangipane kRupaNatege?  - Mankutimma ॥ 443 ॥Six months of effort is required for a rose plant to flower. After that, the flower displays its beauty only for a small time. This beauty emanates a wave of happiness even though it is short lived. Does a person who experiences such happiness crib that the creator is a big miser (for not extending that pleasure for longer)?  - Mankutimma
translation: Six months of effort is required for a rose plant to flower. After that, the flower displays its beauty only for a small time. This beauty emanates a wave of happiness even though it is short lived. Does a person who experiences such happiness crib that the creator is a big miser (for not extending that pleasure for longer)?  - Mankutimma
title: ಹಂಗಿಪನೆ ಕೃಪಣತೆಗೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tingaLu Arara duDdita chengulAbiya beLeta ।kangoLipudu adara siri aregaLige alar oL ॥ponguva Anandavanu anubhavisidan ajana ।hangipane kRupaNatege?  - Mankutimma ॥ 443 ॥
kagga: ತಿಂಗಳಾರರ ದುಡಿತ ಚೆಂಗುಲಾಬಿಯ ಬೆಳೆತ ।ಕಂಗೊಳಿಪುದದರ ಸಿರಿಯರೆಗಳಿಗೆಯಲರೊಳ್ ॥ಪೊಂಗುವಾನಂದವದನನುಭವಿಸಿದವನ್ ಅಜನ ।ಹಂಗಿಪನೆ ಕೃಪಣತೆಗೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೩ ॥

content: ಬಾಂದಳದ ಬಾಗು, ರವಿಕಿರಣಗಳ ನೀಳ್ಕೋಲು ।ಇಂದುಮಣಿನುಣ್ಪು, ತಾರೆಗಳ ಕಣ್ಮಿನುಗು ॥ಚೆಂದದಂಗಾಂಗಭಾವದಿ ಮೊದಲ ಪಾಠವಿವು ।ಸೌಂದರ್ಯಗುರು ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೪ ॥bAndaLada bAgu, ravikiraNagaLa nILkOlu ।indumaNinuNpu, tAregaLa kaN minugu ॥chendada angAngabhAvadi modala pAThavu ।saundarya guru prakRuti  - Mankutimma ॥ 444 ॥The beautiful bend of the sky (at horizon), the straight rays of the Sun, the pleasant rays of moonlight, the twinkle of the stars  - these are the first lessons of experiencing beauty. This is what leads to people;s perception of beauty in human form. Nature is the first teacher of experiencing beauty.  - Mankutimma
translation: The beautiful bend of the sky (at horizon), the straight rays of the Sun, the pleasant rays of moonlight, the twinkle of the stars  - these are the first lessons of experiencing beauty. This is what leads to people;s perception of beauty in human form. Nature is the first teacher of experiencing beauty.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸೌಂದರ್ಯಗುರು ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bAndaLada bAgu, ravikiraNagaLa nILkOlu ।indumaNinuNpu, tAregaLa kaN minugu ॥chendada angAngabhAvadi modala pAThavu ।saundarya guru prakRuti  - Mankutimma ॥ 444 ॥
kagga: ಬಾಂದಳದ ಬಾಗು, ರವಿಕಿರಣಗಳ ನೀಳ್ಕೋಲು ।ಇಂದುಮಣಿನುಣ್ಪು, ತಾರೆಗಳ ಕಣ್ಮಿನುಗು ॥ಚೆಂದದಂಗಾಂಗಭಾವದಿ ಮೊದಲ ಪಾಠವಿವು ।ಸೌಂದರ್ಯಗುರು ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೪ ॥

content: ಕ್ಷಣವದೊಂದೆ ಅನಂತಕಾಲ ತಾನಾಗುವುದು ।ಅನುಭವಕೆ ಸತ್ತ್ವ ಶಿವ ಸುಂದರಗಳಮರೆ ॥ಮನ ತುಂಬುಶಶಿಯಾಗಿ, ನೆನಪಮೃತವಾಗುವುದು ।ಕ್ಷಣದೊಳಕ್ಷಯ ಕಾಣೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೫ ॥kshaNadonde anantakAla tAnAguvudu ।anubhavake sattva shiva sundaragaL amare ॥mana tumbushashiyagi, nenapu amRutavAguvudu ।kShaNadoLakshaya kANo  - Mankutimma ॥ 445 ॥When our experience is filled with truth, purity and beauty then that fleeting second seems like eternity. Mind gets filled with calmness (of the moon). Our memory of that second will be like elixir. See infinity in that second.  - Mankutimma
translation: When our experience is filled with truth, purity and beauty then that fleeting second seems like eternity. Mind gets filled with calmness (of the moon). Our memory of that second will be like elixir. See infinity in that second.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕ್ಷಣದೊಳಕ್ಷಯ ಕಾಣೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kshaNadonde anantakAla tAnAguvudu ।anubhavake sattva shiva sundaragaL amare ॥mana tumbushashiyagi, nenapu amRutavAguvudu ।kShaNadoLakshaya kANo  - Mankutimma ॥ 445 ॥
kagga: ಕ್ಷಣವದೊಂದೆ ಅನಂತಕಾಲ ತಾನಾಗುವುದು ।ಅನುಭವಕೆ ಸತ್ತ್ವ ಶಿವ ಸುಂದರಗಳಮರೆ ॥ಮನ ತುಂಬುಶಶಿಯಾಗಿ, ನೆನಪಮೃತವಾಗುವುದು ।ಕ್ಷಣದೊಳಕ್ಷಯ ಕಾಣೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೫ ॥

content: ಸುಂದರತೆಯೆನುವುದೇಂ? ಜನಕೆ ಮೈಮರೆಯಿಪಾ- ।ನಂದದೊಳಮರುಮವೇಂ? ವಿಶ್ವಚೇತನದಾ ॥ಸ್ಪಂದನವೆ ಸೌಂದರ್ಯಮದುವೆ ಜೀವನಮೂಲ ।ಬಂಧುರತೆ ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೬ ॥sundarate enuvudEm? janake maimareyipa ।Anandada oLa marumavEm? vishvachEtanadA ॥spandanave saundaryam aduve jIvanamUla ।bandhurate bommanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 446 ॥What is it to feel ;beautiful;? What is the secret of happiness that makes people forget themselves? Being conscious of the whole world and empathizing with it is being beautiful. That is the source of life. That is the connection between a man and the Creator.  - Mankutimma
translation: What is it to feel ;beautiful;? What is the secret of happiness that makes people forget themselves? Being conscious of the whole world and empathizing with it is being beautiful. That is the source of life. That is the connection between a man and the Creator.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಂಧುರತೆ ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sundarate enuvudEm? janake maimareyipa ।Anandada oLa marumavEm? vishvachEtanadA ॥spandanave saundaryam aduve jIvanamUla ।bandhurate bommanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 446 ॥
kagga: ಸುಂದರತೆಯೆನುವುದೇಂ? ಜನಕೆ ಮೈಮರೆಯಿಪಾ- ।ನಂದದೊಳಮರುಮವೇಂ? ವಿಶ್ವಚೇತನದಾ ॥ಸ್ಪಂದನವೆ ಸೌಂದರ್ಯಮದುವೆ ಜೀವನಮೂಲ ।ಬಂಧುರತೆ ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೬ ॥

content: ದೃಷ್ಟಿಚುಕ್ಕೆಯದೊಂದನೆಲ್ಲ ಚೆಂದಂಗಳ್ಗ- ।ಮಿಟ್ಟಿಹನು ಪರಮೇಷ್ಠಿ, ಶಶಿಗೆ ಮಶಿಯವೊಲು ॥ಗುಟ್ಟೇನೊ? ರಕ್ಷೆಯೋ? ಸಿಂಗರವೊ? ಹೇಳನವೊ? ।ಮಷ್ಟು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಗೆ ಬೊಟ್ಟು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೭ ॥dRuShTi chukkeyu adondanu ella chendangaLgam ।ittihanu paramEShThi, shashige mashiyavolu ॥guTTEno? rakSheyo? singaravo? hELanavo? ।maShTu sRuShTige boTTu  - Mankutimma ॥ 447 ॥God has kept one black-dot in all beautiful things. Just like the black-dot on the moon. Is it a secret plan? Is it for protection? Is it for decoration? Is it just for fun? There is also ugliness in nature serving as a black-dot in an otherwise beautiful creation.  - Mankutimma
translation: God has kept one black-dot in all beautiful things. Just like the black-dot on the moon. Is it a secret plan? Is it for protection? Is it for decoration? Is it just for fun? There is also ugliness in nature serving as a black-dot in an otherwise beautiful creation.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಷ್ಟು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಗೆ ಬೊಟ್ಟು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dRuShTi chukkeyu adondanu ella chendangaLgam ।ittihanu paramEShThi, shashige mashiyavolu ॥guTTEno? rakSheyo? singaravo? hELanavo? ।maShTu sRuShTige boTTu  - Mankutimma ॥ 447 ॥
kagga: ದೃಷ್ಟಿಚುಕ್ಕೆಯದೊಂದನೆಲ್ಲ ಚೆಂದಂಗಳ್ಗ- ।ಮಿಟ್ಟಿಹನು ಪರಮೇಷ್ಠಿ, ಶಶಿಗೆ ಮಶಿಯವೊಲು ॥ಗುಟ್ಟೇನೊ? ರಕ್ಷೆಯೋ? ಸಿಂಗರವೊ? ಹೇಳನವೊ? ।ಮಷ್ಟು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಗೆ ಬೊಟ್ಟು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೭ ॥

content: ಬಿಂದು ವಿಸರಗಳನುವು, ವಂಕು ಸರಲಗಳನುವು ।ಚೆಂದ ಕಣ್ಣಿಗೆ ವರ್ಣವಿವಿಧಂಗಳನುವು ॥ಚೆಂದ ವೇಗ ಸ್ತಿಮಿತದನುವು, ಹುಳಿಯುಪ್ಪನುವು ।ದ್ವಂದ್ವದನುವುಗಳಂದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೮ ॥bindu visaragaLa anuvu, vanku saralagaLa anuvu ।chenda kaNNige varNavividhaMgaLa anuvu ॥chenda vEga stimitada anuvu, huLiyuppa anuvu ।dvandvadanuvugaLande  - Mankutimma ॥ 448 ॥Beauty comes from coordination of the opposites. A point and an expanse, a bent stroke right next to a straight one, a mixture of colors pleasing to the eye, fast moving and stationary objects, food with sour and salts and so on.  - Mankutimma
translation: Beauty comes from coordination of the opposites. A point and an expanse, a bent stroke right next to a straight one, a mixture of colors pleasing to the eye, fast moving and stationary objects, food with sour and salts and so on.  - Mankutimma
title: ದ್ವಂದ್ವದನುವುಗಳಂದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bindu visaragaLa anuvu, vanku saralagaLa anuvu ।chenda kaNNige varNavividhaMgaLa anuvu ॥chenda vEga stimitada anuvu, huLiyuppa anuvu ।dvandvadanuvugaLande  - Mankutimma ॥ 448 ॥
kagga: ಬಿಂದು ವಿಸರಗಳನುವು, ವಂಕು ಸರಲಗಳನುವು ।ಚೆಂದ ಕಣ್ಣಿಗೆ ವರ್ಣವಿವಿಧಂಗಳನುವು ॥ಚೆಂದ ವೇಗ ಸ್ತಿಮಿತದನುವು, ಹುಳಿಯುಪ್ಪನುವು ।ದ್ವಂದ್ವದನುವುಗಳಂದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೮ ॥

content: ಸೌಂದರ್ಯದಾಲಯ ಬರಿ ದ್ವಂದ್ವವೇನಲ್ಲ ।ದ್ವಂದ್ವದೊಳಗನುವು; ಅದು ಪರಿಮಾಣದುಚಿತ ॥ಸಂಧಾನರೀತಿಯದು; ಸಹಕಾರ ನೀತಿಯದು ।ಸಂದರ್ಭಸಹಜತೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೯ ॥saundaryadAlaya bari dvandvavEnalla ।dvandvadoLaganuvu; adu parimANaduchita ॥sandhAnarItiyadu, sahakAra nItiyadu ।sandarbhasahajateyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 449 ॥Beauty does not exist in the mere presence of the opposites. They have to be well coordinated. They have to be mixed in right proportions. This is the rule of compromise. This is the rule of cooperation. This is what comes out as ;natural; in life situations.  - Mankutimma
translation: Beauty does not exist in the mere presence of the opposites. They have to be well coordinated. They have to be mixed in right proportions. This is the rule of compromise. This is the rule of cooperation. This is what comes out as ;natural; in life situations.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಂದರ್ಭಸಹಜತೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: saundaryadAlaya bari dvandvavEnalla ।dvandvadoLaganuvu; adu parimANaduchita ॥sandhAnarItiyadu, sahakAra nItiyadu ।sandarbhasahajateyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 449 ॥
kagga: ಸೌಂದರ್ಯದಾಲಯ ಬರಿ ದ್ವಂದ್ವವೇನಲ್ಲ ।ದ್ವಂದ್ವದೊಳಗನುವು; ಅದು ಪರಿಮಾಣದುಚಿತ ॥ಸಂಧಾನರೀತಿಯದು; ಸಹಕಾರ ನೀತಿಯದು ।ಸಂದರ್ಭಸಹಜತೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪೯ ॥

content: ಸೌಂದರ್ಯದೊಳ್ ದ್ವಂದ್ವ, ಬಾಂಧವ್ಯದೊಳ್ ದ್ವಂದ್ವ ।ದ್ವಂದ್ವವೀ ಲೋಕ ಸಹವಾಸಗಳೊಳೆಲ್ಲ ॥ಮುಂದೆ ನೀನಾವುಭಯಗಳ ದಾಟಿ ಸಾಗುತಿರೆ ।ಬಂಧಮೋಚನ ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೦ ॥saundaryadoL dvandva, bAndhavyadoL dvandva ।dvandvavI lOka sahavAsagaLoLella ॥munde nInAvubhayagaLa dATi sAgutire ।bandhamOchana ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 450 ॥There is duality in beauty. There is duality in relations of life. There is duality in the whole web of life. Going forward, if you can surpass the duality and see the unity in each one of them then you will liberated.  - Mankutimma
translation: There is duality in beauty. There is duality in relations of life. There is duality in the whole web of life. Going forward, if you can surpass the duality and see the unity in each one of them then you will liberated.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಂಧಮೋಚನ ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: saundaryadoL dvandva, bAndhavyadoL dvandva ।dvandvavI lOka sahavAsagaLoLella ॥munde nInAvubhayagaLa dATi sAgutire ।bandhamOchana ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 450 ॥
kagga: ಸೌಂದರ್ಯದೊಳ್ ದ್ವಂದ್ವ, ಬಾಂಧವ್ಯದೊಳ್ ದ್ವಂದ್ವ ।ದ್ವಂದ್ವವೀ ಲೋಕ ಸಹವಾಸಗಳೊಳೆಲ್ಲ ॥ಮುಂದೆ ನೀನಾವುಭಯಗಳ ದಾಟಿ ಸಾಗುತಿರೆ ।ಬಂಧಮೋಚನ ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೦ ॥

content: ನೀಲ ವಿಸ್ತರವಿರಲು ನಕ್ಷತ್ರ ಬಿಂದು ಸೊಗ ।ಶೈಲದಚಲತೆಯಿರಲು ಝರಿಯ ವೇಗ ಸೊಗ ॥ಬಾಳು ಬಯಲಂತಿರಲು ಮನೆಯಚ್ಚುಕಟ್ಟಿಂಭು ।ವೈಲಕ್ಷಣದೆ ಚೆಂದ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೧ ॥nIla vistaraviralu nakShatra bindu soga ।shailada achalate iralu jhariya vEga soga ॥bALu bayalantiralu maneyacchukaTTimbhu ।vailakShaNadechenda  - Mankutimma ॥ 451 ॥The twinkling star looks beautiful because of the vast expanse of the sky (emptiness). The flowing water of the stream is beautiful because the rocks on which it flows are stationary. The safety of the home is so meaningful because life is like being in open ground. Things are mostly beautiful because they are contrasted with their opposites.  - Mankutimma
translation: The twinkling star looks beautiful because of the vast expanse of the sky (emptiness). The flowing water of the stream is beautiful because the rocks on which it flows are stationary. The safety of the home is so meaningful because life is like being in open ground. Things are mostly beautiful because they are contrasted with their opposites.  - Mankutimma
title: ವೈಲಕ್ಷಣದೆ ಚೆಂದ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nIla vistaraviralu nakShatra bindu soga ।shailada achalate iralu jhariya vEga soga ॥bALu bayalantiralu maneyacchukaTTimbhu ।vailakShaNadechenda  - Mankutimma ॥ 451 ॥
kagga: ನೀಲ ವಿಸ್ತರವಿರಲು ನಕ್ಷತ್ರ ಬಿಂದು ಸೊಗ ।ಶೈಲದಚಲತೆಯಿರಲು ಝರಿಯ ವೇಗ ಸೊಗ ॥ಬಾಳು ಬಯಲಂತಿರಲು ಮನೆಯಚ್ಚುಕಟ್ಟಿಂಭು ।ವೈಲಕ್ಷಣದೆ ಚೆಂದ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೧ ॥

content: ನೀಳುಗೆರೆ ಬಳುಬಳುಕೆ ಕಡಲತೆರೆಯೊಯ್ಯಾರ ।ತಾಳಲಯ ಸೇರೆ ರಾಗದ ನಾಟ್ಯ ಧಾಟಿ ॥ಗೋಳದ ಜ್ವಾಲೆಯಿಂ ಗಗನಪಟ ಸಿಂಗಾರ ।ವೈಲಕ್ಷಣದೊಳಿಂಬು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೨ ॥nILugere baLubaLuke kaDalatereyoyyAra ।tALAlaya sEre rAgada nATya dhATi ॥gOLada jvAleyim gaganapaTa singAra ।vailakShaNadoLimbu  - Mankutimma ॥ 452 ॥The waves at sea always keep changing the waterline. It bends and curves on its own. When the meter (rule based) and rhythm (pleasing) are fused, the musical attracts people;s attention. The burning ball of fire (Sun) makes the sky look beautiful. These seemingly contradicting entities support each other and make a beautiful combination.  - Mankutimma
translation: The waves at sea always keep changing the waterline. It bends and curves on its own. When the meter (rule based) and rhythm (pleasing) are fused, the musical attracts people;s attention. The burning ball of fire (Sun) makes the sky look beautiful. These seemingly contradicting entities support each other and make a beautiful combination.  - Mankutimma
title: ವೈಲಕ್ಷಣದೊಳಿಂಬು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nILugere baLubaLuke kaDalatereyoyyAra ।tALAlaya sEre rAgada nATya dhATi ॥gOLada jvAleyim gaganapaTa singAra ।vailakShaNadoLimbu  - Mankutimma ॥ 452 ॥
kagga: ನೀಳುಗೆರೆ ಬಳುಬಳುಕೆ ಕಡಲತೆರೆಯೊಯ್ಯಾರ ।ತಾಳಲಯ ಸೇರೆ ರಾಗದ ನಾಟ್ಯ ಧಾಟಿ ॥ಗೋಳದ ಜ್ವಾಲೆಯಿಂ ಗಗನಪಟ ಸಿಂಗಾರ ।ವೈಲಕ್ಷಣದೊಳಿಂಬು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೨ ॥

content: ತಾಯೊ ತಂಗಿಯೊ ಎನಿಪ ಶುಚಿಯ ಸೌಮ್ಯದ ಸೊಬಗು ।ಪ್ರೇಯಸಿಯ ಕರೆವೊಲಾತುರವಡಿಪ ಬೆಡಗು ॥ಈಯೆರಡು ಸಮದ ರುಚಿ ನಿನ್ನಿನಿಬ್ಬಗೊಳಿಸೆ ।ಧ್ಯೇಯ ನಿನಗಾವುದೆಲೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೩ ॥tAyo tangiyo enipa shuchiya saumyada sobagu ।prEyasiya karevolu AturavaDipa beDagu ॥ee eraDu samada ruchi ninninibbagegoLise ।dhEya ninagAvudelo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 453 ॥There is difference in attraction towards our mother or sisters and that towards a lover. The former is pure and calm. The later creates a lot of emotions and urgent. When these attractions pull you in different directions, what will you go by? One has to ponder hard and find a way to reconcile  - Mankutimma
translation: There is difference in attraction towards our mother or sisters and that towards a lover. The former is pure and calm. The later creates a lot of emotions and urgent. When these attractions pull you in different directions, what will you go by? One has to ponder hard and find a way to reconcile  - Mankutimma
title: ಧ್ಯೇಯ ನಿನಗಾವುದೆಲೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tAyo tangiyo enipa shuchiya saumyada sobagu ।prEyasiya karevolu AturavaDipa beDagu ॥ee eraDu samada ruchi ninninibbagegoLise ।dhEya ninagAvudelo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 453 ॥
kagga: ತಾಯೊ ತಂಗಿಯೊ ಎನಿಪ ಶುಚಿಯ ಸೌಮ್ಯದ ಸೊಬಗು ।ಪ್ರೇಯಸಿಯ ಕರೆವೊಲಾತುರವಡಿಪ ಬೆಡಗು ॥ಈಯೆರಡು ಸಮದ ರುಚಿ ನಿನ್ನಿನಿಬ್ಬಗೊಳಿಸೆ ।ಧ್ಯೇಯ ನಿನಗಾವುದೆಲೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೩ ॥

content: ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ವಿಶ್ವಪ್ರಕೃತಿಶಕ್ತಿತೇಜಗಳು ।ಕೆರಳಿಸಲು ನರಹೃದಯರಭಸಗಳನದರಿಂ ॥ಪೊರಮಡುವ ಸಂಮೋಹಧೀರಗಂಭೀರಗಳ ।ಸರಸತೆಯೆ ಸುಂದರವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೪ ॥paripariya vishva prakRuti shakti tEjagaLu ।keraLisalu nara hRudaya rabhasagaLanu adarim ॥poramaDuva sammOha dhIra gambhIragaLa ।sarasateye sundaravo  - Mankutimma ॥ 454 ॥There are so many elements in this universe  - natural forces, energies. They sensitize a man;s heart and create a stir. From that arises illusions, courage and seriousness. The interplay of these emotions is beautiful.  - Mankutimma
translation: There are so many elements in this universe  - natural forces, energies. They sensitize a man;s heart and create a stir. From that arises illusions, courage and seriousness. The interplay of these emotions is beautiful.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸರಸತೆಯೆ ಸುಂದರವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: paripariya vishva prakRuti shakti tEjagaLu ।keraLisalu nara hRudaya rabhasagaLanu adarim ॥poramaDuva sammOha dhIra gambhIragaLa ।sarasateye sundaravo  - Mankutimma ॥ 454 ॥
kagga: ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ವಿಶ್ವಪ್ರಕೃತಿಶಕ್ತಿತೇಜಗಳು ।ಕೆರಳಿಸಲು ನರಹೃದಯರಭಸಗಳನದರಿಂ ॥ಪೊರಮಡುವ ಸಂಮೋಹಧೀರಗಂಭೀರಗಳ ।ಸರಸತೆಯೆ ಸುಂದರವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೪ ॥

content: ಸುಂದರದ ರಸ ನೂರು; ಸಾರವದರೊಳು ಮೂರು ।ಹೊಂದಿಪ್ಪುವವು ಮೋಹ ಕರುಣೆ ಶಾಂತಿಗಳ ॥ಒಂದರಿಂದೊಂದು ಬೆಳೆಯಾದಂದು ಜೀವನವು ।ಚೆಂದಗೊಂಡುಜ್ಜುಗವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೫ ॥sundarada rasa nUru; sAravadaroLu mUru ।hondippuvavu mOha karuNe shAntigaLa ॥ondarindondu beLeyAdandu jIvanavu ।chendagonDujjugavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 455 ॥There are hundreds of emotions in this world. Only three of them are very strong  - attachment, compassion and peace. If these three emotions enhance one another, then life becomes beautiful. One must start feeling attached to everything (comes from love). This attachment should lead to compassion towards all. This automatically puts your mind at ease and find peace. Once peaceful, it helps person to love more.   - Mankutimma
translation: There are hundreds of emotions in this world. Only three of them are very strong  - attachment, compassion and peace. If these three emotions enhance one another, then life becomes beautiful. One must start feeling attached to everything (comes from love). This attachment should lead to compassion towards all. This automatically puts your mind at ease and find peace. Once peaceful, it helps person to love more.   - Mankutimma
title: ಚೆಂದಗೊಂಡುಜ್ಜುಗವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sundarada rasa nUru; sAravadaroLu mUru ।hondippuvavu mOha karuNe shAntigaLa ॥ondarindondu beLeyAdandu jIvanavu ।chendagonDujjugavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 455 ॥
kagga: ಸುಂದರದ ರಸ ನೂರು; ಸಾರವದರೊಳು ಮೂರು ।ಹೊಂದಿಪ್ಪುವವು ಮೋಹ ಕರುಣೆ ಶಾಂತಿಗಳ ॥ಒಂದರಿಂದೊಂದು ಬೆಳೆಯಾದಂದು ಜೀವನವು ।ಚೆಂದಗೊಂಡುಜ್ಜುಗವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೫ ॥

content: ಪಿಡಿ ಗಳಿಸು ಭುಜಿಸೊಡೆಯನಾಗೆನ್ನುವುದು ಮೋಹ ।ಕೊಡು ಸಲಿಸು ಸೇವೆಗೈಯೆನ್ನುವುದು ಕರುಣೆ ॥ಬಿಡು ನೀನು ನಾನುಗಳ, ವಿಶ್ವಾತ್ಮಪದವನೀ- ।ನಡರೆನ್ನುವುದು ಶಾಂತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೬ ॥piDi gaLisu bhujisoDeyanAgennuvudu mOha ।koDu salisu sEvegaiyennuvudu karuNe ॥biDu nInu nAnugaLa, vishvAtmapadavanI- ।naDarennuvudu shAnti  - Mankutimma ॥ 456 ॥One of the three emotions is attachment. It tells man to earn (even little), spend and enjoy it and become owner of stuff. Compassion tells him to give, submit and serve. Peace tells him to erase all barriers between me and you. It urges you to lift yourself to the consciousness of the universal soul.  - Mankutimma
translation: One of the three emotions is attachment. It tells man to earn (even little), spend and enjoy it and become owner of stuff. Compassion tells him to give, submit and serve. Peace tells him to erase all barriers between me and you. It urges you to lift yourself to the consciousness of the universal soul.  - Mankutimma
title: ನೀನಡರೆನ್ನುವುದು ಶಾಂತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: piDi gaLisu bhujisoDeyanAgennuvudu mOha ।koDu salisu sEvegaiyennuvudu karuNe ॥biDu nInu nAnugaLa, vishvAtmapadavanI- ।naDarennuvudu shAnti  - Mankutimma ॥ 456 ॥
kagga: ಪಿಡಿ ಗಳಿಸು ಭುಜಿಸೊಡೆಯನಾಗೆನ್ನುವುದು ಮೋಹ ।ಕೊಡು ಸಲಿಸು ಸೇವೆಗೈಯೆನ್ನುವುದು ಕರುಣೆ ॥ಬಿಡು ನೀನು ನಾನುಗಳ, ವಿಶ್ವಾತ್ಮಪದವನೀ- ।ನಡರೆನ್ನುವುದು ಶಾಂತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೬ ॥

content: ಚಾರುದೃಶ್ಯಂಗಳಿಂ ಪ್ರೀತಿ ಹೃದಯವಿಕಾಸ ।ಕ್ರೂರದೌಷ್ಟ್ಯಂಗಳಿಂ ವೀರಾನುಕಂಪ ॥ಭೈರವಾದ್ಭುತಗಳಿಂ ಮೌನದಂತರ್ಮನನ ।ದಾರಿಯುದ್ಧಾರಕಿವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೭ ॥chArudRushyangaLim prIti hRudayavikAsa ।krUradauShTyaNgaLim vIrAnukampa ॥bhairavAdbhutagaLim maunadantarmanana ।dAriyuddhArakivu  - Mankutimma ॥ 457 ॥When one sees beautiful scenes his heart expands with love. If we see oppression and tyranny, it creates anger(towards oppressor) and compassion together (towards victim). These extreme stimuli range from scary to magnificent and make us contemplate in peace. These are the ways for one;s enrichment  - Mankutimma
translation: When one sees beautiful scenes his heart expands with love. If we see oppression and tyranny, it creates anger(towards oppressor) and compassion together (towards victim). These extreme stimuli range from scary to magnificent and make us contemplate in peace. These are the ways for one;s enrichment  - Mankutimma
title: ದಾರಿಯುದ್ಧಾರಕಿವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: chArudRushyangaLim prIti hRudayavikAsa ।krUradauShTyaNgaLim vIrAnukampa ॥bhairavAdbhutagaLim maunadantarmanana ।dAriyuddhArakivu  - Mankutimma ॥ 457 ॥
kagga: ಚಾರುದೃಶ್ಯಂಗಳಿಂ ಪ್ರೀತಿ ಹೃದಯವಿಕಾಸ ।ಕ್ರೂರದೌಷ್ಟ್ಯಂಗಳಿಂ ವೀರಾನುಕಂಪ ॥ಭೈರವಾದ್ಭುತಗಳಿಂ ಮೌನದಂತರ್ಮನನ ।ದಾರಿಯುದ್ಧಾರಕಿವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೭ ॥

content: ಹಿಂದಣದರುಳಿವಿರದು, ಮುಂದಣದರುಸಿರಿರದು ।ಒಂದರೆಕ್ಷಣ ತುಂಬಿ ತೋರುವುದನಂತ ॥ಒಂದೆ ಕಣ್ಣೊಂದೆ ಗುರಿಯೊಂದೆ ಮೈಮನಮರೆತ ।ಸುಂದರದ ಲೋಕವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೮ ॥hindaNadaruLiviradu, mundaNadarusiriradu ।ondarekShaNa tumbi tOruvudananta ॥onde kaNNonde guriyonde maimanamareta ।sundarada lOkavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 458 ॥In the moment of enlightenment, there is no memory of the past. There is no anxiety for the future. That fraction of second is filed with all the excitement of eternity. In that beautiful vision, there is unity of what we see, where we want to go, the body and soul.  - Mankutimma
translation: In the moment of enlightenment, there is no memory of the past. There is no anxiety for the future. That fraction of second is filed with all the excitement of eternity. In that beautiful vision, there is unity of what we see, where we want to go, the body and soul.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸುಂದರದ ಲೋಕವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hindaNadaruLiviradu, mundaNadarusiriradu ।ondarekShaNa tumbi tOruvudananta ॥onde kaNNonde guriyonde maimanamareta ।sundarada lOkavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 458 ॥
kagga: ಹಿಂದಣದರುಳಿವಿರದು, ಮುಂದಣದರುಸಿರಿರದು ।ಒಂದರೆಕ್ಷಣ ತುಂಬಿ ತೋರುವುದನಂತ ॥ಒಂದೆ ಕಣ್ಣೊಂದೆ ಗುರಿಯೊಂದೆ ಮೈಮನಮರೆತ ।ಸುಂದರದ ಲೋಕವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೮ ॥

content: ಹೃದಯಪುಷ್ಪಮರಂದವಾತ್ಮಕೆ ನಿಜಾನಂದ ।ಉದಿಪುದಾ ರಸ ಸುಂದರದ ಕಿರಣ ಸೋಕೆ ॥ಬದುಕಿನೊಳ್ ಕವಿತೆಯೊಳ್ ಕಲೆಗಳೊಳ್ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಯೊಳ್ ।ಪುದಿದಿರ್ಪ ಕಾಂತಿಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೯ ॥hRudayapuShpamarandavAtmake nijAnanda ।udipudA rasa sundarada kiraNa sOke ॥badukinoL kaviteyoL kalegaLoL prakRutiyoL ।pudidirpa kAntiyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 459 ॥The heart has the nectar which makes the soul truly happy. When the eyes see a beautiful scene, it fills the heart with that beauty (and satisfaction). That brilliance is present in life, in poetry, in fine arts and nature.  - Mankutimma
translation: The heart has the nectar which makes the soul truly happy. When the eyes see a beautiful scene, it fills the heart with that beauty (and satisfaction). That brilliance is present in life, in poetry, in fine arts and nature.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪುದಿದಿರ್ಪ ಕಾಂತಿಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hRudayapuShpamarandavAtmake nijAnanda ।udipudA rasa sundarada kiraNa sOke ॥badukinoL kaviteyoL kalegaLoL prakRutiyoL ।pudidirpa kAntiyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 459 ॥
kagga: ಹೃದಯಪುಷ್ಪಮರಂದವಾತ್ಮಕೆ ನಿಜಾನಂದ ।ಉದಿಪುದಾ ರಸ ಸುಂದರದ ಕಿರಣ ಸೋಕೆ ॥ಬದುಕಿನೊಳ್ ಕವಿತೆಯೊಳ್ ಕಲೆಗಳೊಳ್ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಯೊಳ್ ।ಪುದಿದಿರ್ಪ ಕಾಂತಿಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫೯ ॥

content: ಜಗದ ಬಂದೀಗೃಹದಿ ಬಿಗಿಯುತಿರೆ ವಿಧಿ ನಿನ್ನ ।ನಿಗಮ ಸತ್ಕಲೆ ಕಾವ್ಯಗಳ ಗವಾಕ್ಷಗಳಿಂ ॥ಗಗನದೊಳನಂತದರ್ಶನದೆ ಮುಕ್ತಿಯನೊಂದು ।ನಗುನಗಿಸಿ ಲೋಕವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೦ ॥jagada bandIgRuhadi bigyutire vidhi ninna ।nigama satkale kAvyagaLa gavAkShagaLim ॥gaganadoL anantadarshanade muktiyanondu ।nagunagisi lOkavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 460 ॥Providence locks you up in the prison of this world. There are windows that let you see outside  - scriptures, fine arts and literature. Look through those windows towards the sky experience the infinite. That is the way to liberate yourself. While doing so, you should make sure you make the rest of the world happy also.   - Mankutimma
translation: Providence locks you up in the prison of this world. There are windows that let you see outside  - scriptures, fine arts and literature. Look through those windows towards the sky experience the infinite. That is the way to liberate yourself. While doing so, you should make sure you make the rest of the world happy also.   - Mankutimma
title: ನಗುನಗಿಸಿ ಲೋಕವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jagada bandIgRuhadi bigyutire vidhi ninna ।nigama satkale kAvyagaLa gavAkShagaLim ॥gaganadoL anantadarshanade muktiyanondu ।nagunagisi lOkavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 460 ॥
kagga: ಜಗದ ಬಂದೀಗೃಹದಿ ಬಿಗಿಯುತಿರೆ ವಿಧಿ ನಿನ್ನ ।ನಿಗಮ ಸತ್ಕಲೆ ಕಾವ್ಯಗಳ ಗವಾಕ್ಷಗಳಿಂ ॥ಗಗನದೊಳನಂತದರ್ಶನದೆ ಮುಕ್ತಿಯನೊಂದು ।ನಗುನಗಿಸಿ ಲೋಕವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೦ ॥

content: ರಾಮನುಂ ಭರತನುಂ ತಬ್ಬಿಕೊಂಡತ್ತಂದು ।ಪ್ರೇಮಾಶ್ರುವುಕ್ಕಿ ನದಿಯಾಗಿ ಪರಿದಂದು ॥ಸೀಮೆಯಂ ಮುಟ್ಟಿತಲ ಬಾಂಧವ್ಯಸೌಂದರ್ಯ ।ಕ್ಷೇಮವದು ಜೀವಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೧ ॥rAmanum bharatanum tabbikoNDattandu ।prEmAshru ukki nadiyAgi paridandu ॥sImeyam muTTitala bAndhavyasaundarya ।kShEmavadu jIvakke  - Mankutimma ॥ 461 ॥When Rama and Bharatha met and hugged each other, tears of love rolled like a torrent. Such was their emotions which crossed all limits of love and beauty. Once in a while letting our emotions flow like this is good for life.   - Mankutimma
translation: When Rama and Bharatha met and hugged each other, tears of love rolled like a torrent. Such was their emotions which crossed all limits of love and beauty. Once in a while letting our emotions flow like this is good for life.   - Mankutimma
title: ಕ್ಷೇಮವದು ಜೀವಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: rAmanum bharatanum tabbikoNDattandu ।prEmAshru ukki nadiyAgi paridandu ॥sImeyam muTTitala bAndhavyasaundarya ।kShEmavadu jIvakke  - Mankutimma ॥ 461 ॥
kagga: ರಾಮನುಂ ಭರತನುಂ ತಬ್ಬಿಕೊಂಡತ್ತಂದು ।ಪ್ರೇಮಾಶ್ರುವುಕ್ಕಿ ನದಿಯಾಗಿ ಪರಿದಂದು ॥ಸೀಮೆಯಂ ಮುಟ್ಟಿತಲ ಬಾಂಧವ್ಯಸೌಂದರ್ಯ ।ಕ್ಷೇಮವದು ಜೀವಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೧ ॥

content: ಪ್ರೀತಿಮಹಿಮೆಯ ಚಿತ್ರರೀತಿಯಂ ವಾಲ್ಮೀಕಿ ।ನೀತಿಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮದ ಗಹನಮಾರ್ಗಮಂ ವ್ಯಾಸರ್ ॥ಗೀತೆಯಲಿ ವಿಶ್ವಜೀವನರಹಸ್ಯವನವರ್ ।ಖ್ಯಾತಿಸಿಹರದು ಕಾವ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೨ ॥prItimahimeya chitrarItiyam vAlmIki ।nItisUkShmada gahanamArgamam vyAsar ॥gIteyali vishvajIvana rahasyavanavar ।khyAtisiharadu kAvya  - Mankutimma ॥ 462 ॥Valmiki has painted a very beautiful picture depicting magnanimity of love in Ramayana. In Mahabharata, Vyasa has shown us the intricate subtleties of various hues of morality. In the Bhagavadgita, he has revealed the secret of life in this world. That is the reason why these poems are famous.  - Mankutimma
translation: Valmiki has painted a very beautiful picture depicting magnanimity of love in Ramayana. In Mahabharata, Vyasa has shown us the intricate subtleties of various hues of morality. In the Bhagavadgita, he has revealed the secret of life in this world. That is the reason why these poems are famous.  - Mankutimma
title: ಖ್ಯಾತಿಸಿಹರದು ಕಾವ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: prItimahimeya chitrarItiyam vAlmIki ।nItisUkShmada gahanamArgamam vyAsar ॥gIteyali vishvajIvana rahasyavanavar ।khyAtisiharadu kAvya  - Mankutimma ॥ 462 ॥

content: ಹೃದಯಕೊಪ್ಪುವ ಭಾಷೆ ರಾಗಲಯ ವಿಸ್ತಾರ ।ಪದ ಚರ್ಚೆ ಮಿತವಿಚಾರಕೆ ತಕ್ಕ ಭಾಷೆ ॥ಹೃದಯಮತಿ ಸತಿಪತಿಗಳಂತಿರಲು ಯುಕ್ತವದು ।ಬದುಕು ರಸತರ್ಕೈಕ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೩ ॥hRudayake oppuva bhAShe rAgalaya vistAra ।pada charche mitavichArake takka bhAShe ॥hRudaya mati satipatigaLante iralu yuktavadu ।baduku rasa tarka aikya  - Mankutimma ॥ 463 ॥The language that the heart understands is that of emotions. Discussions and words are good for conveying ideas or arguments. It is apt that the heart and mind must be like husband and wife. Life is happy when emotions and logic are both in present in right proportions.  - Mankutimma
translation: The language that the heart understands is that of emotions. Discussions and words are good for conveying ideas or arguments. It is apt that the heart and mind must be like husband and wife. Life is happy when emotions and logic are both in present in right proportions.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬದುಕು ರಸತರ್ಕೈಕ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hRudayake oppuva bhAShe rAgalaya vistAra ।pada charche mitavichArake takka bhAShe ॥hRudaya mati satipatigaLante iralu yuktavadu ।baduku rasa tarka aikya  - Mankutimma ॥ 463 ॥

content: ಸ್ರವಿಸುವುದು ಜೀವರಸ ಹೃದಯಗರ್ತದ ತಳದಿ ।ಕಿವಿಗಾ ರಹಸ್ಯದುಲಿ ಕಾವ್ಯಗಾನಗಳಿಂ ॥ಭುವನದಾಚಿನ ರಹಸ್ಯದ ಕೀರ್ತಿ ವೇದಗಳ ।ರವದಿನೆಂದಾರ್ಷಮತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೪ ॥sravisuvudu jIvarasa hRudayagartada taLadi ।kivige A rahasyada uli kAvyagAnagaLim ॥bhuvanada Achina rahasyada kIrti vEdagaLa ।ravadine endu ArShamata  - Mankutimma ॥ 464 ॥The essence of life flows as emotions in the bottom of every heart. Poets listen (and hear) this secret that comes out as poems and songs. Similarly, it is the sages opinion that the truth beyond this world comes to as the Vedas- Mankutimma
translation: The essence of life flows as emotions in the bottom of every heart. Poets listen (and hear) this secret that comes out as poems and songs. Similarly, it is the sages opinion that the truth beyond this world comes to as the Vedas- Mankutimma
title: ರವದಿನೆಂದಾರ್ಷಮತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sravisuvudu jIvarasa hRudayagartada taLadi ।kivige A rahasyada uli kAvyagAnagaLim ॥bhuvanada Achina rahasyada kIrti vEdagaLa ।ravadine endu ArShamata  - Mankutimma ॥ 464 ॥
kagga: ಸ್ರವಿಸುವುದು ಜೀವರಸ ಹೃದಯಗರ್ತದ ತಳದಿ ।ಕಿವಿಗಾ ರಹಸ್ಯದುಲಿ ಕಾವ್ಯಗಾನಗಳಿಂ ॥ಭುವನದಾಚಿನ ರಹಸ್ಯದ ಕೀರ್ತಿ ವೇದಗಳ ।ರವದಿನೆಂದಾರ್ಷಮತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೪ ॥

content: ಸ್ವರರಾಗಗೀತಿಗಳು ನಾಟ್ಯಾಭಿನೀತಿಗಳು ।ಕರೆದೇಳಿಸುವುವು ಮನಸಿನಲಿ ನಿದ್ರಿಸುವಾ ॥ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ಭಾವಗಳ ಗೂಢಸ್ವಭಾವಗಳ ।ಪರಮೇಷ್ಠಿ ಟೀಕು ಕಲೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೫ ॥svararAgagItigaLu nATya abhinItigaLu ।karedu ELisuvuvu manasinali nidrisuvA ॥paripariya bhAvagaLa gUDhasvabhAvagaLa ।paramEShThi TIku kale  - Mankutimma ॥ 465 ॥Melodious songs, drama and fabulous acting can trigger emotions and innate urges that are asleep deep in our mind. Fine arts is imitating God.- Mankutimma
translation: Melodious songs, drama and fabulous acting can trigger emotions and innate urges that are asleep deep in our mind. Fine arts is imitating God.- Mankutimma
title: ಪರಮೇಷ್ಠಿ ಟೀಕು ಕಲೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: svararAgagItigaLu nATya abhinItigaLu ।karedu ELisuvuvu manasinali nidrisuvA ॥paripariya bhAvagaLa gUDhasvabhAvagaLa ।paramEShThi TIku kale  - Mankutimma ॥ 465 ॥
kagga: ಸ್ವರರಾಗಗೀತಿಗಳು ನಾಟ್ಯಾಭಿನೀತಿಗಳು ।ಕರೆದೇಳಿಸುವುವು ಮನಸಿನಲಿ ನಿದ್ರಿಸುವಾ ॥ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ಭಾವಗಳ ಗೂಢಸ್ವಭಾವಗಳ ।ಪರಮೇಷ್ಠಿ ಟೀಕು ಕಲೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೫ ॥

content: ವ್ಯಸನಕಾರಣವೊಂದು ಹಸನಕಾರಣಾವೊಂದು ।ರಸಗಳೀಯೆರಡಕಿಂತಾಳವಿನ್ನೊಂದು ॥ಭೃಶವಿಶ್ವಜೀವಿತಗಭೀರತೆಯ ದರ್ಶನದ ।ರಸವದದ್ಭುತಮೌನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೬ ॥vyasanakAraNAvondu hasanakAraNAvondu ।rasagaLu ee eraDakinta ALavu innondu ॥bhRuta vishva jIvita gabhIrateya darshanada ।rasavadu adbhuta mauna  - Mankutimma ॥ 466 ॥Everyday emotions are of two types  - that which make us happy (laugh) or make us sad (cry). But there is one which is different from the two. It is the vision of this strange universe and the secret of life. That emotion is nothing but wonderful silence.- Mankutimma
translation: Everyday emotions are of two types  - that which make us happy (laugh) or make us sad (cry). But there is one which is different from the two. It is the vision of this strange universe and the secret of life. That emotion is nothing but wonderful silence.- Mankutimma
title: ರಸವದದ್ಭುತಮೌನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vyasanakAraNAvondu hasanakAraNAvondu ।rasagaLu ee eraDakinta ALavu innondu ॥bhRuta vishva jIvita gabhIrateya darshanada ।rasavadu adbhuta mauna  - Mankutimma ॥ 466 ॥
kagga: ವ್ಯಸನಕಾರಣವೊಂದು ಹಸನಕಾರಣಾವೊಂದು ।ರಸಗಳೀಯೆರಡಕಿಂತಾಳವಿನ್ನೊಂದು ॥ಭೃಶವಿಶ್ವಜೀವಿತಗಭೀರತೆಯ ದರ್ಶನದ ।ರಸವದದ್ಭುತಮೌನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೬ ॥

content: ಗಣನೆಗೆಟುಕದ ಗುಣಗಳಾತ್ಮದವವರ್ಣ್ಯಗಳು ।ಮನದ ದೇಹದ ಜೀವದೆಲ್ಲ ಕರಣಗಳಾ ॥ಅನುಭವದ ಮುಕರದೊಳ್ ಪ್ರತಿಫಲಿಸೆ ತನ್ನದೊಂ  - ।ದಣುವದುವೆ ಸುಂದರವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೭ ॥gaNanege eTukada guNagaLu Atmadavu avarNyagaLu ।manada dEhada jIvada karaNagaLu aa ॥anubhavada mukaradoL pratiphalise tannadu ।ondaNuvu aduve sundaravo  - Mankutimma ॥ 467 ॥The qualities of the soul are innumerable, immeasurable and indescribable. They can only be experienced. It is reflected in what we do using our mind, body and life. When we see that, we realize that every atom is beautiful.   - Mankutimma
translation: The qualities of the soul are innumerable, immeasurable and indescribable. They can only be experienced. It is reflected in what we do using our mind, body and life. When we see that, we realize that every atom is beautiful.   - Mankutimma
title: ಒಂದಣುವದುವೆ ಸುಂದರವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: gaNanege eTukada guNagaLu Atmadavu avarNyagaLu ।manada dEhada jIvada karaNagaLu aa ॥anubhavada mukaradoL pratiphalise tannadu ।ondaNuvu aduve sundaravo  - Mankutimma ॥ 467 ॥
kagga: ಗಣನೆಗೆಟುಕದ ಗುಣಗಳಾತ್ಮದವವರ್ಣ್ಯಗಳು ।ಮನದ ದೇಹದ ಜೀವದೆಲ್ಲ ಕರಣಗಳಾ ॥ಅನುಭವದ ಮುಕರದೊಳ್ ಪ್ರತಿಫಲಿಸೆ ತನ್ನದೊಂ  - ।ದಣುವದುವೆ ಸುಂದರವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೭ ॥

content: ಲಾವಣ್ಯವಾತ್ಮಗುಣವದರಿಂದೆ ಲೋಕಜನ ।ದೇವನನು ಕಮನೀಯ ವಿಗ್ರಹಂಗಳಲಿ  ॥ಭಾವಿಸುತ ತಮ್ಮಿಷ್ಟಭೋಗಗಳನರ್ಪಿಸುವ ।ಸೇವೆಯಿಂ ನಲಿಯುವರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೮ ॥lAvaNya AtmaguNavu adarinda lOkajana ।dEvananu kamanIya vigrahangaLali ॥bhAvisuta tamma iShTa bhogagaLanu arpisuva ।sEveyiM naliyuvaru  - Mankutimma ॥ 468 ॥Beauty is the natural quality of the soul. It is perhaps why people of the world imagine Gods to be in beautiful form (idols). They become happy by  offering all the worldly items that they like to Gods.  - Mankutimma
translation: Beauty is the natural quality of the soul. It is perhaps why people of the world imagine Gods to be in beautiful form (idols). They become happy by  offering all the worldly items that they like to Gods.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸೇವೆಯಿಂ ನಲಿಯುವರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: lAvaNya AtmaguNavu adarinda lOkajana ।dEvananu kamanIya vigrahangaLali ॥bhAvisuta tamma iShTa bhogagaLanu arpisuva ।sEveyiM naliyuvaru  - Mankutimma ॥ 468 ॥
kagga: ಲಾವಣ್ಯವಾತ್ಮಗುಣವದರಿಂದೆ ಲೋಕಜನ ।ದೇವನನು ಕಮನೀಯ ವಿಗ್ರಹಂಗಳಲಿ  ॥ಭಾವಿಸುತ ತಮ್ಮಿಷ್ಟಭೋಗಗಳನರ್ಪಿಸುವ ।ಸೇವೆಯಿಂ ನಲಿಯುವರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೮ ॥

content: ಸೌಂದರ್ಯವೊಂದು ದೈವರಹಸ್ಯ, ಸೃಷ್ಟಿವೊಲು ।ನಿಂದಿರ್ಪುದದರಾಶೆಯಿನೆ ಜೀವಿತಾಶೆ ॥ಅಂದುವುದು ಕಣ್ಣಿಗದು ಸಂಸ್ಕೃತಿಗೆ ತಕ್ಕಂತೆ  ।ಚೆಂದದರಿವೆ ತಪಸ್ಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೯ ॥soundaryavondu daiva rahasya, sRuShTivolu ।nindirpudu adarAsheyine jIvitAshe ॥anduvudu kaNNigadu samskRutige takkante ।chendadarive tapasso  - Mankutimma ॥ 469 ॥The experience of beauty is divine secret, just like the secret of creation. The longing for that experience forms the base for every one;s longing to live. The exact definition of a beautiful experience varies from culture to culture. To be able to recognize and experience it is itself a penance.  - Mankutimma
translation: The experience of beauty is divine secret, just like the secret of creation. The longing for that experience forms the base for every one;s longing to live. The exact definition of a beautiful experience varies from culture to culture. To be able to recognize and experience it is itself a penance.  - Mankutimma
title: ಚೆಂದದರಿವೆ ತಪಸ್ಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: soundaryavondu daiva rahasya, sRuShTivolu ।nindirpudu adarAsheyine jIvitAshe ॥anduvudu kaNNigadu samskRutige takkante ।chendadarive tapasso  - Mankutimma ॥ 469 ॥
kagga: ಸೌಂದರ್ಯವೊಂದು ದೈವರಹಸ್ಯ, ಸೃಷ್ಟಿವೊಲು ।ನಿಂದಿರ್ಪುದದರಾಶೆಯಿನೆ ಜೀವಿತಾಶೆ ॥ಅಂದುವುದು ಕಣ್ಣಿಗದು ಸಂಸ್ಕೃತಿಗೆ ತಕ್ಕಂತೆ  ।ಚೆಂದದರಿವೆ ತಪಸ್ಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬೯ ॥

content: ವಿವಿಧರಸಗಳ ಭಟ್ಟಿ, ಸೌಂದರ್ಯಕಾಮೇಷ್ಟಿ  ।ಕವಿಜಗತ್ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯದು, ಕಲೆಗನಾಕೃಷ್ಟಿ ॥ಗವಿಯೊಳಗಣ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಯಂತ್ರ ವೈಚಿತ್ರ್ಯವದು ।ತಪಸೊಂದೆ ಪಥವದಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೦ ॥vividha rasagaLa bhaTTi, soundaryakAmEShTi ।kavi jagat sRuShTiyadu, kalegana aakRuShTi ॥gaviyoLagaNa prakRuti yantra vaichitryavadu ।tapasonde pathavdake  - Mankutimma ॥ 470 ॥Soundaryakameshti, is a metaphor for antics people do to experience beauty. It is a furnace where many different rasa (emotions, feelings) are distilled. A poet can create such a world where everything is beautiful. An artist can bring it right in front of your eyes. But it is right there in nature;s secret (from with in the cave) all around us. Penance is the only way to see it.  - Mankutimma
translation: Soundaryakameshti, is a metaphor for antics people do to experience beauty. It is a furnace where many different rasa (emotions, feelings) are distilled. A poet can create such a world where everything is beautiful. An artist can bring it right in front of your eyes. But it is right there in nature;s secret (from with in the cave) all around us. Penance is the only way to see it.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಪಸೊಂದೆ ಪಥವದಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vividha rasagaLa bhaTTi, soundaryakAmEShTi ।kavi jagat sRuShTiyadu, kalegana aakRuShTi ॥gaviyoLagaNa prakRuti yantra vaichitryavadu ।tapasonde pathavdake  - Mankutimma ॥ 470 ॥
kagga: ವಿವಿಧರಸಗಳ ಭಟ್ಟಿ, ಸೌಂದರ್ಯಕಾಮೇಷ್ಟಿ  ।ಕವಿಜಗತ್ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯದು, ಕಲೆಗನಾಕೃಷ್ಟಿ ॥ಗವಿಯೊಳಗಣ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಯಂತ್ರ ವೈಚಿತ್ರ್ಯವದು ।ತಪಸೊಂದೆ ಪಥವದಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೦ ॥

content: ಕವಿ ಚಿತ್ರಕೋವಿದನು ಪರತತ್ತ್ವಶೋಧಕನು ।ವಿವಿಧ ವಾದನ ಗೀತ ನೃತ್ಯ ಕುಶಲಿಗಳು ॥ನವನವತೆಯಂ ಮನಸಿಗೀವೆಲ್ಲ ಕಲೆಗಾರ- ।ರವರಿಂದ ಸುಂದರತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೨ ॥kavi chitra kovidanu paratattva shOdhakanu ।vividha vAdana gIta nRutya kushaligaLu ॥navanavateyam manasige iiva ella kalegAraru ।avarinda sundarate  - Mankutimma ॥ 472 ॥These people give freshness to our minds every day  - a poet, a painter, a scientist/philosopher interested in the finding out the truth, people who are experts in playing instruments, singers, dancers and other artisans. Their acts enhance the experience of beauty every day.  - Mankutimma
translation: These people give freshness to our minds every day  - a poet, a painter, a scientist/philosopher interested in the finding out the truth, people who are experts in playing instruments, singers, dancers and other artisans. Their acts enhance the experience of beauty every day.  - Mankutimma
title: ರವರಿಂದ ಸುಂದರತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kavi chitra kovidanu paratattva shOdhakanu ।vividha vAdana gIta nRutya kushaligaLu ॥navanavateyam manasige iiva ella kalegAraru ।avarinda sundarate  - Mankutimma ॥ 472 ॥
kagga: ಕವಿ ಚಿತ್ರಕೋವಿದನು ಪರತತ್ತ್ವಶೋಧಕನು ।ವಿವಿಧ ವಾದನ ಗೀತ ನೃತ್ಯ ಕುಶಲಿಗಳು ॥ನವನವತೆಯಂ ಮನಸಿಗೀವೆಲ್ಲ ಕಲೆಗಾರ- ।ರವರಿಂದ ಸುಂದರತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೨ ॥

content: ಮಂದಿರದ ಶಿಲ್ಪಿ ಯಂತ್ರಗಳ ಯೊಜಕ ರಾಜ್ಯ  - ।ಸಂಧಾನಿ ವಿಜ್ಞಾನಿಯುದ್ಯೊಗದಾನಿ ॥ಮಂದಿಮುಂದಾಳು ಜನಬಾಂಧವ್ಯಪೋಷಕನು ।ಸೌಂದರ್ಯಕರರಿವರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೧ ॥mandirada shilpi yantragaLa yojaka rAjya- ।sandhAni vijnAniyu udyoga dAni ॥mandi mundALu janabAndhavya pOShakanu ।soundaryakararu ivaru  - Mankutimma ॥ 471 ॥These people are all creators of beauty in their own ways  - a sculptor at a temple, an engineer who builds machines, a diplomat, a scientist, an entrepreneur, a leader, a philanthropist who gets people together.  - Mankutimma
translation: These people are all creators of beauty in their own ways  - a sculptor at a temple, an engineer who builds machines, a diplomat, a scientist, an entrepreneur, a leader, a philanthropist who gets people together.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸೌಂದರ್ಯಕರರಿವರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mandirada shilpi yantragaLa yojaka rAjya- ।sandhAni vijnAniyu udyoga dAni ॥mandi mundALu janabAndhavya pOShakanu ।soundaryakararu ivaru  - Mankutimma ॥ 471 ॥
kagga: ಮಂದಿರದ ಶಿಲ್ಪಿ ಯಂತ್ರಗಳ ಯೊಜಕ ರಾಜ್ಯ  - ।ಸಂಧಾನಿ ವಿಜ್ಞಾನಿಯುದ್ಯೊಗದಾನಿ ॥ಮಂದಿಮುಂದಾಳು ಜನಬಾಂಧವ್ಯಪೋಷಕನು ।ಸೌಂದರ್ಯಕರರಿವರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೧ ॥

content: ಪಾರಿಜಾತವ ಕಂಡು ನಿಡುಸುಯ್ದು, ಪದಗಳಿಂ ।ಶೌರಿಕಥೆಯನು ಹೆಣೆದು ತೃಪ್ತನಹನು ಕವಿ ॥ಊರಿನುದ್ಯಾನಕದ ತರಿಸಿ ಬೆಳಸುವ ಕಾರ್ಯ- ।ಧೀರನಲ ರಾಜ್ಯಕನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೩ ॥pArijAtava kanDu niDusuydu, padagaLim ।shourikatheyanu heNedu tRuptanahanu kavi  ॥Urina udyAnakada tarisi beLasuva kArya- ।dhIranala rAjyakanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 473 ॥Parijata plant gives very fragrant flowers. A poet may imagine it, sigh and create a beautiful poem telling the story of how Krishna brought the tree from heaven to earth. The poem will be beautiful. But a king creates beauty by his action  - getting the sapling planted in the garden of the town and making sure it grows well. Both are creators of beauty.  - Mankutimma
translation: Parijata plant gives very fragrant flowers. A poet may imagine it, sigh and create a beautiful poem telling the story of how Krishna brought the tree from heaven to earth. The poem will be beautiful. But a king creates beauty by his action  - getting the sapling planted in the garden of the town and making sure it grows well. Both are creators of beauty.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಾರ್ಯಧೀರನಲ ರಾಜ್ಯಕನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: pArijAtava kanDu niDusuydu, padagaLim ।shourikatheyanu heNedu tRuptanahanu kavi  ॥Urina udyAnakada tarisi beLasuva kArya- ।dhIranala rAjyakanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 473 ॥
kagga: ಪಾರಿಜಾತವ ಕಂಡು ನಿಡುಸುಯ್ದು, ಪದಗಳಿಂ ।ಶೌರಿಕಥೆಯನು ಹೆಣೆದು ತೃಪ್ತನಹನು ಕವಿ ॥ಊರಿನುದ್ಯಾನಕದ ತರಿಸಿ ಬೆಳಸುವ ಕಾರ್ಯ- ।ಧೀರನಲ ರಾಜ್ಯಕನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೩ ॥

content: ಬಿದ್ದುದನು ನಿಲ್ಲಿಪುದೆ ನರನ ಮೃತ್ಯುಂಜಯತೆ ।ಶುದ್ಧಿಸದೆ ನಭ ಧರೆಯ ಮರಮರಳಿ ಮಳೆಯಿಂ? ॥ಗದ್ದೆ ಕೊಯ್ಲಾಗೆ ಮಗುಳ್ದದು ಬೆಳೆಯ ಕುಡದಿಹುದೆ? ।ಬಿದ್ದ ಮನೆಯನು ಕಟ್ಟೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೪ ॥biddudanu nillipude narana mRutyunjayate ।shuddhisade nabha dhareya maramaraLi maLeyim? ॥gadde koylAge maguLdadu beLeya kuDadihude? ।bidda maneyanu kaTTo  - Mankutimma ॥ 474 ॥Man;s immortality is in reconstructing that which has fallen down. We should not shy away from that responsibility. The sky cleans the earth again and again by pouring rain on earth tirelessly. An agriculture field does not refuse produce after the first harvest. Does it? You should always build the broken house back.  - Mankutimma
translation: Man;s immortality is in reconstructing that which has fallen down. We should not shy away from that responsibility. The sky cleans the earth again and again by pouring rain on earth tirelessly. An agriculture field does not refuse produce after the first harvest. Does it? You should always build the broken house back.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಿದ್ದ ಮನೆಯನು ಕಟ್ಟೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ

kagga: ಬಿದ್ದುದನು ನಿಲ್ಲಿಪುದೆ ನರನ ಮೃತ್ಯುಂಜಯತೆ ।ಶುದ್ಧಿಸದೆ ನಭ ಧರೆಯ ಮರಮರಳಿ ಮಳೆಯಿಂ? ॥ಗದ್ದೆ ಕೊಯ್ಲಾಗೆ ಮಗುಳ್ದದು ಬೆಳೆಯ ಕುಡದಿಹುದೆ? ।ಬಿದ್ದ ಮನೆಯನು ಕಟ್ಟೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೪ ॥

content: ಗೌರವಿಸು ಜೀವನವ, ಗೌರವಿಸು ಚೇತನವ ।ಆರದೋ ಜಗವೆಂದು ಭೇದವೆಣಿಸದಿರು ॥ಹೋರುವುದೆ ಜೀವನಸಮೃದ್ಧಿಗೋಸುಗ ನಿನಗೆ ।ದಾರಿಯಾತ್ಮೊನ್ನತಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೫ ॥gouravisu jIvanava, gouravisu chEtanava ।Arado jagavendu bhedaveNisadiru ॥hOruvude jIvana samRuddhigOsuga ninage ।dAri AtmOnnatige  - Mankutimma ॥ 475 ॥Respect life, respect the source of all energy. Don;t be disinterested in this world assuming someone else is running it. Putting in hard work is the only path towards prosperity. It is also the path towards enrichment of your soul.  - Mankutimma
translation: Respect life, respect the source of all energy. Don;t be disinterested in this world assuming someone else is running it. Putting in hard work is the only path towards prosperity. It is also the path towards enrichment of your soul.  - Mankutimma
title: ದಾರಿಯಾತ್ಮೊನ್ನತಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: gouravisu jIvanava, gouravisu chEtanava ।Arado jagavendu bhedaveNisadiru ॥hOruvude jIvana samRuddhigOsuga ninage ।dAri AtmOnnatige  - Mankutimma ॥ 475 ॥
kagga: ಗೌರವಿಸು ಜೀವನವ, ಗೌರವಿಸು ಚೇತನವ ।ಆರದೋ ಜಗವೆಂದು ಭೇದವೆಣಿಸದಿರು ॥ಹೋರುವುದೆ ಜೀವನಸಮೃದ್ಧಿಗೋಸುಗ ನಿನಗೆ ।ದಾರಿಯಾತ್ಮೊನ್ನತಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೫ ॥

content: ಜೀವನೋದ್ಯಮವೆಲ್ಲ ತೋಟದುದ್ಯೋಗವೆನು ।ಭಾವಬುದ್ಧಿಗಳ ಕೃಷಿಯಿಂದೊಗೆದ ಫಲದಿಂ ॥ತೀವುತಿರೆ ನಗೆ ಹೊಳಪು ಮೊಗಮೊಗದೊಳಂ ಜಗದಿ ।ಸೇವೆಯದು ಬೊಮ್ಮಂಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೬ ॥jIvanOdyamavella tOTada udyOgavenu ।bhAvabuddhigaLa kRuShiyinda ogeda phaladim ॥tIvutire nage hoLapu mogamogadoLam jagadi ।sEveyadu bommange  - Mankutimma ॥ 476 ॥Consider all hard work we put in this world same as tending to a garden. If the fruits of our cultivation of feelings and emotions brings sparkle of smiles on many faces, then we can think we served God well.  - Mankutimma
translation: Consider all hard work we put in this world same as tending to a garden. If the fruits of our cultivation of feelings and emotions brings sparkle of smiles on many faces, then we can think we served God well.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸೇವೆಯದು ಬೊಮ್ಮಂಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jIvanOdyamavella tOTada udyOgavenu ।bhAvabuddhigaLa kRuShiyinda ogeda phaladim ॥tIvutire nage hoLapu mogamogadoLam jagadi ।sEveyadu bommange  - Mankutimma ॥ 476 ॥
kagga: ಜೀವನೋದ್ಯಮವೆಲ್ಲ ತೋಟದುದ್ಯೋಗವೆನು ।ಭಾವಬುದ್ಧಿಗಳ ಕೃಷಿಯಿಂದೊಗೆದ ಫಲದಿಂ ॥ತೀವುತಿರೆ ನಗೆ ಹೊಳಪು ಮೊಗಮೊಗದೊಳಂ ಜಗದಿ ।ಸೇವೆಯದು ಬೊಮ್ಮಂಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೬ ॥

content: ಹೂವ ತಳೆದ ಗುಲಾಬಿಯಿಂದ ಮನಕಹುದೇನು? ।ನೋವೋ? ಸಂತಸವೊ? ನೋಡಾಮುಳ್ಳು ಬಾಳ್ಗೆ ॥ಹೂವೆ ದಿವ್ಯಕಿರೀಟವದುವೆ ಕಾಲಕಟಾಕ್ಷ ।ಜೀವನದ ತಿರುಳಷ್ಟೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೭ ॥hUva taLida gulAbiyinda manakahudEnu? ।nOvO? santasavo? nODu aa muLLu bALge ॥hUve divya kirITavu aduve kAlakaTAkSha ।jIvanada  tiruLaShTe  - Mankutimma ॥ 477 ॥What do you feel when you see a rose blooming in a plant? Do you feel pain? or pleasure? See the thorn also. Our life secret is also as simple as that. The rose the goal of life. The thorns are the only ways to attain it.  - Mankutimma
translation: What do you feel when you see a rose blooming in a plant? Do you feel pain? or pleasure? See the thorn also. Our life secret is also as simple as that. The rose the goal of life. The thorns are the only ways to attain it.  - Mankutimma
title: ಜೀವನದ ತಿರುಳಷ್ಟೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hUva taLida gulAbiyinda manakahudEnu? ।nOvO? santasavo? nODu aa muLLu bALge ॥hUve divya kirITavu aduve kAlakaTAkSha ।jIvanada  tiruLaShTe  - Mankutimma ॥ 477 ॥
kagga: ಹೂವ ತಳೆದ ಗುಲಾಬಿಯಿಂದ ಮನಕಹುದೇನು? ।ನೋವೋ? ಸಂತಸವೊ? ನೋಡಾಮುಳ್ಳು ಬಾಳ್ಗೆ ॥ಹೂವೆ ದಿವ್ಯಕಿರೀಟವದುವೆ ಕಾಲಕಟಾಕ್ಷ ।ಜೀವನದ ತಿರುಳಷ್ಟೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೭ ॥

content: ಅಗೆದು ಗೊಬ್ಬರವಿಕ್ಕಿ ನೀರೆರೆದು ತೋಟಿಗನು ।ಜಗಿದ ಮುಳ್ಳಿರಿತಗಳ ಸೈರಿಸೆ ಗುಲಾಬಿ ॥ನಗುವುದೊಂದರೆನಿಮಿಷ ನಗಲು ಬಾಳ್ಮುಗಿಯುವುದು ।ಅಗೆದು ಗೊಬ್ಬರವಿಕ್ಕಿ ನೀರೆರೆದು ತೋಟಿಗನು ।ಜಗಿದ ಮುಳ್ಳಿರಿತಗಳ ಸೈರಿಸೆ ಗುಲಾಬಿ ॥ನಗುವುದೊಂದರೆನಿಮಿಷ ನಗಲು ಬಾಳ್ಮುಗಿಯುವುದು ।ಮುಗುಳು ದುಡಿತಕೆ ತಣಿಸು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೮ ॥agedu gobbaravikki nIreredu tOTiganu ।jagida muLLa iritagaLa sairise gulAbi ॥naguvudu ondarenimiSha nagalu bAL mugiyuvudu ।muguLu duDitake taNisu  - Mankutimma ॥ 478 ॥A gardener will dig, put manure, pour water and grow a rose plant. He will endure the pain caused by the piercing of the thorns. The rose bud smiles only for half a second. Its life ends after the smile. But that smile is worth all the effort.  - Mankutimma ॥ ೪೭೮ ॥ಮಾನವ, ದುಡಿಮೆagedu gobbaravikki nIreredu tOTiganu ।jagida muLLa iritagaLa sairise gulAbi ॥naguvudu ondarenimiSha nagalu bAL mugiyuvudu ।muguLu duDitake taNisu  - Mankutimma ॥ 478 ॥A gardener will dig, put manure, pour water and grow a rose plant. He will endure the pain caused by the piercing of the thorns. The rose bud smiles only for half a second. Its life ends after the smile. But that smile is worth all the effort.  - Mankutimma
translation: A gardener will dig, put manure, pour water and grow a rose plant. He will endure the pain caused by the piercing of the thorns. The rose bud smiles only for half a second. Its life ends after the smile. But that smile is worth all the effort.  - Mankutimma ॥ ೪೭೮ ॥ಮಾನವ, ದುಡಿಮೆagedu gobbaravikki nIreredu tOTiganu ।jagida muLLa iritagaLa sairise gulAbi ॥naguvudu ondarenimiSha nagalu bAL mugiyuvudu ।muguLu duDitake taNisu  - Mankutimma ॥ 478 ॥A gardener will dig, put manure, pour water and grow a rose plant. He will endure the pain caused by the piercing of the thorns. The rose bud smiles only for half a second. Its life ends after the smile. But that smile is worth all the effort.  - Mankutimma
