transliteration: agedu gobbaravikki nIreredu tOTiganu ।jagida muLLa iritagaLa sairise gulAbi ॥naguvudu ondarenimiSha nagalu bAL mugiyuvudu ।muguLu duDitake taNisu  - Mankutimma ॥ 478 ॥
kagga: ಅಗೆದು ಗೊಬ್ಬರವಿಕ್ಕಿ ನೀರೆರೆದು ತೋಟಿಗನು ।ಜಗಿದ ಮುಳ್ಳಿರಿತಗಳ ಸೈರಿಸೆ ಗುಲಾಬಿ ॥ನಗುವುದೊಂದರೆನಿಮಿಷ ನಗಲು ಬಾಳ್ಮುಗಿಯುವುದು ।ಅಗೆದು ಗೊಬ್ಬರವಿಕ್ಕಿ ನೀರೆರೆದು ತೋಟಿಗನು ।ಜಗಿದ ಮುಳ್ಳಿರಿತಗಳ ಸೈರಿಸೆ ಗುಲಾಬಿ ॥ನಗುವುದೊಂದರೆನಿಮಿಷ ನಗಲು ಬಾಳ್ಮುಗಿಯುವುದು ।ಮುಗುಳು ದುಡಿತಕೆ ತಣಿಸು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೮ ॥

content: ಸತ್ಯವೆಂಬುದದೇನು ಸೈನಿಕನ ಜೀವನದಿ? ।ಕತ್ತಿಯವನಿಗೆ ಸತ್ಯವದರಿಂದೆ ಧರ್ಮ ॥ಭುಕ್ತಿಸುಪ್ತಿಗಳ ವಿಭವಂಗಳವನಿಗೆ ಮಿಥ್ಯೆ ।ಸಾರ್ಥಕತೆಯಿಂ ಸತ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೯ ॥satyavembudadEnu sainikana jIvanadi? ।kattiyu avanige satyavu adarinda dharma ॥bhukti supti vibhavangaLu avanige mithya ।sArthakateyiM satya  - Mankutimma ॥ 479 ॥What is the meaning of truth in the life of a soldier? The sword is the only truth he knows. All morality is derived from that. He has no belief in the simple pleasures of life  - food, sleep and merry. People believe what gives them satisfaction as the ultimate truth.  - Mankutimma
translation: What is the meaning of truth in the life of a soldier? The sword is the only truth he knows. All morality is derived from that. He has no belief in the simple pleasures of life  - food, sleep and merry. People believe what gives them satisfaction as the ultimate truth.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಾರ್ಥಕತೆಯಿಂ ಸತ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: satyavembudadEnu sainikana jIvanadi? ।kattiyu avanige satyavu adarinda dharma ॥bhukti supti vibhavangaLu avanige mithya ।sArthakateyiM satya  - Mankutimma ॥ 479 ॥
kagga: ಸತ್ಯವೆಂಬುದದೇನು ಸೈನಿಕನ ಜೀವನದಿ? ।ಕತ್ತಿಯವನಿಗೆ ಸತ್ಯವದರಿಂದೆ ಧರ್ಮ ॥ಭುಕ್ತಿಸುಪ್ತಿಗಳ ವಿಭವಂಗಳವನಿಗೆ ಮಿಥ್ಯೆ ।ಸಾರ್ಥಕತೆಯಿಂ ಸತ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭೯ ॥

content: ಕ್ಲೇಶ ನೂರಾಗಿರೆಯುಮಾಶೆಗಳ ಪುನರುದಯ ।ಬೇಸರದ ನುಡಿಯೊಳಂ ಲೇಸುಗಳ ನೆನಪು ॥ಆಶೆ ಸಾಯ್ತೆಂದೊಡಂ ಚೆಲುವೆನಲು ಕಣ್ಣಲೆತ ।ಮಾಸವೀ ಜೀವಗುಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೦ ॥klEsha nUrAgireyum AshegaLa punarudaya ।bEsarada nuDiyoLam lEsugaLa nenapu  ॥aashe  sAytu endoDam cheluvenalu kaNNaleta ।mAsavI jIvaguNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 480 ॥There are hundreds of worries. But desires keep coming back. When we talk about bad times, we remember the better times we have had earlier (and wish to return). We may at some point feel that our desires have all died. But the moment we come across anything beautiful, our eyes get drawn towards it. It is the innate quality of all beings and it can not be masked.  - Mankutimma
translation: There are hundreds of worries. But desires keep coming back. When we talk about bad times, we remember the better times we have had earlier (and wish to return). We may at some point feel that our desires have all died. But the moment we come across anything beautiful, our eyes get drawn towards it. It is the innate quality of all beings and it can not be masked.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಾಸವೀ ಜೀವಗುಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: klEsha nUrAgireyum AshegaLa punarudaya ।bEsarada nuDiyoLam lEsugaLa nenapu  ॥aashe  sAytu endoDam cheluvenalu kaNNaleta ।mAsavI jIvaguNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 480 ॥
kagga: ಕ್ಲೇಶ ನೂರಾಗಿರೆಯುಮಾಶೆಗಳ ಪುನರುದಯ ।ಬೇಸರದ ನುಡಿಯೊಳಂ ಲೇಸುಗಳ ನೆನಪು ॥ಆಶೆ ಸಾಯ್ತೆಂದೊಡಂ ಚೆಲುವೆನಲು ಕಣ್ಣಲೆತ ।ಮಾಸವೀ ಜೀವಗುಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೦ ॥

content: ನಿಶಿ ಹಿಂದೆ, ನಿಶಿ ಮುಂದೆ, ನಡುವೆ ಮಿಸುಕಾಟ ಬಾಳ್ ।ನಿಶಿ ಕೆಲವರಿಗೆ ಸೊನ್ನೆ , ಕೆಲವರಿಗೆ ಗುಟ್ಟು ॥ಮಸಕಿನಲಿ ಭೂತವೊಂದಿಹುದು ದಿಟವಾದೊಡದ- ।ರುಸಿರು ಸೋಕದೆ ನಿನ್ನ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೧ ॥nishi hinde, nishi munde, naduve misukATa bAL।nishi kelavarige sonne, kelavarige guTTu ॥masakinali bhUtavondihudu diTavAdoDe  ।adara usiru sOkade ninna?  - Mankutimma ॥ 481 ॥Darkness behind, darkness ahead and chaos in between  - this is life. Some think this darkness is void. Some others think it is a mystery. If we think that there is a some being in the darkness, then will its breath not touch you ever?  - Mankutimma
translation: Darkness behind, darkness ahead and chaos in between  - this is life. Some think this darkness is void. Some others think it is a mystery. If we think that there is a some being in the darkness, then will its breath not touch you ever?  - Mankutimma
title: ಅದರುಸಿರು ಸೋಕದೆ ನಿನ್ನ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nishi hinde, nishi munde, naduve misukATa bAL।nishi kelavarige sonne, kelavarige guTTu ॥masakinali bhUtavondihudu diTavAdoDe  ।adara usiru sOkade ninna?  - Mankutimma ॥ 481 ॥
kagga: ನಿಶಿ ಹಿಂದೆ, ನಿಶಿ ಮುಂದೆ, ನಡುವೆ ಮಿಸುಕಾಟ ಬಾಳ್ ।ನಿಶಿ ಕೆಲವರಿಗೆ ಸೊನ್ನೆ , ಕೆಲವರಿಗೆ ಗುಟ್ಟು ॥ಮಸಕಿನಲಿ ಭೂತವೊಂದಿಹುದು ದಿಟವಾದೊಡದ- ।ರುಸಿರು ಸೋಕದೆ ನಿನ್ನ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೧ ॥

content: ಗುಹೆಯೆಡಕೆ, ಗುಹೆ ಬಲಕೆ, ನಡುವೆ ಮಲೆ; ಕಣಿವೆಯಲಿ ।ವಿಹರಿಪೆಯ ಹುಲಿ ಬಾರದೆಂದು ನೀಂ ನಚ್ಚಿ? ॥ರಹಸಿಯದ ಭೂತ ಪಿಡಿಯದ ತೆರದಿ ಬದುಕ ನಿ- ।ರ್ವಹಿಸುವುದೆ ಜಾಣ್ಮೆಯಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೨ ॥guheyeDake, guhe balake, naDuve male, kaNiveyali ।viharipeya huli bAradendu nIm nacchi? ॥rahasiyada bhUta piDiyada teradi baduka  ।nirvahisuvude jANmeyala  - Mankutimma ॥ 482 ॥Cave on the left, cave on the right, mountain straight ahead. Will you trust that there is no tiger prowling around and walk freely in the valley? No. You will be careful. Like wise, in life we must always be cautious of being caught by the secret entity (providence). A wise man would do that.  - Mankutimma
translation: Cave on the left, cave on the right, mountain straight ahead. Will you trust that there is no tiger prowling around and walk freely in the valley? No. You will be careful. Like wise, in life we must always be cautious of being caught by the secret entity (providence). A wise man would do that.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಿರ್ವಹಿಸುವುದೆ ಜಾಣ್ಮೆಯಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: guheyeDake, guhe balake, naDuve male, kaNiveyali ।viharipeya huli bAradendu nIm nacchi? ॥rahasiyada bhUta piDiyada teradi baduka  ।nirvahisuvude jANmeyala  - Mankutimma ॥ 482 ॥
kagga: ಗುಹೆಯೆಡಕೆ, ಗುಹೆ ಬಲಕೆ, ನಡುವೆ ಮಲೆ; ಕಣಿವೆಯಲಿ ।ವಿಹರಿಪೆಯ ಹುಲಿ ಬಾರದೆಂದು ನೀಂ ನಚ್ಚಿ? ॥ರಹಸಿಯದ ಭೂತ ಪಿಡಿಯದ ತೆರದಿ ಬದುಕ ನಿ- ।ರ್ವಹಿಸುವುದೆ ಜಾಣ್ಮೆಯಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೨ ॥

content: ಗಾಳಿಯನು ಗುದ್ದಿದರೆ ಮೈ ನೊಯ್ವುದೊಂದೆ ಫಲ ।ಮೂಲಸತ್ತ್ವವ ಮರೆತ ಸಾಹಸಗಳಂ‌ತು ॥ಮೇಳವಿಸೆ ಪೌರುಷಕೆ ದೈವಕೃಪೆಯಂದು ಫಲ ।ತಾಳಿ ಬಾಳಾವರೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೩ ॥gALiyanu guddidare mai noyvudu onde phala ।mUla sattvava mareta sAhasagaLantu ॥mELavise pauruShake daiva kRupeyandu phala ।tALi bAL aavarege  - Mankutimma ॥ 483 ॥If you punch in air what is the use? It will only result in your pain. Similar is the result on any industry that forgets the basics (that you can not control the outcome by yourself). When the will of providence aligns with human effort, only then will man succeed. Until then, he has to exercise patience.  - Mankutimma
translation: If you punch in air what is the use? It will only result in your pain. Similar is the result on any industry that forgets the basics (that you can not control the outcome by yourself). When the will of providence aligns with human effort, only then will man succeed. Until then, he has to exercise patience.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಾಳಿ ಬಾಳಾವರೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: gALiyanu guddidare mai noyvudu onde phala ।mUla sattvava mareta sAhasagaLantu ॥mELavise pauruShake daiva kRupeyandu phala ।tALi bAL aavarege  - Mankutimma ॥ 483 ॥
kagga: ಗಾಳಿಯನು ಗುದ್ದಿದರೆ ಮೈ ನೊಯ್ವುದೊಂದೆ ಫಲ ।ಮೂಲಸತ್ತ್ವವ ಮರೆತ ಸಾಹಸಗಳಂ‌ತು ॥ಮೇಳವಿಸೆ ಪೌರುಷಕೆ ದೈವಕೃಪೆಯಂದು ಫಲ ।ತಾಳಿ ಬಾಳಾವರೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೩ ॥

content: ಕತ್ತಲೆಯೊಳೇನನೋ ಕಂಡು ಬೆದರಿದ ನಾಯಿ  ।ಎತ್ತಲೋ ಸಖನೊರ್ವನಿಹನೆಂದು ನಂಬಿ ॥ಕತ್ತೆತ್ತಿ ಮೋಳಿಡುತ ಬೊಗಳಿ ಹಾರಾಡುವುದು ।ಭಕ್ತಿಯಂತೆಯೆ ನಮದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೪ ॥kattaleyoLu EnanO kanDu bedarida nAyi ।ettalO sakhanorvanu ihanendu nambi ॥kattetti mOLiDuta bogaLi hArADuvudu  ।bhakti anteye namadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 484 ॥Dogs have a habit of barking loudly in the middle of night for no reason. They seem to see something moving in the dark of night. In the hope that a friend can hear, they lift their head and start howling. Out devotion towards God is much the same.  - Mankutimma
translation: Dogs have a habit of barking loudly in the middle of night for no reason. They seem to see something moving in the dark of night. In the hope that a friend can hear, they lift their head and start howling. Out devotion towards God is much the same.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭಕ್ತಿಯಂತೆಯೆ ನಮದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kattaleyoLu EnanO kanDu bedarida nAyi ।ettalO sakhanorvanu ihanendu nambi ॥kattetti mOLiDuta bogaLi hArADuvudu  ।bhakti anteye namadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 484 ॥
kagga: ಕತ್ತಲೆಯೊಳೇನನೋ ಕಂಡು ಬೆದರಿದ ನಾಯಿ  ।ಎತ್ತಲೋ ಸಖನೊರ್ವನಿಹನೆಂದು ನಂಬಿ ॥ಕತ್ತೆತ್ತಿ ಮೋಳಿಡುತ ಬೊಗಳಿ ಹಾರಾಡುವುದು ।ಭಕ್ತಿಯಂತೆಯೆ ನಮದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೪ ॥

content: ನಂಬದಿರ್ದನು ತಂದೆ, ನಂಬಿದನು ಪ್ರಹ್ಲಾದ ।ನಂಬಿಯುಂ ನಂಬದಿರುವಿಬ್ಬಂದಿ ನೀನು ॥ಕಂಬದಿನೊ ಬಿಂಬದಿನೊ ಮೋಕ್ಷವವರಿಂಗಾಯ್ತು ।ಸಿಂಬಳದಿ ನೊಣ ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೫ ॥nambadirdanu tande, nambidanu prahlAda ।nambiyum nambadiruva ibbandi nInu  ॥kambadino bimbadino mOkShavu avaringAytu ।simbaLadi nONa nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 485 ॥Father (Hiranyakashipu) was a non-believer. But, Prahlada believed entirely. You are a confused person who think he believes, but not. They were both liberated either by true realization (Prahlada) or by the pillar (Hiranyakashipu, by Narasimha coming out of the pillar and killing him). But what about your state? You are like a fly fallen into filth (mucus). Can;t rejoice it, can;t escape it.  - Mankutimma
translation: Father (Hiranyakashipu) was a non-believer. But, Prahlada believed entirely. You are a confused person who think he believes, but not. They were both liberated either by true realization (Prahlada) or by the pillar (Hiranyakashipu, by Narasimha coming out of the pillar and killing him). But what about your state? You are like a fly fallen into filth (mucus). Can;t rejoice it, can;t escape it.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಿಂಬಳದಿ ನೊಣ ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nambadirdanu tande, nambidanu prahlAda ।nambiyum nambadiruva ibbandi nInu  ॥kambadino bimbadino mOkShavu avaringAytu ।simbaLadi nONa nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 485 ॥
kagga: ನಂಬದಿರ್ದನು ತಂದೆ, ನಂಬಿದನು ಪ್ರಹ್ಲಾದ ।ನಂಬಿಯುಂ ನಂಬದಿರುವಿಬ್ಬಂದಿ ನೀನು ॥ಕಂಬದಿನೊ ಬಿಂಬದಿನೊ ಮೋಕ್ಷವವರಿಂಗಾಯ್ತು ।ಸಿಂಬಳದಿ ನೊಣ ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೫ ॥

content: ತನಗಿಂತ ಹಿರಿದ, ಭುವನಕ್ಕಿಂತ ಹಿರಿದೊಂದ- ।ನನುಭವದ ಹಿಂದೆ, ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯ ನೆರಳ ಹಿಂದೆ ॥ಆನುಮಿತಿಸಿ ಮನುಜನಾ ಹಿರಿದನೆಳಸುವನೆಯ್ದೆ ।ಮನುಜನೊಳಹಿರಿಮೆಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೬ ॥tanaginta hirida, bhuvanakkinta hiridondanu ।anubhavada hinde, sRuShTiya neraLa hinde ॥Anumitisi manujan A hiridanu eLesuvanu eyde ।manujana oLa hirimeyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 486 ॥Man has been thinking that there is something much bigger, larger, greater than him, then the world he knows, than anything he has experienced, behind the secret of creation. He is able to hypothesize and make that thing larger and larger  - the concept of God. This thinking is the result of inner greatness in a man.  - Mankutimma
translation: Man has been thinking that there is something much bigger, larger, greater than him, then the world he knows, than anything he has experienced, behind the secret of creation. He is able to hypothesize and make that thing larger and larger  - the concept of God. This thinking is the result of inner greatness in a man.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮನುಜನೊಳಹಿರಿಮೆಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tanaginta hirida, bhuvanakkinta hiridondanu ।anubhavada hinde, sRuShTiya neraLa hinde ॥Anumitisi manujan A hiridanu eLesuvanu eyde ।manujana oLa hirimeyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 486 ॥
kagga: ತನಗಿಂತ ಹಿರಿದ, ಭುವನಕ್ಕಿಂತ ಹಿರಿದೊಂದ- ।ನನುಭವದ ಹಿಂದೆ, ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯ ನೆರಳ ಹಿಂದೆ ॥ಆನುಮಿತಿಸಿ ಮನುಜನಾ ಹಿರಿದನೆಳಸುವನೆಯ್ದೆ ।ಮನುಜನೊಳಹಿರಿಮೆಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೬ ॥

content: ನರರವೊಲೆ ಸುರರುಮಲೆದಲೆದು ಮರೆಯಾಗಿಹರು ।ಭರತದೇಶದೊಳಮೈಗುಪ್ತ ಯವನರೊಳಂ ॥ಸುರ ನಾಮ ರೂಪಗಳಸಂಖ್ಯಾತ, ನಿಜವೊಂದು ।ತೆರೆ ಕೋಟಿ ಕಡಲೊಂದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೭ ॥nararavole surarum aledu aledu mareyAgiharu ।bharatadEshadoLum aigupta yavanaroLam ॥sura nAma rUpagaLu asankhyAta, nija vondu ।tere kOTi kaDalondu  - Mankutimma ॥ 487 ॥Just like humans, the Gods have roamed this earth and have disappeared in all mythologies  - Indian, Egyptian or Greek. There are so many names to the Gods. But the truth remains universal and singular. Waves come in crores, but the sea is still only one.  - Mankutimma
translation: Just like humans, the Gods have roamed this earth and have disappeared in all mythologies  - Indian, Egyptian or Greek. There are so many names to the Gods. But the truth remains universal and singular. Waves come in crores, but the sea is still only one.  - Mankutimma
title: ತೆರೆ ಕೋಟಿ ಕಡಲೊಂದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nararavole surarum aledu aledu mareyAgiharu ।bharatadEshadoLum aigupta yavanaroLam ॥sura nAma rUpagaLu asankhyAta, nija vondu ।tere kOTi kaDalondu  - Mankutimma ॥ 487 ॥
kagga: ನರರವೊಲೆ ಸುರರುಮಲೆದಲೆದು ಮರೆಯಾಗಿಹರು ।ಭರತದೇಶದೊಳಮೈಗುಪ್ತ ಯವನರೊಳಂ ॥ಸುರ ನಾಮ ರೂಪಗಳಸಂಖ್ಯಾತ, ನಿಜವೊಂದು ।ತೆರೆ ಕೋಟಿ ಕಡಲೊಂದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೭ ॥

content: ಜೀವಿ ಬೇಡದಿರೆ ದೈವವನು ಕೇಳುವರಾರು? ।ದೈವ ಗುಟ್ಟಿರಿಸದಿರೆ ಜೀವಿಯರಸುವುದೇಂ? ॥ಜೀವ ದೈವಂಗಳ ಪರಸ್ಪರಾನ್ವೇಷಣೆಯೆ ।ಲಾವಣ್ಯ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೮ ॥jIvi bEDadire daivavanu kELuvarAru? ।daiva guTTirisadire jIviyu arasuvudu Eo? ॥jIva daivangaLa paraspara anvEShaNeye ।lAvaNya sRuShTiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 488 ॥If no being ever prayed, then who cares for a God? If God did not hide (the secret), then what would the being search for? (What would then be the purpose of existence?) Both God and the being are in search of each other. This is the beauty of this creation.  - Mankutimma
translation: If no being ever prayed, then who cares for a God? If God did not hide (the secret), then what would the being search for? (What would then be the purpose of existence?) Both God and the being are in search of each other. This is the beauty of this creation.  - Mankutimma
title: ಲಾವಣ್ಯ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jIvi bEDadire daivavanu kELuvarAru? ।daiva guTTirisadire jIviyu arasuvudu Eo? ॥jIva daivangaLa paraspara anvEShaNeye ।lAvaNya sRuShTiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 488 ॥

content: ಕಣ್ಣಿರದೆ ರವಿಯೇನು? ರವಿಯಿರದೆ ಕಣ್ಣೇನು? ।ಅನ್ಯೋನ್ಯ ಸಹಕೃತಿಯಿನುಭಯ ಸಾರ್ಥಕತೆ  ॥ನಿನ್ನಾತ್ಮ ಜಗದಾತ್ಮಕಂತು ಸಂಬಂಧವವು ।ವಹ್ನಿಸ್ಫುಲಿಂಗಗಳೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೯ ॥kaNNirade raviyEnu? raviyirade kaNNEnu? ।anyOnya sahakRutiyin ubhaya sArthakate ॥ninnAtma jagada Atmake antu sambandhavu avu ।vahni sphulingagaLo  - Mankutimma ॥ 489 ॥What good is the sun with out eyes to see? What good are the eyes without the sun? When one helps the other, there will be satisfying relation. Similar is the relation between your soul and the universe. They are like fire and splinters.  - Mankutimma
translation: What good is the sun with out eyes to see? What good are the eyes without the sun? When one helps the other, there will be satisfying relation. Similar is the relation between your soul and the universe. They are like fire and splinters.  - Mankutimma
title: ವಹ್ನಿಸ್ಫುಲಿಂಗಗಳೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kaNNirade raviyEnu? raviyirade kaNNEnu? ।anyOnya sahakRutiyin ubhaya sArthakate ॥ninnAtma jagada Atmake antu sambandhavu avu ।vahni sphulingagaLo  - Mankutimma ॥ 489 ॥
kagga: ಕಣ್ಣಿರದೆ ರವಿಯೇನು? ರವಿಯಿರದೆ ಕಣ್ಣೇನು? ।ಅನ್ಯೋನ್ಯ ಸಹಕೃತಿಯಿನುಭಯ ಸಾರ್ಥಕತೆ  ॥ನಿನ್ನಾತ್ಮ ಜಗದಾತ್ಮಕಂತು ಸಂಬಂಧವವು ।ವಹ್ನಿಸ್ಫುಲಿಂಗಗಳೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮೯ ॥

content: ಬಹಿರದ್ಭುತವ ಮನುಜನಂತರದ್ಭುತವರಿತು ।ಗ್ರಹಿಸುವಂತಾಗಿಸಲು ಪೂರ್ವಾನುಭವಿಗಳ್ ॥ಬಹುಪರಿಯುಪಾಯಗಳ ನಿರವಿಸಿಹರದಕೇಕೆ ।ಗಹಗಹಿಸುವೆಯೊ, ಮರುಳೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೦ ॥bahir adbhutava manujana antar adbhutavu aritu ।grahisuvantAgisalu pUrvAnubhavigaL ॥bahupari upAyagaLa niravisiharu adakEke ।gahagahisuveyo, maruLe  - Mankutimma ॥ 490 ॥There is wonder in the external creation. There is another wonder inside of every mind. To make the inner wonder grasp the outer wonder is possible only through experience. Those who have already experienced the wonders have devised ways to help us also to do so. Oh! Fool, why do you laugh at those methods?  - Mankutimma
translation: There is wonder in the external creation. There is another wonder inside of every mind. To make the inner wonder grasp the outer wonder is possible only through experience. Those who have already experienced the wonders have devised ways to help us also to do so. Oh! Fool, why do you laugh at those methods?  - Mankutimma
title: ಗಹಗಹಿಸುವೆಯೊ, ಮರುಳೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bahir adbhutava manujana antar adbhutavu aritu ।grahisuvantAgisalu pUrvAnubhavigaL ॥bahupari upAyagaLa niravisiharu adakEke ।gahagahisuveyo, maruLe  - Mankutimma ॥ 490 ॥
kagga: ಬಹಿರದ್ಭುತವ ಮನುಜನಂತರದ್ಭುತವರಿತು ।ಗ್ರಹಿಸುವಂತಾಗಿಸಲು ಪೂರ್ವಾನುಭವಿಗಳ್ ॥ಬಹುಪರಿಯುಪಾಯಗಳ ನಿರವಿಸಿಹರದಕೇಕೆ ।ಗಹಗಹಿಸುವೆಯೊ, ಮರುಳೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೦ ॥

content: ಅಂಬುಧಿಯ ಮಡಕೆಯಲಿ, ಹೊಂಬಿಸಿಲ ಕಿಟಿಕಿಯಲಿ ।ತುಂಬಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವ ಬಡವನೈಶ್ವರ್ಯದಂತೆ ॥ಬಿಂಬದೊಳಗಮಿತ ಸತ್ತ್ವವ ಪಿಡಿದಿಡುವ ಭಕ್ತಿ- ।ಯಿಂಬು ಕಿಂಚಿನ್ಮತಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೧ ॥ambudhiya maDakeyali, hombisila kiTikiyali ।tumbikoLLuva baDavana aishvaryadante ॥bimbadoLage amita sattvava piDidiDuva bhaktiyu ।imbu kinchinmatige  - Mankutimma ॥ 491 ॥Trying to fill the water of the ocean in a pot, to see sunlight through the window is akin to a poor man amassing wealth. Our attempt at condensing the infinite definition of God into a small idol (reflection) is very similar. It only give solace to our simple minds.  - Mankutimma
translation: Trying to fill the water of the ocean in a pot, to see sunlight through the window is akin to a poor man amassing wealth. Our attempt at condensing the infinite definition of God into a small idol (reflection) is very similar. It only give solace to our simple minds.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭಕ್ತಿಯಿಂಬು ಕಿಂಚಿನ್ಮತಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ambudhiya maDakeyali, hombisila kiTikiyali ।tumbikoLLuva baDavana aishvaryadante ॥bimbadoLage amita sattvava piDidiDuva bhaktiyu ।imbu kinchinmatige  - Mankutimma ॥ 491 ॥
kagga: ಅಂಬುಧಿಯ ಮಡಕೆಯಲಿ, ಹೊಂಬಿಸಿಲ ಕಿಟಿಕಿಯಲಿ ।ತುಂಬಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವ ಬಡವನೈಶ್ವರ್ಯದಂತೆ ॥ಬಿಂಬದೊಳಗಮಿತ ಸತ್ತ್ವವ ಪಿಡಿದಿಡುವ ಭಕ್ತಿ- ।ಯಿಂಬು ಕಿಂಚಿನ್ಮತಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೧ ॥

content: ಬಹಿರಂತರೈಕ್ಯವನು ನೆನಪಿಗಾಗಿಸಲೆಂದು ।ವಿಹಿತಮ್ ಆಚಮನಾರ್ಘ್ಯ ಪೂಜೆ ನೈವೇದ್ಯ ॥ಗುಹೆಯೊಳಗಣದ ಹೊರಗಣದ ಕೂಡಿಸುವುಪಾಯ ।ಸಹಭಾವವದಕೆ ಸರಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೨ ॥bahir antar aikyavanu nenapigAgisalendu ।vihitam Achamana arghya pUje naivedya ॥guheyoLagaNada horagaNada kUDisuva upAya ।sahabhAvavu adke sari  - Mankutimma ॥ 492 ॥Unifying the inner spirit with the one outside is the goal of conscience. This is constantly reminded in rituals of aachamana, arghya, pujaa and naivedya. These are ideas to meet the inner expanse of the cave with the outer. When such co-ordination happens, it feels right.  - Mankutimma
translation: Unifying the inner spirit with the one outside is the goal of conscience. This is constantly reminded in rituals of aachamana, arghya, pujaa and naivedya. These are ideas to meet the inner expanse of the cave with the outer. When such co-ordination happens, it feels right.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಹಭಾವವದಕೆ ಸರಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bahir antar aikyavanu nenapigAgisalendu ।vihitam Achamana arghya pUje naivedya ॥guheyoLagaNada horagaNada kUDisuva upAya ।sahabhAvavu adke sari  - Mankutimma ॥ 492 ॥
kagga: ಬಹಿರಂತರೈಕ್ಯವನು ನೆನಪಿಗಾಗಿಸಲೆಂದು ।ವಿಹಿತಮ್ ಆಚಮನಾರ್ಘ್ಯ ಪೂಜೆ ನೈವೇದ್ಯ ॥ಗುಹೆಯೊಳಗಣದ ಹೊರಗಣದ ಕೂಡಿಸುವುಪಾಯ ।ಸಹಭಾವವದಕೆ ಸರಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೨ ॥

content: ಬಹುಜನಂ ಕೈಮುಗಿದ ತೀರ್ಥದೊಳ್ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರದೊಳ್ ।ಮಹಿಮೆಯಲ್ಲೇನೆಂದು ಸಂಶಯಿಸಬೇಡ ॥ವಿಹಿತಗೈದವರಾರು ವಸತಿಂ ದೈವಕ್ಕೆ? ।ಮಹಿಮೆ ಮನಸೋತೆಡೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೩ ॥bahujanam kaimugidu tIrthadoL kShEtradoL ।mahimeyu alli Enendu samshayisabEDa ॥vihitagaidavarAru vasatiyam daivakke? ।mahime manasOteDeyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 493 ॥When many people consider a place as miraculous and holy, don;t get suspicious. Who can instruct God (power) to reside and act miraculously only there? Miracle is when (and where) the logical mind concedes defeat. (and belief takes over).  - Mankutimma
translation: When many people consider a place as miraculous and holy, don;t get suspicious. Who can instruct God (power) to reside and act miraculously only there? Miracle is when (and where) the logical mind concedes defeat. (and belief takes over).  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಹಿಮೆ ಮನಸೋತೆಡೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bahujanam kaimugidu tIrthadoL kShEtradoL ।mahimeyu alli Enendu samshayisabEDa ॥vihitagaidavarAru vasatiyam daivakke? ।mahime manasOteDeyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 493 ॥
kagga: ಬಹುಜನಂ ಕೈಮುಗಿದ ತೀರ್ಥದೊಳ್ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರದೊಳ್ ।ಮಹಿಮೆಯಲ್ಲೇನೆಂದು ಸಂಶಯಿಸಬೇಡ ॥ವಿಹಿತಗೈದವರಾರು ವಸತಿಂ ದೈವಕ್ಕೆ? ।ಮಹಿಮೆ ಮನಸೋತೆಡೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೩ ॥

content: ಹರಿಭಜಕರೊಳು ಭಯದಿನೊಗೆದುದೆನಿಬರ ಭಕುತಿ? ।ವರದ ಮೇಲಣ ಭಕ್ತಿಯೆನಿಬರದು ನೋಡೆ? ॥ಬರಿಯ ಸಂತೋಷದನುರಾಗರಸ ನಿಜಭಕ್ತಿ- ।ಪರಮದಾಕರ್ಷೆಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೪ ॥hari bhajakaroLu bhayadin ogedudu enibara bhakuti? ।varada mELaNa bhakti enibaradu nODe? ॥bariya santOShada anurAga rasa nija bhakti  - ।paramada AkarSheyadu   - Mankutimma ॥ 494 ॥Among the devotees of the Lord, how many are driver by fear? How many have devotions towards boons and not God himself? It is real devotion when feeling of love and happiness is only sought from it. That is the attraction of God.  - Mankutimma
translation: Among the devotees of the Lord, how many are driver by fear? How many have devotions towards boons and not God himself? It is real devotion when feeling of love and happiness is only sought from it. That is the attraction of God.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರಮದಾಕರ್ಷೆಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hari bhajakaroLu bhayadin ogedudu enibara bhakuti? ।varada mELaNa bhakti enibaradu nODe? ॥bariya santOShada anurAga rasa nija bhakti  - ।paramada AkarSheyadu   - Mankutimma ॥ 494 ॥
kagga: ಹರಿಭಜಕರೊಳು ಭಯದಿನೊಗೆದುದೆನಿಬರ ಭಕುತಿ? ।ವರದ ಮೇಲಣ ಭಕ್ತಿಯೆನಿಬರದು ನೋಡೆ? ॥ಬರಿಯ ಸಂತೋಷದನುರಾಗರಸ ನಿಜಭಕ್ತಿ- ।ಪರಮದಾಕರ್ಷೆಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೪ ॥

content: ಅರುಣೊದಯಪ್ರಭೆಯ, ಗಿರಿಶೃಂಗದುನ್ನತಿಯ  ।ವರುಣಾಲಯಾಯತಿಯ ನಿರುಕಿಸಿದೊಡಹುದೇಂ? ॥ಬೆರಗು, ಬರಿಬೆರಗು, ನುಡಿಗರಿದೆನಿಪ್ಪಾನಂದ ।ಪರಮಪೂಜೆಯುಮಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೫ ॥aruNodaya prabheya, girishRungada unnatiya ।varuNAlaya Ayatiya nirukisidoDe ahudEm? ॥beragu, bariberagu, nuDige aridenipa Ananda ।paramapUjeyum antu  - Mankutimma ॥ 495 ॥When one watches the brilliance of sun rise, the heights of mountains and the vast expanse of the seas  - what does he see/feel? Wonder, just wonder. Wonder that can not be described by words. Enjoying such a spectacle is a way we worship God.  - Mankutimma
translation: When one watches the brilliance of sun rise, the heights of mountains and the vast expanse of the seas  - what does he see/feel? Wonder, just wonder. Wonder that can not be described by words. Enjoying such a spectacle is a way we worship God.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರಮಪೂಜೆಯುಮಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aruNodaya prabheya, girishRungada unnatiya ।varuNAlaya Ayatiya nirukisidoDe ahudEm? ॥beragu, bariberagu, nuDige aridenipa Ananda ।paramapUjeyum antu  - Mankutimma ॥ 495 ॥
kagga: ಅರುಣೊದಯಪ್ರಭೆಯ, ಗಿರಿಶೃಂಗದುನ್ನತಿಯ  ।ವರುಣಾಲಯಾಯತಿಯ ನಿರುಕಿಸಿದೊಡಹುದೇಂ? ॥ಬೆರಗು, ಬರಿಬೆರಗು, ನುಡಿಗರಿದೆನಿಪ್ಪಾನಂದ ।ಪರಮಪೂಜೆಯುಮಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೫ ॥

content: ಬೆರಗಾಗಿಪುವುವೆಲ್ಲ ಪಿರಿತನದ ನೋಟಗಳು ।ಬೆರಗೆ, ಮೈಮರೆವೆ, ಸೊಲ್ಲಣಗುವುದೆ ಸೊಗಸು ॥ಬೆರಗು ಚಿತ್ತವ ನುಂಗಲೊಗೆವ ಶಾಂತಿಯ ಕಾಂತಿ ।ಪರಮನರ್ಚನೆಗೆ ವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೬ ॥beragAgipuvavu ella piritanada nOTagaLu ।berage, maimareve, soll anaguvude sogasu  ॥beragu chittava nungalu ogeva shAntiya kAnti ।paramana archanege vara  - Mankutimma ॥ 496 ॥All sights of magnanimity will cause wonder. It is this feeling of wonder, getting lost, feeling speechless that is pleasing. When our intellect is encompassed by this wonder, there is peace. The radiance of this peace is the boon by which we please the creator.  - Mankutimma
translation: All sights of magnanimity will cause wonder. It is this feeling of wonder, getting lost, feeling speechless that is pleasing. When our intellect is encompassed by this wonder, there is peace. The radiance of this peace is the boon by which we please the creator.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರಮನರ್ಚನೆಗೆ ವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: beragAgipuvavu ella piritanada nOTagaLu ।berage, maimareve, soll anaguvude sogasu  ॥beragu chittava nungalu ogeva shAntiya kAnti ।paramana archanege vara  - Mankutimma ॥ 496 ॥
kagga: ಬೆರಗಾಗಿಪುವುವೆಲ್ಲ ಪಿರಿತನದ ನೋಟಗಳು ।ಬೆರಗೆ, ಮೈಮರೆವೆ, ಸೊಲ್ಲಣಗುವುದೆ ಸೊಗಸು ॥ಬೆರಗು ಚಿತ್ತವ ನುಂಗಲೊಗೆವ ಶಾಂತಿಯ ಕಾಂತಿ ।ಪರಮನರ್ಚನೆಗೆ ವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೬ ॥

content: ಸುತೆಯ ಪೋಷಿಸಿ ಬೆಳಸಿ, ಧನಕನಕದೊಡನವಳನ್- ।ಇತರಗೃಹಕಿತ್ತು ನೀಂ ಕೇಳ್ವ ಮುಯ್ಯೇನು? ॥ಪ್ರತಿಫಲವು ಬೇರೇಕೆ? ಸುಕೃತಕದು ತಾನೆ ಫಲ ।ಹಿತ ಮನದ ಪಾಕಕದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೭ ॥suteya pOShisi beLasi, dhana kanakadoDane avaLan ।itara gRuhakittu nIm kELva myyEnu? ॥pratiphalavu bErEke? sukRutake adu tAne phala ।hita manada pAkakadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 497 ॥You bring up a daughter with lot of love and care. Then you give her away to a in-laws with a lot of money and gold. What do you expect in return? Nothing. What can you expect in return? Virtue its own reward. It is good for maturity of the mind.  - Mankutimma
translation: You bring up a daughter with lot of love and care. Then you give her away to a in-laws with a lot of money and gold. What do you expect in return? Nothing. What can you expect in return? Virtue its own reward. It is good for maturity of the mind.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹಿತ ಮನದ ಪಾಕಕದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: suteya pOShisi beLasi, dhana kanakadoDane avaLan ।itara gRuhakittu nIm kELva myyEnu? ॥pratiphalavu bErEke? sukRutake adu tAne phala ।hita manada pAkakadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 497 ॥
kagga: ಸುತೆಯ ಪೋಷಿಸಿ ಬೆಳಸಿ, ಧನಕನಕದೊಡನವಳನ್- ।ಇತರಗೃಹಕಿತ್ತು ನೀಂ ಕೇಳ್ವ ಮುಯ್ಯೇನು? ॥ಪ್ರತಿಫಲವು ಬೇರೇಕೆ? ಸುಕೃತಕದು ತಾನೆ ಫಲ ।ಹಿತ ಮನದ ಪಾಕಕದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೭ ॥

content: ಸಂಗೀತ ತಲೆದೂಗಿಪುದು, ಹೊಟ್ಟೆ ತುಂಬೀತೆ? ।ತಂಗದಿರನೆಸಕ ಕಣ್ಗಮೃತ, ಕಣಜಕದೇಂ? ॥ಅಂಗಡಿಯ ಮಾಡದಿರು ಸುಕೃತಪ್ರಸಕ್ತಿಯಲಿ ।ಪೊಂಗುವಾತ್ಮವೆ ಲಾಭ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೮ ॥sangeeta taledUgipudu, hoTTe tumbIte?  ।tangadirana esaka kaNge amRuta, kaNajake adEm? ॥angaDiya mADadiru sukRutiprasaktiyali ।ponguva Atmave lAbha  - Mankutimma ॥ 498 ॥Music may make head nod, but can it fill the stomach? Cool light from the moon is pleasing on the eyes, but will the granary fill with that? But these are all wonderful things with in tangible benefits. Don;t make it a transaction at a shop by weighing everything against profits. The enriching soul is the only benefit of those acts.  - Mankutimma
translation: Music may make head nod, but can it fill the stomach? Cool light from the moon is pleasing on the eyes, but will the granary fill with that? But these are all wonderful things with in tangible benefits. Don;t make it a transaction at a shop by weighing everything against profits. The enriching soul is the only benefit of those acts.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪೊಂಗುವಾತ್ಮವೆ ಲಾಭ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sangeeta taledUgipudu, hoTTe tumbIte?  ।tangadirana esaka kaNge amRuta, kaNajake adEm? ॥angaDiya mADadiru sukRutiprasaktiyali ।ponguva Atmave lAbha  - Mankutimma ॥ 498 ॥

content: ದೇವಮಂದಿರ ಭಜನೆ ಪೂಜೆ ಪ್ರಸಾದಗಳು ।ಜೀವನದಲಂಕಾರ, ಮನಸಿನುದ್ಧಾರ ॥ಭಾವವಂ ಕ್ಷುಲ್ಲಜಗದಿಂ ಬಿಡಿಸಿ ಮೇಲೊಯ್ವು- ।ದಾವುದಾದೊಡಮೊಳಿತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೯ ॥ dEva mandira bhajane pUje prasAdagaLu ।jIvanada alankAra, manasina uddhAra ॥bhAvavam kShulla jagadim biDisi mEl  oyyvudu ।AvudAdoDam oLitu   - Mankutimma ॥ 499 ॥Temples, worship and offerings we make god are all decorations to our lives, They are meant to enrich our minds. If any such act will take our mind off from every day worries and raises it to a higher level then it is good  - what ever it may be.  - Mankutimma
translation: Temples, worship and offerings we make god are all decorations to our lives, They are meant to enrich our minds. If any such act will take our mind off from every day worries and raises it to a higher level then it is good  - what ever it may be.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೇಲೊಯ್ವುದಾವುದಾದೊಡಮೊಳಿತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dEva mandira bhajane pUje prasAdagaLu ।jIvanada alankAra, manasina uddhAra ॥bhAvavam kShulla jagadim biDisi mEl  oyyvudu ।AvudAdoDam oLitu   - Mankutimma ॥ 499 ॥
kagga: ದೇವಮಂದಿರ ಭಜನೆ ಪೂಜೆ ಪ್ರಸಾದಗಳು ।ಜೀವನದಲಂಕಾರ, ಮನಸಿನುದ್ಧಾರ ॥ಭಾವವಂ ಕ್ಷುಲ್ಲಜಗದಿಂ ಬಿಡಿಸಿ ಮೇಲೊಯ್ವು- ।ದಾವುದಾದೊಡಮೊಳಿತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯೯ ॥

content: ದೇವನೇನತಿಶಯಿತಮಾನಿಸನೆ ಭೋಗಕ್ಕೆ? ।ಹೂವುಣಿಸು ಮುಡುಪೊಡವೆಯವನಿಗಂ ಬೇಕೆ? ॥ಆವುದೊಳ್ಳಿತೊ ತನಗೆ ನರನದನು ಪರಮಂಗೆ ।ನೈವೇದಿಪುದು ಸಾಜ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೦ ॥ dEvanEnu atishayita mAnisane bhOgakke? ।hUvu uNisu muDipu oDaveyu avanigam bEke? ॥Avudu oLLito tanage naranu adanu paramange ।naivEdipudu sAja  - Mankutimma ॥ 500 ॥Is god simply a power human to indulge in our offerings? Does he want the flowers, eateries, clothes and ornaments that offer him? Man simply offers to God all those things that are dear to him. This is a well known fact.  - Mankutimma
translation: Is god simply a power human to indulge in our offerings? Does he want the flowers, eateries, clothes and ornaments that offer him? Man simply offers to God all those things that are dear to him. This is a well known fact.  - Mankutimma
title: ನೈವೇದಿಪುದು ಸಾಜ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dEvanEnu atishayita mAnisane bhOgakke? ।hUvu uNisu muDipu oDaveyu avanigam bEke? ॥Avudu oLLito tanage naranu adanu paramange ।naivEdipudu sAja  - Mankutimma ॥ 500 ॥
kagga: ದೇವನೇನತಿಶಯಿತಮಾನಿಸನೆ ಭೋಗಕ್ಕೆ? ।ಹೂವುಣಿಸು ಮುಡುಪೊಡವೆಯವನಿಗಂ ಬೇಕೆ? ॥ಆವುದೊಳ್ಳಿತೊ ತನಗೆ ನರನದನು ಪರಮಂಗೆ ।ನೈವೇದಿಪುದು ಸಾಜ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೦ ॥

content: ಯುಕ್ತಿಸಾಮ್ರಾಜ್ಯದಲಿ ಭಕ್ತಿ, ಬಡ ಪರದೇಶಿ ।ಶಕ್ತಿ ಚತುರತೆಯುಡುಗಿ ನೀನು ಸೋತಂದು ॥ಉತ್ಕ್ರಮಣದರೆಮನದಿ ದೈವವನು ಪಿಡಿದೇನು? ।ಭಕ್ತಿ ರಕ್ತದಿ ಪರಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೧ ॥ yukti sAmrAjyadali bhakti, baDa paradEshi ।shakti chaturateyu uDugi nInu sOtandu ॥utkramanadi aremanadi daivavanu piDidEnu? ।bhakti raktadi parige  - Mankutimma ॥ 501 ॥In a world everything is driven by intellect, devotion (towards God) is like a poor foreigner. What will you do when your strength and smartness are diminished? What is the use of praying God at the time of death alone? Devotion should be like blood  - with in you all your life.  - Mankutimma
translation: In a world everything is driven by intellect, devotion (towards God) is like a poor foreigner. What will you do when your strength and smartness are diminished? What is the use of praying God at the time of death alone? Devotion should be like blood  - with in you all your life.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭಕ್ತಿ ರಕ್ತದಿ ಪರಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: yukti sAmrAjyadali bhakti, baDa paradEshi ।shakti chaturateyu uDugi nInu sOtandu ॥utkramanadi aremanadi daivavanu piDidEnu? ।bhakti raktadi parige  - Mankutimma ॥ 501 ॥
kagga: ಯುಕ್ತಿಸಾಮ್ರಾಜ್ಯದಲಿ ಭಕ್ತಿ, ಬಡ ಪರದೇಶಿ ।ಶಕ್ತಿ ಚತುರತೆಯುಡುಗಿ ನೀನು ಸೋತಂದು ॥ಉತ್ಕ್ರಮಣದರೆಮನದಿ ದೈವವನು ಪಿಡಿದೇನು? ।ಭಕ್ತಿ ರಕ್ತದಿ ಪರಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೧ ॥

content: ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯದ್ಭುತಶಕ್ತಿಯುಳ್ಳೊರ್ವನಿರಲು ನ- ।ಮ್ಮಿಷ್ಟಗಳನರಿತು ನೀಡುವುದವನಿಗರಿದೇಂ? ॥ಇಷ್ಟವಾತನೊಳುದಿಸುವುವಂತೆ, ಚೋದಿಪುದೆಂತು? ।ಕಷ್ಟ ನಮಗಿಹುದಷ್ಟೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೨ ॥ sRuShTiya adbhuta shaktiyuLLa orvanu iralu  ।nammiShTagaLanu aritu nIDuvudu avanige aridEm? ॥iShTavAtaboLu udisuvante, chOdipudentu? ।kaShTa namagihudu aShTe  - Mankutimma ॥ 502 ॥If we believe in an all powerful being (called God), then it must not be a big deal for him to make learn about our wishes and make them come true. The only difficulty we have is to make him want to make our wishes come true and urge him to do so.  - Mankutimma
translation: If we believe in an all powerful being (called God), then it must not be a big deal for him to make learn about our wishes and make them come true. The only difficulty we have is to make him want to make our wishes come true and urge him to do so.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಷ್ಟ ನಮಗಿಹುದಷ್ಟೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sRuShTiya adbhuta shaktiyuLLa orvanu iralu  ।nammiShTagaLanu aritu nIDuvudu avanige aridEm? ॥iShTavAtaboLu udisuvante, chOdipudentu? ।kaShTa namagihudu aShTe  - Mankutimma ॥ 502 ॥
kagga: ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯದ್ಭುತಶಕ್ತಿಯುಳ್ಳೊರ್ವನಿರಲು ನ- ।ಮ್ಮಿಷ್ಟಗಳನರಿತು ನೀಡುವುದವನಿಗರಿದೇಂ? ॥ಇಷ್ಟವಾತನೊಳುದಿಸುವುವಂತೆ, ಚೋದಿಪುದೆಂತು? ।ಕಷ್ಟ ನಮಗಿಹುದಷ್ಟೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೨ ॥

content: ಜೀವಸತ್ತ್ವದಪಾರಭಂಡಾರವೊಂದಿಹುದು ।ಸಾವಕಾರನದೃಷ್ಟನ್ ಅದನಾಳುತಿಹನು ॥ಅವಶ್ಯಕದ ಕಡವನವನೀವುದುಂಟಂತೆ! ।ನಾವೊಲಿಪುದೆಂತವನ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೩ ॥ jIva sattvada apAra bhanDara ondihudu ।sAvakAranu adRuShTan adanu ALutihanu ॥avashyakada kaDavanu avanu eeyuvudunTante! ।nAvu olipudentu avana?  - Mankutimma ॥ 503 ॥There is a huge stockpile of life essentials. An invisible wealthy master is controlling it. He is known to loan essentials on a need basis once in a while. But, how to entice him to do that?  - Mankutimma
translation: There is a huge stockpile of life essentials. An invisible wealthy master is controlling it. He is known to loan essentials on a need basis once in a while. But, how to entice him to do that?  - Mankutimma
title: ನಾವೊಲಿಪುದೆಂತವನ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jIva sattvada apAra bhanDara ondihudu ।sAvakAranu adRuShTan adanu ALutihanu ॥avashyakada kaDavanu avanu eeyuvudunTante! ।nAvu olipudentu avana?  - Mankutimma ॥ 503 ॥
kagga: ಜೀವಸತ್ತ್ವದಪಾರಭಂಡಾರವೊಂದಿಹುದು ।ಸಾವಕಾರನದೃಷ್ಟನ್ ಅದನಾಳುತಿಹನು ॥ಅವಶ್ಯಕದ ಕಡವನವನೀವುದುಂಟಂತೆ! ।ನಾವೊಲಿಪುದೆಂತವನ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೩ ॥

content: ಗಗನ ಬಿಸಿಗವಸಾಗಿ, ಕೆರೆಗಳಾವಿಗೆಯಾಗಿ ।ಜಗದುಸಿರೆ ಹೊಗೆಯಾಗಿ ಧಗಧಗಿಸುವಂದು ॥ಒಗೆದೆತ್ತಣಿನೊ ರಾತ್ರಿಯಲಿ ಧರೆಗೆ ತಂಪೆರೆವ ।ಮುಗಿಲವೊಲು ದೈವಕೃಪೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೪ ॥ gagana bisi gavasAgi, keregaLu AvigeyAgi ।jagada usire hogeyAgi dhagadhagisuvandu ॥ogedu ettaNino rAtriyali dharege taMpereva ।mugilavolu daiva kRupe  - Mankutimma ॥ 504 ॥God;s grace is showered on us when we are in deep trouble. That is when we appreciate it the most. On a day when the sky feels like a warm blanket, the lakes feel like ovens, the gusts of wind (breath of the nature) seem like smoke  - the clouds from some where shower the earth with rain cooling her. How welcome is that rain?  - Mankutimma
translation: God;s grace is showered on us when we are in deep trouble. That is when we appreciate it the most. On a day when the sky feels like a warm blanket, the lakes feel like ovens, the gusts of wind (breath of the nature) seem like smoke  - the clouds from some where shower the earth with rain cooling her. How welcome is that rain?  - Mankutimma
title: ಮುಗಿಲವೊಲು ದೈವಕೃಪೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: gagana bisi gavasAgi, keregaLu AvigeyAgi ।jagada usire hogeyAgi dhagadhagisuvandu ॥ogedu ettaNino rAtriyali dharege taMpereva ।mugilavolu daiva kRupe  - Mankutimma ॥ 504 ॥
kagga: ಗಗನ ಬಿಸಿಗವಸಾಗಿ, ಕೆರೆಗಳಾವಿಗೆಯಾಗಿ ।ಜಗದುಸಿರೆ ಹೊಗೆಯಾಗಿ ಧಗಧಗಿಸುವಂದು ॥ಒಗೆದೆತ್ತಣಿನೊ ರಾತ್ರಿಯಲಿ ಧರೆಗೆ ತಂಪೆರೆವ ।ಮುಗಿಲವೊಲು ದೈವಕೃಪೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೪ ॥

content: ದೈವಕೃಪೆಯೆನುವುದೇಂ? ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವನವವೃಷ್ಟಿ  ।ಜೀವಗುಣ ಪಕ್ವಪಟ್ಟಂತದರ ವೇಗ ॥ಭಾವಚೋದನೆಗಳಲಿ ಬಾಹ್ಯಸಾಧನೆಗಳಲಿ ।ತೀವಿ ದೊರೆಕೊಳುವುದದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೫ ॥ daivakRupe enuvodEm? parasattva nava vRuShTi ।jIvaguNa pakvapaTTante adara vEga ॥bhAvachOdanegaLali bAhyasAdhanegaLali ।tIvi dorekoLuvudadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 505 ॥What is God;s grace? It is just the fresh shower of cosmic spirit (energy) on this world. How much and how fast you receive depends on the your maturity in your emotions and actions. When you thoughts and action are noble, the grace is also abundant.  - Mankutimma
translation: What is God;s grace? It is just the fresh shower of cosmic spirit (energy) on this world. How much and how fast you receive depends on the your maturity in your emotions and actions. When you thoughts and action are noble, the grace is also abundant.  - Mankutimma
title: ತೀವಿ ದೊರೆಕೊಳುವುದದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: daivakRupe enuvodEm? parasattva nava vRuShTi ।jIvaguNa pakvapaTTante adara vEga ॥bhAvachOdanegaLali bAhyasAdhanegaLali ।tIvi dorekoLuvudadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 505 ॥
kagga: ದೈವಕೃಪೆಯೆನುವುದೇಂ? ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವನವವೃಷ್ಟಿ  ।ಜೀವಗುಣ ಪಕ್ವಪಟ್ಟಂತದರ ವೇಗ ॥ಭಾವಚೋದನೆಗಳಲಿ ಬಾಹ್ಯಸಾಧನೆಗಳಲಿ ।ತೀವಿ ದೊರೆಕೊಳುವುದದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೫ ॥

content: ದೊರೆಗೆ ನೀಂ ಬಿನ್ನಯಿಸೆ ನೂರೆಂಟು ಬಯಕೆಗಳ ।ಸರಿ ತನಗೆ ತೋರ್ದೆನಿತನ್ ಅದರೊಳವನೀವಂ ॥ಅರಿಕೆಯೆಲ್ಲವನಡಸದಿರೆ ದೊರೆಯೆ ಸುಳ್ಳಹನೆ? ।ಕರುಣೆ ನಿರ್ಬಂಧವೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೬ ॥ dorege nIm binnayise nUrenTu bayakegaLa ।sari tanage tOrda enitan adaroLu avanu eevam ॥arikeyellavanu aDasadire doreye suLLahane? ।karuNe nirbandhavEm?  - Mankutimma ॥ 506 ॥You may present hundreds of requests in front of a King. He may choose to grant a few that he feels are just. Just because he did not grant all your wishes, you cannot deny that he is the King (or that the king exists). Do you think that having compassion on you is binding on him?  - Mankutimma
translation: You may present hundreds of requests in front of a King. He may choose to grant a few that he feels are just. Just because he did not grant all your wishes, you cannot deny that he is the King (or that the king exists). Do you think that having compassion on you is binding on him?  - Mankutimma
title: ಕರುಣೆ ನಿರ್ಬಂಧವೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dorege nIm binnayise nUrenTu bayakegaLa ।sari tanage tOrda enitan adaroLu avanu eevam ॥arikeyellavanu aDasadire doreye suLLahane? ।karuNe nirbandhavEm?  - Mankutimma ॥ 506 ॥

content: ದಂಡನಿರ್ಣಯದಿ ನೀಂ ಕ್ಷಮಿಸೆನಲ್ ನ್ಯಾಯಪತಿ ।ಹಿಂದಿನಾ ನಿನ್ನೊಳ್ತನವನ್ ಅಂದಿನಳಲನ್ ॥ತಂದೆಬಗೆಯಿಂ ಬಗೆದು ಶಾಸನೋಗ್ರವನಿನಿತು ।ಕುಂದಿಸಲಿಕಾಗದೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೭ ॥ danDanirNayadi nIm kShamisu enal nyAyapati ।hindinA ninna oLtanavan andina aLalan ॥tande bageyim bagedu shAsanOgravanu initu ।kundisalike AgadEm?  - Mankutimma ॥ 507 ॥At the time of giving a judgement, you will ask to be forgiven. The judge does look at all the good things you have done in the past and your present miseries. He can wear a fatherly hat and analyse the circumstances that lead the Can he not reduce the severity of the punishment based in this?  - Mankutimma
translation: At the time of giving a judgement, you will ask to be forgiven. The judge does look at all the good things you have done in the past and your present miseries. He can wear a fatherly hat and analyse the circumstances that lead the Can he not reduce the severity of the punishment based in this?  - Mankutimma
title: ಶಾಸನೋಗ್ರವನಿನಿತು ಕುಂದಿಸಲಿಕಾಗದೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: danDanirNayadi nIm kShamisu enal nyAyapati ।hindinA ninna oLtanavan andina aLalan ॥tande bageyim bagedu shAsanOgravanu initu ।kundisalike AgadEm?  - Mankutimma ॥ 507 ॥
kagga: ದಂಡನಿರ್ಣಯದಿ ನೀಂ ಕ್ಷಮಿಸೆನಲ್ ನ್ಯಾಯಪತಿ ।ಹಿಂದಿನಾ ನಿನ್ನೊಳ್ತನವನ್ ಅಂದಿನಳಲನ್ ॥ತಂದೆಬಗೆಯಿಂ ಬಗೆದು ಶಾಸನೋಗ್ರವನಿನಿತು ।ಕುಂದಿಸಲಿಕಾಗದೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೭ ॥

content: ತಕ್ಕಡಿಯ ದೈವ ಪಿಡಿದದರೊಂದು ತಟ್ಟೆಯಲಿ ।ಒಕ್ಕುವುದು ಬಿಡದೆ ಜೀವಿಯ ಪಾಪಚಯವ ॥ಇಕ್ಕುವುದು ಸುಕೃತಗಳನಿನ್ನೊಂದರೊಳಗಲ್ಲಿ ।ಭಕ್ತಿ ಪಶ್ಚಾತಾಪ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೮ ॥ takkaDiya daiva piDidu adara ondu taTTeyali ।okkuvudu biDade jIviya pApachayava ॥ikkuvudu sukRutagaLanu innondaroLage alli ।bhakti pashchAtApa  - Mankutimma ॥ 508 ॥God has a balance to measure our deeds. On one plate he keeps all the sins of man without letting even one go unaccounted. On the other he places all the good deeds which includes faith, devotion and remorse. It is up to us to tilt the scale either way.  - Mankutimma
translation: God has a balance to measure our deeds. On one plate he keeps all the sins of man without letting even one go unaccounted. On the other he places all the good deeds which includes faith, devotion and remorse. It is up to us to tilt the scale either way.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭಕ್ತಿ ಪಶ್ಚಾತಾಪ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: takkaDiya daiva piDidu adara ondu taTTeyali ।okkuvudu biDade jIviya pApachayava ॥ikkuvudu sukRutagaLanu innondaroLage alli ।bhakti pashchAtApa  - Mankutimma ॥ 508 ॥
kagga: ತಕ್ಕಡಿಯ ದೈವ ಪಿಡಿದದರೊಂದು ತಟ್ಟೆಯಲಿ ।ಒಕ್ಕುವುದು ಬಿಡದೆ ಜೀವಿಯ ಪಾಪಚಯವ ॥ಇಕ್ಕುವುದು ಸುಕೃತಗಳನಿನ್ನೊಂದರೊಳಗಲ್ಲಿ ।ಭಕ್ತಿ ಪಶ್ಚಾತಾಪ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೮ ॥

content: ಪ್ರಾರಾಬ್ಧದಲಿ ನಿನ್ನ ಪುಣ್ಯವೆನಿತಾನುಮಿರೆ ।ಸೇರೆ ಪಶ್ಚಾತಾಪ ಭಾರವದರೊಡನೆ ॥ದಾರುಣದ ಕರ್ಮನಿಯತಿಯನಿನಿತು ಶಿಥಿಲಿಪುದು ।ಕಾರುಣ್ಯದಿಂ ದೈವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೯ ॥ prArAbdhadali ninna puNyavi initAnum ire ।sEre pashchAtApa bhAravu adaroDane ॥dAruNada karmaniyatiyanu initu shithilipudu ।kAruNyadim daiva  - Mankutimma ॥ 509 ॥If you have carried over punya (Good Karma) from previous births and you add to that by behaving well and feeling true remorse for all bad deeds, then God will fell compassionate and will soften the punishment that has to be meted out (as per law) in your afterlife.  - Mankutimma
translation: If you have carried over punya (Good Karma) from previous births and you add to that by behaving well and feeling true remorse for all bad deeds, then God will fell compassionate and will soften the punishment that has to be meted out (as per law) in your afterlife.  - Mankutimma
title: ಶಿಥಿಲಿಪುದು ಕಾರುಣ್ಯದಿಂ ದೈವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: prArAbdhadali ninna puNyavi initAnum ire ।sEre pashchAtApa bhAravu adaroDane ॥dAruNada karmaniyatiyanu initu shithilipudu ।kAruNyadim daiva  - Mankutimma ॥ 509 ॥
kagga: ಪ್ರಾರಾಬ್ಧದಲಿ ನಿನ್ನ ಪುಣ್ಯವೆನಿತಾನುಮಿರೆ ।ಸೇರೆ ಪಶ್ಚಾತಾಪ ಭಾರವದರೊಡನೆ ॥ದಾರುಣದ ಕರ್ಮನಿಯತಿಯನಿನಿತು ಶಿಥಿಲಿಪುದು ।ಕಾರುಣ್ಯದಿಂ ದೈವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦೯ ॥

content: ನಿನ್ನೇಳುಬೀಳುಗಳು ನಿನ್ನ ಸೊಗ ಗೋಳುಗಳು ।ನಿನ್ನೊಬ್ಬನೋಸುಗವೆ ನೆಡೆವ ಯೋಜನೆಯೇಂ? ॥ಇನ್ನದೆನಿಬರ ಜೀವಪಾಕವದರಿಂದಹುದೊ! ।ಛಿನ್ನವಾ ಋಣಮಾರ್ಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೦ ॥ ninna ELu bILugaLu ninna soga gOLugaLu ।ninnobbana Osuga neDeva yojaneyEm? ॥innadu enibara jIvapAkavu adarindahudo! ।ChinnavA RuNamArga  - Mankutimma ॥ 510 ॥Do you think the whole world is a plan for you  - for your rises and falls, for your happiness and grief? Have you ever thought how actions are effecting the lives of so many other beings? The chain of causation is very difficult to follow.  - Mankutimma
translation: Do you think the whole world is a plan for you  - for your rises and falls, for your happiness and grief? Have you ever thought how actions are effecting the lives of so many other beings? The chain of causation is very difficult to follow.  - Mankutimma
title: ಛಿನ್ನವಾ ಋಣಮಾರ್ಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ninna ELu bILugaLu ninna soga gOLugaLu ।ninnobbana Osuga neDeva yojaneyEm? ॥innadu enibara jIvapAkavu adarindahudo! ।ChinnavA RuNamArga  - Mankutimma ॥ 510 ॥
kagga: ನಿನ್ನೇಳುಬೀಳುಗಳು ನಿನ್ನ ಸೊಗ ಗೋಳುಗಳು ।ನಿನ್ನೊಬ್ಬನೋಸುಗವೆ ನೆಡೆವ ಯೋಜನೆಯೇಂ? ॥ಇನ್ನದೆನಿಬರ ಜೀವಪಾಕವದರಿಂದಹುದೊ! ।ಛಿನ್ನವಾ ಋಣಮಾರ್ಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೦ ॥

content: ನರಕ ತಪ್ಪಿತು ಧರ್ಮಜಂಗೆ, ದಿಟ, ಆದೊಡೇಂ? ।ನರಕದರ್ಶನದುಃಖ ತಪ್ಪದಾಯಿತಲ? ॥ದುರಿತತರುವಾರು ನೆಟ್ಟುದೊ, ನಿನಗಮುಂಟು ಫಲ ।ಚಿರಋಣದ ಲೆಕ್ಕವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೧ ॥ naraka tappitu dharmajange, dita, AdoDEm? ।narakadarshanaduHkha tappadAyitala ॥durita taruvu aaru neTTudo, ninagum untu phala ।chira RuNada lekkavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 511 ॥It is true that Yudhistira was not put into hell in his afterlife. He did every thing according to dharma in his life. Yet he was not spared from the ordeal of having to see hell on the way to heaven. This was done because of his involvement in the slaying of Drona during the Kurukshetra war. Although, the plot was not his own, he had to bear the punishment. It does not matter who plants the seed of sin, if you get involved, then you will have to eat the fruit. That is the calculation of debt of karma.  - Mankutimma
translation: It is true that Yudhistira was not put into hell in his afterlife. He did every thing according to dharma in his life. Yet he was not spared from the ordeal of having to see hell on the way to heaven. This was done because of his involvement in the slaying of Drona during the Kurukshetra war. Although, the plot was not his own, he had to bear the punishment. It does not matter who plants the seed of sin, if you get involved, then you will have to eat the fruit. That is the calculation of debt of karma.  - Mankutimma
title: ಚಿರಋಣದ ಲೆಕ್ಕವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: naraka tappitu dharmajange, dita, AdoDEm? ।narakadarshanaduHkha tappadAyitala ॥durita taruvu aaru neTTudo, ninagum untu phala ।chira RuNada lekkavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 511 ॥
kagga: ನರಕ ತಪ್ಪಿತು ಧರ್ಮಜಂಗೆ, ದಿಟ, ಆದೊಡೇಂ? ।ನರಕದರ್ಶನದುಃಖ ತಪ್ಪದಾಯಿತಲ? ॥ದುರಿತತರುವಾರು ನೆಟ್ಟುದೊ, ನಿನಗಮುಂಟು ಫಲ ।ಚಿರಋಣದ ಲೆಕ್ಕವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೧ ॥

content: ಆವ ಋಣಕೋಸುಗವೊ, ಆರ ಹಿತಕೋಸುಗವೊ ।ಆವಾವ ಕಾರಣಕೊ, ಆವ ಯೋಜನೆಗೋ ॥ನೋವ ನೀಂ ಪಡುವುದೇ ದೈವೇಚ್ಛೆಯಾಗಿರದೆ? ।ದೈವ ಕುರುಡೆನ್ನದಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೨ ॥ aava RuNakOsugavo, aara hitakOsugavo ।aavAva kAraNako, aava yOjanego ॥nOva nIm paDuvudE daivEchCheyAgirade? ।daiva kuruDennadiru  - Mankutimma ॥ 512 ॥No one can explain the reasons behind the actions of Fate. It could be due to consequence of some of your action, or as preparation for someone;s comfort, or some other reason or part of bigger plan. If such actions (will of the providence) require you to go through pain; simply endure it and don;t call out God to be blind.  - Mankutimma
translation: No one can explain the reasons behind the actions of Fate. It could be due to consequence of some of your action, or as preparation for someone;s comfort, or some other reason or part of bigger plan. If such actions (will of the providence) require you to go through pain; simply endure it and don;t call out God to be blind.  - Mankutimma
title: ದೈವ ಕುರುಡೆನ್ನದಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aava RuNakOsugavo, aara hitakOsugavo ।aavAva kAraNako, aava yOjanego ॥nOva nIm paDuvudE daivEchCheyAgirade? ।daiva kuruDennadiru  - Mankutimma ॥ 512 ॥
