content: ಆವುದರಿನಾವಾಗ ದೈವ ತಾನೊಲಿದೀತೊ? ।ಪೂರ್ವಿಕದ ನಿಯತಿಯನದೆಂದು ಸಡಲಿಪುದೋ? ॥ಭಾವಿಸುಕೃತವದೆಂದು ಪೂರ್ವದುರಿತಕೆ ಮಿಗಿಲೊ? ।ದೈವಿಕರಹಸ್ಯವದು- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೩ ॥ aavudarina aavAga daiva tAnu olidIto? ।pUrvikada niyatiyanu adendu saDalipudo? ॥bhAvisukRutavu adendu pUrva duritake migilo? ।daivika rahasyavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 513 ॥It can not be said with certainty when and by what means will fate help us. Or when it will release us from the clutches of previous actions. When will our present and future good deeds match up to the past sins? All these are part of the divine secret.  - Mankutimma
translation: It can not be said with certainty when and by what means will fate help us. Or when it will release us from the clutches of previous actions. When will our present and future good deeds match up to the past sins? All these are part of the divine secret.  - Mankutimma
title: ದೈವಿಕರಹಸ್ಯವದು- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aavudarina aavAga daiva tAnu olidIto? ।pUrvikada niyatiyanu adendu saDalipudo? ॥bhAvisukRutavu adendu pUrva duritake migilo? ।daivika rahasyavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 513 ॥
kagga: ಆವುದರಿನಾವಾಗ ದೈವ ತಾನೊಲಿದೀತೊ? ।ಪೂರ್ವಿಕದ ನಿಯತಿಯನದೆಂದು ಸಡಲಿಪುದೋ? ॥ಭಾವಿಸುಕೃತವದೆಂದು ಪೂರ್ವದುರಿತಕೆ ಮಿಗಿಲೊ? ।ದೈವಿಕರಹಸ್ಯವದು- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೩ ॥

content: ಎನಗೆ ಸುಖವಿಲ್ಲವದರಿಂ ದೇವರಿರನೆನ್ನು-।ವನುಮತಿಯ ನೀಂ ಗೆಯ್ಯೆ, ಸುಖಿಯದೇನನುವಂ ॥ತನುಬಾಹ್ಯಕರಣದನುಭವಕಿಂತ ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮ ತರ- ।ದನುಭವವ ನೀನರಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೪ ॥ enage sukhavilla adarim dEvariraru ennuva ।anumatiya nIm geyye sukhiyadEnanuvam ॥tanu bAhya karaNada anubhavakinta sUkShma tarada ।anubhava nInaraso  - Mankutimma ॥ 514 ॥If you say there is no God because you don;t have happiness then what do you think a happy person may say? Your notion of God should not be tied to your happiness  - especially those that are related to body and external world. If you seek for an experience that is beyond the senses, then you will be happy (with your realization of God).  - Mankutimma
translation: If you say there is no God because you don;t have happiness then what do you think a happy person may say? Your notion of God should not be tied to your happiness  - especially those that are related to body and external world. If you seek for an experience that is beyond the senses, then you will be happy (with your realization of God).  - Mankutimma
title: ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮ ತರದನುಭವವ ನೀನರಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: enage sukhavilla adarim dEvariraru ennuva ।anumatiya nIm geyye sukhiyadEnanuvam ॥tanu bAhya karaNada anubhavakinta sUkShma tarada ।anubhava nInaraso  - Mankutimma ॥ 514 ॥
kagga: ಎನಗೆ ಸುಖವಿಲ್ಲವದರಿಂ ದೇವರಿರನೆನ್ನು-।ವನುಮತಿಯ ನೀಂ ಗೆಯ್ಯೆ, ಸುಖಿಯದೇನನುವಂ ॥ತನುಬಾಹ್ಯಕರಣದನುಭವಕಿಂತ ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮ ತರ- ।ದನುಭವವ ನೀನರಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೪ ॥

content: ಎನ್ನ ಬೇಡಿಕೆ ನಷ್ಟವಹುದೆಂತು ದೇವನಿರೆ? ।ಅನ್ಯಾಯ ಜಗವೆಲ್ಲ; ದೇವನಿರನೆನುತ ॥ತನ್ನ ತನ್ನನುಭವವ ನಂಬಲೋರೊರ್ವನುಂ ।ಭಿನ್ನವಾಗದೆ ಸತ್ಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೫ ॥ enna bEDike naShTavahudentu dEvanire? ।anyAya jagavella; dEvaniranenuta ॥tanna tannanubhavava nambalu orvorvanum ।bhinnavAgade satya?  - Mankutimma ॥ 515 ॥Can one deny the existence of God just because his wishes were not fulfilled? Can he say that the entire world in unfair? There is no God at all? If every one based their notion of God on his own experience (material), then will the truth not be fractured? (as opposed to being universal)  - Mankutimma
translation: Can one deny the existence of God just because his wishes were not fulfilled? Can he say that the entire world in unfair? There is no God at all? If every one based their notion of God on his own experience (material), then will the truth not be fractured? (as opposed to being universal)  - Mankutimma
title: ಭಿನ್ನವಾಗದೆ ಸತ್ಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: enna bEDike naShTavahudentu dEvanire? ।anyAya jagavella; dEvaniranenuta ॥tanna tannanubhavava nambalu orvorvanum ।bhinnavAgade satya?  - Mankutimma ॥ 515 ॥
kagga: ಎನ್ನ ಬೇಡಿಕೆ ನಷ್ಟವಹುದೆಂತು ದೇವನಿರೆ? ।ಅನ್ಯಾಯ ಜಗವೆಲ್ಲ; ದೇವನಿರನೆನುತ ॥ತನ್ನ ತನ್ನನುಭವವ ನಂಬಲೋರೊರ್ವನುಂ ।ಭಿನ್ನವಾಗದೆ ಸತ್ಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೫ ॥

content: ಅನುಭವದ ಪರಿ ನೂರ್ವರಿಗೆ ನೂರು ನೂರು ಪರಿ ।ದಿನವೊಂದರೊಳೆ ಅದೊಬ್ಬಂಗೆ ನೂರು ಪರಿ ॥ಎಣಿಪುದಾರನುಭವವನ್, ಆವ ಪ್ರಮಾಣದಲಿ ।ಮಣಲ ಗೋಪುರವೊ ಅದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೬ ॥ anubhavada pari nUrvarige nUru nUru pari ।dinavondaroLe adu obbange nUru pari ॥eNipudAr anubhavavan, Ava pramANadali ।maNala gOpuravo adu  - Mankutimma ॥ 516 ॥If there are hundred people there will be hundreds of hundred experiences. On any given day, every single person will have a hundred different ways of experiencing God. How can one measure them? (to determine which one is better). What should be the scale (to measure it against)? The description of God based on personal experience is like sand castles  - momentary existence.  - Mankutimma
translation: If there are hundred people there will be hundreds of hundred experiences. On any given day, every single person will have a hundred different ways of experiencing God. How can one measure them? (to determine which one is better). What should be the scale (to measure it against)? The description of God based on personal experience is like sand castles  - momentary existence.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಣಲ ಗೋಪುರವೊ ಅದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: anubhavada pari nUrvarige nUru nUru pari ।dinavondaroLe adu obbange nUru pari ॥eNipudAr anubhavavan, Ava pramANadali ।maNala gOpuravo adu  - Mankutimma ॥ 516 ॥
kagga: ಅನುಭವದ ಪರಿ ನೂರ್ವರಿಗೆ ನೂರು ನೂರು ಪರಿ ।ದಿನವೊಂದರೊಳೆ ಅದೊಬ್ಬಂಗೆ ನೂರು ಪರಿ ॥ಎಣಿಪುದಾರನುಭವವನ್, ಆವ ಪ್ರಮಾಣದಲಿ ।ಮಣಲ ಗೋಪುರವೊ ಅದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೬ ॥

content: ಮನುಜಸಾಕಲ್ಯದನುಭವಕೆ ಮಿತಿಗೊತ್ತುಂಟೆ? ।ದಿನದಿನವು ಕಡಲಲೆಗಳಂತೆ ಪರಿವುದದು ॥ಅನುಮಿತಿಯ ನಿರ್ಧಾರವದರಿಂ ನಿರಾಧಾರ ।ದನಿ ನೂರು ನರನೆದೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೭ ॥ manuja sAkalyada anubhavake miti gottunTe? ।dinadinavu kaDala alegaLante parivudadu ॥anumitiya nirdhAravu adarim nirAdhAra ।dani nUru naranedege  - Mankutimma ॥ 517 ॥Can there be a limit to the number of different ways people (all humans) may experience God? New experiences will keep flowing just like the waves at sea. Hence having a set of rules or regulations for such experience is baseless. There are hundreds of voices in each man;s hearts.  - Mankutimma
translation: Can there be a limit to the number of different ways people (all humans) may experience God? New experiences will keep flowing just like the waves at sea. Hence having a set of rules or regulations for such experience is baseless. There are hundreds of voices in each man;s hearts.  - Mankutimma
title: ದನಿ ನೂರು ನರನೆದೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: manuja sAkalyada anubhavake miti gottunTe? ।dinadinavu kaDala alegaLante parivudadu ॥anumitiya nirdhAravu adarim nirAdhAra ।dani nUru naranedege  - Mankutimma ॥ 517 ॥
kagga: ಮನುಜಸಾಕಲ್ಯದನುಭವಕೆ ಮಿತಿಗೊತ್ತುಂಟೆ? ।ದಿನದಿನವು ಕಡಲಲೆಗಳಂತೆ ಪರಿವುದದು ॥ಅನುಮಿತಿಯ ನಿರ್ಧಾರವದರಿಂ ನಿರಾಧಾರ ।ದನಿ ನೂರು ನರನೆದೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೭ ॥

content: ಅರ್ಥವುಂಟನುಭವಕ್ಕಾದೊಡದು ಮಿತದರ್ಥ ।ಸ್ವಾರ್ಥ ಮಿತವಾದಂತೆ ವಿಸ್ತರಿಪುದರ್ಥ ॥ಸಾರ್ಥಕವಪ್ಪುದಾರ್ಷೇಯಾರ್ಥದೊಡವೆರೆಯೆ ।ಪಾರ್ಥನನುಭವದಂತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೮ ॥ arthavunTu anubhavakke Adodadu mitada artha ।svArtha mitavAdante vistaripudu artha ॥sArthakavappudu aarSheya arthadi odavereye  ।pArthana anubhavadante  - Mankutimma ॥ 518 ॥There is some meaning to individual experiences. But that is limited meaning. The same realization expands when selfishness is reduced. When that realization is coupled with learning from the ancient wise sages, then it becomes truly meaningful  - just like the one Arjuna had in the battlefield of Kurukshetra after listening to Krishna (the advice of Geeta).  - Mankutimma
translation: There is some meaning to individual experiences. But that is limited meaning. The same realization expands when selfishness is reduced. When that realization is coupled with learning from the ancient wise sages, then it becomes truly meaningful  - just like the one Arjuna had in the battlefield of Kurukshetra after listening to Krishna (the advice of Geeta).  - Mankutimma
title: ಪಾರ್ಥನನುಭವದಂತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: arthavunTu anubhavakke Adodadu mitada artha ।svArtha mitavAdante vistaripudu artha ॥sArthakavappudu aarSheya arthadi odavereye  ।pArthana anubhavadante  - Mankutimma ॥ 518 ॥
kagga: ಅರ್ಥವುಂಟನುಭವಕ್ಕಾದೊಡದು ಮಿತದರ್ಥ ।ಸ್ವಾರ್ಥ ಮಿತವಾದಂತೆ ವಿಸ್ತರಿಪುದರ್ಥ ॥ಸಾರ್ಥಕವಪ್ಪುದಾರ್ಷೇಯಾರ್ಥದೊಡವೆರೆಯೆ ।ಪಾರ್ಥನನುಭವದಂತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೮ ॥

content: ಪ್ರಾಲೇಯಗಿರಿಗುಹೆಯ ಗಂಗೆ ವೇದ ಪುರಾಣ ।ಕಾಳಿಂದಿ ಶೋಣೆ ಪೌರುಷ ಬುದ್ಧಿ ಯುಕ್ತಿ ॥ಮೂಲ ಸ್ವತಸ್ಸಿದ್ಧ ಸಂವಿದಾಪಗೆಗಿಂತು ।ಕಾಲದುಪನದಿ ನೆರವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೯ ॥ prAlEyagiriguheya gange vEda purANa ।kALindi shONe pauruSha buddhi yukti ॥mUla svataH siddhi samvidApegege intu ।kAlada upanadi  - Mankutimma ॥ 519 ॥The Ganges has its birth in the caves of the mighty Himalayas. It is always flowing. The knowledge in the Vedas are also like that  - ever green. The efforts of mankind, his intellect and wisdom are like tributaries that feed in little water to the mighty river. The knowledge of the Vedas is self-standing and our efforts (to prove it) are like tributaries that feed in water to the river from time-to-time and not permanent.  - Mankutimma
translation: The Ganges has its birth in the caves of the mighty Himalayas. It is always flowing. The knowledge in the Vedas are also like that  - ever green. The efforts of mankind, his intellect and wisdom are like tributaries that feed in little water to the mighty river. The knowledge of the Vedas is self-standing and our efforts (to prove it) are like tributaries that feed in water to the river from time-to-time and not permanent.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಾಲದುಪನದಿ ನೆರವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: prAlEyagiriguheya gange vEda purANa ।kALindi shONe pauruSha buddhi yukti ॥mUla svataH siddhi samvidApegege intu ।kAlada upanadi  - Mankutimma ॥ 519 ॥
kagga: ಪ್ರಾಲೇಯಗಿರಿಗುಹೆಯ ಗಂಗೆ ವೇದ ಪುರಾಣ ।ಕಾಳಿಂದಿ ಶೋಣೆ ಪೌರುಷ ಬುದ್ಧಿ ಯುಕ್ತಿ ॥ಮೂಲ ಸ್ವತಸ್ಸಿದ್ಧ ಸಂವಿದಾಪಗೆಗಿಂತು ।ಕಾಲದುಪನದಿ ನೆರವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧೯ ॥

content: ತಿಳಿವಾವುದಿಳೆಗೆ ಯುಗಯುಗದ ಬೆಳಕಾಗಿತ್ತೊ ।ಹಳದೆಂದು ನೀನದನು ಕಳೆಯುವೆಯ, ಮರುಳೆ ॥ತಳಹದಿಯದಲ್ತೆ ನಮ್ಮೆಲ್ಲ ಹೊಸ ತಿಳಿವಿಂಗೆ? ।ಹಳೆ ಬೇರು ಹೊಸ ತಳಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೦ ॥ tiLivu Avudu iLege yuga yugada beLakAgitto ।haLadendu nInadanu kaLeyuveya, maruLe ॥taLahadiyadalte nammella hosa tiLivinge? ।haLe bEru hosa taLiru  - Mankutimma ॥ 520 ॥From time immemorial, this world is enlightened by the ancient knowledge (of Vedas). Will you discard them all just because they are old? You would be a fool to do so. It is the foundation of all our new understandings. That knowledge is enabling us to make modern-day-progress possible. Just like a tree is always beautiful only when the roots are old and sprouts are fresh.  - Mankutimma
translation: From time immemorial, this world is enlightened by the ancient knowledge (of Vedas). Will you discard them all just because they are old? You would be a fool to do so. It is the foundation of all our new understandings. That knowledge is enabling us to make modern-day-progress possible. Just like a tree is always beautiful only when the roots are old and sprouts are fresh.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹಳೆ ಬೇರು ಹೊಸ ತಳಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tiLivu Avudu iLege yuga yugada beLakAgitto ।haLadendu nInadanu kaLeyuveya, maruLe ॥taLahadiyadalte nammella hosa tiLivinge? ।haLe bEru hosa taLiru  - Mankutimma ॥ 520 ॥
kagga: ತಿಳಿವಾವುದಿಳೆಗೆ ಯುಗಯುಗದ ಬೆಳಕಾಗಿತ್ತೊ ।ಹಳದೆಂದು ನೀನದನು ಕಳೆಯುವೆಯ, ಮರುಳೆ ॥ತಳಹದಿಯದಲ್ತೆ ನಮ್ಮೆಲ್ಲ ಹೊಸ ತಿಳಿವಿಂಗೆ? ।ಹಳೆ ಬೇರು ಹೊಸ ತಳಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೦ ॥

content: ವೇದ ಲೋಕಾಚಾರ ನಿನ್ನನುಭವದ ಯುಕ್ತಿ ।ಶೋಧಿಸೀ ಮೂರನುಂ ಸಂವಾದಗೊಳಿಸು ॥ಸಾಧಿಜ್ಞಾನ ನರಸಾಧ್ಯ ಪ್ರಮಾಣವದು ।ಹಾದಿ ಬೆಳಕದು ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೧ ॥ vEda lOkAchAra ninna anubhavada yukti ।shOdhisi ee mUranum samvAdagoLisu ॥sAdhi jnAna narasAdhya pramANavadu ।hAdi beLakadu ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 521 ॥The ancient knowledge of the Vedas, the current traditions of the world and wisdom you accumulated based on your experiences. These have to be thought over and over again. They have to be tallied with each other. When we go through such exercise, a new philosophy emerges that is very personal to each one. That should be treated as the yardstick for all decisions. That shall light your path going forward.  - Mankutimma
translation: The ancient knowledge of the Vedas, the current traditions of the world and wisdom you accumulated based on your experiences. These have to be thought over and over again. They have to be tallied with each other. When we go through such exercise, a new philosophy emerges that is very personal to each one. That should be treated as the yardstick for all decisions. That shall light your path going forward.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹಾದಿ ಬೆಳಕದು ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vEda lOkAchAra ninna anubhavada yukti ।shOdhisi ee mUranum samvAdagoLisu ॥sAdhi jnAna narasAdhya pramANavadu ।hAdi beLakadu ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 521 ॥
kagga: ವೇದ ಲೋಕಾಚಾರ ನಿನ್ನನುಭವದ ಯುಕ್ತಿ ।ಶೋಧಿಸೀ ಮೂರನುಂ ಸಂವಾದಗೊಳಿಸು ॥ಸಾಧಿಜ್ಞಾನ ನರಸಾಧ್ಯ ಪ್ರಮಾಣವದು ।ಹಾದಿ ಬೆಳಕದು ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೧ ॥

content: ಹೊಸ ಚಿಗುರು ಹಳೆ ಬೇರು ಕೂಡಿರಲು ಮರಸೊಬಗು ।ಹೊಸಯುಕ್ತಿ ಹಳೆತತ್ತ್ವದೊಡಗೂಡೆ ಧರ್ಮ ॥ಋಷಿವಾಕ್ಯದೊಡನೆ ವಿಜ್ಞಾನ ಕಲೆ ಮೇಳವಿಸೆ ।ಜಸವು ಜನಜೀವನಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೨ ॥ hosa chiguru haLe bEru kUDiralu marasobagu ।hosayukti haLetattvada oDagUDe dharma ॥RuShivAkyada oDane vijnAna kale mELavise ।jasavu janajIvanake  - Mankutimma ॥ 522 ॥ A tree is most healthy and beautiful when it has old roots and fresh sprouts. Just like that, it is Dharma only when new wisdom is in harmony with ancient philosophy. When the words of sages are reverberated in acts of science and art, there is bound to be prosperity to all.  - Mankutimma
translation: A tree is most healthy and beautiful when it has old roots and fresh sprouts. Just like that, it is Dharma only when new wisdom is in harmony with ancient philosophy. When the words of sages are reverberated in acts of science and art, there is bound to be prosperity to all.  - Mankutimma
title: ಜಸವು ಜನಜೀವನಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hosa chiguru haLe bEru kUDiralu marasobagu ।hosayukti haLetattvada oDagUDe dharma ॥RuShivAkyada oDane vijnAna kale mELavise ।jasavu janajIvanake  - Mankutimma ॥ 522 ॥
kagga: ಹೊಸ ಚಿಗುರು ಹಳೆ ಬೇರು ಕೂಡಿರಲು ಮರಸೊಬಗು ।ಹೊಸಯುಕ್ತಿ ಹಳೆತತ್ತ್ವದೊಡಗೂಡೆ ಧರ್ಮ ॥ಋಷಿವಾಕ್ಯದೊಡನೆ ವಿಜ್ಞಾನ ಕಲೆ ಮೇಳವಿಸೆ ।ಜಸವು ಜನಜೀವನಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೨ ॥

content: ಪಿರಿದೆಲ್ಲ ಮತನೀತಿಗಳಿಗಿಂತ ಜೀವಿತವು ।ನೆರೆಬಂದ ನದಿ ದಡಕೆ ಬಾಗಿ ಪರಿಯುವುದೇಂ? ॥ಧರುಮಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮದ ತಿಳಿವೆ ಲೋಕಸೂತ್ರದ ಸುಳಿವು ।ಅರಸು ಜೀವಿತ ಹಿತವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೪ ॥ piridella matanItigaLiginta jIvitavu ।nerebanda nadi daDake bAgi pariyuvudEm? ॥dharumasUkShmada tiLive lOkasUtrada suLivu ।arasu jIvita hitava  - Mankutimma ॥ 524 ॥To be alive is the strongest yardstick to measure our actions against. It trumps all other measure like religion and morality. Does a river having floods try to contain itself with in the banks (and attempt not to hurt the ones living on the banks)? Every situation calls for re-evaluation of our previously held standards of morality. The real code to live by is thus elusive and always changing. We should always be in search of that balance.  - Mankutimma
translation: To be alive is the strongest yardstick to measure our actions against. It trumps all other measure like religion and morality. Does a river having floods try to contain itself with in the banks (and attempt not to hurt the ones living on the banks)? Every situation calls for re-evaluation of our previously held standards of morality. The real code to live by is thus elusive and always changing. We should always be in search of that balance.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅರಸು ಜೀವಿತ ಹಿತವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: piridella matanItigaLiginta jIvitavu ।nerebanda nadi daDake bAgi pariyuvudEm? ॥dharumasUkShmada tiLive lOkasUtrada suLivu ।arasu jIvita hitava  - Mankutimma ॥ 524 ॥
kagga: ಪಿರಿದೆಲ್ಲ ಮತನೀತಿಗಳಿಗಿಂತ ಜೀವಿತವು ।ನೆರೆಬಂದ ನದಿ ದಡಕೆ ಬಾಗಿ ಪರಿಯುವುದೇಂ? ॥ಧರುಮಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮದ ತಿಳಿವೆ ಲೋಕಸೂತ್ರದ ಸುಳಿವು ।ಅರಸು ಜೀವಿತ ಹಿತವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೪ ॥

content: ವೇದಗಳು ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರಗಳು ಲೋಕನೀತಿಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ।ಹಾದಿ ತೋರಲು ನಿಶಿಯೊಳುರಿವ ಪಂಜುಗಳು ॥ಸೌಧವೇರಿದವಂಗೆ, ನಭವ ಸೇರಿದವಂಗೆ ।ಬೀದಿಬೆಳಕಿಂದೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೩ ॥ vEdagaLu shAstragaLu lOkanItigaLella ।hAdi tOralu nishiyoLu uriva panjugaLu ॥soudhavEridavange, nabhava sEridavange ।bIdi beLakindEno?  - Mankutimma ॥ 523 ॥The Vedas, various scriptures and doctrines on morality are all the road-side lamps to help us see the right path in the darkness. What good are these street lights for a person who is already elevated to a higher level of consciousness or attained nirvana (ultimate realization)?  - Mankutimma
translation: The Vedas, various scriptures and doctrines on morality are all the road-side lamps to help us see the right path in the darkness. What good are these street lights for a person who is already elevated to a higher level of consciousness or attained nirvana (ultimate realization)?  - Mankutimma
title: ಬೀದಿಬೆಳಕಿಂದೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vEdagaLu shAstragaLu lOkanItigaLella ।hAdi tOralu nishiyoLu uriva panjugaLu ॥soudhavEridavange, nabhava sEridavange ।bIdi beLakindEno?  - Mankutimma ॥ 523 ॥
kagga: ವೇದಗಳು ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರಗಳು ಲೋಕನೀತಿಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ।ಹಾದಿ ತೋರಲು ನಿಶಿಯೊಳುರಿವ ಪಂಜುಗಳು ॥ಸೌಧವೇರಿದವಂಗೆ, ನಭವ ಸೇರಿದವಂಗೆ ।ಬೀದಿಬೆಳಕಿಂದೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೩ ॥

content: ಜಗ ಬೆಲೆದು ಚಿಗುರುತಿರೆ ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರ ಕರಟರಲಹುದೆ?  ।ನಿಗಮಸಂತತಿಗೆ ಸಂತತಿಯಾಗದಿಹುದೆ? ॥ಬಗೆಬಗೆಯ ಜೀವಸತ್ತ್ವವಿಕಾಸವಾಗುತಿರ- ।ಲೊಗೆವುದೈ ವಿಜ್ಞಾನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೫ ॥ jaga beLedu chigurutire shAstra karaTiralahude? ।nigamasantatige santatiyAgadihude? ॥bage bageya jIva sattva vikAsavAgutiral ।ogevudai vijnAna  - Mankutimma ॥ 525 ॥When the world is growing, the scriptures will also grow. Scriptures are considered to be created by God (The universal truth). Those scriptures will beget more others which will interpret and elaborate on the basic truth. As we find a variety of beings, so will be the scriptures. That is how science (one of the modern scriptures) is born.  - Mankutimma
translation: When the world is growing, the scriptures will also grow. Scriptures are considered to be created by God (The universal truth). Those scriptures will beget more others which will interpret and elaborate on the basic truth. As we find a variety of beings, so will be the scriptures. That is how science (one of the modern scriptures) is born.  - Mankutimma
title: ಒಗೆವುದೈ ವಿಜ್ಞಾನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jaga beLedu chigurutire shAstra karaTiralahude? ।nigamasantatige santatiyAgadihude? ॥bage bageya jIva sattva vikAsavAgutiral ।ogevudai vijnAna  - Mankutimma ॥ 525 ॥
kagga: ಜಗ ಬೆಲೆದು ಚಿಗುರುತಿರೆ ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರ ಕರಟರಲಹುದೆ?  ।ನಿಗಮಸಂತತಿಗೆ ಸಂತತಿಯಾಗದಿಹುದೆ? ॥ಬಗೆಬಗೆಯ ಜೀವಸತ್ತ್ವವಿಕಾಸವಾಗುತಿರ- ।ಲೊಗೆವುದೈ ವಿಜ್ಞಾನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೫ ॥

content: ಸೆರೆಬಿದ್ದು ಧರ್ಮಪಾದಪ ನಿಲದು ಮತಗಳಲಿ ।ಜರೆಯಿಂದ ಬರಡಹುದು ಮಠದ ನೆರಳಿನಲಿ ॥ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವರಸ ವಿಶ್ವಜೀವನದ ಬೇರ್ಗಳಿಂ ।ನೆರೆಯಲಾ ತರು ಸೊಂಪು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೬ ॥ serebiddu dharma pAdapa niladu matagaLali ।jareyinda baraDahudu maThada neraLinali  ॥parasattva rasa vishvajIvanada bErgaLim ।nereyalu aa taru soMpu  - Mankutimma ॥ 526 ॥The tree of Dharma (the moral code of life) will not stay hostage to any one sect. It does get weak if it takes shelter in any one of the sect;s temples. Only when it accept freshness from the cosmic spirit through the roots of everyday life of the world (by not limiting itself to the temple) will the tree look prosperous.  - Mankutimma
translation: The tree of Dharma (the moral code of life) will not stay hostage to any one sect. It does get weak if it takes shelter in any one of the sect;s temples. Only when it accept freshness from the cosmic spirit through the roots of everyday life of the world (by not limiting itself to the temple) will the tree look prosperous.  - Mankutimma
title: ನೆರೆಯಲಾ ತರು ಸೊಂಪು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: serebiddu dharma pAdapa niladu matagaLali ।jareyinda baraDahudu maThada neraLinali  ॥parasattva rasa vishvajIvanada bErgaLim ।nereyalu aa taru soMpu  - Mankutimma ॥ 526 ॥
kagga: ಸೆರೆಬಿದ್ದು ಧರ್ಮಪಾದಪ ನಿಲದು ಮತಗಳಲಿ ।ಜರೆಯಿಂದ ಬರಡಹುದು ಮಠದ ನೆರಳಿನಲಿ ॥ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವರಸ ವಿಶ್ವಜೀವನದ ಬೇರ್ಗಳಿಂ ।ನೆರೆಯಲಾ ತರು ಸೊಂಪು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೬ ॥

content: ಜೀವಕಾರಣಮೂಲ ಗೂಢವಾಗಿರ್ದೊಡಂ ।ಧೀವಿಕಾಸದ ಬೆಳಕನಾದನಿತು ಗಳಿಸಿ ॥ಕೈವಲ್ಯಪಥವನರಸುತ ಯಾತ್ರಿಸಲೆಬೇಕು ।ದೀವಿಗೆಯು ಮತಿಯೊಂದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೭ ॥ jIva kAraNa mUla gUDhavAgirdoDam ।dhIvikAsada beLakanu Adanitu gaLisi ॥kaivalya pathavanu arasuta yAtrisale bEku ।dIvigeyu matiyonde  - Mankutimma ॥ 527 ॥The source of life is mysterious and a divine secret. But we must strive to find it by enhancing our intellect as much as possible. We must find that path towards the realization. Our wisdom is the only light we have to do so.  - Mankutimma
translation: The source of life is mysterious and a divine secret. But we must strive to find it by enhancing our intellect as much as possible. We must find that path towards the realization. Our wisdom is the only light we have to do so.  - Mankutimma
title: ದೀವಿಗೆಯು ಮತಿಯೊಂದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jIva kAraNa mUla gUDhavAgirdoDam ।dhIvikAsada beLakanu Adanitu gaLisi ॥kaivalya pathavanu arasuta yAtrisale bEku ।dIvigeyu matiyonde  - Mankutimma ॥ 527 ॥
kagga: ಜೀವಕಾರಣಮೂಲ ಗೂಢವಾಗಿರ್ದೊಡಂ ।ಧೀವಿಕಾಸದ ಬೆಳಕನಾದನಿತು ಗಳಿಸಿ ॥ಕೈವಲ್ಯಪಥವನರಸುತ ಯಾತ್ರಿಸಲೆಬೇಕು ।ದೀವಿಗೆಯು ಮತಿಯೊಂದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೭ ॥

content: ಭಕ್ತಿ ನಂಬುಗೆ ಸುಲಭ, ಭಜನೆ ವಂದನೆ ಸುಲಭ ।ತತ್ತ್ವ ಶೋಧನೆ ಕಷ್ಟ; ಮತಿಕಾರ್ಯ ಕಷ್ಟ ॥ಸುತ್ತುವುದು ಗಿರಿಸುತ್ತ ಸುಳುವೆಂದು ಲೋಕಜನ ।ಹತ್ತುವನು ತಾಪಸಿಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೮ ॥ bhakti nambuge sulabha, bhajane vandane sulabha ।tattva shOdhane kaShTa, matikArya kaShTa ॥suttuvudu girisutta suLuvendu lOkajana ।hattuvanu tApasiyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 528 ॥It is easy to believe. It is easy to chant the God;s name. It is difficult to understand the concept of God though. It is difficult to think and imagine him. While the general population go round and round a hill looking for clues, only the steadfast climb it to seek God.  - Mankutimma
translation: It is easy to believe. It is easy to chant the God;s name. It is difficult to understand the concept of God though. It is difficult to think and imagine him. While the general population go round and round a hill looking for clues, only the steadfast climb it to seek God.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹತ್ತುವನು ತಾಪಸಿಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bhakti nambuge sulabha, bhajane vandane sulabha ।tattva shOdhane kaShTa, matikArya kaShTa ॥suttuvudu girisutta suLuvendu lOkajana ।hattuvanu tApasiyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 528 ॥
kagga: ಭಕ್ತಿ ನಂಬುಗೆ ಸುಲಭ, ಭಜನೆ ವಂದನೆ ಸುಲಭ ।ತತ್ತ್ವ ಶೋಧನೆ ಕಷ್ಟ; ಮತಿಕಾರ್ಯ ಕಷ್ಟ ॥ಸುತ್ತುವುದು ಗಿರಿಸುತ್ತ ಸುಳುವೆಂದು ಲೋಕಜನ ।ಹತ್ತುವನು ತಾಪಸಿಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೮ ॥

content: ಪರದೈವವನು ತೊರೆಯೆ ಗತಿ ನರನಿಗಿಲ್ಲ ದಿಟ ।ನರನಿಲ್ಲದಿರೆ ದೇವನನು ಕೇಳ್ವರಾರು? ॥ಪುರುಷತೆಯೆ ಸೇತುವೆ ಮೃಗತ್ವದಿಂ ದಿವ್ಯತೆಗೆ ।ಮುರಿಯದಿರು ಸೇತುವೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೯ ॥ paradaivavanu toreye gati naranigilla diTa ।naranilladire dEvananu kELvarAru? ॥puruShateye sEtuve mRugatvadim divyatege ।muriyadiru sEtuveya  - Mankutimma ॥ 529 ॥It is true that Man does not have a future after abandoning God. But, if Man were not to be there, who will care for God? Being human is the bridge between being an animal and realizing God. Don;t blow up the bridge.  - Mankutimma
translation: It is true that Man does not have a future after abandoning God. But, if Man were not to be there, who will care for God? Being human is the bridge between being an animal and realizing God. Don;t blow up the bridge.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮುರಿಯದಿರು ಸೇತುವೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: paradaivavanu toreye gati naranigilla diTa ।naranilladire dEvananu kELvarAru? ॥puruShateye sEtuve mRugatvadim divyatege ।muriyadiru sEtuveya  - Mankutimma ॥ 529 ॥
kagga: ಪರದೈವವನು ತೊರೆಯೆ ಗತಿ ನರನಿಗಿಲ್ಲ ದಿಟ ।ನರನಿಲ್ಲದಿರೆ ದೇವನನು ಕೇಳ್ವರಾರು? ॥ಪುರುಷತೆಯೆ ಸೇತುವೆ ಮೃಗತ್ವದಿಂ ದಿವ್ಯತೆಗೆ ।ಮುರಿಯದಿರು ಸೇತುವೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨೯ ॥

content: ನಿನ್ನ ಕಣ್ ಕಿವಿ ಮನಗಳರಿವಷ್ಟು ನಿನ್ನ ಜಗ ।ನಿನ್ನನಳಿಸುವ ನಗಿಸುವೆಲ್ಲ ನಿನ್ನಂಶ ॥ಉನ್ನತಿಗೆ ನೀನೇರಿದಂತೆ ಜಗ ವಿಸ್ತರಿಸಿ ।ಸಣ್ಣತನ ಸವೆಯುವುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೦ ॥ ninna kaN kivi managaLu arivaShTu ninna jaga ।ninnanu aLisuva nagisuvella ninna amsha ॥unnatige nInu Eridante jaga vistarisi ।saNNatana saveyuvudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 530 ॥Your world is all what your eyes, ears and mind can see. These are the only things that can make you cry or laugh. If you raise yourselves mentally, then your vision starts expanding. That is how you will grow and get rid of innate ;small-mindedness;.  - Mankutimma
translation: Your world is all what your eyes, ears and mind can see. These are the only things that can make you cry or laugh. If you raise yourselves mentally, then your vision starts expanding. That is how you will grow and get rid of innate ;small-mindedness;.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಣ್ಣತನ ಸವೆಯುವುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ninna kaN kivi managaLu arivaShTu ninna jaga ।ninnanu aLisuva nagisuvella ninna amsha ॥unnatige nInu Eridante jaga vistarisi ।saNNatana saveyuvudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 530 ॥
kagga: ನಿನ್ನ ಕಣ್ ಕಿವಿ ಮನಗಳರಿವಷ್ಟು ನಿನ್ನ ಜಗ ।ನಿನ್ನನಳಿಸುವ ನಗಿಸುವೆಲ್ಲ ನಿನ್ನಂಶ ॥ಉನ್ನತಿಗೆ ನೀನೇರಿದಂತೆ ಜಗ ವಿಸ್ತರಿಸಿ ।ಸಣ್ಣತನ ಸವೆಯುವುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೦ ॥

content: ಶಶ್ವದ್ವಿಕಾಸನ ಹ್ರಾಸವ ಕ್ರಮಗಳಿಂ ।ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ ನರ್ತಿಸುತೆ ಪೌರುಷೊನ್ನತಿಯೊಳ್ ॥ಸ್ವಸ್ವರೂಪವನರಸುವಾಟ ಪರಚೇತನದ ।ಹೃಷ್ಯದ್ವಿಲಾಸವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೧ ॥ shashvat vikAsana hrAsana kramagaLim ।vishvadali nartisute pauruShOnnatiyoL ॥svasvarUpavanu arasuva ATa parachEtanada ।hRuShyat vilAsavelo   - Mankutimma ॥ 531 ॥The Cosmic Spirit is a permanent being. But it expands and contracts as the universe. In doing so, it dances happily along side human progress. It gets itself lost in it and plays the game of finding itself (via realization). It is very happy in playing this game for ever.  - Mankutimma
translation: The Cosmic Spirit is a permanent being. But it expands and contracts as the universe. In doing so, it dances happily along side human progress. It gets itself lost in it and plays the game of finding itself (via realization). It is very happy in playing this game for ever.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹೃಷ್ಯದ್ವಿಲಾಸವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: shashvat vikAsana hrAsana kramagaLim ।vishvadali nartisute pauruShOnnatiyoL ॥svasvarUpavanu arasuva ATa parachEtanada ।hRuShyat vilAsavelo   - Mankutimma ॥ 531 ॥
kagga: ಶಶ್ವದ್ವಿಕಾಸನ ಹ್ರಾಸವ ಕ್ರಮಗಳಿಂ ।ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ ನರ್ತಿಸುತೆ ಪೌರುಷೊನ್ನತಿಯೊಳ್ ॥ಸ್ವಸ್ವರೂಪವನರಸುವಾಟ ಪರಚೇತನದ ।ಹೃಷ್ಯದ್ವಿಲಾಸವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೧ ॥

content: ಕಟ್ಟಡದ ಪರಿಯನಿಟ್ಟಿಗೆಯೆಂತು ಕಂಡೀತು? ।ಗಟ್ಟಿ ನಿಲದದು ಬೀಳೆ ಗೋಡೆ ಬಿರಿಯುವುದು ॥ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ಕೋಟೆಯಲಿ ನೀನೊಂದಿಟಿಕೆ; ಸೊಟ್ಟಾಗೆ ।ಪೆಟ್ಟು ತಿನ್ನುವೆ ಜೋಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೨ ॥ kaTTaDada pariyanu iTTigeyu entu kaNDItu? ।gaTTi niladadu bILe gODe biriyuvudu ॥sRuShTi kOTeyali nInu ondu iTike; soTTAge ।peTTu tinnuve jOke  - Mankutimma ॥ 532 ॥How can the brick know about the structure of the building? But if it does not stand firm, the wall cracks and the building fails. So, the mason makes sure that every brick is laid out just the way it should. However once in a while a lone brick will stick out. The mason will either hit it back into the wall or chop it off. In the fort of this creation, each man is a mere brick. If you do anything that does not fit in the grand scheme, be prepared to be whacked.  - Mankutimma
translation: How can the brick know about the structure of the building? But if it does not stand firm, the wall cracks and the building fails. So, the mason makes sure that every brick is laid out just the way it should. However once in a while a lone brick will stick out. The mason will either hit it back into the wall or chop it off. In the fort of this creation, each man is a mere brick. If you do anything that does not fit in the grand scheme, be prepared to be whacked.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸೊಟ್ಟಾಗೆ ಪೆಟ್ಟು ತಿನ್ನುವೆ ಜೋಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kaTTaDada pariyanu iTTigeyu entu kaNDItu? ।gaTTi niladadu bILe gODe biriyuvudu ॥sRuShTi kOTeyali nInu ondu iTike; soTTAge ।peTTu tinnuve jOke  - Mankutimma ॥ 532 ॥
kagga: ಕಟ್ಟಡದ ಪರಿಯನಿಟ್ಟಿಗೆಯೆಂತು ಕಂಡೀತು? ।ಗಟ್ಟಿ ನಿಲದದು ಬೀಳೆ ಗೋಡೆ ಬಿರಿಯುವುದು ॥ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ಕೋಟೆಯಲಿ ನೀನೊಂದಿಟಿಕೆ; ಸೊಟ್ಟಾಗೆ ।ಪೆಟ್ಟು ತಿನ್ನುವೆ ಜೋಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೨ ॥

content: ಪುರುಷಂ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರನೋ? ದೈವವಿಧಿ ಪರವಶನೊ? ।ಎರಡುಮನಿತಿನಿತುಳ್ಳ ತೋಳಿನಂತಿಹನೋ? ॥ತಿರುಗುವುದು ಮಡಿಸುವುದು ತೋಳ್ ಮೈಯಕಟ್ಟಿನಲಿ ।ನರನಂತು ಮಿತಶಕ್ತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೩ ॥ puruSham svatantranO? daivavidhi paravashano? ।eraDum anitu initu uLLa tOLinantihanO? ॥tiruguvudu maDisuvudu tOL maiya kaTTinali ।naranu antu mitashakta  - Mankutimma ॥ 533 ॥Is man independent? Or is he always under the control of Providence? Both of them are true to some extent. He is as free as his arms are. They can swing and fold by their wish  - but even when they do, they have to follow the body structure. Man;s power is also limited thus to the outline that Providence provides.  - Mankutimma
translation: Is man independent? Or is he always under the control of Providence? Both of them are true to some extent. He is as free as his arms are. They can swing and fold by their wish  - but even when they do, they have to follow the body structure. Man;s power is also limited thus to the outline that Providence provides.  - Mankutimma
title: ನರನಂತು ಮಿತಶಕ್ತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: puruSham svatantranO? daivavidhi paravashano? ।eraDum anitu initu uLLa tOLinantihanO? ॥tiruguvudu maDisuvudu tOL maiya kaTTinali ।naranu antu mitashakta  - Mankutimma ॥ 533 ॥
kagga: ಪುರುಷಂ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರನೋ? ದೈವವಿಧಿ ಪರವಶನೊ? ।ಎರಡುಮನಿತಿನಿತುಳ್ಳ ತೋಳಿನಂತಿಹನೋ? ॥ತಿರುಗುವುದು ಮಡಿಸುವುದು ತೋಳ್ ಮೈಯಕಟ್ಟಿನಲಿ ।ನರನಂತು ಮಿತಶಕ್ತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೩ ॥

content: ಹರಡುವುದು ಸಾಜ ವಾಯುಗೆ ಸೈಸದದು ತಡೆಯನ್ ।ಉರುಳಿಪುದದೆಲ್ಲವನು ತಡೆಗಳಿಲ್ಲದಿರೆ ॥ನರನ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರಗತಿಯಂತು ಹಿತಮಿತವಿರಲು ।ಅರಸೊ ಮಿತಿಯಾಯತಿಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೪ ॥ haraDuvudu sAja vAyuge saisadadu taDeyan ।uruLipudu adellavanu taDegaLilladire ॥narana svatantragatiyantu hitamitaviralu ।araso mitiya Ayatiya  - Mankutimma ॥ 534 ॥It is the nature of wind to spread. It does not like obstacles. If it has freedom, it will bring down everything (obstacles) in this world. But it exercises restraint and feels pleasant. Man;s freedom is also similar. It is pleasant when restrained. We should hence search and realise our boundaries and exercise our freedom only with in that.  - Mankutimma
translation: It is the nature of wind to spread. It does not like obstacles. If it has freedom, it will bring down everything (obstacles) in this world. But it exercises restraint and feels pleasant. Man;s freedom is also similar. It is pleasant when restrained. We should hence search and realise our boundaries and exercise our freedom only with in that.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅರಸೊ ಮಿತಿಯಾಯತಿಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: haraDuvudu sAja vAyuge saisadadu taDeyan ।uruLipudu adellavanu taDegaLilladire ॥narana svatantragatiyantu hitamitaviralu ।araso mitiya Ayatiya  - Mankutimma ॥ 534 ॥
kagga: ಹರಡುವುದು ಸಾಜ ವಾಯುಗೆ ಸೈಸದದು ತಡೆಯನ್ ।ಉರುಳಿಪುದದೆಲ್ಲವನು ತಡೆಗಳಿಲ್ಲದಿರೆ ॥ನರನ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರಗತಿಯಂತು ಹಿತಮಿತವಿರಲು ।ಅರಸೊ ಮಿತಿಯಾಯತಿಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೪ ॥

content: ನೀರ ನೆರೆ ತನ್ನೆದುರಿನಣೆಕಟ್ಟನೊದೆಯುವುದು ।ಊರನದು ಕೊಚ್ಚುವುದು ಬದಿಯ ಕಟ್ಟದಿರೆ ॥ಏರಿಗಳನಿಕ್ಕೆಲದಿ ನಿಲಿಸೆ ಹರಿವುದು ಸಮನೆ ।ಪೌರುಷದ ನದಿಯಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೫ ॥ nIra nere tanna edurina aNekaTTanu odeyuvudu ।Uranadu kocchuvudu badiya kaTTadire ॥Erigalanu ikkeladi nilise harivudu samane ।pouruShada nadiyantu  - Mankutimma ॥ 535 ॥A raging river will pound on the dam that stands in its way. If there are no embankments, it will destroy the towns on the banks. If proper embankments are built on either side, then the flow will be peaceful and productive. Thus is the story of the river called human progress  - Mankutimma
translation: A raging river will pound on the dam that stands in its way. If there are no embankments, it will destroy the towns on the banks. If proper embankments are built on either side, then the flow will be peaceful and productive. Thus is the story of the river called human progress  - Mankutimma
title: ಪೌರುಷದ ನದಿಯಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nIra nere tanna edurina aNekaTTanu odeyuvudu ।Uranadu kocchuvudu badiya kaTTadire ॥Erigalanu ikkeladi nilise harivudu samane ।pouruShada nadiyantu  - Mankutimma ॥ 535 ॥
kagga: ನೀರ ನೆರೆ ತನ್ನೆದುರಿನಣೆಕಟ್ಟನೊದೆಯುವುದು ।ಊರನದು ಕೊಚ್ಚುವುದು ಬದಿಯ ಕಟ್ಟದಿರೆ ॥ಏರಿಗಳನಿಕ್ಕೆಲದಿ ನಿಲಿಸೆ ಹರಿವುದು ಸಮನೆ ।ಪೌರುಷದ ನದಿಯಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೫ ॥

content: ಎಸಳಿನಡಿ, ಗಿಡದ ಬಿಗಿ, ಮೇಲೆ ಗಾಳಿಯ ಸರಸ   ।ಕುಸುಮದ ಕ್ಷೇಮವಾ ಬಿಗಿತ ಬಿಡುತೆಗಳಿಂ ॥ಕುಶಲ ಸೌರಭವ ನಿರ್ಯತ್ನ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರದಿಂ ।ಪಸರಿಪಾ ನಯ ಸುಖವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೬ ॥ esaLinaDi, giDada bigi, mEle gALiya sarasa ।kusumada kShEmavu aa bigita biDutegaLim ॥kushala sourabhava niryatna svatantradim ।pasaripA naya sukhavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 536 ॥The petals of flower are held securely to the stalk below. On top, wind plays with it. The flower has to maintain the balance between getting stuck to the stack and sending its fragrance to the wind. It does this freely without any effort. Life is happy if we can find such balance.  - Mankutimma
translation: The petals of flower are held securely to the stalk below. On top, wind plays with it. The flower has to maintain the balance between getting stuck to the stack and sending its fragrance to the wind. It does this freely without any effort. Life is happy if we can find such balance.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪಸರಿಪಾ ನಯ ಸುಖವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: esaLinaDi, giDada bigi, mEle gALiya sarasa ।kusumada kShEmavu aa bigita biDutegaLim ॥kushala sourabhava niryatna svatantradim ।pasaripA naya sukhavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 536 ॥
kagga: ಎಸಳಿನಡಿ, ಗಿಡದ ಬಿಗಿ, ಮೇಲೆ ಗಾಳಿಯ ಸರಸ   ।ಕುಸುಮದ ಕ್ಷೇಮವಾ ಬಿಗಿತ ಬಿಡುತೆಗಳಿಂ ॥ಕುಶಲ ಸೌರಭವ ನಿರ್ಯತ್ನ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರದಿಂ ।ಪಸರಿಪಾ ನಯ ಸುಖವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೬ ॥

content: ತರಣಿಶಶಿಪಥಗಳನು, ಧರೆವರುಣಗತಿಗಲನು ।ಮರುದಗ್ನಿವೇಗಗಳ ನಿಯಮಿಸಿಹ ದಕ್ಷನ್ ॥ನರನರಸಿಕೊಳಲಿ ದಾರಿಯ ತನಗೆ ತಾನೆಂದು ।ತೊರೆದನೇತಕೆ ನಮ್ಮ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೭ ॥ taraNi shashi pathagaLanu, dhare varuNa gatigaLanu ।maruta agni vEgagaLa niyamisiha dakShAn  ॥naranu arasikoLali dAriya tanage tAneMdu ।toredanEtake namma?  - Mankutimma ॥ 537 ॥God has defined rules on how the Sun, Moon, earth moves, when it rains, how fast the wind can blow and fire burn. But for some unknown reason, he has left man to find the way himself. Why did he do that?  - Mankutimma
translation: God has defined rules on how the Sun, Moon, earth moves, when it rains, how fast the wind can blow and fire burn. But for some unknown reason, he has left man to find the way himself. Why did he do that?  - Mankutimma
title: ತೊರೆದನೇತಕೆ ನಮ್ಮ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: taraNi shashi pathagaLanu, dhare varuNa gatigaLanu ।maruta agni vEgagaLa niyamisiha dakShAn  ॥naranu arasikoLali dAriya tanage tAneMdu ।toredanEtake namma?  - Mankutimma ॥ 537 ॥
kagga: ತರಣಿಶಶಿಪಥಗಳನು, ಧರೆವರುಣಗತಿಗಲನು ।ಮರುದಗ್ನಿವೇಗಗಳ ನಿಯಮಿಸಿಹ ದಕ್ಷನ್ ॥ನರನರಸಿಕೊಳಲಿ ದಾರಿಯ ತನಗೆ ತಾನೆಂದು ।ತೊರೆದನೇತಕೆ ನಮ್ಮ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೭ ॥

content: ತನ್ನ ಬೆವರಿನ ಕೊಳದಿ ತಾಂ ಮುಳುಗಿ ತೇಲುತ್ತೆ ।ಧನ್ಯನಾನೆನ್ನುವನದೊರ್ವ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರನ್ ॥ಪುಣ್ಯತೀರ್ಥದೊಳಿಳಿದು ಕರಗಲ್ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರ ತಾನ್ ।ಎನ್ನುವವನಿನ್ನೊರ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೮ ॥ tanna bevarina koLadi tAm muLugi tElutte ।dhanya nAnu ennuvanu orva svatantran ॥puNya tIrthadoLu iLidu karagal svatantra tAn ।ennuvanu innorva  - Mankutimma ॥ 538 ॥People find their own ways to feel free. Some do it by hard work relishing in their own sweat  - satisfied by the fact that they are the masters of their own fate. Some others take a dip in the holy waters and feel free  - satisfied that their fate completely rests in the hands of the all powerful God that they believe in.  - Mankutimma
translation: People find their own ways to feel free. Some do it by hard work relishing in their own sweat  - satisfied by the fact that they are the masters of their own fate. Some others take a dip in the holy waters and feel free  - satisfied that their fate completely rests in the hands of the all powerful God that they believe in.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರ ತಾನ್ ಎನ್ನುವವನಿನ್ನೊರ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tanna bevarina koLadi tAm muLugi tElutte ।dhanya nAnu ennuvanu orva svatantran ॥puNya tIrthadoLu iLidu karagal svatantra tAn ।ennuvanu innorva  - Mankutimma ॥ 538 ॥
kagga: ತನ್ನ ಬೆವರಿನ ಕೊಳದಿ ತಾಂ ಮುಳುಗಿ ತೇಲುತ್ತೆ ।ಧನ್ಯನಾನೆನ್ನುವನದೊರ್ವ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರನ್ ॥ಪುಣ್ಯತೀರ್ಥದೊಳಿಳಿದು ಕರಗಲ್ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರ ತಾನ್ ।ಎನ್ನುವವನಿನ್ನೊರ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೮ ॥

content: ಬರಿಯ ಬುದ್ಧಿವಿಮರ್ಶೆಗರಿದು ಜೀವನತತ್ತ್ವ ।ಪರಿಶೋಧಿಸುವರಾರು ಬುದ್ಧಿಋಜುತೆಯನು? ॥ಸ್ಫುರಿಸುವುದದೆಂದೊ ತಾನೇ ಮಿಂಚುಬಳ್ಳಿವೊಲು ।ಪರತತ್ತ್ವ ಮನದೊಳಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೯ ॥ bariya buddhi vimarshegaridu jIvana tattva ।parishOdhisuvarAru buddhi Rujuteyanu? ॥sphurisuvudu adendo tAnE minchubaLLivolu ।parattva manadoLage  - Mankutimma ॥ 539 ॥Can we search for the realization of cosmic spirit be achieved just be mental calculations  - logic? How can we be certain of the purity of mind? (not being corrupted by temptations of senses) The realization will appear to the mind by itself (through experiences) like a lightening in the sky.  - Mankutimma
translation: Can we search for the realization of cosmic spirit be achieved just be mental calculations  - logic? How can we be certain of the purity of mind? (not being corrupted by temptations of senses) The realization will appear to the mind by itself (through experiences) like a lightening in the sky.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರತತ್ತ್ವ ಮನದೊಳಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bariya buddhi vimarshegaridu jIvana tattva ।parishOdhisuvarAru buddhi Rujuteyanu? ॥sphurisuvudu adendo tAnE minchubaLLivolu ।parattva manadoLage  - Mankutimma ॥ 539 ॥
kagga: ಬರಿಯ ಬುದ್ಧಿವಿಮರ್ಶೆಗರಿದು ಜೀವನತತ್ತ್ವ ।ಪರಿಶೋಧಿಸುವರಾರು ಬುದ್ಧಿಋಜುತೆಯನು? ॥ಸ್ಫುರಿಸುವುದದೆಂದೊ ತಾನೇ ಮಿಂಚುಬಳ್ಳಿವೊಲು ।ಪರತತ್ತ್ವ ಮನದೊಳಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩೯ ॥

content: ನರವಿವೇಕವದೇನು ಬರಿಯ ಮಳೆ ನೀರಲ್ಲ ।ಕೆರೆಯನೀರ್ ಊರ ಮೈಸೋಂಕುಗಳ ಬೆರಕೆ  ॥ಧರೆಯ ರಸವಾಸನೆಗಳಾಗಸದ ನಿರ್ಮಲದ ।ವರವ ಕದಡಾಗಿಪುವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೦ ॥ nara vivEkavadEnu bariya maLe nIralla ।kereya nIr Ura maisOnkugaLa berake ॥dhareya rasavAsanegaLu Agasada nirmalada ।varava kadaDAgipuvu  - Mankutimma ॥ 540 ॥A man;s intellect is not pure like the rain water. It is more like the water of the lake that has impurities from washing the bodies of all the villagers. The purity from the skies is dirtied by the everyday life on the earth.  - Mankutimma
translation: A man;s intellect is not pure like the rain water. It is more like the water of the lake that has impurities from washing the bodies of all the villagers. The purity from the skies is dirtied by the everyday life on the earth.  - Mankutimma
title: ವರವ ಕದಡಾಗಿಪುವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nara vivEkavadEnu bariya maLe nIralla ।kereya nIr Ura maisOnkugaLa berake ॥dhareya rasavAsanegaLu Agasada nirmalada ।varava kadaDAgipuvu  - Mankutimma ॥ 540 ॥
kagga: ನರವಿವೇಕವದೇನು ಬರಿಯ ಮಳೆ ನೀರಲ್ಲ ।ಕೆರೆಯನೀರ್ ಊರ ಮೈಸೋಂಕುಗಳ ಬೆರಕೆ  ॥ಧರೆಯ ರಸವಾಸನೆಗಳಾಗಸದ ನಿರ್ಮಲದ ।ವರವ ಕದಡಾಗಿಪುವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೦ ॥

content: ಪ್ರಾಕ್ತನದ ವಾಸನೆ ಮನಕೆ ಮೊದಲಿನ ಮಂತ್ರಿ ।ಯುಕ್ತಿಗಳ ತನಗೊಪ್ಪುವಂತೆ ತಿರುಗಿಪುದು ॥ಸೂಕ್ತವೆನಿಪುದು ಸಹಜರುಚಿ ತನ್ನ ತರ್ಕವನೆ ।ಗುಪ್ತದೊಳು ಕುಟಿಲವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೧ ॥ prAktanada vAsaneye manake modalina mantri ।yuktigaLa tanagoppuvante tirugipudu ॥sUktavenipudu sahaja ruchi tanna tarkavane ।guptadoLu kuTilavidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 541 ॥Our old memories are our first adviser. They influence our intellect to suit itself (justify itself). It will always favor your argument only and may seem to help you. But in the end, it is serving its purpose only and hence deceitful  - Mankutimma
translation: Our old memories are our first adviser. They influence our intellect to suit itself (justify itself). It will always favor your argument only and may seem to help you. But in the end, it is serving its purpose only and hence deceitful  - Mankutimma
title: ಗುಪ್ತದೊಳು ಕುಟಿಲವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: prAktanada vAsaneye manake modalina mantri ।yuktigaLa tanagoppuvante tirugipudu ॥sUktavenipudu sahaja ruchi tanna tarkavane ।guptadoLu kuTilavidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 541 ॥
kagga: ಪ್ರಾಕ್ತನದ ವಾಸನೆ ಮನಕೆ ಮೊದಲಿನ ಮಂತ್ರಿ ।ಯುಕ್ತಿಗಳ ತನಗೊಪ್ಪುವಂತೆ ತಿರುಗಿಪುದು ॥ಸೂಕ್ತವೆನಿಪುದು ಸಹಜರುಚಿ ತನ್ನ ತರ್ಕವನೆ ।ಗುಪ್ತದೊಳು ಕುಟಿಲವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೧ ॥

content: ಆಶೆ ಮಂಥರೆ, ನರವಿವೇಚನೆಯೆ ಕೈಕೇಯಿ ।ಬೀಸೆ ಮನದುಸಿರು ಮತಿದೀಪವಲೆಯುವುದು ॥ವಾಸನೆಗಳನುಕೂಲ ಸತ್ಯತರ್ಕಕೆ ಶೂಲ ।ಶೋಷಿಸಾ ವಾಸನೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೨ ॥ Ashe manthare, nara vivechaneye kaikEyi ।bIse manadusiru mati dIpavu aleyuvudu ॥vAsanegaLa anukUla satya tarkake shUla ।shOShisA vAsaneya  - Mankutimma ॥ 542 ॥Desire is Manthara. Man;s rational mind is Kaikeyi. As long as desire did not could one;s thoughts, a man follows dharma and lives life honestly. As soon as desire breathes into his mind, the light of wisdom strays and bends the truth and logic to satisfy the desires. Resist and kill such tremptations.  - Mankutimma
translation: Desire is Manthara. Man;s rational mind is Kaikeyi. As long as desire did not could one;s thoughts, a man follows dharma and lives life honestly. As soon as desire breathes into his mind, the light of wisdom strays and bends the truth and logic to satisfy the desires. Resist and kill such tremptations.  - Mankutimma
title: ಶೋಷಿಸಾ ವಾಸನೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Ashe manthare, nara vivechaneye kaikEyi ।bIse manadusiru mati dIpavu aleyuvudu ॥vAsanegaLa anukUla satya tarkake shUla ।shOShisA vAsaneya  - Mankutimma ॥ 542 ॥

content: ಭಾವದಾವೇಶದಿಂ ಮನವಶ್ವದಂತಿರಲಿ ।ಧೀವಿವೇಚನೆಯದಕೆ ದಕ್ಷರಾಹುತನು ॥ತೀವಿದೊಲವಿನ ದಂಪತಿಗಳಾಗಿ ಮನಬುದ್ಧಿ ।ಜೀವಿತವು ಜೈತ್ರಕಥೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೩ ॥ bhAvada aavEshadim manavu ashvadantirali ।dhI vivEchaneyu adake dakSha rAhutanu ॥tIvida olavina dampatigaLAgi mana buddhi ।jIvitavu jaitrakathe  - Mankutimma ॥ 543 ॥Even under the influence of strong emotions, let the mind be like a horse (agile, fast). But, let intellect be like a skilled rider. Let the mind and intellect be like man and his wife who love each other very much. Life becomes a success story automatically.  - Mankutimma
translation: Even under the influence of strong emotions, let the mind be like a horse (agile, fast). But, let intellect be like a skilled rider. Let the mind and intellect be like man and his wife who love each other very much. Life becomes a success story automatically.  - Mankutimma
title: ಜೀವಿತವು ಜೈತ್ರಕಥೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bhAvada aavEshadim manavu ashvadantirali ।dhI vivEchaneyu adake dakSha rAhutanu ॥tIvida olavina dampatigaLAgi mana buddhi ।jIvitavu jaitrakathe  - Mankutimma ॥ 543 ॥
kagga: ಭಾವದಾವೇಶದಿಂ ಮನವಶ್ವದಂತಿರಲಿ ।ಧೀವಿವೇಚನೆಯದಕೆ ದಕ್ಷರಾಹುತನು ॥ತೀವಿದೊಲವಿನ ದಂಪತಿಗಳಾಗಿ ಮನಬುದ್ಧಿ ।ಜೀವಿತವು ಜೈತ್ರಕಥೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೩ ॥

content: ಅನುಭವದ ಪಾಲೊಳು ವಿಚಾರ ಮಂಥನವಾಗೆ ।ಜನಿಯಿಕುಂ ಜ್ಞಾನನವನೀತವದೆ ಸುಖದಂ ॥ಗಿಣಿಯೋದು ಪುಸ್ತಕಜ್ಞಾನ; ನಿನ್ನನುಭವವೆ ।ನಿನಗೆ ಧರುಮದ ದೀಪ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೪ ॥ anubhavada pAloLu vichAra manthanavAge ।janiyikum jnAna navanItavade sukhadam ॥giNiyOdu pustaka jnAna; ninna anubhavave ।ninage dharumada dIpa  - Mankutimma ॥ 544 ॥Only when the milk of experience is churned with deep contemplation, that the butter of knowledge gets realized. One feels very happy when it happens. Knowledge from books is like the wisdom of a parrot. It is the knowledge based on experience that will be guiding lights for leading a life according to dharma.  - Mankutimma
translation: Only when the milk of experience is churned with deep contemplation, that the butter of knowledge gets realized. One feels very happy when it happens. Knowledge from books is like the wisdom of a parrot. It is the knowledge based on experience that will be guiding lights for leading a life according to dharma.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಿನಗೆ ಧರುಮದ ದೀಪ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: anubhavada pAloLu vichAra manthanavAge ।janiyikum jnAna navanItavade sukhadam ॥giNiyOdu pustaka jnAna; ninna anubhavave ।ninage dharumada dIpa  - Mankutimma ॥ 544 ॥
kagga: ಅನುಭವದ ಪಾಲೊಳು ವಿಚಾರ ಮಂಥನವಾಗೆ ।ಜನಿಯಿಕುಂ ಜ್ಞಾನನವನೀತವದೆ ಸುಖದಂ ॥ಗಿಣಿಯೋದು ಪುಸ್ತಕಜ್ಞಾನ; ನಿನ್ನನುಭವವೆ ।ನಿನಗೆ ಧರುಮದ ದೀಪ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೪ ॥

content: ಬುದ್ಧಿಪ್ರಕಾಶದಿಂದಂತರನುಭವಶೋಧೆ ।ಸಿದ್ಧವಾ ಶೋಧೆಯಿಂ ಸತ್ಯಸಂವೀಕ್ಷೆ ॥ಶುದ್ಧಸತ್ಯವ ಜೀವಿತಪ್ರಶ್ನೆಗನ್ವಯಿಪ ।ಪದ್ಧತಿಯೆ ಧರ್ಮವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೫ ॥ buddhi prakAshadinda antar anubhava shOdhe ।siddhavA shOdheyim satya samvIkShe ॥shuddha satyava jIvitaprashnege anvayipa ।paddhatiye dharmavelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 545 ॥One must search inwards for experiences using the light of one;s intellect. From that, you will find the universal truth. Applying that universal truth to every day dilemmas and resolving them is called ;Dharma;  - nothing more complex.  - Mankutimma
translation: One must search inwards for experiences using the light of one;s intellect. From that, you will find the universal truth. Applying that universal truth to every day dilemmas and resolving them is called ;Dharma;  - nothing more complex.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪದ್ಧತಿಯೆ ಧರ್ಮವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: buddhi prakAshadinda antar anubhava shOdhe ।siddhavA shOdheyim satya samvIkShe ॥shuddha satyava jIvitaprashnege anvayipa ।paddhatiye dharmavelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 545 ॥
kagga: ಬುದ್ಧಿಪ್ರಕಾಶದಿಂದಂತರನುಭವಶೋಧೆ ।ಸಿದ್ಧವಾ ಶೋಧೆಯಿಂ ಸತ್ಯಸಂವೀಕ್ಷೆ ॥ಶುದ್ಧಸತ್ಯವ ಜೀವಿತಪ್ರಶ್ನೆಗನ್ವಯಿಪ ।ಪದ್ಧತಿಯೆ ಧರ್ಮವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೫ ॥

content: ಶೀಯನಾಯುವ ಬಲವ ಜಯವ ಬೇಡಿರ್ದೊಡಂ ।ಗಾಯತ್ರಿಯನೆ ಪರಮಮಂತ್ರವೆಂದಾರ್ಯರ್ ॥ಧೀಯಂ ಪ್ರಚೋದಿಸೆಂದನುದಿನದಿ ಬೇಡಿದರು ।ಶ್ರೇಯಸ್ಸು ಧೀಮಹಿಮೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೬ ॥ shrIyanAyuva balava jayava bEdirdoDam ।gAyatriyane paramamantravendu aaryar ॥dhIyam prachOdisendu anudinadi bEDidaru ।shreyassu dhI mahime  - Mankutimma ॥ 546 ॥The ancient people prayed for wealth, longevity, strength and victory. But of all the hymns, they consider Gayatri Mantra to be most sacred. In that, they pray only for their intellect to be provoked. The practice is to chant this daily to keep the mind fresh and rejuvenated. All other forms of well being will follow the well being of the mind.  - Mankutimma
translation: The ancient people prayed for wealth, longevity, strength and victory. But of all the hymns, they consider Gayatri Mantra to be most sacred. In that, they pray only for their intellect to be provoked. The practice is to chant this daily to keep the mind fresh and rejuvenated. All other forms of well being will follow the well being of the mind.  - Mankutimma
title: ಶ್ರೇಯಸ್ಸು ಧೀಮಹಿಮೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: shrIyanAyuva balava jayava bEdirdoDam ।gAyatriyane paramamantravendu aaryar ॥dhIyam prachOdisendu anudinadi bEDidaru ।shreyassu dhI mahime  - Mankutimma ॥ 546 ॥
kagga: ಶೀಯನಾಯುವ ಬಲವ ಜಯವ ಬೇಡಿರ್ದೊಡಂ ।ಗಾಯತ್ರಿಯನೆ ಪರಮಮಂತ್ರವೆಂದಾರ್ಯರ್ ॥ಧೀಯಂ ಪ್ರಚೋದಿಸೆಂದನುದಿನದಿ ಬೇಡಿದರು ।ಶ್ರೇಯಸ್ಸು ಧೀಮಹಿಮೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೬ ॥

content: ಮತಿ ನಯನದಂತೆ ಮುಂದಿರ್ಪುದನು ನೋಡುವುದು ।ಮಿತವದರ ಕೆಲಸ, ಹೆಳವನ ಚಲನೆಯಂತೆ ॥ಗತಿಶಕ್ತಿಯದಕೆ ಮನವೆಂಬ ಚರಣದ ಬಲದೆ ।ಮತಿಬಿಟ್ಟ ಮನ ಕುರುಡು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೭ ॥ mati nayanadante mundirpudanu nODuvudu ।mitavadara kelasa, heLavana chalaneyante ॥gati shaktiyadake manavemba charaNada balade ।matibiTTa mana kuruDu  - Mankutimma ॥ 547 ॥Wisdom (or intellect) is like our eyes. It can only see forward but can not move. It;s abilities are as limited as the movements of a cripple. It rides on the legs of the mind and makes things possible. Hence for proper functioning in life, we need intellect that rides well on a sound mind. A mind that leaves the intellect behind is blind and is severely limited.  - Mankutimma
translation: Wisdom (or intellect) is like our eyes. It can only see forward but can not move. It;s abilities are as limited as the movements of a cripple. It rides on the legs of the mind and makes things possible. Hence for proper functioning in life, we need intellect that rides well on a sound mind. A mind that leaves the intellect behind is blind and is severely limited.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮತಿಬಿಟ್ಟ ಮನ ಕುರುಡು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mati nayanadante mundirpudanu nODuvudu ।mitavadara kelasa, heLavana chalaneyante ॥gati shaktiyadake manavemba charaNada balade ।matibiTTa mana kuruDu  - Mankutimma ॥ 547 ॥
kagga: ಮತಿ ನಯನದಂತೆ ಮುಂದಿರ್ಪುದನು ನೋಡುವುದು ।ಮಿತವದರ ಕೆಲಸ, ಹೆಳವನ ಚಲನೆಯಂತೆ ॥ಗತಿಶಕ್ತಿಯದಕೆ ಮನವೆಂಬ ಚರಣದ ಬಲದೆ ।ಮತಿಬಿಟ್ಟ ಮನ ಕುರುಡು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೭ ॥

content: ಪುರುಷಬುದ್ಧಿಯೆ ಸಾಕು ವರಸಿದ್ಧಿಗೆಂದಲ್ಲ ।ಪರಮೇಶಕರುಣೆಯನವಶ್ಯವೆಂದಲ್ಲ ॥ಚರಣ ನಡೆವನಿತು ಕಣ್ಣರಿವನಿತು ದೂರ ನೀಂ ।ಚರಿಸದಿರೆ ಲೋಪವಲ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೮ ॥ puruSha buddiye sAku varasiddhigendalla ।paramEsha karuNeyu anavashyavendalla ॥charaNa naDevanitu kaNNarivenitu dUra nIm ।charisadire lOpavala  - Mankutimma ॥ 548 ॥It is not that man can achieve everything on his own efforts. It is also not true that we would not need any divine help. But, we must go as long as our legs are strong and vision is clear. Only beyond that, we should let Providence take control. If we do not the efforts we are capable of, then it is us who lack  - not Fate.  - Mankutimma
translation: It is not that man can achieve everything on his own efforts. It is also not true that we would not need any divine help. But, we must go as long as our legs are strong and vision is clear. Only beyond that, we should let Providence take control. If we do not the efforts we are capable of, then it is us who lack  - not Fate.  - Mankutimma
title: ಚರಿಸದಿರೆ ಲೋಪವಲ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: puruSha buddiye sAku varasiddhigendalla ।paramEsha karuNeyu anavashyavendalla ॥charaNa naDevanitu kaNNarivenitu dUra nIm ।charisadire lOpavala  - Mankutimma ॥ 548 ॥
kagga: ಪುರುಷಬುದ್ಧಿಯೆ ಸಾಕು ವರಸಿದ್ಧಿಗೆಂದಲ್ಲ ।ಪರಮೇಶಕರುಣೆಯನವಶ್ಯವೆಂದಲ್ಲ ॥ಚರಣ ನಡೆವನಿತು ಕಣ್ಣರಿವನಿತು ದೂರ ನೀಂ ।ಚರಿಸದಿರೆ ಲೋಪವಲ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೮ ॥

content: ವಿಧಿಗೆ ನೀಂ ಕಾರ್ಯನಕ್ಷೆಯ ವಿಧಿಸ ಹೊರಡದಿರು ।ಅಧಿಕಾರಿ ನೀನಲ್ಲ; ವಿಧಿ ಬೆಪ್ಪನಲ್ಲ ॥ಹದವರಿತು ವಿಧಿ ತಾನೆ ಕುದುರಿಸುವನೆಲ್ಲವನು ।ಅದಟದಿರು ನೀನವನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೯ ॥ vidhige nIm kAryanakSheya vidhisa horaDadiru ।adhikAri nInalla; vidhi beppanalla ॥hadavaritu vidhi tAne kudurisuvanu ellavanu ।adaTadiru nInavana  - Mankutimma ॥ 549 ॥Don;t try to give a blue print to Providence and expect it to follow it. You are not its master. Neither is Providence an idiot. It will let good things happen when the time (and ecosystem) is just right for it. Don;t fight with Providence.  - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t try to give a blue print to Providence and expect it to follow it. You are not its master. Neither is Providence an idiot. It will let good things happen when the time (and ecosystem) is just right for it. Don;t fight with Providence.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅದಟದಿರು ನೀನವನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vidhige nIm kAryanakSheya vidhisa horaDadiru ।adhikAri nInalla; vidhi beppanalla ॥hadavaritu vidhi tAne kudurisuvanu ellavanu ।adaTadiru nInavana  - Mankutimma ॥ 549 ॥
kagga: ವಿಧಿಗೆ ನೀಂ ಕಾರ್ಯನಕ್ಷೆಯ ವಿಧಿಸ ಹೊರಡದಿರು ।ಅಧಿಕಾರಿ ನೀನಲ್ಲ; ವಿಧಿ ಬೆಪ್ಪನಲ್ಲ ॥ಹದವರಿತು ವಿಧಿ ತಾನೆ ಕುದುರಿಸುವನೆಲ್ಲವನು ।ಅದಟದಿರು ನೀನವನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪೯ ॥

content: ತಾಳಿ ಮೆಲುಮೆಲನೊಮ್ಮೆ ಧಾಳಿ ರಭಸದಿನೊಮ್ಮೆ ।ಹೇಳದೆಯೆ ಕೇಳದೆಯೆ ಬಹನು ವಿಧಿರಾಯ ॥ಕೀಳ ಮೇಲಾಗಿಪನು ಮೇಲ ಕೀಳಾಗಿಪನು ।ತಾಳುಮೆಯಿನಿರು ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೦ ॥ tALi melumelane omme dhALi rabhasadin imme ।hELadeye kELadeye bahanu vidhirAya ॥kILa mElAgipanu mEla kILAgipanu ।tALumeyin iru nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 550 ॥Sometimes he comes very slowly and pleasantly. Some times he comes with all his force. He never comes giving prior notice  - such are the acts of Providence. He will make the miserable prosperous and the prosperous miserable. You should only stay put with patience.  - Mankutimma
translation: Sometimes he comes very slowly and pleasantly. Some times he comes with all his force. He never comes giving prior notice  - such are the acts of Providence. He will make the miserable prosperous and the prosperous miserable. You should only stay put with patience.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಾಳುಮೆಯಿನಿರು ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tALi melumelane omme dhALi rabhasadin imme ।hELadeye kELadeye bahanu vidhirAya ॥kILa mElAgipanu mEla kILAgipanu ।tALumeyin iru nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 550 ॥
kagga: ತಾಳಿ ಮೆಲುಮೆಲನೊಮ್ಮೆ ಧಾಳಿ ರಭಸದಿನೊಮ್ಮೆ ।ಹೇಳದೆಯೆ ಕೇಳದೆಯೆ ಬಹನು ವಿಧಿರಾಯ ॥ಕೀಳ ಮೇಲಾಗಿಪನು ಮೇಲ ಕೀಳಾಗಿಪನು ।ತಾಳುಮೆಯಿನಿರು ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೦ ॥

content: ನಿನ್ನ ಹೆಗಲಿನ ಹೊರೆಯ ದೈವಭುಜಕೇರಿಸುವ ।ಸನ್ನಾಹ ಸಾಗೀತೆ? ದೈವವೊಪ್ಪೀತೆ? ॥ಮನ್ನಿಸಲಿ ವಿಧಿ ನಿನ್ನ ಬೇಡೀಕೆಯ, ಭಿನ್ನಿಸಲಿ ।ನಿನ್ನ ಬಲವನು ಮೆರಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೧ ॥ ninna hegalina horeya diavabhujakErisuva ।snnAha sAgIte? daivavoppIte? ॥mannisali vidhi ninna bEDIkeya, bhinnasali ।ninna balavanu meraso  - Mankutimma ॥ 551 ॥If you try to wriggle away from your responsibilities and put the weight on Providence, do you think it would work? Will Providence concur? It may or may not honour your request. But, you should continue to show your strength and do as much as you can.  - Mankutimma
translation: If you try to wriggle away from your responsibilities and put the weight on Providence, do you think it would work? Will Providence concur? It may or may not honour your request. But, you should continue to show your strength and do as much as you can.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಿನ್ನ ಬಲವನು ಮೆರಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ninna hegalina horeya diavabhujakErisuva ।snnAha sAgIte? daivavoppIte? ॥mannisali vidhi ninna bEDIkeya, bhinnasali ।ninna balavanu meraso  - Mankutimma ॥ 551 ॥

content: ಶ್ರುತಿಯರ್ಥ ವಿಶದವಪ್ಪುದು ಪುರುಷಭಾಷ್ಯದಿಂ ।ಶ್ರುತಿಮತಿಗಳನ್ಯೋನ್ಯಪರಿಪೂರಕಂಗಳ್ ॥ಯತಿಯೊಳವು ಸೇರಿರಲು ಸತ್ಯದರ್ಶನ ನಿನಗೆ ।ಕೃತ ಸಮನ್ವಯನಾಗು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೨ ॥ shrutiya artha vishadavappudu puruSha bhAShyadim  ।shruti matigaLa anyOnya paripUrakangaL ॥yatiyoLu avu sEriralu satya darshana ninage ।kRuta samanvayanAgu   - Mankutimma ॥ 552 ॥The knowledge hidden in the scriptures are difficult to discern unless somebody explains them to us as discourses. The words in the scriptures and the mind that can understand should fuse into one as complementary to each other. That is found in a few saints. Through them, you can see the universal truth. You also try to find a balance in the words and experiences.  - Mankutimma
translation: The knowledge hidden in the scriptures are difficult to discern unless somebody explains them to us as discourses. The words in the scriptures and the mind that can understand should fuse into one as complementary to each other. That is found in a few saints. Through them, you can see the universal truth. You also try to find a balance in the words and experiences.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕೃತ ಸಮನ್ವಯನಾಗು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ

kagga: ಶ್ರುತಿಯರ್ಥ ವಿಶದವಪ್ಪುದು ಪುರುಷಭಾಷ್ಯದಿಂ ।ಶ್ರುತಿಮತಿಗಳನ್ಯೋನ್ಯಪರಿಪೂರಕಂಗಳ್ ॥ಯತಿಯೊಳವು ಸೇರಿರಲು ಸತ್ಯದರ್ಶನ ನಿನಗೆ ।ಕೃತ ಸಮನ್ವಯನಾಗು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೨ ॥

content: ಚೂರುಗಳು ಹದಿನಾರು ಚಂದ್ರಮಂಡಲಕಂತೆ ।ನೂರಾರು ಚೂರುಗಳು ಸತ್ಯಚಂದ್ರನವು ॥ಸೇರಿಸುತಲವುಗಳನು ಬಗೆಯರಿತು ಬೆಳಸುತಿರೆ ।ಸಾರ ಋತಪೂರ್ಣಿಮೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೩ ॥ chUrugaLu hadinAru chandramanDalakante ।nUrAru chUrugaLu satya chandranavu ॥sErisutal avugaLanu bageyaritu beLasutire ।sAra RutapUrNimeyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 553 ॥There are sixteen pieces of the moon. When joined properly from the first to fifteenth day, you will see the beautiful full moon. The moon of universal truth has hundreds of pieces. When you can understand each piece, keep them in right place and grow, a beautiful full moon of truth will appear.  - Mankutimma
translation: There are sixteen pieces of the moon. When joined properly from the first to fifteenth day, you will see the beautiful full moon. The moon of universal truth has hundreds of pieces. When you can understand each piece, keep them in right place and grow, a beautiful full moon of truth will appear.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಾರ ಋತಪೂರ್ಣಿಮೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: chUrugaLu hadinAru chandramanDalakante ।nUrAru chUrugaLu satya chandranavu ॥sErisutal avugaLanu bageyaritu beLasutire ।sAra RutapUrNimeyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 553 ॥
kagga: ಚೂರುಗಳು ಹದಿನಾರು ಚಂದ್ರಮಂಡಲಕಂತೆ ।ನೂರಾರು ಚೂರುಗಳು ಸತ್ಯಚಂದ್ರನವು ॥ಸೇರಿಸುತಲವುಗಳನು ಬಗೆಯರಿತು ಬೆಳಸುತಿರೆ ।ಸಾರ ಋತಪೂರ್ಣಿಮೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೩ ॥

content: ತಿಳಿವಿಗೊಳಿತೆನಿಸುದುದು ನಡೆಯೊಳೇತಕ್ಕರಿದು? ।ಕುಳಿ ಮೇಡು ದೂರ ಮತಿಮನಸುಗಳ ನಡುವೆ ॥ಒಳಗಿನಾಯೆಣ್ಣೆ ಬತ್ತಿಗಳೆರಡುಮೊಡವೆರೆಯೆ ।ಬೆಳಕು ಜೀವೋನ್ನತಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೪ ॥ tiLivige oLitenisidudu naDeyoLu Etakkaridu? ।kuLi mEDu dUra mati manasugaLa naDuve ॥oLaginAyeNNe battigaLu eraDum oDavariye ।beLaku jIvOnnatige  - Mankutimma ॥ 554 ॥Intellect knows about the right and the wrong. But the mind does not let us always choose the right. There is a valley (and two hills) difference between the mind and the intellect. Only then they both strive together  - like the oil and the wick in a lamp  - does life become happy and elevated.  - Mankutimma
translation: Intellect knows about the right and the wrong. But the mind does not let us always choose the right. There is a valley (and two hills) difference between the mind and the intellect. Only then they both strive together  - like the oil and the wick in a lamp  - does life become happy and elevated.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬೆಳಕು ಜೀವೋನ್ನತಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tiLivige oLitenisidudu naDeyoLu Etakkaridu? ।kuLi mEDu dUra mati manasugaLa naDuve ॥oLaginAyeNNe battigaLu eraDum oDavariye ।beLaku jIvOnnatige  - Mankutimma ॥ 554 ॥
kagga: ತಿಳಿವಿಗೊಳಿತೆನಿಸುದುದು ನಡೆಯೊಳೇತಕ್ಕರಿದು? ।ಕುಳಿ ಮೇಡು ದೂರ ಮತಿಮನಸುಗಳ ನಡುವೆ ॥ಒಳಗಿನಾಯೆಣ್ಣೆ ಬತ್ತಿಗಳೆರಡುಮೊಡವೆರೆಯೆ ।ಬೆಳಕು ಜೀವೋನ್ನತಿಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೪ ॥

content: ಧರ್ಮಸಂಕಟದಿ ಮನ ತಲ್ಲಣಿಸುತಿರುವಂದು ।ನಿರ್ಮಥಿಸು ನಿನ್ನಾತ್ಮವನೆ ಮಮತೆ ಬಿಟ್ಟು ॥ನಿರ್ಮಮದ ಸದ್ವಿವೇಕದ ದೀಪಕಿಂತ ನೀಂ ।ನೆಮ್ಮಲಿನ್ನೇನಿಹುದೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೫ ॥ dharma sankaTadi mana tallaNisutiruvandu ।nirmathisu ninnAtmavanu mamate biTTu ॥nirmamada sadvivEkada dIpakinta nIm ।nemmalu innEnihudo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 555 ॥When your mind is faced with an ethical dilemma, then do a critical examination of self  - but only after removing self from the equation. When you remove the self, then a good wisdom emerges. Nothing is more reliable than that.  - Mankutimma
translation: When your mind is faced with an ethical dilemma, then do a critical examination of self  - but only after removing self from the equation. When you remove the self, then a good wisdom emerges. Nothing is more reliable than that.  - Mankutimma
title: ನೆಮ್ಮಲಿನ್ನೇನಿಹುದೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dharma sankaTadi mana tallaNisutiruvandu ।nirmathisu ninnAtmavanu mamate biTTu ॥nirmamada sadvivEkada dIpakinta nIm ।nemmalu innEnihudo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 555 ॥
kagga: ಧರ್ಮಸಂಕಟದಿ ಮನ ತಲ್ಲಣಿಸುತಿರುವಂದು ।ನಿರ್ಮಥಿಸು ನಿನ್ನಾತ್ಮವನೆ ಮಮತೆ ಬಿಟ್ಟು ॥ನಿರ್ಮಮದ ಸದ್ವಿವೇಕದ ದೀಪಕಿಂತ ನೀಂ ।ನೆಮ್ಮಲಿನ್ನೇನಿಹುದೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೫ ॥

content: ಶಕ್ತಿಮೀರ್ದ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಗಳನು ವಿಧಿ ನಿಯಮಿಸಿರೆ ।ಯುಕ್ತಿಮೀರ್ದ ಪ್ರಶ್ನೆಗಳನು ಕೇಳುತಿರೆ ॥ಚಿತ್ತವನು ತಿರುಗಿಸೊಳಗಡೆ; ನೋಡು, ನೋಡಲ್ಲಿ ।ಸತ್ತ್ವದಚ್ಛಿನ್ನ ಝರಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೬ ॥ shakti mIrda parIkShegaLanu vidhi niyamisire ।yukti mIrda prashnegalanu kELutire ॥chittavanu tirugisu oLagaDe; nODu nODalli ।sattvada achChinna jhari  - Mankutimma ॥ 556 ॥If life throws difficult tests at you or asks you tough questions, turn your thinking inwards. There; Right there you will find all answers  - the continuous flow (stream) of cosmic truth. We should know how to tap it.  - Mankutimma
translation: If life throws difficult tests at you or asks you tough questions, turn your thinking inwards. There; Right there you will find all answers  - the continuous flow (stream) of cosmic truth. We should know how to tap it.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸತ್ತ್ವದಚ್ಛಿನ್ನ ಝರಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: shakti mIrda parIkShegaLanu vidhi niyamisire ।yukti mIrda prashnegalanu kELutire ॥chittavanu tirugisu oLagaDe; nODu nODalli ।sattvada achChinna jhari  - Mankutimma ॥ 556 ॥
kagga: ಶಕ್ತಿಮೀರ್ದ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಗಳನು ವಿಧಿ ನಿಯಮಿಸಿರೆ ।ಯುಕ್ತಿಮೀರ್ದ ಪ್ರಶ್ನೆಗಳನು ಕೇಳುತಿರೆ ॥ಚಿತ್ತವನು ತಿರುಗಿಸೊಳಗಡೆ; ನೋಡು, ನೋಡಲ್ಲಿ ।ಸತ್ತ್ವದಚ್ಛಿನ್ನ ಝರಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೬ ॥

content: ಅಂತರಂಗದ ಗವಾಕ್ಷಗಳ ತೆರೆದಿಡಲಲ್ಲಿ ।ಚಿಂತೆ ಕುಮುಲದು, ಹೊಗೆಗಳೊತ್ತವಾತ್ಮವನು ॥ಶಾಂತಿ ಬೇಳ್ಪೊಡೆ ಮನೆಗೆ ಗೋಡೆವೊಲೆ ಕಿಟಿಕಿಯುಂ ।ಸಂತತದಪೇಕ್ಷಿತವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೭ ॥ antarangada gavAkShagaLa terediDalu alli ।chinte kumuladu, hogegaLu ottavu Atmavanu ॥shAnti bELpoDe manege gODevole kitikiyum ।santatadapEkShitavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 557 ॥If your inner conscience has enough windows, then worries will not get built up with in. Those worries can not suffocate your soul since they are let out through the windows. If you want peace, then realize that windows are as important for a house as the walls. Find such windows for yourself.  - Mankutimma
translation: If your inner conscience has enough windows, then worries will not get built up with in. Those worries can not suffocate your soul since they are let out through the windows. If you want peace, then realize that windows are as important for a house as the walls. Find such windows for yourself.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಂತತದಪೇಕ್ಷಿತವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: antarangada gavAkShagaLa terediDalu alli ।chinte kumuladu, hogegaLu ottavu Atmavanu ॥shAnti bELpoDe manege gODevole kitikiyum ।santatadapEkShitavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 557 ॥
kagga: ಅಂತರಂಗದ ಗವಾಕ್ಷಗಳ ತೆರೆದಿಡಲಲ್ಲಿ ।ಚಿಂತೆ ಕುಮುಲದು, ಹೊಗೆಗಳೊತ್ತವಾತ್ಮವನು ॥ಶಾಂತಿ ಬೇಳ್ಪೊಡೆ ಮನೆಗೆ ಗೋಡೆವೊಲೆ ಕಿಟಿಕಿಯುಂ ।ಸಂತತದಪೇಕ್ಷಿತವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೭ ॥

content: ಆಳವನು ನೋಡಿ ಬಗೆದಾಡುವ ಮಾತಿಂಗೆ ।ರೂಢಿಯರ್ಥವದೊಂದು ಗೂಡಾರ್ಥವೊಂದು ॥ವಾರಿಧಿಯ ದಾಂಟುವುಡುಪಕೆ ಗಾಳಿಪಟವೊಂದು ।ಕೋಲು ಹುಟ್ಟೊಂದು ಬಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೮ ॥ ALavanu nODi bagedu ADuva mAtinge ।rUDhiyarthavadondu gUDhArthavondu ॥vAridhiya dAnTuva uDupake gALipaTavondu।kOlu huTTondu bala  - Mankutimma ॥ 558 ॥When one thinks a lot and speaks (like the sages did) their words will have more than one meaning  - one that is apparent and simple, and another which is involved and mysterious. Understanding both will help us cross this ocean of samsaara (worldly miseries)  - just like the boat requires both the sail (apparent) and the rudder (hidden) to move.  - Mankutimma
translation: When one thinks a lot and speaks (like the sages did) their words will have more than one meaning  - one that is apparent and simple, and another which is involved and mysterious. Understanding both will help us cross this ocean of samsaara (worldly miseries)  - just like the boat requires both the sail (apparent) and the rudder (hidden) to move.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕೋಲು ಹುಟ್ಟೊಂದು ಬಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ALavanu nODi bagedu ADuva mAtinge ।rUDhiyarthavadondu gUDhArthavondu ॥vAridhiya dAnTuva uDupake gALipaTavondu।kOlu huTTondu bala  - Mankutimma ॥ 558 ॥
kagga: ಆಳವನು ನೋಡಿ ಬಗೆದಾಡುವ ಮಾತಿಂಗೆ ।ರೂಢಿಯರ್ಥವದೊಂದು ಗೂಡಾರ್ಥವೊಂದು ॥ವಾರಿಧಿಯ ದಾಂಟುವುಡುಪಕೆ ಗಾಳಿಪಟವೊಂದು ।ಕೋಲು ಹುಟ್ಟೊಂದು ಬಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೮ ॥

content: ಪರಮಪದದಲಿ ನೋಡು; ಬೇರುಗಳ್ ವ್ಯೋಮದಲಿ ।ಧರೆಗಿಳಿದ ಕೊಂಬುರಂಬೆಗಳು, ಬಿಳಲುಗಳು ॥ಚಿರಜೀವಿವೃಕ್ಷವಿದು ವಿಶ್ವಜೀವಾಶ್ವತ್ಥ ।ಪರಿಕಿಸಿದರರ್ಥವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೯ ॥ paramapadadali nODu; bErugaL vyomadali ।dharegiLida komburambegaLu, biLalugaLu ॥chirajIvivRukShavidu vishva jIva ashvattha ।parikisu idara arthavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 559 ॥Try looking at the universal true picture  - there is a tree with its root in the sky. Towards the earth are its twigs, branches and struts. This is the tree of life. This is the universe symbolised as a Ashwattha tree (root being the supreme being  - God, and leaves are beings of this world). Try and analyse its meaning.  - Mankutimma
translation: Try looking at the universal true picture  - there is a tree with its root in the sky. Towards the earth are its twigs, branches and struts. This is the tree of life. This is the universe symbolised as a Ashwattha tree (root being the supreme being  - God, and leaves are beings of this world). Try and analyse its meaning.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರಿಕಿಸಿದರರ್ಥವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: paramapadadali nODu; bErugaL vyomadali ।dharegiLida komburambegaLu, biLalugaLu ॥chirajIvivRukShavidu vishva jIva ashvattha ।parikisu idara arthavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 559 ॥
kagga: ಪರಮಪದದಲಿ ನೋಡು; ಬೇರುಗಳ್ ವ್ಯೋಮದಲಿ ।ಧರೆಗಿಳಿದ ಕೊಂಬುರಂಬೆಗಳು, ಬಿಳಲುಗಳು ॥ಚಿರಜೀವಿವೃಕ್ಷವಿದು ವಿಶ್ವಜೀವಾಶ್ವತ್ಥ ।ಪರಿಕಿಸಿದರರ್ಥವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫೯ ॥

content: ಜೀವನದ ಮೂಲ ಮೇಲಿಹುದು ಪರಮೋರ್ಧ್ವದಲಿ ।ತೀವಿರ್ಪುದದು ಕೆಳಗೆ ನಮ್ಮ ಲೋಕದಲಿ ॥ನಾವದರ ಕಡ್ಡಿಯೆಲೆ, ಚಿಗುರುವೆವು, ಬಾಡುವೆವು ।ಸಾವು ಮರಕೇನಿಲ್ಲ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೦ ॥ jIvanada mUla mElihudu parama Urdhvadali ।tIvirpudadu keLage namma lOkadali ॥nAvadara kaDDiyele, chiguruvevu, bADuvevu ।sAvu marakEnilla  - Mankutimma ॥ 560 ॥The root source of life is at the very top of the tree (inverted) in the Supreme Being. It sends out the life giving freshness to our world. We are the twigs and leaves of the tree. We blossom and wilt in time. But there is no death to the tree itself.  - Mankutimma
translation: The root source of life is at the very top of the tree (inverted) in the Supreme Being. It sends out the life giving freshness to our world. We are the twigs and leaves of the tree. We blossom and wilt in time. But there is no death to the tree itself.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಾವು ಮರಕೇನಿಲ್ಲ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jIvanada mUla mElihudu parama Urdhvadali ।tIvirpudadu keLage namma lOkadali ॥nAvadara kaDDiyele, chiguruvevu, bADuvevu ।sAvu marakEnilla  - Mankutimma ॥ 560 ॥
kagga: ಜೀವನದ ಮೂಲ ಮೇಲಿಹುದು ಪರಮೋರ್ಧ್ವದಲಿ ।ತೀವಿರ್ಪುದದು ಕೆಳಗೆ ನಮ್ಮ ಲೋಕದಲಿ ॥ನಾವದರ ಕಡ್ಡಿಯೆಲೆ, ಚಿಗುರುವೆವು, ಬಾಡುವೆವು ।ಸಾವು ಮರಕೇನಿಲ್ಲ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೦ ॥

content: ಒಂದು ಕಡೆ ಚಿಗುರುತಲಿ, ಒಂದು ಕಡೆ ಬಾಡುತಲಿ ।ಕಂದುತಿರೆ ಕೊಂಬೆ, ಮುಂಡದಲಿ ಹಬ್ಬುತಲಿ ॥ಎಂದೆಂದುಮಶ್ವತ್ಥ ಹಳೆಹೊಸದು; ತಾನದಾ ।ಸ್ಪಂದನವೊ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮನದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೧ ॥ ondu kaDe chigurutali, ondu kaDe bADutali ।kundutire kombe, munDadali habbutali ॥endendum ashvattha haLe hosadu; tAnadA ।spandanavo brahmanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 561 ॥The tree blossoms in one side, and wilts in another. Branches may recede while it expands at the head (which is down). The tree is forever new as well as old. The spirit running through the tree is of the supreme being.  - Mankutimma
translation: The tree blossoms in one side, and wilts in another. Branches may recede while it expands at the head (which is down). The tree is forever new as well as old. The spirit running through the tree is of the supreme being.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸ್ಪಂದನವೊ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮನದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ondu kaDe chigurutali, ondu kaDe bADutali ।kundutire kombe, munDadali habbutali ॥endendum ashvattha haLe hosadu; tAnadA ।spandanavo brahmanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 561 ॥
kagga: ಒಂದು ಕಡೆ ಚಿಗುರುತಲಿ, ಒಂದು ಕಡೆ ಬಾಡುತಲಿ ।ಕಂದುತಿರೆ ಕೊಂಬೆ, ಮುಂಡದಲಿ ಹಬ್ಬುತಲಿ ॥ಎಂದೆಂದುಮಶ್ವತ್ಥ ಹಳೆಹೊಸದು; ತಾನದಾ ।ಸ್ಪಂದನವೊ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮನದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೧ ॥

content: ಎಲೆಗಳನು ಕಡ್ಡಿ, ಕಡ್ಡಿಯ ರಂಬೆಕೊಂಬೆಗಳು ।ತಳೆದು ಪೆರ್ಚಿಸುತಿಹುವು ಮರದ ಬಾಳ್ಸಿರಿಯ ॥ಸ್ಥಲವೊಂದು ನಿನಗಿಹುದು ವಿಶ್ವವೃಕ್ಷದೊಳಂತು ।ಹಳಿಯದಿರು ನಿನ್ನಿರವ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೨ ॥ elegaLanu kaDDi, kaDDiya rambekombegaLu ।taLidu perchisutihuvu marada bALsiriya ॥sthalavondu ninagihudu vishvavRukShadoLantu ।haLiyadiru ninna irava  - Mankutimma ॥ 562 ॥In this tree of life, the leaves are supported by twigs, twigs by the branches. This way they are all enhancing the beauty of the nature. Every one has his own space in this tree. So, do not hate your existence.  - Mankutimma
translation: In this tree of life, the leaves are supported by twigs, twigs by the branches. This way they are all enhancing the beauty of the nature. Every one has his own space in this tree. So, do not hate your existence.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹಳಿಯದಿರು ನಿನ್ನಿರವ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: elegaLanu kaDDi, kaDDiya rambekombegaLu ।taLidu perchisutihuvu marada bALsiriya ॥sthalavondu ninagihudu vishvavRukShadoLantu ।haLiyadiru ninna irava  - Mankutimma ॥ 562 ॥
kagga: ಎಲೆಗಳನು ಕಡ್ಡಿ, ಕಡ್ಡಿಯ ರಂಬೆಕೊಂಬೆಗಳು ।ತಳೆದು ಪೆರ್ಚಿಸುತಿಹುವು ಮರದ ಬಾಳ್ಸಿರಿಯ ॥ಸ್ಥಲವೊಂದು ನಿನಗಿಹುದು ವಿಶ್ವವೃಕ್ಷದೊಳಂತು ।ಹಳಿಯದಿರು ನಿನ್ನಿರವ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೨ ॥

content: ಬಿಳಲಲ್ಲ, ಬೇರಲ್ಲ, ಮುಂಡಕಾಂಡಗಳಲ್ಲ ।ತಳಿರಲ್ಲ, ಮಲರಲ್ಲ, ಕಾಯಿಹಣ್ಣಲ್ಲ ॥ಎಲೆ ನೀನು; ವಿಶ್ವವೃಕ್ಷದೊಳ್ ಎಲೆಯೊಳೊಂದು ನೀಂ ।ತಿಳಿದದನು ನೆರವಾಗು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೩ ॥ biLalalla, bEralla, munDakANDagaLalla ।taLiralla, malaralla, kAyi haNNalla ॥ele nInu; vishva vRukShadoL eleyoLondu nIm ।tiLidadanu neravAgu  - Mankutimma ॥ 563 ॥You are not the struts, not the roots, not the canopy or the branches, not the sprouts, not the flowers or the fruits. You are just a leaf  - among the many many leaves in this tree of life. Understand your role and be of use (help).  - Mankutimma
translation: You are not the struts, not the roots, not the canopy or the branches, not the sprouts, not the flowers or the fruits. You are just a leaf  - among the many many leaves in this tree of life. Understand your role and be of use (help).  - Mankutimma
title: ತಿಳಿದದನು ನೆರವಾಗು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: biLalalla, bEralla, munDakANDagaLalla ।taLiralla, malaralla, kAyi haNNalla ॥ele nInu; vishva vRukShadoL eleyoLondu nIm ।tiLidadanu neravAgu  - Mankutimma ॥ 563 ॥
kagga: ಬಿಳಲಲ್ಲ, ಬೇರಲ್ಲ, ಮುಂಡಕಾಂಡಗಳಲ್ಲ ।ತಳಿರಲ್ಲ, ಮಲರಲ್ಲ, ಕಾಯಿಹಣ್ಣಲ್ಲ ॥ಎಲೆ ನೀನು; ವಿಶ್ವವೃಕ್ಷದೊಳ್ ಎಲೆಯೊಳೊಂದು ನೀಂ ।ತಿಳಿದದನು ನೆರವಾಗು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೩ ॥

content: ಎತ್ತಲೋ ಕಾಡುಮಬ್ಬಿನ ಬಳ್ಳಿ ಮೊಗ್ಗಿನಲಿ ।ಚಿತ್ರರಚನೆಗದೇಕೆ ತೊಡಗುವಳ್ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ? ॥ಕೃತ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ ತಾಂ ತರುವ ಶಕ್ತಿ ಗುಣ ಪೂರ್ಣತೆಯೆ ।ಸಾರ್ಥಕವೊ ಜೀವಿತಕೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೪ ॥ ettalO kADu mabbina baLLi mogginali ।chitra rachanege adEke toDaguvaL prakRuti ॥kRutyakke taruva shakti guNa pUrNateye ।sArthakavo jIvitake  - Mankutimma ॥ 564 ॥Why does nature take all the pains to create a wonderful picture (of a flower blossom) in a creeper deep in darkness of the forest? There is no one there to appreciate it. But if is satisfaction enough if one brings all the strength and quality into the work and completes it.  - Mankutimma
translation: Why does nature take all the pains to create a wonderful picture (of a flower blossom) in a creeper deep in darkness of the forest? There is no one there to appreciate it. But if is satisfaction enough if one brings all the strength and quality into the work and completes it.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಾರ್ಥಕವೊ ಜೀವಿತಕೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ettalO kADu mabbina baLLi mogginali ।chitra rachanege adEke toDaguvaL prakRuti ॥kRutyakke taruva shakti guNa pUrNateye ।sArthakavo jIvitake  - Mankutimma ॥ 564 ॥
kagga: ಎತ್ತಲೋ ಕಾಡುಮಬ್ಬಿನ ಬಳ್ಳಿ ಮೊಗ್ಗಿನಲಿ ।ಚಿತ್ರರಚನೆಗದೇಕೆ ತೊಡಗುವಳ್ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ? ॥ಕೃತ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ ತಾಂ ತರುವ ಶಕ್ತಿ ಗುಣ ಪೂರ್ಣತೆಯೆ ।ಸಾರ್ಥಕವೊ ಜೀವಿತಕೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೪ ॥

content: ಕಾಡುಹಕ್ಕಿ ಹುಳಕ್ಕೆ ವರ್ಣಚಿತ್ರಗಳೇಕೆ?- ।ನೋಡುವರ ಕಣ್ಣೊಲವ ಬೇಡುವಳೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ? ॥ಮಾಡುವಾ ಮಾಟಗಳನಾದನಿತು ಬೆಳಗಿಪುದು ।ರೂಢಿಯಾ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಯದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೫ ॥ kADu hakki huLakke varNa chitragaLEke? ।nODuvara kaNNolava bEDuvaLe sRuShTi? ॥mADuvA mATagaLanu Adanitu beLagipudu ।rUDhiyA prakRutiyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 565 ॥Why does nature create wonderful sceneries in the forest for birds and insects to see? Does she ask for appreciation from those who see it? It is her practice to exhibit her creations as much as she can  - not caring much if there is an audience or not. That is her style.  - Mankutimma
translation: Why does nature create wonderful sceneries in the forest for birds and insects to see? Does she ask for appreciation from those who see it? It is her practice to exhibit her creations as much as she can  - not caring much if there is an audience or not. That is her style.  - Mankutimma
title: ರೂಢಿಯಾ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಯದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kADu hakki huLakke varNa chitragaLEke? ।nODuvara kaNNolava bEDuvaLe sRuShTi? ॥mADuvA mATagaLanu Adanitu beLagipudu ।rUDhiyA prakRutiyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 565 ॥
kagga: ಕಾಡುಹಕ್ಕಿ ಹುಳಕ್ಕೆ ವರ್ಣಚಿತ್ರಗಳೇಕೆ?- ।ನೋಡುವರ ಕಣ್ಣೊಲವ ಬೇಡುವಳೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ? ॥ಮಾಡುವಾ ಮಾಟಗಳನಾದನಿತು ಬೆಳಗಿಪುದು ।ರೂಢಿಯಾ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಯದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೫ ॥

content: ಆರಣ್ಯಕದ ಪುಷ್ಪಗಳ ಮೂಸುವವರಾರು? ।ಆರಿಹರು ಪತಗದುಡುಪನು ಹುಡುಕಿ ಮಚ್ಚಲ್? ॥ಬೇರೊಬ್ಬರೆಣಿಕೆಯಿಲ್ಲದೆ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ ತನಗೆಂದೆ ।ಸ್ವಾರಸ್ಯವೆಸಗುವಳೊ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೬ ॥ AraNyakada puShpagaLa mUsuvavaru Aru? ।Ariharu patagada uDupanu huDuki mecchal? ॥bErobbara eNikeyillade prakRuti tanagende ।svArasyava esaguvaLo!  - Mankutimma ॥ 566 ॥Who is there to smell the fragrance of a flower in the forest? Who is there to search and appreciate the colors of the dress of a butterfly? Nature pulls out wonders not caring about who is there to watch them.  - Mankutimma
translation: Who is there to smell the fragrance of a flower in the forest? Who is there to search and appreciate the colors of the dress of a butterfly? Nature pulls out wonders not caring about who is there to watch them.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸ್ವಾರಸ್ಯವೆಸಗುವಳೊ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: AraNyakada puShpagaLa mUsuvavaru Aru? ।Ariharu patagada uDupanu huDuki mecchal? ॥bErobbara eNikeyillade prakRuti tanagende ।svArasyava esaguvaLo!  - Mankutimma ॥ 566 ॥
kagga: ಆರಣ್ಯಕದ ಪುಷ್ಪಗಳ ಮೂಸುವವರಾರು? ।ಆರಿಹರು ಪತಗದುಡುಪನು ಹುಡುಕಿ ಮಚ್ಚಲ್? ॥ಬೇರೊಬ್ಬರೆಣಿಕೆಯಿಲ್ಲದೆ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ ತನಗೆಂದೆ ।ಸ್ವಾರಸ್ಯವೆಸಗುವಳೊ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೬ ॥

content: ಮನದ ಭಾವಗಳ ಪೂರ್ಣದಿನೊರೆಯಲರಿತ ಕವಿ ।ಇನಿತನುಂ ಬಿಡದೆ ರೂಪಿಸಲರಿತ ಶಿಲ್ಪಿ  ॥ಅನುರೂಪದಿಂದ ವಾಸ್ತವಗೊಳಿಪ ಕೃತಿಚತುರ ।ಧನಿಯರಿವರೆಲ್ಲಿಹರೊ?   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೭ ॥ manada bhAvagaLa pUrNadim oreyalu arita kavi ।initanum biDade rUpisal arita shilpi ॥anurUpadinda vAstavagoLipa kRuti chatura ।dhaniyaru avarelliharo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 567 ॥Where can one find these fortunate people  - a poet who can describe the feelings of the mind completely? a sculptor who can carve everything without leaving out any detail? an builder/engineer who can convert ideas/plans into reality? They are fortunate because they do something that nature does every day with so much ease.  - Mankutimma
translation: Where can one find these fortunate people  - a poet who can describe the feelings of the mind completely? a sculptor who can carve everything without leaving out any detail? an builder/engineer who can convert ideas/plans into reality? They are fortunate because they do something that nature does every day with so much ease.  - Mankutimma
title: ಧನಿಯರಿವರೆಲ್ಲಿಹರೊ?   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: manada bhAvagaLa pUrNadim oreyalu arita kavi ।initanum biDade rUpisal arita shilpi ॥anurUpadinda vAstavagoLipa kRuti chatura ।dhaniyaru avarelliharo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 567 ॥
kagga: ಮನದ ಭಾವಗಳ ಪೂರ್ಣದಿನೊರೆಯಲರಿತ ಕವಿ ।ಇನಿತನುಂ ಬಿಡದೆ ರೂಪಿಸಲರಿತ ಶಿಲ್ಪಿ  ॥ಅನುರೂಪದಿಂದ ವಾಸ್ತವಗೊಳಿಪ ಕೃತಿಚತುರ ।ಧನಿಯರಿವರೆಲ್ಲಿಹರೊ?   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೭ ॥

content: ಮನದ ಭಾವಿತಕೊಪ್ಪುವುಪಕರಣ ನಮಗಿಲ್ಲ ।ಎಣಿಕೆಗಳ ಪೂರಯಿಪ ಸಾಧನಗಳಿಲ್ಲ ॥ಜನುಮಜನುಮಗಳಿಂತು ಪೇಚಾಟ, ತಿಣಕಾಟ ।ಮುನಿಪುದಾರಲಿ, ಹೇಳು?   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೮ ॥ manada bhAvitake oppuva upakarana namagilla ।eNikegaLa pUrayipa sAdhanegaLilla ॥januma janumagaLintu pEchATa, tiNakATa ।munipudArali, hELu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 568 ॥There are no apparatus that are similar to what we have imagined. There are no means to see through our calculations. The same cycle of misery and helplessness is repeated in all the lives. Tell me who should I be angry with?  - Mankutimma
translation: There are no apparatus that are similar to what we have imagined. There are no means to see through our calculations. The same cycle of misery and helplessness is repeated in all the lives. Tell me who should I be angry with?  - Mankutimma
title: ಮುನಿಪುದಾರಲಿ, ಹೇಳು?   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: manada bhAvitake oppuva upakarana namagilla ।eNikegaLa pUrayipa sAdhanegaLilla ॥januma janumagaLintu pEchATa, tiNakATa ।munipudArali, hELu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 568 ॥
kagga: ಮನದ ಭಾವಿತಕೊಪ್ಪುವುಪಕರಣ ನಮಗಿಲ್ಲ ।ಎಣಿಕೆಗಳ ಪೂರಯಿಪ ಸಾಧನಗಳಿಲ್ಲ ॥ಜನುಮಜನುಮಗಳಿಂತು ಪೇಚಾಟ, ತಿಣಕಾಟ ।ಮುನಿಪುದಾರಲಿ, ಹೇಳು?   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೮ ॥

content: ಕ್ಷಿತಿರುಹಕೆ ಸುಮಫಲಮುಹೂರ್ತ ನಿಶ್ಚಿತವೇನು? ।ಮತಿಮನಂಗಳ ಕೃಷಿತಪಃಫಲವುಮಂತು ॥ಸತತ ಕೃಷಿ, ಬೀಜಗುಣ, ಕಾಲವರ್ಷಗಳೊದವೆ ।ಪ್ರತಿಭೆ ವಿಕಸಿತವಹುದೊ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೯ ॥ kShitiruhake suma phala muhUrta nishchitavEnu? ।matimanangaLa kRuShi tapaH phalavum antu ॥satata kRuShi, bIjaguNa, kAla varShagaLu odave ।pratibhe vikasitavahudo  - Mankutimma ॥ 569 ॥Do the trees have definitely time-table to bear flowers and fruits? The results of our mind and intellect are also like that  - no timetable of for results. Constant nurturing, innate qualities of the seed and the right time of the year (climate) will result in flowers and fruits. Human talent is also like wise  - will blossom under certain conditions only.  - Mankutimma
translation: Do the trees have definitely time-table to bear flowers and fruits? The results of our mind and intellect are also like that  - no timetable of for results. Constant nurturing, innate qualities of the seed and the right time of the year (climate) will result in flowers and fruits. Human talent is also like wise  - will blossom under certain conditions only.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪ್ರತಿಭೆ ವಿಕಸಿತವಹುದೊ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kShitiruhake suma phala muhUrta nishchitavEnu? ।matimanangaLa kRuShi tapaH phalavum antu ॥satata kRuShi, bIjaguNa, kAla varShagaLu odave ।pratibhe vikasitavahudo  - Mankutimma ॥ 569 ॥
kagga: ಕ್ಷಿತಿರುಹಕೆ ಸುಮಫಲಮುಹೂರ್ತ ನಿಶ್ಚಿತವೇನು? ।ಮತಿಮನಂಗಳ ಕೃಷಿತಪಃಫಲವುಮಂತು ॥ಸತತ ಕೃಷಿ, ಬೀಜಗುಣ, ಕಾಲವರ್ಷಗಳೊದವೆ ।ಪ್ರತಿಭೆ ವಿಕಸಿತವಹುದೊ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬೯ ॥

content: ವಕ್ತ್ರವುಂಟೆಲ್ಲರಿಗೆ, ವರ್ಚಸೋರೊರ್ವರಿಗೆ ।ಕತ್ತಿ ಪಣ್ಯದೊಳುಂಟು, ಶಕ್ತಿ ಸಹಜದಲಿ ॥ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿ ಪ್ರಭಾವೀ ಲೋಕಚರಿತೆಯ ಕೀಲು ।ಹಸ್ತವದು ದೈವಕೆಲೊ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೦ ॥ vaktravuntu ellarige, varchassu Orvorvarige ।katti paNyadoLunTu, shakti sahajadali ॥vyakti prabhAvI lOkachariteya kIlu ।hastavadu daivakelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 570 ॥Every one has a mouth. But the charisma to utter the right words is found only in some. One can buy a sword with money. But courage is innate. There are very few people who are capable of making history  - those who are courageous and have influence over many with their words. They become instruments of God;s will.  - Mankutimma
translation: Every one has a mouth. But the charisma to utter the right words is found only in some. One can buy a sword with money. But courage is innate. There are very few people who are capable of making history  - those who are courageous and have influence over many with their words. They become instruments of God;s will.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹಸ್ತವದು ದೈವಕೆಲೊ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vaktravuntu ellarige, varchassu Orvorvarige ।katti paNyadoLunTu, shakti sahajadali ॥vyakti prabhAvI lOkachariteya kIlu ।hastavadu daivakelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 570 ॥
kagga: ವಕ್ತ್ರವುಂಟೆಲ್ಲರಿಗೆ, ವರ್ಚಸೋರೊರ್ವರಿಗೆ ।ಕತ್ತಿ ಪಣ್ಯದೊಳುಂಟು, ಶಕ್ತಿ ಸಹಜದಲಿ ॥ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿ ಪ್ರಭಾವೀ ಲೋಕಚರಿತೆಯ ಕೀಲು ।ಹಸ್ತವದು ದೈವಕೆಲೊ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೦ ॥

content: ನಿನಗಿರದ ಕಣ್ ಬಾಯಿ ವಾಲ್ಮೀಕಿಗೆಂತಾಯ್ತು? ।ಮುನಿಕವಿತೆಗೆಂತು ನಿನ್ನೆದೆಯೊಳೆಡೆಯಾಯ್ತು? ॥ಘನಮಹಿಮನೊಳ್ ಜ್ವಲಿಸುತಿತರರೊಳು ನಿದ್ರಿಸುತೆ ।ಅನಲನೆಲ್ಲರೊಳಿಹನು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೧ ॥ ninagirada kaN bAyi vAlmIkige entAytu? ।munikavitege entu ninna edeyoL eDeyAytu? ॥ghanamahimanoL jvalisute itararoLu nidrisute ।analanu ellaroLu ihanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 571 ॥You have the same mouth and eyes as Valmiki. Then how come he (only he) could create the beautiful Ramayana? How come you like it so much that it has a place in your heart? The inner fire (of love towards the magnanimous) is present in every one. It is asleep in most people but active in the great minds like Valmiki.  - Mankutimma
translation: You have the same mouth and eyes as Valmiki. Then how come he (only he) could create the beautiful Ramayana? How come you like it so much that it has a place in your heart? The inner fire (of love towards the magnanimous) is present in every one. It is asleep in most people but active in the great minds like Valmiki.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅನಲನೆಲ್ಲರೊಳಿಹನು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
