kagga: ನಿನಗಿರದ ಕಣ್ ಬಾಯಿ ವಾಲ್ಮೀಕಿಗೆಂತಾಯ್ತು? ।ಮುನಿಕವಿತೆಗೆಂತು ನಿನ್ನೆದೆಯೊಳೆಡೆಯಾಯ್ತು? ॥ಘನಮಹಿಮನೊಳ್ ಜ್ವಲಿಸುತಿತರರೊಳು ನಿದ್ರಿಸುತೆ ।ಅನಲನೆಲ್ಲರೊಳಿಹನು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೧ ॥

content: ಪುರುಷಯೋಚನೆಯೆಲ್ಲ ಮುರಿದು ಮಣ್ಣಹುದೆಂದು ।ಕೊರಗದಿರು; ಕೆಟ್ಟನೆಂದೆಂದುಮೆನ್ನದಿರು ॥ಶರಧಿಯೊಳು ಮೀನೊಂದು ಪುಟ್ಟಲೇಂ ಸಾಯಲೇಂ? ।ಪರವೆಯೇನಿಲ್ಲವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೨ ॥ puruSha yOchaneyella muridu maNNahudendu ।koragadiru; keTTenu endu endum ennadiru ॥sharadhiyoLu mInondu puTTalEm sAyalEm? ।paraveyEnillavelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 572 ॥When your efforts don;t materialize  - don;t worry too much. Never give up. Never say never again. In the big ocean, if a single fish is born or dies, does it really matter? Individual success or failure are thus insignificant.  - Mankutimma
translation: When your efforts don;t materialize  - don;t worry too much. Never give up. Never say never again. In the big ocean, if a single fish is born or dies, does it really matter? Individual success or failure are thus insignificant.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರವೆಯೇನಿಲ್ಲವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: puruSha yOchaneyella muridu maNNahudendu ।koragadiru; keTTenu endu endum ennadiru ॥sharadhiyoLu mInondu puTTalEm sAyalEm? ।paraveyEnillavelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 572 ॥
kagga: ಪುರುಷಯೋಚನೆಯೆಲ್ಲ ಮುರಿದು ಮಣ್ಣಹುದೆಂದು ।ಕೊರಗದಿರು; ಕೆಟ್ಟನೆಂದೆಂದುಮೆನ್ನದಿರು ॥ಶರಧಿಯೊಳು ಮೀನೊಂದು ಪುಟ್ಟಲೇಂ ಸಾಯಲೇಂ? ।ಪರವೆಯೇನಿಲ್ಲವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೨ ॥

content: ಹೋರಾಡು ಬೀಳ್ವನ್ನಮೊಬ್ಬಂಟಿಯಾದೊಡಂ ।ಧೀರಪಥವನೆ ಬೆದಕು ಸಕಲಸಮಯದೊಳಂ ॥ದೂರದಲಿ ಗೊಣಗುತ್ತ ಬಾಳ್ವ ಬಾಳ್ಗೇನು ಬೆಲೆ? ।ಹೋರಿ ಸತ್ತ್ವವ ಮೆರಸು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೩ ॥ hOrADu bILvannam obbanTiyAdoDam ।dhIrapathavane bedaku sakalasamayadoLu ॥dUradali goNagutta bALva bALgEnu bele ।hOri sattvava merasu  - Mankutimma ॥ 573 ॥Its okay if you (and you alone) fall. You must still continue the fight. Always look to take the courageous path. There is no point in living a life on the sidelines cribbing, but not getting involved. You must endure the hardships and show off your true strengths.  - Mankutimma
translation: Its okay if you (and you alone) fall. You must still continue the fight. Always look to take the courageous path. There is no point in living a life on the sidelines cribbing, but not getting involved. You must endure the hardships and show off your true strengths.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹೋರಿ ಸತ್ತ್ವವ ಮೆರಸು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hOrADu bILvannam obbanTiyAdoDam ।dhIrapathavane bedaku sakalasamayadoLu ॥dUradali goNagutta bALva bALgEnu bele ।hOri sattvava merasu  - Mankutimma ॥ 573 ॥
kagga: ಹೋರಾಡು ಬೀಳ್ವನ್ನಮೊಬ್ಬಂಟಿಯಾದೊಡಂ ।ಧೀರಪಥವನೆ ಬೆದಕು ಸಕಲಸಮಯದೊಳಂ ॥ದೂರದಲಿ ಗೊಣಗುತ್ತ ಬಾಳ್ವ ಬಾಳ್ಗೇನು ಬೆಲೆ? ।ಹೋರಿ ಸತ್ತ್ವವ ಮೆರಸು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೩ ॥

content: ಹೋರು ಧೀರತೆಯಿಂದ, ಮೊಂಡುತನದಿಂ ಬೇಡ ।ವೈರ ಹಗೆತನ ಬೇಡ, ಹಿರಿ ನಿಯಮವಿರಲಿ ॥ವೈರಾಗ್ಯ ಕಾರುಣ್ಯ ಮೇಳನವೆ ಧೀರತನ ।ಹೋರುದಾತ್ತತೆಯಿಂದ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೪ ॥ hOru dhIrateyinda, monDutanadim bEDa ।vaira hagetana bEDa, hiri niyamavirali ॥vairAgya kAruNya mELanave dhIratana ।hOru udAttateyinda  - Mankutimma ॥ 574 ॥You must fight on with courage. Not by stubbornness. You must not fight just to continue a rivalry. There must be a higher calling. When you can find both detachment and compassion, then courage emerges. Fight showing off such a magnanimous courage.  - Mankutimma
translation: You must fight on with courage. Not by stubbornness. You must not fight just to continue a rivalry. There must be a higher calling. When you can find both detachment and compassion, then courage emerges. Fight showing off such a magnanimous courage.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹೋರುದಾತ್ತತೆಯಿಂದ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hOru dhIrateyinda, monDutanadim bEDa ।vaira hagetana bEDa, hiri niyamavirali ॥vairAgya kAruNya mELanave dhIratana ।hOru udAttateyinda  - Mankutimma ॥ 574 ॥
kagga: ಹೋರು ಧೀರತೆಯಿಂದ, ಮೊಂಡುತನದಿಂ ಬೇಡ ।ವೈರ ಹಗೆತನ ಬೇಡ, ಹಿರಿ ನಿಯಮವಿರಲಿ ॥ವೈರಾಗ್ಯ ಕಾರುಣ್ಯ ಮೇಳನವೆ ಧೀರತನ ।ಹೋರುದಾತ್ತತೆಯಿಂದ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೪ ॥

content: ಕಕ್ಷಿಗಾರನವೊಲೇ ಪೋರುತ್ತೆ ನ್ಯಾಯಕ್ಕೆ ।ಸಾಕ್ಷಿವೊಲಿರು ಕಡೆಗೆ ತೀರ್ಪಾಗುವಂದು ॥ಭಿಕ್ಷುವೊಲು ಕಾಲ ಸವೆಯಿಸಿ ಲೋಕಯಾತ್ರೆಯಲಿ ।ಪಕ್ಷಿವೊಲು ಮನದೊಳಿರು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೫ ॥ kakShigArana volE pOrutte nyAyakke ।sAkShiyavol iru kaDege tIrpAguvandu ॥bhikShuvolu kAla saveyisi lOkayAtreyali ।pakShivolu manadoLiru  - Mankutimma ॥ 575 ॥Every plaintiff approaches the court thinking he has a iron-clad case. On the day of the judgment, the best way to deal is to be like a witness  - not bothering which party wins. A witness; job ends once he has told the complete truth under oath in the stands. One must accept the court;s decision as it comes. He must lead the rest of the life like a bikshu (mendicant) who does not grieve/rejoice on previous events. In mind one must be as free as a bird  - not remembering too many things to worry about.  - Mankutimma
translation: Every plaintiff approaches the court thinking he has a iron-clad case. On the day of the judgment, the best way to deal is to be like a witness  - not bothering which party wins. A witness; job ends once he has told the complete truth under oath in the stands. One must accept the court;s decision as it comes. He must lead the rest of the life like a bikshu (mendicant) who does not grieve/rejoice on previous events. In mind one must be as free as a bird  - not remembering too many things to worry about.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪಕ್ಷಿವೊಲು ಮನದೊಳಿರು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kakShigArana volE pOrutte nyAyakke ।sAkShiyavol iru kaDege tIrpAguvandu ॥bhikShuvolu kAla saveyisi lOkayAtreyali ।pakShivolu manadoLiru  - Mankutimma ॥ 575 ॥
kagga: ಕಕ್ಷಿಗಾರನವೊಲೇ ಪೋರುತ್ತೆ ನ್ಯಾಯಕ್ಕೆ ।ಸಾಕ್ಷಿವೊಲಿರು ಕಡೆಗೆ ತೀರ್ಪಾಗುವಂದು ॥ಭಿಕ್ಷುವೊಲು ಕಾಲ ಸವೆಯಿಸಿ ಲೋಕಯಾತ್ರೆಯಲಿ ।ಪಕ್ಷಿವೊಲು ಮನದೊಳಿರು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೫ ॥

content: ತನ್ನ ಶಕ್ತಿಯನಳೆದು, ತನ್ನ ಗುಣಗಳ ಬಗೆದು ।ಸನ್ನಿವೇಶದ ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮವರಿತು, ಧೃತಿದಳೆದು ॥ತನ್ನ ಕರ್ತವ್ಯಪರಿಧಿಯ ಮೀರದುಜ್ಜುಗಿಸೆ ।ಪುಣ್ಯಶಾಲಿಯ ಪಾಡು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೬ ॥ tanna shaktiyanaLedu, tanna guNagaLa bagedu ।sannivEshada sUkShmavaritu, dhRutidaLedu ॥tanna kartavyaparidhiya mIrade ujjugise ।puNyashAliya pADu  - Mankutimma ॥ 576 ॥Fortunate is a person who can do all these  - know his strength, do critical introspection of his qualities, understand the subtleties of the situation, exhibit courage, act with in the perimeter of his powers (and duty) and still get the work done.  - Mankutimma
translation: Fortunate is a person who can do all these  - know his strength, do critical introspection of his qualities, understand the subtleties of the situation, exhibit courage, act with in the perimeter of his powers (and duty) and still get the work done.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪುಣ್ಯಶಾಲಿಯ ಪಾಡು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tanna shaktiyanaLedu, tanna guNagaLa bagedu ।sannivEshada sUkShmavaritu, dhRutidaLedu ॥tanna kartavyaparidhiya mIrade ujjugise ।puNyashAliya pADu  - Mankutimma ॥ 576 ॥
kagga: ತನ್ನ ಶಕ್ತಿಯನಳೆದು, ತನ್ನ ಗುಣಗಳ ಬಗೆದು ।ಸನ್ನಿವೇಶದ ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮವರಿತು, ಧೃತಿದಳೆದು ॥ತನ್ನ ಕರ್ತವ್ಯಪರಿಧಿಯ ಮೀರದುಜ್ಜುಗಿಸೆ ।ಪುಣ್ಯಶಾಲಿಯ ಪಾಡು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೬ ॥

content: ಕಿಡಿ ಸಣ್ಣದನು ಮೇಲೆಬಿದ್ದ ಕೊರಡಾರಿಪುದು ।ಸುಡುವುದಾ ಕಿಡಿಯುರಿಯೆ ನೂರು ಕೊರಡುಗಳ ॥ಉಡುಗಿ ನಿನ್ನಾತ್ಮವಿರೆ ಬಿಡು ಹೆಗ್ಗಲಸಗಳನು ।ತೊಡಗಾತ್ಮ ಬಲಿತಂದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೭ ॥ kiDi saNNadanu mElebidda koraDAripudu ।suDuvudA kiDiyuriye nUru koraDugaLa ॥uDugi ninnAtmavire biDu heggelasagaLanu ।toDagAtma balitandu  - Mankutimma ॥ 577 ॥When a log falls over a spark, it kills the spark. But if the same spark grows into a fire, it consumes hundreds of such logs. The spark has the potential to grow big. When such talent is still nascent in you, you should not undertake huge tasks. You should wait until the talent in you ripens and gets stronger before you take on a mighty opponent.  - Mankutimma
translation: When a log falls over a spark, it kills the spark. But if the same spark grows into a fire, it consumes hundreds of such logs. The spark has the potential to grow big. When such talent is still nascent in you, you should not undertake huge tasks. You should wait until the talent in you ripens and gets stronger before you take on a mighty opponent.  - Mankutimma
title: ತೊಡಗಾತ್ಮ ಬಲಿತಂದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kiDi saNNadanu mElebidda koraDAripudu ।suDuvudA kiDiyuriye nUru koraDugaLa ॥uDugi ninnAtmavire biDu heggelasagaLanu ।toDagAtma balitandu  - Mankutimma ॥ 577 ॥
kagga: ಕಿಡಿ ಸಣ್ಣದನು ಮೇಲೆಬಿದ್ದ ಕೊರಡಾರಿಪುದು ।ಸುಡುವುದಾ ಕಿಡಿಯುರಿಯೆ ನೂರು ಕೊರಡುಗಳ ॥ಉಡುಗಿ ನಿನ್ನಾತ್ಮವಿರೆ ಬಿಡು ಹೆಗ್ಗಲಸಗಳನು ।ತೊಡಗಾತ್ಮ ಬಲಿತಂದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೭ ॥

content: ಬೆಟ್ಟಕ್ಕೆ ಸನ್ನೆಹಾಕಿರುವ ಮಹದಾಶಿಗನೆ ।ಗಟ್ಟಿಯೇ? ಸೊಟ್ಟಾಗದೇ ಸನ್ನೆಗೋಲು? ॥ರಟ್ಟೆಯೇ ಮುರಿದೀತು ಮೈಮರೆತ ಸಾಹಸದಿ ।ಎಷ್ಟುಚಿತವೋ ನೋಡು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೮ ॥ beTTakke sannehAkiruva mahadAshigane ।gaTTiyE? soTTAgadE sannegOlu ॥raTTeyE muridItu maimareta sAhasadi ।eSTu uchitavO nODu  - Mankutimma ॥ 578 ॥Those who are aiming to move the mountain, please listen up. Is it achievable? Will the rod (to be used with the fulcrum) itself not get bent? If not, you may break your arm while being immersed in your efforts. Please take a break and think what you are aiming for is just.   - Mankutimma
translation: Those who are aiming to move the mountain, please listen up. Is it achievable? Will the rod (to be used with the fulcrum) itself not get bent? If not, you may break your arm while being immersed in your efforts. Please take a break and think what you are aiming for is just.   - Mankutimma
title: ಎಷ್ಟುಚಿತವೋ ನೋಡು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: beTTakke sannehAkiruva mahadAshigane ।gaTTiyE? soTTAgadE sannegOlu ॥raTTeyE muridItu maimareta sAhasadi ।eSTu uchitavO nODu  - Mankutimma ॥ 578 ॥

content: ಬೆನ್ನಿನಗಲವನಳೆದು ಹೊರಗೆ ನೀನದನೊಡ್ಡು ।ತನ್ನದೆನುವುದನು ವಿಧಿ ತಾನೆ ಕೊಳಲಿ ಬಿಡು ॥ಬನ್ನ ನಿನಗೊದಗಲದನಾತ್ಮ ಶಿಕ್ಷಣವೆನ್ನು ।ಮಾನ್ಯದೊಪ್ಪಂದವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭೯ ॥ bennina agalavanu aLedu horage nInadanoDDu ।tannadenuvudanu vidhi tAne koLali biDu ॥banna ninagodagalu adanu Atma shikShaNavennu ।mAnyada oppandavidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 579 ॥You must know your strengths (the size of your back) and endure the weight that fate puts on it. You must leave it to providence to remove some of your burden or put more. If you falter while carrying the weight around, then treat each one as a learning for the soul. It is a fair deal.  - Mankutimma
translation: You must know your strengths (the size of your back) and endure the weight that fate puts on it. You must leave it to providence to remove some of your burden or put more. If you falter while carrying the weight around, then treat each one as a learning for the soul. It is a fair deal.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಾನ್ಯದೊಪ್ಪಂದವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bennina agalavanu aLedu horage nInadanoDDu ।tannadenuvudanu vidhi tAne koLali biDu ॥banna ninagodagalu adanu Atma shikShaNavennu ।mAnyada oppandavidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 579 ॥

content: ದೊರೆಯ ವೇಷವ ಧರಿಸಿ ಮರೆಯುವೆಯ ಮೀಸೆಯನು? ।ತಿರುಕಹಾರುವನಾಗಿ ಮೀಸೆ ತಿರಿಚುವೆಯ? ॥ಇರುವುದವನವನಿಗವನವನ ತಾಣದ ಧರ್ಮ ।ಅರಿವೆ ಋತುಗತಿಯಂತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೦ ॥ doreya vEShava dharisi mareyuveya mIseyanu? ।tiruka hAruvanu Agi mIse tirichuveya? ॥iruvudu avanavanige avanavana tANada dharma ।arive Rutugatiyante  - Mankutimma ॥ 580 ॥One can not wear the costumes of a king and forget the manly moustache. One can not also flaunt a moustache when he is playing the part of a beggar or a brahmin. Everybody in this world has a role to play. We have to act according to our role as actors in a play. Just like we change clothes based on seasons, we should change based on our roles.  - Mankutimma
translation: One can not wear the costumes of a king and forget the manly moustache. One can not also flaunt a moustache when he is playing the part of a beggar or a brahmin. Everybody in this world has a role to play. We have to act according to our role as actors in a play. Just like we change clothes based on seasons, we should change based on our roles.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅರಿವೆ ಋತುಗತಿಯಂತೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: doreya vEShava dharisi mareyuveya mIseyanu? ।tiruka hAruvanu Agi mIse tirichuveya? ॥iruvudu avanavanige avanavana tANada dharma ।arive Rutugatiyante  - Mankutimma ॥ 580 ॥

content: ದೇವರದಿದೆಲ್ಲ  ದೇವರಿಗೆಲ್ಲವೆಂದೊರಲು-।ತಾವುದನುಮವನ ನಿರ್ಣಯಕೆ ಬಿಡದೆಯೆ ತಾಂ ॥ದಾವನ್ತ ಬಡುತ ತನ್ನಿಚ್ಛೆಯನೆ ಘೋಷಿಸುವ ।ಭಾವವೆಂತಹ ಭಕುತಿ?   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೧ ॥ dEvaradidella dEvarige ella endu oraluta।Avudanum avana nirNayake biDadeye tAM ॥dAvanta baDuta tanna icCheyane ghOShisuva ।bhAvaventaha bhakuti?  - Mankutimma ॥ 581 ॥What kind of devotion is this? You say everything belongs to God. All things exist only for Him. Yes, you don;t want to leave any matter entirely up to Him. You get restless when ever His decision is even slightly different than yours.  - Mankutimma
translation: What kind of devotion is this? You say everything belongs to God. All things exist only for Him. Yes, you don;t want to leave any matter entirely up to Him. You get restless when ever His decision is even slightly different than yours.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭಾವವೆಂತಹ ಭಕುತಿ?   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dEvaradidella dEvarige ella endu oraluta।Avudanum avana nirNayake biDadeye tAM ॥dAvanta baDuta tanna icCheyane ghOShisuva ।bhAvaventaha bhakuti?  - Mankutimma ॥ 581 ॥
kagga: ದೇವರದಿದೆಲ್ಲ  ದೇವರಿಗೆಲ್ಲವೆಂದೊರಲು-।ತಾವುದನುಮವನ ನಿರ್ಣಯಕೆ ಬಿಡದೆಯೆ ತಾಂ ॥ದಾವನ್ತ ಬಡುತ ತನ್ನಿಚ್ಛೆಯನೆ ಘೋಷಿಸುವ ।ಭಾವವೆಂತಹ ಭಕುತಿ?   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೧ ॥

content: ಸರಿಯಾಗಲಿಲ್ಲವದು ಸರಿಯಿದಲ್ಲವೆನುತ್ತ ।ಹರಡಿಕೊಳಬೇಡ ಮುಳ್ಳನು ಹಾಸಿಗೆಯಲಿ ॥ಕೊರೆಯಾದೊಡೇನೊಂದು?  ನೆರೆದೊಡೇನಿನ್ನೊಂದು?।ಒರಟು ಕೆಲಸವೊ ಬದುಕು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೨ ॥ sariyAgalillavadu sariyidallavenutta ।haraDikoLabEDa muLLanu hAsigeyali ॥kore AdoDe En ondu? neredoDEn innondu? ।oraTu kelasavo baduku  - Mankutimma ॥ 582 ॥If you keep cribbing  - this is not right, that is not right; it is same as spreading a layer of thorns on your bed. Can you sleep peacefully? What is wrong is something in this world is slightly crooked? Or something is bigger than its ideal size? Life is a giant approximation. Just get used to it.  - Mankutimma
translation: If you keep cribbing  - this is not right, that is not right; it is same as spreading a layer of thorns on your bed. Can you sleep peacefully? What is wrong is something in this world is slightly crooked? Or something is bigger than its ideal size? Life is a giant approximation. Just get used to it.  - Mankutimma
title: ಒರಟು ಕೆಲಸವೊ ಬದುಕು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sariyAgalillavadu sariyidallavenutta ।haraDikoLabEDa muLLanu hAsigeyali ॥kore AdoDe En ondu? neredoDEn innondu? ।oraTu kelasavo baduku  - Mankutimma ॥ 582 ॥
kagga: ಸರಿಯಾಗಲಿಲ್ಲವದು ಸರಿಯಿದಲ್ಲವೆನುತ್ತ ।ಹರಡಿಕೊಳಬೇಡ ಮುಳ್ಳನು ಹಾಸಿಗೆಯಲಿ ॥ಕೊರೆಯಾದೊಡೇನೊಂದು?  ನೆರೆದೊಡೇನಿನ್ನೊಂದು?।ಒರಟು ಕೆಲಸವೊ ಬದುಕು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೨ ॥

content: ಅಷ್ಟದಿಗ್ಗಜವೆ ನೀನ್? ಆದಿಶೇಷನೆ ನೀನು?।ಕಷ್ಟಭಾರವಿದೆಂದು ನಿಟ್ಟುಸಿರ ಬಿಡುವೆ! ॥ನಿಷ್ಠುರದ ನಿನ್ನ ಕನಿಕರ ಜಗಕೆ ಬೇಕಿಲ್ಲ ।ಎಷ್ಟಾದರಷ್ಟೆ ಸರಿ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೩ ॥ aShTadiggajeve nIn? AdishEShane nInu? ।kaShTabhAravu idendu niTTusira biDuve! ॥niShTurada ninna kanikara jagake bEkilla ।eShTAdare aShTe sari  - Mankutimma ॥ 583 ॥Are you one of the Gods that is in charge of an expanse of the universe (one of eight directions)? Are you the Adi Shesha who is holding up the universe on his shoulders? Then why are you complaining that your load is too much? No one in this world needs to hear you and feel pity. Everyone has their own burden to bear. What ever order is present in this world is just fine.  - Mankutimma
translation: Are you one of the Gods that is in charge of an expanse of the universe (one of eight directions)? Are you the Adi Shesha who is holding up the universe on his shoulders? Then why are you complaining that your load is too much? No one in this world needs to hear you and feel pity. Everyone has their own burden to bear. What ever order is present in this world is just fine.  - Mankutimma
title: ಎಷ್ಟಾದರಷ್ಟೆ ಸರಿ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aShTadiggajeve nIn? AdishEShane nInu? ।kaShTabhAravu idendu niTTusira biDuve! ॥niShTurada ninna kanikara jagake bEkilla ।eShTAdare aShTe sari  - Mankutimma ॥ 583 ॥
kagga: ಅಷ್ಟದಿಗ್ಗಜವೆ ನೀನ್? ಆದಿಶೇಷನೆ ನೀನು?।ಕಷ್ಟಭಾರವಿದೆಂದು ನಿಟ್ಟುಸಿರ ಬಿಡುವೆ! ॥ನಿಷ್ಠುರದ ನಿನ್ನ ಕನಿಕರ ಜಗಕೆ ಬೇಕಿಲ್ಲ ।ಎಷ್ಟಾದರಷ್ಟೆ ಸರಿ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೩ ॥

content: ಎಲ್ಲಕಂ ನಿನಗಿಲ್ಲ ಕರ್ತವ್ಯದಧಿಕಾರ ।ಇಲ್ಲದೆಯುಮಿಲ್ಲ ನಿನಗಾ ಹೊರೆಯ ಪಾಲು ॥ಸಲ್ಲಿಸಾದನಿತ, ಮಿಕ್ಕುದು ಪಾಲಿಗನ ಪಾಡು।ಒಲ್ಲನವನ್ ಅರೆನಚ್ಚ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೪ ॥ ellakam ninagilla kartavyada adhikAra ।illadeyum illa ninagA horeya pAlu ॥sallisu Adanita, mikkudu pAligana pADu ।ollan avan arenachcha  - Mankutimma ॥ 584 ॥The creator has not given you the responsibility to run the entire world. He has however given you your set of duties. There is no escaping from that. Perform as many duties as possible and let the rest to be dealt by Him. He will not like a person who believes in Him partially (conditionally).  - Mankutimma
translation: The creator has not given you the responsibility to run the entire world. He has however given you your set of duties. There is no escaping from that. Perform as many duties as possible and let the rest to be dealt by Him. He will not like a person who believes in Him partially (conditionally).  - Mankutimma
title: ಒಲ್ಲನವನ್ ಅರೆನಚ್ಚ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ellakam ninagilla kartavyada adhikAra ।illadeyum illa ninagA horeya pAlu ॥sallisu Adanita, mikkudu pAligana pADu ।ollan avan arenachcha  - Mankutimma ॥ 584 ॥
kagga: ಎಲ್ಲಕಂ ನಿನಗಿಲ್ಲ ಕರ್ತವ್ಯದಧಿಕಾರ ।ಇಲ್ಲದೆಯುಮಿಲ್ಲ ನಿನಗಾ ಹೊರೆಯ ಪಾಲು ॥ಸಲ್ಲಿಸಾದನಿತ, ಮಿಕ್ಕುದು ಪಾಲಿಗನ ಪಾಡು।ಒಲ್ಲನವನ್ ಅರೆನಚ್ಚ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೪ ॥

content: ಫಲವೇನು ಹೆಣಗಾಡಿ ಹೋರಾಡಿ ಧರೆಯೊಳಗೆ? ।ಸಲಿಸದೊಂದನುಮೊಂದನುಂ ದೈವ ಬಿಡದು ॥ಹೊಲಸೆಲ್ಲವೆಲ್ಲ ಪಾಳ್, ಬಾಳ್ಗೆ ತಳಹದಿಯಿಲ್ಲ ।ಗಲಿಬಿಲಿಯಿದೆನಬೇಡ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೫ ॥ phalavEnu heNagADi hOrADi dhareyoLage? ।salisadu ondanum ondanum daiva biDadu ॥holasellavu ellavu pAL, bALge taLahadi illa ।galibiliyidu enabEDa  - Mankutimma ॥ 585 ॥Don;t entertain such thoughts. What is the use of struggling so much? Why should I fight so much in this world? Any way providence is not going to make it easier for me. Neither will it let go of anything I owe. The whole world is bad. There is a no solid foundation on which life is built (to rely on). The whole thing is nothing but colossal confusion.  - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t entertain such thoughts. What is the use of struggling so much? Why should I fight so much in this world? Any way providence is not going to make it easier for me. Neither will it let go of anything I owe. The whole world is bad. There is a no solid foundation on which life is built (to rely on). The whole thing is nothing but colossal confusion.  - Mankutimma
title: ಗಲಿಬಿಲಿಯಿದೆನಬೇಡ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: phalavEnu heNagADi hOrADi dhareyoLage? ।salisadu ondanum ondanum daiva biDadu ॥holasellavu ellavu pAL, bALge taLahadi illa ।galibiliyidu enabEDa  - Mankutimma ॥ 585 ॥
kagga: ಫಲವೇನು ಹೆಣಗಾಡಿ ಹೋರಾಡಿ ಧರೆಯೊಳಗೆ? ।ಸಲಿಸದೊಂದನುಮೊಂದನುಂ ದೈವ ಬಿಡದು ॥ಹೊಲಸೆಲ್ಲವೆಲ್ಲ ಪಾಳ್, ಬಾಳ್ಗೆ ತಳಹದಿಯಿಲ್ಲ ।ಗಲಿಬಿಲಿಯಿದೆನಬೇಡ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೫ ॥

content: ಕೆಂಡಮುಸುಡಿಯ ದೈವವೆಲ್ಲವನು ದಹಿಸುತಿರೆ ।ದಂಡಧರನತ್ತಲ್ಲೆಲ್ಲವನು ಕೆಡಹುತಿರೆ ॥ಮೊಂಡುಘಾಸಿಯ ಲಾಭ ಪಿಂಡಮಾತ್ರವು ತಾನೆ? ।ಭಂಡಬಾಳಲೆ ನಮದು?   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೬ ॥ kenda musuDiya daivavu ellavanu dahisutire ।danDadharanu ettalu ellavanu keDahutire ॥monDughAsiya lAbha pinDamAtravu tAne? ।bhanDa bALale namadu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 586 ॥The red faced fate is burning down everything (I do). Death is destroying every thing everywhere. Situation being so, the only result of all our struggle is just the the one handful of food. Right? This life is so hollow and has no greater meaning.  - Mankutimma
translation: The red faced fate is burning down everything (I do). Death is destroying every thing everywhere. Situation being so, the only result of all our struggle is just the the one handful of food. Right? This life is so hollow and has no greater meaning.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭಂಡಬಾಳಲೆ ನಮದು?   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kenda musuDiya daivavu ellavanu dahisutire ।danDadharanu ettalu ellavanu keDahutire ॥monDughAsiya lAbha pinDamAtravu tAne? ।bhanDa bALale namadu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 586 ॥
kagga: ಕೆಂಡಮುಸುಡಿಯ ದೈವವೆಲ್ಲವನು ದಹಿಸುತಿರೆ ।ದಂಡಧರನತ್ತಲ್ಲೆಲ್ಲವನು ಕೆಡಹುತಿರೆ ॥ಮೊಂಡುಘಾಸಿಯ ಲಾಭ ಪಿಂಡಮಾತ್ರವು ತಾನೆ? ।ಭಂಡಬಾಳಲೆ ನಮದು?   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೬ ॥

content: ಅಹುದು ಬಾಳ್ ಭಂಡತನವಿಹದಿ ಬಾಳ್ ಮುಗಿಯುವೊಡೆ ।ಕಹಿಯೊಗರು ಕಾಯಿ, ಮಿಡಿತನದೊಳದು ಮುಗಿಯೆ ॥ಸಿಹಿಯಹುದು ಕಾಯಿ ಹಣ್ಣಾಗೆ, ಜೀವಿತವಂತು ।ಮಹಿಮೆಗೊಳುವುದು ಮಾಗೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೭ ॥ ahudu bAL bhandatanavu ihadi bAL mugiyuvoDe ।kahiya ogaru kAyi, miDitanadoLadu mugiye ॥sihiyahudu kAyi haNNAge, jIvitavantu ।mahimegoLuvudu mAge  - Mankutimma ॥ 587 ॥Yes, life is meaningless for any one if it ends abruptly right now. A fruit has a bitter taste if its life ended when it was still very young. But as it ripens it sweetens. Our lives are very similar. They get a greater meaning as we get old (and ripe with wisdom).  - Mankutimma
translation: Yes, life is meaningless for any one if it ends abruptly right now. A fruit has a bitter taste if its life ended when it was still very young. But as it ripens it sweetens. Our lives are very similar. They get a greater meaning as we get old (and ripe with wisdom).  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಹಿಮೆಗೊಳುವುದು ಮಾಗೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ahudu bAL bhandatanavu ihadi bAL mugiyuvoDe ।kahiya ogaru kAyi, miDitanadoLadu mugiye ॥sihiyahudu kAyi haNNAge, jIvitavantu ।mahimegoLuvudu mAge  - Mankutimma ॥ 587 ॥
kagga: ಅಹುದು ಬಾಳ್ ಭಂಡತನವಿಹದಿ ಬಾಳ್ ಮುಗಿಯುವೊಡೆ ।ಕಹಿಯೊಗರು ಕಾಯಿ, ಮಿಡಿತನದೊಳದು ಮುಗಿಯೆ ॥ಸಿಹಿಯಹುದು ಕಾಯಿ ಹಣ್ಣಾಗೆ, ಜೀವಿತವಂತು ।ಮಹಿಮೆಗೊಳುವುದು ಮಾಗೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೭ ॥

content: ಜಟ್ಟಿ ಕಾಳಗದಿ ಗೆಲ್ಲದೊಡೆ ಗರಡಿಯ ಸಾಮು ।ಪಟ್ಟುವರಸೆಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ವಿಫಲವೆನ್ನುವೆಯೇಂ? ॥ಮುಟ್ಟಿ ನೋಡವನ ಮೈಕಟ್ಟು ಕಬ್ಬಿಣ ಗಟ್ಟಿ  ।ಗಟ್ಟಿತನ ಗರಡಿ ಫಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೮ ॥ jaTTi kALagadi gelladoDe garaDiya sAmu ।paTTuvarasegaLella viphalavennuveyEm? ॥muTTI nODavana maikaTTu  kabbiNa gaTTi ।gaTTitana garaDi phala  - Mankutimma ॥ 588 ॥If a wrestler loses a fight can you say that all his practice (of body building and wrestling moves) in the gym are waste? Touch his body and see. It is hard as iron. That physique is what the gym made of him  - and is worth all the effort.   - Mankutimma
translation: If a wrestler loses a fight can you say that all his practice (of body building and wrestling moves) in the gym are waste? Touch his body and see. It is hard as iron. That physique is what the gym made of him  - and is worth all the effort.   - Mankutimma
title: ಗಟ್ಟಿತನ ಗರಡಿ ಫಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jaTTi kALagadi gelladoDe garaDiya sAmu ।paTTuvarasegaLella viphalavennuveyEm? ॥muTTI nODavana maikaTTu  kabbiNa gaTTi ।gaTTitana garaDi phala  - Mankutimma ॥ 588 ॥
kagga: ಜಟ್ಟಿ ಕಾಳಗದಿ ಗೆಲ್ಲದೊಡೆ ಗರಡಿಯ ಸಾಮು ।ಪಟ್ಟುವರಸೆಗಳೆಲ್ಲ ವಿಫಲವೆನ್ನುವೆಯೇಂ? ॥ಮುಟ್ಟಿ ನೋಡವನ ಮೈಕಟ್ಟು ಕಬ್ಬಿಣ ಗಟ್ಟಿ  ।ಗಟ್ಟಿತನ ಗರಡಿ ಫಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೮ ॥

content: ಪರಿ ಪರಿ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಗಳು, ಪರಿಭವದ ಶಿಕ್ಷೆಗಳು ।ಗರಡಿಯ ವ್ಯಾಯಾಮ ಮನಬುದ್ಧಿಗಳಿಗೆ ॥ಪುರುಷತೆಗೆ ಪೆಟ್ಟುಗಳಿನಾದ ಗಂತಿಯೆ ವಿಜಯ ।ಬಿರಿದ ನನೆ ಫಲಕೆ ಮನೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೯ ॥ pari pari parIkShegaLu, paribhavada shikShegaLu ।garaDiya vyAyAma manabuddhigaLige ॥puruShatege peTTugaLinAda gantiye vijaya ।birida nane phalake mane  - Mankutimma ॥ 589 ॥Life puts you through a series of exams. It makes you suffer defeat many times. These are to be taken as exercises of mind and intellect. The wounds on the mind and body should be considered as scars of victory. Only when a flower wilts, the fruit makes it its home. For good things to happen, we will have go through rough times.  - Mankutimma
translation: Life puts you through a series of exams. It makes you suffer defeat many times. These are to be taken as exercises of mind and intellect. The wounds on the mind and body should be considered as scars of victory. Only when a flower wilts, the fruit makes it its home. For good things to happen, we will have go through rough times.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಿರಿದ ನನೆ ಫಲಕೆ ಮನೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: pari pari parIkShegaLu, paribhavada shikShegaLu ।garaDiya vyAyAma manabuddhigaLige ॥puruShatege peTTugaLinAda gantiye vijaya ।birida nane phalake mane  - Mankutimma ॥ 589 ॥
kagga: ಪರಿ ಪರಿ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಗಳು, ಪರಿಭವದ ಶಿಕ್ಷೆಗಳು ।ಗರಡಿಯ ವ್ಯಾಯಾಮ ಮನಬುದ್ಧಿಗಳಿಗೆ ॥ಪುರುಷತೆಗೆ ಪೆಟ್ಟುಗಳಿನಾದ ಗಂತಿಯೆ ವಿಜಯ ।ಬಿರಿದ ನನೆ ಫಲಕೆ ಮನೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮೯ ॥

content: ಪುರುಷನ ಸ್ವಾತಂತ್ರ್ಯವವನ ತೋಳ್ಗಿರುವಷ್ಟು  ।ಪರಿಧಿಯೊಂದರೊಳದರ ಯತ್ನ ಕಡೆಯುಂಟು ॥ತಿರುಗುವುದು ಮಡಿಸುವುದು ನಿಗುರುವುದು ನೀಳುವುದು ।ತೊರೆದು ಹಾರದು ತೋಳು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೦ ॥ puruShana svAtantryavu avana tOLge iruvaShTu ।paridhiyondaroLu adara yatna kaDeyunTu ॥tiruguvudu madisuvudu niguruvudu nILuvudu ।toredu hAtradu tOLu  - Mankutimma ॥ 590 ॥A man is as independent of this world as his hands are independent of him. They  have a perimeter beyond which they can not reach. With in the limits, they can turn, fold, extend or spring up. But, they cannot leave the body and fly.  - Mankutimma
translation: A man is as independent of this world as his hands are independent of him. They  have a perimeter beyond which they can not reach. With in the limits, they can turn, fold, extend or spring up. But, they cannot leave the body and fly.  - Mankutimma
title: ತೊರೆದು ಹಾರದು ತೋಳು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: puruShana svAtantryavu avana tOLge iruvaShTu ।paridhiyondaroLu adara yatna kaDeyunTu ॥tiruguvudu madisuvudu niguruvudu nILuvudu ।toredu hAtradu tOLu  - Mankutimma ॥ 590 ॥
kagga: ಪುರುಷನ ಸ್ವಾತಂತ್ರ್ಯವವನ ತೋಳ್ಗಿರುವಷ್ಟು  ।ಪರಿಧಿಯೊಂದರೊಳದರ ಯತ್ನ ಕಡೆಯುಂಟು ॥ತಿರುಗುವುದು ಮಡಿಸುವುದು ನಿಗುರುವುದು ನೀಳುವುದು ।ತೊರೆದು ಹಾರದು ತೋಳು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೦ ॥

content: ಬದುಕು ಕದನದ ತೆರನೆ; ನೋಡೆ ಲೀಲೆ ಕದನ ।ಮೊದಲುಮುಗಿವುಗಳಿರದ ಚಿತ್ರಲೀಲೆಯದು ॥ಇದರೊಳೆಂದಿಗುಮಿರದು ಸೋಲ್ಗೆಲುವು ಕಡೆಯೆಣಿಕೆ ।ಸದರದಾಟವೆ ಮುಖ್ಯ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೧ ॥ baduku kadanada terane; nODe lIle kadana ।modalu mugivigaLu irada chitra lIleyadu ॥idaroLu endigum iradu sOl geluvu kaDeyeNike ।sadaradATave mukhya  - Mankutimma ॥ 591 ॥Life is like a battle. If you have the right perspective, it is a fun game. There is no beginning or an end to this game; just beautiful scenes. There is no result or final tally  - hence no winners or losers. Having fun while playing is the only important thing.  - Mankutimma
translation: Life is like a battle. If you have the right perspective, it is a fun game. There is no beginning or an end to this game; just beautiful scenes. There is no result or final tally  - hence no winners or losers. Having fun while playing is the only important thing.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸದರದಾಟವೆ ಮುಖ್ಯ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: baduku kadanada terane; nODe lIle kadana ।modalu mugivigaLu irada chitra lIleyadu ॥idaroLu endigum iradu sOl geluvu kaDeyeNike ।sadaradATave mukhya  - Mankutimma ॥ 591 ॥
kagga: ಬದುಕು ಕದನದ ತೆರನೆ; ನೋಡೆ ಲೀಲೆ ಕದನ ।ಮೊದಲುಮುಗಿವುಗಳಿರದ ಚಿತ್ರಲೀಲೆಯದು ॥ಇದರೊಳೆಂದಿಗುಮಿರದು ಸೋಲ್ಗೆಲುವು ಕಡೆಯೆಣಿಕೆ ।ಸದರದಾಟವೆ ಮುಖ್ಯ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೧ ॥

content: ನರಜೀವನದ ರಣದಿ ವಿಧಿಯ ಬಲವೊಂದು ಕಡೆ ।ಚಿರವಿವೇಕದಿ ಬೆಳೆದ ನಲುಮೆಯೊಂದು ಕಡೆ ॥ಉರುಬುತಿರೆ ಪುರುಷಂಗೆ ನಲುಮೆಯುಳಿತವೆ ಗೆಲವು।ಪುರುಷತನವೇ ವಿಜಯ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೨ ॥ nara jIvanada raNadi vidhiya balavondu kaDe ।chiravivEkadi beLeda nalumeyondu kaDe ॥urubutire puruShange nalumeya uLitave gelavu ।puruShatanavE vijaya  - Mankutimma ॥ 592 ॥In the battle of human life (everyone;s life) Fate is on one side. The wisdom, love and affection acquired over the lifetime is on the other side. When you are going about progressing in life, retaining the love towards others is itself a pleasure. Showing off love and there by being human is itself victory.  - Mankutimma
translation: In the battle of human life (everyone;s life) Fate is on one side. The wisdom, love and affection acquired over the lifetime is on the other side. When you are going about progressing in life, retaining the love towards others is itself a pleasure. Showing off love and there by being human is itself victory.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪುರುಷತನವೇ ವಿಜಯ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nara jIvanada raNadi vidhiya balavondu kaDe ।chiravivEkadi beLeda nalumeyondu kaDe ॥urubutire puruShange nalumeya uLitave gelavu ।puruShatanavE vijaya  - Mankutimma ॥ 592 ॥
kagga: ನರಜೀವನದ ರಣದಿ ವಿಧಿಯ ಬಲವೊಂದು ಕಡೆ ।ಚಿರವಿವೇಕದಿ ಬೆಳೆದ ನಲುಮೆಯೊಂದು ಕಡೆ ॥ಉರುಬುತಿರೆ ಪುರುಷಂಗೆ ನಲುಮೆಯುಳಿತವೆ ಗೆಲವು।ಪುರುಷತನವೇ ವಿಜಯ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೨ ॥

content: ಸತ್ತೆನೆಂದೆನಬೇಡ; ಸೋತೆನೆಂದೆನಬೇಡ ।ಬತ್ತಿತೆನ್ನೊಳು ಸತ್ತ್ವದೂಟೆಯೆನಬೇಡ ॥ಮೃತ್ಯುವೆನ್ನುವುದೊಂದು ತೆರೆಯಿಳಿತ; ತೆರೆಯೇರು ।ಮತ್ತೆ ತೋರ್ಪುದು ನಾಳೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೩ ॥ sattenendu enabEDa; sOtenendu enabEDa ।battitennoLu sattvada ooteyenabEDa ॥mRutyuvennuvodondu tereyiLita; tereyEru ।matte tOrpudu nALe  - Mankutimma ॥ 593 ॥Don;t entertain such thoughts  - I am dead. I am defeated. I have no more life (strength) left in me. Death is merely a low-tide at sea. High tide will come again tomorrow. Maintain hope.  - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t entertain such thoughts  - I am dead. I am defeated. I have no more life (strength) left in me. Death is merely a low-tide at sea. High tide will come again tomorrow. Maintain hope.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮತ್ತೆ ತೋರ್ಪುದು ನಾಳೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sattenendu enabEDa; sOtenendu enabEDa ।battitennoLu sattvada ooteyenabEDa ॥mRutyuvennuvodondu tereyiLita; tereyEru ।matte tOrpudu nALe  - Mankutimma ॥ 593 ॥
kagga: ಸತ್ತೆನೆಂದೆನಬೇಡ; ಸೋತೆನೆಂದೆನಬೇಡ ।ಬತ್ತಿತೆನ್ನೊಳು ಸತ್ತ್ವದೂಟೆಯೆನಬೇಡ ॥ಮೃತ್ಯುವೆನ್ನುವುದೊಂದು ತೆರೆಯಿಳಿತ; ತೆರೆಯೇರು ।ಮತ್ತೆ ತೋರ್ಪುದು ನಾಳೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೩ ॥

content: ಬಿಡುವಿಲ್ಲದೀ ಜೀವಿತಾಪಣದ ಸರಕೆಣಿಸೆ ।ಕಡೆಯೆಂದು? ಮುಗಿಯದಿಹ ಲಾಭನಷ್ಟಗಳ ॥ಕಡತದೊಳ್ ಅದೆಂದಿನಾ ಲೆಕ್ಕವೇ ತೀರ್ಮಾನ? ।ಬಿಡು ಲಾಭದಾತುರವ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೪ ॥ biDuvillada ee jIvita ApaNada sarakeNise ।kaDeyendu? mugiyadiha lAbhanaShTagaLa ॥kaDatadoL adendinA  lekkavE tIrmAna।biDu lAbhadAturava  - Mankutimma ॥ 594 ॥Life is like a shop that runs non-stop. Our job is to keep the account books. Since it is a never ending story, how can we know if we are making profit or loss. We can only know short-term results at the end of each day  - but in the long run they may be exactly reverse. So, stop running behind short-term profits.  - Mankutimma
translation: Life is like a shop that runs non-stop. Our job is to keep the account books. Since it is a never ending story, how can we know if we are making profit or loss. We can only know short-term results at the end of each day  - but in the long run they may be exactly reverse. So, stop running behind short-term profits.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಿಡು ಲಾಭದಾತುರವ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: biDuvillada ee jIvita ApaNada sarakeNise ।kaDeyendu? mugiyadiha lAbhanaShTagaLa ॥kaDatadoL adendinA  lekkavE tIrmAna।biDu lAbhadAturava  - Mankutimma ॥ 594 ॥
kagga: ಬಿಡುವಿಲ್ಲದೀ ಜೀವಿತಾಪಣದ ಸರಕೆಣಿಸೆ ।ಕಡೆಯೆಂದು? ಮುಗಿಯದಿಹ ಲಾಭನಷ್ಟಗಳ ॥ಕಡತದೊಳ್ ಅದೆಂದಿನಾ ಲೆಕ್ಕವೇ ತೀರ್ಮಾನ? ।ಬಿಡು ಲಾಭದಾತುರವ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೪ ॥

content: ಎನಿತು ನೀಂ‌ಗೆಲಿದೆಯೆಂದೆನರು ಬಲ್ಲವರೆಂದು- ।ಮೆನಿತು ನೀಂ ಪೋರ್ದೆ ಯೆನಿತನು ಪೊತ್ತೆಯೆನುವರ್ ॥ಗಣನೆ ಸಲುವುದು ತೋರ್ದ ಪೌರುಷಕೆ, ಜಯಕೆಲ್ಲ ।ದಿನದಿನದ ಗರಡಿಯಿದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೫ ॥ enitu nIm gelideyendu anaru ballavaru endum ।enitu nIm pOrde yenitanu potte enuvar ॥gaNane saluvudu tOrda pauruShake, jayakalla ।dinadinada garaDiyidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 595 ॥Those who are wise will never ask you how many battles you won in life. They will ask how many you fought, how hard you tried, how much burden did you carry. For them, the valiant effort matters and not the victories. This world is a everyday gym.  - Mankutimma
translation: Those who are wise will never ask you how many battles you won in life. They will ask how many you fought, how hard you tried, how much burden did you carry. For them, the valiant effort matters and not the victories. This world is a everyday gym.  - Mankutimma
title: ದಿನದಿನದ ಗರಡಿಯಿದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: enitu nIm gelideyendu anaru ballavaru endum ।enitu nIm pOrde yenitanu potte enuvar ॥gaNane saluvudu tOrda pauruShake, jayakalla ।dinadinada garaDiyidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 595 ॥
kagga: ಎನಿತು ನೀಂ‌ಗೆಲಿದೆಯೆಂದೆನರು ಬಲ್ಲವರೆಂದು- ।ಮೆನಿತು ನೀಂ ಪೋರ್ದೆ ಯೆನಿತನು ಪೊತ್ತೆಯೆನುವರ್ ॥ಗಣನೆ ಸಲುವುದು ತೋರ್ದ ಪೌರುಷಕೆ, ಜಯಕೆಲ್ಲ ।ದಿನದಿನದ ಗರಡಿಯಿದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೫ ॥

content: ಗರಡಿಯ ಸಾಮಿಂದೆ ನೀನೆದುರಾಳ ಗೆಲ್ಲದೊಡೇಂ? ।ಬರದಿಹುದೆ ನಿನಗನಿತು ಕಾಯಾಂಗಪಟುತೆ? ॥ವರ ಸದ್ಯಕಿಲ್ಲದೊಡೆ ಬರಿದಾಗುವುದೆ ಪೂಜೆ? ।ಪರಿಶುದ್ಧ ಮನವೆ ವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೬ ॥ garaDiya sAminde nInu edurALa gelladoDEm? ।baradihude ninage initu kAyaanga paTute? ॥vara sadyakilladoDe baridAguvude pUje? ।parishuddha manave vara  - Mankutimma ॥ 596 ॥You are a wrestlers practising in a gym. So what if you do not defeat the opponent today? Will you not get better physique because of the fight? So what if your prayers at the temple are not answered immediately? Having a pure mind is itself a boon.  - Mankutimma
translation: You are a wrestlers practising in a gym. So what if you do not defeat the opponent today? Will you not get better physique because of the fight? So what if your prayers at the temple are not answered immediately? Having a pure mind is itself a boon.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರಿಶುದ್ಧ ಮನವೆ ವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: garaDiya sAminde nInu edurALa gelladoDEm? ।baradihude ninage initu kAyaanga paTute? ॥vara sadyakilladoDe baridAguvude pUje? ।parishuddha manave vara  - Mankutimma ॥ 596 ॥
kagga: ಗರಡಿಯ ಸಾಮಿಂದೆ ನೀನೆದುರಾಳ ಗೆಲ್ಲದೊಡೇಂ? ।ಬರದಿಹುದೆ ನಿನಗನಿತು ಕಾಯಾಂಗಪಟುತೆ? ॥ವರ ಸದ್ಯಕಿಲ್ಲದೊಡೆ ಬರಿದಾಗುವುದೆ ಪೂಜೆ? ।ಪರಿಶುದ್ಧ ಮನವೆ ವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೬ ॥

content: ಬಿತ್ತ ಮಳೆಗಳವೋಲು ಯತ್ನ ದೈವಿಕ ನಮಗೆ ।ಯುಕ್ತದೊಳಗೆರಡುಮನುವಾಗೆ ಬೆಳೆ ಹುಲುಸು ॥ಯತ್ನ ಬಿಟ್ಟರೆ ಲೋಪ, ದೈವ ತಾಂ ಬಿಡೆ ತಾಪ ।ಗೊತಿಲ್ಲ ಫಲದ ಬಗೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೭ ॥ bitta maLegaLavOlu yatna daivika namage ।yuktadoLage eraDum anuvAge beLe hulusu ॥yatna biTTare lOpa, daiva tAm biDe tApa ।gottilla phalada bage  - Mankutimma ॥ 597 ॥The quality of the crop depends on our efforts (seeds, work and other efforts) as well as providence. When both things work out, then the crop will be excellent. If efforts lack, it is our fault. If rains don;t work out then it creates anxiety  - but nothing much can be done about it. We will never know about the crop until it comes.  - Mankutimma
translation: The quality of the crop depends on our efforts (seeds, work and other efforts) as well as providence. When both things work out, then the crop will be excellent. If efforts lack, it is our fault. If rains don;t work out then it creates anxiety  - but nothing much can be done about it. We will never know about the crop until it comes.  - Mankutimma
title: ಗೊತಿಲ್ಲ ಫಲದ ಬಗೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bitta maLegaLavOlu yatna daivika namage ।yuktadoLage eraDum anuvAge beLe hulusu ॥yatna biTTare lOpa, daiva tAm biDe tApa ।gottilla phalada bage  - Mankutimma ॥ 597 ॥
kagga: ಬಿತ್ತ ಮಳೆಗಳವೋಲು ಯತ್ನ ದೈವಿಕ ನಮಗೆ ।ಯುಕ್ತದೊಳಗೆರಡುಮನುವಾಗೆ ಬೆಳೆ ಹುಲುಸು ॥ಯತ್ನ ಬಿಟ್ಟರೆ ಲೋಪ, ದೈವ ತಾಂ ಬಿಡೆ ತಾಪ ।ಗೊತಿಲ್ಲ ಫಲದ ಬಗೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೭ ॥

content: ಬದುಕು ಕದನವೆಂದಂಜಿ ಬಿಟ್ಟೋಡುವನು ।ಬಿದಿಯ ಬಾಯಿಗೆ ಕವಳವಾಗದುಳಿಯುವನೆ? ॥ಎದೆಯನುಕ್ಕಾಗಿಸುತ, ಮತಿಗದೆಯ ಪಿಡಿದು, ನೀ- ।ನೆದುರು ನಿಲೆ ಬಿದಿಯೊಲಿವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೮ ॥ baduku kadanavendanji biTToDuvanu ।bidiya bAyige kavaLa aagade uLiyuvane? ॥edeyanu ukkAgisuta, matigdeya piDidu,  ।nIneduru nile bidiyu oliva  - Mankutimma ॥ 598 ॥If one thinks that life is a tough battle and tries to run away; will he not become snacks for the providence? Make your heart as strong as iron. Hold the club of intellect and face fate head on  - it will relent and support you.  - Mankutimma
translation: If one thinks that life is a tough battle and tries to run away; will he not become snacks for the providence? Make your heart as strong as iron. Hold the club of intellect and face fate head on  - it will relent and support you.  - Mankutimma
title: ನೀನೆದುರು ನಿಲೆ ಬಿದಿಯೊಲಿವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: baduku kadanavendanji biTToDuvanu ।bidiya bAyige kavaLa aagade uLiyuvane? ॥edeyanu ukkAgisuta, matigdeya piDidu,  ।nIneduru nile bidiyu oliva  - Mankutimma ॥ 598 ॥
kagga: ಬದುಕು ಕದನವೆಂದಂಜಿ ಬಿಟ್ಟೋಡುವನು ।ಬಿದಿಯ ಬಾಯಿಗೆ ಕವಳವಾಗದುಳಿಯುವನೆ? ॥ಎದೆಯನುಕ್ಕಾಗಿಸುತ, ಮತಿಗದೆಯ ಪಿಡಿದು, ನೀ- ।ನೆದುರು ನಿಲೆ ಬಿದಿಯೊಲಿವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೮ ॥

content: ತಿರುಗಿಸಲಿ ವಿಧಿರಾಯನಿಚ್ಛೆಯಿಂ ಯಂತ್ರವನು ।ಚರಿಕೆ ತಾರಾಗ್ರಹಗಳಿಷ್ಟವೋದಂತೆ ॥ಪರಿಹಾಸದಿಂ ಕರ್ಮ ದೈವ ಕೇಕೆಗಳಿಡಲಿ ।ಸ್ಥಿರಚಿತ್ತ ನಿನಗಿರಲಿ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೯ ॥ tirugisali vidhirAyanu iccheyim yantravanu ।charike tArAgrahagaLa iShTavOdante ॥parihAsadim karma daiva kEkegaLiDali ।sthirachitta ninagirali  - Mankutimma ॥ 599 ॥Let the providence run the world machinery as it pleases. Let the planets and stars wander the way they want. Let fate keep laughing at you (your failures). You continue to march on to your goal with a steady mind.  - Mankutimma
translation: Let the providence run the world machinery as it pleases. Let the planets and stars wander the way they want. Let fate keep laughing at you (your failures). You continue to march on to your goal with a steady mind.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸ್ಥಿರಚಿತ್ತ ನಿನಗಿರಲಿ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tirugisali vidhirAyanu iccheyim yantravanu ।charike tArAgrahagaLa iShTavOdante ॥parihAsadim karma daiva kEkegaLiDali ।sthirachitta ninagirali  - Mankutimma ॥ 599 ॥
kagga: ತಿರುಗಿಸಲಿ ವಿಧಿರಾಯನಿಚ್ಛೆಯಿಂ ಯಂತ್ರವನು ।ಚರಿಕೆ ತಾರಾಗ್ರಹಗಳಿಷ್ಟವೋದಂತೆ ॥ಪರಿಹಾಸದಿಂ ಕರ್ಮ ದೈವ ಕೇಕೆಗಳಿಡಲಿ ।ಸ್ಥಿರಚಿತ್ತ ನಿನಗಿರಲಿ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯೯ ॥

content: ಬದುಕು ಜಟಕಾಬಂಡಿ, ವಿಧಿಯದರ ಸಾಹೇಬ ।ಕುದುರೆ ನೀನ್, ಅವನು ಪೇಳ್ದಂತೆ ಪಯಣಿಗರು ॥ಮದುವೆಗೋ ಮಸಣಕೋ  ಹೋಗೆಂದ ಕಡೆಗೋಡು ।ಪದ ಕುಸಿಯೆ ನೆಲವಿಹುದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೦ ॥ baduku jaTakA banDi, vidhiyu adara sAhEba ।kudure nIn, avanu pELdante payaNigaru ॥maduvegO masaNakO hOgenda kadege Odu ।pada kusiye nelavihudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 600 ॥Life is like a . Providence is the master. You are the horse. Passengers are chosen by the master. So, you will have brief company of whom He chooses for you. The ride could be to a wedding or a funeral. You are not to ask  - just run. If your legs fail, don;t worry there is ground below to support you.  - Mankutimma
translation: Life is like a . Providence is the master. You are the horse. Passengers are chosen by the master. So, you will have brief company of whom He chooses for you. The ride could be to a wedding or a funeral. You are not to ask  - just run. If your legs fail, don;t worry there is ground below to support you.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪದ ಕುಸಿಯೆ ನೆಲವಿಹುದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: baduku jaTakA banDi, vidhiyu adara sAhEba ।kudure nIn, avanu pELdante payaNigaru ॥maduvegO masaNakO hOgenda kadege Odu ।pada kusiye nelavihudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 600 ॥
kagga: ಬದುಕು ಜಟಕಾಬಂಡಿ, ವಿಧಿಯದರ ಸಾಹೇಬ ।ಕುದುರೆ ನೀನ್, ಅವನು ಪೇಳ್ದಂತೆ ಪಯಣಿಗರು ॥ಮದುವೆಗೋ ಮಸಣಕೋ  ಹೋಗೆಂದ ಕಡೆಗೋಡು ।ಪದ ಕುಸಿಯೆ ನೆಲವಿಹುದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೦ ॥

content: ಇರುವ ಕೆಲಸವ ಮಾಡು ಕಿರಿದೆನದೆ ಮನವಿಟ್ಟು ।ದೊರತುದ ಹಸಾದವೆಂದುಣ್ಣು  ಗೊಣಗಿಡದೆ ॥ಧರಿಸು ಲೋಕದ ಭರವ ಪರಮಾರ್ಥವನು ಬಿಡದೆ ।ಹೊರಡು ಕರೆ ಬರಲ್ ಅಳದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೧ ॥ iruva kelasava mADu kiridenade manaviTTu ।doratuda hasAdavenduNNu goNagiDade ॥dharisu lOkada bharava paramArthavanu biDade ।horaDu kare baral aLade  - Mankutimma ॥ 601 ॥Do your work with all your heart without feeling sorry for yourself. Do not crib and enjoy what ever your get. Endure the misery of this world without losing sight of the universal truth. When it is your turn to go, just leave without crying.  - Mankutimma
translation: Do your work with all your heart without feeling sorry for yourself. Do not crib and enjoy what ever your get. Endure the misery of this world without losing sight of the universal truth. When it is your turn to go, just leave without crying.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹೊರಡು ಕರೆ ಬರಲ್ ಅಳದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: iruva kelasava mADu kiridenade manaviTTu ।doratuda hasAdavenduNNu goNagiDade ॥dharisu lOkada bharava paramArthavanu biDade ।horaDu kare baral aLade  - Mankutimma ॥ 601 ॥
kagga: ಇರುವ ಕೆಲಸವ ಮಾಡು ಕಿರಿದೆನದೆ ಮನವಿಟ್ಟು ।ದೊರತುದ ಹಸಾದವೆಂದುಣ್ಣು  ಗೊಣಗಿಡದೆ ॥ಧರಿಸು ಲೋಕದ ಭರವ ಪರಮಾರ್ಥವನು ಬಿಡದೆ ।ಹೊರಡು ಕರೆ ಬರಲ್ ಅಳದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೧ ॥

content: ಮಾಯೆಯೆಂಬಳ ಸೃಜಿಸಿ, ತಾಯನಾಗಿಸಿ ಜಗಕೆ ।ಆಯಸಂಗೊಳುತ ಸಂಸಾರಿಯಾಗಿರುವ ॥ನಾಯಕ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮನ್ ಅನುಯಾಯಿಗಳು ನಾವೆಲ್ಲ ।ಹೇಯವದರೊಳಗೇನೊ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೨ ॥ mAyeyembaLa sRujisi, tAyanAgisi jagake ।AyAsangoLuta samsAriyAgiruva aa ॥nAyaka brahman anuyAyigaLu nAvella ।heyavadaroLage Eno  - Mankutimma ॥ 602 ॥He created the illusion (Maya) so that he could amuse himself. He made her (Maya) the mother of this world. He seems to be busy running this world. Such is the nature of the creator. He is the leader and we all follow him. What is the difficulty in accepting this fact?  - Mankutimma
translation: He created the illusion (Maya) so that he could amuse himself. He made her (Maya) the mother of this world. He seems to be busy running this world. Such is the nature of the creator. He is the leader and we all follow him. What is the difficulty in accepting this fact?  - Mankutimma
title: ಹೇಯವದರೊಳಗೇನೊ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mAyeyembaLa sRujisi, tAyanAgisi jagake ।AyAsangoLuta samsAriyAgiruva aa ॥nAyaka brahman anuyAyigaLu nAvella ।heyavadaroLage Eno  - Mankutimma ॥ 602 ॥
kagga: ಮಾಯೆಯೆಂಬಳ ಸೃಜಿಸಿ, ತಾಯನಾಗಿಸಿ ಜಗಕೆ ।ಆಯಸಂಗೊಳುತ ಸಂಸಾರಿಯಾಗಿರುವ ॥ನಾಯಕ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮನ್ ಅನುಯಾಯಿಗಳು ನಾವೆಲ್ಲ ।ಹೇಯವದರೊಳಗೇನೊ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೨ ॥

content: ಧರಣಿಗೋಳವು ಮೂಸೆ; ಜೀವಗಳನದರೊಳಗೆ ।ಪರಿಶುದ್ಧಿಗೊಳಿಸುವುದು ಸಂಸಾರತಾಪ ॥ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ಬಂಧುಧರ್ಮದಿನ್ ಅಹಂಮತಿ ಕರಗೆ ।ಹರಡಿ ಹಬ್ಬುವುದಾತ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೩ ॥ dharaNigOLavu mUse; jIvagaLanu adaroLage ।parishuddhi goLisuvudu samsAra tApa ॥paripariya bandhu dharmadin aham mati karage ।haraDi habbuvudu Atma  - Mankutimma ॥ 603 ॥This earth is a vessel. Lives of all of us gets cooked inside that using heat of this world (just by being in the world). By relating ourselves to others in this world, our pride and selfishness will wear and the true nature (true, beautiful and content) of the soul will expand.  - Mankutimma
translation: This earth is a vessel. Lives of all of us gets cooked inside that using heat of this world (just by being in the world). By relating ourselves to others in this world, our pride and selfishness will wear and the true nature (true, beautiful and content) of the soul will expand.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹರಡಿ ಹಬ್ಬುವುದಾತ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dharaNigOLavu mUse; jIvagaLanu adaroLage ।parishuddhi goLisuvudu samsAra tApa ॥paripariya bandhu dharmadin aham mati karage ।haraDi habbuvudu Atma  - Mankutimma ॥ 603 ॥
kagga: ಧರಣಿಗೋಳವು ಮೂಸೆ; ಜೀವಗಳನದರೊಳಗೆ ।ಪರಿಶುದ್ಧಿಗೊಳಿಸುವುದು ಸಂಸಾರತಾಪ ॥ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ಬಂಧುಧರ್ಮದಿನ್ ಅಹಂಮತಿ ಕರಗೆ ।ಹರಡಿ ಹಬ್ಬುವುದಾತ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೩ ॥

content: ಹೊಸಹೊಸಬನಾಗುವನನುಕ್ಷಣಂ ಮಾನವನು ।ವಸುಧೆಯಾ ಮೂಸೆಯಲಿ ಪುಟಪಾಕವಾಂತು ॥ರಸಮೂರ್ತಿಯಾಗುವನು ಜಗದಾತ್ಮಮತಿ ಬೆಳೆಯೆ ।ಕಸವೆಲ್ಲ ಕಳೆದವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೪ ॥ hosa hosabanAguvanu anukShaNam mAnavanu ।vasudheya aa mUseyali puTapAkavAntu ॥rasamUrtiyAguvanu jagadAtmamati beLeye ।kasavella kaLedavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 604 ॥Every man feels himself as a-new-man every second  when is being cooked for purification in the furnace of the world. When one sheds all the impurities the universal realization dawns on him and he becomes one with the universe (and the creator).  - Mankutimma
translation: Every man feels himself as a-new-man every second  when is being cooked for purification in the furnace of the world. When one sheds all the impurities the universal realization dawns on him and he becomes one with the universe (and the creator).  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಸವೆಲ್ಲ ಕಳೆದವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hosa hosabanAguvanu anukShaNam mAnavanu ।vasudheya aa mUseyali puTapAkavAntu ॥rasamUrtiyAguvanu jagadAtmamati beLeye ।kasavella kaLedavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 604 ॥
kagga: ಹೊಸಹೊಸಬನಾಗುವನನುಕ್ಷಣಂ ಮಾನವನು ।ವಸುಧೆಯಾ ಮೂಸೆಯಲಿ ಪುಟಪಾಕವಾಂತು ॥ರಸಮೂರ್ತಿಯಾಗುವನು ಜಗದಾತ್ಮಮತಿ ಬೆಳೆಯೆ ।ಕಸವೆಲ್ಲ ಕಳೆದವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೪ ॥

content: ಉದರಶಿಖಿಯೊಂದುಕಡೆ, ಹೃದಯಶಿಖಿಯೊಂದುಕಡೆ ।ಕುದಿಸದಿರೆ ಜೀವಶಿಲೆ ಮೃದುವಪ್ಪುದೆಂತು? ॥ಬದುಕಿನುರಿಯಲಿ ಕರಗಿ ತಿಳಿಯಾಗದಿಹ ಜೀವ ।ಪುದಿಯದಾತ್ಮಾರ್ಣವದಿ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೫ ॥ udarashikhiyondu kaDe, hRudayashikhiyondu kaDe ।kudisadire jIvashile mRuduvappudentu? ॥badukinuriyali karagi tiLiyAgadiha jIva ।pudiyadu AtmArNavadi  - Mankutimma ॥ 605 ॥Every being is baked by the heat in his stomach (hunger) and the heat in his heart (love). If the life is not so heated, how will it melt? Only if murky life is heated thus will it get clear. Only then can it fill the sea of the soul.  - Mankutimma
translation: Every being is baked by the heat in his stomach (hunger) and the heat in his heart (love). If the life is not so heated, how will it melt? Only if murky life is heated thus will it get clear. Only then can it fill the sea of the soul.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪುದಿಯದಾತ್ಮಾರ್ಣವದಿ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: udarashikhiyondu kaDe, hRudayashikhiyondu kaDe ।kudisadire jIvashile mRuduvappudentu? ॥badukinuriyali karagi tiLiyAgadiha jIva ।pudiyadu AtmArNavadi  - Mankutimma ॥ 605 ॥

content: ತ್ರಾಸಿನಲಿ ಕಪ್ಪೆಗಳ ಸರಿಕೂಡಿಸುವ ಚತುರಿ ।ಸಂಸ್ಕೃತಿ ದ್ವಂದ್ವಗಳ ಸಮತೂಗಲರಿವಂ ॥ಬೀಸುಕತ್ತಿಗಳ ಮಧ್ಯದಿ ನೂಲಮೇಲ್ ನಡೆವ ।ಸಾಸವೀ ಗೃಹಧರ್ಮ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೬ ॥ trAsinali kappegaLa sarikUDisuva chaturi ।samskRuti svandvagaLa samatUgalarivam ॥bIsukattigaLa madhyadi nUlamEl naDeva ।sAsavI gRuhadharma  - Mankutimma ॥ 606 ॥Dealing with the dilemmas of culture is as difficult a task as keeping frogs still on a balance. It is like walking on a tight rope when people are wielding swords to kill you when you fall down. Running a household is such a delicate balancing act.  - Mankutimma
translation: Dealing with the dilemmas of culture is as difficult a task as keeping frogs still on a balance. It is like walking on a tight rope when people are wielding swords to kill you when you fall down. Running a household is such a delicate balancing act.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಾಸವೀ ಗೃಹಧರ್ಮ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: trAsinali kappegaLa sarikUDisuva chaturi ।samskRuti svandvagaLa samatUgalarivam ॥bIsukattigaLa madhyadi nUlamEl naDeva ।sAsavI gRuhadharma  - Mankutimma ॥ 606 ॥

content: ಪ್ರೇಮಾತಿಶಯವಿರದ ದಾಂಪತ್ಯ ವರ್ಧಿಸದು ।ವ್ಯಾಮೋಹಕೆಡೆಗೊಟ್ಟೊಡದು ನಿಗಳವಹುದು ॥ಸಾಮರಸ್ಯವನೆಂತು ಕಾಣ್ಬುದೀ ವಿಷಮದಲಿ? ।ಆಮಿಷದ ತಂಟೆಯಿದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೭ ॥ premAtishayavu irada dAmpatya vardhisadu ।vyAmOhake eDegoTToDe adu nigaLavahudu ॥sAmarasyavanu entu kANbudI viShamadali? ।AmiShada tanTeyidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 607 ॥A marriage without excess love and affection will not prosper. But if you let love grow into too much attachment, then it ties you down like a chain. How can one reconcile these two opposites? Thus are the tricks of attraction.  - Mankutimma
translation: A marriage without excess love and affection will not prosper. But if you let love grow into too much attachment, then it ties you down like a chain. How can one reconcile these two opposites? Thus are the tricks of attraction.  - Mankutimma
title: ಆಮಿಷದ ತಂಟೆಯಿದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: premAtishayavu irada dAmpatya vardhisadu ।vyAmOhake eDegoTToDe adu nigaLavahudu ॥sAmarasyavanu entu kANbudI viShamadali? ।AmiShada tanTeyidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 607 ॥
kagga: ಪ್ರೇಮಾತಿಶಯವಿರದ ದಾಂಪತ್ಯ ವರ್ಧಿಸದು ।ವ್ಯಾಮೋಹಕೆಡೆಗೊಟ್ಟೊಡದು ನಿಗಳವಹುದು ॥ಸಾಮರಸ್ಯವನೆಂತು ಕಾಣ್ಬುದೀ ವಿಷಮದಲಿ? ।ಆಮಿಷದ ತಂಟೆಯಿದು   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೭ ॥

content: ಕೈಕಯಿಯವೊಲು ಮಾತೆ, ಸತ್ಯಭಾಮೆವೊಲು ಸತಿ ।ಸಾಕಿ ಸಂತಸವೆರೆಯೆ ಸಂಸಾರ ಲೀಲೆ ॥ಬೇಕು ಮತ್ಸರ ಮಮತೆ ಮೋಹಂಗಳಾವೇಶ ।ಲೋಕನಾಟಕಕಾಗ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೮ ॥ kaikayiyavolu mAte, satyabhAmevolu sati ।sAki santasavereye samsAra lIle ॥bEku matsara mamate mOhangaLa Avesha ।lOka nATakake Aga  - Mankutimma ॥ 608 ॥Mothers should be like Kaikeyi (mother of Bharatha in Ramayana). Wife should be like Satyabhama (wife of Krishna). They both showed the world how powerful their love can be. Their actions although born out of love, had adverse consequences. Life is wonderful only when such unlimited love and affection exist. Such jealousy, affection and attachment are required for the drama of life.  - Mankutimma
translation: Mothers should be like Kaikeyi (mother of Bharatha in Ramayana). Wife should be like Satyabhama (wife of Krishna). They both showed the world how powerful their love can be. Their actions although born out of love, had adverse consequences. Life is wonderful only when such unlimited love and affection exist. Such jealousy, affection and attachment are required for the drama of life.  - Mankutimma
title: ಲೋಕನಾಟಕಕಾಗ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kaikayiyavolu mAte, satyabhAmevolu sati ।sAki santasavereye samsAra lIle ॥bEku matsara mamate mOhangaLa Avesha ।lOka nATakake Aga  - Mankutimma ॥ 608 ॥
kagga: ಕೈಕಯಿಯವೊಲು ಮಾತೆ, ಸತ್ಯಭಾಮೆವೊಲು ಸತಿ ।ಸಾಕಿ ಸಂತಸವೆರೆಯೆ ಸಂಸಾರ ಲೀಲೆ ॥ಬೇಕು ಮತ್ಸರ ಮಮತೆ ಮೋಹಂಗಳಾವೇಶ ।ಲೋಕನಾಟಕಕಾಗ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೮ ॥

content: ಆವ ಜೀವದ ಪಾಕವಾವನುಭವದಿನಹುದೊ! ।ಆವ ಪಾಪಕ್ಷಯವದಾವ ಪುಣ್ಯದಿನೋ! ॥ಕಾವಿರದೆ ಪಕ್ವವಿಹ ಜೀವವಿಳೆಯೊಳಗಿರದು ।ನೋವೆಲ್ಲ ಪಾವಕವೊ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೯ ॥ aava jivada pAkavu aava anubhavadinahudo! ।aava pApakShayavu adaava puNyadinO! ॥kAvirada pakvaviha jIvavu iLeyoLiradu ।nOvella paavakavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 609 ॥Every being has its own cleansing experience. Which experience will trigger that refinement is very personal and varied among the beings! Which good deed cancels out which portion of baggage of sins! There is no being that can get refined without being heated (troubled). Consider every one of your troubles to be uplifting refining process.  - Mankutimma
translation: Every being has its own cleansing experience. Which experience will trigger that refinement is very personal and varied among the beings! Which good deed cancels out which portion of baggage of sins! There is no being that can get refined without being heated (troubled). Consider every one of your troubles to be uplifting refining process.  - Mankutimma
title: ನೋವೆಲ್ಲ ಪಾವಕವೊ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aava jivada pAkavu aava anubhavadinahudo! ।aava pApakShayavu adaava puNyadinO! ॥kAvirada pakvaviha jIvavu iLeyoLiradu ।nOvella paavakavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 609 ॥
kagga: ಆವ ಜೀವದ ಪಾಕವಾವನುಭವದಿನಹುದೊ! ।ಆವ ಪಾಪಕ್ಷಯವದಾವ ಪುಣ್ಯದಿನೋ! ॥ಕಾವಿರದೆ ಪಕ್ವವಿಹ ಜೀವವಿಳೆಯೊಳಗಿರದು ।ನೋವೆಲ್ಲ ಪಾವಕವೊ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦೯ ॥

content: ಕ್ಷುತ್ತುಮಮತೆಗಳು ಜೀವಕೆ ಕುಲಿಮೆಸುತ್ತಿಗೆಗಳ್ ।ಉತ್ತಮವದೆನಿಪುವುವು ಕಿಟ್ಟಗಳ ಕಳೆದು ॥ಚಿತ್ತ ಸಂಸ್ಕಾರಸಾಧನವಯ್ಯ ಸಂಸಾರ ।ತತ್ತ್ವ ಪ್ರವೃತ್ತಂಗೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೦ ॥ kShuttu mamategaLu jIvake kulime suttigegaL ।uttamavu adenipuvuvu kiTTagaLa kaLedu ॥chitta samskAra sAdhanavayya samsAra ।tattva pravRuttange  - Mankutimma ॥ 610 ॥Hunger and affection trouble a man a lot and drive him to introspection. Those are furnace and hammer in a the foundry. They repeated heat and beat the metal to cleanse it of all impurities. The world is also like that. A person who can think inwards and philosophize will use it to refine his thoughts (and get closer to God / truth).  - Mankutimma
translation: Hunger and affection trouble a man a lot and drive him to introspection. Those are furnace and hammer in a the foundry. They repeated heat and beat the metal to cleanse it of all impurities. The world is also like that. A person who can think inwards and philosophize will use it to refine his thoughts (and get closer to God / truth).  - Mankutimma
title: ತತ್ತ್ವ ಪ್ರವೃತ್ತಂಗೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kShuttu mamategaLu jIvake kulime suttigegaL ।uttamavu adenipuvuvu kiTTagaLa kaLedu ॥chitta samskAra sAdhanavayya samsAra ।tattva pravRuttange  - Mankutimma ॥ 610 ॥

content: ಮನೆಯೆ ಮಠವೆಂದು ತಿಳಿ, ಬಂಧು ಬಳಗವೆ ಗುರುವು ।ಅನವರತಪರಿಚರ್ಯೆಯವರೊರೆವ ಪಾಠ ॥ನಿನಗುಳಿದ ಜಗವ ಮುಟ್ಟಿಪ ಸೇತು ಸಂಸಾರ ।ಮನಕೆ ಪುಟಸಂಸ್ಕಾರ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೧ ॥ maneye maThavendu tiLi, bandhu baLagave guruvu ।anavarata paricharyeyu avaroreva pATha ॥ninaguLida jagava muTTipa sEtu samsAra ।manake puTasamskAra  - Mankutimma ॥ 611 ॥You should consider your own home as hermitage. Your own friends and relatives are your teachers. You should serve them well  - this is the only lesson that is taught (by culture). This world as we see it is the only bridge that you have to the rest of the universe (after life, heaven, hell, whatever). Living in this world and abiding dharma is a cleansing exercise to the mind.  - Mankutimma
translation: You should consider your own home as hermitage. Your own friends and relatives are your teachers. You should serve them well  - this is the only lesson that is taught (by culture). This world as we see it is the only bridge that you have to the rest of the universe (after life, heaven, hell, whatever). Living in this world and abiding dharma is a cleansing exercise to the mind.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮನಕೆ ಪುಟಸಂಸ್ಕಾರ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: maneye maThavendu tiLi, bandhu baLagave guruvu ।anavarata paricharyeyu avaroreva pATha ॥ninaguLida jagava muTTipa sEtu samsAra ।manake puTasamskAra  - Mankutimma ॥ 611 ॥

content: ಕಾಷಾಯವೇಂ ತಪಸು ಗೃಹಲೋಕನಿರ್ವಾಹ ।ವೇಷತಾಳದ ತಪಸು, ಕಠಿನತರ ತಪಸು ॥ಲೇಸಿನಿಂದದು ಸಾಗೆ ಬೇಕು ಶಮ ದಮ ಸಮತೆ ।ಆಸಿಧಾರವ್ರತವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೨ ॥ kAShAyavEm tapasu gRuhalOkanirvAha ।vEShatALada tapasu, kaThinatara tapasu ॥lEsinindadu sAge bEku shama dama samate ।AsidhAravratavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 612 ॥A ascetic does his penance wearing saffron. But it is a tougher penance to run a household and live according to dharma in this world  - a penance done without wearing special attire. For this penance to go smoothly one must learn to practice being content, subdue urges and maintain composure. It is as tough as walking over a knife;s edge.  - Mankutimma
translation: A ascetic does his penance wearing saffron. But it is a tougher penance to run a household and live according to dharma in this world  - a penance done without wearing special attire. For this penance to go smoothly one must learn to practice being content, subdue urges and maintain composure. It is as tough as walking over a knife;s edge.  - Mankutimma
title: ಆಸಿಧಾರವ್ರತವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kAShAyavEm tapasu gRuhalOkanirvAha ।vEShatALada tapasu, kaThinatara tapasu ॥lEsinindadu sAge bEku shama dama samate ।AsidhAravratavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 612 ॥
kagga: ಕಾಷಾಯವೇಂ ತಪಸು ಗೃಹಲೋಕನಿರ್ವಾಹ ।ವೇಷತಾಳದ ತಪಸು, ಕಠಿನತರ ತಪಸು ॥ಲೇಸಿನಿಂದದು ಸಾಗೆ ಬೇಕು ಶಮ ದಮ ಸಮತೆ ।ಆಸಿಧಾರವ್ರತವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೨ ॥

content: ನಯನಯುಗದಿಂ ಜಗವ ಪೊರೆದು, ನಿಟಿಲಾಕ್ಷಿಯಿಂ ।ಲಯವಡಿಸುವುದದೇನು ಶಿವಯೋಗಲೀಲೆ? ॥ಜಯಿಸಿ ಮದನನ ಬಳಿಕ ತನ್ನೊಡಲೊಳ್ ಉಮೆಯನ- ।ನ್ವಯಿಸಿಕೊಂಡಿಹುದೇನು?   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೩ ॥ nayana yugadim jagava poredu, niTilAkShiyim ।layavaDisuvudadEnu shivayOgalIle> ॥jayisi madanana baLika tannoDaloL umeyanu ।anvayisikondihudEnu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 613 ॥Shiva is the supreme practitioner of art of balance between attachment and detachment. He takes care of (overlooks) the world with this two eyes. But when it is time for destruction, he simply goes ahead to end the world with his third eye on the fore head. He destroyed Manmatha (God of Love). Yet, he loved Parvathi so much that he gave her half his body to become Ardhanareeshawara.  - Mankutimma
translation: Shiva is the supreme practitioner of art of balance between attachment and detachment. He takes care of (overlooks) the world with this two eyes. But when it is time for destruction, he simply goes ahead to end the world with his third eye on the fore head. He destroyed Manmatha (God of Love). Yet, he loved Parvathi so much that he gave her half his body to become Ardhanareeshawara.  - Mankutimma
title: ಉಮೆಯನನ್ವಯಿಸಿಕೊಂಡಿಹುದೇನು?   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nayana yugadim jagava poredu, niTilAkShiyim ।layavaDisuvudadEnu shivayOgalIle> ॥jayisi madanana baLika tannoDaloL umeyanu ।anvayisikondihudEnu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 613 ॥
kagga: ನಯನಯುಗದಿಂ ಜಗವ ಪೊರೆದು, ನಿಟಿಲಾಕ್ಷಿಯಿಂ ।ಲಯವಡಿಸುವುದದೇನು ಶಿವಯೋಗಲೀಲೆ? ॥ಜಯಿಸಿ ಮದನನ ಬಳಿಕ ತನ್ನೊಡಲೊಳ್ ಉಮೆಯನ- ।ನ್ವಯಿಸಿಕೊಂಡಿಹುದೇನು?   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೩ ॥

content: ಮಾರನಂ ದಂಡಿಸಿರೆ ಗೌರಿಯಿಂ ಭಯವೇನು? ।ಚಾರುಸಹಕಾರಿಯವಳೆಂದು ಶಿವನೊಲಿದನ್ ॥ಮೀರೆ ಮೋಹವನು ಸಂಸಾರದಿಂ ಭಯವೇನು? ।ದಾರಿ ಕೆಳೆಯದು ನಿನಗೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೪ ॥ mAranam danDisire gauriyim bhayavEnu? ।chAru sahakAriyavaLendu shivanolidan ॥mIre mohavanu samsAradim bhayavEnu? ।dAri keLeyadu ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 614 ॥When Shiva has conquered Manmatha (Cupid of Indian mythology), why should be afraid of Gowri;s beauty? He accepted her because she was the appropriate partner for his life. If one can come over attachment, there is nothing to be afraid of in this world. The world will just be a good friend in your journey (towards enlightenment).  - Mankutimma
translation: When Shiva has conquered Manmatha (Cupid of Indian mythology), why should be afraid of Gowri;s beauty? He accepted her because she was the appropriate partner for his life. If one can come over attachment, there is nothing to be afraid of in this world. The world will just be a good friend in your journey (towards enlightenment).  - Mankutimma
title: ದಾರಿ ಕೆಳೆಯದು ನಿನಗೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mAranam danDisire gauriyim bhayavEnu? ।chAru sahakAriyavaLendu shivanolidan ॥mIre mohavanu samsAradim bhayavEnu? ।dAri keLeyadu ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 614 ॥
kagga: ಮಾರನಂ ದಂಡಿಸಿರೆ ಗೌರಿಯಿಂ ಭಯವೇನು? ।ಚಾರುಸಹಕಾರಿಯವಳೆಂದು ಶಿವನೊಲಿದನ್ ॥ಮೀರೆ ಮೋಹವನು ಸಂಸಾರದಿಂ ಭಯವೇನು? ।ದಾರಿ ಕೆಳೆಯದು ನಿನಗೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೪ ॥

content: ಹಾಲ ಕಾಯಿಸಿ ಹೆಪ್ಪನಿಕ್ಕಿ ಕಡೆದೊಡೆ, ಮೊದಲು ।ಮೇಲೆ ಕಾಣದ ಬೆಣ್ಣೆ ತೇಲಿ ಬರುವಂತೆ ॥ಬಾಳನೀ ಜಗದ ಮಂತುವು ಕಡೆಯಲೇಳುವುದು ।ಆಳದಿಂದಾತ್ಮಮತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೫ ॥ hAla kAyisi heppanikki kaDedoDe, modalu ।mEle kANada beNNe tEli baruvante ॥baLanI jagada mantuvu kaDeyaLu ELuvudu ।aaLadinda aatma mati  - Mankutimma ॥ 615 ॥Butter is not visible in milk. Only when you heat it, leave it overnight to ferment and stir does it start floating. Life is like that. The world is a big stirrer. It will stir our lives and let the butter of inner wisdom of the soul come out.  - Mankutimma
translation: Butter is not visible in milk. Only when you heat it, leave it overnight to ferment and stir does it start floating. Life is like that. The world is a big stirrer. It will stir our lives and let the butter of inner wisdom of the soul come out.  - Mankutimma
title: ಆಳದಿಂದಾತ್ಮಮತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hAla kAyisi heppanikki kaDedoDe, modalu ।mEle kANada beNNe tEli baruvante ॥baLanI jagada mantuvu kaDeyaLu ELuvudu ।aaLadinda aatma mati  - Mankutimma ॥ 615 ॥
kagga: ಹಾಲ ಕಾಯಿಸಿ ಹೆಪ್ಪನಿಕ್ಕಿ ಕಡೆದೊಡೆ, ಮೊದಲು ।ಮೇಲೆ ಕಾಣದ ಬೆಣ್ಣೆ ತೇಲಿ ಬರುವಂತೆ ॥ಬಾಳನೀ ಜಗದ ಮಂತುವು ಕಡೆಯಲೇಳುವುದು ।ಆಳದಿಂದಾತ್ಮಮತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೫ ॥

content: ಭುಕ್ತಿಪಥ ಮುಕ್ತಿಪಥ ಬೇರೆಬೇರೆಯವಲ್ಲ ।ಯುಕ್ತದಿಂದೆರಡುಮಂಚುಗಳೊಂದೆ ಪಥಕೆ ॥ಸತ್ತ್ವಶೋಧನೆ ಲೋಕಸಂಸ್ಕಾರದಿಂ ನಿನಗೆ ।ಶಕ್ತಿಯಧ್ಯಾತ್ಮಕದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೬ ॥ bhuktipatha muktipatha bEre bEreyavalla ।yuktadim eraDum anchugaLu onde pathake ॥sattvashOdhane loka samskAradim ninage ।shaktiyu adhyAtmakadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 616 ॥There are two ways of life  - immersing yourself fully into the dynamics of the world, or renouncing it completely. They are not too different from each other. If you think properly, they are the the two edges of the same path (the lead to salvation) that never meet. The search of the ultimate truth is achieved by following Dharma  - the code of life. That is exactly the strength of the knowledge of the soul. (Hence both ways of life are trying to achieve the same)  - Mankutimma
translation: There are two ways of life  - immersing yourself fully into the dynamics of the world, or renouncing it completely. They are not too different from each other. If you think properly, they are the the two edges of the same path (the lead to salvation) that never meet. The search of the ultimate truth is achieved by following Dharma  - the code of life. That is exactly the strength of the knowledge of the soul. (Hence both ways of life are trying to achieve the same)  - Mankutimma
title: ಶಕ್ತಿಯಧ್ಯಾತ್ಮಕದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bhuktipatha muktipatha bEre bEreyavalla ।yuktadim eraDum anchugaLu onde pathake ॥sattvashOdhane loka samskAradim ninage ।shaktiyu adhyAtmakadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 616 ॥
kagga: ಭುಕ್ತಿಪಥ ಮುಕ್ತಿಪಥ ಬೇರೆಬೇರೆಯವಲ್ಲ ।ಯುಕ್ತದಿಂದೆರಡುಮಂಚುಗಳೊಂದೆ ಪಥಕೆ ॥ಸತ್ತ್ವಶೋಧನೆ ಲೋಕಸಂಸ್ಕಾರದಿಂ ನಿನಗೆ ।ಶಕ್ತಿಯಧ್ಯಾತ್ಮಕದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೬ ॥

content: ಧ್ವನಿತ ಪ್ರತಿಧ್ವನಿತ ಮನುಜಜೀವಿತವೆಲ್ಲ ।ಕುಣಿವುದವನೆದೆ ಜಗತ್ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ ಪಾಡುವವೊಲ್ ॥ಇನಿದಕೊಲವಳಲಿಗನುತಾಪ; ಸೆಣಸಿಗೆ ಬೀರ ।ಘನಗರ್ಜಿತಕೆ ದೈನ್ಯ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೭ ॥ dhvanita pratidhvanita manuja jIvitavella ।kuNivudu avana ede jagat prakRuti pADuvavol ॥inidake olava aLalige anutApa; seNasige bIra ।ghanagarjitake dainya  - Mankutimma ॥ 617 ॥The story of the human life is just about echoing the voices of the world around him. His heart dances to the tunes of the nature surrounding him. Love for love, compassion for misery (sadness), bravery for provocation and submission for mighty roaring.  - Mankutimma
translation: The story of the human life is just about echoing the voices of the world around him. His heart dances to the tunes of the nature surrounding him. Love for love, compassion for misery (sadness), bravery for provocation and submission for mighty roaring.  - Mankutimma
title: ಘನಗರ್ಜಿತಕೆ ದೈನ್ಯ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dhvanita pratidhvanita manuja jIvitavella ।kuNivudu avana ede jagat prakRuti pADuvavol ॥inidake olava aLalige anutApa; seNasige bIra ।ghanagarjitake dainya  - Mankutimma ॥ 617 ॥
kagga: ಧ್ವನಿತ ಪ್ರತಿಧ್ವನಿತ ಮನುಜಜೀವಿತವೆಲ್ಲ ।ಕುಣಿವುದವನೆದೆ ಜಗತ್ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ ಪಾಡುವವೊಲ್ ॥ಇನಿದಕೊಲವಳಲಿಗನುತಾಪ; ಸೆಣಸಿಗೆ ಬೀರ ।ಘನಗರ್ಜಿತಕೆ ದೈನ್ಯ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೭ ॥

content: ಜಗದ ಸಂತಾಪ ಸಂತಸ ಸಂಭ್ರಮಂಗಳುಲಿ ।ಬಗಿದು ನರನೆದೆಯ, ಜೀವವ ಪಿಡಿದು ಕುಲುಕೆ ॥ಸೊಗಯಿಪುದು ಮನಸಿಗದು ಕವಿಕಲಾರಸಿಕರ್ಗೆ ।ಜಗ ಸೂರ್ಯ ನೀಂ ಕಮಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೮ ॥ jagada santApa santasa sambhramamgala uli ।bagidu narana edeya, jIvava piDidu kuluke ॥sogayipudu manasigadu kavi kalA rasikarge ।jaga sUrya nIm kamala  - Mankutimma ॥ 618 ॥The sounds of this world  - happiness, grief and celebrations  -  will touch the very heart of human existence. It will shake it and cause chaos. But a lighthearted poet will see it with amusement. He will consider the world to be the Sun and himself a lotus that blooms when exposed to sunlight.  - Mankutimma
translation: The sounds of this world  - happiness, grief and celebrations  -  will touch the very heart of human existence. It will shake it and cause chaos. But a lighthearted poet will see it with amusement. He will consider the world to be the Sun and himself a lotus that blooms when exposed to sunlight.  - Mankutimma
title: ಜಗ ಸೂರ್ಯ ನೀಂ ಕಮಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jagada santApa santasa sambhramamgala uli ।bagidu narana edeya, jIvava piDidu kuluke ॥sogayipudu manasigadu kavi kalA rasikarge ।jaga sUrya nIm kamala  - Mankutimma ॥ 618 ॥
kagga: ಜಗದ ಸಂತಾಪ ಸಂತಸ ಸಂಭ್ರಮಂಗಳುಲಿ ।ಬಗಿದು ನರನೆದೆಯ, ಜೀವವ ಪಿಡಿದು ಕುಲುಕೆ ॥ಸೊಗಯಿಪುದು ಮನಸಿಗದು ಕವಿಕಲಾರಸಿಕರ್ಗೆ ।ಜಗ ಸೂರ್ಯ ನೀಂ ಕಮಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೮ ॥

content: ಪ್ರತ್ಯೇಕ ಸುಖವ, ನೀಂ ಪ್ರತ್ಯೇಕ ಸಂಪದವ- ।ನತ್ಯಾಶೆಯಿಂದರಸಿ ಮಿಕ್ಕೆಲ್ಲ ಜಗವ- ॥ನೊತ್ತಟ್ಟಿಗಿಡುವೆನೆನೆ, ನಷ್ಟವಾರಿಗೊ ಮರುಳೆ? ।ಬತ್ತುವುದು ನಿನ್ನಾತ್ಮ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೯ ॥ pratyeka sukhava, nIm pratyeka sampadavanu ।atyAsheyinda arasi mikkella jagavanu ॥ottoTTige iDuvenu ene, naShTavArigo marule? ।battuvudu ninnAtma  - Mankutimma ॥ 619 ॥If you want all your happiness and all your prosperity to yourself (and don;t share) and push the rest of the world away, then who is at loss? You are a fool to think it is in your interest to do so. It is your soul that is drying up.  - Mankutimma
translation: If you want all your happiness and all your prosperity to yourself (and don;t share) and push the rest of the world away, then who is at loss? You are a fool to think it is in your interest to do so. It is your soul that is drying up.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬತ್ತುವುದು ನಿನ್ನಾತ್ಮ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: pratyeka sukhava, nIm pratyeka sampadavanu ।atyAsheyinda arasi mikkella jagavanu ॥ottoTTige iDuvenu ene, naShTavArigo marule? ।battuvudu ninnAtma  - Mankutimma ॥ 619 ॥
kagga: ಪ್ರತ್ಯೇಕ ಸುಖವ, ನೀಂ ಪ್ರತ್ಯೇಕ ಸಂಪದವ- ।ನತ್ಯಾಶೆಯಿಂದರಸಿ ಮಿಕ್ಕೆಲ್ಲ ಜಗವ- ॥ನೊತ್ತಟ್ಟಿಗಿಡುವೆನೆನೆ, ನಷ್ಟವಾರಿಗೊ ಮರುಳೆ? ।ಬತ್ತುವುದು ನಿನ್ನಾತ್ಮ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧೯ ॥

content: ಲೋಕಜೀವನದೆ ಮಾನಸದ ಪರಿಪಾಕವಾ ।ಪಾಕದಿಂ ಮತಿಶುದ್ಧಿಯದರಿನೊಳದೃಷ್ಟಿ ॥ಸಾಕಲ್ಯದಾತ್ಮಸಂದರ್ಶನಕೆ ಕರಣವದು ।ಲೋಕದಿಂ ನಿರ್ಲೋಕ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೨೦ ॥ lOka jIvanade mAnasada paripAkavu aa ।pAkadim matishuddhi adarin oLadRuShTi ॥sAkalyada aatma sandarshanake karaNavadu ।lOkadim nirlOka  - Mankutimma ॥ 620 ॥Getting through life in this world will clear your mind. From that clarity arises a wisdom. Using that wisdom one must turn his thought inwards. When one does that, he will realize the universal nature of the soul  - beyond all boundaries of time and space. We can realize the universal truth (timeless and invariant) only by getting through the life on this world (time bound and limited)  - know the infinite through the finite.  - Mankutimma
translation: Getting through life in this world will clear your mind. From that clarity arises a wisdom. Using that wisdom one must turn his thought inwards. When one does that, he will realize the universal nature of the soul  - beyond all boundaries of time and space. We can realize the universal truth (timeless and invariant) only by getting through the life on this world (time bound and limited)  - know the infinite through the finite.  - Mankutimma
title: ಲೋಕದಿಂ ನಿರ್ಲೋಕ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: lOka jIvanade mAnasada paripAkavu aa ।pAkadim matishuddhi adarin oLadRuShTi ॥sAkalyada aatma sandarshanake karaNavadu ।lOkadim nirlOka  - Mankutimma ॥ 620 ॥
kagga: ಲೋಕಜೀವನದೆ ಮಾನಸದ ಪರಿಪಾಕವಾ ।ಪಾಕದಿಂ ಮತಿಶುದ್ಧಿಯದರಿನೊಳದೃಷ್ಟಿ ॥ಸಾಕಲ್ಯದಾತ್ಮಸಂದರ್ಶನಕೆ ಕರಣವದು ।ಲೋಕದಿಂ ನಿರ್ಲೋಕ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೨೦ ॥

content: ಧರಿಸಿರ್ಪುದಲ ಧರ್ಮ? ಧರಿಸು ಜೀವನಧುರವ ।ಚರಿಸು ಲೋಕದ ಮಾರ್ಗಗಳಲಿ ಹಿತವರಿತು ॥ಸರಿಪಡಿಸಿ ದಾರಿಗಳ ಕೆರೆ ತೋಪು ಸತ್ರಗಳ ।ನೆರವಾಗು ಪಯಣಕ್ಕೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೨೧ ॥ dharisirpudala dharma? dharisu jIvana dhurava ।charisu lOkada mArgagaLali hitavaritu ॥saripaDisi dArigaLa kere tOpu satragaLa ।neravAgu payaNakke  - Mankutimma ॥ 621 ॥Don;t they say that Dharma protects everybody? Believe in it. Carry the yoke of this worldly life, and carry it well. Tread the paths of this world  - whichever you feel good. As you go, repair the paths, lakes, and rest houses along the way. Make yourself useful to the world while you are here.  - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t they say that Dharma protects everybody? Believe in it. Carry the yoke of this worldly life, and carry it well. Tread the paths of this world  - whichever you feel good. As you go, repair the paths, lakes, and rest houses along the way. Make yourself useful to the world while you are here.  - Mankutimma
title: ನೆರವಾಗು ಪಯಣಕ್ಕೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dharisirpudala dharma? dharisu jIvana dhurava ।charisu lOkada mArgagaLali hitavaritu ॥saripaDisi dArigaLa kere tOpu satragaLa ।neravAgu payaNakke  - Mankutimma ॥ 621 ॥
kagga: ಧರಿಸಿರ್ಪುದಲ ಧರ್ಮ? ಧರಿಸು ಜೀವನಧುರವ ।ಚರಿಸು ಲೋಕದ ಮಾರ್ಗಗಳಲಿ ಹಿತವರಿತು ॥ಸರಿಪಡಿಸಿ ದಾರಿಗಳ ಕೆರೆ ತೋಪು ಸತ್ರಗಳ ।ನೆರವಾಗು ಪಯಣಕ್ಕೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೨೧ ॥

content: ಧರ್ಮನಿರ್ಣಯ ನಿನಗೆ ಜನ್ಮಜನ್ಮಾಂತರದ ।ಕರ್ಮಸಂದರ್ಭದಿಂದೊಗೆವುದದನರಿತು ॥ನಿರ್ಮಮದ ನಿರ್ಮಲೋತ್ಸಹದೆ ನೀನಾಚರಿಸೆ ।ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಸಾಮೀಪ್ಯವೆಲೊ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೨೨ ॥ dharmanirNaya ninage janma janmaantarada ।karma sandharbhadinda ogevudu adanaritu ॥nirmamada nirmalOtsahade nInAcharise ।brahma sAmIpyavelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 622 ॥The results of your action are to dependent on your actions from previous births and has to be seen with the right context. Once you understand this, you will observe the happenings in your life with detachment and that will help you experience pure joy. That is as close as you can get to God.  - Mankutimma
translation: The results of your action are to dependent on your actions from previous births and has to be seen with the right context. Once you understand this, you will observe the happenings in your life with detachment and that will help you experience pure joy. That is as close as you can get to God.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಸಾಮೀಪ್ಯವೆಲೊ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dharmanirNaya ninage janma janmaantarada ।karma sandharbhadinda ogevudu adanaritu ॥nirmamada nirmalOtsahade nInAcharise ।brahma sAmIpyavelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 622 ॥
kagga: ಧರ್ಮನಿರ್ಣಯ ನಿನಗೆ ಜನ್ಮಜನ್ಮಾಂತರದ ।ಕರ್ಮಸಂದರ್ಭದಿಂದೊಗೆವುದದನರಿತು ॥ನಿರ್ಮಮದ ನಿರ್ಮಲೋತ್ಸಹದೆ ನೀನಾಚರಿಸೆ ।ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಸಾಮೀಪ್ಯವೆಲೊ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೨೨ ॥

content: ಗೃಹದಿ ರಾಷ್ಟ್ರದಿ ಸಮಾಜದಿ ಲೋಕಸಂಗತದಿ ।ವಿಹಿತದ ಸ್ಥಾನದಿಂ ಸಹಜಗುಣಬಲದಿಂ- ॥ದಿಹಪರಸಮನ್ವಯದೆ ಸರ್ವಹಿತಸಂಸ್ಥಿತಿಗೆ ।ಸಹಕರಿಪುದಲೆ ಧರ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೨೩ ॥ gRuhadi rAShTradi samAjadi lOkasangatadi ।vihitada sthAnadim sahajaguNabaladinda ॥iha para samanvayade sarvahita samsthitige ।sahakaripudale dharma  - Mankutimma ॥ 623 ॥At all levels  - home, nation, society, world  - one must do what ever he can to preserve the well being of all. While doing so one must balance the duties of this world and the next. Being of help to run this world is the real meaning of Dharma  - Mankutimma
translation: At all levels  - home, nation, society, world  - one must do what ever he can to preserve the well being of all. While doing so one must balance the duties of this world and the next. Being of help to run this world is the real meaning of Dharma  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಹಕರಿಪುದಲೆ ಧರ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: gRuhadi rAShTradi samAjadi lOkasangatadi ।vihitada sthAnadim sahajaguNabaladinda ॥iha para samanvayade sarvahita samsthitige ।sahakaripudale dharma  - Mankutimma ॥ 623 ॥
kagga: ಗೃಹದಿ ರಾಷ್ಟ್ರದಿ ಸಮಾಜದಿ ಲೋಕಸಂಗತದಿ ।ವಿಹಿತದ ಸ್ಥಾನದಿಂ ಸಹಜಗುಣಬಲದಿಂ- ॥ದಿಹಪರಸಮನ್ವಯದೆ ಸರ್ವಹಿತಸಂಸ್ಥಿತಿಗೆ ।ಸಹಕರಿಪುದಲೆ ಧರ್ಮ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೨೩ ॥

content: ಹತ್ಯೆಯೋ ಹನ್ಯತೆಯೊ ವಿಜಯವೋ ಪರಿಭವವೊ ।ಕ್ಷತ್ರಿಯಂ ಸ್ವಾರ್ಥಮಂ ಗಣಿಸುವನೆ ರಣದೊಳ್? ॥ಕೃತ್ಯನಿರ್ಣಯ ಬಾಹ್ಯಲಾಭನಷ್ಟದಿನಲ್ಲ ।ಆತ್ಮಋಣವದು ಜಗಕೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೨೪ ॥ hatyeyO hanyateyo vijayavO paribhavavo ।kShatriyam svArthamam gaNisuvane raNadoL? ॥kRutyanirNaya bAhya lAbha naShTadinalla ।Atma RuNavadu jagake  - Mankutimma ॥ 624 ॥A soldier does not care for the result when he is on the battle field  - killing or being killed, victory or defeat. He has no selfish agenda to be achieved during the war. His actions are not determined by calculations of profit or loss in the outside world. He is just repaying the debt of his soul to the world. We should approach life like that.  - Mankutimma
translation: A soldier does not care for the result when he is on the battle field  - killing or being killed, victory or defeat. He has no selfish agenda to be achieved during the war. His actions are not determined by calculations of profit or loss in the outside world. He is just repaying the debt of his soul to the world. We should approach life like that.  - Mankutimma
title: ಆತ್ಮಋಣವದು ಜಗಕೆ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hatyeyO hanyateyo vijayavO paribhavavo ।kShatriyam svArthamam gaNisuvane raNadoL? ॥kRutyanirNaya bAhya lAbha naShTadinalla ।Atma RuNavadu jagake  - Mankutimma ॥ 624 ॥

content: ಕೆಟ್ಟ ಪ್ರಪಂಚವಿದು, ಸುಟ್ಟ ಕರಿ ನರಮನಸು ।ಬಿಟ್ಟುಬಿಡಲರಿದದನು, ಕಟ್ಟಿಕೊಳೆ ಮಷ್ಟು ॥ಮುಟ್ಟಿ ಮುಟ್ಟದವೋಲುಪಾಯದಿಂ ನೋಡದನು ।ಗಟ್ಟಿ ಪುರುಳೇನಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೨೫ ॥ keTTa prapanchavidu, suTTa kari naramanasu ।biTTu biDalaridadanu, kaTTikoLe maShTu ॥muTTi muTTadavOl upAyadim nODadanu ।gaTTi puruLenalla  - Mankutimma ॥ 625 ॥This is a bad world. By living in this world, man;s mind has become dark like charcoal. But you can leave it alone by itself. The more you touch it, it more dirty you get. The right way to deal with it is to touch it  - very lightly, as if you have not. There is nothing great in this art.  - Mankutimma
translation: This is a bad world. By living in this world, man;s mind has become dark like charcoal. But you can leave it alone by itself. The more you touch it, it more dirty you get. The right way to deal with it is to touch it  - very lightly, as if you have not. There is nothing great in this art.  - Mankutimma
title: ಗಟ್ಟಿ ಪುರುಳೇನಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: keTTa prapanchavidu, suTTa kari naramanasu ।biTTu biDalaridadanu, kaTTikoLe maShTu ॥muTTi muTTadavOl upAyadim nODadanu ।gaTTi puruLenalla  - Mankutimma ॥ 625 ॥

content: ಕುಸುಮಸಖನೇಂ ನೀನು? ಹಿಸುಕದೆಯೆ ಮೂಸದನು ।ಹಿಸುಕೆ ಕಟುಕಂಪು; ನರಲೋಕವದರವೋಲೇ ॥ಗಸಿಯ ಕಲಕದೆ ಕೊಳದ ಮೇಲ್ತಿಳಿಯ ಕುಡಿದು ನಡೆ ।ಹಸನು ಹಗುರದ ಬಾಳು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೨೬ ॥ kusuma sakhanEm nInu? hisukadeye mUsadanu।hisuke kaTukampu; naralOkavu adaravOlE ॥gasiya kalakade koLada mEltiLiya kuDidu naDe ।hasanu hagurada bALu  - Mankutimma ॥ 626 ॥If you are a lover of flowers you would know to smell them without holding them too tight. If you crush them, the fragrance turns into a stink. One must deal with this world like wise. Just like we should drink the clear water from the top of the lake without disturbing the sediment at the bottom, life is happy if dealt with lightly.  - Mankutimma
translation: If you are a lover of flowers you would know to smell them without holding them too tight. If you crush them, the fragrance turns into a stink. One must deal with this world like wise. Just like we should drink the clear water from the top of the lake without disturbing the sediment at the bottom, life is happy if dealt with lightly.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹಸನು ಹಗುರದ ಬಾಳು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kusuma sakhanEm nInu? hisukadeye mUsadanu।hisuke kaTukampu; naralOkavu adaravOlE ॥gasiya kalakade koLada mEltiLiya kuDidu naDe ।hasanu hagurada bALu  - Mankutimma ॥ 626 ॥
kagga: ಕುಸುಮಸಖನೇಂ ನೀನು? ಹಿಸುಕದೆಯೆ ಮೂಸದನು ।ಹಿಸುಕೆ ಕಟುಕಂಪು; ನರಲೋಕವದರವೋಲೇ ॥ಗಸಿಯ ಕಲಕದೆ ಕೊಳದ ಮೇಲ್ತಿಳಿಯ ಕುಡಿದು ನಡೆ ।ಹಸನು ಹಗುರದ ಬಾಳು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೨೬ ॥

content: ವಿಷಯಸನ್ನಿಧಿಗಿಂತ ಮಸಣಸನ್ನಿಧಿ ಲೇಸು ।ವಿಷದೂಟಕಿಂತುಪೋಷಿತವೆ ಲೇಸಲ್ತೆ? ॥ತೃಷೆ ಕನಲೆ, ಜೀವ ಬಿಸಿಬಾಣಲಿಗೆ ಬಿದ್ದ ಹುಳು ।ಶಿಶು ಪಿಶಾಚಿಯ ಕೈಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೨೭ ॥ viShaya sannidhiginta masaNa sannidhi lEsu ।viShadUTakinta upOShitave lEsalte? ॥tRuShe kanale, jIva bisibANalige bidda huLu ।shishu pishAchiya kaige  - Mankutimma ॥ 627 ॥It is better to die than be attracted to the material pleasures in this world. Isn;t being hungry better than consuming poisoned food? When a man is controlled by desire, he is like a worm that falls into a hot vessel. He is like a baby in the hands of a demon.  - Mankutimma
translation: It is better to die than be attracted to the material pleasures in this world. Isn;t being hungry better than consuming poisoned food? When a man is controlled by desire, he is like a worm that falls into a hot vessel. He is like a baby in the hands of a demon.  - Mankutimma
title: ಶಿಶು ಪಿಶಾಚಿಯ ಕೈಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: viShaya sannidhiginta masaNa sannidhi lEsu ।viShadUTakinta upOShitave lEsalte? ॥tRuShe kanale, jIva bisibANalige bidda huLu ।shishu pishAchiya kaige  - Mankutimma ॥ 627 ॥
