content: ಒರ್ವನೇ ನಿಲುವೆ ನೀನುತ್ಕಟಕ್ಷಣಗಳಲಿ ।ಧರ್ಮಸಂಕಟಗಳಲಿ, ಜೀವಸಮರದಲಿ ॥ನಿರ್ವಾಣದೀಕ್ಷೆಯಲಿ, ನಿರ್ಯಾಣಘಟ್ಟದಲಿ ।ನಿರ್ಮಿತ್ರನಿರಲು ಕಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೮೯ ॥ orvanE niluve nInu utkaTa kShaNagaLali ।dharma sankaTagaLali, jIva samaradali ॥nirvANa dIkSheyali, niryANa ghaTTadali ।nirmitraniralu kali  - Mankutimma ॥ 689 ॥You will be standing alone in all the crucial moments od your life  - when faced with moral dilemma, while fighting for life, at the moment of divine realization and at death. Learn to be friendless.  - Mankutimma
translation: You will be standing alone in all the crucial moments od your life  - when faced with moral dilemma, while fighting for life, at the moment of divine realization and at death. Learn to be friendless.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಿರ್ಮಿತ್ರನಿರಲು ಕಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: orvanE niluve nInu utkaTa kShaNagaLali ।dharma sankaTagaLali, jIva samaradali ॥nirvANa dIkSheyali, niryANa ghaTTadali ।nirmitraniralu kali  - Mankutimma ॥ 689 ॥
kagga: ಒರ್ವನೇ ನಿಲುವೆ ನೀನುತ್ಕಟಕ್ಷಣಗಳಲಿ ।ಧರ್ಮಸಂಕಟಗಳಲಿ, ಜೀವಸಮರದಲಿ ॥ನಿರ್ವಾಣದೀಕ್ಷೆಯಲಿ, ನಿರ್ಯಾಣಘಟ್ಟದಲಿ ।ನಿರ್ಮಿತ್ರನಿರಲು ಕಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೮೯ ॥

content: ಶುನಕ ಬೆಂಬತ್ತಿತಲ ಧರ್ಮಜನ ಕಡೆವರಂ ।ನಿನಗಂತು ಸಂಗಡಿಗನೊರ್ವನೆಡೆಬಿಡದನ್ ॥ಇಣಿಕಿ ನೋಡರದಾರುಮೆನ್ನುವೆಡೆ ಕಾದಿಹನು ।ಅಣಕಿಗ ಮನಸ್ಸಾಕ್ಷಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೦ ॥ shunaka bembattitala dharmajana kaDevaram ।ninagantu sangaDiganu orvanu eDebiDadan ॥iNaki nODaru adArum ennuvaDe kAdihanu ।aNakiga manassAkShi  - Mankutimma ॥ 690 ॥A dog followed Yudhistira all the way till the very end  - till heaven. Like that, every one of us has a person who is with us at every step of the way. If we look around and make sure no one is watching, just then he is watching us closely and taunting us. He is our conscience.  - Mankutimma
translation: A dog followed Yudhistira all the way till the very end  - till heaven. Like that, every one of us has a person who is with us at every step of the way. If we look around and make sure no one is watching, just then he is watching us closely and taunting us. He is our conscience.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅಣಕಿಗ ಮನಸ್ಸಾಕ್ಷಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: shunaka bembattitala dharmajana kaDevaram ।ninagantu sangaDiganu orvanu eDebiDadan ॥iNaki nODaru adArum ennuvaDe kAdihanu ।aNakiga manassAkShi  - Mankutimma ॥ 690 ॥
kagga: ಶುನಕ ಬೆಂಬತ್ತಿತಲ ಧರ್ಮಜನ ಕಡೆವರಂ ।ನಿನಗಂತು ಸಂಗಡಿಗನೊರ್ವನೆಡೆಬಿಡದನ್ ॥ಇಣಿಕಿ ನೋಡರದಾರುಮೆನ್ನುವೆಡೆ ಕಾದಿಹನು ।ಅಣಕಿಗ ಮನಸ್ಸಾಕ್ಷಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೦ ॥

content: ಸುತ್ತಿ ಸುತ್ತುವ ಖಗದ ಗೂಡ ನೆನಪೆಳೆಯುವುದು ।ಗೊತ್ತುನೂಲ್ ಪಿಡಿದಿಹುದು ದನವ ಬಯಲಿನಲಿ ॥ತತ್ತ್ವವೊಂದರ ಹಿಡಿತಕೊಗ್ಗದಿಹ ಬಾಳೇನು? ।ಕಿತ್ತ ಗಾಳಿಯ ಪಟವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೧ ॥ sutti suttuva khagada gUDa nenapu eLeyuvudu ।gottu nUl piDidihudu danava bayalinali ॥tattvavondara hiDitake oggadiha bALEnu? ।kitta gALIya paTavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 691 ॥We feel the birds in the sky are free to what they want. But the memory of nest drags them back to the nest. A cow grazing the field is only as free as the length of the rope permits. But is there any value in total freedom? If one does not ground himself to any one philosophy, then life is like a kite whose string is severed. It is mercy of the wind.  - Mankutimma
translation: We feel the birds in the sky are free to what they want. But the memory of nest drags them back to the nest. A cow grazing the field is only as free as the length of the rope permits. But is there any value in total freedom? If one does not ground himself to any one philosophy, then life is like a kite whose string is severed. It is mercy of the wind.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಿತ್ತ ಗಾಳಿಯ ಪಟವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sutti suttuva khagada gUDa nenapu eLeyuvudu ।gottu nUl piDidihudu danava bayalinali ॥tattvavondara hiDitake oggadiha bALEnu? ।kitta gALIya paTavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 691 ॥
kagga: ಸುತ್ತಿ ಸುತ್ತುವ ಖಗದ ಗೂಡ ನೆನಪೆಳೆಯುವುದು ।ಗೊತ್ತುನೂಲ್ ಪಿಡಿದಿಹುದು ದನವ ಬಯಲಿನಲಿ ॥ತತ್ತ್ವವೊಂದರ ಹಿಡಿತಕೊಗ್ಗದಿಹ ಬಾಳೇನು? ।ಕಿತ್ತ ಗಾಳಿಯ ಪಟವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೧ ॥

content: ಬರಿಯೋದು ಬರಿವಾದ ಬರಿಬುದ್ಧಿ ದೊರಕಿಸದು ।ಪರತತ್ತ್ವವನು; ಬೇಕು ಬೇರೆ ಕಣ್ಣದಕೆ ॥ಚಿರದ ಮಮತಾವೇಷ್ಟಿತದ ಪೊರೆಯ ಪರಿದಂದು ।ಅರಳ್ವದರಿವಿನ ಕಣ್ಣು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೨ ॥ bariya Odu barivAda baribuddhi dorakisadu ।para tattvavanu; bEku bEre kaNNadake ॥chirada mamatAvEShTitada poreya paridandu ।arLvadu arivina kaNNu  - Mankutimma ॥ 692 ॥Just education, just debates and just intellect is not enough to understand the cosmic universal truth. A different kind of ;eye; is required for that. When the veil of affection (that clouds our vision) gets torn down, the realization will dawn on us  - they eye of knowledge will thus open.  - Mankutimma
translation: Just education, just debates and just intellect is not enough to understand the cosmic universal truth. A different kind of ;eye; is required for that. When the veil of affection (that clouds our vision) gets torn down, the realization will dawn on us  - they eye of knowledge will thus open.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅರಳ್ವದರಿವಿನ ಕಣ್ಣು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bariya Odu barivAda baribuddhi dorakisadu ।para tattvavanu; bEku bEre kaNNadake ॥chirada mamatAvEShTitada poreya paridandu ।arLvadu arivina kaNNu  - Mankutimma ॥ 692 ॥
kagga: ಬರಿಯೋದು ಬರಿವಾದ ಬರಿಬುದ್ಧಿ ದೊರಕಿಸದು ।ಪರತತ್ತ್ವವನು; ಬೇಕು ಬೇರೆ ಕಣ್ಣದಕೆ ॥ಚಿರದ ಮಮತಾವೇಷ್ಟಿತದ ಪೊರೆಯ ಪರಿದಂದು ।ಅರಳ್ವದರಿವಿನ ಕಣ್ಣು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೨ ॥

content: ಇಂದ್ರಿಯಾತೀತವನು ಪಿಡಿಯಲಿಂದ್ರಿಯಕಳವೆ? ।ಇಂದ್ರಧನು ಕೈದೋಟಿ ಕೊಂಕಿಗೆಟುಕುವುದೆ? ॥ಸಂದೃಶ್ಯವಾತ್ಮಕೆ ಬೇರೆ ಕರಣದಿಂ ।ತಂದ್ರಿ ಬಿಡೆ ದೊರೆವುದದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೩ ॥ indriyAtItavanu piDiyalu indriyake aLave? ।indradhanu kaidOTi  konkige eTakuvude?॥sandRushyavu aatmake bEre  karaNadim।tandri biDe dorevudadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 693 ॥Can the object beyond the senses (the cosmic truth) be ever sensed by the sensory organs? Can the rainbow ever be grasped by the garden hook? The realization of the truth happens to every soul through a different medium. It can only achieved when one shuns laziness and actively looks for it.  - Mankutimma
translation: Can the object beyond the senses (the cosmic truth) be ever sensed by the sensory organs? Can the rainbow ever be grasped by the garden hook? The realization of the truth happens to every soul through a different medium. It can only achieved when one shuns laziness and actively looks for it.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಂದ್ರಿ ಬಿಡೆ ದೊರೆವುದದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: indriyAtItavanu piDiyalu indriyake aLave? ।indradhanu kaidOTi  konkige eTakuvude?॥sandRushyavu aatmake bEre  karaNadim।tandri biDe dorevudadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 693 ॥
kagga: ಇಂದ್ರಿಯಾತೀತವನು ಪಿಡಿಯಲಿಂದ್ರಿಯಕಳವೆ? ।ಇಂದ್ರಧನು ಕೈದೋಟಿ ಕೊಂಕಿಗೆಟುಕುವುದೆ? ॥ಸಂದೃಶ್ಯವಾತ್ಮಕೆ ಬೇರೆ ಕರಣದಿಂ ।ತಂದ್ರಿ ಬಿಡೆ ದೊರೆವುದದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೩ ॥

content: ಬಂಧನಗಳೆಲ್ಲವನು ದಾಟಿ, ಹೊಳೆ ನೆರೆ ನೀರು ।ಸಂಧಿಪುದು ಕಡಲನೀರ್ಗಳನ್; ಅಂತು ಜೀವನ್ ॥ಇಂದ್ರಿಯದ ಕಟ್ಟುಗಳ ಮೀರ್ದೀಕ್ಷೆಯೋಟದಿಂ ।ಸಂದರುಶಿಪನು ಪರನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೪ ॥ bandhanagaLellavanu dATi, hoLe nere nIru ।sandhipudu kaDalanIrgaLan; antu jIvan॥indriyada kaTTugaLa mIrda eekSheya OTadim ।sansdarushipanu parana  - Mankutimma ॥ 694 ॥The flood water from the stream (pond) will break all barriers and flow out towards the ocean to become one with the water of the sea. Just like that our individual souls will break the boundaries (limitations) of senses and become one the cosmic truth only when we let our vision go beyond the sensory world.  - Mankutimma
translation: The flood water from the stream (pond) will break all barriers and flow out towards the ocean to become one with the water of the sea. Just like that our individual souls will break the boundaries (limitations) of senses and become one the cosmic truth only when we let our vision go beyond the sensory world.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಂದರುಶಿಪನು ಪರನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bandhanagaLellavanu dATi, hoLe nere nIru ।sandhipudu kaDalanIrgaLan; antu jIvan॥indriyada kaTTugaLa mIrda eekSheya OTadim ।sansdarushipanu parana  - Mankutimma ॥ 694 ॥
kagga: ಬಂಧನಗಳೆಲ್ಲವನು ದಾಟಿ, ಹೊಳೆ ನೆರೆ ನೀರು ।ಸಂಧಿಪುದು ಕಡಲನೀರ್ಗಳನ್; ಅಂತು ಜೀವನ್ ॥ಇಂದ್ರಿಯದ ಕಟ್ಟುಗಳ ಮೀರ್ದೀಕ್ಷೆಯೋಟದಿಂ ।ಸಂದರುಶಿಪನು ಪರನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೪ ॥

content: ದ್ವಂದ್ವಲೋಕವನಕ್ಷಿಯುಗದೆ  ಪೊರೆದು ತ್ರ್ಯಕ್ಷ- ।ನೊಂದರಿಂ ಮಾಯೆಯಾಟವ ಮೀರುವಂತೆ ॥ಇಂದ್ರಿಯಾತೀತದರ್ಶನಕೆ ಬೇರೊಂದಕ್ಷಿ ।ಸಂಧಾನವನು ಗಳಿಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೫ ॥ dvandva lOkavanu akShiyugade poredu tryakShan ।ondarin mAyeyATava mIruvante ॥indriyAtIta darshanake bErondu akShi ।sandhAnavanu gaLiso  - Mankutimma ॥ 695 ॥Lord Shiva is the ultimate example of the way this world has to be dealt with. He has two eyes using which he will preside over the well being of the entire world. But for philosophical union with the cosmic truth, the has the third eye. With that he can perceive beyond the senses. In our lives, we have to find the balance between what can be seen with our eyes and what has to be experienced with eyes shut.  - Mankutimma
translation: Lord Shiva is the ultimate example of the way this world has to be dealt with. He has two eyes using which he will preside over the well being of the entire world. But for philosophical union with the cosmic truth, the has the third eye. With that he can perceive beyond the senses. In our lives, we have to find the balance between what can be seen with our eyes and what has to be experienced with eyes shut.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಂಧಾನವನು ಗಳಿಸೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dvandva lOkavanu akShiyugade poredu tryakShan ।ondarin mAyeyATava mIruvante ॥indriyAtIta darshanake bErondu akShi ।sandhAnavanu gaLiso  - Mankutimma ॥ 695 ॥

content: ಶರಧಿಯನೀಜುವನು, ಸಮರದಲಿ ಕಾದುವನು ।ಗುರಿಯೊಂದನುಳಿದು ಪೆರತೊಂದ ನೋಡುವನೆ? ॥ಮರೆಯುವನು ತಾನೆಂಬುದನೆ ಮಹಾವೇಶದಲಿ ।ನಿರಹಂತೆಯದು ಮೋಕ್ಷ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೬ ॥ sharadhiyanIjuvanu, samaradali kAduvanu ।guriyondanuLidu peratonda nODuvane? ॥mareyuvanu tAnembudane mahA avEshadali ।nirahanteyadu mOkSha  - Mankutimma ॥ 696 ॥Man does many things to achieve the magnanimous  - he swims across oceans, fights in wars and so on. In his quest, he does not see anything other than the goal. He forgets himself in pursuit of his quest. When the self gets dissolved, it is called Moksha (realization).  - Mankutimma
translation: Man does many things to achieve the magnanimous  - he swims across oceans, fights in wars and so on. In his quest, he does not see anything other than the goal. He forgets himself in pursuit of his quest. When the self gets dissolved, it is called Moksha (realization).  - Mankutimma
title: ನಿರಹಂತೆಯದು ಮೋಕ್ಷ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sharadhiyanIjuvanu, samaradali kAduvanu ।guriyondanuLidu peratonda nODuvane? ॥mareyuvanu tAnembudane mahA avEshadali ।nirahanteyadu mOkSha  - Mankutimma ॥ 696 ॥

content: ಉತ್ತಮತೆಯಿಂತೆಂದು ಮತಿಗೆ ತೋರ್ದೊಡದೇನು? ।ವೃತ್ತಿಯೊಳ್ ಅದೂರಿ ಸ್ವಭಾವಾಂಶವಾಗಲ್ ॥ಮತ್ತುಮತ್ತನುವರ್ತಿಸುತ, ಭಂಗವಾದಂದು ।ಯತ್ನಿಸಿನ್ನುಂ ಮರಳಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೭ ॥ uttamate intendu matige tOrdoDe adEnu? ।vRuttiyoL adu oori svabhAva amshavAgal ॥mattu mattu anuvartisuta, bhangavAdandu ।yatnisu innum maraLi  - Mankutimma ॥ 697 ॥It is not enough if the mind can know what is the righteous thing to do. One has to put it to practice in daily life again and again so that it becomes his nature. If it is broken for some reason, then start again.  - Mankutimma
translation: It is not enough if the mind can know what is the righteous thing to do. One has to put it to practice in daily life again and again so that it becomes his nature. If it is broken for some reason, then start again.  - Mankutimma
title: ಯತ್ನಿಸಿನ್ನುಂ ಮರಳಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: uttamate intendu matige tOrdoDe adEnu? ।vRuttiyoL adu oori svabhAva amshavAgal ॥mattu mattu anuvartisuta, bhangavAdandu ।yatnisu innum maraLi  - Mankutimma ॥ 697 ॥
kagga: ಉತ್ತಮತೆಯಿಂತೆಂದು ಮತಿಗೆ ತೋರ್ದೊಡದೇನು? ।ವೃತ್ತಿಯೊಳ್ ಅದೂರಿ ಸ್ವಭಾವಾಂಶವಾಗಲ್ ॥ಮತ್ತುಮತ್ತನುವರ್ತಿಸುತ, ಭಂಗವಾದಂದು ।ಯತ್ನಿಸಿನ್ನುಂ ಮರಳಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೭ ॥

content: ಎಡವದೆಯೆ, ಮೈಗಾಯವಡೆಯದೆಯೆ, ಮಗುವಾರು ।ನಡೆಯ ಕಲಿತವನು? ಮತಿನೀತಿಗತಿಯಂತು ॥ತಡವರಿಸಿ ಮುಗ್ಗರಿಸಿ ಬಿದ್ದು ಮತ್ತೆದ್ದು ಮೈ- ।ದಡವಿಕೊಳುವವರೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೮ ॥ eDavadeye, mai gaaya oDayadeye, maguvAru ।naDeya kalitavanu? matinItigatiyantu ॥taDavarisi muggarisi biddu matteddu ।madaDavikoLuvavarella  - Mankutimma ॥ 698 ॥Is there any child that has learned to walk without ever having tripped, without breaking open a wound? Similar is the story of wisdom. One does err (and get hurt), regain composure  - shake it off and continue. Troubles and setbacks are natural.  - Mankutimma
translation: Is there any child that has learned to walk without ever having tripped, without breaking open a wound? Similar is the story of wisdom. One does err (and get hurt), regain composure  - shake it off and continue. Troubles and setbacks are natural.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೈದಡವಿಕೊಳುವವರೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: eDavadeye, mai gaaya oDayadeye, maguvAru ।naDeya kalitavanu? matinItigatiyantu ॥taDavarisi muggarisi biddu matteddu ।madaDavikoLuvavarella  - Mankutimma ॥ 698 ॥
kagga: ಎಡವದೆಯೆ, ಮೈಗಾಯವಡೆಯದೆಯೆ, ಮಗುವಾರು ।ನಡೆಯ ಕಲಿತವನು? ಮತಿನೀತಿಗತಿಯಂತು ॥ತಡವರಿಸಿ ಮುಗ್ಗರಿಸಿ ಬಿದ್ದು ಮತ್ತೆದ್ದು ಮೈ- ।ದಡವಿಕೊಳುವವರೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೮ ॥

content: ಏಸು ಸಲ ತಪಗೈದುದೇಸು ಬನ್ನವನಾಂತು ।ಕೌಶಿಕಂ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮರ್ಷಿಪದಕರ್ಹನಾದನ್? ॥ಘಾಸಿಪಡುತಿನ್ನೊಮ್ಮೆ ಮತ್ತೊಮ್ಮೆ ಮರಮರಳಿ ।ಲೇಸಾಗಿಸಾತ್ಮವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೯ ॥ Esu sala tapagaidu Esu bannavanu aantu ।kaushikam brahmarShi padake arha nAdan ॥ghAsi paDuta innomme mattomme mara maraLi ।lEsAgisu aatmavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 699 ॥How many times did Vishvamitra (Koushika) undertook stringent penances to attain the position of Brahmarshi? He failed many times. Yet, he kept trying time and again. That way he refined his soul. We should persevere like him towards our goal in spite of repeated failures.  - Mankutimma
translation: How many times did Vishvamitra (Koushika) undertook stringent penances to attain the position of Brahmarshi? He failed many times. Yet, he kept trying time and again. That way he refined his soul. We should persevere like him towards our goal in spite of repeated failures.  - Mankutimma
title: ಲೇಸಾಗಿಸಾತ್ಮವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Esu sala tapagaidu Esu bannavanu aantu ।kaushikam brahmarShi padake arha nAdan ॥ghAsi paDuta innomme mattomme mara maraLi ।lEsAgisu aatmavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 699 ॥
kagga: ಏಸು ಸಲ ತಪಗೈದುದೇಸು ಬನ್ನವನಾಂತು ।ಕೌಶಿಕಂ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮರ್ಷಿಪದಕರ್ಹನಾದನ್? ॥ಘಾಸಿಪಡುತಿನ್ನೊಮ್ಮೆ ಮತ್ತೊಮ್ಮೆ ಮರಮರಳಿ ।ಲೇಸಾಗಿಸಾತ್ಮವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೯೯ ॥

content: ವಾಸನೆ ವಿವೇಚನೆಗಳೆರಡಕಂ ಸಂಗರ್ಷ ।ಪ್ರಾಚೀನಕಂ ಪೌರುಷಕ್ಕಮಿರುವಂತೆ  ॥ಆಶಾವಿನಾಶಮುಂ ಧೀಶಕ್ತಿಯುದ್ಭವಮುಮ್ ।ಈಶಪ್ರಸಾದದಿಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೦ ॥ vAsane vivEchanegaLu eraDakam sangarSha।prAchInakam pauruShakkam iruvante ॥aashA vinaashamum dhIshaktiya udbhavamum ।eeshaprasAdadim  - Mankutimma ॥ 700 ॥There are always struggles between these  - urge to indulge and wisdom that says to refrain, old wisdom and new enthusiasm. It depends on the strength of the individual which one wins. But to be able to destroy desire and enhance wisdom, one needs God;s grace and that alone.  - Mankutimma
translation: There are always struggles between these  - urge to indulge and wisdom that says to refrain, old wisdom and new enthusiasm. It depends on the strength of the individual which one wins. But to be able to destroy desire and enhance wisdom, one needs God;s grace and that alone.  - Mankutimma
title: ಈಶಪ್ರಸಾದದಿಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vAsane vivEchanegaLu eraDakam sangarSha।prAchInakam pauruShakkam iruvante ॥aashA vinaashamum dhIshaktiya udbhavamum ।eeshaprasAdadim  - Mankutimma ॥ 700 ॥
kagga: ವಾಸನೆ ವಿವೇಚನೆಗಳೆರಡಕಂ ಸಂಗರ್ಷ ।ಪ್ರಾಚೀನಕಂ ಪೌರುಷಕ್ಕಮಿರುವಂತೆ  ॥ಆಶಾವಿನಾಶಮುಂ ಧೀಶಕ್ತಿಯುದ್ಭವಮುಮ್ ।ಈಶಪ್ರಸಾದದಿಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೦ ॥

content: ಎರಡು ಕೋಣೆಗಳ ನೀಂ ಮಾಡು ಮನದಾಲಯದಿ ।ಹೊರಕೋಣೆಯಲಿ ಲೋಗರಾಟಗಳನಾಡು ॥ವಿರಮಿಸೊಬ್ಬನೆ ಮೌನದೊಳಮನೆಯಲಿ ಶಾಂತಿಯಲಿ ।ವರಯೋಗಸೂತ್ರವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೧ ॥ eraDu kONegaLa nIm mADu manadAlayadi ।horakONeyali lOgaraaTagaLanADu ॥viramisobbane maunadi oLamaneya shAntiyali ।vara yOga sUtravidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 701 ॥You make two rooms in your mind. In the outer room, you go about performing worldly actions that is required to be done in order to survive this world. You rest alone in the inner room remain silent. You will find peace. This is the the way you will find balance in life.  - Mankutimma
translation: You make two rooms in your mind. In the outer room, you go about performing worldly actions that is required to be done in order to survive this world. You rest alone in the inner room remain silent. You will find peace. This is the the way you will find balance in life.  - Mankutimma
title: ವರಯೋಗಸೂತ್ರವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: eraDu kONegaLa nIm mADu manadAlayadi ।horakONeyali lOgaraaTagaLanADu ॥viramisobbane maunadi oLamaneya shAntiyali ।vara yOga sUtravidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 701 ॥
kagga: ಎರಡು ಕೋಣೆಗಳ ನೀಂ ಮಾಡು ಮನದಾಲಯದಿ ।ಹೊರಕೋಣೆಯಲಿ ಲೋಗರಾಟಗಳನಾಡು ॥ವಿರಮಿಸೊಬ್ಬನೆ ಮೌನದೊಳಮನೆಯಲಿ ಶಾಂತಿಯಲಿ ।ವರಯೋಗಸೂತ್ರವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೧ ॥

content: ಬೇಕು ಜೀವನಯೋಗಕೊಂದು ಬಹುಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮನಯ । ಬೇಕೊಂದು ಜಾಗರೂರಕತೆ, ಬುದ್ಧಿ ಸಮತೆ ॥ ತಾಕನೊಂದನು ಯೋಗಿ, ನೂಕನೊಂದನು ಜಗದಿ । ಎಕಾಕಿ ಸಹವಾಸಿ – ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೩ ॥ bEku jIvana yOgakondu bahusUkShma naya । bEkondu jAgarUkate, buddhi samate ॥ tAkanondanu yOgi, nUkanondanu jagadi । ekAki sahavAsi – Mankutimma ॥ 703 ॥ Happiness in life needs a very precise balance. It needs utmost caution and tranquility of mind. A practitioner of this art will not get attached to any thing in life. He will neither reject anything. He is standing alone while being friends with the entire world. – Mankutimma
translation: Happiness in life needs a very precise balance. It needs utmost caution and tranquility of mind. A practitioner of this art will not get attached to any thing in life. He will neither reject anything. He is standing alone while being friends with the entire world. – Mankutimma
title: ಎಕಾಕಿ ಸಹವಾಸಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bEku jIvana yOgakondu bahusUkShma naya । bEkondu jAgarUkate, buddhi samate ॥ tAkanondanu yOgi, nUkanondanu jagadi । ekAki sahavAsi – Mankutimma ॥ 703 ॥
kagga: ಬೇಕು ಜೀವನಯೋಗಕೊಂದು ಬಹುಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮನಯ । ಬೇಕೊಂದು ಜಾಗರೂರಕತೆ, ಬುದ್ಧಿ ಸಮತೆ ॥ ತಾಕನೊಂದನು ಯೋಗಿ, ನೂಕನೊಂದನು ಜಗದಿ । ಎಕಾಕಿ ಸಹವಾಸಿ – ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೩ ॥

content: ಮನೆಯ ಸಂಸಾರದಲಿ ವಾಸವಿರುತಾಗಾಗ ।ನೆನೆದು ನೀಂ ದೇಗುಲಕೆ ಪೋಗಿಬರುವಂತೆ ॥ದಿನವೆಲ್ಲ ದೇವಸನ್ನಿಧಿಯೊಳಿರುತಾಗಾಗ ।ಮನೆಗೆ ಬರುವನವೊಲಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೨ ॥ maneya samsAradali vAsaviruta aagAga ।nenedu nIm degulake pOgi baruvante ॥dinavella dEva sannidhiyoL iruta aagAga ।manege baruvanavOl iru  - Mankutimma ॥ 702 ॥You live in this material world all the time. You remember God and visit the temple once in a while. But mentally, you should be close to God most of the time and visit home once in a while.  - Mankutimma
translation: You live in this material world all the time. You remember God and visit the temple once in a while. But mentally, you should be close to God most of the time and visit home once in a while.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮನೆಗೆ ಬರುವನವೊಲಿರು – ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: maneya samsAradali vAsaviruta aagAga ।nenedu nIm degulake pOgi baruvante ॥dinavella dEva sannidhiyoL iruta aagAga ।manege baruvanavOl iru  - Mankutimma ॥ 702 ॥
kagga: ಮನೆಯ ಸಂಸಾರದಲಿ ವಾಸವಿರುತಾಗಾಗ ।ನೆನೆದು ನೀಂ ದೇಗುಲಕೆ ಪೋಗಿಬರುವಂತೆ ॥ದಿನವೆಲ್ಲ ದೇವಸನ್ನಿಧಿಯೊಳಿರುತಾಗಾಗ ।ಮನೆಗೆ ಬರುವನವೊಲಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೨ ॥

content: ಸಮತೆಸಂಯಮಶಮಗಳಿಂ ಭವವನೋಲಗಿಸೆ ।ಸಮನಿಪುದು ಮತಿಯ ಹದವಾತ್ಮಾನುಭವಕೆ ॥ಮಮತೆಯಳಿವಿಂ ಜ್ಞಾನ; ಪಾಂಡಿತ್ಯದಿಂದಲ್ಲ ।ಶ್ರಮಿಸಿಳೆಯ ಗಾಣದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೪ ॥ samate samyama shamagaLim bhavavanu Olagise ।samanipudu matiya hadava atmAnubhavake ॥mamateya aLivim jnAna; pAnDityadindalla ।shramisu iLeya gANadali  - Mankutimma ॥ 704 ॥See everyone equally. Have control over your senses. Exercise restraint. You should serve the world thus. If you do so, the mind will be in your control and lead to beautiful experiences of the soul. Knowledge comes when the attachment ends  - not by being a scholar. You have to work hard on the shop-floor of this world. There is no other way.  - Mankutimma
translation: See everyone equally. Have control over your senses. Exercise restraint. You should serve the world thus. If you do so, the mind will be in your control and lead to beautiful experiences of the soul. Knowledge comes when the attachment ends  - not by being a scholar. You have to work hard on the shop-floor of this world. There is no other way.  - Mankutimma
title: ಶ್ರಮಿಸಿಳೆಯ ಗಾಣದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: samate samyama shamagaLim bhavavanu Olagise ।samanipudu matiya hadava atmAnubhavake ॥mamateya aLivim jnAna; pAnDityadindalla ।shramisu iLeya gANadali  - Mankutimma ॥ 704 ॥
kagga: ಸಮತೆಸಂಯಮಶಮಗಳಿಂ ಭವವನೋಲಗಿಸೆ ।ಸಮನಿಪುದು ಮತಿಯ ಹದವಾತ್ಮಾನುಭವಕೆ ॥ಮಮತೆಯಳಿವಿಂ ಜ್ಞಾನ; ಪಾಂಡಿತ್ಯದಿಂದಲ್ಲ ।ಶ್ರಮಿಸಿಳೆಯ ಗಾಣದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೪ ॥

content: ಸಂತತದ ಶಿಕ್ಷೆಯಿಂ ದೀರ್ಘದಭ್ಯಾಸದಿಂ- ।ದಂತರಂಗದ ಕಡಲು ಶಾಂತಿಗೊಳಲಹುದು ॥ಸಂತೃಪ್ತವೃತ್ತಿಯಿಂದೇಕಾಂತಸೇವೆಯಿಂ ।ಸಂತಯಿಸು ಚಿತ್ತವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೫ ॥ santatada shikSheyim dIrghada abhyAsadinda ।antarangada kaDalu shaantigoLalahudu ॥santRupta vRuttiyinda EkAnta sEveyim ।santayisu chittavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 705 ॥One must punish the mind for straying always and resort to long term training on austerity. Only then one can attain inner tranquillity. One must placate his mind by being satisfied at work and serving (God) alone.  - Mankutimma
translation: One must punish the mind for straying always and resort to long term training on austerity. Only then one can attain inner tranquillity. One must placate his mind by being satisfied at work and serving (God) alone.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಂತಯಿಸು ಚಿತ್ತವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: santatada shikSheyim dIrghada abhyAsadinda ।antarangada kaDalu shaantigoLalahudu ॥santRupta vRuttiyinda EkAnta sEveyim ।santayisu chittavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 705 ॥
kagga: ಸಂತತದ ಶಿಕ್ಷೆಯಿಂ ದೀರ್ಘದಭ್ಯಾಸದಿಂ- ।ದಂತರಂಗದ ಕಡಲು ಶಾಂತಿಗೊಳಲಹುದು ॥ಸಂತೃಪ್ತವೃತ್ತಿಯಿಂದೇಕಾಂತಸೇವೆಯಿಂ ।ಸಂತಯಿಸು ಚಿತ್ತವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೫ ॥

content: ಅರಸಡವಿಗೈದಿದೊಡಮ್, ಅವನಿತ್ತ ಪಾದುಕೆಗ- ।ಳೊರೆಯದೊಡಮೆನನಂ, ತಾಂ‌  ವರದಿಯೊರೆದು॥ದೊರೆತನದ ಭಾರವನು ಹೊತ್ತು ದೊರೆಯಾಗದಾ ।ಭರತನವೊಲಿರು ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೬ ॥ arasu aDavige aididoDam, avanitta pAdukegaLa ।oreyadoDam Enanam, tAm varadiyoredu ॥doretanada bhAravanu hottu doreyAgada aa ।bharatanavol iru nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 706 ॥The King was exiled to the forest. But he brought his sandals to the city and placed them on the throne. He gave updates (to the throne) on the matters of the state even when not asked for. He bore the burden of being a king without ever being one. You must be like that Bharatha.  - Mankutimma
translation: The King was exiled to the forest. But he brought his sandals to the city and placed them on the throne. He gave updates (to the throne) on the matters of the state even when not asked for. He bore the burden of being a king without ever being one. You must be like that Bharatha.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭರತನವೊಲಿರು ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: arasu aDavige aididoDam, avanitta pAdukegaLa ।oreyadoDam Enanam, tAm varadiyoredu ॥doretanada bhAravanu hottu doreyAgada aa ।bharatanavol iru nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 706 ॥
kagga: ಅರಸಡವಿಗೈದಿದೊಡಮ್, ಅವನಿತ್ತ ಪಾದುಕೆಗ- ।ಳೊರೆಯದೊಡಮೆನನಂ, ತಾಂ‌  ವರದಿಯೊರೆದು॥ದೊರೆತನದ ಭಾರವನು ಹೊತ್ತು ದೊರೆಯಾಗದಾ ।ಭರತನವೊಲಿರು ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೬ ॥

content: ಒಡೆಯನೆಂದೋ ಬಂದು ಕೇಳ್ವನದಕುತ್ತರವ ।ಕೊಡಬೇಕು ತಾನೆನುವವೊಲು ಋಜುತೆಯಿಂದ ॥ಒಡಲ, ಜಾಣಿನ, ಜೀವಶಕ್ತಿಗಳನೆಲ್ಲವನು ।ಮುಡುಪುಕೊಟ್ಟನು ಭರತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೭ ॥ oDeyanu endO bandu kELvanu adakuttarava ।koDabEku tAnu enuvavolu Rujuteyinda ॥oDala, jANIna, jIvashaktigaLanellavanu ।muDUpukoTTanu bharata  - Mankutimma ॥ 707 ॥The real owner of this (Kingdom) will come back one day. He will ask for a detailed account and I must provide one. This was Bharata;s mantra while running the state while Rama was away. He was always righteous. He gave his body, mind and his life towards this single goal.  - Mankutimma
translation: The real owner of this (Kingdom) will come back one day. He will ask for a detailed account and I must provide one. This was Bharata;s mantra while running the state while Rama was away. He was always righteous. He gave his body, mind and his life towards this single goal.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮುಡುಪುಕೊಟ್ಟನು ಭರತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: oDeyanu endO bandu kELvanu adakuttarava ।koDabEku tAnu enuvavolu Rujuteyinda ॥oDala, jANIna, jIvashaktigaLanellavanu ।muDUpukoTTanu bharata  - Mankutimma ॥ 707 ॥
kagga: ಒಡೆಯನೆಂದೋ ಬಂದು ಕೇಳ್ವನದಕುತ್ತರವ ।ಕೊಡಬೇಕು ತಾನೆನುವವೊಲು ಋಜುತೆಯಿಂದ ॥ಒಡಲ, ಜಾಣಿನ, ಜೀವಶಕ್ತಿಗಳನೆಲ್ಲವನು ।ಮುಡುಪುಕೊಟ್ಟನು ಭರತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೭ ॥

content: ಒಡರಿಸುವನೆಲ್ಲವನ್, ಅದಾವುದುಂ ತನದಲ್ಲ ।ಬಿಡನೊಂದನುಂ ರಾಜ್ಯ ತನದಲ್ಲವೆಂದು ॥ನಡೆವಂ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರದಲಿ ಸಲಿಸುತೆ ವಿಧೇಯತೆಯ ।ಕಡುಯೋಗಿ ಭರತನಲ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೮ ॥ oDarisuvanu ellavan, adAvudu tanadalla ।biDanondanum rAjya tanadallavendu  ॥naDevam svatantradali salisute vidhEyateya ।kaDuyOgi bharatanala?  - Mankutimma ॥ 708 ॥He commands the entire state. But realizes that it is not his to command. He looks over every thing even if it is not his responsibility. He is free to do anything. But he chooses to be faithful to his brother. Isn;t Bharata a great yogi (ascetic)?  - Mankutimma
translation: He commands the entire state. But realizes that it is not his to command. He looks over every thing even if it is not his responsibility. He is free to do anything. But he chooses to be faithful to his brother. Isn;t Bharata a great yogi (ascetic)?  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಡುಯೋಗಿ ಭರತನಲ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: oDarisuvanu ellavan, adAvudu tanadalla ।biDanondanum rAjya tanadallavendu  ॥naDevam svatantradali salisute vidhEyateya ।kaDuyOgi bharatanala?  - Mankutimma ॥ 708 ॥
kagga: ಒಡರಿಸುವನೆಲ್ಲವನ್, ಅದಾವುದುಂ ತನದಲ್ಲ ।ಬಿಡನೊಂದನುಂ ರಾಜ್ಯ ತನದಲ್ಲವೆಂದು ॥ನಡೆವಂ ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರದಲಿ ಸಲಿಸುತೆ ವಿಧೇಯತೆಯ ।ಕಡುಯೋಗಿ ಭರತನಲ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೮ ॥

content: ದೊರೆತನದ ಜಟಿಲಗಳ, ಕುಟಿಲಗಳ, ಖಠಿನಗಳ ।ಭರತನುಳಿಸಿದನೆ ರಾಮನ ತೀರ್ಪಿಗೆಂದು ॥ಅರಿವಿಗಿಹ ಕರ್ತವ್ಯಭಾರವನು ತಾನರಿತು ।ಧುರವ ಧರಿಸಿದನವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೯ ॥ doretanada jaTilagaLa, kuTilagaLa, khaThinagala ।bharatanu uLisidane rAmana tIrpigendu ॥arivigiha kartavyabhAravanu tAnaritu ।dhurava dharisidanu avanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 709 ॥There are many dilemmas and tough decisions that a king has to make  - dilemmas, strategies and difficulties. Did Bharata defer dealing with them till Rama comes back? He realized the full weight of his position and the performed his duties worthy of a King even if he was not a king.  - Mankutimma
translation: There are many dilemmas and tough decisions that a king has to make  - dilemmas, strategies and difficulties. Did Bharata defer dealing with them till Rama comes back? He realized the full weight of his position and the performed his duties worthy of a King even if he was not a king.  - Mankutimma
title: ಧುರವ ಧರಿಸಿದನವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: doretanada jaTilagaLa, kuTilagaLa, khaThinagala ।bharatanu uLisidane rAmana tIrpigendu ॥arivigiha kartavyabhAravanu tAnaritu ।dhurava dharisidanu avanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 709 ॥
kagga: ದೊರೆತನದ ಜಟಿಲಗಳ, ಕುಟಿಲಗಳ, ಖಠಿನಗಳ ।ಭರತನುಳಿಸಿದನೆ ರಾಮನ ತೀರ್ಪಿಗೆಂದು ॥ಅರಿವಿಗಿಹ ಕರ್ತವ್ಯಭಾರವನು ತಾನರಿತು ।ಧುರವ ಧರಿಸಿದನವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೦೯ ॥

content: ಪ್ರತ್ಯಕ್ಷವಿಲ್ಲದಾ ಸ್ವಾಮಿಯಂ ನೆನೆನೆನೆದು ।ಸತ್ಯಭಕ್ತಿಯ ಸೇವೆಗೆಯ್ದವಂ ಭರತಂ ॥ನಿತ್ಯಜೀವನದಿ ನೀನಾ ನಯವನನುಸರಿಸೊ ।ಸ್ವತ್ವದಾಶೆಯ ನೀಗಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧೦ ॥ pratyakShavillada aa svAmiyam nene nenedu ।satya bhaktiya sEvegeydavam bharatam ॥nityajIvanadi nInu aa nayavanu anusariso ।svatvada aasheyanu nIgi  - Mankutimma ॥ 710 ॥The master is not present to oversee. Yet, Bharata always kept him in his mind and served the cause (being a king) with true dedication. In every day life, we must follow this principle everyday. We must set aside our selfish desires.  - Mankutimma
translation: The master is not present to oversee. Yet, Bharata always kept him in his mind and served the cause (being a king) with true dedication. In every day life, we must follow this principle everyday. We must set aside our selfish desires.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸ್ವತ್ವದಾಶೆಯ ನೀಗಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: pratyakShavillada aa svAmiyam nene nenedu ।satya bhaktiya sEvegeydavam bharatam ॥nityajIvanadi nInu aa nayavanu anusariso ।svatvada aasheyanu nIgi  - Mankutimma ॥ 710 ॥
kagga: ಪ್ರತ್ಯಕ್ಷವಿಲ್ಲದಾ ಸ್ವಾಮಿಯಂ ನೆನೆನೆನೆದು ।ಸತ್ಯಭಕ್ತಿಯ ಸೇವೆಗೆಯ್ದವಂ ಭರತಂ ॥ನಿತ್ಯಜೀವನದಿ ನೀನಾ ನಯವನನುಸರಿಸೊ ।ಸ್ವತ್ವದಾಶೆಯ ನೀಗಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧೦ ॥

content: ಧರೆಯೆ ಕೋಸಲ, ಪರಬ್ರಹ್ಮನೇ ರಘುವರನು ।ಭರತವೊಲನುಪಾಲನಕ್ರಿಯರು ನಾವು ॥ಅರಸನೂಳಿಗ ನಮ್ಮ ಸಂಸಾರದಾಡಳಿತ ।ಹರುಷದಿಂ ಸೇವಿಸೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧೧ ॥ dhareye kOsala, parabrahmanE raghuvaranu ।bharatanavol anupAlana kriyaru nAvu ॥arasana ULiga namma samsArada ADaLita ।hariShadim sEviselo  - Mankutimma ॥ 711 ॥This world is like Kosala (Kingdom of Rama). The creator is like Rama. Like Bharata we are all just care-takers following orders. The owner is still the king. But the administration of this world is in our hands. Let us serve him with joy.  - Mankutimma
translation: This world is like Kosala (Kingdom of Rama). The creator is like Rama. Like Bharata we are all just care-takers following orders. The owner is still the king. But the administration of this world is in our hands. Let us serve him with joy.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹರುಷದಿಂ ಸೇವಿಸೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dhareye kOsala, parabrahmanE raghuvaranu ।bharatanavol anupAlana kriyaru nAvu ॥arasana ULiga namma samsArada ADaLita ।hariShadim sEviselo  - Mankutimma ॥ 711 ॥
kagga: ಧರೆಯೆ ಕೋಸಲ, ಪರಬ್ರಹ್ಮನೇ ರಘುವರನು ।ಭರತವೊಲನುಪಾಲನಕ್ರಿಯರು ನಾವು ॥ಅರಸನೂಳಿಗ ನಮ್ಮ ಸಂಸಾರದಾಡಳಿತ ।ಹರುಷದಿಂ ಸೇವಿಸೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧೧ ॥

content: ನಾಸಿಕದೊಳುಚ್ಛ್ವಾಸ ನಿಶ್ವಾಸ ನಡೆವಂತೆ ।ಸೂಸುತ್ತಲಿರಲಿ ನಿನ್ನಿರವು ಮಂಗಳವ ॥ಆಶಿಸದೆ ಸಂಕಲ್ಪಯತ್ನಗಳನಿನಿತುಮಂ ।ಸಾಜವಾಗಲಿ ಸಯ್ಪು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧೨ ॥ nAsikadoL ucChvAsa nishvAsa naDevante ।sUsuttalirali ninna iravu mangaLava ॥aashissade sankalpa yatnagalanu initum।sAjavAgali saypu  - Mankutimma ॥ 712 ॥The nose inhales and exhales for as long as you are alive. There is no effort there. Let your existence be like that. You bring good things to those around without trying too hard or working towards it exclusively. Let doing good come naturally to you.  - Mankutimma
translation: The nose inhales and exhales for as long as you are alive. There is no effort there. Let your existence be like that. You bring good things to those around without trying too hard or working towards it exclusively. Let doing good come naturally to you.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಾಜವಾಗಲಿ ಸಯ್ಪು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nAsikadoL ucChvAsa nishvAsa naDevante ।sUsuttalirali ninna iravu mangaLava ॥aashissade sankalpa yatnagalanu initum।sAjavAgali saypu  - Mankutimma ॥ 712 ॥
kagga: ನಾಸಿಕದೊಳುಚ್ಛ್ವಾಸ ನಿಶ್ವಾಸ ನಡೆವಂತೆ ।ಸೂಸುತ್ತಲಿರಲಿ ನಿನ್ನಿರವು ಮಂಗಳವ ॥ಆಶಿಸದೆ ಸಂಕಲ್ಪಯತ್ನಗಳನಿನಿತುಮಂ ।ಸಾಜವಾಗಲಿ ಸಯ್ಪು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧೨ ॥

content: ಕಾಯಕವ ಚರಿಪುದಾತ್ಮ ಜುಗುಪ್ಸೆಗೆಡೆಗುಡದೆ ।ಆಯತದ ಲೋಕಧರ್ಮಗಳ ಪಾಲಿಪುದು ॥ಆಯತಿಗೆ ಬಾಯ್ಬಿಡದೆ ಗತವ ಚಿಂತಿಸದಿಹುದು ।ಧ್ಯೇಯವೀ ಸೂತ್ರಗಳು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧೩ ॥ kAyakava charipudu Atma jugupsege eDeguDade ।Ayatada lOkadharmagaLa pAlipudu ॥Ayatige bAybiDade gatava chintisade ihudu ।dhyEyavI sUtragaLu  - Mankutimma ॥ 713 ॥To do work in this world in such a way that the soul is not sad (compromised). To follow all the rules of life in this world. Not to look forward for future gains. Not to think about the past. These are great morals that one must meditate on.  - Mankutimma
translation: To do work in this world in such a way that the soul is not sad (compromised). To follow all the rules of life in this world. Not to look forward for future gains. Not to think about the past. These are great morals that one must meditate on.  - Mankutimma
title: ಧ್ಯೇಯವೀ ಸೂತ್ರಗಳು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kAyakava charipudu Atma jugupsege eDeguDade ।Ayatada lOkadharmagaLa pAlipudu ॥Ayatige bAybiDade gatava chintisade ihudu ।dhyEyavI sUtragaLu  - Mankutimma ॥ 713 ॥

content: ಪರಿಮಿತಿಯನರಿತಾಶೆ, ಪರವಶತೆಯಳಿದ ಸುಖ ।ವಿರತಿಯೊಡವೆರೆದ ಲೋಕೋದ್ಯೋಗಯುಕ್ತಿ ॥ಪರಿಕಿಸುತ ಜೀವಿತವ ಸತ್ಯವನೆ ಪಿಡಿವ ಮತಿ ।ವರಗಳೀ ನಾಲ್ಕೆ ವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧೪ ॥ parimitiyan arita aashe, paravashateyu aLida sukha ।viratiyoDavereda lOkOdyOga yukti ॥parikisuta jIvitava satyavane piDiva mati ।varagaLI nAlke vara  - Mankutimma ॥ 714 ॥Having desires that know their limits. Happiness that is got when one is freed from bondage. Being able to perform duties of the world with detachment. Having an intellect that can dig the facts of life to search and hold on to the truth. These are four boons and the only boons that one must wish for.  - Mankutimma
translation: Having desires that know their limits. Happiness that is got when one is freed from bondage. Being able to perform duties of the world with detachment. Having an intellect that can dig the facts of life to search and hold on to the truth. These are four boons and the only boons that one must wish for.  - Mankutimma
title: ವರಗಳೀ ನಾಲ್ಕೆ ವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: parimitiyan arita aashe, paravashateyu aLida sukha ।viratiyoDavereda lOkOdyOga yukti ॥parikisuta jIvitava satyavane piDiva mati ।varagaLI nAlke vara  - Mankutimma ॥ 714 ॥
kagga: ಪರಿಮಿತಿಯನರಿತಾಶೆ, ಪರವಶತೆಯಳಿದ ಸುಖ ।ವಿರತಿಯೊಡವೆರೆದ ಲೋಕೋದ್ಯೋಗಯುಕ್ತಿ ॥ಪರಿಕಿಸುತ ಜೀವಿತವ ಸತ್ಯವನೆ ಪಿಡಿವ ಮತಿ ।ವರಗಳೀ ನಾಲ್ಕೆ ವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧೪ ॥

content: ಮೃತನ ಸಂಸಾರಕಥೆ ಶವವಾಹಕರಿಗೇಕೆ? ।ಸತಿಯು ಗೋಳಿಡಲಿ, ಸಾಲಿಗನು ಬೊಬ್ಬಿಡಲಿ ॥ಜಿತಮನದಿ ಚಿತಿಗಟ್ಟಿ ಕೊಂಡೊಯ್ಯುತಿಹರವರು ।ಧೃತಿಯ ತಳೆ ನೀನಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧೬ ॥ mRutana samsAra kathe shava vAhakarigEke?।satiyu gOLiDali, sAliganu bobbiDali ॥jitamanadi chitigaTTi konDoyyutiharu avaru ।dhRutiya taLe nInu antu  - Mankutimma ॥ 716 ॥Do the carriers of a man;s cadaver worry about the stories of his life. They do not care if the wife is crying or the banker who lent him money is creating a ruckus. They seem to have controlled their mind and focused on getting the body away in the coffin. One must try to be detached like them.  - Mankutimma
translation: Do the carriers of a man;s cadaver worry about the stories of his life. They do not care if the wife is crying or the banker who lent him money is creating a ruckus. They seem to have controlled their mind and focused on getting the body away in the coffin. One must try to be detached like them.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭ್ರಮೆಯೊ ಮಿಕ್ಕೆಲ್ಲ ತಪ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mRutana samsAra kathe shava vAhakarigEke?।satiyu gOLiDali, sAliganu bobbiDali ॥jitamanadi chitigaTTi konDoyyutiharu avaru ।dhRutiya taLe nInu antu  - Mankutimma ॥ 716 ॥
kagga: ಮೃತನ ಸಂಸಾರಕಥೆ ಶವವಾಹಕರಿಗೇಕೆ? ।ಸತಿಯು ಗೋಳಿಡಲಿ, ಸಾಲಿಗನು ಬೊಬ್ಬಿಡಲಿ ॥ಜಿತಮನದಿ ಚಿತಿಗಟ್ಟಿ ಕೊಂಡೊಯ್ಯುತಿಹರವರು ।ಧೃತಿಯ ತಳೆ ನೀನಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧೬ ॥

content: ನಿನ್ನ ಹೆಣವನು ನೀನೆ ಹೊತ್ತು ಸಾಗಿಸಬೇಕೊ ।ಅಣ್ಣ ಬಾ ತಮ್ಮ ಬಾ ಎಂದಳುವುದೇಕೋ? ॥ನಿನ್ನೊಡಲೆ ಚಿತೆ, ಜಗದ ತಂಟೆಗಳೆ ಸವುದೆಯುರಿ ।ಮಣ್ಣೆ ತರ್ಪಣ ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧೭ ॥ ninna heNavanu nIne hottu sAgisabEko ।aNNa baa tamma baa endu aLuvudEkO? ॥ninnoDale chite, jagada tanTegaLe savude uri ।maNNe tarpaNa ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 717 ॥You must carry your own dead body (burden of life). You should not call for help from your brothers and friends. You must live life such that there is no weight left when you die. Your body is the pyre. The troubles that the world gives you is the firewood. The dirt that the world sets on you while working is the cleansing water. You must die (perform all duties you are supposed to) before your body dies.  - Mankutimma
translation: You must carry your own dead body (burden of life). You should not call for help from your brothers and friends. You must live life such that there is no weight left when you die. Your body is the pyre. The troubles that the world gives you is the firewood. The dirt that the world sets on you while working is the cleansing water. You must die (perform all duties you are supposed to) before your body dies.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಣ್ಣೆ ತರ್ಪಣ ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ninna heNavanu nIne hottu sAgisabEko ।aNNa baa tamma baa endu aLuvudEkO? ॥ninnoDale chite, jagada tanTegaLe savude uri ।maNNe tarpaNa ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 717 ॥
kagga: ನಿನ್ನ ಹೆಣವನು ನೀನೆ ಹೊತ್ತು ಸಾಗಿಸಬೇಕೊ ।ಅಣ್ಣ ಬಾ ತಮ್ಮ ಬಾ ಎಂದಳುವುದೇಕೋ? ॥ನಿನ್ನೊಡಲೆ ಚಿತೆ, ಜಗದ ತಂಟೆಗಳೆ ಸವುದೆಯುರಿ ।ಮಣ್ಣೆ ತರ್ಪಣ ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧೭ ॥

content: ತನ್ನ ಶಿಲುಬೆಯ ತಾನೆ ಹೊತ್ತನಲ ಗುರು ಯೇಸು? ।ನಿನ್ನ ಕರ್ಮದ ಹೊರೆಯ ಬಿಡದೆ ನೀನೆ ಹೊರು ॥ಖಿನ್ನನಾಗದೆ ತುಟಿಯ ಬಿಗಿದು ಶವಭಾರವನು ।ಬೆನ್ನಿನಲಿ ಹೊತ್ತು ನಡೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧೮ ॥ tanna shilubheya tAne hottanala guru yEsu? ।ninna karmada horeya biDade nIne horu ॥khinnanAgade tuTiya bigidu shavabhAravanu ।benninali hottu naDe  - Mankutimma ॥ 718 ॥Did Guru Yesu (Jesus) not carry his own crucifix to his death? One must carry his the burden of his actions himself. He must do so with his lips closed (not cribbing). There is no escaping from carrying the burden of death (accounts that have not squared off).  - Mankutimma
translation: Did Guru Yesu (Jesus) not carry his own crucifix to his death? One must carry his the burden of his actions himself. He must do so with his lips closed (not cribbing). There is no escaping from carrying the burden of death (accounts that have not squared off).  - Mankutimma
title: ಬೆನ್ನಿನಲಿ ಹೊತ್ತು ನಡೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tanna shilubheya tAne hottanala guru yEsu? ।ninna karmada horeya biDade nIne horu ॥khinnanAgade tuTiya bigidu shavabhAravanu ।benninali hottu naDe  - Mankutimma ॥ 718 ॥

content: ತಲೆಪಾಗಿನೊಳಕೊಳಕ, ಪಂಚೆನಿರಿಯೊಳಹರಕ  ।ತಿಳಿಸುವೆಯ ರಜಕಗಲ್ಲದೆ ಲೋಗರಿಂಗೆ? ॥ಅಳಲುದುಗುಡಗಳ ನಿನ್ನೊಳಗೆ ಬಯ್ತಿಡದೆ ನೀ ।ನಿಳೆಗೆ ಹರಡುವುದೇಕೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧೯ ॥ tale pAgina oLa koLaka, pancheniriya oLa haraka ।tiLisuveya rajakagallade lOgaringe? ॥aLalu duguDagaLa ninnoLage baytiDade nInu ।iLege haraDuvudEko?  - Mankutimma ॥ 719 ॥You will not show the dirt on inner side of the hat or the tear in the inner folds of the dhoti to the world. You will only share it with your laundry man. Then why do you want to share your grief and anxiety with the whole world?  - Mankutimma
translation: You will not show the dirt on inner side of the hat or the tear in the inner folds of the dhoti to the world. You will only share it with your laundry man. Then why do you want to share your grief and anxiety with the whole world?  - Mankutimma
title: ನೀನಿಳೆಗೆ ಹರಡುವುದೇಕೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tale pAgina oLa koLaka, pancheniriya oLa haraka ।tiLisuveya rajakagallade lOgaringe? ॥aLalu duguDagaLa ninnoLage baytiDade nInu ।iLege haraDuvudEko?  - Mankutimma ॥ 719 ॥
kagga: ತಲೆಪಾಗಿನೊಳಕೊಳಕ, ಪಂಚೆನಿರಿಯೊಳಹರಕ  ।ತಿಳಿಸುವೆಯ ರಜಕಗಲ್ಲದೆ ಲೋಗರಿಂಗೆ? ॥ಅಳಲುದುಗುಡಗಳ ನಿನ್ನೊಳಗೆ ಬಯ್ತಿಡದೆ ನೀ ।ನಿಳೆಗೆ ಹರಡುವುದೇಕೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೧೯ ॥

content: ಹೊಸತನವೆ ಬಾಳು; ಹಳಸಿಕೆಯೆಲ್ಲ ಸಾವು ಬಿಡು ।ರಸವು ನವನವತೆಯಿಂದನುದಿನವು ಹೊಮ್ಮಿ ॥ಹಸನೊಂದು ನುಡಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ನಡೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ನೋಟದಲಿ ।ಪಸರುತಿರೆ ಬಾಳ್ ಚೆಲುವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೦ ॥ hosatanave bALu; haLasikeyella sAvu biDu ।rasavu navanavateyinda anudinavu hommi ॥hasanondu nuDiyalli naDeyalli nOTadali ।pasarutire bAL cheluvu  - Mankutimma ॥ 720 ॥Freshness is life. Stale is death. Get rid of it. Life springs out of that freshness every day. We must spread goodness in the form of words, acts and perspective. Life is beautiful then.  - Mankutimma
translation: Freshness is life. Stale is death. Get rid of it. Life springs out of that freshness every day. We must spread goodness in the form of words, acts and perspective. Life is beautiful then.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪಸರುತಿರೆ ಬಾಳ್ ಚೆಲುವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hosatanave bALu; haLasikeyella sAvu biDu ।rasavu navanavateyinda anudinavu hommi ॥hasanondu nuDiyalli naDeyalli nOTadali ।pasarutire bAL cheluvu  - Mankutimma ॥ 720 ॥
kagga: ಹೊಸತನವೆ ಬಾಳು; ಹಳಸಿಕೆಯೆಲ್ಲ ಸಾವು ಬಿಡು ।ರಸವು ನವನವತೆಯಿಂದನುದಿನವು ಹೊಮ್ಮಿ ॥ಹಸನೊಂದು ನುಡಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ನಡೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ನೋಟದಲಿ ।ಪಸರುತಿರೆ ಬಾಳ್ ಚೆಲುವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೦ ॥

content: ಮೆರೆಯುವುವು ನೂರಾರು ಮೈಮೆಗಳು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ ।ಧರಣಿಯವು, ಗಗನದವು, ಮನುಜಯತ್ನದವು ॥ಪಿರಿದೆಂಬೆನವುಗಳೊಳು ಧರುಮವರಿತವನೊಲುಮೆ ।ಅರಿವುಳ್ಳೊಲುಮೆ ಪಿರಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೧ ॥ mereyuvuvu nUrAru  maimegaLu sRuShTiyali।dharaNiyavu, gaganadavu, manuja yatnadavu ॥piridembenu avugaLoLu dharumava aritavana olume ।arivuLLa olume piridu  - Mankutimma ॥ 721 ॥There are many a wonders in this creation  - wonders of earth, the sky and that of human creation. Of all of them, I consider the love shown by person who knows (and follows) Dharma to be the greatest wonder. When one loves after realization (as opposed to love due to attachment)  - it is great.  - Mankutimma
translation: There are many a wonders in this creation  - wonders of earth, the sky and that of human creation. Of all of them, I consider the love shown by person who knows (and follows) Dharma to be the greatest wonder. When one loves after realization (as opposed to love due to attachment)  - it is great.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅರಿವುಳ್ಳೊಲುಮೆ ಪಿರಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mereyuvuvu nUrAru  maimegaLu sRuShTiyali।dharaNiyavu, gaganadavu, manuja yatnadavu ॥piridembenu avugaLoLu dharumava aritavana olume ।arivuLLa olume piridu  - Mankutimma ॥ 721 ॥
kagga: ಮೆರೆಯುವುವು ನೂರಾರು ಮೈಮೆಗಳು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ ।ಧರಣಿಯವು, ಗಗನದವು, ಮನುಜಯತ್ನದವು ॥ಪಿರಿದೆಂಬೆನವುಗಳೊಳು ಧರುಮವರಿತವನೊಲುಮೆ ।ಅರಿವುಳ್ಳೊಲುಮೆ ಪಿರಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೧ ॥

content: ಚೆಲುವುನಗುವುಗಳ ಕಂಡವನ ಕಣ್ಣರಳುವುದು ।ಅಳುವುನೋವುಗಳ ಕಂಡೊದ್ದೆಯಾಗುವುದು ॥ಇಳೆಯ ದನಿಗವನೆದೆಯೊಳೊಪ್ಪು ಮರುದನಿಯಹುದು ।ಶಿಲೆಯಲ್ಲ ಯೋಗಿಯೆದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೨ ॥ cheluvu naguvugaLa kanDu avana kaNNaraLuvudu ।aLalu nOvugaLa kanDu oddeyAguvudu ॥iLeya danige avanedeya oLa oppu marudaniyahudu ।shileyalla yOgi ede  - Mankutimma ॥ 722 ॥Many people think ascetics who have the universal realization are devoid of feelings and are stone cold. Their eyes (pupils) light up when they see beauty and happiness. They shed tears when they see crying and pain. His heart;s inner voice will respond to all the world sounds appropriately. His heart is not a stone.  - Mankutimma
translation: Many people think ascetics who have the universal realization are devoid of feelings and are stone cold. Their eyes (pupils) light up when they see beauty and happiness. They shed tears when they see crying and pain. His heart;s inner voice will respond to all the world sounds appropriately. His heart is not a stone.  - Mankutimma
title: ಶಿಲೆಯಲ್ಲ ಯೋಗಿಯೆದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: cheluvu naguvugaLa kanDu avana kaNNaraLuvudu ।aLalu nOvugaLa kanDu oddeyAguvudu ॥iLeya danige avanedeya oLa oppu marudaniyahudu ।shileyalla yOgi ede  - Mankutimma ॥ 722 ॥
kagga: ಚೆಲುವುನಗುವುಗಳ ಕಂಡವನ ಕಣ್ಣರಳುವುದು ।ಅಳುವುನೋವುಗಳ ಕಂಡೊದ್ದೆಯಾಗುವುದು ॥ಇಳೆಯ ದನಿಗವನೆದೆಯೊಳೊಪ್ಪು ಮರುದನಿಯಹುದು ।ಶಿಲೆಯಲ್ಲ ಯೋಗಿಯೆದೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೨ ॥

content: ಸ್ವಸ್ಥತೆಯ ಕದಲಿಸದ ಜಗದಾಸ್ಥೆಯೊಂದು ಗುಣ ।ಆಸ್ಥೆಯನು ಕುಂದಿಸದ ತಾಟಸ್ಥ್ಯವೊಂದು ॥ನಷ್ಟಲಾಭಂಗಳಲಿ ಲಘುಹಾಸ್ಯನಯವೊಂದು ।ಸ್ವಸ್ತಿಗಾವಶ್ಯಕವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೩ ॥ svasthateya kadalisada jagada aastheyondu guNa ।aastheyanu  kundisada tATasthyavondu ॥naShTa lAbhangaLa laghuhAsya nayavondu ।svastige aavashyakavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 723 ॥One must love the entire world. But not too much that can spoil your own balance. There must be detachment from everything. But the passion in one;s work must not come down. Both profit and loss have to taken with light humour. All these are required for total well being of yourself.  - Mankutimma
translation: One must love the entire world. But not too much that can spoil your own balance. There must be detachment from everything. But the passion in one;s work must not come down. Both profit and loss have to taken with light humour. All these are required for total well being of yourself.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸ್ವಸ್ತಿಗಾವಶ್ಯಕವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: svasthateya kadalisada jagada aastheyondu guNa ।aastheyanu  kundisada tATasthyavondu ॥naShTa lAbhangaLa laghuhAsya nayavondu ।svastige aavashyakavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 723 ॥
kagga: ಸ್ವಸ್ಥತೆಯ ಕದಲಿಸದ ಜಗದಾಸ್ಥೆಯೊಂದು ಗುಣ ।ಆಸ್ಥೆಯನು ಕುಂದಿಸದ ತಾಟಸ್ಥ್ಯವೊಂದು ॥ನಷ್ಟಲಾಭಂಗಳಲಿ ಲಘುಹಾಸ್ಯನಯವೊಂದು ।ಸ್ವಸ್ತಿಗಾವಶ್ಯಕವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೩ ॥

content: ಸ್ಮಿತವಿರಲಿ ವದನದಲಿ, ಕಿವಿಗೆ ಕೇಳಿಸದಿರಲಿ ।ಹಿತವಿರಲಿ ವಚನದಲಿ, ಋತವ ಬಿಡದಿರಲಿ ॥ಮಿತವಿರಲಿ ಮನಸಿನುದ್ವೇಗದಲಿ, ಭೋಗದಲಿ ।ಅತಿ ಬೇಡವೆಲ್ಲಿಯುಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೪ ॥ smitavirali vadanadali, kivige kELisadirali ।hitavirali vachanadali, Rutava biDadirali ॥mitavirali manasina udvEgadali, bhOgadali ।ati bEDavo elliyum  - Mankutimma ॥ 724 ॥Let there be a smile on your face always. But let it not turn into a laughter that hurts others (let it not fall on other;s ears). Always speak pleasantly. But do not leave the path of truth. There must be moderation in anxiety and indulgence. Let there not be over indulgence in anything.  - Mankutimma
translation: Let there be a smile on your face always. But let it not turn into a laughter that hurts others (let it not fall on other;s ears). Always speak pleasantly. But do not leave the path of truth. There must be moderation in anxiety and indulgence. Let there not be over indulgence in anything.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅತಿ ಬೇಡವೆಲ್ಲಿಯುಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: smitavirali vadanadali, kivige kELisadirali ।hitavirali vachanadali, Rutava biDadirali ॥mitavirali manasina udvEgadali, bhOgadali ।ati bEDavo elliyum  - Mankutimma ॥ 724 ॥
kagga: ಸ್ಮಿತವಿರಲಿ ವದನದಲಿ, ಕಿವಿಗೆ ಕೇಳಿಸದಿರಲಿ ।ಹಿತವಿರಲಿ ವಚನದಲಿ, ಋತವ ಬಿಡದಿರಲಿ ॥ಮಿತವಿರಲಿ ಮನಸಿನುದ್ವೇಗದಲಿ, ಭೋಗದಲಿ ।ಅತಿ ಬೇಡವೆಲ್ಲಿಯುಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೪ ॥

content: ಕಡಲ್ಗಳೊಂದಾದೊಡಂ, ಪೊಡವಿ ಹಬೆಯಾದೊಡಂ ।ಬಿಡದಿರೊಳನೆಮ್ಮದಿಯ, ಬಿಡು ಗಾಬರಿಕೆಯ ॥ಕಡಲ ನೆರೆ ತಗ್ಗುವುದು, ಪೊಡವಿಧೂಳಿಳಿಯುವುದು ।ಗಡುವಿರುವುದೆಲ್ಲಕಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೫ ॥ kaDalgaLu ondAdoDam, poDavi habeyAdoDam ।biDadiru oLa nemmadiya, biDu gAbarikeya ॥kaDala nere tagguvudu, poDavi dhOL iLiyuvudu ।gaDuvu iruvudu ellakam  - Mankutimma ॥ 725 ॥Even if the floods cause the seas to unite (drowning the land in between). Even if the forest is covered in fog. Do not let go of your inner tranquility. Do not feel anxious. The seas will recede. The fog will clear up. There is an end to everything  - good or bad.  - Mankutimma
translation: Even if the floods cause the seas to unite (drowning the land in between). Even if the forest is covered in fog. Do not let go of your inner tranquility. Do not feel anxious. The seas will recede. The fog will clear up. There is an end to everything  - good or bad.  - Mankutimma
title: ಗಡುವಿರುವುದೆಲ್ಲಕಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kaDalgaLu ondAdoDam, poDavi habeyAdoDam ।biDadiru oLa nemmadiya, biDu gAbarikeya ॥kaDala nere tagguvudu, poDavi dhOL iLiyuvudu ।gaDuvu iruvudu ellakam  - Mankutimma ॥ 725 ॥
kagga: ಕಡಲ್ಗಳೊಂದಾದೊಡಂ, ಪೊಡವಿ ಹಬೆಯಾದೊಡಂ ।ಬಿಡದಿರೊಳನೆಮ್ಮದಿಯ, ಬಿಡು ಗಾಬರಿಕೆಯ ॥ಕಡಲ ನೆರೆ ತಗ್ಗುವುದು, ಪೊಡವಿಧೂಳಿಳಿಯುವುದು ।ಗಡುವಿರುವುದೆಲ್ಲಕಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೫ ॥

content: ನಲಿಸುವೊಲಿಸುವ, ಕೆಣಕಿ ಕಾಡಿಸುವ ಮುಳಿಯಿಸುವ ।ಕೆಳೆ ನಂಟು ಹಗೆ ಕಲಹ ಕುಹಕದೋಲೆಗಳಂ ॥ಹಲಬರಿಗೆ ಹಂಚಿ ಬಾರೆಂದು ವಿಧಿ ನೇಮಿಸಿಹ ।ಇಳೆಯಂಚೆಯಾಳು ನೀಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೬ ॥ nalisi olisuva, keNaki kADisuva muLiyisuva ।keLe nanTu hage kalaha kuhakada OlegaLam ॥halabarige hanchi bArendu vidhi nEmisiha  ।iLeya ancheyALu nIm  - Mankutimma ॥ 726 ॥You are the mail man that Fate has sent to earth to deliver various news to other people. The letters may entertain, placate, provoke, trouble, anger, friendship, kinship, hatred, fight, conspiracy to the recipient. You are just a messenger.  - Mankutimma
translation: You are the mail man that Fate has sent to earth to deliver various news to other people. The letters may entertain, placate, provoke, trouble, anger, friendship, kinship, hatred, fight, conspiracy to the recipient. You are just a messenger.  - Mankutimma
title: ಇಳೆಯಂಚೆಯಾಳು ನೀಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nalisi olisuva, keNaki kADisuva muLiyisuva ।keLe nanTu hage kalaha kuhakada OlegaLam ॥halabarige hanchi bArendu vidhi nEmisiha  ।iLeya ancheyALu nIm  - Mankutimma ॥ 726 ॥
kagga: ನಲಿಸುವೊಲಿಸುವ, ಕೆಣಕಿ ಕಾಡಿಸುವ ಮುಳಿಯಿಸುವ ।ಕೆಳೆ ನಂಟು ಹಗೆ ಕಲಹ ಕುಹಕದೋಲೆಗಳಂ ॥ಹಲಬರಿಗೆ ಹಂಚಿ ಬಾರೆಂದು ವಿಧಿ ನೇಮಿಸಿಹ ।ಇಳೆಯಂಚೆಯಾಳು ನೀಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೬ ॥

content: ಓಲೆಗಾರನಿಗೇಕೆ ಬರೆದ ಸುದ್ದಿಯ ಚಿಂತೆ? ।ಓಲೆಗಳನವರವರಿಗೈದಿಸಿರೆ ಸಾಕು ॥ಸಾಲಗಳೊ, ಶೂಲಗಳೊ, ನೋವುಗಳೊ, ನಗುವುಗಳೊ! ।ಕಾಲೋಟವವನೂಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೭ ॥ OlegAranigEke bareda suddhiya chinte? ।OlegaLanu avaravarigaidisidare sAku ॥sAlagaLo, shUlagaLo, nOvugaLo, naguvugaLo! ।kAlOTavu avanUTa  - Mankutimma ॥ 727 ॥Why is the messenger bothered about the content of the message? His job is done if he delivers them to the right people. The message could be about debt, death, pain or happiness. He is not bothered. He is running around to earn his food.  - Mankutimma
translation: Why is the messenger bothered about the content of the message? His job is done if he delivers them to the right people. The message could be about debt, death, pain or happiness. He is not bothered. He is running around to earn his food.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಾಲೋಟವವನೂಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: OlegAranigEke bareda suddhiya chinte? ।OlegaLanu avaravarigaidisidare sAku ॥sAlagaLo, shUlagaLo, nOvugaLo, naguvugaLo! ।kAlOTavu avanUTa  - Mankutimma ॥ 727 ॥
kagga: ಓಲೆಗಾರನಿಗೇಕೆ ಬರೆದ ಸುದ್ದಿಯ ಚಿಂತೆ? ।ಓಲೆಗಳನವರವರಿಗೈದಿಸಿರೆ ಸಾಕು ॥ಸಾಲಗಳೊ, ಶೂಲಗಳೊ, ನೋವುಗಳೊ, ನಗುವುಗಳೊ! ।ಕಾಲೋಟವವನೂಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೭ ॥

content: ನಗುಮನದಿ ಲೋಗರ ವಿಕಾರಂಗಳನು ನೋಡಿ ।ಬಿಗಿ ತುಟಿಯ ದುಡಿವಂದು ನೋವಪಡುವಂದು ॥ಪೊಗು ವಿಶ್ವಜೀವನದ ಜೀವಾಂತರಂಗದಲಿ ।ನಗುನಗುತ ಬಾಳ್, ತೆರಳು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೮ ॥ nagu manadi lOgara vikArangaLanu nODi ।bigi tuTiya duDivandu nOvupaDuvandu ॥pogu viShvajIvanada jIvAntarangadali ।nagunaguta bAL, teraLu  - Mankutimma ॥ 728 ॥When you see the distortions of the world, laugh it off  - but internally only. When you are working hard or in pain, hold your lips (tongue). Do not speak to every one about it. At the same time, do not distance yourself from the world. Mingle with the world and live life to the fullest. Laugh and be happy always. When it is over, leave the world without much fanfare.  - Mankutimma
translation: When you see the distortions of the world, laugh it off  - but internally only. When you are working hard or in pain, hold your lips (tongue). Do not speak to every one about it. At the same time, do not distance yourself from the world. Mingle with the world and live life to the fullest. Laugh and be happy always. When it is over, leave the world without much fanfare.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಗುನಗುತ ಬಾಳ್, ತೆರಳು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nagu manadi lOgara vikArangaLanu nODi ।bigi tuTiya duDivandu nOvupaDuvandu ॥pogu viShvajIvanada jIvAntarangadali ।nagunaguta bAL, teraLu  - Mankutimma ॥ 728 ॥
kagga: ನಗುಮನದಿ ಲೋಗರ ವಿಕಾರಂಗಳನು ನೋಡಿ ।ಬಿಗಿ ತುಟಿಯ ದುಡಿವಂದು ನೋವಪಡುವಂದು ॥ಪೊಗು ವಿಶ್ವಜೀವನದ ಜೀವಾಂತರಂಗದಲಿ ।ನಗುನಗುತ ಬಾಳ್, ತೆರಳು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೮ ॥

content: ಎಡರು ತೊಡರೆನಲೇಕೆ? ಬಿಡಿಸು ಮತಿಗಾದನಿತ ।ದುಡಿ ಕೈಯಿನಾದನಿತು; ಪಡು ಬಂದ ಪಾಡು ॥ಬಿಡು ಮಿಕ್ಕುದನು ವಿಧಿಗೆ; ಬಿಡದಿರುಪಶಾಂತಿಯನು ।ಬಿಡುಗಡೆಗೆ ದಾರಿಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೯ ॥ eDaru toDaru enalEke? biDisu matige Adanita ।duDi kaiyina Adanitu; paDu banda pADu ॥biDu mikkudanu vidhige; biDadiru upashaantiyanu ।biDugaDege dAriyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 729 ॥Why keep worrying about obstacles in life? Solve as many as possible for your mind. You put in the hard work. Then live through the consequences. Leave the rest to Providence. Never let of of the inner tranquillity. This is the path to salvation  - to be free from the cycle of misery.  - Mankutimma
translation: Why keep worrying about obstacles in life? Solve as many as possible for your mind. You put in the hard work. Then live through the consequences. Leave the rest to Providence. Never let of of the inner tranquillity. This is the path to salvation  - to be free from the cycle of misery.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಿಡುಗಡೆಗೆ ದಾರಿಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: eDaru toDaru enalEke? biDisu matige Adanita ।duDi kaiyina Adanitu; paDu banda pADu ॥biDu mikkudanu vidhige; biDadiru upashaantiyanu ।biDugaDege dAriyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 729 ॥
kagga: ಎಡರು ತೊಡರೆನಲೇಕೆ? ಬಿಡಿಸು ಮತಿಗಾದನಿತ ।ದುಡಿ ಕೈಯಿನಾದನಿತು; ಪಡು ಬಂದ ಪಾಡು ॥ಬಿಡು ಮಿಕ್ಕುದನು ವಿಧಿಗೆ; ಬಿಡದಿರುಪಶಾಂತಿಯನು ।ಬಿಡುಗಡೆಗೆ ದಾರಿಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೨೯ ॥

content: ಹಕ್ಕಿ ಮುನ್ನರಿಯುವುದೆ ತನ್ನ ಪಯಣದ ತೆರನ? ।ಇಕ್ಕುವರದಾರದನು ಕರೆದು ತಿರುಪೆಯನು? ॥ರೆಕ್ಕೆ ಪೋದಂತಲೆದು, ಸಿಕ್ಕಿದನುಣ್ಣುವುದು ।ತಕ್ಕುದಾ ವ್ರತ ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೦ ॥ hakki munna ariyuvude tanna payaNada terana? ।ikkuvaru adAru adanu karedu tirupeyanu? ॥rekke pOdantu aledu, sikkidanu uNNuvudu ।takkudA vrata ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 730 ॥Will the bird know in advance what is going to happen it during the day? Is there anyone who will call it and give scraps. It will go as its wings take it. It will eat whatever it gets. Its lifestyle is very suitable to you also.  - Mankutimma
translation: Will the bird know in advance what is going to happen it during the day? Is there anyone who will call it and give scraps. It will go as its wings take it. It will eat whatever it gets. Its lifestyle is very suitable to you also.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಕ್ಕುದಾ ವ್ರತ ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hakki munna ariyuvude tanna payaNada terana? ।ikkuvaru adAru adanu karedu tirupeyanu? ॥rekke pOdantu aledu, sikkidanu uNNuvudu ।takkudA vrata ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 730 ॥
kagga: ಹಕ್ಕಿ ಮುನ್ನರಿಯುವುದೆ ತನ್ನ ಪಯಣದ ತೆರನ? ।ಇಕ್ಕುವರದಾರದನು ಕರೆದು ತಿರುಪೆಯನು? ॥ರೆಕ್ಕೆ ಪೋದಂತಲೆದು, ಸಿಕ್ಕಿದನುಣ್ಣುವುದು ।ತಕ್ಕುದಾ ವ್ರತ ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೦ ॥

content: ಏನೊ ಕಣ್ಣನು ಪಿಡಿವುದೇನೊ ದಿಗಿಲಾಗಿಪುದು ।ಏನನೋ ನೆನೆದು ಸರ್ರೆಂದು ಹಾರುವುದು ॥ಬಾನೊಳಾಡುವ ಹಕ್ಕಿಗದುವೆ ನಿತ್ಯಾನುಭವ ।ನೀನದನು ಮೀರಿಹೆಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೧ ॥ Eno kaNNanu piDiyuvudu Eno digilAgipudu ।EnanO nenedu sarrendu hAruvudu ॥bAnoLADuva hakkige aduve nityAnubhava ।nInadanu mIriheya?  - Mankutimma ॥ 731 ॥The eye catches something interesting. It sees something and gets scared. It remembers something else and just takes off. These are the everyday experience of a bird flying in the open sky. Do you think your experiences are any better?  - Mankutimma
translation: The eye catches something interesting. It sees something and gets scared. It remembers something else and just takes off. These are the everyday experience of a bird flying in the open sky. Do you think your experiences are any better?  - Mankutimma
title: ನೀನದನು ಮೀರಿಹೆಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: Eno kaNNanu piDiyuvudu Eno digilAgipudu ।EnanO nenedu sarrendu hAruvudu ॥bAnoLADuva hakkige aduve nityAnubhava ।nInadanu mIriheya?  - Mankutimma ॥ 731 ॥
kagga: ಏನೊ ಕಣ್ಣನು ಪಿಡಿವುದೇನೊ ದಿಗಿಲಾಗಿಪುದು ।ಏನನೋ ನೆನೆದು ಸರ್ರೆಂದು ಹಾರುವುದು ॥ಬಾನೊಳಾಡುವ ಹಕ್ಕಿಗದುವೆ ನಿತ್ಯಾನುಭವ ।ನೀನದನು ಮೀರಿಹೆಯ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೧ ॥

content: ಆವ ಕಡೆ ಹಾರುವುದೊ! ಆವ ಕಡೆ ತಿರುಗುವುದೊ ।ಆವಾಗಳಾವಕಡೆಗೆರಗುವುದೊ ಹಕ್ಕಿ! ॥ನಾವುಮಂತೆಯೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಕೃತ್ರಿಮದ ಕೈಗೊಂಬೆ ।ಜೀವಮಾರ್ಗವನೂಹ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೨ ॥ aava kaDe hAruvudo! aava kaDe tiruguvudo ।aavAgaL aavakaDege eraguvodo hakki! ॥nAvum anteye sRuShTi kRutrimada kaigombe ।jIva mArgavu anUhya  - Mankutimma ॥ 732 ॥One can not say which way the bird would fly. when it would turn, at what instant would it take off. Even the bird may not be able to tell. We are also like that. We are puppets in the hands of the illusion of creation. Life can never be certain.  - Mankutimma
translation: One can not say which way the bird would fly. when it would turn, at what instant would it take off. Even the bird may not be able to tell. We are also like that. We are puppets in the hands of the illusion of creation. Life can never be certain.  - Mankutimma
title: ಜೀವಮಾರ್ಗವನೂಹ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aava kaDe hAruvudo! aava kaDe tiruguvudo ।aavAgaL aavakaDege eraguvodo hakki! ॥nAvum anteye sRuShTi kRutrimada kaigombe ।jIva mArgavu anUhya  - Mankutimma ॥ 732 ॥
kagga: ಆವ ಕಡೆ ಹಾರುವುದೊ! ಆವ ಕಡೆ ತಿರುಗುವುದೊ ।ಆವಾಗಳಾವಕಡೆಗೆರಗುವುದೊ ಹಕ್ಕಿ! ॥ನಾವುಮಂತೆಯೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಕೃತ್ರಿಮದ ಕೈಗೊಂಬೆ ।ಜೀವಮಾರ್ಗವನೂಹ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೨ ॥

content: ಮಾವುಸಸಿಯನು ನೆಟ್ಟು ಬೇವುಣಲು ಸಿದ್ಧನಿರು ।ಭೂವಿಷಯದಿಂದ ರಸ ಮಾರ್ಪಡುವುದುಂಟು ॥ಆ ವಿವರ ನಿನಗೇಕೆ? ತೋಟದೊಡೆಯನಿಗಿರಲಿ ।ಸೇವಕನು ನೀನಲ್ತೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೩ ॥ mAvu sasiyanu neTTu bEvu uNalu siddhaniru ।bhUviShayadinda rasa mArpaDuvudunTu ॥A vivara ninagEke? tOTada oDeyanigirali ।sEvakanu nInalte?  - Mankutimma ॥ 733 ॥You may plant a mango (sweet) sapling and grow it. But you must be prepared to eat neem (bitter). The nourishment it receives from earth sometimes has the ability to change the basic nature of the plant itself. But why should you bother with that process. Let the owner of the garden (Creator) worry about that. Aren;t you a mere servant taking care of the garden?  - Mankutimma
translation: You may plant a mango (sweet) sapling and grow it. But you must be prepared to eat neem (bitter). The nourishment it receives from earth sometimes has the ability to change the basic nature of the plant itself. But why should you bother with that process. Let the owner of the garden (Creator) worry about that. Aren;t you a mere servant taking care of the garden?  - Mankutimma
title: ಸೇವಕನು ನೀನಲ್ತೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mAvu sasiyanu neTTu bEvu uNalu siddhaniru ।bhUviShayadinda rasa mArpaDuvudunTu ॥A vivara ninagEke? tOTada oDeyanigirali ।sEvakanu nInalte?  - Mankutimma ॥ 733 ॥
kagga: ಮಾವುಸಸಿಯನು ನೆಟ್ಟು ಬೇವುಣಲು ಸಿದ್ಧನಿರು ।ಭೂವಿಷಯದಿಂದ ರಸ ಮಾರ್ಪಡುವುದುಂಟು ॥ಆ ವಿವರ ನಿನಗೇಕೆ? ತೋಟದೊಡೆಯನಿಗಿರಲಿ ।ಸೇವಕನು ನೀನಲ್ತೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೩ ॥

content: ಸೈನಕನು ನೀನು, ಸೇನಾಧಿಪತಿಯೆಲ್ಲಿಹನೊ! ।ಆಣತಿಯ ಕಳುಹುತಿಹನದನು ನೀನರಿತು ॥ಜಾಣಿನಧಟಿಂ ಪೋರು; ಸೋಲುಗೆಲುವವನೆಣಿಕೆ ।ಕಾಣಿಸದನಾಳ್ಕೆಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೪ ॥ sainikanu ninu, sEnAdhipatiyu ellihano! ।aaNatiya  kaLuhitihanu adanu nInaritu ॥jANinadhaTim pOru; sOlu geluvu avaneNike ।kANisadana ALkeyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 734 ॥You are a soldier. We don;t know where the commander is! He is sending instructions. We have to understand and execute the orders wisely and courageously. Victory or defeat is not ours, but his. Life is the rule of the invisible commander.  - Mankutimma
translation: You are a soldier. We don;t know where the commander is! He is sending instructions. We have to understand and execute the orders wisely and courageously. Victory or defeat is not ours, but his. Life is the rule of the invisible commander.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಾಣಿಸದನಾಳ್ಕೆಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sainikanu ninu, sEnAdhipatiyu ellihano! ।aaNatiya  kaLuhitihanu adanu nInaritu ॥jANinadhaTim pOru; sOlu geluvu avaneNike ।kANisadana ALkeyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 734 ॥
kagga: ಸೈನಕನು ನೀನು, ಸೇನಾಧಿಪತಿಯೆಲ್ಲಿಹನೊ! ।ಆಣತಿಯ ಕಳುಹುತಿಹನದನು ನೀನರಿತು ॥ಜಾಣಿನಧಟಿಂ ಪೋರು; ಸೋಲುಗೆಲುವವನೆಣಿಕೆ ।ಕಾಣಿಸದನಾಳ್ಕೆಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೪ ॥

content: ನಾಯಕನಿಗಿರಲಿ ರಣವಿಜಯ ಪರಿಭವ ಗಣನೆ ।ಆಯವದರಿಂ ಭಟನ ಸತ್ತ್ವಶಿಕ್ಷಣಕೆ ॥ಸ್ವೀಯ ಸತ್ತ್ವವಿಕಾಸ ನಿಜಶಕ್ತಿಯಭ್ಯಾಸ ।ಶ್ರೇಯಸಿಗೆ ಸೋಪಾನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೫ ॥ nAyakanigirali raNavijaya paribhava gaNane ।aayavu adarim bhaTana sattva shikShaNake ॥svIya sattvavikAsa nija shaktiyabhyAsa ।shrEyasige sOpAna  - Mankutimma ॥ 735 ॥Let the worry of keeping counts of victories and defeat be left to the leader (God). The only outcome of the process should be your training for the battle. The practice alone is good enough outcome and it will lead to enrichment of your life.  - Mankutimma
translation: Let the worry of keeping counts of victories and defeat be left to the leader (God). The only outcome of the process should be your training for the battle. The practice alone is good enough outcome and it will lead to enrichment of your life.  - Mankutimma
title: ಶ್ರೇಯಸಿಗೆ ಸೋಪಾನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nAyakanigirali raNavijaya paribhava gaNane ।aayavu adarim bhaTana sattva shikShaNake ॥svIya sattvavikAsa nija shaktiyabhyAsa ।shrEyasige sOpAna  - Mankutimma ॥ 735 ॥
kagga: ನಾಯಕನಿಗಿರಲಿ ರಣವಿಜಯ ಪರಿಭವ ಗಣನೆ ।ಆಯವದರಿಂ ಭಟನ ಸತ್ತ್ವಶಿಕ್ಷಣಕೆ ॥ಸ್ವೀಯ ಸತ್ತ್ವವಿಕಾಸ ನಿಜಶಕ್ತಿಯಭ್ಯಾಸ ।ಶ್ರೇಯಸಿಗೆ ಸೋಪಾನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೫ ॥

content: ಕಾಯಕವ ಚರಿಸುತ್ತ, ಮಾನಸವ ಸಯ್ತಿಡುತ ।ಆಯಸಂಬಡಿಸದವೊಲಂತರಾತ್ಮನನು ॥ಮಾಯೆಯೊಡನಾಡುತ್ತ, ಬೊಮ್ಮನನು ಭಜಿಸುತ್ತ ।ಆಯುವನು ಸಾಗಿಸೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೬ ॥ kAyakava charisutta, mAnasava saytiDuta ।aayasam baDisadavol antaraatmananu ॥mAyeyoDane aaDutta, bommananu bhajisutta ।aayuvanu sAgiselo  - Mankutimma ॥ 736 ॥Do your duty. Console your mind. Don;t let your inner conscience get anxious. Play (revel) with the grand illusion of this world. Always keep God in mind. You must get through your life like this.  - Mankutimma
translation: Do your duty. Console your mind. Don;t let your inner conscience get anxious. Play (revel) with the grand illusion of this world. Always keep God in mind. You must get through your life like this.  - Mankutimma
title: ಆಯುವನು ಸಾಗಿಸೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kAyakava charisutta, mAnasava saytiDuta ।aayasam baDisadavol antaraatmananu ॥mAyeyoDane aaDutta, bommananu bhajisutta ।aayuvanu sAgiselo  - Mankutimma ॥ 736 ॥
kagga: ಕಾಯಕವ ಚರಿಸುತ್ತ, ಮಾನಸವ ಸಯ್ತಿಡುತ ।ಆಯಸಂಬಡಿಸದವೊಲಂತರಾತ್ಮನನು ॥ಮಾಯೆಯೊಡನಾಡುತ್ತ, ಬೊಮ್ಮನನು ಭಜಿಸುತ್ತ ।ಆಯುವನು ಸಾಗಿಸೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೬ ॥

content: ಎಂದಿಗಾನುಂ ನಿನ್ನ ಪೂರ್ವಋಣಗಳ ಲೆಕ್ಕ ।ನೊಂದಬೇಕೆಂದಿರ್ದೊಡಿಂದೆ ಮೊದಲನಿಡು ॥ಅಂದಿಸಿಕೊ ಹೆರರೆನಿಪರನು ಹೃದಯವಿಸ್ತರದೆ ।ಹೊಂದು ವಿಶ್ವಾತ್ಮತೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೭ ॥ endigAnum ninna pUrva RuNagaLa lekka ।nondabEkendu irdoDe inde modalaniDu ॥andisiko herar eniparanu hRudaya vistarade  ।hondu vishvAtmateya  - Mankutimma ॥ 737 ॥If there is some debt from previous actions (from any births) that is yet to be repaid, then make a start right now. Embrace those who keep you away by expanding your self-consciousness. There by you will expand yourself and realize that the whole world is one.  - Mankutimma
translation: If there is some debt from previous actions (from any births) that is yet to be repaid, then make a start right now. Embrace those who keep you away by expanding your self-consciousness. There by you will expand yourself and realize that the whole world is one.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹೊಂದು ವಿಶ್ವಾತ್ಮತೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: endigAnum ninna pUrva RuNagaLa lekka ।nondabEkendu irdoDe inde modalaniDu ॥andisiko herar eniparanu hRudaya vistarade  ।hondu vishvAtmateya  - Mankutimma ॥ 737 ॥
kagga: ಎಂದಿಗಾನುಂ ನಿನ್ನ ಪೂರ್ವಋಣಗಳ ಲೆಕ್ಕ ।ನೊಂದಬೇಕೆಂದಿರ್ದೊಡಿಂದೆ ಮೊದಲನಿಡು ॥ಅಂದಿಸಿಕೊ ಹೆರರೆನಿಪರನು ಹೃದಯವಿಸ್ತರದೆ ।ಹೊಂದು ವಿಶ್ವಾತ್ಮತೆಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೭ ॥

content: ತನಗೆ ಬಾರದ ಲಾಭ ತನಯಂಗೆ ಬಂದಾಗ ।ಜನಕನ್ ಅದು ತನದೆಂದು ಸಂತಸಿಪ ತೆರದಿ ॥ಜನದೊಳಾರ್ಗಾವ ಸೊಗವಾದೊಡಂ ತನದೆನ್ನು- ।ತನುಭವಿಪನೋ ಜ್ಞಾನಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೮ ॥ tanage bArada lAbha tanayange bandAga ।janakan adu tanadendu santasipa teradi ॥janadoL aarge aava sogavAdoDam tanadennuta ।anubhavipanO jnAni  - Mankutimma ॥ 738 ॥If a father misses a fortune and sees his son get it, he will rejoice it just as much. A wise man will do just the same for any joy experienced by any one in this world. That is the secret of his happiness.  - Mankutimma
translation: If a father misses a fortune and sees his son get it, he will rejoice it just as much. A wise man will do just the same for any joy experienced by any one in this world. That is the secret of his happiness.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅನುಭವಿಪನೋ ಜ್ಞಾನಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tanage bArada lAbha tanayange bandAga ।janakan adu tanadendu santasipa teradi ॥janadoL aarge aava sogavAdoDam tanadennuta ।anubhavipanO jnAni  - Mankutimma ॥ 738 ॥
kagga: ತನಗೆ ಬಾರದ ಲಾಭ ತನಯಂಗೆ ಬಂದಾಗ ।ಜನಕನ್ ಅದು ತನದೆಂದು ಸಂತಸಿಪ ತೆರದಿ ॥ಜನದೊಳಾರ್ಗಾವ ಸೊಗವಾದೊಡಂ ತನದೆನ್ನು- ।ತನುಭವಿಪನೋ ಜ್ಞಾನಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೮ ॥

content: ತನ್ನ ಮನದಾಟಗಳ ತಾನೆ ನೋಡುತ ನಗುವ ।ತನ್ನೊಳಗೆ ತಾನಿರ್ವರಾದವೊಲು ಬಾಳ್ವ ॥ಚಿನ್ಮಾತ್ರವನು ಬೇರೆ ಬಗೆದು ಜಾನಿಪ ಚತುರ ।ಧನ್ಯತೆಯ ಕಂಡವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೯ ॥ tanna manadATagaLa tAne nODuta naguva ।tannoLage tAnu irvaraadavolu bALva ॥chinmAtravanu bEre bagedu jAnipa chatura ।dhanyate kanDavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 739 ॥He is a wise, content and realised man who can see himself as two people and live like that. One of them is under the control of the mind and chasing the worldly existence. While the other is knows it is all futile and observes (with a smile) his mind detached just as it would observe the rest of the world.  - Mankutimma
translation: He is a wise, content and realised man who can see himself as two people and live like that. One of them is under the control of the mind and chasing the worldly existence. While the other is knows it is all futile and observes (with a smile) his mind detached just as it would observe the rest of the world.  - Mankutimma
title: ಧನ್ಯತೆಯ ಕಂಡವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tanna manadATagaLa tAne nODuta naguva ।tannoLage tAnu irvaraadavolu bALva ॥chinmAtravanu bEre bagedu jAnipa chatura ।dhanyate kanDavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 739 ॥
kagga: ತನ್ನ ಮನದಾಟಗಳ ತಾನೆ ನೋಡುತ ನಗುವ ।ತನ್ನೊಳಗೆ ತಾನಿರ್ವರಾದವೊಲು ಬಾಳ್ವ ॥ಚಿನ್ಮಾತ್ರವನು ಬೇರೆ ಬಗೆದು ಜಾನಿಪ ಚತುರ ।ಧನ್ಯತೆಯ ಕಂಡವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೩೯ ॥

content: ಜೀವನವದೊಂದು ಕಲೆ; ಕಲೆಯ ಕಲಿಸುವುದೆಂತು? ।ಸಾವಿರದ ನಿಯಮ ಯುಕ್ತಿಗಳನೊರೆದೊಡೆಯುಂ ॥ಆವುದೋ ಕುಶಲತೆಯದೊಂದಿರದೆ ಜಯವಿರದು ।ಆ ವಿವರ ನಿನ್ನೊಳಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೦ ॥ jIvanavu adondu kale; kaleya kalisuvudentu? ।sAvirada niyama yuktigaLanu oredoDeyum ॥Avido kushalateyu adondirade jayaviradu ।aa vivara ninnoLage  - Mankutimma ॥ 740 ॥Succeeding in life is an art. But who can teach the art? There are thousands of rules and tactics that one can master. But victory eludes you unless you have that one special skill. Details of that skill is available only to you  - within you.  - Mankutimma
translation: Succeeding in life is an art. But who can teach the art? There are thousands of rules and tactics that one can master. But victory eludes you unless you have that one special skill. Details of that skill is available only to you  - within you.  - Mankutimma
title: ಆ ವಿವರ ನಿನ್ನೊಳಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jIvanavu adondu kale; kaleya kalisuvudentu? ।sAvirada niyama yuktigaLanu oredoDeyum ॥Avido kushalateyu adondirade jayaviradu ।aa vivara ninnoLage  - Mankutimma ॥ 740 ॥
kagga: ಜೀವನವದೊಂದು ಕಲೆ; ಕಲೆಯ ಕಲಿಸುವುದೆಂತು? ।ಸಾವಿರದ ನಿಯಮ ಯುಕ್ತಿಗಳನೊರೆದೊಡೆಯುಂ ॥ಆವುದೋ ಕುಶಲತೆಯದೊಂದಿರದೆ ಜಯವಿರದು ।ಆ ವಿವರ ನಿನ್ನೊಳಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೦ ॥

content: ತಲೆ ಕೊಡವ ತಳೆದಿರಲು, ಕೈ ಕತ್ತಿ ಪಿಡಿದಿರಲು ।ಬಳುಕು ಹಗ್ಗದ ಮೇಲೆ ತಾನಡಿಯನಿಡುತ ॥ಕೆಲ ಬಲಕೆ ಬೀಳದೆ ಮುನ್ನೆಡೆವ ಡೊಂಬನುಪಾಯ ।ಕಲೆಯೆ ಜೀವನಯೋಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೧ ॥ tale koDava taLediralu, kai katti piDidiralu ।baLuku haggada mEle tAnu adiyanu iDuta ॥kela balake bILade munneDeva Dombana upAya ।kaleye jIvana yOga  - Mankutimma ॥ 741 ॥A circus artiste shows us the most important lesson of life. He walks over tight shaky rope with pot on his head and sword in his hand. He is able to move forward without falling down or to his side. He is able to attain the balance in spite of all the noise around him. His art of concentrating on the balance and filtering everything else out is the key to happiness in life.  - Mankutimma
translation: A circus artiste shows us the most important lesson of life. He walks over tight shaky rope with pot on his head and sword in his hand. He is able to move forward without falling down or to his side. He is able to attain the balance in spite of all the noise around him. His art of concentrating on the balance and filtering everything else out is the key to happiness in life.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಲೆಯೆ ಜೀವನಯೋಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ

content: ಬಹುವಿದ್ಯೆ  ಬಹುತರ್ಕ ಬಹುನೇಮ ಬೇಕಿಲ್ಲ ।ವಹಿಸೆ ಜೀವನಭರವನದು ಹಗುರೆನಿಪವೊಲ್ ॥ಸಹನೆ ಸಮರಸಭಾವವಂತಃಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಗಳು ।ವಿಹಿತವಾತ್ಮದ ಹಿತಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೨ ॥ bahu vidye bahu tarka bahunEma bEkilla ।vahise jIvanabharavanu adu hagurenipavol ॥sahane samarasabhAvavu antaH parIkShegaLu ।vihitavu aatmada hitake  - Mankutimma ॥ 742 ॥You don;t need very sophisticated education, or grand logic, or elaborate rituals to make the burden of life lighter. What you need is patience, a common view of entire world and critical introspection. These are all good for the soul.  - Mankutimma
translation: You don;t need very sophisticated education, or grand logic, or elaborate rituals to make the burden of life lighter. What you need is patience, a common view of entire world and critical introspection. These are all good for the soul.  - Mankutimma
title: ವಿಹಿತವಾತ್ಮದ ಹಿತಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bahu vidye bahu tarka bahunEma bEkilla ।vahise jIvanabharavanu adu hagurenipavol ॥sahane samarasabhAvavu antaH parIkShegaLu ।vihitavu aatmada hitake  - Mankutimma ॥ 742 ॥

content: ಎಲ್ಲ ನಾಶನವೆಲ್ಲ ಕಾಲವಶವಾದೊಡಂ ।ಕ್ಷುಲ್ಲಕನು ನರನಾದೊಡಂ ಲಾಲನಿದಿರೊಳ್ ॥ಉಲ್ಲಾಸವೇ ಧರ್ಮ; ಕೊಲ್ಲಿಪನೆ ಬೆಳೆಯಿಪನು ।ಹುಲ್ಲೊಣಗಿ ಬೆಳೆವುದಲ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೩ ॥ ella nAshanavella kAlavashavAdoDam ।kShullakanu naranu aadoDam kAlana idiroL ॥ullAsave dharma; kollipane beLeyipanu ।hullu oNagi beLevudala?  - Mankutimma ॥ 743 ॥It is true that everything gets destroyed in time. Everything is controlled by time. Man is truly insignificant when compared to Time. But in the little time one lives, it is his duty to be happy. There is one reason to be happy too. The same Time that destroys you, also makes your prosper. Just like grass dries up, and again grows back.  - Mankutimma
translation: It is true that everything gets destroyed in time. Everything is controlled by time. Man is truly insignificant when compared to Time. But in the little time one lives, it is his duty to be happy. There is one reason to be happy too. The same Time that destroys you, also makes your prosper. Just like grass dries up, and again grows back.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹುಲ್ಲೊಣಗಿ ಬೆಳೆವುದಲ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ella nAshanavella kAlavashavAdoDam ।kShullakanu naranu aadoDam kAlana idiroL ॥ullAsave dharma; kollipane beLeyipanu ।hullu oNagi beLevudala?  - Mankutimma ॥ 743 ॥
kagga: ಎಲ್ಲ ನಾಶನವೆಲ್ಲ ಕಾಲವಶವಾದೊಡಂ ।ಕ್ಷುಲ್ಲಕನು ನರನಾದೊಡಂ ಲಾಲನಿದಿರೊಳ್ ॥ಉಲ್ಲಾಸವೇ ಧರ್ಮ; ಕೊಲ್ಲಿಪನೆ ಬೆಳೆಯಿಪನು ।ಹುಲ್ಲೊಣಗಿ ಬೆಳೆವುದಲ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೩ ॥

content: ಅಣಗಿದ್ದು ಬೇಸಗೆಯೊಳ್, ಎದ್ದು ಮಳೆ ಕರೆದಂದು ।ಗುಣಿಯೆನದೆ ತಿಟ್ಟೆನದೆ ಸಿಕ್ಕಿದೆಡೆ ಬೆಳೆದು ॥ಉಣಿಸನೀವನು ದನಕೆ, ತಣಿವನೀವನು ಜಗಕೆ ।ಗುಣಶಾಲಿ ತೃಣಸಾಧು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೪ ॥ aNagiddu bEsageyoL, eddu maLe karedandu ।guNiyenade tiTTenade sikkideDe beLedu ॥uNisanIvanu danake, taNivanIvanu jagake ।guNashAli tRuNasAdhu  - Mankutimma ॥ 744 ॥It hides during summer. When rains gives it a call, it comes out. It does not mind whether it is a pit or the banks of a stream. It just grows wherever it can. It gives food to the cows and coolness to mankind. Grass is like a saint with great qualities.  - Mankutimma
translation: It hides during summer. When rains gives it a call, it comes out. It does not mind whether it is a pit or the banks of a stream. It just grows wherever it can. It gives food to the cows and coolness to mankind. Grass is like a saint with great qualities.  - Mankutimma
title: ಗುಣಶಾಲಿ ತೃಣಸಾಧು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aNagiddu bEsageyoL, eddu maLe karedandu ।guNiyenade tiTTenade sikkideDe beLedu ॥uNisanIvanu danake, taNivanIvanu jagake ।guNashAli tRuNasAdhu  - Mankutimma ॥ 744 ॥
kagga: ಅಣಗಿದ್ದು ಬೇಸಗೆಯೊಳ್, ಎದ್ದು ಮಳೆ ಕರೆದಂದು ।ಗುಣಿಯೆನದೆ ತಿಟ್ಟೆನದೆ ಸಿಕ್ಕಿದೆಡೆ ಬೆಳೆದು ॥ಉಣಿಸನೀವನು ದನಕೆ, ತಣಿವನೀವನು ಜಗಕೆ ।ಗುಣಶಾಲಿ ತೃಣಸಾಧು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೪ ॥

content: ಪರಹಿತದ ಮಾತಿರಲಿ; ಪರರಿನೇ ಜೀವಿಪನು ।ನರಜಂತು, ಪಶು ಪಕ್ಷಿ ಕೀಟ ಮೀನ್ಗಳವೋಲ್ ॥ಪರರಿನೆಳಸದದೇನನುಂ ಪರರಿಗುಪಕರಿಪ ।ತರುಜನ್ಮವಲ ಪುಣ್ಯ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೫ ॥ parahitada mAtirali; pararinE jIvipanu ।narajantu, pashu pakShi kITa mIngaLa vOl ॥pararina eLasadu Enanum pararige upakaripa ।tarujanmavala  puNya  - Mankutimma ॥ 745 ॥Let us set aside the concept of ;helping others;. These trees seem to entirely live for the benefit of others  - man, animals, birds, worms and fishes. They do not expect any help from others. They always help others. Truly, trees must be accumulating a lot of good karma.  - Mankutimma
translation: Let us set aside the concept of ;helping others;. These trees seem to entirely live for the benefit of others  - man, animals, birds, worms and fishes. They do not expect any help from others. They always help others. Truly, trees must be accumulating a lot of good karma.  - Mankutimma
title: ತರುಜನ್ಮವಲ ಪುಣ್ಯ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: parahitada mAtirali; pararinE jIvipanu ।narajantu, pashu pakShi kITa mIngaLa vOl ॥pararina eLasadu Enanum pararige upakaripa ।tarujanmavala  puNya  - Mankutimma ॥ 745 ॥
kagga: ಪರಹಿತದ ಮಾತಿರಲಿ; ಪರರಿನೇ ಜೀವಿಪನು ।ನರಜಂತು, ಪಶು ಪಕ್ಷಿ ಕೀಟ ಮೀನ್ಗಳವೋಲ್ ॥ಪರರಿನೆಳಸದದೇನನುಂ ಪರರಿಗುಪಕರಿಪ ।ತರುಜನ್ಮವಲ ಪುಣ್ಯ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೫ ॥

content: ನೆರಳನಿನಿತನು ಕೊಡುವ, ದಣಿವನಿನಿತನು ಕಳೆವ ।ತಿರೆಯ ಪಯಣದ ಹೊರೆಯನಿನಿತು ಸುಳುವೆನಿಪಾ ॥ತರುವಾಗಿ ಮನೆಯೊಳಗೊ ಹೊರಗೊ ನೀಂ ಬೆಳೆಯುತಿರೆ ।ಪರಮಧರ್ಮವದೆಲವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೬ ॥ neraLan initanu  koDuva, daNivan initanu kaLeva ।tireya payaNada horeyan initu suLuvenipa aa ॥taruvAgi maneyoLago horago nIm beLeyutire ।parama dharmavadu elavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 746 ॥It gives a little shade when it is hot. It gives relief when you are tired. It makes the journey on this earth a little more manageable. If we can be like that tree inside or outside our houses, then it is akin to following the best Dharma.  - Mankutimma
translation: It gives a little shade when it is hot. It gives relief when you are tired. It makes the journey on this earth a little more manageable. If we can be like that tree inside or outside our houses, then it is akin to following the best Dharma.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರಮಧರ್ಮವದೆಲವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: neraLan initanu  koDuva, daNivan initanu kaLeva ।tireya payaNada horeyan initu suLuvenipa aa ॥taruvAgi maneyoLago horago nIm beLeyutire ।parama dharmavadu elavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 746 ॥
kagga: ನೆರಳನಿನಿತನು ಕೊಡುವ, ದಣಿವನಿನಿತನು ಕಳೆವ ।ತಿರೆಯ ಪಯಣದ ಹೊರೆಯನಿನಿತು ಸುಳುವೆನಿಪಾ ॥ತರುವಾಗಿ ಮನೆಯೊಳಗೊ ಹೊರಗೊ ನೀಂ ಬೆಳೆಯುತಿರೆ ।ಪರಮಧರ್ಮವದೆಲವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೬ ॥

content: ಅವರೆಷ್ಟು ಧನವಂತರ್, ಇವರೆಷ್ಟು ಬಲವಂತರ್ ।ಅವರೆಷ್ಟು ಯಶವಂತರ್ ಎನುವ ಕರುಬಿನಲಿ ॥ಭವಿಕ ನಿನಗೆಷ್ಟಿಹುದೊ ಮರೆತು ನೀಂ ಕೊರಗುವುದು ।ಶಿವನಿಗೆ ಕೃತಜ್ಞತೆಯೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೭ ॥ avareShTu dhanavantar, ivareShTu balavantar ।avareShTu yashavantar enuva karubinali ॥bhavika ninageShTihudo maretu nIm koraguvudu ।shivanige kRutajnateye?  - Mankutimma ॥ 747 ॥How rich are they? How powerful are they? How famous are they? Man has only such thoughts about others. There is a whole lot of possessions that he has an enjoys. But he forgets them all and concentrates only on what others have. Is this how we show thankfulness to God (Lord Shiva)?  - Mankutimma
translation: How rich are they? How powerful are they? How famous are they? Man has only such thoughts about others. There is a whole lot of possessions that he has an enjoys. But he forgets them all and concentrates only on what others have. Is this how we show thankfulness to God (Lord Shiva)?  - Mankutimma
title: ಶಿವನಿಗೆ ಕೃತಜ್ಞತೆಯೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: avareShTu dhanavantar, ivareShTu balavantar ।avareShTu yashavantar enuva karubinali ॥bhavika ninageShTihudo maretu nIm koraguvudu ।shivanige kRutajnateye?  - Mankutimma ॥ 747 ॥
kagga: ಅವರೆಷ್ಟು ಧನವಂತರ್, ಇವರೆಷ್ಟು ಬಲವಂತರ್ ।ಅವರೆಷ್ಟು ಯಶವಂತರ್ ಎನುವ ಕರುಬಿನಲಿ ॥ಭವಿಕ ನಿನಗೆಷ್ಟಿಹುದೊ ಮರೆತು ನೀಂ ಕೊರಗುವುದು ।ಶಿವನಿಗೆ ಕೃತಜ್ಞತೆಯೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೭ ॥

content: ಅನ್ನವುಣುವಂದು ಕೇಳ್: ಅದನು ಬೇಯಿಸಿದ ನೀರ್ ।ನಿನ್ನ ದುಡಿತದ ಬೆಮರೊ, ಪೆರರ ಕಣ್ಣೀರೋ? ॥ತಿನ್ನು ನೀಂ ಜಗಕೆ ತಿನಲಿತ್ತನಿತ; ಮಿಕ್ಕೂಟ ।ಜೀರ್ಣಿಸದ ಋಣಶೇಷ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೮ ॥ anna uNuvandu kEL: adanu bEyisida nIr ।ninna duDitada bemaro, perara kaNNIrO? ॥tinnu nIm jagake tinal ittanita; mikka ooTa ।jIrNisada RuNashESha  - Mankutimma ॥ 748 ॥When you sit to eat, ask yourself if the water that was used came from your sweat (hard work) or from other people;s tears (tyranny). You must eat only that much which you have given to the world. Any amount more will be counted as unpaid debt.  - Mankutimma
translation: When you sit to eat, ask yourself if the water that was used came from your sweat (hard work) or from other people;s tears (tyranny). You must eat only that much which you have given to the world. Any amount more will be counted as unpaid debt.  - Mankutimma
title: ಜೀರ್ಣಿಸದ ಋಣಶೇಷ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: anna uNuvandu kEL: adanu bEyisida nIr ।ninna duDitada bemaro, perara kaNNIrO? ॥tinnu nIm jagake tinal ittanita; mikka ooTa ।jIrNisada RuNashESha  - Mankutimma ॥ 748 ॥
kagga: ಅನ್ನವುಣುವಂದು ಕೇಳ್: ಅದನು ಬೇಯಿಸಿದ ನೀರ್ ।ನಿನ್ನ ದುಡಿತದ ಬೆಮರೊ, ಪೆರರ ಕಣ್ಣೀರೋ? ॥ತಿನ್ನು ನೀಂ ಜಗಕೆ ತಿನಲಿತ್ತನಿತ; ಮಿಕ್ಕೂಟ ।ಜೀರ್ಣಿಸದ ಋಣಶೇಷ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೮ ॥

content: ಪರಮಲಾಭವ ಗಳಿಸೆ ಜೀವಿತವ್ಯಾಪಾರ ।ಕಿರಬೇಕು ಮೂಲಧನವದು ತತ್ತ್ವದೃಷ್ಟಿ ॥ಚಿರಲಾಭ ಜಗದಾತ್ಮಲೀಲಾವಿಹಾರಸುಖ ।ಧರೆಯ ಸುಖ ಮೇಲ್ ಬಡ್ಡಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೯ ॥ paramalAbhava gaLise jIvita vyApArake ।irabEku mUladhanavadu tattvadRuShTi ॥chira lAbha jagada aatma lIlA vihArasukha ।dhareya sukha mEl baDDi  - Mankutimma ॥ 749 ॥In this business of life, there is a way to make ultimate profit. The capital one needs is the understanding of the working of the world  - unified theory of existence. The capital appreciation is in the form of the opportunity to participate in the grand illusion of world and enjoy it. The bonus interest are the pleasures we get to enjoy in this world while we are part of the illusion.  - Mankutimma
translation: In this business of life, there is a way to make ultimate profit. The capital one needs is the understanding of the working of the world  - unified theory of existence. The capital appreciation is in the form of the opportunity to participate in the grand illusion of world and enjoy it. The bonus interest are the pleasures we get to enjoy in this world while we are part of the illusion.  - Mankutimma
title: ಧರೆಯ ಸುಖ ಮೇಲ್ ಬಡ್ಡಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: paramalAbhava gaLise jIvita vyApArake ।irabEku mUladhanavadu tattvadRuShTi ॥chira lAbha jagada aatma lIlA vihArasukha ।dhareya sukha mEl baDDi  - Mankutimma ॥ 749 ॥
kagga: ಪರಮಲಾಭವ ಗಳಿಸೆ ಜೀವಿತವ್ಯಾಪಾರ ।ಕಿರಬೇಕು ಮೂಲಧನವದು ತತ್ತ್ವದೃಷ್ಟಿ ॥ಚಿರಲಾಭ ಜಗದಾತ್ಮಲೀಲಾವಿಹಾರಸುಖ ।ಧರೆಯ ಸುಖ ಮೇಲ್ ಬಡ್ಡಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೪೯ ॥

content: ಮುಳುಗದಿರು; ಜೀವನದ ತೆರೆಯ ಮೇಲೀಜುತಿರು ।ಒಳಿತನಾಗಿಸು, ಕೊಡುತ ಕೊಳುತ ಸಂತಸವ ॥ಕಳವಳಂಬಡದೆ ನಡೆ ಕಡೆಯ ಕರೆ ಬಂದಂದು ।ಮಿಳಿತನಿರು ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೦ ॥ muLugadiru; jIvanada tereya mEle eejutiru ।oLitanAgisu, koDuta koLuta santasava ॥kaLavaLaMbaDade naDe kaDeya kare bandandu ।miLitaniru vishvadali  - Mankutimma ॥ 750 ॥Try to stay afloat and swim through the tides of life. Don;t drown. Do good to others  - give and take happiness. Don;t get anxious when the final comes. Just leave everything and go. Try to mingle well in the world.  - Mankutimma
translation: Try to stay afloat and swim through the tides of life. Don;t drown. Do good to others  - give and take happiness. Don;t get anxious when the final comes. Just leave everything and go. Try to mingle well in the world.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಿಳಿತನಿರು ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: muLugadiru; jIvanada tereya mEle eejutiru ।oLitanAgisu, koDuta koLuta santasava ॥kaLavaLaMbaDade naDe kaDeya kare bandandu ।miLitaniru vishvadali  - Mankutimma ॥ 750 ॥
kagga: ಮುಳುಗದಿರು; ಜೀವನದ ತೆರೆಯ ಮೇಲೀಜುತಿರು ।ಒಳಿತನಾಗಿಸು, ಕೊಡುತ ಕೊಳುತ ಸಂತಸವ ॥ಕಳವಳಂಬಡದೆ ನಡೆ ಕಡೆಯ ಕರೆ ಬಂದಂದು ।ಮಿಳಿತನಿರು ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೦ ॥

content: ಲೋಕವೆಲ್ಲವು ಚಿತ್ರವಿಂದ್ರಜಾಲದ ಕೃತ್ಯ ।ಸಾಕೆನದೆ ಬೇಕೆನದೆ ನೋಡು ನೀನದನು ॥ತಾಕಿಸದಿರಂತರಾತ್ಮಂಗಾವಿಚಿತ್ರವನು ।ಹಾಕು ವೇಷವ ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೧ ॥ lOkavu ellavu chitravu indrajAlada kRutya ।sAkenade bEkenade nODu nInadanu ॥tAkisadiru antarAtmange aa vichitravanu ।hAku vEShava nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 751 ॥The whole world is an illusion created by magic. You are a part of it. Watch it without asking for more, or wanting it to stop. Don;t let your soul develop any attachment towards it. You must play your part (and leave).  - Mankutimma
translation: The whole world is an illusion created by magic. You are a part of it. Watch it without asking for more, or wanting it to stop. Don;t let your soul develop any attachment towards it. You must play your part (and leave).  - Mankutimma
title: ಹಾಕು ವೇಷವ ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: lOkavu ellavu chitravu indrajAlada kRutya ।sAkenade bEkenade nODu nInadanu ॥tAkisadiru antarAtmange aa vichitravanu ।hAku vEShava nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 751 ॥
kagga: ಲೋಕವೆಲ್ಲವು ಚಿತ್ರವಿಂದ್ರಜಾಲದ ಕೃತ್ಯ ।ಸಾಕೆನದೆ ಬೇಕೆನದೆ ನೋಡು ನೀನದನು ॥ತಾಕಿಸದಿರಂತರಾತ್ಮಂಗಾವಿಚಿತ್ರವನು ।ಹಾಕು ವೇಷವ ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೧ ॥

content: ಭೋಜನದಿ ಪ್ರಮಭೋಜನ ಪರಬ್ರಹ್ಮರಸ ।ಯಾಚಿಸಲ್ಕೇನಿರ್ಪುದದನುಂಡ ಬಳಿಕ? ॥ತ್ಯಾಜಕ ತ್ಯಾಗ ಸಂತ್ಯಾಜ್ಯ ಭೇದಗಳಿರದೆ ।ರಾಜ ನೀಂ ಜಗಕೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೨ ॥ bhOjanadi parama bhOjana parabrahma rasa ।yAchisalke Enirpudu adanunDa baLika? ॥tyAjaka tyAga santyAjya bhEdagaLirade ।rAja nIm jagakella  - Mankutimma ॥ 752 ॥Among all the foods, the best is the essence of the Parabrahman (God) himself. Once you have experienced it, then what is left in this world to ask for? People say that the way to realization is to lose attachment  - letting go. If you have experienced God, then you will not find any difference among the person letting go, the act of letting go and the object being let go. You are the king of the world.  - Mankutimma
translation: Among all the foods, the best is the essence of the Parabrahman (God) himself. Once you have experienced it, then what is left in this world to ask for? People say that the way to realization is to lose attachment  - letting go. If you have experienced God, then you will not find any difference among the person letting go, the act of letting go and the object being let go. You are the king of the world.  - Mankutimma
title: ರಾಜ ನೀಂ ಜಗಕೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bhOjanadi parama bhOjana parabrahma rasa ।yAchisalke Enirpudu adanunDa baLika? ॥tyAjaka tyAga santyAjya bhEdagaLirade ।rAja nIm jagakella  - Mankutimma ॥ 752 ॥
kagga: ಭೋಜನದಿ ಪ್ರಮಭೋಜನ ಪರಬ್ರಹ್ಮರಸ ।ಯಾಚಿಸಲ್ಕೇನಿರ್ಪುದದನುಂಡ ಬಳಿಕ? ॥ತ್ಯಾಜಕ ತ್ಯಾಗ ಸಂತ್ಯಾಜ್ಯ ಭೇದಗಳಿರದೆ ।ರಾಜ ನೀಂ ಜಗಕೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೨ ॥

content: ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಾನುಸಂಧಾನ ಲೋಕಸಂಧಾನದಲಿ ।ಬ್ರಹ್ಮದರ್ಶನವೆಲ್ಲ ಜೀವರೂಪದಲಿ ॥ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಾನುಭವ ದೇಹಕರಣಾನುಭವಗಳಲಿ ।ಮರ್ಮವಿದು ಮುಕ್ತಿಗೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೩ ॥ brahmAnusandhAna lOka sandhAnadali ।brahma darshanavella jIvarUpadali ॥brahma anubhava dEha karaNAnubhavagaLali ।marmavidu muktigelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 753 ॥Understand the brahman (God) by understanding his world. See the brahman in all beings He created. Experience the brahman through the senses. Salvation is possible through this path  - experiencing the world (not by abandoning it).  - Mankutimma
translation: Understand the brahman (God) by understanding his world. See the brahman in all beings He created. Experience the brahman through the senses. Salvation is possible through this path  - experiencing the world (not by abandoning it).  - Mankutimma
title: ಮರ್ಮವಿದು ಮುಕ್ತಿಗೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: brahmAnusandhAna lOka sandhAnadali ।brahma darshanavella jIvarUpadali ॥brahma anubhava dEha karaNAnubhavagaLali ।marmavidu muktigelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 753 ॥
kagga: ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಾನುಸಂಧಾನ ಲೋಕಸಂಧಾನದಲಿ ।ಬ್ರಹ್ಮದರ್ಶನವೆಲ್ಲ ಜೀವರೂಪದಲಿ ॥ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಾನುಭವ ದೇಹಕರಣಾನುಭವಗಳಲಿ ।ಮರ್ಮವಿದು ಮುಕ್ತಿಗೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೩ ॥
