content: ಒಮ್ಮೆ ಹೂದೋಟದಲಿ, ಒಮ್ಮೆ ಕಳೆಕೂಟದಲಿ ।ಒಮ್ಮೆ ಸಂಗೀತದಲಿ, ಒಮ್ಮೆ ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರದಲಿ ॥ಒಮ್ಮೆ ಸಂಸಾರದಲಿ, ಮತ್ತೊಮ್ಮೆ ಮೌನದಲಿ ।ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಾನುಭವಿಯಾಗೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೪ ॥ omme hUdOTadali, omme kaLe kUTadali ।omme sangeetadali, omme shaastradali ॥omme samsaaradali, mattomme maunadali ।brahmAnubhaviyAgo  - Mankutimma ॥ 754 ॥The creator is everywhere. Experience him sometimes in a flower garden, sometimes in a friendly get together, sometimes in music, sometimes in scriptures, sometimes in worldly dealings and sometimes in silence.  - Mankutimma
translation: The creator is everywhere. Experience him sometimes in a flower garden, sometimes in a friendly get together, sometimes in music, sometimes in scriptures, sometimes in worldly dealings and sometimes in silence.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಾನುಭವಿಯಾಗೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: omme hUdOTadali, omme kaLe kUTadali ।omme sangeetadali, omme shaastradali ॥omme samsaaradali, mattomme maunadali ।brahmAnubhaviyAgo  - Mankutimma ॥ 754 ॥
kagga: ಒಮ್ಮೆ ಹೂದೋಟದಲಿ, ಒಮ್ಮೆ ಕಳೆಕೂಟದಲಿ ।ಒಮ್ಮೆ ಸಂಗೀತದಲಿ, ಒಮ್ಮೆ ಶಾಸ್ತ್ರದಲಿ ॥ಒಮ್ಮೆ ಸಂಸಾರದಲಿ, ಮತ್ತೊಮ್ಮೆ ಮೌನದಲಿ ।ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಾನುಭವಿಯಾಗೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೪ ॥

content: ಮತಿಗರ್ಥವಾದೊಡೇಂ? ಸ್ಮೃತಿಯೊಳದು ನೆಲಸಿರಲಿ ।ಸತತ ಸಂಧಾನದಲಿ ಪರಮಾರ್ಥವಿರಲಿ ॥ಶತಲಕ್ಷಧನದ ಲೆಕ್ಕವ ಬಾಯಿ ನುಡಿದೊಡೇಂ? ।ಭೃತಿಯೆಷ್ಟು ವೆಚ್ಚಕ್ಕೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೫ ॥ matige arthavAdoDEm? smRutiyoLadu nelasirali ।satata sandhAnadali paramArthavirali ॥shatalakSha dhanada lekkava bAyi nuDidoDEm? ।bhRutiyeShTu vecchakke?  - Mankutimma ॥ 755 ॥It is not enough if you just understand it. You must always remember it. In all your thoughts, there must be the presence of the ultimate truth. What is the use of a clerk (in a bank) talking about and keeping account of millions? At the end of the day he has to get only wages to meet his ends.  - Mankutimma
translation: It is not enough if you just understand it. You must always remember it. In all your thoughts, there must be the presence of the ultimate truth. What is the use of a clerk (in a bank) talking about and keeping account of millions? At the end of the day he has to get only wages to meet his ends.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭೃತಿಯೆಷ್ಟು ವೆಚ್ಚಕ್ಕೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: matige arthavAdoDEm? smRutiyoLadu nelasirali ।satata sandhAnadali paramArthavirali ॥shatalakSha dhanada lekkava bAyi nuDidoDEm? ।bhRutiyeShTu vecchakke?  - Mankutimma ॥ 755 ॥
kagga: ಮತಿಗರ್ಥವಾದೊಡೇಂ? ಸ್ಮೃತಿಯೊಳದು ನೆಲಸಿರಲಿ ।ಸತತ ಸಂಧಾನದಲಿ ಪರಮಾರ್ಥವಿರಲಿ ॥ಶತಲಕ್ಷಧನದ ಲೆಕ್ಕವ ಬಾಯಿ ನುಡಿದೊಡೇಂ? ।ಭೃತಿಯೆಷ್ಟು ವೆಚ್ಚಕ್ಕೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೫ ॥

content: ಸಾರ್ವಭೌಮತೆ ನಾಲ್ಕು ಗುಣಕೆ ಗುಣರಾಜ್ಯದಲಿ ।ಧೈರ್ಯ ಮೊದಲಿನದೆರಡನೆಯದು ಮತಿಯೋಜೆ ॥ಸರ್ವದಯೆ ಮೂರನೆಯದದುವೆ ನೀತಿಯ ಮೂಲ ।ನಿರ್ಮಮತ್ವವೆ ಮುಕುಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೬ ॥ sArvabhaumate nAlku guNake guNarAjyadali ।dhairya modalinadu eraDaneyadu matiyOje ॥sarvadaye mUraneyadaduve nItiya mUla ।nirmamatvave mukuTa  - Mankutimma ॥ 756 ॥In the kingdom of qualities, there are four qualities that are the best. Courage is the first. Second is wisdom that lets you choose the right over wrong. Having compassion towards all is the third which is the root of all morality. Dispassionate attachment is the fourth and the best of them all.  - Mankutimma
translation: In the kingdom of qualities, there are four qualities that are the best. Courage is the first. Second is wisdom that lets you choose the right over wrong. Having compassion towards all is the third which is the root of all morality. Dispassionate attachment is the fourth and the best of them all.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಿರ್ಮಮತ್ವವೆ ಮುಕುಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sArvabhaumate nAlku guNake guNarAjyadali ।dhairya modalinadu eraDaneyadu matiyOje ॥sarvadaye mUraneyadaduve nItiya mUla ।nirmamatvave mukuTa  - Mankutimma ॥ 756 ॥
kagga: ಸಾರ್ವಭೌಮತೆ ನಾಲ್ಕು ಗುಣಕೆ ಗುಣರಾಜ್ಯದಲಿ ।ಧೈರ್ಯ ಮೊದಲಿನದೆರಡನೆಯದು ಮತಿಯೋಜೆ ॥ಸರ್ವದಯೆ ಮೂರನೆಯದದುವೆ ನೀತಿಯ ಮೂಲ ।ನಿರ್ಮಮತ್ವವೆ ಮುಕುಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೬ ॥

content: ವ್ಯಾಮೋಹವಿಲ್ಲದ ಪ್ರೇಮ ನಿರ್ಭರವಿರಲಿ ।ಭೀಮಸಾಹಸವಿರಲಿ ಹಗೆತನವನುಳಿದು ॥ನೇಮನಿಷ್ಠೆಗಳಿರಲಿ ಡಂಭಕಠಿಣತೆ ಬಿಟ್ಟು ।ಸೌಮ್ಯವೆಲ್ಲಡೆಯಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೭ ॥ vyAmOhavillada prEma nirbharavirali ।bhIma sAhasavirali hagetanavanuLidu ॥nEmaniShThegaLirali DambhakaThiNate biTTu ।soumyavelleDeyirali  - Mankutimma ॥ 757 ॥Let there be a lots of love without attachment. Let you have the courage of Bheema without the hatred. Let there be rituals and rules without being just namesake and punishing(or showoff). Let there be pleasantness everywhere.  - Mankutimma
translation: Let there be a lots of love without attachment. Let you have the courage of Bheema without the hatred. Let there be rituals and rules without being just namesake and punishing(or showoff). Let there be pleasantness everywhere.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸೌಮ್ಯವೆಲ್ಲಡೆಯಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vyAmOhavillada prEma nirbharavirali ।bhIma sAhasavirali hagetanavanuLidu ॥nEmaniShThegaLirali DambhakaThiNate biTTu ।soumyavelleDeyirali  - Mankutimma ॥ 757 ॥
kagga: ವ್ಯಾಮೋಹವಿಲ್ಲದ ಪ್ರೇಮ ನಿರ್ಭರವಿರಲಿ ।ಭೀಮಸಾಹಸವಿರಲಿ ಹಗೆತನವನುಳಿದು ॥ನೇಮನಿಷ್ಠೆಗಳಿರಲಿ ಡಂಭಕಠಿಣತೆ ಬಿಟ್ಟು ।ಸೌಮ್ಯವೆಲ್ಲಡೆಯಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೭ ॥

content: ಔದಾರ್ಯ ತಾಯಿ ನೀತಿಗೆ, ಧೈರ್ಯವೇ ತಂದೆ ।ಸ್ವಾಧಿಪತ್ಯದೆ ನೀನು ಬಾಳನಾಳುವೊಡೆ ॥ಹೋದುದನು ನೆನೆಯದಿರು, ಬರುವುದಕೆ ಸಿದ್ಧನಿರು ।ಆದನಿತು ಸಂತೋಷ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೮ ॥ oudArya tAyi nItige, dhairyavE tande ।svAdhipatyade nInu bALanALuvoDe ॥hOdudanu neneyadiru, baruvudake niddhaniru ।aadanitu santOSha  - Mankutimma ॥ 758 ॥Morality has courage as father and magnanimity as mother. When you are in control of your life, you should not worry about what you have lost. You should be ready for whatever future has in store for you. In the process, if you can get some happiness, make full use of it.  - Mankutimma
translation: Morality has courage as father and magnanimity as mother. When you are in control of your life, you should not worry about what you have lost. You should be ready for whatever future has in store for you. In the process, if you can get some happiness, make full use of it.  - Mankutimma
title: ಆದನಿತು ಸಂತೋಷ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: oudArya tAyi nItige, dhairyavE tande ।svAdhipatyade nInu bALanALuvoDe ॥hOdudanu neneyadiru, baruvudake niddhaniru ।aadanitu santOSha  - Mankutimma ॥ 758 ॥
kagga: ಔದಾರ್ಯ ತಾಯಿ ನೀತಿಗೆ, ಧೈರ್ಯವೇ ತಂದೆ ।ಸ್ವಾಧಿಪತ್ಯದೆ ನೀನು ಬಾಳನಾಳುವೊಡೆ ॥ಹೋದುದನು ನೆನೆಯದಿರು, ಬರುವುದಕೆ ಸಿದ್ಧನಿರು ।ಆದನಿತು ಸಂತೋಷ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೮ ॥

content: ಬರದಿಹುದರೆಣಿಕೆಯಲಿ ಬಂದಿಹುದ ಮರೆಯದಿರು ।ಗುರುತಿಸೊಳಿತಿರುವುದನು ಕೇಡುಗಳ ನಡುವೆ ॥ಇರುವ ಭಾಗ್ಯವ ನೆನೆದು ಬಾರೆನೆಂಬುದನು ಬಿಡು ।ಹರುಷಕದೆ ದಾರಿಯೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೯ ॥ baradihudara eNikeyali bandihuda mareyadiru ।gurutisu oLitiruvudanu kEDugaLa naDuve ॥iruva bhAgyava nenedu bArenembudanu biDu ।haruShakade dAriyelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 759 ॥Don;t neglect what you have while counting what you don;t have. Try to identify the good and pleasant among many unpleasant things. You should relish what you have and let go of what does not come to you. That is the path to happiness.  - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t neglect what you have while counting what you don;t have. Try to identify the good and pleasant among many unpleasant things. You should relish what you have and let go of what does not come to you. That is the path to happiness.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹರುಷಕದೆ ದಾರಿಯೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: baradihudara eNikeyali bandihuda mareyadiru ।gurutisu oLitiruvudanu kEDugaLa naDuve ॥iruva bhAgyava nenedu bArenembudanu biDu ।haruShakade dAriyelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 759 ॥
kagga: ಬರದಿಹುದರೆಣಿಕೆಯಲಿ ಬಂದಿಹುದ ಮರೆಯದಿರು ।ಗುರುತಿಸೊಳಿತಿರುವುದನು ಕೇಡುಗಳ ನಡುವೆ ॥ಇರುವ ಭಾಗ್ಯವ ನೆನೆದು ಬಾರೆನೆಂಬುದನು ಬಿಡು ।ಹರುಷಕದೆ ದಾರಿಯೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೫೯ ॥

content: ಮುನ್ನಾದ ಜನುಮಗಳ ನೆನಸಿನಿಂ ನಿನಗೇನು? ।ಇನ್ನುಮಿಹುದಕೆ ನೀಡು ಮನವನ್; ಎನ್ನುವವೋಲ್ ॥ಬೆನ್ನ ಪಿಂತಿನದು ಕಾಣಿಸದಂತೆ ಪರಮೇಷ್ಠಿ ।ಕಣ್ಣನಿಟ್ಟನು ಮುಖದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೦ ॥ munnAda janumagaLa nenasinim ninagEnu? ।innumihudake nIDu manavan: ennuvavOl ॥benna pintinadu kANisadante paramEShThi ।kaNNaniTTanu mukhadi  - Mankutimma ॥ 760 ॥Don;t think about the lives that we have already lived. We should concentrate in the ones which are yet to come. By keeping our eyes set in the front  - God created us like this so that we should be forward looking.  - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t think about the lives that we have already lived. We should concentrate in the ones which are yet to come. By keeping our eyes set in the front  - God created us like this so that we should be forward looking.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಣ್ಣನಿಟ್ಟನು ಮುಖದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: munnAda janumagaLa nenasinim ninagEnu? ।innumihudake nIDu manavan: ennuvavOl ॥benna pintinadu kANisadante paramEShThi ।kaNNaniTTanu mukhadi  - Mankutimma ॥ 760 ॥
kagga: ಮುನ್ನಾದ ಜನುಮಗಳ ನೆನಸಿನಿಂ ನಿನಗೇನು? ।ಇನ್ನುಮಿಹುದಕೆ ನೀಡು ಮನವನ್; ಎನ್ನುವವೋಲ್ ॥ಬೆನ್ನ ಪಿಂತಿನದು ಕಾಣಿಸದಂತೆ ಪರಮೇಷ್ಠಿ ।ಕಣ್ಣನಿಟ್ಟನು ಮುಖದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೦ ॥

content: ಲೋಚನದ ಸಂಚಾರ ಮುಖದ ಮುಂದಕಪಾರ ।ಗೋಚರಿಪುದೇನದಕೆ ತಲೆಯ ಹಿಂದಣದು? ॥ಪ್ರಾಚೀನ ಹೊರತು ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರ ನೀಂ, ಸಾಂತವದು ।ಚಾಚು ಮುಂದಕೆ ಮನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೧ ॥ lochanada sanchAra mukhada mundake apAra ।gocharipudu Enadake taleya hindaNadu? ॥prAchIna horetu svatantra nIm, sAntavadu ।chAchu mundake manava  - Mankutimma ॥ 761 ॥The eyes wander in front of us a lot. What can it see from behind the head? Like that we cannot do anything about the past. The past has an end. We are free from it. You must spread your mind into the future  - not past.  - Mankutimma
translation: The eyes wander in front of us a lot. What can it see from behind the head? Like that we cannot do anything about the past. The past has an end. We are free from it. You must spread your mind into the future  - not past.  - Mankutimma
title: ಚಾಚು ಮುಂದಕೆ ಮನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: lochanada sanchAra mukhada mundake apAra ।gocharipudu Enadake taleya hindaNadu? ॥prAchIna horetu svatantra nIm, sAntavadu ।chAchu mundake manava  - Mankutimma ॥ 761 ॥
kagga: ಲೋಚನದ ಸಂಚಾರ ಮುಖದ ಮುಂದಕಪಾರ ।ಗೋಚರಿಪುದೇನದಕೆ ತಲೆಯ ಹಿಂದಣದು? ॥ಪ್ರಾಚೀನ ಹೊರತು ಸ್ವತಂತ್ರ ನೀಂ, ಸಾಂತವದು ।ಚಾಚು ಮುಂದಕೆ ಮನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೧ ॥

content: ಧಾರುಣಿಯ ನಡಿಗೆಯಲಿ ಮೇರುವಿನ ಗುರಿಯಿರಲಿ ।ಮೇರುವನು ಮರೆತಂದೆ ನಾರಕಕೆ ದಾರಿ ॥ದೂರವಾದೊಡದೇನು? ಕಾಲು ಕುಂಟಿರಲೇನು? ।ಊರ ನೆನಪೇ ಬಲವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೨ ॥ dhAruNiya naDigeyali mEruvina giriyirali ।mEruvanu maretande nArakake dAri ॥dUravAdoDadEnu? kAlu kunTiralEnu? ।Ura nenapE balavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 762 ॥In our life on this world, let our goal be to scale Mt Meru (Mountain of Gold). The day you forget about Meru, it will be a path to hell. What if it is far away? What if you are handicapped? Let the memory of the home town give you strength.  - Mankutimma
translation: In our life on this world, let our goal be to scale Mt Meru (Mountain of Gold). The day you forget about Meru, it will be a path to hell. What if it is far away? What if you are handicapped? Let the memory of the home town give you strength.  - Mankutimma
title: ಊರ ನೆನಪೇ ಬಲವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dhAruNiya naDigeyali mEruvina giriyirali ।mEruvanu maretande nArakake dAri ॥dUravAdoDadEnu? kAlu kunTiralEnu? ।Ura nenapE balavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 762 ॥
kagga: ಧಾರುಣಿಯ ನಡಿಗೆಯಲಿ ಮೇರುವಿನ ಗುರಿಯಿರಲಿ ।ಮೇರುವನು ಮರೆತಂದೆ ನಾರಕಕೆ ದಾರಿ ॥ದೂರವಾದೊಡದೇನು? ಕಾಲು ಕುಂಟಿರಲೇನು? ।ಊರ ನೆನಪೇ ಬಲವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೨ ॥

content: ಮೇರುಪರ್ವತಕಿಹುವು ನೂರೆಂಟು ಶಿಖರಗಳು ।ದಾರಿ ನೂರಿರಬಹುದು, ನಿಲುವ ಕಡೆ ನೂರು ॥ಸಾರು ನೀಂ ಯಾತ್ರಿಕರಿಗೆಲ್ಲ ಕೆಳೆಯಾಗಿರುತೆ ।ಮೇರುಸಂಸ್ಮೃತಿಯೆ ಬಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೩ ॥ mEru parvatake ihuvu nUrenTu shikharagaLu ।dAri nUrirabahudu, niluva kaDe nUru ॥sAru nIm yAtrikarigella kaLeyAgirute ।mEru samsmRutiye bala  - Mankutimma ॥ 763 ॥There are hundreds of peaks (which one may confuse to be the actual peak) on Mt Meru.. There are hundreds of paths to the top. There are hundreds of resting points. You must mingle well with all other travelers with compassion. Let the thoughts of the Meru itself be your strength.  - Mankutimma
translation: There are hundreds of peaks (which one may confuse to be the actual peak) on Mt Meru.. There are hundreds of paths to the top. There are hundreds of resting points. You must mingle well with all other travelers with compassion. Let the thoughts of the Meru itself be your strength.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೇರುಸಂಸ್ಮೃತಿಯೆ ಬಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mEru parvatake ihuvu nUrenTu shikharagaLu ।dAri nUrirabahudu, niluva kaDe nUru ॥sAru nIm yAtrikarigella kaLeyAgirute ।mEru samsmRutiye bala  - Mankutimma ॥ 763 ॥
kagga: ಮೇರುಪರ್ವತಕಿಹುವು ನೂರೆಂಟು ಶಿಖರಗಳು ।ದಾರಿ ನೂರಿರಬಹುದು, ನಿಲುವ ಕಡೆ ನೂರು ॥ಸಾರು ನೀಂ ಯಾತ್ರಿಕರಿಗೆಲ್ಲ ಕೆಳೆಯಾಗಿರುತೆ ।ಮೇರುಸಂಸ್ಮೃತಿಯೆ ಬಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೩ ॥

content: ಧನ್ಯ ಹೊಲೆಯರ ನಂದ; ಹಿಡಿದುದವನನು ಕನಸು ।ಸ್ವರ್ಣಸಭೆಯಾ ಶೈವತಾಂಡವದ ಕನಸು ॥ಅನ್ಯ ಚಿಂತೆಗಳನದು ಬಿಡಿಸುತವನಾತ್ಮವನು ।ಚಿನ್ಮಯಕೆ ಸೇರಿಸಿತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೪ ॥ dhanya holeyara nanda; hiDidudu avananu kanasu ।svarna sabheya aa shava tAnDavada kanasu ॥anya chintegaLanadu biDisuta avanAtmavanu ।chinmayake sErisitu  - Mankutimma ॥ 764 ॥There was once a great believer in Lord Shiva by the name  - Nanda. He was born in lower caste and was forbidden from entering temples. But he had a dream of Shiva dancing his signature Tandava steps in a elegant court of Gods. After having this dream that was the only thing he could think of. His single minded devotion made him forget (free himself from) all the worldly ties and finally become one with the Holy Spirit.  - Mankutimma
translation: There was once a great believer in Lord Shiva by the name  - Nanda. He was born in lower caste and was forbidden from entering temples. But he had a dream of Shiva dancing his signature Tandava steps in a elegant court of Gods. After having this dream that was the only thing he could think of. His single minded devotion made him forget (free himself from) all the worldly ties and finally become one with the Holy Spirit.  - Mankutimma
title: ಚಿನ್ಮಯಕೆ ಸೇರಿಸಿತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dhanya holeyara nanda; hiDidudu avananu kanasu ।svarna sabheya aa shava tAnDavada kanasu ॥anya chintegaLanadu biDisuta avanAtmavanu ।chinmayake sErisitu  - Mankutimma ॥ 764 ॥
kagga: ಧನ್ಯ ಹೊಲೆಯರ ನಂದ; ಹಿಡಿದುದವನನು ಕನಸು ।ಸ್ವರ್ಣಸಭೆಯಾ ಶೈವತಾಂಡವದ ಕನಸು ॥ಅನ್ಯ ಚಿಂತೆಗಳನದು ಬಿಡಿಸುತವನಾತ್ಮವನು ।ಚಿನ್ಮಯಕೆ ಸೇರಿಸಿತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೪ ॥

content: ತನ್ನ ರುಚಿ ರಾಮರುಚಿ; ತನ್ನ ಸಂತುಷ್ಟಿ ಪರಿ- ।ಪೂರ್ಣವಪ್ಪುದು ರಾಮಸಂತುಷ್ಟಿಯಿಂದೆ ॥ಎನ್ನುವಾ ಸಾಜಾದಾ ದೈವಾತ್ಮಭಾವದಲಿ ।ಧನ್ಯಳಾದಳು ಶಬರಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೫ ॥ tanna ruchi rAmaruchi; tanna santuShTi ।paripUrNavappudu rAmasantuShTiyinde ॥ennuva sAjAdA daivAtma bhAvadali ।dhanyaLAdaLu shabari  - Mankutimma ॥ 765 ॥Shabari had another kind of sublime devotion towards Rama. She thought that only when Rama is happy could she be happy. So, she made sure that all the fruits she chose for him were sweet by tasting them herself. This blurring of the personal with the supreme soul is exemplified in Shabari.  - Mankutimma
translation: Shabari had another kind of sublime devotion towards Rama. She thought that only when Rama is happy could she be happy. So, she made sure that all the fruits she chose for him were sweet by tasting them herself. This blurring of the personal with the supreme soul is exemplified in Shabari.  - Mankutimma
title: ಧನ್ಯಳಾದಳು ಶಬರಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tanna ruchi rAmaruchi; tanna santuShTi ।paripUrNavappudu rAmasantuShTiyinde ॥ennuva sAjAdA daivAtma bhAvadali ।dhanyaLAdaLu shabari  - Mankutimma ॥ 765 ॥
kagga: ತನ್ನ ರುಚಿ ರಾಮರುಚಿ; ತನ್ನ ಸಂತುಷ್ಟಿ ಪರಿ- ।ಪೂರ್ಣವಪ್ಪುದು ರಾಮಸಂತುಷ್ಟಿಯಿಂದೆ ॥ಎನ್ನುವಾ ಸಾಜಾದಾ ದೈವಾತ್ಮಭಾವದಲಿ ।ಧನ್ಯಳಾದಳು ಶಬರಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೫ ॥

content: ಘನತತ್ತ್ವವೊಂದಕ್ಕೆ ದಿನರಾತ್ರಿ ಮನಸೋತು ।ನೆನೆಯದಿನ್ನೊಂದನೆಲ್ಲವ ನೀಡುತದರಾ ॥ಅನುಸಂಧಿಯಲಿ ಜೀವಭಾರವನು ಮರೆಯುವುದು ।ಹನುಮನುಪದೇಶ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೬ ॥ ghana tattva ondakke dina rAtri manasOtu ।neneyade innondanu ella nIDuta adara aa ॥anusandhiyali jIvabhAravanu mareyuvudu ।hanumanupadesha  - Mankutimma ॥ 766 ॥Surrendering to a greater call and thinking about it day and night, not thinking about any other thing, seeing everything else in its light  - spending the life thus is what Hanuman teaches us to do. To Hanuman, devotion towards Rama was that greater call.  - Mankutimma
translation: Surrendering to a greater call and thinking about it day and night, not thinking about any other thing, seeing everything else in its light  - spending the life thus is what Hanuman teaches us to do. To Hanuman, devotion towards Rama was that greater call.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹನುಮನುಪದೇಶ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ghana tattva ondakke dina rAtri manasOtu ।neneyade innondanu ella nIDuta adara aa ॥anusandhiyali jIvabhAravanu mareyuvudu ।hanumanupadesha  - Mankutimma ॥ 766 ॥
kagga: ಘನತತ್ತ್ವವೊಂದಕ್ಕೆ ದಿನರಾತ್ರಿ ಮನಸೋತು ।ನೆನೆಯದಿನ್ನೊಂದನೆಲ್ಲವ ನೀಡುತದರಾ ॥ಅನುಸಂಧಿಯಲಿ ಜೀವಭಾರವನು ಮರೆಯುವುದು ।ಹನುಮನುಪದೇಶ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೬ ॥

content: ಕ್ಷಣದಿಂದನುಕ್ಷಣಕೆ, ದಿನದಿಂದ ಮರುದಿನಕೆ ।ಅನಿತನಿತರೊಳೆ ಬದುಕುತಾಯುವನು ಕಳೆವಾ ॥ಮನದ ಲಘುಸಂಚಾರವೊಂದು ಯೋಗದುಪಾಯ ।ಶುನಕೋಪದೇಶವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೭ ॥ kShaNadinda anukShaNake, dinadinda marudinake ।anitu anitaroLe badukuta aayuvanu kaLeva aa ॥manada laghu sanchAravu ondu yOgada upAya ।shunakana upadeshavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 767 ॥Living from moment to moment, day to day and finding small happiness in little small pocket and leading the entire life thus. It is a lighthearted way of leading life and a good plan. This is the plan followed by a dog.  - Mankutimma
translation: Living from moment to moment, day to day and finding small happiness in little small pocket and leading the entire life thus. It is a lighthearted way of leading life and a good plan. This is the plan followed by a dog.  - Mankutimma
title: ಶುನಕೋಪದೇಶವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kShaNadinda anukShaNake, dinadinda marudinake ।anitu anitaroLe badukuta aayuvanu kaLeva aa ॥manada laghu sanchAravu ondu yOgada upAya ।shunakana upadeshavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 767 ॥
kagga: ಕ್ಷಣದಿಂದನುಕ್ಷಣಕೆ, ದಿನದಿಂದ ಮರುದಿನಕೆ ।ಅನಿತನಿತರೊಳೆ ಬದುಕುತಾಯುವನು ಕಳೆವಾ ॥ಮನದ ಲಘುಸಂಚಾರವೊಂದು ಯೋಗದುಪಾಯ ।ಶುನಕೋಪದೇಶವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೭ ॥

content: ಗತಿಯೇನು ಎನಗೆನುತ ಕೇಳ್ವವರೆ ಎಲ್ಲರುಂ ।ಹಿತವೆಂತು ಜಗಕೆಂದು ಕೇಳುವವರಾರು? ॥ಮತಿಯ ವಿಶ್ವದಿ ಬೆರಸಿ ಜೀವಿತವ ವಿಸ್ತರಿಸೆ ।ಪಥ ಮುಕ್ತಿಗಾಗಳೇ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೮ ॥ gatiyEnu enegenuta kELvavare ellarum ।hitaventu jagakendu kELuvavarAru? ॥matiya vishvadi berasi jIvitava vistarise ।patha muktige aagaLE  - Mankutimma ॥ 768 ॥Everyone is worried about what would happen to them. Nobody is asking what is good for the world? When we use our wisdom with a world view and expand our consciousness, that becomes a path to salvation.  - Mankutimma
translation: Everyone is worried about what would happen to them. Nobody is asking what is good for the world? When we use our wisdom with a world view and expand our consciousness, that becomes a path to salvation.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪಥ ಮುಕ್ತಿಗಾಗಳೇ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: gatiyEnu enegenuta kELvavare ellarum ।hitaventu jagakendu kELuvavarAru? ॥matiya vishvadi berasi jIvitava vistarise ।patha muktige aagaLE  - Mankutimma ॥ 768 ॥
kagga: ಗತಿಯೇನು ಎನಗೆನುತ ಕೇಳ್ವವರೆ ಎಲ್ಲರುಂ ।ಹಿತವೆಂತು ಜಗಕೆಂದು ಕೇಳುವವರಾರು? ॥ಮತಿಯ ವಿಶ್ವದಿ ಬೆರಸಿ ಜೀವಿತವ ವಿಸ್ತರಿಸೆ ।ಪಥ ಮುಕ್ತಿಗಾಗಳೇ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೮ ॥

content: ಒಂದುದಿನವೌತಣಕೆ, ಉಪವಾಸಕಿನ್ನೊಂದು ।ಸಂದಣಿಯದಿನವೊಂದು, ಬಿಡುವು ದಿನವೊಂದು ॥ಹೊಂದಿರ್ದೊಡುಭಯಮುಂ ಜೀವಕದು ಸುಖ ಚಲನ ।ಒಂದುಕಾಲ್ನಡೆ ಸುಖವೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೯ ॥ ondu dinavu autaNake, upavAsake innondu ।sandaNiya dinavondu, biDuvu dinavondu ॥hondirdoDe ubhayamum jIvakadu sukha chalana ।ondu kAlnaDe sukhave?  - Mankutimma ॥ 769 ॥One day we feast. We stay hungry as a ritual on some other day. One day will be very busy. Another day will be for rest. When the two are well interspersed, life will be happy. If there are days of only one kind, then life becomes tough  - like walking on one leg.  - Mankutimma
translation: One day we feast. We stay hungry as a ritual on some other day. One day will be very busy. Another day will be for rest. When the two are well interspersed, life will be happy. If there are days of only one kind, then life becomes tough  - like walking on one leg.  - Mankutimma
title: ಒಂದುಕಾಲ್ನಡೆ ಸುಖವೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ondu dinavu autaNake, upavAsake innondu ।sandaNiya dinavondu, biDuvu dinavondu ॥hondirdoDe ubhayamum jIvakadu sukha chalana ।ondu kAlnaDe sukhave?  - Mankutimma ॥ 769 ॥
kagga: ಒಂದುದಿನವೌತಣಕೆ, ಉಪವಾಸಕಿನ್ನೊಂದು ।ಸಂದಣಿಯದಿನವೊಂದು, ಬಿಡುವು ದಿನವೊಂದು ॥ಹೊಂದಿರ್ದೊಡುಭಯಮುಂ ಜೀವಕದು ಸುಖ ಚಲನ ।ಒಂದುಕಾಲ್ನಡೆ ಸುಖವೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೬೯ ॥

content: ನೇತ್ರಯುಗಳಂ ಪಿಡಿಗುಮೊಂದು ಲಕ್ಷ್ಯವ ಕೂಡಿ ।ಹಸ್ತಯುಗ ಸಾಧಿಪುದು ಮನದರ್ಥವೊಂದನ್ ॥ದ್ವೈತದಿಂದದ್ವೈತವದ್ವೈತದೊಳ್ ದ್ವೈತ ।ಚೈತನ್ಯ ಲೀಲೆಯಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೦ ॥ nEtrayugaLam piDigum ondu lakShayava kUDi ।hastayuga sAdhipudu manadarthavondan ॥dvaitadinda advaita advaitadoL dvaita ।chaitanya lIleyidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 770 ॥The two eyes set you a single target and the two hands help you to achieve a single goal that the mind sets. There is unity through duality and duality inside unity. This is the mark of the Cosmic Spirit of God.  - Mankutimma
translation: The two eyes set you a single target and the two hands help you to achieve a single goal that the mind sets. There is unity through duality and duality inside unity. This is the mark of the Cosmic Spirit of God.  - Mankutimma
title: ಚೈತನ್ಯ ಲೀಲೆಯಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nEtrayugaLam piDigum ondu lakShayava kUDi ।hastayuga sAdhipudu manadarthavondan ॥dvaitadinda advaita advaitadoL dvaita ।chaitanya lIleyidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 770 ॥
kagga: ನೇತ್ರಯುಗಳಂ ಪಿಡಿಗುಮೊಂದು ಲಕ್ಷ್ಯವ ಕೂಡಿ ।ಹಸ್ತಯುಗ ಸಾಧಿಪುದು ಮನದರ್ಥವೊಂದನ್ ॥ದ್ವೈತದಿಂದದ್ವೈತವದ್ವೈತದೊಳ್ ದ್ವೈತ ।ಚೈತನ್ಯ ಲೀಲೆಯಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೦ ॥

content: ನೀರಧಿ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮ, ನೀರ್ಗಲ್ ಜೀವವೆನುತೊಂದು ।ಕ್ಷೀರವದು, ಘೃತವಿದದರೊಳಗೆನ್ನುತೊಂದು ॥ಕೀರು ಪರಮಾನ್ನವದು, ದ್ರಾಕ್ಷಿಯಿದೆನುತ್ತೊಂದು ।ಮೂರಿಂತು ಮತವಿವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೧ ॥ nIradhi brahma, nIrgal jIvavu enuta ondu ।kShIravadu, ghRutavidu adaroLage ennuta ondu॥kIru paramAnnavadu, drAkShiyidu enuttondu ।mUrintu matavivara  - Mankutimma ॥ 771 ॥This is the summary of the three prevalent treatises about the universe. One says God is like an ocean and beings are like an iceberg  - made of the same material but visibly different and supported by God. Second one says that God is like milk and beings are like ghee  - the two are indistinguishable till one makes an effort to churn it. The third one says, God is kheer (a sweet dish) and beings are like raisins in it. Beings are just a item in the recipe and clearly distinguishable from the complete product (Kheer).  - Mankutimma
translation: This is the summary of the three prevalent treatises about the universe. One says God is like an ocean and beings are like an iceberg  - made of the same material but visibly different and supported by God. Second one says that God is like milk and beings are like ghee  - the two are indistinguishable till one makes an effort to churn it. The third one says, God is kheer (a sweet dish) and beings are like raisins in it. Beings are just a item in the recipe and clearly distinguishable from the complete product (Kheer).  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೂರಿಂತು ಮತವಿವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nIradhi brahma, nIrgal jIvavu enuta ondu ।kShIravadu, ghRutavidu adaroLage ennuta ondu॥kIru paramAnnavadu, drAkShiyidu enuttondu ।mUrintu matavivara  - Mankutimma ॥ 771 ॥
kagga: ನೀರಧಿ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮ, ನೀರ್ಗಲ್ ಜೀವವೆನುತೊಂದು ।ಕ್ಷೀರವದು, ಘೃತವಿದದರೊಳಗೆನ್ನುತೊಂದು ॥ಕೀರು ಪರಮಾನ್ನವದು, ದ್ರಾಕ್ಷಿಯಿದೆನುತ್ತೊಂದು ।ಮೂರಿಂತು ಮತವಿವರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೧ ॥

content: ಮೂರಿರಲಿ ವಾದ, ಮುನ್ನೂರಿರಲಿ; ಸಕಲರುಂ ।ಸಾರವಸ್ತುವನೊಂದನೊಪ್ಪಿಕೊಳುವವರೇ ॥ಪಾರಮಾರ್ಥಿಕವನಂತೆಣಿಸಿದ ವ್ಯವಹಾರ ।ಭಾರವಾಗದು ಜಗಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೨ ॥ mUrirali vAda, munnUrirali; sakalarum ।sAravastuvanoMdanu oppikoLuvavare ॥pAramArthikavanu anteNisida vyavahAra ।bhAravAgadu jagake  - Mankutimma ॥ 772 ॥Let there by three treatises or there hundred. All of them agree that there is one thing  - God like  - that supports the entire creation of this universe. What ever treatise that looks at the truth this way can not be harmful to the world.  - Mankutimma
translation: Let there by three treatises or there hundred. All of them agree that there is one thing  - God like  - that supports the entire creation of this universe. What ever treatise that looks at the truth this way can not be harmful to the world.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭಾರವಾಗದು ಜಗಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mUrirali vAda, munnUrirali; sakalarum ।sAravastuvanoMdanu oppikoLuvavare ॥pAramArthikavanu anteNisida vyavahAra ।bhAravAgadu jagake  - Mankutimma ॥ 772 ॥
kagga: ಮೂರಿರಲಿ ವಾದ, ಮುನ್ನೂರಿರಲಿ; ಸಕಲರುಂ ।ಸಾರವಸ್ತುವನೊಂದನೊಪ್ಪಿಕೊಳುವವರೇ ॥ಪಾರಮಾರ್ಥಿಕವನಂತೆಣಿಸಿದ ವ್ಯವಹಾರ ।ಭಾರವಾಗದು ಜಗಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೨ ॥

content: ಹೊರಗೆ ಲೋಕಾಸಕ್ತಿಯೊಳಗೆ ಸಕಲ ವಿರಕ್ತಿ ।ಹೊರಗೆ ಕಾರ್ಯಧ್ಯಾನವೊಳಗುದಾಸೀನ ॥ಹೊರಗೆ ಸಂಸೃತಿಭಾರವೊಳಗದರ ತಾತ್ಸಾರ ।ವರಯೋಗಮಾರ್ಗವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೩ ॥ horage lOkAsakti oLage sakala virakti ।horage kAryadhyAna oLage udAsIna ॥horage samsRutibhAra oLage adara tAtsAra ।vara yOga mArgavidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 773 ॥This is a very good plan to live happily. On the outside we must engage in every worldly activity that we deem fit. Inside, we should be detached to it. On the outside we must give hundred percent to the work at hand. Inside, we must not care too much about its result. On the outside we must take part in the every-day progress of the world  - birth, suffering, happiness and death. Inside, we should not care about it.  - Mankutimma
translation: This is a very good plan to live happily. On the outside we must engage in every worldly activity that we deem fit. Inside, we should be detached to it. On the outside we must give hundred percent to the work at hand. Inside, we must not care too much about its result. On the outside we must take part in the every-day progress of the world  - birth, suffering, happiness and death. Inside, we should not care about it.  - Mankutimma
title: ವರಯೋಗಮಾರ್ಗವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: horage lOkAsakti oLage sakala virakti ।horage kAryadhyAna oLage udAsIna ॥horage samsRutibhAra oLage adara tAtsAra ।vara yOga mArgavidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 773 ॥
kagga: ಹೊರಗೆ ಲೋಕಾಸಕ್ತಿಯೊಳಗೆ ಸಕಲ ವಿರಕ್ತಿ ।ಹೊರಗೆ ಕಾರ್ಯಧ್ಯಾನವೊಳಗುದಾಸೀನ ॥ಹೊರಗೆ ಸಂಸೃತಿಭಾರವೊಳಗದರ ತಾತ್ಸಾರ ।ವರಯೋಗಮಾರ್ಗವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೩ ॥

content: ತರಣಿದರ್ಶನಕಿಂತ ಕಿರಣಾನುಭವ ಸುಲಭ ।ಪರಮಶಾಸ್ತ್ರಕ್ಕಿಂತ ಸರಿಯುದಾಹರಣೆ ॥ಪರಮತತ್ತ್ವ ಕಂಡ ಗುರುವನರಸುವುದೆಲ್ಲಿ? ।ದೊರೆತಂದು ನೀಂ ಧನ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೪ ॥ taraNi darshanakinta kiraNAnubhava sulabha ।parama shAstrakkinta sari udAharaNe ॥paramatattva kanDa guruvanu arasuvudelli? ।doretandu nIm dhanya  - Mankutimma ॥ 774 ॥It is easier to bask in sunlight than look at the sun directly. It is easier to understand by examples than to learn all the scriptures first hand. We all want to learn about the universal truth. But is there a teacher who can simplify it for us? Where can we start the search for him? You will be fortunate the day you get him.  - Mankutimma
translation: It is easier to bask in sunlight than look at the sun directly. It is easier to understand by examples than to learn all the scriptures first hand. We all want to learn about the universal truth. But is there a teacher who can simplify it for us? Where can we start the search for him? You will be fortunate the day you get him.  - Mankutimma
title: ದೊರೆತಂದು ನೀಂ ಧನ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: taraNi darshanakinta kiraNAnubhava sulabha ।parama shAstrakkinta sari udAharaNe ॥paramatattva kanDa guruvanu arasuvudelli? ।doretandu nIm dhanya  - Mankutimma ॥ 774 ॥
kagga: ತರಣಿದರ್ಶನಕಿಂತ ಕಿರಣಾನುಭವ ಸುಲಭ ।ಪರಮಶಾಸ್ತ್ರಕ್ಕಿಂತ ಸರಿಯುದಾಹರಣೆ ॥ಪರಮತತ್ತ್ವ ಕಂಡ ಗುರುವನರಸುವುದೆಲ್ಲಿ? ।ದೊರೆತಂದು ನೀಂ ಧನ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೪ ॥

content: ಕಾಗೆಯುಂ ಕೋಗಿಲೆಯುಮೊಂದೆ ಮೇಲ್ನೋಟಕ್ಕೆ ।ಯೋಗಿಯುಂ ಸಂಸಾರಭೋಗಿಯೇ ಹೊರಕೆ ॥ಲೋಗರವೊಲಿರುತೆ ಸುಖದುಃಖಸಂಭ್ರಮಗಳಲಿ ।ತ್ಯಾಗಿಯವನ್ ಆಂತರದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೫ ॥ kAgeyum kOgileyum onde mElnOTakke ।yOgiyum samsAra bhOgiyE horake ॥lOgaravol irute sukha duHkha sambhramagaLali ।tyAgi avan aantaradi  - Mankutimma ॥ 775 ॥For a plain sight, the crow and nightingale look similar. But they are very different in their qualities. Just like that, a Yogi (ascetic) may also look to be a normal person enjoying his stay in this world. He mingles with every one with their happiness, grief and jubilations. But inside he is noble person deeply and selflessly concerned about others on the world.  - Mankutimma
translation: For a plain sight, the crow and nightingale look similar. But they are very different in their qualities. Just like that, a Yogi (ascetic) may also look to be a normal person enjoying his stay in this world. He mingles with every one with their happiness, grief and jubilations. But inside he is noble person deeply and selflessly concerned about others on the world.  - Mankutimma
title: ತ್ಯಾಗಿಯವನ್ ಆಂತರದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kAgeyum kOgileyum onde mElnOTakke ।yOgiyum samsAra bhOgiyE horake ॥lOgaravol irute sukha duHkha sambhramagaLali ।tyAgi avan aantaradi  - Mankutimma ॥ 775 ॥
kagga: ಕಾಗೆಯುಂ ಕೋಗಿಲೆಯುಮೊಂದೆ ಮೇಲ್ನೋಟಕ್ಕೆ ।ಯೋಗಿಯುಂ ಸಂಸಾರಭೋಗಿಯೇ ಹೊರಕೆ ॥ಲೋಗರವೊಲಿರುತೆ ಸುಖದುಃಖಸಂಭ್ರಮಗಳಲಿ ।ತ್ಯಾಗಿಯವನ್ ಆಂತರದಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೫ ॥

content: ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ರೂಪದಲಿ ಪರದೈವ ಕಣ್ಮುಂದೆ ।ಚರಿಸುತಿರೆ ನರನದರ ಗುರುತನರಿಯದೆಯೆ ॥ಧರೆಯದದು ತನ್ನಂದದ ಪ್ರಾಣಿಯೆಂದೆಣಿಸಿ ।ತೊರೆಯುವನು ದೊರೆತುದನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೬ ॥ paripariya rUpadali paradaiva kaNmunde ।charisutire naranu adara gurutanu ariyadeye ॥dhareyadadu tanna andada prANiyendu eNisi ।toreyuvanu doretudanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 776 ॥God comes in front of us in different forms. Man does not recognize it. He thinks it just another beautiful creature of this world. He will let go of it even after getting it.  - Mankutimma
translation: God comes in front of us in different forms. Man does not recognize it. He thinks it just another beautiful creature of this world. He will let go of it even after getting it.  - Mankutimma
title: ತೊರೆಯುವನು ದೊರೆತುದನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: paripariya rUpadali paradaiva kaNmunde ।charisutire naranu adara gurutanu ariyadeye ॥dhareyadadu tanna andada prANiyendu eNisi ।toreyuvanu doretudanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 776 ॥
kagga: ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ರೂಪದಲಿ ಪರದೈವ ಕಣ್ಮುಂದೆ ।ಚರಿಸುತಿರೆ ನರನದರ ಗುರುತನರಿಯದೆಯೆ ॥ಧರೆಯದದು ತನ್ನಂದದ ಪ್ರಾಣಿಯೆಂದೆಣಿಸಿ ।ತೊರೆಯುವನು ದೊರೆತುದನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೬ ॥

content: ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯ ರೂಪದಲಿ, ಸಂಸಾರಿವೇಷದಲಿ ।ಸ್ವಾಮಿ ನಿನ್ನೆಡೆಗೆ ಬರಬಹುದು ವರ ನೀಡಿ ॥ಮೈಮೆ ಕಾಂಬೊಡೆ ನಿನಗೆ ಸಂಸ್ಕಾರವಿರಬೇಕು ।ತಾಮಸಿಗೆ ವರವೆಲ್ಲಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೭ ॥ sAmAnya rUpadali, samsAri vEShadali  ।svAmi ninneDege barabahudu vara nIDi ॥maime kAmboDe ninage samskAravirabEku ।tAmasige varavelli?  - Mankutimma ॥ 777 ॥God may come to you in ordinary form as another worldly person. He comes to you to give you a boon. But to see him (as God) you need to have righteous ways. How will a greedy (interested in enjoying pleasures) ever get a boon? (He will not be able to recognize God and treat him well)  - Mankutimma
translation: God may come to you in ordinary form as another worldly person. He comes to you to give you a boon. But to see him (as God) you need to have righteous ways. How will a greedy (interested in enjoying pleasures) ever get a boon? (He will not be able to recognize God and treat him well)  - Mankutimma
title: ತಾಮಸಿಗೆ ವರವೆಲ್ಲಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sAmAnya rUpadali, samsAri vEShadali  ।svAmi ninneDege barabahudu vara nIDi ॥maime kAmboDe ninage samskAravirabEku ।tAmasige varavelli?  - Mankutimma ॥ 777 ॥
kagga: ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯ ರೂಪದಲಿ, ಸಂಸಾರಿವೇಷದಲಿ ।ಸ್ವಾಮಿ ನಿನ್ನೆಡೆಗೆ ಬರಬಹುದು ವರ ನೀಡಿ ॥ಮೈಮೆ ಕಾಂಬೊಡೆ ನಿನಗೆ ಸಂಸ್ಕಾರವಿರಬೇಕು ।ತಾಮಸಿಗೆ ವರವೆಲ್ಲಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೭ ॥

content: ವಿಷಯಭೋಗವಿರಕ್ತಿ, ವಿಶ್ವಲೀಲಾಸಕ್ತಿ ।ಕೃಷಿಗೆ ಸಂತತ ದೀಕ್ಷೆ, ವಿಫಲಕೆ ತಿತಿಕ್ಷೆ ॥ವಿಷಮದಲಿ ಸಮದೃಷ್ಟಿ, ವಿವಿಧಾತ್ಮ ಸಂಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ।ಕುಶಲಸಾಧನಗಳಿವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೮ ॥ viShaya bhOga virakti, vishva lIlA aasakti ।kRuShige santata dIkShe, viphalake titikShe ॥viShamadali samadRuShTi, vividhAtma sandRuShTi ।kushala sAdhanagaLivu  - Mankutimma ॥ 778 ॥These are the qualities that will help you lead a happy life. Disinterest in the material pleasures, indulging in understanding of the world, always being hard working, exercising patience when fail, keeping a balanced mind when faced with troubles, treating all other beings as same (equal to self).  - Mankutimma
translation: These are the qualities that will help you lead a happy life. Disinterest in the material pleasures, indulging in understanding of the world, always being hard working, exercising patience when fail, keeping a balanced mind when faced with troubles, treating all other beings as same (equal to self).  - Mankutimma
title: ಕುಶಲಸಾಧನಗಳಿವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: viShaya bhOga virakti, vishva lIlA aasakti ।kRuShige santata dIkShe, viphalake titikShe ॥viShamadali samadRuShTi, vividhAtma sandRuShTi ।kushala sAdhanagaLivu  - Mankutimma ॥ 778 ॥
kagga: ವಿಷಯಭೋಗವಿರಕ್ತಿ, ವಿಶ್ವಲೀಲಾಸಕ್ತಿ ।ಕೃಷಿಗೆ ಸಂತತ ದೀಕ್ಷೆ, ವಿಫಲಕೆ ತಿತಿಕ್ಷೆ ॥ವಿಷಮದಲಿ ಸಮದೃಷ್ಟಿ, ವಿವಿಧಾತ್ಮ ಸಂಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ।ಕುಶಲಸಾಧನಗಳಿವು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೮ ॥

content: ದೊರೆವ ಜೀತಕೆ ದುಡಿತ, ಮರುದಿನದ ಚಿಂತೆ ಮಿತ ।ಹೊರೆಯ ಹಗುರಾಗಿಸುವ ಕೆಳೆಯರೊಡನಾಟ ॥ಸರಳತೆಯ ಪರಿತುಷ್ಟಿ, ಪರಮಾರ್ಥ ದೃಷ್ಟಿಯಿವು ।ಸರಿಗೂಡೆ ಸುಕೃತವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೯ ॥ doreva jItake duDita, marudinada chinte mita ।horeya hagurAgisuva keLeyara OdanATa ॥saraLateya parituShTi paramArtha dRuShTiyivu ।sarigUDe sukRutavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 779 ॥A person is really fortunate if he has all these together: rightful wages for his work, limited worries of tomorrow, a good group of friends to lessen his burden of life, satisfaction in simplicity and eyes set on the universal truth.  - Mankutimma
translation: A person is really fortunate if he has all these together: rightful wages for his work, limited worries of tomorrow, a good group of friends to lessen his burden of life, satisfaction in simplicity and eyes set on the universal truth.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸರಿಗೂಡೆ ಸುಕೃತವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: doreva jItake duDita, marudinada chinte mita ।horeya hagurAgisuva keLeyara OdanATa ॥saraLateya parituShTi paramArtha dRuShTiyivu ।sarigUDe sukRutavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 779 ॥
kagga: ದೊರೆವ ಜೀತಕೆ ದುಡಿತ, ಮರುದಿನದ ಚಿಂತೆ ಮಿತ ।ಹೊರೆಯ ಹಗುರಾಗಿಸುವ ಕೆಳೆಯರೊಡನಾಟ ॥ಸರಳತೆಯ ಪರಿತುಷ್ಟಿ, ಪರಮಾರ್ಥ ದೃಷ್ಟಿಯಿವು ।ಸರಿಗೂಡೆ ಸುಕೃತವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೭೯ ॥

content: ಮಳೆಗೊಂದು ಬೆಳೆಗೊಂದು ಫಲಕೊಂದು ಋತುವಂತೆ ।ಬೆಳೆಯಿಪುದು ಜೀವವೃಕ್ಷವ ಕಾಲನಿಯತಿ ॥ತಿಳಿವುಮೊಳ್ತನಮುಂ ವಿರಕ್ತಿಯುಂ ಮುಕ್ತಿಯುಂ ।ಗಳಿಗೆ ಸರಿಸೇರ್ದಂದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೦ ॥ maLEgondu beLegondu phalakondu Rutuante ।beLeyipudu jIva vRukShava kAla niyati ॥tiLivum oLtanamum viraktiyum muktiyum ।gaLige sari sErdandu  - Mankutimma ॥ 780 ॥There is a season for rain, one for growth and one for harvest. The tree of life will grow according to the schedule set by time. Wisdom, good character, detachment and salvation will all come when the time is ripe.  - Mankutimma
translation: There is a season for rain, one for growth and one for harvest. The tree of life will grow according to the schedule set by time. Wisdom, good character, detachment and salvation will all come when the time is ripe.  - Mankutimma
title: ಗಳಿಗೆ ಸರಿಸೇರ್ದಂದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: maLEgondu beLegondu phalakondu Rutuante ।beLeyipudu jIva vRukShava kAla niyati ॥tiLivum oLtanamum viraktiyum muktiyum ।gaLige sari sErdandu  - Mankutimma ॥ 780 ॥
kagga: ಮಳೆಗೊಂದು ಬೆಳೆಗೊಂದು ಫಲಕೊಂದು ಋತುವಂತೆ ।ಬೆಳೆಯಿಪುದು ಜೀವವೃಕ್ಷವ ಕಾಲನಿಯತಿ ॥ತಿಳಿವುಮೊಳ್ತನಮುಂ ವಿರಕ್ತಿಯುಂ ಮುಕ್ತಿಯುಂ ।ಗಳಿಗೆ ಸರಿಸೇರ್ದಂದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೦ ॥

content: ಕಾಳನುದಯದಿ ಬಿತ್ತೆ ಸಂಜೆಗದು ಪೈರಹುದೆ? ।ಪಾಲುಂಟು ಕಾಲಂಗೆ ನಮ್ಮ ಕೃಷಿಗಳಲಿ ॥ವೇಳೆ ಗಡು ಮರೆತಾತುರದಿನ್ ಅಡುಗೆ ಪಕ್ಕಹುದೆ ।ತಾಳುಮೆಯೆ ಪರಿಪಾಕ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೧ ॥ kALanu udayadi bitte sanjegadu pairahude? ।pAluNTu kAlange namma kRuShigaLali ॥vELe gaDu maretu aaturadin aDuge pakkahude ।tALumeye paripAka  - Mankutimma ॥ 781 ॥Can one sow the seed in the morning and expect a harvest by evening? Time has a great role to play in out efforts. Can one forget about time and cook food hurriedly? Patience makes the finished product complete.  - Mankutimma
translation: Can one sow the seed in the morning and expect a harvest by evening? Time has a great role to play in out efforts. Can one forget about time and cook food hurriedly? Patience makes the finished product complete.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಾಳುಮೆಯೆ ಪರಿಪಾಕ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kALanu udayadi bitte sanjegadu pairahude? ।pAluNTu kAlange namma kRuShigaLali ॥vELe gaDu maretu aaturadin aDuge pakkahude ।tALumeye paripAka  - Mankutimma ॥ 781 ॥
kagga: ಕಾಳನುದಯದಿ ಬಿತ್ತೆ ಸಂಜೆಗದು ಪೈರಹುದೆ? ।ಪಾಲುಂಟು ಕಾಲಂಗೆ ನಮ್ಮ ಕೃಷಿಗಳಲಿ ॥ವೇಳೆ ಗಡು ಮರೆತಾತುರದಿನ್ ಅಡುಗೆ ಪಕ್ಕಹುದೆ ।ತಾಳುಮೆಯೆ ಪರಿಪಾಕ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೧ ॥

content: ಅಂದಿಗಂದಿನ ಕೆಲಸ, ಸಂದನಿತರಲಿ ತೃಪ್ತಿ ।ಕುಂದದುಬ್ಬದ ಮನಸು ಬಂದುದೇನಿರಲಿ ॥ಬಂಧು ಮತಿ ಲೋಕದಲಿ, ಮುನ್ ದೃಷ್ಟಿ  ಪರಮದಲಿ ।ಹೊಂದಿರಲಿವದು ಪುಣ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೨ ॥ andige andina kelasa, sandanitarali tRupti ।kundada ubbada manasu bandu Enirali ॥bandhu mati lOkadali, mun dRuShTi paramadali ।hondiralu ivu adu puNya  - Mankutimma ॥ 782 ॥Fortunate are those people who possess these: ability to finish that day;s task on the same days, satisfaction with whatever they have (or get), a mind that neither grieves nor rejoices come what may, friends of the entire world, their sight set on the universal truth.   - Mankutimma
translation: Fortunate are those people who possess these: ability to finish that day;s task on the same days, satisfaction with whatever they have (or get), a mind that neither grieves nor rejoices come what may, friends of the entire world, their sight set on the universal truth.   - Mankutimma
title: ಹೊಂದಿರಲಿವದು ಪುಣ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: andige andina kelasa, sandanitarali tRupti ।kundada ubbada manasu bandu Enirali ॥bandhu mati lOkadali, mun dRuShTi paramadali ।hondiralu ivu adu puNya  - Mankutimma ॥ 782 ॥
kagga: ಅಂದಿಗಂದಿನ ಕೆಲಸ, ಸಂದನಿತರಲಿ ತೃಪ್ತಿ ।ಕುಂದದುಬ್ಬದ ಮನಸು ಬಂದುದೇನಿರಲಿ ॥ಬಂಧು ಮತಿ ಲೋಕದಲಿ, ಮುನ್ ದೃಷ್ಟಿ  ಪರಮದಲಿ ।ಹೊಂದಿರಲಿವದು ಪುಣ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೨ ॥

content: ಬುದ್ಧಿಮಾತಿದು ನಿನಗೆ; ಸಿದ್ಧನಿರು ಸಕಲಕ್ಕಂ ।ಎದ್ದು ಕುಣಿಯಲಿ ಕರ್ಮ; ದೈವ ನಿದ್ರಿಸಲಿ ॥ಅದ್ಭುತಗಳರಿದಲ್ಲ; ಭವ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ ಹದ್ದಿಲ್ಲ ।ಸಿದ್ಧನಾಗೆಲ್ಲಕಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೩ ॥ buddhi mAtidu ninage; siddhaniru sakalakkam ।eddu kuNiyali karma; daiva nidrisali ॥adbhutagaLu aridalla; bhavyakke haddilla ।siddhanAgu ellakam  - Mankutimma ॥ 783 ॥This is a wise advice to you: Be prepared for everything. Your karma will come back to you in full force  - good or bad. You cannot control it. You will pray God for relief. But He may not listen. On the other hand, miracles can happen. It;s not unheard of. There is no limit for magnanimity. Be prepared for everything.  - Mankutimma
translation: This is a wise advice to you: Be prepared for everything. Your karma will come back to you in full force  - good or bad. You cannot control it. You will pray God for relief. But He may not listen. On the other hand, miracles can happen. It;s not unheard of. There is no limit for magnanimity. Be prepared for everything.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಿದ್ಧನಾಗೆಲ್ಲಕಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: buddhi mAtidu ninage; siddhaniru sakalakkam ।eddu kuNiyali karma; daiva nidrisali ॥adbhutagaLu aridalla; bhavyakke haddilla ।siddhanAgu ellakam  - Mankutimma ॥ 783 ॥
kagga: ಬುದ್ಧಿಮಾತಿದು ನಿನಗೆ; ಸಿದ್ಧನಿರು ಸಕಲಕ್ಕಂ ।ಎದ್ದು ಕುಣಿಯಲಿ ಕರ್ಮ; ದೈವ ನಿದ್ರಿಸಲಿ ॥ಅದ್ಭುತಗಳರಿದಲ್ಲ; ಭವ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ ಹದ್ದಿಲ್ಲ ।ಸಿದ್ಧನಾಗೆಲ್ಲಕಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೩ ॥

content: ಏನಾದೊಡೆಯುಮಪ್ಪುದುಂಟು, ಸಿದ್ಧನಿರದಕೆ ।ಭಾನು ತಣುವಾದಾನು; ಸೋಮ ಸುಟ್ಟಾನು ॥ಕ್ಷೋಣಿಯೇ ಕರಗೀತು; ಜಗ ಶೂನ್ಯವಾದೀತು ।ಮೌನದಲಿ ಸಿದ್ಧನಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೪ ॥ EnAdoDeyum appudunTu, siddhaniru adake ।bhAnu taNuvAdAnu; sOma suTTAnu ॥kShONiyE karagItu; jaga shUnyavAdItu ।maunadali siddhaniru  - Mankutimma ॥ 784 ॥Anything may happen. Be prepared for that. Sun may go cold and Moon may get hotter. Earth may melt and world may go empty. You face it with courage and silently be prepared for it.  - Mankutimma
translation: Anything may happen. Be prepared for that. Sun may go cold and Moon may get hotter. Earth may melt and world may go empty. You face it with courage and silently be prepared for it.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೌನದಲಿ ಸಿದ್ಧನಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: EnAdoDeyum appudunTu, siddhaniru adake ।bhAnu taNuvAdAnu; sOma suTTAnu ॥kShONiyE karagItu; jaga shUnyavAdItu ।maunadali siddhaniru  - Mankutimma ॥ 784 ॥
kagga: ಏನಾದೊಡೆಯುಮಪ್ಪುದುಂಟು, ಸಿದ್ಧನಿರದಕೆ ।ಭಾನು ತಣುವಾದಾನು; ಸೋಮ ಸುಟ್ಟಾನು ॥ಕ್ಷೋಣಿಯೇ ಕರಗೀತು; ಜಗ ಶೂನ್ಯವಾದೀತು ।ಮೌನದಲಿ ಸಿದ್ಧನಿರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೪ ॥

content: ಕುಂದದೆಂದಿಗುಮೆನ್ನಿಸುವ ಮನದ ಕಾತರತೆ ।ಯೆಂದೊ ತಾನೆ ಬಳಲಿ ತಣ್ಣಗಾಗುವುದು ॥ಮಂದದಾ ಕಾರ್ಮೋಡ ಬಿರಿದು ರವಿ ಬೆಳಗುವನು ।ಅಂದಿನಾ ಸುಖವೆ ಸುಖ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೫ ॥ kundadu endigum ennisuva manada kAtarate ।yendo tAne baLali taNNagAguvudu ॥mandadA kArmODa biridu ravi beLaguvanu ।andina aa sukhave sukha  - Mankutimma ॥ 785 ॥It seems as though the anxiety in our minds will never end. But one day, it will go away on its own. Just like a break in the clouds converts a dull cloudy moment into a bright sunny day. That happiness is the real happiness.  - Mankutimma
translation: It seems as though the anxiety in our minds will never end. But one day, it will go away on its own. Just like a break in the clouds converts a dull cloudy moment into a bright sunny day. That happiness is the real happiness.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅಂದಿನಾ ಸುಖವೆ ಸುಖ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kundadu endigum ennisuva manada kAtarate ।yendo tAne baLali taNNagAguvudu ॥mandadA kArmODa biridu ravi beLaguvanu ।andina aa sukhave sukha  - Mankutimma ॥ 785 ॥
kagga: ಕುಂದದೆಂದಿಗುಮೆನ್ನಿಸುವ ಮನದ ಕಾತರತೆ ।ಯೆಂದೊ ತಾನೆ ಬಳಲಿ ತಣ್ಣಗಾಗುವುದು ॥ಮಂದದಾ ಕಾರ್ಮೋಡ ಬಿರಿದು ರವಿ ಬೆಳಗುವನು ।ಅಂದಿನಾ ಸುಖವೆ ಸುಖ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೫ ॥

content: ಅನ್ತವೆಲ್ಲಕುಮಿರುವುದಿರಲಿ; ವಿಷಯೇಂದ್ರಿಯದ ।ಸಂತಾಪವುಂ ಮುಗಿವುದೆಂಬುದಲ ಪುಣ್ಯ? ॥ಎಂತೊ, ನಿನ್ನಾಜ್ಞೆಯಿನೊ, ತಾಂ ಸೋತೋ, ಬೇಸತ್ತೊ ।ಶಾಂತಿವಡೆಯಲಿ ಕರಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೬ ॥ antavu ellakum iruvudirali; viShayEndriyada ।santApavum mugivudembudala puNya? ॥ento, ninnAjneyino, tAm sOtO, besatto ।shAntivadeyali karaNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 786 ॥It is pleasant to know that everything has to end. Even the misery that is created by our senses (longing for pleasure). But it has an end  - by your order, by its defeat or by sheer frustration. Let the senses attain peace.  - Mankutimma
translation: It is pleasant to know that everything has to end. Even the misery that is created by our senses (longing for pleasure). But it has an end  - by your order, by its defeat or by sheer frustration. Let the senses attain peace.  - Mankutimma
title: ಶಾಂತಿವಡೆಯಲಿ ಕರಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: antavu ellakum iruvudirali; viShayEndriyada ।santApavum mugivudembudala puNya? ॥ento, ninnAjneyino, tAm sOtO, besatto ।shAntivadeyali karaNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 786 ॥
kagga: ಅನ್ತವೆಲ್ಲಕುಮಿರುವುದಿರಲಿ; ವಿಷಯೇಂದ್ರಿಯದ ।ಸಂತಾಪವುಂ ಮುಗಿವುದೆಂಬುದಲ ಪುಣ್ಯ? ॥ಎಂತೊ, ನಿನ್ನಾಜ್ಞೆಯಿನೊ, ತಾಂ ಸೋತೋ, ಬೇಸತ್ತೊ ।ಶಾಂತಿವಡೆಯಲಿ ಕರಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೬ ॥

content: ಶೀತಾಳೆ ಸಿಡುಬು ಶಿಶುಗಳ ಕುಲುಕಿ ತೆರಳುವುದು ।ಪ್ರೀತಿಕಾಮನೆಗಳಷ್ಟಿಷ್ಟು ಬೆಳೆದವರ ॥ಯಾತನೆಗಳಿಂ ಕುದಿಸಿ ಕುಲುಕಿ ಬಳಿಕಾರುವುವು ।ಕಾತರತೆ ಕಳೆಯೆ ಸುಖ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೭ ॥ shItALe siDubu shishugaLa kuluki teraLuvudu ।prIti kAmanegaLu aShTiShTu beLedavara ॥yAtanegaLim kudisi kuluki baLika aaruvuvu ।kAtarate kaLeye sukha  - Mankutimma ॥ 787 ॥Chicken pox will rattle a baby bad and leave. Just like that love and other desires will rattle grownup by raking up feelings. Later they subside. When the anxiety ends, it is happiness.  - Mankutimma
translation: Chicken pox will rattle a baby bad and leave. Just like that love and other desires will rattle grownup by raking up feelings. Later they subside. When the anxiety ends, it is happiness.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಾತರತೆ ಕಳೆಯೆ ಸುಖ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: shItALe siDubu shishugaLa kuluki teraLuvudu ।prIti kAmanegaLu aShTiShTu beLedavara ॥yAtanegaLim kudisi kuluki baLika aaruvuvu ।kAtarate kaLeye sukha  - Mankutimma ॥ 787 ॥
kagga: ಶೀತಾಳೆ ಸಿಡುಬು ಶಿಶುಗಳ ಕುಲುಕಿ ತೆರಳುವುದು ।ಪ್ರೀತಿಕಾಮನೆಗಳಷ್ಟಿಷ್ಟು ಬೆಳೆದವರ ॥ಯಾತನೆಗಳಿಂ ಕುದಿಸಿ ಕುಲುಕಿ ಬಳಿಕಾರುವುವು ।ಕಾತರತೆ ಕಳೆಯೆ ಸುಖ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೭ ॥

content: ಜ್ವರ ಬಂದು ತನು ಬೆಂದ ಯಾತನೆಯ ಮಾತೇನು? ।ಉರಿಬೇಗೆಯಿಳಿಯೆ ಹೊಸ ಹೊಸಬನಾ ನರನು ॥ಕರಣತಪನೆಗಳಿಳಿಯೆ, ಕಾರಣವದೇನಿರಲಿ ।ಮರುಜನ್ಮವಾತ್ಮಂಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೮ ॥ jvara bandu tanu bendu yAtaneya mAtEnu? ।uri bEgegaLu iLiye hosa hosabanA naranu ॥karaNa tapanegaLu iLiye, kAraNavadEnirali ।marujanmavu aatmange  - Mankutimma ॥ 788 ॥What can be said about the misery when fever batters the body? But when the misery subsides, we feel like in a new body. Just like that by whatever means, when the senses come back into our control, it feels like a new birth to the soul.  - Mankutimma
translation: What can be said about the misery when fever batters the body? But when the misery subsides, we feel like in a new body. Just like that by whatever means, when the senses come back into our control, it feels like a new birth to the soul.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮರುಜನ್ಮವಾತ್ಮಂಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jvara bandu tanu bendu yAtaneya mAtEnu? ।uri bEgegaLu iLiye hosa hosabanA naranu ॥karaNa tapanegaLu iLiye, kAraNavadEnirali ।marujanmavu aatmange  - Mankutimma ॥ 788 ॥
kagga: ಜ್ವರ ಬಂದು ತನು ಬೆಂದ ಯಾತನೆಯ ಮಾತೇನು? ।ಉರಿಬೇಗೆಯಿಳಿಯೆ ಹೊಸ ಹೊಸಬನಾ ನರನು ॥ಕರಣತಪನೆಗಳಿಳಿಯೆ, ಕಾರಣವದೇನಿರಲಿ ।ಮರುಜನ್ಮವಾತ್ಮಂಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೮ ॥

content: ಹುಲ್ಲಾಗು ಬೆಟ್ಟದಡಿ, ಮನೆಗೆ ಮಲ್ಲಿಗೆಯಾಗು ।ಕಲ್ಲಾಗು ಕಷ್ಟಗಳ ಮಳೆಯ ವಿಧಿ ಸುರಿಯೆ ॥ಬೆಲ್ಲ ಸಕ್ಕರೆಯಾಗು ದೀನದುರ್ಬಲರಿಂಗೆ ।ಎಲ್ಲರೊಳಗೊಂದಾಗು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೯ ॥ hullAgu beTtadaDi, manege malligeyAgu ।kallAgu kaShTagaLa maLeya vidhi suriye ॥bella sakkareyAgu dIna durbalaringe ।ellaroLu ondAgu  - Mankutimma ॥ 789 ॥Be like a blade of grass at the bottom of a mountain. It leads a peaceful life by itself, offers solace to people who foot hurt while climbing down, it survives winds which even big trees can not. Be like a fragrant flower to your own household. Always spread smiles and happiness. Be like a stone when providence showers rains of trouble on you. Be like jaggery and sugar to the weak and people in need of your help. Be one among everybody.  - Mankutimma
translation: Be like a blade of grass at the bottom of a mountain. It leads a peaceful life by itself, offers solace to people who foot hurt while climbing down, it survives winds which even big trees can not. Be like a fragrant flower to your own household. Always spread smiles and happiness. Be like a stone when providence showers rains of trouble on you. Be like jaggery and sugar to the weak and people in need of your help. Be one among everybody.  - Mankutimma
title: ಎಲ್ಲರೊಳಗೊಂದಾಗು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hullAgu beTtadaDi, manege malligeyAgu ।kallAgu kaShTagaLa maLeya vidhi suriye ॥bella sakkareyAgu dIna durbalaringe ।ellaroLu ondAgu  - Mankutimma ॥ 789 ॥
kagga: ಹುಲ್ಲಾಗು ಬೆಟ್ಟದಡಿ, ಮನೆಗೆ ಮಲ್ಲಿಗೆಯಾಗು ।ಕಲ್ಲಾಗು ಕಷ್ಟಗಳ ಮಳೆಯ ವಿಧಿ ಸುರಿಯೆ ॥ಬೆಲ್ಲ ಸಕ್ಕರೆಯಾಗು ದೀನದುರ್ಬಲರಿಂಗೆ ।ಎಲ್ಲರೊಳಗೊಂದಾಗು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೮೯ ॥

content: ಏನಾನುಮಂ ಮಾಡು ಕೈಗೆ ದೊರೆತುಜ್ಜುಗವ ।ನಾನೇನು ಹುಲ್ಲುಕಡ್ಡಿಯೆಂಬ ನುಡಿ ಬೇಡ ॥ಹೀನಮಾವುದುಮಿಲ್ಲ ಜಗದ ಗುಡಿಯೂಳಿಗದಿ ।ತಾಣ ನಿನಗಿಹುದಲ್ಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೦ ॥ EnAnumam mADu kaige doreta ujjugava ।nAnEnu hullu kaDDI yemba nuDi bEDa ॥hInam aavudum illa jagada guDiyULigadi ।tANa ninagihudalli   - Mankutimma ॥ 790 ॥Do something. Any work that you can find is good enough. Never belittle yourself (by comparing yourself to a blade of grass). In this world, there is no work that is inferior. There is a place for every job.  - Mankutimma
translation: Do something. Any work that you can find is good enough. Never belittle yourself (by comparing yourself to a blade of grass). In this world, there is no work that is inferior. There is a place for every job.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಾಣ ನಿನಗಿಹುದಲ್ಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: EnAnumam mADu kaige doreta ujjugava ।nAnEnu hullu kaDDI yemba nuDi bEDa ॥hInam aavudum illa jagada guDiyULigadi ।tANa ninagihudalli   - Mankutimma ॥ 790 ॥
kagga: ಏನಾನುಮಂ ಮಾಡು ಕೈಗೆ ದೊರೆತುಜ್ಜುಗವ ।ನಾನೇನು ಹುಲ್ಲುಕಡ್ಡಿಯೆಂಬ ನುಡಿ ಬೇಡ ॥ಹೀನಮಾವುದುಮಿಲ್ಲ ಜಗದ ಗುಡಿಯೂಳಿಗದಿ ।ತಾಣ ನಿನಗಿಹುದಲ್ಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೦ ॥

content: ದಿನದಿನವು ಕುಸಿದು ಕಟ್ಟಿಸಿಕೊಳುವ ಗುಡಿ ವಿಶ್ವ ।ಜನರೆಲ್ಲರಾಗುಡಿಯ ಕೆಲಸದಾಳುಗಳು ॥ಮನೆಯೇನು? ನಾಡೇನು? ಕುಲವೇನು? ಮಠವೇನು? ।ಎಣಿಸೆಲ್ಲವದೆಯೆಂದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೧ ॥ dinadinavu kusidu kaTTisikoLuva guDi vishva ।janarellaru aa guDiya kelasadALugaLu ॥maneyEnu? nADEnu? kulavEnu? maThavEnu? ।eNisellavu ade endu  - Mankutimma ॥ 791 ॥This world is a temple that gets destroyed and built again every day. All the people are servants at that temple. A house, a state, a family or a religion  - everything is insignificant in comparison. Everything is just a part of the same world which undergoes change every day.  - Mankutimma
translation: This world is a temple that gets destroyed and built again every day. All the people are servants at that temple. A house, a state, a family or a religion  - everything is insignificant in comparison. Everything is just a part of the same world which undergoes change every day.  - Mankutimma
title: ಎಣಿಸೆಲ್ಲವದೆಯೆಂದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dinadinavu kusidu kaTTisikoLuva guDi vishva ।janarellaru aa guDiya kelasadALugaLu ॥maneyEnu? nADEnu? kulavEnu? maThavEnu? ।eNisellavu ade endu  - Mankutimma ॥ 791 ॥
kagga: ದಿನದಿನವು ಕುಸಿದು ಕಟ್ಟಿಸಿಕೊಳುವ ಗುಡಿ ವಿಶ್ವ ।ಜನರೆಲ್ಲರಾಗುಡಿಯ ಕೆಲಸದಾಳುಗಳು ॥ಮನೆಯೇನು? ನಾಡೇನು? ಕುಲವೇನು? ಮಠವೇನು? ।ಎಣಿಸೆಲ್ಲವದೆಯೆಂದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೧ ॥

content: ಆಶೆಗಳ ಕೆಣಕದಿರು, ಪಾಶಗಳ ಬಿಗಿಯದಿರು ।ಕ್ಲೇಶದ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಗಳಿಗೆನ್ನ ಕರೆಯದಿರು ॥ಬೇಸರದ ಪಾತಕಸ್ಮೃತಿಯ ಚುಚ್ಚದಿರ್: ಎನ್ನು- ।ತೀಶನನು ಬೇಡುತಿರೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೨ ॥ aashegaLa keNakadiru, pAshagaLa bigiyadiru ।klEshada parIkShegaLige enna kareyadiru ॥bEsarada pAtaka smRutiya chucchadir: ennuta ।eeshananu bEDutiro   - Mankutimma ॥ 792 ॥You must ask God this  - Don;t provoke me with desires. Don;t tie me up with attachments. Don;t present me tough dilemmas to choose from. Don;t remind me of hurting memories.  - Mankutimma
translation: You must ask God this  - Don;t provoke me with desires. Don;t tie me up with attachments. Don;t present me tough dilemmas to choose from. Don;t remind me of hurting memories.  - Mankutimma
title: ಎನ್ನುತೀಶನನು ಬೇಡುತಿರೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aashegaLa keNakadiru, pAshagaLa bigiyadiru ।klEshada parIkShegaLige enna kareyadiru ॥bEsarada pAtaka smRutiya chucchadir: ennuta ।eeshananu bEDutiro   - Mankutimma ॥ 792 ॥
kagga: ಆಶೆಗಳ ಕೆಣಕದಿರು, ಪಾಶಗಳ ಬಿಗಿಯದಿರು ।ಕ್ಲೇಶದ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಗಳಿಗೆನ್ನ ಕರೆಯದಿರು ॥ಬೇಸರದ ಪಾತಕಸ್ಮೃತಿಯ ಚುಚ್ಚದಿರ್: ಎನ್ನು- ।ತೀಶನನು ಬೇಡುತಿರೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೨ ॥

content: ನಾನೆಂಬುದೊಂದಂಶವಿತರ ಜಗವೊಂದಂಶ ।ನಾನು ನೀನುಗಳಳಿದ ಸರ್ವೈಕ್ಯವೊಂದು ॥ಧ್ಯಾನಿಸುತ್ತೈಕ್ಯವನು ಪಾಲಿಸುವುದುಭಯವನು ।ಜಾಣಿನಾ ನಾಟಕವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೩ ॥ nAnembudu ondamshavu itare jagavu ondamsha ।nAnu nInugaLu aLida sarvaikyavondu ॥dhyAnisutta aikyavanu pAlisuvudu ubhavanu ।jANInA nATakavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 793 ॥One part of the creation is me. All other parts of the creation is another part. There is a universal truth where all difference between self and the rest is lost. Having mind set on that truth but living happily in this dual world is a wise drama to act.  - Mankutimma
translation: One part of the creation is me. All other parts of the creation is another part. There is a universal truth where all difference between self and the rest is lost. Having mind set on that truth but living happily in this dual world is a wise drama to act.  - Mankutimma
title: ಜಾಣಿನಾ ನಾಟಕವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nAnembudu ondamshavu itare jagavu ondamsha ।nAnu nInugaLu aLida sarvaikyavondu ॥dhyAnisutta aikyavanu pAlisuvudu ubhavanu ।jANInA nATakavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 793 ॥
kagga: ನಾನೆಂಬುದೊಂದಂಶವಿತರ ಜಗವೊಂದಂಶ ।ನಾನು ನೀನುಗಳಳಿದ ಸರ್ವೈಕ್ಯವೊಂದು ॥ಧ್ಯಾನಿಸುತ್ತೈಕ್ಯವನು ಪಾಲಿಸುವುದುಭಯವನು ।ಜಾಣಿನಾ ನಾಟಕವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೩ ॥

content: ಮನಸು ಬೆಳೆಯಲಿ ಭುಜಿಸಿ ನೂರು ನೂರನುಭವವ ।ಹೊನಲು ನೂರೀ ಬಾಳ ಕಡಲನುಬ್ಬಿಸಲಿ ॥ತನುಬಂಧ ಕಳಚಿ, ಜೀವವಖಂಡಚೇತನದ ।ಕುಣಿತದಲಿ ಕೂಡಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೪ ॥ manasu beLeyali bhujisi nUru nUru anubhavava ।honalu nUru ee bALa kaDalanu ubbisali ॥tanubandha kaLachi, jIvavu akhanDa chEtanada ।kuNitadali kUDirali  - Mankutimma ॥ 794 ॥Let the mind expand with hundreds and hundreds of experiences. Let the light from these experiences expand the seas of life. Once the attachment towards body is lost, life dances with the universal cosmic spirit.  - Mankutimma
translation: Let the mind expand with hundreds and hundreds of experiences. Let the light from these experiences expand the seas of life. Once the attachment towards body is lost, life dances with the universal cosmic spirit.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕುಣಿತದಲಿ ಕೂಡಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: manasu beLeyali bhujisi nUru nUru anubhavava ।honalu nUru ee bALa kaDalanu ubbisali ॥tanubandha kaLachi, jIvavu akhanDa chEtanada ।kuNitadali kUDirali  - Mankutimma ॥ 794 ॥
kagga: ಮನಸು ಬೆಳೆಯಲಿ ಭುಜಿಸಿ ನೂರು ನೂರನುಭವವ ।ಹೊನಲು ನೂರೀ ಬಾಳ ಕಡಲನುಬ್ಬಿಸಲಿ ॥ತನುಬಂಧ ಕಳಚಿ, ಜೀವವಖಂಡಚೇತನದ ।ಕುಣಿತದಲಿ ಕೂಡಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೪ ॥

content: ಮೊಳೆವ ಸಸಿಯೊಳು ನಾನು, ತೊಳಗುವಿನನೊಳು ನಾನು  ।ಬೆಳೆವ ಶಿಶುವೊಳು ನಾನು, ಕೆಳೆನೋಟ ನಾನು ॥ಕಳಕಳಿಸುವೆಲ್ಲಮುಂ ನಾನೆಂದು ಭಾವಿಸುತೆ ।ಒಳಗೂಡು ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೫ ॥ moLeva sasiyoLu nAnu, toLaguva inanoLu nAnu ।beLeva shishuvoLu nAnu, keLeNOTa nAnu ॥kaLakaLisuva ellamum nAnendu bhAvisute ।oLagUDu vishvadali   - Mankutimma ॥ 795 ॥You must feel that you are one with the world. See oneself in a seed that this sprouting to become a sapling, in the rising sun, in a growing child, in the looks of friends. You must feel one with anything that evokes emotion.  - Mankutimma
translation: You must feel that you are one with the world. See oneself in a seed that this sprouting to become a sapling, in the rising sun, in a growing child, in the looks of friends. You must feel one with anything that evokes emotion.  - Mankutimma
title: ಒಳಗೂಡು ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: moLeva sasiyoLu nAnu, toLaguva inanoLu nAnu ।beLeva shishuvoLu nAnu, keLeNOTa nAnu ॥kaLakaLisuva ellamum nAnendu bhAvisute ।oLagUDu vishvadali   - Mankutimma ॥ 795 ॥
kagga: ಮೊಳೆವ ಸಸಿಯೊಳು ನಾನು, ತೊಳಗುವಿನನೊಳು ನಾನು  ।ಬೆಳೆವ ಶಿಶುವೊಳು ನಾನು, ಕೆಳೆನೋಟ ನಾನು ॥ಕಳಕಳಿಸುವೆಲ್ಲಮುಂ ನಾನೆಂದು ಭಾವಿಸುತೆ ।ಒಳಗೂಡು ವಿಶ್ವದಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೫ ॥

content: ಸರಿ ಹದದ ಕಾಳು ತಿರೆಯಪ್ಪಿದೊಡೆ ಮೊಳೆಯುವುದು ।ಹುರಿದೊಡದು ಮೊಳೆಯದರಳಹುದು ಬಾಯ್ಸವಿಗೆ ॥ಪರಮತತ್ತ್ವಜ್ಞಾನಿಯೊಡರಿಸುವ ಕರುಮಗಳು ।ಮರುಬೆಳೆಗೆ ಬಿತ್ತಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೬ ॥ sari hadada kALu tire appidoDe moLeyuvudu ।huridoDe adu moLeyadu araLahudu bAy savige ॥parama tattva jnAniyoDarisuva karumagaLu ।marubeLege bittalla  - Mankutimma ॥ 796 ॥If the right seed is sown into a receptive ground, a sapling sprouts. But if you fry it, it will not sprout but pops open and becomes a tasty snack. Actions performed by a person with the knowledge of universal truth will not result in cycle of actions and reactions. It is a seed that will not be sown again.  - Mankutimma
translation: If the right seed is sown into a receptive ground, a sapling sprouts. But if you fry it, it will not sprout but pops open and becomes a tasty snack. Actions performed by a person with the knowledge of universal truth will not result in cycle of actions and reactions. It is a seed that will not be sown again.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮರುಬೆಳೆಗೆ ಬಿತ್ತಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sari hadada kALu tire appidoDe moLeyuvudu ।huridoDe adu moLeyadu araLahudu bAy savige ॥parama tattva jnAniyoDarisuva karumagaLu ।marubeLege bittalla  - Mankutimma ॥ 796 ॥
kagga: ಸರಿ ಹದದ ಕಾಳು ತಿರೆಯಪ್ಪಿದೊಡೆ ಮೊಳೆಯುವುದು ।ಹುರಿದೊಡದು ಮೊಳೆಯದರಳಹುದು ಬಾಯ್ಸವಿಗೆ ॥ಪರಮತತ್ತ್ವಜ್ಞಾನಿಯೊಡರಿಸುವ ಕರುಮಗಳು ।ಮರುಬೆಳೆಗೆ ಬಿತ್ತಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೬ ॥

content: ಸುಟ್ಟ ಹಗ್ಗದ ಬೂದಿ ರೂಪಮಾತ್ರದಿ ಹಗ್ಗ ।ಗಟ್ಟಿ ಜಗವಂತು ತತ್ತ್ವಜ್ಞಾನ ಸೋಕೆ ॥ತೊಟ್ಟಿಹುದು ಲೋಕರೂಪವ, ತಾತ್ತ್ವಿಕನ ವೃತ್ತಿ ।ಕಟ್ಟದವನಾತ್ಮವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೭ ॥ suTTa haggada bUdi rUpamAtradi hagga ।gaTTi jagavantu tattva jnAna sOke ॥toTTihudu lOkarUpava, tAttvikana vRutti ।kaTTadu avu avana aatmavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 797 ॥A burnt rope just looks like a rope. It does not have the strength of the rope. The world as we see it is also like that. It is only strong only when one has the knowledge of the universal truth.   - Mankutimma
translation: A burnt rope just looks like a rope. It does not have the strength of the rope. The world as we see it is also like that. It is only strong only when one has the knowledge of the universal truth.   - Mankutimma
title: ಕಟ್ಟದವನಾತ್ಮವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: suTTa haggada bUdi rUpamAtradi hagga ।gaTTi jagavantu tattva jnAna sOke ॥toTTihudu lOkarUpava, tAttvikana vRutti ।kaTTadu avu avana aatmavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 797 ॥
kagga: ಸುಟ್ಟ ಹಗ್ಗದ ಬೂದಿ ರೂಪಮಾತ್ರದಿ ಹಗ್ಗ ।ಗಟ್ಟಿ ಜಗವಂತು ತತ್ತ್ವಜ್ಞಾನ ಸೋಕೆ ॥ತೊಟ್ಟಿಹುದು ಲೋಕರೂಪವ, ತಾತ್ತ್ವಿಕನ ವೃತ್ತಿ ।ಕಟ್ಟದವನಾತ್ಮವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೭ ॥

content: ನೈರಾಶ್ಯನಿರತಂಗೆ ದೇವತೆಗಳಿಂದೇನು? ।ವೈರಾಗ್ಯಪಥಿಕಂಗೆ ನಷ್ಟಭಯವೇನು? ॥ಪಾರಂಗತಂಗಂತರಾಳ ದೂರಗಳೇನು? ।ಸ್ವೈರಪಥವಾತನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೮ ॥ nairAshya niratange dEvategaLindEnu? ।vairAgya pathikange naShTabhayavEnu? ॥pArangatange antarALa dUragaLEnu? ।svaira pathavAtanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 798 ॥Does a pessimist have anything to ask of the Gods? Does an ascetic ever afraid of any loss? For a person who has understood it all (universal truth), is there any difference between near or far? He is the master of his own path.  - Mankutimma
translation: Does a pessimist have anything to ask of the Gods? Does an ascetic ever afraid of any loss? For a person who has understood it all (universal truth), is there any difference between near or far? He is the master of his own path.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸ್ವೈರಪಥವಾತನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nairAshya niratange dEvategaLindEnu? ।vairAgya pathikange naShTabhayavEnu? ॥pArangatange antarALa dUragaLEnu? ।svaira pathavAtanadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 798 ॥
kagga: ನೈರಾಶ್ಯನಿರತಂಗೆ ದೇವತೆಗಳಿಂದೇನು? ।ವೈರಾಗ್ಯಪಥಿಕಂಗೆ ನಷ್ಟಭಯವೇನು? ॥ಪಾರಂಗತಂಗಂತರಾಳ ದೂರಗಳೇನು? ।ಸ್ವೈರಪಥವಾತನದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೮ ॥

content: ಘೋರವನು ಮೋಹವನು ದೇವತೆಗಳಾಗಿಪರು ।ಭೀರು ಯಾಚಕರಾಸ್ಥೆ ತಪ್ಪದಿರಲೆಂದು ॥ಆರಿಂದಲೇಂ ಭೀತಿ, ಏಂ ಬಂದೊಡದ ಕೊಳುವ ।ಪರಮಾರ್ಥಿಕನಿಗೆಲೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೯ ॥ ghOravanu mOhavanu dEvategaLu aagiparu ।bhIru yAchakara aasthe tappadiralendu ॥ArindalEm bhIti, Em bandoDe ada koLuva ।paramArthikanigelo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 799 ॥Gods will create fear and desire in us. This is to prevent the coward and pitiful people astray from God;s path. If a person is ready to take anything that fate throws at him  - what should he be afraid of?   - Mankutimma
translation: Gods will create fear and desire in us. This is to prevent the coward and pitiful people astray from God;s path. If a person is ready to take anything that fate throws at him  - what should he be afraid of?   - Mankutimma
title: ಪರಮಾರ್ಥಿಕನಿಗೆಲೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ghOravanu mOhavanu dEvategaLu aagiparu ।bhIru yAchakara aasthe tappadiralendu ॥ArindalEm bhIti, Em bandoDe ada koLuva ।paramArthikanigelo?  - Mankutimma ॥ 799 ॥
kagga: ಘೋರವನು ಮೋಹವನು ದೇವತೆಗಳಾಗಿಪರು ।ಭೀರು ಯಾಚಕರಾಸ್ಥೆ ತಪ್ಪದಿರಲೆಂದು ॥ಆರಿಂದಲೇಂ ಭೀತಿ, ಏಂ ಬಂದೊಡದ ಕೊಳುವ ।ಪರಮಾರ್ಥಿಕನಿಗೆಲೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭೯೯ ॥

content: ಹಣ್ಣೇನು ಕಾಯೇನು ಹೊಟ್ಟೆ ತುಂಬಿರುವಂಗೆ? ।ಪುಣ್ಯವೇಂ ಪಾಪವೇಂ ಪೂರ್ಣದರ್ಶನಿಗೆ? ॥ಉನ್ನತ ಶಿಖರದಿಂ ತಿಟ್ಟೇನು ಕುಳಿಯೇನು? ।ಪೂರ್ಣತೆಗೆ ಸೊಟ್ಟೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೦ ॥ haNNEnu kAyEnu hoTTe tumbiruvange? ।puNyavEm pApavEm pUrNadarshanige? ॥unnata shikharadiM tiTTEnu kuLiyEnu? ।pUrNatege soTTenu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 800 ॥It does not matter whether the fruit is ripe or not for a person whose stomach is filled. For a person who has realized the complete truth, there is no sin or good karma. When viewed from a high position (mountaintop), mounds and holes in the ground below cannot be seen. There can not be anything missing (or crooked) in the complete.   - Mankutimma
translation: It does not matter whether the fruit is ripe or not for a person whose stomach is filled. For a person who has realized the complete truth, there is no sin or good karma. When viewed from a high position (mountaintop), mounds and holes in the ground below cannot be seen. There can not be anything missing (or crooked) in the complete.   - Mankutimma
title: ಪೂರ್ಣತೆಗೆ ಸೊಟ್ಟೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: haNNEnu kAyEnu hoTTe tumbiruvange? ।puNyavEm pApavEm pUrNadarshanige? ॥unnata shikharadiM tiTTEnu kuLiyEnu? ।pUrNatege soTTenu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 800 ॥
kagga: ಹಣ್ಣೇನು ಕಾಯೇನು ಹೊಟ್ಟೆ ತುಂಬಿರುವಂಗೆ? ।ಪುಣ್ಯವೇಂ ಪಾಪವೇಂ ಪೂರ್ಣದರ್ಶನಿಗೆ? ॥ಉನ್ನತ ಶಿಖರದಿಂ ತಿಟ್ಟೇನು ಕುಳಿಯೇನು? ।ಪೂರ್ಣತೆಗೆ ಸೊಟ್ಟೇನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೦ ॥

content: ಕೋಡುಗಲ್ಲನು ಹತ್ತಿ ದೂರವನು ನೋಳ್ಪಂಗೆ ।ಗೋಡೆಗೊತ್ತುಗಳೇನು? ಮೇಡು ಕುಳಿಯೇನು? ॥ನೋಡು ನೀನುನ್ನತದಿ ಜನಜೀವಿತವ ।ಮಾಡುದಾರದ ಮನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೧ ॥ kODugallanu hatti dUravanu nOLpange ।gODe gottugaLEnu? mEDu kuLiyEnu? ॥nODu nInu unnatadi jana jIvitava ।mADu udArada manava  - Mankutimma ॥ 801 ॥If one climbs up a hill and looks far, he can not make out the details of the topology below  - walls, signs on the wall, gardens, holes. Like wise, we all should reach a higher state of being where the petty differences in people and other life don;t matter any more. Let your mind expand to such a wide inclusive consciousness.  - Mankutimma
translation: If one climbs up a hill and looks far, he can not make out the details of the topology below  - walls, signs on the wall, gardens, holes. Like wise, we all should reach a higher state of being where the petty differences in people and other life don;t matter any more. Let your mind expand to such a wide inclusive consciousness.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಾಡುದಾರದ ಮನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kODugallanu hatti dUravanu nOLpange ।gODe gottugaLEnu? mEDu kuLiyEnu? ॥nODu nInu unnatadi jana jIvitava ।mADu udArada manava  - Mankutimma ॥ 801 ॥
kagga: ಕೋಡುಗಲ್ಲನು ಹತ್ತಿ ದೂರವನು ನೋಳ್ಪಂಗೆ ।ಗೋಡೆಗೊತ್ತುಗಳೇನು? ಮೇಡು ಕುಳಿಯೇನು? ॥ನೋಡು ನೀನುನ್ನತದಿ ಜನಜೀವಿತವ ।ಮಾಡುದಾರದ ಮನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೧ ॥

content: ಹರ್ಮ್ಯಾಗ್ರಕೇರಿ ಸೋಪಾನದಿನತೀತನಹೆ ।ನಿರ್ಮಮತೆಗೇರಿ ಕರ್ಮಾತೀತನಪ್ಪೆ ॥ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಪದದಿಂದ ಧರ್ಮಾಧರ್ಮಳ ನಿಯಮ ।ನಿರ್ಮಾಲ್ಯವಾಗುವುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೨ ॥ harmyAgrake eri sOpAnadina atItanahe ।nirmamatege eri karma atItanappe ॥brahmapadadinda dharma adharmagaLa niyama ।nirmAlyavAguvudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 802 ॥For a person who has already climbed to the upper rooms, there is no use of the stairs. If a person is already detached from everything, then his actions will not any implications (of sin or otherwise). Once a person has reached the supreme consciousness, petty discussions on morality stop bothering him. They are as important as discarded flowers (waste) after worship.  - Mankutimma
translation: For a person who has already climbed to the upper rooms, there is no use of the stairs. If a person is already detached from everything, then his actions will not any implications (of sin or otherwise). Once a person has reached the supreme consciousness, petty discussions on morality stop bothering him. They are as important as discarded flowers (waste) after worship.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಿರ್ಮಾಲ್ಯವಾಗುವುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: harmyAgrake eri sOpAnadina atItanahe ।nirmamatege eri karma atItanappe ॥brahmapadadinda dharma adharmagaLa niyama ।nirmAlyavAguvudu  - Mankutimma ॥ 802 ॥
kagga: ಹರ್ಮ್ಯಾಗ್ರಕೇರಿ ಸೋಪಾನದಿನತೀತನಹೆ ।ನಿರ್ಮಮತೆಗೇರಿ ಕರ್ಮಾತೀತನಪ್ಪೆ ॥ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಪದದಿಂದ ಧರ್ಮಾಧರ್ಮಳ ನಿಯಮ ।ನಿರ್ಮಾಲ್ಯವಾಗುವುದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೨ ॥

content: ಎಲ್ಲರೊಳು ತಾನು ತನ್ನೊಳಗೆಲ್ಲರಿರುವವೋ- ।ಲೆಲ್ಲೆಲ್ಲಿಯುಂ ನೋಡಿ ನಡೆದು ನಗುತಳುತ ॥ಬೆಲ್ಲ ಲೋಕಕ್ಕಾಗಿ ತನಗೆ ತಾಂ ಕಲ್ಲಾಗಿ ।ಬಲ್ಲವನೆ ಮುಕ್ತನಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೩ ॥ ellaroLu tAnu tannoLage ellaru iruvavolu ।ellelliyum nODi naDedu naguta aLuta ॥bella lOkakkAgi tanage tAm kallAgi ।ballavane muktanala  - Mankutimma ॥ 803 ॥I am one among everybody. Everybody is one with me. I look at everything. I walk alongside everything. I laugh, I cry. I will be sweet to the world. I shall be a rock to myself. Only a person who can do this is completely free.  - Mankutimma
translation: I am one among everybody. Everybody is one with me. I look at everything. I walk alongside everything. I laugh, I cry. I will be sweet to the world. I shall be a rock to myself. Only a person who can do this is completely free.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಲ್ಲವನೆ ಮುಕ್ತನಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ellaroLu tAnu tannoLage ellaru iruvavolu ।ellelliyum nODi naDedu naguta aLuta ॥bella lOkakkAgi tanage tAm kallAgi ।ballavane muktanala  - Mankutimma ॥ 803 ॥
kagga: ಎಲ್ಲರೊಳು ತಾನು ತನ್ನೊಳಗೆಲ್ಲರಿರುವವೋ- ।ಲೆಲ್ಲೆಲ್ಲಿಯುಂ ನೋಡಿ ನಡೆದು ನಗುತಳುತ ॥ಬೆಲ್ಲ ಲೋಕಕ್ಕಾಗಿ ತನಗೆ ತಾಂ ಕಲ್ಲಾಗಿ ।ಬಲ್ಲವನೆ ಮುಕ್ತನಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೩ ॥

content: ಶುಭವಾವುದಶುಭವಾವುದು ಲೋಕದಲಿ ನೋಡೆ? ।ವಿಭಜಿಸಲ್ಕಾಗದನ್ಯೋನ್ಯಸಂಬಂಧ ॥ಉಭಯವನು ಮೀರ್ದ ಸಾಮ್ಯದ ನೀತಿಯೊಂದಿಹುದು ।ಅಭಯಪಥವದು ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೪ ॥ shubhavAvudu ashubhavAvudu lOkadali nODe? ।vibhajisalke aagada anyOnya sambandha ॥ubhayavanu mIrda sAmyada nItiyondihudu ।abhaya pathavadu ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 804 ॥Is there a way you can classify things in this world as auspicious or otherwise? No. It always depends on perspective, context and highly subjective. They are inseparable. But there is one truth that goes beyond both auspicious and inauspicious. If you follow that, there will be no fear.  - Mankutimma
translation: Is there a way you can classify things in this world as auspicious or otherwise? No. It always depends on perspective, context and highly subjective. They are inseparable. But there is one truth that goes beyond both auspicious and inauspicious. If you follow that, there will be no fear.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅಭಯಪಥವದು ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: shubhavAvudu ashubhavAvudu lOkadali nODe? ।vibhajisalke aagada anyOnya sambandha ॥ubhayavanu mIrda sAmyada nItiyondihudu ।abhaya pathavadu ninage  - Mankutimma ॥ 804 ॥
kagga: ಶುಭವಾವುದಶುಭವಾವುದು ಲೋಕದಲಿ ನೋಡೆ? ।ವಿಭಜಿಸಲ್ಕಾಗದನ್ಯೋನ್ಯಸಂಬಂಧ ॥ಉಭಯವನು ಮೀರ್ದ ಸಾಮ್ಯದ ನೀತಿಯೊಂದಿಹುದು ।ಅಭಯಪಥವದು ನಿನಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೪ ॥

content: ಸಾರ್ವಭೌಮನು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯೊಳಗದೊರ್ವನೆ ಕಾಣೊ ।ಸರ್ವವನು ತನ್ನಾತ್ಮವೆಂದು ಬದುಕುವನು ॥ನಿರ್ವಿಕಾರಾಂತರಂಗದಿ ಜಗವ ಧರಿಸುವನು ।ಸರ್ವಮಂಗಳನವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೫ ॥ sArvabhaumanu sRuShTiyoLage orvane kANo ।sarvavanu tanna aatmavendu badukuvanu ॥nirvikAra antarangadi jagava dharisuvanu ।sarvamangaLanu avanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 805 ॥There is only one emperor in creation. It is he who can think that the whole universe is himself. He will embrace the world with a clear conscience without any distortion. He brings good to everyone.  - Mankutimma
translation: There is only one emperor in creation. It is he who can think that the whole universe is himself. He will embrace the world with a clear conscience without any distortion. He brings good to everyone.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸರ್ವಮಂಗಳನವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sArvabhaumanu sRuShTiyoLage orvane kANo ।sarvavanu tanna aatmavendu badukuvanu ॥nirvikAra antarangadi jagava dharisuvanu ।sarvamangaLanu avanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 805 ॥
kagga: ಸಾರ್ವಭೌಮನು ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯೊಳಗದೊರ್ವನೆ ಕಾಣೊ ।ಸರ್ವವನು ತನ್ನಾತ್ಮವೆಂದು ಬದುಕುವನು ॥ನಿರ್ವಿಕಾರಾಂತರಂಗದಿ ಜಗವ ಧರಿಸುವನು ।ಸರ್ವಮಂಗಳನವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೫ ॥

content: ಗರ್ವಪಡದುಪಕಾರಿ, ದರ್ಪ ಬಿಟ್ಟಧಿಕಾರಿ ।ನಿರ್ವಿಕಾರದ ನಯನದಿಂ ನೋಳ್ಪುದಾರಿ ॥ಸರ್ವಧರ್ಮಾಧಾರಿ, ನಿರ್ವಾಣಸಂಚಾರಿ ।ಉರ್ವರೆಗೆ ಗುರುವವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೬ ॥ garvapaDada upakAri, darpa biTTa adhikAri ।nirvikArada nayanadim nOLpa udAri ॥sarvadharma aadhAri, nirvANa sanchAri ।urvarege guruvavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 806 ॥One who can help without feeling proud about it; an officer who does not throw his weight around; a benevolent person who can see the world as-is without any distortion; a person who respects and supports all dharma (religion); a person whose moves around searching for salvation.  - all these people can become teachers of the world.  - Mankutimma
translation: One who can help without feeling proud about it; an officer who does not throw his weight around; a benevolent person who can see the world as-is without any distortion; a person who respects and supports all dharma (religion); a person whose moves around searching for salvation.  - all these people can become teachers of the world.  - Mankutimma
title: ಉರ್ವರೆಗೆ ಗುರುವವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: garvapaDada upakAri, darpa biTTa adhikAri ।nirvikArada nayanadim nOLpa udAri ॥sarvadharma aadhAri, nirvANa sanchAri ।urvarege guruvavanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 806 ॥
kagga: ಗರ್ವಪಡದುಪಕಾರಿ, ದರ್ಪ ಬಿಟ್ಟಧಿಕಾರಿ ।ನಿರ್ವಿಕಾರದ ನಯನದಿಂ ನೋಳ್ಪುದಾರಿ ॥ಸರ್ವಧರ್ಮಾಧಾರಿ, ನಿರ್ವಾಣಸಂಚಾರಿ ।ಉರ್ವರೆಗೆ ಗುರುವವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೬ ॥

content: ಜಗದ ಕಲ್ಯಾಣದೊಳಗಾತ್ಮ ಕಲ್ಯಾಣವನು ।ಜಗದ ಬೀದಿಗಳೊಳು ನಿಜಾತ್ಮ ಯಾತ್ರೆಯನು ॥ಜಗದ ಜೀವಿತದಿ ನಿಜಜೀವಿತದ ಪೂರ್ತಿಯನು ।ಬಗೆಯಲರಿತವನೆ ಸುಖಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೭ ॥ jagada kalyANadoLage aatma kalyANavanu ।jagada bIdigaLoLu nijAtma yAtreyanu ॥jagada jIvitadi nijajIvitada pUrtiyanu ।bageyalu aritavane sukhi  - Mankutimma ॥ 807 ॥To see one;s growth in the growth of the world. To wander one;s soul freely in the streets of the world. To see the completeness of life only among all the other life in this world. A person who is able to do the above will be happy.  - Mankutimma
translation: To see one;s growth in the growth of the world. To wander one;s soul freely in the streets of the world. To see the completeness of life only among all the other life in this world. A person who is able to do the above will be happy.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಗೆಯಲರಿತವನೆ ಸುಖಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jagada kalyANadoLage aatma kalyANavanu ।jagada bIdigaLoLu nijAtma yAtreyanu ॥jagada jIvitadi nijajIvitada pUrtiyanu ।bageyalu aritavane sukhi  - Mankutimma ॥ 807 ॥
kagga: ಜಗದ ಕಲ್ಯಾಣದೊಳಗಾತ್ಮ ಕಲ್ಯಾಣವನು ।ಜಗದ ಬೀದಿಗಳೊಳು ನಿಜಾತ್ಮ ಯಾತ್ರೆಯನು ॥ಜಗದ ಜೀವಿತದಿ ನಿಜಜೀವಿತದ ಪೂರ್ತಿಯನು ।ಬಗೆಯಲರಿತವನೆ ಸುಖಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೭ ॥

content: ಚಿರ ಶಿಕ್ಷೆಯಿಂ ನಿನಗೆ ಸರ್ವಾತ್ಮತಾಭ್ಯಾಸ ।ಸರಳ ಸಹಜವದಹುದು ಮೂಗಿನುಸಿರವೊಲು ॥ಪರನಿಯತಿಯಿರದು ಸ್ವತಸಿದ್ಧ ನಿಯತಿಯಿರೆ ।ಹೊರಸಡಿಲಕೊಳಹಿಡಿತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೮ ॥ chira shikSheyim ninage sarvAtmatA abhyAsa ।saraLa sahajavadahudu mUgina usiravolu ॥paraniyatiyiradu svatasiddha niyatiyire ।horasaDilake oLahiDita  - Mankutimma ॥ 808 ॥To be able to treat everything in this world as if his own is a tough exercise. It has to be practiced tirelessly. Once mastered it is as simple as breathing. Once your inner self is disciplined, there is no need for any external forces to impose rules. To be free and flexible outside, the inside must be disciplined and strong.  - Mankutimma
translation: To be able to treat everything in this world as if his own is a tough exercise. It has to be practiced tirelessly. Once mastered it is as simple as breathing. Once your inner self is disciplined, there is no need for any external forces to impose rules. To be free and flexible outside, the inside must be disciplined and strong.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹೊರಸಡಿಲಕೊಳಹಿಡಿತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: chira shikSheyim ninage sarvAtmatA abhyAsa ।saraLa sahajavadahudu mUgina usiravolu ॥paraniyatiyiradu svatasiddha niyatiyire ।horasaDilake oLahiDita  - Mankutimma ॥ 808 ॥
kagga: ಚಿರ ಶಿಕ್ಷೆಯಿಂ ನಿನಗೆ ಸರ್ವಾತ್ಮತಾಭ್ಯಾಸ ।ಸರಳ ಸಹಜವದಹುದು ಮೂಗಿನುಸಿರವೊಲು ॥ಪರನಿಯತಿಯಿರದು ಸ್ವತಸಿದ್ಧ ನಿಯತಿಯಿರೆ ।ಹೊರಸಡಿಲಕೊಳಹಿಡಿತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೮ ॥

content: ದ್ವೈತವೇನದ್ವೈತವೇನಾತ್ಮದರ್ಶನಿಗೆ? ।ಶ್ರೌತಾದಿವಿಧಿಯೇನು? ತಪನಿಯಮವೇನು? ॥ನೀತಿ ಸರ್ವಾತ್ಮಮತಿಯದರಿನಮಿತ ಪ್ರೀತಿ ।ಭೀತಿಯಿಲ್ಲದನವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೯ ॥ dvaitavEnu advaitavEnu aatmadarshanige? ।shrautaadi vidhiyEnu? tapa niyamavEnu? ॥nIti sarvAtma matiyu adarin amita prIti ।bhItiyilladan avanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 809 ॥For a person who treats the whole of creation as himself, there is no fear. He has unlimited love to give to the world. He is a realized soul. He does not (need not) care about various philosophies of duality or singularity, about rituals and penances.  - Mankutimma
translation: For a person who treats the whole of creation as himself, there is no fear. He has unlimited love to give to the world. He is a realized soul. He does not (need not) care about various philosophies of duality or singularity, about rituals and penances.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭೀತಿಯಿಲ್ಲದನವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: dvaitavEnu advaitavEnu aatmadarshanige? ।shrautaadi vidhiyEnu? tapa niyamavEnu? ॥nIti sarvAtma matiyu adarin amita prIti ।bhItiyilladan avanu  - Mankutimma ॥ 809 ॥
kagga: ದ್ವೈತವೇನದ್ವೈತವೇನಾತ್ಮದರ್ಶನಿಗೆ? ।ಶ್ರೌತಾದಿವಿಧಿಯೇನು? ತಪನಿಯಮವೇನು? ॥ನೀತಿ ಸರ್ವಾತ್ಮಮತಿಯದರಿನಮಿತ ಪ್ರೀತಿ ।ಭೀತಿಯಿಲ್ಲದನವನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೦೯ ॥

content: ಬರಿಭಕ್ತಿ ಬರಿಕರ್ಮ ಬರಿತರ್ಕ ದೊರಕಿಸದು ।ಪರಮಾತ್ಮ ದರ್ಶನವ; ಬೇಕದಕೆ ತಪಸು ॥ಪರಿಪೂರ್ಣ ಜೀವನಾನುಭವತಾಪದಿ ಮತಿಯು ।ಪರಿಪಕ್ವವಾಗಲದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೦ ॥ bari bhakti bari karma bari tarka dorakisadu ।paramAtma darshanava; bEkadake tapasu ॥paripUrNa jIvanAnubhava tApadi matiyu ।paripakvavAgaladu  - Mankutimma ॥ 810 ॥Devotion, actions, logic  - any of these alone is not enough to get the full picture of the universal truth. It requires a lot of penance. It requires the mind to be subject to wide range of experiences through out life. Only then will the mind be purified to be able to comprehend the truth.  - Mankutimma
translation: Devotion, actions, logic  - any of these alone is not enough to get the full picture of the universal truth. It requires a lot of penance. It requires the mind to be subject to wide range of experiences through out life. Only then will the mind be purified to be able to comprehend the truth.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರಿಪಕ್ವವಾಗಲದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bari bhakti bari karma bari tarka dorakisadu ।paramAtma darshanava; bEkadake tapasu ॥paripUrNa jIvanAnubhava tApadi matiyu ।paripakvavAgaladu  - Mankutimma ॥ 810 ॥
kagga: ಬರಿಭಕ್ತಿ ಬರಿಕರ್ಮ ಬರಿತರ್ಕ ದೊರಕಿಸದು ।ಪರಮಾತ್ಮ ದರ್ಶನವ; ಬೇಕದಕೆ ತಪಸು ॥ಪರಿಪೂರ್ಣ ಜೀವನಾನುಭವತಾಪದಿ ಮತಿಯು ।ಪರಿಪಕ್ವವಾಗಲದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೦ ॥

content: ಹೊರಗು ಹೊರೆಯಾಗದವೊಲ್ ಒಳಗನನುಗೊಳಿಸಿ, ನೀ- ।ನೊಳಗು ಶೆಕೆಯಾಗದವೊಲ್ ಅಳವಡಿಸೆ ಹೊರಗ ॥ಸರಿಸಮದೊಳೆರಡನುಂ ಬಾಳಿನಲಿ ಜೋಡಿಪುದೆ ।ಪರಮಜೀವನಯೋಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೧ ॥ horagu horeyAgadavol oLaganu anugoLisi nInu ।oLagu shekeyAgadavol aLavaDise horaga ॥sarisamadoL eradanum bALinali jODipude ।parama jIvana yOga  - Mankutimma ॥ 811 ॥The inner conscience must be calibrated so that the worldly dealings will not be too heavy. Everyday actions must be in such a way that they do not suffocate the inner conscience. Balancing both of them is greatest art of life.  - Mankutimma
translation: The inner conscience must be calibrated so that the worldly dealings will not be too heavy. Everyday actions must be in such a way that they do not suffocate the inner conscience. Balancing both of them is greatest art of life.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರಮಜೀವನಯೋಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: horagu horeyAgadavol oLaganu anugoLisi nInu ।oLagu shekeyAgadavol aLavaDise horaga ॥sarisamadoL eradanum bALinali jODipude ।parama jIvana yOga  - Mankutimma ॥ 811 ॥
kagga: ಹೊರಗು ಹೊರೆಯಾಗದವೊಲ್ ಒಳಗನನುಗೊಳಿಸಿ, ನೀ- ।ನೊಳಗು ಶೆಕೆಯಾಗದವೊಲ್ ಅಳವಡಿಸೆ ಹೊರಗ ॥ಸರಿಸಮದೊಳೆರಡನುಂ ಬಾಳಿನಲಿ ಜೋಡಿಪುದೆ ।ಪರಮಜೀವನಯೋಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೧ ॥

content: ಅಳಬೇಕು, ನಗಬೇಕು, ಸಮತೆ ಶಮವಿರಬೇಕು ।ಹೊಳೆಯ ನೆರೆವೊಲು ಹೃದಯರಸ ಹರಿಯಬೇಕು ॥ಅಲೆಯಿನಲುಗದ ಬಂಡೆಯವೊಲಾತ್ಮವಿರಬೇಕು ।ತಿಳಿದವರ ಚರಿತವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೨ ॥ aLa bEku, naga bEku, samate shamavirabEku ।hoLeya nerevolu hRudayarasa hariya bEku ॥aleyin alugada banDeyavol aatmavirabEku ।tiLidavara charitavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 812 ॥One must cry; one must laugh. But there must be a sensible limit to both that one must not cross. The emotions in our heart must flow like a river (not stagnant like a pond). But, our mind must be like a rock that does not move even a bit in spite of facing endless waves. This is the picture of a wise man.  - Mankutimma
translation: One must cry; one must laugh. But there must be a sensible limit to both that one must not cross. The emotions in our heart must flow like a river (not stagnant like a pond). But, our mind must be like a rock that does not move even a bit in spite of facing endless waves. This is the picture of a wise man.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಿಳಿದವರ ಚರಿತವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aLa bEku, naga bEku, samate shamavirabEku ।hoLeya nerevolu hRudayarasa hariya bEku ॥aleyin alugada banDeyavol aatmavirabEku ।tiLidavara charitavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 812 ॥
kagga: ಅಳಬೇಕು, ನಗಬೇಕು, ಸಮತೆ ಶಮವಿರಬೇಕು ।ಹೊಳೆಯ ನೆರೆವೊಲು ಹೃದಯರಸ ಹರಿಯಬೇಕು ॥ಅಲೆಯಿನಲುಗದ ಬಂಡೆಯವೊಲಾತ್ಮವಿರಬೇಕು ।ತಿಳಿದವರ ಚರಿತವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೨ ॥

content: ಬಿಟ್ಟೆನೆಲ್ಲವನೆಂಬ ಹೃದಯಶೋಷಣೆ ಬೇಡ ।ಕಟ್ಟಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವ ಶಿರಃಪೀಡೆಯುಂ ಬೇಡ ॥ತೊಟ್ಟು ನಿರಹಂಕೃತಿಯ ಕವಚವನು ನೀಂ ಪೋರು ।ಮುಟ್ಟದಿಳೆಯಸಿ ನಿನ್ನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೩ ॥ biTTenu ellavanemba hRudaya shoShaNe bEDa ।kaTTikoLLuva shiraH pIDeyum bEDa ॥toTTu nirahankRutiya kavachavanu nIm pOru ।muTTadu iLeya asi ninna  - Mankutimma ॥ 813 ॥Let there be no pain in the heart due to complete renouncement. Let there no headaches due to excessive involvement either. Wear the armor of selflessness and the swords of this world will not be able to hurt you.  - Mankutimma
translation: Let there be no pain in the heart due to complete renouncement. Let there no headaches due to excessive involvement either. Wear the armor of selflessness and the swords of this world will not be able to hurt you.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮುಟ್ಟದಿಳೆಯಸಿ ನಿನ್ನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: biTTenu ellavanemba hRudaya shoShaNe bEDa ।kaTTikoLLuva shiraH pIDeyum bEDa ॥toTTu nirahankRutiya kavachavanu nIm pOru ।muTTadu iLeya asi ninna  - Mankutimma ॥ 813 ॥
kagga: ಬಿಟ್ಟೆನೆಲ್ಲವನೆಂಬ ಹೃದಯಶೋಷಣೆ ಬೇಡ ।ಕಟ್ಟಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವ ಶಿರಃಪೀಡೆಯುಂ ಬೇಡ ॥ತೊಟ್ಟು ನಿರಹಂಕೃತಿಯ ಕವಚವನು ನೀಂ ಪೋರು ।ಮುಟ್ಟದಿಳೆಯಸಿ ನಿನ್ನ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೩ ॥

content: ನ್ಯಾಯಾಧಿಪತಿ ತನ್ನ ಮತಿ ಮನಸುಗಳನೆಲ್ಲ ।ಸ್ವೀಯಲಾಭಸ್ಮರಣೆಯುಳಿದು ವಿವಾದಗಳಾ ॥ದಾಯನಿರ್ಣಯಕೆ ಯೋಜಿಸುವಂತೆ, ನೀಂ ಜಗದ ।ಶ್ರೇಯಸ್ಸಿಗುಜ್ಜುಗಿಸು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೪ ॥ nyAyAdhipati tanna mati manasugaLanella ।svIya lAbha smaraNeya uLidu vivAdagaLa aa ॥dAya nirNayake yOjisuvante, nIm jagada  ।shrEyassige ujjugisu  - Mankutimma ॥ 814 ॥A judge sets aside all thoughts of personal gain aside and listens to all the parties in a case. He needs this detachment to be able to give impartial judgments. One must exercise the same detachment (selflessness) and work towards bettering this world.  - Mankutimma
translation: A judge sets aside all thoughts of personal gain aside and listens to all the parties in a case. He needs this detachment to be able to give impartial judgments. One must exercise the same detachment (selflessness) and work towards bettering this world.  - Mankutimma
title: ಶ್ರೇಯಸ್ಸಿಗುಜ್ಜುಗಿಸು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nyAyAdhipati tanna mati manasugaLanella ।svIya lAbha smaraNeya uLidu vivAdagaLa aa ॥dAya nirNayake yOjisuvante, nIm jagada  ।shrEyassige ujjugisu  - Mankutimma ॥ 814 ॥
kagga: ನ್ಯಾಯಾಧಿಪತಿ ತನ್ನ ಮತಿ ಮನಸುಗಳನೆಲ್ಲ ।ಸ್ವೀಯಲಾಭಸ್ಮರಣೆಯುಳಿದು ವಿವಾದಗಳಾ ॥ದಾಯನಿರ್ಣಯಕೆ ಯೋಜಿಸುವಂತೆ, ನೀಂ ಜಗದ ।ಶ್ರೇಯಸ್ಸಿಗುಜ್ಜುಗಿಸು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೪ ॥

content: ಪೌರುಷಾಶ್ವಕ್ಕಾಶೆ ಛಾಟಿ, ಭಯ ಕಡಿವಾಣ ।ಹಾರಾಟವದರದಾ ವೇಧೆಗಳ ನಡುವೆ ॥ಧೀರನೇರಿರೆ, ಹೊಡೆತ ಕಡಿತವಿಲ್ಲದೆ ಗುರಿಗೆ ।ಸಾರುವುದು ನೈಜದಿಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೫ ॥ pauruShAshvakke aashe ChATi, bhaya kaDivANa ।hArATavu adaradu aa vEdhegaLa naDuve ॥dhIranu Eridare, hoDeta kaDitavillade gurige  ।sAruvudu naijadim  - Mankutimma ॥ 815 ॥For a horse names ;human endeavour;, desire is a whip and fear is a chain. Its misery is dealing between both at the same time  - the whip and the chain. But is a brave man rides it, the horse neither needs a whip not a chain. It can reach its goal naturally.   - Mankutimma
translation: For a horse names ;human endeavour;, desire is a whip and fear is a chain. Its misery is dealing between both at the same time  - the whip and the chain. But is a brave man rides it, the horse neither needs a whip not a chain. It can reach its goal naturally.   - Mankutimma
title: ಸಾರುವುದು ನೈಜದಿಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: pauruShAshvakke aashe ChATi, bhaya kaDivANa ।hArATavu adaradu aa vEdhegaLa naDuve ॥dhIranu Eridare, hoDeta kaDitavillade gurige  ।sAruvudu naijadim  - Mankutimma ॥ 815 ॥
kagga: ಪೌರುಷಾಶ್ವಕ್ಕಾಶೆ ಛಾಟಿ, ಭಯ ಕಡಿವಾಣ ।ಹಾರಾಟವದರದಾ ವೇಧೆಗಳ ನಡುವೆ ॥ಧೀರನೇರಿರೆ, ಹೊಡೆತ ಕಡಿತವಿಲ್ಲದೆ ಗುರಿಗೆ ।ಸಾರುವುದು ನೈಜದಿಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೫ ॥

content: ಆರೋಗ್ಯಭಾಗ್ಯವನು ಮನಕೆ ತನುಗೆಂತಂತೆ ।ಹಾರಯಿಸುವೊಡೆ ಹಲವು ಸರಳ ನೀತಿಗಳ ॥ಧಾರಯಿಸು ನೆನಸಿನಲಿ ನುಡಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ನಡತೆಯಲಿ ।ಪಾರಾಗು ಸುಳಿಯಿಂದ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೬ ॥ aarOgya bhAgyavanu manake tanugentante ।hArayisuvoDe halavu saraLa nItigaLa ॥dhArayisu nenasinali nuDiyali naDateyali ।pArAgu suLiyinda  - Mankutimma ॥ 816 ॥If you want good health for you mind as well as your body, you have to follow a many simple morals. You must always think, speak and do good. You will escape the cycle of sin begetting sin if you put this in practice.  - Mankutimma
translation: If you want good health for you mind as well as your body, you have to follow a many simple morals. You must always think, speak and do good. You will escape the cycle of sin begetting sin if you put this in practice.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪಾರಾಗು ಸುಳಿಯಿಂದ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aarOgya bhAgyavanu manake tanugentante ।hArayisuvoDe halavu saraLa nItigaLa ॥dhArayisu nenasinali nuDiyali naDateyali ।pArAgu suLiyinda  - Mankutimma ॥ 816 ॥
kagga: ಆರೋಗ್ಯಭಾಗ್ಯವನು ಮನಕೆ ತನುಗೆಂತಂತೆ ।ಹಾರಯಿಸುವೊಡೆ ಹಲವು ಸರಳ ನೀತಿಗಳ ॥ಧಾರಯಿಸು ನೆನಸಿನಲಿ ನುಡಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ನಡತೆಯಲಿ ।ಪಾರಾಗು ಸುಳಿಯಿಂದ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೬ ॥

content: ಮರವ ನೀನರಿಯುವೊಡೆ ಬುಡವ ಕೀಳಲು ಬೇಡ ।ತರಿಯಬೇಡೆಲೆಕಡ್ಡಿಗಳ ಪರೀಕ್ಷಣಕೆ ॥ಎರೆ ನೀರ, ಸುರಿ ಗೊಬ್ಬರವ, ಕೆದಕು ಪಾತಿಯನು ।ನಿರುಕಿಸುತ ತಳಿರಲರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೭ ॥ marava nInu ariyuvoDe buDava kILalu bEDa ।tariya bEDa ele kaDDIgaLa parIKshaNake ॥ere nIra, suri gobbarava, kedaku pAtiyanu ।nirukisuta taLiru alara  - Mankutimma ॥ 817 ॥If you want to know a tree well, don;t pluck its roots. Don;t tear its leaves and branches. Instead  - water it, pour some manure, plough its bankings  - enjoy touching its fresh sprouts and flowers. That is a good way to know the trees.  - Mankutimma
translation: If you want to know a tree well, don;t pluck its roots. Don;t tear its leaves and branches. Instead  - water it, pour some manure, plough its bankings  - enjoy touching its fresh sprouts and flowers. That is a good way to know the trees.  - Mankutimma
title: ನಿರುಕಿಸುತ ತಳಿರಲರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: marava nInu ariyuvoDe buDava kILalu bEDa ।tariya bEDa ele kaDDIgaLa parIKshaNake ॥ere nIra, suri gobbarava, kedaku pAtiyanu ।nirukisuta taLiru alara  - Mankutimma ॥ 817 ॥
kagga: ಮರವ ನೀನರಿಯುವೊಡೆ ಬುಡವ ಕೀಳಲು ಬೇಡ ।ತರಿಯಬೇಡೆಲೆಕಡ್ಡಿಗಳ ಪರೀಕ್ಷಣಕೆ ॥ಎರೆ ನೀರ, ಸುರಿ ಗೊಬ್ಬರವ, ಕೆದಕು ಪಾತಿಯನು ।ನಿರುಕಿಸುತ ತಳಿರಲರ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೭ ॥

content: ವನಜಂತುಗಳ ಸಸ್ಯಮೂಲಿಕಾಹಾರದಿಂ ।ಗುಣವನರಿತವರಾದಿವೈದ್ಯರೌಷಧದೊಳ್ ॥ಒಣತರ್ಕಗಳಿನೇನು? ಜೀವನದ ವಿವಿಧರಸ- ।ದನುಭವದಿ ತತ್ತ್ವವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೮ ॥ vanajantugaLa sasya mUlikA aahAradim ।guNavanu araitavar aadi vaidyaru auShadhadoL ॥oNatarkagaLin Enu? jIvanada vividha rasada ।anubhavadi tattvavelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 818 ॥The early doctors came to know about the medicinal value of all the plants by observing the animals of the forest use them.
