The did not find it by theorizing. What can be achieved by debates? The ultimate truth can only be realized through experiences in life.  - Mankutimma
translation: The early doctors came to know about the medicinal value of all the plants by observing the animals of the forest use them. The did not find it by theorizing. What can be achieved by debates? The ultimate truth can only be realized through experiences in life.  - Mankutimma
title: ರಸದನುಭವದಿ ತತ್ತ್ವವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vanajantugaLa sasya mUlikA aahAradim ।guNavanu araitavar aadi vaidyaru auShadhadoL ॥oNatarkagaLin Enu? jIvanada vividha rasada ।anubhavadi tattvavelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 818 ॥
kagga: ವನಜಂತುಗಳ ಸಸ್ಯಮೂಲಿಕಾಹಾರದಿಂ ।ಗುಣವನರಿತವರಾದಿವೈದ್ಯರೌಷಧದೊಳ್ ॥ಒಣತರ್ಕಗಳಿನೇನು? ಜೀವನದ ವಿವಿಧರಸ- ।ದನುಭವದಿ ತತ್ತ್ವವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೮ ॥

content: ಕಡಿದೊಡೆ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಗುಳಿವುವು ಸತ್ತನಾರುಗಳು ।ಕಡಿಯದಿರೆ ಮರದಿ ಪರಿಯುವುದು ಜೀವರಸ ॥ಬಿಡುವಮ್ ಈ ಬಾಳ್ ಅದೇಕೆಂಬ ಚರ್ಚೆಯ; ನಾವು ।ದುಡಿವಮ್ ಅದು ಪೆಂಪುಗೊಳೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೯ ॥ kaDidoDe parIkShege uLivuvu sattanArugaLu ।kaDiyadire maradi pariyuvudu jIvarasa ॥biDuvum ii bAL adEkemba charcheya; nAvu ।duDivam adu pempugoLe  - Mankutimma ॥ 819 ॥If you cut it (a tree) to examine it  - all you will be left is dried wood and bark. If you don;t cut it, life flows and enhances in it. Similarly, we should not examine/analyze our lives too much. We must put in enough efforts to make it blossom well.  - Mankutimma
translation: If you cut it (a tree) to examine it  - all you will be left is dried wood and bark. If you don;t cut it, life flows and enhances in it. Similarly, we should not examine/analyze our lives too much. We must put in enough efforts to make it blossom well.  - Mankutimma
title: ದುಡಿವಮ್ ಅದು ಪೆಂಪುಗೊಳೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kaDidoDe parIkShege uLivuvu sattanArugaLu ।kaDiyadire maradi pariyuvudu jIvarasa ॥biDuvum ii bAL adEkemba charcheya; nAvu ।duDivam adu pempugoLe  - Mankutimma ॥ 819 ॥
kagga: ಕಡಿದೊಡೆ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಗುಳಿವುವು ಸತ್ತನಾರುಗಳು ।ಕಡಿಯದಿರೆ ಮರದಿ ಪರಿಯುವುದು ಜೀವರಸ ॥ಬಿಡುವಮ್ ಈ ಬಾಳ್ ಅದೇಕೆಂಬ ಚರ್ಚೆಯ; ನಾವು ।ದುಡಿವಮ್ ಅದು ಪೆಂಪುಗೊಳೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೧೯ ॥

content: ಜೀವನವ್ಯಾಪಾರ ಮೂವರೊಟ್ಟು ವಿಚಾರ ।ಭಾವಿಪೊಡೆ ನೀನು, ಜಗ, ಇನ್ನೊಂದದೃಷ್ಟ ॥ಆವಗಂ ಮೂರನೆಯ ಭಾಗಸ್ಥನಿಚ್ಛೆ ಬಲ ।ಈ ವಿವರವರಿಯೆ ಸುಖ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೦ ॥ jIvana vyApAra mUvara oTTu vichAra ।bhAvipoDe nInu, jaga, innondu adRuShTa ॥aavagam mUraneya bhAgasthana icChe bala ।ii vivarava ariye sukha  - Mankutimma ॥ 820 ॥There are three parts to any transaction in life  - self, the world and luck. It is the party who has the third part who usually gets his way. If one understands this, life will be easy and happy.  - Mankutimma
translation: There are three parts to any transaction in life  - self, the world and luck. It is the party who has the third part who usually gets his way. If one understands this, life will be easy and happy.  - Mankutimma
title: ಈ ವಿವರವರಿಯೆ ಸುಖ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jIvana vyApAra mUvara oTTu vichAra ।bhAvipoDe nInu, jaga, innondu adRuShTa ॥aavagam mUraneya bhAgasthana icChe bala ।ii vivarava ariye sukha  - Mankutimma ॥ 820 ॥
kagga: ಜೀವನವ್ಯಾಪಾರ ಮೂವರೊಟ್ಟು ವಿಚಾರ ।ಭಾವಿಪೊಡೆ ನೀನು, ಜಗ, ಇನ್ನೊಂದದೃಷ್ಟ ॥ಆವಗಂ ಮೂರನೆಯ ಭಾಗಸ್ಥನಿಚ್ಛೆ ಬಲ ।ಈ ವಿವರವರಿಯೆ ಸುಖ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೦ ॥

content: ಏನೇನು ಹಾರಾಟ ಸುಖಕೆಂದು ಲೋಕದಲಿ! ।ತಾನಾಗಿ ಗಾಳಿವೊಲ್ ಬಂದ ಸುಖವೆ ಸುಖ ॥ನೀನೆ ಕೈಬೀಸಿಕೊಳೆ ನೋವು ಬೆವರುಗಳೆ ಫಲ ।ಮಾಣು ಮನದುಬ್ಬಸವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೧ ॥ EnEnu hArATa sukhakendu lOkadali! ।tAnAgi gALivol banda sukhave sukha ॥nIne kaibIsikoLe nOvu bevarugaLe phala ।mANu manada ubbasava  - Mankutimma ॥ 821 ॥What antic one does in this world for happiness? We must accept whatever happiness comes to us like wind. If we try to grab it by swing our arms, fatigue and sweat will be the only outcome. We must reduce anxiety and find calm.  - Mankutimma
translation: What antic one does in this world for happiness? We must accept whatever happiness comes to us like wind. If we try to grab it by swing our arms, fatigue and sweat will be the only outcome. We must reduce anxiety and find calm.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಾಣು ಮನದುಬ್ಬಸವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: EnEnu hArATa sukhakendu lOkadali! ।tAnAgi gALivol banda sukhave sukha ॥nIne kaibIsikoLe nOvu bevarugaLe phala ।mANu manada ubbasava  - Mankutimma ॥ 821 ॥
kagga: ಏನೇನು ಹಾರಾಟ ಸುಖಕೆಂದು ಲೋಕದಲಿ! ।ತಾನಾಗಿ ಗಾಳಿವೊಲ್ ಬಂದ ಸುಖವೆ ಸುಖ ॥ನೀನೆ ಕೈಬೀಸಿಕೊಳೆ ನೋವು ಬೆವರುಗಳೆ ಫಲ ।ಮಾಣು ಮನದುಬ್ಬಸವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೧ ॥

content: ಆತುರತೆಯಿರದ ಸತತೋದ್ಯೋಗ ಸರ್ವಹಿತ ।ಭೂತದಾವೇಶವಾತುರತೆಯಾತ್ಮಕ್ಕೆ ॥ಕಾತರನು ನಿನಾಗೆ ಮೂರನೆಯ ಸಹಭಾಗಿ ।ಪ್ರೀತನಾಗುವನೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೨ ॥ aaturateyirada satata udyOga sarvahita ।bhUtada aaveshavu aaturate aatmakke ॥kAtaranu nInAge mUraneya sahabhAgi ।prItanAguvanEno?  - Mankutimma ॥ 822 ॥Persistent hard work without anxiety will benefit all. If one acts as if he is possessed, then it is not good for the soul. If you do all work in an excited state, then the third party (God, Fate or Luck) involved – other than you and the work, will not be happy.  - Mankutimma
translation: Persistent hard work without anxiety will benefit all. If one acts as if he is possessed, then it is not good for the soul. If you do all work in an excited state, then the third party (God, Fate or Luck) involved – other than you and the work, will not be happy.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪ್ರೀತನಾಗುವನೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aaturateyirada satata udyOga sarvahita ।bhUtada aaveshavu aaturate aatmakke ॥kAtaranu nInAge mUraneya sahabhAgi ।prItanAguvanEno?  - Mankutimma ॥ 822 ॥
kagga: ಆತುರತೆಯಿರದ ಸತತೋದ್ಯೋಗ ಸರ್ವಹಿತ ।ಭೂತದಾವೇಶವಾತುರತೆಯಾತ್ಮಕ್ಕೆ ॥ಕಾತರನು ನಿನಾಗೆ ಮೂರನೆಯ ಸಹಭಾಗಿ ।ಪ್ರೀತನಾಗುವನೇನೊ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೨ ॥

content: ಎಣಿಕೆಯೊಳಿತಾದೊಡೆಯುಮೊಳಿತನಾಗಿಸದು ಹಟ ।ಮಣಿಕನಕ ಸಂಕೋಲೆ ತನುವ ಬಂಧಿಸದೇಂ? ॥ತನಯನಿರಿದಸಿ ನಿನ್ನ ಮೈಯ ಹುಣ್ಣಾಗಿಸದೆ? ।ಮನ ಸರ್ವಸಮವಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೩ ॥ eNike OlitAdoDeyum OlitanAgisadu haTa ।maNi kanaka sankOle tanuva bandhisadEm? ॥tanayanu irida asi ninna maiya huNNagisade? ।mana sarva samavirali  - Mankutimma ॥ 823 ॥Stubbornness may be right. But it does not do any good. Cuffs are still a restraint even if they are made of pearls and gold. Your body will bleed even if it is your son who stabs. We need to learn to be objective and bring peace to our minds and look at all things equally.  - Mankutimma
translation: Stubbornness may be right. But it does not do any good. Cuffs are still a restraint even if they are made of pearls and gold. Your body will bleed even if it is your son who stabs. We need to learn to be objective and bring peace to our minds and look at all things equally.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮನ ಸರ್ವಸಮವಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: eNike OlitAdoDeyum OlitanAgisadu haTa ।maNi kanaka sankOle tanuva bandhisadEm? ॥tanayanu irida asi ninna maiya huNNagisade? ।mana sarva samavirali  - Mankutimma ॥ 823 ॥
kagga: ಎಣಿಕೆಯೊಳಿತಾದೊಡೆಯುಮೊಳಿತನಾಗಿಸದು ಹಟ ।ಮಣಿಕನಕ ಸಂಕೋಲೆ ತನುವ ಬಂಧಿಸದೇಂ? ॥ತನಯನಿರಿದಸಿ ನಿನ್ನ ಮೈಯ ಹುಣ್ಣಾಗಿಸದೆ? ।ಮನ ಸರ್ವಸಮವಿರಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೩ ॥

content: ಗುರಿಯನೈದದೊಡೊಮ್ಮೆ ಮರಳಿ ನೀನುಜ್ಜುಗಿಸು ।ಕರಯುಕ್ತಿ ಪೆರ್ಚಿಯೋ, ದೈವ ಕರುಣಿಸಿಯೋ ॥ಕರುಮಋಣ ಸಂಧಿಸಿಯೊ ಕೈಗೂಡಬಹುದು ಗುರಿ ।ಪರವೆಯಿಡದುಜ್ಜುಗಿಸು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೪ ॥ guriyanu aidadoDe omme maraLi nInu ujjugisu ।karayukti perchiyO, daiva karuNisiyO ॥karuma RuNa sandhisiyo kaigUDabahudu guri ।parave iDade ujjugisu  - Mankutimma ॥ 824 ॥If you do not reach the goal at first, try again. By your skill, or by luck;s help, or due to previous good karma – your efforts may fructify. You don;t give up and keep on trying.  - Mankutimma
translation: If you do not reach the goal at first, try again. By your skill, or by luck;s help, or due to previous good karma – your efforts may fructify. You don;t give up and keep on trying.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರವೆಯಿಡದುಜ್ಜುಗಿಸು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: guriyanu aidadoDe omme maraLi nInu ujjugisu ।karayukti perchiyO, daiva karuNisiyO ॥karuma RuNa sandhisiyo kaigUDabahudu guri ।parave iDade ujjugisu  - Mankutimma ॥ 824 ॥
kagga: ಗುರಿಯನೈದದೊಡೊಮ್ಮೆ ಮರಳಿ ನೀನುಜ್ಜುಗಿಸು ।ಕರಯುಕ್ತಿ ಪೆರ್ಚಿಯೋ, ದೈವ ಕರುಣಿಸಿಯೋ ॥ಕರುಮಋಣ ಸಂಧಿಸಿಯೊ ಕೈಗೂಡಬಹುದು ಗುರಿ ।ಪರವೆಯಿಡದುಜ್ಜುಗಿಸು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೪ ॥

content: ಕಲೆಗಳಲಿ ಪರಮಕಲೆ ಜೀವನದ ಲಲಿತಕಲೆ ।ಕಲಿಸಲದನಳವಲ್ಲ ಬಾಹ್ಯಬೋಧನೆಯಿಂ ॥ಒಲಿದೊಲಿಸಿಕೊಳುವ ಲೌಕಿಕನಯದ ಸೊಗಸ ನೀಂ ।ತಿಳಿವುದೊಳಹದದಿಂದ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೫ ॥ kalegaLali paramakale jIvanada lalitakale ।kalisal adan aLavalla bAhya bOdhaneyim ॥olidu olisikoLuva laukika nayada sogasa nIm ।tiLivudu Olahadadinda  - Mankutimma ॥ 825 ॥The finest of the fine arts is the art of living. One can not teach it by external instructions. One must learn to give and take, to concede and convince. Life will be beautiful then. This wisdom will come from inner peace only.  - Mankutimma
translation: The finest of the fine arts is the art of living. One can not teach it by external instructions. One must learn to give and take, to concede and convince. Life will be beautiful then. This wisdom will come from inner peace only.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಿಳಿವುದೊಳಹದದಿಂದ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kalegaLali paramakale jIvanada lalitakale ।kalisal adan aLavalla bAhya bOdhaneyim ॥olidu olisikoLuva laukika nayada sogasa nIm ।tiLivudu Olahadadinda  - Mankutimma ॥ 825 ॥
kagga: ಕಲೆಗಳಲಿ ಪರಮಕಲೆ ಜೀವನದ ಲಲಿತಕಲೆ ।ಕಲಿಸಲದನಳವಲ್ಲ ಬಾಹ್ಯಬೋಧನೆಯಿಂ ॥ಒಲಿದೊಲಿಸಿಕೊಳುವ ಲೌಕಿಕನಯದ ಸೊಗಸ ನೀಂ ।ತಿಳಿವುದೊಳಹದದಿಂದ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೫ ॥

content: ಸಂಗೀತಕಲೆಯೊಂದು, ಸಾಹಿತ್ಯಕಲೆಯೊಂದು ।ಅಂಗಾಂಗ ಭಾವ ರೂಪಣದ ಕಲೆಯೊಂದು ॥ಸಂಗಳಿಸಲೀ ಕಲೆಗಳನುನಯವು ಚರ್ಯೆಯಲಿ ।ಮಂಗಳೋನ್ನತ ಕಲೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೬ ॥ sangeeta kaleyondu, sAhitya kaleyondu ।angAnga bhAva rUpaNada kaleyondu ॥sangaLisalu ee kalegaLu anunayavu charyeyali ।mangaLonnata kaleyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 826 ॥Music one of the fine arts. Literature is another. There is another which shows off the beauty of expressions and the body – dance and drama. When all these come together in everyday life, then life itself will be an auspicious art.  - Mankutimma
translation: Music one of the fine arts. Literature is another. There is another which shows off the beauty of expressions and the body – dance and drama. When all these come together in everyday life, then life itself will be an auspicious art.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಂಗಳೋನ್ನತ ಕಲೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sangeeta kaleyondu, sAhitya kaleyondu ।angAnga bhAva rUpaNada kaleyondu ॥sangaLisalu ee kalegaLu anunayavu charyeyali ।mangaLonnata kaleyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 826 ॥
kagga: ಸಂಗೀತಕಲೆಯೊಂದು, ಸಾಹಿತ್ಯಕಲೆಯೊಂದು ।ಅಂಗಾಂಗ ಭಾವ ರೂಪಣದ ಕಲೆಯೊಂದು ॥ಸಂಗಳಿಸಲೀ ಕಲೆಗಳನುನಯವು ಚರ್ಯೆಯಲಿ ।ಮಂಗಳೋನ್ನತ ಕಲೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೬ ॥

content: ಲೋಕದಲಿ ಭಯವಿರಲಿ, ನಯವಿರಲಿ, ದಯೆಯಿರಲಿ ।ನೂಕುನುಗ್ಗುಗಳತ್ತ, ಸೋಂಕುರೋಗಗಳು ॥ಸಾಕಿಸಲಹುವರುಮ್ ಅತ್ತಲೆ ನಿನಗೆ; ನಿನ್ನೆಲ್ಲ ।ಲೋಕ ಮೂಲವು ನೋಡೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೭ ॥ lOkadali bhayavirali, nayavirali, dayeyirali ।nUku nuggu gaLu atta, sOnku rOgagaLu ॥sAkisalahuvarum attale ninage; ninna ella ।lOka mUlavu nODo  - Mankutimma ॥ 827 ॥One must be very careful of his actions in this world. He must tread with fear, humility and compassion. It is in this world that he faces lot of competition (crowd), diseases, relatives who grow him up. This world is practically the root of all his existence. Hence he needs to be very careful of what his actions will entail.  - Mankutimma
translation: One must be very careful of his actions in this world. He must tread with fear, humility and compassion. It is in this world that he faces lot of competition (crowd), diseases, relatives who grow him up. This world is practically the root of all his existence. Hence he needs to be very careful of what his actions will entail.  - Mankutimma
title: ಲೋಕ ಮೂಲವು ನೋಡೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: lOkadali bhayavirali, nayavirali, dayeyirali ।nUku nuggu gaLu atta, sOnku rOgagaLu ॥sAkisalahuvarum attale ninage; ninna ella ।lOka mUlavu nODo  - Mankutimma ॥ 827 ॥
kagga: ಲೋಕದಲಿ ಭಯವಿರಲಿ, ನಯವಿರಲಿ, ದಯೆಯಿರಲಿ ।ನೂಕುನುಗ್ಗುಗಳತ್ತ, ಸೋಂಕುರೋಗಗಳು ॥ಸಾಕಿಸಲಹುವರುಮ್ ಅತ್ತಲೆ ನಿನಗೆ; ನಿನ್ನೆಲ್ಲ ।ಲೋಕ ಮೂಲವು ನೋಡೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೭ ॥

content: ಕಳವಳವ ನೀಗಿಬಿಡು, ತಳಮಳವ ದೂರವಿಡು ।ಕಳೆ, ತಳ್ಳು ಗಲಭೆ ಗಾಬರಿಯ ಮನದಿಂದ ॥ಅಲೆದಾಡುತಿರೆ ದೀಪ ಕಣ್ಗೆ ಗುರಿ ತಪ್ಪುವುದು ।ತಿಳಿತಿಳಿವು ಶಾಂತಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೮ ॥ kaLavaLa nIgibiDu, taLamaLava dUraviDu ।kaLe, taLLu galabhe gAbariya manadinda ॥aledADutire dIpa kaNge guri tappuvudu ।tiLitiLivu shAntiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 828 ॥Stop being anxious. Give up restlessness. Let your mind be free from rush, violence and fear. These are all distractions. If the light is wavering, the eye loses sight of the goal. Let that not happen to you. Clear wisdom will only be seen when you have peace with in you.  - Mankutimma
translation: Stop being anxious. Give up restlessness. Let your mind be free from rush, violence and fear. These are all distractions. If the light is wavering, the eye loses sight of the goal. Let that not happen to you. Clear wisdom will only be seen when you have peace with in you.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಿಳಿತಿಳಿವು ಶಾಂತಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kaLavaLa nIgibiDu, taLamaLava dUraviDu ।kaLe, taLLu galabhe gAbariya manadinda ॥aledADutire dIpa kaNge guri tappuvudu ।tiLitiLivu shAntiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 828 ॥
kagga: ಕಳವಳವ ನೀಗಿಬಿಡು, ತಳಮಳವ ದೂರವಿಡು ।ಕಳೆ, ತಳ್ಳು ಗಲಭೆ ಗಾಬರಿಯ ಮನದಿಂದ ॥ಅಲೆದಾಡುತಿರೆ ದೀಪ ಕಣ್ಗೆ ಗುರಿ ತಪ್ಪುವುದು ।ತಿಳಿತಿಳಿವು ಶಾಂತಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೮ ॥

content: ಕೊಳದ ಜಲ ನಿನ್ನ ಮನ; ಲೋಗರದರೊಳಗಿಳಿಯೆ ।ತಳದ ಕಸ ತೇಲುತ್ತ ಬಗ್ಗಡವದಹುದು ॥ಕಲಕದದ್ದೆದೆ ಕೊಂಚ ಬಿಟ್ಟಿದ್ದೊಡದು ಮರಳಿ ।ತಿಳಿಯಹುದು ಶಾಂತಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೯ ॥ koLada jala ninna mana; lOgaru adaroLage iLiye ।taLada kasa tElutta baggaDavadahudu ॥kalakade addade koncha biTTiddoDe adu maraLi ।tiLiyahudu shAntiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 829 ॥Your mind is like the water of the pond. When undisturbed, it will be clear. But people of this world will get into the pond and as a result the dirt from the bottom will float and make it dirty. But if you let it settle without any more disturbance, it will again get cleared. That is the power of finding peace inside.  - Mankutimma
translation: Your mind is like the water of the pond. When undisturbed, it will be clear. But people of this world will get into the pond and as a result the dirt from the bottom will float and make it dirty. But if you let it settle without any more disturbance, it will again get cleared. That is the power of finding peace inside.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಿಳಿಯಹುದು ಶಾಂತಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: koLada jala ninna mana; lOgaru adaroLage iLiye ।taLada kasa tElutta baggaDavadahudu ॥kalakade addade koncha biTTiddoDe adu maraLi ।tiLiyahudu shAntiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 829 ॥
kagga: ಕೊಳದ ಜಲ ನಿನ್ನ ಮನ; ಲೋಗರದರೊಳಗಿಳಿಯೆ ।ತಳದ ಕಸ ತೇಲುತ್ತ ಬಗ್ಗಡವದಹುದು ॥ಕಲಕದದ್ದೆದೆ ಕೊಂಚ ಬಿಟ್ಟಿದ್ದೊಡದು ಮರಳಿ ।ತಿಳಿಯಹುದು ಶಾಂತಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೨೯ ॥

content: ಕೊಳಕೆಂದು, ಹುಳುಕೆಂದು, ಹೇಸಿಗೆಯ ಹುಳುವೆಂದು ।ಇಳೆಯೊಳಾವುದರೊಳಮಸಹ್ಯಪಡಬೇಡ ॥ಬೆಲೆಯುಂಟು ಕೊಳೆಗಮೀ ಜೀವಸಾಮಾಗ್ರಿಯಲಿ ।ಕೊಳೆ ಶುಚಿಖ್ಯಾಪಕವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೦ ॥ koLakendu, huLukendu, hEsigeya huLuvendu ।iLeyoLu aavudaroLam asahya paDabEDa ॥beleyunTu koLegam ee jIvasAmAgriyali ।koLe shuchi khyApakavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 830 ॥Don;t cringe and berate anything in this world as filth, rotten, dirty or infested. There is value to filth also in this symbiotic nature of life. It is the filth that sets apart the clean as clean.  - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t cringe and berate anything in this world as filth, rotten, dirty or infested. There is value to filth also in this symbiotic nature of life. It is the filth that sets apart the clean as clean.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕೊಳೆ ಶುಚಿಖ್ಯಾಪಕವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: koLakendu, huLukendu, hEsigeya huLuvendu ।iLeyoLu aavudaroLam asahya paDabEDa ॥beleyunTu koLegam ee jIvasAmAgriyali ।koLe shuchi khyApakavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 830 ॥
kagga: ಕೊಳಕೆಂದು, ಹುಳುಕೆಂದು, ಹೇಸಿಗೆಯ ಹುಳುವೆಂದು ।ಇಳೆಯೊಳಾವುದರೊಳಮಸಹ್ಯಪಡಬೇಡ ॥ಬೆಲೆಯುಂಟು ಕೊಳೆಗಮೀ ಜೀವಸಾಮಾಗ್ರಿಯಲಿ ।ಕೊಳೆ ಶುಚಿಖ್ಯಾಪಕವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೦ ॥

content: ತಳೆಯಲಾರನೆ ಬೊಮ್ಮ ಬೀಭತ್ಸರೂಪಗಳ? ।ನಲಿಯಲಾರನೆ ತಿಪ್ಪೆರೊಚ್ಚು ನಾತದಲಿ? ॥ಮಲವೇನೊ! ಹೊಲೆಯೇನೊ! ಜೀವಸಂಬಧವಲ ।ಮಲಿನದಲಿ ನೆನೆ ಶುಚಿಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೧ ॥ taLeyalArane bomma bhIbhatsarUpagaLa? ।naliyalArane tippe rochchu nAtadali? ॥malavEno! holeyEno! jiva sambandhavala ।malinadali nene shuchiya  - Mankutimma ॥ 831 ॥Can God not take form that can scare you? Can God not enjoy himself in all the dirty stinking filth? What is filth? What is dirt? All of it has its place in this web of life. In dirt, one must remember the cleanliness and be happy.  - Mankutimma
translation: Can God not take form that can scare you? Can God not enjoy himself in all the dirty stinking filth? What is filth? What is dirt? All of it has its place in this web of life. In dirt, one must remember the cleanliness and be happy.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಲಿನದಲಿ ನೆನೆ ಶುಚಿಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: taLeyalArane bomma bhIbhatsarUpagaLa? ।naliyalArane tippe rochchu nAtadali? ॥malavEno! holeyEno! jiva sambandhavala ।malinadali nene shuchiya  - Mankutimma ॥ 831 ॥
kagga: ತಳೆಯಲಾರನೆ ಬೊಮ್ಮ ಬೀಭತ್ಸರೂಪಗಳ? ।ನಲಿಯಲಾರನೆ ತಿಪ್ಪೆರೊಚ್ಚು ನಾತದಲಿ? ॥ಮಲವೇನೊ! ಹೊಲೆಯೇನೊ! ಜೀವಸಂಬಧವಲ ।ಮಲಿನದಲಿ ನೆನೆ ಶುಚಿಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೧ ॥

content: ಗುಡಿಯ ಪೂಜೆಯೊ, ಕಥೆಯೊ, ಸೊಗಸುನೋಟವೊ, ಹಾಡೊ ।ಬಡವರಿಂಗುಪಕೃತಿಯೊ, ಆವುದೋ ಮನದ ॥ಬಡಿದಾಟವನು ನಿಲಿಸಿ ನೆಮ್ಮದಿಯನೀವೊಡದೆ ।ಬಿಡುಗಡೆಯೊ ಜೀವಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೨ ॥ guDiya poojeyo, katheyo, sogasu nOTavo, hADo ।baDavaringe upakRutiyo, aavidO manada ॥baDidATavanu nilisi nemmadiyanu eevudoDe ade ।biDugaDeyo jIvakke  - Mankutimma ॥ 832 ॥Anything that makes us happy and brings peace to us is liberating. Be it worshiping at a temple, listening to a story (about God), seeing something beautiful, a song, helping the poor – anything would do as long as it can rest the anxiety in the mind and attain peace.  - Mankutimma
translation: Anything that makes us happy and brings peace to us is liberating. Be it worshiping at a temple, listening to a story (about God), seeing something beautiful, a song, helping the poor – anything would do as long as it can rest the anxiety in the mind and attain peace.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಿಡುಗಡೆಯೊ ಜೀವಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: guDiya poojeyo, katheyo, sogasu nOTavo, hADo ।baDavaringe upakRutiyo, aavidO manada ॥baDidATavanu nilisi nemmadiyanu eevudoDe ade ।biDugaDeyo jIvakke  - Mankutimma ॥ 832 ॥
kagga: ಗುಡಿಯ ಪೂಜೆಯೊ, ಕಥೆಯೊ, ಸೊಗಸುನೋಟವೊ, ಹಾಡೊ ।ಬಡವರಿಂಗುಪಕೃತಿಯೊ, ಆವುದೋ ಮನದ ॥ಬಡಿದಾಟವನು ನಿಲಿಸಿ ನೆಮ್ಮದಿಯನೀವೊಡದೆ ।ಬಿಡುಗಡೆಯೊ ಜೀವಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೨ ॥

content: ನಗುನಗುವ ಕಣ್ಗಳಿಗೆ ಹೊಗೆಯನೂದಲುಬೇಡ ।ಜಗವ ಸುಡುಗಾಡೆನುವ ಕಟುತಪಸು ಬೇಡ ॥ಮಗುವು ತಾಯ್ತಂದೆಕಣ್ಮುಂದೆ ನಡೆವಂತೆ ನಡೆ ।ಮಿಗೆಚಿಂತೆ ತಲೆಹರಟೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೩ ॥ nagu naguva kaNgaLige hogeyanu oodalu bEDa।jagava suDugADenuva kaTutapasu bEDa ॥maguvu tAytande kaNmunde naDevante naDe ।mige chinte tale harate  - Mankutimma ॥ 833 ॥Don;t blow smoke into happy eyes. Don;t give up on this world equating this to be just a cemetery. Get on with your work with same enthusiasm as a kid walking and playing in front of its parents. Leave all other worries behind – they are all just banter.  - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t blow smoke into happy eyes. Don;t give up on this world equating this to be just a cemetery. Get on with your work with same enthusiasm as a kid walking and playing in front of its parents. Leave all other worries behind – they are all just banter.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಿಗೆಚಿಂತೆ ತಲೆಹರಟೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nagu naguva kaNgaLige hogeyanu oodalu bEDa।jagava suDugADenuva kaTutapasu bEDa ॥maguvu tAytande kaNmunde naDevante naDe ।mige chinte tale harate  - Mankutimma ॥ 833 ॥
kagga: ನಗುನಗುವ ಕಣ್ಗಳಿಗೆ ಹೊಗೆಯನೂದಲುಬೇಡ ।ಜಗವ ಸುಡುಗಾಡೆನುವ ಕಟುತಪಸು ಬೇಡ ॥ಮಗುವು ತಾಯ್ತಂದೆಕಣ್ಮುಂದೆ ನಡೆವಂತೆ ನಡೆ ।ಮಿಗೆಚಿಂತೆ ತಲೆಹರಟೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೩ ॥

content: ಹೀಗೋ ಹಾಗೋ ಹೇಗೋ ಜನುಮಕಥೆ ಮುಗಿಯುವುದು ।ಈಗಲೋ ಆಗಲೋ ಎಂ‌ದೋ ಮುಗಿಯುವುದು ॥ಸಾಗಿಮುಗಿವುದು; ಮುಗಿದು ಮರೆವುದದೆ ನರಸುಕೃತ ।ಭೂಗತಸ್ಥಿತಿ ಮುಕುತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೪ ॥ hIgO hAgO hEgO janumakathe mugiyuvudu ।eegalO aagalO endO mugiyuvudu ॥sAgimugivudu; mugidu marevudu ade nara sukRuta ।bhUgata sthiti mukuti- Mankutimma ॥ 834 ॥Like, this, that or some how, the story of this life will end. It may end now, then or at sometime. But it will definitely end. When it ends, we forget everything of this birth. That is a very good fortune. Being dead (under the earth) is liberation.  - Mankutimma
translation: Like, this, that or some how, the story of this life will end. It may end now, then or at sometime. But it will definitely end. When it ends, we forget everything of this birth. That is a very good fortune. Being dead (under the earth) is liberation.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭೂಗತಸ್ಥಿತಿ ಮುಕುತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: hIgO hAgO hEgO janumakathe mugiyuvudu ।eegalO aagalO endO mugiyuvudu ॥sAgimugivudu; mugidu marevudu ade nara sukRuta ।bhUgata sthiti mukuti- Mankutimma ॥ 834 ॥
kagga: ಹೀಗೋ ಹಾಗೋ ಹೇಗೋ ಜನುಮಕಥೆ ಮುಗಿಯುವುದು ।ಈಗಲೋ ಆಗಲೋ ಎಂ‌ದೋ ಮುಗಿಯುವುದು ॥ಸಾಗಿಮುಗಿವುದು; ಮುಗಿದು ಮರೆವುದದೆ ನರಸುಕೃತ ।ಭೂಗತಸ್ಥಿತಿ ಮುಕುತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೪ ॥

content: ಮೃತ್ಯುವಿಂ ಭಯವೇಕೆ? ದೇಶಾಂತರಕ್ಕೊಯ್ವ ।ಮಿತ್ರನಾತಂ; ಚಿತ್ರ ಹೊಸದಿರ್ಪುದಲ್ಲಿ ॥ಸಾತ್ತ್ವಿಕದಿ ಬಾಳ್ದವಂಗೆತ್ತಲೇಂ ಭಯವಿಹುದು? ।ಸತ್ರ ಹೊಸದಿಹುದು ನಡೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೫ ॥ mRutyuvim bhayavEke? dEshAntarakke oyyva ।mitranAtam; chitra hosadirpudu alli ॥sAttvikadi bALdavange ettalEm bhayavihudu? ।satra hosadihudu naDe  - Mankutimma ॥ 835 ॥Why should one fear Death? He is a friend who takes you to a different land. There is a different picture there. If you have lived your life without any sins, then what have you got to fear? It is just a different place to stay  - thats all.  - Mankutimma
translation: Why should one fear Death? He is a friend who takes you to a different land. There is a different picture there. If you have lived your life without any sins, then what have you got to fear? It is just a different place to stay  - thats all.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸತ್ರ ಹೊಸದಿಹುದು ನಡೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mRutyuvim bhayavEke? dEshAntarakke oyyva ।mitranAtam; chitra hosadirpudu alli ॥sAttvikadi bALdavange ettalEm bhayavihudu? ।satra hosadihudu naDe  - Mankutimma ॥ 835 ॥
kagga: ಮೃತ್ಯುವಿಂ ಭಯವೇಕೆ? ದೇಶಾಂತರಕ್ಕೊಯ್ವ ।ಮಿತ್ರನಾತಂ; ಚಿತ್ರ ಹೊಸದಿರ್ಪುದಲ್ಲಿ ॥ಸಾತ್ತ್ವಿಕದಿ ಬಾಳ್ದವಂಗೆತ್ತಲೇಂ ಭಯವಿಹುದು? ।ಸತ್ರ ಹೊಸದಿಹುದು ನಡೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೫ ॥

content: ಬಹುರಹಸ್ಯವೊ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ, ಬ್ರಹ್ಮರಹಸ್ಯವೊ ಜೀವ ।ಅಹುದದಲ್ಲವಿದೆಂಬ ವಾದ ಬರಿ ಹರಟೆ ॥ಗುಹೆಯೊಳಿಹುದೆಲ್ಲ ತತ್ತ್ವಗಳ ತತ್ತ್ವದ ಮೂಲ ।ಬಹಿರಂತರ ರಹಸ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೬ ॥ bahu rahasyavo sRuShTi brahma rahasyavo jIva ।ahudu adu allvu idu emba vAda bari haraTe ॥guheyoLu ihudu ella tattvagaLa tattvada mUla ।bahir antara rahasya  - Mankutimma ॥ 836 ॥Creation is a big mystery. Greatest mystery is about life. This is true, that is false  - all such logic are just banter. In this cave, there lies the root of all mystery. The mystery itself surrounds everything  - inside and out.  - Mankutimma
translation: Creation is a big mystery. Greatest mystery is about life. This is true, that is false  - all such logic are just banter. In this cave, there lies the root of all mystery. The mystery itself surrounds everything  - inside and out.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಹಿರಂತರ ರಹಸ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bahu rahasyavo sRuShTi brahma rahasyavo jIva ।ahudu adu allvu idu emba vAda bari haraTe ॥guheyoLu ihudu ella tattvagaLa tattvada mUla ।bahir antara rahasya  - Mankutimma ॥ 836 ॥
kagga: ಬಹುರಹಸ್ಯವೊ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ, ಬ್ರಹ್ಮರಹಸ್ಯವೊ ಜೀವ ।ಅಹುದದಲ್ಲವಿದೆಂಬ ವಾದ ಬರಿ ಹರಟೆ ॥ಗುಹೆಯೊಳಿಹುದೆಲ್ಲ ತತ್ತ್ವಗಳ ತತ್ತ್ವದ ಮೂಲ ।ಬಹಿರಂತರ ರಹಸ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೬ ॥

content: ಎತ್ತೆತ್ತ ನೋಡಲುಂ ಗುಪ್ತ ಭೂತಗಳಯ್ಯ ।ಕತ್ತಲೆಯೊಳಾಡುತಿಹ ದೆವ್ವಗಳ ಸುಳಿವು ॥ಮುತ್ತಿ ಮುಸುಕಿಹುದು ಜೀವನದ ರಹಸ್ಯವೊಂದು ।ಬೆತ್ತಲೆಯದಹುದೆಂತು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೭ ॥ ettetta nODalum gupta bhUtagaLayya ।kattaleyoLu ADutiha devvagaLa suLivu ॥mutti musukihudu jIvanada rahasyavondu ।bettaleyadu ahudentu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 837 ॥Wherever I see, there are hidden demons. Traces of ghosts wandering in the dark. A thick darkness envelopes the secret of life. How am I to see the naked truth?  - Mankutimma
translation: Wherever I see, there are hidden demons. Traces of ghosts wandering in the dark. A thick darkness envelopes the secret of life. How am I to see the naked truth?  - Mankutimma
title: ಬೆತ್ತಲೆಯದಹುದೆಂತು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ettetta nODalum gupta bhUtagaLayya ।kattaleyoLu ADutiha devvagaLa suLivu ॥mutti musukihudu jIvanada rahasyavondu ।bettaleyadu ahudentu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 837 ॥
kagga: ಎತ್ತೆತ್ತ ನೋಡಲುಂ ಗುಪ್ತ ಭೂತಗಳಯ್ಯ ।ಕತ್ತಲೆಯೊಳಾಡುತಿಹ ದೆವ್ವಗಳ ಸುಳಿವು ॥ಮುತ್ತಿ ಮುಸುಕಿಹುದು ಜೀವನದ ರಹಸ್ಯವೊಂದು ।ಬೆತ್ತಲೆಯದಹುದೆಂತು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೭ ॥

content: ಮುಸುಕಿಹುದು ಹುಟ್ಟಳಿವುಗಳ ಕಾರಣವ ಮಬ್ಬು ।ಮಸಕಿನಲಿ ಹುದುಗಿಹುವು ಮೋಹಮೂಲಗಳು ॥ನಿಶಿ ಮುಚ್ಚಿಹುದು ದಿನಪಚಂದಿರರ ಹುಟ್ಟೆಡೆಯ ।ಮಿಸುಕುವ ರಹಸ್ಯ ನೀಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೮ ॥ musukihudu huTTu aLivugaLa kAraNava mabbu ।masakinali hudugiguhuvu mOhamUlagaLu ॥nishi mucchihudu dinapa chandirara huTTeDeya ।misukuva rahasya nIM  - Mankutimma ॥ 838 ॥The truth about birth and death is concealed behind a veil. In this deciet is hidden all the truth about attachment. Just like darkness covers the birth of the Sun and the Moon. It is your task to decipher the mystery and see the truth for yourself.  - Mankutimma
translation: The truth about birth and death is concealed behind a veil. In this deciet is hidden all the truth about attachment. Just like darkness covers the birth of the Sun and the Moon. It is your task to decipher the mystery and see the truth for yourself.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಿಸುಕುವ ರಹಸ್ಯ ನೀಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: musukihudu huTTu aLivugaLa kAraNava mabbu ।masakinali hudugiguhuvu mOhamUlagaLu ॥nishi mucchihudu dinapa chandirara huTTeDeya ।misukuva rahasya nIM  - Mankutimma ॥ 838 ॥
kagga: ಮುಸುಕಿಹುದು ಹುಟ್ಟಳಿವುಗಳ ಕಾರಣವ ಮಬ್ಬು ।ಮಸಕಿನಲಿ ಹುದುಗಿಹುವು ಮೋಹಮೂಲಗಳು ॥ನಿಶಿ ಮುಚ್ಚಿಹುದು ದಿನಪಚಂದಿರರ ಹುಟ್ಟೆಡೆಯ ।ಮಿಸುಕುವ ರಹಸ್ಯ ನೀಂ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೮ ॥

content: ಆವ ಗಾಳಿಯದಾವ ಧೂಳ್ಕಣವ ಪೊತ್ತಿಹುದೊ! ।ಆವ ಧೂಳಿನೊಳಾವ ಚೈತನ್ಯಕಣವೋ! ॥ಜೀವವಿಂತಜ್ಞಾತ ಸೂತ್ರದಾಟದ ಬೊಂಬೆ ।ಭಾವಿಸಾ ಸೂತ್ರಗಳ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೯ ॥ aava gALiyu adAva dhUL kaNava pottihudo! ।aava dhULinoLu aava chaitanya kaNavO! ॥jIva intu ajNAta sUtrada aaTa bombe ।bhAvisu aa sUtragaLa  - Mankutimma ॥ 839 ॥One can not know what grain of sand is carried by what wind or what spec of dust is carrying what energy particle. Life is thus a puppet controlled by strings that you cannot see. Try to think and contemplate on those strings.  - Mankutimma
translation: One can not know what grain of sand is carried by what wind or what spec of dust is carrying what energy particle. Life is thus a puppet controlled by strings that you cannot see. Try to think and contemplate on those strings.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭಾವಿಸಾ ಸೂತ್ರಗಳ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aava gALiyu adAva dhUL kaNava pottihudo! ।aava dhULinoLu aava chaitanya kaNavO! ॥jIva intu ajNAta sUtrada aaTa bombe ।bhAvisu aa sUtragaLa  - Mankutimma ॥ 839 ॥
kagga: ಆವ ಗಾಳಿಯದಾವ ಧೂಳ್ಕಣವ ಪೊತ್ತಿಹುದೊ! ।ಆವ ಧೂಳಿನೊಳಾವ ಚೈತನ್ಯಕಣವೋ! ॥ಜೀವವಿಂತಜ್ಞಾತ ಸೂತ್ರದಾಟದ ಬೊಂಬೆ ।ಭಾವಿಸಾ ಸೂತ್ರಗಳ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೩೯ ॥

content: ಭುಕ್ತಿ ನಿನಗೆಲ್ಲಿಯದು? ಭತ್ತ ತಾನೆಲ್ಲಿಯದೊ! ।ಎತ್ತಲಿನ ಗೊಬ್ಬರವೊ! ಎತ್ತಲಿನ ನೀರೋ! ॥ಭಾಕ್ತವಾರಾರ ದುಡಿತದಿನೊ ನಿನಗಾಗಿಹುದು! ।ಗುಪ್ತಗಾಮಿನಿಯೊ ಋಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೦ ॥ bhukti ninagelliyadu? Bhatta taanelliyado! ।ettalina gobbaravo! ettalina nIrO! ॥bhAktavu aarAra duDitadino ninagAgihudu! ।guptagAminiyo RuNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 840 ॥Where has this food that you eat come from? The rice is from somewhere. The manure is from elsewhere. Water from somewhere else. The meal has been prepared owing to the efforts of many many people. The debt of food is untraceable.  - Mankutimma
translation: Where has this food that you eat come from? The rice is from somewhere. The manure is from elsewhere. Water from somewhere else. The meal has been prepared owing to the efforts of many many people. The debt of food is untraceable.  - Mankutimma
title: ಗುಪ್ತಗಾಮಿನಿಯೊ ಋಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bhukti ninagelliyadu? Bhatta taanelliyado! ।ettalina gobbaravo! ettalina nIrO! ॥bhAktavu aarAra duDitadino ninagAgihudu! ।guptagAminiyo RuNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 840 ॥
kagga: ಭುಕ್ತಿ ನಿನಗೆಲ್ಲಿಯದು? ಭತ್ತ ತಾನೆಲ್ಲಿಯದೊ! ।ಎತ್ತಲಿನ ಗೊಬ್ಬರವೊ! ಎತ್ತಲಿನ ನೀರೋ! ॥ಭಾಕ್ತವಾರಾರ ದುಡಿತದಿನೊ ನಿನಗಾಗಿಹುದು! ।ಗುಪ್ತಗಾಮಿನಿಯೊ ಋಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೦ ॥

content: ನಿನ್ನೆಂಜಲಗುಳಾವ ಕಾಲುವೆಯ ಸೇರುವುದೊ! ।ಮಣ್ಣಾವುದದರಿಂದೆ ಗರ್ಭವತಿಯಹುದೋ! ॥ಅನ್ನವದರಿಂದಾರ್ಗೊ! ಲೋಕಕವರಿಂದೇನೊ! ।ಬಣ್ಣಿಸುವರಾರದನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೧ ॥ ninna enjila uguLu aava kAluveya sEruvudo! ।maNNAvudu adarinde garbhavatiyahudO! ॥annavu adarinda aargo! lOkakavarindEno! ।baNNisuvaru aaradanu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 841 ॥When you spit out, you will not know which stream that goes into. It reaches some land which holds a seed that gets and germinates with life. That becomes food for someone later. Because that person could eat, the world will be effected differently. Who can describe the entire chain of causation?  - Mankutimma
translation: When you spit out, you will not know which stream that goes into. It reaches some land which holds a seed that gets and germinates with life. That becomes food for someone later. Because that person could eat, the world will be effected differently. Who can describe the entire chain of causation?  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಣ್ಣಿಸುವರಾರದನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ninna enjila uguLu aava kAluveya sEruvudo! ।maNNAvudu adarinde garbhavatiyahudO! ॥annavu adarinda aargo! lOkakavarindEno! ।baNNisuvaru aaradanu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 841 ॥
kagga: ನಿನ್ನೆಂಜಲಗುಳಾವ ಕಾಲುವೆಯ ಸೇರುವುದೊ! ।ಮಣ್ಣಾವುದದರಿಂದೆ ಗರ್ಭವತಿಯಹುದೋ! ॥ಅನ್ನವದರಿಂದಾರ್ಗೊ! ಲೋಕಕವರಿಂದೇನೊ! ।ಬಣ್ಣಿಸುವರಾರದನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೧ ॥

content: ಆವ ನೆಲದಲಿ ಮೇದೊ, ಆವ ನೀರನು ಕುಡಿದೊ ।ಆವು ಹಾಲ್ಗರೆವುದದನಾರು ಕುಡಿಯುವನೋ! ॥ಆವ ಬಲವದರಿನೊಗೆದೇಂಗೆಯ್ಸುವುದೊ ಜಗಕೆ! ।ಭಾವಿಸಾ ಋಣಗತಿಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೨ ॥ aava neladalu mEdo, aava nIranu kuDido ।aavu hAlgarevudu adanAru kuDiyuvanO! ॥aava balavadarin ogedu Em geysuvudo jagake! ।bhAvisA RuNagatiya  - Mankutimma ॥ 842 ॥A cow grazes in someone;s field, drinks water from some stream and someone milks it. Somebody will drink that milk. From the strength that he gets from drinking the milk, he will do actions that effects the world in some way. Try to think about the chain of causation and debt.  - Mankutimma
translation: A cow grazes in someone;s field, drinks water from some stream and someone milks it. Somebody will drink that milk. From the strength that he gets from drinking the milk, he will do actions that effects the world in some way. Try to think about the chain of causation and debt.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭಾವಿಸಾ ಋಣಗತಿಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aava neladalu mEdo, aava nIranu kuDido ।aavu hAlgarevudu adanAru kuDiyuvanO! ॥aava balavadarin ogedu Em geysuvudo jagake! ।bhAvisA RuNagatiya  - Mankutimma ॥ 842 ॥
kagga: ಆವ ನೆಲದಲಿ ಮೇದೊ, ಆವ ನೀರನು ಕುಡಿದೊ ।ಆವು ಹಾಲ್ಗರೆವುದದನಾರು ಕುಡಿಯುವನೋ! ॥ಆವ ಬಲವದರಿನೊಗೆದೇಂಗೆಯ್ಸುವುದೊ ಜಗಕೆ! ।ಭಾವಿಸಾ ಋಣಗತಿಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೨ ॥

content: ಸೇರಿರ್ಪುವುಸಿರುಸಿರುಗಳೊಳೆಷ್ಟೊ ಜೀವಾಣು ।ಹಾರುತಿಹುವೆಷ್ಟೊ ಚೇತನ ಧೂಳುಕಣದೊಳ್ ॥ಪ್ರಾರಬ್ಧಗತಿಯ ನಿಶ್ಚಯದಿ ತಿಳಿದವರಿಲ್ಲ ।ಆ ರಹಸ್ಯಕ್ಕೆರಗೊ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೩ ॥ sErirpudu usiru usirugaLa oLeShTo jIvANu ।hArutihuveShTo chEtana dhUL kaNadoL ॥prArAbdha gatiya nishchayadi tiLidavarilla ।aa rahasyakke erago!  - Mankutimma ॥ 843 ॥In each breath there is there are so many living cells. On each speck of dust, there is so many energy particles. Each one is just following the consequences of their previous actions. No one can be certain of their next move. Surrender to the mystery that is behind this machinery of causation.  - Mankutimma
translation: In each breath there is there are so many living cells. On each speck of dust, there is so many energy particles. Each one is just following the consequences of their previous actions. No one can be certain of their next move. Surrender to the mystery that is behind this machinery of causation.  - Mankutimma
title: ಆ ರಹಸ್ಯಕ್ಕೆರಗೊ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sErirpudu usiru usirugaLa oLeShTo jIvANu ।hArutihuveShTo chEtana dhUL kaNadoL ॥prArAbdha gatiya nishchayadi tiLidavarilla ।aa rahasyakke erago!  - Mankutimma ॥ 843 ॥
kagga: ಸೇರಿರ್ಪುವುಸಿರುಸಿರುಗಳೊಳೆಷ್ಟೊ ಜೀವಾಣು ।ಹಾರುತಿಹುವೆಷ್ಟೊ ಚೇತನ ಧೂಳುಕಣದೊಳ್ ॥ಪ್ರಾರಬ್ಧಗತಿಯ ನಿಶ್ಚಯದಿ ತಿಳಿದವರಿಲ್ಲ ।ಆ ರಹಸ್ಯಕ್ಕೆರಗೊ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೩ ॥

content: ಬೀಳಿಸದಿರೆಲೊ ನಿನ್ನ ನೆರಳನಿತರರ ಮೇಲೆ ।ಬಾಳಿಕೊಳುಗವರು ತಂತಮ್ಮ ಬೆಳಕಿನಲಿ ॥ಮೇಲುಬೀಳುಗಳಾರ್ಗದೆಂತೊ ನೀನೇನರಿವೆ? ।ತಾಳದಿರು ಗುರುತನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೪ ॥ bILisadirelo ninna neraLanu itarara mEle ।bALikoLugavaru tamtamma bELakinali ॥mElu bILugaLu aarge adento nInu Enu arive? ।tALadiru gurutanava  - Mankutimma ॥ 844 ॥Make sure that your shadow is not falling on other people. Let them live as they please in their own light. What do you know about the ups and downs of their life. Don;t force yourself as their mentor (without them asking for it).  - Mankutimma
translation: Make sure that your shadow is not falling on other people. Let them live as they please in their own light. What do you know about the ups and downs of their life. Don;t force yourself as their mentor (without them asking for it).  - Mankutimma
title: ತಾಳದಿರು ಗುರುತನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bILisadirelo ninna neraLanu itarara mEle ।bALikoLugavaru tamtamma bELakinali ॥mElu bILugaLu aarge adento nInu Enu arive? ।tALadiru gurutanava  - Mankutimma ॥ 844 ॥
kagga: ಬೀಳಿಸದಿರೆಲೊ ನಿನ್ನ ನೆರಳನಿತರರ ಮೇಲೆ ।ಬಾಳಿಕೊಳುಗವರು ತಂತಮ್ಮ ಬೆಳಕಿನಲಿ ॥ಮೇಲುಬೀಳುಗಳಾರ್ಗದೆಂತೊ ನೀನೇನರಿವೆ? ।ತಾಳದಿರು ಗುರುತನವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೪ ॥

content: ಪೆರತೊಂದು ಬಾಳ ನೀನಾಳ್ವ ಸಾಹಸವೇಕೆ? ।ಹೊರೆ ಸಾಲದೇ ನಿನಗೆ, ಪೆರರ್ಗೆ ಹೊಣೆವೋಗೆ? ॥ಮರದಿ ನನೆ ನೈಜದಿಂದರಳೆ ಸೊಗವೆಲ್ಲರ್ಗೆ ।ಸೆರೆಮನೆಯ ಸೇಮವೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೫ ॥ peratondu bALa nInu aaLva sAhasavEke? ।hore sAlade ninage, perarge hoNevOge? ॥maradi nane naijadinda araLe sogavu ellarge ।seremaneya sEmavEm?  - Mankutimma ॥ 845 ॥Why do you want the adventure of controlling some other life (apart from yours)? Isn;t your load enough? Why do you want to carry other people;s burden also? If a bud blooms by itself in a plant, it gives pleasure to everybody. If you force it to your liking, then it may not. Not everything in this world can run according to rules like in a prison.  - Mankutimma
translation: Why do you want the adventure of controlling some other life (apart from yours)? Isn;t your load enough? Why do you want to carry other people;s burden also? If a bud blooms by itself in a plant, it gives pleasure to everybody. If you force it to your liking, then it may not. Not everything in this world can run according to rules like in a prison.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸೆರೆಮನೆಯ ಸೇಮವೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: peratondu bALa nInu aaLva sAhasavEke? ।hore sAlade ninage, perarge hoNevOge? ॥maradi nane naijadinda araLe sogavu ellarge ।seremaneya sEmavEm?  - Mankutimma ॥ 845 ॥
kagga: ಪೆರತೊಂದು ಬಾಳ ನೀನಾಳ್ವ ಸಾಹಸವೇಕೆ? ।ಹೊರೆ ಸಾಲದೇ ನಿನಗೆ, ಪೆರರ್ಗೆ ಹೊಣೆವೋಗೆ? ॥ಮರದಿ ನನೆ ನೈಜದಿಂದರಳೆ ಸೊಗವೆಲ್ಲರ್ಗೆ ।ಸೆರೆಮನೆಯ ಸೇಮವೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೫ ॥

content: ಮರಣದಿಂ ಮುಂದೇನು? ಪ್ರೇತವೋ? ಭೂತವೋ? ।ಪರಲೋಕವೋ? ಪುನರ್ಜನ್ಮವೊ? ಅದೇನೋ! ॥ತಿರುಗಿ ಬಂದವರಿಲ್ಲ, ವರದಿ ತಂದವರಿಲ್ಲ ।ಧರೆಯ ಬಾಳ್ಗದರಿನೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೬ ॥ maraNadim mundEnu? prEtavO? bhUtavO? ।paralOkavO? punarjanmavo? adEnO! ॥tirugi bandavarilla, varadi tandavarilla ।dhareya bALge adarinEm?  - Mankutimma ॥ 846 ॥What will happen after death? Does one become a bodyless soul? or a ghost? Will there be a different world? Or another birth in this world? Whatever! There is no one who has comeback or brought a message from those who have seen. How does all that effect our life in this world?  - Mankutimma
translation: What will happen after death? Does one become a bodyless soul? or a ghost? Will there be a different world? Or another birth in this world? Whatever! There is no one who has comeback or brought a message from those who have seen. How does all that effect our life in this world?  - Mankutimma
title: ಧರೆಯ ಬಾಳ್ಗದರಿನೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: maraNadim mundEnu? prEtavO? bhUtavO? ।paralOkavO? punarjanmavo? adEnO! ॥tirugi bandavarilla, varadi tandavarilla ।dhareya bALge adarinEm?  - Mankutimma ॥ 846 ॥
kagga: ಮರಣದಿಂ ಮುಂದೇನು? ಪ್ರೇತವೋ? ಭೂತವೋ? ।ಪರಲೋಕವೋ? ಪುನರ್ಜನ್ಮವೊ? ಅದೇನೋ! ॥ತಿರುಗಿ ಬಂದವರಿಲ್ಲ, ವರದಿ ತಂದವರಿಲ್ಲ ।ಧರೆಯ ಬಾಳ್ಗದರಿನೇಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೬ ॥

content: ನೆಲದ ಬೇಸಾಯ ತಾನೊಳ್ಳಿತಾಗಿರೆ ನಿನಗೆ ।ಫಲದೆಂತಹುದೆಂಬ ಶಂಕೆಗೆಡೆಯುಂಟೆ? ॥ಒಳಿತರೊಳೆ ನೀಂ ಬಾಳು; ಪರವದೆಂತಿರ್ದೊಡೇಂ? ।ಇಳೆಯೆ ಬಾಗಿಲು ಪರಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೭ ॥ nelada bEsAya tAn oLLitAgire ninage ।phala adentahudemba shankege eDeyunTe? ॥oLitaroLe nIm bALu; paravadu entirdoDe Em? ।iLeye bAgilu parake  - Mankutimma ॥ 847 ॥If the hard work put in agriculture is right, then is there any doubt about the produce? You must lead the life in this world thus (to the best standards of morality). What can the after life have for you then? The life here is the gates to the life later.  - Mankutimma
translation: If the hard work put in agriculture is right, then is there any doubt about the produce? You must lead the life in this world thus (to the best standards of morality). What can the after life have for you then? The life here is the gates to the life later.  - Mankutimma
title: ಇಳೆಯೆ ಬಾಗಿಲು ಪರಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nelada bEsAya tAn oLLitAgire ninage ।phala adentahudemba shankege eDeyunTe? ॥oLitaroLe nIm bALu; paravadu entirdoDe Em? ।iLeye bAgilu parake  - Mankutimma ॥ 847 ॥
kagga: ನೆಲದ ಬೇಸಾಯ ತಾನೊಳ್ಳಿತಾಗಿರೆ ನಿನಗೆ ।ಫಲದೆಂತಹುದೆಂಬ ಶಂಕೆಗೆಡೆಯುಂಟೆ? ॥ಒಳಿತರೊಳೆ ನೀಂ ಬಾಳು; ಪರವದೆಂತಿರ್ದೊಡೇಂ? ।ಇಳೆಯೆ ಬಾಗಿಲು ಪರಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೭ ॥

content: ಸ್ಥಿರ ಹಿಮಾಚಲ ಬೊಮ್ಮ, ಚರ ಜಾಹ್ನವಿಯೆ ಮಾಯೆ ।ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವ ಘನದ ವಿದ್ರವರೂಪ ವಿಶ್ವ ॥ಪರಮಾರ್ಥಕೊಂದಕ್ಷಿ ವೆವಹಾರಕಿನ್ನೊಂದು ।ಎರಡುಮೊಂದಾಂತರ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೮ ॥ sthira himAchala bomma, chara jAhnaviye mAye ।para sattva ghanada vidrava rUpa vishva ॥paramArthake ondu akShi vevahArake innondu ।eradum ondAntarya  - Mankutimma ॥ 848 ॥The immovable Himalaya is like the Creator. The flowing Ganges is like the illusion of this creation. The world is the molten form of the solid matter of the universal truth. One who knows how to see the truth as well as the world in two different views (and balance them) will find peace inside.  - Mankutimma
translation: The immovable Himalaya is like the Creator. The flowing Ganges is like the illusion of this creation. The world is the molten form of the solid matter of the universal truth. One who knows how to see the truth as well as the world in two different views (and balance them) will find peace inside.  - Mankutimma
title: ಎರಡುಮೊಂದಾಂತರ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sthira himAchala bomma, chara jAhnaviye mAye ।para sattva ghanada vidrava rUpa vishva ॥paramArthake ondu akShi vevahArake innondu ।eradum ondAntarya  - Mankutimma ॥ 848 ॥
kagga: ಸ್ಥಿರ ಹಿಮಾಚಲ ಬೊಮ್ಮ, ಚರ ಜಾಹ್ನವಿಯೆ ಮಾಯೆ ।ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವ ಘನದ ವಿದ್ರವರೂಪ ವಿಶ್ವ ॥ಪರಮಾರ್ಥಕೊಂದಕ್ಷಿ ವೆವಹಾರಕಿನ್ನೊಂದು ।ಎರಡುಮೊಂದಾಂತರ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೮ ॥

content: ಒಮ್ಮನಸಿನಿಂದ ನೀನೀ ತತ್ತ್ವವಂ ಗ್ರಹಿಸು ।ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಲೀಲೆಗೆ ಗೊತ್ತುಗುರಿ ಲೆಕ್ಕವಿಲ್ಲ ॥ಸುಮ್ಮನಿರು ನಿನ್ನ ಪಾಡನು ಪಡುತ ತುಟಿ ಬಿಗಿದು ।ನೆಮ್ಮದಿಗೆ ದಾರಿಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೯ ॥ ommanasininda nInI tattvavam grahisu ।brahma lIlege gottu guri lekkavilla ॥summaniru ninna pADanu paDuta tuTi bigidu ।nemmadige dAriyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 849 ॥Grasp this thought with single minded attention. There is no purpose, no explanation to the dance of the Creator. You get though your role in this act even if it means suffering. You must do so without much cribbing  - with stiff lips. It is the only way to find peace.  - Mankutimma
translation: Grasp this thought with single minded attention. There is no purpose, no explanation to the dance of the Creator. You get though your role in this act even if it means suffering. You must do so without much cribbing  - with stiff lips. It is the only way to find peace.  - Mankutimma
title: ನೆಮ್ಮದಿಗೆ ದಾರಿಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ommanasininda nInI tattvavam grahisu ।brahma lIlege gottu guri lekkavilla ॥summaniru ninna pADanu paDuta tuTi bigidu ।nemmadige dAriyadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 849 ॥
kagga: ಒಮ್ಮನಸಿನಿಂದ ನೀನೀ ತತ್ತ್ವವಂ ಗ್ರಹಿಸು ।ಬ್ರಹ್ಮಲೀಲೆಗೆ ಗೊತ್ತುಗುರಿ ಲೆಕ್ಕವಿಲ್ಲ ॥ಸುಮ್ಮನಿರು ನಿನ್ನ ಪಾಡನು ಪಡುತ ತುಟಿ ಬಿಗಿದು ।ನೆಮ್ಮದಿಗೆ ದಾರಿಯದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೪೯ ॥

content: ನೃತ್ಯವೋ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮನಟರಾಜನದು ಜಗವೆಲ್ಲ ।ಪ್ರತ್ಯೇಕ ಜೀವದಶೆಯವನಂಗಭಂಗಿ ॥ಸತ್ಯಸತ್ತ್ವಜ್ವಾಲೆ ವಿಶ್ವಮಾಯಾಲೀಲೆ ।ಪ್ರತ್ಯಗಾತ್ಮನು ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೦ ॥ nRutyavO brahma naTarAjanadu jagavella ।pratyEka jIvadasheyu avana anga bhangi ॥satya sattva jvAle vishvamAyAlIle ।pratyagAtmanu nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 850 ॥The world is nothing but the dance of the creator. Every being is part of the dance as one of his body parts. His original energy flames manifest as the action in this world. You are just a carrier of that energy.   - Mankutimma
translation: The world is nothing but the dance of the creator. Every being is part of the dance as one of his body parts. His original energy flames manifest as the action in this world. You are just a carrier of that energy.   - Mankutimma
title: ಪ್ರತ್ಯಗಾತ್ಮನು ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nRutyavO brahma naTarAjanadu jagavella ।pratyEka jIvadasheyu avana anga bhangi ॥satya sattva jvAle vishvamAyAlIle ।pratyagAtmanu nInu  - Mankutimma ॥ 850 ॥
kagga: ನೃತ್ಯವೋ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮನಟರಾಜನದು ಜಗವೆಲ್ಲ ।ಪ್ರತ್ಯೇಕ ಜೀವದಶೆಯವನಂಗಭಂಗಿ ॥ಸತ್ಯಸತ್ತ್ವಜ್ವಾಲೆ ವಿಶ್ವಮಾಯಾಲೀಲೆ ।ಪ್ರತ್ಯಗಾತ್ಮನು ನೀನು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೦ ॥

content: ಕಣ್ದೆರೆದು ನೋಡು, ಚಿತ್ಸತ್ತ್ವಮೂರ್ತಿಯ ನೃತ್ಯ ।ಕಣ್ಮುಚ್ಚಿ ನೋಡು, ನಿಶ್ಚಲ ಶುದ್ಧ ಸತ್ತ್ವ ॥ಉನ್ಮುಖನು ನೀನೆರಡು ಜಗಕವಿರುತಿರಲಾಗ ।ಹೃನ್ಮಧ್ಯದಲಿ ಶಾಂತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೧ ॥ kaNderedu nODu, chit sattva mUrtiya nRutya ।kaNmuchchi nODu, nishchala shuddha sattva ॥unmukhanu nIneraDu jagake avu irutiralu aaga ।hRun madhyadali shAnti  - Mankutimma ॥ 851 ॥Open your eyes and see the dance of the Creator in his creation. Close your eyes and you will see the immovable pure truth. If you can see both these worlds and balance them both, then you will find peace in the middle of your heart.  - Mankutimma
translation: Open your eyes and see the dance of the Creator in his creation. Close your eyes and you will see the immovable pure truth. If you can see both these worlds and balance them both, then you will find peace in the middle of your heart.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹೃನ್ಮಧ್ಯದಲಿ ಶಾಂತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kaNderedu nODu, chit sattva mUrtiya nRutya ।kaNmuchchi nODu, nishchala shuddha sattva ॥unmukhanu nIneraDu jagake avu irutiralu aaga ।hRun madhyadali shAnti  - Mankutimma ॥ 851 ॥
kagga: ಕಣ್ದೆರೆದು ನೋಡು, ಚಿತ್ಸತ್ತ್ವಮೂರ್ತಿಯ ನೃತ್ಯ ।ಕಣ್ಮುಚ್ಚಿ ನೋಡು, ನಿಶ್ಚಲ ಶುದ್ಧ ಸತ್ತ್ವ ॥ಉನ್ಮುಖನು ನೀನೆರಡು ಜಗಕವಿರುತಿರಲಾಗ ।ಹೃನ್ಮಧ್ಯದಲಿ ಶಾಂತಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೧ ॥

content: ನವನವ ಪ್ರಶ್ನೆಗಳು, ನವನವ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಗಳು ।ದಿವಸಾಬ್ದಯುಗ ಚಕ್ರ ತಿರುತಿರುಗಿದಂತೆ ॥ಪ್ರವಹಿಪ್ಪುವದರಂತೆ ಪೌರುಷ ಹಿತಪ್ರಜ್ಞೆ ।ಅವಿರತದ ಚೈತನ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೨ ॥ nava nava prashnegaLu, navanava parIkShegaLu ।divasAbda yuga chakra tiru tirugidante ॥pravahippuvu adarante pauruSha hita prajne ।aviratada chaitanya  - Mankutimma ॥ 852 ॥Every day, every year, every epoch, as time flows  - there will be new questions, new tests to mankind. In response to these times, mankind;s efforts and his evaluation of happiness has changed. Only thing that is constant is the unending energy flow.  - Mankutimma
translation: Every day, every year, every epoch, as time flows  - there will be new questions, new tests to mankind. In response to these times, mankind;s efforts and his evaluation of happiness has changed. Only thing that is constant is the unending energy flow.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅವಿರತದ ಚೈತನ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nava nava prashnegaLu, navanava parIkShegaLu ।divasAbda yuga chakra tiru tirugidante ॥pravahippuvu adarante pauruSha hita prajne ।aviratada chaitanya  - Mankutimma ॥ 852 ॥
kagga: ನವನವ ಪ್ರಶ್ನೆಗಳು, ನವನವ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಗಳು ।ದಿವಸಾಬ್ದಯುಗ ಚಕ್ರ ತಿರುತಿರುಗಿದಂತೆ ॥ಪ್ರವಹಿಪ್ಪುವದರಂತೆ ಪೌರುಷ ಹಿತಪ್ರಜ್ಞೆ ।ಅವಿರತದ ಚೈತನ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೨ ॥

content: ಸಾರ್ವಲೌಕಿಕಸೌಖ್ಯ ನೆಲಸುವನ್ನೆಗಮಿಳೆಯೊ- ।ಳೊರ್ವನುಂ ಸುಖಿಯಲ್ತು, ದಿಟದಿ. ಪೂರ್ಣದಲಿ ॥ಒರ್ವನುಬ್ಬಸದ ಬಿಸಿ ವಿಷವಾಯುವಾಗಿ ತಾ ।ನುರ್ವರೆಯ ಮುಸುಕೀತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೩ ॥ sArvalaukika saukhya nelasuvannegam iLeyoL ।orvanum sukhiyaltu, diTadi pUrNadali ॥orvana ubbasada bisi viShavAyuvAgi tAn ।urvareya musukItu  - Mankutimma ॥ 853 ॥For one to be completely happy in this world, every body (barring none) should be happy  - in totality. Even if one of them is unhappy, his sigh filled with grief will become poisonous and consume (envelope) the entire world.  - Mankutimma
translation: For one to be completely happy in this world, every body (barring none) should be happy  - in totality. Even if one of them is unhappy, his sigh filled with grief will become poisonous and consume (envelope) the entire world.  - Mankutimma
title: ನುರ್ವರೆಯ ಮುಸುಕೀತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sArvalaukika saukhya nelasuvannegam iLeyoL ।orvanum sukhiyaltu, diTadi pUrNadali ॥orvana ubbasada bisi viShavAyuvAgi tAn ।urvareya musukItu  - Mankutimma ॥ 853 ॥
kagga: ಸಾರ್ವಲೌಕಿಕಸೌಖ್ಯ ನೆಲಸುವನ್ನೆಗಮಿಳೆಯೊ- ।ಳೊರ್ವನುಂ ಸುಖಿಯಲ್ತು, ದಿಟದಿ. ಪೂರ್ಣದಲಿ ॥ಒರ್ವನುಬ್ಬಸದ ಬಿಸಿ ವಿಷವಾಯುವಾಗಿ ತಾ ।ನುರ್ವರೆಯ ಮುಸುಕೀತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೩ ॥

content: ಸರ್ವಹಿತವೊಂದುಂಟೆ? ಅದಕೆ ಪಥ ನಮಗುಂಟೆ? ।ನಿರ್ವಾಹಸಾಧನಗಳೆತ್ತ? ಗುರುವೆತ್ತ? ॥ಪೂರ್ವವನು ನೆಟ್ಟಗಿಪ ನರಕೃತಿಯಿನಾಗದೇನ್ ।ಅರ್ವಾಚಿಯಲಿ ಸೊಟ್ಟು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೪ ॥ sarvahitavondu unTe? adake patha namagunTe? ।nirvAha sAdhanagaLu etta? guruvetta? ॥pUrvavanu neTTagippa narakRutiyin aagadEn ।arvAchiyali soTTu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 854 ॥Is there a something like universal happiness? What is the path to get that? What are the ways to achieve it? Where can one find a teacher to show us the way? If we embark on a mission to set the past right  - will the same actions not become crooked in the future?  - Mankutimma
translation: Is there a something like universal happiness? What is the path to get that? What are the ways to achieve it? Where can one find a teacher to show us the way? If we embark on a mission to set the past right  - will the same actions not become crooked in the future?  - Mankutimma
title: ಅರ್ವಾಚಿಯಲಿ ಸೊಟ್ಟು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sarvahitavondu unTe? adake patha namagunTe? ।nirvAha sAdhanagaLu etta? guruvetta? ॥pUrvavanu neTTagippa narakRutiyin aagadEn ।arvAchiyali soTTu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 854 ॥
kagga: ಸರ್ವಹಿತವೊಂದುಂಟೆ? ಅದಕೆ ಪಥ ನಮಗುಂಟೆ? ।ನಿರ್ವಾಹಸಾಧನಗಳೆತ್ತ? ಗುರುವೆತ್ತ? ॥ಪೂರ್ವವನು ನೆಟ್ಟಗಿಪ ನರಕೃತಿಯಿನಾಗದೇನ್ ।ಅರ್ವಾಚಿಯಲಿ ಸೊಟ್ಟು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೪ ॥

content: ಸುಲಭವೇನಲ್ಲ ನರಲೋಕಹಿತನಿರ್ಧಾರ ।ಬಲಕೆ ನೋಳ್ಪರ್ ಕೆಲರು, ಕೆಲರೆಡಕೆ ನೋಳ್ಪರ್ ॥ವಿಲವಿಲನೆ ಚಪಲಿಸುವ ಮನುಜಸ್ವಭಾವದಲಿ ।ನೆಲೆಗೊತ್ತು ಹಿತಕೆಲ್ಲಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೫ ॥ sulabhavEnalla naralOka hita nirdhAra ।balake nOLpar kelaru, kelar eDake nOLpar ॥vilavilane chapalisuva manuja svabhAvadali ।nele gottu hitakelli?  - Mankutimma ॥ 855 ॥It is not easy in this human world to understand what is good and what is bad. Some look to the right, some look to the left. If you follow the fickle definition of human happiness  - how can one ever find happiness?  - Mankutimma
translation: It is not easy in this human world to understand what is good and what is bad. Some look to the right, some look to the left. If you follow the fickle definition of human happiness  - how can one ever find happiness?  - Mankutimma
title: ನೆಲೆಗೊತ್ತು ಹಿತಕೆಲ್ಲಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sulabhavEnalla naralOka hita nirdhAra ।balake nOLpar kelaru, kelar eDake nOLpar ॥vilavilane chapalisuva manuja svabhAvadali ।nele gottu hitakelli?  - Mankutimma ॥ 855 ॥
kagga: ಸುಲಭವೇನಲ್ಲ ನರಲೋಕಹಿತನಿರ್ಧಾರ ।ಬಲಕೆ ನೋಳ್ಪರ್ ಕೆಲರು, ಕೆಲರೆಡಕೆ ನೋಳ್ಪರ್ ॥ವಿಲವಿಲನೆ ಚಪಲಿಸುವ ಮನುಜಸ್ವಭಾವದಲಿ ।ನೆಲೆಗೊತ್ತು ಹಿತಕೆಲ್ಲಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೫ ॥

content: ರಾಮಕಾರ್ಮುಕ, ಕೃಷ್ಣಯುಕ್ತಿ, ಗೌತಮಕರುಣೆ ।ಭೂಮಿಭಾರವನಿಳುಹೆ ಸಾಲದಾಗಿರಲು ॥ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯರೆನಿತು ತಾಂ ಪೆಣಗಿದೊಡಮೇನಹುದು? ।ಕ್ಷೇಮವೆಂದುಂ ಮೃಗ್ಯ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೬ ॥ rAmakArmuka, kRuShNa yukti, gautama karuNe ।bhUmi bhAravanu iLuhe sAladAgiralu ॥sAmAnyaru enitu tAm peNagidoDam Enahudu? ।kShEmavendu mRugya  - Mankutimma ॥ 856 ॥The righteousness and the bow of Rama, the wisdom of Krishna and the compassion of Gautama  - all these could not eradicate evil/grief from this earth permanently. What can common people do even after a lot of struggling? We must find solace and happiness in just trying.  - Mankutimma
translation: The righteousness and the bow of Rama, the wisdom of Krishna and the compassion of Gautama  - all these could not eradicate evil/grief from this earth permanently. What can common people do even after a lot of struggling? We must find solace and happiness in just trying.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕ್ಷೇಮವೆಂದುಂ ಮೃಗ್ಯ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: rAmakArmuka, kRuShNa yukti, gautama karuNe ।bhUmi bhAravanu iLuhe sAladAgiralu ॥sAmAnyaru enitu tAm peNagidoDam Enahudu? ।kShEmavendu mRugya  - Mankutimma ॥ 856 ॥
kagga: ರಾಮಕಾರ್ಮುಕ, ಕೃಷ್ಣಯುಕ್ತಿ, ಗೌತಮಕರುಣೆ ।ಭೂಮಿಭಾರವನಿಳುಹೆ ಸಾಲದಾಗಿರಲು ॥ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯರೆನಿತು ತಾಂ ಪೆಣಗಿದೊಡಮೇನಹುದು? ।ಕ್ಷೇಮವೆಂದುಂ ಮೃಗ್ಯ   - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೬ ॥

content: ಸತತಮಾರ್ಗಣೆ, ಸಿದ್ಧಿಯಂತಿರಲಿ, ಮಾರ್ಗಣೆಯೆ ।ಗತಿ ಮನುಜಲೋಕಕ್ಕೆ ; ಜಗದ ಜೀವವದು ॥ಕೃತಕಾಮರೆಲ್ಲರಾದೊಡೆ ಕೃತ್ಯವುಳಿಯದೊಡೆ ।ಕಥೆಮುಗಿವುದಲ ಜಗಕೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೭ ॥ satata mArgane, siddhiyantirali, mArgaNeye ।gati manujalOkakke; jagada jIvavadu ॥kRutkAmaru ellarAdoDe kRutyavu uLiysdoDe ।kathe mugivudela jagake?  - Mankutimma ॥ 857 ॥Let the constant endeavor be an end by itself. Action is a savior of mankind. it is the life of this world. If everyone in this world magically became satisfied and there is nothing left to do  - wouldn;t it be the end of story for this world?  - Mankutimma
translation: Let the constant endeavor be an end by itself. Action is a savior of mankind. it is the life of this world. If everyone in this world magically became satisfied and there is nothing left to do  - wouldn;t it be the end of story for this world?  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಥೆಮುಗಿವುದಲ ಜಗಕೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: satata mArgane, siddhiyantirali, mArgaNeye ।gati manujalOkakke; jagada jIvavadu ॥kRutkAmaru ellarAdoDe kRutyavu uLiysdoDe ।kathe mugivudela jagake?  - Mankutimma ॥ 857 ॥
kagga: ಸತತಮಾರ್ಗಣೆ, ಸಿದ್ಧಿಯಂತಿರಲಿ, ಮಾರ್ಗಣೆಯೆ ।ಗತಿ ಮನುಜಲೋಕಕ್ಕೆ ; ಜಗದ ಜೀವವದು ॥ಕೃತಕಾಮರೆಲ್ಲರಾದೊಡೆ ಕೃತ್ಯವುಳಿಯದೊಡೆ ।ಕಥೆಮುಗಿವುದಲ ಜಗಕೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೭ ॥

content: ಪ್ರಿಯಹಿತಗಳನ್ವೇಷೆಯಿಂ ಕರ್ಮಪರಿಪೋಷೆ ।ಕ್ರಿಯೆಯ ಪಾರಂಪರ್ಯ ಜನ್ಮಾಂತರೀಯ ॥ನಿಯತವಿಂತು ಜಗತ್ಪ್ರವರ್ಧನೆಗೆ ನರತೃಷ್ಣೆ ।ಜಯ ಪೂರ್ಣವೆಂದದಕೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೮ ॥ priya hitagala anvESheyim karma paripOShe ।kriyeya pAramparya janmAntarIya ॥niyataviMtu jagat pravardhanege naratRuShNe ।jaya pUrNavendadake  - Mankutimma ॥ 858 ॥To find happiness, we do work  - actions. The consequences of actions are accumulated beyond the present lives. This is the rule that the world runs on. The main source of development in this world is the human desire. But does it ever have victory or at least an end?  - Mankutimma
translation: To find happiness, we do work  - actions. The consequences of actions are accumulated beyond the present lives. This is the rule that the world runs on. The main source of development in this world is the human desire. But does it ever have victory or at least an end?  - Mankutimma
title: ಜಯ ಪೂರ್ಣವೆಂದದಕೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: priya hitagala anvESheyim karma paripOShe ।kriyeya pAramparya janmAntarIya ॥niyataviMtu jagat pravardhanege naratRuShNe ।jaya pUrNavendadake  - Mankutimma ॥ 858 ॥
kagga: ಪ್ರಿಯಹಿತಗಳನ್ವೇಷೆಯಿಂ ಕರ್ಮಪರಿಪೋಷೆ ।ಕ್ರಿಯೆಯ ಪಾರಂಪರ್ಯ ಜನ್ಮಾಂತರೀಯ ॥ನಿಯತವಿಂತು ಜಗತ್ಪ್ರವರ್ಧನೆಗೆ ನರತೃಷ್ಣೆ ।ಜಯ ಪೂರ್ಣವೆಂದದಕೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೮ ॥

content: ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಯನವರತ ಮನುಜನ ತಿದ್ದುತಿರುವಂತೆ ।ವಿಕೃತಿಗೊಳಿಸುವನವನುಮ್ ಆಕೆಯಂಗಗಳ ॥ಭೂಕೃಷಿಕ ರಸತಂತ್ರಿ ಶಿಲ್ಪಿ ವಾಹನಯಂತ್ರಿ ।ವ್ಯಾಕೃತಿಸರೇನವಳ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೯ ॥ prakRutiyu anavarata manujana tiddutiruvante ।vikRuti goLisuvanu avanum aakeya angagaLa ॥bhUkRuShika rasatantri shilpi vAhanayantri ।vyAkRutisarEnu avaLa?  - Mankutimma ॥ 859 ॥Nature always exerts enough force to correct man;s course. On his part, man always tries to shape nature to his advantage/liking. A farmer, a metallurgist, a sculptor, an automobile engineer  - Aren;t they all exerting force to change nature?  - Mankutimma
translation: Nature always exerts enough force to correct man;s course. On his part, man always tries to shape nature to his advantage/liking. A farmer, a metallurgist, a sculptor, an automobile engineer  - Aren;t they all exerting force to change nature?  - Mankutimma
title: ವ್ಯಾಕೃತಿಸರೇನವಳ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: prakRutiyu anavarata manujana tiddutiruvante ।vikRuti goLisuvanu avanum aakeya angagaLa ॥bhUkRuShika rasatantri shilpi vAhanayantri ।vyAkRutisarEnu avaLa?  - Mankutimma ॥ 859 ॥
kagga: ಪ್ರಕೃತಿಯನವರತ ಮನುಜನ ತಿದ್ದುತಿರುವಂತೆ ।ವಿಕೃತಿಗೊಳಿಸುವನವನುಮ್ ಆಕೆಯಂಗಗಳ ॥ಭೂಕೃಷಿಕ ರಸತಂತ್ರಿ ಶಿಲ್ಪಿ ವಾಹನಯಂತ್ರಿ ।ವ್ಯಾಕೃತಿಸರೇನವಳ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೫೯ ॥

content: ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ಚೋದನೆಗಳಿಂ ನರನೊಳಿಷ್ಟಗಳುದಯ- ।ವಿಷ್ಟಸಿದ್ದಿಗೆ ಯಂತ್ರತಂತ್ರಗಳ ಯುಕ್ತಿ ॥ತ್ವಷ್ಟೃಕುಶಲದೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ವಿಕೃತಿ; ಇಂತನ್ಯೋನ್ಯ ।ಸ್ಪೃಷ್ಟರ್ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ ನರರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೦ ॥ sRuShTi chodanegaLim naranoL iShTagaLa udayavu ।iShTasiddhige yantra tantragaLa yukti ॥tvaShTRu kushalade sRuShTi vikRuti; intu anyOnya ।spRuShTar prakRuti nararu  - Mankutimma ॥ 860 ॥nature provokes man with desires. To satisfy this desire, he creates machines and mechanisms with his intellect. By the grace of this divine sculptor (through his energy residing in man) nature is altered now and then. This leads to the repeat of the cycle. Nature and mankind thus have an symbiotic relation.  - Mankutimma
translation: nature provokes man with desires. To satisfy this desire, he creates machines and mechanisms with his intellect. By the grace of this divine sculptor (through his energy residing in man) nature is altered now and then. This leads to the repeat of the cycle. Nature and mankind thus have an symbiotic relation.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸ್ಪೃಷ್ಟರ್ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ ನರರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sRuShTi chodanegaLim naranoL iShTagaLa udayavu ।iShTasiddhige yantra tantragaLa yukti ॥tvaShTRu kushalade sRuShTi vikRuti; intu anyOnya ।spRuShTar prakRuti nararu  - Mankutimma ॥ 860 ॥
kagga: ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ಚೋದನೆಗಳಿಂ ನರನೊಳಿಷ್ಟಗಳುದಯ- ।ವಿಷ್ಟಸಿದ್ದಿಗೆ ಯಂತ್ರತಂತ್ರಗಳ ಯುಕ್ತಿ ॥ತ್ವಷ್ಟೃಕುಶಲದೆ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿ ವಿಕೃತಿ; ಇಂತನ್ಯೋನ್ಯ ।ಸ್ಪೃಷ್ಟರ್ ಪ್ರಕೃತಿ ನರರು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೦ ॥

content: ದಿವ್ಯ ಚರಿತಂಗಳ ಪ್ರತ್ಯುಕ್ತಿ ನರಚರಿತೆ ।ಕಾವ್ಯ ವಿಜ್ಞಾನಗಳ್ ನಿಗಮಾನುಸರಗಳ್ ॥ನವ್ಯಸಂಪದವಾರ್ಷಸಂಪದುದ್ಧೃತವಿಂತು ।ಸವ್ಯಪೇಕ್ಷಗಳುಭಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೧ ॥ divya charitangaLa pratyukti nara charite ।kAvya vijnAnagaL nigama anusAragaL ॥navya sampadavu aarSha sampada uddhRutavu intu ।savya apEkShegaLu ubhaya  - Mankutimma ॥ 861 ॥Human story is nothing more than  a retelling of the past. Poetry and Science are following the same rules of the universe. New culture is only an excerpt of the old ones. The new and old grow depending on each other. The old needs the new to keep themselves alive and the new needs old to take form.  - Mankutimma
translation: Human story is nothing more than  a retelling of the past. Poetry and Science are following the same rules of the universe. New culture is only an excerpt of the old ones. The new and old grow depending on each other. The old needs the new to keep themselves alive and the new needs old to take form.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸವ್ಯಪೇಕ್ಷಗಳುಭಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: divya charitangaLa pratyukti nara charite ।kAvya vijnAnagaL nigama anusAragaL ॥navya sampadavu aarSha sampada uddhRutavu intu ।savya apEkShegaLu ubhaya  - Mankutimma ॥ 861 ॥
kagga: ದಿವ್ಯ ಚರಿತಂಗಳ ಪ್ರತ್ಯುಕ್ತಿ ನರಚರಿತೆ ।ಕಾವ್ಯ ವಿಜ್ಞಾನಗಳ್ ನಿಗಮಾನುಸರಗಳ್ ॥ನವ್ಯಸಂಪದವಾರ್ಷಸಂಪದುದ್ಧೃತವಿಂತು ।ಸವ್ಯಪೇಕ್ಷಗಳುಭಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೧ ॥

content: ಇರುವುದರೊಳಾದನಿತು ಸೊಗವ ಪಡೆವೊಡೆ ಲೋಗರ್ ।ಅರಿಗೆ ಮೊದಲ್ ಇಹಕೆ ಪರದಾವರಣವಿಹುದನ್ ॥ಪರಮಾರ್ಥಗಣಿತದಿಂದಿಹದರ್ಥಗಳನೆಣಿಸೆ ।ಸರಿ ಲೋಕಬಾಂಧವ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೨ ॥ iruvudaroL aadanitu  sogava paDevoDe lOgar ।arige modal ihake parada aavaraNavu ihudan ॥paramArtha gaNitadinda ihada arthagaLaneNise ।sari lOkabAndhavya  - Mankutimma ॥ 862 ॥If you seek to find happiness in whatever state you are in  - then you must first understand that everything here has greater meaning in the context of the universe. Once you start evaluating the profits and losses of this world on an absolute scale of the universe, you will be able to achieve balance in life in this world.  - Mankutimma
translation: If you seek to find happiness in whatever state you are in  - then you must first understand that everything here has greater meaning in the context of the universe. Once you start evaluating the profits and losses of this world on an absolute scale of the universe, you will be able to achieve balance in life in this world.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸರಿ ಲೋಕಬಾಂಧವ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: iruvudaroL aadanitu  sogava paDevoDe lOgar ।arige modal ihake parada aavaraNavu ihudan ॥paramArtha gaNitadinda ihada arthagaLaneNise ।sari lOkabAndhavya  - Mankutimma ॥ 862 ॥
kagga: ಇರುವುದರೊಳಾದನಿತು ಸೊಗವ ಪಡೆವೊಡೆ ಲೋಗರ್ ।ಅರಿಗೆ ಮೊದಲ್ ಇಹಕೆ ಪರದಾವರಣವಿಹುದನ್ ॥ಪರಮಾರ್ಥಗಣಿತದಿಂದಿಹದರ್ಥಗಳನೆಣಿಸೆ ।ಸರಿ ಲೋಕಬಾಂಧವ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೨ ॥

content: ಮುದಿಕುರುಡಿ ಹೊಂಗೆಯನು ಬಾದಾಮಿ, ಕೋ ಯೆನುತ ।ಪದುಳದಿಂ ಮೊಮ್ಮಂಗೆ ಕೊಡಲು ಸಿಹಿಯಹುದೆ? ॥ಹೃದಯವೊಳಿತಾದೊಡೇಂ? ತಿಳಿವಿಹುದೆ? ಜಾಣಿಹುದೆ? ।ಸುಧೆ ಬಂತೆ ಸುಲಭದಲಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೩ ॥ mudi kuruDi hongeyanu bAdAmi, kO yenuta ।paduLadim mommange koDalu sihiyahude? ॥hRudayavu oLitAdoDEm? tiLivihude? jANihude? ।sudhe bante sulabhadali?  - Mankutimma ॥ 863 ॥A blind old lady may give a beech nut to her grandson thinking (and telling) that it is an almond. That does not make it sweet. Does it? Is it just enough to have all the good intentions at heart? Is it wise? Is it the right thing? Can great things (like getting elixir which required the churning of the ocean) get done just like that (by god intentions alone)?  - Mankutimma
translation: A blind old lady may give a beech nut to her grandson thinking (and telling) that it is an almond. That does not make it sweet. Does it? Is it just enough to have all the good intentions at heart? Is it wise? Is it the right thing? Can great things (like getting elixir which required the churning of the ocean) get done just like that (by god intentions alone)?  - Mankutimma
title: ಸುಧೆ ಬಂತೆ ಸುಲಭದಲಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mudi kuruDi hongeyanu bAdAmi, kO yenuta ।paduLadim mommange koDalu sihiyahude? ॥hRudayavu oLitAdoDEm? tiLivihude? jANihude? ।sudhe bante sulabhadali?  - Mankutimma ॥ 863 ॥
kagga: ಮುದಿಕುರುಡಿ ಹೊಂಗೆಯನು ಬಾದಾಮಿ, ಕೋ ಯೆನುತ ।ಪದುಳದಿಂ ಮೊಮ್ಮಂಗೆ ಕೊಡಲು ಸಿಹಿಯಹುದೆ? ॥ಹೃದಯವೊಳಿತಾದೊಡೇಂ? ತಿಳಿವಿಹುದೆ? ಜಾಣಿಹುದೆ? ।ಸುಧೆ ಬಂತೆ ಸುಲಭದಲಿ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೩ ॥

content: ಜಗದ ಸೊಗದರಸಿಕೆಯ ಫಲ, ನೋಡು, ಬರಿ ಕಲಹ ।ಮೃಗಗಳಾವೇಶಗೊಳಲಿಪ್ಪುದಿನ್ನೇನು? ॥ಮುಗಿಯುವುದು ಕಾಳ್ಗಿಚ್ಚು ವನ ಬೂದಿಯಾದಂದು ।ಹಗೆತನವುಮಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೪ ॥ jagada sogada arasikeya phala, nODu, bari kalaha ।mRugagaLa aavEshagoLalu ippudinnEnu? ॥mugiyuvudu kALgichchu vana bUdiyAdandu ।hagetanavum antu  - Mankutimma ॥ 864 ॥What is the result of everyone in this world being in pursuit of happiness? See, It;s just conflict. Man has engaged in conflict much like the animals every where. What else can be expected to happen then? The forest fire will cease only after turning the entire forest into ashes. Hatred is also thus.  - Mankutimma
translation: What is the result of everyone in this world being in pursuit of happiness? See, It;s just conflict. Man has engaged in conflict much like the animals every where. What else can be expected to happen then? The forest fire will cease only after turning the entire forest into ashes. Hatred is also thus.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹಗೆತನವುಮಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jagada sogada arasikeya phala, nODu, bari kalaha ।mRugagaLa aavEshagoLalu ippudinnEnu? ॥mugiyuvudu kALgichchu vana bUdiyAdandu ।hagetanavum antu  - Mankutimma ॥ 864 ॥
kagga: ಜಗದ ಸೊಗದರಸಿಕೆಯ ಫಲ, ನೋಡು, ಬರಿ ಕಲಹ ।ಮೃಗಗಳಾವೇಶಗೊಳಲಿಪ್ಪುದಿನ್ನೇನು? ॥ಮುಗಿಯುವುದು ಕಾಳ್ಗಿಚ್ಚು ವನ ಬೂದಿಯಾದಂದು ।ಹಗೆತನವುಮಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೪ ॥

content: ಉರಿಯಾರಿ ಮಳೆಗರೆಯೆ ಮರಳಿ ಸಸಿಯೇಳಿವುದು ।ಮರುಗನೊಂದುವುದು ಪೊನ್ ಪುಟ ಕಾದ ಬಳಿಕ ॥ನರಜೀವವಂತು ಶುಚಿಯಹುದು ದುಃಖಾಶ್ರುವಿಂ ।ತರುವಾಯ ಪುನರುದಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೫ ॥ uriyAri maLegareye maraLi sasiyELuvudu ।maruganonduvudu pon kAda baLika ॥nara jIvavum antu shuchiyahudu duHkhAshruvim ।taruvAya punarudaya  - Mankutimma ॥ 865 ॥When the summer heat subsides and earth receives showers, there will be fresh sprouts all around making everyone happy. Gold also gets its luster only after heated in the furnace. Our lives are also thus. It gets purified by the tears of misery. After that there will be a new beginning of happiness.  - Mankutimma
translation: When the summer heat subsides and earth receives showers, there will be fresh sprouts all around making everyone happy. Gold also gets its luster only after heated in the furnace. Our lives are also thus. It gets purified by the tears of misery. After that there will be a new beginning of happiness.  - Mankutimma
title: ತರುವಾಯ ಪುನರುದಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: uriyAri maLegareye maraLi sasiyELuvudu ।maruganonduvudu pon kAda baLika ॥nara jIvavum antu shuchiyahudu duHkhAshruvim ।taruvAya punarudaya  - Mankutimma ॥ 865 ॥
kagga: ಉರಿಯಾರಿ ಮಳೆಗರೆಯೆ ಮರಳಿ ಸಸಿಯೇಳಿವುದು ।ಮರುಗನೊಂದುವುದು ಪೊನ್ ಪುಟ ಕಾದ ಬಳಿಕ ॥ನರಜೀವವಂತು ಶುಚಿಯಹುದು ದುಃಖಾಶ್ರುವಿಂ ।ತರುವಾಯ ಪುನರುದಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೫ ॥

content: ಆತುಮದ ಸಂಸ್ಥಿತಿಗೆ ದೈಹಿಕಸಮಾಧಾನ; ।ಭೌತವಿಜ್ಞಾನದಾ ರಾಷ್ಟ್ರ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಗಳಾ ॥ನೂತನ ವಿವೇಕಪ್ರಯೋಗಗಳಿನಾದೀತು ।ಭೂತಿಸಂಪದ ಜಗಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೬ ॥ aatumada samsthitige daihika samaadhAna ।bhautavijnAnadaa rAShTra samsthegaLA ॥nUtana viveka prayogagaLin aadItu ।bhUti sampada jagake  - Mankutimma ॥ 866 ॥For the soul to be happy, it must reside in a healthy happy body. All the advances in science, organisations and nations with their latest inventions and discoveries will make living in this world prosperous.  - Mankutimma
translation: For the soul to be happy, it must reside in a healthy happy body. All the advances in science, organisations and nations with their latest inventions and discoveries will make living in this world prosperous.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭೂತಿಸಂಪದ ಜಗಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aatumada samsthitige daihika samaadhAna ।bhautavijnAnadaa rAShTra samsthegaLA ॥nUtana viveka prayogagaLin aadItu ।bhUti sampada jagake  - Mankutimma ॥ 866 ॥
kagga: ಆತುಮದ ಸಂಸ್ಥಿತಿಗೆ ದೈಹಿಕಸಮಾಧಾನ; ।ಭೌತವಿಜ್ಞಾನದಾ ರಾಷ್ಟ್ರ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಗಳಾ ॥ನೂತನ ವಿವೇಕಪ್ರಯೋಗಗಳಿನಾದೀತು ।ಭೂತಿಸಂಪದ ಜಗಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೬ ॥

content: ಯತನ ಕರ್ತವ್ಯವದು, ನಮಗೆ ವಿದ್ಯಾಭ್ಯಾಸ ।ಹಿತಪರಿಜ್ಞಾನ ಯತ್ನಾನುಭವ ಫಲಿತ ॥ಸತತಯತ್ನದಿನಾತ್ಮ ಶಕ್ತಿ ಪರಿವರ್ಧಿಪುದು ।ಯತನ ಜೀವನಶಿಕ್ಷೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೭ ॥ yatana kartavyavadu, namage vidyAbhyAsa ।hita parijnAna yatnAnubhava phalita ॥satata yatnadin aatma shakti parivardhipudu ।yatana jIvana shikShe  - Mankutimma ॥ 867 ॥To try is our duty. Only when one tries, he learns. He will know what is good for himself. This knowledge is the fruit of trying. Only when you try often and be persevere will the soul grow in strength. To try is the only way to get educated.  - Mankutimma
translation: To try is our duty. Only when one tries, he learns. He will know what is good for himself. This knowledge is the fruit of trying. Only when you try often and be persevere will the soul grow in strength. To try is the only way to get educated.  - Mankutimma
title: ಯತನ ಜೀವನಶಿಕ್ಷೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: yatana kartavyavadu, namage vidyAbhyAsa ।hita parijnAna yatnAnubhava phalita ॥satata yatnadin aatma shakti parivardhipudu ।yatana jIvana shikShe  - Mankutimma ॥ 867 ॥
kagga: ಯತನ ಕರ್ತವ್ಯವದು, ನಮಗೆ ವಿದ್ಯಾಭ್ಯಾಸ ।ಹಿತಪರಿಜ್ಞಾನ ಯತ್ನಾನುಭವ ಫಲಿತ ॥ಸತತಯತ್ನದಿನಾತ್ಮ ಶಕ್ತಿ ಪರಿವರ್ಧಿಪುದು ।ಯತನ ಜೀವನಶಿಕ್ಷೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೭ ॥

content: ಅರೆದಿನದ ನಮ್ಮ ಯತ್ನದಿನದೇನೆನ್ನದಿರು ।ಕಿರಿದುಮೊಡಗೂಡಿರಲು ಸಿರಿಯಹುದುಬಾಳ್ಗೆ ॥ಪರಿಪೋಷಿಸದೆ ನಿನ್ನೊಡಲ ದಾರಿಮರದ ಫಲ? ।ಕಿರುಜಾಜಿ ಸೊಗಕುಡದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೮ ॥ aredinada namma yatnadin adEnu ennadiru ।kiridum oDagUDiralu siriyahudu bALge ॥paripOShisade ninna oDala dAri marada phala ।kiru jAji sogakuDade?  - Mankutimma ॥ 868 ॥Don;t think that your small efforts of half a day will not do any impact. When such small efforts all come together, then life becomes beautiful. Doesn;t the small fruit from a tree on the path quench your hunger a bit? Is the small jaaji (variety of jasmine) with mild fragrance not capable of giving you   - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t think that your small efforts of half a day will not do any impact. When such small efforts all come together, then life becomes beautiful. Doesn;t the small fruit from a tree on the path quench your hunger a bit? Is the small jaaji (variety of jasmine) with mild fragrance not capable of giving you   - Mankutimma
title: ಕಿರುಜಾಜಿ ಸೊಗಕುಡದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aredinada namma yatnadin adEnu ennadiru ।kiridum oDagUDiralu siriyahudu bALge ॥paripOShisade ninna oDala dAri marada phala ।kiru jAji sogakuDade?  - Mankutimma ॥ 868 ॥
kagga: ಅರೆದಿನದ ನಮ್ಮ ಯತ್ನದಿನದೇನೆನ್ನದಿರು ।ಕಿರಿದುಮೊಡಗೂಡಿರಲು ಸಿರಿಯಹುದುಬಾಳ್ಗೆ ॥ಪರಿಪೋಷಿಸದೆ ನಿನ್ನೊಡಲ ದಾರಿಮರದ ಫಲ? ।ಕಿರುಜಾಜಿ ಸೊಗಕುಡದೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೮ ॥

content: ಮಾರ್ಗಣೆಯೆ ಮುಖ್ಯ; ಲಭ್ಯದ ಮಾತದಂತಿರಲಿ ।ಸ್ವರ್ಗವನು ಭುವಿಗಿಳಿಸಬಲ್ಲವನದಾರು? ॥ಅರ್ಗಲ ವಿಹೀನ ಸರ್ವಾರ್ಥ ಸಹಭಾಗಿತೆಯೆ ।ಅರ್ಘಾರ್ಹತತ್ತ್ವವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೯ ॥ mArganeye mukhya; labhyada mAtadu antirali ।svargavanu bhuvige iLisa ballavanu adAru? ॥argala vihIna sarvArtha sahabhAgiteye ।arghArha tatvavelo  - Mankutimma ॥ 869 ॥Searching (striving) for the answer is important. Not the result. What one gets finally is a different matter altogether. Is there a person who can claim that he can get heaven to earth? It is enough if one can find a acceptable solution without obstacles that involves everyone sharing and caring about each other. That is nothing short of heaven and is the great ideal to live by.  - Mankutimma
translation: Searching (striving) for the answer is important. Not the result. What one gets finally is a different matter altogether. Is there a person who can claim that he can get heaven to earth? It is enough if one can find a acceptable solution without obstacles that involves everyone sharing and caring about each other. That is nothing short of heaven and is the great ideal to live by.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅರ್ಘಾರ್ಹತತ್ತ್ವವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
