kagga: ಮಾರ್ಗಣೆಯೆ ಮುಖ್ಯ; ಲಭ್ಯದ ಮಾತದಂತಿರಲಿ ।ಸ್ವರ್ಗವನು ಭುವಿಗಿಳಿಸಬಲ್ಲವನದಾರು? ॥ಅರ್ಗಲ ವಿಹೀನ ಸರ್ವಾರ್ಥ ಸಹಭಾಗಿತೆಯೆ ।ಅರ್ಘಾರ್ಹತತ್ತ್ವವೆಲೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೬೯ ॥

content: ದಿವಿಜಸುಧೆ ಬರಿಮಧುವೊ; ಹುಳಿಯುಪ್ಪು ಮಿಶ್ರಿತವೊ? ।ಅವನಿಯುಣಿಸಿನಲಿ ಷಡ್ರಸ ತಪ್ಪದಿಹುದು ॥ಲವಲೇಶಮಾನುಮಿರದಿರೆ ಕಯ್ಪು  ಜೀವನದಿ ।ಪವಳಿಸಿರನೇ ನರನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೦ ॥ divijasudhe barimadhuvo; huLi uppu mishritavo? ।avaniya uNisinali ShaD rasa tappade ihudu ॥lavalEsham aanum iradire kaypu jIvanadi ।pavaLisiranE naranu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 870 ॥About the elixir that the Gods drink  - is it all sweet or has traces of sour and salt? In the food of this world, there is definitely a mixture of all six tastes. If there is absolutely not bitterness  - not even an grain of it, then man would spend his entire life sleeping. Isn;t it?  - Mankutimma
translation: About the elixir that the Gods drink  - is it all sweet or has traces of sour and salt? In the food of this world, there is definitely a mixture of all six tastes. If there is absolutely not bitterness  - not even an grain of it, then man would spend his entire life sleeping. Isn;t it?  - Mankutimma
title: ಪವಳಿಸಿರನೇ ನರನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: divijasudhe barimadhuvo; huLi uppu mishritavo? ।avaniya uNisinali ShaD rasa tappade ihudu ॥lavalEsham aanum iradire kaypu jIvanadi ।pavaLisiranE naranu?  - Mankutimma ॥ 870 ॥
kagga: ದಿವಿಜಸುಧೆ ಬರಿಮಧುವೊ; ಹುಳಿಯುಪ್ಪು ಮಿಶ್ರಿತವೊ? ।ಅವನಿಯುಣಿಸಿನಲಿ ಷಡ್ರಸ ತಪ್ಪದಿಹುದು ॥ಲವಲೇಶಮಾನುಮಿರದಿರೆ ಕಯ್ಪು  ಜೀವನದಿ ।ಪವಳಿಸಿರನೇ ನರನು?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೦ ॥

content: ಆರಿಗಾವುದು ತಕ್ಕುದಾರಿಗಾವುದು ದಕ್ಕ- ।ದೀ ರಹಸ್ಯದಿನಾದ ಸಾಹ್ಯವುಪಕಾರ ॥ತಾರತಮ್ಯವಿವೇಕವರಿಯದಾ ಸಂಸ್ಕಾರ ।ಪ್ರೇರಕವೊ ಚೌರ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೧ ॥ aarigAvudu takkudu  aarigAvudu dakkadu ।E rahasyadin aada sAhyavupakAra ॥tAratamya vivEkava ariyada samskAra ।prErakavo chauryakke  - Mankutimma ॥ 871 ॥Who deserves what? Who should not get what? One must make an attempt to learn this secret. There are multiple uses of this knowledge of rightly assigning causes for events and thereby determining the deservedness of people. If one does not understand it properly, then it will only encourage stealing.  - Mankutimma
translation: Who deserves what? Who should not get what? One must make an attempt to learn this secret. There are multiple uses of this knowledge of rightly assigning causes for events and thereby determining the deservedness of people. If one does not understand it properly, then it will only encourage stealing.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪ್ರೇರಕವೊ ಚೌರ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: aarigAvudu takkudu  aarigAvudu dakkadu ।E rahasyadin aada sAhyavupakAra ॥tAratamya vivEkava ariyada samskAra ।prErakavo chauryakke  - Mankutimma ॥ 871 ॥
kagga: ಆರಿಗಾವುದು ತಕ್ಕುದಾರಿಗಾವುದು ದಕ್ಕ- ।ದೀ ರಹಸ್ಯದಿನಾದ ಸಾಹ್ಯವುಪಕಾರ ॥ತಾರತಮ್ಯವಿವೇಕವರಿಯದಾ ಸಂಸ್ಕಾರ ।ಪ್ರೇರಕವೊ ಚೌರ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೧ ॥

content: ಗುಡಿಸಲೇನೊಣಹುಲ್ಲು ಕಡ್ಡಿ ಮಣ್ಣೆನ್ನುತಲಿ ।ಬಡವನಲಿ ಕೊರತೆಗಳ ನೆಡುವುದರಿದಲ್ಲ ॥ಕೆಡಿಸಿದಾ ಗುಡಿಸಿಲಿನ ನೆಮ್ಮದಿಯ ಮತ್ತೆಂತು ।ಕೊಡಲಹುದವಂಗೆ ನೀಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೨ ॥ guDisalu Enu oNa hullu kaDDi maNNu annutali ।baDavanali korategaLa neDuvudu aridalla ॥keDisidA guDisilina nemmadiya mattentu ।koDalahudavange nIm?  - Mankutimma ॥ 872 ॥A hut is nothing more than a few dried straw a few sticks. It is very easy to plant such thoughts in the minds of people who are happily living in the hut. It is easy to make them feel miserable with their present state and wish for more. You would have disturbed the peace and happiness in that household. How are you planning to give it back?  - Mankutimma
translation: A hut is nothing more than a few dried straw a few sticks. It is very easy to plant such thoughts in the minds of people who are happily living in the hut. It is easy to make them feel miserable with their present state and wish for more. You would have disturbed the peace and happiness in that household. How are you planning to give it back?  - Mankutimma
title: ಕೊಡಲಹುದವಂಗೆ ನೀಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: guDisalu Enu oNa hullu kaDDi maNNu annutali ।baDavanali korategaLa neDuvudu aridalla ॥keDisidA guDisilina nemmadiya mattentu ।koDalahudavange nIm?  - Mankutimma ॥ 872 ॥
kagga: ಗುಡಿಸಲೇನೊಣಹುಲ್ಲು ಕಡ್ಡಿ ಮಣ್ಣೆನ್ನುತಲಿ ।ಬಡವನಲಿ ಕೊರತೆಗಳ ನೆಡುವುದರಿದಲ್ಲ ॥ಕೆಡಿಸಿದಾ ಗುಡಿಸಿಲಿನ ನೆಮ್ಮದಿಯ ಮತ್ತೆಂತು ।ಕೊಡಲಹುದವಂಗೆ ನೀಂ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೨ ॥

content: ಬಳಲಿ ನೆಲದಲಿ ಮಲಗಿ ಮೈಮರೆತು ನಿದ್ರಿಪನ ।ಕುಲುಕಿ ಹಾಸಿಗೆಯನರಸೆನುವುದುಪಕೃತಿಯೆ? ॥ಒಳಿತನೆಸಗುವೆನೆಂದು ನೆಮ್ಮದಿಯ ನುಂಗದಿರು ।ಸುಲಭವಲ್ಲೊಳಿತೆಸೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೩ ॥ baLali neladali malagi mai maretu nidripana।kuluki hAsigeyanu arasu enuvudu upakRutiye? ॥oLitanesaguvenendu nemmadiya nungadiru ।sulabhavalla oLitesege  - Mankutimma ॥ 873 ॥Is it called helping when you wake up a tired person sleeping happily on the floor to send him searching for a bed to sleep on? With the intention of helping, one must not disturb the peace and happiness of someone. It is not easy to do good.  - Mankutimma
translation: Is it called helping when you wake up a tired person sleeping happily on the floor to send him searching for a bed to sleep on? With the intention of helping, one must not disturb the peace and happiness of someone. It is not easy to do good.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸುಲಭವಲ್ಲೊಳಿತೆಸೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: baLali neladali malagi mai maretu nidripana।kuluki hAsigeyanu arasu enuvudu upakRutiye? ॥oLitanesaguvenendu nemmadiya nungadiru ।sulabhavalla oLitesege  - Mankutimma ॥ 873 ॥
kagga: ಬಳಲಿ ನೆಲದಲಿ ಮಲಗಿ ಮೈಮರೆತು ನಿದ್ರಿಪನ ।ಕುಲುಕಿ ಹಾಸಿಗೆಯನರಸೆನುವುದುಪಕೃತಿಯೆ? ॥ಒಳಿತನೆಸಗುವೆನೆಂದು ನೆಮ್ಮದಿಯ ನುಂಗದಿರು ।ಸುಲಭವಲ್ಲೊಳಿತೆಸೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೩ ॥

content: ಮಡಕೆಯನು ಬಡಿದು ಹೊನ್ ಕೊಡವ ತೋರುವ ಸಖನೆ ।ಪಡೆದಿಹೆಯ ರಹದಾರಿಯನು ಹೊನ್ನ ಗಣಿಗೆ? ॥ಒಡಲಿಗೊಗ್ಗಿದ ನೀರ ಚೆಲ್ಲಿದೊಡದೇಂ ಪಾಲ ।ಕುಡಿವ ಸಂತಸಕೆಣೆಯೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೪ ॥ maDakeyanu baDidu honn koDava tOruva sakhane ।paDediheya rahadAriyanu honna gaNige? ॥oDalige oggida nIra chellidoDe adEm pAla ।kuDiva santasake eNeye?  - Mankutimma ॥ 874 ॥Friend, you cannot break the mud pot with the promise to show a golden one. Have you got the license to mine gold so that you can show these dreams to people? If people are comfortable drinking water (which suits well to their body) then you should not ask them throw water away and get used to milk. Will they be happy doing so?  - Mankutimma
translation: Friend, you cannot break the mud pot with the promise to show a golden one. Have you got the license to mine gold so that you can show these dreams to people? If people are comfortable drinking water (which suits well to their body) then you should not ask them throw water away and get used to milk. Will they be happy doing so?  - Mankutimma
title: ಪಾಲ ಕುಡಿವ ಸಂತಸಕೆಣೆಯೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: maDakeyanu baDidu honn koDava tOruva sakhane ।paDediheya rahadAriyanu honna gaNige? ॥oDalige oggida nIra chellidoDe adEm pAla ।kuDiva santasake eNeye?  - Mankutimma ॥ 874 ॥
kagga: ಮಡಕೆಯನು ಬಡಿದು ಹೊನ್ ಕೊಡವ ತೋರುವ ಸಖನೆ ।ಪಡೆದಿಹೆಯ ರಹದಾರಿಯನು ಹೊನ್ನ ಗಣಿಗೆ? ॥ಒಡಲಿಗೊಗ್ಗಿದ ನೀರ ಚೆಲ್ಲಿದೊಡದೇಂ ಪಾಲ ।ಕುಡಿವ ಸಂತಸಕೆಣೆಯೆ?  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೪ ॥

content: ಬಲುಹಳೆಯ ಲೋಕವಿದು, ಬಲುಪುರಾತನಲೋಕ ।ಬೆಳೆದಿರ್ಪುದಿದು ಕೋಟಿರಸಗಳನು ಪೀರ್ದು ॥ಸುಲಭವಲ್ಲದರ ಸ್ವಭಾವವನು ಮಾರ್ಪಡಿಸೆ ।ಸಲದಾತುರೆಯದಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೫ ॥ balu haLeya lOkavidu, balu purAtana lOka ।beLedirpudu idu kOTi rasagaLanu pIrdu ॥sulabhavalla adara svabhAvavanu mArpaDise ।saladu aatureyu adake  - Mankutimma ॥ 875 ॥This world is very old. It is an ancient one. It has grown over the ages imbibing a lot of emotions (crores of them) and each of them have left deep stains on its culture. It is hence not easy to change its very nature. It does not like being hurried also. Change does happen, but very slowly.  - Mankutimma
translation: This world is very old. It is an ancient one. It has grown over the ages imbibing a lot of emotions (crores of them) and each of them have left deep stains on its culture. It is hence not easy to change its very nature. It does not like being hurried also. Change does happen, but very slowly.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಲದಾತುರೆಯದಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: balu haLeya lOkavidu, balu purAtana lOka ।beLedirpudu idu kOTi rasagaLanu pIrdu ॥sulabhavalla adara svabhAvavanu mArpaDise ।saladu aatureyu adake  - Mankutimma ॥ 875 ॥
kagga: ಬಲುಹಳೆಯ ಲೋಕವಿದು, ಬಲುಪುರಾತನಲೋಕ ।ಬೆಳೆದಿರ್ಪುದಿದು ಕೋಟಿರಸಗಳನು ಪೀರ್ದು ॥ಸುಲಭವಲ್ಲದರ ಸ್ವಭಾವವನು ಮಾರ್ಪಡಿಸೆ ।ಸಲದಾತುರೆಯದಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೫ ॥

content: ಸಿಂಧುವನು ಹಿಮಗಿರಿಗೆ ಹಿಂದಿರುಗಿ ಬೇರೊಂದು ।ಚೆಂದದಲಿ ಪರಿದು ಬಾರೆಂದಾಣತಿಪೆಯಾ? ॥ಸಂದರ್ಭವಿಡಿದು ಜನಚೈತನ್ಯ ಪರಿದಿಹುದು ।ಅಂಧಗತಿಯಲ್ಲವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೬ ॥ sindhuvanu himagirige hindirugi bErondu ।chendadali paridu bArendu aaNatipeyaa? ॥sandarbhaviDidu janachaitanya paridihudu ।andhagatiyallavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 876 ॥Do you think you can order River Indus to go back to the Himalayas and flow in a different beautiful way? Human energy and resulting culture is also like that. It follows and changes according to the circumstances reacting the best it can to the current situations. It is not a blind march.  - Mankutimma
translation: Do you think you can order River Indus to go back to the Himalayas and flow in a different beautiful way? Human energy and resulting culture is also like that. It follows and changes according to the circumstances reacting the best it can to the current situations. It is not a blind march.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅಂಧಗತಿಯಲ್ಲವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sindhuvanu himagirige hindirugi bErondu ।chendadali paridu bArendu aaNatipeyaa? ॥sandarbhaviDidu janachaitanya paridihudu ।andhagatiyallavadu  - Mankutimma ॥ 876 ॥
kagga: ಸಿಂಧುವನು ಹಿಮಗಿರಿಗೆ ಹಿಂದಿರುಗಿ ಬೇರೊಂದು ।ಚೆಂದದಲಿ ಪರಿದು ಬಾರೆಂದಾಣತಿಪೆಯಾ? ॥ಸಂದರ್ಭವಿಡಿದು ಜನಚೈತನ್ಯ ಪರಿದಿಹುದು ।ಅಂಧಗತಿಯಲ್ಲವದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೬ ॥

content: ಮತಿವಂತರಿದ್ದರಲ ನಮ್ಮ ಹಿಂದೆಯುಮಿಲ್ಲಿ ।ಹಿತಚಿಂತಕರು ಜನಕೆ, ಕೃತಪರಿಶ್ರಮರು? ॥ಅತಿವೈದ್ಯದಿಂದ ಹೊಸರುಜಿನಕೆಡೆಯಾದೀತೊ ।ಮಿತಿಯಿಂ ನವೀಕರಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೭ ॥ mativantariddarala namma hindeyum illi ।hita chintakaru janake, kRuta parishramaru? ॥ati vaidyadinda hosa rujinake eDeyAdIto ।mitiyim navIkaraNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 877 ॥There were intelligent people even before us her. They also thought about the general well being of the entire world. They worked hard too. What is so special about our efforts? If we over-do the change, then it may lead to new diseases (physical, mental and social). Let the change and modernization be in moderation.  - Mankutimma
translation: There were intelligent people even before us her. They also thought about the general well being of the entire world. They worked hard too. What is so special about our efforts? If we over-do the change, then it may lead to new diseases (physical, mental and social). Let the change and modernization be in moderation.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಿತಿಯಿಂ ನವೀಕರಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mativantariddarala namma hindeyum illi ।hita chintakaru janake, kRuta parishramaru? ॥ati vaidyadinda hosa rujinake eDeyAdIto ।mitiyim navIkaraNa  - Mankutimma ॥ 877 ॥
kagga: ಮತಿವಂತರಿದ್ದರಲ ನಮ್ಮ ಹಿಂದೆಯುಮಿಲ್ಲಿ ।ಹಿತಚಿಂತಕರು ಜನಕೆ, ಕೃತಪರಿಶ್ರಮರು? ॥ಅತಿವೈದ್ಯದಿಂದ ಹೊಸರುಜಿನಕೆಡೆಯಾದೀತೊ ।ಮಿತಿಯಿಂ ನವೀಕರಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೭ ॥

content: ಒಡೆಯದಿರು ತಳಹದಿಯ ಸರಿವಡಿಪೆನದನೆಂದು ।ಸಡಲಿಸುವ ನೀಂ ಮರಳಿ ಕಟ್ಟಲರಿತವನೇಂ? ॥ಗಿಡವ ಸರಿ ಬೆಳೆಯಿಸಲು ಬುಡವ ಕೀಳ್ವುದು ಸರಿಯೆ? ।ದುಡುಕದಿರು ತಿದ್ದಿಕೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೮ ॥ oDeyadiru talahadiya sarivaDipenu adanendu ।saDalisuva nIm maraLi kaTTalaritavanEm? ॥giDava sari beLeyisalu buDava kILvudu sariye? ।duDukadiru tiddikege  - Mankutimma ॥ 878 ॥Don;t break the foundation even if you intend to only correct it. Before shaking it have you thought through if would be capable of building it again? If you want the plant to grow well, you should not replant it elsewhere by plucking its roots. One must not hurry to change others.  - Mankutimma
translation: Don;t break the foundation even if you intend to only correct it. Before shaking it have you thought through if would be capable of building it again? If you want the plant to grow well, you should not replant it elsewhere by plucking its roots. One must not hurry to change others.  - Mankutimma
title: ದುಡುಕದಿರು ತಿದ್ದಿಕೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: oDeyadiru talahadiya sarivaDipenu adanendu ।saDalisuva nIm maraLi kaTTalaritavanEm? ॥giDava sari beLeyisalu buDava kILvudu sariye? ।duDukadiru tiddikege  - Mankutimma ॥ 878 ॥
kagga: ಒಡೆಯದಿರು ತಳಹದಿಯ ಸರಿವಡಿಪೆನದನೆಂದು ।ಸಡಲಿಸುವ ನೀಂ ಮರಳಿ ಕಟ್ಟಲರಿತವನೇಂ? ॥ಗಿಡವ ಸರಿ ಬೆಳೆಯಿಸಲು ಬುಡವ ಕೀಳ್ವುದು ಸರಿಯೆ? ।ದುಡುಕದಿರು ತಿದ್ದಿಕೆಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೮ ॥

content: ಮೃಗಶೇಷವಿರುವನಕ ಜಗಳ ತಪ್ಪದು ಜಗದಿ ।ಹಗೆಗೆ ಕೊಲದವರು ಹಸಿವಿಂದ ಕೊಂದಾರು ॥ಟಗರು ಜೂಜೋ ಸಭೆಯ ರಗಳೆಯೋ ಕುಸ್ತಿಯೋ ।ಸೊಗ ಜನಕೆ ರಣರಂಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೯ ॥ mRuga shEShavu iruvanaka jagaLa tappadu jagadi ।hagege koladavaru hasivinda kondAru ॥Tagaru jUjO sabheya ragaLeyO kustiyO ।soga janake raNaranga  - Mankutimma ॥ 879 ॥As long as there is any animal instinct left in a man, there will be conflict, quarrels and wars. People many not kill out of hatred, but they will kill due to hunger. Man has always enjoyed watching conflict  - be in ram fighting, arguments in an meeting or organized fighting.  - Mankutimma
translation: As long as there is any animal instinct left in a man, there will be conflict, quarrels and wars. People many not kill out of hatred, but they will kill due to hunger. Man has always enjoyed watching conflict  - be in ram fighting, arguments in an meeting or organized fighting.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸೊಗ ಜನಕೆ ರಣರಂಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mRuga shEShavu iruvanaka jagaLa tappadu jagadi ।hagege koladavaru hasivinda kondAru ॥Tagaru jUjO sabheya ragaLeyO kustiyO ।soga janake raNaranga  - Mankutimma ॥ 879 ॥
kagga: ಮೃಗಶೇಷವಿರುವನಕ ಜಗಳ ತಪ್ಪದು ಜಗದಿ ।ಹಗೆಗೆ ಕೊಲದವರು ಹಸಿವಿಂದ ಕೊಂದಾರು ॥ಟಗರು ಜೂಜೋ ಸಭೆಯ ರಗಳೆಯೋ ಕುಸ್ತಿಯೋ ।ಸೊಗ ಜನಕೆ ರಣರಂಗ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೭೯ ॥

content: ತನ್ನ ಮನೋರಥಂಗಳ ಚಕ್ರವೇಗದಿನೆ ।ತನ್ನ ಮಣಿಹಾರಗಳ ಸಿಕ್ಕು ಬಿಗಿತದಿನೇ ॥ತನ್ನ ಸಂಕಲ್ಪ ವಿಪರೀತದಿನೆ ಮಾನವನ ।ಬೆನ್ನು ಮುರಿದೀತೇನೊ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೦ ॥ tanna manOrathangaLa chakra vEgadine ।tanna maNihAragaLa sikku bigitadinE ॥tanna sankalpa viparItadine mAnavana ।bennu muridItEno!  - Mankutimma ॥ 880 ॥Man is running fast in the cycle of desire-satisfaction-more-desires. During this, he may wear a necklace of pearls. While running fast, it may get entangled and suffocate him. His back may get broken under the weight of all the grand endeavors to satisfy his lofty ambitions.  - Mankutimma
translation: Man is running fast in the cycle of desire-satisfaction-more-desires. During this, he may wear a necklace of pearls. While running fast, it may get entangled and suffocate him. His back may get broken under the weight of all the grand endeavors to satisfy his lofty ambitions.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬೆನ್ನು ಮುರಿದೀತೇನೊ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tanna manOrathangaLa chakra vEgadine ।tanna maNihAragaLa sikku bigitadinE ॥tanna sankalpa viparItadine mAnavana ।bennu muridItEno!  - Mankutimma ॥ 880 ॥
kagga: ತನ್ನ ಮನೋರಥಂಗಳ ಚಕ್ರವೇಗದಿನೆ ।ತನ್ನ ಮಣಿಹಾರಗಳ ಸಿಕ್ಕು ಬಿಗಿತದಿನೇ ॥ತನ್ನ ಸಂಕಲ್ಪ ವಿಪರೀತದಿನೆ ಮಾನವನ ।ಬೆನ್ನು ಮುರಿದೀತೇನೊ!  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೦ ॥

content: ಮಿತಿಯನರಿತಾಶೆ, ಸಮುಚಿತವ ಮರೆಯದ ಯತ್ನ ।ತೈತಿಕ್ಷೆ ಕಷ್ಟಾಂಶದಪರಿಹಾರ್ಯತೆಗೆ ॥ಮೃತಿಯೆ ಜೀವನಕಥೆಯ ಕೊನೆಯಲ್ಲವೆಂಬರಿವು ।ಹಿತಗಳಿವು ನರಕುಲಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೧ ॥ mitiyanu arita aashe, samuchitava mareyada yatna ।taitikShe kaShTAmshada parihAryatege ॥mRutiye jIvanakatheya koneyallavemba arivu ।hitagaLu ivu narakulake  - Mankutimma ॥ 881 ॥These are the sources of happiness for the mankind  - desire that knows one;s bounds, efforts that always keep the propriety of Dharma in mind, patience till difficult times pass, knowledge that death is not the end of everything.  - Mankutimma
translation: These are the sources of happiness for the mankind  - desire that knows one;s bounds, efforts that always keep the propriety of Dharma in mind, patience till difficult times pass, knowledge that death is not the end of everything.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹಿತಗಳಿವು ನರಕುಲಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mitiyanu arita aashe, samuchitava mareyada yatna ।taitikShe kaShTAmshada parihAryatege ॥mRutiye jIvanakatheya koneyallavemba arivu ।hitagaLu ivu narakulake  - Mankutimma ॥ 881 ॥
kagga: ಮಿತಿಯನರಿತಾಶೆ, ಸಮುಚಿತವ ಮರೆಯದ ಯತ್ನ ।ತೈತಿಕ್ಷೆ ಕಷ್ಟಾಂಶದಪರಿಹಾರ್ಯತೆಗೆ ॥ಮೃತಿಯೆ ಜೀವನಕಥೆಯ ಕೊನೆಯಲ್ಲವೆಂಬರಿವು ।ಹಿತಗಳಿವು ನರಕುಲಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೧ ॥

content: ಸರ್ವಾರ್ಥ ಸಹಭಾಗಿತೆಗೆ ರಾಷ್ಟ್ರ ಕುಲ ವರ್ಗ ।ಸರ್ವದಣು ತಾನೆನುತ್ತೋರೊರ್ವ ಮನುಜನ್ ॥ಸರ್ವಜೀವ ಸಮೃದ್ಧಿಗನುಗೂಡಿ ದುಡಿಯುತಿರೆ ।ಪರ್ವವಂದಿಳೆಗೆಲವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೨ ॥ sarvArtha sahabhAgitege rAShTra kula varga ।sarvada aNu tAn enutta Orvorva manujan ॥sarvajIva samRuddhige anugUDi duDiyutire ।parvavandu iLege elavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 882 ॥The goal of making nations, races and sects is to aid sharing and caring for each other. Each man must realize that he is just an atom (cell) of the whole. He must work towards the overall well being of the whole. Only then, the world will look beautiful  - like a festival day.  - Mankutimma
translation: The goal of making nations, races and sects is to aid sharing and caring for each other. Each man must realize that he is just an atom (cell) of the whole. He must work towards the overall well being of the whole. Only then, the world will look beautiful  - like a festival day.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರ್ವವಂದಿಳೆಗೆಲವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sarvArtha sahabhAgitege rAShTra kula varga ।sarvada aNu tAn enutta Orvorva manujan ॥sarvajIva samRuddhige anugUDi duDiyutire ।parvavandu iLege elavo  - Mankutimma ॥ 882 ॥
kagga: ಸರ್ವಾರ್ಥ ಸಹಭಾಗಿತೆಗೆ ರಾಷ್ಟ್ರ ಕುಲ ವರ್ಗ ।ಸರ್ವದಣು ತಾನೆನುತ್ತೋರೊರ್ವ ಮನುಜನ್ ॥ಸರ್ವಜೀವ ಸಮೃದ್ಧಿಗನುಗೂಡಿ ದುಡಿಯುತಿರೆ ।ಪರ್ವವಂದಿಳೆಗೆಲವೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೨ ॥

content: ಕಾಯಕಿಂತಾತ್ಮ ಪಿರಿತೆಂದು ಜನವರಿತಂದು ।ಸ್ವೀಯೇಚ್ಛೆಯಿಂದ ಸಮಾಧಾನ ಕೆಡದಂದು ॥ದಾಯ ಸಮ ಸಂಸೃಷ್ಟಿ  ಭೂಭಾಗ್ಯವಾದಂದು ।ಶ್ರೇಯ ನೆರೆವುದು ಜಗಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೩ ॥ kAyakinta aatma piritendu janavaritandu ।svIya ichCheyinda samAdhAna keDadandu ॥dAya sama samsRuShTi bhUbhAgyavAdandu ।shreya nerevudu jagake  - Mankutimma ॥ 883 ॥There will be prosperity in abundance in this world when people realize that the soul is to be cared for more than the body, when people find peace within themselves and find ways to do so by themselves, when people learn to share with others equally what they have.  - Mankutimma
translation: There will be prosperity in abundance in this world when people realize that the soul is to be cared for more than the body, when people find peace within themselves and find ways to do so by themselves, when people learn to share with others equally what they have.  - Mankutimma
title: ಶ್ರೇಯ ನೆರೆವುದು ಜಗಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: kAyakinta aatma piritendu janavaritandu ।svIya ichCheyinda samAdhAna keDadandu ॥dAya sama samsRuShTi bhUbhAgyavAdandu ।shreya nerevudu jagake  - Mankutimma ॥ 883 ॥
kagga: ಕಾಯಕಿಂತಾತ್ಮ ಪಿರಿತೆಂದು ಜನವರಿತಂದು ।ಸ್ವೀಯೇಚ್ಛೆಯಿಂದ ಸಮಾಧಾನ ಕೆಡದಂದು ॥ದಾಯ ಸಮ ಸಂಸೃಷ್ಟಿ  ಭೂಭಾಗ್ಯವಾದಂದು ।ಶ್ರೇಯ ನೆರೆವುದು ಜಗಕೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೩ ॥

content: ವಸ್ತು ವಿಜ್ಞಾನದಿಂ ಜೀವನಸಮೃದ್ಧಿ ಮಿಗೆ ।ವಿಸ್ತರಿಸೆ ವಿಶ್ವೈಕ್ಯಭಾವ ಜನಮನದೊಳ್ ॥ದೃಷ್ಟಲೋಕದ ಬೆಡಗದೃಷ್ಟವನು ಮರಸದಿರೆ ।ಸ್ವಸ್ತಿ ಲೋಕಕ್ಕೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೪ ॥ vastu vijnAnadim jIvana samRuddhi mige ।vistarise vishvaikya bhaava janamanadoL ॥dRuShTa lOkada beDagu adRuShTavanu marasadire ।svasti lOkakkella  - Mankutimma ॥ 884 ॥Material advances and science will make life easier. That should allow man to contemplate and expand his consciousness to the entire universe. The splendor of what we can see (this world) should not make us forget or ignore what we cannot see (the rest of the universe). If we can do that, there will be prosperity everywhere.  - Mankutimma
translation: Material advances and science will make life easier. That should allow man to contemplate and expand his consciousness to the entire universe. The splendor of what we can see (this world) should not make us forget or ignore what we cannot see (the rest of the universe). If we can do that, there will be prosperity everywhere.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸ್ವಸ್ತಿ ಲೋಕಕ್ಕೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vastu vijnAnadim jIvana samRuddhi mige ।vistarise vishvaikya bhaava janamanadoL ॥dRuShTa lOkada beDagu adRuShTavanu marasadire ।svasti lOkakkella  - Mankutimma ॥ 884 ॥
kagga: ವಸ್ತು ವಿಜ್ಞಾನದಿಂ ಜೀವನಸಮೃದ್ಧಿ ಮಿಗೆ ।ವಿಸ್ತರಿಸೆ ವಿಶ್ವೈಕ್ಯಭಾವ ಜನಮನದೊಳ್ ॥ದೃಷ್ಟಲೋಕದ ಬೆಡಗದೃಷ್ಟವನು ಮರಸದಿರೆ ।ಸ್ವಸ್ತಿ ಲೋಕಕ್ಕೆಲ್ಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೪ ॥

content: ಜಾನಪದ ಶಿಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ, ಸಂಪತ್ಸಮಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ ।ಜ್ಞಾನಸಂಧಾನದಲಿ, ಮೌಲ್ಯ ಗಣನೆಯಲಿ ॥ಮಾನವತೆ ಮಾನುಷ್ಯ ಧಾರ್ಮಿಕತೆಯೆದ್ದುನಿಲೆ ।ಆನಂದ ಧರೆಗಂದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೫ ॥ jAnapada shiShTiyali, sampat samaShTiyali ।jnAna sandhAnadali, maulya gaNaneyali ॥mAnavate mAnuShya dhArmikateyu eddu nile ।aananda dharegandu  - Mankutimma ॥ 885 ॥In the discipline of the society, in the way wealth gets distributed, in the way people learn (accumulate knowledge), in the way people evaluate qualities  - if there is human values, compassion and morality; then there will be ubiquitous happiness in this world.  - Mankutimma
translation: In the discipline of the society, in the way wealth gets distributed, in the way people learn (accumulate knowledge), in the way people evaluate qualities  - if there is human values, compassion and morality; then there will be ubiquitous happiness in this world.  - Mankutimma
title: ಆನಂದ ಧರೆಗಂದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jAnapada shiShTiyali, sampat samaShTiyali ।jnAna sandhAnadali, maulya gaNaneyali ॥mAnavate mAnuShya dhArmikateyu eddu nile ।aananda dharegandu  - Mankutimma ॥ 885 ॥
kagga: ಜಾನಪದ ಶಿಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ, ಸಂಪತ್ಸಮಷ್ಟಿಯಲಿ ।ಜ್ಞಾನಸಂಧಾನದಲಿ, ಮೌಲ್ಯ ಗಣನೆಯಲಿ ॥ಮಾನವತೆ ಮಾನುಷ್ಯ ಧಾರ್ಮಿಕತೆಯೆದ್ದುನಿಲೆ ।ಆನಂದ ಧರೆಗಂದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೫ ॥

content: ಅಶ್ವತ್ಥವಿಲ್ಲಿ ಬಾಡಿದೊಡೇನು? ಚಿಗುರಲ್ಲಿ; ।ನಶ್ವರತೆ ವಿಟಪ ಪರ್ಣಂಗಳಲಿ ಮಾತ್ರ; ॥ಶಾಶ್ವತತೆ ರುಂಡಮೂಲದಲಿ; ಪರಿಚರಿಸದನು ।ವಿಶ್ವಪ್ರಗತಿಯಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೬ ॥ ashvatthavu illi bADidoDEnu? chiguru alli; ।nashvarate viTapa parNangaLali mAtra; ॥shAshvatate runDa mUladali; paricharisadanu ।vishva pragatiyantu  - Mankutimma ॥ 886 ॥The progress of this world is like that of the Holy Fig tree. A twig here, some leaves there will wilt and die. But there will be sprouts and fresh leaves elsewhere. The leaves twigs and branches are the only things that are temporary. The trunk and the roots are permanent. The world lives on  - only parts of it flourish and perish in time.  - Mankutimma
translation: The progress of this world is like that of the Holy Fig tree. A twig here, some leaves there will wilt and die. But there will be sprouts and fresh leaves elsewhere. The leaves twigs and branches are the only things that are temporary. The trunk and the roots are permanent. The world lives on  - only parts of it flourish and perish in time.  - Mankutimma
title: ವಿಶ್ವಪ್ರಗತಿಯಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ashvatthavu illi bADidoDEnu? chiguru alli; ।nashvarate viTapa parNangaLali mAtra; ॥shAshvatate runDa mUladali; paricharisadanu ।vishva pragatiyantu  - Mankutimma ॥ 886 ॥
kagga: ಅಶ್ವತ್ಥವಿಲ್ಲಿ ಬಾಡಿದೊಡೇನು? ಚಿಗುರಲ್ಲಿ; ।ನಶ್ವರತೆ ವಿಟಪ ಪರ್ಣಂಗಳಲಿ ಮಾತ್ರ; ॥ಶಾಶ್ವತತೆ ರುಂಡಮೂಲದಲಿ; ಪರಿಚರಿಸದನು ।ವಿಶ್ವಪ್ರಗತಿಯಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೬ ॥

content: ಪರಿಪೂರ್ಣಸುಖವನೆಳಸುವನು ತನ್ನೊಳಗಡೆಗೆ ।ತಿರುಗಿಸಲಿ ತನ್ನ ದೃಷ್ಟಿಯನು ನಿರ್ಮಲದಿಂ ॥ನಿರತಿಶಯ ಸುಖವಲ್ಲಿ, ವಿಶ್ವಾತ್ಮ ವೀಕ್ಷೆಯಲಿ ।ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವ ಶಾಂತಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೭ ॥ paripUrNa sukhavanu elasuvanu tannoLagaDege ।tirugisali tanna dRuShTiyanu nirmaladim ॥niratishaya sukhavalli, vishvAtma vIkSheyali ।parasattva shAntiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 887 ॥If you are looking for absolute happiness, then you should turn your search inwards with pure intentions. There you can find happiness that can not bettered. You will have the soul of the universe in your sight and experience complete cosmic peace.  - Mankutimma
translation: If you are looking for absolute happiness, then you should turn your search inwards with pure intentions. There you can find happiness that can not bettered. You will have the soul of the universe in your sight and experience complete cosmic peace.  - Mankutimma
title: ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವ ಶಾಂತಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: paripUrNa sukhavanu elasuvanu tannoLagaDege ।tirugisali tanna dRuShTiyanu nirmaladim ॥niratishaya sukhavalli, vishvAtma vIkSheyali ।parasattva shAntiyali  - Mankutimma ॥ 887 ॥
kagga: ಪರಿಪೂರ್ಣಸುಖವನೆಳಸುವನು ತನ್ನೊಳಗಡೆಗೆ ।ತಿರುಗಿಸಲಿ ತನ್ನ ದೃಷ್ಟಿಯನು ನಿರ್ಮಲದಿಂ ॥ನಿರತಿಶಯ ಸುಖವಲ್ಲಿ, ವಿಶ್ವಾತ್ಮ ವೀಕ್ಷೆಯಲಿ ।ಪರಸತ್ತ್ವ ಶಾಂತಿಯಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೭ ॥

content: ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿಮಾತ್ರದ ವಿಭವ ವಿಶ್ವಾತ್ಮತಾನುಭವ ।ಮುಕ್ತಿ ಸುಖವಾಂತರಿಕವದು ನಿರವಧಿಸುಖ ॥ಭಾಕ್ತ ಪ್ರಪಂಚಸುಖವೆಂತಪರಿಮಿತವಹುದು? ।ರಿಕ್ತ ಸುಖ ಭಾಹ್ಯ ಸುಖ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೮ ॥ vyakti mAtrada vibhava vishvAtmata anubhava ।mukti sukhavu aantarikavadu niravadhi sukha ॥bhAkta prapancha sukhaventu aparimitavu ahudu? ।rikta sukha bAhya sukha  - Mankutimma ॥ 888 ॥The experience of realization of the universal soul is very personal. It can not be taught, learnt or described. The happiness so got is immense and infinite. How can any happiness got by worldly pleasures even match up? Any such happiness is finite and there will always be other pleasures that will give more happiness.  - Mankutimma
translation: The experience of realization of the universal soul is very personal. It can not be taught, learnt or described. The happiness so got is immense and infinite. How can any happiness got by worldly pleasures even match up? Any such happiness is finite and there will always be other pleasures that will give more happiness.  - Mankutimma
title: ರಿಕ್ತ ಸುಖ ಭಾಹ್ಯ ಸುಖ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vyakti mAtrada vibhava vishvAtmata anubhava ।mukti sukhavu aantarikavadu niravadhi sukha ॥bhAkta prapancha sukhaventu aparimitavu ahudu? ।rikta sukha bAhya sukha  - Mankutimma ॥ 888 ॥
kagga: ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿಮಾತ್ರದ ವಿಭವ ವಿಶ್ವಾತ್ಮತಾನುಭವ ।ಮುಕ್ತಿ ಸುಖವಾಂತರಿಕವದು ನಿರವಧಿಸುಖ ॥ಭಾಕ್ತ ಪ್ರಪಂಚಸುಖವೆಂತಪರಿಮಿತವಹುದು? ।ರಿಕ್ತ ಸುಖ ಭಾಹ್ಯ ಸುಖ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೮ ॥

content: ಭ್ರಾಂತಿಯೋ ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣ ಸುಖದಾಶೆ ಬಾಹ್ಯದಲಿ ।ಸಾಂತ ಲೋಕದ ಸೌಖ್ಯ, ಖಂಡಖಂಡವದು ॥ಸ್ವಾಂತಕೃಷಿಯಿಂ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮವೀಕ್ಷೆ ಲಭಿಸಿರ್ದೊಡೇ- ।ಕಾಂತ ಪೂರ್ಣಾನಂದ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೯ ॥ bhrAntiyO sampUrNa sukhada aashe bAhyadali ।sAnta lOkada saukhya, khanDa khanDavadu॥svAntakRuShiyim brahmavIkShe labhisirdoDe ।ekAnta pUrNaananda  - Mankutimma ॥ 889 ॥It is an illusion that one can find complete happiness in the external world. Happiness in this world always has an end. It comes in pieces (followed by pieces of grief). When one realizes the (gets the sight of) universal truth by his own efforts, then he will get a taste of complete happiness  - that only he can enjoy.  - Mankutimma
translation: It is an illusion that one can find complete happiness in the external world. Happiness in this world always has an end. It comes in pieces (followed by pieces of grief). When one realizes the (gets the sight of) universal truth by his own efforts, then he will get a taste of complete happiness  - that only he can enjoy.  - Mankutimma
title: ಏಕಾಂತ ಪೂರ್ಣಾನಂದ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bhrAntiyO sampUrNa sukhada aashe bAhyadali ।sAnta lOkada saukhya, khanDa khanDavadu॥svAntakRuShiyim brahmavIkShe labhisirdoDe ।ekAnta pUrNaananda  - Mankutimma ॥ 889 ॥
kagga: ಭ್ರಾಂತಿಯೋ ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣ ಸುಖದಾಶೆ ಬಾಹ್ಯದಲಿ ।ಸಾಂತ ಲೋಕದ ಸೌಖ್ಯ, ಖಂಡಖಂಡವದು ॥ಸ್ವಾಂತಕೃಷಿಯಿಂ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮವೀಕ್ಷೆ ಲಭಿಸಿರ್ದೊಡೇ- ।ಕಾಂತ ಪೂರ್ಣಾನಂದ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೮೯ ॥

content: ನಶ್ವರಾಕೃತಿ ನಾಮಮಯ ವಿಶ್ವಾರ್ಧಿಯಿದು ।ಶಾಶ್ವತಬ್ರಹ್ಮದುಚ್ಛ್ವಾಸ ಘನ ಬಿಂದು ॥ಪ್ರಶ್ವಸಿತದಲೆಗಳನೆ ಪಿಡಿದು ಗುರಿಯರಿತೀಜೆ ।ವಿಶ್ವಮೂಲಾಪ್ತಿಯಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೦ ॥ nashvara aakRuti nAmamaya vishva vArdhiyu idu ।shAshvata brahmada uchChvAsa ghana bindu ॥prashvasitada alegaLanepiDidu guriya aritu iije ।vishva mUlAptiyala  - Mankutimma ॥ 890 ॥This world is a ever churning (changing) ocean of temporary forms and named objects. There are waves created by the exhalation of the Creator. If one can hold on to the waves and swim towards the center of the ripples, he will succeed in finding the secret of the universe.  - Mankutimma
translation: This world is a ever churning (changing) ocean of temporary forms and named objects. There are waves created by the exhalation of the Creator. If one can hold on to the waves and swim towards the center of the ripples, he will succeed in finding the secret of the universe.  - Mankutimma
title: ವಿಶ್ವಮೂಲಾಪ್ತಿಯಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nashvara aakRuti nAmamaya vishva vArdhiyu idu ।shAshvata brahmada uchChvAsa ghana bindu ॥prashvasitada alegaLanepiDidu guriya aritu iije ।vishva mUlAptiyala  - Mankutimma ॥ 890 ॥
kagga: ನಶ್ವರಾಕೃತಿ ನಾಮಮಯ ವಿಶ್ವಾರ್ಧಿಯಿದು ।ಶಾಶ್ವತಬ್ರಹ್ಮದುಚ್ಛ್ವಾಸ ಘನ ಬಿಂದು ॥ಪ್ರಶ್ವಸಿತದಲೆಗಳನೆ ಪಿಡಿದು ಗುರಿಯರಿತೀಜೆ ।ವಿಶ್ವಮೂಲಾಪ್ತಿಯಲ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೦ ॥

content: ನಿನ್ನ ಕಹಿಸಿಹಿಯೆಲ್ಲ ಕಡಲೊಳುಪ್ಪಾಗುವುದು ।ನಿನ್ನೆಲ್ಲ ಗುಣಗಳುಂ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮದೊಳಗಂತು ॥ಪುಣ್ಯವೋ, ಪಾಪವೋ, ಅಹಿತವೋ, ಹಿತವೊ ಅದು ।ಚೆನ್ನಹುದು ಬೊಮ್ಮನಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೧ ॥ ninna kahi sihiyella kaDaloLu uppAguvudu ।ninnella guNagaLum brahmadoLu antu ॥puNyavO, pApavO, ahitavO, hitavo adu ।chennahudu bommanali  - Mankutimma ॥ 891 ॥All your good and bad experiences (sweet and sour) will dissolve anonymously in the sea (salty). All your qualities are similarly neutralized when you go back to the creator. It may be good karma, bad karma, misery or happiness  - all of them dissolve and look good when it is with the Creator (as whole, and not individual).  - Mankutimma
translation: All your good and bad experiences (sweet and sour) will dissolve anonymously in the sea (salty). All your qualities are similarly neutralized when you go back to the creator. It may be good karma, bad karma, misery or happiness  - all of them dissolve and look good when it is with the Creator (as whole, and not individual).  - Mankutimma
title: ಚೆನ್ನಹುದು ಬೊಮ್ಮನಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: ninna kahi sihiyella kaDaloLu uppAguvudu ।ninnella guNagaLum brahmadoLu antu ॥puNyavO, pApavO, ahitavO, hitavo adu ।chennahudu bommanali  - Mankutimma ॥ 891 ॥
kagga: ನಿನ್ನ ಕಹಿಸಿಹಿಯೆಲ್ಲ ಕಡಲೊಳುಪ್ಪಾಗುವುದು ।ನಿನ್ನೆಲ್ಲ ಗುಣಗಳುಂ ಬ್ರಹ್ಮದೊಳಗಂತು ॥ಪುಣ್ಯವೋ, ಪಾಪವೋ, ಅಹಿತವೋ, ಹಿತವೊ ಅದು ।ಚೆನ್ನಹುದು ಬೊಮ್ಮನಲಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೧ ॥

content: ಹೊರಗೆ, ವಿಶ್ವದಿನಾಚೆ, ದೂರದಲಿ, ನೀಲದಲಿ ।ಒಳಗೆ, ಹೃತ್ಕೂಪದಾಳದಲಿ, ಮಸಕಿನಲಿ ॥ನೆಲೆಗಳಿಂತೆರಡು ಮೂಲ ರಹಸ್ಯಕವುಗಳುಲಿ  ।ಕಲೆತಂದು ನೀಂ ಜ್ಞಾನಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೨ ॥ horage, vishvadin aache, dUradali, nIladali ।oLage, hRut kUpada aaLadali, masakinali ॥nelegaLu intu eraDu mUla rahasyake avugaLa uli ।kaletandu nIm jnAni  - Mankutimma ॥ 892 ॥There are two sources of the universal truth. One is outside, beyond this universe, far away, in the blue of the sky. The other is inside, in the greatest depth of the heart (mind) and hidden. Both of them are telling the same things. When you can listen to them both and reconcile, you will be an enlightened soul.  - Mankutimma
translation: There are two sources of the universal truth. One is outside, beyond this universe, far away, in the blue of the sky. The other is inside, in the greatest depth of the heart (mind) and hidden. Both of them are telling the same things. When you can listen to them both and reconcile, you will be an enlightened soul.  - Mankutimma
title: ಕಲೆತಂದು ನೀಂ ಜ್ಞಾನಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: horage, vishvadin aache, dUradali, nIladali ।oLage, hRut kUpada aaLadali, masakinali ॥nelegaLu intu eraDu mUla rahasyake avugaLa uli ।kaletandu nIm jnAni  - Mankutimma ॥ 892 ॥
kagga: ಹೊರಗೆ, ವಿಶ್ವದಿನಾಚೆ, ದೂರದಲಿ, ನೀಲದಲಿ ।ಒಳಗೆ, ಹೃತ್ಕೂಪದಾಳದಲಿ, ಮಸಕಿನಲಿ ॥ನೆಲೆಗಳಿಂತೆರಡು ಮೂಲ ರಹಸ್ಯಕವುಗಳುಲಿ  ।ಕಲೆತಂದು ನೀಂ ಜ್ಞಾನಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೨ ॥

content: ಸ್ವಪ್ನಲೋಕವ ಜಾಗೃತಂ ಸುಳ್ಳೆನುವನಲ್ತೆ? ।ಸುಪ್ತಂಗೆ ಜಾಗೃತನ ಲೋಕಮುಂ ಸುಳ್ಳೇ ॥ಸ್ವಪ್ನ ಜಾಗ್ರತ್ಸುಪ್ತಿಗಳ ಹಿಂದೆ ನಿರ್ಲಿಪ್ತ- ।ಗುಪ್ತಾತ್ಮನಿಹುದು ದಿಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೩ ॥ svapna lOkava jAgRutam suLLenuvanu alte?।suptange jAgRutana lOkamum suLLE ॥svapna jAgrata suptigala hinde nirlipta ।gupta aatmanihudu diTa  - Mankutimma ॥ 893 ॥When awake one will always say that the dream land is untrue. Right? Similarly, for a person sleeping  - the wakeful world is also untrue. But it is certain that behind the sleeping, alert and the dreaming selfs of a person there is a hidden soul who observes all these and is not influenced by any of these.  - Mankutimma
translation: When awake one will always say that the dream land is untrue. Right? Similarly, for a person sleeping  - the wakeful world is also untrue. But it is certain that behind the sleeping, alert and the dreaming selfs of a person there is a hidden soul who observes all these and is not influenced by any of these.  - Mankutimma
title: ಗುಪ್ತಾತ್ಮನಿಹುದು ದಿಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: svapna lOkava jAgRutam suLLenuvanu alte?।suptange jAgRutana lOkamum suLLE ॥svapna jAgrata suptigala hinde nirlipta ।gupta aatmanihudu diTa  - Mankutimma ॥ 893 ॥
kagga: ಸ್ವಪ್ನಲೋಕವ ಜಾಗೃತಂ ಸುಳ್ಳೆನುವನಲ್ತೆ? ।ಸುಪ್ತಂಗೆ ಜಾಗೃತನ ಲೋಕಮುಂ ಸುಳ್ಳೇ ॥ಸ್ವಪ್ನ ಜಾಗ್ರತ್ಸುಪ್ತಿಗಳ ಹಿಂದೆ ನಿರ್ಲಿಪ್ತ- ।ಗುಪ್ತಾತ್ಮನಿಹುದು ದಿಟ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೩ ॥

content: ಭಾನೂದಯಾಸ್ತಗಳಿನಲ್ತೆ ದಿಕ್ಕಾಲಗಳ ।ಮಾನಗಣಿತವು ನಮಗೆ? ಭಾನುವಿರದೊಡದೇಂ? ॥ಅನಂತ್ಯ, ಶುದ್ಧಸತ್ತಾ ಮಾತ್ರ, ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು ।ಲೀನನಾಗದರೊಳಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೪ ॥ bhAnu udaya astagaLin alte dikku kAlagaLa ।mAna gaNitavu namage? bhAnuviradoDe adEm? ॥anantya, shuddha sattA mAtra, bommanadu ।lInanAgu adaroLage  - Mankutimma ॥ 894 ॥The rise and setting of the Sun is what gives us a scale to measure time and direction (space). Right? What if there was no Sun? All sense of time and direction will fall apart. What then remains is the endless, pure truth of the Creator that has no dependence on time or space. You should shed all feelings that are based on partial truths and dissolve in that supreme pure truth.  - Mankutimma
translation: The rise and setting of the Sun is what gives us a scale to measure time and direction (space). Right? What if there was no Sun? All sense of time and direction will fall apart. What then remains is the endless, pure truth of the Creator that has no dependence on time or space. You should shed all feelings that are based on partial truths and dissolve in that supreme pure truth.  - Mankutimma
title: ಲೀನನಾಗದರೊಳಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bhAnu udaya astagaLin alte dikku kAlagaLa ।mAna gaNitavu namage? bhAnuviradoDe adEm? ॥anantya, shuddha sattA mAtra, bommanadu ।lInanAgu adaroLage  - Mankutimma ॥ 894 ॥
kagga: ಭಾನೂದಯಾಸ್ತಗಳಿನಲ್ತೆ ದಿಕ್ಕಾಲಗಳ ।ಮಾನಗಣಿತವು ನಮಗೆ? ಭಾನುವಿರದೊಡದೇಂ? ॥ಅನಂತ್ಯ, ಶುದ್ಧಸತ್ತಾ ಮಾತ್ರ, ಬೊಮ್ಮನದು ।ಲೀನನಾಗದರೊಳಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೪ ॥

content: ಸಂಕೇತಭಾವಮಯ ಲೋಕಜೀವನದ ನಯ ।ಸಂಖ್ಯೆ ಗುಣ ಹೇತು ಕಾರ್ಯಗಳ ಲಕ್ಷಣದಿಂ- ॥ದಂಕಿತಂಗಳು ಪದಪದಾರ್ಥ ಸಂಬಂಧಗಳು ।ಅಂಕೆ ಮೀರ್ದುದು ಸತ್ತ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೫ ॥ sankEta bhAvamaya lOkajIvanada naya ।snkhye guNa hEtu kAryagaLa lakShaNadinda ॥ankitangaLu pada padArtha sambandhagaLu ।anke mIrdudu sattva  - Mankutimma ॥ 895 ॥In this worldly existence, feelings and names are important. These have origins in numbers, qualities, actions or other characteristics. They form the link between the object and the name it is known by. But the real existence (of the object) is beyond the measuring scale or the name it gets because of it.  - Mankutimma
translation: In this worldly existence, feelings and names are important. These have origins in numbers, qualities, actions or other characteristics. They form the link between the object and the name it is known by. But the real existence (of the object) is beyond the measuring scale or the name it gets because of it.  - Mankutimma
title: ಅಂಕೆ ಮೀರ್ದುದು ಸತ್ತ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sankEta bhAvamaya lOkajIvanada naya ।snkhye guNa hEtu kAryagaLa lakShaNadinda ॥ankitangaLu pada padArtha sambandhagaLu ।anke mIrdudu sattva  - Mankutimma ॥ 895 ॥
kagga: ಸಂಕೇತಭಾವಮಯ ಲೋಕಜೀವನದ ನಯ ।ಸಂಖ್ಯೆ ಗುಣ ಹೇತು ಕಾರ್ಯಗಳ ಲಕ್ಷಣದಿಂ- ॥ದಂಕಿತಂಗಳು ಪದಪದಾರ್ಥ ಸಂಬಂಧಗಳು ।ಅಂಕೆ ಮೀರ್ದುದು ಸತ್ತ್ವ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೫ ॥

content: ಭೌತವಿಜ್ಞಾನ ವಿವರಗಳಿನೇನಾತ್ಮಂಗೆ? ।ಪ್ರೇತಪ್ರಯಾಣಕಥೆಯೆಂತಿರ್ದೊಡೇನು? ॥ಜಾತಿ ನೀತಿ ಸಮಾಜ ವರ್ಗ ಭೇದದಿನೇನು? ।ಘಾತಿಯಿಲ್ಲಾತ್ಮಂಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೬ ॥ bhauta vijnAna vivaragaLin Enu aatmange? ।prEta prayANa katheyu entirdoDe Enu? ॥jAti nIti samAja varga bhEdadin Enu? ।ghAtiyilla aatmange  - Mankutimma ॥ 896 ॥What has the soul got to do with the details of physical science? What does one have to do with different stories about the afterlife? What has one got to do with all the divisions in the society based on caste, morality and other social norms? The soul is not hurt by any of these. It remains pure and untouched by anything that is temporary.  - Mankutimma
translation: What has the soul got to do with the details of physical science? What does one have to do with different stories about the afterlife? What has one got to do with all the divisions in the society based on caste, morality and other social norms? The soul is not hurt by any of these. It remains pure and untouched by anything that is temporary.  - Mankutimma
title: ಘಾತಿಯಿಲ್ಲಾತ್ಮಂಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: bhauta vijnAna vivaragaLin Enu aatmange? ।prEta prayANa katheyu entirdoDe Enu? ॥jAti nIti samAja varga bhEdadin Enu? ।ghAtiyilla aatmange  - Mankutimma ॥ 896 ॥
kagga: ಭೌತವಿಜ್ಞಾನ ವಿವರಗಳಿನೇನಾತ್ಮಂಗೆ? ।ಪ್ರೇತಪ್ರಯಾಣಕಥೆಯೆಂತಿರ್ದೊಡೇನು? ॥ಜಾತಿ ನೀತಿ ಸಮಾಜ ವರ್ಗ ಭೇದದಿನೇನು? ।ಘಾತಿಯಿಲ್ಲಾತ್ಮಂಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೬ ॥

content: ಶೂನ್ಯವೆಲ್ಲವುಮೆಂಬೊಡಂತೆನಿಸುವುದದೇನು? ।ಅನ್ಯವಿಲ್ಲೆನುವರಿವದೊಂದಿರ್ಪುದಲ್ತೆ? ॥ಚಿನ್ಮಯವನದನೆ ನೀಂ ಸತ್ಯವೆಂದಾಶ್ರಯಿಸು ।ಶೂನ್ಯವಾದವೆ ಶೂನ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೭ ॥ shUnyavellavum emboDe antenisuvudu adEnu? ।anyavilla enuva arivu adondirpudalte? ॥chinmayavanu adane nIm satyavendu aashrayisu ।shUnyavAdave shUnya  - Mankutimma ॥ 897 ॥There is a school of thought that proposes that nothing exists. Existence is nothing but a big zero. But what is that one can feel to be existing? If not anything, there is at least the feeling that nothing else exists. That feeling is at least very real. That is just a thought. You should consider it as the truth and surrender to it. In reality, the zero existence logic itself is a big zero.  - Mankutimma
translation: There is a school of thought that proposes that nothing exists. Existence is nothing but a big zero. But what is that one can feel to be existing? If not anything, there is at least the feeling that nothing else exists. That feeling is at least very real. That is just a thought. You should consider it as the truth and surrender to it. In reality, the zero existence logic itself is a big zero.  - Mankutimma
title: ಶೂನ್ಯವಾದವೆ ಶೂನ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: shUnyavellavum emboDe antenisuvudu adEnu? ।anyavilla enuva arivu adondirpudalte? ॥chinmayavanu adane nIm satyavendu aashrayisu ।shUnyavAdave shUnya  - Mankutimma ॥ 897 ॥
kagga: ಶೂನ್ಯವೆಲ್ಲವುಮೆಂಬೊಡಂತೆನಿಸುವುದದೇನು? ।ಅನ್ಯವಿಲ್ಲೆನುವರಿವದೊಂದಿರ್ಪುದಲ್ತೆ? ॥ಚಿನ್ಮಯವನದನೆ ನೀಂ ಸತ್ಯವೆಂದಾಶ್ರಯಿಸು ।ಶೂನ್ಯವಾದವೆ ಶೂನ್ಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೭ ॥

content: ನರನರೀ ಚಿತ್ರಗಳು, ನಾಟಕದ ಪಾತ್ರಗಳು ।ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ವೇಷಗಳು, ವಿವಿಧ ಭಾಷೆಗಳು ॥ಬರುತಿಹುವು, ಬೆರಗನರಸಿ ಮೆರೆಯುವುವು, ತೆರಳುವುವು ।ಮೆರವಣಿಗೆಯೋ ಲೋಕ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೮ ॥ naranarI chitragaLu, nATakada pAtragaLu।paripariya vEShagaLu, vividha bhAShegaLu ॥barutihuvu, beraganarasi mereyuvuvu, teraLuvuvu ।meravaNigeyO lOka  - Mankutimma ॥ 898 ॥This world is a procession. There are pictures of people and foxes. There are characters of a play. Various kinds of dresses, various languages. The come in search of excitement, rejoice and leave. This world is a wonderful procession.  - Mankutimma
translation: This world is a procession. There are pictures of people and foxes. There are characters of a play. Various kinds of dresses, various languages. The come in search of excitement, rejoice and leave. This world is a wonderful procession.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೆರವಣಿಗೆಯೋ ಲೋಕ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: naranarI chitragaLu, nATakada pAtragaLu।paripariya vEShagaLu, vividha bhAShegaLu ॥barutihuvu, beraganarasi mereyuvuvu, teraLuvuvu ।meravaNigeyO lOka  - Mankutimma ॥ 898 ॥
kagga: ನರನರೀ ಚಿತ್ರಗಳು, ನಾಟಕದ ಪಾತ್ರಗಳು ।ಪರಿಪರಿಯ ವೇಷಗಳು, ವಿವಿಧ ಭಾಷೆಗಳು ॥ಬರುತಿಹುವು, ಬೆರಗನರಸಿ ಮೆರೆಯುವುವು, ತೆರಳುವುವು ।ಮೆರವಣಿಗೆಯೋ ಲೋಕ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೮ ॥

content: ಜಗದೀ ಜಗತ್ತ್ವವನು, ಮಾಯಾವಿಚಿತ್ರವನು ।ಒಗೆದಾಚೆ ಬಿಸುಡೆಲ್ಲ ಕರಣವೇದ್ಯವನು ॥ಮಿಗುವುದೇಂ? ರೂಪಾಖ್ಯೆಯೊಂದುಮಿಲ್ಲದ ವಸ್ತು ।ಹೊಗಿಸಾ ಕಡೆಗೆ ಮತಿಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೯ ॥ jagada ii jagattvavanu, mAyA vichitravanu ।ogedu aache bisuDu ella karaNa vEdyavanu ॥miguvudEm? rUpAkhyeyondum illada vastu ।hogisA kaDege matiya  - Mankutimma ॥ 899 ॥Keep aside all things worldly about this world  - the matter, the illusion and so on. Throw away everything that is perceived by senses only. What is left is the universal truth  - something that has no form and dependence. Let your mind flow towards that.  - Mankutimma
translation: Keep aside all things worldly about this world  - the matter, the illusion and so on. Throw away everything that is perceived by senses only. What is left is the universal truth  - something that has no form and dependence. Let your mind flow towards that.  - Mankutimma
title: ಹೊಗಿಸಾ ಕಡೆಗೆ ಮತಿಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: jagada ii jagattvavanu, mAyA vichitravanu ।ogedu aache bisuDu ella karaNa vEdyavanu ॥miguvudEm? rUpAkhyeyondum illada vastu ।hogisA kaDege matiya  - Mankutimma ॥ 899 ॥
kagga: ಜಗದೀ ಜಗತ್ತ್ವವನು, ಮಾಯಾವಿಚಿತ್ರವನು ।ಒಗೆದಾಚೆ ಬಿಸುಡೆಲ್ಲ ಕರಣವೇದ್ಯವನು ॥ಮಿಗುವುದೇಂ? ರೂಪಾಖ್ಯೆಯೊಂದುಮಿಲ್ಲದ ವಸ್ತು ।ಹೊಗಿಸಾ ಕಡೆಗೆ ಮತಿಯ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮೯೯ ॥

content: ಸುತ್ತ ಮುತ್ತಣ ಗಾಳಿಯಾವಗಂ‌ ನಮ್ಮೊಡಲ- ।ನೊತ್ತಿದೊಡಮಾ ಹೊರೆಯ ಮನಸು ಕಾಣದವೋಲ್ ॥ಬಿತ್ತರದ ಲೋಕಭಾರವನಾತ್ಮನರಿಯದಿರೆ ।ಮುಕ್ತ ಲಕ್ಷಣವದುವೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೦ ॥ sutta muttaNa gALiyu aavagam nammoDalanu ।ottidoDam aa horeya manasu kANadavOl ॥bittarada lOkabhAravanu aatmanu ariyadire ।mukta lakShaNavaduve  - Mankutimma ॥ 900 ॥There is air around us exerting pressure on our bodies. But our mind does not take notice of this pressure. Just like that the day when our soul does not take notice of the pressure the rest of the world puts on us  - we can call ourselves as liberated (attained salvation or nirvana).  - Mankutimma
translation: There is air around us exerting pressure on our bodies. But our mind does not take notice of this pressure. Just like that the day when our soul does not take notice of the pressure the rest of the world puts on us  - we can call ourselves as liberated (attained salvation or nirvana).  - Mankutimma
title: ಮುಕ್ತ ಲಕ್ಷಣವದುವೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sutta muttaNa gALiyu aavagam nammoDalanu ।ottidoDam aa horeya manasu kANadavOl ॥bittarada lOkabhAravanu aatmanu ariyadire ।mukta lakShaNavaduve  - Mankutimma ॥ 900 ॥
kagga: ಸುತ್ತ ಮುತ್ತಣ ಗಾಳಿಯಾವಗಂ‌ ನಮ್ಮೊಡಲ- ।ನೊತ್ತಿದೊಡಮಾ ಹೊರೆಯ ಮನಸು ಕಾಣದವೋಲ್ ॥ಬಿತ್ತರದ ಲೋಕಭಾರವನಾತ್ಮನರಿಯದಿರೆ ।ಮುಕ್ತ ಲಕ್ಷಣವದುವೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೦ ॥

content: ನಾನು ನಾನೇ ನಾನೆನುತ್ತೆ ಕಿರಿಕೊಡದ ನೀರ್ ।ಗಾನಗೆಯ್ವುದು ಹೆಮ್ಮೆಯಿಂ ಕಡಲ ಮರೆತು ॥ನೂನದಿಂದೆಲ್ಲವನುವಬ್ಧಿಯೊಳಗದನಿರಿಸೆ ।ಮೌನವದು ಮಣ್ಕರಗಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೧ ॥ nAnu nAnE nAnu enutte kiri koDada nIr ।gAna geyvudu hemmeyim kaDala maretu ॥nUnadinda ella anuva abdhiyoLage adanu irise ।maunavadu maN karagi  - Mankutimma ॥ 901 ॥The water in the little pot will make a lot of noise. It will sing merrily having forgotten about the ocean. The water of the ocean on the other hand will speak a lot by its silence. If you put the pot into the sea, the mud dissolves and the water from the pot will unite with water outside and become silent.  - Mankutimma
translation: The water in the little pot will make a lot of noise. It will sing merrily having forgotten about the ocean. The water of the ocean on the other hand will speak a lot by its silence. If you put the pot into the sea, the mud dissolves and the water from the pot will unite with water outside and become silent.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೌನವದು ಮಣ್ಕರಗಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: nAnu nAnE nAnu enutte kiri koDada nIr ।gAna geyvudu hemmeyim kaDala maretu ॥nUnadinda ella anuva abdhiyoLage adanu irise ।maunavadu maN karagi  - Mankutimma ॥ 901 ॥
kagga: ನಾನು ನಾನೇ ನಾನೆನುತ್ತೆ ಕಿರಿಕೊಡದ ನೀರ್ ।ಗಾನಗೆಯ್ವುದು ಹೆಮ್ಮೆಯಿಂ ಕಡಲ ಮರೆತು ॥ನೂನದಿಂದೆಲ್ಲವನುವಬ್ಧಿಯೊಳಗದನಿರಿಸೆ ।ಮೌನವದು ಮಣ್ಕರಗಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೧ ॥

content: ಮಲಗಿದೋದುಗನ ಕೈಹೊತ್ತಿಗೆಯು ನಿದ್ದೆಯಲಿ ।ಕಳಚಿ ಬೀಳ್ವುದು; ಪಕ್ವಫಲವಂತು ತರುವಿಂ ॥ಇಳೆಯ ಸಂಬಂಧಗಳು ಸಂಕಲ್ಪನಿಯಮಗಳು ।ಸಡಿಲುವುವು ಬಾಳ್ ಮಾಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೨ ॥ malagi Odugana kaihottigeyu niddeyali ।kaLachi bILvudu; pakva phalavantu taruvim ॥iLeya sambandhagaLu sankalpa niyamagaLu ।saDiluvuvu bAL mAge   - Mankutimma ॥ 902 ॥If a person lies down and reads a book, sleep will slowly take over and the book will slip from his hand. Similarly, when ripe a fruit shall fall down by itself. Just like that, when one accumulates enough experience in life he will drop all association with this world, the goals, the rules  - everything will dissolve.  - Mankutimma
translation: If a person lies down and reads a book, sleep will slowly take over and the book will slip from his hand. Similarly, when ripe a fruit shall fall down by itself. Just like that, when one accumulates enough experience in life he will drop all association with this world, the goals, the rules  - everything will dissolve.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಡಿಲುವುವು ಬಾಳ್ ಮಾಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: malagi Odugana kaihottigeyu niddeyali ।kaLachi bILvudu; pakva phalavantu taruvim ॥iLeya sambandhagaLu sankalpa niyamagaLu ।saDiluvuvu bAL mAge   - Mankutimma ॥ 902 ॥
kagga: ಮಲಗಿದೋದುಗನ ಕೈಹೊತ್ತಿಗೆಯು ನಿದ್ದೆಯಲಿ ।ಕಳಚಿ ಬೀಳ್ವುದು; ಪಕ್ವಫಲವಂತು ತರುವಿಂ ॥ಇಳೆಯ ಸಂಬಂಧಗಳು ಸಂಕಲ್ಪನಿಯಮಗಳು ।ಸಡಿಲುವುವು ಬಾಳ್ ಮಾಗೆ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೨ ॥

content: ಮೋಕ್ಷದಾಶೆಯೊಳಮತ್ಯಾತುರತೆಯೊಳಿತಲ್ಲ ।ಶಿಕ್ಷೆ ಬಹುಕಾಲ ನಡೆಯದೆ ಮೋಕ್ಷವಿಲ್ಲ ॥ಲಕ್ಷ್ಯ ತಪ್ಪದೆ ಚರಿಸು ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯಧರ್ಮಗಳ ।ಮೋಕ್ಷ ಸ್ವತಸ್ಸಿದ್ದ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೩ ॥ mOkShada aasheyoLum ati aaturateyu oLitalla ।shikShe bahukAla naDeyade mOkShavilla ॥lakShya tappade charisu sAmAnya dharmagaLa ।mOkSha svatassidda  - Mankutimma ॥ 903 ॥In the pursuit of salvation (nirvana), one must not hurry a lot. Salvation is not possible without a lot of suffering. One must not lose sight of the goal and always follow the path of common morality. Salvation is certain when you do so. It is only a matter of when.  - Mankutimma
translation: In the pursuit of salvation (nirvana), one must not hurry a lot. Salvation is not possible without a lot of suffering. One must not lose sight of the goal and always follow the path of common morality. Salvation is certain when you do so. It is only a matter of when.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮೋಕ್ಷ ಸ್ವತಸ್ಸಿದ್ದ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: mOkShada aasheyoLum ati aaturateyu oLitalla ।shikShe bahukAla naDeyade mOkShavilla ॥lakShya tappade charisu sAmAnya dharmagaLa ।mOkSha svatassidda  - Mankutimma ॥ 903 ॥

content: ವಹಿಸು ಕೆಲ ಭಾರಗಳ; ಸಹಿಸು ಕೆಲ ನೋವುಗಳ ।ಪ್ರಹರಿಸರಿಗಳನನಿತು ಯುಕ್ತಗಳನರಿತು ॥ಮಹಿಯ ನಾಟಕದಿ ನೀಂ ಮನಸಿಟ್ಟು ಕುಣಿಕುಣಿದು ।ವಿಹರಿಸಾತ್ಮಾಲಯದಿ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೪ ॥ vahisu kela bhAragaLa; sahisu kela nOvugaLa ।praharisu arigaLanu anitu yuktagaLanu aritu ॥mahiya nATakadi nIm manasiTTu kuNikuNidu ।viharisu aatmAlayadi  - Mankutimma ॥ 904 ॥Shoulder some responsibilities. Suffer some pain. Attack your enemies a bit. While doing so, never lose sight of right and wrong. Dance well in the drama of this world. Lead a happy dancing life in your palace of the soul.  - Mankutimma
translation: Shoulder some responsibilities. Suffer some pain. Attack your enemies a bit. While doing so, never lose sight of right and wrong. Dance well in the drama of this world. Lead a happy dancing life in your palace of the soul.  - Mankutimma
title: ವಿಹರಿಸಾತ್ಮಾಲಯದಿ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: vahisu kela bhAragaLa; sahisu kela nOvugaLa ।praharisu arigaLanu anitu yuktagaLanu aritu ॥mahiya nATakadi nIm manasiTTu kuNikuNidu ।viharisu aatmAlayadi  - Mankutimma ॥ 904 ॥
kagga: ವಹಿಸು ಕೆಲ ಭಾರಗಳ; ಸಹಿಸು ಕೆಲ ನೋವುಗಳ ।ಪ್ರಹರಿಸರಿಗಳನನಿತು ಯುಕ್ತಗಳನರಿತು ॥ಮಹಿಯ ನಾಟಕದಿ ನೀಂ ಮನಸಿಟ್ಟು ಕುಣಿಕುಣಿದು ।ವಿಹರಿಸಾತ್ಮಾಲಯದಿ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೪ ॥

content: ಶ್ವಾನ ತಿಪ್ಪೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ ಮಲಗಿರಲು ಪೂರ್ವಿಕ- ।ಜ್ಞಾನ ಪಶ್ಚಾತ್ತಾಪ ಶುಭಚಿಂತೆಯಂತೆ ॥ಏನೋ ವಾಸನೆ ಬೀಸಲದು ಹಾರಿ ದುಮುಕುವುದು ।ಮಾನವನ ಮನಸಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೫ ॥ shvAna tippeya mEle malagiralu pUrvika- ।jnAna pashchAttApa shubha chinteyante ॥EnO vAsane bIsalu adu hAri dumukuvudu ।mAnavana manasantu  - Mankutimma ॥ 905 ॥When a dog is sleeping peaceful on a pile of garbage, one may think that it is contemplating on the wisdom of its ancestors, or repenting for some action, or just thinking about something good and pleasant. But once there is a whiff of something (tasty) it will jump from there and follow the smell. Human mind is also thus. It is hard to find peace. Even when found, it is very easily disturbed by distractions.  - Mankutimma
translation: When a dog is sleeping peaceful on a pile of garbage, one may think that it is contemplating on the wisdom of its ancestors, or repenting for some action, or just thinking about something good and pleasant. But once there is a whiff of something (tasty) it will jump from there and follow the smell. Human mind is also thus. It is hard to find peace. Even when found, it is very easily disturbed by distractions.  - Mankutimma
title: ಮಾನವನ ಮನಸಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: shvAna tippeya mEle malagiralu pUrvika- ।jnAna pashchAttApa shubha chinteyante ॥EnO vAsane bIsalu adu hAri dumukuvudu ।mAnavana manasantu  - Mankutimma ॥ 905 ॥
kagga: ಶ್ವಾನ ತಿಪ್ಪೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ ಮಲಗಿರಲು ಪೂರ್ವಿಕ- ।ಜ್ಞಾನ ಪಶ್ಚಾತ್ತಾಪ ಶುಭಚಿಂತೆಯಂತೆ ॥ಏನೋ ವಾಸನೆ ಬೀಸಲದು ಹಾರಿ ದುಮುಕುವುದು ।ಮಾನವನ ಮನಸಂತು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೫ ॥

content: ತತ್ತ್ವಸಾಕ್ಷಾತ್ಕಾರ ಚಿತ್ತಶುದ್ಧಿಯಿನಹುದು ।ಚಿತ್ತಶೋಧನೆ ಮತಿಚಮತ್ಕಾರವಲ್ಲ ॥ಬಿತ್ತರದ ಲೋಕಪರಿಪಾಕದಿಂ, ಸತ್ಕರ್ಮ ।ಸಕ್ತಿಯಿಂ ಶುದ್ಧತೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೬ ॥ tattva sAkShAtkAra chitta shuddhiyin ahudu ।chitta shOdhane mati chamatkAravalla ॥bittarada lOka paripAkadim, satkarma ।saktiyim shuddhateyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 906 ॥Realization of the ultimate truth is not possible unless you mind is pure. Cleaning one;s mind is a not a magic (trick) known to the intellect. One must learn a lot from the world around him, live life doing good deeds  - that will give a strength that can make (and keep) the mind pure.  - Mankutimma
translation: Realization of the ultimate truth is not possible unless you mind is pure. Cleaning one;s mind is a not a magic (trick) known to the intellect. One must learn a lot from the world around him, live life doing good deeds  - that will give a strength that can make (and keep) the mind pure.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸಕ್ತಿಯಿಂ ಶುದ್ಧತೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tattva sAkShAtkAra chitta shuddhiyin ahudu ।chitta shOdhane mati chamatkAravalla ॥bittarada lOka paripAkadim, satkarma ।saktiyim shuddhateyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 906 ॥
kagga: ತತ್ತ್ವಸಾಕ್ಷಾತ್ಕಾರ ಚಿತ್ತಶುದ್ಧಿಯಿನಹುದು ।ಚಿತ್ತಶೋಧನೆ ಮತಿಚಮತ್ಕಾರವಲ್ಲ ॥ಬಿತ್ತರದ ಲೋಕಪರಿಪಾಕದಿಂ, ಸತ್ಕರ್ಮ ।ಸಕ್ತಿಯಿಂ ಶುದ್ಧತೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೬ ॥

content: ತನುರುಜೆಗೆ ಪಥ್ಯಾನ್ನ, ಬಾಯ ಚಪಲಕ್ಕಲ್ಲ ।ಮನದ ಶಿಕ್ಷೆ ಲೋಕ, ಮಮಕಾರಕಲ್ಲ ॥ಗುಣಚರ್ಯೆ ವಿಶ್ವಸಮರಸಕೆ, ಕಾಮಿತಕಲ್ಲ ।ಮುನಿವೃತ್ತಿ ಸೂತ್ರವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೭ ॥ tanurujege pathyAnna, bAya chapalakkalla ।manada shikShe lOka, mamakArakalla ॥guNacharye vishvasamarasake, kAmitakalla ।munivRutti sUtravidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 907 ॥One must follow diet to keep in good health  - not because one likes the diet menu. The world exists to punish the mind,not to be loved. One must possess laudable qualities to preserve order in this world, not to gain anything. These are a code a sage has to live by.   - Mankutimma
translation: One must follow diet to keep in good health  - not because one likes the diet menu. The world exists to punish the mind,not to be loved. One must possess laudable qualities to preserve order in this world, not to gain anything. These are a code a sage has to live by.   - Mankutimma
title: ಮುನಿವೃತ್ತಿ ಸೂತ್ರವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tanurujege pathyAnna, bAya chapalakkalla ।manada shikShe lOka, mamakArakalla ॥guNacharye vishvasamarasake, kAmitakalla ।munivRutti sUtravidu  - Mankutimma ॥ 907 ॥
kagga: ತನುರುಜೆಗೆ ಪಥ್ಯಾನ್ನ, ಬಾಯ ಚಪಲಕ್ಕಲ್ಲ ।ಮನದ ಶಿಕ್ಷೆ ಲೋಕ, ಮಮಕಾರಕಲ್ಲ ॥ಗುಣಚರ್ಯೆ ವಿಶ್ವಸಮರಸಕೆ, ಕಾಮಿತಕಲ್ಲ ।ಮುನಿವೃತ್ತಿ ಸೂತ್ರವಿದು  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೭ ॥

content: ತ್ಯಜಿಸಿ ಭುಜಿಸಲ್ಕಲಿತವನೆ ಜಗಕೆ ಯಜಮಾನ ।ನಿಜಕುಕ್ಷಿ ಚಿಂತೆಯೇಂ ಮೊದಲು ಮನೆತಾಯ್ಗೆ? ॥ಭುಜಿಪ ಪತಿಸುತರೊಪ್ಪು ತುಪ್ಪವವಳೂಟಕ್ಕೆ ।ಭಜಿಸು ನೀನಾ ವ್ರತವ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೮ ॥ tyajisi bhujisal kalitavane jagake yajamAna ।nija kukShi chinteyEm modalu mane tAyge? ॥bhujipa pati sutara oppu tuppavu avaLUTakke ।bhajisu nInu aa vratava  - Mankutimma ॥ 908 ॥If one learns to live by sacrificing for the sake of others, he will own the entire world. A mother (in a household) is never worried about her own stomach. If the husband and the children eat well and become happy, she will feel as if she has just eaten ghee. One must follow this ideal.  - Mankutimma
translation: If one learns to live by sacrificing for the sake of others, he will own the entire world. A mother (in a household) is never worried about her own stomach. If the husband and the children eat well and become happy, she will feel as if she has just eaten ghee. One must follow this ideal.  - Mankutimma
title: ಭಜಿಸು ನೀನಾ ವ್ರತವ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: tyajisi bhujisal kalitavane jagake yajamAna ।nija kukShi chinteyEm modalu mane tAyge? ॥bhujipa pati sutara oppu tuppavu avaLUTakke ।bhajisu nInu aa vratava  - Mankutimma ॥ 908 ॥
kagga: ತ್ಯಜಿಸಿ ಭುಜಿಸಲ್ಕಲಿತವನೆ ಜಗಕೆ ಯಜಮಾನ ।ನಿಜಕುಕ್ಷಿ ಚಿಂತೆಯೇಂ ಮೊದಲು ಮನೆತಾಯ್ಗೆ? ॥ಭುಜಿಪ ಪತಿಸುತರೊಪ್ಪು ತುಪ್ಪವವಳೂಟಕ್ಕೆ ।ಭಜಿಸು ನೀನಾ ವ್ರತವ- ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೮ ॥

content: ಮಗುವಾಗಿ ಬೊಂಬೆಗೆಂದತ್ತು ಪಿರಿಯರ ಕಾಡಿ ।ಜಗದುಣಿಸುಗಳನುಂಡು ಬೆಳೆದವಂ ತಾನೆ ॥ಮಗುಗಳನು ಬೆಳೆಸುತ್ತ ಮೆನೆಯನಾಳುವವೋಲು ।ಜಗವನಾಳ್ವನು ಜಾಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೯ ॥ maguvAgi bombegendattu piriyara kADi ।jagada uNisugaLan unDu beLedavam tAne ॥magugaLanu beLesutta maneyanu aaLuvavOlu ।jagavanu aaLvanu jANa  - Mankutimma ॥ 909 ॥When one is still a child, he would cry and pester the elders for a doll. In time, he grows up savoring all the worldly experiences and becomes wise and responsible. He will have his children to bring up  - who will now cry and pester for dolls. He will handle them with a fatherly hat  - doing what is best in the child;s interest. If one also behaves the same way with the world (understanding and fatherly) then he is really wise.  - Mankutimma
translation: When one is still a child, he would cry and pester the elders for a doll. In time, he grows up savoring all the worldly experiences and becomes wise and responsible. He will have his children to bring up  - who will now cry and pester for dolls. He will handle them with a fatherly hat  - doing what is best in the child;s interest. If one also behaves the same way with the world (understanding and fatherly) then he is really wise.  - Mankutimma
title: ಜಗವನಾಳ್ವನು ಜಾಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: maguvAgi bombegendattu piriyara kADi ।jagada uNisugaLan unDu beLedavam tAne ॥magugaLanu beLesutta maneyanu aaLuvavOlu ।jagavanu aaLvanu jANa  - Mankutimma ॥ 909 ॥
kagga: ಮಗುವಾಗಿ ಬೊಂಬೆಗೆಂದತ್ತು ಪಿರಿಯರ ಕಾಡಿ ।ಜಗದುಣಿಸುಗಳನುಂಡು ಬೆಳೆದವಂ ತಾನೆ ॥ಮಗುಗಳನು ಬೆಳೆಸುತ್ತ ಮೆನೆಯನಾಳುವವೋಲು ।ಜಗವನಾಳ್ವನು ಜಾಣ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೦೯ ॥

content: ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯರೊಳ್ ಪುಟ್ಟಿ, ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯರೊಳ್ ಬೆಳೆದು ।ಭೂಮಿಪತಿಪಟ್ಟವನು ಜನ ತನಗೆ ಕಟ್ಟಲ್ ॥ಸಾಮರ್ಥ್ಯದಿಂದವರನಾಳ್ದ ಲಿಂಕನನಂತೆ ।ಸ್ವಾಮಿ ಲೋಕಕೆ ಯೋಗಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೧೦ ॥ sAmAnyaroL puTTi, sAmAnyaroL beLedu ।bhUmipati paTTavanu jana tanage kaTTal ॥sAmarthyadinda avaranu aaLda linkana nante ।svAmi lOkake yOgi  - Mankutimma ॥ 910 ॥He was born among he common. Grew up among the common. But then the people gave him the responsibility of the governing, he executed it very well  - fair, just and courageously. Only a person with good morals like Lincoln (like a yogi) can become the king and rule the whole world.  - Mankutimma
translation: He was born among he common. Grew up among the common. But then the people gave him the responsibility of the governing, he executed it very well  - fair, just and courageously. Only a person with good morals like Lincoln (like a yogi) can become the king and rule the whole world.  - Mankutimma
title: ಸ್ವಾಮಿ ಲೋಕಕೆ ಯೋಗಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: sAmAnyaroL puTTi, sAmAnyaroL beLedu ।bhUmipati paTTavanu jana tanage kaTTal ॥sAmarthyadinda avaranu aaLda linkana nante ।svAmi lOkake yOgi  - Mankutimma ॥ 910 ॥
kagga: ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯರೊಳ್ ಪುಟ್ಟಿ, ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯರೊಳ್ ಬೆಳೆದು ।ಭೂಮಿಪತಿಪಟ್ಟವನು ಜನ ತನಗೆ ಕಟ್ಟಲ್ ॥ಸಾಮರ್ಥ್ಯದಿಂದವರನಾಳ್ದ ಲಿಂಕನನಂತೆ ।ಸ್ವಾಮಿ ಲೋಕಕೆ ಯೋಗಿ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೧೦ ॥

content: ರಣದಿ ಬಿದ್ದಾ ನೈನ್ಯಪತಿ ಸಿಡ್ನಿಯುತ್ಕ್ರಮಣ- ।ದೊಣಗುಬಾಯಿಗೆ ನೀರ್ನೊಡ್ಡಲ್ ಅದನವನು ॥ತನಗಿಂತ ಕೆಲದ ಭಟಗದು ಸಲ್ವುದೆಂದಿತ್ತು ।ತಣಿವನಾಂತುದ ನೆನೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೧೧ ॥ raNadi bidda aa sainya pati siDniya utkramaNada  ।oNagu bAyige nIran oDDal adanu avanu ॥tanaginta kelada bhaTagadu salvudu endittu ।taNivan aantuda neneyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 911 ॥Sidney was a English Knight. He was injured badly in a battle against Spain. On his death bed, in spite of being very thirsty he refused to take water telling that another soldier lying next to him need it more than him. He derived satisfaction from the uncompromising practice of morality. Remember him and his acts.  - Mankutimma
translation: Sidney was a English Knight. He was injured badly in a battle against Spain. On his death bed, in spite of being very thirsty he refused to take water telling that another soldier lying next to him need it more than him. He derived satisfaction from the uncompromising practice of morality. Remember him and his acts.  - Mankutimma
title: ತಣಿವನಾಂತುದ ನೆನೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: raNadi bidda aa sainya pati siDniya utkramaNada  ।oNagu bAyige nIran oDDal adanu avanu ॥tanaginta kelada bhaTagadu salvudu endittu ।taNivan aantuda neneyo  - Mankutimma ॥ 911 ॥
kagga: ರಣದಿ ಬಿದ್ದಾ ನೈನ್ಯಪತಿ ಸಿಡ್ನಿಯುತ್ಕ್ರಮಣ- ।ದೊಣಗುಬಾಯಿಗೆ ನೀರ್ನೊಡ್ಡಲ್ ಅದನವನು ॥ತನಗಿಂತ ಕೆಲದ ಭಟಗದು ಸಲ್ವುದೆಂದಿತ್ತು ।ತಣಿವನಾಂತುದ ನೆನೆಯೊ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೧೧ ॥

content: ಇಂದ್ರಿಯಗಳೊಳು ಬಾಳಿ ಜೀವ ಪಕ್ವಂಗೊಳ್ಳ- ।ಲಿಂದ್ರಿಯಂಗಳ ಮೀರಿ ಮೇಲೇರಿ ಜಾಣಿಂ- ॥ದಿಂದ್ರಿಯಂಗಳನಾಳಿ ಲೋಕವಂ ಸಂತಯಿಪ ।ಬಂಧು ಜೀವನ್ಮುಕ್ತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯೧೨ ॥ indriyagaLoLu bALi jIva pakvangoLLalu ।indriyangaLa mIri mElEri jANinda ॥indriyangaLanu aaLi lOkavam santayipa  ।bandhu jIvanmukta  - Mankutimma ॥ 912 ॥One has to live in this world known to his senses and get all teh experiences he can. Then he has to reach out to (think about) entities that are extra sensory  - God, Universe, etc.. Once he has a handle on that, then he can control his own senses and create happiness in this world. Such a wise person will attain salvation from the endless cycle of births.  - Mankutimma
translation: One has to live in this world known to his senses and get all teh experiences he can. Then he has to reach out to (think about) entities that are extra sensory  - God, Universe, etc.. Once he has a handle on that, then he can control his own senses and create happiness in this world. Such a wise person will attain salvation from the endless cycle of births.  - Mankutimma
title: ಬಂಧು ಜೀವನ್ಮುಕ್ತ  - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ
transliteration: indriyagaLoLu bALi jIva pakvangoLLalu ।indriyangaLa mIri mElEri jANinda ॥indriyangaLanu aaLi lOkavam santayipa  ।bandhu jIvanmukta  - Mankutimma ॥ 912 ॥
